T'eh er enney ain myr "Ayr y Vyn-vioagh-oaylleeaght", as t'eh coontit myr y chied vyn-vioagh-oayllee. Ta enney share er er son yn obbyr echey er lhiassaghey'n vynreayrtan as er son e chohoyrtyssyn da bunneydys y vyn-vioagh-oaylleeaght. Ren eh ymmyd jeh ny mynreayrtyn laue-jeant echey dy yannoo baghtyn as coontaghyn er bioagyn un-chillagh, as eh cur yn ennym "animalcules" orroo, as ta er fys ain jiu myr myn-vioagyn. Myrane lesh shen, v'eh ny chied ghooiney dy yannoo recortyssyn baghtalagh mynreayrtagh er frauaigyn muskyl, bacteyryn, spermatozoa as stroo folley ayns myn-eddanyn (feddanyn folley beggey). Cha screeu Van Leeuwenhoek lioaryn, agh screeu eh lettyryn.

Airnag:
She billey ee airnag, as fo-ghooie phlumbis. Ta messyn drupagh yn-ee eck, as soo as gleihagh jeant jeu. Ta ny liggaryn jeneeve as "slivovitz" jeant jeu myrgeddin.
Ta messyn oochrooagh eck. Ta'n crackan oc gorrym dorraghey dys plooreenagh, as y feill oc buigh-ghlass. T'ad gollrish airnyn, agh t'adsyn ny sloo as crackan jiarg-gorrym ny buigh oc. Ta'n crackan oc geayragh, as myr shen, cha nel ad goll er ee myr t'ad dy cadjin.
Ta blaaghyn beggey baney eck.

Aittin:
She genus dy chrouwyn sheer-ghlassey jialgagh eh aittin (ny aadjin, conney). T'ad ayns kynney Fabaceae ny pishyryn. Ta aittin dooghyssagh da'n Europey heear as yn Affrick heear-hwoaie, as ta'n chooid smoo jeh dooieyn cummal 'syn Ibeir.
Ta faggys-mooinjerys eddyr aittin as conney skeab, agh ta'n aittin feer jialgagh. Ta duillagyn tree filley ec fir aegey, agh t'ad jannoo jialgyn assdaue ny s'anmey. Ta blaaghyn beggey buighey eck.
T'eh gaase dy mie er thalloo boght as claghagh. Ta jargaght echey dy hashtey neetragien, as myr shen, ta ymmyd jeant jeu er son dy lhiasaghey thalloo, myr sampleyr, er ynnydyn shenn veainyn.

Conney (reddaghey):
Ta ymmodee keeallyn ec conney. Foddee eh çheet er:

Aane ushtey:
She rheynn dy lossreeyn bryophytagh (neuchuishlagh) eh Marchantiophyta, as t'ad cur aane ushtey ny lus ny haane er ny lossreeyn hene. Myr aght cadjin ny Bryophyta, ta corys bea gametophyte-hrome oc, choud's nagh vel agh un 'oirran dy chroymasoomyn oc.
T'ad ry-akin er feie ny cruinney ayns dagh çhymbyllaght, bunneys. Bare lhieu ardjyn tash, agh ta dooieyn arctagh as faasagh ayns myrgeddin. Ta kuse jeu nyn sarkylyn ayns garaghyn as thieyn glonney. T'ad beg, agh foddee kuse dy ghooie skeaylley harrish eaghtyr mooar. 
Jalloo-oaylleeaght.
T'ad beg son y chooid smoo, eddyr 2-20mm er lheead as ny sloo na 10 kentimeader er lhiurid. Ta daa horçh jeu: aaneyn ushtey thallussagh, as aaneyn ushtey duillagagh. Ta aaneyn ushtey thallussagh jeant seose jeh gish lheaney rybbanagh banglaneagh. Ta aaneyn ushtey duillagagh jeant seose jeh gish lheaney as duillagyn ny crottylyn orroo nyn lhie harrish y cheilley ayns tree keimyn ny ny sloo. Ta'n keim meanagh anchasley rish ny fir elley.
Corys bea.
Ta aane ushtey goaill toshiaght myr sporrag haploid. T'eh foghaney as jannoo protonema: foddee eshyn ve dhossan dy snaueyn ny thallus lhean. She eash neuveayn eh y protonema. T'eh caghlaa dys gemetophore ("jeantagh ghameteyn") ta cur magh comyssyn. T'ad cur antheridium er comys firrinagh ta jannoo killagyn sheel. Ta dhossanyn dy antheridia boallit ec perigonium, ny vrat dy chillagyn. T'ad cur archegonium er comys bwoirrinagh, as perichaetum mygeayrt-y-mooee. Ta feddan keyl myr mwannal da'n archegonium, as ta sheelyn snaue ny 'heese er son dy roshtyn yn ooh. 
Shegin da'n çheel snaue veih ny antheridia da archegonium. Ta daa 'lagellum as t'ad snaue lhieu.<ref name="Campbell 1918">

Bananey garroo:
Ta'n bananey garroo, ny Musa x paradisiaca, ny hroar 'sy ghenus "Musa" as t'eh ymmydit son y chooid smoo ayns coagyraght, ayns cosoylaght rish y vananey millish bog.

Berrish ghlass:
Ta'n verrish ghlass ("Ribes uva-crispa", co-chea. "R. grossularia") ny dooie 'sy ghenus "Ribes". T'ee çheet magh ass yn Oarpey, yn Affrick heear hwoaie, as yn Aishey heear yiass er çheu yn dooieaght eck. T'ee coontit myr fer jeh ram dooieyn 'sy fo-ghenus "Grossularia". Ta'n ennym shen jannoo cur sheese er y drine (drine berrish, ny drine berrish ghlass) myrane lesh y vess echey.

Fig:
Ta'n fig ("Ficus carica") ny rassan yn-lhoamey mooar ass yn Aishey heear yiass as ass yn ard Meanvooiragh (veih'n Afghanistaan dys y Ghreag). T'eh 6.9 m - 10 m (23 - 33 tr) er yrjid, lesh speeiney lheeah rea echey. Ta ny duillagyn 12 - 25 cm (4.7 - 9.8 oar.) er lhiurid as 10 - 18 cm (3.9 - 7.1 oar) er lheead, as t'ad jeh cummey babbanagh lesh tree ny queig babbanyn. Ta'n mess echey eddyr 3 as 5 cm (1.2 - 2.0 oar.) er lhiurid lesh speeiney glass er, as ny messyn goaill appaghey derrey t'ad gorrym jiarg ny dhone er daah. Ta'n sapp jeh ny h-ayrnyn glassey ny farbeyder da crackan deiney.

Aghaue veg:
She lus nieunagh ee aghaue veg (Cicuta virosa). She lus sheer-vio lussagh t'ayn, wheesh as 2 veader er yrjid. Ta gish reaey, banglaneagh eck. T'ad follym as rimmeigagh; ta un eddin rea oc as ny çheuyn elley cruinn. Ta duillagyn maylartey feeacklagh tree-'edjagagh eck, as blaaghyn beggey baney ayns dhossan gollrish fascaidagh. T'ee gaase ayns lheeanntyn fliughey, rish stroanyn, as ayns buill 'liughey elley. Ta beamyn drigey magh fliughid ooillagh buigh. Ta fraueyn baney moylagh eck.
T'ee ry-akin 'syn Europey hwoaie as meanagh, 'syn Aishey hwoaie as 'syn Americkey Hwoaie heear-hwoaie. 
Nieu.
Ta cicutoxin 'sy lus, as ish boirey er obbraghyn y chorys nearag meanagh. Da deiney, t'eh cur orrin çhingys gailley, skeahrey as pian boldagh, roish oor ny lurg ee. Ta craaghyn as teaymyn myrgeddin ny keayrtyn. She'n fraue y rheynn smoo nieunagh j'ee, as ta meer dy liooar dy varroo. Da beiyn, vees 60 gramme marroo keyrrey as 230 gramme marroo cabbyl. Er y fa dy vel ny cowraghyn soiagh orroo dy tappee, ta lheeys gyn raah dy cadjin.

Dolly Pentreath:
Va Dolly Pentreath, ny Dorothy Pentreath (bashtit 1692, hooar baase ayns Mee ny Nollick 1777) ny Cornisheyr flaaoil jerrinagh, foddee.
Dy mennick ta cuir heese j'ee gra dy row ee ny Cornisheyr un-çhengaghyn jerrinagh, t'eh shen, y dooiney jerrinagh lesh y Chornish agh gyn y Vaarle, agh t'eh shen ayns contraartys rish e coontey urree hene, myr va recortyssit ec Daines Barrington.
Seihll.
Va Pentreath bashtit er 16 Mee Voaldyn 1692, as t'eh er credjal dy row ee ny nah phaitçhey ass shey paitçhyn ec yn eeasteyr Nicholas Pentreath, as e nah ven, Jone Pentreath. Dooyrt ee ny s'anmey nagh row ee jargal y Vaarle dy loayrt roish e 20-oo laa ruggyree. Foddee nagh row eh shen kiart, agh va'n Chornish ny kied çhengey eck. Nar v'ee 'sy çhenneraght chooinnee ee dy row eeastyn er ny creck eck trooid y Chornish ayns Pen Sans, as va'n Chornish so-hoiggal ec y chooid smoo jeh ny cummaltee ynnydagh (goaill stiagh y sleih ooasley). Ren ee cummal ayns skeerey Pawl, faggys da Porthynys.
Cha phoos Pentreath rish peiagh erbee, agh 'sy vlein 1729 va un vac behrt eck, as eh enmyssit John Pentreath (1729 - 1778). 
Ayns 1768, ren Daines Barrington ronsaghey'n Chorn er son Cornisheyryn as ayns Porthynys haink eh er Pentreath, creckeyder eeastyn ec y traa shen as ee 82 bleeaney d'eash, as "y Chornish flaaoil eck". 'Sy vlein 1775, chur eh magh coontey j'ee ayns yn earish-lioar "Archaeologia" de chooid y Society of Antiquaries, as y coontey enmyssit "On the Expiration of the Cornish Language" ("Mychione Jerrey'n Chornish"). Screeu Barrington 'syn art dy row "y bwaane raad v'ee cummal ayns bayreen keyl", as dy row daa vwaane ny share hoal noi as daa ven elley ayndaue, jeih ny daa vleeaney jeig ny saa na Pentreath, nagh row jargal y Chornish dy loayrt, agh va jargal ee ry-hoiggal. Queig bleeaney ny s'anmey va Pentreath 87 bleeaney d'eash as v'ee "boght as freilt son y chooid smoo rish y skeerey, as er aghtu rish faaishnagh as cabblagh 'sy Chornish".
Ayns ny bleeantyn jerrinagh jeh'n theihll eck, haink er Pentreath dy ve ny dooiney ardghooagh ynnydagh er son y fys eck er y Chornish. Mygeayrt ny bleeaney 1777, va caslys j'ee daahit liorish John Opie (1761–1807), as ayns 1781 va grainney j'ee ec Robert Scaddan er ny hoilshey. 
'Sy vlein 1797 dooyrt eeasteyr ass Porthynys rish Richard Polwhele (1760–1838) dy ren William Bodinar "coloayrtyssyn lhee er feie ny h-ooryn 'sy Chornish; nagh row y coloayrtys oc ry-hoiggal agh ec kuse veg dy 'leih 'syn ynnyd; as dy row y Vaarle ec y daa jeu"
Ta Pentreath er çheet stiagh ayns shenn-skeealyn er son e gweeaghyn er sleih ayns stroo liauyr dy Chornish chreoi traa va farg urree. Ta e baase coontit myr baase ny Cornish myr çhengey cho-phobbylagh. Rere ny shenn-skeealyn v'ad ny focklyn jerrinagh eck na ""Me ne vidn cewsel Sawznek!"" ("Cha n'aillym y Vaarle dy loayrt!") agh s'cosoylagh nagh row ayns ny focklyn shen agh e freggyrt cadjin as deiney loayrt r'ee 'sy Vaarle.
Ta ram skeealyn mooee ayn. V'eh raait dy ren ee gweeaghyn er deiney dy mennick, goaill stiagh traaghyn v'ee enmyssey deiney ""kronnekyn hager du"", "beayf doo graney", as v'eh raait ec sleih elley dy row ee ny buitçh.
Lhiaght cooinaghtyn.
Va Pentreath oanluckit ayns Pawl, raad va lhiaght cooinaghtyn ayns e onnor currit stiagh ayns bwoalley garey killagh Pawl Noo Aurelian 'sy vlein 1860 liorish Louis Lucien Bonaparte, mac braarey Napoleon, as liorish Viggar Phawl ec y traa shen. V'eh screeuit er y lhiaght: 
Cornisheyr jerrinagh?
Myrane lesh "loayreyderyn çhengey jerrinagh" elley, ta arganys ayn mychione staydys Phentreath. She'n feer aggyrtys eck myr y Cornisheyr dooghyssagh flaaoil jerrinagh.
Lurg e baase hooar Barrington lettyr, screeuit 'sy Chornish as lhieggan Baarle goll marish, veih eeasteyr ayns Porthynys as yn ennym William Bodinar (ny Bodener) er as eh gra dy row queig deiney er fys echey 'sy valley beg shen as y Chornish oc. Chammah as shen screeu Barrington mychione John Nancarrow veih Marghasyow as eh ny loayreyder dooghyssagh va bio ayns ny 1790yn.
Ta daane casherickit da Dolly Pentreath ec y screeuder Britaanagh Pêr-Jakez Helias.

Aigh vane:
She crouw ny billey beg ‘sy ghenus "Buxus" ee aigh vane (Buxus sempervirens). T'ee ry-akin 'syn Europey heear as jiass, 'syn Aishey heear-yiass as 'syn Affrick heear-hwoaie. 
T'ee gaase dys wheesh as 9 meadar er yrjid, as crantessen wheesh as 20 kentimeadar. Ta duillagyn buighey-ghlassey ny glassey eck, ayns jeesyn, oohchrooagh as mysh 15-20mm er lhiurid. Ta blaaghyn neuvaghtal buighey-ghlassey eck, gyn petyllyn erbee, as t'ad goll er pollnaghey ec shey-chassee. Ta ny messyn eck nyn gishtaghyn tree-vabbanagh as 3-6 rassyn ayndaue.
T'ee gaase er thalloo kelkagh ny eaylagh dy cadjin, myr fo-laare da biljyn smoo dy mennick. T'ee ry-akin myrane lesh faih son y chooid smoo, agh ayns scrub çhirrym slieau ny keayrtyn. She Box Hill, Surrey ("Cronk aigh vane") eh ard smoo Hostyn dy aigh vane dooghyssagh.
Ymmyd.
T'ee feer ennoil myr lus jesheenagh ayns garaghyn, er son cleighyn as jallooyn cleigh erskyn ooilley. Ta'n fuygh eck ("foiee kishtey") feer chreoi as trome, as myr shen t'eh slanjeant er son cabnaidaght, grainney, obbyr ynlhie, jannoo clarinaidyn, cassyn ghreieyn as king woaillteenyn. Ayns ny laghyn shinney, v'ad jannoo ymmyd jeh duillagyn aigh vane ayns ynnyd quineen, as er son dy injillaghey çhiassaghey.

Alfalfey:
She lus sheer-vio 'sy chynney pishyryn Fabaceae ee Alfalfa (Medicago sativa). She foddyr scanshoil t'ayn. 
Jalloo-oaylleeaght.
T'ee gaase dys mysh 70 kentimeadar er yrjid. Ta gish gyn fynney eck, as ymmodee gish gobbey ass yn un vun. 
Ta duillagyn maylartey tree-ghuillagagh eck, as dagh duillageen oblanceolatagh, as giarrit ec y jerrey, bunnys. Ta oirryn reaey oc, er lhimmey jeh kuse dy 'eeacklyn. Ta ny duillageenyn mysh 3 kentimeadar er lhiurid.
Ta daa stipule beg sleeanagh ec bun yn yl-ghuillag. Ta raceme er jerrey kuse dy ghish, as blaaghyn echey. Ta ny blaaghyn mysh kentimeader er lhiurid. Ta 5 petylyn oc, 10 staimynyn, as un phistil. T'ad cur magh blaaghyn 'sy tourey son y chooid smoo. Ny yei shen, t'ad cur magh fynneigyn caslit mysh kentimeadar er lhiurid. T'ad moggylagh, as ta fynney creoi orroo ny keayrtyn. Ta rassyn buighey-ouyrey ayndaue.
Ta corys fraueagh dowiney eck, wheesh as 4.5 meadar ny keayrtyn. Myr shen, t'ee feer aahassooagh noi çhirmid. 
Ta genome tetraploid eck.
Eggoaylleeaght.
Ta alfalfey skeaylley liorish cur magh rassyn. Ta bea 3-12 vlein eck, as shen croghey er yn emshir as y sorçh t'ayn. 
T'ee hene-nieunagh, dy ghra myr shen, s'doillee da rassyn alfalfey noa aase mastey alfalfey t'ayn foast. Myr shen, t'ad caghlaa alfalfey lesh dooieyn elley.

Cummey duillag:

Smeyr churree:
She possan dy vyn-rassanyn sheer-ghlass ny raiseyderyn sleaydagh 'sy ghenus Vaccinium fo-ghenus Oxycoccos eh smeyr churree. Ta smeir churree ry-gheddyn ayns curreeyn sharroo er feie ny h-ayrnyn feayrey 'sy Lieh-Chruinney Hwoaie.

Smeyr ghoo:
Ta'n smeyr ghoo ny mess yn-ee veih ny dooieyn 'sy ghenus "Rubus" jeh'n chynney Rosaceae. Dy cadjin ta cuirtlee ghaa-vleeanagh as fraueyn yl-vleeanagh ec ny lossreeyn. T'eh ny phossan lheeadagh, ta mie er enney lesh 375 sorçhyn dy ghooieyn as ram jeu bentyn ry cheilley er feie'n Lieh-Chruinney Hwoaie as America Yiass.

Berrish yiarg:
Ta'n verrish yiarg ("Ribes rubrum") ny h-oltey jeh'n ghenus "Ribes" 'sy chynney Grossulariaceae (myrane lesh y verrish ghlass as y verrish ghoo). Ta'n verrish ny berrish ghooghyssagh jeh'n Oarpey Heear (y Velg, y Rank, y Ghermaan, y Çheer Injil, yn Iddaal Hwoaie as y Spaainey Hwoaie). Ta'n losserey eck ny rassan yn-lhoamey ta eddyr 1 as 1.5 m er yrjid (2 m ny keayrtyn), lesh duillagyn queig-vabbagh as ad reaghit dy caslagh er ny sthilk. Ta daah buigh-glass er ny duillagyn, as t'ad reaghit ayns crouw-vlaaghyn ta eddyr 4 as 8 cm er lhiurid, as ad goaill appee myr berrishyn yn-ee jiarg-ghial trooid-hoilshagh ta eddyr 8 as 12 mm er crantessen, lesh 3-10 berrishyn er dagh crouw-vlaaghey. Foddee drine prowit gientyn 3-4 kg dy verrishyn veih mean y touree dys y tourey jeianagh.

Berrish ghoo:
Ta'n verrish ghoo ("Ribes nigrum") ny h-oltey jeh'n ghenus "Ribes" 'sy chynney Grossulariaceae (myrane lesh y verrish ghlass as y verrish yiarg). Ta'n verrish ny berrish ghooghyssagh jeh'n Oarpey veanagh as hwoaie, as yn Aishey hwoaie. T'ee ny rassan beg ta eddyr 1 as 2 m er yrjid. Ta ny duillagyn cor, neuchramp, eddyr 3 as 5 cm er lhiurid, as babbagh dy bassagh lesh oirr 'eeacklagh. Ta ny blaaghyn eddyr 4 as 6 cm er lhiurid, lesh queig petylyn ta glass ruyagh dys dhoanagh er daah; t'ad gientit ayns crouw-vlaaghyn eddyr 5 as 10 cm er lhiurid.
Traa nagh vel y rassan gymmyrkey messyn, t'eh cosoylagh rish rassan y verrish yiarg, as ad yn-chronnaghey lesh y chooraght lajer veih ny sthilk as ny duillagyn. Ta'n mess ny verrish yn-ee ta 1 cm er crantessen, as ad gorrym jiarg dorraghey, begnagh doo, er daah, lesh crackan gloasagh as seepal shassooagh er y vaare ta cummal rassyn ennagh ta gloo er beagheeyn. Foddee drine prowit gientyn seose dys 5 kg dy verrishyn car y tourey.

Oarn:
Ta oarn ny grine ta çheet ass y faiyr bleeanagh Hordeum vulgare. Ta ram ymmydyn ec yn oarn. T'ee ymmydit myr foddyr da sthockyn, myr braih vunneydagh da lhune as joughinyn drigit, as myr mynayrn ayns bee slaynt ennagh. T'ee ymmydit ayns awreeyn as broityn, as ayns arran oarn ayns cultooryn ennagh, veih Nalbin dys yn Affrick.
Ayns rang-oardraghey ny bleeaney 2007 er troaryn grineagh 'sy dowan, va'n oarn 'sy chiarroo ynnyd rere mooads va troarit (136 millioonyn dy hunnaghyn) as rere eaghtyr lhiassaghey (566,000 km²).

Manx Independent:
Ta'n Manx Independent ny phabyr-naight shiaghtinoil baghtagh ayns Mannin. T'eh currit magh dagh Jeheiney. She Isle of Man Newspapers, cooid jeh Johnston Press, y shellooder er y phabyr-naight. T'ad yn "Isle of Man Courier" as yn "Isle of Man Examiner" ny shuyr-phabyryn echey.
Shennaghys.
Va'n pabyr-naight bunnit 'sy vlein 1987 myr duillag vooar lurg stholk ren dooney yn "Isle of Man Examiner", yn "Isle of Man Times", yn "Isle of Man Gazette", as y "Manx Star". Va enmys yn "Isle of Man Examiner" aavioghit rish yn Halifax Courier Group, shellooder yn "Isle of Man Courier". Er feie tammylt giare va'n "Manx Independent" currit magh tree keayrtyn 'sy çhiaghtin. Haink er dy ve ny phabyr-naigh baghtagh va currit magh daa cheayrt 'sy çhiaghtin 'sy vlein 1992 as eh ayns shelloo ec Mercantile Publishers as lurg shen ec Morton Newspapers veih Nerin Hwoaie. V'eh creckit da Isle of Man Newspapers ayns 1993 as dooney as coayl obbyr da dagh peiagh 'sy fwirran myr eiyrtys. V'eh aavioghit ny s'anmey 'sy vlein shen 'sy chummey myr t'eh jiu.

Vsevolod Kuznetsov:
Va Vsevolod Anatolyevich Kuznetsov () (9 Mean Souree 1928 – 5 Jerrey Souree 2003) ny ellyneyr theater as scannaneaght. V'eh reiht myr Ellyneyr Theayagh PHCH ny Roosh 'sy vlein 1977.
Seihll.
Rug Kuznetsov ayns lught thie theateragh ayns Leningrad (Caayr Pheddyr jiu). V'ee Vera Kuznetsova, aghtyer ardghooagh, e vayr. Hie eh dys Undinys Theateragh Leningrad (Ленинградский театральный институт) eddyr ny bleeantyn 1945 as 1949. Lurg yn Undinys hie eh gobbraghey ayns Theater Dramadagh Bryansk, Theater y Lhuingys Marrey Baltagh as Theater Lensovet.
Veih'n vlein 1956 hoshee eh gobbraghey ayns Theater Tovstonogov, raad haghyr eh er Georgiy Tovstonogov. V'eh coontit myr ard-vainshtyr paartyn y nah cheim.
Hooar eh baase ayns Caayr Pheddyr 'sy vlein 2003, as t'eh oanluckit ayns Ruillick Volkovskoe.

Anne Craine:
Ta Anne Valerie Craine BS (r. 30 Averil 1954) ny politickeyr Manninagh as roie-OKF son Rhumsaa. Myrane lesh shen, t'ee ny Shirveishagh Ynsee as ny Caairliagh er Undinys Eiraght Vannin. Roish v'ee reiht da Tinvaal v'ee ny h-oltey jeh'n Voayrd Ynsee as Undinys Eiraght Vannin.
Seihll.
Va Anne Craine ruggit 'sy vlein 1954 as she inneen Charles Kerruish, eear-Eaghtyrane Tinvaal t'aynjee. Hie ee dys Bunscoill y Doon ayns Skyll Maghal, as lurg y vunscoill hie ee er yn ard-scoill ayns Scoill Grammar Rhumsaa. Daag ee yn ellan lurg y vunscoill as hie ee dys Lunnin dy yannoo studeyryssyn ayns St. Godric's Secretarial College.
T'ee poost rish David Peter Craine veih'n vlein 1978 as ta daa vac as un 'neen oc.
Seihll politickagh.
Ren Anne Craine eab dy ve reiht son Rhumsaa ayns 2001 agh cha row ee raahoil ec y taghyrt shen. Ayns fo-reihys 'sy vlein 2003 chossyn ee soiag son Rhumsaa. Reesht 'syn ard-reihys 2006 chossyn ee yn reihys as ee ny chied ynnyd lesh 1969 voteyn, as hooar Allan Bell y nah hoiag 'sy valley lesh 1768 voteyn. V'ee reiht myr Shirveishagh Ynsee ayns 2006. Ayns Mee Vayrnt 2010, v'eh fogrit magh dy bee ee reiht myr Shirveishagh Tashtee, as ee çheet ny yei Allan Bell veih 1-d Averil.

Almon:
She billey dooghyssagh da'n Çhiar Veanagh ee Almon (Prunus dulcis) ny almond ny keayrtyn. Sthie y ghenus "Prunus", t'ad cur ee myrane lesh peitshag 'syn 'o-ghenus "Amygdalus", ry-eddyrscarrey veih fo-ghenera elley er coontey y bleayst crampit (endocarp) mygeayrt y rass.
Ta mess yn-ee eck. Cha nee feer chro t'ayn, agh droop: ta bleayst vooie echey, as bleayst chreoi sthie as y rass ("cro") aynjee. Ta "bleaystaghey" almon çheet er goaill y vleayst jeh'n rass. T'ad creckey almonyn er nyn mleaystaghey (gyn bleayst) ny gyn (as bleayst orroo foast). 
Jalloo-oaylleeaght.
She billey beg yn-lhoamey ee almond, eddyr 4-10m er yrjid, as wheesh as 30 kentimeadar er crontessen. Ta slattagyn aegey geayney ec y toshiaght; t'ad gorrym-jiargaghey fo soilshey ny greiney, as t'ad çheet dy ve lheeah 'sy nah vlein. Ta duillagyn 3-5" er lhiurid eck. Ta oirr feeacklagh oc, as cass duillag. Ta blaaghyn baney ny baney-jiargey ec almondyn, 3-5 kentimeadar er lhiurid, as 5 petalyn oc. T'ad cur magh blaaghyn anmagh 'syn arrey, nyn lomarcan ny ayns jeesyn.
T'ad gymmyrkey mess erreish da queig bleeantyn. Ta'n mess appee 'sy tourey, mysh 7-8 meeghyn erreish da ny blaaghyn çheet magh.
Rere lus-oaylleeaght, cha nee cro t'ayn agh droop mysh 3-6 kentimeadar er lhiurid. Ta coadagh mooie (exocarp) ec "Prunus", as shen feillagh ec plumbissyn as shillishyn; ta coadagh mooie almonyn lhiareagh. Ta bleayst 'uyghoil voggylagh ny sthie, as shen yn endocarp. Ta'n rass hene sthie y vleayst, as shen ny t'ad cur "cro" er.

Ynnyd-eggey:
Ta ynnyd-eggey, ny ynnyd-voggyl ( ny ) ny enmys ta currit er cohaglym dy ghuillagyn-moggyl, yallooyn, feeshanyn ny chooid vun-earrooagh mooinjeragh ta enmyssit bentyn rish URL cadjin, as eh jeant seose jeh'n ennym çhiarnys ynrican dy mennick, ny yn enmys IP, as y fraue-chassan ('/') ayns moggyl ta bunnit er Internet Protocol. Ta ynnyd-eggey er ny oastagh er un hirveishagh-moggyl er y chooid sloo, as eh so-roshtynagh trooid moggyl lheid as yn Eddyr-voggyl ny trooid moggyl ard ynnydagh (LAN) preevaadjagh.

Alfey:
She faiyr sheer-vio eh alfey ny faiyr alfey. T'ee gaase 'syn Affrick heear-hwoaie as 'syn Ibeir jiass. T'ad jannoo coyrd, bascaidyn, pabyr as cooid elley ass.

Aloe:
She genus dy lossreeyn blaaghey eh aloe, as mysh 400 dooie ayn. She "Aloe vera" ("feer aloe") y dooie share er enney. Ta'n genus dooghyssagh da'n Affrick, as t'eh cadjin ayns Cape Province, sleityn yn Affrick ghrianchryssagh, Madagascar as ellanyn elley.
Ta roseagh dy ghuillagyn mooarey çhiuey feillagh ec aloeyn, son y chooid smoo. Ta duillagyn sleeanagh oc, as oirr jialgagh ocsyn. Ta blaaghyn feddanagh oc er gish ghlooey neuchrampit gyn duillagyn.

Lus yn anis:
She lus 'sy chynney Apiaceae eh lus yn anis (ny lus anis, anis). T'eh dooghyssagh da'n Eddyrheeragh as yn Aishey heear-yiass. Ta enney er er son y vlass echey, cosoylagh rish shugyr doo, lus y vooyn as dragane.
Jalloo-oaylleeaght.
She lus lussagh bleeanagh eh lus yn anis. T'eh gaase dys meadar er yrjid. Ta duillagyn liauyrey babbanagh faggys da bun y lus, mysh 1-5 kentimeader er liurid. Ta duillagyn ny s'yrjey fedjagagh. Ta blaaghyn baney mysh 3mm er er crontessen echey, ayns umbyllyn. She schizocarp dronuillagagh 3-5mm er lhiurid eh y mess echey, as shen "sheel anis".

Flodaigh:
Ta Flodaigh ny h-ellan tidee ny soie çheu hwoaie veih Beinn nam Fadhla as çheu yiass veih Griomasaigh ayns ny h-Ellanyn Heear, Nalbin. T'ee kianglt rish Beinn nam Fadhla rish taagher.
Ta'n ellan 1.45 km² er eaghtyr as 'sy vlein 2001 va 11 chummaltagh urree. Ta Coontey-pobble ny Bleeaney 2001 cur sheese yn ellan myr "Flodda" - ennym Baarlagh ta currit er yn ellan.

Ooisht y Twoaie:
Ta Ooist y Twoaie (, ) ny h-ellan ayns ny h-Ellanyn Heear, Nalbin. T'ee ny jeihoo ellan smoo mastey ellanyn ny h-Albey as ny treeoo ellan jeig smoo mastey ny h-ellanyn ta cruinnlaghey yn Vretyn Vooar. T'ee 117 mi ker (303 km²) er eaghtyr, as t'ee beggan ny sloo na Ooist y Jiass. Ta Ooist y Twoaie kianglt liorish taagheryn rish Beinn nam Fadhla trooid Griomasaigh, rish Beàrnaraidh, as rish Baile Sear. Faagail magh y niar yiass, ta'n ellan rea er eaghtyr, as t'ee coodit lesh mestey curreeyn moaney, cruink injil, as loghanyn, lesh ny smoo na lieh-chooid jeh'n thalloo coodit lesh ushtey. Ta kuse ennagh jeh ny loghyn jeant seose jeh mestey ushtey oor as ushtey sailjey, as eh shen lhiggey da oayldyn cramp as neuchadjin. She Logh ny Moddee, purt eeasteyragh as ynnyd da thie tashtee, laare ellynyn, as shamyr ghorraghey, y balley smoo er yn ellan.

Griomasaigh:
Ta Griomasaigh () ny h-ellan tidee ayns ny h-Ellanyn Heear, Nalbin. T'ee ny h-ellan smoo ass ny tar-ellanyn ta gymmyrkey taagher yn Oitir Mhòr, arc queig meeilley er lhiurid as bayr un-raad er ta kiangley Ooist y Twoaie rish Beinn nam Fadhla trooid y chione heear jeh'n ellan. T'ad Bàgh Mòr as Ceallan ny baljyn beggey smoo as t'ad soit er y çheu hiar jeh'n ellan.

Beinn na Faoghla:
Ta Beinn na Faoghla, ny Beinn nam Fadhla () ny h-ellan ayns ny h-Ellanyn Heear 'sy Cheayn Sheear magh veih coose heear ny h-Albey. Rere Coontey-pobble ny Bleeaney 2001 va 1,249 cummaltee er yn ellan as va'n chooid smoo jeu nyn Gatolee Raueagh. T'ee ny cooid jeh'n ard ta fo-reirey ec Comhairle nan Eilean Siar ny Coonseil ny h-Ellanyn Sheear. She Baile a' Mhanaich preeu-valley yn ellan.

Baile a' Mhanaich:
Ta Baile a' Mhanaich () ny valley beg er yn ellan Beinn na Faoghla ayns ny h-Ellanyn Heear magh veih coose heear ny h-Albey. T'eh ny h-ard-valley da Beinn na Faoghla as ny h-ellanyn sniessey Ooist y Twoaie, Ooist y Jiass as ram ellaneenyn beggey elley. 'Sy vlein 2001 va 443 cummaltee 'sy valley. Ta'n ennym, ta çhyndaait myr "Balley'n Vaynee" çheet er mannishter va bunnit ayn 'sy çheyoo eash as ta tholtanyn Teampull Chaluim Chille ry-akin çheu yiass veih'n valley beg.
Ta oikyn ynnydagh jeh'n choonseil ardjynagh (Comhairle nan Eilean Siar) ry-gheddyn ayns Baile a' Mhanaich myrane lesh oik postagh, thie lheihys, bunscoill, as kuse ennagh dy happyn as oastanyn beggey.

Baie yn Chashtal:
Ta Baie yn Chashtal (, ) ny valley beg as ny balley smoo er Ellan Varraie ayns ny h-Ellanyn Heear, Nalbin. T'eh ny hoie er coose yiass yn ellan as t'eh jeeaghyn magh er baie 'sy Cheayn Sheear.
Keeill.
Va'n cheeill Chatoleagh ayns Baie yn Chashtal, "Keeill y Ven Seyr Rollage ny Marrey", troggit 'sy vlein 1886 er crongan ta jeeaghyn harrish çheshvean y valley. Va'n cummey j'ee kiaddit ec seyrnagh ass yn Oban, G. Woulfe Brennan, myrane lesh thie ny s'odjey sheese y chrongan da'n taggyrt. Ta uinnag ghaait ta taishbyney yn Crossey ry-akin er gaabyl twoaie ny killey, as ta ny gaabylyn jiass taishbyney Y Ven Seyr Rollage ny Marrey. Ta'n glonney ghaait çheet ass ny 1950yn leah.

Steornavaie:
Ta Steornavaie (, ) ny valley as ny chochorp er Ellan Lioas ayns ny h-Ellanyn Heear, Nalbin.
Ta'n balley goaill stiagh 9,000 cummaltee ass ny 26,370 deiney ta cummal er feie ny h-Ellanyn Heear. Ta skeerey theayagh Steornavaie goaill stiagh baljyn beggey ennagh ry laue, as ta 12,000 cummaltee cummal ayn. Ta Steornavaie ny purt hrome-chooishagh as t'ee ny balley smoo scanshoil as ny balley reiragh jeh ny h-Ellanyn Heear. Ta kione-cherroo Chomhairle nan Eilean Siar ("Coonseil ny h-Ellanyn Heear") soit aynjee myrane lesh ram bunneeaghtyn ynsee, spoyrt as ym-ysseraght

Breacleit:
Ta Breacleit () ny valley beg er Bearnaraigh Mòr ayns ny h-Ellanyn Heear, Nalbin. Ta thie tashtey, shapp veg, scoill, oik postagh, keeill, ynnyd theayagh lesh oastan beg, stashoon pedryl, stashoon aile, as shamyr choyrlee 'sy valley.

Logh ny Moddee:
She balley reiragh Ooist y Twoaie eh Logh ny Moddee (, ). Ta'n balley ny hoie er Ooist y Twoaie ayns ny h-Ellanyn Heear, Nalbin. T'eh soit ec kione branlaig as, er oyr y chroo dooghyssagh creggagh ayn, cha nel balley elley erbee er y choose hiar jeh'n ellan - foddey veih ny baljyn beggey ayns yn ayrn ny smoo pobbylagh ayns sheear Ooist y Twoaie.

Dalabrog:
Ta Dalabrog () ny valley beg ta soit tree meeillaghyn çheusthie veih Logh Baastyl as t'eh ny nah valley smoo rere earroo yn phobble ayns Ooisht y Jiass. T'ad ny caaghyn t'ayns y valley na oik postagh, ard-vargey Co-op, y Borrodale Hotel (thie oast lesh roshtynaght theayagh da'n eddyr-voggyl), as shapp Scottish Hydro Electric. Myrane lesh shen ta scoill, ynnyd theayagh, as daa cheeill (Keeill Chatoleagh Raueagh Noo Peddyr as Keeill Agglish ny h-Albey) ayn.

Heysham:
Ta Heysham ny valley beg mooar faggys da Lancaster ayns coontae Lancashire, Sostyn. T'eh jeeaghyn harrish Baie Morecambe as ta purt ayn lesh shirveishyn assaig ta goll dys Mannin as Nerin. Ta daa stashoon lectraghys çheshveanagh ayns Heysham as t'ad nyn gowraghyn thallooin ta so-akin veih ny cruink 'syn ard mygeayrt.
Dy reiragh, ta Heysham ny chooid jeh slyst Valley Lancaster, lesh tree wardyssyn: Heysham Central (lesh 4,397 cummaltee), Heysham North (5,477 cummaltee), as Heysham South (6,262 chummaltagh); tra t'ad currit ry-cheilley ta 16,136 cummaltee (coontey-pobble 2001) ayn, agh t'ad sheeyney magh ayns ardjyn çheu hoal jeh'n valley beg hene as mychione 6,500 cummaltee ayn.

Fleetwood:
Ta Fleetwood ny valley ayns slyst Wyre ayns Lancashire, Sostyn. T'eh ny hoie ayns uillin heear hwoaie jeh The Fylde. Rere coontey pobble 2001 va 26,840 cummaltee 'sy valley. T'eh jannoo seose cooid jeh covaljys Blackpool Mooar. Va'n balley ny chied co-phobbyl cummit 'syn Eash Victorianagh.

Baile Roibín, Coontae ny Mee:
Ta Baile Roibín () ny valley beg ayns Coontae ny Mee, Nerin. T'eh soit eddyr yn Ooive as Baile Átha Troim er y raad eddyr Baile Átha Buí as Dún Seachlainn. Ta'n balley soit ayns skeerey Dún Doire. Ta shapp, thie lhionney, thie folteyr, keeill Chatoleagh, bunscoill, as garreish 'sy valley beg.

Annyl:
She crouw ayns kynney ny pishyryn (Fabaceae) ee annyl (Indigofera suffruticosa). T'ee gaase dys 1m er yrjid, ayns thalloo çhirrym. Ta duillagyn fedjagagh eck. Ta plooreen jeant jee.

Ard-firryn bane:
She lus 'sy chynney Lamiaceae eh ard-firryn bane (Lamium album). T'eh gaase er feie yn Europey as yn Aishey heear, ayns banjee ny keyljyn, er thalloo tash.
Jalloo-oaylleeaght.
She lus lussagh t'ayn. T'eh gaase dys meadar er yrjid, as ta gish gheayney kiare-corneilagh echey. Ta ny duillagyn echey 3-8 kentimeadar er liurid as 2-5 kentimeadar er lheead; t'ad oochrooagh dys sleeanagh as ta oirr feeacklagh oc. T'ad gollrish duillagyn undaagee, agh cha nel ad cur gah. Ta blaaghyn baney oc ayns fainaghyn er ny gish heose, as ad 1.5-2.5 kentimeadar er lhiurid.
Ymmyd.
Ta ny duillagyn aegey yn-ee, as t'ad jannoo glassan assdaue. Ta ymmyd jeant jeu ayns lheeys lussagh myrgeddin.
Ta ard-firryn bane er ny yannoo dooie ayns America Hwoaie.
Caslyssyn.
 

Ard-firryn breck:
She lus 'sy chynney Lamiaceae eh ard-firryn breck (Lamium maculatum). T'eh gaase er feie yn Europey, ayns banjee ny keyljyn, er thalloo tash.
Jalloo-oaylleeaght.
She lus lussagh t'ayn. T'eh gaase dys meadar er yrjid, as ta gish gheayney kiare-corneilagh echey. Ta ny duillagyn echey oochrooagh dys sleeanagh as ta oirr feeacklagh oc. T'ad gollrish duillagyn undaagee, agh cha nel ad cur gah. Ta cowraghyn bane orroo dy cadjin. Ta blaaghyn jiargey-gorrym ec y lus, cosoylagh rish blaaghyn slaanee.

Ard-firryn jiarg:
She lus 'sy chynney Lamiaceae eh ard-firryn jiarg (Lamium purpureum). T'eh gaase er feie yn Europey as 'syn Aishey, ayns banjee ny keyljyn, er thalloo tash.
Jalloo-oaylleeaght.
She lus lussagh t'ayn. T'eh gaase dys 20 kentimeadar er yrjid. Ta ny duillagyn echey oochrooagh dys cree-chrooagh as ta oirr tonnagh dys saue-eeacklagh oc. T'ad jiargaghey faggys da kione y lus. T'ad gollrish duillagyn undaagee, agh cha nel ad cur gah. T'eh cur magh blaaghyn jiargey-gorrym, cosoylagh rish blaaghyn slaanee. 
Ymmyd.
Ta ny duillagyn aegey yn-ee, as t'ad jannoo glassan assdaue. T'eh scanshoil da shellanyn, er y fa dy nod eh cur magh blaaghyn car ny bleeaney ny keayrtyn.

Ard-losserey:
She lus 'sy chynney Lamiaceae eh ard-losserey ny ayr-losserey (Glechoma hederacea). T'eh gaase er feie yn Europey as 'syn Aishey. T'eh er ny chur stiagh ayns America Hwoaie myrgeddin.
Jalloo-oaylleeaght.
She lus sheer-vio sheer-ghlass t'ayn. T'eh gaase dys 50 kentimeadar er yrjid. Ta ny duillagyn echey cruinn dys aarey-chrooagh as ta oirr tonnagh oc. T'ad piyral. Ta blaaghyn gollrish tunneyderyn echey, as adsyn gorrym dys gorrym-jiarg.
Aase.
Ta ard-losserey bishaghey ayns ardjyn tashey scaadooagh, agh t'eh fuillaghtyn soilshey dy mie. T'eh cadjin ayns banjee, keyljyn as reeastyn. T'eh shassoo noi buinn, as skeaylley liorish rass ny sthollane. Foddee eh jannoo magh fee gloo er faaie, as myr shen t'ad gra dy nee sarkyl t'ayn. 
Ymmyd.
V'ad cliaghtey jannoo ymmyd jeh ard-losserey myr lus lheeys. V'ad coyrlaghey eh er son tinnitus, çhingyssyn aarey as lag-ghailley, chammah as myr brasneyder moon, casteyder folley, aavreeagh as greeyseyder.
Ren ny Sostnee ymmyd jeh myr blasstan, sheeleyder as freaylleyder ayns imbyl lhune, roish my ghow ad toshiaght lesh lus y lhionney 'syn ynnyd echey.

Arroghyr:
She lus bearkanagh eh arroghyr (Araucaria araucana). T'eh dooghyssagh da'n Çhillee yiass veanagh as yn Argenteen heear veanagh, ayns ardjyn erskyn 1000m dy cadjin. 
Jalloo-oaylleeaght.
She billey sheer-ghlass t'ayn. T'eh gaase dys 40m er yrjid as 2v er crantessen. Ta ny duillagyn echey trooraneagh as geyre, mysh 3-4 kentimeadar er lhiurid. T'ad çhiu, creoi as gollrish crottylyn. T'ad ry-akin er fud y villey, er lhimmey jeh shenn vanglaneyn.
She dooie dioecious t'ayn; cha nel birk 'irrinagh as bwoirrinagh er yn un villey, son y chooid smoo. T'ad goll er pollnaghey liorish y gheay. Ta birk 'irrinagh dronuillagagh, mysh 8-12 kentimeadar er lhiurid as 5-6 kentimeadar er lheead. Ta birk woirrinagh cruinney, as 12-20 kentimeadar er lhiurid.
Ennym.
Hug Molina yn ennym "Pinus araucana" er ayns 1782. Ayns 1789, chroo de Jussieu genus noa da'n dooie (Araucaria), as ayns 1797 hoilshee magh Pavón coontys noa jeh myr "Araucaria imbricata". Cha row shen ny ennym cooie, er y fa nagh ren eh ymmyd jeh'n ennym dooieagh currit er ec Molina. Fy yerrey, ayns 1873, hoilshee magh Koch "Araucaria araucana". Ta "araucana" ass ennym ny Mapuche 'sy Spaainish, "araucanos". V'adsyn cliaghtey çhaglym rassyn ny biljyn 'sy Çhillee

Farym:
She genus dy lossreeyn eh Scrophularia (ny farym, arym ayns glare chadjin). Ta mysh 200 dy dooie ayn. Ta duillagyn piyral as blaaghyn fosley daa-veeallagh oc. T'ad ry-akin er feie yn lieh-chruinney hwoaie, 'syn Aishey son y chooid smoo, agh ta beggan jeu cummal 'syn Europey as ayns America Hwoaie.
Ta stoo ymmydoil ayns kuse jeu, myr sampleyr iridoidyn, as ta ymmyd jeant jeu ayns lheeys tradishoonagh er feie ny cruinney; myr sampleyr, "Scrophularia ningpoensis". Ta'n ennym "Scrophularia" jeh "scrofula" (çhingys y ree), ny chummey çhingys y cleeau, er y fa dy row ad jannoo ymmyd jeu noi y çhingys shoh.

Skeerey Maghal:
Ta Skyll Maghal ny Skeerey Maghal () ny valley beg as ny skeerey ayns shiar hwoaie Vannin. Ta ennym ard-noo yn ellan - Maghal - currit urree. Ta'n skeerey hene 34.5 km² er eaghtyr as rere coontey-pobble 'sy vlein 2006 va 950 cummaltee ayn. Myrane lesh y valley beg as ennym y skeerey er, ta'n skeerey goaill stiagh ny baljyn beggey Cornah as Glion Moaney. Ta Raad-yiarn Lectragh Vannin goll trooid y skeerey er e vollagh veih Doolish gys Rhumsaa, as t'eh jannoo stadyn ayns ram buill 'sy skeerey, lheid as Stashoon traenagh Chornah as Stadd y Gharey.
Ta'n skeerey hene sheeyney veih Rhumsaa dys Clagh Ouyr, as veih mullagh sker y clieau hiar gys y vooir. T'ee ny slyst sleitagh, as ta'n chooid smoo j'ee ny thalloo sleitagh neuvoallit nagh vel traauoil. T'ad Baarool Twoaie (561 m), Clagh Ouyr (551 m), Slieau Lhean (459 m), Slieau Ouyr (452 m) as Slieau Ruy (396 m) ny buill s'yrjey 'sy skeerey. Ny h-ard-vuill s'inshley, t'ad goaill stiagh Glion Valley Euar (altan keylljagh beg er liargagh twoaie Vaarool), Glion Chornah (glion anerit eddyr Pairk Llewellyn as Baarool, as oirr ard Slieau Lhean as Slieau Ouyr), as Glion y Dhoon (glionteen veg keylljagh ec bun Slieau Ruy). Ta'n thalloo liargee dy geyre veih ny sleityn gys y choose. Ta'n coose ard as creggagh as brisht liorish gulladyn. Ta ram glish ghiarey stroo veih ny sleityn gys y vooir trooid clashyn diuney 'sy choose, agh she'n glass Awin Chornah y glass smoo ny mast'oc.
Ta'n balley beg hene ta enmyssit Maghal ny hoie faggys da Kione Maghal (114 m), raad haink y noo er çheer rere ny shenn-skeealyn. Ta'n kione shoh ny voayl smoo shiar er yn ellan as t'eh ny voayl s'faggys da Sostyn, 50 kilometeryn veih St Bees Head ayns Cumbria. Ta keeill veg ry-akin 'sy valley beg as ta'n cheeill shen nane jeh ny kialteenyn shinney er yn ellan. T'ee ny thie cadjin jeh'n torçh Manninagh, as ta ram taaishnyssyn ayn, goaill stiagh croshyn Celtiagh as Loghlynagh lesh roonyn er fir jeu. Ta ny croshyn shen tashtit ayns Thie Croshyn Skylley Maghal ayns thalloo ny killey. Ayns ruillick ny killey ta tree kialteenyn jeh'n çhenn-horçh ry-akin. 'Sy ruillick ta lhiaghtyn cooinaghtyn ry-akin myrgeddin as enmyn ny cummaltee skeerey ren cohoyrtyssyn scanshoil da seihll yn ellan, lheid as Edward Christian (y chied Chiannoort Manninagh), P.M.C. Kermode (y chied veoir jeh Thie-Tashtee Vannin), as y Reejerey Charles Kerruish (kied eaghtyrane Tinvaal). Faggys da corneil hiar hwoaie y ruillick ta Çhibbyr Noo Maghal ry-akin. Chur lught yn ellan arrym mooar da'n çhibbyr ayns ny shenn-traaghyn agh cha nel y çhibbyr nish agh ny voayl naggyr.
Reiltys.
Ta Skyll Maghal stiurit as reirit ec Barrantee Skyll Maghal. T'ad çheet ry-cheilley ec cruinnaghtyn ayns Halley Keeill y Dowin. She Hazel Lace Captan ny Skeerey, as Caairliagh ny Barrantee.
Rolley Captanyn Skyll Maghal.
Ta'n rolley shoh goaill stiagh dagh Captan veih'n vlein 1627:

Asparag:
She lus yn-ee ee asparag (Asparagus officinalis). T'eh dooghyssagh da'n Europey, yn Affrick hwoaie as yn Aishey heear. T'ee goll er troarey ayns ymmodee buill.
Jalloo-oaylleeaght.
She lus lussagh sheer-vio t'ayn. T'ee gaase wheesh as 100-150 kentimeadar er yrjid. Cha nel feer duillagyn eck: ta cladodeyn birragh 'syn ynnyd oc, mysh 6-32mm er lhiurid, as 4-15 jeu ayns dhossan. Ta fraueyn moylagh eck. Ta blaaghyn baney-ghlassey dys buighey eck, jeh cummey cluig. Ta berrishyn beggey jiargey eck.

Skeerey Stondane:
Ta Skeerey Stondane ny Skylley Stondane ( ny ) ny skeerey ayns jiass Vannin eddyr Purt Soderick as Strooan Stondane ayns y çheadin Medall. Ta'n skeerey çhemmit liorish ny skeeraghyn Braddan da'n shiar, Marooney da'n twoaie, as Malew da'n sheear. Ta'n joarey jiass jeh'n skeerey jeant seose jeh Mooir Vannin. She Balley Noa y balley smoo 'sy skeerey. Ta Donald Gelling ny Chaptan ny Skeerey agh ta Andrew Parker ny Chaairliagh er ny barrantee.

Roie-ockle:
She rang fockle eh roie-ockle. Son y chooid smoo, t'eh cowraghey cochianglaghyn bentyn rish reamys ny traa. Ta'n ennym oc er y fa dy vel ad roish ny t'ad bentyn rish, son y chooid smoo. 'sy Ghaelg as çhengaghyn Celtiagh elley (mastey fir elley), ta roie-ocklyn cowraghey peiagh as earroo liorish yn-filley. Myr shen, ny keayrtyn, cha nel red erbee nyn lurg, er y fa dy vel eh goit stiagh 'sy roie-ockle hene.
Eear-ocklyn as taah-ocklyn.
Ayns kuse dy hengaghyn, ta focklyn jannoo yn obbyr cheddin, agh t'ad soit ny lurg ny focklyn. Myr shen, ta çhengoayllee cur "eear-ockle" orroo. Ny keaytyn, t'ad cur "taah-ockle" er y daa.
Myr sampleyr:

Skeerey Marooney:
Ta Skeerey Marooney ny Skyll Marooney () ny skeerey hallooinit ayns Mannin. Ta'n skeerey ny soie 'sy çheadin Medall. Dy shendeeagh (er dyn vlein 1796), va'n skeerey soit 'sy çheedin Glion Faba. She Marooney yn un skeerey ayns Mannin nagh vel çhemmal rish y vooir. Ta'n Awin Doo roie trooid y skeerey. Ta ny baljyn beggey Glion Vyan as Balley ny Croshey soit 'sy skeerey. She Tim O'Hanlon Caairliagh ny Barrantee as she Charles Fargher Captan ny Skeerey.

Connaghyn:
Ta Connaghyn, ny Ardjyn Chonnaghyn (), ny skeerey as ny ard ayns Mannin. Chammah's shen, t'eh ny Cho-heiyderys son y Chiare as Feed as ta daa OKFyn reiht veih. T'eh ny hoie 'sy çheadin Garff, agh ayns ny shenn traaghyn v'eh coontit myr cooid jeh Medall. Ta'n skeerey çhemmit liorish Lonan da'n shiar as y shiar hwoaie, liorish Braddan da'n twoaie as y sheear, liorish Doolish da'n sheear yiass, as liorish Mooir Vannin da'n jiass. She Carn Gerjoil (445 m) y boayl s'yrjey 'sy skeerey, as she Slieau Ree (316 m) y mullagh s'yrjey. Rere coontey-pobble 'sy vlein 2006 va 9,172 cummaltee 'syn ard. She Kione Droghad y balley smoo 'syn ard, as t'eh ny fo-valley dy Ghoolish.

Skeerey Vreeshey:
Ta Skeerey Vreeshey () ny skeerey ayns twoaie Vannin. T'ee ny soie 'sy çheadin Inver Ayre. She William Christian Captan ny Skeerey ec y traa t'ayn. Ta'n skeerey 21.7 km² er eaghtyr as ta 418 cummaltee ayn rere coontey-pobble 'sy vlein 2006. Ta'n skeerey goaill stiagh ny baljyn beggey Skyll Vreeshey as Cranstal. T'ee sheeyney veih Kione ny h-Ayrey 'sy twoaie gys Skyll Chreest ny h-Ayrey 'sy jiass; as veih Skyll Andreas 'sy neear gys Mooir Vannin 'sy niar.
Ta'n skeerey shoh ny skeerey s'faggys da'n Vretyn Vooar as cha nel Kione ny h-Ayrey agh 26 km veih'n Ghallioo ayns Nalbin.

Lus ny h-oohyn:
She lus 'sy chynney "Solanaceae" ee lus ny h-oohyn ny auberjeen (Solanum melongena). Ta mess yn-ee eck. Ta faggys-mooinjerys eddyr ish as ooyl graih, praase, tombagey as lus y vaaish. T'ee dooghyssagh da Nepaal, yn Injey, y Vangladesh, Yn Phakistaan, as Sri Lanka. 
Jalloo-oaylleeaght.
She lus sheer-vio t'ayn. T'ee wheesh as 150 kentimeadar (57") er yrjid. Ta duillagyn cummey duillag#babbagh mooarey eck, mysh 10-20 kentimeadar (4-8") er lhiurid as 5-10 kentimeadar (2-4") er lheead. Ta jialgyn er y ghass dy cadjin. Ta blaagh baney dys jiarg-gorrym eck. Ta'n mess eck feillagh; she berrish t'ayn rere lus-oaylleeaght, as ta ymmodee rassyn beggey yn-ee ayn. T'ad sharroo er y fa dy vel beggan dy alkaloydyn nicoteenagh ayndaue.

Skylley Maayl:
Ta Skyll Maayl () ny skeerey ayns Mannin. Ta'n skeerey sheeyney veih Glion Cam 'sy jiass gys Orrisdale 'sy twoaie; as veih'n vooir 'sy sheear dys Eairee Horkill 'sy shiar. Ta'n skeerey 33.9 km² er eaghtyr as ta 1,640 cummaltee ayn rere coontey-pobble 'sy vlein 2006. Ta'n Balley Keeill Vaayl, y balley beg smoo 'sy skeerey, ny hoie ayns twoaie ny skeerey. She John James Martin Cannell Captan ny Skeerey.

Ayr lossey:
She lus blaaghey eh ayr lossey, ayr hallooin ny lus cosney folley (Achillea millefolium). T'eh dooghyssagh da'n lieh-chruinney hwoaie. V'ad cliaghtey jannoo ymmyd jeh dys castey folley. T'eh gaase liorish raisoamyn.
Jalloo-oaylleeaght.
She lus lussagh sheer-vio t'ayn. T'eh cur magh gass ny ghaa wheesh as meadar er yrjid, as duillagyn er nyn reaghey orroo dy corrym. Ta ny duillagyn echey 5-20 kentimeadar er liurid. T'ad daa-'edjagagh dys tree-'edjagagh as er nyn reaghey myr caslagh er y ghass. T'ad lameydagh, bunnys. Ta blaaghyn baney dys bane-jiargey echey ayns dhossan; t'eh cur magh blaaghyn 'sy tourey.
Ymmyd.
T'ad troarey ayr lossey dys lhiettal crimmey ny keayrtyn, er y fa dy vel eh jeen noi çhirmid.
T'ad gra dy nee casteyder folley as greeseyder t'ayn. Ta geayr salicylagh, geayr isovaleragh as asparagin ayn. Ta ennym y ghenus rere Achilles, er y fa dy dooyrt ad dy hug lesh eh y lus noi lhottyn y çheshaght chaggee.
T'ad jannoo ymmyd jeh gish çhirmit ayr lossey ayns faaishnagh I Ching.
Ayns ny Mean Eashyn, v'ad cur ayr lossey ayns lhune myr blasstan. Ta duillagyn yn-ee echey, as v'ad gee eh dy mennick 'sy 17oo eash. T'eh millish as blass beg sharroo echey. Ta ymmyd jeant jeh ny duillagyn çhirmit myr lus blasstal myrgeddin.

Grammeydys:
Ta grammeydys çheet er reillyn coyannoo bentyn rish glare ny rish çhengey er lheh. Dy cadjin, t'eh çheet er co-yannoo focklyn as raaghyn. Rere keeall ny s'çhaghney, t'eh goaill stiagh sheeanyn myrgeddin. Chammah's shen, t'eh çheet er studeyrys er ny cooishyn shen, goaill stiagh co-ordrail, sheeanchoryssaghtys, jalloo-oaylleeaght as semantaght. Cha nel eh çheet er cairscreeu ny punkaghey son y chooid smoo.
Ta fys ec loayreyderyn dooghyssagh er strughtoor as reillyn ny çhengey, ga dy vel eh gyn enney er oc son y chooid smoo. T'ad jannoo ymmyd jeh dys loayrt 'sy çhengey.
Ta çhengoayllee rheynn eieyn grammeydys ayns "soilshee" as "oardrailagh". Ta ram grammeydys cadjin ny tradishoonagh oardrailagh, dy ghra myr shen, t'eh cur reillyn er ny "lhisagh" oo gra as screeu. Dy cadjin, ta shen foayraghey un abbyrt (abbyrt adsyn as ard chied oc, son y chooid smoo) erskyn abbyrtyn elley. T'eh cur er bun çhengey chadjinit. Ta grammeydys soilshee cur coontey jeh'n aght ta'n çhengey goll er loayrt, as meenaghyn ny reillyn ta stiurey shen, gyn gra ny "lhisagh" oo gra.
Bun-ocklaght.
Ta'n fockle "grammeydys" ass Shenn Ghreagish , "grammatikē technē" (aght lettyryn) ass , "gramma" ("lettyr"), ass , "graphein" (screeu).

Nowy Dwór Królewski:
She balley beg ayns y Pholynn eddyr Chełmno as Toruń eh Nowy Dwór Królewski. Ta 170 dy chummaltee ayn.

Çhengey chadjinit:
Ta çhengey chadjinit ny abbyrt chadjinit çheet er cummey dy hengey ennagh as keimeeaght ard eck. Ta staydys oikoil ec kuse jeu, agh cha nel ec fir elley. Ta bun oc ymmyd abbyrt ennagh ayns screeuyn, as shen çheumooie ard yn abbyrt veill dy cadjin. T'ad jannoo ymmyd jeh'n abbyr shoh ayns cooishyn oikoil, myr sampleyr ayns reirey, lettyraght as leigh. Ta ceaghlaght goll er leodaghey 'syn abbyrt shoh. Dy cadjin, ta'n cummey shoh rere abbyrt sleih ooasle. Ta keimeeaght ard ec abbyrt sleih cummaghtagh as ynsit, as t'ee ny sampleyr da sleih elley. Ta fockleyryn as lioaryn grammeydys beaynaghey normyn ny çhengey, chammah's obbyr oaylleeagh as reiltyssyn. Dy cadjin, ta bun yn abbyr chadjinit abbyrt y phreeu-valley. Ny keayrtyn elley, t'eh rere abbyrtyn ard-valjyn cultooragh ny tarmayrnagh. Ta çhengaghyn chadjinit elley jeant jeh ymmodee abbyrtyn ardjynagh.
Ayns çheeraghyn aasit, ta'n chooid smoo jeh'n phobbyl toiggal yn abbyrt chadjinit, eer mannagh vel ad ish y loayrt. Dy cadjin, ta sleih çheerey as lught ny h-obbyr daa-abbyrtagh: t'ad loayrt ayns abbyrt neuchadjinit 'sy thie as 'syn obbyr, agh t'ad jannoo ymmyd jeh'n abbyrt chadjinit er son cooishyn formoil.
Ny keayrtyn, ta blass er lheh kianglt rish yn abbyrt chadjinit, bentyn rish bun cadjin; myr sampleyr, ta Baarle Chadjinit kianglt rish Received Pronunciation, agh t'eh goll er loayrt ayns blassyn elley.
Ayns shiartanse dy heeraghyn, ta jantys ayn er son dy reaghey yn abbyrt chadjinit.

Skeerey Andreas:
Ta Skeerey Andreas () ny skeerey ayns twoaie Vannin. Myrane lesh Skeerey Vreeshey as Skeerey Chreest ny h-Ayrey, ta Andreas soit 'sy çheadin Inver Ayre. Ta'n skeerey sheeyney veih'n Lhen Vooar harrish y coose sheear hwoaie gys Breeshey. T'ee çhemmit liorish Jorby da'n sheear, liorish Creest ny h-Ayrey da'n jiass, liorish Breeshey da'n shiar as liorish Mooir Vannin da'n twoaie. Ta'n balley beg Andreas soit 'sy skeerey.

Jorby:
Ta Jorby ny Jurby () ny skeerey ayns sheear hwoaie Vannin. Myrane lesh Skylley Maayl as Skeerey Valley ny Loughey, ta Jorby coontit myr nane jeh ny tree skeeraghyn 'sy çheadin Maayl. Ta'n skeerey ny slyst eirinagh er coose sheear hwoaie yn ellan agh ta steat çhynskylagh er y çhenn phairk aer RAF Jurby. Ta pryssoon noa Ellan Vannin, va foshlit er 14 Luanistyn 2008, soit ayn.

Skeerey Vraddan:
Ta Skeerey Vraddan ny Skylley Vraddan () ny skeerey heeynt 'sy çheadin Medall, Mannin. T'ee sheeyney veih ny skeeraghyn Maayl as Creest ny h-Ayrey 'sy twoaie, as çhemmal rish ny skeeraghyn Carmane, Marooney, as Connaghyn 'sy vean, as t'ee çhemmal rish Stondane 'sy jiass. Ta'n ayrn twoaie sleitagh as ta'n ayrn jiass ny smoo rea. Ta'n ayrn jiass goaill stiagh ardjyn cummaltagh faare da Doolish. She Thomas Philip Caley Captan ny Skeerey.

Skeerey Chreest ny h-Ayrey:
Ta Skeerey Chreest ny h-Ayrey ny Skyll Chreest ny h-Ayrey () ny skeerey 'sy çheadin Inver Ayre, Mannin. Ta'n skeerey çhemmit liorish Skylley Maayl as Skeerey Valley ny Loghey da'n sheear, liorish Skeerey Andreas as Skeerey Vreeshey da'n twoaie, liorish Rhumsaa, Skeerey Lonan as Skyll Maghal da'n shiar, as liorish Skeerey Braddan da'n jiass. Ta'n skeerey ny skeerey smoo ayns Mannin as ee 62.3 km² er eaghtyr. Rere coontey-pobble ny bleeaney 2006 ta 1,237 cummaltee ayn. She Thomas Philip Caley Captan ny Skeerey.
T'ee ny skeerey sleitagh, as ta Sniaul, y slieau s'yrjey er yn ellan, ny hoie 'sy skeerey, myrane lesh ayrnyn liauyrey jeh'n choorse TT. Ta'n chooid smoo jeh coorse Awin Sulby, yn awin s'liurey er yn ellan, goit stiagh 'sy skeerey. Ta'n chooid smoo jeh ny cummaltee soit er y raad eddyr Rhumsaa as Purt ny h-Inshey, goaill stiagh y balley beg Sulby.

Balsym buigh:
She lus bleeanagh lussagh eh balsym buigh (Impatiens noli-tangere). T'eh ry-akin ayns ynnydyn tashey er feie ny h-Oarpey, ny h-Aishey as America Hwoaie. Ta blaaghyn buighey echey. Ta ny fynneigyn resh echey bleaystagh tra t'ad appee, as ceau ny rassyn foddey ersooyl.

Skeerey Lonan:
Ta Skeerey Lonan () ny skeerey 'sy çheadin Garff er coose shiar Vannin. Ta'n skeerey sheeyney veih Glion Coon 'sy jiass gys meainaghyn Sniaul as Corneil Çhibbyr Slieau Maggle (er y choorse TT shiar veih Beinn y Phott). T'ee ny h-ard eaghtyragh, as t'ee ny h-ard sleitagh as follym, as t'ee tuittym dy geyre jeeragh stiagh 'syn 'aarkey, lesh glionteenyn dowin coodit er lhimmey. She Mullagh Ouyr (491 m) y boayl s'yrjey 'sy skeerey. She John Thomas Faragher Captan ny Skeerey.

Banian:
She lus figgagh eh banian, as billey ashoonagh ny h-Injey. .
T'eh goaill toshiaght myr epiphyte ta foghaney ayns scaaney ayns billey (ny troggal, ny keayrtyn). Ta ny rassyn goll er skeaylley ec ushagyn mess-eeagh. T'ad cur sheese fraueyn coar y thalloo, as foddee ad coodaghey rheynn jeh'n villey ny troggal oastagh. T'eh mooadaghey liorish fraueyn aerag ta çheet dy ve kirp choonee. She billey feer vooar t'ayn: foddee shenn viljyn gaase harrish 200m er crontessen er coontey ny ymmodee kirp oc, as 30m er yrjid. 

Barbrag:
She crouw 'sy chynney Berberidaceae ee barbrag (Berberis vulgaris). T'ee dooghyssagh da'n Europey veanagh as jiass, yn Affrick heear-hwoaie as yn Aishey heear. T'ee er ny jannoo dooie da'n Europey hwoaie as America Hwoaie myrgeddin.
Jalloo-oaylleeaght.
She crouw yn-lhoamey t'ayn, wheesh as 4m er yrjid. Ta duillagyn eelipsagh beggey eck, 2-5km er lhiurid as 1-2km er lheead, as saue-eeacklagh. T'ad gaase ayns dhossan dy 2-5 as jialg myrane lhieu. Ta blaaghyn buighey 4-6mm er crontessen eck, er panicle 3-6km er lhiurid. 
Ta berrishyn jiargey dronuillagagh eck, 7-10mm er lhiurid as 3-5mm er lheead. T'ad appee anmagh 'sy tourey; t'ad yn-ee, agh sharroo dy liooar. T'ad bee scanshoil da ushagyn beggey, as t'adsyn skeaylley ny rassyn 'sy check oc. 
Ymmyd.
Ta milljan Rooshagh jeant jeh berrishyn barbrag (), as ta ymmyd jeant jeu ayns coagyraght ny h-Eeraan. Ta soo jeant jeu 'syn Europey.
Er lhimmey jeh ny berrishyn as rassyn eck, t'ee beggan nieunagh. Ta berberine aynjee.
T'ee ny oastagh meanagh da'n fungys "Puccinia graminis", ny doghan curnaght.

Skeerey Rosien:
Ta Skeerey Rosien (), ny Skyll Chreest Rosien (Baarle: "Kirk Christ Rushen") ny skeerey 'sy çheadin Rosien er coose jiass Vannin. Ta'n skeerey ny h-ard eeasteyragh as eirinagh. Ta'n skeerey nane jeh tree skeeraghyn 'sy çheadin lesh yn ennym cheddin. She Skeerey Chairbre as Skeerey Malew y daa skeerey elley. Ta'n skeerey 24.6 km² er eaghtyr as ta 1,591 cummaltee aynjee rere coontey-pobble ny bleeaney 2006 (goaill magh Purt le Moirrey as Purt Çhiarn). T'ee sheeyney veih Halley'n Traie eddyr lieh-vollagh eddyr Balley Chashtal as Purt le Moirrey gys ny h-eayninyn çheu heear jeh Cronk ny Arrey Laa. T'ee rheynnit ayns daa ayrn. Ta'n preeu-ayrn soit da'n twoaie as da'n shiar hwoaie veih Purt le Moirrey as Purt Çhiarn. Ta'n ayrn s'loo soit da'n jiass as da'n sheear yiass veih ny baljyn beggey shen as t'ee goaill stiagh y claghan Creneash as yn ellaneen y Cholloo myrane lesh y daa chreg Famman Kitterland as Carrick ny Colloo.
Reiltys.
Ta Skeerey Rosien stiurit as reirit ec Barrantee Skeerey Rosien. T'ad çheet ry-cheilley ec cruinnaghtyn ayns Halley Balley Phesson. She Stanley Ditchfield Clucas Captan ny Skeerey, as she Adrian Tinkler Caairliagh ny Barrantee.
Rolley Captanyn Skeerey Rosien.
Ta'n rolley shoh goaill stiagh dagh Captan veih'n vlein 1627:

Charles Kerruish:
Va'n Reejerey Charles Kerruish OBE LLD CS OA (23 Jerrey Souree 1917 - 23 Jerrey Souree 2003) ny pholitickeyr Manninagh. V'eh ny Loayreyder er y Chiare as Feed veih 1962 derrey 1990, as v'eh ny chied Eaghtyrane Tinvaal. Myrane lesh shen v'eh ny chied Chaairliagh jeh'n Choonseil Chiannoortagh, roie-immeeaght jeh Ard-Hirveishagh Ellan Vannin, veih 1961 derrey 1967. Rere shen, v'eh ny chied Vanninagh dy ghoaill shellooderys er currym slattyssagh ayns Mannin. Roish shen va'n chummaght slattyssagh lesh y Lhiass-Chiannoort. Myrane lesh ny freggyrtyssyn echey ayns currymyn ellanagh, v'eh ny Chaptan Skeerey son Skyll Maghal veih'n vlein 1960 derrey laa e vaaish.

Çhengaghyn Mayagh:
She kynney çhengey ad ny çhengaghyn Mayagh. Ta ny çhengaghyn shoh goll er loayrt ayns Mesoamerica as America Veanagh hwoaie. Ta 6 millioon dy loayreyderyn oc, ayns Mecsico, yn Ghuatemaley, yn Veleesh as ny Hondooraghyn son y chooid smoo. 
Ta'n kynney Mayagh mastey kynneeyn share er nyn nocamadys ayns America. 
Rish yn eash roie-Cholombagh, va kuse dy hengaghyn Mayagh screeut 'sy screeu jalloo-ocklagh Mayagh, ayns eash Chlassicagh ny Mayee er lheh (250-900 BNJ). Ta ny smoo na 10,000 cowraghyn grainnit er mayrn er troggalyn, claghyn cooinaghtyn, pasheydys as ayns lioaryn pabyr roost, as ram screeueeaght 'syn abbyrlhit Romanagh erreish da'n eash choloinagh. Myr shen, ta bun mie ayn er son toiggal shennaghys roie-Cholombagh, gyn cosoylaght ayns America.
Troyn.
Ta troyn cadjin ny chengaghyn Mayagh goaill stiagh:

Skeerey Charmane:
Ta Skeerey Charmane () ny skeerey 'sy çheadin Glion Faba, Mannin. Ayns ny shenn traaghyn ghow ee stiagh Purt ny h-Inshey raad ta Moir-Agglish Charmane soit. Ta'n skeerey goaill stiagh Balley Keeill Eoin, raad ta feailley Tinvaal goll ersooyl. T'ee ny h-ard cronkagh son y chooid smoo, faagail magh thalloo rea slystagh faggys da Purt ny h-Inshey. T'ee çhemmit rish Skylley Maayl da'n shiar hwoaie, rish Skeerey Braddan as Skeerey Marooney da'n shiar as da'n shiar yiass, as rish Skeerey Pherick da'n jiass as da'n sheear yiass. Ta'n skeerey caglit rish Mooir Vannin da'n sheear as da'n sheear hwoaie. She John Kennaugh Captan ny Skeerey.

Skeerey Pherick:
Ta Skeerey Pherick () ny skeerey 'sy çheadin Glion Faba er coose heear Vannin. Ta'n skeerey ny h-ard sleitagh ta goaill stiagh liargee twoaie Vaarool Jiass, Slieau Whallin, as Slieau Ghelbee. T'ee çhemmit rish Purt ny h-Inshey da'n twoaie, rish Skeerey Charmane da'n twoaie as y shiar hwoaie, rish Skeerey Marooney da'n shiar, rish Skeerey Malew da'n shiar yiass, rish Skeerey Chairbre as Skeerey Rosien da'n jiass as rish Mooir Vannin da'n sheear. Ta Glion Rosien soit eddyr Slieau Ghelbee as Baarool Jiass, as t'ee roie sheese ny sleityn gys y Glion Mooar as trooid ny hrooid gys Glion Muigh. Ta Awin Ghlion Muigh roie trooid ny glionteenyn shen as ta eas Ghlion Muigh soit mygeayrt 1 veeiley veih'n choose.
Ta kiare baljyn beggey 'sy skeerey: ta Delbee soit faggys da'n slyst er çheu heear jeh Slieau Ghelbee, Forsdal, Skyll Pherick da'n twoaie, as Glion Muigh er y choose. She Margaret Quirk Captan ny Skeerey.

Skeerey Malew:
Ta Skeerey Malew () ny skeerey 'sy çheadin Rosien er coose jiass Vannin. Ta'n skeerey çhemmit rish Balley Chashtal da'n sheear yiass, rish Skeerey Chairbre da'n sheear, rish Skeerey Pherick da'n twoaie, rish Skeerey Marooney da'n shiar hwoaie, rish Skeerey Stondane da'n shiar as rish Mooir Vannin da'n jiass. Rere çheer-oaylleeaght ta Balley Chashtal ny chooid jeh'n skeerey agh t'eh reirit liorish coonseil er lheh lesh hene. Ta'n skeerey goaill stiagh ny baljyn beggey Balley Sallagh, Balley Keeill Varkysh, as Camys y Ree, myrane lesh ny steatyn çhynskylagh ayns Roonysvaie as Balthane as Purt Aer Vannin. She Roy H. Gelling Captan ny Skeerey.

Skeerey Chairbre:
Ta Skeerey Chairbre () ny skeerey 'sy çheadin Rosien er coose jiass Vannin. Ta'n skeerey çhemmit rish Balley Chashtal as Mooir Vannin da'n jiass, rish Skeerey Rosien da'n sheear, rish Skeerey Pherick da'n twoaie, as rish Skeerey Malew da'n shiar. Ta'n skeerey goaill stiagh ny baljyn beggey Eairy Shynnagh, Colby, as Balley Beg. She Cecil Raymond Gawne Captan ny Skeerey.

Ennymockle conastagh:
Ta ennymockle conastagh çheet er ennymockle ta cowraghey, dy undinagh, kianglaghyn eddyr nhee er lheh as nhee elley.
Myr sampleyr, cha nel keeall erbee ec "moir", "carrey" as "laue-lheeys" mannagh vel ad cowraghey "moir "pheiagh ennagh"", "carrey "peiagh ennagh"", ny "laue-lheeys "er peiagh ennagh"". 'Syn aght cheddin, ta "cooyl", "baare" as "bun" cowraghey rheynn dy red elley son y chooid smoo. 
Ta ennymocklyn conastagh nyn ennymocklyn rere co-ordrail, agh t'ad jannoo obbyr taah-ocklyn. Ta focklyn myr shen ry-akin ayns ymmodee çhengaghyn, agh ta çhengoayllee jannoo ymmyd jeh bentyn rish çhengaghyn Mesoamericaanagh son y chooid smoo. Ta çhengaghyn as ennymocklyn conastagh oc goaill stiagh çhengaghyn Mayagh, çhengaghyn Mixeagh-Zoqueagh as çhengaghyn Oto-Mangueagh.
She ennymockle cadjin t'ayn rere grammeydys, agh ta'n keeall echey cowraghey conastey reamyssagh ny emshiragh, cha nel "nhee"; myr shen, ta ymmyd jeant jeu dys soilshaghey ynnyd, gleashaght as kianglaghyn elley, 'syn aght cheddin as roie-ockle ayns çhengaghyn as y lheid oc. Ta'n ennymockle conastagh "lesh" ennymockle elley, as t'eh cowraghey conastey eddyr y "chaireyder" echey as ennymockle elley. 
Sampleyryn.
Ayns Nahuatl Chlassicagh:
Ayns Shapaanish:
Dy cadjin, ta ennymocklyn conastagh ass (ny kianglt rish) rheynnyn y chorp, myr sampleyr, "cooyl".

Skeerey Valley ny Loghey:
Ta Skeerey Valley ny Loghey () ny skeerey 'sy çheadin Maayl ayns sheear hwoaie Vannin. Ta'n skeerey çhemmit rish Jorby da'n twoaie, rish Skeerey Chreest ny h-Ayrey da'n shiar, rish Skylley Maayl da'n jiass as y sheear yiass, as rish Mooir Vannin er feie daa veeilley (3 km) da'n sheear. She Charles Edgar Cowin Captan ny Skeerey.

Balley:
Ta'n fockle balley çheet er tree bun-chooishyn mooarey ayns Gaelg - boayl er y çheer raad ta eirinys goll er obbyr; boayl raad ta dooiney cummal; as boayl raad ta ram thieyn, strughtooryn, shappyn as e lheid ayn. Ta'n fockle shen çheet ass "baile" ny Yernish, as va'n cheeal cheddin ec yn 'ockle ayns Yernish ayns ny shenn traaghyn. Nish, son y chooid smoo, cha nel y fockle Yernish agh çheet er "town" y Vaarle ny lomarcan.

Skeerey:
Ta skeerey çheet er unnid dy halloo va reirit, stiurit, ny shirveishit liorish keeill ynnydagh ny skyll. Ta'n unnid reiragh agglishagh shoh ry-gheddyn dy cadjin ayns ny h-Agglishyn shoh: yn Agglish Chatoleagh Raueagh, y Commeeys Anglicaanagh, yn Agglish Chair-Chredjuagh Hiar, Agglish ny Soolynn, Agglish Norlynn, as kuse dy h-agglishyn Saasilagh as Presbyteyragh. T'ee çheet er boodeeys ny thalloo agglishagh ynnydagh, goaill stiagh yn ard-cheeill, cabbalyn coonee as shellooghyssyn elley.
Ayns çheeraghyn ennagh, ta skeerey çheet er ard reiragh jeh reiltys theayagh. Ta skeeraghyn jeh'n torçh shen ry-gheddyn ayns Sostyn, Nerin, Mannin, Ellanyn Vooir Eeaght, Louisiana ayns ny Steatyn Unnaneysit, as ayns ram ashoonyn ellanagh 'sy Vooir Charibagh. Dy mennick, t'ad çheet ass skeeraghyn agglishagh lesh yn ennym cheddin oc, foddee, agh lesh ceau yn traa, lesh joaraghyn ceaghlit oc son goll lesh fenaghtyn gurneilys ynnydagh.

Balley beg:
Ta balley beg çheet er boodeeys ny boayl cummaltit ta ny smoo na claghan agh ta ny sloo na balley. Dy mennick ta eddyr keeadyn as millaghyn dy 'leih cummal ayn. Ta baljyn beggey nyn muill veayn dy cadjin lesh thieyn soit. Ayns baljyn beggey ta ny thieyn troggit er gerrey da thieyn elley 'sy valley beg. Dy shendeeagh, haink er claghan dy ve coontit myr balley beg tra va keeill troggit ayn.

Balley beg (reddaghey):
Ta ny smoo na un cheeal lesh ny focklyn balley beg:

Çhengey ergatagh-jeeragh:
Ayns çhengoaylleeaght, ta çhengey ergatagh-jeeragh çheet er çhengey ta cur commagh breear neuchaghlaaee as cass breear aistragh ry-cheilley myr y red cheddin. T'ad geddyr-scarrey kione breear aistragh jeh'n daa elley.
Çhengaghyn ergatagh as cassidagh.
Ta çhengey ergatagh-jeeragh cormaghey cass breear aistragh rish commagh breear neuchaghlaaee. Ta kione breear aistragh ny red er lheh. Ta scansh eddyr oc as çhengaghyn ennymagh-cassidagh ta cormaghey kione breear aistragh rish commagh breear neuchaghlaaee, as geddyr-scarrey cass breear aistragh jeu.
T'ad cowraghey ad myr shoh (rere shenn ymmyd Baarle ny focklyn "Subject", "Agent" as "Object"):

Çhengaghyn Mixeagh-Zoqueagh:
She kynney çhengey ad çhengaghyn Mixeagh-Zoqueagh. T'ad goll er loayrt mygeayrt quing hallooin Tehuantepec ayns Mecsico. Ta reiltys Vecsico goaill rish tree çhengaghyn er lheh Mixeagh-Zoqueagh myr çhengaghyn oikoil: Mixeish (188,000 loayreyderyn), Zoqueish (88,000), as Popoluca, ennym ta goaill stiagh kuse dy hengaghyn Mixeagh as Zoqueagh (69,000). Ta ram anchaslys sthie ny possanyn shoh: ta Ethnologue rheynn ad ayns 16 çhengaghyn, as Wichmann rheynn ad ayns 12 çhengaghyn as 11 abbyrtyn.

Idu-Mishmish:
She çhengey veg ny h-Injey as Deynphobblaght ny Sheen ee Idu-Mishmish. Ta mysh 11,000 loayreyderyn eck.

Barrag wuigh:
She lus jesheenagh ee barragh wuigh (Glaucium flavum). Ta rassyn yn-ee eck.
T'ee dooghyssagh da'n Europey heear. T'ee er ny jannoo dooie da America Hwoaie myrgeddin, as she sarkyl t'ayn ayns shen.
Ymmyd.
Ta'n alkaloyd glauseen ayns "Glaucium flavum". Ta bree lheanaghey scowan as noi-loshtaght echey, liorish lhiettal phosphodiesterase as dooney keyllys chelkium, as ta ymmyd jeant jeu myr medshin cassaght ayns kuse dy heeraghyn. Foddee eh cur co-eiyrtyssyn ort, as adsyn goaill stiagh kuinaghey, neuvioyrid as branlaadee reayrtagh. Ta feanish ayn jeu myr druggey-soccar.

Alkaloyd:
She covestey kemmigagh as breneenyn nitrageen bunneydagh ayndaue ad alkaloydyn. Ta'n ennym ass "alkalaih". T'ad goll er co-haaghey ec ymmodee bioagyn. Ta ymmodee fir jeu nieunagh da bioagyn elley; ta bree potacareeagh oc dy mennick, as ta ymmyd jeant jeu myr stoo lheeys, druggaghyn-soccar, as ayns oardee entheogenagh. T'ad goaill stiagh cocaine (ny anloaghtan as greeseyder), caffeen, nicoteen, morfeen as quineen. Ta blass sharroo oc dy cadjin.

Gongdukish:
She çhengey Tibetagh-Burmagh ee Gongdukish. T'ee goll er loayrt ec mysh thousane dy 'leih ayns slyst Monggar ny Butaan. 
Ta corys yn-filley crampit eck, as t'eh taishbyney shenn corys Tibetagh-Burmagh, foddee. Ta cummaght Tshanglaish ry-akin ayns earrooyn Gongdukish.
Ta George van Driem cur possan er lheh jee 'sy chynney çhengey Tibetagh-Burmagh, er bun grammeydys as tasht-fockle. Cha nel faggys-mooinjerys eddyr ee as çhengaghyn elley ny Butaan, Arunachal Pradesh ny Nepaal.

Tasht-fockle:
Ta tasht-fockle çheet er possan dy 'ocklyn bentyn rish cooish er lheh. Foddee eh çheet er focklyn çhengey er lheh, focklyn as fys orroo ec peiagh er lheh, focklyn bentyn rish bun-chooish er lheh, ny focklyn noa ta ry-clashtyn ny ry-akin ayns lessoon ny lioar ynsee.

Monzón:
Ta Monzón ny valjaght ayns Aragón, y Spaainey. Ta 17,115 deiney cummal ayn.

Rolley ellanyn 'syn Oarpey rere eaghtyr:
Ta'n duillag shoh rang-oardraghey ellanyn yn Oarpey rere eaghtyr. Myr reill cadjin, cha nel ellanyn ayns ushtey oor currit er y rolley.

Shynnagh ruy:
Ta'n shynnagh (veih "sionnach" ny Yernish), shynnagh ruy ny heeintagh 'sy chynney Canidae ta çheet ass America Hwoaie as yn Oaraishey dy dooghyssagh, myrane lesh twoaie yn yn Affrick. T'eh ny ghooie jeh'n çhynnagh ta smoo er enney, as rere shen, t'eh er fys myr y "shynnagh" dy cadjin. V'eh currit stiagh 'syn Austrail ayns y 19-oo eash. Myr ta'n ennym coyrlaghey da, ta daah ruy-dhone er y fynney echey.
Ta'n shynnagh ruy ny horçh jeh'n çhynnagh ta smoo lheeadagh as smoo earrooagh, veih ny curree slystagh ayns ny Steatyn Unnaneysit, gys ny tundraghyn Alpagh er Ard-chlaare Tibet, agh cha nel eh ry-gheddyn ayns buill ennagh ayn lheid as Thalloo yn Eeast, Greenlynn, yn Eeslynn, Ellanyn ny Geyrragh, as Mannin.

Arkan sonney:
Ta'n arkan sonney, ny yn graynoge, çheet er sheeintee yialgagh erbee jeh'n fo-chynney Erinaceinae as yn oardagh Erinaceomorpha. Ta 17 dooieyn jeh arkanyn sonney ayns queig genussyn, as t'ad ry-gheddyn ayns ayrnyn ny h-Oarpey, ny h-Aishey, ny h-Affrick, as ny Seelynn Noa. Cha nel arkanyn sonney dooghyssagh ry-gheddyn 'syn Austrail, as cha nel dooieyn bio dooghyssagh ry-gheddyn ayns America Hwoaie; ta ny fir ta ry-gheddyn 'sy Teelynn Noa nyn sluightee jeh fir va currit stiagh.

Nathalia Dill:
She ben-chloieder Vrasseelagh ee Nathalia Goyannes Dill Orrico. Rug ee er 24 Mart, 1986 'syn ard-valley Rio de Janeiro.

Baskad wuigh:
She lus bleinoil ee baskad wuigh (Calendula arvensis). T'ee dooghyssagh da'n Europey veanagh as yiass, agh t'ee ry-akin er feie ny cruinney jiu. 
Jalloo-oaylleeaght.
T'eh gaase dys 15 kentimeadar er yrjid. Ta ny duillagyn echey sleeanagh as soit er cass duillag. Ta ny blaaghyn echey ayns possan wheesh as 4cm er lheead, as t'ad buigh; ta blaagyn gahagh mygeayrt blaagyn jyskagh.

Bassyl:
She lus yn-ee eh bassyl (Ocimum basilicum). Ta laue mooar echey ayns bee Iddaalagh, yn Çheer Thai, yn Vietnam, yn Laos as yn Chamboyd. T'eh bleinoil son y chooid smoo, agh ayns çheeraghyn grianchryssagh, foddee eh ve sheer-vio.
Jalloo-oaylleeaght.
T'eh gaase dys 20-60cm er yrjid. Ta ny gish, tepallyn as dy mennick, ny duillagyn echey renneigagh. Ta ny duillagyn echey oohchrooagh, mysh 1.5-5cm er lhiurid as 1-3cm er lheead, gyn renneig er yn ooir. T'ad nyn soie er cass duillag 5-20mm er lhiurid. Ta ny blaaghyn echey bane as claggagh, as ta staimynyn feer liauyrey echey.

Bastag vane:
She lus blaaghey ee bastag vane (Leucanthemum vulgare). T'ee dooghyssagh da'n Europey as ardjyn temprailagh ny h-Aishey. 
Jalloo-oaylleeaght.
She lus sheer-vio t'ayn. Ta gass neuvanglaneagh eck, as blaa beg jeant jeh mysh 20 blaag gahagh bane mygeayrt kiarkyl dy vlaagyn jyskagh buighey. Ta bun-sthock snauee eck.
Ta duillagyn geayney dorraghey eck. Ta ny duillagyn s'inshley nyn soie er cass duillag, jeiragh dys spaddylagh, as saue-eeacklagh dys feeacklagh. Ta ny duillagyn s'ardjey ny s'girrey, as gyn chass.
T'ee cur magh rassyn lhean, as skeaylley liorish fraueyn myrgeddin.

Steat yl-ashoonagh:
Ta steat yl-ashoonagh çheet er steat (çheer) raad dy vel y pobble jeant seose jeh daa phossan kynneeagh er lheh ny ny smoo as ny possanyn shen jeh mooadys mooar. T'eh shen ayns neu-chosoylaght rish steat ashoonagh raad dy vel y chooid smoo jeh'n phobble jeant seose jeh un ashoon.

Cappan FIFA y Theihll 2010:
Va Cappan FIFA y Theihll 2010 ny hournamint soccer ren goaill toshiaght 'syn Affrick Yiass car sourey ny bleeaney 2010, veih 11 Mean Souree derrey 11 Jerrey Souree. Ren 32 'wirran eddyrashoonagh cloie 'sy tournamint. Va'n tournamint shoh ny chied hournamint dy ve cloit ayns ashoon Affrickagh.

Bastag wuigh:
She lus blaagh sheer-vio ee bastag wuigh, blaashagh buigh ny jean airhey (Glebionis segetum, Chrysanthemum segetum). T'ee er ny jannoo dooie harrish yn Europey. 
Jalloo-oaylleeaght.
Ta bastag wuigh gaase wheesh as 80cm er yrjid. Ta duillagyn reaghit ayns caslagh eck. T'ad liauyr, babbanagh as ta brat kereagh orroo. Ta ny blaaghyn eck buigh-ghial as ayns dhossan 3-5cm er lhiurid. Ta blaagyn gahagh mygeayrt mean dy vlaagyn jyskey.
Foddee ee ve ny sarkyl mooar. Ta leigh ny h-Albey y 13oo eash gra dy vel ooley jeh un cheyrrey er erinagh erbee ta lhiggey da un vastag wuigh cur magh rassyn mastey y troar echey.

Bee conning:
She lus yn-ee eh bee conning (Sonchus oleraceus). Ta enmyn elley echey goaill stiagh bee muc, onnane veein as onnane vuc. Foddee bainney muc çheet er chammah's er "Sonchus arvensis". T'eh dooghyssagh da'n Aishey as yn Europey, agh t'eh ry-akin ayns çheeraghyn elley. Dy cadjin, t'ad cur sarkyl er. T'eh skeaylley liorish rassyn ta goll er skeaylley magh er y gheay ny er ushtey.
Ymmyd.
Ny keayrtyn, ta sleih gee ny duillagyn ayns glassan, ga dy vel ad sharroo. Ta broie goaill magh jiooldey y blass sharroo. Ta ymmodee beiyn gee eh myrgeddin, as shen bun ny h-enmyn cadjin. 

Brock:
Ta'n brock, ny broc ny keayrtyn, ny heeintagh ooilley-eeagh lesh cassyn giarey 'sy chynney assag, Mustelidae. Ta hoght dooieyn dy vrockyn ayn ayns tree fo-chynneeyn: Melinae (brockyn Oarpagh as Aishanagh), Mellivorinae (brockyn molley ny Ratel), as Taxideinae (brockyn Americaanagh).

Mwaagh slieau:
Ta'n mwaagh slieau ny yn mwaagh Yernagh ("Lepus timidus") ny waagh ta cormit rish oayldyn sleitagh as poullagh. T'eh ry-akin veih Fennoscandia gys y Çhibbeyr hiar; ayns bishaghey rish shen, ta possanyn anerit ry-akin ayns ny Beinnyn Alpagh, ayns Nerin, 'sy Pholynn, 'sy Reeriaght Unnaneysit as ayns Hokkaidō. T'eh er ny ve currit stiagh ayns Shetlynn as Ellanyn ny Geyrragh. Foddee mwaagh slieau aase gys 45-65 kentimedaryn (18-26 oar) er lhiurid as gys 2-3 kilogramyn (4.4-6.6 lb) er trimmid, as dy cadjin, ta ny mwaaee woirrinagh ny s'trimmey na ny mwaaee 'irrynagh..

Feeaih ruy:
Ta'n feeaih ruy ("Cervus elaphus") nane jeh ny feeaihee smoo. Ta'n feeaih ruy cummal 'sy chooid vooar jeh'n Oarpey, ayns ard Sleityn ny Coagaash, 'syn Aishey Veg as ayns ayrnyn yn Aishey heear as veanagh. T'ad cummal ayns ard Sleityn Atlas eddyr y Varoc as y Tooneesh 'syn Affrick heear hwoaie, as ad yn un dooie jeh feeaih ta cummal 'syn Affrick. Ta feeaihee ruy er ny ve currit stiagh ayns ardjyn elley goaill stiagh yn Austrail, y Teelynn Noa, as yn Argenteen.

Kayt ny miljyn:
Ta kayt ny miljyn ny assag ny miljyn ("Martes martes") ny heeintagh ass yn Oarpey Hwoaie. She sheeintagh lesh y chynney Mustelidae eh as y kynney shen goaill stiagh beiyn lheid as yn assag rangagh, y dooarchoo, y broc, y gluttyn, as yn assag. T'eh cosoylaght rish y chayt thieoil er mooadys. Ta'n corp echey seose gys 53 cm (21 oar.) er lhiurid as foddee dy vel yn arbyl skeabagh echey 25 cm (10 oar.) er lhiurid. Ta ny kiyt irrynagh beggan ny smoo na ny kiyt woirrinagh; dy meanagh, ta'n kayt 1.5 kg (3.5 lb) er trimmid. Ta clooie ghone ouyr ny ghone ghorraghey orroo as t'ee gaase ny s'liurey as ny smoo sheeidagh car y gheurey. Ta broghil vuigh ouyr orroo er nyn scoarnee oc dy mennick.

Mooir:
Ta mooir çheet er corpane mooar d'ushtey sailjey ta kianglt rish keayn, agh ta'n enmys shen ymmydit son jannoo cur sheese er y cheayn chammah, lesh ymmyd y lhieggan gienneydagh - marrey - son y chooid smoo. Ta'n enmys shen ymmydit dy chur sheese er loghyn mooarey sailjey, lheid as y Vooir Chaspagh as y Vooir Varroo.

Çheeraghyn Nordagh:
Ta ny Çheeraghyn Nordagh (Danvargish / Norlynnish / Soolynnish: "Norden", Finnlynnish: "Pohjoismaat", Eeslynnish: "Norðurlöndin", Faaroish: "Norðurlond", Greenlynnish: "Nunat Avannarliit") jannoo seose ard 'syn Oarpey Hwoaie as 'sy Cheayn Sheear. T'ad jeant seose jeh'n Danvarg, yn Eeslynn, Finnlynn, Norlynn as y Toolynn (as dagh fer jeu goaill ymmyd jeh Crosh Nordagh myr brattagh) as ny croghaneyn ta kianglt roo, goaill stiagh Ellanyn ny Geyrragh, Greenlynn, Svalbard, as Åland. Ta Loghlin ymmydit ny keayrtyn myr co-cheayllaght da ny çheeraghyn Nordagh, agh çheusthie jeh ny çheeraghyn shen ta'n daa enmys anchasley rish y cheiley.

Yn trass rheynnag (tarmaynys):
Ta'n trass rheynnag (er enney chammah myr rheynnag shirveishyn ny çhynskyl shirveishyn) nane jeh ny tree rheynnagyn tarmaynagh. T'ad y chied rheynnag (tayrn magh, lheid as meaineraght, eirinys, eeasteyraght) as y nah rheynnag (jantyssaght son y chooid smoo) ny rheynnagyn elley. She kiarail shirveishyn ayns ynnyd jeh kiarail troarey jerrinagh y cheeal chadjin eck.

Zlatograd:
Ta Zlatograd (, ny "Balley Airhey") ny valley 'sy Vulgeyr, 60 km veih Smolyan. T'eh ny hoie ayns glion eddyr y ghlout-sleitagh hiar as meanagh ayns Sleityn Rhodope. Ta'n joarey lesh y Ghreag soit 5 km veih'n valley, as er 15 Jerrey Geuree 2010, va'n raad eddyr Zlatograd as Thermes ('sy Ghreag) foshlit.

Aavioghey çhengey:
Ta aavioghey çhengey ny çhyndaa arraghey çhengey çheet er yn eab liorish deiney as reagheydyssyn as parteeas oc ayns goll er ash tuittym d'ymmyd çhengey. Ta ny fir as reagheydyssyn shen goaill stiagh deiney er lheh, possanyn cultooragh as boodeeys, reiltyssyn, lughtyn-reill politickagh, a.r.e. My vel ymmyd ny çhengey tuittym dy geyre, foddee dy vel y çhengey ayns gaue, neuvioyr, ny varroo. 'Sy chooishyn shen, she dean yn aavioghee ayn na ymmyd ny çhengey loayrit dy gheddyn reesht. Ga dy vel deanyn aavioghee hengey anchasley rere boodeeys as stayd, she dean dy ram boodeeyssyn çhengey ta marroo ny dy chur er ash myr çhengey loayrit laaoil. Ta obbraghey aavioghee hengey ny obbraghey contraartagh dy vaase çhengey.

Trongisvágur:
Ta Trongisvágur ny valley beg ayns Ellanyn ny Geyrragh. T'eh soit er coose hiar yn ellan Suðuroy ec bun y cheyllys sailley Trongisvágurfjørður. T'eh as y balley beg Tvøroyri er nyn aase ry-cheiley myr un voayl. Ayns Trongisvágur, ta ynnyd spoyrt, scoill, as scoill oikanagh ry-gheddyn 'sy valley.

Sandavágur:
Ta Sandavágur ny valley beg ayns Ellanyn ny Geyrragh ta soit er yn ellan Vágar.

Eiði:
Ta Eiði ny valley beg ayns Ellanyn ny Geyrragh ta soit er yn ellan Eysturoy.

Leirvík:
Ta Leirvík ny valley beg ayns Ellanyn ny Geyrragh ta soit er yn ellan Eysturoy. T'eh kianglt rish Klaksvík er Borðoy liorish y Norðoyatunnilin, thollane ta kiangley yn daa ellan ry cheilley.

Bee cooag:
She lus eh bee cooag ny shamrag Vanninagh (Oxalis acetosella). V'ad cliaghtey gee eh myr lus glassan. Ta ram geayr ocsalagh ayn, as eshyn nieunagh my eeys oo ram jeu.
Jallo-oaylleeaght.
Ta duillagyn tree-duillagagh cree-chrooagh oc, as ad fillit 'sy vean. T'ad gaase ayns troor er gass. Ta blaaghyn beggey baney echey 'syn arrey. Ny keayrtyn, t'ad jiarg ny bane-jiarg. Ta duillagyn as blaaghyn cribbey 'syn oie as rish fliaghey.

Bee muc friogganagh:
She lus bleinoil yn-ee eh bee muc friogganagh (Sonchus asper).
Jalloo-oaylleeaght.
Ta duillagyn jialgagh as babbanagh gorrym-ghlassey as blaaghyn buighey echey, gollrish lus ny minnag. T'eh gaase wheesh as 180cm er yrjid. Ta sapp bainnagh echey.

Bee ny shynnee:
She lus sheer-vio eh bee ny shynnee (Sedum anglicum).
Jalloo-oaylleeaght.
Ta duillagyn oochrooagh roseagh as feillagh echey. T'ad jiargey ny keayrtyn. Ta blaaghyn baney-jiargey echey. T'eh gaase er claghyn.

Beetys:
She lus yn-ee eh beetys ("Beta vulgaris" fogh. "vulgaris" arr. "conditiva" as enmyn elley).
Ymmyd.
T'ad gee fraue veetys broit, ny mynyiarrit ayns glassan. T'ad jannoo piggyl assjee. 'syn Europey Hiar t'ad jannoo borscht assjee. Ta ny duillagyn echey yn-ee myrgeddin.
Ta'a jannoo ymmyd jeh betanin ass ny fraueyn myr daah bee, as myr daah screeuee ny keayrtyn.
Cha nel betanin goll er lheie 'sy volg, as ayns co-chruinnaght ard, foddee eh jiargaghey mooin as keck. T'eh jeeaghyn gollrish eiyrtys fuill, agh t'eh neuskielleydagh.
Jalloo-oaylleeaght.
Ta duillagyn mooarey craplaghey echey, as cuishlin baghtal ry-akin 'sy vean oc. Ta gass as fraue jiarg echey, as famman liauyr ec y 'raue.

Beetys marrey:
She lus sheer-vio eh beetys marrey ("Beta vulgaris" fogh. "maritima"). T'eh dooghyssagh da slystyn ny h-Oarpey, ny h-Affrick hwoaie, as ny h-Aishey jiass. She shennayr lossreeyn cadjin t'ayn, myr sampleyr, beetys as beetys shugyr. Ta ny duillagyn echey yn-ee.
Jalloo-oaylleeaght.
T'eh gaase wheesh as 1.2m er yrjid. Ta duillagyn dorraghey-geayney gloasagh echey, as gish yiargey oc dy mennick. Ta blaaghyn gaase er kibbin liuayr eddyr Jerrey Souree as Mean Fouyir. Cha nel gish ny petylyn ec ny blaaghyn, agh ta staimynyn buighey ry-akin. T'ad daa-ghooghyssagh as goll er pollnaghey ec y gheay. T'eh gaase er thalloo tash jeeigit dy mie.

Beetys shugyr:
She lus daa-vleinoil eh beetys shugyr (Beta vulgaris arr. altissima). Ta ram sucrose 'sy 'raue echey, as myr shen, she troar traghtee scanshoil t'ayn.
Ta sleih er ny droarey myr bee as foddyr rish eashyn, agh nel er son shugyr derrey 1747, tra hooar magh Andreas Marggraf (ny kemmigagh Germaanagh) saase dy ghoaill y shugyr ass. Rish ny Caggaghyn Napoleon (1793-1815), ren lhuingys chaggee Hostyn çhemmaltey purtyn ny h-Oarpey, as cha dod ad kionnaghey stiagh shugyr cuirtlee. Myr shen, ghow ad toshiaght dy aase ram beetys shugyr 'syn ynnyd echey. Hooar ad magh dy nod oo eshyn y aase dy mie 'syn Europey, as rish 1880, va beetys shugyr ard-vun shugyr 'syn Europey. Rish dolley magh slauaght ayns ny h-Injyn Sheear, dardjee costyn shugyr cuirtlee, as shen brod elley dy hroarey beetys shugyr.
'syn Vretyn Vooar, ren y reiltys greinney eirinee dy hroarey beetys shugyr rish Yn Chied Chaggey Dowanagh tra va fo-vooiraneyn Germaanagh cur baatyn traghtee fo.

Beta vulgaris:
She lus eh Beta vulgaris. Ta ymmodee lossreeyn troarey fo'n dooie shoh. T'eh rheynn ayns daa foghooie: "vulgaris" as "cicla". Ta "vulgaris" goaill stiagh ny fraueyn yn-ee: beetys, beetys marrey, beetys mooar as beetys shugyr. 

Glyvrar:
Ta Glyvrar ny valley beg ayns Ellanyn ny Geyrragh ta soit er yn ellan Eysturoy. She nane jeh ymmodee dy valjyn beggey er çheu hiar jeh'n cheyllys sailley Skalafjørður as t'ad er nyn 'aase ry-cheiley myr covaljys ta 10 kilometeryn er lhiurid.

Hvalba:
Ta Hvalba ny valley beg ayns Ellanyn ny Geyrragh ta soit er yn ellan Suðuroy.

Kollafjørður:
Ta Kollafjørður ny valley beg ayns Ellanyn ny Geyrragh ta soit er yn ellan Streymoy.

Saltangará:
Ta Saltangará ny valley beg ayns Ellanyn ny Geyrragh ta soit er yn ellan Eysturoy.

Hósvík:
Ta Hósvík ny valley beg ayns Ellanyn ny Geyrragh ta soit er yn ellan Streymoy.

Strendur:
Ta Strendur ny valley beg ayns Ellanyn ny Geyrragh ta soit er yn ellan Eysturoy.

Søldarfjørður:
Ta Søldarfjørður ny valley beg ayns Ellanyn ny Geyrragh ta soit er yn ellan Eysturoy.

Sørvágur:
Ta Sørvágur ny valley beg ayns Ellanyn ny Geyrragh ta soit er yn ellan Vágoy.

Beih argid:
She billey yn-lhoamey 'sy ghenus "Betula" ee beih argid (Betula pendula). T'ee dooghyssagh da'n Europey, chammah's sleityn ny Turkee hwoaie. Ta kuse dy lus-oayllee gra dy vel "Betula platyphylla" (yn Aishey hwoaie) as "Betula szechuanica" (yn Aishey veanagh) sorçhyn dy veih argid myrgeddin, myr "B. pendula" arr. "platyphylla" as "B. pendula" arr. "szechuanica".
Jalloo-oaylleeaght.
Ta beih argid gaase wheesh as 15-25m er yrjid, agh ta'n corp eck keyl, ny sloo na 40cm son y chooid smoo. Ta roost bane eck, as cowraghyn dooey er dy mennick, faggys da'n vun erskyn ooilley. Ta stholeyn garroo eck. Ta ny duillagyn eck 3-7cm er lhiurid, trooraneagh, as ta oirr daa-eeacklagh oc. She clooieyn ny gayt ad ny blaaghyn, as t'ad goll er pollnaghey liorish y gheay. Ta rassyn beggey skianagh eck.
Eggoaylleeaght.
T'ee ry-akin er thalloo geinee, çhirrym son y chooid smoo. T'ee gaase myrane lesh y fungys mycorrhisagh "Amanita muscaria" dy cadjin, er thalloo boght er lheh. Ny keayrtyn, ta "Leccinum scabrum" ny "Cantharellus cibarius" myrane lhee. Dy mennick, ta skeaban buitçh eck myr eiyrtys "Taphrina betulina".

Tórshavnar kommuna:
Ta Tórshavnar kommuna () ny valjaght ayns Ellanyn ny Geyrragh. 'Sy vlein 2005 va 19,284 cummaltee 'sy valjaght. Ta'n valjaght jeant seose jeh'n phreeu-valley Tórshavn as y boayl mygeayrt. T'ee coodaghey yn lieh jiass jeh'n ellan Streymoy myrane lesh ellanyn beggey ry laue.

Viðareiðis kommuna:
Ta Viðareiðis kommuna () ny valjaght ayns Ellanyn ny Geyrragh. 'Sy vlein 2002 va 347 cummaltee 'sy valjaght. Cha nel agh un valley 'sy valjaght: Viðareiði. Ta'n valjaght ny boayl smoo twoaieagh ayns Ellanyn ny Geyrragh.

Fuglafjarðar kommuna:
Ta Fuglafjarðar kommuna () ny valjaght er coose hiar jeh'n ellan Eysturoy ayns Ellanyn ny Geyrragh. She Fuglafjørður y balley smoo 'sy valjaght.

Runavíkar kommuna:
Ta Runavíkar kommuna () ny valjaght er coose hiar jeh'n ellan Eysturoy ayns Ellanyn ny Geyrragh. Myrane lesh Runavík hene, ta'n valjaght goaill stiagh ny baljyn beggey elley Saltangará, Æðuvík, Glyvrar, Lambi, Rituvík, Skipanes, Søldarfjørður as Lambareiði.

The Tower (lioar):
Va The Tower () ny lioar dy ghaanyn liorish William Butler Yeats va soilshit magh 'sy vlein 1928. Ta enmys y lioar, ta çheet magh ass ennym y nah daan, cur sheese er Caisleán Thúr Bhaile Uí Laoigh va kionnit ec Yeats as raad v'eh lesh y lught thie echey cummal er feie tammylt. Ta'n lioar goaill stiagh shiartanse dy ny daanyn smoo ennoil ec Yeats, goaill stiagh "Sailing to Byzantium", "Leda and the Swan", as "Among School Children".

Sumba, Ellanyn ny Geyrragh:
Ta Sumba ny valley beg ayns Ellanyn ny Geyrragh ta soit er yn ellan Suðuroy.

Beetys mooar:
She lus daa-vleinoil eh beetys mooar ("Beta vulgaris fogh. vulgaris arr. crassa"). T'ad troarey eh myr foddyr.

Beta vulgaris fogh. vulgaris:
Ta'n foghooie Beta vulgaris fogh. vulgaris çheet er cummaghyn "Beta vulgaris". Ta "vulgaris" goaill stiagh ny fraueyn yn-ee: beetys, beetys marrey, beetys mooar as beetys shugyr. 

Sandur, Ellanyn ny Geyrragh:
Ta Sandur ny valley beg ayns Ellanyn ny Geyrragh ta soit er yn ellan Sandoy.

Skopun:
Ta Skopun (focklit magh myr ) ny valley beg ayns Ellanyn ny Geyrragh ta soit er coose twoaie yn ellan Sandoy. She Skopun y nah valley smoo er yn ellan. Ga dy vel deiney cummal 'syn ard veih ny Mean Eashyn, cha row Skopun bunnit myr balley beg agh dy jeianagh 'sy vlein 1833. Cha row thalloo er shelloo ec cummaltee yn valley as ren ad cohassoo er bun eeasteyraght agh rere shen ta ny thieyn soit rish yn 'aarkey.

Beih veg:
She crouw 'sy ghenus "Betula" ee beih veg (Betula nana). T'ee dooghyssagh da'n Europey hwoaie, yn Aishey hwoaie as America Hwoaie hwoaie, ayns ardjyn arctagh as tempreilagh feayrey. Çheumooie jeh ardjyn hwoaie, t'ee lhiettit da sleityn erskyn 300m, wheesh as 835m ayns Nalbin as 2200m ayns ny h-Alpyn.
Jalloo-oaylleeaght.
