Ta daa 'o-chynney ayn, Cercopithecinae as Colobinae. Ta Cercopithecinae Affrickagh son y chooid smoo (er lhimmey jeh macaqueyn ny h-Aishey), as ta Colobinae Aishanagh son y chooid smoo agh goaill stiagh apagyn Colobus ny h-Affrick.

San Francisco:
Ta Caayr as Coontae San Francisco ny chiarroo chaayr smoo ayns California as ny 12-h chaayr smoo ayns ny Steatyn Unnaneysit lesh 808,977 cummaltee rere coontey-pobble ny bleeaney 2008. Ta San Francisco 121 km2 er eaghtyr as ta 6,700 deiney cummal ayns dagh kilomeadar kerrinagh. Ta 4.3 millioonyn dy chummaltee cummal 'syn ard moir-valjagh, as t'eh ny chree argidoil, cultooragh as arraghey son Ard Baie San Francisco raad ta 7.4 millioonyn dy chummaltee.

Eaddagh oie:
Ta eaddagh oie çheet er eaddeeyn ta ceaut tra ta'n ceaueyder ny chadley. Ta sorçh yn eaddee anchasley lesh ny h-imbeeyn lesh sorçhyn ny s'çhoe er nyn geau ayns coryn feayrey. Ta sorçhyn as fassanyn elley reiht er son y yeearreeaght reayrtagh ny an-ghraagh.
Ta sorçhyn d'eaddeeyn goaill stiagh:

Coodagh king:
Ta coodagh king ny eaddagh king çheet er sorçh ennagh d'eaddeeyn ta ceaut er y chione. Ta coodee ching ceaut dys y kione dy choadey veih'n emshir (fliaghey, sniaghtey, feayrid, çhiassid, a.r.e.), dys y folt dy freayll cumiragh, er son cooishyn fassanagh ny jesheenagh, son cooishyn craueeaght, as son cooishyn elley.
Ta coodee ching goaill stiagh ny coodee shoh heese mastey coodee elley:

Caayr Ho Chi Minh:
Ta Caayr Ho Chi Minh (Vietnamish: "Thành phố Hồ Chí Minh") ny valley smoo 'sy Vietnam. Ta ny smoo na 7.1 millioonyn dy chummaltee ayn. Ta Purt Aer Tan Son Nhat (IATA: SGN, ICAO: VVTS) ny soie ayns y chaayr.

Clag (traa):
Ta clag çheet er jeshaght ta ymmydit dy hoilshaghey magh, dy howse, dy 'reayll, as dy cho-oardaghey yn traa. Ta'n fockle "clag" çheet magh ass ny focklyn Celtish "clagan" as "clocca" as ad çheet er "clag", "clageen", ny "kiaullane". Ta oor-oaylleeyn as sur-oaylleeyn elley goaill ymmyd jeh'n fockle "clag" 'sy cheeal shoh dy chur sheese er greie lesh jeshaght woallee dy fogrey magh eddyrcheimyn traa dy sheeanoil lesh claggintys, clingaghey, ny bwoalley gong. Ta'n fockle ooreyder currit er greieyn traa elley ta ceaut er y laue. 'Sy ghlare chadjin, ansherbee, ta'n fockle "clag" ymmydit dy chur sheese er greie erbee ta soilshaghey magh cre'n oor t'eh.

Clag:
Ta ymmodee keeallyn ec clag. Foddee eh çheet er:

Clag (greie sheeanoil):
Ta clag çheet er greie sheeanoil aashagh. Ta'n clag ny ghreie bwoallee. Dy mennick ta cluig nyn ghreieyn lesh cummey cappan follym as eh aavuilley traa t'eh bwoaillit. Foddee dy vel y greie bwoallee ny chroghag ta croghit çheusthie jeh'n chlag as eh enmyssit "oabbyr", ny foddee dy vel y greie bwoallee ny woaillteen er lheh. Ta'n fockle "clag" çheet magh ass y fockle Celtish "clagan" ny "clocca" as y cheeal cheddin echey.
Ta cluig jeant ass meain dy mennick, agh foddee dy vel cluig veggey dy ve jeant ass crayee ny glonney. Ta cluig ry-gheddyn ayns dagh mooadys: veih cluig veggey son jesheenaghey dys cluig vooarey lheid as ad ta ry-akin ayns kialteenyn ta shiartanse dy hunnaghyn er thummid. She claggintys yn ennym ta currit er studeyrys cluig.

Ny Bermioodee:
Ta ny Bermioodee (), ny ny Bermioodee ny Ellanyn Somers () dy h-oikoil, nyn Dhallooyn harrish Mooir Goaldagh 'sy Cheayn Sheear. T'ad nyn soie magh veih coose hiar ny Steatyn Unnaneysit as she Cape Hatteras ayns Carolina Hwoaie y thalloo s'girrey da ny h-ellanyn, ga nagh vel y boayl shen ny hoie agh 1,030 kilomeadaryn sheear sheear hwoaie veih ny h-ellanyn. T'ad soit 1,373 km yiass veih Halifax, Nalbin Noa, y Chanadey, as 1,770 km shiar hwoaie veih Miami, Florida. She Hamilton y preeu-valley.

Çheer:
Ayns çheer-oaylleeaght, ta çheer çheet er ard çheer-oaylleeagh. Dy mennick ta'n enmys shen currit er rheynn pholitickagh ny er thalloo steat kionedeeagh, ny er rheynn ny er eear-rheynn pholitickagh ny sloo jeh ard çheer-oaylleeagh. Dy mennick ta'n enmys coontit myr unnane as steat, ashoon ny reiltys, agh foddee dy vel eh çheet er ard neu-valjagh ta fo biljyn ny magheryn, a.m.s.

Arrane ashoonagh:
Ta arrane ashoonagh, hymn ashoonagh, ny anthym ashoonagh çheet er cummey kiaullee çheer-ghraihagh ta kelloorey as tayrn magh shennaghys, tradishoonyn as doccar seyraanee ny çheerey, as t'er enney ec reiltys yn ashoon myr yn arrane ashoonagh oikoil, ny t'er enney rere coardail ny seyraanee.

509-500 RC:

Kiaull Vannin:
Ta kiaull Vannin ny cur sheese er begnagh dagh sorçh dy chiaull t'ayn jiu ayns Mannin. Ta Mannin coontit myr nane jeh ny Çheeraghyn Celtiagh, gollrish Nerin, Nalbin, Bretyn, y Chorn, as y Vritaan, as myr shen, ta blass Celtiagh er chooid vooar jeh'n chiaull çheerey ta ry-chlashtyn er yn ellan, agh ta cleanaghyn Loghlynagh as Sostynagh ry-chlashtyn 'sy chiaull chammah. Agh ta'n chiaull ayns Mannin goaill stiagh sorçhyn elley dy chiaull lheid as craa-chiaull, pop-chiaull, as snag-chiaull. Hie kiaull hradishoonagh Vannin magh ass foayr ayns ny 19oo eash yeianagh gys ny 1970yn, tra haghyr aavioghey 'sy chiaull hradishoonagh liorish feailley kiaullee enmyssit "Yn Chruinnaght" ayns Rhumsaa.
Ta kiaulleyderyn ard-ghooagh jeh'n aavioghey Manninagh goaill stiagh lheid as King Chiaullee, Skeeal, The Mannin Folk, Mactullagh Vannin, Moot as shiartanse dy vannyn elley. Ta Undinys Eiraght Vannin kiarail ynnyd Myspace meanagh da kiaull as da daunse Vannin, as kianglaghyn gys kiaulleyderyn elley ayn. Ta ellyneyryn elley t'er ghientyn JCyn goaill stiagh Emma Christian (goo, cruitçh as feddan millish) as y cruitçheragh Charles Guard, reireyder ayns Undinys Eiraght Vannin.

700:

King Chiaullee:
Ta King Chiaullee ny vann kiaullee veih Mannin. Hie yn bann ry-cheilley 'sy scoill 'sy vlein 1994, as veih'n traa shen, ren y bann cloie ayns ram feaillaghyn kiaullee er feie'n Reeriaght Unnaneysit, yn Oarpey, as ayns ny Steatyn Unnaneysit.
Ta queig olteynyn 'sy vann:
Ta King Chiaullee mestey kiaull hradishoonagh ass Mannin, Nalbin as Nerin marish arraneyn bunneydagh ta screeuit ec olteynyn y vann, dys mestey jeh chiaull Cheltiagh dy chur magh. Ta tree albymyn skeaylt magh ec y vann: "Baase Cooil Stroo" (2000), "Reel: Ode" (2003), as "Nish!" (2006), as ta ram cohortyssyn jeant oc ayns albymyn elley.
'Sy vlein 2008 ren y bann cloie ayns Feailley Eddyr-cheltiagh An Oriant 'sy Vritaan, as va'n aundyr "Trophée Cidrerie des Terroirs" cosnit ec y vann - y chied ynnyd 'sy chohirrey bann.

Ceboidea:
She apag 'sy far-chynney Ceboidea eh apag y Teihill Noa. Shoh ny queig kynneeyn dy 'ar-gheiney ta ry-akin ayns America Yiass as America Veanagh. She far-chynney ynrican er mayrn y pharva-oardagh Platyrrhini, as dy cadjin ta "Platyrrhini" çheet er ny h-apagyn shoh. 
Troyn.
Ta apagyn ny Shenn Seihill beg: She Marmaseen Druaie y dooie sloo, 14-16km er lhiurid voish kione dys boyn, mysh 120 dys 190g er trimmid; she "Brachyteles arachnoides" y dooie smoo, mysh 55-70km er lhiurid, as wheesh as 15kg er trimmid. T'ad geddyr-scarrey ad veih Cercopithecidae er bun y stroin oc, as tuill stronney lhiasragh echey. Ta fammanyn yn-ghreimmee oc myrgeddin, anchasley rish fammanyn neughreimmee ny Cercopithecidae.
Cha nel shilley tree-chromaidagh ec Ceboidea firrinagh, er lhimmey jeh agapyn yllagh 'sy ghenus "Alouatta". Ta shilley daah ayns Ceboidea croghey er un ghien er y chroymasoom X dys jannoo daahghyn nod freggyragh da sollys tonn veanagh as liauyr. Ta daahghyn elley freggyragh da sollys tonn ghiare. Myr shen, ta jargaght scarrey daa-hroagh ec fir as ec mraane homozygous (shilley daa-chroamatagh). Ta daa allele ny gienntag cheddin ec mraane heterozygous as foddee ad jannoo daahghyn ta freggyragh da daa horçh dy hollys tonn veanagh-liauyr, chammah's sollys tonn yiare. Myr shen, ta eddyr-scarrey tree-hroagh yn-yannoo oc (shilley tree-chroamatagh).
Ta anchaslys elley ayn bentyn rish ny feeacklyn. Ta daa 'eeackle lieh-chooylloo yeig ec Ceboidea, cosoylit rish hoght ec Cercopithecidae. Myr shen, ta formley feeacklagh oc. She apagyn 'sy chynney Atelidae ad ny far-gheiney ynrickan as famman yn-ghreimmee oc. Anchasley rish sleih as apagyn ny Shenn Seihill, cha nel ordaag hoil noi oc er lhimmey jeh Cebidae ennagh..

Skeeal (bann):
She bann kiaullee Manninagh eh Skeeal. Ta'n possan cloie arraneyn tradishoonagh as Gaelgagh son y chooid smoo as t'ad jannoo ymmyd jeh feddanyn mooarey, gitaryn as goo, as ny h-arranyn oc gleashaghey eddyr ny tree çhengaghyn Gaelgagh - Yernish, Gaelg Albinagh, as Gaelg. Ta daa JC skeaylt magh ec y vann - "Long Story" as "Slipway". Va'n nah JC oc ry-chlashtyn ayns Feailley Eddyr-cheltiagh An Oriant 'sy vlein 2009.
Ta queig olteynyn 'sy vann:

Catarrhini:
She parva-oardagh Phrimates eh Catarrhini, fer jeh daa vyn-oardagh Himiiformes. T'eh goaill stiagh Cercopithecoidea (apagyn ny Shenn Seihill) as Hominoidea (far-chynney ny h-apeyn). 
Ta "catarrhini" ("stroin cheyll") çheet er ny tuill stronney keylley cour y laare oc. My ta fammanyn oc, cha nel ad yn-ghreimmee. Ta formley feeacklagh oc.
T'ad laaoil. T'ad daa-vorfagh son y chooid smoo, as cha nel ad piyral. T'ad cummal ayns possan dy cadjin. T'ad dooghyssagh da'n Affrick as yn Aishey.

Simiiformes:
She myn-oardagh Phrimates eh Simiiformes. Ta'n ronney shoh goaill stiagh ny far-gheiney s'yrjey mie er enney ain: apagyn ny Shenn Seihill as ny Seihill Noa as apeyn. Son y chooid smoo, t'ad ny smoo na prosimee (ny "far-gheiney s'inshley").
Rang-oardraghey.
Shoh rolley ny kyneeyn simeeagh t'ayn:

Hawaiish:
Ta Hawaiish ny Hawaii (Hawaiish: ") ny çhengey Austraineeshagh 'sy chynney Pholaneesagh Hiar. T'ee goll er loayrt ayns Hawaii, as t'ee ny çhengey oikoil ayns shen myrane lesh Baarle.
Grammeydys.
Ta oardagh fockle Breear-Kione-Cass ec Hawaiish, gollrish Gaelg. She çhengey scarreydagh t'ayn, as cha nel yn-filley eck. T'ee jannoo ymmyd jeh breneenyn as oardagh ny focklyn dys soilshaghey y cheeall oc. Cha nel keintys eck.
Artyn.
Ta artyn kinjagh as neushoilshaghey ec Hawaiish. She ny eh yn art kinjagh unnaneagh (croghey er toshiaght yn 'ockle ny yei), as eh yn ard kinjagh yl-rey. She eh yn ard neuhoilshaghey.

Abbyrlhit ny Hawaiish:
Ta abbyrlhit ny Hawaiish çheet er cummey jeh'n Abbyrlhit Romanagh as ymmyd jeant jeh son dy screeu Hawaiish.

Billey ruissagh:
She crouw ny billey sheer-ghlass eh billey ruissagh (Rhododendron ponticum) 'sy chynney "Rhododendron". T'eh dooghyssagh da'n Oarpey yiass as yn Aishey heear-yiass. She sarkyl ruegyssagh t'ayn ayns ny h-Ellanyn Goaldagh.
Jalloo-oaylleeaght.
T'eh gaase wheesh as 5m er yrjid. Ta duillagyn 6-18km er lhiurid as 2-6km er lheead echey. Ta blaaghyn gorrym-jiargey 3-5km er crantessen echey; dy mennick, ta cronyn beggey buighey-ghlassey er. She kishtag çhirrym eh y mess oc, mysh 15-25mm er lhiurid as ram rassyn ayn.

Billey plaaney:
Ta billey plaaney çheet er biljyn 'sy ghenus (Platanus). T'ad dooghyssagh da'n Lieh-chruinney Hwoaie as cummal ayns curree dy cadjin. T'adsyn olteynyn ynrican t'er mayrn jeh'n chynney Platanaceae. Ta'n crosh-sheelragh Platanus × hispanica jeen er lheh noi çhirmid.
Jalloo-oaylleeaght.
T'ad gaase wheesh as 50m er yrjid. Ta roost crottylagh oc, liorish scaillaghey dy aashagh.
Ta duillagyn un-duillagagh oc. T'ad duillageenagh er lhimmey jeh "Platanus kerrii". Er lhimmey jeh "P. Kerrii" t'ad yn-lhoamey.
Ta blaaghyn beggey ayns dhossan oc: ta mysh 3-7 seepalyn kianglt ec y un, as ta 3-7 petyllyn oc. Ta biljyn plaaney monoecious (blaaghyn bwoirrinagh as firrinagh er lheh er y villey cheddin). T'ad goll er pollnaghey ec y gheay, as ta blaaghyn firrinagh tuittym erreish daue ceau y pollin oc. Ta ny blaaghyn bwoirrinagh çheet dy ve acheneyn ayns dhossan dy ymmodee keead. Ta dagh achene cughlinagh as ta un rass ayn. Ta tappag caulgagh oc cur cooney daue skeaylley er y gheay.

Eudicotyledonae:
Ta eudicotyledonae çheet er possan monophyletagh dy lossreeyn blaaghey (unnaneagh: eudicot ny eudicotyledon). Hug Doyle & Hotton (1991) yn ennym shoh er y phossan. Va oayllee ny sleaie cliaghtey cur "tricolpates" ny "dicotyn neu-Vagnoliagh" orroo. She "feer dicotyledonyn" ee keeall yn ennym, er y fa dy vel eh goaill stiagh y chooid smoo jeh lossreeyn v'ad coontey myr dicotyledon as troyn sampleyragh dicotyledon oc. T'ad jannoo ymmyd jeh dys çheet er fer jeh'n daa chlade angiosperm smoo, as she monocotyn ny fir elley.
Ta'n corys APG as corys APG II jannoo ymmyd jeh'n 'ockle eudicot bentyn rish rang-oardraghey angiospermyn. T'ad cur eh er clade ta goaill stiagh y chooid smoo jeh ny dicotyledonyn dy row.

Billey rubbyr:
She billey 'sy ghenus "Hevea" eh billey rubbyr (Hevea brasiliensis). She oltey smoo scanshoil y ghenus bentyn rish tarmaynys, er coontey y sapp echey, lateks, bun-vun rubbyr najooragh. T'eh dooghyssagh da ard ny h-Amason.
Çhaglym lateks.
Rish 5–6 bleeantyn d'eash, foddee ad çhaglym rubbyr assdaue. T'ad beamey ad er jeeraghan ny cuishlinyn lateks, as dowiney dy liooar dy varnaghey ad gyn lhiettal aase y villey. T'ad cur stiagh çhoob as ta'n lateks sheeley magh as stiagh ayns cruick. 
Jalloo-oaylleeaght.
T'eh gaase wheesh as 44m er yrjid. Ta cuishlinyn lateks gaase ayns caslagh jeshagh mygeayrt y chorp. Ta biljyn garey lhiettit er yrjid do nagh beagh ad jummal daa-ocseed charboan er aase, agh cur eh da jannoo lateks.ref name=eb>"Elastomer-The rubber tree", "Encyclopaedia Britannica", 2008</ref> Ta duillagyn tree-duillagagh noi-sleeanagh echey as cuishlinaght fedjagagh oc. Ta roost rea dhone echey. Ta blaaghyn buighey gyn petyllyn echey, as soar geyre oc. She kishtey bleastagh eh y mess echey.

Guido Reni:
Va Guido Reni (4 Mee Houney, 1575 - 18 Luanistyn, 1642) ny pheinteyr Iddaalagh. Rug eh ayns Bologna, yn Iddaal, ayns 1575 as hooar eh baase 'sy vlein 1642.

Billey shapaanagh:
Ta billey shapaanagh (ny quinsey shapaanagh, thammag shapaanagh) çheet er crouwyn yn-lhoamey 'sy ghenus Chaenomeles. T'ad dooghyssagh da'n Aishey hiar - yn Çhapaan, yn Çheen as yn Chorea. Ta mooinjerys eddyr oc as quinsh as quinsh sheenish, agh ta anchaslyssyn eddyr oc bentyn rish duillagyn as blaaghyn.
Jalloo-oaylleeaght.
Ta biljyn shapaanagh gaase 1-3m er yrjid. Ta duillagyn maylartey un-duillagagh oc, as oirr haue-eeacklagh oc. T'ad cur magh blaaghyn anmagh 'sy gheurey ny leah 'syn arree; t'ad jiargey-bwee dy cadjin, agh bane-jiarg ny bane ny keayrtyn. Ta queig petyllyn oc as t'ad 3-4.5 km er crantessen. She pome eh y mess oc, as queig carpyllyn echey; t'eh appee rish fouyr.
Ymmyd.
Ta sleih gaase dooieyn "Chaenomeles " myr lossreeyn jesheenagh. Ta'n mess oc geyre as castagh, agh t'ad mie dy liooar son soo as liggoor.

An Bóthar Buí, Coontae ny Mee:
Ta an Bóthar Buí (, Yernish son "y Baayr Buigh") ny valley ayns jiass Choontae ny Mee, Nerin. Ta'n balley ny hoie eddyr Cionn Átha Gad as Cill Choca er yn R148 va enmyssit yn N4 roish haink er y valley dy ve shaghnit liorish yn M4 ta goll veih Divlyn gys Shliggagh. Cha nel y balley agh fodjeeaght ghiare veih'n joarey rish Coontae Cheeill Darey.

Dún Seachlainn:
Ta Dún Seachlainn ny Domhnach Seachnaill () ny valley ayns Coontae ny Mee, Nerin. Ta'n balley ny hoie 29 km sheear hwoaie veih Divlyn as 19 km shiar yiass veih'n Ooive er raad yn N3. Rere coontey-pobble ny bleeaney 2006 va 3,384 cummaltee 'sy valley.

Dún Búinne:
Ta Dún Búinne () ny valley ayns Coontae ny Mee, Nerin. Son y chooid smoo t'eh ny fo-valley jeh Divlyn. T'eh ny hoie er crossag jeh raaidyn yn R156 as yn R157, beggan çheu yiass veih'n N3.

Cill Dhéagláin:
Ta Cill Dhéagláin () ny valley ayns Coontae ny Mee, Nerin. T'eh ny fo-valley jeh Divlyn as t'eh soit mygeayrt 20 km çheu hwoaie veih'n phreeu-valley. T'eh shaghnit liorish bayr gleashtanagh yn M2. Derrey'n vlein 1970 cha row ayns Cill Dhéagláin agh balley beg as cha row agh 400 deiney cummal ayn. Agh rere bishaghey as mooadaghey Ghivlyn, daase yn balley as nish ta 8,528 deiney cummal ayn.

Shillish:
She billey 'sy ghenus Prunus eh shillish (Prunus avium). T'ad dooghyssagh da'n Oarpey, yn Affrick heear-hwoaie as yn Aishey heear. Ta coontey diploid 16 kroymasoomyn echey.. Ta dagh ayrn jeh, er lhimmey jeh messyn appee, beggan nieunagh er y fa dy vel glycosaidyn keeanaganagh ayn.
Jalloo-oaylleeaght.
She billey yn-lhoamey t'ayn. T'eh gaase wheesh as 32m er yrjid. Ta roost rea dhone dys jiarg-ghorrym ec biljyn aegey, as lenticellyn cochruinnagh er. T'eh çheet dy ve dhone-ghoo as scaanit er shenn viljyn. Ta duillagyn maylartey un-duillagagh oochrooagh echey, 7-14km er lhiurid as 4-7km er lheead. Ta ooir saue-eeacklagh oc, as cass duillag glass ny jiarg 2-3.5km er lhiurid.
Ta blaaghyn baney echey. T'ad gaase myr corymb dy ghaa dys shey, as queig petyllyn oc. T'ad goll er pollnaghey ec shellanyn. She droop jiarg dorraghey eh y mess oc, mysh 1-2km er crantessen. T'eh yn-ee, ga dy vel eh castagh ny keayrtyn. Ta un rass mooar creoi ayn, mysh 8mm er crantessen, as clash er y çheu echey.

Ráth Tó:
She balley ayns Coontae ny Mee, Nerin, eh Ráth Tó (). Ta'n balley ny hoie er crossag ny raaidyn ardjynagh R125 as R155. Rere coontey-pobble 'sy vlein 1996 va 1,061 deiney cummal 'sy valley, agh rere y choontey-pobble reesht 'sy vlein 2006 va 7,249 deiney ayn. Ta awin An Ghabhair roie trooid y valley.

An Seanchaisleán:
Ta an Seanchaisleán (, Yernish son "y Shenn-Chashtal") ny valley ayns Coontae ny Mee, Nerin. T'eh soit ayns sheear hwoaie jeh'n choontae, er gerrey da'n joarey rish Coontae yn Chavan, as mygeayrt 21 km veih Ceanannas. Ta ny raaidyn ardjynagh - yn R154 as yn R195 çheet ry-cheilley 'sy valley. 'Sy vlein 2006 va 1,316 deiney cummal 'sy valley. Ta ny tommanyn roie-hendeeagh Loch Craobh soit er gerrey da'n valley - tommanyn ta begnagh 5,500 bleeaney d'eash.

An Obair:
Ta an Obair (, Yernish son "yn Obbyr") ny valley beg ayns Coontae ny Mee, Nerin. Ta'n balley beg ny hoie er raad yn R162 19 km çheu hwoaie veih'n Ooive. Ta Ceanannas ny hoie da'n sheear, ta Baile Átha Fhirdhia ny hoie da'n shiar, as ta Dún na Rí ny hoie da'n twoaie. Ta Abhainn Fhirdhia roie trooid y valley eirinagh lesh yn ennym cheddin.

Maigh nEalta:
Ta Maigh nEalta () ny valley beg ayns sheear hwoaie Choontae ny Mee, Nerin. T'eh soit ec crossag ny raaidyn R194 as R164 8 km çheu hwoaie veih Ceanannas, faggys da'n joarey rish Coontae yn Chavan. Ta an Abhainn Rua roie trooid y valley.

Billey shillish figgagh:
She billey 'sy ghenus "Prunus" eh billey shillish figgagh (Prunus padus). T'eh dooghyssagh da'n Oarpey hwoaie as yn Aishey hwoaie. T'eh gaase eer çheu hwoaie Chryss yn Arctagh. 
Jalloo-oaylleeaght.
She billey ny crouw yn-lhoamey t'ayn. T'eh gaase 8-16m er yrjid. Ta roost garroo lheeah oc. Ta duillagyn maylartey un-duillagagh eelipsagh feeacklagh. Ta blaaghyn baney oc ayns crouw-vlaaghey. She berrish doo eh y mess oc. T'eh geyre as castagh, agh t'eh yn-ee.

Cnoc an Línsigh:
Ta Cnoc an Línsigh () ny valley beg ayns jiass Choontae ny Mee, Nerin. T'eh soit ec crossag ny raaidyn R156 as R158 10 km çheu hiar yiass veih Baile Átha Troim as 11 km çheu heear hwoaie veih Cill Choca, Coontae Cheeill Darey. Ta Teach an Daingin, thie çheerey lambaanys jeh Arthur Wesley, y 1d Duic Wellington, soit faggys da'n valley beg.

Maigh Dearmhaí:
Ta Maigh Dearmhaí () ny valley beg ayns jiass Choontae ny Mee, Nerin. T'eh soit er raad yn R160 as 15 km çheu yiass veih Baile Átha Troim, as 50 km veih Divlyn. Ta meanscoill, bunscoill, faaie, tree shappyn, oik phostagh, as kiare thieyn lhionney 'sy valley beg, mastey caaghyn elley.

Maigh Muirí:
Ta Maigh Muirí () ny valley beg as ny henn-champ seyrey ayns shiar Choontae ny Mee, Nerin. T'eh ny hoie mygeayrt 48 km çheu hwoaie veih Divlyn. Ta enney share er y voayl myr camp seyrey Butlins 'sy nah lieh jeh'n 20oo eash as myr ynnyd ny cloiaghyn crouw da Cluichí an Phobail. Va'n camp doont 'sy vlein 2000 as haink er y voayl dy ve ny ynnyd da kemmyrkee. Nish ta ny smoo na 700 kemmyrkee ass ny smoo na 20 çheeraghyn cummal 'syn ynnyd.

Maigh Locha:
Ta Maigh Locha () ny valley beg ayns sheear hwoaie Choontae ny Mee, Nerin. Ta'n balley soit er gerrey da an Seanchaisleán er raad yn R195 mygeayrt 3 km veih'n joarey rish Coontae ny h-Eearvee. Cha nel 'sy valley beg agh club CLG, keeill Chatoleagh, bunscoill, as ruillick 'sy valley beg. Rere coontey-pobble ny bleeaney 2006 va 417 cummaltee 'sy valley beg as 'syn ard mygeayrt y valley beg.

Ráth Moliain:
Ta Ráth Moliain () ny valley beg ayns jiass Choontae ny Mee, Nerin. T'eh ny hoie 8 km çheu yiass veih Baile Átha Troim ec çheet ry-cheilley ny raaidyn ardjynagh R156 as R159. Ta keeill Chatoleagh as keeill Phrotestoonagh 'sy valley beg, myrane lesh bunscoill as daa hie lhionney.

Dún Doire:
Ta Dún Doire (, Yernish son "Doon Darragh") ny valley beg ayns mean Choontae ny Mee, Nerin. T'eh ny hoie 7 km çheu heear yiass veih'n Ooive as 6 km çheu hwoaie veih Baile Átha Troim er y raad eddyr Baile Átha Buí as Ráth Cairn er un çheu as Dún Seachlainn er y çheu elley. Ta keeill Chatoleagh, shapp, bunscoill, club CLG, as daa hie lhionney ry-gheddyn 'sy valley beg, myrane lesh ruillick er y raad gys yn Ooive.

Baile an Bhóthair, Coontae ny Mee:
She balley beg ayns shiar yiass Choontae ny Mee eh Baile an Bhóthar (, Yernish son "Balley yn Vayr"). T'eh ny hoie er raad yn R154 23 km veih Divlyn as 23 km veih Baile Átha Troim.

Steach Maoilín:
Ta Steach Maoilín () ny valley beg ayns shiar Choontae ny Mee, Nerin. T'eh soit er gerrey da bayr gleashtanagh yn M1 begnagh er y joarey rish Coontae Ghivlyn as 35 km çheu hwoaie veih Divlyn. Ta ard-vargey, thie lhionney, kiare thieyn folteyr, lheelann beiyn, thie buitçhoor, as caaghyn elley ry-gheddyn 'sy valley beg.

Dún Samhnaí:
Ta Dún Samhnaí () ny chlaghan ayns Coontae ny Mee, Nerin. T'eh soit er y raad eddyr Cill Mheasáin as Dún Seachlainn, faggys da'n N3, y preeu-raad ta kianglaghey Divlyn as Béal Átha Seanaidh as ta goll trooid yn Ooive. Ta enney mooar er y chlaghan er son Caisleán Dhún Samhnaí, balley da'n screeudeyr Edward Plunkett, 18oo Barroon Dún Samhnaí. Ta oik postagh, bunscoill, keeill Chatoleagh, commyn CLG lesh thie lhionney echey, as shiartanse dy hieyn 'sy chlaghan. Ta Teamhair na Rí, soiaghey Ard-Reeaghyn Nerin, soit begnagh 4 km çheu hwoaie jeh'n chlaghan.

Damhliag:
Ta Damhliag () ny valley beg ayns shiar Choontae ny Mee, Nerin. T'eh soit lieh-vollagh eddyr Coontae Lhoo as Coontae Ghivlyn faggys da Droghad Aah. Rere coontey-pobble 'sy vlein 2006 va 3,236 cummaltee 'sy valley.

Baile Iúiliáin:
Ta Baile Iúiliáin () ny valley beg ayns shiar Choontae ny Mee, Nerin. T'eh soit faggys da Droghad Aah er raad yn R132 er gerrey da camp Maigh Muirí. Ta awin an Ainí roie trooid y valley beg as roie jeeragh gys an Inse 3km er fodjeeaght, raad t'ee roie stiagh ayns Mooir Vannin. Ta keeill Chatoleagh as keeill Phrotestoonagh 'sy valley beg, myrane lesh bunscoill as thie lhionney.

An Scrín, Coontae ny Mee:
She balley beg as teiy-rheynn ayns Coontae ny Mee, Nerin, eh an Scrín ( ny ). Ta'n balley beg soit er, as mygeayrt, cronk ennoil eddyr preeu-raaidyn yn N2 as yn M3, er gerrey da Teamhair na Rí. Ta keeill Chatoleagh, bunscoill, halley baljey, tree thieyn lhionney, as commyn CLG 'sy valley beg.

Domhnach Cairnigh:
Ta Domhnach Cairnigh ny Domhnach Cearnaigh () ny valley beg ayns shiar Choontae ny Mee, Nerin, er gerrey da'n joarey rish Coontae Lhoo. T'eh soit er gerrey da Baile Uí Mhornáin as queig kilomeadaryn veih çheshvean Ghroghad Aah. Ta keeill Chatoleagh, daa scoill, as thie lhionney 'sy valley beg. Ta daa valley eirinagh 'syn ard shen as ad enmyssit Domhnach Cairnigh Mór ("Doonagh Cairneach Mooar") as Domhnach Cairnigh Beag ("Doonagh Cairneach Beg").

An Inse, Coontae ny Mee:
She balley beg ayns shiar Choontae ny Mee, Nerin, eh an Inse (, Yernish son "Yn Inshey"). T'eh soit er coose Vooir Vannin er y raad ardjynagh R150. Myrane lesh Baile an Bhiataigh as Baile Uí Mhornáin, ta'n Inse jannoo seose y balley coontey-pobble An Inse-Baile an Bhiataigh-Baile Uí Mhornáin. 'Sy valley shoh va 8,978 cummaltee 'sy valley coontey-pobble. Ta'n balley hene ny hoie 50 km çheu hwoaie veih Divlyn. Myrane lesh Baile an Bhiataigh, t'eh soit er traie liauyr ta sheeyney er feie 3 km veih Baile Uí Mhornáin ec inver an Bhóinn jiass gys inver an Ainí ec an Inse as jiass gys y joarey rish Coontae Ghivlyn.

Droim Rí:
Ta Droim Rí (, Yernish son "Dreeym Ree") ny chlaghan ayns Coontae ny Mee, Nerin. T'eh soit 3 km çheu heear veih Dún Seachlainn as 26 km veih Divlyn er y raad eddyr Dún Seachlainn as Baile Átha Troim. Cha nel ayn agh bunscoill, oik phostagh, thie lhionney as commyn CLG. Va stashoon traenagh 'sy chlaghan veih 29 Luanistyn 1862, derrey'n dooney echey er 1 Averil 1963. Tra va Çhiarn Dún Samhnaí tannaghtyn ayns Caisleán Dhún Samhnaí 'sy chlaghan Dún Samhnaí, haink eh gys y voayl ec y stashoon traenagh ayns Droim Rí.

Baile Uí Mhornáin:
She balley beg ayns shiar Choontae ny Mee, Nerin, eh Baile Uí Mhornáin (). T'eh soit er coose Vooir Vannin er y raad ardjynagh R150. Myrane lesh Baile an Bhiataigh as an Inse, ta Baile Uí Mhornáin jannoo seose y balley coontey-pobble An Inse-Baile an Bhiataigh-Baile Uí Mhornáin. 'Sy valley shoh va 8,978 cummaltee 'sy valley coontey-pobble. Ta'n balley hene ny hoie 5 km çheu hiar veih Droghad Aah as 55 km çheu hwoaie veih Divlyn.
Va'n enmys Eearley Baile Uí Mhornáin coontit myr nane jeh ny h-enmyssyn ooaslagh Goaldagh share er feie ny keeadyn. V'eh ny h-ooaslid Ghoaldagh tra, agh nish cha nel ayn agh enmys cooyrtoil. She Arthur Gerald Wellesley shellooder yn enmys nish. Ta Çhiarn Baile Uí Mhornáin, oe y 8oo Duic Wellington, poosit rish Jemma Wellesley, Ben Choontey Baile Uí Mhornáin as ee ny shuyr da Jodie Kidd.
"Túr na Maighdine" as "Méar na Bantiarna".
Ta "Túr na Maighdine" ("Toor ny Moidyn") as "Méar na Bantiarna" ("Mair ny Ben Çhiarn") soit 'sy valley beg. Va'n daa strughtoor shoh troggit myr cooneyderyn yn-shiaulley da lhongyn as ad shiaulley stiagh ayns inver an Bhóinn veih Mooir Vannin. Cha nel fys ain cuin va'n daa strughtoor troggit, agh va'n toor ayn 'sy vlein 1582 tra va coontys giare jeh screeuit sheese roish planyn toor dy hroggal ec an Rinn, as y toor shen "cosoylagh rish y toor ayns Droghad Aah er yrjid as lajerid".

Cill Mheasáin:
Ta Cill Mheasáin (, Yernish son "Keeill Measán") ny valley beg ayns mean Choontae ny Mee, Nerin. Ta'n balley beg soit eddyr Beigthigh as Dún Samhnaí er y raad eddyr Dún Seachlainn as Baile Átha Buí. Ta'n Ooive, preeu-valley yn choontae, soit 11 km da'n twoaie. Rere coontey-pobble ny bleeaney 2006 va 342 deiney cummal 'sy valley beg. Ta'n teiy-rheynn fo'n ennym cheddin 25.52 km2 er eaghtyr as ta 1,436 deiney cummal ayn, goaill stiagh adsyn ta cummal 'sy valley beg.

Shykey:
She billey 'sy ghenus "Acer" eh shykey (Acer pseudoplatanus). T'eh dooghyssagh da'n Oarpey veanagh as yn Aishey hiar-yiass. Ta'n ennym oaylleeagh ("far-phlaaney") echey er y fa dy vel eh cosoylagh rish billey plaaney. 
Jalloo-oaylleeaght.
She billey yn-lhoamey t'ayn. T'eh gaase wheesh as 20-35m er yrjid. Ta roost rea lheeah ec biljyn aegey, agh t'eh garroo as crottylagh er shenn viljyn. Ta duillagyn maylartey duillageenagh echey, 10-25km er lhiurid as er lheead. Ta oirr feeacklagh oc. Ta blaaghyn monoecious buighey-ghlassey oc, as t'ad gaase myr crouw-vlaaghey 10-20km er liurid, as wheesh as 50 blaaghey ayn. She samara eh y mess oc, as skianyn echey. T'ad skeaylley er y gheay.
Dooie ruegyssagh.
T'ad gra dy nee sarkyl t'ayn ayns ardjyn ny h-Austrail (Yarra Ranges, Victoria), ny Seelan Noa as Norlynn.

Cluain Aodha:
Ta Cluain Aodha (, Yernish son "Lheannee Aodh") ny valley beg ayns shiar yiass Choontae ny Mee, Nerin. Er-yn-oyr dy vel y balley ny hoie er y joarey eddyr y Vee as Coontae Ghivlyn, t'eh coontit myr fo-valley dy Ghivlyn as y preeu-valley ny hoie 14 km veih'n valley beg. Ren yn N3, nane jeh preeu-vayryn Nerin ta goll veih Divlyn gys y Chavan trooid yn Ooive, goll trooid y valley beg, agh ayns ny 1990yn v'eh shaghnit. Ta Dún Búinne soit 3 km seose y vayr.

Billey slaanee:
Ta billey slaanee çheet er lossreeyn 'sy ghenus Senna. T'eh dooghyssagh da'n ghrianchryss. Ta oayllee gra dy vel mysh 260 dooie ayn dy cadjin, agh ta fir elley gra dy vel wheesh as 350 ayn. She "Senna alexandrina" eh y dooie sampleyragh. 

Jeeg:
Ta ymmodee keeallyn ec jeeg ny jeeig. Foddee eh çheet er:

Currach Átha:
Ta Currach Átha ( ny , Yernish son "Curragh Aah") ny chlaghan ayns Coontae ny Mee, Nerin. T'eh ny hoie 4.5 km veih Cill Dhéagláin as 4 km veih Ráth Tó.

Kerrin (caslys-skeeal):
Ta kerrin çheet er un rheynn ny jalloo ayns caslys-skeeal ny scheim aitt. Ny keayrtyn, ta'n kerrin soilshaghey ny ta taghyrt ec un thurrick. Ny keartyn elley, t'eh soilshaghey meer ennagh jeh ny ta taghyrt 'sy skeeal, as shen goaill stiagh traa sodjey.
Ny keayrtyn (myr sampleyr, ayns cartoonyn politickagh) cha nel agh un cherrin.
Ta ymmodee cummaghyn ec scheimyn aittey, as shen bentyn rish y çheer son y chooid smoo. Ta straih dy hree ny kiare cadjin ayns earishlioaryn. Ta straih pontreilagh cadjin 'syn Aishey. Ayns lioaryn as earishlioaryn currit da caslys-skeealyn, myr sampleyr caslys-earishlioar ny manga, ta ymmodee oardee ry-akin. Ayns caslys-skeeal eddyr-voggyl, cha nel cagliagh corpagh erbee er mooadys ny duillagyn (duillag neuchreaghnagh) as ta kuse jeu jannoo ymmyd jeh'n rheamys shen.

Cluain Ioraird:
Ta Cluain Ioraird (, Yernish son "Lheannee Iorard") ny valley beg ayns sheear yiass Choontae ny Mee, Nerin. T'eh soit er raad yn R148 eddyr Cionn Átha Gad as an Bóthar Buí. Ta'n balley soit er gerrey rish y joarey lesh Coontae ny h-Eearvee, raad ta Cionn Átha Gad soit.

Droim Eamhna:
Ta Droim Eamhna () ny valley beg ayns sheear Choontae ny Mee, Nerin. T;eh soit faggys da'n joarey rish Coontae ny h-Eearvee, 6 km veih an Seanchaisleán as 5 km veih Loch Craobh er Sliabh na Caillí.

Baile Shláine:
Ta Baile Shláine () ny valley beg ayns Coontae ny Mee, Nerin. Ta'n balley beg soit er cronk er broogh clee jeh'n Bhóinn ec crossag yn N2 (y raad veih Divlyn gys Muinaghan) as yn N51 (y raad veih Droghad Aah gys yn Ooive). Ta Baile Shláine ny ghiat veih'n N2 da Brú na Bóinne, quoi ta ny hoie 7 km shiar veih'n valley beg. 'Sy vlein 2006, rere y choontey-pobble, va 1,099 deiney cummal 'sy valley beg.
V'eh "Ferta Fear Fiac" ny "Oaiaghyn Fir Fiac" yn ennym va currit er yn ard shoh foddey er-dy-henney, agh haink y boayl-ennym noa-emshiragh ass ennym Ree Sláine ny Fir Bolg. T'eh er credjal dy vel eh oanluckit fo Mullach Bhaile Shláine.

Tezuka Osamu:
By vankaga, bio-chaslysseyder as leayreyder Shapaanagh eh . T'ad gra dy nee "Shennayr Anime" v'ayn, as va laue mooar echey ayns aase y magher. Ta obbraghyn mie er enney jeant echey goaill stiagh "Tetsuwan Atomu", "Budda", as "Hi no Ton". Va troar mooar echey, as ram eieyn noa: myr shen, hug ad "ayr vanga" as "jee caslys-skeealyn" er.

Droim Conrach, Coontae ny Mee:
Ta Droim Conrach () ny valley beg ayns twoaie Choontae ny Mee, Nerin. T'eh ny hoie 4 km veih'n joarey rish Coontae Lhoo as 8 km veih Baile Átha Fhirdhia. Ta 405 deiney cummal 'sy valley beg rere coontey-pobble ny bleeaney 2006. Ta'n skeerey fo'n ennym cheddin soit er y joarey rish Coontae Lhoo as t'eh soit begnagh er y joarey rish Coondaeghyn Vuinaghan as y Chavan.

Carn na Ros:
Ta Carn na Ros () ny valley beg ayns sheear hwoaie Choontae ny Mee, Nerin. T'eh soit er raad yn N3, 4 km çheu heear hwoaie veih Ceanannas as 4 km veih'n joarey rish Coontae yn Chavan.

Baile an Cheantaigh:
Ta Baile an Cheantaigh () ny valley beg ayns Coontae ny Mee, Nerin. T'eh soit 10 km shiar veih'n Ooive er crossag ny raaidyn R153 as R150. Rere coontey-pobble ny bleeaney 2006 va 912 deiney cummal 'sy valley beg.

Goal twoaie:
She phenomenon shilleydagh as emshyragh eh goal twoaie (goll twoaie, Bhow Ghorree). T'eh cur er spectrum sollys çheet rish 'sy speyr tra ta soilshey ny greiney bentyn rish bineenyn ushtey 'syn aeraght. Ta cummey cruillag yl-daahagh echey, as jiarg er y çheu mooie echey, as gorrym-jiarg er y çheu sthie. She spectrum gyn creeaghyn t'ayn, agh ta sleih cliaghtey rheynn eh ayns daahghyn discreajagh. Hug Isaac Newton queig daahghyn da: jiarg, buigh, geayney, gorrym as ""violet"" (cummey gorrym-jiarg gyn fockle 'sy Ghaelg, myr daah lus y chree). Hug eh stiagh jiarg-bwee as plooreen ny s'anmey rere aarey chiaull. Cha nel dagh çhengey cur ny daahghyn cheddin da.
Cha nee fliaghey ynrican nod ve ny vun goal twoaie; t'ad ry-akin ayns kay as spreie myrgeddin.
Soilshaghey oaylleeagh.
Ta soilshey aascellaghey tra t'eh goll stiagh 'sy vineen. T'eh aahoilshaghey jeh cooyl y vineen, as eisht aascellaghey reesht tra t'eh goll magh ass y vineen. Er y fa dy vel soilshey tonn giare aascellaghey ny smoo na soilshey tonn liauyr, ta'n soilshey eddyrscarrey dys spectrum. Ta'n soilshey smoo jeean er uillin mysh 40–42°. T'eh uillin hene croghey er ayndagh aahoilshaghey y vineen. Ta ayndagh aahoilshaghey saailley ny smoo na fliaghey, as myr shen ta lieh-chrantessen sloo ec goal twoaie ayns spreie marrey na goal twoaie ayns fliaghey.
Cha nel ynnyd er lheh ec goal twoaie 'sy speyr. Ta'n ynnyd baghtal echey croghey er ynnydyn ny greiney as y chronneyder. Ta dagh bineen aascellaghey as aahoilshaghey soilshey ny greiney 'syn aght cheddin, agh cha nel agh beggan jeh'n toilshey roshtyn sooill y chronneyder. She yn soilshey shen ta jannoo magh goal twoaie da'n chronneyder shen. Ta ynnyd goal twoaie 'sy speyr noi y ghrian cosoylit rish y chronneyder, as ta mean y ghoal twoaie erskyn scaa-doo kione y chronneyder, ec yn ynnyd noi-ghrianagh. Ta'n goal twoaie ry-akin mysh 40–42° jeh linney eddyr kione y chronneyder as scaa-doo y chione. Myr shen, my ta'n ghrian ny s'ardjey na 42°, ta'n goal twoaie fo oirr ny cruinney, as cha nel eh ry-akin mannagh vel y chronneyder fodder erskyn y thalloo.

Cill Chluain:
Ta Cill Chluain () ny valley beg as ny skeerey ayns Coontae ny Mee, Nerin. T'eh soit er gerrey da'n joarey rish Coontae Cheeill Darey as Coontae Ghivlyn.

Baile Mhic Gormáin:
Ta Baile Mhic Gormáin () ny valley beg as ayns Coontae ny Mee, Nerin. Ta'n balley beg ny hoie er gerrey da'n joarey rish Coontae Ghivlyn ayns shiar y choontae.

Cill Dealga:
Ta Cill Dealga (, Yernish son "Keeill Dealga") ny balley beg as ny teiy-rheynn ayns sheear Choontae ny Mee, Nerin. Ta'n balley beg ny hoie eddyr Baile Átha Buí, Baile Átha Troim as Baile Íomhair. Rere coontey-pobble ny bleeaney 2006 va 518 deiney cummal 'sy valley beg.

Baile Íomhair:
Ta Baile Íomhair () ny valley beg as ayns sheear Choontae ny Mee, Nerin. Ta'n balley beg ny hoie er yn R156, y raad ardjynagh ta goll veih na Dúnta gys Cluain Aodha er gerrey da'n joarey rish Coontae ny h-Eearvee. Rere coontey-pobble ny bleeaney 2006 va 1,212 deiney cummal 'sy valley beg.

Baile Ghib:
Ta Baile Ghib ( ny ) ny chlaghan as ny Ghaeltacht noa ayns Coontae ny Mee, Nerin. Ta'n Ghaeltacht hene jeant seose jeh ayrnyn ny teiy-rheynnyn Tailtin as Domhnach Phádraig. Ta'n clyst shoh ny soie 7 km veih'n Ooive ayns twoaie yn choontae. Myrane lesh Ráth Cairn, ta Baile Ghib coontit myr y nah Ghaeltacht ayns Queiggey Lion ga nagh vel mooarane dy Yernish loayrit ayn ayns ny laaghyn t'ain. Va'n Ghaeltacht shoh currit er bun ayns ny 1930yn rere eiyrtyssyn Steat Seyr Nerin. Haink ny cummaltee gys yn ard shoh veih ardjyn ayns Coontae ny Galliu, Coontae Vay Eo as Coontae Ghoon ny Ghoal, as, er-yn-oyr nagh row abbyrt cheddin oc, cheaghil ny loayreyderyn nyn jengey gys y Vaarle myr eddyr-hengey da'n chooid smoo.

Buaile na Bréachmhaí:
Ta Buaile na Bréachmhaí ny Baile na Breacaigh () ny valley beg ayns sheear yiass Choontae ny Mee, Nerin. Ta'n balley beg soit faggys da Cionn Átha Gad ayns Coontae ny h-Eearvee as er gerrey da'n joarey rish Coontae Uíbh Fhailí.

Cill Táile:
Ta Cill Táile () ny chlaghan ayns mean Choontae ny Mee, Nerin. T'eh soit er y raad eddyr Baile Átha Troim as an Tarbh Dubh er yn M3. T'eh ny hoie mygeayrt 9 km çheu hiar veih Baile Átha Troim, mygeayrt 9 km çheu heear veih Dún Seachlainn as 19 km çheu yiass veih'n Ooive.

Baile an Bheileogaigh:
Ta Baile an Bheileogaigh () ny valley beg ayns shiar Choontae ny Mee, Nerin. Ta'n balley beg ny hoie eddyr Damhliag as y joarey rish Coontae Ghivlyn er gerrey da'n M1 - y preeu-raad ayns Nerin. Ta enney mooar er y valley beg er son y coorse ratçhal cabbil t'ayn.

Frida Kahlo:
Va Frida Kahlo de Rivera (6 Jerrey Souree, 1907 - 13 Jerrey Souree, 1954) ny pheinteyr Meksicagh. Rug ee ayns Coyoacán, Meksico, ayns 1907 as hooar ee baase 'sy vlein 1954.

Ard Cath:
Ta Ard Cath () ny valley beg as ny heiy-rheynn ayns shiar Choontae ny Mee, Nerin. Ta'n balley beg soit faggys da Damhliag begnagh er y joarey rish Coontae Ghivlyn. Rere coontey-pobble 'sy vlein 2011, va 1,911 deiney cummal 'sy teiy-rheynn. Ta'n ard hene goaill cagliaghey rish Baile Gháire, Cluain Ailbhe, Damhliag, Baile an Bheileogaigh, Baile Bhartraim as Steach Maoilín.

Achair:
Ta Achair () ny chlaghan ayns Coontae ny Mee, Nerin. T'eh ny hoie 3 km heear yiass veih Cnoc an Línsigh er crossag.

Croitish:
She çhengey ashoonagh as oikoil ny Croit ee yn Chroitish (). She nane jeh ny çhengaghyn Slavagh t'ayn as t'ee loayrit ec Croitee 'sy Chroit, ayns Bosnia as Herzegovina, as ayns çheeraghyn elley gerroil, as ec Croitee elley er feie ny Cruinney.
She abbyrlhit Ladjynagh Gaj yn abbyrlhit eck, as ta tree preeu-abbyrtyn eck: yn abbyrt Štokavagh, yn abbyrt Čakavagh, as yn abbyrt Kajkavagh. Ta'n çhengey lettyragh as chadjinit bunnit er yn abbyrt Štokavagh Heear, as yn abbyrt shen lhiggey da so-hoiggalys marish y Terbish, y Vosnish, as y Vontenegrish, quoi ta bunnit er yn abbyrt Štokavagh Hiar.

Undinys ny Croitish as ny Çhengoaylleeaght:
Ta Undinys ny Croitish as ny Çhengoaylleeaght () ny undinys oikoil 'sy Chroit as y currym echey na freayltys as greesaghey ny Croitish. Ta'n shennaghys echey goll sheear gys y vlein 1948, tra v'eh ny chooid jeh Colleish Oaylleeaght as Ellanyn ny Yugoslaav (Colleish Oaylleeaght as Ellanyn ny Croit jiu). Va'n undinys noa-emshiragh bunnit ec seyrsnys ny Croit 'sy vlein 1991. T'eh stiurey Coonseil Stundayrtyn ny Croitish Chadjin as y choonseil shen ny reireyder çhengey ry hoi'n Chroitish.

Ard neu-chorpagh:
Rere leigh, ta ard neu-chorpagh çheet er ard thalloo nagh vel ny chooid jeh baljaght erbee. 'Sy cho-heks shoh, ta co-chorpaghey çheet er crooaght ghurneilys ennagh son dy stiurey cochorp baljagh, caayr ny balley.

Boayl enmyssit da coontaghyn-pobble:
Ta boayl enmyssit da coontaghyn-pobble ny voayl ayns gurneilys ynnydagh ta ymmydit ry hoi cooishyn staydraa as coontaghyn-pobble er lheh. T'ad ymmydit da buill nagh vel nyn ardjyn co-chorpagh as nagh vel reiltys baljagh oc, lheid as caayryn, baljyn, as baljyn beggey, agh ta cosoylagh rish buill co-chorpagh.

Clou trome:
Ta clou trome çheet er y trimmid ayns clougraafeeaght ta currit er focklyn ennagh ayns abbyrt ennagh marish clou ny s'trimmey ayns aght ayns cosoylaght rish y chooid elley jeh'n teks. Ta clou trome ymmydit son kione-linnaghyn naight, son fograghyn raaue, as son dy hoilshaghey magh focklyn as trimmid ny keeall er lheh oc.

Queiggaghyn Nerin:
Rere tradishoon ta Nerin rheynnit magh ayns kiare queiggaghyn ny "queigooyn". Ayns ny shen traaghyn va queig rheynnyn 'sy çheer goaill stiagh ny queiggaghyn noa-emshiragh myr Queiggey Ulley, Queiggey Connaghtey, Queiggey Lion, Queiggey Mooan, as yn eear-wheiggey Queiggey ny Mee
T'ad ny kiare queiggaghyn noa-emshiragh na:

Co-heiyderyssyn parlamaidagh ayns Pobblagh Nerin:
Ta'n thie s'inshley jeh'n Oireachtas (Parlamaid Nerin), Dáil Éireann, jeant seose jeh 166 Teachtaí Dála (TDyn) as t'ad shassoo er son 43 co-heiyderyssyn parlamaidagh er feie Phobblaght Nerin. Lhisagh dy ve 3 TDyn shassoo da dagh co-heiyderys er y chooid sloo, as ta earroo ny çhaghteryn bunnit er mooadys y cho-heiyderys. Cha nel cagliagh heose da earroo ny TDyn ta shassoo da dagh co-heiyderys, agh rere y chummey t'ayn nish, ta 3, 4, ny 5 TDyn shassoo da dagh fer. Rere corrillagh 2006 ta un TD da dagh 25,512 ghooinney. Ta ard-reihyssyn stiurit lesh y vote singil yn-astreeaghey jeh'n chummey tuarystallys coreiragh.
Co-heiyderyssyn Nerin.
Son Ard-reihys 2007 va Teachtaí Dála reiht da ny co-heiyderyssyn shoh:

Parlamaid ny h-Oarpey:
Ta Parlamaid ny h-Oarpey ny yn Pharlamaid Oarpagh ny h-undinys parlamaidagh jeeragh-reiht jeh'n Unnaneys Oarpagh (UO). Myrane lesh Coonseil yn Unnaneys Oarpagh (y Choonseil), t'eh jannoo seose y chrouw slattyssagh ghaa-hamyragh jeh'n UO as t'eh er cur sheese eck dy vel ee coontit myr nane jeh ny quaiylyn slattyssagh smoo cummaghtagh er y theihll. Ta'n Pharlamaid as y Choonseil jannoo seose y corpane slattyssagh s'yrjey çheusthie jeh'n UO. Ta'n Pharlamaid jeant seose jeh 736 OPOyn ny MEPyn, as t'ad goaill shirveish er y nah reihderaght gheynlagh smoo er y theihll (lurg yn Injey) as y reihderaght gheynlagh harrish-ashoonagh smoo er y theihll lesh 375 millioon dy reihderyn 'sy vlein 2009.

Baile an Mhóta (reddaghey):
Foddee dy vel Baile an Mhóta çheet er:

An Mullach Mór (reddaghey):
Foddee dy vel An Mullach Mór çheet er:

Tobar an Choire:
Ta Tobar an Choire ( ny ) ny valley ayns Coontae Shliggee, Nerin. T'eh ny hoie ec bun Sliabh Gamh er yn N17 - y preeu-raad eddyr Shliggagh as Galliu.

Portmeirion:
She balley beg turryssagh ayns Gwynedd, Bretyn Hwoaie eh Portmeirion. V'eh kiaddit as troggit ec y Reejerey Clough Williams-Ellis eddyr 1925 and 1978, as t'eh fo stiurey treisht ghiastyllagh jiu. T'eh mie er enney myr The Village ayns claare çhellveeish Ghoaldagh ny 1960yn "The Prisoner". T'eh 'sy voodeeys Penrhyndeudraeth, daa veeilley çheu hiar-yiass Phorthmadog as meeilley jeh stashoon traenagh Minffordd.
V'eh fo Williams-Ellis taishbyney dy nod oo troggal ayns ardjyn aalin gyn jeeylley yn aalid oc. Va shenn steat 'syn ynnyd, "Aber Iâ" (), ass ny 1850yn. Shen y thie oast as tree bwaaneyn ("White Horses", "Mermaid" as "The Salutation") t'ayn jiu. Chred Williams-Ellis dy row yn ennym çheet er "Beeal Riojit", as chaghlaa eh eh dys Portmeirion: "Port dys cowraghey dy row eh er y clyst, Meirion er son Merionydd" (y coontae v'eh ayn ec y traa shen). 
Ta brooillagh cashtal mean-eashagh ayns keyll faggys da'n valley beg. Ta feanish ayn jeh fo enmyn "Castell Deudraeth", "Castell Gwain Goch" as "Castell Aber Iau". Screu Giraldus Cambrensis er ayns 1188. Ta thie mooar Victorianagh 'syn ard myrgeddin, as eshyn fo'n ennym "Castell Deudraeth". Chionnee Williams-Ellis eshyn jeh'n naim echey, y Reejerey Osmund Williams, Lv, as v'eh fo goaill eh stiagh ayns ard-hroggalys thie oast Phortmeirion, agh haink caggey as doilleeidyn elley. Fy-yerrey, ghow y hreisht cooney Heritage Lottery Fund, European Regional Development Fund as Wales Tourist Board dys jannoo thie oast jeh. V'eh foslit ec Bryn Terfel er 20 Mee Luanistyn 2001.
Portmeirion ayns cultoor y theay.
Ta Portmeirion ry-akin ayns ymmodee fillmyn, myr boayl frangagh 'syn Oarpey dy cadjin. Myr sampleyryn, skeeal "View from the Villa" 1960 jeh'n chlaare "Danger Man" lesh Patrick McGoohan; skeeal 1976 "Doctor Who" "The Masque of Mandragora" 'syn yn Iddaal Aavioghey; skeeal jeh "Citizen Smith" as y feniagh ayns Rimini; as Wiggyville in claare Cbeebies Gigglebiz.
Ta'n ymmyd share jeh 1966-1967, tra haink McGoohan erash dys goaill caslyssyn çheumooie er son "The Prisoner", ny ghrama surreal peeikearys. Va Portmeirion "The Village" raad v'eh ayns pryssoon. Rere mian Williams-Ellis, cha dug ad ennym er Portmeirion myr ynnyd y straih derrey'n skeeal s'jerree. Haink y chlaare dy ve ny feer ennoil, as ta ard-jeeaneyder cur keayrt er foast. Ta co-chruinnaghtyn bleinoil "Prisoner" ayn. Ta "thie" y charracteyr hene ny happ "Prisoner" nish. Er bun y chiangley shoh, ta claareyn fomyssagh er nyn nyannoo 'sy valley beg myrgeddin. Ren skeeal 'sy straih BBC "The Celts" aayannoo reayrtyssyn jeh "The Prisoner". Ayns 1987, ghow Jools Holland ayrn ayns far-chlaare feer-skeealagh , "The Laughing Prisoner", lesh Stephen Fry, Terence Alexander as Hugh Laurie. Ayns 2003, ghow ad fillym er son skeeal s'jerree y chlaare "Cold Feet".
Ren ad fillym arrane Supergrass "Alright" ayns Portmeirion as Morfa Bychan. T'eh çheet er "The Prisoner" dy mennick.

An Scrín (reddaghey):
Foddee dy vel An Scrín çheet er:

Corys ingagh ogheragh Nerin:
Ta corys ingagh ogheragh Nerin (, ) ny chorys dy ingee ogheragh ta ymmydit dy cadjin ayns Nerin (ayns Pobblaght Nerin as Nerin Hwoaie). Ta'n ingagh Yernagh lhie harrish corys ingagh ogheragh ashoonagh y Vretyn Vooar.

Corys co-ordnaidyn çheer-oaylleeagh:
Ta corys co-ordnaidyn çheer-oaylleeagh ny chorys dy cho-ordnaidyn ta lhiggey da dagh boayl er y Chruinney dy ve enmyssit liorish possan dy earrooyn. Dy mennick, ta ny h-earrooyn reiht er yn aght dy vel un earroo shassoo er son ynnyd pontreilagh, as dy vel daa ny tree earrooyn shassoo son ynnyd cochruinnagh. She dowan-lhiurid, dowan-lheead, as yrjid eelipsoydagh ny fir s'cadjiney jeh ny co-ordnaidyn.

Porthmadog:
She balley as boodeeys ayns Gwynedd, Bretyn Hwoaie eh Porthmadog. 

Çhionnal Ashoonagh Vretin:
She çhionnal ashoonagh jeeveanit eh Çhionnal Ashoonagh Vretin (, ) ta jannoo slattyssyn ayns Bretyn. Ta 60 olteynyn ayn, as adsyn nyn Olteynyn y Hionnal, ny OÇyn (Baarle: , Bretnish: ). T'ad er nyn reiy er son kiare bleeantyn fo corys tooilley oltenyn: ta 40 jeu nyn ynnydee rheynnyn-reih ny çheerey er nyn reih liorish corys yl-raght, as 20 jeu nyn ynnydee queig ardjyn reihyssagh rere corys tuarastyl choreiragh d'Hondt.
Rere refrane ayns 1997, hie y çhionnal er croo liorish Slattys Reiltys Vretin 1998. Ghow eh er mooar-chooid pooaryn Oik Vretin as Screeudeyr Steat Vretin. Tra haink eh rish, cha row kied echey dy yannoo ard-slattyssyn. Liorish Slattys Reiltys Vretin 2006, ta kied echey ard-slattyssyn y yannoo bentyn rish cooishyn er lheh, liorish Saaseyn Çhionnal, ga dy vel ad fo crossey Screeudeyr Steat Vretin as Ard-whaiyl y Reeriaght Unnaneyssit.

Ard-whaiyl y Reeriaght Unnaneysit as Nerin Hwoaie:
She ard-whaiyl slattyssagh y Reeriaght Unnaneysit as ny Thallooyn harrish Mooir ee Ard-whaiyl y Reeriaght Unnaneysit as Nerin Hwoaie (ny keayrtyn, Ard-whaiyl Hostyn ny Ard-whaiyl y Reeriaght Unnaneysit). She monark y Reeriaght Unnaneyssit kione yn ard-whaiyl; myr shen, she Çhalse III eh ec y traa t'ayn.

Awin rioee:
She awin vooar riojit ta gleashaghey dy moal harrish y thallooin ee awin rioee ny rio-stroo. T'ad jeant seose ass sniaghtey as rio, as ad er nyn jaglym trooid shiartanse dy vleeantyn tra ta'n çhaglym ny smoo na'n jummal eck. Ta'n rio ayns ny h-awinyn rioee ny hashtey smoo dy ushtey oor er y Chruinney. Ta awinyn rioee coodaghey ardjyn mooarey ayns ny h-ardjyn poullagh as t'ad ry-akin ayns slieau-reaynyn er dagh mooar-rheynn goaill stiagh yn Austrailaishey ('sy Teelynn Noa).

David Cameron:
She shenn Ard-vinishter y Reeriaght Unnaneyssit eh David Cameron (; ruggit 9 Jerrey Fouyir 1966), neayr's 11 Boaldyn, 2010. Myrane lesh y churrym echey myr Ard-vinishter ny çheerey, t'eh ny Chied-Çhiarn er y Steat-Chishtey. T'eh ny h-oltey parlamaidagh (OA) er son Whitney.
T'eh ny chione toshee jeh'n Phartee Cumaadagh, as erreish da ard-reihys gyn tromlagh ayns Mee ny Boaldyn 2010 as conaant marish ny Libraalee Deynlagh, haink eh dy ve ny Ard-vinishter myrgeddin. 

Cedar:
Ta cedar (ny sedar) çheet er biljyn bearkanagh 'sy ghenus Cedrus. T'ad dooghyssagh da'n ard Meanvooiragh as sleityn Himalaya heear, ec yrdjidyn eddyr 1,000m as 3,200m.
Jalloo-oaylleeaght.
She biljyn sheer-ghlass t'ayn. T'ad gaase 30-40m er yrjid son y chooid smoo. Ta banglaneyn lheead rea oc. Ta fuigh rosinagh soaral oc, as roost çhiu scaanit. Ta daa horçh dy hole oc: stholeyn liauyrey ta çheet dy ve nyn manglaneyn, as stholeyn beggey ta gymmyrkey duillagyn. Ta duillagyn snaidagh oc, 8-60mm er lhiurid as er nyn reaghey myr caslagh. Ta bearkanyn stoandagh oc, 6-12km er lhiurid as 3-8km er lheead. T'ad tuittym veih my cheilley tra t'ad appee dy lhiggey magh ny rassyn skianagh assdaue. Myr dooieyn "Abies", ta 2-3 bolganyn rosinagh meevlasstal oc; noi fioragyn, foddee.

Ree Vannin:
By enmys reeoil eh Ree Vannin (, ) va currit er reireyderyn ennagh, seyrey ny fo smaght, va stiurey Reeriaght Vannin eddyr ny bleeantyn 1237 as 1504. Ec y traa t'ayn jiu, cha nel yn enmys ymmydit agh ta "ree" ny "benrein" Vannin enmyssit Çhiarn Vannin jiu.
Reeriaght Vannin as ny h-Ellanyn (roish 1237).
Goaill toshiaght 'sy vlein 1237, va Reeriaght Vannin as ny h-Ellanyn rheynnit ayns daa ayrn. Ren reeaghyn goll er oaie lesh nyn stiurey harrish Mannin, agh haink er ny h-ellanyn Albinagh dy ve goit stiagh myr çhiarnaght ny h-Albey. Son shennaghys ny reireyderyn va stiurey ny h-Ellanyn Albinagh lurg y date shoh, jeeagh er Çhiarn ny h-Ellanyn.
Reeriaght heyr (1333 - 1399).
Er 9 Luanistyn 1333 ren Edard III shaghney dagh aggyrtyn Sostynagh er Mannin, as ren eh cur enney er Mannin myr reeriaght heyr fo'n ree eck, William Montacute, 1d Eearley Salisbury.
By eh William le Scrope y ree jerrinagh er Mannin 'sy linney shoh, as eh gaggyrt fuilleeaght yeeragh veih The Ghorree Crovan, ny reireyderyn Loghlynagh lheah.
Ard-Hiarnys Sostynagh (1399 - 1504).
Er-yn-oyr dy ren eiyrtyssagh Inry, Edard III, cur Mannin er enney myr reeriaght heyr, cha ren Inry IV aggyrt dy jeeragh er y chrooin Vanninagh. Ayns e ynnyd, ren eh fockley magh dy row yn reeriaght currit fo haart rere barriaght. Rere y leigh eddyr-ashoonagh ec y traa shen ren yn aght shen cur fo haart yn oardagh bunraghtoil v'ayn. Er 19 Jerrey Fouyir 1399 yiall eh yn Ellan, myr fo-reill fo'n Chrooin Hostynagh, gys Henry Percy, 1d Eearley Northumberland myrane lesh cummaghtyn lheeadagh dy reill as reeoilidyn kianglt rish, myrane lesh yn aght 'Çhiarn Vannin', ayns ynnyd feudalaght as myr shen gyn seyrsnys. Gyn y wooise da shen, ren Percy enmyssey eh hene myr 'Ree Vannin'.
Lurg yn irree magh traitooragh liorish Percy, yiall Inry VI seyrsnys yn Ellan, er conaantyn cosoylagh agh er lhing unnane as e heihll, gys y Reejerey Juan y Stanlagh 'sy vlein 1405. Ayns bishaghey lesh shen, agh er aght er lheh veih reirey yn Ellan, va patroonys Aspickys Sodor as Vannin gialdit da Juan y Stanlagh.
Va ny lettyryn-foshlit shen jeant neuvreeoil as aa-ghialdit er 6 Averil 1406. Eishtagh, va'n gialdyn eiraghtoil as va leagh feudalagh anchasley ayn - va feme er y Çhiarn Manninagh nish goaill stiagh toyrtys ammys as keesh dy ghaa hirragh dy yiall da dagh Ree Sostynagh lesh lhing nyn grooinaghey oc. Jiu, ta'n tradishoon shen dy ghialdyn shirree ry-akin er armys Vannin raad ta'n shirragh shassoo er y çheu toshtal.
Çhiarn Vannin (1504 - jiu).
Cha ren mac Homase Stanlagh, 2h Eearley Derby, ymmyd jeh'n enmys 'Ree', as v'eh as y lught eiyrtyssagh echey er enney dy cadjin myr 'Çhiarn Vannin'. Ansherbee, va'n enmys Ladjynagh "Rex Manniae et Insularum" (Ree Vannin as ny h-Ellanyn) er ymmyd ny keayrtyn ayns docamadyn oikoil derrey'n 17-oo eash er y chooid sloo.
'Sy vlein 1765 va'n enmys aa-ghreimmit stiagh ayns Crooin y Reeriaght Unnaneysit, as myr shen ta'n enmys 'Çhiarn Vannin' currit er y Ree Çhalse III.

1095:

Ree Vannin as ny h-Ellanyn:
By enmys va currit er ny reeaghyn ren reirey yn Orkaid, Shetlynn, Inshyn Goal as Mannin eh Ree Vannin as ny h-Inshyn ny Ree Vannin as ny h-Ellanyn. V'eh Reeriaght Vannin as ny h-Ellanyn yn ennym va currit er yn reeriaght shen.
Rheynn magh Reeriaght Vannin as ny h-Ellanyn.
'Sy vlein 1237, va ny h-ellanyn Albinagh rheynnit magh veih Mannin as haink orroo dy ve nyn reeriaght heyr er lheh, roish haink urree dy ve lhiggit da'n chrooin Albinagh 'sy vlein 1265 liorish Conaant Pheairt.

Raad ny Foillan:
Ta Raad ny Foillan ny cassan troagyraght liauyr ayns Mannin.
Bollagh as shennaghys.
Ta "Raad ny Foillan" goaill toshiaght as goaill jerrey ec Droghad y Villey Bleeaney harrish Purt Ghoolish. Ta'n cassan kiarkylagh, ta 102 meeilaghyn er liurid, taishbynit er feie yn choose Manninagh liorish cowraghyn ta taishbyney foillan er cooylrey gorrym.
Va'n cassan currit er bun son dy chelloorey feaillaghyn "Vlein yn Eiraght" 'sy vlein 1986, as t'eh goll rish y choose dy cadjin as t'eh jeant seose jeh thalloo anchasley, eddyr traieyn gavel ec Inver Ayre gys cruink as eayninyn yrjey. 
Ta'n cassan jeant seose jeh ny rheynnyn shoh:
Blaanid as beiyn.
Ec ny rheynnyn slystagh ta ushagyn marrey lheid as pirree, pibbinyn Manninagh, pibbinyn, stronnagyn, as foillanyn ry-akin myrane lesh raunyn glassey, as ec buill antraieagh ta kirree loaghtan Vanninagh ry-akin ayns ardjyn ta freillt liorish Undinys Eiraght Vannin.

Algey:
She possan bea-oaylleeagh eh Algae (algaghyn). She bioagyn bunneydagh t'ayn, as ad hetra-veeagh liorish co-haaghey sollysh son y chooid smoo. Ta fir jeu un-chillagagh as fir elley yl-chillagagh, myr sampleyr, famlee vooarey. T'ad cur famlagh er ny fir varrey smoo dy cadjin.
V'ad cliaghtey goaill stiagh Cyanobacteria prokaryotagh myr algaghyn, agh rere eieyn cadjin jeianagh, t'ad ny s'faggys da bacteyryn. Ta "algaghyn" çheet er bioagyn eukaryotagh ynrican jiu. Myr shen, ta çheshvean as plastaidyn far-chrackanagh ec feer algaghyn rere'n eie t'ayn nish. She possan paraphyletagh sa polyphyletagh t'ayn, er y fa nagh vel eh goaill stiagh dagh cloan y çhennayr co-chadjin s'jerree as cha nel shennayr algagh co-chadjin ec dagh fer jeu. Ny yei shen, t'eh jeeaghyn dy vel co-vun ec y plastaidyn oc.
Ta feanish fossyllagh ayn jeh algaghyn mysh 3 billioon blein er dy henney, 'syn Eash Roie-Chambriagh
Cha nel ymmodee oltyn lossreeyn thallooin ec algaghyn. Cha nel duillagyn, rhisoidyn ny fraueyn oc. Ta ymmydee jeu hene-veeagh, agh ta fir elley micsotrophagh (goaill bree liorish co-haaghey sollysh as liorish goaill stiagh carboan orgaanagh, myr sampleyr, liorish ee killagyn. Ta kuse dy ghooie un-chillagagh croghey er bree çheumooie as cha nel farrys co-haaghey sollysh oc. Dys geddyn sliught, ta fir jeu rheynn dy neucheintyssagh, agh ta saaseyn crampit sheelraghey keintyssagh ec fir elley.
Ta farrys co-haaghey sollysh algey jeh Cyanobacteria 'sy toshiaght, as myr shen, t'ad cur magh ocsygien myr fo-hroar co-haaghey sollysh. Shen anchasley rish obbraghyn bacteyryn elley ta co-haaghey sollysh.
Rang-oardraghey.
Rere tradishoon, v'ad goaill stiagh Cyanobacteria myr algey. Rere'n eie t'ayn nish, t'ad cliaghtey dooney magh ad er bun anchaslyssyn mooarey; myr sampleyr, cha nel mynoltyn far-chrackanagh oc, ta un chroymasoom kiarkylagh, ta peptidoglycan 'sy voalley killag, as ribbosoomyn anchasley rish adsyn t'ec algaghyn. Cha nel chloroplastyn oc, as t'ad co-haaghey sollysh er far-chrackan thylakoidjagh. Myr shen, ga dy vel currym eggoaylleeagh cosoylagh ec y daa, cha nel ad casley rish y cheilley.
Rere soilshaghey jeinagh, she eukaryoteyn t'ayn, as adsyn co-haaghey sollysh ayns chloroplastyn (nyn mynoltyn far-chrackanagh). Ta GDN kiarkylagh 'sy chloroplast, as ta'n mynolt gollrish Cyanobacteria. She shimboshee sthie jeelymagh t'ayn, foddee. Ta cummey er lheh ec chloroplastyn dagh clein. Ta'n taabyl heese soilshaghey magh cummey ny tree possanyn algagh smoo. Ta mooinjerys ry-akin 'sy diagram er y çheu yesh. Ta olteynyn ayns ymmodee possanyn nagh vel co-haaghey sollysh nish. Ta plastaidyn elley (cha nel chloroplastyn) ec fir jeu foast, as cha nel plastaidyn erbee ec fir elley.
Rang-oardraghey rere plastaidyn:

Plastaid:
She mynoltyn scanshoil ayns killagyn lossreeyn as algaghyn ad plastaidyn. Ta kemmigyn scanshoil goll er co-haaghey ayndaue. Dy cadjin, ta daaghyn co-haaghey sollysh ayndaue, as ta ny daaghyn shoh soaiaghey daah ny killag.
Ta dagh plastaid jannoo ymmodee coipyn jeh'n phlastoom kiarkylagh as 75-250 kilojees ayn. Ta earroo ny coipyn croghey er obbraghyn y phlastaid; ta ram jeu (harrish 1000 ny keayrtyn) ayns killaghyn ta rheynn dy tappee (cha nel monney plastaidyn ayns lheid ny killagyn), agh 100 ny ny sloo ayns killagyn aasit, as ny plastaidyn oc er nyn rheynn hene dys ymmodee plastaidyn. Ta mysh 100 gien 'sy phlastome, bentyn rish GRNr as GRNa, chammah's proteenyn as laue oc ayns co-haaghey sollysh, as obbraghyn aascreeu as çhyndaays. Agh cha nel shen agh ayrnag ny proteenyn as feme oc dys jannoo plastaid. Ta'n chooid smoo jeu er nyn goad ayns gienntagyn çheshveanagh, as ta cooilleeney gienntagyn plastaidagh as çheshveanagh co-reillt dys shickyraghey co-hrimmid cooie plastaidyn bentyn rish rheynn ny killag.
Ta currymyn plastaidyn goaill stiagh co-haaghey sollys, co-haaghey kemmigyn elley, as tashtey troaryn myr stark. Foddee ad eddyr-scarrey, ny aa-eddyrscarrey, dys fo-chummaghyn plastaid, bentyn rish obbraghyn ny killag. Foddee plastaid neuaasit ("proplastaid") goaill er hene ny cummaghyn shoh:
Ayns algaghyn, t'ad cur "leucoplast" er plastaid erbee gyn daah. Cha nel shen y red cheddin as leucoplast lus. 

Facebook:
Ta Facebook ny ynnyd-eggey da moggyl soshiallagh va shiaullit ayns Toshiaght Arree 2004 as ta fo-reirey as fo-stiurey liorish y y cholught shelloodagh echey, Facebook, Inc., lesh ny smoo na 500 millioonyn dy ymmydeyryn breeoil ayns Jerrey Souree 2010. Foddee ymmydeyryn cur sleih lioroo hene myr caarjyn as foddee ad shiaull çhaghteraghtyn hucsyn. Myrane lesh shen foddee ad jannoo nyn skeealyn ass y noa. Foddee ymmydeyryn kiangley lesh moggylyn ta rang-oardit liorish ynnyd obbree, scoill, ny colleish. Ta ennym yn ynnyd-eggey çheet ass yn ennym cadjin jeh ny lioaryn ta currit ta scollagyn ec toshiaght y vlein acadoil liorish lught-reill ollooscoillagh ayns ny Steatyn Unnaneysit as ad shirrey cooney ny scollagyn cur fys orroosyn hene. Ta Facebook lhiggey da dagh peiagh ta ny shinney na 13 bleeeaney d'eash cur ynnyd dauesyn hene er bun er yn ynnyd-eggey.
Va Facebook currit er bun liorish Mark Zuckerberg marish e chumraagyn shamyr as e chumraagyn scoillaragh va jannoo studeyrys er sheanse co-earrooagh myr Eduardo Saverin, Dustin Moskovitz as Chris Hughes. Va olteynys yn ynnyd-eggey caglit liorish ny bunneyderyn dys scollagyn Harvard, agh ny s'anmey v'eh lheanit dys colleishyn elley ayns ard Boston, y Leeg Hibbin, as Ollooscoil Stanford. Chur eh cooney da scollagyn ec ollooscoillyn elley roish e foshley dys scollagyn ayns ard-scoillyn, as, fo yerrey, dys dagh peiagh ny shinney na 13 bleeaney d'eash.

Cathal Buí Mac Giolla Ghunna:
By fer jeh ny feeleeghyn by ennymoil, myrane lesh Peadar Ó Doirnín, Art Mac Cumhaigh as Séamas Dall Mac Cuarta, ass jiass Ulley as twoaie Lion 'sy 17oo as 'sy 18oo eash eh Cathal Buí Mac Giolla Ghunna (m. 1680 – 1756). V'eh ruggit as troggit ayns Fer Managh as, lurg lhing ghiare echey myr saggyrt, hie eh lesh yn 'eeleeaght myr coorse-bea. 
Ga nagh vel "Cathal Buí", myr t'eh enmyssit dy caarjoil ayns beeal-arrish Bréifne, cha nel eh mie er enney ayns Nerin nish, agh ta'n obbyr mooar echey An Bonnán Buí tannaghtyn myr nane jeh ny keaynaghyn as arraneyn share er enney ass Nerin veih ny keead-bleeantyn jerree. Va çhaglym jeh'n obbyr echey, "Cathal Buí: Amhráin", foilshit magh ec y schoillar Breandán Ó Buachalla 'sy vlein 1975.
Ta studeyrys er scoill feeleeaght Bréifne ry-heet veih Pádraigín Ní Uallacháin. Ta e heihll kelloorit dagh blein 'sy çheer ghooghyssagh echey 'sy Bhlaic as ayns Béal Cú lesh feailley ta enmyssit ayns e onnor, Féile Chathal Buí.

Gowaltys:
She ayrn dy hallooin eh gowaltys ny ferm ta goaill stiagh strughtooryn eigsoylagh, as ta casherickit da'n chliaghtey dy troarey as reirey bee (troar, grineyn, ny sthock, frauaigyn, as conney. Foddee dy vel gowaltyssyn ayns shelloo dooinney ynrican, lught thie, co-phobbyl, co-chorp, colught, ny steat.

Stroll:
Ta stroll çheet er sorçh dy fidderaght lesh baare gloasagh as cooyl ouyragh eck. Ta stroll ymmydit ayns eaddeeyn dy mennick: ayns jaggadyn bluckan-valley, breeçhyn cuttagh roortagh, fo-eaddagh ben, gooynyn oie, blooseyn, as gooynyn fastyr, agh t'ee ry-akin ayns breeçhyn cuttagh doarney, lheinaghyn as carvatyn.

Sylem:
She stoo kirpey ymmyrkee lossreeyn cuishlagh ee sylem ny xylem. Shen ass Shenn Ghreagish ("xylon"), "fuygh". She fuygh ee y tylem share er enney, agh t'ee ry-akin er fud ny lus. T'ee ymmyrkey ushtey son y chooid smoo, agh t'ee ymmyrkey stoo beaghee myrane lesh.
Fyshoaylleeaght sylem.
Ta sylem currit da ymmyrkey ushtey as beaghey meainagh lheieagh jeh ny fraueyn dys rheynnyn elley y lus. T'ee gaanoaghey yn ushtey ta goll er coayl lesh trooid-ghaalaghey as co-haaghey sollysh. Ta sapp sylem jeant magh jeh ushtey as eeaneyn neuorgaanagh, as ny keayrtyn, ta kemmigyn orgaanagh ayn myrgeddin. Cha nel ny stooghyn kirpey sylem baarail bree dy arraghey y sapp; ta ny stooghyn kirpey hene marroo. Ta daa phenomenon lhiggey da'n tapp arraghey:
Ronsaghey-kirpey sylem.
Ta sylem ry-akin ayns caghlaaghyn strughtoor rere y lus t'ayn:
Cha nel ad co-harmeshtagh, agh son y chooid smoo cha nel agh "bun-sylem" ayns dhossan cuishlagh.
She stoo kirpey cramp t'ayn. Ta killagyn sylem goaill stiagh tracheagyn as tracheidjyn dys ymmyrkey ushtey, chammah's killagyn elley, myr sampleyr parenchyma.
Ta feanish ayn dy vel banglaneaght hylem lhiantyn rish Leigh Murray.
Bun-sylem as fo-hylem.
T'ad geddyraghey daa horçh dy hylem rere bun. 
Ta bun-sylem çheet er sylem ta jeant ass procambium rish aase toshee lossreeyn. T'ee goaill stiagh "protosylem" as "metasylem"; ta cuishlinyn as tracheidjyn metasylem ny shlea na adsyn t'ec protosylem.
Ta fo-hylem çheet er sylem ta jeant ass cambium cuishlagh rish aa-aase. Son y chooid smoo, t'a fo-hylem ry-akin ayns "Coniferae" as "Angiospermae", agh t'eh ec kuse dy Gnetophyta, Ginkgophyta as Cycadophyta myrgeddin.
Aafilley sylem.
Ta feanish ayn jeh sylem fossylagh ass yn eash Siluragh, 400 millioon bleeaney er dy henney, as luirg gollrish killagyn sylem unnaneagh ayns claghyn Ordoviciagh s'leaie. Y feanish s'leaie jeh feer sylem, shen tracheidyn as brat scroddagh ec y voalley killag oc. Shen y sorçh ynrican ta ry-akin ayns lossreeyn cuishlagh leah, as t'eh ry-akin foast ayns protosylem. Dy s'anmey, ren ymmodee possanyn aafilley tracheidyn spohttagh, liorish aafilley cochleanagh: ayns lossreeyn t'ayn jiu, cha nel tracheidyn spohttagh çheet rish neayr's ta'n metasylem er nappaghey.
Son y chooid smoo, she tracheidjyn spohttagh ad ny h-ard-chillagyn ymmyrkey. Ta tracheagyn cochianglt myr cuishley liorish tuill; ta'n ushtey gleashaghey liorish gleashaght stoo‎ 'syn aght cheddin as ushtey ayns pioban, cha nel liorish skeaylley trooid yn 'ar-chrackan killag. Er lesh lus-oayllee, ta sylem mastey ny binn scanshoil lhig da haink lesh angiospermae.. Agh cha nee angiospermae ynrican s'oc tracheagyn, as cha nel y lheid ec shiartanse dy henn linneeaghtyn angiospermagh, myr sampleyr, Amborellaceae, Tetracentraceae, Trochodendraceae, as Winteraceae).

Eiraght Ashoonagh Vannin:
She Eiraght Ashoonagh Vannin () y çheshaght eiraght ashoonagh da Mannin. Va'n çheshaght currit er bun 'sy vlein 1951 myr Treisht Ashoonagh Vannin ("Manx National Trust").
Sar-reayrtys.
Ta Eiraght Ashoonagh Vannin freggyrtagh er son:

Cnobha:
Ta Cnobha (fockley magh ny Yernish: /ˈknɔːvɘ/; , focklit magh myr /ˈnaʊθ/) ny oaye limmer Noa-littagh as ny voayl shenndeeagh ayns "Brú na Bóinne" ayns glion An Bhóinn, Coontae ny Mee, Nerin. 
Ta Cnobha ny oaye limmer smoo mastey ny h-oayghyn limmer çheusthie jeh co-hroggalys Brú na Bóinne. Ta'n boayl jeant seose jeh carnane mooar (enmyssit Boayl 1) as 17 fo-hommanyn beggey. Ta Boayl 1 ny charnane mooar ta coodaghey 1 hectare as ta cummal daa limmer, as ad soit er linney niar-sheear. T'eh cruinnit liorish 127 claghyn cribbanagh (lesh 3 jeu ass eanish, as 4 jeu lesh jeeyl vooar orroo). Cha nel ny limmeryn kianglt ry-cheilley, agh t'ad goll gys shamyryn oanluckee. Ta'n limmer hiar goll gys shamyr chroshagh, cosoylagh rish y limmer ayns Sí an Bhrú. Ta tree buill 'adanagh ayn as claghyn tobbyr-oonlee raad dy row fooillagh lostit ny merriu currit. 
Ta'n boayl fadanagh er y çheu jesh ny smoo er mooadys as ny smoo jesheenit lesh ellyn vooar-chlaghagh na ny buill 'adanagh elley, red ta sampleyragh jeh oayghyn limmer Yernagh jeh'n torçh shen. Ta'n limmer heear goaill creaghney ayns shamyr neuchronnalagh. Ta'n çhamyr shoh scarrit magh veih'n limmer liorish clagh leacagh. Va clagh tobbyr-oonlee ayn rieau, agh v'eh scughit ny s'anmey as nish t'eh ny hoie daa hrass heese y limmer.

Eeast scowanagh:
She eeastyn ushtey millish 'syn 'o-rang Dipnoi ad eeastyn scowanagh. T'ad mie er enney er son freayll troyn bunneydagh da eeastyn craueagh (goaill stiagh tayrn ennal) as da Sarcopterygii (goaill stiagh friogganyn babbagh as ushylagh sthie mie-aasit). T'ad ry-akin 'syn Affrick, America Yiass as yn Austrail jiu, agh ta fossylyn cowraghey dy row rheamys mooar oc ayns ushtey millish traa dy row.
Ronsaghey-kirpey as jalloo-oaylleeaght.
Ta notochord lunganeagh gyn brishey oc, as noa-chlaigin lunganeagh. Ta jeesyn dy 'riogganyn cleeau as frioggan pelvagh oc, as frioggan fammanagh ynrican, ayns ynnyd jeh friogganyn drommey, fammanagh as thoanney eeastyn cadjin. 'Syn imbagh lheimmee, ta eeastyn scowanagh Anerica Yiass firrinagh gaase friogganyn pelvagh fedjagagh. T'ad feer chuishlinagh, as t'an eeast skeaylley magh ocsygien ass e 'uill dys yn edd as ny h-oohyn, as goaill magh daa-ocseed charboan. Myr shen, t'eh gardjaghey co-chruinnaghey ocsygien er son ny h-oohyn as eeastyn aegey.
Ta ny feeacklyn oc anchasley rish dreeym-juntee elley. Ta straihyn dy odontodeyn er y chlea as keeil s'inshley jannoo magh eaghtyr sleaystagh.
Scowanyn.
Ta un scowan ec eeastyn scowanagh Wheensland, as daa scowan ec ny dooieyn elley. T'ad kianglt rish y farang, as t'ad coreggyragh rish scowanyn kiare-chassee.
Ta jargaght tayrn ennal ec dooieyn eeast elley, liorish bolgan gas cuishlinagh, agh t'ad nyn molganyn bunneydagh son y chooid smoo, gyn monney strughtoor sthie. Ta scowanyn eeastyn scowanagh aarheynnit ayns ymmodee myn-volganyn dys mooadaghey eaghtyr son co-cheaghley gas. 
Tayrn ushtey.
Cha nod agh "N. forsteri" tayrn trooid ny grooaneyn echey. Ta grooaneyn eeastyn scowanagh elley ro-hirgit shen y yannoo. 
Eggoaylleeaght.
Ta eeastyn scowanagh ny h-Affrick as America Yiass tannaghtyn bio rish çhirmaghey yn ushtey oc, liorish towlaghey stiagh ayns laagh as tannaghtyn nyn gadley. Ta'n soe oc goll ny s'melley, wheesh as 1/60oo y reat cadjin, as t'ad cur magh urrea ayns ynnyd ammoiney myr jeeyl, er y fa nagh vel eh cho nieunagh (rish imbee elley, t'ad keckey ammoiney magh 'syn ushtey as cha nel doilleeid oc).
Ta bea liauyr oc ny keayrtyn: ta eeast scowanagh Shedd Aquarium ayns Chicago er ve oc neayrs 1933.

Dubhadh:
Ta Dubhadh () ny oaye limmer Noa-littagh ta soit ayns Glion An Bhóinn, Coontae ny Mee, Nerin. T'eh ny oaye shinney mastey ny tree preeu-oayghyn 'sy cho-hroggalys "Brú na Bóinne" (t'ad Sí an Bhrú as Cnobha ny fir elley). Cha nel yn oaye shoh cha lhiasit myr boayl turryssagh na ny nabooyssyn echey, er-yn-oyr dy vel y çhamyr ny s'inshley, as nagh vel y jesheenys cha ornaidagh.

Étrépagny:
She commyoon 'sy rheynn Eure 'syn ard Haute-Normandie ayns twoaie ny Frank eh Étrépagny. Ta mooinjerys lannoonagh eddyr Étrépagny as y valley Yernagh Baile Átha Troim, raad ta eiraght Normanagh ry-akin chammah.

Feer earroo:
Ayns maddaght, ta feer earrooyn goaill stiagh earrooyn resoonagh (myr sampleyr, 42 ny -23/129) as earrooyn neuresoonagh (myr sampleyr, pi as fraue cherrinagh daa. Foddee oo cur feer earroo myr tuarastyl jeihoil beayn, myr sampleyr 2.4871773339... (as ny earrooyn goll er gyn jerrey). Foddee oo sheiltyn ad myr ynnydyn er linney earroo gyn jerrey.

Farang:
She ayrn y wannal as scoarnagh eh farang. T'eh soit erreish da'n veeal as shamyr stroanney, as erskyn yn oesophagus, yn aahjioogh as y ghoolag.
Obbraghyn.
Ta laue ec yn 'arang ayns corys lheieagh as corys ennalagh ymmodee bioagyn. Er y fa dy vel bee as aer nyn yees goll trooid yn 'arang, ta'n far-ghlottys (ny chooylley dy stoo kirpey) dooney y scoarnagh tra ta'n bioag sluggey, dys lhiettal plooghey as tayrn stiagh scowanagh. T'eh scanshoil da deiney er son fockley.
Ayrnyn.
T'ad rheynn y farang ayns tree ayrnyn: farang stroanney, farang beill, as farang aahjiooghagh.
Farang stroanney.
Ta'n ayrn stroanney eddyr ny tuill stroanney sthie as y chlea vog, as erskyn y çhamyr veill. Ta ny h-adenoidyn 'sy voalley cooyl echey. Ta ny piobanyn eaishteeagh eddyr yn 'arang as cleash veanagh fosley er yn 'arang stroanney. Ta'n doarlish fosley as dooney dys cormaghey çhionnid aer y chleash veanagh as aeraght, as lhiggey da ymmyrkey kiart sheeanyn.
Farang beill.
Ta'n farang beill çheu cooyl jeh'n çhamyr veill. Ta'n boalley toshee jeant magh jeh bun ny çhengey as vallecula far-ghlottyssagh; ta'n boalley lhiattagh jeant magh jeh'n cheshleen, fossa keshleenagh as collooghyn keshleenagh; ta'n boalley heose jeant magh jeh eaghtyryn sthie ny clea vog as çhengey veg.
Farang aajiooghagh.
Bentyn rish deiney, ta'n farang aajiooghagh ny ayrn fammanagh yn 'arang. T'eh fo y 'ar-ghlottys, as t'eh roshtyn yn ynnyd raad ta'n scoarnagh rheynn ayns piobanyn ennalagh (aajioogh) as lheieagh (oesophagus). Rish sluggey, ta tosheeaght ec bee, as cha nod aer goll ny hrooid.

Aahjioogh:
Ayns kiare-chassee, she bollagh aer eddyr yn 'arang ny goolag as ny scowanyn eh ahjioogh ny readan. Ta coodagh çheusthie killagyn epithelium far-strahit collooagh kippeenagh echey, chammah's killagyn cornagh ta cur magh smug. Ta'n smug shoh lhie er killagyn ny h-aahjioogh dys ribbey ayrneenyn joarree. Ta ny kippeenyn tonnaghey as ymmyrkey ny h-ayrneenyn seose cour y ghoolag as farang, raad t'ad goll er sluggey stiagh 'sy volg ny ceau magh myr shelley.
Aahjioogh deiney.
Ta crantessen mysh 21-27mm (0.8-1.1") eck as lhiurid msh 100-160mm ()3.9-6.3"). T'eh goaill toshiaght ec y ghoolag, ec yrjid wheiggoo junt craue-drommey mhuinneelagh, as t'eh goalaghey dys ard-vronchyssyn ec yrjid y chiarroo ny wheiggoo junt craue-drommey thoracksagh.
Ta mysh 15-20 fainnaghyn lunganeagh cummey-C niartaghey cooyl as çheuyn ny h-aahjioogh dys coadey as ymmyrkey y bollagh aer. Ta'n trachealis kiangley king ny fainnaghyn ry-cheilley, as t'eh craplaghey rish creddal; ta shen jannoo lumen ny h-aahjioogh ny sloo, as ardjaghey reat gleashaghey ny h-aer. Ta'n oesophagus ny lhie erreish da'n aahjioogh. Ta ny fainnaghyn neuslane do nod yn aahjioogh filley beggan as lhiggey da bee goll sheese yn oesophagus. Ta'n far-ghlottys dooney doarlish y ghoolag rish sluggey do nagh dod bee goll stiagh 'syn aahjioogh.
Beiyn elley.
Ta aahjiooghyn sheeintee elley as beishteigyn cosoylagh rish aahjiooghyn deiney. Ta aahjioogh ein eddyr yn 'arang as syrincs, as ta ny h-ard-vronchyssyn rheynn assjehsyn. Ta aahjioogh feer liauyr ec ollee, as ayrn jeh caslit fo y chraue cleeu; she aavuilltagh t'ayn, foddee. Ta fainnaghyn lunganeagh slane jeant ec kuse dy h-ein, as ad er nyn graueaghey ny keayrtyn.
Ta aahjioogh daa-veaghagh feer veg son y chooid smoo, as t'eh goll dy jeeragh stiagh 'sy scowanyn gyn ard-vronchyssyn baghtal. Ta aahjioogh s'liurey ec kuse dy lossagyn as kaikilee. Ta crammanyn lunganeagh ec yn aahjiooagh vaa-veaghagh, agh cha nel ad jannoo magh fainnaghyn myr adsyn t'ec amniota.
Cha nel agh un dreeym-juntagh scowanagh gyn aahjioogh: "Polypterus", as ny scowanyn echey kianglt dy jeeragh rish yn 'arang.
Çhingyssyn ny h-aahjioogh.
Shoh heese ta çhingyssyn as asslayntyn bentyn rish yn aahjioogh:
Ayns 2008, ghow ben Cholombagh aahjioogh aa-hoit as e gass-chillagyn hene ayn do nagh beagh e corp jiooley yn olt.

Logh:
She corpane mooar d'ushtey ta cruinnit, dy slane ny begnagh dy slane, liorish thalloo eh logh. Dy cadjin, ta strooanyn as awinyn stroo ayndaue dys ad dy veaghey lane. Er lhimmey jeh'n Chruinney, cha nel loghyn, myr ta fys ain, er dowan elley faagail magh Titan, raad ta loghyn jeant seose ass eetane. Ta ny loghyn er Titan beaghit liorish awinyn. Ta feanish ayn dy row loghyn er Mart ram bleeantyn er-dy-henney.

Awin:
She coorse ushtey najooragh, jeant ass ushtey glen dy mennick, ta roie lesh faarkey, logh, mooir, ny awin elley eh awin. Ayns cooishyn ennagh ta awin çhirmaghey roish y çheet eck lesh corpane elley d'ushtey. Foddee dy vel awinyn beggey er enney fo enmyn elley goaill stiagh branlaig, strooan, gullad, glasheen, glass, a.r.e.
Ta awinyn nyn gooid jeh Çhymshal yn Ushtey. Ta ushtey çheusthie jeh awin çhymshit liorish frassaghey trooid teaumey, aalughtey ushtey thallooin, farraneyn, as skeaylley magh ushtey va tashtit ayns rio najooragh as sniaghtey (m.s. veih awinyn rioee).

Oie Houney:
Ta Oie Houney ( ny ; ayns Mannin: "Hop-tu-Naa") ny feailley ta goll er kelloorey dagh blein er yn oie jeh'n 31 Jerrey Fouyir. She feailley Celtiagh t'ayn er bun as t'ee kianglt rish Samhain ny Gaeil elley ayns Nalbin as Nerin, as rish yn 'eailley Creestee Laa'l Mooar ny Nooghyn. Jiu, t'ee kelloorit er feie ny Cruinney myr feailley neuvonnagh.
Ta gastidyn as gammanyn er yn oie goaill stiagh scaaghey, ceau coamraghyn as frastyl er kayleeyn coamree, çheinjeanyn, snuggal son ooylyn, as e lheid. Ayns Mannin hene, ta paitçhyn ceau coamraghyn as goll veih thie gys thie shirrey miljanyn ny argid. Ayns neu-chosoylaght rish y chooid elley jeh'n Theihll, ta ny paitçhyn gymmyrkey londeyryn napin ayns ynnyd jeh londeyryn pumkin, as t'ad goaill arraneyn Oie Houney. Ta kuse ennagh jeh ny shenn chliaghtaghyn cosoylagh rish adsyn ta kianglt rish y Vlein Noa ayns Jerrey Geuree. Tra da fadeyraght, roie-insh yn emshir, as faaishnagh v'ayn. Va leoie yn aile jeant rea 'sy çhiollagh ec jerrey ny h-oie as ren cummaltee yn thie tannaght da cowrey coshey ayn. My va'n cowrey jeeraghey lesh y dorrys, s'foddee dy beagh baase 'sy thie 'sy vlein ry-heet. Agh my va'n cowrey jeeraghey çheusthie, s'foddee dy beagh ruggyr 'sy thie.
Bun-ocklaght.
She "Sauin" y fockle noa-emshiragh ta currit er yn 'eailley. Ta ny h-Albinee cur "Samhuinn" er as ta ny Yernee cur "Samhain" er. Ta'n tree focklyn shen çheet magh ass "Samain" [ˈsaṽɨnʲ ny Shenn Yernish, fockle ta çhyndaait myr "jerrey souree". Ta ny Gaeil ooilley cur "Sauin", "an t-Samhuinn" as "Samhain" er y vee t'ayn eddyr Mee Yerrey Fouyir as Mee ny Nollick. Rere bun-ocklaght theayagh, ta "Samain" çheet magh ass daa 'ockle: "sam" ("sourey") as "fuin" ("lhie ny greiney", "jerrey"). Ta "sam" ny Shenn Yernish çheet magh ass "*semo-" ny çhengey Phroto-Ind-Oarpagh. Ta co-cheintee goaill stiagh "haf" ny Bretnish, "hañv" ny Britaanish, "summer" ny Baarle as "sumar" ny Shenn Loghlynish, lesh dagh fockle jeusyn shen çheet er "sourey", as "sáma" ny Sanskrit ("imbagh").
'Sy vlein 1907, ren Whitley Stokes cur sannish da bun-ocklaght veih "*samani" ny Proto-Cheltish ("cruinnaght"), co-cheintagh lesh "sámana" ny Sanskrit, as "samana" ny Gothish. Ta J. Vendryes kiangley nagh vel ny focklyn ta goaill stiagh "*semo-" ("sourey") kianglt rish "samain", graa dy row "jerrey yn touree" ec ny Celtiee taghyrt ayns Mee Yerrey Souree, as nagh row eh taghyrt ayns Mee Houney, myr ta currit ayns feanish ec "gorffennaf" ("Jerrey Souree") ny Bretnish. Foddee dy beagh shen dellal lesh fockle Celtish Ellanagh son "cruinnaght", "*samani" ny "*samoni", as fockle son "sourey", "saminos" (çheet magh ass "*samo-": "sourey") currit liorish "samrad", "*samo-roto-". Beagh "samain" ny Yernish neuchianglt dy bun-ocklagh rish "sourey", agh çheet magh ass "cruinnaght". Ansherbee ta ennym y vee çheet ass yn eash Phroto-Cheltiagh, cf. "SAMON" ny Goalish veih feaillere Coligny, as foddee dy vel y kiangley rish "sourey" rere bun-coklaght theayagh, dy bunneydagh, çheet ass traa roish ny Celtiee Ellanagh.
Dy mestit, ta "Samonios" (Jerrey Fouyir/Mee Houney) ny Goalish co-reggyrtagh da "GIAMONIOS", y shiaghtoo mee (Averil/Boaldyn) as toshiaght y touree. Ta'n fockle "Giamonios", toshiaght y touree, kianglt rish yn 'ockle son "geurey", "*g'hei-men-" ny Proto-Ind-Oarpish ("hiems" ny Ladjyn, "ziema" ny Latvish, "žiema" ny Litaanish, "zima" ny Slavish, "kheimon" ny Greagish, "gimmanza" ny Hittitish), cf. "gem-adaig" ("oie yn gheuree") ny Shenn Yernish. S'foddee, er y fa shen, dy row y chied vee jeh imbagh y touree 'sy Phroto-Cheltish enmyssit "geuragh", as dy row y chied vee jeh imbagh y gheuree enmyssit "sourinagh". Ta'n soilshaghey shen jannoo yn soilsheydys jeh "cruinnaght" gyn bree, ny cur soilshaghey rere bun-ocklaght theayagh dys traaghyn feer leah.
Va Sauin enmyssit Féile Moingfhinne ("feailley Mongfhionn"). Rere "Sanas Cormaic", by ee Mongfhionn y ven-jee va ny Yernee phaganagh cur ooashley da er Samain.
Jiu, ta ny Manninee jannoo ymmyd jeh "Boaldyn", "Luanistyn" as "Sauin" myr enmyn da'n wheiggoo, da'n hoghtoo, as da'n chied vee jeig. Ta ny Yernee jannoo ymmyd jeh "Bealtaine", "Lúnasa" as "Samhain" da ny meeghyn cheddin, as ta ny h-Albinee jannoo ymmyd jeh "an Lùnasdal" as "an t-Samhuinn" da Luanistyn as Mee Houney.
Arrane Oie Houney.
Fer jeh ny h-arraneyn smoo scanshoil ta kiaullit er Mannin car Oie Houney:

Goolag:
She ayrn jeh cassan y ghoo ee goolag, eddyr yn 'arang as yn aahjioogh, as ynnyd teaddyn y ghoo. T'ee ry-akin ec deiney myr cront ny scoarnee, as shen cummey çheumooie lungane çheeroydjagh.
Ta daa ard-obbraghyn ec y ghoolag. Hoshiaght, t'eh coadey yn aahjioogh noi ayrnyn bee do nagh beagh y cretoor plooghey. Rish sluggey, t'ee garraghey seose, as ta'n çhengey scughey ergooyl. Ta shen cur er yn 'ar-ghlottys lhie harrish y ghlottys, as cha nod ny ta goll er sluggey goll stiagh 'sy ghoolag, as myr shen, dys ny scowanyn. My ta'n ghoolag goll er greinnaghey ec bee (ny stoo elley), ta aawoalley creddal lajer dys ny eebyrt.
Chammah's shen, ta teaddyn y ghoo soit 'sy ghoolag, as ec sheeintee, t'ad stiurey stroo yn ennal, as t'ad gientyn toan liorish craa. Shen bun glare deiney. Ta goolag ec ein myrgeddin, agh cha nel teaddyn ny far-ghlottys oc. Ta'n syrincs oc gientyn sheean.

Billey smeyr:
She lus 'sy ghenus "Morus" eh billey smeyr (Morus nigra). T'ad dooghyssagh da'n Aishey heear-yiass.
Jalloo-oaylleeaght.
She billey yn-lhoamey beg t'a'yn, wheesh as 10-13m er yrjid. Ta duillagyn cree-chrooagh echey dy mennick, agh foddee ad ve babbanagh myrgeddin. T'ad geayshteenagh, mysh 10-20cm er lhiurid as 6-10cm er lheead. Ta roost dhone echey, as eshyn crammanagh as scaant, ec shenn viljyn er lheh, agh cha nel eh roshtyn 300 bleeantyn d'eash dy mennick. Ta cummey surllaghey echey, faggys co-chruinnagagh ny keayrtyn. Ta berrishyn yn-ee jiarg-ghorrym dorraghey echey, as ad nyn nroopyn. Ta blass menoyragh oc.
Ymmyd.
T'ad troarey billey smeyr er fud ny h-Aishey as ny h-Oarpey er son y vess yn-ee echey as myr bee da crooagyn heeidey.

Billey theiley:
She genus dy viljyn yn-lhoamey eh Tilia (biljyn theiley). T'ad dooghyssagh da'n lieh-chruinney Hwoaie. V'ad mastey Tiliaceae rere corys Chronquist, agh t'ad ayns Malvaceae rere'n APG.
Dooeiyn.
Ta arganeys ayn mychione dooieyn y ghenus, agh shoh heese adsyn t'ad goaill rish dy mennick:

Billey tooishey:
Ta billey tooishey çheet er biljyn 'sy ghenus Boswellia as rosin cooragh millish oc ta sleih cur tooish ny "frankincense" er. Ta ymmyd jeant jeh myr stoo lheeys, as noi-loshtaghtyn er lheh. 
Ymmyd lheeys.
T'ad jannoo ymmyd jeh biljyn tooishey 'sy chorys lheeys Ayurvedagh. Ta ronsaghey ayn bentyn rish bree geayr boswellagh (ass y rosin) noi reean as çhingyssyn guinn-hiass. 'Syn Affrick Heear, t'ad jannoo ymmyd jeh roost "Boswellia dalzielii" noi çhiassaghey, aacheoid as çhingyssyn gailley.

Plymouth:
Ta Plymouth ny chaayr as ny lught-reill unnaneagh er coose yiass Devon, Sostyn, mygeayrt 190 meeillaghyn (310 km) çheu heear yiass veih Lunnin. T'eh ny hoie eddyr inveryn ny h-awinyn Plym da'n shiar as An Tamer da'n sheear, raad t'ad çheet ry-cheilley myr Keyllys Plymouth. Veih'n vlein 1967 ta Plymouth goaill stiagh ny fo-valjyn Plympton as Plymstock ta nyn soie er broogh hiar yn awin Plym.
Jiu, ta 250,000 deiney cummal 'sy chaayr, as rere shen t'eh ny 15oo chaayr smoo ayns Sostyn. T'eh fo reirey Choonseil Caayragh Plymouth as ta tree OAyn echey. Ta cleayney mooar ec troggal lhongyn ayns tarmaynys Plymouth, agh ta ny smoo cleayney nish ec y rheynn hirveishagh veih ny 1990yn. Ta'n 11d ollooscoil smoo 'sy Reeriaght Unnaneysit rere earroo scollagyn - Ollooscoill Plymouth - as y phurt chaggee obbraidagh smoo 'syn Oarpey Heear - HMNB Plymouth. Ta baataghyn assaig kiangley Plymouth rish y Rank as y Spaainey as purt aeragh lesh shirveishyn Oarpagh eck.

An Tamer:
Ta An Tamer (, Cornish: "Dowr Tamer" ny "An Tamer") ny h-awin ayns Sostyn Heear Yiass. Ta'n awin shen ny joarey eddyr Devon da'n shiar as y Chorn da'n sheear. Cha nel moir An Tamer agh 6 km (4 meeilaghyn) veih coose hwoaie ny Corn, agh t'ee roie jiass. Ec yn inver, ta An Tamer roie stiagh ayns Hamoaze raad t'ee çheet ry-cheilley lesh An Lyner roish t'ee goll stiagh ayns Keyllys Plymouth.

Blaa arroo:
She lus bleinoil 'sy genus "Centaurea" eh blaa arroo ny lus y voteil ghorrym (Centaurea cyanus). T'eh dooghyssagh da'n Oarpey.
