Jalloo-oaylleeaght.
T'eh gaase wheesh as 35" er yrjid. Ta gish lheeah-ghlassey echey, as duillagyn sleeanagh 1-4cm er lhiurid. Ta blaaghyn gorrym gial echey as dhossan 1.5-3cm er crantessen. Ta fainney dy vlaagyn gahagh mygeayrt jysk meanagh. She protocyanin eh daah y lus.

Eaynin:
Ayns çheer-oaylleeaght as creg-oaylleeaght, ta eaynin çheet er oaie chreggagh phontreilagh ny begnagh phontreilagh. Ta eayninyn crooit myr eiyrtys jeh crimmey as emshyraghey. Ta eayninyn ry-akin dy mennick rish cooseyn, ayns ardjyn sleitagh, er lhiargee, as rish awinyn. Ta eayninyn ry-akin ayns buill raad ta ny creggyn ta jannoo seose ny h-eayninyn jeenagh noi'n chrimmey as yn emshyraghey.

Blaa Boaldyn:
She lus eh blaa Boaldyn (lilee ny glionney, lilee y choan; dy oaylleeagh, Convallaria majalis). She oltey ynrican y ghenus Concallaria t'ayn, foddee. V'ad cliaghtey cur eh 'sy chynney Liliaceae ny kynney eh hene, Convallariaceae. T'eh dooghyssagh da'n lieh-chruinney Hwoaie 'syn Oarpey as yn Aishey, agh ta arganeys ayn my t'eh dooghyssagh da America Hiar Hwoaie raad ta pobble beg ayn ("Convallaria majalis" var. "montana").
Jalloo-oaylleeaght.
She lus lussagh sheer-vio t'ayn. T'eh jannoo coloinyn mooarey liorish cur magh raisoamyn. Ta stholeyn noa çheet magh ass king stolonyn rish y tourey. Rish yn arrey, t'adsyn gaase dys stholeyn duillagagh noa ta kianglt rish ny stholeyn elley fo'n thalloo. Ta gish wheesh as 30cm er yrjid oc, as duillag ny ghaa 10-25cm er lhiurid oc. Ta daa duillag ec gish blaaghey, as crouw-vlaaghey dy 5-15 blaaghyn. She tepal bane jeh cummey cluig eh y blaa, mysh 5-10mm er crantessen as soar millish oc. She berrish beg jiarg eh y mess echey. Ta beggan dy rassyn baney-dhoney ayn, as t'ad çhirmaghey dy trooid-hoilshagh. T'ad hene-hast, as my ta'n choloin jeant jeh un lus ynrican, cha nel ad cur magh rassyn.
Rang-oardraghey.
Ta traa arraghyssyn ayn, as ny keayrtyn ta lus-oayllee dyn eddyr-scarrey myr dooieyn ny fo-ghooieyn. Rere shen, foddee nagh vel agh un dooie 'sy ghenus Convallaria, agh foddee dy vel ny smoo.
Ta kuse dy 'leih goaill rish "Convallaria transcaucasica" myr dooie. Va "Convallaria japonica" ayn, agh t'ad rang-oardraghey eh myr "Ophiopogon japonicus" nish.
Nieu.
Ta dagh ayrn jeh'n lus feer nieunagh. Ta mysh 38 sorçhyn dy chardenolideyn ayn, goaill stiagh:
Ta saponinyn ayn myrgeddin. Ga dy vel eh niaunagh, va ymmyd lheeys jeant jeh.

Raisoam:
Ayns lus-oaylleeaght, she gass lus eh raisoam (ass Greagish "dhossan dy 'raueyn", ass "cur er goaill ynnyd"). T'ad co-chruinnaghagh as fo-halloo son y chooid smoo, as t'ad cur magh fraueyn as stholeyn ass ny noadyn oc dy mennick. T'eh ny haase gientyn neucheintyssagh lossreeyn.
Ta sthollane casley rish raisoam, agh ta sthollane gobbey ass gass t'ayn hannah, ta eddyr-noadyn liauyrey echey, as t'eh cur magh stholeyn noa ass y chione. She ard-ghass y lus eh raisoam, as ta eddyr-noadyn beggey echey; t'eh cur magh fraueyn ass eaghtyr s'inshley ny noadyn, as stholeyn ass eaghtyr s'yrdjey ny noadyn. Ta moyllyn myr praaseyn nyn raisoamyn ny sthollaneyn er nyn mooadaghey dys tashtey cooid.
Ta raisoamyn erskyn thallooin ec kuse dy lossreeyn, goaill stiagh cliogee ennagh, as ta renniee skeaylley liorish raisoamyn. Ta lossreeyn as raisoamyn fo-halloo oc goaill stiagh jinsharyn, cuirtlee ennagh, Dionaea muscipula, lus y lhionney, as gollianee vooarey. Ta raisoamyn ayns un vrat dy mennick, agh ta fir yl-vrattagh ec gollianee vooarey.
My ta raisoam er ny vrishey ayns peeshyn, foddee dagh peesh gaase dys lus noa. Shen gientyn losseragh, as ta eirinee as gareyderyn jannoo ymmyd jeh dys sheelraghey lossreeyn ennagh. T'adsyn goaill stiagh jinsharyn, lus y lhionney, cliogee, blaa Boaldyn as asparag.

Keyllys Chleayee:
Ard mooar d'ushtey slystagh ayns sheear ny h-Albey eh Keyllys Chleayee (, ). T'eh coadit veih'n Cheayn Sheear liorish lieh-innys Chione Çheerey ta cruinnaghey y keyllys mooie ayns Oirr ny Gaeil as Coontae Inver Ayre. Ta an Caolas Brandanach ny chrouw jeh'n Cheyllys as t'eh scarrey lieh-innys Chione Çheerey veih Ellan Aran.
T'eh 26 meeilaghyn (42 km) er lheead ec yn entreilys echey. Ta'n chooid eaghtyragh echey goaill stiagh ard raad t'eh çheet rish Loch Long as an Geàrr-Loch. Ta Awin Chleayee stroo stiagh 'sy cheyllys faggys da Grianaig.
Çheer-oaylleeaght.
Ta'n keyllys goaill stiagh shiartanse dy ellanyn as lieh-inshyn as ta 12 hirveish dy vaataghyn assaig kiangley ad rish y vooar-heer. Ta'n chooid smoo jeh ny shirveishyn shen er stiurey ec Caledonian MacBrayne. Ta ram loghyn-marrey sheeyney ry-cheilley rish y cheyllys.
Baljyn as baljyn beggey rish y choose.
T'eh shoh goaill stiagh kuse jeh ny baljyn mooarey as kuse jeh ny baljyn beggey rish y Cheyllys hene.
Ellanyn 'sy Chleayee.
Ta ram ellanyn 'sy Cheyllys. Ta boodeeyssyn bishagh er ny fir smoo as kianglaghyn dy vaataghyn assaig rish y vooar-heer. Ta ny tree ellanyn smoo goaill stiagh:

Mycorrhisagh:
Ta mycorrhisagh (ass Greagish: , "fungys" as , "fraue") çheet er eddyr-obbraghey shimboshagh (coreggyragh dy cadjin, agh sheadaneagh ny keayrtyn) eddyr fungys as fraueyn lus cuishlagh.

Ten Canoes:
She fillym eh Ten Canoes ("Jeih Finneigyn"), as eshyn mie er enney myr kied fillym lane jeant ayns çhengey ghooghyssagh ny h-Austrail (abbyrtyn Yolŋu Matha). Hie eh er stiurey ec Rolf de Heer as Peter Djigirr, as by Crusoe Kurddal eh yn ard-chloieder. Haink yn ennym ass coloayrtyssyn eddyr de Heer as David Gulpilil mychione caslys-soilshey jeh jeih finneigee puntal tessen y Churragh Arafura. Hie y chaslys-soilshey er nyannoo ec yn antrapoayllee Donald Thomson ayns 1936.
Giare-choontey.
Ta'n fillym soit 'sy Çheer Arnhem, 'syn eash roish daink ny sleih baney. Ta'n 'er caggee Dayindi (Jamie Gulpilil) shelg oohyn guiy lesh nuy fir elley. Ta sooill echey er ben saa e vraar shinney. Myr shen, ta'n braar echey ginsh skeeal da er ny shennayraghyn oc, foddey er-dy-henney, as fer elley as sooill echey er trass ven e vraar. 
'Sy skeeal shen, ta tree mraane ec Ridjimiraril (Crusoe Kurrdal), as ta sooill ec y vraar er y trass. Laa ennagh, ta fer joarree cur lesh shilley er y chlein, agh cha nel ad dy hreishteil. Tammylt ny yei shen, ta nah ven Ridjimiraril skellal roish. Ta Ridjimiraril credjal dy ren y fer joarree geid ee, as laa ennagh, t'ad fakin y fer joarree reesht. Ta Ridjimiraril goll dy loayrt rish, agh ta corree çheet er as t'eh cur shleiy ny hrooid. Agh cha nee y fer joarree cheddin t'ayn, agh fer elley jeh'n chlein. Dys lhiettal caggey, ta'n leigh shassoo er oardagh cooilleeney, raad ta'n clein elley ceau shleiyghyn er Ridjimiraril as carrey jeh derrey ghoys fer jeu lhott. Ta Ridjimiraril goll er lhottey, agh t'eh tannaghtyn bio rish tammylt as roshtyn y camp. Erreish da geddyn baase, tra t'ad jannoo shirveishyn ny merriu, ta'n nah ven çheet erash. She clein joarree elley gheid ee, as chochionnee ee foddey ersooyl, as ga dy scap ee, v'eh urree shooyl tessen y çheer rish imbagh dy roshtyn thie. Nish ta'n braar saa, Yeeralparil, goll dy vio lesh mraane e vraar marroo, rere cliaghtey y chlein; agh t'eh er goaill kiarail jeh'n tree jeh, cha nel y ven saa ynrican, as shen cooish elley na ny v'eh yeearree.
Ta'n skeeal mooie, bentyn rish Dayindi, doo as bane, agh ta skeeal ny shennayraghyn lane daahit. T'ad loayrt abbyrtyn Yolŋu Matha, lesh fo-heidylyn, as ta'n insheyder loayrt Baarle.
Cloiederyn as skimmee.
Ta Crusoe Kurddal ass Maningrida as ta Gunwinggu echey. Ta ny cloiederyn elley ass Ramingining as t'ad loayrt abbyryn 'sy phossan Yolŋu Matha.
Skimmee.
Shoh cloiederyn s'ardjey yn 'illym.
Aundyryn.
Chosnee "Ten Canoes" aundyr Un Certain Regard ec y Cannes Film Festival 2006. Hie eh er enmys da shiaght aundyryn yn Australian Film Institute, as chosnee eh shey jeu: Fillym Share (Julie Ryan & Rolf de Heer er son stiureydys), Stiureyder Share (Rolf de Heer & Peter Djigirr), Script Noa Share - (Rolf de Heer), Scannaneaght Hare (Ian Jones), Reagheydys Share (Tania Nehme) as Sheean Share (James Currie, Tom Heuzenroeder, Michael Bakaloff & Rory McGregor). Chosnee eh tree aundyryn jeh Film Critics Circle of Australia: Fillym Share, Reagheydys Share (Tania Nehme) as Scannaneaght Hare (Ian Jones). 
Ta'n fillym goaill stiagh claare beg feer-skeealagh er taghyrtyn yn obbyr fillym, "The Balanda and the Bark Canoes" ("y Fer Bane as ny Finneigyn Roostey"). Chosnee eshyn aundyr Claare Beg Feer-Skeealagh Share ny h-Austrail da de Heer, Tania Nehme as Molly Reynolds. T'eh bentyn rish eddyr-obbraghey ny cultooryn ayns obbyr fillym, eiyrtys coryssyn clein er yn obbyr, as streeuyn sthie ny sleih bun-dooghyssagh eddyr eiraght, tradishoon as bea jeianagh.
Ayns Mee Houney 2006, reih ad "Ten Canoes" myr skeeal oikoil ny h-Austrail 'sy rheynn Fillym Çhengey Joarree Share da ny Academy Awards ayns 2007.
Ren de Heer jiooldey yn eie dy vel eh ny stiureyder bane jannoo skeeal bun-dooghyssagh: ""Ta sleih gra, c'red ta fo ny stiureyder bane jannoo skeeal bun-dooghyssagh? T'ad ginsh y skeeal son y chooid smoo, as ta mee my haase daue shen y yannoo.""

Yolŋu Matha:
Ta Yolŋu Matha çheet er çhengaghyn Bun-Dooghyssagh Austrailagh ta goll er loayrt ec sleih Yolŋu ayns Çheer Arnhem 'syn Austrail hwoaie.
Ta mysh shey çhengaghyn ayn, do-hoiggal eddyr y cheilley, as ymmodee abbyrtyn fo nyn enmyn hene (myr screeut 'sy chishtey fys).
Fockleyryn as greieyn elley.
Ta fockleyryn screeut ec Beulah Lowe, David Zorc as Michael Christie.
Ta lioaryn grammeydys coorse çhengaghyn Yolŋuagh screeut ec Jeffrey Heath, Frances Morphy, Melanie Wilkinson as fir elley.

Blaa boalley:
She lus bleinoil 'sy ghenus "Erysimum" eh blaa boalley, blaa Feill' Eoin ny lus yn voalley. T'eh dooghyssagh da'n Oarpey, agh t'eh cadjin er mooar-rheynnyn elley myr dooie currit stiagh. T'eh daa-vleeanagh ny sheer-vio, as ennoil myr lus jesheenagh.
Jalloo-oaylleeaght.
Ta gish wheesh as 80cm echey, as duillagyn sleeanagh wheesh as 20cm er lhiurid. Ta dhossan blaaghey spaagagh echey. Ta seepallyn glassey-jiargey oc, as petyllyn runtit 2-3cm er lhiurid. Ta'n daah oc neuchinjagh, eddyr buigh, jiarg as gorrym-jiarg. T'ad tuittym as faagail fynneigyn liauyrey geayshteenagh. 

Erysimum:
She genus dy lossreeyn bleinoil eh Erysimum. Ta mysh 180 dooie ayn, goaill stiagh blaa boalley. Ny keayrtyn, t'ad cur y ghenus "Cheiranthus" 'sy ghenus shoh myrgeddin.
Jalloo-oaylleeaght.
She lossreeyn beggey t'ayn. Ta kuse jeu gaase wheesh as 130km er yrjid. Ta gish nyn shassoo jeeragh oc son y chooid smoo. Ta duillagyn keylley gyn chass oc: ta duillagyn s'inshley linnagh dys noi-sleeanagh as lieh-fedjagagh lesh babbyn gour nyn drommey, as ta duillagyn s'ardjey linnagh. Ta crouwyn-blaaghey oc, as ta ny blaaghyn jiarg, buigh ny bane-jiarg, as daa-ghooghyssagh.

Lus y touree:
She lus 'sy ghenus "Matthiola" eh lus y touree ny blaa yn 'Eaill Eoin (Matthiola incana). T'ad bleinoil ny daa-vleeanagh.
Jalloo-oaylleeaght.
Ta duillagyn sleeanagh echey. Ta ny blaaghyn jannoo magh crouw-vlaaghey, as foddee ad ve bane, jiarg, ny bane-jiarg.

Billey kenney:
She crouw ny billey beg sheer-ghlass 'sy chynney "Arbutus" eh billey kenney (Arbutus unedo). T'eh dooghyssagh da'n ard Mean-vooiragh as yn Europey heear, dys Nerin as y Rank heear.
Jalloo-oaylleeaght.
T'eh gaase wheesh as 10m er yrjid dy cadjin, ny 15m dy goan. Ta'n corp echey wheesh as 80km er crantessen. Ta duillagyn eelipsagh glassey dorraghey gloasagh echey, mysh 5-10km er lhiurid as 2-3km er lheead, as ta oirr saue-eeacklagh oc. Ta blaaghyn daa-ghooghyssagh baney cummey cluig oc, as t'adsyn goll er pollnaghey ec shellanyn. She berrish jiarg yn-ee eh y mess oc. T'eh mysh 1-2km er crantessen, as eaghtyr garroo echey. T'eh appee rish y nah imbagh blaaghey. Ta soo as alcoal jeant jeu ayns çheeraghyn ennagh, myr sampleyr, Portiugagh.
Cultoor.
Ta billey kenney ry-akin er armyn Vadrid.

Billey cannial:
She billey ny crouw erbee 'sy ghenus ghenus sheer-ghlass Cinnamomum eh billey cannial. Ta mysh 300 jeu ayn, as t'ad dooghyssagh da ardjyn grianchryssagh er fud ny cruinney. Ta ooillyn jeih-hoaral 'sy roost as duillagyn oc. T'ad jannoo cannial ass roost sthie kuse dy ghooieyn. Ta dooieyn ennoil elley goaill stiagh "C. tamala", bun y spios malabathrum, as "C. camphora", bun camphor. 
Rere prowaltys, t'ad diploidagh as ta 24 kroymasoomyn oc.

Lieh-innys:
Ta lieh-innys ny lieh-ellan (co-ockle bunnit er y daa 'ockle "lieh" as "innys" ny "ellan") çheet er ayrn dy hallooin ta cruinnit liorish ushtey agh ta kianglt rish y çheer vooar liorish quing hallooin. Foddee dy vel kione çheerey, meayll, gob ellanagh ny rinn ny lieh-innys.

Aah:
Ta aah ny aae çheet er boayl 'syn awin ny 'sy strooan raad t'eh so-aahoil er shooyl ny liorish carbyd. Dy mennick, she phenomenon najooragh t'ayn.
Ta'n fockle 'aah' ry-akin ayns enmyn ram buill, lheid as Droghad Aah (aah raad ta droghad ayn), ny Aah yn Ollee (aah 'syn awin raad ren dew goll harrish yn awin). Ayns cosoylagh rish shen, ta'n fockle "áth" ny Yernish (ayns Baile Átha Troim as Áth an Ghainimh) as yn fockle "àth" ny Gaelg Albinagh (ayns Àth a' Chàirn as Àth Maol Ruibhe) nyn go-cheintee as ta'n cheeall cheddin oc.

Traie:
She cummey thallooin creg-oaylleeagh rish oirr cheayin, varrey ny logh ee traie. T'ee jeant seose jeh partigalyn beggey skeaylt ta jeant seose jeh creg, lheid as geinnagh, garvel, shillee, ny bwaagyn. Foddee dy vel fraueyn bea-oaylleeagh ec cummal traie, as ee jeant seose jeh smooirlagh dy shligganyn ny smooirlagh dy algey corrylagh.

Inver:
Ta inver çheet er corpane d'ushtey ta cruinnit dy paartagh lesh un awin ny strooan ny ny smoo roie stiagh ayn, as lesh kiangley seyr eck rish y vooir.
Ta inveryn nyn ardjyn caghlaaee eddyr çhymmyltaghtyn awinagh as çhymmyltaghyn marrey, as t'ad fo cleaynaghyn mooiragh, lheid as tidaghyn, tonnyn, as lhiggey stiagh d'ushtey sailley; as t'ad ec y traa cheddin fo cleaynaghyn awinagh, lheid as strooanyn d'ushtey oor as drundin. Ta'n lhiggey stiagh d'ushtaghyn sailley as ooragh cur rish keimyn ardjey dy veaghey 'syn ushtey as 'sy drundin. Rere shen, ta inveryn coontit mastey ny h-ardjyn smoo troaragh er y theihll.

Eas:
Ta eas ny lhieggey ushtey çheet er boayl raad ta ushtey roie tuittym harrish boayl eaynagh ny eaynin. Ta easyn coontit mastey ny phenomenonyn smoo aalin 'sy najoor. Ta easyn ennagh ymmydit ayns gientyn pooar ushtey-lectragh.

Droghad:
She strughtoor eh droghad ta troggit son dy gholl harrish glion, raad, corpane d'ushtey, ny harrish bac fishigagh elley lheid as foar. Ta'n cummey oc anchasley rere currym y droghad, najoor y thalloon raad ta'n droghad goll er troggal, y stoo ta ymmydit ayns e hroggalys, as yn argid t'ayn da'n troggalys.

Michelangelo:
She peinteyr, yallooder, ard-obbrinagh, feelee as jeshaghteyr Iddaalagh va Michelangelo di Lodovico Buonarroti Simoni (6 Mart, 1475 - 18 Toshiaght Arree, 1564). Rug eh faggys da Arezzo 'sy Tuscaan, ayns yn Iddaal, as hooar eh baase 'sy Raue. Ta enney mooar er son ram obbraghyn, "Davy" as "Çhymmey" er lheh.

Leonardo da Vinci:
She yl-oayllee Iddaalagh jeh'n Ard Aa-vioghey va Leonardo di ser Piero da Vinci (15 Averil 1452 – 2 Boaldyn 1519). V'eh gastey myr peinteyr, linneyder, jeshaghteyr, oayllee, sheiltynagh, jallooder, as seyrnagh. Ga dy row yn enney echey bunnit er ny h-obbraghyn echey myr peinteyr, haink enney er chammah son e lioaryn screeuee raad ren eh linneeaghtyn as noteyn er caghlaa dy chooishyn, goaill stiagh y ronsaghey kirpey, y rollageydys, y lus-oaylleeaght, y chaartgraafeeaght, y pheintal, as studeyrys ny shenn lossreeyn. T'eh er credjal dy lheeadagh dy nee ard-cheeayllagh va Leonardo va coontit myr giare-skeeal ard-smooinaght heelnauederys yn Aa-vioghey, as ta çhaglym ny h-obbraghyn echey coontit myr co-hoyrtys da sheelogheyn anmagh d'ellyneyryn nagh vel piyrit ec dooinney elley erbee goaill magh e cho-emshiragh aeg, Michelangelo.
V'eh ruggit ass poosey lesh noteyr as ben ass sleih injil ayns, ny faggys da, Vinci, as v'eh ynsit ayns Firenze liorish y pheinteyr as y jallooder Iddaalagh, Andrea del Verrocchio. Hoshee yn coorse bea echey 'sy chaayr, agh cheau eh cooid vie jeh'n traa echey ayns shirveish Ludovico Sforza ayns Milaan. Ny s'anmey, ren eh obbraghey ayns Firenze as Milaan reesht, chammah as feie lhing ghiare 'sy Raue, tra v'eh çhaglym possan mooar eiyrtyssagh dy lurgeyryn as studeyryn. Er cuirrey voish Frank I, cheau eh yn tree vleeeaney jerrinagh echey 'sy Rank, raad hooar eh baase ayns 1519. Ta ny h-obbraghyn, anaaseyn, y vea phersoonagh echey, as ny smooinaghtyn treealagh echey brasnaghey anaase as yindys dagh vlein voish laa e vaaish, jannoo ass co-ennymee as myr cooish 'sy chultoor.

Eeder foalley:
Ta eeder foalley çheet er bioag ta goaill bree as beaghey ass stoo kirpey beiyn son y chooid smoo, liorish cragheydys ny scrobbey. My ta baagh croghey er feill ynrican, shen "eeder foalley eginagh"; mannagh vel, she "eeder foalley coonee" t'ayn. Ta eeder ooilley gee feill as bee elley myrgeddin, as cha nel scansh baghtal eddyr eeder foalley as eeder oilley (ny lus-eeagh) . Ta eeder foalley s'yrdjey 'sy yeuley bee ny ard-chragheyder.
Ta kuse dy lossreeyn goaill as ee shey-chassee, as t'adsyn nyn lossreeyn feill-eeagh. Ta kuse dy 'ungyssyn goaill as ee myn-chretooryn, as t'adsyn nyn vungyssyn feill-eeagh.

Carnivora:
Ta'n oardagh Carnivora (ass Ladjyn "carō" (fraue "carn-") "feill", + "vorāre" "ee") goaill stiagh harrish 260 dooie dy heeintee chrooagh. Gyn scansh da keeal ny focklyn, cha nel "carnivoragh" as "eederyn foalley" y red cheddin: cha nel dagh eeder foalley 'syn oardagh shoh. She oardagh feer eigysolagh t'ayn, eddyr "Mustela nivalis" (mysh 25g er trimmid as 11cm er lhiurid) as "Mirounga leonina" (wheesh as 5000kg as 6.9m er lhiurid). Ta carnivoree gee feill erskyn ooilley son y chooid smoo. Ta fir jeu (myr sampleyr, kiyt, skian-chassee as assagyn) nyn eederyn foalley eginagh, agh ta fir elley (myr sampleyr, raccoonyn as mucyn-awin) ooilley-eeagh. Ta'n maghouin Sheenagh ny lus-eeder son y chooid smoo, agh t'eh gee yeeastyn, oohyn as shey-chassee ny keayrtyn.

Alpha:
She kied lettyr yn abbyrlhit Greagagh eh alpha (A, α) (). Haink eh ass aleph Feaneeckagh. Haink aittyn Romanagh as A Kyrillagh ass.
Shennaghys.
T'ad gra dy daink alpha jeh screeu caslys jeh kione ghow ayns Jalloo-ocklyn Egyptagh ny'n abbyrlhit Proto-Sinaitagh. Haink y cowrey shoh trooid corys screeuee Feaneeckagh dys ny Greagee.
Ymmyd.
Ayns Shenn Ghreagish, ren ad fockley magh alpha myr breeockle foshlit toshee neuruntit: giare as liauyr. Ny keayrtyn, t'ad cur cowrey girrid as linney vreear orroo dys eddyr-scarrey ad: Ᾱᾱ, Ᾰᾰ.
Cha nel lhiurid breeockle ec Greagish yeianagh, as ta alpha çheet er giare dagh keayrt.
Alpha as Omega.
Dy caslyssagh, ta alpha (myr fockle ny lettyr) çheet er kied tampleyr ny ard-hampleyr red ennagh. Rere'n Chonaant Noa, ta Jee graa "Mish Alpha as Omega, yn toshiaght as y jerrey, yn chied 'er as y fer s'jerree." (Ashlish 22:13).
Coadyn co-earrooder.
Ayns Unicode, ta A mooar ec U+0391 (Α) as U+2C6D (Ɑ). Ta ɑ beg ec U+0251 (ɑ) as U+03B1 (α).
Ayns HTML as XML, ta A mooar ec "&Alpha;" ny "&#913;" (Α) as "&#11373;" (Ɑ).
Ta ɑ beg ec "&alpha;" ny "&#945;" (α) as "&#593;" (ɑ).

Baljaghtyn ayns Åland:
Ta ny 16 baljaghtyn ayns Åland rheynnit ayns tree fo-ardjyn: Mariehamn, çheu çheerey as yn ellanragh.

Bacteria:
Ta Bacteria (bacteyryn) ny phossan mooar dy vynorgaanee phrokaryotagh un-chillagagh. T'ad ooilley-ynnydagh er feie ny cruinney; t'ad gaase 'sy thalloo, ayns geillyn ushtey çheh, jeeyll goul-rooragh, ushtey as kirp lossreeyn as beiyn bio. Ta mysh 40 millioon bacteyr ayns gramme dy halloo as millioon jeu ayns millileetyr dy ushtey villish; s'cosoylagh dy vel queig nonillion (5×1030) bacteyr er y chruinney. T'ad jannoo magh ayrn mooar jeh bea-chorpys ny cruinney. 
Ta mysh jeig keayrt smoo bacteyryn cummal er corp deiney na ta killagyn deiney ayn. Ta ram jeu er y chrackan as biota collaneagh. Ta'n chooid smoo jeu meeskielleydagh er coontey obbraghyn y chorys jeenaght, as ta fir jeu foayssagh dooin. Ta fir elley gorlagh as t'adsyn nyn minn ymmodee çhingyssyn, myr sampleyr, yn collyr, anthracs, louraneys as yn phlaih fairaigagh. Ta gorley shymlee marroo mysh 2 villioon sleih 'sy vlein, 'syn Affrick fo-Haharagh son y chooid smoo. Ta fir lhee jannoo ymmyd jeh noi-vaagh noi bacteyryn.

Vertebra:
Ta vertebra ny junt craue-drommey çheet er corp craueagh 'sy chraue drommey ta cowraghey dreeym-juntee. T'eh jeant ass corpane vertebragh ("corpus vertebrae"), corran vertebragh ("arcus vertebrae"), daa chubblane tessen ("processus transversus"), kiare cubblaneyn juntagh ("processus articulares") as cubblane drommey ("processus spinosus"). Ta'n craue drommey ny choodagh coadey da'n coyrd drommey ta sheeyney veih bun y chlaigin sheese çheu drommey y vaagh dys y phelvis, as eisht t'ad jannoo famman.
Corpane vertebragh.
Ta'n corpane vertebragh rollianagh, as ta eaghtyr rea garroo s'inshley as s'yrdjey echey. Ta claare eddyr-vertebragh eddyr eaghtyr s'inshley yn un 'er as eaghtyr s'yrdjey y nah 'er. Ta kianglaghyn craue kiangley ad myrgeddin 
("Ligamentum longitudinale anterius" as "posterius").
Corran vertebragh.
Ta corran vertebragh ny cho-olt craueagh y vertebra. Ta frauaig ("Pediculus arcus vertebrae") kiangley rish duillag vertebragh ("Lamina arcus vertebrae"). Ta'n corran combaasey cooyl y towl vertebragh ("Foramen vertebrale"). Ta'n çheu ghailley jeant jeh'n chorpane vertebragh. Ta ny tuill shoh jannoo magh cassan drommey raad ta'n coyrd drommey, mening as fliughid kerrodrommey nyn soie.
Cubblaneyn tessen.
Ta'n daa chubblane tessen jannoo obbyr cubblane da kianglaghyn craue as muskyllyn. Ta cubblaneyn tessen vertebrae thoracksagh jannoo kiangley juntagh rish ny h-asnaghyn.
Ta tuill dowan-lhiurid ("Foramen transversarium") trooid y chied dys sheyoo vertebrae mhuinneelagh. T'eh ny chassan ("Canalis transversarius") da'n arteyr as cuishlin vertebragh as nearagh vertebragh.
Cubblane drommey.
Ayns deiney, ta cubblane drommey sheeyney ny chooyl as sheese veih cochiangle ny duillagyn vertebragh, as ta muskyllyn as kianglaghyn craueagh kiangley rish. Ayns beiyn elley, t'eh sheeyney seose, as ny chooyl ny er oaie jeh cochiangle ny duillagyn vertebragh. Ta cubblane drommey mooadit ec shiartanse dy chretooryn, dys jannoo "shiaull"; myr sampleyr, "Dimetrodon" as "Spinosaurus" marroo.
Cha nel cubblane drommey erbee ec y chied vertebra mhuinneelagh. Ta cubblaneyn drommey vertebrae 'sy tacrum er nyn go-lheie dys "Crista sacralis median".
Cubblaneyn juntagh.
Ta kiare cubblaneyn juntagh (daa chubblane s'inshley as daa chubblane s'yrdjey) kiangley vertebrae dy fondagh. Ta eaghtyr kianglee y chubblane s'yrdjey coar y chooyl, as eaghtyr kianglee y chubblane s'inshley er oaie.
Rang-oardraghey.
T'ad geddyr-scarrey vertebrae rere ynnyd 'sy chraue drommey. Ta vertebrae mhuinneelagh adsyn faggys da'n wannal. Er lhimmey jeh daa raiseyder ("Choleopus" as "Bradypus") as y booa varrey ("Trichechus"), ta shiaght vertebrae mhuinneelagh ec dagh sheeintagh. Ta scanshyn mooar eddyr beiyn elley; ta un vertebra ec daa-veeaghee ennagh, wheesh as 25 ec olla, as va 76 ec y phlesiosaur "Elasmosaurus". 
Ta "vertebra drommey" eddyr y wannal as y pelvis; she vertebra thoracksagh t'ayn my t'eh kiangley rish asney, as vertebra lumbagh t'ayn manangh vel.
Ta vertebra sacragh faggys da'n phelvis. Ta un ec daa-veeaghee, as daa ec ushagyn as beishteigyn jeianagh son y chooid smoo, agh ta 3-5 ec sheeintee. Ny keayrtyn, ta kuse jeu co-lheie dys un chraue, y sacrum. Ta synsacrum ec ein, as shen jeant jeh vertebrae sacragh, lumbagh, y pelvis, as kuse dy vertebrae thoracksagh as fammanagh.
Ta vertebrae fammanagh jannoo magh y famman. Foddee ad co-lheie dys pygostyle ein, ny coccygeal (craue famman) deiney as çhimpanseeyn

Limmeragh:
Ta Limmeragh (, ) ny trass chaayr smoo ayns Pobblaght Nerin as ny chiarroo caayr smoo er yn ellan. Goaill stiagh ny fo-valjyn as ny binn chaayragh, ta 90,757 deiney cummal 'sy chaayr. Ta Limmeragh ny nah chaayr smoo ayns Queiggey Mooan lurg Corkee. Ta'n chaayr ny soie er ram ellanyn as cassyn ny Shannon, yn awin s'liurey ayns Nerin lesh inver eck er gerrey da'n chaayr.
Mooinjerys eddyrashoonagh.
Baljyn as caayryn lannoonit.
Ta Limmeragh lannoonit rish ny baljyn as caayryn shoh heese:

Clou iddaalagh:
Ayns clougraafeeagh, ta clou iddaalagh çheet er clou roie bunnit er cummey aghtit jeh lauescreeuee penneyragh. Er oyr y chleayney veih'n phenneyraght, ta e lheid jeh clouyn shen sceau beggan da'n jiass. Ta cummaghyn glyffyn anchasley veih'n chlou romanagh ymmydit chammah–cleaney elley veih'n phenneyraght.
Ta'n ennym "iddaalagh" currit er y chlou er oyryn shendeeagh. Va clouyn penneyragh kiaddit 'syn Iddaal son cooishyn ardreiltagh. V'ad Ludovico Arrighi as Aldus Manutius (y daa jeu eddyr y 15oo as y 16oo eash) ny preeu-chiaddeyderyn 'syn obbraghey ec y traa shen.

San Marino (caayr):
She preeu-valley Pobblaght San Marino ee Caayr San Marino ny San Marino dy h-aashagh. Ta'n chaayr ny soie er lieh-innys ny h-Iddaal, faggys da'n Vooir Aidreeatagh. Ta 4,493 deiney cummal 'sy chaayr. T'ee soit er lhiargee heear y voayl s'yrjey ayns San Marino, Monte Titano.
Ga dy vel San Marino ny phreeu-valley, ta'n chooid smoo jeh dellal ny çheerey ayns Borgo Maggiore. T'ee ny trass chaayr smoo 'sy çheer, lurg Dogana as Borgo Maggiore. Ta'n valjaght hene çhemmit liorish ny baljaghtyn Acquaviva, Borgo Maggiore, Fiorentino, as Chiesanuova ayns San Marino, as liorish y valjaght Iddaalagh San Leo.

Meegrasteatyn Oarpagh:
Ta meegrasteatyn ny mynsteatyn Oarpagh çheet er possan beg dy steatyn feer veggey 'syn Oarpey. Choud's ta Andorra, Liechtenstein, y Valta, Monaco, San Marino, as Ard-valley yn Phaab coontit nyn mast'oc, ta troyn cosoylagh ry-akin ec Lucsemburg as y Cheeprey. She steatyn seyrey beggey t'ayn ayns meegrasteatyn, ayns neu-chosoylaght rish "meegra-ashoonyn", unnidyn nagh vel seyr.

Coonseil yn Oarpey:
She nane jeh ny reagheydyssyn eddyr-ashoonagh shinney 'syn Oarpey ee Coonseil yn Oarpey (, ). She co-hymey yn Oarpey yn dean ec y Choonseil. Va'n reagheydys bunnit 'sy vlein 1949 liorish Conaant Lunnin. Ta cleayney mooar eck er stundayrtyn leighoil, kiartyn deiney, lhiasaghey deynlaghys, reill y leigh, as co-obbraghey cultooragh. Ta 47 çheeraghyn 'sy Choonseil as staydys olteynagh oc lesh 800 millioonyn dy chummaltee. Cha nee yn Unnaneys Oarpagh ayns feysht 'sy Choonseil, ga nagh vel agh 27 olteynyn 'syn Unnaneys, as polaseeyn cadjin as leighyn boandagh echey. Agh, ansherbee, ta cowraghyn er lheh er nyn rheynn magh eddyr y Choonseil as yn Unnaneys, goaill stiagh y brattagh.

Brattagh yn Oarpey:
She brattagh as cowrey yn Unnaneys Oarpagh (UO) as Choonseil yn Oarpey (CnO) eh brattagh yn Oarpey. T'eh jeant seose jeh 12 rollage airhey er cooylrey gorrym. Ta'n daah gorrym shassoo son yn eear, ta earroo ny rollageyn shassoo son slanid as ta'n soiaghey oc ayns kiarkyl shassoo son unnaneys. Cha nel earroo ny rollageyn shassoo son earroo olteynyn ny reagheydyssyn er-yn-oyr dy vel ad shassoo son dagh sleih as dagh kynney 'syn Oarpey, goaill stiagh adsyn magh veih co-hymey ny h-Oarpey.
Va'n brattagh cummit ec Arsène Heitz as Paul Lévy 'sy vlein 1955 da'n CnO myr y cowrey eck, as ren y CnO coyrlaghey da reagheydyssyn Oarpagh elley eh dy gholtey. 'Sy vlein 1985, ren yn UO, y Boodeeys Tarmaynagh Oarpagh ec y traa shen, doltey yn brattagh myr y brattagh echey hene rere keim-hoshee Pharlamaid yn Oarpey. Cha nel imraa er y brattagh ayns conaantyn yn UO, agh t'eh er ve doltit rere leigh.

Langlish:
She lieh-innys Langlish () ta gobbey magh begnagh daa chilomeadar veih shiar yiass Vannin. Ayns ny shenn laaghyn va Langlish ny h-ellan, agh haink urree dy ve kianglt rish y vooar-heer liorish y ghleashaght as y chur sheese dy stoo rish Baie Valley Chashtal. Dy çheer-oaylleeagh, ta'n lieh-innys ny hombolo. Ta'n balley beg Camys y Ree ny hoie er chooid jeh'n lieh-innys ta kiangley rish y vooar-heer, as y lieh-innys hene ny soie er gerrey da Balley Chashtal.
Ta Kione Dreswick soit ayns jiass y lieh-innys, as ta Innys Vael kianglt rish y lieh-innys liorish taagher 'sy twoaie.

Tombolo:
Ta tombolo (veih "tombolo" ny h-Iddaalish, veih "tumulus" ny Ladjyn, as "tullagh" y cheeal echey) ny ayre (veih "eyrr" ny Shenn-Loghlynish, as "traie gharvel" y cheeal echey) ny keayrtyn, ny chummey thallooin. T'eh çheet er ellan ta kianglt rish y vooar-heer liorish quing hallooin cheyl, lheid as gob.

Ellanragh:
Ta ellanragh çheet er driaght ny dossan dy ellanyn va crooit dy çhectonagh. Ta'n fockle ymmydit son dy cur sheese er possan ellanagh ennagh, ny ny keayrtyn, son dy chur sheese er mooir raad ta earroo mooar dy ellanyn ry-akin, lheid as ny h-Ellanyn Aejeeanagh 'sy Vooir Aejeeanagh.
Ta ellanree ry-gheddyn nyn lomarcan ayns ushtaghyn, ny foddee dy vel çheer vooar ry-laue. Myr sampleyr, ta ny smoo na 700 ellanyn cruinnaghey Nalbin. Dy mennick, she ellanyn volcaanagh t'ayn, t'er nyn groo rish arcyn ellanagh v'er ny ghientyn liorish cryssyn leodee ny buill heh, agh ta ram obbraidyn elley cur nyn laueyn stiagh 'sy chrooaght oc, goaill stiagh crimmey, cur sheese, as yrjey thallooin.
T'ad yn Indoneesh, y Çhapaan, ny h-Ellanyn Philippeenagh, y Teelynn Noa as y Reeriaght Unnaneysit ny çheeraghyn ellanree smoo. She Mooir yn Ellanree ayns Finnlynn y vooir lesh y chooid smoo dy ellanyn.

Quaiyl (reddaghey):
Foddee quaiyl çheet er:

Quaiyl slattyssagh:
Ta quaiyl slattyssagh ny quaiyl resooney nod jannoo, caghlaa as aagherrym slattyssyn. Chammah's jannoo slattyssyn, ta kiart oc dy cadjin dy ardjaghey keeshyn as goaill rish claare argidoil as biljyn argid elley. Ny keayrtyn, t'ad cur ard-whaiyl ny quaiyl ard-eish er quaiyl slattyssagh, agh ta keeallyn elley ec ny h-enmyn shoh.
Ayns corys ard-whaiylagh reiltys, ta'n whaiyl slattyssagh kiondeeagh, as t'ee ponteil oltey yn thie myr ard-vinishter dys stiurey banglane obbree ny reiltys. Ayns corys eaghtyraneagh, rere reill scarrey cummaght, ta'n whaiyl slattyssagh ny banglane neuchrogheydagh ny reiltys corrym rish y vanglane obbree as y banglane briwnagh.

Quaiyl:
She bing ee quaiyl, fo stiurey reiltys dy cadjin, ta jannoo briwnyssyn er cooishyn leigh.

Quaiyl abb:
By whaiyl vannoragh Hostyn ee quaiyl abb ayns ny Mean Eashyn. She quaiyl vunneydagh çhiarnaght v'ayn, as v'ee dellal rish cooishyn sthie y stayd son y chooid smoo, myr sampleyr, caghlaa tannystys, cur stiagh er kiartyn y çhiarn, as arganeyn thallooinagh eddyr tannyssyn. Va cliaghtaghyn y vannor bun ny briwnyssyn, as v'ad anchasley eddyr daa vannor erbee. Foddee quaiyllyn abbey dellal rish aghinyn neu-chimmagh bentyn rish wheesh as 40s myrgeddin.

Blaa greiney:
She lus ny greiney eh blaa greiney (Helianthus tuberosus). T'eh dooghyssagh da ny Steatyn Unnaneyssit hiar, eddyr Maine as Dakota Hwoaie, as Florida as Texas. T'eh goll er troarey er fud ny cryss tempreilagh er coontey'n voyl yn-ee echey.
Jalloo-oaylleeaght.
She lus lussagh sheer-vio t'ayn. T'eh gaase wheesh as 3m er yrjid. Ta duillagyn s'singhley piyral as feeacklagh, agh ta duillagyn s'yrdjey maylartey as ta oirr rea oc. T'ad oohchrooagh as garroo.
Ta dhossan blaaghyn buighey echeymysh 5-10cm er lheead, as ta 10-20 blaag gahagh oc.
Ta ny fraueyn cur magh moyllyn liauyrey, mysh 10cm er lhiurid as 5cm er lheead, gollrish fraue jinshar. Foddee ad ve bane-dhone, bane, jiarg ny jiarg-ghorrym.

Dùn Àluinn:
She Dùn-Àluinn, ny Dùn-Àluinn, no an t-Oighre ’na Dhìobarach, va'n chied noaskeeal lane liauyr 'sy Ghaelg Albinagh hie er ny hoilshey magh 'sy vlein 1912. V'eh screeuit ec Iain MacCormaig as soilshit magh da'n chied cheayrt myr straih-skeeal 'sy "People's Journal" veih Boaldyn derrey Mean Fouyir ny bleeaney 1910. Ren MacCormaig soilshey magh noaskeeal beg, "Gun d'thug i speis do'n Armunn", gerrid ny bleeantyn roish.
She skeeal mychione ny graynyn car Skeayley ny Gaeil ayns Nalbin t'ayn, as mychione eirey çhiarn thallooin tranlaasagh, Cailean Og, ren coayl e eiraght. She yn persoon smoo anaasagh t'ayn na'n shirveishagh ta goaill sharmane mychione kiartyn soshiallagh. Ta ny taghyrtyn 'sy skeeal goaill stiagh buill andooghyssagh, lheid as meainyn airhey 'sy Teelynn Noa.

Làmh-sgrìobhainn Fheàrnaig:
She docamad ta goaill stiagh mysh 4,200 linnaghyn dy ghaanyn ad Làmh-sgrìobhainn Fheàrnaig (Gaelg Albinagh son "Laue-screeuyn Feàrnaig", ). Ta ny daanyn jeant seose jeh cooishyn politickagh as craueeagh son y chooid smoo. Va ny laue-screeuyn cummit eddyr ny bleeantyn 1688 as 1693 liorish Donnchadh MacRath ayns Taobh Siar Rois as ta scansh vooar orroo er son y chair-screeu unnar lesh yn ughtar, as t'eh screeuit ayns cummey ta cosoylagh rish Leabhar Deathan Lios Mòir, cummey ta bunnit er y Vaarle, ayns cosoylaght rish y Ghaelg Chlassicagh. Ga dy row studeyrys jeant er ny laue-screeuyn, as dy row ad "çhyndaait" rere cair-screeu chiart ny Gaelgey Albinagh as dy row ad aahoilshit magh - 'sy vlein 1923 da'n chied cheayrt ec Calum MacPhàrlainn - t'eh er gra nagh vel bun baghtal dy barrantoil currit orroo gys y laa ain.
Ayns bishaghey rish y corys screeuee quaagh ayndaue, ta ny laue-screeuyn coontit myr obbraghyn feer scanshoil son cooishyn elley. Cha nel recortys elley jeh daanyn Albinagh as cosoylaght ayns cummey ayn va cliaghtit ec bardyn Mooanagh ec toshiaght y 17oo eash. T'ad goaill stiagh daanyn crauee ta ny shinney na cummey ny laue-screeuyn as ta currit sheese myr y sampleyr lomarcan jeh daanyn crauee veih'n eash shen ta co-chorrym er-yn-oyr dy vel sampleyryn cosoylagh feer ghoan veih'n lhing lurg Cah Chùl Lodair. Va dagh recortys elley jeh daanyn Gaelgagh ny 17oo eash currit sheese er pabyr lurg keead bleeaney ny ny smoo myr coois jeh'n tradishoon beill. Ta ny laue-screeuyn goaill stiagh 59 peeshyn lesh jeih jeu gyn enney er yn ughtar, daa yeig jeu ta gurrit gys lieh Donnchadh MacRath hene as 17 ughtaryn elley as freggyrt currit dauesyn.
Meer ass y daan "Gillimichells ansr to ye ford lyns" ("Freggyrt Ghuilley-Maayl hug ny Linnaghyn Roie-raait"):
Ta ny laue-screeuyn, ayns cummey daa lioar, ayns shelloo lioarlann Ollooscoill Ghlaschu. Roish haink er ny laue-screeuyn ayns shelloo ny h-ollooscoill, v'ad freillt ec Mac Mathghamhuin ennagh ass Feàrnaig, as rere shen v'ad enmyssit Làmh-sgrìobhainn Fheàrnaig ny Laue-screeuyn Feàrnaig. Eisht, hie ad trooid laueyn y Dr Dr Mackintosh-Mackay, y Dr W.F. Skene as yn Arrymagh Reverend John Kennedy ass Aran. Hug eh ad gys Ollooscoill. Ta'n abbyrt ta goll er ymmyd ayndaue anchasley as s'foddee dy vel eh caghlaa eddyr aght formoil as lettyragh as aght ynnydagh. Choud's t'eh jargal dy row fys ennagh ec MacRath er laue-screeuyn Gaelgagh (ny h-Albey as Nerin) 'syn aght lettyragh, cha nel agh beggan dy stronnaghey ry-akin 'sy teks - tro jeh'n Yernish as fer jeh ny h-anchaslyssyn smoo eddyr y Ghaelg Albinagh as y Yernish – as t'eh shen cur sannish da'n 'irriney nagh chur eh sheese er pabyr red erbee dy row jaghtit da liorish Yernisheyr. Ansherbee, ta'n skeeal goaill stiagh daa obbyr ec daa vard Yernagh v'er mayrn ram sheelogheyn roish lhing yn ughtar as t'eh shen cur credjal da'n nhee dy row ainjys ec MacRath marish y torçh lettyraght shen. Foddee yn daa lioar jeh'n laue-screeuyn dy rheynn rere y chooish jeh ny daanyn ta ry-gheddyn ayndaue. Ta'n chied lioar goaill stiagh obbraghyn crauee jeh'n aght lettyragh as ta'n nah lioar ny smoo politickagh as cadjinagh ayns aght. Ta kuse vooar dy 'ocklyn ayndaue nagh vel ry-gheddyn ayns fockleyryn noa-emshyragh ny Gaelg Albinagh agh ta cooid vooar jeh ny focklyn shen ry-gheddyn ayns fockleryn ny Yernish as ayns fockleyr "ooilley-Ghaelgagh" dy chooid Shaw.

Lioar:
She çhaglym cochianglt as coodit dy ghuillagyn ee lioar. Son y chooid smoo, ta screeuyn, diagramyn, jallooyn ny cooid elley er ny duillagyn. Dy cadjin, t'ad geddyr-scarrey lioaryn seyrey (monagrafyn) veih earishlioaryn, ga dy vel y cummey cheddin oc ny keayrtyn. Ny keayrtyn, ta ymmodee ym-lioaryn jannoo magh un obbyr (yl-lioar).
Ny keayrtyn, t'ad cur lioar er rheynn dy lioar chorpagh ennagh, bentyn rish shenn obbraghyn as obbraghyn crauee dy cadjin. Myr sampleyr, ta Lioar Genesis rheynn jeh'n Vible as y Torah nagh vel ad cur magh ny lomarcan son y chooid smoo.
Ta lioar-l çheet er obbyr lectraneagh ta ry-akin lesh co-earrooder ny lhaihder lioar-l. Ta kuse jeu jeant jeh caslyssyn jeh lioaryn corpagh, as fir elley aascreeut ayns cummey lectraneagh.
Shennaghys.
Ec y toshiaght, screeu shenn chultooryn er ymmodee eaghtyryn: sheeidey, claghyn, roost, lhiackagyn cray, duillagyn palmey as meain.
Ren ny Shenn Eajiptee ymmyd jeh pabyr Eajiptagh, as shen jeant ass gish 'eeit "Cyperus papyrus". Ta'n feanish s'leaie jeh ass lioaryn coontys Ree Neferirkare Kakai y Wheigoo Reeraghtys (mysh 2400 RC). Ren ad gleiyaghey duillagyn ry-cheilley myr scrolley. Ny keayrtyn, ren ad ymmyd jeh roost; myr sampleyr, roost theiley.
Rere Herodotus, hug lhieu Feaneeackee screeu as pabyr Eajiptagh da'n Ghreag mysh y 9oo ny 10oo Eash RC. Haink focklyn ny Greagish son pabyr as lioaryn (' as ') jeh ennym Vyblos, ny purt Feaneeackagh ren assphurtal pabyr da'n Ghreag. Va scrollaghyn y cummey lioar cadjin ayns cultoor Greagagh, Romanagh, Sheenagh as Ewagh. Haink rish crackan screeuee mysh y 3oo Eash RC, 'syn Ghreag, as pabyr mysh y 1oo Eash RC 'syn Çheen, ga nagh ren ad ymmyd cadjin jeh er son lioaryn derrey'n 3oo Eash BNJ.
Dynlee ny Romanee codex (lioar jeianagh) rere lhiackagyn screeuee ayns coodaghyn fuyghagh. Ghow eh harrish ynnyd scrollaghyn dy moal, bentyn rish skeaylley Chreestiaght: ren ny Creestee ymmyd jeh myr cummey ynrickan y Vible, faggys, neayr's y toshiaght. Hug Martial (ny vard Romanagh) moylley da codices er son ymmydoilid. V'eh corrym rish y scrolley mysh y 3oo Eash, as va codices y cummey cadjin 'sy teihll Greagagh-Romanagh rish y 6oo Eash.

Jane Austen:
By noaskeealagh ee Jane Austen (16 Mee ny Nollick, 1775 - 28 Mean Souree, 1817). T'ee mie er enney er son obbraghyn myr "Pride and Prejudice" as "Sense and Sensibility". Screeu ee ayns aght rieaughagh as gamlagh, as v'ee coontit myr fakider sheshaght tastagh. 

Corys parlamaidagh:
Ta corys parlamaidagh çheet er corys dy reiltys raad ta shirveishee y chrouw chiannoortagh poyntit ass olteynyn y whaiyl slattyssagh as ta freggyrtagh da'n chorpane shen, 'syn aght dy vel ny crouwyn kiannoortagh as slattyssagh co-vestit. Ayns coryssyn parlamaidagh, dy mennick ta anchaslys glen eddyr y chione steat as y chione reiltys, as y fer shen enmyssit ard-vinishter, toshiagh ny ard-hirveishagh dy mennick, as staydys ennymagh ec y chione steat, dooinney ta enmyssit eaghtyrane (reiht ec y phobbyl ny ec y reiltys) ny monarch eiraghtagh (ayns reeriaght vunraghtoil dy mennick).

Blaa Nollick:
She lus blaaghey sheer-vio nieunagh eh blaa Nollick ny blaa ny Nollick (Helleborus niger) 'sy chynney Ranunculaceae. 
Jalloo-oaylleeaght.
She lus sheer-vio t'ayn. Ta duillagyn "pedata" dorraghey lhiareagh echey. Ta blaaghyn mooarey baney ny baney-jiarg echey, as t'ad cur magh 'sy gheurey ny anmagh 'syn arrey.
Nieu.
Ta protoanemonin ny ranunculin ayns "Helleborus niger". Ta blass geyre echey, as foddee eh cur loshtaght er sooillyn, beill as scoarn, chammah's cur ort askaidaghey beill, enteritis gailley as haematemesis..

At the Mountains of Madness:
She noaskeeal beg scoaghagh liorish H. P. Lovecraft eh At the Mountains of Madness ("Ec Sleityn y Vaanrid"). V'eh screeut echey ayns arree 1931, as hie eh er chur magh dy earishagh ayns earrooyn Toshiaght Arree, Mee Vayrnt as Averil 1936 "Astounding Stories". T'eh er ny aachlou ayns ymmodee lioar skeealyn çhaglit.
Giare-choontey.
Ta'n skeeal er ny screeu 'sy chied phersoon liorish William Dyer, ny chreg-oayllee Ollooscoill ny Miskatonagh. T'eh screeu dys brah folliaghtyn mie-follit fo mian lhiettal turrys oaylleeagh mie er soilshaghey magh da Kione Jiass y Teihill. Leeid Dyer roie-turrys oayllee jeh Ollooscoill ny Miskatonagh da, as feddyn tholtanyn ard-yindyssagh as agglagh, as folliaght gaueagh ny lurg straih sleityn ny s'yrdjey na ny Himalayaghyn. Y possan hooar as hie tessen ny sleityn, hooar ad fooillagh shenn vioagyn gyn enney oaylleeagh deiney oc ayns ooig; shey jeu jeeillit, ny fir elley slane dy quaagh. T'ad ro-aafillit da'n straih t'ad ayn. Er y fa dy vel eh gollrish cretooryn feayn-skeealeydagh 'sy Necronomicon, ta ny oayllee cur "Nheeghyn Shinney" orroo.
Ta'n posson shoh caillt ec y chione-cherroo, as myr shen ta Dyer as e cho-obbree goll dys y champ dys feddyn magh ny haghyr. Ta'n camp currit mow as deiney as moddee rio traartyssit. Cha nel agh un dooinney as un voddey ass yn earroo. Faggys da'n champ, t'ad feddyn shey carnaneyn sniaghtee as Nhee Shinney er ny oanluckey fo dagh fer. Ta ny Nheeghyn share freilt er skellal roish, as ta prowaltys corp-yiarrey ennagh er ny yannoo er dooinney as moddey.
Ta Dyer as studeyr enmyssit Danforth getlagh etlan harrish ny sleityn, as feddyn ard-valley fouwragh dy chioobyn as cughlinyn gyn cosoylaght deiney. Rish wandreil 'syn ard-valley neuchredjallagh, t'ad feddyn jalloo-screeuyn as caslyssyn boalley ta soilshaghey magh shennaghys ny Nheeghyn Shinney. Haink ad da'n Teihll beggan erreish da'n Eayst brishey seyr jeh, as croo bea y teihill. Ren ad ard-valjyn liorish "Shoggothyn", nyn gretooryn yl-chrooagh nod cooilleeney obbyr erbee as goaill orroo cummey erbee. Ta'n daa 'er feddyn magh shennaghys dooieyn elley, goaill stiagh caggaghyn noi Sliught Rollageagh Cthulhu as Mi-Go haink da'n teihll tammylt ny yei ny Nheeghyn Shinney. Ec y traa cheddin, ta injillaghey schlei ry-akin 'syn ellyn rish ny eashyn choud's ta ny Shoggothyn çheet dy ve ny seyrey, as t'eh ny s'doillee freayll laue yn eaghtyr orroo. Ta ny caslyssyn çheet dy ve neureilt as bunneydagh, as t'ad çheet er olk gyn enney ayns sleityn eer ny smoo faggys daue ta cur aggle eer orroosyn. Fy-yerrey, rish y rio snaue roo, daag ny Nheeghyn Shinney dys faarkey mooar fo-halloo. T'eh jeeaghyn dy nee fir foddey caillt hooar ny deiney 'syn ooig, as ad ass y çheshaght foddey roish my daag y pobble.
Fy-yerrey, ta ny deiney toiggal nagh vel ad nyn lomarcan 'syn ard-valley. Ny Nheeghyn Shinney hie er coayl ass y champ, t'ad er irree magh reesht aght ennagh, as marroo ny deiney (liorish aggle, foddee) as goll er ash da'n ard-valley ruggyree oc. Ta ny deiney feddyn lorg ronsaghey magh, as kirp y dooinney as moddey caillt er sleaydyn bredagh. Rish goll ny s'diuney stiagh 'syn ard-valley, t'ad feddyn dorrys gloutagh drogh-aaishnagh ta fosley thiollane, as er lhieu dy vel eh kiangley rish yn 'aarkey fo-halloo lhaih ad er ny s'leaie. T'eh cleaynaghey ad stiagh, as t'ad feddyn scoaghyn elley: Nheeghyn Shinney er nyn marroo dy broutagh, spennigyn albeenagh doalley shey trieyn er yrjid, as fy-yerrey, eajeeid ard-vooar screeaghee, ny chorpys bolganeagh doo, as shen Shoggoth. T'ad scaapail liorish aigh as molley. 'Syn eltan reesht, ta Danforth jeeaghyn nyn yei as fakin red ennagh ta cur eh ass e cheeall. Ta sannish ayn dy vel eh bentyn rish ny ta ry-akin er çheu elley ny sleityn elley as hug aggle eer er ny Nheeghyn Shinney.
Bun.
Va sym beayn ec Lovecraft ronsaghey magh yn Antarctagh, neayr's v'eh 12 vleeantyn d'eash as screeu traghtyssyn beggey er ronseyderyn Antarctagh leah as skeealyn giarey bentyn rish. Ta S. T. Joshi cowraghey dy row yn Antarctagh mastey ardjyn s'jerree y teihill gyn ronsaghey rish ny 1920yn, as myr shen, lhig eh da Lovecraft soilshaghey eh liorish sheiltynys hene, gyn boirey er contraartys ass laue.

Sheltish:
She çhengey ta goll er loayrt ec y Lught Shooyl ayns Nerin as 'sy Vretyn Vooar ee Sheltish. T'ee er enney ec çhengoaylleeyn myr "Sheltish", ny loayreyderyn pene myr "Gammon", agh ta sleih elley cur "the Cant" urree 'sy Vaarle, as ta Yernisheyryn cur "Gaimis", "Seiltis" as "Caintis" urree. V'ee er ymmyd myr çhengey follit ec y lught shooyl dy chur joarree fud nyn geilley as y lught shooyl co-loayrt rish nyn geilley, agh ta trimmid ro-vooar currit er yn aght shen. Cha nel fys shickyr ayn mychione earroo ny loayreyderyn er oyr cooishyn sheshengoaylleeagh agh ta Ethnologue gooley dy vel eddyr 6,000 Sheltisheyryn ayns Nerin as 86,000 Sheltisheyryn er feie ny Cruinney.

Príomh Oifig Staidrimh na hÉireann:
She jantys reiltys ee Príomh Oifig Staidrimh na hÉireann (, Yernish son "Preeu Oik Staydraa Nerin") ta freggyrtagh ass y choontey-pobble ashoonagh ayns Pobblaght Nerin. Chammah's shen, t'ee çhaglym monney staydraa elley dys cooney dy hoyrt da'n reiltys. Chur y Slattys Staydraa 1993 y jantys go h-oikoil er bun, dys ny h-oikyn vel staydraa er nyn jaglym oc dy leodaghey. Ta'n oik freggyrtagh da'n Taoiseach as ta'n kione-cherroo soit ayns Corkee.

Yn Ghermaan Heear:
Ennym cadjin 'sy Ghaelg va currit er Pobblaght Chonastagh y Ghermaan ny PCG ee yn Ghermaan Heear () car y lhing eddyr y chrooaght eck ayns Mee Voaldyn 1949 gys aa-unnaneysey ny Germaan er 3 Jerrey Fouyir 1990. Haink jerrey lesh y lhing shen tra haink jerrey lesh y Ghermaan Hiar as tra ren y queig steatyn ayn unnaneysey rish Pobblaght Chonastagh ny Germaan. Er-yn-oyr shen, ta'n Ghermaan roie ny beaynaghey jeh Pobblaght Chonastagh ny Germaan roie-1990, as cha nel ee ny h-eiyrtyssagh.
Va'n Ghermaan Heear currit er bun ass un steat jeig va currit er bun ayns ny tree cryssyn cummaltys va freillt ec ny Steatyn Unnaneysit, y Rank, as y Reeriaght Unnaneysit ("ny Cryssyn Heear"). Va Bonn enmyssit myr y preeu-valley shallidagh. Va'n chiarroo chryss freillt fo cummaltys yn Unnaneys Soveidjagh. Va ny thallooyn çheu hiar jeh'n Oder-Neisse goit stiagh 'syn Unnaneys Soveidjagh as 'sy Pholynn cummynagh; haink er y chooid elley jeh'n çheer mygeayrt Berleen dy ve currit er enney myr Pobblaght Gheynlagh y Ghermaan.

Pobblaght pharlamaidagh:
Ta pobblaght pharlamaidagh ny pobblaght vunraghtoil pharlamaidagh çheet er sorçh dy phobblaght ta gobbraghey fo corys parlamaidagh. Ayns ny coryssyn shen cha nel anchaslys glen eddyr ny banglaneyn slattyssagh as kiannoortagh, agh ta anchaslys glen ayn eddyr kione y reiltys as kione y steat, as dy mennick ta'n kione reiltys goaill shelloo er y chummaght.

Pictish:
Ta Pictish jannoo cur sheese er y çhengey ny ny çhengaghyn marroo va goll er loayrt ec ny Pictee, sleih va cummal ayns twoaie as mean ny h-Albey car ny Mean Eashyn Leah. T'eh er enney dy row çhengey er lheh ayn 'sy Phictish as yn 'eanish ry-akin ayns "Historia ecclesiastica gentis Anglorum" liorish Beda 'sy 8-oo eash. 'Syn obbyr shen ta'n Phictish enmyssit er lheh myr çhengey va anchasley rish y Vretnish as y Çhenn Ghaelg.
Cha nel jarrooaghey jeeragh ny Pictish ayn son y chooid smoo, faagail magh kuse veg dy vuill-enmyn as enmyn deiney ta ry-gheddyn er lhiaghtyn cooinaghtyn as ny recortyssyn co-emshiragh 'syn ard va fo stiurey ec Reeriaght ny Pictee.
Va'n enmys "Pictish" ymmydit liorish Jackson (1955), as ren Forsyth (1997) ymmyd jeh ny s'anmey, son dy chur sheese er y çhengey va goll er loayrt çheu hwoaie jeh'n linney Keyllys-Y Cleayee ayns ny Mean Eashyn Leah. T'ad cur "Pritennish" son dy chur sheese er y çhengey Proto-Phictish va goll er loayrt 'syn ard shen car yn Eash Yiarn.

Nitassinan:
She thalloo ghooie hennayragh ny h-Innu ee Nitassinan (Innu-aimun son "Nyn Dhalloo"). Ta'n thalloo coodaghey yn chooid smoo jeh Labrador as shiar Québec, 'sy Chanadey. Ta'n Innu er ve cummal 'syn ard shen er feie daa villey bleeaney ny ny smoo. T'ad ny boodeeyssyn Innu smoo 'syn ard na Natuashish, Sheshatshiu, Pakut-shipu, Unamen-shipu, Nutashkuan, Ekuanitshit, Innu Takuaikan Uashat Mak Mani-Utenam, Pessamit, Essipit, Mashteuiatsh, Matimekush, as Kawawachikamach. Ec y traa t'ayn ta 17,000 Innu cummal ayns Nitassinan as ta'n chooid smoo jeu foast loayrt nyn jengey oc, as ee enmyssit "Innu-aimun" 'sy çhengey hene.

Norish:
Va'n Norish, ny yn Cheltish Hiar ny keayrtyn, ny çhengey Cheltiagh vooarheeragh. Cha nel feanish ayn jee agh ayns daa screeuyn brisht veih'n wheiggey Raueagh Noricum (fer ayns Grafenstein, yn Austeyr, as fer elley ayns Ptuj 'sy Clovean) as cha nel feanish dy liooar oc son dy chur briwnys er aght ny çhengey. Ansherbee, va'n çhengey cosoylagh rish ny çhengaghyn Celtiagh elley ry-laue, lheid as y Ghoalish. Er-yn-oyr nagh vel mooarane dy feanish ayn cha nel fys er date baaish ny çhengey.
Screeuyn Ptuj.
Ta screeuyn Ptuj, va feddynit magh 'sy vlein 1894, screeuit veih'n yesh gys y chlee 'syn abbyrlhit Iddaalagh shenndeeagh as t'eh ry-laih ayn na:
T'eh çhyndaait myr daa ennym persoonagh: "Artebudz" "Brogduos". Ta'n ennym "Artebudz" keeayllaghey, foddee, "bod maghouin", as s'foddee dy vel "Brogduos" goaill stiagh y meer "brog-, mrog-" "çheer". Er y laue elley, foddee dy vel y screeuyn çhyndaait myr "Artebudz" [eh shoh da "Brogdos", lesh y nah ennym 'sy chase toyrtagh.
Screeuyn Grafenstein.
Ta screeuyn Grafenstein, er sclate veih'n nah eash BNJ va feddynit ayns poyll shillee 'sy vlein 1977, neuslane, agh ta'n chooid ry-gheddyn er ny h-aascreeu myr shoh:
Ta "Moge" ayns shoh çheet er ennym persoonagh ny er aa-gherrid jeh ennym persoonagh, s'foddee, ta "P· II- lav" ny aa-gherrid Ladjynagh ta cowraghey meih, ta "ne sadiíes" ny chummey breearagh as s'foddee dy vel eh çheet er "cha nel oo soie/soiaghey", ta "ollo so" çheet er "y vooad shoh", as s'foddee dy vel "Lugnu" çheet er ennym persoonagh elley. Er-yn-oyr shen foddee dy vel y teks çheet er recortys jeh jannoo argidoil.
Ta tushtaghyn elley jeh'n screeuyn er ve currit roish, goaill stiagh:
as

Bree:
Ayns fishig, ta bree ny vooad. Dy cadjin, t'ad soilshaghey magh eh myr "jargaght dy yannoo obbyr fishigagh". Foddee bree ve ec breneen, nhee ny corys nheeghyn erbee myr eiyrtys y stayd fishigagh oc.
Ta cummaghyn bree goaill stiagh bree gleashiddagh, cummyssagh, çhermagh, ym-hayrnagh, sheeanagh, bree so-sheeney as goulraght vagnaidagh lectragh. Ren y fishigagh Germaanagh Hermann von Helmholtz fondaghey dy vel cummaghyn bree corrym rish y cheilley - foddee bree un chummey skellal roish, agh hig rish y mooad bree cheddin ayns cummey elley. Foddee oo gra dy vel bree biallagh da leigh freayltys rish traa. Cha nel bree so-chroo ny so-stroie.
Foddee cummey bree erbee goll er çhyndaa dys cummey elley. Mannagh vel eh bree çhermagh, foddee eh çhyndaa er fondid mie, ny eer lane fondid. Bentyn rish bree çhermagh, ta nah leigh çhiass-niartallaght lhiettal y fondid. Myr sampleyr, tra ta ooill aawoalley marish ocsygien, ta bree cummyssagh goll er seyrey, er y fa dy vel kianglaghyn kemmigagh noa çheet rish 'sy troaryn as adsyn ny smoo shassooagh na ny v'ayns yn ocsygien as ooill. Foddee oo jannoo lectraght jeh'n vree seyrey er fondid mie liorish cooilleeney yn aawoalley ayns killag conney. Er y laue elley, foddee oo jannoo bree çhermagh jeh liorish lostey yn ooill. Agh liorish shen, ta kuse jeh'n bree çhermagh goll er "leodaghey", as cha nel eh ry-gheddyn da obbyr elley ec yn un çhiassid; myr shen, t'eh ayn ayns cummey nagh nod oo çhyndaa dys cummey elley. Ny yei shen, foddee oo jannoo cummaghyn bree elley jeh'n vree çhermagh t'er mayrn. Ayns dagh obbyr çhyndaa bree, ta'n lane vooadys bree neuchaghlaaee. Hug ad roish y reill shoh leah 'sy 19oo eash. T'eh bentyn rish corys scarrit erbee. Rere çhoarym Noether, ta freayltys bree ny eiyrtys nagh vel leighyn fishigagh caghlaa rish y traa.
Ga nagh vel ard-sym bree ayns corys ennagh caghlaa rish y traa, ta'n feeu echey croghey er crauelagh cooilleeinee. Myr sampleyr, cha nel bree gleashiddagh erbee ec troailtagh ny hoie ayns eltan bentyn rish yn etlan; agh bentyn rish y thalloo, ta bree gleashiddagh echey, as myr shen, ard-sym bree ny smoo.
She mooad fishigagh scaillearagh eh bree. Rere Corys Unnidyn Eddyr-ashoonagh, t'ad towse bree ayns jouleyn, agh ayns magheryn ennagh t'ad jannoo ymmyd jeh unnidyn elley, myr sampleyr, kilowatt-ooryn as kilohiassanyn.

Coondaeghyn Hostyn:
Ta Sostyn er ny rheynn ayns 48 coondaeghyn jesh-chliaghtagh ny çheer-oaylleeagh. Ta shenn vun ec ymmodee jeu, agh hie fir elley er cur er bun cho anmagh as 1974.
Çheumooie jeh Lunnin Vooar as ny Skillee, ta Sostyn er ny rheynn ayns 83 coondaeghyn moirvaljagh as neuvoirvaljagh. T'adsyn ayn er son gurneilys ynnydagh, as ta fir jeu aarheynnit ayns ardjyn. T'ad rere ny coondaeghyn jesh-chliaghtagh, agh ta creeaghyn sloo oc son y chooid smoo.
Ta'n rang-oardraghey jeianagh ny eiyrtys aachroo brashagh. Eddyr 1889 as 1974, hug ad coondaeghyn reiragh er ynnydyn as coonseil choontae oc, as va meenaghey elley ec coondaeghyn jesh-chliaghtagh. Eddyr 1974 as 1996, va coondaeghyn moirvaljagh as neuvoirvaljagh corrym rish coondaeghyn jesh-chliaghtagh. Er son y phost, va coondaeghyn postagh ayn eddyr 1974 as 1996, agh lhig y Post Reeoil lhieu.

Coondaeghyn jesh-chliaghtagh Hostyn:
Ta coondaeghyn jesh-chliaghtagh Hostyn nyn ardjyn Hostyn as Çhiarn Aachaptan oc. T'ad er nyn meenaghey ec y reiltys myr "coondaeghyn as ardjyn er son y Lieutenancies Act 1997" bentyn rish coondaeghyn moirvaljagh as neuvoirvaljagh Hostyn. Ta ymmyd çheer-oaylleeaght jeant jeu dy mennick, as myr shen, t'ad cur coondaeghyn çheer-oaylleeagh orroo ny keayrtyn.
Caslys-çheerey.
Cha nel Ard-Valley Lunnin ry-akin
Meenaghey.
Ta'n Lieutenancies Act 1997 meenaghey coondaeghyn er son Aachaptanys rere ardjyn gurneilys ynnydagh crooit ec y Local Government Act 1972 lhiasit. Ga nagh vel yn ennym ry-akin 'sy Clattys hene, t'ad cur "Coondaeghyn Jesh-chliaghtagh" orroo. Rere Schedule 1, meer 2–5 lhiasit 2009, t'ad meenit: 

Blaa ny feoghaig:
She genus dy hey dooieyn 'sy chynney Apocynaceae ad blaaghyn ny feoghaig (Vinca). T'ad dooghyssagh da'n Europey, yn Affrick heear-hwoaie as yn Aishey hiar-yiass.
Jalloo-oaylleeaght.
She lus lussagh t'ayn. Ta gish snauee 1-2m er lhiurid oc, cha nel ny smoo na 20-70cm erskyn y thallooin. T'ad cur magh fraueyn dy mennick my t'ad bentyn rish y thalloo, as myr shen ta'n lus skeaylley dy lheead. Ta duillagyn sleeanagh dys oochrooagh piyral oc, mysh 1-9cm er lhiurid as 0.5-6cm er lheead. Ta kiare dooieyn sheer-ghlass, agh ta "V. herbacea" yn-lhoamey.
T'ad cur magh blaaghyn car ny bleeaney. T'ad jiarg-ghorrym son y chooid smoo, agh bane ny keayrtyn. Ta queig petyllyn kianglt ec y vun dys çhoob. She piyr dy 'alacailjyn eh y mess oc.

Galatish:
She çhengey Cheltiagh va goll er loayrt ayns Galatia 'syn Aishey Veg (y Turkee noa-emshiragh) ee Galatish. V'ee loayrit veih'n 3-oo eash RC derrey'n 4-oo eash BNJ. T'ee ny çhengey Cheltiagh vooarheeragh gollrish y Ghoalish.
Cha nel mooarane fys ain er y çhengey jiu er-lhimmey jeh focklyn ennagh as giare-choontyssyn liorish screeuderyn classicagh, as enmyn skeaylt er screeuyn. Rere ny feanishyn shen, cha nel agh mysh 120 focklyn ain, as y chooid smoo jeu nyn enmyn persoonagh ta goaill jerrey lesh -"riks" (cf. Goalish -"rix/"-"reix", Shenn Yernish "ri", Gothish -"reiks", Shenn Rankish "rik", Ladjyn "rex") "ree", fir elley ta goaill jerrey lesh -"marus", toyrtagh -"mari" (cf. Goalish -"maros", Shenn Yernish "mor", Bretnish "mawr") "mooar", as enmyn kynneeagh lheid as "Ambitouti" (Shenn Yernish "imm"- "ym-", Shenn Yernish "tuath" "theay"/"sleih"), myrane lesh y nhee focklagh "drunaimeton" "ynnyd cruinnaght" (cf. Shenn Yernish "drui" "druiaght", Shenn Yernish "neimed" "ynnyd noo").

Conamara:
She ard ayns sheear Nerin, eh Conamara (). T'eh jeant seose jeh lieh-innys lhean eddyr an Caoláire Rua as Cuan Chill Chiaráin ayns sheear Choontae ny Galliu. Dy mennick ta sleih ennagh cur Conamara er y slane ard soit çheu heear veih Caayr ny Galliu, agh she red meestiuragh eh shen. Cois Fharraige yn ennym ta currit er yn ard eddyr y chaayr as Casla, balley beg er coose jiass y choontae. Ta'n ennym "Conamara" çheet magh ass yn ennym kynneeagh "Conmhaícne Mara", banglane jeh'n chynney "Conmhaícne". Er-yn-oyr dy row y banglane shen cummal er laue ny marrey, v'ad enmyssit "Conmhaícne Mara" ny "Conmhaícne Marrey".
Çheer-oaylleeaght.
Ta Conamara ny lhie ayns ard "Iar Chonnacht", ny "Eear Chonnaghtey", thalloo ayns Coontae ny Galliu çheu heear veih Loch Coirib. Ta Conamara er ny rheynn dy tradishoonagh ayns daa ayrn - Conamara Hwoaie as Conamara Yiass. Ta ny sleityn Beanna Beola as Abhainn Ghlinne, ta stroo stiagh 'sy vooir ayns an Clochán, cowraghey yn joarey eddyr yn daa ayrn. Ta Conamara caglit da'n sheear, da'n jiass, as da'n twoaie liorish y Cheayn Sheear. Ta'n joarey thallooin lesh y chooid elley jeh Coontae ny Galliu cowrit liorish Abhainn Inbhear Mór (ta stroo jeeragh stiagh ayns twoaie Chuan Chill Chiaráin), Loch Úraid, (soit meeiley ny ghaa çheu heear veih'n Teach Dóite), as y dreeym heear jeh Sléibhte Mhám Toirc. Ayns twoaie ny sleityn, ta'n joarey çheet ry-cheilley rish y vooir ec an Caoláire Rua, meeiley ny ghaa sheear veih'n Líonán.
Ellanyn scanshoil.
<br>

Blaa ny ferrishyn:
Ta blaa ny ferrishyn çheet er lossreeyn 'sy ghenus "Silene", as er "Silene latifolia" as "Silene dioica" er lheh.

Silene:
She genus dy lossreeyn blaaghey eh Silene. Dy cadjin, ta sleih cur blaa ny ferrishyn er "Silene dioica" as "Silene latifolia", dooieyn cadjin 'syn Oarpey.
Jalloo-oaylleeaght.
Ta duillagyn neuchramp oc. Ta blaaghyn nyn lomarcan ny ayns crouwyn-blaaghey. Ta queig petyllyn oc as co-chrooaght lieh-chrantessenagh. 

Brattagh Lion:
Ta brattagh Lion jeant seose jeh claasagh Yernagh airhey er cooylrey geayney: er geayney claasagh airhey giall-argidagh strengit. Ta armys Lion cowrit er brattagh ny kiare queiggaghyn, myrane lesh ayns cummey jesheenagh ayns logo y fwirran ruggyr Leinster Rugby. Ta'n brattagh er ymmyd dy mennick myr cowrey yn ashoonaghys ayns Nerin as t'eh shassoo er son yn ellan er feie.

Dalrymple Maitland:
By ghelleyder as hirveishagh theayagh ass Mannin eh Dalrymple Maitland, BS (22 Mart 1848—25 Mart 1919). V'eh ny oltey 'sy Chiare as Feed veih'n vlein 1890, as ny Loayreyder er y Chiare as Feed veih'n vlein 1909, derrey'n laa baaish echey 'sy vlein 1919.
Rug Maitland ayns Lerphoyll, Sostyn, as by vac John Maitland, reagheyder y "Liverpool Mercury" eh. V'eh ynsit 'sy scoill Crescent Academy dy chooid Dr. Steele, as lurg shen ren eh gobbraghey 'sy thie dellal ec y naim echey. Hooar eh yn shelloo rere eiraght er yn "Liverpool Mercury", agh 'sy vlein 1887, nar hie eh stiagh 'sy theihll theayagh marish y naim echey, chreck eh ny mwyllinyn as ny thieyn dellal elley.
Lurg baase y naim echey v'eh kianglt rish ram oikyn theayagh as traghtee, as y chooid smoo jeu er ny ghoaill echey trooid eiraght. V'eh reiht myr OKF son Medall 'sy vlein 1890 as haink er dy ve ny Loayreyder ayns 1909. V'eh ayns shelloo yn oik shen derrey dirree eh magh ass oik 'sy vlein 1919, y vlein yerrinagh echey.
Haink er dy ve ny Vriw Shee ayns 1892 as dy ve Captan ny Skeerey son Skeerey Marooney ayns 1909. Myrane lesh shen by Chaairliagh Raaidyn-Yiarn Vannin, Cholught Paggad Gaal Ellan Vannin as Vanc Vannin.
Hooar Maitland baase tree laaghyn lurg y laa ruggyree echey tra v'eh 71 bleeaney d'eash rere geu-ghorley aadiugh 'sy valley ayns Mwyllin Doo Aah. V'eh oanluckit er 28 Mart 1919 ayns Skeerey Braddan. Hooar y ven heshee echey, Frances Caley, va poost rish veih 16 Mean Souree 1879, baase ayns 1891, tammylt beg lurg ruggyr yn un vac oc, John Dalrymple Maitland. Hooar eh shen baase er y vagher caggee car y Chied Chaggey Dowanagh ayns 1916.

Jack Nivison:
By pholitickeyr eh John "Jack" Allen Cowell Kennedy Nivison AIG BS (1910—5 Nollick 2003). V'eh ny eear-Eaghtyrane er y Choonseil Slattyssagh.
V'eh reiht da'n chied cheayrt myr OKF er son Medall 'sy vlein 1948, as haink er dy ve ny oltey jeh'n Choonseil Slattyssagh 'sy vlein 1962. Hannee eh myr oltey jeh'n Choonseil derrey dirree eh magh ass oik ayns 1988, as begnagh 40 bleeaney dy hirveish jeant echey. V'eh reiht myr y chied Eaghtyrane er y Choonseil Slattyssagh, as ren eh shirveish 'syn oik shen eddyr ny bleeantyn 1980 as 1988. Myrane lesh yn obbyr echey ayns seihll politickagh yn ellan, v'eh ny varrantagh as Chaptan ny Skeerey son Connaghyn.

Pamela Crowe:
She politickeyr Manninagh ee Pamela Mavis Crowe (r. 30 Mean Souree, 1943). Ec y traa t'ayn t'ee ny h-Oltey jeh'n Ard-Whaiyl (O.A.) ny as t'ee ny Caairliagh er Oik Postagh Ellan Vannin. Roish hie ee stiagh 'sy pholitickaght v'ee ny stiureyder er Crowes Ltd. as ny h-ughtar er shiartanse dy lioaryn, goaill stiagh "Rhymes of Mann", "Rhymes of Scotland" as "The Manx Scenic Cookbook". V'ee reiht myr OKF son Rosien ayns 1997, as v'ee ayns shelloo yn oik shen derrey v'ee reiht da'n Choonseil Slattyssagh ayns 2003. Ec y traa t'ayn, t'ee cummal ayns Purt Çhiarn.

John Senhouse Goldie-Taubman:
She politickeyr Manninagh va John Senhouse Goldie-Taubman BS (1838 - 9 Sauin 1898). V'eh ny OKF veih 1859 derrey 1898 as ny Loayreyder er y Chiare as Feed veih 1867 derrey 1898.
She mac shinney lesh John Taubman Goldie-Taubman as Ellen, inneen Humphrey Senhouse ass Netherhall Cumberland v'eh. V'eh ynsit ayns Colleish Eton. Nar va'n scoill creaghnit echey ayns 1856, hie eh magh troailtaghey. 'Sy vlein 1859 v'eh reiht myr oltey jeh'n Chiare as Feed - quaiyl hene-reiht ec y traa shen. 'Sy vlein 1867 v'eh reiht myr ynnydagh son Doolish as y whaiyl reiht nish liorish y phobble. V'eh reiht 'sy Chiare as Feed myr Loayreyder. Shass eh er son Doolish myr OKF as myr Loayreyder derrey laa e vaaish. Va'n ayr, y shennayr, as y shenn shennayr echey nyn Loayreyderyn er y Chiare as Feed chammah.

Northumberland:
She coontae jesh-chliaghtagh Hostyn as lught-reill unnaneagh eh Northumberland. T'eh soit ec shiar twoaie ny çheerey. Va'n coontae bunnit 'sy vlein 1974. She Morpeth yn ard-valley echey, neayr's 1981. T'eh çhemmit liorish Cumbria da'n çheear, Coontae Durham da'n jiass, Tyne as Wear da'n çhiar-yiass, as Creeaghyn ny h-Albey da'n twoaie. Ta slyst marrey aalid vooar echey. 
Myr Reeriaght Northumbria fo y Ree Edwin, lhean creeaghyn yn ard jeh'n Humber 'sy jiass da'n Awin Forth 'sy twoaie. Va shenn chreeaghyn y choontae goaill stiagh Balley Chashtal Noa, balley coontae tradishoonagh y choontae, as ardjyn Tyneside Hwoaie elley. Hie adsyn er livrey dys Tyne as Wear ayns 1974.
Er y fa dy vel eh er creeagh ny h-Albey as Sostyn, va Northumberland ynnyd ymmodee caggaghyn. She thalloo pairkyn ardey t'ayn, as t'adsyn fo coadey Pairk Ashoonagh Northumberland nish son y chooid smoo. She coontae Hostyn sloo y phobble echey t'ayn; cha nel agh 62 'sy chilomeader kerrinagh.

Peter Stallard:
She reireyder coloinagh Goaldagh va yn Reejerey Peter Hyla Gawne Stallard KCMG CVO MBE (1915—1995).
Eddyr 9 Mee ny Nollick 1961 as 11 Jerrey Souree 1966 v'eh ny Chiannoort er ny Hondooraghyn Goaldagh as eddyr 7 Mean Fouyir 1966 as 1974 v'eh ny Lhiass-chiannoort er Mannin.

Coontae Durham:
She coontae jesh-chliaghtagh Hostyn eh Coontae Durham (). Ta lught-reill unnaneagh echey myrgeddin, as eshyn ny sloo na'n coontae. T'eh soit ec shiar twoaie ny çheerey. Va'n coontae bunnit 'sy vlein 1974. She Durham yn ard-valley echey. T'eh çhemmit liorish Cumbria da'n çheear, Yorkshire Hwoaie da'n jiass, as Northumberland as Tyne as Wear da'n twoaie. T'eh soit 'syn ard Sostyn Hiar Hwoaie.

Tyne as Wear:
She coontae jesh-chliaghtagh Hostyn as coontae moirvaljagh eh Tyne as Wear. T'eh soit ec shiar twoaie ny çheerey. Va'n coontae moirvaljagh bunnit 'sy vlein 1974. Ta queig baljyn corpagh echey: Tyneside Yiass, Tyneside Hwoaie, Ard-valley Balley Chashtal Noa, Gateshead as Ard-valley Sunderland.
T'eh çhemmit liorish Northumberland da'n twoaie as Coontae Durham da'n jiass.

Yorkshire Hwoaie:
She coontae moirvaljagh ayns Yorkshire as y Humber eh Yorkshire Hwoaie. T'eh soit ec shiar twoaie ny çheerey. Va'n coontae jeianagh bunnit 'sy vlein 1974. She Northallerton yn ard-oik reiragh echey, agh she York eh y preeu-valley jesh-chliaghtagh. T'eh çhemmit liorish Cumbria da'n çheear hwoaie, Lancashire da'n çheear yiass, Yorkshire Heear as Treen Hiar Yorkshire da'n jiass, as Coontae Durham da'n twoaie.
Ta coontae jesh-chliaghtagh smoo Hostyn ayn myrgeddin, 'syn ard cheddin son y chooid smoo, agh goaill stiagh kuse dy Hostyn Hiar Hwoaie.

John Raymond Kniveton:
She politickeyr Manninagh eh John Raymond Kniveton (r. 5 Boaldyn, 1933). Rug eh ayns Kione Droghad, Mannin as v'eh ynsit ayns Ard-Scoill Ghoolish. Ren eh gobbraghey ayns Banc NatWest as hie eh stiagh 'sy Çhirveish Aer Reeoil roish haink er dy ve ny Stiureyder Reirey er Tours (Isle of Man) as ny stiureyder er Mwyllinyn Ghlion Laksaa. V'eh ny oltey jeh Barrantee Chonnaghyn eddyr 1989 as 1995. V'eh reiht da'n Chiare as Feed son Connaghyn ayns 1994. 'Sy vlein 1998 v'eh yrjit gys y Choonseil Slattyssagh, raad ren eh shirveish derrey 2005.

Lancashire:
She coontae neuvoirvaljagh ayns Sostyn Heear Hwoaie eh Lancashire. T'eh soit ec sheear twoaie ny çheerey. Ta bun shennaghyssagh echey, agh aachroo ad creeaghyn y choontae ayns 1974, lesh goaill magh Lerphoyll as Manchuin as ny h-ardjyn oc dys croo Merseyside as Manchuin Vooar. She Lancaster y balley coontae echey, agh she Preston eh y balley reiragh. T'eh çhemmit liorish Cumbria da'n twoaie, Manchuin Vooar as Merseyside da'n jiass, as Yorkshire Heear as Yorkshire Hwoaie da'n çhiar.
Ta coontae jesh-chliaghtagh Hostyn Lancashire ayn myrgeddin, as eshyn ny sloo na'n choontae neuvoirvaljagh.

Arthur William Moore:
She screeudeyr shennaghys, çhengoayllee, as politickeyr Manninagh va Arthur William Moore CVO LKF BS MA (6 Toshiaght Arree, 1853 - 12 Sauin, 1909). She Loayreyder y Chiare as Feed v'eh eddyr 1898 as laa e vaaish 'sy vlein 1909. Myrane lesh y choorse politickagh echey, va sym as paart mooar echey ayns cooishyn Gaelgagh, as she bunneyder y Çheshaght Ghailckagh v'eh. Screeu eh fo'n ghiare-ennym A. W. Moore. 
Seihll.
Rug eh ayns Strooan y Chrink, Skeerey Braddan, Mannin. She mac lesh William Fine Moore OKF as Hannah Christian v'eh as v'eh jeh'n sluight fuilleeaght veih Illiam Dhone. V'eh ynsit ayns scoillyn preevadjagh ayns Doolish as ayns scoill aarlagh ayns Weybridge, Surrey 'Sy vlein 1867, as eh 14 bleeaney d'eash, hie eh stiagh 'sy scoill ayns Rugby School as 'sy vlein 1872 hie eh stiagh ayns Colleish ny Trinaid, Cambridge. Lurg shen, ren eh cooney yn ayr echey ayns reireydys y thie obbree va cur eaddagh shiaullee ry-cheilley. Dirree eh 'sy thie obbree lurg baase e ayr ayns ny hoghtadyn. She sporteyr mooar v'eh chammah, as eh ny 'er gorrym ayns Cambridge, ny ymmyrtagh lheiltagh, as ny vunneyder er Club Criggad Strooan y Chrink. Ghow eh y slane costys er cummey as greighey yn chlub ersyn hene, myrane lesh soiaghey yn thalloo.
Lurg haink jerrey lesh y thie obbree rere cleayney ny baataghyn gaal, hie eh stiagh 'sy Cholught Paggad Gaal myr stiureyder, as v'eh ny stiureyder er Colught Bancagh Ellan Vannin.
Phoose Moore rish Elizabeth Wynn, 'neen Ard-Jaghin Vannin yn arrymagh Joshua Hughes-Games, er 24 Toshiaght Arree 1887. Va kiare paitçhyn oc - Helena Christian Wynn Moore (r. 1888), Margery Christian Moore (r. 1889), William Arnold Christian Moore (1893 - 1894), as Arthur Hughes Games Christian Moore.
Coorse screeuee.
Rolley obbraghyn.
Shoh rolley neuslane jeh ny h-obbraghyn echey:

Yorkshire Heear:
She coontae moirvaljagh ayns Yorkshire as y Humber eh Yorkshire Heear. T'eh soit ec twoaie ny çheerey. Ta bun echey ayns shenn Treen Heear Yorkshire, agh aachroo ad creeaghyn y choontae ayns 1974. She Wakefield eh y balley reiragh as preeu-valley tradishoonagh. Ta queig baljyn corpagh moirvaljagh echey: Ard-Valley Bradford, Ard-Valley Wakefield, Ard-Valley Leeds, Calderdale as Kirklees. T'eh çhemmit liorish Lancashire da'n çheear hwoaie, Yorkshire Hwoaie da'n çhiar hwoaie, Manchuin Vooar da'n çheear yiass, Yorkshire Yiass da'n çhiar yiass, as Derbyshire da'n jiass. Ta'n coontae ny choontae jesh-chliaghtagh Hostyn myrgeddin.

Niue:
She ashoon ellanagh 'sy Cheayn Sheealtagh Jiass eh Niue (Niuē: Niuē). Dy mennick, t'eh er enney myr "Creg y Pholaneesey", as ta'n pobbyl dooie enmyssey eh "y Chreg". Ta Niue ny hoie 2,400 km (1,500 mi) çheu hiar hwoaie veih'n Teelynn Noa ayns troorane eddyr y Tongey da'n sheear yiass, Samoa da'n sheear hwoaie, as Ellanyn Cook da'n shiar yiass. T'eh 260 kilometeryn kerrinagh (100 mi ker) er eaghtyr as ta mysh 1,400 deiney cummal ayn, y chooid smoo jeu nyn Bolaneesee. She Alofi, balley beg ayns sheear yn ellan, y preeu-valley.
Ga dy vel Niue ny heer hene-reiltagh, ta staydys seyr-chianglt eddyr eh as y Teelynn Noa, as lesh shen cha nel slane seyrsnys echey. She Ree Çhalse III y kione-steat. Ta'n chooid smoo jeh'n vooinjerys eddyr-ashoonagh stiurit liorish y Teelynn Noa er son Niue.

Treen Hiar Yorkshire:
She slyst gurneilys ynnydagh ayns Yorkshire as y Humber as stayd lught-reill unnaneagh echey eh Treen Hiar Yorkshire. T'eh soit ec shiar hwoaie ny çheerey. Ta shenn vun echey myr shenn choontae Hostyn marish Treen Heear Yorkshire as Treen Hwoaie Yorkshire, agh aachroo ad y choontae ayns 1974 myr ayrn jeh coontae neuvoirvaljagh Humberside, derrey aachroo elley ayns 1996. She Beverley eh y balley reiragh. T'eh çhemmit liorish Lincolnshire da'n hiass, Yorkshire Hwoaie da'n twoaie, as Yorkshire Yiass da'n çhiar yiass. Ta'n coontae ny choontae jesh-chliaghtagh Hostyn myrgeddin, as er son shen t'eh goaill stiagh y lught-reill unnaneagh Kingston upon Hull.

Far-skeealaght Ghothagh:
Ta far-skeealaght Ghothagh ny shaanrey Romansagh Europagh. T'eh goaill stiagh troyn far-skeealaght ghraih as scoaghagh. T'eh kianglt rish seyrnaght vean-eashagh as seyrnaght Aavioghey Ghothagh: ghow screeudeyryn breeaghys jeh shenn troggalyn as tholtanyn, as haghyr ny skeealyn ayns cashtallyn as mannishteryn, as limmeryn follit, cooyllyn troggee as nyn lheid oc. V'ad kiangley ny troggalyn dorraghey shoh rish folliaghtyn, drogh haghyrtyn as reddyn neughooghyssagh. 
Va bun ec ny ta shin cur "far-skeealaght Ghothagh" er nish ayns obbyr Horace Walpole, "The Castle of Otranto". She y cashtal hene eh bun y skeeal, ny troggal cartageagh t'er n'aase far-enney, faggys, rish ny h-eashyn. Ta caggeydeyr y skeeal soit er beaynaghey e chlein e hene, as cha nel eh tayrn er ash eer veih egin ben. Ta'n skeeal soilshaghey magh ny kianglaghyn eddyr fuilleeaght as thalloo ny sleih ooasley ayns cooish chassit.
Dy cadjin, ta ny skeealyn ard-haghyrtagh as ceautagh. Ta scaanyn, dorraghys, baase, baanrid, fioghys, folliaghtyn as mollaghtyn eiraghtagh ayndaue dy mennick.
Shennaghys.
Noaskeealaght as cremeydys romanseeaght.
Haink magh y noaskeeal "rieughee" leah 'sy 18oo eash myr aawoalley da'n romanseeaght tradishoonagh va çhiarnyssagh neayr's jerrey'n 17oo eash. Hoilshee magh Daniel Defoe, Samuel Richardson as Henry Fielding dy row yn obbyr oc noa as bentyn da bea jeianagh liorish eddyr-scarrey eh veih "romanseeaght" shenn-emshiragh neuheiltagh. Ren Richardson caartrey ben-eniee liorish gra dy vel ad lhiah far-skeealyn romanseeagh; myr shen, dy vel ad nyn nyummaltee-traa as sheiltynee. Hug Fielding kied chabdil lioar 8 "Hom Jones" da grinderys er ymmyd reddyn yindyssagh ayns far-skeealaght. Ren ad ymmyd jeh "noaskeeal" bentyn da'n obbyr oc: cummey noa dy 'ar-skeealaght, ny smoo so-chredjal as jeianagh, cooie da eash toiggalagh. Chowree ad eieyn Aristotle as Horace myr bun er son caartrey romanseeaght, er y fa dy row adsyn shassoo er cosoylaght er son ynsagh as sharaghey moralaght.
Va'n cremeydys shoh er daa vun. Er yn un laue, honnick ad romanseeaght myr eiyrtys Chatoaleaghys Raueagh, as kyndagh rish y Toilsheraght as yn Aachummey Sostnagh, va shen neuchooie. Myr sampleyr, ayns goan foslee da "Roderick Random", screeu Tobias Smollett: 
Va'n argane elley rere'n eie dy nee ynsaghey eh ard-ymmyd skeealaght, dys jannoo lhaihderyn aarloo da bea. Myr shen, er lhieu dy row romanseeaght ny red ass cummey yinnagh y lhaihder neuaarloo da bea 'syn 'eer teihll. Va'n argane shoh rere "Don Quixote" skitt er romanseeaght reejeroil myr "Amadis de Gaula". Agh dy cadjin, cha row ny briwnyssyn shen jeant er bun lettyraght roish y 17oo eash, agh er romanseeaght Rangish ennoil myr Le Grand Cyrus liorish Madeleine de Scudéry as Cassandre liorish La Calprenède. Dy jarroo, cha row taghyrtyn neughooghyssagh ayndaue son y chooid smoo, agh v'ad yn-enneydagh liorish focklaghey ellynagh, cohaghyrtyn ass towse, mestey shennaghys as far-skeealaght, as treanid erskyn credjue. 
Gyn scansh da lheid y taishbyney, cha row scarrey baghtal ayn eddyr noaskeealaght as romanseeaght, ny cosoylaght as neuchosoylaght. Ta "Clarissa" liorish Richardson goaill stiagh pryssoonaght as baanrid gollrish obbraghyn ard-haghyrtagh Nicholas Rowe. Ta reayrt ayns "Ferdinand Count Fathom", liorish Smollett, as yn Eearley goit ayns thie roosteyryn marish corp marroo, ta bun reayrt cosoylagh rish ayns "The Monk". Hug cremeyderyn s'anmey moylley da myr ard-hampleyr scoagh dooghyssagh, agh cha row noaskeealee aarloo dy gholl harrish y dooghyssagh as resoonagh foast. Haink magh "The Castle of Otranto" myr doolane da'n cair-chredjue shoh. Er lesh Walpole dy row cosoylaght lhiettal far-skeealaght: ""ta cooid share sheiltynys er nyn stangey liorish lhiantyn rish bea cadjin"". Loght eh cliaghtaghyn screeuee Hamuel lhiann rish reddyn dooghyssagh. Va Samuel Johnson er screeu art dardjee ny cliaghtaghyn shoh dys reillyn moralagh: dys ynsaghey sleih aegey (ard-ymmyd skeealaght, er lesh) begin da far-skeealaght ""taishbyney bea 'sy feer stayd echey, gyn caghlaa agh liorish taghyrtyn laaoil y teihill, as fo cummaght ennaghtyn as quallidyn ta ry-akin dy feer liorish ainjys deiney."" Er lesh dy va skeealyn nyn sampleyryn ymmyrkey da sleih, as mannagh row eh er skeeal lhiantyn rish firrinys, begin da taishbyney sampleyr fondalys deiney. Ny nagh dod shin credjal, cha nod eh ve sampleyr dooin. Ren Walpole beg jeh'n reill shoh: ayns "The Castle of Otranto", ta kerraghey Yee roshtyn eirey far-ghoaillagh liorish scaanjoon jymmoosagh as meeryn dy phlaaitail buillvollee. Cha nod shen ve ny lessoon moralagh er son bea er chor erbee. Myr dooyrt Walpole hene, ta bun-cheeal y skeeal: ""dy vel peccaghyn ny ayraghyn goll er kerraghey er y chloan dys y trass as y chiarroo heeloghe"", as cha nel eh feer ymmydoil. V'eh fo cur taitnys da sleih, cha nel lessoonyn. Tra ghow eh rish dy nee eshyn ughtar y skeeal, hoilshee eh dy row eh fo mestey ""y daa horçh romanseeaght: shenn as jeianagh"", as cur ry-cheilley taghyrtyn ard-yindyssagh as ymmyrkey deiney cosoylagh. V'eh cur trimmid er yn eie dy vel noaskeealaght ny sorçh dy romanseeaght, gyn scansh da'n rieughid echey as aggyrtys ny h-ughtaryn. Chammah's shen, v'eh goaill stiagh eieyn ny condaigee: v'eh fosyn ""jannoo seyr obbraghyn sheiltynys dys croo soiaghyn ny smoo anaasagh"", agh ""stiurey jantee deiney y skeeal rere reillyn cosoylaght; dy giare, dy chur orroo smooinaghtyn, loayrt as jannoo ny yinnagh deiney as mraane cadjin mastey taghyrtyn neuchadjinagh"". V'eh jannoo eab dy ghoaill stiagh cooishyn ard-haghyrtagh as neughooghyssagh lesh soilshaghey as coloayrtys najooragh. 'Syn aght cheddin as ghow stiagh noaskeealaght cowraghyn romanseeaght, va Walpole gobbraghey er bun far-skeealaght rieughee as ennaghtagh.
Aavioghey romanseeaght.
Haink magh daa obbyr scanshoil shennaghys lettyraght beggan roish "The Castle of Otranto": "Observations on the Faerie Queene of Spenser" liorish Thomas Warton as "Letters on Chivalry and Romance" liorish Richard Hurd. V'ad cur trimmid er y scansh leagh y chur er romanseeaght mean-eashagh myr troar ny h-eashyn as sheshaghtyn v'ayn. She Hurd hug "Romanseeaght Ghothagh" er y troa noa. Er lesh, foddee, dy row ""red ennagh 'sy Romanseeaght Ghothagh cooie er lheh da baght ard-cheeayllagh as dean bardaght"". Dys fendeil far-skeealaght Ghothagh, chosoylee eh seyrnaght Ghothagh as Greagagh. 
Er bun studeyrys shennaghys Palaye Noo "Mémoires de l'Ancienne Chévalerie", hug Hurd argane lajer dy row lettyraght Ghothagh ny cummey ellynagh cho fondagh as ellyn Greagagh, rere'n coheks eck. Hass Hurd noi'n eie dy row romanseeaght ny Shee gyn feeu er y fa dy row ee erskyn cosoylaght. Hug eh trimmid er yn eie nagh row bardyn shirrey er sleih credjal ny screeu ad, agh cur orroo sheiltyn eh er son taitnys. Ren eh geddyr-scarrey credjue ny theay, nyn mun as breeaghys da skeealaght as bardaght, as credjue y lhaihder hene. Er lesh nagh row feme er y fer s'jerree: ""tra ta ny theay er y çheu echey, as ta bun ayns credjue ny h-eash echey da'n çheiltynys echey, t'eh lhiggey harrish y lhaihder as lhiggey da'n lhaihder ve wheesh meechredjallagh as wheesh ouryssagh as s'taittin lesh."" Dooyrt eh myrgeddin nagh row kuse dy hropeyn romanseeaght wheesh do-chredjal as shen; myr sampleyr, va mraane caggee ry-akin ayns ny h-eashyn shen, as va sheshaghtyn caggee erskyn towse ry-akin 'sy Chroshaid.
Liorish goaill rish dy row dooghys er lheh ec lettyraght Ghothagh, haink yn eie dy row mieyn e hene eck. Hug roish Warton as Hurd dy row yn eash Ghothagh cooie er lheh da sheiltynys, er y fa hene dy row eh barbaragh, as dy row beasaght yn eash jeianagh er goayl breeaghys bardoil. Dy feer, er lesh Hurd dy row yn eash Ghothagh ny share myr bun bardaght as far-skeealaght na'n eash Ghreagagh. Haink rish Bunneydaght, gleashaght ren arganeys noi y çhenn hickyrys dy row beasaghey y red cheddin as shareaghey. Lesh goaill rish dy row red ennagh caillt liorish beasaghey y teihill, haink rish yn eie dy row eh er sleih jeianagh ynsaghey jeh ny shenn eashyn neuveasagh as geiyrt orroo. Ayns 1765, hoilshee magh James Macpherson "shenn obbraghyn Ossian çhyndaait ass y Ghaelg Albinagh", agh s'cosoylagh dy nee eh obbyr eh hene v'ayn son y chooid smoo, goaill stiagh eieyn jeh beeal-arrish as arraneyn ny h-Albey. Va cummaght mooar as lheead ec yn obbyr shen, er lheid ny screeudeyryn as Walter Scott, János Arany, Goethe as Herder. Screeu Goethe as Herder bardaght "Ossianagh" rish y cheilley. Va ard-vian ec sleih er feer shenn vard Nordagh, as ram anaase oc er shenn reddyn, reddyn dorraghey as neuhoilsheydagh. Chroo y ghleashaght shen çhymbyllaght chooie da aavioghey romanseeaght Ghothagh. 
Ren Warton as Hurd myrgeddin argane dy row lheid yn 'ar-skeealaght ny scaa streeu brastyllagh ny h-eash, raad va çhiarnyn tranlaasagh nyn voawir ayns cashtallyn, as ny shirveishee oc nyn roosteyryn as fir oaldey. 'Syn aght cheddin, ayns "Otranto" ta fansee mooadit ny eiyrtys drogh-ymmyd pooar. Va cremeydys elley bentyn rish cummaght Chatoaleaght Raueagh er romanseeaght. Er lesh sleih dy nee noaskeealaght ouryssagh y cummey cooie da cultoor toiggalagh Protestoonagh. Myr shen, haink corree er kuse dy 'leih liorish feddyn magh dy row "Otranto" ny skeeal jeieanagh, cha nel ny hyndaa ass shenn skeeal. Ny s'anmey, ver lhee stiagh Radcliffe "neughooghyssaght yn-hoilshaghey" dys aachoardail meechredjue Protestoonagh as graih scoagh scaanjoonagh. 
Fallsoonys ooashlaght.
Ayns 1674, ren Boileau çhyndaa traaght Longinus "Peri hupsous" er "aght mooar screeuee" ta greesaghey irree lajer. Haink yn eie shen y ve cummaghtagh, as ghow sleih toshiaght jannoo ymmyd jeh'n eie chlassicagh shoh noi eieyn classicagh elley, goaill stiagh mimesis (eiyrt er najoor). Rere'n "aght mooar screeuee", foddee ughtaryn goaill stiagh neughooghyssaght as reddyn ard-yindyssagh dys greinnaghey ennaghtyn gleashagh. Haink rish "Scoill Ruillick" bardaght Hostnagh, goaill stiagh William Cowper as Thomas Gray, screeu er marvaanaght as baase. Hug lheid ny h-obbraghyn folliaghtyn, scoagh as yindys noi resoonaghys y 18oo eash.
Ren y Scoill Ruillick ymmyd jeh blass faasechredjueagh dys cur eieyn marvaanys er y lhaihder gyn taishbyney "feer" scaanjoonyn. Ayns 1757, hug magh Edmund Burke "A Philosophical Enquiry into the Origin of Our Ideas of the Sublime and Beautiful" bentyn rish yn eie cheddin. Er lesh nagh row gleashaght ennaghtagh cooie ynrican, agh femoil da aigney as corp. Ta ennaghtyn lajer, as scoagh erskyn ooilley, gooraghey feayr-chooish aigney as cummal seose aigney sunt. Va'n eie cheddin, dy nee scoagh eh ard-ghean skeealaght, ny vreeaghys da Walpole. Va bun ec obbyr Vurke as Walpole myrgeddin ayns dreeys as saieid sheshaght hraghtee ny h-eash, as mian ny theay er reddyn noa as greesaghey ellynagh. Ny yei shen, cha daink lesh ughtaryn y ghenre noa noi condaigys lettyraght 'ondid rish tammylt. Myr sampleyr, cha hoie ad monney jeh "The Bard" liorish Ghray, lane dy neughooghyssaght as bunneydaght. Haink lesh obbraghyn "Ossian" er y fa dy lhig yn ughtar er dy nee shenn obbyr v'ayn, as tra dooar ad magh nagh nee, haink cremeydys er. Foddee dy row laue ec cremedys "The Bard" 'sy lhiggey-er shen.
Hyndaa Walpole dys drama, agh cha hoilshee magh eh yn obbyr noa, "The Mysterious Mother" dy foshlit; er lesh dy row bun-chooish y skeeal, croaiaght vayrey, ro-ghraney myr ayrn cuirraghan as erskyn aa-eaysley moralagh erbee.
