Ansherbee, hie yn sorçh d'ynsagh shen er ny lhaggaghey mygeayrt y vlein 1872. Va'n staydys er ny vroojey liorish y Clattys Ynsee 1872 tra va corys dy ynsagh ashoonagh currit er bun. Ga nagh row feme er ny scoillyn jannoo ynsaghey trooid y Vaarle, cha ren ny scoillyn jannoo nyn ynsaghey trooid y Ghaelg, agh trooid y Vaarle. Hie yn corys shen er ny niartaghey rere y Clattys Ynsee 1892.
Agh ga nagh row scansh currit er y Ghaelg ayns ny scoillyn as ny kialteenyn ny smoo, cha row lhiettalys currit er cur magh reddyn 'sy Ghaelg, as ad cur cooney da'n aavioghey ayns ny bleeantyn s'anmey. 'Sy vlein 1804 hie "A Practical Grammar of the Antient Gaelc; or Language of the Isle of Mann, Usually Called Manks" ("Lioar Grammeydys ny Gaelgey") er ny chur magh liorish yn Arrymagh John Kelly. Va shalee echey fockleyr tree-hengagh dy chur magh 'sy vlein 1805, agh va'n lioar scrysst ayns aile 'syn oik prental. 'Sy vlein 1822 hie "Banglanyn y Chredjue Chreestee" magh liorish y Prayer-book and Homily Society as ayns 1835 hie "A Dictionary of the Manx Language" er ny chur magh liorish Archibald Cregeen (1774 - 1841), fockleyr ta coontit dys y laa t'ayn myr nane jeh ny fockleyryn smoo scanshoil 'sy Ghaelg.
'Sy nah lieh jeh'n 19oo eash v'eh so-leayr ec pohllderyn y chultoor Manninagh dy row yn cultoor shen ayns gear-ghaue fo cleayney yn arraghey stiagh veih Sostyn, as ayns Toshiaght Arree 'sy vlein 1858 ren fir jeu cur er bun sheshaght ry hoi cur magh, ny aa-chur magh dagh red bentyn rish shennaghys as cultoor yn ellan fo'n ennym "The Manx Society for Publication of National Documents" ny "The Manx Society". Harrish ny 25 bleeantyn va'n çheshaght gobbraghey, ren ee cur magh 33 ym-lioaryn bentyn rish Mannin, as clouyn elley goaill stiagh "Recortyssyn Reeaghyn Vannin as ny h-Ellanyn" (1859-60), y "Fockleyr Manninagh as Baarlagh" liorish Juan y Kelly v'er ny reaghey ec yn Arrymagh William Gill (1866), çhaglym jeh shennocklyn, raaghyn, bannagyn, a.r.e fo'n ennym "Mona Miscellany" (1869), aa-chur magh "A Practical Grammar of the Antient Gaelc" liorish John Kelly (1870), as "Coontey-Ghiare jeh Ellan Vannin, ayns Gailck" v'er ny chur magh ec y Çheshaght 'sy vlein 1872, agh v'er ny screeu ec Joseph Bridson mygeayrt y vlein 1760. Ansherbee, ayns ny bleeantyn jeianagh jeh'n çheshaght hie ee er ny sheebey, as 'sy vlein 1908 haink jerrey lesh y çheshaght. Va ny lioaryn, clouyn, docamadyn as nyn lheid astreeit gys y Thie Tashtee Manninagh as Treishteilee ny Lhiaghtyn Shenndeeagh.
Agh gyn y wooise da obbyr y Manx Society, va earroo ny Gaelgeyryn foast tuittym, as v'eh shen ry-akin ayns ny staydraa: ny smoo na 12,300 Gaelgeyryn ayns ny 1870yn leah, agh ny sloo na 5,000 Gaelgeyryn ec toshiaght y 20oo eash. Dirree garrey son çheshaght Ghaelgagh car y lhing shen, as fo yerrey va'n Çheshaght Ghailckagh currit er bun 'sy vlein 1899 ry hoi freayltys as ardjaghey yn Ghaelg.
Yn 20oo eash.
S'foddee yn 20-oo eash dy vrishey sheese ayns daa rheynn 'sy ghleashaght aavioghey. Ren y chied rheynn 'sy ghleashaght shen sheeyney veih bunneeaght y Çheshaght Ghailckagh ayns 1899 gys ny 1920yn tra ren Mona Douglas cur Aeglagh Vannin er bun as tra va Caarjyn Vannin currit er bun. Ren y nah rheynn sheeyney veih ny 1970yn gys y laa t'ayn nish, lesh staydys oikoil ec y Ghaelg, bunscoillyn Gaelgagh, as nyn lheid. Va'n chied rheynn kianglt rish freayltys y Ghaelg myr çhengey ashoonagh as bio yn Ellan as, dy kinjagh, va Gaelgeyryn dooghyssagh ayn ayns ny bleeantyn shen rere ny coontaghyn-pobble. Ansherbee, va'n nah rheynn 'sy ghleashaght aavioghey kianglt rish pohlldal y Ghaelg as yn aalaanaghey eck.
'Sy chied lieh jeh'n 20oo eash va anaase mooar ec ram deiney ayns dagh red Gaelgagh, goaill stiagh y çhengey hene. Son dy chooney lesh yn aavioghey hie "First Lessons in Manx" liorish Edmund Goodwin er ny chur magh 'sy vlein 1901. 'Sy vlein shen va 59 Gaelgeyryn un-çhengagh foast ayn er yn Ellan, myrane lesh 4,419 Gaelgeyryn elley. Agh v'eh so-leayr ec graihderyn y Ghaelg dy row yn çhengey geddyn baase. Ny deiney nagh row jargal lhiettalys dy chur er eh shen, ren ad stiurey nyn eabyn oc ayns troaghyn Gaelgagh elley lheid as clubyn aegey, kiaull, a.r.e. Ayns 1921 haink y Cohaglym Celtiagh gys yn Ellan marish Douglas Hyde, chied Eaghtyrane Nerin. 'Sy vlein 1924 va'n Chruinnaght Vanninagh Ashoonagh currit er bun ec William Cubbon. Ansherbee, gyn y wooise da ny h-eabyn v'ec ny deiney shen 'sy traa shen, cha row Gaelgeyryn un-hengagh da'n chied cheayrt er yn ellan rere y choontey-pobble ayns 1921, as cha row agh 529 Gaelgeyryn ayns 1931.
Eddyr yn obbyr shen ayns ny 1920yn as ny 1970yn cha daghyr monney ayns aavioghey yn çhengey. Va ny kied recortyssyn rheaymyssagh jeant jeh'n çhengey 'sy vlein 1933 liorish yn Olloo Carl J. S. Marstrander veih'n Rheynn Cheltiagh ayns Ollooscoill Oslo, Ren Coimisiún Béaloideasa Éireann ("Commishoon Beeal-Arrish Nerin") (1948) as y Manx Museum Folklife Survey (1949-51) jannoo straih jeh recortyssyn jeh ny Gaelgeyryn jerrinagh. 'Sy vlein 1952 ren Douglas C. Fargher (1926 - 1987) guee er sleih Vannin 'sy phabyr-naight "Mona's Herald" raad screeu eh:
Ga dy dooar y Gaelgeyr jerrinagh, Ned Maddrell, baase 'sy vlein 1974, va'n anaase 'sy Ghaelg er ny vleaystey veih toshiaght ny 1970yn, as 'sy vlein 1976 va Clubyn Gaelgagh currit er bun ayns scoillyn ennagh. 'Sy vlein 1979 hie yn fockleyr Baarle-Gaelg liorish Douglas C. Fargher er ny chur magh, y chied fockleyr Gaelgagh jeh'n 20-oo eash. Myrane lesh y çhengey, va anaase mooar ry-akin ayns kuse vooar dy reddyn Gaelgagh, lheid as y chiaull Vanninagh, y daunse Manninagh as reddyn elley lheid as shen. 'Sy vlein 1977 va Feailley Vanninagh Rhumsaa reaghit ec Mona Douglas, feailley v'er kelloorey dagh red bentyn rish y tradishoon Gaelgagh. Va'n feailley aachummit blein ny lurg shen son dy 'reayll tradishoon y Chruinnaght Vanninagh Ashoonagh va currit er bun ayns ny 1920yn. Agh, 'sy chooish shoh, v'ee aachummit myr y Chruinnaght as ee ny feailley queig-laa as Eddyr-Cheltiagh nish.
Hie taghyrtyn bentyn rish y Ghaelg er oaie dy tappee ayns ny 1980yn as ny 1990yn. Va bunneydys yn ynsaghee as y staydys oikoil ec y Ghaelg currit sheese ayns ny 1980yn, as 'sy vlein 1982 va teisht y GCE O Level scruit da'n Ghaelg, ga dy row'n aarlagh jee er n'gheddyn ayns brastylyn fastyragh. Va enney nish ec ny lughtyn-reill as va feme ec ny h-ynseyderyn sheshaght, bing ny corpane oikoil dy chur er bun da femeyn y voodeeys Gaelgagh, lheid as soilsheanyn, fockleyryn, termeeaght noa, a.r.e., dy chur er oaie as er bun. 'Sy vlein 1985 va Coonceil ny Gaelgey, fo-ving jeh Undinys Eiraght Vannin as bing slattyssagh jeh'n Reiltys, currit er bun ry hoi kiarail enmyssyn da rheynnyn reiltyssagh, enmyn straidey, as crooaght focklyn as abbyrtyn noa.
Ayns ny 1990yn hie yn ghleashaght er troa noa, as ynsagh trooid y Ghaelg ayns aignaghyn ec ny paraantyn. Va'n Chied Chesmayd, possan cloie va currit er bun liorish paraantyn son dy chiarail çhymmyltaght raad dy row yn Ghaelg goll er loayrt mastey ny paitçhyn, currit er bun. Son dy chur co-oardraghey 'syn ynnyd ynsee, ren y reiltys cur y chied Manx Language Officer, ny Oaseir Gailckagh, er bun, oik noa fo currym y Rheynn Ynsee, as by eh Brian Stowell y chied oikagh. 'Sy vlein cheddin va'n Ghaelg currit stiagh ayns ny scoillyn da'n chied cheayrt, ga nagh row egin ayn, as 'sy vlein 1997 va'n Teisht Chadjin Ghaelgagh currit ayns ynnyd y GCE O Level (cochorrym rish y GCSE). As, ec jerrey yn villey-bleeaney, ayns 1998 va Phil Gawne, fer mooar ayns skeeal y Ghaelg, pointit myr y Greinneyder, oik noa fo currym Undinys Eiraght Vannin as Eiraght Ashoonagh Vannin.
Staydys yn aavioghey jiu.
Ta'n Ghaelg er jeet er turrys liauyr veih toshiaght y failleil eck gys y laa t'ain. Rere y choontey-pobble 'sy vlein 2001 va mysh 2.2% jeh pobble yn ellan jargal loayrt, lhaih ny screeu 'sy Ghaelg. 'Sy vlein 1990 cha row yn Ghaelg loayrit agh ec 0.9% y phobble ayns cosoylaght rish y 2% jeh'n phobble ayns 2001. Myrane lesh y vishaghey ayns earroo ny Gaelgeyryn, ta barel foayroil ayn nish rish y Ghaelg, as rere towse-barel Gallup ayns 1991 ren 36% jeh'n lught freggyrt cur fys dy row barel foayroil oc rish cur stiagh y Ghaelg myr vrastyl reihyssagh ayns ny scoillyn. 'Sy vlein 2001 va'n chied vrastyl lane-Ghaelgagh currit er bun ayns commeeys marish Mooinjer Veggey as Sheshaght ny Paarantyn çheusthie jeh Bunscoill Valley Vac Ottar ayns Doolish. Ayns 2003 ren y Vrastyl Ghaelgagh scughey gys thie noa ayns Balley Keeill Eoin fo ennym noa, y Vunscoill Ghaelgagh. Hoshiaght, cha row agh nuy paitçhyn recortyssit 'sy scoill, agh 'sy vlein 2009 va 65 paitçhyn 'sy scoill, myrane lesh 4 ynseyderyn. Ec y traa t'ayn ta coorseyn ayns Gaelg as trooid y Ghaelg nish ry-gheddyn ayns ram bunscoillyn, meanscoillyn as ayns scoillyn as undinyssyn jeh'n trass cheim, lheid as y Laare-Studeyrys Manninagh ayns Lerphoyll, Sostyn.
'Sy vlein 2003 ren yn Reeriaght Unnaneysit, er son Mannin, shickyraghey y Chaart Oarpagh son Çhengaghyn Ardjynagh ny Mynçhengaghyn. Ta'n Ghaelg nish ry-akin er cowraghyn baayrey as straidey lesh çhyndaaghyn 'sy Vaarle as 'sy Ghaelg. Yn chooid smoo jeh baljyn as baljyn beggey, t'ad goaill shelloo er enmyn Gaelgagh as Baarlagh, as t'ad ry-akin er cowraghyn failt, er barooseyn, as er earrooyn traa baroose. Ta enmyn Gaelgagh ec rheynnyn y reiltys nish as ad ry-akin er cowraghyn, pabreydys as gleashtanyn.

Doour:
Foddee doour çheet er:

Northamptonshire:
She coontae reiragh as jesh-chliaghtagh thalloonit ayns Mean-çheerey Hiar Hostyn eh Northamptonshire. T'eh soit ayns mean ny çheerey. T'eh çhemmit liorish Warwickshire da'n çheear, Leicestershire as Rutland da'n twoaie, Lincolnshire da'n çhiar hwoaie, Cambridgeshire da'n çhiar, Bedfordshire da'n çhiar yiass, Buckinghamshire da'n jiass, as Sheer Aah yn Ollee da'n çheear yiass.
Ta shiaght slystyn ec y choontae neuvoirvaljagh: Northampton, Daventry, Wellingborough, Kettering, Corby as Northamptonshire Hiar.

Cambridgeshire:
She coontae reiragh as jesh-chliaghtagh thalloonit ayns Sostyn Hiar eh Cambridgeshire. T'eh soit ayns mean ny çheerey. T'eh çhemmit liorish Lincolnshire da'n twoaie, Norfolk da'n çhiar hwoaie, Suffolk da'n çhiar, Essex as Hertfordshire da'n jiass, as Bedfordshire as Northamptonshire da'n çheear.
Ta quieg slystyn ec y choontae neuvoirvaljagh: Cambridge, Cambridgeshire Yiass, Cambridgeshire Hiar, Huntingdonshire as Fenland. Ta'n coontae jesh-chliaghtagh goaill stiagh y lught-reill unnaneagh Peterborough myrgeddin.

Norfolk:
She coontae reiragh as jesh-chliaghtagh ayns Sostyn Hiar eh Norfolk. T'eh soit ayns shiar foddey ny çheerey. T'eh çhemmit liorish Lincolnshire as Cambridgeshire da'n çheear, as Suffolk da'n jiass.
Ta quieg slystyn ec y choontae: Norwich, Norfolk Yiass, Great Yarmouth, Broadland, Norfolk Hwoaie, King's Lynn as Norfolk Heear, Breckland.

Suffolk:
She coontae reiragh as jesh-chliaghtagh ayns Sostyn Hiar eh Suffolk. T'eh soit ayns shiar foddey ny çheerey. T'eh çhemmit liorish Norfolk da'n twoaie, Essex da'n jiass as Cambridgeshire da'n çheear.
Ta shiaght slystyn echey: Ipswich, Suffolk Slystagh, Waveney, Suffolk Meanagh, Babergh, St Edmundsbury, as Forest Heath.
Ta Sutton Hoo ayns Suffolk hiar ny ynnyd shenndaaleeagh scanshoil. Hooar ad tasht Anglo-Hostnagh mooar ayns shen ayns 1939 as reddyn elley ny yei.

Manchuin Vooar:
She coontae moirvaljagh reiragh as jesh-chliaghtagh thalloonit ayns Sostyn Heear Hwoaie ee Manchuin Vooar. T'ee çhemmit liorish Lancashire da'n twoaie, Treen Hiar Yorkshire da'n çhiar hwoaie, Derbyshire da'n çhiar yiass, Cheshire da'n jiass, as Merseyside da'n çheear.
Ta jeih slystyn eck: Ard-valley Manchester, Stockport, Tameside, Oldham, Rochdale, Bury, Bolton, Wigan, Ard-valley Salford, as Trafford.

Merseyside:
She coontae moirvaljagh as jesh-chliaghtagh ayns Sostyn Heear Hwoaie eh Merseyside. T'eh çhemmit liorish Lancashire da'n twoaie, Manchuin Vooar da'n çhiar, as Cheshire da'n jiass.
Ta queig slystyn echey: Lerphoyll, Sefton, Knowsley, St Helens, as Wirral. Erreish da jee-vunnaghey ny coonseil choontae ayns 1974, t'adsyn nyn lughtyn-reill unnaneagh.

Staffordshire:
She coontae reiragh as jesh-chliaghtagh ayns Mean-çheerey Heear Hostyn eh Staffordshire. T'eh çhemmit liorish Cheshire da'n çheear twoaie, Derbyshire as Leicestershire da'n çhiar, Warwickshire da'n çhiar yiass, Mean-çheerey Heear Hostyn as Worcestershire da'n jiass, as Shropshire da'n çheear.
Ta nuy slystyn echey: Tamworth, Lichfield, Cannock Chase, Staffordshire Yiass, Stafford, Newcastle-under-Lyme, Staffordshire Moorlands, Staffordshire Heear, as Stoke-on-Trent. Ta Stoke-on-Trent ny lught-reill unnaneagh, agh t'eh goit stiagh 'sy choontae jesh-chliaghtagh.
Ayns Jerrey Souree 2009, hooar ad tasht Anglo-Hostnagh smoo Vretyn Vooar, Tasht Staffordshire, faggys da Lichfield.

Shropshire:
She coontae jesh-chliaghtagh ayns Mean-çheerey Heear Hostyn eh Shropshire (Salop dy maylartagh; ). T'eh çhemmit liorish Cheshire da'n twoaie, Staffordshire da'n çhiar, Worcestershire da'n çhiar yiass, Herefordshire da'n jiass, Powys da'n çheear, as Wrecsam da'n çheear hwoaie. 
She Shrewsbury eh y preeu-valley tradishoonagh. Er son reirey, t'eh aarheynnit ayns daa 'lyst, slyst Shropshire as slyst Telford as Wrekin, nyn lughtyn-reilley unnaneagh.

Herefordshire:
She coontae jesh-chliaghtagh as reiragh ayns Mean-çheerey Heear Hostyn eh Herefordshire. T'eh çhemmit liorish Shropshire da'n twoaie, Worcestershire da'n çhiar, Gloucestershire da'n çhiar yiass, Gwent da'n çheear yiass, as Powys da'n çheear. 
She Hereford eh y preeu-valley tradishoonagh as ard-oik reiragh.

Cleeau:
She oltey jeh ronsaghey-kirpey yn dooinney as cretooryn eigsoylagh elley ee yn chleeau. Ta'n fockle thoracks (veih θώραξ "thórax" ny Greagish trooid "thorax" y Ladjyn) currit urree ny keayrtyn. Ayns deiney as "hominidae", ta'n fockle cleeau çheet er yn ard eddyr y wannal as y volg, goaill stiagh ny h-organeyn sthie as dagh red elley ta cummal ayn. Ayns shey-chassee as cretooryn elley lesh ushylee vooie oc, ta'n fockle thoracks currit er yn ard ta co-reggyrt rish y chleeau.

Worcestershire:
She coontae jesh-chliaghtagh as reiragh ayns ard Mean-çheerey Heear Hostyn eh Worcestershire. T'eh çhemmit liorish Staffordshire da'n twoaie, Mean-çheerey Heear Hostyn da'n çhiar hwoaie, Warwickshire da'n çhiar, Gloucestershire da'n jiass, Herefordshire da'n çheear, as Shropshire da'n çheear hwoaie. 
She Worcester eh y preeu-valley tradishoonagh as ard-oik reiragh.

Mean-çheerey Heear Hostyn (coontae):
She coontae jesh-chliaghtagh as moirvaljagh ayns ard Mean-çheerey Heear Hostyn eh Mean-çheerey Heear Hostyn. T'eh çhemmit liorish Staffordshire da'n twoaie as heear, Warwickshire da'n çhiar, as Worcestershire da'n jiass. 
Ta shiaght slystyn echey: Ard-valley Wolverhampton, Dudley, Walsall, Sandwell, Ard-valley Birmingham, Solihull, as Ard-valley Coventry. Erreish da mooghey ny cooinseil choontae ayns 1986, t'adsyn nyn lughtyn-reilley unnaneagh "de facto".

Warwickshire:
She coontae reiragh as jesh-chliaghtagh ayns Mean-çheerey Heear Hostyn eh Warwickshire. T'eh çhemmit liorish Mean-çheerey Heear Hostyn as Staffordshire da'n çheear hwoaie, Leicestershire da'n çhiar hwoaie, Northamptonshire da'n çhiar, Sheer Aah yn Ollee da'n jiass, Gloucestershire da'n çhiar yiass, as Worcestershire da'n çheear.
Ta queig slystyn echey: Warwickshire Hwoaie, Nuneaton as Bedworth, Rugby, Stratford-on-Avon, as Warwick hene. Cha nel caayr erbee 'sy choontae erreish da Coventry as Birmingham goll er covestey ayns Mean-çheerey Heear Hostyn ayns 1974.

Gloucestershire:
She coontae reiragh as jesh-chliaghtagh ayns Sostyn Heear Yiass eh Gloucestershire. T'eh çhemmit liorish Worcestershire da'n' twoaie, Warwickshire da'n çhiar hwoaie, Sheer Aah yn Ollee da'n çhiar, Wiltshire da'n çhiar yiass, Bristol da'n çheear yiass, Gwent da'n çheear, as Herefordshire da'n çheear hwoaie.
Ta shey slystyn ec y choontae reiragh: Gloucester, Tewkesbury, Cheltenham, Cotswold, Stroud, as Forest of Dean. Ta'n coontae jesh-chliaghtagh goaill stiagh y lught-reill unnaneagh Gloucestershire Yiass myrgeddin. 

Sheer Aah yn Ollee:
She coontae reiragh as jesh-chliaghtagh ayns Sostyn Heear Yiass eh Sheer Aah yn Ollee (). T'eh çhemmit liorish Warwickshire da'n' çheear hwoaie, Northamptonshire da'n çhiar hwoaie, Buckinghamshire da'n çhiar, Berkshire da'n jiass, Wiltshire da'n çheear yiass, as Gloucestershire da'n çheear.
Ta queig slystyn echey: Oxford, Cherwell, Sheer Aah yn Ollee Yiass, Vale of White Horse, as Sheer Aah yn Ollee Heear.

Buckinghamshire:
She coontae reiragh as jesh-chliaghtagh ayns Sostyn Heear Yiass eh Buckinghamshire. T'eh çhemmit liorish Northamptonshire da'n' twoaie, Bedfordshire da'n çhiar hwoaie, Hertfordshire da'n çhiar, Lunnin Vooar da'n çhiar yiass, Berkshire da'n jiass, as Sheer Aah yn Ollee da'n çheear.
Ta kiare slystyn echey: Bucks Yiass, Chiltern, Wycombe, as Aylesbury Vale. Ta'n coontae jesh-chliaghtagh goaill stiagh y balley corpagh Milton Keynes myrgeddin.

Bedfordshire:
She coontae jesh-chliaghtagh ayns Sostyn Hiar eh Bedfordshire. T'eh çhemmit liorish Cambridgeshire da'n çhiar hwoaie, Hertfordshire da'n çhiar yiass, Buckinghamshire da'n çheear yiass, as Northamptonshire da'n çheear hwoaie. Hie y coontae reiragh er jee-vunnaghey ayns 2009 lesh jannoo lughtyn-reilley unnaneagh jeh ny slystyn echey.
Ta tree lughtyn-reilley 'sy choontae jesh-chliaghtagh: Bedford, Bedfordshire Meanagh as Luton.

Kerrin Tahrir:
She kerrin baljagh theayagh mooar ayns Cairo ny h-Egypt Kerrin Tahrir (, ASE: el-, ettæħˈɾiːɾ, ). Va'n kerrin enmyssit "Midan Ismaileyya" ny "Kerrin Ismailia" dy bunneydagh, as ennym y reireyder 19oo eashagh Khedive Ismail currit er. By chiaddeyder y chummey "Paarys er y Neel" er çheshvean y valley eh Ismail. Lurg yn Irree Magh 'sy vlein 1919 va'n kerrin enmyssit Kerrin y Teyrsnys, agh cha row yn kerrin enmyssit myr shen dy h-oikoil derrey'n Irree Magh 'sy vlein 1952. Fo'n irree magh shen va staydys ny çheerey caghlaait veih staydys reeriaghtagh bunraghtoil gys staydys pobblaghtagh.
Çhionnraaghyn 2011.
By nane jeh ny buill vooarey ayns çhionnraaghyn Egyptagh 'sy vlein 2011, as yn ard-voayl ayns Cairo, eh yn Kerrin. Ren ny smoo na 15,000 deiney cummal yn kerrin er 25 Jerrey Geuree 2011, as car y lhing shen va shirveishyn eddyr-voggylagh gyn-streng millit. Ayns ny laghyn ny lurg haink er y Kerrin dy ve ny ard-voayl da ny çhionnraaghyn ayns Cairo. Rish y 30oo laa jeh Jerrey Fouyir ren y BBC cur fogrey ayn dy row ny smoo na 50,000 çhionnraaderyn ayn, as er 31 Jerrey Geuree ren co-reggyrtee veih Al Jazeera soilshey dy row ny smoo na 250,000 dy leih ayn. Er 1 Toshiaght Arree haghlym ny smoo na 1 villioon dy hionnraaderyn 'sy Cherrin.

Hosni Mubarak:
Va Muhammad Hosni Sayyid Mubarak (, ASE: ˈħosni ˈsæjːed moˈbɑːɾɑk, "Muḥammad Ḥusnī Sayyid Mubārak"; ruggit 4 Boaldyn, 1928 - 2020) ny h-Eaghtyrane er Pobblaght Arabagh ny h-Egypt. V'eh ny chiaroo eaghtyrane er y çheer as yn eaghtyrane smoo foddey-reiragh.

Enda Kenny:
She politickeyr Yernagh as fer toshee jeh'n phartee politickagh Fine Gael eh Enda Kenny (; v'er ny ruggey 24 Averil 1951). V'eh reiht myr Taoiseach Nerin lurg Ard-Reihys 2011 er 9 Mayrnt 2011. Roish shen v'eh ny 'er toshee er y Chontraartys ayns Dáil Éireann, y thie s'inshley jeh'n Oireachtas (Parlamaid Phobblaght Nerin). Dirree eh myr Teachta Dála (Çhaghter yn Dáil, ny TD dy mennick ayns Yernish as ayns Baarle) son May Eo 'sy vlein 1975 myr eiyrtyssagh yn ayr echey Henry Kenny. Ren Kenny shirveishey myr Shirveishagh Turrysid as Traght eddyr ny bleeantyn 1994 as 1997.

Eamon Gilmore:
She politickeyr Yernagh as fer toshee er Partee yn Lught Obbyr ayns Nerin eh Eamon Gilmore (; v'er ny ruggey 24 Averil 1955). Dirree eh myr Teachta Dála (TD) son Doon Laoire 'sy vlein 1989, tra v'eh ny oltey jeh Partee Labreeyn Nerin, as ny s'anmey marish y phartee Deynlaghys Clee, derrey haink y partee shen ry-cheilley lesh Partee yn Lught Obbyr. Dobbyr eh myr Shirveishagh Steat 'sy Rheynn Marrey veih 1994 derrey 1997 tra va'n partee echey ny chooid jeh "Reiltys y Ghoal Twoaie" car y 27oo Dáil. Er y 9oo laa jeh Vee Mayrnt v'eh reiht myr Tánaiste (Lhiass-Ard-Hirveishagh) Nerin.
Seihll.
Rug Gilmore er 24 Averil 1955 'sy Chealtrach, Coontae ny Galliu. V'eh ynsit 'sy veanscoill Coláiste Ghearrbhaile ayns Beeal Aah ny Sluigh, as lurg shen hie eh gys Ollooscoill Nerin, Galliu raad cheau eh blein myr Eaghtyrane er Unnaneys ny Studeyryn. By Eaghtyrane er Unnaneys ny Studeyryn ayns Nerin veih 1976 derrey 1978. 'Sy vlein 1985 va Gilmore reiht myr Coonseillagh er Coonseil Choontae Ghivlyn. V'eh reiht da Dáil Éireann da'n chied cheayrt ayns Ard-reihys Nerin, 1989 as v'eh aareiht ayns dagh ard-reihys veih shen.

Micheál Martin:
She politickeyr Yernagh as fer toshee er Fianna Fáil, y partee reiree ayns Reiltys Phobblaght Nerin eh Micheál Martin (v'er ny ruggey 1 Luanistyn 1960). T'eh ny Teachta Dála son Corkee Yiass Meanagh, oik ren eh goaill shelloo er da'n chied cheayrt 'sy vlein 1989. Ta Martin er n'obbraghey myr Shirveishagh Ynsee as Oaylleeaght (1997-2000), myr Shirveishagh Slaynt as Paitçhyn (2000-2004), myr Shirveishagh Treealys, Traght as Faillee (2004-2008) as myr Shirveishagh Cooishyn Joarree (2008-2011).

Tlachta:
She cronk ayns Coontae ny Mee, Nerin ee Tlachta ny Tlachtga (). T'eh ny hoie er y vollagh veih Baile Átha Buí gys Ráth Cairn. Car ny mean eashyn v'ee ny soiaghey da feillaghyn mooarey, goaill stiagh feilley neayr va aileyn geuree er nyn lostey son Samhain, roie-immeeaght ny Souney noa-emshiragh. Ta kiangley eddyr y chronk as y phersoonid ta enmyssit Tlachtga, ben-druaight Yernagh as troor dy phaitçhyn er nyn ruggey eck er.
She soiaghey raah Yiarn-Eashagh t'ayn as kiangley eddyr ee as Reeaghyn ny Mee as Vooan ayns ny traaghyn s'anmey. Ta ennym y chruink ry-gheddyn ayns skeealyn Yernagh mychione Tlachtga as yn ayr eck Mug Ruith, ren markiaght y jeshaght etlagh echey, yn "roth rámach" ("queeyl ymmyrtagh"), harree. 'Sy vlein 1168 ren yn Ard-Ree Ruaidrí mac Tairrdelbach Ua Conchobair cur cruinnaght vooar ry-cheilley er y chronk.

Hertfordshire:
She coontae jesh-chliaghtagh as neuvoirvaljagh ayns Sostyn Hiar eh Hertfordshire. T'eh çhemmit liorish Bedfordshire da'n twoaie, Cambridgeshire da'n çhiar yiass, Essex da'n çhiar, Lunnin Vooar da'n jiass, as Buckinghamshire da'n çheear. 
Ta jeih lughtyn-reilley 'sy choontae jesh-chliaghtagh: Three Rivers, Watford, Hertsmere, Welwyn Hatfield, Broxbourne, Hertfordshire Hiar, Stevenage, Hertfordshire Hwoaie, St Albans, as Dacorum.

John A. Costello:
She politickeyr as leighder Yernagh va John Aloysius Costello (; 20 Mean Souree 1891 — 5 Jerrey Geuree 1976). She coyrlagh v'eh lesh reiltys Steat Seyr Nerin lurg y teyrsnys eck, as lurg shen dirree eh myr Turneyr Theayagh Nerin veih 1926 derrey 1932. She Taoiseach ("Toshiagh") v'eh veih 1948 derrey 1951 as veih 1954 derrey 1957.

Jack Lynch:
By pholitickeyr as sporteyr Yernagh eh John Mary "Jack" Lynch (; 15 Luanistyn 1917 — 20 Jerrey Fouyir 1999). By Taoiseach eh er Pobblaght Nerin, as daa hiarrym echey veih 1966 derrey 1973 as veih 1977 derrey 1979.
Va Lynch reiht myr Teachta Dála da Dáil Éireann da'n chied cheayrt 'sy vlein 1948 son Corkee, as v'eh aa-reiht ayns dagh ard-reihys elley derrey dirree eh ass oik 'sy vlein 1981. Dobbyr eh myr Shirveishagh Argidys (1965–1966), myr Shirveishagh Çhynskyl as Traght (1959-1965), myr Shirveishagh Ynsee (1957-1959), myr Shirveishagh ny Gaeltaght (1957) as myr Scrudeyr y Pharlamaid. By eh yn trass fer toshee er Fianna Fáil veih 1966 derrey 1979, as eh ny eiyrtyssagh er Seán Lemass. Va'n tromlagh jerrinagh 'sy Dáil cosnit echey ayns ard-reihys 1977.
Roish haink er dy ve ny pholitickeyr, v'eh ny sporteyr rahoil myr cloieder dooblagh ny Cloiaghyn Gaelgagh. Chloie eh yn immaneeaght marish y chommyn ynnydagh Fánaithe an Ghleann ("Rouailtee yn Ghlion") as lesh fwirran eddyr-choontae Chorcaí veih 1936 derrey 1950. Chloie eh yn bluckaneyrys Gaelgagh lesh y chommyn ynnydagh echey San Nioclás ("Niglus Noo") as lesh fwirran eddyr-choontae Chorkee eddyr ny bleeantyn 1936 as 1946.

Essex:
She coontae jesh-chliaghtagh as neuvoirvaljagh ayns Sostyn Hiar eh Essex. T'eh çhemmit liorish Suffolk da'n çhiar hwoaie, Kent da'n jiass, Lunnin Vooar da'n çheear yiass, Hertfordshire da'n çheear, as Cambridgeshire da'n çheear hwoaie. 
Ta kiare lughtyn-reilley jeig 'sy choontae jesh-chliaghtagh: Epping Forest, Brentwood, Basildon, Castle Point, Rochford, Maldon, Chelmsford, Uttlesford, Braintree, Colchester, Tendring, Thurrock as Southend-on-Sea. Ta Thurrock as Southend-on-Sea nyn lughtyn-reilley unnaneagh nagh vel fo stiuredys y choonceil choontae.

Albert Reynolds:
By eh Albert Reynolds (; v'er ny ruggey er 4 Sauin 1932 - 2014) y hoghtoo Taoiseach er Nerin. Ghow eh shelloo yn oik shen 'sy vlein 1992, agh chaill eh yn oik echey tra daag Partee yn Lught Obbyr y reiltys co-pharteeagh 'sy vlein 1994. By eh Reynolds y queigoo fer toshee er Fianna Fáil car y lhing shen chammah.
Va Reynolds reiht da Dáil Éireann da'n chied cheayrt myr TD son Lhongfort-Yn Eearvee 'sy vlein 1977, as v'eh aa-reiht ayns dagh ard-reihys elley derrey dirree eh magh ass y pholitickaght 'sy vlein 2002. Va staartaghyn echey myr Shirveishagh Argidys (1988-91), myr Shirveishagh Çhynskyl as Traght (1987-88), myr Shirveishagh Çhynskyl as Bree (1982), myr Shirveishagh Arraghey (1980-81) as myr Shirveishagh Postyn as Çhellegrafyn (1979-81).

Charles Haughey:
By pholitickeyr Yernagh eh Charles James "Charlie" Haughey (; 16 Mean Fouyir 1925 — 13 Mean Souree 2006). By Taoiseach Nerin eh eddyr Mee ny Nollick 1979 as Mean Souree 1981, reesht eddyr Mayrnt 1982 as Mee ny Nollick 1982, as eddyr Mayrnt 1987 as Toshiaght Arree 1992. By eh Haughey yn kiarroo fer toshee er y phartee Fianna Fáil veih'n vlein 1979 derrey 1992. Hooar eh baase jeh kanghyr ny fairaig millish 'sy vlein 2006.
Va Haughey reiht myr TD da Dáil Éireann da'n chied cheayrt son Divlyn Hiar Hwoaie 'sy vlein 1957, as v'eh aa-reiht ayns dagh ard-reihys ny lurg derrey 1992.

Cill Rìmhinn:
She balley ollooscoillagh as eear-chochorp reeoil er coose hiar Feevey ayns Nalbin ee Cill Rìmhinn ( ny ; Baarle Albinagh: "Saunt Andras"). Roish y 10oo eash va'n balley enmyssit "Kilrymont" 'sy Vaarle. Ansherbee, lurg yn eash shen, va'n balley aa-enmyssit as ennym yn ostyl Andreays Noo currit er.

Podolsk:
She caayr hynskylagh as ynnyd reiragh Slyst Podolsky ayns Queiggey Moscow, y Roosh eh Podolsk (. T'eh ny hoie er Awin Pakhra (fo-awin Moskva). T'eh ny chaayr smoo ayns Queiggey Moscow, as rere coontey-pobble ny bleeaney 2002 va 180,963 deiney cummal 'sy chaayr. T'eh ny hoie 36 km veih çheshvean Moscow as 15 km veih'n MKAD. Ta'n chaayr çhemmit liorish Shcherbinka da'n twoaie, liorish Klimovsk da'n jiass.

Garret FitzGerald:
She politickeyr as Toshiagh ("Taoiseach") Phobblaght Nerin va Garret FitzGerald (; 9 Toshiaght Arree 1926 — 19 Boaldyn 2011). Va FitzGerald reiht da Seanad Éireann ("Shannad Nerin") 'sy vlein 1965 as lurg shen v'eh reiht da Dáil Éireann myr TD jeh Fine Gael 'sy vlein 1969. Dobbyr eh myr Shirveishagh Cooishyn Joarree veih 1973 derrey 1977. By 'er toshee eh er Fine Gael veih 1977 as 1987, as car y lhing shen va daa hiarrym echey myr Taoiseach veih Jerrey Souree 1981 derrey Toshiaght Arree 1982 as reesht veih Nollick 1982 derrey Mayrnt 1987.
By vac lesh Desmond FitzGerald, y chied Hirveishagh Cooishyn Mooie jeh'n steat Yernagh noa-ghient lurg seyrsnys veih'n Reeriaght Unnaneysit, eh. By Eaghtyrane er Undinys ny Cooishyn Eddyr-ashoonagh as Oarpagh eh tra hooar eh baase. Dy mennick ren eh screeu colooyn politickagh as tarmaynagh ayns "The Irish Times" as ny keayrtyn v'eh ry-akin er claareeyn çhellveeish lheid as "Tonight with Vincent Browne".

Somerset:
She coontae jesh-chliaghtagh as neuvoirvaljagh ayns Sostyn Heear Yiass eh Somerset. T'eh çhemmit liorish Bristol as Gloucestershire da'n çhiar hwoaie, Wiltshire da'n çhiar, Dorset da'n çhiar yiass, as Devon da'n çheear yiass.
Ta shiaght lughtyn-reilley jeig 'sy choontae jesh-chliaghtagh: Somerset Yiass, Taunton Deane, Somerset Heear, Sedgemoor, Mendip, Bath as Somerset Hiar Hwoaie (Unnaneagh), Somerset Hwoaie (Unnaneagh). Ta Somerset Hwoaie, as Bath as Somerset Hiar Hwoaie, nyn lughtyn-reilley unnaneagh nagh vel fo stiuredys y choonceil choontae.

Liam Cosgrave:
By Hoshiagh, ny Taoiseach myr t'eh enmyssit ayns Yernish, Phobblaght Nerin, eh Liam Cosgrave (; v'er ny ruggey er 13 Averil 1920 - 2017). By Hoshiagh eh eddyr ny bleeantyn 1973 as 1977. Hie eh stiagh 'sy pholitickaght 'sy vlein 1943 as chossyn eh yn soiag echey derrey dirree eh magh ass yn oik 'sy vlein 1981. Roish haink er dy ve ny Hoshiagh by Hirveishagh Chooishyn Mooie eh.

Wiltshire:
She coontae jesh-chliaghtagh as reiragh ayns Sostyn Heear Yiass eh Wiltshire. T'eh çhemmit liorish Sheer Aah yn Ollee da'n çhiar hwoaie, Berkshire da'n çhiar, Hampshire da'n çhiar yiass, Dorset da'n jiass, Somerset da'n çheear yiass, as Bristol as Gloucestershire da'n çheear hwoaie.
Ta'n coontae jesh-chliaghtagh goaill stiagh Swindon, ny lught-reill unnaneagh nagh vel fo stiureydys Coonceil choontae Wiltshire.
Ta'n coontae goaill stiagh ny h-ynnydyn shennaghyssagh Stonehenge as Avebury.

Dorset:
She coontae jesh-chliaghtagh as neuvoirvaljagh ayns Sostyn Heear Yiass eh Dorset. T'eh çhemmit liorish Devon da'n çheear, Somerset da'n çheear hwoaie, Wiltshire da'n çhiar hwoaie, as Hampshire da'n çhiar. Ta Mooir yn Eeaght da'n jiass. 
Ta shey slystyn 'sy choontae reiragh: Weymouth as Portland, Dorset Heear, Dorset Hwoaie, Purbeck, Dorset Hiar, as Christchurch. Ta'n coontae jesh-chliaghtagh goaill stiagh ny lughtyn-reilley unnaneagh Bournemouth as Poole myrgeddin.

Rolley lioaryn ny Gaelgey:
Shoh rolley lioaryn ny Gaelgey. Lioaryn ad ta scruit 'sy Ghaelg ny lioaryn ayns çhengaghyn elley ta cur sheese er y Ghaelg, goaill stiagh lioaryn grammeydys, fockleyryn, a.r.e. Ta ny lioaryn dy liooar ayns oardagh abbyrlhitagh rere ennym yn ughtar. Mannagh vel 'sy rolley agh lioar v'er ny cur magh hannagh hene fo ennym ughtar elley cha nel ennym yn ard-ughtar scruit sheese, agh ennym y çhyndaader, m.s. ta "Contoyrtyssyn Ealish ayns Çheer ny Yindyssyn" rang-oardit fo Stowell, ga dy row ee scruit liorish Lewis Carroll. Son dy yeeaghyn er bun-screeuder lioar er lheh, lhisagh shiu jeeaghyn er ny noteyn.

Berkshire:
She coontae jesh-chliaghtagh as neuvoirvaljagh thallooinit ayns Sostyn Hiar Yiass eh Berkshire. T'eh çhemmit liorish Sheer Aah yn Ollee da'n twoaie, Lunnin Vooar as Surrey da'n çhiar, Hampshire da'n jiass, as Wiltshire da'n çheear.
Ayns 1998, ren ad lughtyn-reilley unnaneagh jeh ny slystyn v'echey, as myr shen cha nel coonceil choontae ayn jiu. Ny yei shen, cha ren ad scryssey magh y choontae hene. Ta'n choontae jesh-chliaghtagh jeant jeh ny lughtyn-reilley heese: Berkshire Heear, Reading, Wokingham, Bracknell Forest, Windsor as Maidenhead, as Slough.
Ta Berkshire ny 'er jeh Coondaeghyn Lunnin.

Hampshire:
She coontae jesh-chliaghtagh as neuvoirvaljagh ayns Sostyn Hiar Yiass eh Hampshire. T'eh çhemmit liorish Berkshire da'n twoaie, Surrey da'n çhiar hwoaie, Sussex Heear da'n çhiar, Dorset da'n çheear yiass, as Wiltshire da'n çheear hwoaie. Ta Mooir yn Eeaght as Ellan Eeaght da'n jiass.
Ta un slyst jeig ec y choontae reiragh: Gosport, Fareham, Winchester, Havant, Hampshire Hiar, Hart, Rushmoor, Basingstoke as Deane, Test Valley, Eastleigh, as New Forest. Ta'n coontae jesh-chliaghtagh goaill stiagh ny lughtyn-reilley unnaneagh Southampton as Portsmouth myrgeddin.

Surrey:
She coontae jesh-chliaghtagh as neuvoirvaljagh thallooinit ayns Sostyn Hiar Yiass eh Surrey. T'eh çhemmit liorish Lunnin Vooar da'n twoaie, Kent da'n çhiar, Sussex Hiar da'n çhiar yiass, Sussex Heear da'n jiass, Hampshire da'n çheear yiass, as Berkshire da'n çheear.
Ta un slyst jeig ec y choontae: Spelthorne, Runnymede, Surrey Heath, Woking, Elmbridge, Guildford, Waverley, Mole Valley, Epsom as Ewell, Reigate as Banstead, as Tandridge.
Ta'n coonceil choontae soit ayns Kingston upon Thames, ga dy vel y balley shoh ayns Lunnin Vooar neayr's 1965.

Sussex Heear:
She coontae jesh-chliaghtagh as neuvoirvaljagh ayns Sostyn Hiar Yiass eh Sussex Heear (). T'eh çhemmit liorish Hampshire da'n çheear, Surrey da'n twoaie, as Sussex Hiar da'n çhiar. Ta Mooir yn Eeaght da'n jiass. 
Ta shiaght slystyn ec y choontae: Worthing, Arun, Chichester, Horsham, Crawley, Sussex Meanagh, as Adur.

Sussex Hiar:
She coontae jesh-chliaghtagh as neuvoirvaljagh ayns Sostyn Hiar Yiass eh Sussex Hiar (). T'eh çhemmit liorish Sussex Heear da'n çheear, Surrey da'n çheear hwoaie, as Kent da'n twoaie. Ta Mooir yn Eeaght da'n jiass.
Ta queig slystyn ec y choontae reiragh: Hastings, Rother, Wealden, Eastbourne, as Lewes. Ta'n coontae jesh-chliaghtagh goaill stiagh y lught-reill unnaneagh Brighton & Hove myrgeddin.

Kent:
She coontae jesh-chliaghtagh as neuvoirvaljagh ayns Sostyn Hiar Yiass eh Kent. T'eh çhemmit liorish Sussex Hiar da'n jiass, Surrey as Lunnin Vooar da'n çheear, as Essex da'n twoaie. Ta creeagh ennymagh echey marish y Rank ayns mean Hiollane Mooir yn Eeaght.
Ta daa slyst jeig ec y choontae reiragh: Sevenoaks, Dartford, Gravesham, Tonbridge as Malling, Maidstone, Tunbridge Wells, Swale, Ashford, Canterbury, Shepway, Thanet, as Dover. Ta'n choontae jesh-chliaghtagh goaill stiagh y lught-reill unnaneagh Medway myrgeddin.

Emshir ry-heet:
Ayns grammeydys, ta emshir ry-heet çheet er cummaghyn grammeydagh ta cowraghey ny ta shin jerkal haghyrys eh erreish da traa ennagh elley. Ayns corys jarroo-emshir, shen ny haghyrys erreish da nish. Ayns corys emshir chonastagh, shen ny haghyrys erreish da taghyrt ennagh elley, my t'eshyn er ngoll shaghey hannah, goll er taghyrt nish, ny ry-heet foast.
Gaelg.
Ta tree aghtyn dy chowraghey y traa ry-heet 'sy Ghaelg.
Cummaghyn yn-filleydagh.
Ta cummey yn-filleydagh y vreear jannoo ymmyd jeh'n jerrey -ee ayns breearyn reiltagh, agh ta cooishyn er lheh ayn.
Ta cummey yn-filleydagh obbalagh y vreear jannoo ymmyd jeh'n jerrey -ee ayns breearyn reiltagh, as ta boggaghys ec y toshiaght, agh ta cummaghyn er lheh ec kuse dy vreearyn neureiltagh. Ta'n meer obbalagh cha roish y vreear, 
Cummaghyn ym-loayrtagh.
Ta cummaghyn ym-loayrtagh ry-heet 'sy Ghaelg jeant liorish jannoo ny ve, as keeall er lheh ec y daa. Ta cummaghyn jannoo cowraghey taghyrtyn, as ta cummaghyn ve cowraghey grooish immeeaght (ny vees goll er foast ec traa er lheh).
Cummaghyn conastagh.
Ta cummey conastagh jarrooagh ry-heet er lheh 'sy Ghaelg myrgeddin.
Cha nel cummey conastagh obbalagh ayn; ta'n cummey ry-heet cadjin ayn raad vees eh.
Ta ymmyd jeant jeu marish y cheilley.

Cynara cardunculus:
She lus 'sy chynney Cynara ee Cynara cardunculus. Ta daa horçh scanshoil eck:

Bollan dhoa:
She lus daa-vleeanagh 'sy ghenus "Arctium" eh bollan dhoa, bollan ghoa, boaghan doa ny cramman sooree (Arctium lappa). T'eh goll er troarey er son y fraue yn-ee echey.
Ny keayrtyn, ta "boaghan doa" ny "boagandoa" çheet er dooie mooinjerey da, "Arctium minus".
Jalloo-oaylleeaght.
T'eh gaase wheesh as 2m er yrjid. Ta duillagyn maylartey cree-chrooagh echey. 
Ta blaaghyn gorrym-jiargey echey. Ta kiarkyl dy vraghtyn mygeayrt oc, as t'adsyn dooanagh dys croghey er fynney beiyn. She achene eh y mess oc. Ta'n fraue yn-ee wheesh as 1m er liurid er 2cm er lheead.
Ymmyd myr bee.
Ta fraue bollan dhoa goll er troarey my bee 'syn Çhapaan, yn Taiwaan, yn Chorea, yn Iddaal, y Vrasseel as yn Phortiugal. Ny keayrtyn, t'ad çhaglym gish neuappee myrgeddin, anmagh 'syn arree roish my hig ad my vlaa.
Ymmyd lheeys.
Er lesh lusseyryn, ta bree brasneyder moon, gientyn ollish as glenney folley echey. Ta ymmyd tradishoonagh jeant jeh noi gorlaghyn crackanagh myrgeddin. Ta arctigenin 'sy rassyn echey ta bentyn rish cooinaghtyn aght ennagh. Ta feanish ennagh dy vel arctigenin shassoo noi veerys floo A as loshtaght "in vitro" myrgeddin.

Bossan dhoa:
She lus daa-vleeanagh 'sy phossan ghenus Arctium eh bossan dhoa ny boagandhoa (Arctium minus). T'ad dooghyssagh da'n Oarpey, agh t'eh ry-akin er feie ny Steatyn Unnaneyssit myrgeddin myr sarkyl.
Ny keayrtyn, ta "boagandhoa", "boaghandhoa" ny "boaghan dhoa" çheet er y dooie mooinjerey "Arctium lappa" myrgeddin.
Jalloo-oaylleeaght.
T'eh gaase wheesh as 1.5m er yrjid. Ta ny duillagyn s'yrdjey oohchrooagh wheesh as 50cm er lhiurid echey. Ta ny duillagyn s'inshley chree-chrooagh as ta oirr tonnagh dy tree-howshanagh oc. Ta ny duillagyn glass dorraghey er yn eaghtyr s'yrdjey, as clooieagh er yn eaghtyr s'inshley. Ta blaaghyn gorrym-jiargey ayns dhossan blaaghey oc, gollrish onnane. Ta braghtyn dooanagh mygeayrt oc. Erreish da'n dhossan blaaghey çhirmaghey, nee ny braghtyn greimmey er beiyn dys gleashaghey as skeaylley ny rassyn. Ta bun-fraue feer dowin echey, wheesh as 30cm er diunid. 

Boglus:
She lus daa-vleeanagh eh boglus (Picris echioides). T'eh dooghyssagh da'n Oarpey as yn Affrick Hwoaie.
Jalloo-oaylleeaght.
T'eh gaase wheesh as 90cm er yrjid. Ta gass çhiu banglaneagh echey. Ta duillagyn noi-sleeanagh 10-20cm er lhiurid echey, as cass beg oc. Ta ny duillagyn, banglaneyn as gass friogganagh. Ta dhossanyn blaaghey echey, mysh 2-3.5cm er lheead, as ta 3-5 braghtyn oochrooagh dys cree-chrooagh mygeayrt oc.
Ymmyd.
Va ymmyd tradishoonagh jeant jeh myr noi-helmintagh..
Bun-ocklaght.
Ta "echioides" er y fa dy vel duillagyn boglus gollrish adsyn t'ec "Echium vulgare".

Selena:
Va Selena Quintanilla (16 Mee ny Boaldyn, 1971-31 Mee Vayrnt, 1995) ny h-arraneyder, kiaulleyder, aghteyr as cummeyder eaddagh Americaanagh Mecsicagh. Hie ee er enmys myr "kiaulleyder share Ladjynagh ny 90yn" as "kiaulleyder Ladjynagh share er greck ny jeih-bleeaney" liorish "Billboard", er son 14 singilyn 'sy jeih s'yrdjey ayns taabyl Arraneyn Ladjynagh share, as shiaght jeu 'sy chied ynnyd. Va singilyn smoo speeideilagh 1994 as 1995 eck myrgeddin: "Amor Prohibido" as "No Me Queda Más". Dinsh ad "Benrein chiaullee Tejano" ree, as gra dy nee "Madonna" Vecsico v'ayn. Hug Selena magh y chied albym eck, "Selena y Los Dinos", tra v'ee 12 vlein d'eash. Chosnee ee Ben-Arraneyder ny Bleeaney ec Tejano Music Awards 1987 as geddyn coardailys recortys marish EMI blein ny ghaa ny yei.
Hie ee er varroo tra v'ee 23 d'eash liorish Yolanda Saldívar, eaghtyrane y chlub ard-jeeaneyderyn eck. Er Averil 12, 1995, daa hiaghtin erreish jee geddyn baase, dogree George W. Bush, kiannoort Texas ec y tra shen, dy row e laa ruggyree "Laa Helena" ayns Texas. Ayns 1997, ren Warner Bros. y fillym "Selena" er e bea, as Jennifer Lopez cloie Selena. Va drama arraneagh jeant myrgeddin, "Selena Forever" as Veronica Vazquez cloie Selena. 
Ayns Mean Souree 2006, doshil thie tashtee currit jee ayns Corpus Christi, Texas, as jalloo prashey er towse dooghyssagh jee, Mirador de la Flor. Ta ny smoo na 21 million albym jeh'n chiaull eck er nyn greck er feie ny cruinney.

Jennifer Lopez:
She aghteyr, arraneyder, leayreder recortyssyn, daunseyr, persoonid hellveeish, kiaddeyder fassan as leayreder çhellveeish Americaanagh ee Jennifer Lopez ny J.Lo myr t'ee eit ny keayrtyn (ruggit 24 Jerrey Souree, 1969). Hoshee yn coorse bea eck myr daunseyr er y chlaare hellveeish "In Living Color". Lurg shen, hie ee stiagh 'syn aghteyrys, as hooar ee enney as foaynoo 'sy scannane "Money Train" 'sy vlein 1995.
Va'n chied preeu-rolley cosnit eck 'sy scannane beashnyssagh "Selena" (1997), raad chossyn ee Aundyr ALMA son Ben-Aghteyryn Yindyssagh. Chossyn ee e nah Aundyr ALMA da'n chloie eck 'sy scannane "Out of Sight" (1998). Veih'n lhing shen dobbyr ee ayns scannaneyn aitt romansagh, goaill stiagh "The Wedding Planner" (2001) as "Maid in Manhattan" (2002).
Hooar ee enney as foaynoo 'sy chiaull lurg skeaylley magh y chied albym eck "On the 6" (1999). Chossyn y singyl veih'n albym shen "If You Had My Love" y chied ynnyd. Va rah eck 'sy nah albym eck "J.Lo" (2001)), as hie hoght millioon dy choipyn er nyn greck. By eh "" (2002) y trass albym eck, as raink eh y chied ynnyd 'sy chaart "Billboard" 200. Raink e kiaroo as e queigoo albymyn, "This Is Me... Then" (2002) as "Rebirth" (2005), y nah ynnyd 'sy chaart. 'Sy vlein 2007 ren ee skeaylley magh daa albym goaill stiagh y chied albym Spaainish eck "Como Ama una Mujer" as y queigoo albym seyrlann Baarlagh "Brave".

Concepción, y Çhillee:
She caayr 'sy Çhillee eh Concepción (Spaainish son "Gientyn"). She preeu-valley Wheiggey Concepción as Ard Biobío ny Ard VIII t'ayn. Ta Concepción Mooar ("Gran Concepción", goaill stiagh Talcahuano, San Pedro de la Paz, Hualpén, Chiguayante, Penco, Tomé, Lota, Coronel, Hualqui as Concepción hene) ny nah chovaljys smoo 'sy çheer, lesh 889,725 cummaltee (coontey-pobble 2002). Er lesh ny lomarcan, t'eh ny chied chommyoon jeig smoo 'sy çheer, lesh 212,003 cummaltee.

Bugogue varrey:
She crouw ny billey beg yn-lhoamey 'sy ghenus "Hippophae" ee bugogue varrey (Hippophae rhamnoides). She tashteyder neetragien neuphoanragh t'ayn. T'ee ry-akin er feie ny h-Oarpey as ny h-Aishey. Son y chooid smoo, t'ee cummal rish y clyst marrey myr garee er cronkanyn geinee as eayninyn.
Jalloo-oaylleeaght.
T'eh gaase wheesh as 6m er yrjid. Ta duillagyn sleeanagh glassey-argidagh eck, mysh 3-8cm er lhiurid as ny sloo na 7mm er lheead. T'eh dioecious, dy ghra myr shen, cha nel blaaghyn firrynagh as bwoirrinagh er y lus cheddin. Ta blaaghyn dhoneagh eck. T'ad goll er pollnaghey liorish y gheay. She berrish jiarg-bwee eh y mess eck.
Ymmyd.
T'ad jannoo ooill ass ny berrishyn eck. 'Syn Roosh as yn Çheen, t'ad jannoo ymmyd jeh noi çhing aile goulraght. 

Bogrenish:
She renniagh curree 'sy ghenus "Osmunda" ee bogrenish (Osmunda regalis). T'ee dooghyssagh da'n Oarpey, yn Affrick, yn Aishey as America. 
Jalloo-oaylleeaght.
She renniagh yn-lhoamey t'ayn, as t'ee cur magh frinn hroaragh as shiast er lheh. Ta ny frinn hiast gaase wheesh as 60-160km er yrjid as 40km er lheead, as t'ad skeaylley mooie. T'ad daa-'edjagagh as ta 7-9 piyryn dy ghuillageenyn oc, wheesh as 30km er lhiurid. Ta 7-13 piyryn dy 'o-ghuillageenyn ec dagh duillageen, as adsyn 2-6km er lhiurid as 1-2km er lheead. 
Ta ny frinn hroaragh nyn shassoo jeeragh, as t'ad ny sloo na ny frinn hiast. T'adsyn 20-50km er yrjid; ta piyr ny ghaa dy ghuillageenyn 'sy chass oc, as 7-14 piyryn troaragh er-nyn-skyn, as sporraganeyn glooey croghey orroo.
Arraghyssyn.
Ta tree ny kiare arraghyssyn ayn:
Ymmyd.
T'ad jannoo frauaig osmunda jeh fraueyn bogrenish chammah's dooieyn "Osmunda" elley. Shen ny mean aase er son epiphyteyn myr orchidyn ellynagh.
T'ee goll er ee myr glassrey ayns ymmodee çheeraghyn.

Bollan bane:
She lus sheer-vio 'sy ghenus "Artemisia" eh bollan bane (Artemisia vulgaris). T'eh dooghyssagh da'n Oarpey tempreilagh, yn Aishey, yn Affrick hwoaie as Alaska, as t'eh er ny yannoo dooie ayns America Hwoaie. T'eh cadjin er thalloo neetragienagh, myr sampleyr, fadaneyn as çheughyn raaidey.
Jalloo-oaylleeaght.
T'eh gaase wheesh as 2m er yrjid. Ta fraue fuyghagh echey. Ta duillagyn fedjagagh 5-20cm er lhiurid echey. T'ad glass dorraghey, ad ta fynney clooieagh bane er yn eaghtyr s'inshley oc. Ta blaaghyn buighey ny jiargey dorraghey 5mm er crantessen echey. 
Ymmyd.
Ta ymmyd jeant jeh duillagyn as buinnaghyn neuappee bollan bane myr spios.

Craa thallooin as tsunami Tōhoku, 2011:
She craa thallooin mooar-heiyagh va . Haghyr yn craa thallooin magh veih coose hiar hwoaie y Çhapaan ec 05:46 UTC (traa ynnydagh 14:46 JST) er 11 Mayrnt 2011. She craa thallooin va eddyr 8.9 as 9.1 MW er mooadys v'ayn. Va'n çheshvean echey soit 130 km magh veih coose hiar Lieh-innys Oshika, Tōhoku, as y fo-vean soit 24.4 km sheese er diunid veih'n thalloo.
Ren y craa thallooin tilgey raaueyn tsunami as folmaghyn veih coose Sheealtagh y Çhapaan as ayns 20 çheeraghyn er y chooid sloo, goaill stiagh y slane choose Sheealtagh jeh America Yiass as America Hwoaie. Ren y craa thallooin tilgey tonnyn tsunami 10 m er yrjid ren cur stiagh er y Çhapaan, as lesh tonnyn ny s'inshley ayns ram çheeraghyn elley. Ta recortyssyn ayn dy ren ny tonnyn goll 10 km stiagh er y çheer 'sy Çhapaan.
Rere Jantys Poleenyn Ashoonagh y Çhapaan hooar 5,692 deiney baase. Myrane lesh shen ta 2,409 guintee as ta 9,522 ghooinney ass eanish ayns shey meoiraghtyn jeig, agh foddee bee ny h-earrooyn shen ny s'yrjey. Ren y craa thallooin jeeilley raaidyn, raaidyn yiarn, aileyn, as tuittym doour. Myrane lesh shen ve jeeill lheeadagh jeant ayns stashoon lectraghys çheshveanagh tra va daa rasseeagh çheshveanagh lieh-lheit sheese. Va bleaystey ayns Stashoon Bree Çheshveanagh Fukushima I begnagh 24 ooryn lurg y chraa thallooin bunneydagh. Ga dy ren y bleastey cur lesh tuittym y thie cummal concraidagh mooie, cha row neuloghtynid y chummeydane cummal y chree sthie currit ayns gaue.

Bollan Vreeshey:
Foddee bollan Vreeshey çheet er:

Polygala vulgaris:
She lus eh Polygala vulgaris (bollan Vreeshey ny bollan y chee).
Jalloo-oaylleeaght.
Ta'n lus gaase wheesh as 10cm er yrjid. Ta duillagyn maylartey echey, as ta ny gish banglaneagh. Ta blaaghyn daahoil echey; ta ny seepalyn mooie beggey as glassey, agh ta ny seepalyn sthie ny smoo as t'adsyn gorrym, gorrm-jiarg ny bane gial.

Plantago coronopus:
She lus vleeanagh ny daa-vleeanagh 'sy ghenus "Plantago" ee Plantago coronopus (bollan Vreeshey, bossan Vreeshey). T'ee dooghyssagh da'n yn Europey, yn Aishey as yn Affrick Hwoaie, agh t'eh ry-akin myr dooie jeant dooghyssagh ayns buill elley.
Ta ny h-enmyn cadjin eck çheet er lossreeyn elley ny keayrtyn: ta bollan Vreeshey çheet er "Polygala vulgaris" ("bollan y chee") ny keayrt, as ta bossan Vreeshey çheet er "Lapsana communis" ("duillag vie, duillag Vreeshey, lus ny kee").
Jalloo-oaylleeaght.
Ta duillagyn sleeanagh babbanagh wheesh as 25cm er lhiurid eck, as adsyn reaghit ayns cummey rose. Ta'n dhossan blaaghey gaase wheesh as 50cm er yrjid, as ta blaaghyn beggey baney echey.

Bossan Vreeshey:
Foddee bossan Vreeshey çheet er:

Lapsana communis:
She oltey ynrican y ghenus Lapsana ee Lapsana communis (bossan Vreeshey, duillag vie, duillag Vreeshey, lus ny kee). T'ee dooghyssagh da'n Oarpey as yn Aishey hwoaie.
Jalloo-oaylleeaght.
She bleintag ny lus sheer-vio lussagh t'ayn. T'ee gaase wheesh as 1.2m er yrjid. Ta gish fynnagh as sapp sheeley eck. Ta duillagyn reaghit myr caslagh mygeayrt ny gish. Ta ny duillagyn s'inshley smoo fedjagagh dy cadjin, as wheesh as kiare duillageenyn oc. Ta ny duillagyn s'yrdjey oohchrooagh. Ta oirr feeacklagh oc. Ta blaaghyn buighey 1-2cm er crantessen çheet my vlaa ayns .
Fo-ghooieyn.
Ta shey fo-ghooieyn ayn:
V'ad cliaghtey cur fir elley 'sy ghenus shoh, agh t'adsyn er nyn goaill stiagh fo "Crepis" as "Lapsanastrum".
Ymmyd.
Ta duillagyn aegey ny lus yn-ee as t'ad goll er ee myr glassrey. 
Ta'n ennym lus ny kee jeh cummey ny buinnaghyn blaa doont. Rere'n aaraue cowraghyn v'ad jannoo ymmyd jee noi askaidjyn kee.

Aaraue cowraghyn:
She sheiltynys lusseyragh eh yn aaraue cowraghyn. Rere'n eie shen, ta cummaghyn as daaghyn lossreeyn nyn cowraghyn ymmyd currit orroo liorish Jee. Myr ta lus ennagh gollrish olt ny kirpey, ta pooar eck noi çhingyssyn yn olt shen.

Bossan:
She lus sheer-vio lussagh 'sy ghenus "Typha" eh bossan (Typha angustifolia). T'eh ry-akin er feie ny lieh-chruinney hwoaie.
Jalloo-oaylleeaght.
Ta gass neuvanglaneagh echey as duillagyn linnagh echey, 5-8mm er lheead. Ta'n spadix echey er ny rheynn ayns firrynagh as bwoirrinagh. Ta ny blaaghyn bwoirrinagh ec cass y spadix as 2-4cm er lhiurid. Ta teepalyn ec ny blaaghyn firrynagh, as t'adsyn 7-12cm er lhiurid.
Ymmyd.
Ta kuse dy oltyn bossan yn-ee 'syn imbagh oc: buinnaghyn, cree ny gish, spadices neuappee, pollin appee, as fraueyn.

Bossan ardnieu:
She lus lussagh eh bossan ardnieu ny glioonagh ghuiy (Persicaria bistorta). T'eh ry-akin er feie ny h-Oarpey. Cha nel ynnyd rang-oaylleeagh soit ec y dooie; ny keayrtyn, t'eh goll er cur fo genus "Polygonum" ny "Bistorta". 
Jalloo-oaylleeaght.
T'eh gaase wheesh as 1m er yrjid. Ta duillagyn dronuillinag-oohchrooagh dys trooraneagh-oohchrooagh echey. T'ad faggys da cass ny gish son y chooid smoo, agh ta duillag ny ghaa faggys da ny blaaghyn. Ta ny blaaghyn ayns crouw-vlaaghey mysh 2cm er lheead as 5-9cm er lhiurid. T'ad bane-yiarg. T'ad gaase ayns thalloo tash, as rish çhirmid, t'ad ceau y duillagys jeu derrey vees ushtey dy liooar oc reesht. T'ad gaase jeh raisoamyn çhiuey giarey banglaneagh.
Bun-ocklaght.
Ta'n ennym Ladjyn "" çheet er y 'raue cassit oc. 
Ymmyd.
Ren ad puiddin sharroo Kargys jeh duillagyn bossan ardnieu, oohyn, meinn chorkey as lossreeyn elley. Ta casteyder folley ry-yannoo ass y 'raue.

Cliafuine:
She balley beg ayns twoaie Choontae Shliggee, Pobblaght Nerin, eh Cliafuine ( ny dy h-oikoil). Ta'n balley beg ny hoie 22 km çheu hwoaie veih Shliggagh er yn N15, fer jeh ny preeu-raaidyn ayns Nerin, as 13 km çheu heear yiass veih Bun Dobhráin. T'eh ny hoie er crossag, raad ta'n bayr gys An Mullach Mór çheet ry-cheilley lesh bayr Shliggee-Ghoon ny Ghoal. Rere coontey-pobble ny bleeaney 'sy vlein 2006 va 425 deiney cummal 'sy valley beg. Cha nel ayn 'sy valley beg agh keeill Chatoleagh, bunscoill, thie lhionney, shapp, oik postagh, as thie bee, myrane lesh kuse veg dy steatyn beaghee beggey. 

Bun Dobhráin:
She balley ayns jiass Choontae Ghoon ny Ghoal, Nerin eh Bun Dobhráin (; Yernish son "Bun Ushtey Beg" ny "Bun Doouran"). Ta'n balley ny hoie er yn N15 faggys da Béal Átha Seanaidh eddyr Doon ny Ghoal as Shliggagh. Ta enney mooar er y valley myr fer jeh ny buill heyrey çheu faarkey share ayns Nerin. Ta'n balley er ny scarrey magh ayns daa rheynn liorish awin an Bhradóg - y Çheu Heear as y Çheu Hiar. Rere y choontey-phobble 'sy vlein 2006 va 1,706 deiney cummal 'sy valley hene, as 888 deiney elley ayns ny binn mygeayrt y mysh.

Bossan argid:
She lus sheer-vio blaaghey 'sy chynney Rosaceae eh bossan argid ny duillag argid (Argentina anserina). T'eh dooghyssagh da'n lieh-chruinney Hwoaie, er claddeeyn as lheeantyn dy mennick. V'ad cliaghtey cur eh 'sy ghenus "Potentilla", agh rish ny 1990yn hug ad eh stiagh ayns "Argentina".
Jalloo-oaylleeaght.
She lus lussagh injil t'ayn. Ta ny sthollaneyn snauee jiargey echey gaase wheesh as 80cm er lhiurid. Ta duillagyn rea-fedjagagh 10-20cm er lhiurid echey, as ny duillageenyn 2-5cm er lhiurid as oirr tonnagh oc. Ta fynney sheeidagh bane er duillagyn, gish as sthollaneyn. T'adsyn bun ennym cadjin y lus.
Ta blaaghyn buighey ec bossan argid, dagh fer ny lomarcan er gass 5-15cm er yrdjid; t'eh 1.5-2.5cm er crantessen. Ta queig dys shiaght petyllyn oc. She dhossan dy acheneyn çhirrym eh y mess oc.
Ymmyd.
Ta tey jeant jeh fraueyn bossan argid. V'ad cliaghtey gra dy row bree castey folley chammah's bree noi pian bolgey, glassey keeilley as ymmodee çhingyssyn beill. Ren ad ymmyd jeh'n lus noa noi brasney moon, as poodyrit noi çhingys craaee. V'ad cur ushtey drigit y lus er y chrackan noi brick ghreiney, pluccanyn as daah ny greiney.

Bossan doo:
She lus lussagh 'sy ghenus "Typha" eh bossan doo ny quiggal ny ben-shee (Typha latifolia). T'eh dooghyssagh da'n Oarpey, yn Affrick, America Hwoaie as Yiass, as yn Aishey. T'eh coontit myr sarkyl ruegyssagh 'syn Austrail as Hawaii. Ta feanish ayn dy vel eh ry-akin 'syn Indoneesh, yn Valaysia, Yn Teelynn Noa, Papooey Guinea Noa as ny h-Ellanyn Philippeenagh, agh cha nel eh dooghyssagh 'syn ardjyn shen.
T'eh ry-akin ayns ymmodee emshyraghtyn çhirrym ny fliugh. T'eh gaase eddyr ardjid ny marrey as 2,300m er yrjid. Ta feme echey er ushtey, myr egintagh thalloo fliugh. T'eh gaase ayns buill baiht raad nagh vel ushtey erskyn 0.8m, son y chooid smoo. Ny keayrtyn, t'eh gaase myr breshag snauee ayns ushtey dowin. Share da ushtey millish, agh t'eh surranse beggan sailjys. My ta'n sailjys lhaggaghey, foddee eh goaill yn ynnyd jeh dooieyn dooghyssagh reeastyn gortey, as myr shen ve ny harkyl ruegyssagh. 
Jalloo-oaylleeaght.
T'eh gaase wheesh as 3m er yrjid. Ta duillagyn 2-4cm er lheead echey.
Ymmyd.
Va dooghyssee America gee raisoamyn bossan doo, chammah's binn ny duillagyn as dhossanyn blaaghey aegey. Ta raisoamyn yn-ee erreish daue goll er coagyrey as speeiney; ta ny gish as duillagyn yn-ee aw ny coagyrit. T'eh soo stiagh broid ass yn ushtey, myr shen, cha nel eh sauçhey ee adsyn ya gaase ayns ushtey broighit.

Lus lussagh:
Ta lus lussagh ny lus gyn sheer-ghass fuyghagh erskyn thallooin. Ta ny duillagyn as gish erskyn thallooin eck fioghey ec jerrey'n imbagh aase. Ta lossreeyn lussagh sheer-vio, bleinoil as daa-vleinoil ayn. Ta lossreeyn lussagh bleinoil geddyn baase erreish daue ymmyrkey mess, ny ec jerrey'n imbagh, as gaase reesht jeh'n rass oc. Ta gish lossreeyn lussagh daa-vleinoil ny sheer-vio fioghey, agh ta oltyn elley tannaghtyn bio, myr sampleyr fraueyn, cormaneyn, sthollaneyn ny raisoamyn. Ta daa-vleintagyn lussagh goaill stiagh carradje, cushag, as pesmad; ta lossreeyn sheer-vio goaill stiagh lus ny keylley, ymmodee renniee as mynthey. Ta gish fuyghagh lossreeyn sheer-vio neulussagh tannaghtyn bio erskyn thallooin car ny bleeaney as cur magh stholeyn 'syn imbagh aase; t'adsyn goaill stiagh biljyn as crouwyn.

Bossan feeackle:
Ta bossan feeackle çheet er lossreeyn 'sy ghenus "Viola". Ny keayrtyn, t'eh shassoo noi "blaa villish", as cowraghey dooieyn "Viola" gyn soar; agh ny keayrtyn t'eh çheet er blaa villish myrgeddin. Ta bossanyn feeackle goaill stiagh:

Bossan friogganagh:
She lus ushtee lussagh eh bossan friogganagh (Subularia aquatica). T'eh dooghyssagh da'n Euraishey as America Hwoaie hwoaie. Ta daa arraghys ayn: "Subularia aquatica" arr. "aquatica" 'syn Oarpey, as "Subularia aquatica" arr. "americana" ayns America Hwoaie. 
Jalloo-oaylleeaght.
Ta duillagyn menneeagh reaghit ayns caslagh echey. T'ad gaase jeh cormane. Ta blaaghyn baney 1mm er crantessen echey. Adsyn ta gaase harrish eaghtyn yn ushtey, t'ad fosley; adsyn ta tannaghtyn fo-ushtey, t'ad hene-phollnaghey. She fynneig pheeogeagh sheidit seose y mess oc.

Bambi:
She scannane drama bioghit Americaanagh voish y vlein 1942 eh Bambi. V'eh stiurit ec David Hand, gientit ec Walt Disney as bunnit er y lioar "Bambi. Eine Lebensgeschichte aus dem Walde" (1923), v'er ny skeaylley magh ayns çheeraghyn Baarlagh myr "Bambi, A Life in the Woods" (), liorish yn ughtar as shelgeyr Austeyragh Felix Salten. Hie yn scannane er ny skeaylley liorish RKO Radio Pictures er 13 Luanistyn 1942, as t'eh ny wheiggoo ard-scannane bioghit.

Bossan gennish:
She lus sheer-vio eh bossan gennish (Epimedium alpinum). 
Jalloo-oaylleeaght.
T'eh gaase wheesh as 40cm er yrjid. Ta fraue snauee echey, as gass jeeragh. Ta duillagyn fedjagagh echey. Ta ny duillageenyn 4-8cm er lhiurid as cree-chrooagh; ta oirr jialgagh oc. Ta blaaghyn 1cm er crantessen echey; ta ny petylyn buighey as ny seepalyn glassey dys jiargey. She follicle wheesh as 2cm er lhiurid eh y mess echey.

Dumbo:
She scannane fansee bioghit Americaanagh voish y vlein 1941 eh Dumbo. Va'n scannane gientit liorish Walt Disney Productions as skeallit magh liorish RKO Radio Pictures. Y kiarroo ard-scannane bioghit Disney, t'eh bunnit er linney skeeal va screeuit ec Helen Aberson as Harold Pearl, as tayrnit liorish Helen Durney son frauehoylley gaih noagh ("Roll-a-Book"). She Jumbo Jr. yn ard-characteyr, elefant lesh y far-ennym dewil "Dumbo" haink ass "dumb" "ommidagh". Car y vea echey, t'eh geddyn fannidys er son y cleayshyn mooarey. Agh, ta cummaght yn etlagh echey as eh jargal etlagh liorish ymmyd e chleayshyn myr skianyn. Car y chooid smoo jeh'n vea echey, goaill magh e voir, she Timothy y lugh yn ynrican carrey echey.

Béal Átha Seanaidh:
She balley ayns jiass Choontae Ghoon ny Ghoal, Nerin eh Béal Átha Seanaidh (; Yernish son "Beeal Aah Seanaigh" ny "Beeal Aah Seanaidh"). Ta'n balley ny hoie er yn N15 faggys da Bun Dobhráin eddyr Doon ny Ghoal as Shliggagh. Ta'n balley soit er inver Awin an Éirne

Breizh-Izel:
Ta Breizh-Izel (, Britaanish son "y Vritaan Eeghtyragh" ny "y Vritaan Injil") çheet er ayrnyn jeh'n Vritaan çheu heear jeh Ploermael raad dy row yn Vritaanish goll er loayrt dy tradishoonagh as raad dy vel kianglaghyn bentyn rish y çhengey ry-akin dy mennick. Ta'n enmys ny noi-chowrey rish Breizh-Uhel ("Y Vritaan Eaghtyragh"), y chooid jeh'n Vritaan ta kianglt rish y chultoor Romanagh.

Fañch Broudig:
She earisheyr as screeudeyr Britaanagh eh Fañch Broudig (er enney myr François Broudic da'n steat theayagh; v'er ny ruggey 'sy vlein 1946). Ta e chooid screeuyn scruit 'sy Vritaanish as 'sy Rangish. Rug eh ayns Lannuon (Aodoù-an-Arvor).
Ym-ysseraght.
Eddyr ny bleeantyn 1964 as 2007 ren eh leayrey claareyn 'sy Vritaanish er y radio, as veih'n vlein 1971 er y çhellveeish (France 3 Bretagne) myrane lesh e obbraghyn myr docamadeyr ayns Laare-Undinys Ronsaght Britaanagh as Celtiagh jeh Ollooscoil Brest.
By scrudeyr ayns Bing Chooishagh da'n Vritaanish eh veih 1968 derrey 1970, as shiartanse dy chooishyn er nyn stiurey ec y ving 'sy traa shen, goaill stiagh shooyl veih Ploue gys An Oriant 'sy vlein 1970. Ny lurg shen, hie eh gimmeeaght dy politickagh lesh y PCF lesh e chaarjyn Yves Le Berre as Jean Le Dû, fir ynsee ny Britaanish ayns Ollooscoil Brest.
'Sy vlein 1975 v'eh pointit myr fer toshee naight 'sy Vritaanish ayns Brest, as veih'n vlein 1991 v'eh ny leayreyder obbree er claareeyn Britaanish lesh France 3 Ouest. Dirree eh magh ass yn oik dy h-oikoil 'sy vlein 2009.
Screeudeyr as reagheyder.
She eear-chiannoort er yn Undinys Cultooragh Britaanagh - Emgleo Breiz - as eh ny chaairliagh er yn undinys shen. Rere shen ta freggyrtys echey er ny lhiegganyn Britaanish jeh Emgleo Breiz, jeh'n earishlioar lettyragh Vritaanish Brud Nevez, as jeh ny h-earishlioaryn ynsee Britaanish Ar Skol vrezoneg as Ar Helenner. Ta'n possan shen dy chopharteeys, lesh nyn gione-cherro ec 4 rue Yves Collet ayns Brest, jannoo soiagh jeh'n chair-screeu ollooscoillagh (t'er ny treigeil feie tammylt beg), ayns cosoylaght rish y chair-screeu fo'n ennym Peurunvan - cair-screeu ny smoo lheeadagh.
Ta ny cuir magh ny s'anmey veih Fañch Broudig cur ry-cheilley shennaghys as aafilley ny Britaanish, goaill stiagh yn kione argane echey er cliaghtey ny Britaanish.
Coyrt seose.
Veih'n traa ren eh irree magh ass oik, t'eh gobbragh lesh "Armor Magazine" as t'eh stiurey towshanyn dy mennick da Coonseil Ardjynagh ny Britaan as da Reiltaght Hie Ynsee Roazhon.

Stourm ar Brezhoneg:
She sheshaght Vritaanagh eh Stourm ar Brezhoneg (Britaanish son "Caggey er son y Vritaanish"). Va'n çheshaght currit er bun 'sy vlein 1984 as t'ee shirrey slattys oikoil da'n Vritaanish 'sy theihll theayagh.
Ta'n çheshaght geddyn cooney veih Skoazell Vreizh.

Brest:
Foddee dy vel Brest çheet er:

Bossan gorrym:
She lus 'sy chynney Campanulaceae eh bossan gorrym (Jasione montana). T'eh gaase ayns ardjyn sleitagh ny h-Oarpey as ny h-Aishey heear, er reeastaneyn ardjey ayns eayninyn as quarralyn raad ta'n thalloo thanney. Share da thalloo geyre, as cha nel eh gaase er clagh eayil. 
Jalloo-oaylleeaght.
She daa-vleintag beg t'ayn. T'eh gaase wheesh as trie er yrjid. Ta duillagyn linnagh-dronuillinag dys sleeanagh echey, reaghit ayns cummey rose. Ta oirr honnagh oc as eaghtyr caulgagh. Ta blaaghyn gorrym ayns kione blaaghey echey; ta 5 anthyryn kianglt ec y vun dys feddan. Ta ny anthyryn appee roish ny s'leaie na ny stigmaghyn, dys lhiettal hene-phollnaghey. T'ad goll er pollnaghey ec shey-chassee. Ta ny blaaghyn so-akin fo soilshey erskyn-ghorrym, dys tayrn shey-chassee phollnee, foddee.

Richard Jebb:
Foddee dy row shiu çheet er:

Richard Jebb (leighder):
She leighder, briw, as politickeyr va'n Reejerey Richard Claverhouse Jebb (27 Jerrey Geuree 1807 — 7 Jerrey Geuree 1884). Rug eh ayns Divlyn, Nerin lesh Richard Jebb as Louisa Finlay, inneen lesh Oltey Pharlamaid Nerin John Finlay. Hooar Jebb e cheim veih Colaashtey ny Trinaid, Divlyn as v'eh symnit gys y Ving Hostynagh 'sy vlein 1832. V'eh pointit myr Briw Agglish er 16 Nollick 1861.

Josephine Kermode:
She screeudeyr cloie as feelee Manninagh va Josephine 'Cushag' Kermode (1852 — 1937). Rug ee ayns Balley ny Loghey, Mannin. She inneen lesh yn Arrymagh William Kermode as shuyr lesh P.M.C. Kermode v'ee. Cha ren ee rieau poosey, agh ren ee gobbragh myr ben thie da'n vraar eck. Tra hooar eh baase hie ee gys Bournemouth, Sostyn, son cummal lesh e shuyr raad hooar ee baase 'sy vlein 1937. V'ee oanluckit ayns Wimbourne.

Gurneilys ynnydagh ayns Mannin:
Va'n gurneilys ynnydagh ayns Mannin bunnit er 6 sheadinyn, as ad er ny rheynn magh ayns 17 skeeraghyn. Jiu, ta'n ellan er ny rheynn magh ayns slystyn balley, slystyn balley beg as slystyn skeerey son cooishyn gurneilys ynnydagh myr:
Sheadinyn.
Ta Mannin er ny rheynn magh ayns shey sheadinyn: Inver Ayre, Glion Faba, Garff, Maayl, Rosien as Medall. T'ad ymmydit nish son:
Cha nel fys shickyr mychione çheet neose yn 'ockle "sheadin". Ta tree sheiltynyssyn ayn:

Ellan çhengey:
Ta ellan çhengey çheet er ard raad ta mynlught çhengey ennagh cruinnit mygeayrt ec çhengey elley. Ta'n fockle bentyn rish ardjyn beggey; cha nel ad cur "ellan çhengey" er çheeraghyn. Er son ellan çhengey y ve ayn, ta feme ayn dy vel y çhengey goll er loayrt 'sy voir-heer eck foast.
Bunnaghey ellan çhengey.
Ta ellan çhengey troggal ass eddyr-obbraghey daa hengey.

Boston:
She preeu-valley as y chaayr smoo ayns Massachusetts, ny Steatyn Unnaneysit, eh Boston. She nane jeh ny caayryn shinney ayns ny Steatyn Unnaneysit. Er-yn-oyr dy vel eh ny chaayr smoo ayns Sostyn Noa, ta Boston coontit myr preeu-valley neu-oikoil Hostyn Noa er son y vuilley tarmaynagh as cultooragh er y clane ard. Rere y coontey-pobble 'sy vlein 2010 va 617,594 deiney cummal 'sy chaayr hene, agh va 4.5 millioonyn dy leih cummal 'syn ard moir-valjagh Boston Mooar. Rere shen t'ee ny jeihoo ard moir-valjagh smoo 'sy çheer.

The Fox and the Hound:
She scannane drama bioghit Americaanagh voish y vlein 1981 eh The Fox and the Hound. Hie yn scannane er ny ghientyn ec Walt Disney Productions as bunnit dy anhickyr er y noaskeeal liorish Daniel P. Mannix fo'n ennym cheddin. Y 24oo ard-scannane bioghit Disney, ta'n scannane goll er gra skeeal er daa charrey neulicklee, shynnagh ruy ta enmyssit Tod as coo ta enmyssit Copper. Ta'n daa jeu streeu yn chaarjys eddyr oc y 'reill gyn y wooise da nyn nooghys ta girree as ny broojyn sheshoil mygeayrt-y-moosyn.
Va'n scannane stiurit ec Ted Berman as Richard Rich as chur ny h-aghteyryn Kurt Russell, Mickey Rooney, Pearl Bailey, Pat Buttram, Sandy Duncan, Richard Bakalyan, Paul Winchell, Jack Albertson, Jeanette Nolan, John Fiedler, John McIntire, Keith Coogan, as Corey Feldman nyn ghoo lesh y scannane. Hie yn scannane er ny skeaylley magh er 10 Jerrey Souree 1981. Tra haink eh magh v'eh ny scannane bioghit smoo costallagh mastey ny scannaneyn rieau, as $12 millioonyn y costys echey.

Bossan ingyr:
She lus lussagh 'sy chynney Brassicaceae eh bossan ingyr (Draba verna). T'eh dooghyssagh da'n Oarpey, yn Affrick hwoaie, yn Aishey hempreilagh as America heear hwoaie.
Jalloo-oaylleeaght.
T'eh gaase wheesh as 8cm er yrjid ass bun-fraue. Ta'n ghass jeeragh as gyn folt. Ta ny duillagyn echey ayns cummey rose; ta ny duillagyn s'inshley spaddylagh as ta cass oc. Ta ny duillagyn s'yrdjey gyn chass, spaddylagh, as ta oirr rea oc as baare geyre oc. Ta ny duillagyn wheesh as 1cm er lhiurid as 3-4mm er lheead. 
Ta crouw-vlaaghey oc. Ta frauaigyn 2-3mm er lhiurid rish blaaghey, dys 1cm rish ymmyrkey mess, as gyn clooie. Ta kiare petyllyn ec ny blaaghyn, 3mm er lhiurid as 2mm er lheead. T'ad cruinn. Ta shey staimynyn jeeragh oc, as kiare seepalyn glassey as oirr vane oc. Ta mess eelipsagh dys oohchrooagh oc, wheesh as 5mm er lhiurid as 4mm er lheead, as ymmodee rassyn ayn.

Keyrrey loaghtan:
She sheelrey dy chirree as y bun oc ayns Mannin y cheyrrey loaghtan. Ta ollan ghone ghorraghey as dy cadjin ta kiare, ny ny keayrtyn shey, eairkyn orroo.
She lught fuilleeagh jeh ny kirree vunneydagh v'er gheddyn er feie ny h-Albey, Inshyn Goal as Shetlynn foddey er-dy-henney. T'ad coontit myr fir jeh ny sheelraghyn giare-fammanagh Oarpagh Hwoaie. T'ad beg er mooadys, gyn ollan er yn eddin oc ny er ny cassyn. Ta daah dhone dorraghey er yn eddin as ny cassyn. Cha nel agh eairkyn giarey er ny h-oashtyn agh t'ad ny s'troshey as ny s'liurey er ny reaghyn.

Mona Douglas:
By veeal-arrisheyr, screeudeyr, vard, as immeeaghtagh Manninagh ee Constance Mona Douglas (18 Mean Fouyir 1898 – 8 Jerrey Fouyir 1987). 
Aegid.
Ta sleih ennagh gra dy row ee ruggit ec 49 Allerton Road, Much Woolton, Lerphoyll, Sostyn, as sleih elley gra dy row ee ruggit er y vaatey paggad "Ellan Vannin" er y vollagh keayin eddyr Mannin as Lerphoyll. By inneen ee lesh Frank Beardmore Douglas (c. 1864–1943), stiureyder shapp, as e ven heshee, Frances Mona Holmes (c. 1873–1953). 
By phaitçhey ynrickan ee, as er-yn-oyr dy row ee çhing 'syn aegid eck v'ee ynsit 'sy valley eck faggys da Laksaa. Cheau ee ny laghyn seyrey paitçhey eck lesh e shenn ayr as e shenn voir ayns Mannin, raad ren ee goll feie ny çheerey, taggloo lesh ny fir as ny mraane va gobbraghey ayns ny magheryn as er y cheayn. 
Ren Sophia Morrison (1859 - 1917) foaddey yn anaase eck 'sy veeal-arrish. Ren ee cur creeaght aynjee son dy screeu sheese ny skeealyn as ny h-arraneyn ren ee clashtyn. Ren Morrison lhiasaghey yn anaase ec Douglas ayns dagh red Celtiagh, as ren yn anaase shen tannaghtyn lhee feie yn theihll eck. Va çhaglym jeh ny daanyn eck fo'n ennym "Manx Song and Maiden Song" currit er clou 'sy vlein 1915 myr y chied jeh'n straih "Little Books of Georgian Verse" tra nagh row ee agh 16 bleeaney d'eash. Daa vlein ny lurg va ym-lioar elley currit magh eck fo'n ennym "Mychurachan". 
'Sy vlein 1917 v'ee lhiggit stiagh gys y trass oardyr jeh Gorsedd ny Bardyn ec yn eisteddfod doo ayns Kione Beih. Ren ee goll quail lesh ram screeudeyryn, scoillaryn, as politickeyryn cleaynoil, goaill stiagh W. B. Yeats, George William Russell (Æ), Maud Gonne, as T. E. Lawrence. By scrudeyr vanglane Manninagh y Chohaglym Celtiagh ee 'sy vlein 1921, as daa lioar as tree cloiaghyn dyn gur magh eck. 
'Sy vlein 1925 ren ee arraghey gys Harlech, Gwynedd, raad ren ee gobbraghey myr scrudeyr da'n feelee A. P. Graves tra va'n hene-veashnys "To Return to All That" er ny screeu echey. Hug Graves cree j'ee son dy gholl gys Lunnin son e caaghyn as e taghyrtyn y lhiasaghey. Tra v'ee hoal, ren ee niartal e kianglaghyn lesh yn English Folk Dance Society ("Sheshaght Daunse Çheerey Hostyn"), raad v'ee co-screeu lesh A. G. Gilchrist. S'leayr dy ren ee cur da tree cuirraghyn magh (1924-26) liorish Gilchrist jeh earish-lioar ny sheshaght as ad currit da kiaull çheerey Vanninagh. Myrane lesh shen, ren ee co-obbraghey marish Arnold Foster er y chied phossan mastey tree possanyn d'oardee jeh arraneyn Manninagh.
Ayns Mannin.
Ayns ny 1930yn hie Douglas er ash son beaghey ayns Mannin as ren ee gobbraghey 'sy Lioarlann Çheerey. Ren ee gobbraghey feie'n theihll eck, as ren ee gynsaghey arraneyn, daunseyn, skeealyn as shennaghys yn ellan dys ny deiney Manninagh aegey. Screeu ee daanyn as artyn da earish-lioaryn acadoil, myrane lesh screeu as leayrey cloiaghyn 'sy Ghaelg as 'sy Vaarle Vanninagh. Lurg dirree ee ass obbyr, ren ee gobbraghey myr earisheyr feie queig bleeaney as feed ny smoo. Ren ee cur magh daa noa-skeeal ("Song of Mannin", 1976, as "Rallying Song", 1981) as ad cur stiagh e credjueyn cultooragh, politickagh, as crauee. 'Sy vlein 1976 ren ee aavioghey "Yn Chruinnaght", feailley daunse, kiaull, as lettyraght Vannin.
Cha ren Douglas poosey rieau, agh va caarjys trome eddyr ee as Nikolai Giovannelli veih'n traa roish y Nah Chaggey Dowanagh derrey laa e vaaish ayns ny 1980yn leah. Ren ee cur ooashley ayns cabbalyn Saasilagh as ayns kialteenyn Catoleagh Raueagh, agh va cleayney mooar eck rish spyrrydys Creestee jeh'n çhenn agglish Cheltiagh. By chree jeh ny daanyn as prose ashlinagh eck spyrryd Vanannan as ‘y coheshaghtys gial’.
Ayns Bleeantyn Ny S'anmey.
Va Aundyr Mannanan bronnit er Douglas 'sy vlein 1972, as 'sy vlein 1982 hooar ee MBE er son ny shirveishyn eck rish cultoor Vannin. Myrane lesh shen, va eaghtyraneyssyn y Chohaglym Celtiagh, as yn 'Eailley Ooilley-Cheltiaghys ayns Keeill Airney (1980) as by ee yn chied çhaghter Manninagh ayns Eisteddfod Ashoonagh Vretyn (1981). By phatroon Undinys Eiraght Vannin ee 'sy vlein 1986, as va olteynys y phreeu-oardyr ayns Gorsedd ny Bardyn bronnit urree 'sy vlein 1987. Va Reih Bleeaney Vanannan bronnit urree 'sy vlein 1988 lurg e baaish.
Baase.
Tammylt giare roish Nollick 1986 huitt Douglas as ren ee brishey e cass, agh gyn y wooise da coyrle e caarjyn, cha ren ee arraghey veih'n thie ech ayns ny cruink. Ansherbee, kuse veg dy veeghyn ny yei v'ee lhiggit stiagh ayns Thie Lheihys Noble ayns Streng, Doolish, raad hooar ee baase er 8 Jerrey Fouyir 1987.

Eisteddfod:
She feilley Bretnagh jeh lettyraght, kiaull as cloie eh yn eisteddfod (focklit magh myr yl-rey "eisteddfodau" [ə(i)stɛðˈvɔdaɨ). Ta'n tradishoon shoh goll foddey sheear gys y 12oo eash er y chooid sloo tra ren Rhys ap Gruffydd ass Deheubarth cur feilley jeh bardaght as kiaull ry cheilley ec y chooyrt echey echey ayns Aberteifi 'sy vlein 1176. Ansherbee, lesh failleil yn tradishoon bardagh, huitt eh ayns neuymmyd. Ta'n cummey noa-emshyragh çheet magh ass aavioghey 'sy hoghtoo eash jeig as eh hene çheet ass ymmodee d'eisteddfodyn neuformoil. Ta'n fockle "eisteddfod" çheet magh ass "eistedd" ("soie") as "bod" ("bee"), as lesh shen t'eh keeayllaghey "ve nyn soie" ny "ve nyn soie ry-cheilley" (ta "bod" er ny voggaghey gys "fod").

Woolton:
She fo-valley Lerphoyll, Merseyside, Sostyn eh Woolton. Myrane lesh shen, t'eh ny wardys da Coonceil Chaayragh Lerphoyll. T'eh ny hoie ayns jiass y chaayr, as t'eh caglit liorish Gateacre, Hunts Cross, Allerton as Halewood. Rere coontey-pobble 'sy vlein 2001 va 14,836 deiney cummal 'sy valley.

Kione Beih:
She balley ayns Balley Corpagh Moirvaljagh Wirral ayns Merseyside, Sostyn eh Kione Beih (). T'eh ny hoie er Lieh-innys Wirral er broogh heear yn awin Mersey, eddin ry eddin lesh Caayr Lerphoyll. Rere coontey-pobble 'sy vlein 2001 va 83,729 deiney cummal 'sy valley.

Beeal-arrish:
Ta beeal-arrish çheet er ny shenn-skeealyn, y chiaull, y veeal-hennaghys, ny shennocklyn, ny spotçhyn, ny faasechredjueyn, ny far-skeealyn as shee-skeealyn as cliaghtaghyn bentyn rish cultoor, fo-chultoor, ny possan ennagh. Myrane lesh shen t'ee çheet er y phossan dy chliaghtaghyn bentyn rish aghtey ny shaanraghyn dreaghagh shen. Ta'n fockle çheet ass yn daa 'ockle "beeal" as "arrish" ta keeayllaghey "aa-obbyr", "aaloayrtys" ny "aayannoo".

Phil Gawne:
She politickeyr, eirinagh as coontysseyr Manninagh Philip "Phil" Anderson Gawne (ruggit 19 Toshiaght Arree 1965). V'eh ruggit ayns Doolish, Mannin as she mac lesh C. R. Gawne as E. Gawne eh. T'eh poosit rish Catherine Annie Kissack as ta mac (Ewan) as inneen (Catreeney) echey. V'eh reiht myr Oltey yn Chiare as Feed son Rosien 'sy vlein 2003. She Shirveishagh Bun-troggalys t'ayn veih'n vlein 2010, as roish shen by Hirveishagh 'sy Rheynn Eirinys, Eeastagh as Keylljyn eh roish shen.
Ec y traa t'ayn t'eh cummal ayns Sulby ayns jiass Vannin. V'eh ynsit ayns Bunscoill Chairbre, as Ard-scoill Chashtal Rosien. Hooar eh magh keim (BSc(Hons) ayns Bea-chemmig) veih Ollooscoill Lerphoyll.
She loayreyder glen y Ghaelg t'ayn, as ram jeant echey er son y çhengey. Cheau eh tammylt myr yn Greinneyder. T'eh er ceau 16 meeghyn ayns pryssoonaght son lostey. Ren eh hene lesh fir elley lostey thieyn ayns Mannin myr çhionnraa noi'n arraghey stiagh gys Mannin jeh Sostynee, as ad, 'syn reayrt echey, jannoo jeeill da'n chultoor ynnydagh.

Yn Chruinnaght:
She feailley cultooragh Manninagh ee Yn Chruinnaght ta kelloorey kiaull, çhengey as cultoor Vannin, myrane lesh ny kianglaghyn eddyr Mannin as ny h-ashoonyn Celtiagh elley.
Va roie-haghter yn Chruinnaght currit er bun 'sy vlein 1924 myr Cruinnaght Vanninagh Ashoonagh. By heiltynys ec William Cubbon, y chied stiureyder er Thie Tashtee Vannin as Tashteyder Onnoragh yn Çheshaght Ghailckagh as Heshaght Vanninagh y Theihll (SVT).
Ta claareeyn veih ny feaillaghyn lheah gra dy vel "Yn Cruinnaght Vanninagh Ashoonagh goll fo currym Heshaght Vanninagh y Theihll as y Çheshaght Ghailckagh ayns cooinaghtyn da'n Feelee Ashoonagh mooar as son dy 'reayll y smooinaght ashoonagh". By chur sheese er yn feelee Thomas Edward Brown (1830-1897) eh "yn Feelee Ashoonagh mooar" ren screeu daanyn, goaill stiagh rane-skeealyn liauyrey 'sy Vaarle Vanninagh (lesh focklyn ennagh jeh'n Ghaelg ny mast'oc) as ad er nyn gur magh ec Macmillan.
Va'n Chruinnaght Ashoonagh Vanninagh er ny reaghey ec William Cubbon trooid earish-lioar yn SVT, "Ellan Vannin". By 'eailley un-laa, cohirreydagh v'er ny gholl er shooyl ec Sauin, lesh commee veih'n Ellan (ga dy daink un vriw er y chooid sloo, J. E. Lyon, harrish ny tonnyn). By olteynyn jeh ny fo-vingyn eigsoylagh ad Archibald Knox, J. J. Kneen as Mona Douglas, mastey deiney elley. Va'n feailley jeant seose jeh'n arraneys (goaill stiagh arraneyn 'sy Ghaelg), y chiaull, as cuirrey kiaull mooar myr cooish yerrinagh, chammah as ny h-ellynyn, ny keirdyn, as y choagyraght. Haink jerrey lesh yn 'eailley tra vrish y Nah Chaggey Dowanagh magh.
By reayrtys ec Mona Douglas Yn Chruinnaght y aavioghey myr feailley ashoonagh Vannin ny lurg. Ren aavioghey cultooragh ayns ny 1960yn jeianagh aavioghey 'sy Ghaelg, myrane lesh aavioghey 'sy chiaull tradishoonagh, as 'sy daunse Manninagh er lheh. Ren Douglas cur enney er yn aght dy voddagh Yn Chruinnaght cloie paart myr cree son immeeaghtyn cultooragh as myr mod son dy chur ny smoo enney 'sy chultoor tradishoonagh ayns Mannin.
'Sy vlein 1977 ren Douglas reaghey Feailley Vanninagh Rhumsaa. Haghyr eh er Jerdein er y 1d laa Mean Fouyir marish co-obbraghey lesh yn reagheydys Ellynyn ny Gael. Va cowrey noa-emshyragh Yn Chruinnaght ry-akin er coodagh, as çheu sthie, jeh'n chlaare. Ec jerrey yn chlaare va fogrey ayn mychione aavioghey Yn Chruinnaght ayns Rhumsaa ayns Luanistyn-Mean Fouyir 1978, as dy "nee feailley Eddyr-Cheltiagh queig-laa dy beagh ayn". Haghyr eh eddyr y 21d as y 25oo laa Luanistyn 1978.
Ayns notey 'sy chlaare screeu Douglas 'sy vlein 1979 dy row yn reaghey goll er chur er ny reagheyderyn yn feailley y chuirrey ayns Rhumsaa, er-yn-oyr nagh row feailley scanshoil mooar ec y valley neughollrish ny baljyn elley er yn ellan, as er-yn-oyr dy row Rhumsaa, gollrish Purt ny h-Inshey, myr nane jeh ny h-ynnydyn da'n aavioghey ashoonagh.
Ga nagh row 'sy Chruinnaght Vanninagh Ashoonagh agh feailley v'er kelloorey yn cultoor Manninagh, ren Douglas cur Yn Chruinnaght er bun 'sy chummey noa-emshyragh myr feailley eddyr-Cheltiagh, as va caa currit da commee ny shey h-ashoonyn veih Mannin, Nalbin, yn Vritaan, Nerin, Bretyn as y Chorn. Hooar yn Chruinnaght enney oikoil veih An tOireachtas (Nerin), Gorsedd y Beirdd as Yr Eisteddfod Genedlaethol (Bretyn), as Am Mòd (Nalbin).
Haghyr cloiaghyn er feie yn Ellan, agh eddyr ny bleeantyn 1978 derrey 2006, by eh Rhumsaa cree yn Chruinnaght. Va ram caaghyn ayn ayns Rhumsaa da'n Chruinnaght 'sy valley, goaill stiagh thieyn oast eigsoylagh as y Halley Baljey, kialteenyn eigsoylagh, as margey ny sthock. Beggan as beggan, cha row cha mooar as ny h-ynnydyn shen ry-gheddyn as dirree er paalan buillvollee dy ve ny chowrey 'syn 'eailley. Ansherbee, er-yn-oyr nagh row yn boayl da'n phaalan buillvollee ry-gheddyn da'n Chruinnaght 'sy vlein 2007, va'n cree arrit dys Purt ny h-Inshey raad va ny caaghyn ayns Laare y Cheead Blein kiarail boayl ree-vie.

Harlech:
She balley as ynnyd seyrey marrey ayns Gwynedd, heear hwoaie Vretyn, eh Harlech. T'eh ny lhie er Baie Tremadog çheu sthie jeh Pairk Ashoonagh Eryri. Ta 1,952 deiney cummal 'sy valley, as ta 59% jeu nyn Mretnisheyryn.

William Cubbon:
She lioarlannee, screeudeyr shennaghys, vea-skeealeyder as immeeaghtagh Manninagh va William Cubbon (28 Boaldyn 1865 - 1 Jerrey Geuree 1955). Rug eh ayns Croit y Caley, Rosien. She mac lesh James Cubbon v'eh, aa-ard-varrinagh voish Purt le Moirrey. Hoshee eh yn aght beaghee echey myr prindeys prentyr. Haink er dy ve ny reireyder as ny reagheyder shallidagh er y phabyr "Isle of Man Examiner". Ny s'anmey 'sy vlein 1900, haink er dy ve ny cho-hellooder er y "Manx Sun" derrey haink eh ry-cheilley lesh yn "Isle of Man Times" ayns 1906. 'Sy vlein 1912 v'eh pointit myr Lioarlannee Corpagh Ghoolish. Chur eh yn cummey "roshtynaght foshlit" stiagh 'sy lioarlann son eeasaght lioaryn mastey lhiassaghyn elley. Hoshee eh yn Oik Faillee fo currym y Reiltys 'sy vlein 1917 as v'eh pointit myr reireyder er yn oik shen. Ayns 1922 v'eh pointit myr Scrudeyr as Lioarlannee er Thie Tashtee Vannin, as 'sy vlein 1932 v'eh jeant meoir er y thie tashtee. She reagheyder va Cubbon er y chied haglym son dy chur er bun sheshaght noa da'n Ghailck as beggan ny lurg v'eh reiht myr Eaghtyrane er y çheshaght noa shen - yn Çheshaght Ghailckagh. Myrane lesh yn obbyr echey er son y Ghailck, ren eh gobbraghey lesh Sheshaght Tushtey Najoor as Shenndaght Ellan Vannin, sheshaght er ny row eh ny Eaghtyrane myrgeddin. Ren eh cur magh ram lioaryn as obbraghyn goaill stiagh "Book of Manx Poetry" (1913), "Manx Christian Names" (1923), "A Bibliographical Account of the Literature of the Isle of Man" (1933), as "Island Heritage" (1952).

Yernish Veanagh:
By hengey Ghaelgagh ee Yernish Veanagh. Hie ee er loayrt er feie Nerin, Nalbin as Mannin eddyr y 10oo as 12oo eash. Myr shen, she co-emshiragh y Çhenn Vaarle anmagh as y Vaarle Veanagh leah v'ayn.
Ta ny çhengaghyn Gaelgagh jeianagh nyn glein Yernish Veanagh. She çhengey smoo sheeynt Bretin Vooar v'ayn derrey'n 12oo eash anmagh as skeaylley Vaarle Veanagh. Bentyn rish tasht lettyraght er mayrn, cha nel monney çhengaghyn Oarpagh mean-eashagh corrym rish Yernish Veanagh. Ayns ayrn, shen kyndagh rish obbyr greimmaltagh kuse dy scoillaryn 'syn eash jeianagh leah. Ta mooadys ny feniagh-skeealyn, shennaghyssyn, noo-hennaghyssyn as reddyn elley cowraghey treisht ny Gaelgeyryn ynsit mean-eashagh 'sy çhengey v'oc. Ta'n chooid smoo jeh'n tasht lettyraght er mayrn ayns Nerin; cha nel monney ayns Nalbin ny Mannin. 

Ashoonaght:
She cur sheese er olteynys ashoon ny steat seyr ee ashoonaght. Ta seyraanaght er ny reaghey rere "jus soli", "jus sanguinis" ny dooghyssaghey. Ayns ardjyn ennagh y theihll, ta ashoonaght dooiney er ny reaghey liorish yn chynneeaghys oc, as cha nee liorish y teyraanaght. Ta'n ashoonaght fordrail reillys y steat er yn dooinney as t'ee fordrail yn dooinney coadey yn steat er.

John Kelly (scoillar):
By scoillar, fockleyreyder as hirveishagh agglishagh eh John Kelly ny Juan y Kelly (1750 – 1809). 
Aegid as Ynsagh.
By vac lesh yn eirinagh as y chubeyr William Kelly as e ven heshee Alice Kewley. V'eh ruggit er shellooderys yn ayr echey ayns Algaar, Boaldyn, faggys da Doolish. Ren Kelly poosey rish Louisa Dolland, inneen lesh Peter Dolland, as oe 'neen John Dolland, 'sy vlein 1784 ny 1785 Va un vac oc, Gordon William Kelly. By eh Gordon William Kelly ren cur yn "Aundyr Manninagh" ayns Colleish Ree Illiam. Hie eh gynsaghey ayns Colaashtey Noo Eoin, Cambridge raad hooar eh LL.B. 'sy vlein 1794 as LL.D. 'sy vlein 1799.
Çhyndaays y Vible Ghaelgagh.
V'eh ynsit ec yn Arrymagh Philip Moore, Mainshtyr y Scoill Ghrammar Heyr ayns Doolish. T'eh raait dy row cooieaght vooar echey ayns dagh red bentyn rish yn ynsaghey, agh ayns e hengey ghooie er lheh. Er-yn-oyr shen, ren yn Aspick roie, Mark Hildesley, reih eshyn myr peiagh cooie da'n obbyr v'er goll rish çhyndaa yn Vible Chasherick, veih'n Vaarle dys y Ghaelg. S'leayr tra nagh row eh agh shey bleeaney jeig d'eash dy ren eh gobbraghey marish yn Arr. Moore er aavriwnys, kiartaghey, as aarlaghey y nah ym-lioar jeh'n Çhenn Chonaant (veih Job gys yn jerrey, goaill stiagh yn Apocryphey). Ren Kelly mac-screeu y trass ym-lioar, va cummal yn Conaant Noa, as ren eh kiartaghey ny prowallyn da'n chlou da'n slane Shenn Chonaant. Ayns Mean Souree 1768 hie eh ayns ny curmyn echey as ayns Mee Averil 1770 ren eh ymmyrkey y chied chooid jeh'n obbyr gys Whitehaven dy phrental. Tra v'eh gymmyrkey lesh y nah chooid hie yn lhong er ny brishey as, son dy choadey yn laue-screeuyn, dreill eh yn obbyr harrish yn ushtey feie queig ooryn derrey v'eh sauit. Va'n slane red creaghnit fo'n stiurey echey ayns Mee ny Nollick 1772, tammylt beg lurg baase Hildesley.
