'Sy vlein 1776 ny lurg hooar Kelly cuirrey veih'n Chohionnal Aspickagh ayns Inver Ayre dy ve nyn mochilley anmey. Hie eh er n'oardaghey myr jaghin liorish Aspick Carlisle. Ren eh beaghey ayns Inver Ayre derrey'n vlein 1779, tra hoshee eh gobbraghey myr ynseyder da mac yn Duic Gordon, markys Huntley. Ren eh stiurey studeyryssyn y varkys ayns Eton as ayns Cambridge, as hie eh er turrys marish gys vooar-rheynn. Tra haink eh erash 'sy vlein 1791, hooar Kelly y saggyrtys ayns Ardleigh faggys da Colchester, Sostyn. Dirree eh myr Reiltagh ayns Copford, faggys da Ardleigh 'sy vlein 1800. Ren eh tannaghtyn ayns Ardleigh derrey 1807.
Grammeydys Ghaelgagh.
Myrane lesh yn obbyr echey myr fer crauee as myr ynseyder, by scoillar as hengoayllee eh. Ren Kelly eiyrtys dy screeu sheese reillyn grammeydys y Ghaelg as fockleyr y çhengey. By obbyr neuaashagh v'ayn, er-yn-oyr dy row eh shen y chied eiyrtys e lheid obbyr shen y yannoo. Cha row echey myr cooney agh y Sushtal scruit liorish yn Noo Mian v'er ny chur magh liorish yn Aspick Wilson 'sy vlein 1748. Ren eh creaghney yn grammeydys 'sy vlein 1780, agh cha row eh currit magh agh 'sy vlein 1804 fo'n ennym "A Practical Grammar of the ancient Gaelic, or language of the Isle of Man, usually called Manks". Eddyr ny bleeantyn 1779 as 1790 ren eh creaghey yn chooid smoo jeh'n "magnum Opus" echey - fockleyr tree-hengagh jeh'n Ghaelg myr va goll er loayrt ayns Nalbin, Nerin as ayns Mannin - lesh çhyndaa Baarlagh echey fo'n ennym "A Triglot Dictionary of the Celtic tongue, as spoken in the Highlands of Scotland, Ireland, and the Isle of Man;". Ren eh cuirrey treealtyssyn dy phrental 'sy vlein 1805, as hoshee clou magh 'sy vlein 1807. 'Sy vlein 1808 va 63 duillagyn prentit as va dagh lettyr gys y lettyr L prentit tra vrish aile magh 'syn oik, as va begnagh dagh coip caillt. Hie yn chooid Vanninagh-Baarlagh er ny aachlou lesh caghlaaghyn, as marish cooid Vaarlagh-Manninagh, 'sy vlein 1866.

Whitehaven:
She balley beg as purt er coose Chumbria, Sostyn, eh Whitehaven (Baarle son "Y Phurt Vane"). T'eh ny hoie lieh-vollagh eddyr yn daa valley smoo 'sy choontae, Carlisle as Barrow-in-Furness, as ta Raad Yiarn Slystagh Chumbria as yn raad A595 goll trooid y valley. She ynnyd reiragh Valley Corpagh Copeland t'ayn, myrane lesh ard neu-skeerit.

Carlisle:
She balley coontae Chumbria, Sostyn, eh Carlisle (), Ta'n chaayr ny soie er çheet ry-cheilley ny h-awinyn Eden, Caldew as Petteril, 10 m (10 km) çheu yiass veih'n joarey lesh Nalbin. Ta Carlisle ny valley smoo 'sy choontae, as t'eh ny ynnyd reiragh son Coonseil Chaayragh Carlisle as Coonseil Coontae Chumbria. Rere y choontey-pobble 'sy vlein 2001 va 71,773 deiney cummal 'sy chaayr, as 100,734 'sy clane ard.

Charlotte's Web (scannane 1973):
She scannane kiaullee bioghit Americaanagh voish y vlein 1973 eh "Charlotte's Web". Hie yn scannane er ny ghientyn ec Hanna-Barbera Productions as Sagittarius Productions. Ta'n scannane bunnit er y lioar lesh yn ennym cheddin voish y vlein 1952 liorish E. B. White. Ta'n scannane, myrane lesh y lioar, ginsh skeeal mychione muc ren doo-oallee hushtagh fo'n ennym Charlotte sauçhey veih buitçhoorys. She fer jeh ny kiare scannaneyn liorish Hanna-Barbera nagh vel bunnit er ny cartoonyn çhellveeish ard-ghooagh oc — "C.H.O.M.P.S" (1979), "Heidi's Song" (1982) as "Once Upon a Forest" (1993).

Charlotte's Web:
She noaskeeal paitçhey veih'n vlein 1952 liorish E. B. White eh "Charlotte's Web". T'eh ginsh skeeal gowaltys, lught-thie y ghowaltys, as kuse dy veiyn ta cummal ayn. Ta bun y skeeal Wilbur, ny chollag muc aeg, as doo-oallee hushtagh enmyssit Charlotte ta ny hauçhey veih buitçhoorys. Ta'n skeeal tayrnit ec Garth Williams.
"Charlotte's Web" aachummit myr scannane kiaullee bioghit liorish Hanna-Barbera Productions as Sagittarius Productions 'sy vlein 1973. 

Gass (çhengoaylleeaght):
Ayns çhengoaylleeaght, ta gass ny ayrn fockle ta crogheydyssyn goll er kiangley ree. Ta daa ymmyd eck.
Rere un ymmyd, ta gass ny cummey nodmayd kiangley croghedyssyn ree. Myr sampleyr, ta "prindeysaghtyn" goaill stiagh "prindeys", ny gass ta'n crogheydys gientynagh "-aght" goll er kiangley ree dys croo gass noa, "prindeysaght". Ta'n crogheydys yn-filleydagh "-yn" goll er kiangley reeish. Ny keayrtyn, cha nel sleih coontey fraue yn 'ockle ("prindeys") myr gass.
Rere ymmyd elley, ta gass fockle ennagh yn ayrn jeh ta er mayrn ayns dagh cummey yn-fillit jeh. Aght soilshee elley, she y rheynn jeh fockle ta ayn roish my vees crogheydys yn-filleydagh erbee (m.s. earroo, keintys as emshir) goll er kiangley rish.. Rere'n ymmyd shoh, ta crogheydyssyn gientynagh nyn ayrnyn ny gass. Myr sampleyr, ta gass "prindeysaghtyn" "prindeysaght", as ta'n crogheydys yn-filleydagh "-yn" goll er kiangley ree.
Ny keayrtyn, ta gass ny fraue (myr sampleyr, "roie"). Ny keayrtyn elley, she cummey crampit jalloo-oaylleeagh t'ayn; myr sampleyr, co-ockle ny fockle jeant liorish breneen-grammeydys gientyn. Ta fraue yn ennymockle crampit ' ("fotographee") 'sy Vaarle ', cha nel '. Ta fraue ' ("jee-ondit") , ny chummey ' nagh vel ayn ny lomarcan; she ' eh y ghass, as t'ee goaill stiagh ny crogheydyssyn ' as ', agh cha nel crogheydys yn-filleydagh ny h-emshir chooilleeinit, '. 
Ta ymmyd er lheh "gass" croghey er jalloo-oaylleeaght ny çhengey er lheh. Myr sampleyr, ayns çhengaghyn Athabaskagh, ta gass vreear ny fraue nagh dod ve ayn ny lomarcan, as ta gymmyrkey toan yn 'ockle. Rere shen, ta daa ghass ec breear Athabaskagh dy cadjin, as meeryn roie ec dagh fer.
Breeocklyn.
Ta breeocklyn gass ceaghey ny keayrtyn; myr sampleyr, ayns Germaanish, liorish Ablaut as Umlaut. T'eh croghey er y çheiltynys çhengoaylleeagh t'ayn my t'ad goaill rish lheid ny gish myr un ghass ny ghaa. Myr sampleyr, ta ' (ashlishyn) ny chummey ennymagh yl-rey yn 'ockle ' (ashlish). My t'ou credjal dy vel yn-filley cur crogheydyssyn as ceaghley breeockle er gass dys jannoo yn yl-rey, myr shen, ta gass yn yl-rey y red cheddin as gass yn unnaneagh: '. My t'ou credjal nagh vel cummaghyn fockle goll er troggal agh liorish cochiangley breneenyn-grammeydys, t'eh ort cur roish daa ghass: ' as ""
Cummaghyn enmys as breneenyn-grammeydys cochianglt.
Ayns çhengaghyn as beggan yn-filley oc (m.s. Baarle, ny çhengaghyn Sheenish), ta'n ghass y red cheddin as cummey "cadjin" yn 'ockle son y chooid smoo: dy ghra myr shen, cummey enmys ta ry-akin ayns fockleyryn. Ny keayrtyn, t'ad cur "lemma" er y chummey shoh. Ayns çhengaghyn elley, s'goan ad gish nyn lomarcan. Myr sampleyr, ta gass "roie" lane ghollrish cummaghyn laaragh as chaie yn 'ockle. Ayns Spaainish, she ' ee y ghass corrym rish "roie", agh cha nel ee ry-akin ny lomarcan rieau. T'ee goll er enmys 'syn infinnidagh er ny yn-filley myr ', as ayns feer ghlare, t'ee çheet magh myr cummey neuheorit ny cummey yn-fillit. T'ad cur "breneenyn-grammeydys cochianglt" er lheid ny gish nagh vel ry-chlashtyn nyn lomarcan.
Çhengoaylleeaght cho-earrooagh.
Ayns çhengoaylleeaght cho-earrooagh, ta "gass" fockle ennagh y rheynn jeh nagh vel ceaghey eer liorish yn-filley jalloo-oaylleeaght. T'ad geddyr-scarrey y ghass jeh'n lemma, as meenaghey'n lemma myr cummey bunneydagh yn 'ockle. Myr sampleyr, " ("troarit"): she "" eh lemma'n 'ockle, agh she "" ee y ghass. Shen er y fa dy vel focklyn myr ayn. 

Bossan jargan:
She lus sheer-vio 'sy chynney "Asteraceae" eh bossan jargan (Pulicaria dysenterica). T'eh dooghyssagh da'n Oarpey as yn Aishey heear, ayns buill hashey. T'eh jannoo magh dhossanyn glooey as skeaylley liorish ny fraueyn echey. 
Jalloo-oaylleeaght.
T'eh gaase wheesh as 6km er yrjid. Ta duillagyn maylartey dronuillagagh dys sleeanagh echey. Ta'n echey jeant jeh 40-100 blaag jyskagh as mysh 20-30 blaagyn gahagh keylley mygyeayrt oc.
Bun-ocklaght.
Ta'n ennym echey çheet er shenn ymmyd myr thooishey noi shey-chassee. Ta'n cheeall cheddin ec enmyn ny lus ayns çhengaghyn elley, goaill stiagh yn ennym oaylleeagh echey. V'ad cliaghtey jannoo ymmyd jeh noi giarrey folley as çhingyssyn sooilley.

Glooaght y phobble:
She towse co-chruinnaghey pobble rere eaghtyr ny towse-lhieenee ee glooaght y phobble. Dy cadjin, t'ee çheet er sleih, agh ta ymmyd jeant j'ee bentyn rish dagh ooilley horçh dy vioag.

Once Upon a Forest:
She scannane contoyrtys kiaullee bioghit voish y vlein 1993 eh Once Upon a Forest. Hie yn scannane er ny ghientyn liorish Hanna-Barbera Productions as er ny skeaylley magh liorish 20th Century Fox. Bunnit er ny karacteyryn "Furlings" va crooit ec Rae Lambert, va'n scannane stiurit liorish Charles Grosvenor as gientit liorish David Kirschner. T'eh goaill stiagh gooyn Michael Crawford, Ellen Blain, Benji Gregory, Paige Gosney, Will Estes, Janet Waldo, Elisabeth Moss, as Ben Vereen.

Bossan keylley:
She lus sheer-vio 'sy chynney Apiaceae eh bossan keylley (Sanicula europaea). T'eh ry-akin er feie ny h-Oarpey ayns keyljyn dorraghey. 
Jalloo-oaylleeaght.
Ta blaaghyn baney-jiarg echey ayns umbyl. T'ad goll er pollnaghey liorish shellanyn. Ta ny messyn echey caulgagh, as t'ad croghey er eaddee as fynney dys skeaylley ny rassinyn echey. Ta duillagyn babbanagh-duillageenagh echey.
Nieu.
Ta saponin 'sy lus, as myr shen t'ad beggan nieunagh.
Ymmyd.
Va ymmyd tradishoonagh jeant jeh myr saase eeastee, liorish cur ram jeu 'syn ushtey as lhiggey da'n nieu faase cur neeal er ny yeeastyn. V'ad jannoo ymmyd jeh myr stoo lheeys myrgeddin, noi çhingyssyn crackan as folley.</ref name="PFAF">

Bossan mollagh:
She lus 'sy chynney Asteraceae eh bossan mollagh (Jacobaea erucifolia).

Bossan mollagh mooar:
She lus ghoan 'sy chynney Asteraceae eh bossan mollagh mooar (Senecio sarracenicus). T'eh gaase ayns ardjyn najooragh rish awinyn. T'eh dooghyssagh da'n Oarpey as yn Aishey heear. Er coontey'n 'raue dowin echey, she dooie toshee t'ayn.
Jalloo-oaylleeaght.
She hemicryptophyte beayn-hassooagh t'ayn. Ta stholeyn wheesh as 150km er lhiurid echey, as raisoam feillagh. Ta bolganyn lane dy aer ayns roost ny fraueyn, nyn gochormyssyn noi buill curree gyn monney ocsygien. Ta'n ghass s'inshley oc echey renaigagh. Ta duillagyn sleeanagh liauyrey echey. Ta'n crouw-vlaaghey yl-chioneagh echey. Ta ny blaaghyn ayns cummey cluig as jeant jeh queig petyllyn buighey. T'ad goll er pollnaghey ec shey-chassee ny hene-phollnaghey, as ta ny rassinyn goll er skeaylley liorish y gheay, croghey er beiyn, as liorish snienganyn.

Bossan ny jeeigey:
She lus 'sy ghenus Elatine eh bossan ny jeeigey (Elatine hexandra).
Jalloo-oaylleeaght.
T'eh gaase wheesh as 20 cm er yrjid. Ta duillagyn maylartey eelipsagh dys spaddylagh echey. Ta blaaghyn baney echey, as tree petyllyn oc. Ta 6 staimynyn as tree carpyllyn oc.

John Joseph Kneen:
She çhengoayllee Manninagh va John Joseph Kneen (12 Mean Fouyir 1873 – 21 Sauin 1938). Ta enney mooar er son yn obbyr va jeant echey er son y Ghaelg ayns Mannin, goaill stiagh studeyryssyn er sliennooyn, enmyn, boayl-enmyn Manninagh as grammeydys y Ghaelg. By eshyn ren çhyndaa Arrane Ashoonagh dy Vannin 'sy vlein 1907. Va'n arrane shen screeuit 'sy Vaarle as va'n chiaull cummit ec William Henry Gill.
Seihll as coorse beaghee.
Rug Kneen er Straid Hanover, Doolish, er 12 Mean Fouyir 1873. By vac lesh yn 'er post John Kneen as e ven heshee Hannah Crebbin. V'eh ynsit ayns Scoill Shorys Noo fo stiurey yn 'er ynsee Mnr. Nichols. By ayn daase anaase mooar echey 'sy Ghaelg. Va anaase mooar ec e phaarantyn, as lesh cooney voue, hooar eh cooid vooar d'oayllys tradishoonagh assdaue. Ren eh poosey daa cheayrt. Phoos eh rish Margaret Ann Tasker er 24 Mean Souree 1902. Phoos eh da'n nah cheayrt rish Alice Bridson er 6 Jerrey Souree 1930, as va daa vac, James as Harold, as un inneen, Winifred, oc.
Hoshee eh screeu 'sy phabyr naight "Isle of Man Examiner" cha leah as 1895, tra nagh row eh agh 22 vleeaney d'eash. 'Sy vlein 1897 ren Loayreyder y Chiare as Feed, A. W. Moore, goaill tastey er ny cohoyrtyssyn echey 'sy phabyr, as va shiartanse dy whaaltyssyn jeant eddyr yn daa jeu. Daa vlein ny lurg ren ad cur er bun yn Çheshaght Ghailckagh (YCG). Haink er dy ve ny eaghtyrane er y çheshaght shen, chammah as eaghtyrane er yn Isle of Man History and Antiquarian Society.
Chur yn obbyr echey lesh YCG cree mooar ayn ayns freiltys y çhengey as ayns studeyrys er beeal-arrish as shennaghys yn çheer echey. Ren eh screeu ram lioareenyn as ren eh cummey lesoonyn da scoillaryn y çhengey. Va ram daanyn as hymnyn çhyndaait echey. Va paart mooar echey ayns cur magh lhieggan noa as lhiassit jeh Fockleyr Chregeen, as beggan ny lurg ren eh cur magh fockleyr echey hene, "Manx-English Pronouncing Dictionary".
'Sy vlein 1910 ren eh cur magh yn obbyr share echey - "A Grammar of the Manx Language". Ren eh cur er tashtey yn laue-screeuyn ayns Lioarlann Thie Tashtee Vannin 'sy vlein 1927 er-yn-oyr nagh row mie dy liooar argid echey son yn obbyr y chlou. Va'n laue-screeuyn currit gys tastey ny Treishteilee 'sy lioarlann. V'eh er credjal ec ny Treishteilee shen dy row scansh vooar ec yn laue-screeuyn as hie ad gys Tinvaal son argid y gheddyn dy chur magh eh. Hug Tinvaal £250 dauesyn er e hon shen as hie yn lioar er ny chur magh 'sy vlein 1930.
Car lhing y chaggey hoshee eh screeu noteyn mychione boayl-enmyn yn Ellan, as obbyr A. W. Moore myr bun da. Va'n clane obbyr creaghnit echey 'sy vlein 1923, as ren eh cur yn stoo roish y Çheshaght Ghailckagh. Ren y çheshaght scarrey yn obbyr ayns shey ayrnyn - fer da dagh sheadin - as hie ad er nyn glou ayns ym-lioaryn er lheh eddyr ny bleeantyn 1925 as 1928.
Va ny shirveishyn echey lesh lettyraght Vannin currit er enney liorish Ollooscoill Lerphoyll 'sy vlein 1929 tra va Mainshtyr ny h-Ellynyn (M.A.) bronnit er. 'Sy vlein 1930 va'n obbyr echey er blaystyn Loghlynagh ayns kynney, shennaghys, as çhengey Vannin currit er enney ec y reiltys Norlynnagh trooid cleayney yn Olloo Carl Marstrander ass Ollooscoill Oslo as hug ad £200. Va'n argid shen jeerit da freayltys ny ronsaghtyn echey as son recortys cruinn jeh fockley magh ynnydagh jeh ny boayl-enmyn y gheddyn roish baase yn Ghaelg vio.
Reesht er moylley yn Olloo Marstrander, va Reejerys jeh Oardyr Auley Noo bronnit er liorish Haakon VII, Ree Norlynn.

Teletubbies:
She straih hellveeish da paitçhyn jeh'n BBC eh Teletubbies. Er ny chur magh ec y cholught Ragdoll Productions, va'n straih jeerit ec lught fakinagh ro-scoill. Hie yn straih magh er creeley veih'n vlein 1997 derrey'n vlein 2001. V'ee currit er bun ec stiureyder crootagh Ragdoll, Anne Wood, as Andrew Davenport, yn fer ren screeu dagh fer jeh'n 365 claareyn hie magh er ny tonnyn çhellveeish. Va'n straih currit er aer da'n chied cheayrt er 31 Mee Vayrnt 1997 as hie eh er syndacait ayns ny Steatyn Unnaneysit er y voggyl çhellveeish PBS er 6 Averil 1998. Haink jerrey lesh yn straih 'sy vlein 2001, as hie yn straih yerrinagh magh er ny tonnyn er 5 Jerrey Geuree 2001.
Ta'n straih cur sheese er contoyrtyssyn ny Teletubbies, Tinky Winky (gorrym jiarg), Dipsy (geayney), Laa-Laa (buigh) as Po (jiarg). 'Sy straih, ta ny persoonidyn shen cloie ayns thalloo ghennal as chreeoil fo'n ennym Teletubbyland.

1873:

The Princess and the Frog:
She scannane aittys romansagh fansee kiaullee bioghit Americaanagh voish y vlein 2009 eh The Princess and the Frog. Va'n scannane gientit liorish Walt Disney Animation Studios as skeayllit magh liorish Walt Disney Pictures. Y 49oo ard-scannane bioghit Disney, t'eh bunnit dy anhickyr er y noaskeeal "The Frog Princess" (2002) liorish E. D. Baker, ta bunnit eh hene er y skeeal çheerey Germaanagh "The Frog Prince" myr va çhaglit ec ny Braaraghyn Grimm. Va'n scannane stiurit ec John Musker as Ron Clements as gientit ec Peter Del Vecho voish scaa-chloie ren Musker as Clements s creeu marish Rob Edwards. Ren ny stiureyderyn screeu yn skeeal marish Greg Erb as Jason Oremland chammah. 

Shooylaghan Loch:
She fer jeh ny straidyn mooarey as y shooylaghan smoo scanshoil ayns Doolish, Mannin, eh Shooylaghan Loch (). Ta ennym y Chiannoort Loch currit er y çhooylaghan. Va'n shooylaghan as y traid troggit as foshlit 'sy vlein 1878 er thalloo lhiassit veih'n vooir. T'eh roie veih jerrey Cherrin Oonlee rish y vaie feie 2,500 slatyn, as t'eh creaghney er y ghoal lesh Raad ny Killey as y Shooylaghan Harris. Ta ny h-ard-straidyn Straid Duke as Straid Broogh y Traie kianglt rish. Va leagh y raad cosnit ec ny troggeyderyn lesh cur er creck ny thallooyn çheu-chooyl jeh'n voalley marrey. Hie straneyn dy hieyn Victorianagh er nyn droggal rish y raad, as nish t'ad coontit myr nane jeh ard-chowraghyn Ghoolish.

Vuk (scannane):
She scannane bioghit Ungaaragh voish y vlein 1981 eh Vuk va skeayllit magh ayns çheeraghyn Baarlagh fo'n ennym The Little Fox. Va'n scannane gientit ec Pannónia Filmstúdió, as t'eh bunnit er y noaskeeal fo'n ennym cheddin liorish István Fekete. Ta'n scannane er ny stiurey liorish Attila Dargay as er ny screeu liorish Attila Dargay, István Imre as Ede Tarbay, as v'eh skeayllit magh ayns 1981.

Vuk:
Foddee dy vel Vuk çheet er:

Stashoon traenagh Ghoolish:
She ard-chione-stashoon Raad Yiarn Vannin eh Stashoon traenagh Ghoolish (). T'eh ny hoie ec jerrey yn cheiy Hwoaie lesh y thalloo, faggys da shenn valley Ghoolish, preeu-valley Vannin. Ayns ny laghyn t'ayn jiu, she kione-stashoon jeh'n raad yiarn veih Purt Çhiarn gys Doolish, agh ayns ny laghyn ceaut va shirveishyn traenagh gimmeeaght gys Purt ny h-Inshey ayns sheear yn Ellan as gys Rhumsaa 'sy twoaie.

The Rescuers:
She scannane bioghit Americaanagh voish y vlein 1977 eh The Rescuers. Hie yn scannane er ny ghientyn ec Walt Disney Productions as er ny skeaylley magh er 22 Mean Souree 1977. Y 23oo ard-scannane bioghit Disney, t'eh cur sheese er yn "Rescue Aid Society" ("Sheshaght Chooney Sauail"), sheshaght eddyrashoonagh ta jeant seose jeh lughee as y kione-cherroo oc ayns Caayr York Noa as ta gobbraghey ayns scaa ny h-Ashoonyn Unnaneysit. She dean y çheshaght ayn na dy chur cooney as pohlldey da dreihyn v'er nyn ghoaill ersooyl er feie ny Cruinney. Ta jees ny lughee shoh, y dorryser craagh Bernard (Bob Newhart) as y co-obbragh echey, Miss Bianca (Eva Gabor), goll er turrys son dy hauail Penny (Michelle Stacy), caillin hreoghe t'er ny ve goit myr pryssoonagh ayns Devil's Bayou liorish y çhelgeyr tashtee Madame Medusa (Geraldine Page).
Ta'n scannane bunnit er straih dy lioaryn liorish Margery Sharp, as er "The Rescuers" as "Miss Bianca" er lheh. Er oyr speeideilys as rah y scannane, hie scannane eiyrtyssagh er ny skeayley magh 'sy vlein 1990 fo'n ennym "The Rescuers Down Under".

Bossan Pheddyr:
She lus 'sy chynney Asteraceae eh bossan Pheddyr (Tanacetum parthenium). V'eh dooghyssagh da'n yn Euraishey (Lieh-inshey Valkanagh, Anatolia as y Choagaash) agh t'eh skeaylt harrish y teihll jiu. T'eh ry-akin 'syn Oarpey, America Hwoaie as yn Çhillee.
Jalloo-oaylleeaght.
T'eh gaase dys crouw wheesh as 46cm er yrjid. 
Ymmyd.
Va ymmyd jeant jeh myr losserey lheeys noi çhiassaghey, çhingyssyn king as gailley. Ta cooid vreeoil bossan Pheddyr goaill stiagh parthenolide as tanetin, as melatonin. Foddee eh cur aawoalley allergagh ort, goaill stiagh gorley craitnagh coventyn, çhingys gailley, as askaidjyn beill. T'ad cur coyrle n'oi rish torraghys.

Purt Varrey Ghoolish:
Ta Purt Varrey Ghoolish () ny soie faggys da Kione Ghoolish ec kione jiass Ghoolish, preeu-valley Vannin. She preeu-phurt yn Ellan son traght as carbid hraghtee as phreevaadjagh. Ta burtyn er lheh ayn son tankeyryn ooill as gas myrane lesh lhongyn lughtee cadjin, baataghyn eeastagh, as baataghyn towshan, keeshyn-marrey as lhuingyssagh. Doshil y chied stashoon birling 'sy vlein 2001 as t'eh kiarail burtyn da baataghyn roortys.
Ta Purt Varrey Ghoolish jeant seose jeh'n Phurt Vooie as y Phurt Sthie, as t'ad scarrit veih nyn geilley liorish Droghad Bascule. Ta kione-stashoon y phurt varrey ny hoie er çheu hiar hwoaie yn phurt marish stiureydys y phurt.
Ta'n Phurt Vooie jeant seose jeh daa cheiy, kiare callooyn marrey, un vurt jeig, as ynnyd da baataghyn sauçhys. T'ad ny callooyn marrey na:
T'ad yn daa cheiy na:
Ta'n Phurt Sthie lhiggey da entreilys as burtys ny baataghyn beggey.

Rolley stashoonyn traenagh ayns Mannin:
She rolley ny stashoon traenagh ayns Mannin yn rolley shoh. T'eh goaill stiagh stashoonyn as staddyn traenagh er Raad Yiarn Vannin, Raad-yiarn Lectragh Vannin, as ny raaidyn yiarn preevaadjagh er yn Ellan.

Lepidium:
She genus dy lossreeyn ayns kynney mustart Brassicaceae eh Lepidium. Ta mysh 175 dooie ayn. Ta kuse jeh nyn ymmyltee.

Bossan pibbyragh:
She lus vleeanagh eh bossan pibbyragh (Lepidium campestre). T'eh dooghyssagh da'n Oarpey, as t'eh ry-akin ayns America Hwoaie myr lus ruegyssagh as sarkyl. 
Jalloo-oaylleeaght.
Ta bossan pibbyragh gaase wheesh as 60cm er yrjid. Ta crouw-vlaaghey echey. Ta blaaghyn baney beggey ayn, as t'ad jannoo fynneigyn glassey rea oohchrooagh jeu hene, mysh 6mm er lhiurid as 4km er lheead. Ta daa rass dhone ayns dagh fynneig. Ta duillagyn maylartey sideagh gyn chass echey, as ta'n ghass gaase jeh cummey rose dy ghuillagyn feeacklagh. Ta'n ghass renaigagh.
Troarey as Ymmyd.
Ta bossan pibbyragh gaase ayns reeastyn as msatey troaryn. S'cummey lesh y thalloo.
T'eh yn-ee myr glassan ny broit. T'ad jannoo ymmyd jeh messyn as rassinyn aegey myr spiossyn, as blass pibbyr doo ny mustart oc.

Booa ghone:
She lus lussagh bleeanagh ee booa ghone (Fumaria officinalis). T'ee dooghyssagh da'n Oarpey heear as meanagh. 
Jalloo-oaylleeaght.
T'ee gaase wheesh as 50cm er yrjid. She achene eh y mess eck.
Ymmyd lheeys.
V'ad cliaghtey jannoo ymmyd jee noi gorley crackanagh as sooilley, as acnee. Ta lusseyryn jeianagh jannoo ymmyd jee noi gorley crackanagh, çhuintys as gorley aarey. She lus nieunagh t'ayn.

Balley Beg, Lonan:
Ta Balley Beg () ny valley beg ta soit faggys da Laksaa ayns Skeerey Lonan, Mannin.

Bossan tessen:
She lus sheer-vio eh bossan tessen (Cruciata laevipes). T'eh dooghyssagh da'n Oarpey eddyr Bretyn Vooar as yn Çhibbeyr. T'eh gaase ayns lheeantyn, rish raaidyn as awinyn, as mastey keyljyn, er thalloo kelkagh.
Jalloo-oaylleeaght.
T'eh gaase dy jeeragh wheesh as 70cm er yrjid. Ta gass renaigagh echey. Ta ny duillagyn echey reaghit mygeayrt ny gish myr fainey ayns kiareyn, agh cha nel ad daa 'syn 'ainey nyn veer duillagyn; ta'n ghaa elley nyn stipuleyn. T'ad sleeanagh dys oohchrooagh as birr oc, as fynnagh. Ta blaaghyn buighey daa-ghooghyssagh echey, mysh 2-3mm er crantessen. Ta messyn gyn fynney echey.
Ymmyd lheeys.
V'ad jannoo ymmyd jeh myr lus lheeys. Choyrlee Bald's Leechbook eh noi çhingys king.

Shappal:
Ta shappal çheet er yn aght dy yannooyn raad ta cooid ny shirveishyn veih mynchreckeyderyn currit fo scrudeyrys yn fakider as eh kiarail ad dy chionnaghey ec y traa t'ayn. Er-yn-oyr shen, ta shappal çheet er reih as/ny er kionnaghey ny cooid ny ny shirveishyn. Ayns co-heksyn ennagh t'ee coontit myr immeeaght soccar myrane lesh immeeaght harmaynagh. Dy mennick ta deiney shappal ayns shappyn mooarey yl-rheynnagh, chammah as ayns buill er lheh, lheid as çheshveanyn dy valjyn, ayns ynnydyn-shappal, shapplannyn, kerrinyn baljagh, margaghyn as basaryn.

Eunysseyrys:
Ta'n eunysseyrys çheet er jannoo, roortys ny gastid erbee ta kiarail ceau traa ny ta lhiggey da deiney cur taitnys dauesyn hene 'sy traa seyr oc. She jannoo taaue yn eunysseyrys, lheid as fakin er kiaulldramey ny er scannane. Ta formyn lheiltagh jeh'n aittys, lheid as y spoyrt, coontit myr formyn jeh ceau emshir, as ta formyn lheid as y lhaihderaght phersoonagh ny cliaghtey greieyn kiaullee coontit myr ceau traa.
Foddee yn eunysseyrys kiarail aittys, taitnys as arraght. Ta ram sorçhyn jeh'n eunysseyrys ayn lheid as scannaneyn, yn theater, spoyrtyn, gammanyn, as yn daunse sheshoil.

Brabbanagh:
Ta brabbanagh ny bun glass (Molinia caerulea) ny faiyr sheer-vio. T'ee dooghyssagh da'n Oarpey, yn Aishey heear, as yn Affrick hwoaie. T'ee gaase ayns buill wheesh as 2300m er yrjid ayns ny h-Alpyn. Share jee thalloo sharroo eddyr pH 2.5-5, agh t'ee tannaghtyn bio dys pH 2 ny keayrtyn. T'ee ry-akin dy cadjin er reeastaneyn, curree as sleityn er feie Bretyn Vooar.
Jalloo-oaylleeaght.
She feayr ghossagh wheesh as 90cm er yrjid t'ayn. Ta ny gish gaase dy gloo rish-y-cheilley, as myr shen, t'ad jean noi aile. Ta'n çhengag eck ny fainney renaigyn. Ta ny birrageenyn liauyrey keylley gorrym-jiargey nyn gowraghyn scanshoil ennee; ta'n panicle 15cm er liurid. T'ee çheet my vlaa eddyr Jerrey Souree as Mean Fouyir.
Dooieyn kianglt ree.
Ta kuse dy vraddagyn dy ee, myr sampleyr, "Carterocephalus palaemon". Ta'n fungys "Claviceps purpurea" gaase er rassinyn ny lus.

Brashlagh:
She lus vleeantagh ee brashlagh (Sinapis arvensis). T'ee dooghyssagh da'n Oarpey as t'ee er ny jannoo dooie ayns America Hwoaie myrgeddin myr sarkyl.
Jalloo-oaylleeaght.
Ta gass jeeragh eck, as ish renaigagh faggys da'n vun eck. Ta duillagyn y vun mooar as angheyre, lieh-fedjagagh as feeacklagh, as ta cass oc. Ta duillagyn ny gass ny sloo, gyn chass, as dronuillagagh dys oohchrooagh, as ta bir oc. Ta crouw-vlaaghey wuighey eck as blaaghyn kiare-phetyllagh ecksh. She fynneig liauyr eh y mess eck, mysh 3-5em er lhiurid as gob 1-2cm echey. Ta rassinyn dhoney dorraghey ayn, as t'ad tannaghtyn bio rish wheesh as 10 bleeantyn 'sy thalloo, ny erreish daue goll trooid corys lheieagh beiyn ny keayrtyn.
Ymmyd.
She sarkyl t'ayn dy cadjin, as olteyr cadjin da "Plasmodiophora brassica", ny vun çhingys da troaryn 'sy chynney Cruciferae. Ta meeyllyn glassey as noidyn elley cummal urree myrgeddin.
Ta wheesh as 30% ooill ayns ny rassinyn, as ta ymmyd keirdagh jeant jee. Ta shellanyn as foillycanyn gee ish.

Çhengag:
Ta çhengag çheet er olt lossreeyn ta kiangley lheean duillag rish gass. Son y chooid smoo, she far-chrackan trooid-hoilshagh t'ayn, er ny lhiuraghey ass epiderm ny fine. T'ee coadey noi jeeyl geayee.

Isle of Man Bank:
Va'n Isle of Man Bank () currit er bun er 26 Jerrey Fouyir 1865. By eh yn chied cholught çhiarmaanit va currit er bun lurg y clattys noa, yn Companies Act 1865, as y slattys shen lhiggey da bunneeaght ny sorçhyn shen dy cholughtyn er yn Ellan. Va'n banc kionnit ec yn National Provincial Bank 'sy vlein 1961, as hie eh stiagh 'sy Royal Bank of Scotland Group 'sy vlein 2000 myr cooid jeh NatWest.
Ta un vanglane jeig jeh'n vanc er yn Ellan.

Brashlagh rangagh:
She lus vleeanagh 'sy chynney Brassicaceae ee brashlagh rangagh (Sinapis alba). 
Jalloo-oaylleeaght.
Ta gass jeeragh, banglaneagh as friogganagh eck. Ta duillagyn maylartey, neurea-fedjagagh ny lieh-fedjagagh as saue-eeacklagh eck, er cassyn; t'ad renaigagh as ta cuishlinaght fedjagagh oc. Ta blaaghyn buighey croshagh kiare-phetyllagh eck, ayns crouw-vlaaghey. Ta 6 staimynyn oc. She fynneig liauyr glass ee y mess eck, as mysh 3-5 rassinyn aynjee. Ta bun-fraue eck.
Ymmyd.
T'ad çhaglym rassinyn brashlagh rangagh dys jannoo mustart. Ta'n thioglycosaid sinalbin bun y blass oc. 'Syn Ghreag, t'ad gee ny duillagyn as blaaghyn aegey rish y gheuree, myr ny .

Wu Cheng'en:
By noaskeealagh as bard y reeraghtys Ming eh Wu Cheng'en (; ennym cooyrtoilid ). T'eh share er enney myr ughtar cosoylagh Xī Yóu Jì ("Jurnaa Sheear"), fer jeh Kiare Ard-Noaskeealyn Classicagh lettyraght Heenagh.
Bea-skeeal.
Rug Wu ayns Lianshui, ayns queiggey Jiangsu, as darree eh dys Huaian. Va ayr Wu's, mie-ynsit as scoillaragh agh dobbyr eh myr keirdagh er coontey stayd argidoil y lught-thie. Ny yei shen, v'eh "currit da lettyraght" as haink yn anaase cheddin er e vac er son lettyraght as skeealyn. 
Hie Wu Cheng'en fo'n scrutaght impiroil ymmodee keayrtyn dys çheet dy ve ny mandarin (oikagh impiroil) agh cha daink eh lesh. Rish mean eash, ghow eh entreilys ayns ollooscoill impiroil Nanjing as çheet dy ve ny vandarin ayns Beijing as Changxing agh cha by vie lesh yn obbyr, as dirree ass eh. S'cosoylagh dy cheau eh e vea 'sy valley dooghys echey liorish screeu skeealyn as daanyn. Haink eh dy ve ny screeudeyr mie bardaght as skeealaght, as ren eh caarjyn jeh ymmodee ughtaryn ny h-eash. V'eh boght cour e vea, as cha row clein erbee echey; cheau eh ram jeh'n vea echey myr fer lomarcan.
Obbyr.
Xi You Ji.
Ta Wu share er enney er son y skeeal "Xī Yóu Jì", fer jeh Kiare Ard-Noaskeealyn Classicagh lettyraght Heenagh. T'ad credjal dy nee eshyn hug magh yn obbyr gyn ennym, er coontey trimmid sheshoil ny h-eash. Rish bea Wu, va beayn ayns lettyraght Heenagh arrish y yannoo er lettyraght chlassicagh Qin, Han as Tang, as screeu ayns Sheenish Chlassicagh. Rish shenn eash, t'ad credjal dy hyndaa eh noi'n troa liorish screeu y noaskeeal "Xī Yóu Jì" ayns glare ny theay. S'cosoylagh eh dy dug magh eh y noaskeeal gyn enneym er coontey drogh-ennym lettyraght ny theay ec y traa v'ayn. Denmys mooinjer y valley dooie echey eshyn myr yn ushtar dy leah, agh son y chooid smoo v'eh gyn enney rish tree eashyn.
Cha nel firrinaghey fondagh ayn; hie yn obbyr er cur magh gyn ennym, as cha daink Wu er y skeeal ayns obbyr elley erbee. Ta oltscarrey teks as ronsaghey recortyssyn y reeraghtys Qing keeayllaghey dy nee eshyn screeu eh. Ta earisheyr oikoil 1625 ass balley dooie Wu ny enmys myr yn ushtar. Er y laue elley, cha nel mynphoyntyn politickagh ayn harrish ynsaghey y theay, ga dy row Wu ainjyssagh rish rheynnydys as politickaght ny Sheen. Va cooid mooar jeh'n skeeal ry-chlashtyn ayns bea-skeeal, as myr shen, cha s'ain quoid va crooit ec yn ughtar, as quoid va reaghit echey. Ny yei shen, she lhieggan smoo ughtaragh ny skeealyn t'ayn; cha daink rish lhieggan elley erreish da'n noaskeeal ad y haglym as ta Wu goit rish myr yn ughtar son y chooid smoo, ga dy vel ourys ennagh ayn foast. 
Obbraghyn elley.
Screeu Wu ymmodee daanyn as skeealyn, agh t'ayn chooid smoo jeu caillt ain. Erreish da geddyn baase, ren mooinjer echey çhaglym laue-screeuyn as ad y chur magh myr "Laue-screeuyn er mayrn Mnr. Sheyang". Va daanyn echey goit stiagh ayns teihyssyn ny h-eash.

Hindish:
She sur-ream cadjinit Hindustaanish ee Hindish ny Hindish Yeianagh Chadjinit (, "Mānak Hindī"). T'ee ass abbyrt "Khariboli" Delhi, Uttar Pradesh heear as Uttarakhand yiass. T'ee mastey 22 hengey oikoil ny h-Injey as ny çhengey hoshee nyn mast'oc. 
Ta abbyrtyn ny Hindish jannoo magh continuum abbyrtagh ayns mean hwoaie ny h-Injey. Ta Hindish yeianagh so-chohoiggal marish sur-ream elley Hindustaani, Urduish. Rere kione-earroo 2001 ny h-Injey, t'ee ny kied çhengey da 258 sleih 'syn Injey, agh ta shen goaill stiagh loayreyderyn abbyrtyn elley. Rere Ethnologue, va 180 millioon loayreyder eck ayns 1991. Ta'n art shoh currit da sur-ream cadjinit Hindish yeianagh. Er son shennaghys, as co-hroyn Hindish as Urduish, jeeagh er Hindustaanish.

Sur-ream:
Ayns çhengoaylleeaght, ta sur-ream çheet er arraghys çhengey ennagh as ymmyd jeant jeh er son dean er lheh, ny ayns çhymbyllaght heshoil er lheh. 
She caaynt as screeu ad ny sur-reamyn smoo, agh ta ymmodee fo-rheynnyn oc. Myr sampleyr, ta troyn leaght anchasley rish troyn coloayrtys eddyr caarjyn, as cha nel ny troyn cheddin ec tekslioar leigh as caart post. Cha nel ny sur-reamyn cheddin ec dagh çhengey noadyr.
Rere cliaghtey anchaslyssyn glare, ta sur-reamyn nyn spectrum, cha nel nyn straih dy arraghyssyn caglit. Chammah's shen, ta sur-ream lhie harrish eieyn sheshengoaylleeaght elley, myr sampleyr, abbyrt, genre, ny rheynnyn continuum creeolagh. Ta kuse dy hengoayllee meenaghey "sur-ream" rere ceaghlaghyn tasht-fockle (myr çhengey vrisht).

Arraghys (çhengoaylleeaght):
Ayns sheshengoaylleeaght, ta arraghys ny lect çheet er fo-'oirran çhengey ny continuum abbyrtagh ennagh as cummey er lheh echey. Ta troyn er lheh ec dagh arraghys ny çhengey. Ta arraghyssyn goaill stiagh çhengaghyn, abbyrtyn, blassyn, sur-reamyn, aghtyn as eieyn elley, chammah's y çhengey chadjinit hene. Ta'n fockle "arraghys" shaghney cur "çhengey" ny "abbyrt" er ny fo-'oirranyn shen: ta'n theay lhiettal "çhengey" da çhengey chadjinit dy mennick, as ta blass politickagh er; as ta "abbyrt" shassoo noi "cadjinit" myr cummey s'inshley as sloo kiart, ny keayrtyn. Ta çhengoayllee loayrt er arraghyssyn cadjinit as neuchadjinit. Ta "lect" ny "arraghys" shaghney jannoo briwnys my ta daa chummaghyn nyn jengaghyn hene ny nyn abbyrtyn ny çhengey cheddin. Dy cadjin, ta anchaslyssyn tasht-fockle ynrican (m.s. far-ghlare ny glare roosteyryn) coontit myr tro sur-ream, agh ny keayrtyn, t'ad coontit myr nyn arraghys hene.
Ta çhengey chadjinit ny h-arraghys: fer ta ymmyd screeuee lettyragh jeant jeh as ta er ny veenaghey myr norm glare er son fockley magh as grammeydys. Ta sleih geddyraghey arraghys cadjinit (çhengey chadjinit) veih arraghyssyn neuchadjinit (abbyrtyn, abbyrtyn sheshoil, çhengaghyn ardjynagh, glare ny theay).
Ta kiaddey arraghys Eugenio Coseriu soilshaghey magh kiare towshanyn arraghys:
Er son arraghyssyn "diastratic" ta enney ny loayreyderyn (idiolect, keintys, aegid) as olteynys possan ny brastyl ennagh (abbyrt sheshoil a.r.e.) scanshoil. Ta "diaphasic" arraghyssyn cowrit liorish obbree as soiee (m.s. çhengey vrisht as glare ny theay).

Bugogue:
She lus 'sy chynney Rhamnaceae ee bugogue (Rhamnus cathartica). T'ee dooghyssagh da'n Oarpey, yn Affrick heear hwoaie, as yn Aishey heear. T'ee ry-akin ayns America Hwoaie myr lus jesheenagh.
Jalloo-oaylleeaght.
She crouw yn-lhoamey t'ayn. T'ee gaase wheesh as 8m er yrjid. Ta roost dhone lheeah eck as banglaneyn jialgagh. Ta duillagyn eelipsagh dys oohchrooagh glassey eck, mysh 2.5–9 cm er lheead as 1.2–3.5 cm er yrjid; t'ad maylartey. Ta blaaghyn buighey-ghlassey kiare-petyllagh eck. T'ad dioecious, as t'ad goll er pollnaghey ec shey-chassee. She droop doo eh y mess eck, mysh 6–10 mm er crantessen, as ta daa dys kiare rassinyn ayn. T'eh nieunagh da sleih, agh ta ein ad y ee gyn doilleeid, as skeaylley ny rassinyn 'sy check oc.
Aase.
Ta bugogue gaase dy tappee, agh t'ee neuveayn. T'ee dy mie, as t'ee tramylt. T'ee ny lus ruegyssagh as ta'n scaa eck lhiettal aase dooieyn dooghyssagh. S'doillee eh ish y 'reayll fo; t'ee cur magh buinnaghyn dy breeoil erreish jee goll er giarrey ny lossey.
Hug Linnaeus "Rhamnus catharticus" urree, agh ren ad kerraghey yn ennym myr "cathartica" er y fa dy nee ennym genus bwoirrinagh ee "Rhamnus".
Ymmyd.
Ren ad ymmyd purgaidagh jeh roost as messyn ny lus traa dy row, agh s'goan shen nish er coontey fo-eiyrtyssyn gaueagh. Ta'n fuygh creoi, agh cha nel monney ymmyd jeant jeh. She lus bee foillycanyn 'sy ghenus "Gonepteryx" t'ayn, as oltey da noidyn scanshoil troaryn: "Puccinia coronata" as "Aphis glycines".

Buighag:
She lus lussagh sheer-vio ee buighag (Ranunculus repens). T'ee dooghyssagh da'n Oarpey, yn Aishey as yn Affrick heear hwoaie.
Jalloo-oaylleeaght.
T'ee gaase wheesh as 50cm er yrjid. T'ee sthollaneagh. Ta gish snauee cur magh fraueyn as lossreeyn noa; ta gish yeeragh cur magh blaaghyn. Ta ny duillagyn s'inshley eck rheynnit ayns tree duillageenyn lheead babbanagh, mysh 1.5-8cm er lhiurid, er cass wheesh as 20cm er lhiurid. Ta ny duillagyn s'yrjey ny sloo as ta duillageenyn s'keylley oc. Ta gish as duillagyn renaigagh. Ta blaaghyn buighey queig-petyllagh eck, mysh 2-3cm er crantessen. She acheneyn ad ny messyn eck, mysh 2.5-4mm er lhiurid. Share jee thalloo bog.
Ymmyd.
Hie buighag er creck er feie ny cruinney myr lus yesheenagh, as t'ee ny lus ruegyssagh ayns ymmyodee buill nish. T'ee nieunagh rere cliaghtey y ghenus, agh ta'n nieu lheie liorish çhirmaghey marish traagh. Foddee sapp buighag ny volgeyder. Cha nel ollee dy ee er coontey'n vlass garg eck; myr shen, t'ee jannoo ymmyd jeh'n thalloo fassit dys skeeaylley ny sthollaneyn eck. T'ee goll er skeaylley liorish arraghey traagh myrgeddin. 

Buighan shellee:
She lus lussagh eh buighan shellee (Monotropa hypopitys). T'eh dooghyssagh da'n Lieh-chruinney Hwoaie tempreilagh, agh t'eh goan.
Anchasley rish y chooid smoo dy lossreeyn, cha nel chlorophyll erbee ec buighan shellee. She hetra-veeagheyder fliughaneagh ta goaill bee liorish sheadanys er fungyssyn; cha nel eh co-haaghey sollysh. Myr shen, foddee eh cummal ayns buill ghorraghey, myr sampleyr, laare keyljyn glooey, er y fa nagh vel feme echey er soilshey ny greiney.
Jalloo-oaylleeaght.
T'eh gaase wheesh as 35cm er yrjid er gass neuvanglaneagh. Ta'n clane lus bane-wuigh as blass jiarg echey. She crottylyn ad ny duillagyn echey, mysh 5-10mm er lhiurid. Ta ny blaaghyn buighey ny jiargey croghey neose ayns dhossan dy 2-11; t'ad mysh 9-12mm er lhiurid.
Ta'n ennym oaylleeagh ass Greagish Ladjinit: "hypo-", "fo", as "pitys", "juys", rere oayll cadjin ny lus. Ren Linnaeus eh y vee-lettraghey myr "hypopithys", as ta kuse dy 'leih screeu rere shen. Ny yei shen, t'ad gra dy vel y lettraghey "ry-charraghey myr 'hypopitys'", rere aght screeuee oayllee elley.

Bullught:
Ta bullught ny bwilloght (Caltha palustris) ny lus lussagh sheer-vio. T'ee dooghyssagh da curree, anee, jeeigyn as thalloo keylley 'sy Lieh-chruinney Hwoaie tempreilagh.
Jalloo-oaylleeaght.
T'ee gaase wheesh as 80cm er yrjid. Ta duillagyn aarey-chrooagh eck, mysh 3-20cm er lheead; ta oirr saue-eeacklagh as eaghtyr kereagh oc. Ta ny gish eck follym. Ta blaaghyn buighey eck; t'ad mysh 2-5cm er crantessen, as 4-9 seepalyn gollrish petyllyn oc, chammah's ymmodee staimynyn. T'ad çheet my vlaa eddyr arrey as sourey. Ta shey-chassee cur keayrt orroo er son pollin as naghtyr ta goll er taaley er çheu dagh carpyl. Ta ny carpyllyn jannoo follicleyn glassey jeu hene, wheesh as 1cm er lhiurid as ymmodee rassinyn ayndaue.
Myr lossreeyn elley 'sy Ranunculaceae, t'ee nieunagh. Foddee eh cur gorley craitnagh as brooanyn ort liorish ro-ventyn rish. 

Jeneeve:
She liggar lesh blass berrishyn euar ny greg echey eh jeneeve. Ta ram aghtyn dy jeneeve ayn agh dy mennick t'eh er ny rheynn magh ayns daa ronney leighoil. Ta'n jeneeve drigit jeant 'syn aght tradishoonagh lesh aa-ghrigey liggaryn neaghtyragh as bun eirinagh oc rish berrishyn euar ny greg as lussyn elley. Er y laue elley, ta'n jeneeve covroojit jeant lesh blassey liggar neaghtyragh rish tharraghyn as/ny rish 'blasstanyn najooragh' elley gyn aa-ghrigey, as rere shen cha nel foayr mooar er y torçh shen. Er y chooid sloo ta 37.5% alcoal rere thummid ayns dagh boteil 'syn UO as 40% er y chooid sloo ayns dagh boteil 'syn SUA.

Ulrike Meinhof:
She caggeyder Germaanagh jeh'n skian chlee va Ulrike Marie Meinhof (7 Jerrey Fouyir 1934 - 9 Boaldyn 1976). Ren ee cur er bun Cologid yn Armee Jiarg ("Rote Armee Fraktion") marish Andreas Baader, Gudrun Ensslin as Horst Mahler 'sy vlein 1970 lurg lhing obbyr myr earisheyr marish yn earishlioar "Konkret". V'ee goit seose 'sy vlein 1972 as va cassid jeant urree son ram dunveryssyn as son cur er bun sheshaght chimmeeagh. Roish jerrey yn chooish leigh 'sy vlein 1976, va Meinhof feddynit 'sy chillag eck as ee er ny ve croghit.

Ammyr Griboyedov:
She ammyr ayns Caayr Pheddyr, y Roosh, ee Ammyr Griboyedov (, "Kanal Griboyedova"; roish y vlein 1923: , "Yekatyerininskiy kanal"). Ta'n ammyr goaill toshiaght ec yn awin Moyka ec Magher Vart as t'ee roie stiagh 'syn awin Fontanka ec Droghad Malo-Kalinkin. Ta'n ammyr 5 km er lhiurid as 32 m er lheead. T'ee teaumey ushtey magh er cormid harrish er 3.1 — 3.4 m³/s.
Shennaghys.
Ec y toshiaght va ennym y Ven Tsar Katreeney II currit er yn ammyr myr va'n ammyr er ny troggal car y lhing reilley eck. Er 6 Jerrey Fouyir 1923 va'n ammyr aa-enmyssit as ennym y screeudeyr cloie as yn diplomagh Alexander Sergeyevich Griboyedov currit er. Ren eh cummal ayns thie çheu yn ammyr as haink urree dy ve enmyssit "канал Писателя Грибоедова" ny "Ammyr y Screeudeyr Griboyedov", as veih'n vlein 1931 myr "канал Грибоедова" ("Ammyr Griboyedov").
Va'n ammyr currit sheese er lhiabbee yn awin Krivusha (Кривуша) as ee goaill toshiaght ayns curragh ushlagh eddyr Kerrin Konyushennaya as Kerrin ny h-Ellynyn. 'Sy vlein 1739 va'n farrane eck kianglt rish y Moyka as eddyr ny bleeantyn 1764 as 1790 va'n bun eck diunit as va brooinyn yn ammyr aaniartit liorish cleigh va jeant ass clagh hryal. Va'n obbyr shen jeant ec I. M. Golenishchev-Kutuzov, I. A. Borisov, F. B. Baur as K. F. Moderakh. Eddyr ny bleeantyn 1954 as 1956 va eddin clagh hryal currit er yn ammyr veih'n Moyka gys yn Traid Iddaalagh.
'Sy vlein 1735 va droghad aamaid er ny hroggal liorish Astyl Voznesensky fo'n ennym Droghad Voznesensky. Hoshee troggalaght er yn ard mygeayrt y Krivusha çheu yiass veih Astyl Nevsky 'sy vlein 1737 tra hoshee stashoonyn listal jeh Rheynn y Lhuingys Marrey gobbraghey veih'n ard shen. Hoshee yn troggalaght niartaghee er y vroogh yesh. Va ny chied thieyn troggit liorish aamaid as maidjey, agh rere oardagh impiroil veih'n Tsar cha row ymmyd jeh ny biljyn darragh, malpys as theiley lhiggit. My row ny biljyn shen ry-akin er y voayl-troggee v'ad aachuirrit sheese ayns ny garaghyn as ny h-ooylee ry laue.
Ayns ny bleeantyn 2007 as 2008 va un vroogh aahroggit eddyr Droghad Kazansky as Droghad y Vanc. Ansherbee, ta'n broogh elley foast fuirraghtyn er aahroggalaght.
Droghadyn.
Ta 21 ghroghad goll tessen yn ammyr:

Kione (reddaghey):
Ta ny smoo ny un cheayll lesh yn 'ockle kione:

Kione:
Ayns ronsaghey-kirpey, ta kione baagh, cretoor ny dooinney çheet er y chooid crannagh ta cummal yn inçhyn, ny sooillyn, ny cleayshyn, y stroin as y beeal. Ta ny h-ayrnyn shen cooney lesh obbraidyn keeallagh, lheid as y shilley, yn eaishtaght, y toaral as y blastyn. S'cosoylagh nagh vel king er cretooryn neuchramp ennagh, agh ta king ry akin er ram er sorçhyn ennagh dy vioagyn shimmeadragh daa-heuagh.

Burleek:
She lus sooagh eh burleek (Veronica beccabunga). T'eh gaase rish strooanyn as jeeigyn 'syn Oarpey, yn Affrick Hwoaie as yn Aishey hwoaie as heear. 
Ta duillagyn dronuillagagh echey, as blaaghyn beggey gorrym ny bane-jiarg.

Neva (awin):
She awin ayns sheear hwoaie ny Roosh ee awin y Neva (, ASE:). T'ee roie magh veih Logh Ladoga trooid Queiggey Leningrad stiagh gys Baie Neva er Lhoob Finnlynn ayns Caayr Pheddyr. Gyn y wooise da'n lhiurid ghiare eck (74 km), t'ee ny trass awin smoo 'syn Oarpey rere y lhiggey magh eck (lurg y Volga as y Danube).
Cha nel awin alley roie magh as Loch Ladoga. Ta kiare caayryn troggit er ny brooinyn eck: Caayr Pheddyr, Shlisselburg, Kirovsk as Otradnoye, myrane lesh shiartanse dy valjyn as valjyn beggey elley. She awin yn-shiaulley t'aynjee as t'ee ny cooid jeh Bollagh Ushtey yn Volga as y Vooir Valtagh as Ammyr y Vooir Vane as y Vooir Valtagh.

Moyka (awin):
She awin as far-chrouw deltey yn Neva ayns Caayr Pheddyr, y Roosh ee yn Moyka (). T'ee cruinnaghey yn chooid veanagh jeh'n chaayr, as rere shen ta'n chooid veanagh jeh'n chaayr ny h-ellan. T'ee 4.67 km er lhiurid, seose gys 40 m er lheead, as 3.2 m er diunid. T'ee toshiaghey ec y Fontanka faggys da Magher Vart as roie stiagh 'sy Neva eddyr Ellan ny h-Ardmarraght Noa as Keiy ny h-Ardmarraght.

Straid Korablestroiteley:
She straid ayns Caayr Pheddyr heear, y Roosh, ee Straid Korablestroiteley (, "Ulitsa Korablestroiteley"; Rooshish son "Straid ny Troggeyderyn Lhongey"). Ta'n traid ny soie er Ellan Vasilyevsky heear as t'eh er credjal dy vel ee ny straid s'lhea 'sy chaayr. Hooar y traid yn ennym eck 'sy vlein 1972. T'ee roie tessen yn awin Smolenka liorish Droghad Korablestroiteley. Ta'n chooid smoo jeh ny thieyn er y traid nyn dhieyn cummaltagh preevaadjagh, agh ta thie lhiabbagh jeh Ollooscoil Steat Chaayr Pheddyr as yn thie oast "Pribaltiyskaya" nyn soie er y traid.

Burleek ushtey:
She lus lussagh sheer-vio eh burleek ushtey (Veronica anagallis-aquatica). T'eh gaase ayns thalloo fliugh as ushtey thanney. 
Jalloo-oaylleeaght.
She lus raisoamagh t'ayn. Ta ny gish echey 10cm-1m er lhiurid; ta kuse jeu snaueagh, as fir elley jeeragh. Ta duillagyn maylartey rea ny feeacklagh echey. Ta crouw-vlaaghey cur magh blaaghyn gorrym ny gorrym-jiargey er frauaig. Ta daa staimyn ec dagh blaa.

Burley:
She lus lussagh sheer-vio eh burley (Nasturtium officinale). T'ad jannoo ymmyd jeh myr glassrey duillagagh.
Jalloo-oaylleeaght.
Ta gish 'ollym echey, 15-90cm er lhiurid, ta nyn lhie ayns ushtey. Ta duillagyn neurea-fedjagagh echey, as 1-5 piyr dy ghuillageenyn oc. Ta fraueyn taghyrtagh gaase ass noadyn. T'eh çheet my vlaa eddyr Mee Vayrnt as Jerrey Souree, myr crouw-vlaaghey bane. Ta fynneigyn 8-20mm er lhiurid as 2-3mm er lheead echey, as wheesh as 60 rass ayndaue ayns daa straih.

Mair:
She olt jeh corp yn dooinney as organe ry hoi laueaghey, stiurey as ennaghtyn ta ry-gheddyn er laueyn deiney as far-gheiney as er cassyn cretooryn elley ee yn vair. Dy cadjin ta queig mairyn er y laue (gyn baght er yn yl-vairaghys, er y fo-vairaghys, as er coayl mairyn). She yn ordaag y chied vair er y laue, as t'ad ny mairyn ny lurg ayn na'n chorrag, y vair vooar, mair ny fainey as y vair veg. Dy cadjin ta'n enmys "mair chass" ny "mair choshey" currit er ny h-oltyn t'ayn ec jerrey cassyn.

Sooill:
She organe ta cronnaghey soilshey as ta çhyndaa yn soilshey shen gys thollaneyn lectro-chemmigagh ayns neayr-chillagyn ee yn tooill. Ta ny fotoghowderyn s'bunneydagh 'sy çhilley co-yssagh kiangley yn soilshey rish gleashaght. Ayns bioagyn ny s'yrjey ta'n tooill ny chooid jeh corys shilleydagh co-chast as t'ee çhaglym yn soilshey veih'n çhymmyltaght mygeayrt-y-mooee; cur streean er y gheyrid liorish cooney veih scannane; jeeraghey yn soilshey liorish cooney veih corys so-chiartaghey dy hooillagyn dy chroo jallooyn; çhyndaa ny jallooyn shen gys possan dy chowraghyn lectragh; as creeley ny cowraghyn shen gys yn inçhyn er bollee neayragh cho-chast ta kiangley yn tooill, trooid y nearag hilleydagh, gys y chorteish hilleydagh as ardjyn elley yn inçhyn. Dy cadjin, ta ny sooillyn soit 'sy chione er-yn-oyr dy vel y bollagh veih ny sooillyn dys yn inçhyn ny s'girrey.

Stroin:
Dy fishigagh ta'n stroin ny h-organe er yn eddin. Rere ronsaghey-kirpey, ta'n fockle stroin çheet er moyl ayns vertebree ta cummal ny tuill stroaney ta lhiggey yn aer stiagh as magh son ennalaghey lesh cooney veih'n veeal. Ta ny mucoseyn soaralagh as ny lhaggeenyn stroaney soit çheu-chooyl jeh'n stroin. Çheu-chooyl jeh'n lhin stroaney, ta'n aer goll trooid y farang, as eh er ny rheynn lesh y chorys lheieagh, as jeeragh stiagh 'sy chooid elley jeh'n chorys ennalagh. Ta'n stroin soit er mean yn eddin ayns deiney agh ayns y chooid smoo jeh sheeintee elley t'ee ry-gheddyn er baare y strooh.

Burley cleiyee:
She lus eh burley cleiyee (Sisymbrium officinale). T'eh dooghyssagh da'n Oarpey as yn Affrick Hwoaie, agh t'eh ry-akin er feie ny cruinney nish. 
Ymmyd.
She brasneyder moon, brasneyder shelley as purgaidagh t'ayn. Ta lusseyryn jannoo ymmyd jeh noi sheer-chassaghtee as çhingys gailley. Ayns lheeys Tibetagh, ta ymmyd jeant jeh noi nieuaghey bee.
T'eh goll er troarey harrish yn Oarpey er son ny duillagyn as rassinyn yn-ee echey. Ta ymmyd jeant jeh myr spios ayns glassan, ny myr aunlyn.
T'eh ny bee da praddagyn "Pieris rapae" as foillycanyn elley.

Burley frangagh:
She lus eh burley frangagh (Rorippa islandica, Rorippa palustris). T'eh dooghyssagh da'n Oarpey, yn Aishey, yn Affrick Hwoaie, as America Hwoaie. T'eh ny harkyl neughooghyssagh ayns çheeraghyn elley. T'eh gaase ayns thalloo fliugh.
Jalloo-oaylleeaght.
Ta gass yeeragh echey, wheesh as 1m er yrjid. Ta duillagyn feeacklagh dys babbanagh echey, wheesh as 30cm er lhiurid. Ta ny blaaghyn jannoo magh crouw-vlaaghey wuigh; ta ny petyllyn oc ayns cummey spein. She fynneig liauyr eh y mess echey, wheesh as kentimeader er lhiurid.

Burley garroo:
She lus blaagh eh burley garroo. T'eh dooghyssagh da'n Oarpey, yn Aishey, as America Hwoaie hwoaie.

Cleaysh:
She yn organe corpronsagh ta cronnaghey sheean ee yn chleaysh. Ansherbee, cha nel ee cloie paart myr gowaltagh son sheean ny lomarcan; ta paart mooar eck ayns cormaghey as soiaghey yn chorp. Ta'n chleaysh ny chooid jeh'n chorys eaishteeagh. Ta'n fockle "cleaysh" ymmydit dy chur sheese er y clane organe as er y chooid so-akin.

Mollee:
She ardjyn jeh renaigyn fiosagh as gloo çheu heose jeh ny sooillyn ad molleeyn. T'ad goll rish cummey yn oirr injil jeh'n immyr erskyn sooillyn sheeintee er-lheh. She yn phreeu-churrym oc na dy chur lhiettrimys er tuittym yn ollish as yn ushtey stiagh ayns laggin ny sooillyn, agh ta paart mooar oc ayns deiney ry hoi çhaghteraght gheiney as dreagh eddinagh. Dy mennick ta deiney, as mraane er lheh, ceaghley ny molleeyn lesh bishaghey ny scughey renaigyn, jeshaghey, ny towlley.

Burley geuree:
She genus dy lossreeyn lossreeyn blaaghey sheer-vio eh Barbarea (burley geuree). T'ad dooghyssagh da'n Lieh-chruinney Hwoaie, as y chooid smoo jeu 'syn Oarpey yiass as yn Aishey heear yiass. 
Jalloo-oaylleeaght.
Ta duillagyn babbanagh glassey dorraghey echey. Ta ny blaaghyn buighey as kiare-phetyllagh.
Dooieyn.
Rere The Plant List:
Ta kiare dooieyn ("B. intermedia", "B. stricta", "B. vulgaris" as "B. verna") dooghyssagh da ny h-Ellanyn Goaldagh.
Ymmyd.
Ta duillagyn yn-ee ec kuse dy ghooieyn.

Burley traie:
She lus daa-vleeanagh eh burley traie (Barbarea verna). T'eh dooghyssagh da'n Oarpey heear yiass. 
T'eh yn-ee, agh cha nel eh goll er troarey dy cadjin. 

Bwoid saggyrt:
Ta bwoid saggyrt (Dactylorhiza maculata) ny lus. Ta'n ennym echey oaylleeagh echey rere breckyn ny blaaghyn as duillagyn echey; she "mair-fraue breck" eh keeayll yn ennym.

Crooin Hostyn:
Ta Crooin Hostyn ny cochorp lomarcan. Ayns reamyn y Cho-unnaneys, as ny mooar-rheynnyn as steatyn oc, ta'n Chrooin cochorpaghey y reiltys er son y leigh, reiragh, slattyssagh, ny briwnagh. Haink rish ee 'sy Reeriaght Unnaneyssit dys eddyraghey y crooin chorpagh as cooid yn ashoon veih yn ard-ree as y chooid echeysyn. Skeayll yn eie da coloinyn Goaldagh, as t'eh ry-akin nish ayns ashoonyn neuchrogheydagh y Cho-unnaneys. Ta scansh eddyr Crooin Hostyn as Cliejeenyn ny Crooiney.

Yn Eash Chloaie:
Ta'n Eash Chloaie ny Eash ny Claghyn ny h-eash roie-hendeeagh y theihill. Ta'n ennym rere greieyn cloaie y sleih v'ayn, jeh clagh ghrillinagh erskyn ooilley. Va greieyn elley jeant jeh fuygh as craue. 
T'ad rheynn yn eash ayns tree ammyn:

Pasheydys:
Ta pasheydys çheet er cooid ta jeant jeh cray coagit. Ta troyn as dooghys y pasheydys rere y sorçh dy chray t'ad jannoo ymmyd jeh, as myr shen, ta saaseyn tradishoonagh er lheh ec ardjyn er lheh dy cadjin. Foddee pasheyder jannoo caghlaaghyn cooid liorish ny saaseyn t'ayn. 
'Sy toshiaght, chiaddee ad cummey y nhee craie er laueyn ynrican. Ny s'anmey, ghow ad toshiaght jannoo ymmyd jeh queeyllyn, ayns Mesopotamia mysh 6,000-4,000 RJC. Y pasheydys s'leaie as fys ain er, shen jallooghyn deiney beggey hie er jannoo mysh 29,000–25,000 RJC. Y crockanys s'leaie as fys ain er, shen ass yn Çhapaan as jeant mysh 10,500 RJC. S'cosoylagh eh dy hooar magh sleih çhaghnyssyn pasheydys ayns ymmodee buill er feie ny cruinney gyn kiangley eddyr oc.

Armys Nerin:
Ta armys Nerin jeant seose jeh claasagh airhey lesh strengyn as daah argid orroo er cooylrey gorrym. She cowrey heraldagh Nerin y chlaasagh. T'eh ry akin er yn armys v'er ny recortyssey dy h-oikoil myr armys steat Nerin er 9 Sauin 1945.

Yn Toodaan Yiass:
She çheer 'syn Affrick ee yn Toodaan Yiass. T'ee çhemmit liorish y Toodaan da'n twoaie, liorish yn Eetoip da'n shiar, liorish y Cheinney, Ooganda, as Pobblaght Gheynlagh ny Congo da'n jiass, as liorish Pobblaght yn Affrick Veanagh da'n sheear. She Juba y preeu-valley.

Amharish:
She çhengey Hemittagh ta ry-chlashtyn 'syn Eetoip ee Amharish.

The Lion King:
She scannane drama kiaullee bioghit Americaanagh voish y vlein 1994 eh The Lion King. Hie yn scannane er ny ghientyn liorish Walt Disney Feature Animation as er ny skeaylley magh liorish Walt Disney Pictures. T'eh ny 32h ard-scannane bioghit Disney as ny wheiggoo scannane bioghit hie er ghientyn car yn eash ta enmyssit Disney Renaissance. Va "The Lion King" stiurit ec Roger Allers as Rob Minkoff as screeuit ec Don Hahn, voish scaa-chloie liorish Irene Mecchi, Jonathan Roberts, as Linda Woolverton. Va ny h-arraneyn bunneydagh screeuit ec y chummeyder Elton John as yn arraneyder Tim Rice, marish reaghys kiaullee liorish Hans Zimmer. Ta'n scannane goaill stiagh gooyn Matthew Broderick, James Earl Jones, Jeremy Irons, Jonathan Taylor Thomas, Moira Kelly, Nathan Lane, Ernie Sabella, Rowan Atkinson, Robert Guillaume, Madge Sinclair ('sy phaart scannane jerrinagh eck), Whoopi Goldberg, Cheech Marin, as Jim Cummings. Ta "" (1998) eiyrtyssagh er.

Domhnach Phádraig:
She claghan as teiy-rheynn ayns twoaie meanagh Choontae ny Mee, Nerin, eh Domhnach Phádraig (; Yernish son "Doonagh Pherick"). T'eh ny lhie begnagh lieh-vollagh eddyr yn Ooive as Ceanannas er broogh hwoaie An Abhainn Dubh ("yn Awin Doo"). Ta cooid vooar jeh'n teiy-rheynn ny soie ayns Gaeltacht Bhaile Ghib - fer jeh'n daa ard Gaeltacht ayns Coontae ny Mee. Ta bunscoill (Scoil Náisiúnta Ultain Naofa) as keeill Phrotestoonagh 'sy chlaghan. Myrane lhieu, ta tholtanyn dy cheeill henndeeagh v'er troggal son Perick Noo liorish Conall, braar Rí Lóegaire mac Néill, as rhaa henndeeagh lesh kiare carnaneyn caggee ta cruinnaghey mygeayrt-y-mooee.

An Aitinn Bhuí:
She claghan beg ayns çheshvean Choontae ny Mee, Nerin, ee an Aitinn Bhuí (; Yernish son "yn Aittin Vuigh"). T'ee ny soie 5 km çheu heear yiass veih Baile Shláine, er y joarey eddyr ny baljyn eirinagh Baile an Dolardaigh as Baile an tSeanascail.

Baile Bháigh:
She claghan beg ayns çheshvean Choontae ny Mee, Nerin, ee Baile Bháigh (). T'eh ny hoie 5 km çheu heear yiass veih'n Ooive, preeu-valley yn choontae beggan çheu hwoaie jeh'n phreeu-raad ashoonagh N51.

Baile Nua na Manach:
Ta Baile Nua na Manach (; Yernish son "Balley Noa ny Maynaghyn") ny valley beg eirinagh ayns Coontae ny Mee, Nerin. T'eh ny lhie 4 km hiar yiass veih Baile Shláine as 700 m veih'n joarey rish Coontae Lhoo.

Jean Auguste Dominique Ingres:
Va Jean Auguste Dominique Ingres (29 Mee ny Nollick, 1780 - 1867) ny pheinteyr Frangagh. Rug eh ayns Montauban, y Rank ayns 1780 as hooar eh baase ayns 1867 ayns Paarys.

Masiela Lusha:
Ta Masiela Lusha ny ben-chloieder scannane as ardan Albaanagh as Americaanagh. Rug ee ayns Tiranë, yn Albaan er 23 Jerrey Fouyir, 1985. 

Coryssyn screeuee Canadagh:
Ta Coryssyn screeuee Canadagh (ny keayrtyn, sheelaght Chanadagh), ny kynney dy abugidaghyn t'ad jannoo ymmyd jeu dys screeu çhengaghyn bun-dooghyssagh Canadagh ennagh. T'ad goaill stiagh çhengaghyn Algonquiagh as Çhengaghyn Eskimagh-Aleutagh; va ymmyd jeant jeu liorish çhengaghyn Athabaskan traa dy row.
Ta ymmyd jeant jeh ny coryssyn shoh dys screeu abbyrtyn Creeish eddyr Naskapish (ayns Quebec) dys ny Sleityn Rocky, as shen goaill stiagh including Creeish Hiar, Creeish Cheylley, Creeish Churree as Creeish Vagheragh. 'Syn Arctagh Canadagh hiar, t'ad screeu Inuktitut lioroo, as ta stayd co-oikoil oc marish yn abbyrlhit Romanagh ayns Nunavut. Ta ymmyd ardjynagh oc dys screeu Ojiwebish 'syn Chanadey Heear. Va ymmyd jeant jeu keayrtyn dy row dys screeu Siksikish, Dakelhish, Dene Suline, Slavish, Tliçhoish, as Danezaaish.
Ta ymmyd neuchadjin jeant jeu liorish boodeeyssyn er creeaghyn ny Canadey as ny Steatyn Unnaneyssit, agh she phenomenon Canadagh t'ayn son y chooid smoo.
Cummey.
Gyn scansh da'n ennym Baarleagh "Canadian Aboriginal Syllabics" oc, she abugida t'ayn, cha nee sheelaght. Ta cowraghyn er lheh ec dagh shillab ayns sheelaght, as son y chooid smoo cha nel shillabyn gollrish y cheilley ga dy vel y corockle cheddin oc. Ta'n corys screeuee Canadagh jannoo ymmyd jeh cowraghyn cadjin as ad y chaghlaa (liorish çhyndaa) dys cowraghey y breeockle t'oc. Cha nel yn aght cowree shoh, liorish çhyndaa ny "lettyryn", ry-akin ayns coryssyn screeuee elley erbee.

Creeish:
Ta Creeish ( ny macro-hengey Algonquiagh ta goll er loayrt ec mysh 117,000 sleih 'syn Chanadey, eddyr Thallooyn yn Eear Hwoaie as Labrador. Myr shen, she çhengey bun-dooghyssagh smoo ny Canadey Gyn scansh da shen, cha nel stayd oikoil erbee eck agh ayns Thallooyn yn Eear Hwoaie marish hoght çhengaghyn bun-dooghyssagh elley.
Ennym.
Ta enmyn dooghyssagh goaill stiagh "Nēhiyawēwin" ᓀᐦᐃᔭᐍᐏᐣ (Creeish Vagheragh), "Nīhithawīwin" (Crrish Cheylley), "Nēhinawēwin" as "Nehirâmowin" (Atikamekwish), "Nehilawewin" (Innuish Heear, abbyrt Piyekwâkamî), "Leluwewn" (Innuish Heear, abbyrt Betsiamites), "Innu-Aimûn" (Montagnish Hiar), "Iynu-Ayamûn" (Creeish Hiar Çheerey Yiass), "Iyiyiw-Iyimiwin" (Cree Hiar Hwoaie).
Continuum abbyrtagh.
Ta ny Creeish ry-rheynn rere ymmydee slattyn towsey. 
Ta'n scansh smoo baghtal eddyr abbyrtyn croghey er soilshaghey y vyn-heean *n Proto-Algonquish 'syn abbyrt jeianagh:
Myr shen, ta Creeisheyryn Magheragh cur er y çhengey, ta Creeisheyryn Keylley gra , as ta Creeisheyryn Curree gra . Ta obbyr chosoylagh ry-akin ayns ny çhengaghyn Siouagh myr "Dakota, Nakota" as "Lakota".
Ta abbyrtyn Ontario hwoaie, as slystyn James Bay yiass, Lanaudière as Mauricie ny Quebec, geddyr-scarrey ("sh" myr "sh"uyr) as ("s" myr "soo"). Ta abbyrtyn da'n çheear ad y chovestey myr ), as ta abbyrtyn ny çhiar ad y chovestey myr ny ). 
Ayns shiartase dy abbyrtyn, goaill stiagh Creeish Vagheragh hwoaie as Creeish Cheylley, ta as er govestey myr . Ayns boodeeyssyn Québec Chisasibi, Whapmagoostui, as Kawawachikamach, ta er govestey marish .
Ta caghlaays sheeanagh elley croghey er cleaoilaghey *k Proto-Algonquish. Çheu hiar jeh creeagh Ontario as Quebec, er lhimmey jeh Atikamekwish, t'eh er arraghey dys roie breeockle toshee. Shen ry-akin 'sy cholloo *kīna heose.
Rang-oardraghey.
Ny keayrtyn, t'ad rheynn y continuum abbyrtagh ayns daa hengey, "Creeish" as "Montagnish". Ta "Creeish" goaill stiagh dagh ooilley abbyrt gyn y caghlaa *k -> (Yn Cholombey Ghoaldagh–Quebec) as ta "Montagnish" çheet er yn ardjyn raad ta'n caghlaa shen ayn (Quebec-Thalloo yn Eeast as Labrador). Shen ymmydoil er son çhengoaylleeaght, agh beggan boiragh er y fa dy vel eh cur "Montagnaish" er Creeish Hiar. 
Co-ordrail.
Rere cliaghtey çhengaghyn bun-dooghyssagh Americaanagh, she çhengey yl-chohaahagh t'ayn. Ta focklyn ny Creeish feer liauyr dy mennick, as ta un 'ockle soilshaghey keeayll lane raa 'sy Ghaelg.
Screeu.
Son y chooid smoo, ta abbyrtyn Creeish goll er screeu liorish corys screeuee Creeish rere tradishoon. Foddee oo ad y screeu 'syn abbyrlhit Romanagh chammah. Ta abbyrtyn Quebec hiar as Labrador goll er screeu 'syn abbyrlhit Romanagh ynrican. Ta shalleeyn ayn dys croo fockleyryn da abbyrtyn ny Creeish, myr sampleyr, Cree Language Resource Project.
Cummaght.
Ta cummaght ec cree er daa hengey ny Canadey Heear: Michif as Bungee.
Stayd.
Ta stayd ceaghlagh ec Creeish harrish yn Chanadey. T'ee mastey 11 hengey oikoil Thallooyn yn Eear Hwoaie,agh cha nel agh beggan loayreyderyn eck 'syn ard, rish Fort Smith. Ayns shiartase dy ardjyn, she çhengey vio ny theay t'ayn; ta mooar-earroo ny theay nyn Greeisheyryn as t'ee goll er ynsaghey ayns scoillyn liorish as nah hengey. Ayns ardjyn elley, t'ee parail. T'ee mastey çhengaghyn bun-dooghyssagh stroshey America Hwoaie, agh er y fa nagh vel monney cooney undinyssagh eck, t'ee fo gaue ny yei shen.

Ennalaghey (sheeanaghtys):
Ayns sheeanaghtys, ta ennalaghey çheet er bleaystey aeragh rish fosley ny dooney lhiettalys. Ta kuse jeu goll er ennalaghey as cha nel fir elley. T'eh ry-ennaghtyn liorish cur mair roish ny meillyn ayd traa t'ou gra "paag", "spaag" as "baagh". Cur tastey da'n scansh eddyr oc: ta ennalaghey ec y chied 'ockle agh cha nel ec ny fir elley. 
Cha nel corocklyn ennalit ec dagh ooilley çhengey. Ny keayrtyn, ta "ennalit" as "neuennalit" eddyr-scarrey daa vyn-heean çhengey ennagh. Ny keayrtyn elley, ta ennalaghey lhiettalys ennagh cowraghey fo-heeanyn myn-heean ennagh ta ry-chlashtyn ayns çhymyllaght er lheh. 
Myr sampleyr, 'sy Thaish, ta as [p nyn myn-heeanyn er lheh, /pʰ/ as /p/. 
'Sy Ghaelg, ta as [p nyn vo-heeanyn y vyn-heean cheddin, /p/. Ta ry-chlashtyn erreish da [s.
Ta Frangish, Ollannish as Latvish sampleyryn dy hengaghyn gyn corocklyn ennalit erbee.
Ta coryssyn screeuee cowraghey y tro shen ny keayrtyn. Myr sampleyr, ta Bretnish screeu er son ("schlei") rere [gast ("olk") as y daa heean gyn ennalaghey. Er y laue elley, ta Baarle screeu er son ("schlei"), rere [kʰɪl ("marroo"), ga nagh vel ennalaghey ec y chied /k/.
Dys cowraghey ennalaghey 'syn Abbyrlhit Sheeanagh Eddyr-ashoonagh, t'ad screeu "h" harrish, . Cha nel ad cowraghey corocklyn gyn ennalaghey son y chooid smoo, agh ta'n scarreydagh ayn er son y chooish..

The Aristocats:
She scannane aittys kiaullee romansagh Americaanagh voish y vlein 1970 eh The Aristocats. Hie yn scannane er ny ghientyn liorish Walt Disney Productions as er ny stiurey liorish Wolfgang Reitherman. Y 20oo ard-scannane bioghit Disney, ta'n scannane bunnit er skeeal liorish Tom McGowan as Tom Rowe, as geiyrt er lught kiyt ooasle as er kayt straiddey ta cooney riu lurg ren butleyr goaill ad son goaill greim er berçhys e venainshtyr. Ta'n scannane goaill stiagh gooyn Phil Harris, Eva Gabor, Hermione Baddeley, Dean Clark, Sterling Holloway, Scatman Crothers, as Roddy Maude-Roxby.

Macro-hengey ISO 639:
Rere corys rang-oardraghey çhengoayllee ISO 639-3, ta macro-hengey ny macrohengey çheet er possan dy arraghyssyn er lheh. Ta macro-hengey goaill stiagh cooishyn do-reaghey continuum abbyrtagh (my nee arraghyssyn scartagh t'ayn, ny çhengaghyn as faggys-vooinjerys eddyr oc), chammah's cooishyn tra sleih er nyannoo briwnyssyn er quoid dy hengaghyn t'ayn rere kynneeaght ny politickaght, cha nel rere çhengoaylleeaght. 
Cha row çhengey er lheh ec dagh coad ISO 639-2 ta ny macro-hengey ayns ISO 639-3. Myr sampleyr, 'ara' (Arabish). Va aarheynnyn fir elley ayns 639-2 myr çhengaghyn er lheh: myr sampleyr, va 'nor' (Norlynnish) ayn myr 'nno' (Nynorsk) as 'nob' (Bokmål). Rere shen, ny keayrtyn, ta "abbyrtyn" ec 639-2 ta nyn jengaghyn rere 639-3: myr sampleyr, va 'arb' (Arabish Chadjinit) ny abbyrt 'ara' (Arabish) rere 639-2, agh she çhengey t'ayn rere 639-2 as ta 'ara' ny macro-hengey. Shen ny eab dys reaghey arraghyssyn as scansh çhengoaylleeagh eddyr oc, ga dy nee y çhengey cheddin t'ayn er lesh loayreyderyn, myr sampleyr ayns diglossia.
Rolley macro-hengaghyn.
Fys oikoil rere http://www.sil.org/iso639-3.

Mahommad:
By vunneyder yn Islam eh Mahommad (‎ ', )(ny Muhammad ibn Abdullah ny keayrtyn; t'eh goll er aascreeu myr Muḥammad, Muhammed, Mohammad ny Mohammed chammah) (m. 26 Averil 570—8 Mean Souree 632) T'eh coontit ec Moslymee myr çhaghter as fayder Yee, as myr y fer-ymmyrkee s'jerree jeh'n leigh mastey Fayderyn yn Islam, as, ec y chooid smoo jeh ny Moslymee, t'eh coontit myr y fayder s'jerree rere yn Quran. Rere shen, ta Moslymee coontey Mahommad myr aachoureyder yn chraueeaght vunneydagh unjeeagh jeh Adaue, Noah, Abraham, Moses, Yeesey as fayderyn elley. Va paart echey chammah myr aachummeyder sheshoil, diploamagh, marçhan, fallsoonagh, oraatagh, leigh-hoyrtagh, fer-toshee cahnagh, dein-charrey, graihder sheelnaue, as, rere credjue ny Moslymee, obbraidagh jantyssyn Yee er y thalloo.

Akanish:
Ta Akanish (Twi ny Fante) ny çhengey ghooghyssagh yn Ghaney. T'ee ry-chlashtyn er fud jiass ny çheerey ec mysh 52% jeh'n phobble. She çhengey ny h-Akanee as nyn naboonyn t'ayn, mastey çhengaghyn Kwa elley.
Ta tree abbyrtyn cadjinit ayn as cairscreeu nyn hene oc: Asanteish as Akuapemish (t'ad cur Twi er y jees oc), as Fanteish. Ga dy vel ad so-chohoiggal myr caaynt, v'ad do-chohoiggal myr çhengaghyn screeuit. Ayns 1978, hug er bun y Akan Orthographey Committee co-chairscreeu da Akan, as ta ymmyd jeant jeh ayns bun-scoillyn er son çhengaghyn Kwa elley.

Aymarish:
She çhengey Aymaragh ny h-Aymaree ee Aymarish (). Ta staydys oikoil eck 'syn yn Volivia as yn Pheroo, as t'ee ry-chlashtyn ayns yn Çhillee as yn Argenteen myrgeddin. She çhengey ghleiynagh t'ayn, as ta oardagh kione-cass-breear eck.

Bikolish:
She macro-hengey ard Bikol ny h-Ellanyn Philippeenagh ee Bikolish. 

Asserbajaanish:
She macro-hengey ee Asserbajaanish (). T'ee mastey çhengaghyn Turkagh ny h-Aishey heear yiass , as t'ee goll er loayrt ec ny h-Asserbajaanee. Ta faggys-mooinjerys eddyr ish as Turkish, Qashqaish as Turkmenish.

Baloçhish:
She macro-hengey Eeraanagh Heear Hwoaie ee Baloçhish (Baloçhish: ). She çhengey ny Baloçhee t'ayn, as t'ee ry-chlashtyn ayns yn Valoçhistaan, chammah's yn Phakistaan, yn Eeraan hiar, yn Afghanistaan yiass, yn Turkmenistaan, EAU, Yn Omaan as yn Injey. T'ee mastey nuy çhengaghyn oikoil ny Pakistaan.

The Fox and the Hound (noaskeeal):
She noaskeeal voish y vlein 1967 eh The Fox and the Hound va screeuit liorish y noaskeealagh Americaanagh Daniel P. Mannix as daahit liorish John Schoenherr. Ta'n noaskeeal geiyrt er bea Tod, shynnagh ruy va troggit ec dooinney 'sy chied vlein jeh'n vea echey, as Copper, moddey lieh--choo folley t'ayns shelloo shelgeyr ynnydagh, as yn ennym Master ("Mainshtyr") bronnit er. Erreish da ren Tod cur bun rish baase y choo share ec y vainshtyr, ta'n dooinney as e voddey geiyrt as shelg y shynnagh, fo cooylrey cruinney deiney caghlaaee as bea cadjin Tod as eh shelg bea, shirrey sheshey, as coadey yn thalloo echey. As eh gaarlaghey eh hene roish screeu yn lioar, ren Mannix studeyrys er shynnee, meein as oaldey, keirdeeaghtyn shelg eigsoylagh, as ny bollee ta cooyn shelg shynnee, dy hickyraghey aght rieughagh ny karacteyryn echey.
Ren y noaskeeal cosney yn Dutton Animal Book Award ayns 1967, as, rere shen, hie eh magh er ny hoilshaghey magh er 11 Mean Fouyir jeh'n vlein cheddin liorish E.P. Dutton. She reihys y "Reader's Digest" Book Club eh ayns 1967 as cosneyder yn Athenaeum Literary Award. Ren cremeyderyn cur ard-voylley da mynphaartyn v'ayn as da aght screeuee Mannix. Chionnee Walt Disney Productions ny kiartyssyn scannane tra ren eh cosney aundyr Dutton, agh ren ad goaill toshiaght rish gientyn y scannane agh ayns 1977. Ga dy row ceaghlaghyn mooarey ayn 'sy scannane nagh row 'sy noaskeeal, hie "The Fox and the Hound" liorish Disney er ny skeaylley magh ayns theateryn ayns Jerrey Souree 1981 as haink er dy ve feer rahoil.

Mareeish:
She macro-hengey 'sy lught-çhengagh Ooralagh Mareeish (Mareeish: , ). T'ee loayrit ayns Mari El 'sy Roosh son y chooid smoo, chammah's 'syn Tatarstaan, 'syn Udmurt as ayns Creeagh Perm.

Delawarish:
She macro-hengey bun-dooghyssagh America Hwoaie ee Delawarish. T'eh goaill stiagh Munseeish as y çhengey varroo Unamish.

Magnus VI:
By ree Norlynn eh Magnus VI Lagabøte (Shenn Norlynnish: "Magnús lagabœtir", Gaelg: "Magnus karreyder leigh") ny Magnus Håkonsson (Shenn Norlynnish: "Magnús Hákonarson") eddyr 1263 as 1280.
She mac saa Håkon Håkonsson as Margrét Skúladóttir v'ayn. Rug eh ayns Tønsberg er 1 Mee ny Boaldyn 1238, as goll er bashtey. V'eh troggit ayns Bergen. Hooar e vraar Håkon ayns 1257 as faagail Magnus myr eirey y reeriaght. Er 11 Mean Fouyir 1261, phoos eh ben-phrinse Ingeborg, inneen Ree Erik Plogpenning Ghanvarg marroo. Hooar Ree Håkon baase er 16 Mee ny Nollick 1263 rish caggey noi ree Nalbin er ny h-Inshyn Goal, as hie Magnus er crooinaghey ny ree Norlynn.
Baase.
Ayns arrey 1280, haink çhingys er Magnus ayns Bergen as hooar eh baase er 9 Mee ny Boaldyn. V'eh fo e vac Eirik y chrooinaghey myr co-ree rish mean souree, agh nish haink Eirik y ve ree ynrican rish 12 vleeaney d'eash. Va feer phooar ec quaiyl choyrlee, goaill stiagh Ingeborg. Ta enney er Magnus myr ree mie ren ymmyd jeh leigh ayns ynnyd niart. She ree faase v'ayn er lesh kuse dy hennaghyssee er y fa dy ren eh livrey seose ny h-Inshyn Goal as cur sheese rere mianyn ny killagh. Er lesh sleih elley, she polaase creeney v'ayn ren scapail caggaghyn fardailagh as shickyraghey shee ny çheerey. Hie eh er oanluckey ayns agglish vannishter Fransiscagh Vergen, as shen Ard-Çhiamble Vergen neayr's y 16oo eash.

Reeriaght vunraghtoil:
She corys reiltys ard-reeagh ee reeriaght vunraghtoil ta soiaghey ard-ree ny chione steat rere cagliaghyn bunraght screeut ny aafillit. Ta'n corys shoh soiaghey noi ry-hoi jarroo-reeriaght gyn cagliagh bunraghtoil erbee er pooar yn ard-ree.
Dy cadjin, ta parlamaid ec reeriaght vunraghtoil as pooar reiragh echey son y chooid smoo. Ta pooaryn yn ard-ree croghey er y vunraght t'ayn. Ny keayrtyn, ta currymyn jesh-chliaghtagh ec yn ard-ree; ny keayrtyn elley, ta pooar gear-ghaue ec yn ard-ree.
Ny keayrtyn, ta reeriaghtyn bunraghtoil er go-obbraghey marish reiltyssyn Fashishtagh (myr sampleyr, Yn Iddaal Fashishtagh as Yn Spaainey Francoagh) as ard-reillaghtyn caggee. Ny keayrtyn elley, ta laue scanshoil oc ayns shassoo noi "coupyn d'état" ny eabyn reiltyssyn deynlagh y chur fo haart liorish gleashaghtyn cummynagh ny fashistagh (myr sampleyr, "coup" 23-F ny Spaainey, ny "coupyn" 1981 as 1985 ny Çheerey Thai). Va paart y ree ayns ny cooishyn shen feer scanshoil.
Ta reeriaghtyn vunraghtoil goaill stiagh yn Austrail, ny Bahamaghyn, Barbados, yn Velg, yn Veleesh, yn Vutaan, Bahrain, yn Chamboyd, yn Chanadey, Y Danvarg, Grenada, yn Yamaicey, yn Çhapaan, Jordan, yn Choowait, Liechtenstein, Lesoto, Luxembourg, yn Valaysia, Monaco, yn Varoc, yn Teelan Noa, yn Çheer Injil, Norlynn, Papooey Guinea Noa, Noo Winsen as ny Grenadeenyn, ny h-Ellanyn Holomon, yn Spaainey, yn Toolynn, yn Çheer Thai, Tuvalu, as y Reeriaght Unnaneysit.

Kilomeadar kerrinagh:
Ta kilomeadar kerrinagh (cowrey: km2) ny vishan jeh'n unnid towse SI eaghtyr meadar kerrinagh. Ta 1 km2 corrym rish:
Noi shen:
Ta "km2" cowraghey (km)2, "kilo-meadar kerrinagh", cha nel k(m2), "kilo meadar-kerrinagh". Ta 3 km2 corrym rish = 3,000,000 m2, cha nel 3,000 m2.

The Hunchback of Notre Dame (scannane 1996):
She scannane drama kiaullee bioghit Americaanagh voish y vlein 1996 eh The Hunchback of Notre Dame. Hie yn scannane er ny ghientyn liorish Walt Disney Feature Animation as er ny skeaylley magh liorish Walt Disney Pictures. Y 34oo ard-scannane bioghit Disney as y shiaghtoo scannane va gientit car eash y Disney Renaissance, ta'n scannane bunnit er y noaskeeal voish 1831 as yn ennym cheddin er liorish Victor Hugo. Ta skeeal y scannane geiyrt er Quasimodo, kiaullaneyder croobagh Notre Dame, as e streeuyn son soiaghey jeh'n çheshaght y gheddyn. Va'n scannane stiurit ec Gary Trousdale as Kirk Wise, as ta'n fwirran goo goaill stiagh Tom Hulce, Demi Moore, Tony Jay, Kevin Kline, Paul Kandel, Jason Alexander, Charles Kimbrough, David Ogden Stiers, as Mary Wickes 'sy phaart scannane jerrinagh eck. Hie scannane eiyrtyssagh, "The Hunchback of Notre Dame II", er ny skeaylley magh jeeragh er feeshan ayns 2002.

Meeiley cherrinagh:
Ta meeiley cherrinagh (cowrey: mi², mi ker) ny unnid towse impiroil as SUA er son eaghtyr ta corrym rish kerrin un veeiley. 
Ta meeiley cherrinagh corrym rish:

Conaant Pheairt:
She conaant shee 1266 eh Conaant Pheairt hug jerrey er caggaghyn eddyr Magnus VI Reeriaght Norlynn as Alexander III Reeriaght ny h-Albey er kiondeeaght ny h-Inshyn Goal as Vannin.
Roish my daink stiagh ny Wiggynee, va ny n-Inshyn Goal yiass fo reeriaght Ghaelgagh, Dal Roih-Oddey, as va ny h-Inshyn Goal hwoaie fo stiurey Pictagh. 
Rere "Feniagh-Skeeal Orkneyinga", tra hie Harald I Norlynn er crooiney mysh 872 BNJ, hie ymmodee noidyn er çhea dys ellanyn ny h-Albey. Ren Harald geiyrt orroo, as goaill stiagh Ellanyn y Twoaie 'sy reeriaght ayns 875 as ny h-Inshyn Goal mysh jeig bleeaney ny s'anmey. Hie Mannin er goaill ec ny Norlynnee traa ennagh eddyr 877 as 900 BNJ.
Ayns 1098, ghow Magnus III Norlynn barriaght er kione-fir Norlynnagh reeriaghtyn beggey yn Orkaid, ny h-Inshyn Goal as Mannin. Chossyn eh stiurey reeoil jeeragh er ny h-ellanyn. Ren Edgar ny h-Albey coardailys marish Magnus as lhiggey voish ny h-ellanyn.
Hie Conaant Pheairt er coardail ayns 1266 tree blein ny lurg Caggey Largs as eiytys neuhickyr echey. V'eh fo Haakon IV Loghlynn aahoieaghey orroo rish y nah hourey, agh hooar eh baase rish y gheurey. Va Magnus VI ny eiyrtyssagh echey, as hirr eh er shee liorish y chonaant.
Ta'n conaant goaill rish kiondeeaght ny h-Albey er ny h-ellanyn er son sym-glout dy 4000 margyn as bleeanaght dy 100 margyn. Chammah's shen, ren Nalbin goit rish kiondeeaght Norlynn er Shetlynn as yn Orkaid.

Cooish:
She feailley eddyr-Ghaelgagh bleinoil ee Cooish, ny Yn Chooish, ta kelloorey dagh red bentyn rish y Ghaelg as cultoor Vannin. T'ee goll er stiurey as reaghey ec y Çheshaght Ghailckagh as t'ee geddyn cooney veih veih Undinys Eiraght Vannin as veih Coonseil Ellynyn Ellan Vannin myrane lesh thieyn dellal ynnydagh. T'ee cur greinneyderyn çhengey, kiaulleyderyn, ard-scoillaryn, as y theay ry cheilley son dy chur yn eiraght Ghaelgagh er oaie. T'ee goll er kelloorey feie shiaghtin as t'ee goaill stiagh cuirraghyn kiaull, keirdlannyn scoill, leaghtyn, as seshoonyn kiaull. Va'n feailley currit er bun ec Phil Gawne fo'n ennym "Feailley Ghaelgagh" ayns ny 1990yn leah.

Cooyl-screeudeyr:
She screeudeyr keirdey ta screeu fo ennym as scaa peiagh elley eh cooyl-screeudeyr. T'eh gobbraghey er faill soilsheyder, jantagh screeuee ny ughtar as screeu artyn, lioaryn ny kiaull er son peiagh elley. Dy cadjin, t'ad screeu hene-veashnyssyn ny collooghyn earishlioar fo ennym ennymoilagh ennagh gyn schlei screeuee dy liooar shen y yannoo, ny gyn traa dy liooar y clane obbyr y yannoo. Ta cooyl-screeu ry-akin ayns kiaull as ellyn ny keayrtyn.
Cha nee braddeeaght lettyraght ayn; ta braddeeaght çheet er ymmyd obbyr ta jeant hannah gyn kiart, agh ta cooyl-screeu jeant ass y noa er son y chooish t'ayn. Cha nel screeu fo ennym screeuee coontit myr cooyl-screeu noadyr. 
Obbyr.
Son y chooid smoo, ta cooyl-screeu ry-akin ayns obbyr ta croghey er ennym y screeudeyr enmyssit: hene-veashnyssyn, lioaryn aght keirdey liorish ard-ghelleyderyn, as oraidjyn politickagh. Ta lioaryn elley cooyl-screeuit myr nane jeh straih liorish ughtar ennoil. Ta kuse dy 'leih cadjin failley cooyl-screeudeyr ad y chooney dy screeu cooinaghtyn persoonagh da'n lught-thie. Chammah's shen, ta cooneyderyn post ec oikee, politickeyryn as ennymoilee t'ad y chooney liorish freggyrt screeuyn.
Ta laue y chooyl-screeudeyr 'syn obbyr croghey er y chooish. Ta kuse jeu reaghey, shareaghey as glenney draght ta screeuit ec yn ughtar enmyssit. Ny keayrtyn elley, t'ad screeu lane obbyr, faggys, rere cummey as eieyn yn ughtar. Ta ram obbyr ronsaghey jeant oc ny keayrtyn, myr sampleyr, dys cooyl-screeu hene-veashnys ennymoilagh ny lioar neufarskeealagh, ny dys screeu dy jeeragh rere blass as far-heihill ughtar far-skeealaght.
Dys cooyl-screeu hene-veashnys, t'ad co-akin marish yn ughtar enmyssit, co-obbree, caardjyn as lught-thie, as ronsaghey artyn, co-akinyn as recortyssyn elley. Dys screeu neufarskeealaght, t'ad co-akin yn ughtar as lhaih ny h-artyn, oraidjyn as co-akinyn ta jeant echey do beagh yn obbyr cooyl-screeuit rere barelyn, tuarym as blass yn ughtar.
Shimmey fa t'ayn ta sleih failley cooyl-screeudeyr er. S'goan ad ennymoilee ny sleih scanshoil as traa, smaght er hene as schlei screeuee dy liooar oc lioar y screeu. Ga dy vel kuse jeu screeu art ny oraid nish as reesht, foddee nagh vel oayllys oc er yn aght share lane lioar y chiaddey as reaghey do beagh eh anaasoil, resoonagh as er bieauid chooie. Ny keayrtyn elley, ta soilsheyder failley cooyl-screeudeyr lioaryn y screeu fo ennym ughtar mie er enney as creckeydagh. Ta shen lhiggey daue ny smoo lioaryn y chur magh fo ennym ughtar fondit as lhaihderyn jeean oc hannah. 
Son y chooid smoo, ta meer 'sy chonaant eddyr y chooyl-screeudeyr as soilsheyder lhiettal y cooyl-screeudeyr veih cur enney er hene myr "feer screeudeyr" yn obbyr. Ny keayrtyn elley, t'eh goit rish liorish raa ennagh myr "marish..." ny "myr dinsh eh da...", liorish bwooise ayns goan foshlee, ny myr "cohoyrtagh" ny "coondeyder ronsee".
Ardjaghey.
Ny keartyn, ta sheshaghtyn-dellal ny reagheydyssyn failley sleih noteyn y screeu da'n ynnyd-eggey ny blog oc rere ymmodee far-enmyn, jannoo arrish dy ve pobble cadjin. T'ad lhiggey er dy vel yn ynnyd-eggey foddey ny share er enney na vel eh dy feer, dy dy vel anaase ec ram sleih er cooish ennagh.
Cooyl-screeu ard-scoillaragh.
Ny keayrtyn, ta sheshaghtyn dellal failley screeudeyryn keirdey dys screeu artyn, as breigey ny geeck scoillar ad y chur magh myr nyn obbyr hene. Ta shen ny haase , as ta ymmyd jeant jeh dys shaghney leigh soilsheenee, jannoo beg jeh doilleeidyn troa ennagh, as moylley troa ny sheshaght noi troa sheshaghtyn elley.
Cooyl-screeu studeyragh.
Ta shiartanse dy studeyryn failley cooyl-screeudeyr dys screeu traaght stiagh, traaghtyn imbee, traaghtyssyn as . T'eh coontit myr braddeeaght lettyragh ad y chur stiagh. Ta nyn sheshaghtyn-dellal ta çhebbal lheid yn obbyr.
Shaghney crossey oikoil.
Ta kuse dy heeraghyn crossey ughtaryn t'er chur mee-haitnys er y reiltys t'ayn, ny er lught-reill keirdey ennagh, as ad y lhiettal veih soilshaghey. Ta kuse jeu shaghney shen liorish cur magh obbyr fo ennym ughtar elley. Myr sampleyr, va'n scannane "Bridge on the River Kwai" screeuit ec Carl Foreman as Michael Wilson, agh v'adsyn ayns lioar doo Hollywood. Hug ad enmys oikoil da Pierre Boulle, screeudeyr y noaskeeal va bun y scannane. Ayns 1984, erreish daue geddyn baase, ren yn Academy goaill rish ad dy oikoil liorish aundyr Oscar. Ta enmys oc er lhiegganyn jeianagh y scannane.

Blaenau Gwent (reddaghey):
Foddee Blaenau Gwent çheet er:

Co-chorp Coontae Chaerffili:
She co-chorp coontae ayns Bretin Yiass eh Co-chorp Coontae Chaerffili, as y balley Caerffili hene balley reiragh y choontae.

Zhengzhou:
She Zhengzhou (Sheenish aashagh: 郑州; Sheenish hradishoonagh: 鄭州; pinyin: Zhèngzhōu) preeu-valley Henan.

Casnewydd:
She coontae as ard-valley ayns Bretin Yiass eh Casnewydd, ny hoie er yn Afon Wysg. Ta'n ard-valley hene balley reiragh y choontae. 
Ta'n ennym çheet jeh "Castell Newydd ar y Wysg", dy gra myr shen, "Cashtal noa er y Wysg", çheet er cashtal y 12oo eash faggys da mean y valley.
Va shenn chashtal breck as bailey ny hoie er Stow Hill. Cha nel y chashtal shen ry-akin nish.

Oltey Hionnal Ashoonagh Vretin:
She ynnydagh ny theay ayns Çhionnal Ashoonagh Vretin eh Oltey Hionnal Ashoonagh Vretin ny OHA (, ). Ta 60 oltey ayn: 40 as rheynn-reih er lheh oc, as 20 er nyn reih myr ynnydee ardjyn-reihey Vretin. Ta queig OHAyn ec Bretnagh, fer ass y rheynn-reih echey, as kiare ass yn ard-reih.
Ta queig ardjyn-reihey ayn: Bretyn Heear as Meanagh, Bretyn Hwoaie, Bretyn Heear Yiass, Bretyn Hiar Yiass as Bretyn Yiass Veanagh.
Reihys.
Ta olteynyn rheynn-reih goll er reih liorish corys reih kied ghooinney dy valley, agh ta olteynyn ard-reih goll er reih myr corys oltey brash, myr sorçh dy tuarastyllys coreiragh. Ta dagh soieag goll er reih ec y traa cheddin, dagh kiare bleeantyn. My ta oltey geddyn baase ny lhiggey sheese, ta'n eiyrtys croghey er y torçh dy hoieag t'ayn. Ta soieag rheynn-reih goll er aareih liorish fo-reihys, agh my she soieag ardjynagh t'ayn, ta'n nah yeearreyder er y rolley goaill y soieag.

Poagey laue:
She poagey mooar lesh cassyn doarnane eh poagey laue. Dy cadjin ta cummey fassanagh er poagaghyn laue, as t'ad goll er ymmyd ec mraane dy ymmyrkey nheeghyn persoonagh lheid as wolladyn, sporranyn, cooinaghyn argid, ogheryn, jesheenagyn, skeaban fuilt, tudjeenyn, shooylee, as reddyn elley.

Glackan:
She saase obbrinee ta cur streean er gleashaght eh glackan. She craag y co-olt contraartagh rish. Dy bunneydagh, ta glackanyn goaill ymmyd jeh screebey dy hyndaa yn vree ghleashiddagh ny hiass, agh foddee dy vel saaseyn elley dy hyndaays bree goll er ymmyd chammah. Myr sampleyr, ta'n çhionney glackanyn aaghiennaghtagh çhyndaa yn chooid smoo jeh'n vree lectragh as ee goll er stoyral son ymmyd ny s'anmey. Ta saaseyn elley çhyndaa yn vree ghleashiddagh ny bree chummyssagh ayns cummaghyn stoyrit lheid as aer çhionnit as ooill hionnit. Ta glackanyn stroo eeiree goaill ymmyd jeh magheryn magnaidagh dy hyndaa yn vree ghleashiddagh ny stroo lectragh ayns jysk, frioggan, ny railley glackan as ee er ny çhyndaa ny çhiass. Ta saaseyn elley çhyndaa yn vree ghleashiddagh ayns cummaghyn elley, goaill stiagh astreeaghey yn vree ayns queeyl chassee hyndaaee.
Dy cadjin, ta glackanyn currit rish essylyn çhyndaaee ny rish queeyllyn, agh foddee dy vel cummaghyn elley orroo lheid as crackan ushlaght ghleashagh (flabbagyn ta goll er scarrey magh ayns ushtey ny aer). Ta carbid ennagh goaill ymmyd jeh obbraghyssyn glackanee co-vestit, lheid as gleashtanyn ratçhal sleaydey as glackanyn queeyllagh as parashuityn oc, as etlanyn as glackanyn queeyllagh as flibbagyn sleaydey ta goll er yrjaghey 'syn aer car y tarlheimey.
