Ta shollaneyn ry-gheddyn 'sy chooid smoo jeh tudjeenyn noa-emshyragh as t'ad jeant seose jeh tombagey aachummit as brashaneyn elley.
Shymmey jeeill ta tudjeenyn jannoo er corp y smookeyder. She stoo neu-lhiggagh eh yn nicoteen, y preeu-stoo kemmigagh shickobbree 'sy tombagey as, rere shen, ayns tudjeenyn. Ta mysh lieh chooid jeh smookeyderyn feddyn baase er cooishyn bentyn rish y smookal as t'ad coayl mysh 14 bleeaney jeh'n vea oc. S'gaueagh smookal tudjeenyn ec mraane torragh as shymmey feanish t'ayn ta taishbyney dy vel y smookal cur rish lheamyssyn ruggyree, goaill stiagh anlheiltyssyn inçhynagh as fishigagh. Ta feanish ayn chammah dy vel y smookal aa-laue cur er slaynt fakideryn, as, rere shen, ta leighyn ayn nish ayns ram çheeraghyn ta cur lhiettrimys er y smookal ayns buill obbree as heayagh.

Ard an Rátha:
She balley beg ayns Coontae Ghoon ny Ghoal, Nerin, eh Ard an Rátha (; Yernish er son "Ard y Rhaa"). Ta'n balley beg ny hoie er coose heear yiass y choontae er y phreeu-raad ashoonagh, yn N56. Rere coontey-pobble 'sy vlein 2011, va 731 ghooinney cummal ayn. Hie yn balley beg er ny hroggal er brooinyn Abhainn tSocair, awin ta girree ayns na Cruacha Gorma as ta roie stiagh 'sy Cheayn Sheear faggys da'n valley hene.

Echinodermata:
She phylum dy veiyn marrey eh Echinodermata. Te'n ennym ass y Çhenn Ghreagish, "ἐχινόδερμα" ("echinóderma"), "crackan jialgagh". Shen "ἐχῖνος" ("echínos"), "arkan sonney; kione kiyt" as "δέρμα" ("dérma"), "crackan".
Ta co-chrooaght lieh-chrantessenagh oc, as shen queig-filley dy cadjin. Ta deill as cucowryn marrey nyn echinodermyn. T'ad cummal er feie ny marrey, voish y chryss eddyr-tidee dys y chryss harvaalagh.
Ta mysh 7000 dooie 'sy phylum. Myr shen, she nah phossan smoo Deuterostomia t'ayn, lurg Chordata. She y smoo phylum t'ayn gyn dooie erbee ta cummal ayns ushtey millish ny er yn thalloo.
Ta scansh bea-oaylleeagh as creg-oaylleeagh oc. Ta pooar aaghiennagh yindyssagh oc, do nod ad aa-aase stoo kirpey, organeyn, cass, ny eer aachroo ad hene dy slane jeh cass ynrican. Ta ushylee vesodermagh chraueagh Echinodermata cadjin dy liooar ayns clagh eayil, as ta fys ry-gheddyn assdaue er y çhymbyllaght chreg-oaylleeagh v'ayn.
Rang-oardraghey.
Ta daa aarheynn mooar ayn: Eleutherosoa gleashagh, shen Asteroidea (crossagyn marrey), Ophiuroidea (crossagyn brishlag), Echinoidea (king kiyt) as Holothuroidea (cocowryn marrey); as Pelmatosoa soit, shen crinoidee, Blastosoa anvio, as Paracrinoidea anvio. Ta shiartanse dy chrinoidee gleashagh, gyn scansh da'n rang-oardraghey shen.
Hooar ad rang Eleutherosoa noa ayns 1986, as tree dooie echey: shen Concentricycloidea ("neaynin marrey"). Hug ad eh mastey Asteroidea fy-yerrey. Ta dooieyn elley ry-gheddyn 'sy recortys fossylagh nagh by ayns dy baghtal.

N56 (raad ayns Nerin):
She bayr ashoonagh jeh'n nah cheim ayns Nerin ta roie veih Doon ny Ghoal dys Littyr Kennain. Ta'n bollagh er feie ny hoie ayns Coontae Ghoon ny Ghoal as t'ej jannoo coorse begnagh kiarkylagh mygeayrt y choontae. Hoshiaght, va'n chooid jeh'n N13 ta roie eddyr Littyr Kennain as Srath an Urláir coontit myr chooid jeh'n N56. Ta'n bayr roie trooid y Ghaeltaght.
Baljyn mooarey er y raad.
Toshiaghey ayns Doon ny Ghoal 'sy jiass, as roie lesh y chlag, ta'n bayr roie trooid ny baljyn mooarey shoh:

Rheynn (bea-oaylleeaght):
Rere rang-oardraghey bea-oaylleeagh, she rank rang-oardragh lus-oaylleeagh tradishoonagh eh rheynn, fo reeriaght as erskyn rang. Ayns baagh-oaylleeaght ta'n fockle corrym "phylum" ry-lhaih. 
Ayns 1993, ren ICN goaill rish "phylum" myr termeeaght noa corrym rish "rheynn". Ta "phylum" goaill er hene ynnyd "rheynn" beggan er veggan.
Ta enmys rheynnyn cur -phyta ec enmyn lossreeyn, as -mycota ec enmyn fungyssyn.

Stoo:
Shimmey sorçh dy stoo ta sy teihll - ushtey, ooir, creggyn, genniagh, as myr shen. Mygeayrt y mysh y teihll, ta eaghtyr dy ghassyn nagh vod oo fakin: ta shin gra yn aer ny yn speyr rish yn eaghtyr shoh.
Ta stoo lheeiney spoar ennagh, as ta mass echey.
Ta stoo ry-gheddyn myr stooaltane, myr fliughane, ny myr gas - shoh staydyn stoo.

Stooaltane:
Ta cummey shickyr ec stooaltaneyn. Ta e chummey hene ec gagh stooaltane, as t'eh freayll y cummey shen derrey vees çhiass ny forsey jannoo er.
Ta towse-lhienee shickyr ec stooaltaneyn. T'eh feer doillee towse-lhieenee stooaltane y leodaghey lesh covroo. Dy jarroo, ta stooaltaneyn bunnys do-yn-chovroojey.
Cha nel stooaltaneyn roie myr fliughaneyn - cha nel ad 'strooaney'. Cha nel stooaltaneyn skealley magh er eaghtyryn.

Ushlagh:
Cha nel cummey shickyr ec ushlagh. Cummey'n taagh ta'n ushlagh ayn, shen cummey yn ushlagh.
Ta towse-lhieenee shickyr ec ushlagh. S'feer doillee eh towse-lhieenee ushlee y leodaghey lesh cohionney, as ta dynamickyn sheeltagh gabbyr dy vel ad neufaastagh son y chooid smoo, er-lhimmey jeh gleashaght neufaastagh.
Gollrish gas, ta ushlee roie, as myr shen she sheeltagh t'ayn. Rish deayrtey ushlagh er eaghtyr, t'eh skeaylley magh. Ta çhionnid eaghtyragh ny hro ushlee er lheh, as ta fliughey jantagh liorish.

Gas:
Cha nel cummey shickyr ec gassyn. Y cummey jeh'n taagh ta'n gas ayns, shen cummey'n ghas.
Cha nel towse-lhieenee shickyr ec gas. Ta gas lhieeney'n saagh t'eh ayn. Ta shin gra eddyrskeaylley rish shen.
S'aashagh gas y chovroojey. S'aashagh towse-lhieenee sloo y chur er gas.

Caghlaa-stayd:
She caghlaa corys çhiass-niartal veih un phaase stoo gys paase elley eh caghlaa-stayd.
Tra t'ou çhiow stooaltane, ta ny floagyn geddyn tooilley bree as t'ad goll er craa ny s'tappee. Er jerrey, t'ad brishey magh ass ny h-ynnydyn v'ad soit ayn, as t'ad goaill toshiaght dy skirrey harrish y cheilley. Ta shin gra dy vel y stooaltane lheie as çheet dy ve ny ushlagh.
Ta shin gra yn poynt lheie rish y tempreilys ta stooaltane lheie. Ec y phoint shen, ta daa stayd-stoo ry-gheddyn ry-cheilley, stooaltane as ushlagh.
Tra t'ou çhiow ushlagh, ta ny floagyn geddyn toilley bree as t'ad gleashaghey ny smoo tappee harrish y cheilley. Ta bree dy liooar ec floagyn ennagh dy scapail as goll magh 'syn aer. Ta shin gra dy vel yn ushlagh gaalaghey as çheet dy ve ny ghas.
My vees y ushlagh goll er çhiow ny s'odjey, nee floagyn ennagh scapail veih'n ushlagh cho tappee as dy bee bolganyn dy ghas jeant çheusthie jeh'n liughane. Eisht, bee yn ushlagh er roshtyn y poynt broie. She yn point-broie yn tempreilys jeh'n ushlagh tra t'eh gaalaghey.
Ta shin gra dy vel caghlaa-stayd ayn tra ta stooaltane lheie as çheet dy ve ny ushlagh, er-nonney tra ta ushlagh gaalaghey as çheet dy ve ny ghas (as bun-ry-skyn).

Robert Boyle:
Va Robert Boyle (25 J. Geuree 1627 - 31 Nollick 1691) ruggit ayns Cashtal Lios Mór, Co. Phurt Largey, ayns Nerin. Va'n ayr echey feer verçhagh, as va Robert currit dys scoill ooasle ayns Sostyn tra v'eh hoght bleeaney d'eash. Ren eh troailt mygeayrt yn Oarpey marish ynseyder tra v'eh un vlein jeig d'eash. Ren Boyle pump-folmit dasyn hene, as ren eh kuse dy phrowaltyssyn er gas. Liorish shen, ren eh baghtal y kiangley eddyr towse-lhieenee as broo-gas (Leigh Boyle). Hooar eh magh nagh jean sheean troailt trooid folmid. Hooar eh magh neesht dy vel trimmid ec aer. She Boyle va'n chied pheiagh ren toiggal dy vel y chooid smoo jeh stoo jeant ass çhaglymyn dy stooghyn neuchramp ta shin gra bunstooghyn roo. Myr shen, she Boyle va'n chied heanseyr ren ymmyd jeh'n ockle "bunstoo". Veenee Boyle y fockle "bunstoo" as ren eh cooish oardreilagh as lodjicoil jeh kemmig. Kindagh rish shen, ta Robert Boyle coontit myr "ayr y chemmig". Cha phoose eh rieau. Hooar eh baase ayns Lunnin as eh tree feed as kiare bleeaney d'eash.

Kiangley kemmigagh:
Ta shin gra kiangley kemmigagh rish ny forseyn ta freayll breneenyn ry-cheilley. Ta ny forseyn tayrnagh jeant liorish aa-reaghey lectraneyn ayns ny fynneigyn sodjey magh ayns breneenyn.
Ny gassyn ooasle as reill yn oghtread.
Ta ny gassyn ooasle ayns possan 0 (ta shin gra possan VIII rish shen neesht) ta ry-gheddyn er y laue yesh jeh taabyl ny bunstooghyn. Ta ooiley ny gassyn ooasle feer neu-ymobbreeagh (ta'n fockle 'argon' çheet veih fockle Greagish as y cheeall 'litçheragh' echey) - ta ny gassyn ooasle jeant ass un vreneen ny lomarcan.
She William Ramsay (1852-1916) y kemmigagh Albinagh ren feddyn magh queig jeh ny gassyn ooasle. Rug eshyn ayns Glaschu, as ren eh studeyrys er kemmig 'sy Ghermaan fo stiurey Robert Bunsen. Ta sleih cooinaghtyn er Ramsay er yn oyr dy dooar eh magh argon (1894), hailium (1895), neoin (1898), krypton (1898) as xenon (1898). Scarr eh neoin, krypton, as xenon rish aer va jeant ny ushlagh. Chossyn William Ramsay Aundyr Nobel ayns 1904 son geddyn ny queig gassyn ooasle imraait heose.
Hoshiaght, va sleih gra 'ny gassyn taaue' rish ny gassyn ooasle, son dy row ad cho neu-ymobbreeagh. Agh eisht v'eh feddynit magh dy noddagh krypton as xenon ymobbraghey ny keayrtyn. Foddee nagh vel co-vunstoo jeh hailium, jeh neoin ny jeh argon feddynit foast. Er y fa dy vel ny gassyn ooasle cho neu-ymobbreeagh, t'ad ymmydoil. Myr sampleyr, foddee hailium goll er ymmydey dy hauçhey ayns mollagyn aeragh as ayns lhongyn-aer. S'gaueagh mollag aeragh ny lhong-aer ta lheent lesh hiddragien. 'Sy vlein 1937, y lhong-aer Ghermaanagh "Hindenburg" va lheent lesh hiddragien, ren ee sheidey seose ayns lossanyn erskyn New Jersey. Va mysh lieh-cheead troailtagh marrooit kyndagh rish shen as, son y chooid smoo, va shen y jerrey jeh ny lhongyn-aer myr saase-arraghey. Bentyn da neoin, ta ymmyd jeant jeh ayns cowraghyn-soilsheydys. Ta fillamad tungsten ayns bolgan ta lhieent lesh neoin. Tra ta stroo lectragh roie trooid y fillamad, ta'n argon gymobbraghey lesh y tungsten, ta çheet dy ve ny vrasnag vane-çheh (2500°C) ta cur magh ram soilshey. Ta ymmyd jeant jeh krypton as xenon ayns londeyryn niartal ayns thieyn-soilshey as fotografeeaght.
C'ren fa ta ny gassyn ooasle cho neu-ymobbreeagh?
My t'ou jeeaghyn er reaghey ny lectraneyn ayns ny breneenyn jeh paart jeh ny gassyn ooasle, t'ou fakin dy vel hoght lecraneyn 'syn 'ynneig sodjey magh. Er yn oyr dy vel ny gassyn ooasle cho neu-ymobbreeagh, shegin da'n reaghey shoh jeh ny lectraneyn ve doillee dy chaghlaa - ta kianglaghyn kemmigagh ennagh croghey er lectraneyn goll noon as noal eddyr breneenyn, as ta shen taghyrt ayns ny fynneigyn sodjey magh. Ta red ennagh er-lheh bentyn da'n earroo dy lectraneyn ayns ny fynneigyn shen. Ta hoght lectraneyn 'syn 'ynneig sodjey magh ayns ny breneenyn jeh'n chooid smoo jeh ny gassyn ooasle, as ta shen leeideil gys reill yn oghtread. Ta shin gra yn oghtread fondagh rish ny hoght lectraneyn ta 'syn 'ynneig sodjey magh - agh ta'n chied 'ynneig lane (shen yn ynrican fynneig as lectraneyn aynjee). Ta troyn hailium kiart goll rish troyn ny bunstooghyn elley sy phossan cheddin, as myr shen, ta hailium kinjagh coontit dy vel nane jeh ny gassyn ooasle.
Cha nee leigh fondagh kemmigagh reill yn oghtread, agh aght dy chooney lesh toiggal kiangley kemmigagh. Cha nel hiddragien as litçhey biallagh rish reill yn oghtread. Tra ta hiddragien as litçhey goaill ayrn ayns kiangley kemmigagh, t'ad prowal dy gheddyn yn reaghey cheddin as hailium. Cha nel ny meainyn-caghlaaee biallagh rish reill yn oghtread.
Reill yn Oghtread: tra ta kiangley kemmigagh taghyrt, ta breneen prowal dy gheddyn hoght lectraneyn syn ynneig-lectrane sodjey magh.
Cha nel ny gassyn ooasle ymobreeagh er y fa dy vel reaghey ny lectraneyn ayns ny fynneigyn sodjey magh feer fondagh. Ta bunstooghyn elley goaill ayrn ayns kianglaghyn kemmigagh er y fa nagh vel reaghey nyn lectraneyn cho fondagh as reaghey ny lectraneyn ayns breneenyn ny gassyn ooasle. Ta daa phreeu-horçh dy chiangley kemmigagh ayn: y kiangley eeaneagh (ny "lectrofioosagh") as y kiangley co-iooseagh.
Y kiangley eeaneagh.
Ta shoh jeant tra ta un lectrane, er-nonney ny shlee na shen, goll er coonrey eddyr breneenyn. Tra ta breneen naeear coayl lectrane(yn), t'eh çheet dy ve ny eeane jarrooagh - she floag lughtit t'ayn: ta ny shlee protaneyn na lectraneyn 'sy vreneen. As tra ta breneen naeear cosney lectrane(yn), t'eh çheet dy ve ny eeane jiooldagh - she floag lughtit t'ayn: ta ny shlee lectraneyn na protaneyn 'sy vreneen.
Sampleyr.
Tra ta breneen sodjum coayl yn ynrican lectrane ta syn ynneig sodjey magh, eisht ta 8 lectraneyn sy nah ynneig sodjey magh: Na (2, 8, 1) → Na+ + lectrane.
Cha nel breneen naeear sodjum coayl lectrane dy aashagh - ta'n tayrnys eddyr y çheshvean (lught jarrooagh) as y lectrane (lught jiooldagh) lhiettal shen. Agh ta breneen sodjum cur lectrane da breneen cloreen aashagh dy liooar. Ta shoh taghyrt tra ta breneen sodjum kiangley lesh breneen cloreen dy yannoo co-vreneen dy chloreed sodjum, lurg da ny breneenyn v'er jeed dy ve nyn eeaneyn.
Jeeaghyn er yn ym-obbraghey shoh:
My nee yn breneen sodjum cur yn lectrane sodjey da'n vreneen cloreen, s'baghtal dy bee 8 lectraneyn ayns ny fynneigyn sodjey magh ec y jees oc - as dy bee yn jees oc jeant booiagh! Ta Na çheet dy ve Na+, as ta Cl çheet dy ve Cl-, as da'n daa eeane goll er tayrn ry-cheilley dy yannoo co-vreneen dy NaCl - cloreed sodjum (sollan). Ta kiangley eeanagh eddyr yn eeane sodjum as yn eeane cloreen.
Sampleyr elley.
Ta magnaishum lostey dy gial ayns ocsygien, as ta shen croo poodyr bane ta shin gra ocseed vagnaishum rish. Ta gagh co-vreneen jeh ocseed vagnaishum jeant ass eeane Mg2+ as eeane O2-. Shoh reaghey ny lectraneyn ayns ny breneenyn shoh:
Ta gagh breneen Mg cur e lectraneyn mooie da breneen ocsygien. Er yn oyr dy vel daa lectrane caillit ec y vreneen Mg, ta shin screeu symbol yn eeane myr Mg2+. As er yn oyr dy vel daa lectrane cosnit ec y vreneen O, ta shin screeu yn eeane shen myr O2-.
Y kiangley cofioosagh.
Cha nel beoyn er co-stooghyn ennagh lectraneyn y choayl ny lectraneyn y chosney. Dy cliaghtagh, ta neu-veainyn myr shen, myr sampleyr, carboan as hiddragien. Bentyn da co-vreneenyn as daa neu-veain ayndaue, ta ny breneenyn jannoo nyn gooid share dy gheddyn hoght lectraneyn ayns nyn vynneigyn-lectrane sodjey magh liorish rheynn lectraneyn. She kiangley cofioosagh t'ayn eisht.
Son y chooid smoo, she kianglaghyn cofioosagh t'ec co-vreneenyn nagh vel ayndaue agh neu-veainyn, myr hiddragien (H2), cloreen (Cl2), neetragien (N2), ushtey (H2O), ammoiney (NH3), mettane (CH4), daa-ocseed charboan (CO2), a.m.s.
Kianglaghyn unnaneagh cofioosagh.
Sampleyr nane.
Ayns gas hiddragien, cha nel breneenyn hiddragien nyn lomarcan - she co-vreneenyn t'ayn dy bollagh. Ayns gagh co-vreneen hiddragien, ta daa vreneen hiddragien kianglt ry-cheilley. Ayns gagh breneen hiddragien, cha nel agh un lectrane (H = 1). Dy chosney reaghey ny lectraneyn ayns hailium (He = 2), ta daa vreneen hiddragien çheet ry-cheilley dy rheynn lectraneyn dy ve goll rish hailium.
Myr shen, ta daa lectrane syn ynneig sodjey magh ec gagh breneen hiddragien - y lectrane echey hene as y lectrane rheynnit. Ta shin gra kiangley unnaneagh cofioosagh rish rheynn y phiyr-lectrane. Dy mennick, ta'n kiangley cofioosagh shoh screeut myr shoh: H-H.
Sampleyr jees.
Kiart goll rish gas hiddragien, ayns gas cloreen she co-vreneenyn jeant ass daa vreneen t'ayn. Ta piyryn dy vreneenyn cloreen kianglt ry-cheilley liorish kiangley cofioosagh. S'leayr yn aght ta ny breneenyn cloreen goll er kiangley ry-cheilley my ta shin jeeaghyn er reaghey ny lectraneyn ayns breneen cloreen: Cl = 2, 8, 7
Sampleyr tree.
Ayns co-vreneen mettane (gas dooghyssagh), ta un vreneen carboan ny lomarcan kianglt rish kiare breneenyn hiddragien. S'aashagh toiggal yn aght ta co-vreneen mettane goll er troggal my ta shin jeeaghyn er reaghey ny lectraneyn ayns ny breneenyn C as H:
Ta'n breneen carboan as ny kiare breneenyn hiddragien rheynn lectraneyn dy lhieeney ny fynneigyn sodjey magh oc.
Kianglaghyn cofioosagh dooblit as tree-filley.
Choud as shoh, ta shin er ve jeeaghyn er kianglaghyn cofioosagh raad ta piyr dy lectraneyn goll er rheynn eddyr daa vreneen. Agh ayns co-vreneenyn ennagh ta ny breneenyn cummit ry-cheilley liorish rheynn daa phiyr, ny tree piyryn, dy lectraneyn.
Kianglaghyn cofioosagh dooblit.
Ayns co-vreneen ocsygien, O2, she kiangley dooble t'ayn. T'eh çheet lesh gagh breneen ocsygien hoght lectraneyn syn ynneig sodjey magh echey y chosney. Ta e hey lectraneyn hene ec gagh breneen ocsygien ayns yn ynneig sodjey magh echey, as t'eh rheynn daa lectrane elley. Ta sambyl elley jeh'n chiangley dooble ry-gheddyn ayns co-vreneen carboan.
Kianglaghyn cofioosagh tree-filley.
Ta sambyl jeh kiangley tree-filley ry-gheddyn ayns co-vreneen neetragien. S'doillee yn kiangley eddyr ny breneenyn neetragien y vrishey. Shen y fa dy vel gas neetragien cho neu-ymobbreeagh. Cooinee dy nee N = 2, 5 reaghey ny lectraneyn ayns breneen neetragien.
Troyn co-vunstooghyn eeaneagh as cofioosagh.
Ta co-vunstooghyn eeaneagh (lectrofioosagh) jeant ass eeaneyn. Ta eayl jeant ass eeaneyn Ca2+ as O2- ta cummit ry-cheilley liorish boandey eeaneagh. Dy cliaghtagh, ta millioonyn jeu goll er sniemmey ry-cheilley crystal y chroo. Ta shin gymmeydey scellyn-X dy gheddyn magh reaghey ny eeaneyn ayns crystalyn. She William Henry Bragg as e vac William Lawrence Bragg ren lhiasaghey yn aght dy gheddyn magh y strughtoor crystalyn lesh skellyn-X.
William as Lawrence Bragg.
S'ard-ghooagh William Bragg (1862-1942), y fishigagh Sostnagh, as e vac Lawrence Bragg (1890-1971) er yn oyr dy ren ad gymmeydey scellyn-X y strughtoor jeh crystalyn y gheddyn magh. Dod ad taishbyney dy row crystalyn dy stoo goll rish cloreed sodjum jeant ass millioonyn dy h-eeaneyn cloreed as eeaneyn sodjum reaghit dy reajagh. Sy vlein 1915, chossyn ad yn Aundyr Nobel ayns paart son yn obbyr oc ayns crystallografeeaght scell-X. She ny Braggyn yn ynrican ayr as mac chossyn yn onnor shoh. Haink Lawrence Bragg dy ve ny Olloo Fishag ec Ollooscoill Chambridge. Tra dirree eh ass yn obbur shen, va anaase mooar echey er ynsaghey sheanse da sleih aegey.
Troyn cadjin co-vunstooghyn cofioosagh.
Dy mennick, ta co-vunstooghyn jeant ass bunstooghyn ta ry-gheddyn sy vean jeh Taabyl ny Bunstooghyn, m.s., carboan, neetragien, fosfaar, a.m.s. sambil jeh co-vunstooghyn cofioosagh, shen ushtey, mettane, ammoiney, a.m.s.. Ta paart dy hroyn co-chadjin ec ny co-vunstooghyn ooilliu:

Na Cruacha Gorma:
She slieau-reayn mooar ayns jiass Choontae Ghoon ny Ghoal, Nerin, ad na Cruacha Gorma ( ny ). T'ad scarrey jiass y choontae as ny baljyn t'ayn, lheid as Doon ny Ghoal as Béal Átha Seanaidh, veih twoaie as sheear y choontae as ny baljyn ayn, lheid as Littyr Kennain as an Clochán Liath. Ta'n bayr ta kiangley yn daa ayrn jeh'n choontae roie trooid an Bearnas Mór, baarney ayns ny sleityn ayns shiar y choontae.

David Livingstone:
She sushtallagh lheeys kioneraadagh Cohionnalagh veih Nalbin va David Livingstone (19 Mayrnt 1813 – 1 Boaldyn 1873). Ren eh ronsaghey magh yn Affrick marish Sheshaght Hushtallagh Lunnin. Ren yn enney mooar echey cur rish feddyn magh bun y Neel as ronsaghey magh Oarpagh as cur stiagh coloinagh 'syn Affrick. Ren ny troailtyn sushtallagh, y "skelley", baase 'syn Affrick, as y gloyraghey echey myr feniagh ashoonagh lurg e vaaish cur rish bunneeaght ram ventyryssyn sushtallagh Creestee mooarey car Skeabey er yn Affrick.

1813:

Kolrinn:
She slieau as keyll eddyr Inji Brekka, Cronk y Voddee as Boaldyn ayns mean Vannin eh Kolrinn (). Ta'n slieau hene 487 m (1,598 tr) er yrjid.

Slieau:
Ta'n fockle slieau çheet er cummey thallooin mooar ta sheeyney magh ny s'yrjey na'n thalloo mygeayrt y mysh, ayns cummey mullagh dy cadjin. Dy mennick ta slieau ny s'eaynee na cronk. Ayns ny h-Ellanyn Goaldagh ta creg-oaylleeyn coontey dy nee slieau eh mullagh ennagh ta ny s'yrjey na 610 m (2,000 tr). She Slieau Everest (8,848 m; 29,029 tr) y slieau s'yrjey er y Chruinney. She Olympus Mons (21,171 m; 69,459 tr) er Mart y slieau s'yrjey, choud's ta fys ain, ayns Corys ny Greiney.

William Henry Bragg:
She fishigagh, kemmigagh, maddaghteyr as spoyrteyr Goaldagh va William Henry Bragg (2 Jerrey Souree 1862 – 10 Mayrnt 1942). S'ard-ghooagh eh er yn oyr dy ren eh, marish e vac William Lawrence Bragg, cosney Aundyr Nobel ayns Fishig 'sy vlein 1915 myr eiyrtys er yn obbyr ren ad marish scellyn-X dys strughtooryn jeh crystalyn y gheddyn magh. Dod ad taishbyney dy row crystalyn dy stoo goll rish cloreed sodjum jeant ass millioonyn dy h-eeaneyn cloreed as eeaneyn sodjum reaghit dy reajagh. She ny Braggyn yn un ayr as vac chossyn yn onnor shoh.

Kiangley eeaneagh:
Ta kiangley eeaneagh (ny "lectrofioosagh") jeant tra ta un lectrane, er-nonney ny shlee na shen, goll er coonrey eddyr breneenyn. Tra ta breneen naeear coayl lectrane(yn), t'eh çheet dy ve ny eeane jarrooagh - she floag lughtit t'ayn: ta ny shlee protaneyn na lectraneyn 'sy vreneen. As tra ta breneen naeear cosney lectrane(yn), t'eh çheet dy ve ny eeane jiooldagh - she floag lughtit t'ayn: ta ny shlee lectraneyn na protaneyn 'sy vreneen.
Sampleyr.
Tra ta breneen sodjum coayl yn ynrican lectrane ta syn ynneig sodjey magh, eisht ta 8 lectraneyn sy nah ynneig sodjey magh: Na (2, 8, 1) → Na+ + lectrane.
Cha nel breneen naeear sodjum coayl lectrane dy aashagh - ta'n tayrnys eddyr y çheshvean (lught jarrooagh) as y lectrane (lught jiooldagh) lhiettal shen. Agh ta breneen sodjum cur lectrane da breneen cloreen aashagh dy liooar. Ta shoh taghyrt tra ta breneen sodjum kiangley lesh breneen cloreen dy yannoo co-vreneen dy chloreed sodjum, lurg da ny breneenyn v'er jeed dy ve nyn eeaneyn.
Jeeaghyn er yn ym-obbraghey shoh:
My nee yn breneen sodjum cur yn lectrane sodjey da'n vreneen cloreen, s'baghtal dy bee 8 lectraneyn ayns ny fynneigyn sodjey magh ec y jees oc - as dy bee yn jees oc jeant booiagh! Ta Na çheet dy ve Na+, as ta Cl çheet dy ve Cl-, as da'n daa eeane goll er tayrn ry-cheilley dy yannoo co-vreneen dy NaCl - cloreed sodjum (sollan). Ta kiangley eeanagh eddyr yn eeane sodjum as yn eeane cloreen.
Sampleyr Elley.
Ta magnaishum lostey dy gial ayns ocsygien, as ta shen croo poodyr bane ta shin gra ocseed vagnaishum rish. Ta gagh co-vreneen jeh ocseed vagnaishum jeant ass eeane Mg2+ as eeane O2-. Shoh reaghey ny lectraneyn ayns ny breneenyn shoh:
Ta gagh breneen Mg cur e lectraneyn mooie da breneen ocsygien. Er yn oyr dy vel daa lectrane caillit ec y vreneen Mg, ta shin screeu symbol yn eeane myr Mg2+. As er yn oyr dy vel daa lectrane cosnit ec y vreneen O, ta shin screeu yn eeane shen myr O2-.

Kiangley cofioosagh:
Cha nel beoyn er co-stooghyn ennagh lectraneyn y choayl ny lectraneyn y chosney. Dy cliaghtagh, ta neu-veainyn myr shen, myr sampleyr, carboan as hiddragien. Bentyn da co-vreneenyn as daa neu-veain ayndaue, ta ny breneenyn jannoo nyn gooid share dy gheddyn hoght lectraneyn ayns nyn vynneigyn-lectrane sodjey magh liorish rheynn lectraneyn. She kiangley cofioosagh t'ayn eisht.
Son y chooid smoo, she kianglaghyn cofioosagh t'ec co-vreneenyn nagh vel ayndaue agh neu-veainyn, myr hiddragien (H2), cloreen (Cl2), neetragien (N2), ushtey (H2O), ammoiney (NH3), meetane (CH4), daa-ocseed charboan (CO2), a.m.s.
Kianglaghyn unnaneagh cofioosagh.
Sampleyr nane.
Ayns gas hiddragien, cha nel breneenyn hiddragien nyn lomarcan - she co-vreneenyn t'ayn dy bollagh. Ayns gagh co-vreneen hiddragien, ta daa vreneen hiddragien kianglt ry-cheilley. Ayns gagh breneen hiddragien, cha nel agh un lectrane (H = 1). Dy chosney reaghey ny lectraneyn ayns hailium (He = 2), ta daa vreneen hiddragien çheet ry-cheilley dy rheynn lectraneyn dy ve goll rish hailium.
Myr shen, ta daa lectrane syn ynneig sodjey magh ec gagh breneen hiddragien - y lectrane echey hene as y lectrane rheynnit. Ta shin gra kiangley unnaneagh cofioosagh rish rheynn y phiyr-lectrane. Dy mennick, ta'n kiangley cofioosagh shoh screeut myr shoh: H-H.
Sampleyr jees.
Kiart goll rish gas hiddragien, ayns gas cloreen she co-vreneenyn jeant ass daa vreneen t'ayn. Ta piyryn dy vreneenyn cloreen kianglt ry-cheilley liorish kiangley cofioosagh. S'leayr yn aght ta ny breneenyn cloreen goll er kiangley ry-cheilley my ta shin jeeaghyn er reaghey ny lectraneyn ayns breneen cloreen: Cl = 2, 8, 7
Sampleyr tree.
Ayns co-vreneen meetane (gas dooghyssagh), ta un vreneen carboan ny lomarcan kianglt rish kiare breneenyn hiddragien. S'aashagh toiggal yn aght ta co-vreneen meetane goll er troggal my ta shin jeeaghyn er reaghey ny lectraneyn ayns ny breneenyn C as H:
Ta'n breneen carboan as ny kiare breneenyn hiddragien rheynn lectraneyn dy lhieeney ny fynneigyn sodjey magh oc.
Kianglaghyn cofioosagh Dooble as Tree-filley.
Choud as shoh, ta shin er ve jeeaghyn er kianglaghyn cofioosagh raad ta piyr dy lectraneyn goll er rheynn eddyr daa vreneen. Agh ayns co-vreneenyn ennagh ta ny breneenyn cummit ry-cheilley liorish rheynn daa phiyr, ny tree piyryn, dy lectraneyn.
"Tra ta un phiyr dy lectraneyn goll er rheynn, she kiangley cofioosagh unnaneagh t'ayn."
"Tra ta daa phiyr dy lectraneyn goll er rheynn, she kiangley cofioosagh dooble t'ayn."
"Tra ta tree piyryn dy lectraneyn goll er rheynn, she kiangley cofioosagh tree-filley t'ayn."
Kianglaghyn cofioosagh Dooble.
Ayns co-vreneen ocsygien, O2, she kiangley dooble t'ayn. T'eh çheet lesh gagh breneen ocsygien hoght lectraneyn syn ynneig sodjey magh echey y chosney. Ta e hey lectraneyn hene ec gagh breneen ocsygien ayns yn ynneig sodjey magh echey, as t'eh rheynn daa lectrane elley. Ta sambyl elley jeh'n chiangley dooble ry-gheddyn ayns co-vreneen carboan.
Kianglaghyn cofioosagh Tree-filley.
Ta sambyl jeh kiangley tree-filley ry-gheddyn ayns co-vreneen neetragien. S'doillee yn kiangley eddyr ny breneenyn neetragien y vrishey. Shen y fa dy vel gas neetragien cho neu-ymobbreeagh. Cooinee dy nee N = 2, 5 reaghey ny lectraneyn ayns breneen neetragien.

William Ramsay:
She William Ramsay (1852-1916) y kemmigagh Albinagh ren feddyn magh queig jeh ny gassyn ooasle. Rug eh ayns Glaschu, as ren eh studeyrys er kemmig 'sy Ghermaan fo stiurey Robert Bunsen. Ta sleih cooinaghtyn er Ramsay er yn oyr dy dooar eh magh argon (1894), hailium (1895), neoin (1898), krypton (1898) as xenon (1898). Scarr eh neoin, krypton, as xenon veih aer va jeant ny ushlagh. Chossyn William Ramsay Aundyr Nobel ayns 1904 son geddyn ny queig gassyn ooasle imraait heose.

Please Please Me:
Ta Please Please Me ny albym liorish y phossan craa-chiaull Sostynagh "The Beatles". V'eh nyn chied albym, as haink eh magh ayns mee Vayrnt 1962 lurg speeideilys ny singilyn "Please Please Me" as "Love Me Do". Va hoght jeh ny kiare arraneyn jeig er yn albym screeuit liorish John Lennon as Paul McCartney.
Claare.
Çheu 2.
Ta dagh arrane liorish Lennon/McCartney, agh ny fir lesh enmyn ayns lhoobeenyn.

With the Beatles:
Ta With The Beatles ny albym liorish y phossan craa-chiaull Sostynagh "The Beatles". V'eh nyn nah albym, as haink eh magh ayns Mee Houney 1963. Va hoght jeh ny kiare arraneyn jeig er yn albym screeuit liorish John Lennon as Paul McCartney as va nane liorish George Harrison (e chied arrane).
Claare.
Çheu 2.
Ta dagh arrane liorish Lennon/McCartney, agh ny fir lesh enmyn ayns lhoobeenyn.

Kiryat Shmona:
She caayr 'sy Clyst Hwoaie, Israel, eh Kiryat Shmona (, "Caayr ny Hoght"). T'eh ny hoie er lhiargee heear Ghlion Hula er y joarey rish y Livaan. Ta ennym ny hoght dooiney, goaill stiagh Joseph Trumpeldor, hooar baase 'sy vlein 1920 as ad coadey yn balley Tel Hai.
'Sy vlein 2011 va 22,992 deiney cummal 'sy chaayr. Ta mysh trass y phobble ny s'aegey na 19 bleeaney d'eash as she Ewnyn jeh sluight Maroccagh y chooid smoo jeh ny cummaltee. She Kiryat Shmona y chaayr smoo twoaieagh mastey ny caayryn ayns Israel. V'eh currit er bun 'sy vlein 1949 as hooar eh staydys caayragh 'sy vlein 1975.

Ard y Joarey:
She ard jeh Keim III fo skeim NUTS ayns Nerin eh Ard y Joarey (; ). T'eh goll fo stiurey as reirey Lught Reill Ardjynagh y Joarey. T'eh jeant seose jeh ny coondaeghyn Doon ny Ghoal, y Cavan, y Lhoo, Lheeahtrim, Muinaghan as Shliggagh. Ta Ard y Joarey 12,156 km2 er eaghtyr, ny 17.3% jeh eaghtyr slane y steat, as ta ny smoo na 432,500 deiney cummal ayn. She IE011 y coad NUTS echey.
Rere Oik Ardjyn Nerin ta queig preeu-valjyn ardjynagh ec yn ard: y Cavan, Doon Jialgan, Littyr Kennain, Muinaghan, as Shliggagh.
Çheer-oaylleeaght.
Ta'n ard sheeyney veih'n Cheayn Sheear 'sy neear dys Mooir Vannin 'sy niar. Ta farraneyn yn daa awin s'liurey 'sy çheer (y Çhannon as an Éirne) soit ayn as t'ad kianglt ry-cheilley myr Ushtey-vollagh ny Shannon as an Éirne. She çheu çheerey eirinagh as ram cummaghyn thallooin çheer-oaylleeagh ayn eh yn ard. Ta ram slieau-reaynyn as eayninyn marrey ardjey ry-gheddyn ayns Coontae Ghoon ny Ghoal, lheid as na Cruacha Gorma, Cnoic Dhoire Bheatha, as Sliabh Liag. Ta jees jeh ny tree keyllyssyn sailley ayns Nerin ry-gheddyn 'syn ard foast: Loch Súilí as Loch Cairlinn.
Lught-Reill Ardjynagh y Joarey.
Ta Ard y Joarey goll fo stiurey as reirey Lught-Reill Ardjynagh y Joarey. Ta 38 ynnydee reiht er bing y Lught-Reill, goaill stiagh ynnydagh y Lught-Reill ta goaill shirveish er Bing Ardjyn yn UO. Ta ny h-ynnydee shen cruinnaghey laa 'sy vee as t'ad pointit veih ny shey coonseilyn 'syn ard: 
Baljyn mooarey.
Rolley ny jeih baljyn smoo ayns Ard y Joarey. Ta ny preeu-valjyn coontae currit er y rolley ayns clou trome.

Ringo Starr:
Ta Richard Starkey (ny "Ringo Starr") (ruggit 7 Jerrey Souree 1940) ny chiaulleyder, ny arraneyder, as ny vard arrane Sostynagh. Marish John Lennon, Paul McCartney as George Harrison, hooar eh ard-ghoo myr oltey jeh'n phossan kiaullee, The Beatles.

John Lennon:
Va John Winston Ono Lennon (9 Jerrey Fouyir 1940 - 8 Mee ny Nollick 1980) ny chiaulleyder, ny arraneyder, ny vard arrane, as ny yl-chloieder greienyn Sostynagh. Marish Paul McCartney, George Harrison, as Ringo Starr, hooar eh ard-ghoo myr oltey jeh ny Beatles, as ta'n co-obbraghey marish McCartney echey nane jeh ny boodeeyssyn smoo ennymoil jeh'n 20oo cheead. Lurg ren y phossan brishey seose, ren eh lorgey coorse lomarcan, as ren eh croo yn possan Plastic Ono Band marish e nah ven, Yoko.

George Harrison:
Va George Harrison (25 Toshiaght Arree 1943 - 29 Sauin 2001) ny chiaulleyder, ny arraneyder, ny vard arrane, as ny yl-chloieder greienyn Sostynagh. Marish Paul McCartney, John Lennon, as Ringo Starr, hooar eh ard-ghoo myr oltey jeh ny Beatles.

Çhiass:
Shimmey barel t'ec sleih bentyn da çhiass as feayght. My t'ou mooie as ta'n emshir feayr, tra t'ou goll stiagh ayns thie, s'cosoylagh dy bee oo gennaghtyn çheh. As mennick dy liooar ayns shamyr ennagh, ta un pheiagh gra dy vel eh feayr, ta peiagh elley sy çhamyr cheddin gra dy vel eh çheh. Cha nod oo croghey er yn aght ta sleih gennaghtyn my t'ou laccal towse sheansagh jeh cre cho feayr as cre cho çheh as t'eh. Shegin dooin croghey er tempreilys. She towse çhiass tempreilys.

Tempreilyssane:
She greie ta towshan çhiassid ny tempreilys eh tempreilyssane. Shimmey sorçh dy hempreilyssane t'ayn nish. Agh, son y chooid smoo, cha nel sleih fakin agh tempreilyssaneyn jeant ass gless, as alcoal ny argid bio ayndaue. Y prinsabyl-obbree jeu shoh, ta shen dy vel ushlee mooadaghey ny crapley kyndagh rish y tempreilys. Ta alcoal ny argid bio currit ayns feddanyn keylley dy ghless, as ta aarey cowrit er y feddan. Ta bolgan d'ushlagh ec bun y tempreilyssane as snaie d'ushlagh goll seose veih'n volgan. She yrjid y snaie-ushlagh ta ginsh dooin y tempreilys. Roish my jed yn aarey er cowraghey er y ghless, ta bun y tempreilyssane er ny chur ayns mestey dy rio as ushtey, as ta cowrey er ny chur ec y leval ta'n ushlagh goll huggey - shen 0°C. Eisht ta bun y tempreilyssane er ny chur ayns ushtey broie dy gheddyn y cowrey son 100°C. Ny lurg, ta'n slane aarey er ny chowraghey.
Un vondeish t'ec alcoal ayns tempreilyssane, kyndagh rish caghlaa ennagh ayns tempreilys, ta alcoal mooadaghey shey keayrt ny smoo na ta argid bio mooadaghey. Myr shen, saasey caghlaaghyn beggey ayns tempreilys y howse lesh tempreilyssane alcoal na lesh fer argid bio. As ta alcoal sloo costalagh na argid bio, as ta point-rioee alcoal ny s'inshley na point-rioee argid bio - foddee tempreilyssane alcoal goll er ymmydey sheese gys -115°C.
Agh neuvondeish t'ec alcoal ayns tempreilyssane, ta shen dy vel y point-broie echey 78°C - cha vod oo towse tempreilyssyn ny syrjey na shen lesh tempreilyssane alcoal.
Ta tempreilyssaneyn er-lheh ec fir-lhee. T'ad jeant er y aght cheddin as tempreilyssaneyn cadjin, agh ta reayn coon oc - eddyr 34°C as 42°C - er y fa dy nee mysh 37°C y tempreilys meanagh ec sleih. Ta'n fer-lhee cur bolgan y tempreilyssane ayns colb y turransagh son tammylt as eisht goaill magh eh. Ayns tempreilyssane fer-lhee, ta keylaghey ayns y feddan jeeragh erskyn y volgan. Ta'n keylaghey shen lhiettal y fliughane-snaie veih tuittym sheese, as foddee y fer-lhee towse y tempreilys myr v'eh ayns colb y turransagh. Shegin da'n fer-lhee y tempreilyssane y chraa dy chur yn argid bio erash gys y volgan.

Sulfeed vercur:
Ta sulfeed vercur (HgS) ny co-vunstoo, jeant ass Mercur as Sulfur.

Earroo breneenagh:
Yn earroo breneenagh, shen yn earroo dy phrotaneyn t'ayns çhesh-vean. Ta earroo breneenagh anchasley ec gagh bunstoo. She 6 yn earroo breneenagh t'ec carboan - 6 protaneyn sy çhesh-vean jeh breneen dy charboan. As she 26 yn earroo breneenagh t'ec cobbyr (26 protaneyn sy çhesh-vean).

Gas ooasle:
Ta ny gassyn ooasle ayns possan 0 (ta shin gra possan VIII rish shen neesht) ta ry-gheddyn er y laue yesh jeh taabyl ny bunstooghyn. Ta ooiley ny gassyn ooasle feer neu-ymobbreeagh (ta'n fockle 'argon' çheet veih fockle Greagish as y cheeall 'litçheragh' echey) - ta ny gassyn ooasle jeant ass un vreneen ny lomarcan.
By eh William Ramsay (1852-1916) y kemmigagh Albinagh ren feddyn magh queig jeh ny gassyn ooasle. Rug eshyn ayns Glaschu, as ren eh studeyrys er kemmig 'sy Ghermaan fo stiurey Robert Bunsen. Ta sleih cooinaghtyn er Ramsay er yn oyr dy dooar eh magh argon (1894), hailium (1895), neoin (1898), krypton (1898) as xenon (1898). Scarr eh neoin, krypton, as xenon veih aer va jeant ny ushlagh. Chossyn William Ramsay Aundyr Nobel ayns 1904 son geddyn ny queig gassyn ooasle imraait heose.
Hoshiaght, va sleih gra 'ny gassyn taaue' rish ny gassyn ooasle, son dy row ad cho neu-ymobbreeagh. Agh eisht v'eh feddynit magh dy noddagh krypton as xenon ymobbraghey ny keayrtyn. Foddee nagh vel co-vunstoo jeh hailium, jeh neoin ny jeh argon feddynit foast. Er y fa dy vel ny gassyn ooasle cho neu-ymobbreeagh, t'ad ymmydoil. Myr sampleyr, foddee hailium goll er ymmydey dy hauçhey ayns mollagyn aeragh as ayns lhongyn-aer. S'gaueagh mollag aeragh ny lhong-aer ta lheent lesh hiddragien. 'Sy vlein 1937, y lhong-aer Ghermaanagh "Hindenburg" va lheent lesh hiddragien, ren ee sheidey seose ayns lossanyn erskyn New Jersey. Va mysh lieh-cheead troailtagh marrooit kyndagh rish shen as, son y chooid smoo, va shen y jerrey jeh ny lhongyn-aer myr saase-arraghey. Bentyn da neoin, ta ymmyd jeant jeh ayns cowraghyn-soilsheydys. Ta fillamad tungsten ayns bolgan ta lhieent lesh neoin. Tra ta stroo lectragh roie trooid y fillamad, ta'n argon gymobbraghey lesh y tungsten, ta çheet dy ve ny vrasnag vane-çheh (2500°C) ta cur magh ram soilshey. Ta ymmyd jeant jeh krypton as xenon ayns londeyryn niartal ayns thieyn-soilshey as fotografeeaght.

Co-rollageys:
She corys feer vooar dy rollageyn, remladyn rollageagh, mean eddyr-rollageagh dy ghas as yoan cosmagh, as, foddee, stoo dorraghey, eh co-rollageys. Ta'n corys kianglt ry-cheilley fo'n ym-hayrn. Shymmey sorçh dy cho-rollageyssyn t'ayn, goaill stiagh crivassanee (marish 10 millioon, ny 107, dy rollageyn) as foawir (marish 100 trillioon, ny 1014, dy rollageyn). She sampleyr jeh co-rollageyssyn caslagh barrit eh Raad Mooar Ree Gorree.

Bieauid:
She bieauid yn oddid ta red goll ayns unnid dy hraa.

Bieauid-jeerit:
She bieauid-jeerit yn oddid ta red goll ayns unnid dy hraa ayns jeeraght ennagh.

Aa-hiyr:
She aa-hiyr y caghlaa ayns bieauid/bieauid-jeerit ayns unnid dy hraa.

Obbyr (fishig):
Ayns fishig, ta obbyr çheet er y vree ta arrit dys ny voish nhee trooid obbraghey forsey harrish scughey. 'Sy chummey s'oney, s'mennick t'eh er ny hoilshaghey myr troar forsey as vaghtoor. T'eh raait dy vel forsey jannoo obbyr yarrooagh my vel (tra t'eh currit rish) co-olt echey ayns troa scughee yn phoynt obbree. Ta forsey jannoo obbyr yiooldagh my vel co-olt echey noi troa scughee ec y phoynt obbree.
Myr sampleyr, my vees bluckan freillt harrish yn eaghtyr as, ny yei, lhieggit, ta obbyr y forsey-stoo er y vluckan tra t'eh tuittym corrym rish trimmid y vluckan (forsey) er ny vishaghey liorish y foddeeaght dys yn eaghtyr (scughey). Tra ta'n forsey shassooagh as tra ta'n uillin eddyr y forsey as y scughey corrym rish , ta'n obbyr goll er taishbyney myr:
formula_1
She mooad scaillagh ee yn obbyr, as, er-yn-oyr shen, ta mooadys eck agh t'ee gyn troa. Ta obbyr garraghey bree voish boayl dys boayl elley, ny voish cummey dys cummey elley. She joule (J) yn unnid SI t'ec obbyr, myr t'ec bree.

Çhiass-chondughtaght:
She çhiass-chondughtaght y ghleashaght jeh çhiass trooid stoo gyn gleashaghey yn stoo hene.
My t'ou çhiow un chione jeh slat dy yiarn, ta shen cur bree da ny breneenyn yiarn ec y chione shen, as ta ny breneenyn shen tonn-chraa ny s'tappee na v'ad tonn-chraa roish shen. Ta shen cur bree da ny breneenyn sniessey daue, as t'adsyn tonn-chraa ny s'tappee. Myr shen, ta bree/çhiass gleashaghey trooid y clat, as cha nel y slat hene gleashaghey.

Allail:
She allail nane ass piyr dy ghientagyn ta stiurey yn tro cheddin, agh foddee nagh vel eh livrey yn red cheddin. Myr sampleyr, abbyr dy vel gientagyn B as b reaghey yn daah jeh fynney lughee, agh ta B livrey fynney doo as ta b livrey fynney dhone.

Meain alkalaihagh:
She meain alkalaih bunstoo erbee t'ayns possan I jeh taabyl reiltagh ny bunstooghyn.

Hallageen:
She hallageen bunstoo erbee ayns possan VII jeh taabyl reiltagh ny bunstooghyn.

Ohm:
She ohm (cowrey: Ω) yn unnid son sthaagey.

Aneeane:
She aneeane eeane lesh lught jiooldagh.

Cateeane:
She cateeane eeane lesh lught jarrooagh.

Trie:
She unnid liurid ayns corys ny h-unnidyn impiroil as ayns corys ny h-unnidyn cliaghtagh Americaanagh ee yn trie (yl. -(gh)yn; aagherrid ny cowrey: tr ny ′). T'ee 0.3048 m er liurid. T'ee goll er rheynn magh ayns 12 oarlagh.
Va'n trie ymmydit ayns coryssyn unnidyn elley, goaill stiagh coryssyn veih'n Çhenn Ghreag, y Çhenn Raue, Sostyn, Nalbin as ram çheeraghyn Oarpagh y vooar-rheynn. Ansherbee, cha row liurid cheddin ec y trie, as va'n liurid eck anchasley veih çheer gys çheer as, ayns cooishyn er lheh, veih caayr gys caayr.
She ny Steatyn Unnaneysit yn un çheer hynskylit ta jannoo ymmyd jeh'n trie eddyr-ashoonagh as y trie howshan ayns ny h-immeeaghtyn traghtee, jeshaghteyrys as stundayrtyn oc. Ta enney oikoil foast ec y trie myr unnid elley yn liurid 'sy Chanadey as t'ee goll er ymmyd foast myr unnid liurid 'sy Reeriaght Unnaneysit, ga dy vel ny coryssyn ayns ny çheeraghyn shen begnagh meadrit. Ta'n trie ymmydit dy mennick 'sy çhynskyl etlagh.

Oarlagh:
She unnid liurid ayns ymmodee coryssyn towshan, goaill stiagh ny coryssyn impiroil as Americaanagh eh yn oarlagh (yl. oarleeyn; aagherrid ny cowrey: oar. ny ″). Ta'n oarlagh 1⁄12 jeh liurid y trie ny 25.4 mm.

Dáil Éireann:
She Dáil Éireann () y thie eeaghtyragh jeh'n Oireachtas (Parlamaid Nerin). T'ee ny shamyr smoo scanshoil 'syn Oireachtas ta goaill stiagh Eaghtyrane Nerin as Seanad Éireann (Shannad Nerin). Ta ny h-olteynyn goll er reih dagh queig bleeaney er y chooid sloo fo corys reihys coreiragh marish corys yn un teiy yn-astreeaghey. Ta ny poaraghyn eck cosoylagh rish ny pooaraghyn ayns ram coryssyn parlamaidagh daa-hamyragh elley. Ta olteynyn y Dáil (Teachtaí Dála) cruinnaghey ayns Teach Laighean, Divlyn, veih'n vlein 1922.

Glout:
Ayns fishig, ta glout çheet er cooid stoo corp ennagh. Ta daa fo-cheeall ayn: ta glout taaueagh ny howse mooadagh jeh shassooaght noi siyraghey; as ta glout ym-hayrnagh ny howse mooadagh ta coreiragh rish mooadys yn ym-hayrn ta'n corp surranse voish nhee elley ("glout ym-hayrnagh surransagh"), ny cur er nhee elley ("glout ym-hayrnagh jantagh"). She kilogram eh unnid SI glout.
Ta siyraghey corp coreiragh rish y glout taaueagh echey tra t'ou cur forse er. Rere nah leigh Newton er y ghleashaght, lesh cur forse ynrican F er corp "m" er glout soit, ta'n siyraghey echey a ry-gheddyn liorish F/"m". 

Meechraueeaght:
Ta meechraueeaght çheet er y chredjue dy vel mayrnaght Yee, y jeeaght, ny yn neughooghyssaght gyn enney. Ta shin gra meechredjuagh da peiagh nagh vel shickyr vel Jee ayn.

Anjeeys:
Ta shin gra anjeeys rish yn credjue nagh vel jee erbee ayn.

Myghin-varroo:
She myghin-varroo tra ta peiagh currit gy baase ayns aght neuphiandagh tra ta çhingys gonnagh echey.

Mirril:
She mirril red ennagh ta taghyrt ta brishey ny reillyn sheeansagh. Ta sleih gra dy vel mirrilyn jeant liorish Jee.

Padjer:
She padjer aght ta sleih crauee prowal dy loayrt rish Jee.

Jee:
She Jee sorçh dy vioys ooiley-niartal. Ta ram sorçhyn dy Yee ayns as t'ad anchasley ayns dagh credjue.

Yn Vible:
She'n Vible (voish Greagish Koine τὰ βιβλία, "tà biblía", "ny lioaryn") lioar chasherick y Chreestiaght. Ta ram vershoonyn anchasley ayn.
Yn Shenn Chonaant.
Yn Phentateuch.
Genesis.
"Ard-art: Genesis"
Ta'n ennym Genesis çheet voish fockle Greagish, γένεσις, çheet er "brenn". She ennym cooie t'ayn son yn chied lioar jeh'n Vible, er yn oyr dy vel eh ooilley mychione yn toshiaght jeh'n Tuinney, sleih, bea lught-thie, ashoonyn, ams. Ta'n chied 11 chabdil mychione traaghyn buneashagh, as t'ad loayrt mychione ny chied h-Ewnyn, voish Adam dys Abraham. Ta ny cabdilyn elley mychione Jee as ny h-Ard-ayryn Abraham; Isaac; Jacob; as mac Yacob, Joseph. Va ooilley jeu "ayryn" jeh yn sleih ren Jee reih. Ta'n lioar dooney lesh yn "Sleih reiht" 'syn Egypt.
Exodus.
Ta'n ennym Exodus çheet voish Greagish, ἔξοδος, Exodos, çheet er "goll magh". Ta'n ennym çheet voish nane jeh ny skeealyn smoo scanshoil sy lioar, ny Israelitee "goll magh" ass yn Eajipt, agh ta ram skeealyn scanshoil elley taghyrt sy lioar, myr sampleyr, yn çhenjaght jeh'n Sleih Reiht sy'n Eajipt, etlagh as eam Voses, as connantey Yee lesh ashoon Israel ec Sinai - tra ta ny Jeih Annaghyn currit magh trooid Moses dys yn sleih.
Kianglaghyn mooie.
Y Vible Ghaelgagh

Arthur Caley:
Va Routh Goshen, ny Arthur James Caley, ruggit ayns Sulby ayns Mannin 'sy vlein 1824 as s'liklee dy re eshyn va'n dooinney s'lhiurey 'sy theihll 'sy lhing echey. Tra v'eh slane aasit va Caley dy firrinagh "ny ghooinney gollrish slieau", as eh 7 trieyn as 11 oarlagh er lhiurid as ny smoo na 28 claghyn er trimmid. 
Va Caley ruggit ayns 1824 ec boayl enmyssit y Çhibbyr, meeiley ny ghaa çheu-heear jeh Sulby, as ta boallaghyn folmey yn thie beg foast er mayrn jiu. Tra v'eh foast bio as cloie ayns ny Steatyn Unnaneyssit, v'eh enmyssit Colonel Routh Goshen ny yn Foayr Arabagh ny Foayr y Phalasteen.
Rish foddey v'eh goll er credjal dy ren Caley cummal ec Thie-oast Glion Sulby, ayn ta frameyn dorrys feer vooar, agh ren ronsaghey prowal nagh row shoh kiart, son ta caslys-çheerey OS voish 1870 ayn - foddey lurg da'n Foawr v'er n'aagail yn Ellan - t'eh jeeaghyn nagh row yn thie-oast troggit ec y traa shen.
Va'n ayr echey, shenn Arthur Caley, ny eirinagh as dynsee Arthur aeg y cheird cheddin, agh cha nee derrey v'eh ayns ny bleeantyn jeig s'jerree echey dy ghow eh toshiaght er gaase dy mooar, as hie shen er derrey v'eh bunnys jeih as feed.
Daag eh Mannin ayns 1851 dy chosney ard-ghoo as berçhys er e hon 'sy RU, as haink eh rish ayns taishbynyssyn ayns Manchuin as Lunnin roish my jagh eh dys Paarys, raad haink eh dy ve ny hayrnys ennymoil ayns ny 'salons'.
Ren ny beashnyssyn far-skeealagh fosyn ec y traa gra dy row eh ruggit ayns Jerusalem er 5 Boaldyn 1837. Lurg dirree eh ass yn obbyr echey, hoie eh ayns Middlebush, Jersee Noa raad hooar eh yn far-ennym Foayr Middlebush.

Scell-X:
She scell-X ny scell-Röntgenyn ennym t'er sorçh dy scell lectro-vagnaidagh. Ta tonn-lhiurid scellyn-X eddyr 0.01 as 10 nanomeedyr. Ta ny tonn-lhiuridyn ny s'girrey na scellyn UV as ny s'liurey na scellyn gamma. Ayns ymmodee çhengaghyn elley, ta'd gra "x" ayns ynnyd jeh "Röntgen".

Anders Celsius:
Haink Anders Celsius (27 Sauin 1701 - 25 Averil 1744) veih lught-thie chossyn ard-ghoo ayns sheanse. V'eh ruggit ayns Uppsala 'sy Toolynn 'sy vlein 1701. V'eh jeant ny olloo er y rollageydys ayns 1943 ayns Ollooscoill Uppsala.
Ren Anders Celsius studeyrys er yn Aurora Borealis, ta shen dy ghra, lossan y twoaie. As phrow eh feddyn y mooadys jeh rollageyn ennagh liorish towse y ghillid oc.
'Sy vlein 1742 hug eh er bun yn aarey-tempreilys ta beaynaghey yn ennym echey, yn aarey Celsius. Ayns y toshiaght, dooyrt eh dy nee 0° va point-broie ushtey, as dy nee 100° va point-rioee ushtey. Agh ayns 1945, lurg baase Celsius voish çhingys y cleeau, hug Carl Linnaeus shen bun ry skyn as dooyrt eh:

Poynt broie:
Y poynt broie jeh stoo, ta shen y tempreilys t'eh caghlaa veih ushlagh gys gas feiy'n ushlagh ooilley. Ta'n poynt broie croghey er y vroo. Myr s'yrjey yn broo, s'yrjey yn point-broie. (Myr s'yrjey yn broo, smoo doillee da ny co-vreneenyn scapail veih my cheilley.) Ec broo aeragh cliaghtagh (76cm Hg), she 100°C poynt broie ushtey. Agh my ta'n broo aeragh corrym rish 152cm Hg, she 120°C poynt broie ushtey.
Oddagh poynt broie ushtey ve cho injil as 80°C er mullagh slieau - veagh eh doillee bee y choagyrey ayns shen.

Poynt lheie:
Y poynt lheie jeh stoo, ta shen y tempreilys t'eh caghlaa veih stooaltane dys ushlagh. Ta'n poynt lheie croghey er glennid stoo. Ta ushtey jarroo-ghlen riojey ec 0°C. My t'ou cur sollan stiagh syn ushtey, ta'n poynt rioee tuittym. Myr shen, she ushlagh t'ayn, eer my vees y tempreilys fo 0°C. My t'ou cur tooilley sollan stiagh, ta'n poynt rioee çheet dy ve ny s'inshley.
Ta'n poynt lheie croghey er y vroo neesht. Son y chooid smoo dy stooghyn, myr smoo yn broo, s'yrjey yn poynt lheie. Agh cha nel ushtey myr shen. Ta ushtey mooadaghey tra t'eh riojey. My ta'n broo goll seose, t'eh ny s'doillee da'n ushtey mooadaghey, as t'eh tannaghtyn myr ushlagh fo 0°C - tra ta'n broo aeragh ny s'yrjey na 76 cm Hg (100 kPa) ta poynt rioee ushtey ny s'inshley na 0°C.
My t'ou kiangley streng cheyl rish meih trome as croghey shen veih block dy rio as y streng goll mygeayrt y vlock, nee shen jeeaghyn dhyt yn aght ta broo ginjillaghey yn poynt lheie.
Ta'n broo mooar er y fa dy vel y streng cheyl. Ta'n rio fo'n treng lheie as ta'n meih tuittym veggan as ny veggan. Myr ta'n streng giarrey trooid y vlock, yn ushtey faagit erskyn y treng, t'eh riojey reesht. Er jerrey, cha beagh fys ayd dy row yn block giarrit.

Caloree:
She yn caloree (cal) yn unnid tradishoonagh jeh çhiass.
1 cal = çhiass dy hroggal y tempreilys jeh 1g dy h-ushtey liorish 1°C.
1 kilocaloree (kcal) = 1000cal = 103cal
Er mynjeigyn bee ny keayrtyn, tra t'ou fakin 'caloreeyn', she kilocaloreeyn t'ayn.
1 caloree = 4.19 Joule

Ym-obbraghey kemmigagh:
Smooinee er ny reddyn ta taghyrt tra ta geayl goll er lostey. Ta jaagh çheet magh ass, ta leoaie goll er jannoo as ta çhiass goll er giennaghtyn. Cha nod y leoaie as y jaagh ve currit ry-cheilley reesht geayl y yannoo - she shen, cha nod y chaghlaa goll ergooyl. She ym-obbraghey kemmigagh ny caghlaa kemmigagh t'ayn.
Caghlaa corpagh, shen caghlaa ta stoo noa çheet magh ass. Er y chooid smoo, cha nod y caghlaa goll ergooyl.
Sambil.
Er y chooid smoo, ta kemmig dellal rish caghlaaghyn kemmigagh. Ta sambil dy liooar jeh ym-obbraghyn kemmigagh ry-gheddyn mygeayrt y mooin. Myr sampleyr, ta ym-obbraghey kemmigagh taghyrt tra ta shin jannoo arran-greddan. As ta ym-obbraghey kemmigagh taghyrt tra ta meer dy yiarn çheet dy ve mergagh. Ta'n yiarn gym-obbraghey lesh yn ocsygien syn aer, as ta shen croo stoo ta shin gra ocseed yiarn rish - ny merg, ny ta shin gra dy cadjin. As lurg tammylt ta daah glass çheet er ny mullee-chobbyr jeh troggalyn ennagh kyndagh rish ym-obbraghey kemmigagh. Sambyl elley jeh ym-obbraghey kemmigagh, shen coagyrey bee. Ayns ny kirp ain, ta ym-obbraghey kemmigagh feasley bree dy chummal shin çheh. As ayns kishtaghyn-pooar, ta ym-obbraghyn kemmigagh feasley bree ayns cummey lectraghys.

Ocseed yiarn:
She ocseed yiarn ny cho-vunstoo jeant ass ocsygien as yiarn. Ta shin gra "merg" dys ocseed yiarn dy mennick.

Sulfeed yiarn:
She sulfeed yiarn ny cho-vunstoo jeant ass sulfur as yiarn.

Co-vreneen:
S'goan ny bunstooghyn ta jeant ass breneenyn ta ny lomarcan. Dy cliaghtagh, ta breneenyn çheet ry-cheilley ayns piyryn ny ayns possanyn. Eisht, ta shin gra co-vreneenyn rish ny floagyn shoh. Myr sampleyr, ayns boteil d'ocsygien, cha nel breneen erbee ny lomarcan aynjee - ta ooilley ny breneenyn kianglt ry-cheilley ayns piyryn. Ta'n red cheddin ry-gheddyn bentyn rish hiddragien as eeadeen.
Co-vreneen - ta shen yn ayrn sloo jeh bunstoo ny jeh co-vunstoo oddys ve ayn dy neuchrogheydagh. My ta ooilley ny breneenyn ayns co-vreneen ny vreneen cheddin, ta shin gra co-vreneen bunstoo rish.
Goll rish breneenyn, ta co-vreneenyn feer vinniagagh. Ta millioonyn dy cho-vreneenyn ushtey ayns y vine sloo d'ushtey. Er y fa dy vel millioonyn dy vunstooghyn ayn, ta millioonyn dy horçhyn dy cho-vreneenyn ayn. Ta kemmigee soilshaghey co-vunstooghyn lesh formlaghyn kemmigagh.
She H2O yn formley ta shassoo son ushtey er yn oyr dy vel daa vreneen hiddragien sniemmit lesh un vreneen ocsygien. Y formley ta shassoo son daa-ocseed charboan, ta shen CO2 er y fa dy vel breneen carboan sniemmit lesh daa vreneen ocsygien.

Ocseed vercur:
She ocseed vercur ny cho-vunstoo jeant ass mercur as ocsygien. T'eh screeuit myr HgO.

Geayrag hulfuragh:
Ta geayrag hulfuragh ny co-vunstoo jeant ass sulfur, hiddragien, as ocsygien. T'eh screeuit myr H2SO4.

Cloreed litçhey:
Ta cloreed litçhey ny co-vunstoo jeant ass cloreen as litçhey. T'eh screeuit myr LiCl.

Cloreed vagnaishum:
She cloreed vagnaishum ny cho-vunstoo jeant ass cloreen as magnaishum. T'eh screeuit myr MgCl2.

Ocseed sodjum:
She ocseed sodjum ny cho-vunstoo jeant ass ocsygien as sodjum. T'eh screeuit myr Na2O.

Ocseed ollymin:
She ocseed ollymin ny cho-vunstoo jeant ass ocsygien as ollymin. T'eh screeuit myr Al2O3.

Hydrocseed sodjum:
She hydrocseed sodjum ny cho-vunstoo jeant ass sodjum, hiddragien as ocsygien. T'eh screeuit myr NaOH.

Sulfaayt sodjum:
She sulfaayt sodjum ny cho-vunstoo jeant ass sodjum, sulfur as ocsygien. T'eh screeuit myr Na2SO4.

Sulfaayt ollymin:
She sulfaayt ollymin ny cho-vunstoo jeant ass sulfur, ollymin as ocsygien. T'eh screeuit myr Al2(SO4)3.

Carboanaayt kelkium:
Ta carboanaayt kelkium ny co-vunstoo jeant ass carboan, kelkium, as ocsygien. T'eh screeuit myr CaCO3. Ta shin gra kelk da dy mennick.

Cloreed sodjum:
Ta cloreed sodjum ny co-vunstoo jeant ass cloreen as sodjum. T'eh screeuit myr NaCl. Ta sleih gra sollan da dy mennick.

Cloreed potashum:
She cloreed potashum ny cho-vunstoo jeant ass cloreen as potashum. T'eh screeuit myr KCl.

Carboanaayt sodjum:
Ta carboanaayt sodjum ny co-vunstoo jeant ass carboan, sodjum as ocsygien. T'eh screeuit myr Na2CO3.

Sulfaayt kelkium:
She sulfaayt kelkium ny cho-vunstoo jeant ass sulfur, kelkium as ocsygien. T'eh screeuit myr CaSO4.

Algeerey:
She algeerey y paart dy vaddaght ta jannoo ymmyd jeh lettyryn as cowraghyn elley dy chowraghey earrooyn ayns formlaghyn as cormidyn.

Cronk ny Marrey:
Ta Cronk ny Marrey ny heeabin çhellveeish Gaelgagh ta jeant liorish ÇhellVeeish. Hie eh magh ec jerrey yn vlein 2013.
Soiaghey.
Ta Cronk ny Marrey soit ayns y valley far-skeealagh Cronk ny Marrey.
Karacteyryn.
Ta daa lught-thie scanshoil ayns "Cronk ny Marrey", y lught-thie MacMannys, as y lught-thie Mylchreest.

ÇhellVeeish:
Ta ÇhellVeeish ny cholught Manninagh, ta croo claareeyn çhellveeish sy Ghaelg. Ec y traa t'ayn ta'd jannoo "Cronk ny Marrey".

Jamys Peddyr MacMannys:
She karacteyr 'sy chlaare çhellveeish "Cronk ny Marrey" eh Jamys Peddyr MacMannys.

Breeshey Cowin:
Ta Breeshey Cowin ny karacteyr sy çheeabin ÇhellVeeish, Cronk ny Marrey. She ben heshee Jamys Peddyr MacMannys t'ee.

Tom MacMannys-Cowin:
Ta Tom MacMannys-Cowin ny karacteyr sy çheeabin ÇhellVeeish, Cronk ny Marrey. She mac Yamys Peddyr MacMannys as Vreeshey Cowin t'eh.

Cronk ny Marrey (balley far-skeealagh):
She Cronk ny Marrey y balley far-skeealagh, raad ta Cronk ny Marrey soit.

Cronk ny Marrey (reddaghey):
Foddee Cronk ny Marrey çheet er:

Cruinlagh:
Ayns fishig ta cruinlagh çheet er coorse kiarkylagh red erbee fo cleayney yn ym-hayrn mygeayrt boayl 'syn 'eaynid, myr sampleyr cruinlagh planaid mygeayrt çheshvean chorys rollageagh, lheid as Corys ny Greiney. Ta cruinlagh eelipsagh ec planaidyn dy cadjin.

Frassaghey:
'Syn emshyraght, ta frassaghey çheet er troar erbee jeh coghlooghey y ghaal ushtey aeraghtagh as eh tuittym gys y thalloo fo cleayney yn ym-hayrn. T'ad ny sorçhyn smoo scanshoil jeh na'n dramane, y joanlagh, y fliaghey, y fliugh-niaghtee, y sniaghtey as y sniaghtey garroo. Ta'n fliaghey taghyrt tra ta ayrn ynnydagh jeh'n aeraght çheet dy ve cha saiht lesh y ghaal ushtey dy vel yn ushtey coghlooghey as "frassaghey". Cha nel y kay as y sou coontit myr frassaghey er-yn-oyr nagh vel ad tuittym. Ta daa obbraghey, as ad gobbraghey ry-cheilley ny keayrtyn, cur rish saiaghey yn aer: feayraghey yn aer ny bishaghey gaal ushtey 'syn aer.

Abhainn tSocair:
She awin ayns Coontae Ghoon ny Ghoal, Nerin, ee Abhainn tSocair (Yernish son "Awin Soccaragh"; ). T'ee girree ayns bun na Cruacha Gorma çheu hiar hiar yiass veih'n inver eck as t'ee roie feie 17 km gys y Cheayn Sheear. Er y choorse eck t'ee roie trooid y valley beg Ard an Rátha ta ny lhie begnagh er yn inver. Ta an Abhainn Rua ("yn Awin Ruy") çheet ry-cheilley rish Abhainn tSocair faggys da'n voir eck.

Bibi Baskin:
She aa-hebbeyder claare radio as çhellveeish marish Raidió Teilifís Éireann (RTÉ) ee Olive "Bibi" Baskin (ruggit er 19 Boaldyn 1952). Myrane lesh yn obbyr eck marish RTÉ ren ee obbraghey myr earisheyr as screeudeyr son earishlioaryn as pabyryn-naight. Ec y traa t'ayn t'ee stiurey thie oast as thie goaldagh eiraghtagh ayns Alleppey, Kerala, yn Injey.
Daag Baskin RTÉ ayns ny 1990yn as ren ee goll gys Sussex Heear, Sostyn, raad ren ee tannaghtyn ayn feie queig bleeaney gobbraghey er shaleeyn eigsoylagh as, tra v'ee smooinaghtyn er y chied cheim elley, ren ee toshiaghey lioar y screeu. Va anaase mooar eck 'sy vedshin as 'sy teaystey Ayurvedagh as ren ee goll er turrys gys Kerala, faggys da Madras, raad ren ee feddyn shellooghys va jeeaghyn magh er traie aalin. Jiu, t'ee cummal ayn as t'ee coontey dy vel Kerala ny voayl mie er yn oyr dy vel ram keimyn as boodeeyssyn ayn, goaill stiagh Hindooyn, Creesteenyn as Ewnyn, red nagh vel cosoylagh rish y voayl dooie eck ayns Ard an Rátha, Coontae Ghoon ny Ghoal.
Ta'n Yernish ghlen eck as ren ee obbraghey myr ynseyder y çhengey ec toshiaght y choorse-bea eck. By vriw ee er claare RTÉ, "Fáilte Towers", 'sy vlein 2008. She pohllder y çheshaght-ghiastyllagh Plan Ireland ee.

John Doherty (kiaulleyder):
She fidleyr kiaull çheerey Yernagh va John Doherty (1900 - 26 Jerrey Geuree 1980). Rug eh ayns Ard an Rátha, Coontae Ghoon ny Ghoal. She fer jeh'n Lught Shooyl eh as ren y lught-thie v'echeyssyn obbraghey myr tingleyryn as delleyderyn cabbil. She fidleyr va'n ayr echey, Mickey "Mór" Doherty, as she fidleyryn cooid vie jeh ny braaraghyn as ny shuyraghyn v'echey. Ren Mickey Mór poosey rish Mary McConnell, arraneyder voish Doon ny Ghoal yiass. Va nuy paitçhey oc as she John va'n fer s'aegey.

CLG Chontae Dhún na nGall:
She nane jeh'n 32 voayrd coontae jeh CLG ayns Nerin eh Boayrd Commyn Roortaghys Gaelgagh Choontae Ghoon ny Ghoal (, ny ). Ta'n boayrd freggyrtagh er son cloiaghyn Gaelgagh ayns Coontae Ghoon ny Ghoal, myrane lesh ny fwirranyn eddyr-choontae.

Pat Shovlin:
She greinneyder as ynseyder y vluckaneyrys Gaelgagh ass Ard an Rátha, Coontae Ghoon ny Ghoal, Nerin, va Pat Shovlin. Ren eh obbraghey myr greinneyder deaneyderyn marish fwirran bluckaneyrys shinsharagh Ghoon ny Ghoal. Ren eh eh shassoo son y chlub ynnydagh echey, CLG Ard an Rátha.

Straid:
She bollagh pemmadit theayagh ayns balley ny caayr ee straid. She ayrn thallooin theayagh t'ayn ta kiangley thieyn ry-cheilley as raad ta deiney çheet ry-cheilley, eddyr-obbraghey as çheet as goll. Ta straidyn jeant ass pemmadyn, concraid, asfalt, ny breekyn er y chooid smoo, agh ta straidyn jeant ass cray creoi ry-gheddyn chammah.

Heear Hwoaie (rheynn-reihys Pharlamaid ny h-Oarpey):
She rheynn-reihys jeh Parlamaid ny h-Oarpey ayns Nerin ee yn rheynn-reihys Heear Hwoaie (; ). Ta 3 OPOyn goll er nyn reih ayn. Ta'n rheynn-reihys goaill stiagh ny coondaeghyn y Cavan, y Claar, Doon ny Ghoal, Galliu, Lheeahtrim, Lhongfort, May Eo, Muinaghan, Ros Comain, Shliggagh, yn Eearvee as Caayr ny Galliu.

Doon ny Ghoal Heear Yiass (rheynn-reihys Dáil Éireann):
She rheynn-reihys er son Dáil Éireann, y çhamyr s'inshley ayns Parlamaid Nerin eh Doon ny Ghoal Heear Yiass (; ). Ta 3 Teachtaí Dála ("Çhaghteryn y Whaiyl"; TD myr aagherrid) goll er reih ayn. T'ad Pearse Doherty (SF), Dinny McGinley (FG) as Thomas Pringle (Neu) ny TDyn ec y traa t'ayn.

Keintys:
Ta ymmodee keeallyn ec keintys:

S4C:
She S4C (goll er loayrt myr Sianel Pedwar Cymru ny ny keayrtyn ayns Baarle dy neuchooishagh/neu-oikoil myr S Four C) bollagh çhellveeish ayns Bretin as y chooid smoo jeh ny claaryn echey ayns Bretnish. Va'n bollagh currit er bun er 1 Mee Houney, 1982.

Keintys bea-oaylleeagh:
Ta keintys çheet er "firran" ny "bwoirrin".

Senoturbellida:
She genus dy veiyn daa-heuagh eh Senoturbella ny Xenoturbella. Ta daa ghooie dhianeagh aynsyn. Hooar Sixten Bock y chied dooie ("Xenoturbella bocki") ayns 1915, agh cha daink rish coontey screeuit derrey 1949, liorish Einar Westblad.
Rang-oardraghey.
Ta daa ghooie 'sy ghenus "Xenoturbella":
Cha nel eie soit er y rang-oardraghey kiart. Hoshiaght chreid oayllee dy nee mooinjer eeastyn shliggagh v'ayn, agh dooyrt kuse jeu dy row y GDN er ny hollaghey ec GDN eeastyn shliggagh v'ad er nyn ee, as bare lhieu rang-oardraghey "Xenoturbella" myr deuterostomagh bunneydagh nagh row mastey ny phyla v'ayn hannah. Ayns 2006, hooar studeyrys elley dy nee oohyn "Xenoturbellida" hene v'ayn, cha nee oohyn eeastyn shliggagh eeit v'ayn, agh ghow ad rish dy row y chied studeyrys er ny hollaghey ny yei shen as dy nee deuterostomagh t'ayn. Ec y traa t'ayn she oltey ynrican y phylum Xenoturbellida t'ayn. Rere jalloo-oaylleeaght as bea-oaylleeaght chovreneenagh, t'ad credjal dy nee faggys-mooinjer Acoelomorpha t'ayn.
Ta oltscarrey GDN mitochondriagh cowraghey dy nee bun-phossan deuterostomagh t'ayn, ny co-phossan Echinoderma as Hemichordata, foddee. Ta oayllee elley ad y chur ny smoo bunneydagh, mastey Metasoa.
Jalloo-oaylleeaght.
Ta "Xenoturbella" wheesh as 4cm er lhiurid. Ta corp neuchramp echey, gyn inçhyn, corys keckey, collane ny gonad , ny organe erbee agh as killagyn scuitçhal echey. Ta corys nearag skeayllt echey. 

Tree Cassyn (possan kiaullee):
Ta Tree Cassyn ny phossan kiaullee Manninagh. Ta tree olteyryn 'sy phossan kiaullee - Paayl Rogers, Doona Lambden as Isla Callister-Wafer.

Isla Callister:
She kiaulleyder Manninagh ee Isla Callister, ny Isla Callister-Wafer keayrtyn. She oltey jeh'n phossan kiaull Tree Cassyn t'ee. Sheear ayns 2013, ren ee cur e goo rish y scannane "Solace in Wicca" as ee cloie Margaret Quaine.

Paayl Rogers:
Ta Paayl Rogers ny oltey jeh ram possanyn kiaullee Manninagh, myr sampleyr Tree Cassyn.

Tree cassyn (reddaghey):
Ta ny smoo na cheeal ec tree cassyn. Foddee eh çheet er:

Tanakh:
She ennym 'syn Ewaghys ta cur sheese er canoin y Vible Ewnagh eh yn Tanakh (, goll er fockley magh myr ny [təˈnax). T'eh goll er enney myr y Teks Masoretagh ny yn "Miqra" chammah. She "acronym" t'ayn as eh çheet magh ass ny kied lettyryn Ewagh jeh rheynnyn tradishoonagh y Teks Masoretagh: y Torah ("Yn Ynsagh" ny Queig Lioar Voses), Nevi'im ("Ny Faihderyn") as Ketuvim ("Ny Screeunyn") — ny "TaNaKh". She ennym elley t'ayn na ""Miqra"" () ta çheet er "ny ta goll er lhaih". Va lioaryn y Tanakh lhiass-chreelit marish tradishoon beill fo'n ennym y Torah Beill.

Eliezer Ben-Yehuda:
She fockleyreyder as reagheyder pabyr-naight Litvakagh va Eliezer Ben-Yehuda (). She spyrryd deiyragh v'eh er son aavioghey yn Ewnish 'syn eash noa-emshyragh eh. Rug Ben-Yehuda er 7 Jerrey Geuree 1858 ayns Lužki 'sy Velaroosh noa-emshyragh (Kiannoortys Vilna ayns Impiraght ny Roosh y lhing shen) myr "Eliezer Yitzhak Perlman" (). Tra v'eh tree bleeaney d'eash, ren eh goll er cheder raad ren eh studeyrys er yn Ewnish as y Vible. She cliaghtey cadjin v'eh shen mastey Ewnyn yn Oarpey Hiar ec y traa shen. Tra v'eh 12 vlein d'eash va ayrnyn mooarey jeh'n Torah, y Mishna as y Talmud lhaiht echey. Va ny paarantyn echey jerkal dy jed eh ny rabbi as ren ad cur eh gys yeshiva. Ren eh studeyryssyn er yn Ewnish henndeeagh ayn as va screeunyn seihlltagh y toilsheraght 'syn Ewnish foshlit roish. Ren eh studeyryssyn ny s'anmey er y Rangish, y Ghermaanish, as y Rooshish as v'eh currit gys Dünaburg son tooilley ynsee. Hoshee eh lhaih y pabyr-naight Ewnish "HaShahar" raad haghyr eh er y Teionaght as ren eh kiangley aavioghey yn Ewnish ayns Eretz Israel rish unnaneyssey Ewnyn y Dowan.
Tra hooar eh yn cheim echey hie eh gys Paarys as eh jannoo studeyryssyn ayns Ollooscoill Sorbonne. Ren eh studeyryssyn er shennaghys as politickagh y Niar Veanagh, agh she yn Ewnish hie dy mooar er. Va'n Ewnish goll er ymmyd myr çhengey loayrit mastey ny scollagyn shen as ren ny coloayrtyssyn shen shickyraghey dy nee eie yn-jannoo eh aavioghey yn Ewnish myr çhengey yn ashoon. Hannee eh ayns Paarys feie kiare bleeaney.
'Sy vlein 1881 hie Ben-Yehuda gys y Phalasteen va fo stiurey yn Impiraght Ottomanagh as ren eh cummal ayns Jerusalem. Hoshee eh gobbraghey myr ynseyder ayns scoill yn Alliance Israelite Universelle. Hoshee eh lhiassaghey çhengey noa as y dean echey ish y chur ayns ynnyd y Ewdish as dagh abbyrt ardjynagh elley myr mean y choloayrtys laaoil mastey ny h-Ewnyn ren aliyah veih dagh corneil y Dowan. Ren eh coontey dy nee shimbosh v'ayn 'sy Ewnish as y Teionaght.
Phoose Ben-Yehuda daa cheayrt, rish daa huyr. Hooar e chied ven, Devora (née Jonas), baase myr eiyrtys er y ghorley shymlee 'sy vlein 1891 as queig cloan oc. She yn yeearree s'jerree v'eck dy nee Ben-Yehuda poosey rish e shuyr, Paula Beila. Beggan lurg baase e chied ven, hooar troor jeh ny paitçhyn echey baase myr eiyrtys er y diftheyr çheusthie lhing jeih mee. Shey mee ny s'anmey, phoose eh rish Paula, as ren ee doltey yn ennym Ewnish "Hemda".
Hrog eh yn chied vac echey, Ben-Zion Ben-Yehuda, lane 'sy Ewnish. Cha row çhengey elley erbee foshlit da tra v'eh ny aegid. She eshyn va'n chied loayreyder dooghyssagh jeh'n Ewnish noa-emshyragh.
Coorse earisheyraght.
She reagheyder va Ben-Yehuda er ram pabyryn-naight Ewnish: "HaZvi", "Hashkafa" as "HaOr". Va "HaZvi" doont feie blein myr eiyrtys er y staanys veih'n voodeeys feer-chiart-chredjuagh ayns Jerusalem as ad shassoo noi ymmyd yn Ewnish, y çhengey chasherick oc, son coloayrtyssyn cadjin laaoil.
Fockleyrys.
She peiagh mooar va Ben-Yehuda ayns bunneeaght Ving ny h-Ewnish (Va'ad HaLashon), ny Colleish ny h-Ewnish y lhing ain. She Ben-Yehuda va'n ughtar jeh'n chied 'ockleyr Ewnish noa-emshyragh as haink er dy ve enmyssit "aaviogheyder" yn Ewnish, gyn bwooise er y staanys noi kuse d'ocklyn va crooit echey. Haink er kuse vie jeh ny focklyn shen dy ve ymmydit 'sy çhengey, agh cha daink y raah cheddin er kuse elley jeu — mysh 2,000 fockle. She "badura" va'n fockle echey er son traase, agh ta Ewnisheyryn jeu gymmydey yn fockle "agvania".
Baase as kelloorey.
Er 16 Nollick 1922 hooar Ben-Yehuda baase myr eiyrtys er y ghorley shymlee, gorley v'echey er feie y chooid smoo jeh'n theihll echey. V'eh oanluckit er Cronk Olive ayns Jerusalem. Haink ny smoo na 30,000 dy 'leih gys e hirveish merriu.
Ren Ben-Yehuda troggal thie er son e lught-thie ayns y nabooys Talpiot, Jerusalem, agh hooar eh baase tree mee roish my row'n troggalys jeant. Ren e ven Hemda cummal ayn er feie mysh 30 bleeaney. Jeih bleeaney lurg e baaish, ren e mac Ehud astreeaghey bargane screeuee yn thie gys baljaght Jerusalem ry hoi crooaght thie tashtee as ynnyd studeyrys. Fy yerrey, v'eh lhiggit magh er eeasaght gys possan agglishagh veih'n Ghermaan as ren ad cur ynnyd er bun son arryltee Ghermaanagh. She ynnyd co-choyrle as thie oast t'ayn jiu ta fo reirey yn çheshaght Ghermaanagh "Aktion Sühnezeichen Friedensdienste" (Germaanish son "Immeeaght Hirveish Aachaarjys ry hoi'n Çhee") as ad reaghey keirdlannyn, shemminaareyn as claareeyn ulpan 'sy Ewnish.

Cabbash chraplit:
She troarag "Brassica oleracea" 'sy phossan troaragagh Capitata ee cabbash chraplit. She "Brassica oleracea poss. capitata arr. sabauda L." yn ennym formoil eck. Ta duillagyn glassey craplit yn-ee eck, as ad ayns kione skeaylt.

Talpiot:
She nabooys ayns Jerusalem hiar yiass, Israel, eh Talpiot (, "tooranyn" ny "troggit dy mie"). V'eh bunnit 'sy vlein 1922 ec kioneraadee Heionagh. Ta enney mooar er y nabooys er-yn-oyr dy ren Eliezer Ben-Yehuda, ayr yn Ewnish noa-emshyragh, troggal thie ayn, agh hooar eh baase roish creaghney yn troggalys echey.

Seionaght:
She cummey jeh'n ashoonaghys Ewagh ta shassoo son steat er lheh da ny h-Ewnyn ayns Eretz Israel ee yn Teionaght (, "Tsiyonut"). Ta Seionee credjal dy lhisagh dagh Ew freayll yn enney Ewagh oc. T'ad shassoo noi lheie ny h-Ewnyn rish sheshaghtyn elley as t'ad credjal dy lhisagh dagh Ew goll er ash gys Israel as y dean ayn na ny h-Ewnyn y chur ayn myr tromlagh 'syn ashoon oc, as ny h-Ewnyn y heyrey veih'n lhiettrimys, y lhiehlaghys as y dowilghreim noi-ewnagh. Dirree yn Teionaght 'syn Oarpey veanagh as 'syn Oarpey hiar 'sy 19oo eash myr gleashaght aavioee ashoonagh as tammylt veg ny lurg ren y chooid smoo jeh ny fir hoshee 'sy ghleashaght kiangley yn dean oc rish bunneeaght steat Ewagh 'sy Phalasteen, ard va fo stiurey yn Impiraght Ottomanagh ec y traa shen. Jiu, ta'n Teionaght moylley er son y steat Ewagh.
Ta fendeilee yn Teionaght gra dy nee gleashaght heyrey ashoonagh t'ayn ta moylley çheet er ash possan sheshoil skeaylt gys y çheer ghooie oc. Agh ta cremeyderyn y Teionaght gra dy nee eie-oaylleeaght choloinagh ny chynneeagh t'ayn as ee jeant seose jeh'n choloinaghys cummalagh as glenney kynneeagh ny Palasteenee. Er yn oyr shen ta'n staanys noi'n Teionaght goaill stiagh cummaltyssyn Israelagh neu-leighoil ayns ny thallooyn Palasteenagh, y glackey thallooin as y raghlid noi ny Palasteenee. Ansherbee, ta cremeyderyn y noi-Heionaght gra dy nee cummey yn noi-Ewaghys t'ayn ayns condaigys noi'n Teionaght.

Daugavpils:
She caayr er brooinyn yn awin Daugava eh Daugavpils (Latvish son "Cashtal Daugava"). T'eh ny nah chaayr smoo 'sy çheer lurg Rīga as t'eh ny hoie mysh 230 km çheu hiar yiass veih'n phreeu-valley.

Cheder:
She bunscoill hradishoonagh ta gynsaghey bun yn Ewaghys as yn Ewnish eh cheder (ny cheider; , "shamyr").
Va chederyn ry-gheddyn er feie yn Oarpey roish cassey yn 18oo eash. Haghyr ny lessoonyn ayns thie ynseyder, er enney myr Melamed, as hooar yn ynseyder e chooid argid veih'n voodeeys Ewagh ny veih ny paarantyn. Dy cadjin, cha jagh agh guillyn gys y scoill as hooar ny caillinyn nyn gooid ynsagh veih nyn moiraghyn 'sy valley. Tra cha row mooarane argid ayn, va ny guillyn ynsit ayns un phossan.
Dy tradishoonagh, hoshee guillyn gynsaghey yn abbyrlhit Ewagh tra v'ad tree bleeaney d'eash, cha ren ad goll stiagh 'sy cheder derrey v'ad queig bleeaney d'eash. Lurg ren ad toshiaghey yn Ewnish y lhaih, hoshee ad ad gynsaghey yn Torah, goaill toshiaght rish y Vayikra as queig lioaryn Voses. Hoshee ad gynsaghey yn Mishna tra v'ad mysh shiaght bleeaney d'eash as y Torah (Mishna, Gemara, as tooilley coontyssyn) tra va'n Mishna ynsit oc. Ren ad ynsaghey as ad lhaih er ard as gaaraa. Tra v'eh 13 ny 14 bleeaney d'eash, va jerrey ynsee yn ghuilley cowrit magh lesh y bar mitzvah.

Alliance Israélite Universelle:
She reagheydys eddyr-ashoonagh Ewagh ta bunnit ayns Paarys eh Alliance Israélite Universelle (). Va'n reagheydys bunnit 'sy vlein 1860 ec y steateyr Frangagh Adolphe Crémieux ry hoi coadey kiartyn deiney Ewnyn y theihll. Ta'n reagheydys cur ard-smooinaghtyn hene-choadey as hene-haieys ny h-Ewnyn liorish yn ynsagh as y lhiassaghey gerrymoil.

Talmud:
She fer jeh ard-heksyn yn Ewaghys Rabbinagh, t'er coontey myr y nah heks smoo scanshoil lurg y Torah, eh yn Talmud ( "talmūd" "ynsagh", veih'n 'raue "lmd" "ynsaghey, jannoo studeyrys"). Ta'n ennym Shas () currit er dy tradishoonagh as eh çheet er yn aagherrid Ewnish son "shisha sedarim" ny "shey oardagh" Leigh Veill yn Ewaghys. Ta daa ayrn 'sy Talmud: y Mishnah (, m. 200 BNJ), y chied haglym jeh Leigh Veill yn Ewaghys, as y Gemara (m. 500 BNJ), soilshey yn Vishnah as ny screeunyn Tannaitagh ta cur er cooishyn elley as ta cur bun er y Vible Ewnish. Ta ny h-enmyssyn "Talmud" as "Gemara" ymmydit ayns ynnyd nyn geilley dy mennick.
Ta'n Talmud jeant seose jeh 63 traghtys as, 'sy chlou cadjin, t'eh ny s'liauyrey na 6,200 duillag. T'eh screeuit 'syn Ewnish as 'syn Aramaaish Hannaitagh. Ta smooinaghtyn as barelyn veih thousaneyn dy rabbinaghyn er caghlaa dy chooishyn ayn, goaill stiagh y leigh, y voraltaght, y fallsoonys, cliaghtaghyn, y shennaghys, y jeeoilys, y veeal-arrish as ram cooishyn elley. She bun er son dagh coad y leigh rabbinagh t'ayn 'sy Talmud as ta ram aaraaghyn echey ayns lettyraght rabbinagh eigsoylagh.

Brattagh Israel:
Va brattagh Israel ( "Degel Yisrael"; "Alam Isra'īl") doltit er 28 Jerrey Fouyir 1948, queig mee lurg seyrsnys y çheer. T'eh soilshaghey magh Rollage Ghavy gorrym er cooylrey bane eddyr daa rimmeig ghorrym cho-chruinnagh. Cha nel meenaghey shickyr ec daah yn ghorrym faagail magh dy lhisagh eh ve dorraghey myr gorrym y speyr. Va'n cummey echey currit sheese er son y Ghleashaght Heionagh 'sy vlein 1891. Ta cummey yn "Tallit" Ashkenazagh, yn 'illeag phadjeragh Ewagh as daah bane marish rimmeigyn gorrymey urree.

Shimon Peres:
Va steateyr Israelagh va ruggit 'sy Pholynn eh Shimon Peres (, ruggit myr Szymon Perski; 2 Luanistyn 1923 - 28 Mean Fouyir 2016). V'eh ny 9oo Eaghtyrane er Israel. By Ard-Vinishter Israel eh daa cheayrt, as un cheayrt myr Ard-Vinishter shallidagh. V'eh reiht da'n Knesset ayns Sauin y vlein 1959 as, faagail magh barney giare feie tree mee ayns 2006 leah, ren eh shirveishey begnagh gyn scuirr derrey yn vlein 2007 tra v'eh reiht myr Eaghtyrane.

Cabbash nappinagh:
She glassrey fraueagh ee cabbash nappinagh, ny troarag chabbash.
Coontey.
Ta cabbash nappinagh er ny croo liorish er son attit. Ny yei shen, t'ee ass fuilleeaght chabbash, challish Rangagh as troaragyn elley "Brassica oleracea".
Ymmyd.
Ta'n ghass as ny duillagyn yn-ee. Dy cadjin, ta sleih roostey brat s'mooie frauaigagh voish y ghass roish aarlaghey. Ta ny duillagyn gollrish duillagyn caayl jiarg.
Ta cabbash nappinagh feer chadjin ayns bee Kashmiragh.
Ta arraghyssyn ennagh goll er troarey myr bee ollee.

Benjamin Netanyahu:
She politickeyr Israelagh as shenn Ard-Vinishter Israel eh Benjamin "Bibi" Netanyahu (, ; r. 21 J. Fouyir 1949). Chammah as shen, t'eh ny oltey jeh'n Knesset, ny Chaairliagh er y phartee politickagh Likud, ny Hirveishagh Cooishyn Joarree, as ny Hirveishagh Diplomaght Heayagh as Cooishyn y Lught Eebyrtagh. She Netanyahu y chied Ard-Vinishter va ruggit ayns Israel lurg seyrsnys y çheer.

Rolley Eaghtyraneyn Israel:
She fer toshee y steat ayns Israel eh Eaghtyrane Steat Israel ( "Nesi HaMedina", "Eaghtyrane y Steat"; ). Er y chooid smoo, she oik staydoil neu-pholitickagh t'ayn. Ta'n phooar lattyssagh hene ny lhie ayns laueyn yn Ard-Vinishter. She Shimon Peres yn Eaghtyrane ec y traa t'ayn. Hie eh ayns shelloo yn oik er 15 Jerrey Souree 2007. Ta ny h-Eaghtyraneyn goll er reih dagh shiaght bleeaney ec olteynyn y Knesset. Ta joarey un-çharrymagh ec yn Eaghtyrane.
Rolley Eaghtyraneyn Israel.
Shoh rolley Caairliee as, eisht, Eaghtyraneyn Israel veih bunneeaght y çheer shen 'sy vlein 1948.
Caairliee Choonseil Hallidagh y Steat (1948–1949).
Myr Caairliagh Choonseil Hallidagh y Steat, ren Chaim Weizmann goaill shirveish myr fer toshee "de facto" y steat derrey v'eh reiht myr Eaghtyrane.
Eaghtyraneyn Israel (1949–jiu).
Ren nuy dooinney goaill shirveish myr Eaghtyrane Israel, as ren kiare jeu goaill shirveish feie daa lhing ass y cheilley. Ren Yitzhak Ben-Zvi goaill shirveish myr Eaghtyrane tree keayrt ass y cheilley.

Thiollane Vooir Eeaght:
She thiollane raad yiarn fo Mooir yn Eeaght eh Thiollane Vooir Eeaght (; ). T'eh roie feie 50.5 km (31.4 mi) veih Folkestone, Kent, 'sy Reeriaght Unnaneysit gys Coquelles, Pas-de-Calais, faggys da Calais ayns twoaie yn Rank. Ec y voayl s'inshley t'eh ny lhie 75 m (250 tr) er diunid.
Ta'n thiollane gymmyrkey ny traenyn troailtee ard-vieau Eurostar, ny traenyn carbyd Eurotunnel Shuttle as traenyn lught eddyr-ashoonagh. Ta'n thiollane kiangley rish ny raaidyn yiarn ard-vieau yn LGV Nord as yn High Speed 1.

Coonseil Hreishteilaght ny h-Ashoonyn Unnaneysit:
She fer jeh ard-arganeyn ny h-Ashoonyn Unnaneysit ee Coonseil Hreishteilaght ny h-Ashoonyn Unnaneysit (; ). Va'n choonseil currit er bun er son reirey as stiurey ny thallooyn treishteilagh as currym as arrey ny cummaltee as shee as shickyrys yn dowan y dean eck. Ta dagh fer jeu seyr veih'n AU nish as ad fo hene-reiltys ny reiltys neuchroghagh. By eh Palau yn thalloo hreishteilagh s'jerree tra haink er y çheer shen dy ve ny steat neuchroghagh ren çheet stiagh 'syn AU ayns Mee ny Nollick 1994.

Anthony Molloy (bluckaneyr Yernagh):
She eear-vluckaneyr Gaelgagh eh Anthony Molloy (r. 28 Boaldyn 1962). V'eh ruggit ayns Ard an Rátha, Coontae Ghoon ny Ghoal. Ren eh cloie marish y chlub ynnydagh echey, CLG Ard an Rátha, as marish fwirran eddyr-choontae Ghoon ny Ghoal veih ny 1980yn derrey ny 1990yn. V'eh ny chaptan er y wirran eddyr-choontae tra ren ad cosney yn chied Chione-Chloie Ooilley Yernagh 'sy vluckaneyrys Gaelgagh 'sy vlein 1992. Ren eh cosney aundyr y Far-Vluckaneyr 'sy vlein cheddin chammah.

Ewnyn Israelagh:
Ta'n enmys Ewnyn Israelagh ny Ewnyn Israel çheet er:
Ta'n chooid smoo jeh ny h-Ewnyn Israelagh cummal ayns Israel ny 'sy lieh heear jeh'n Dowan. T'ad loayrt Ewnish er y chooid smoo as ta'd cliaghtey yn Ewaghys ayns cummey ennagh. Ta begnagh lieh-chooid jeh Ewnyn y theihll cummal ayns Israel.

Cowrey Israel:
Ta Cowrey Steat Israel () taishbyney menorah eddyr daa vanglane olive er y daa heu, as y fockle (Ewnish son "Israel") foue. Dy mennick ta daaghyn bane-ghorrym as bane er y chowrey, agh t'eh ry-akin ayns daaghyn elley bentyn rish ymmyd y chowrey.
Shennaghys.
Ren Steat Israel doltey yn cowrey lurg cohirrey kiaddee 'sy vlein 1948. Ta kiaddey yn chowrey bunnit er y chur-stiagh ren Gabriel as Maxim Shamir cur stiagh 'sy chohirrey, marish troyn veih cuir-stiagh elley lheid as Oteh Walisch as W. Struski, as Itamar David as Yerachmiel Schechter. Va'n cowrey doltit ec y steat er 10 Toshiaght Arree 1949.
Cosoyley.
Ta'n jalloo ta goll er ymmyd er y chowrey bunnit er jalloo yn menorah er Arc Titus. Va'n menorah ymmydit 'sy Çhiamble shenndeeagh ayns Jerusalem. She cowrey yn Ewaghys t'ayn veih ny shenn traaghyn. T'eh shassoo er son y toilsheraght chadjin.
Foddee dy vel yn cowrey bunnit er ashlish yn 'aihder bibleagh Zechariah, cabdil 4, raad t'eh cur sheese er menorah as daa villey olive cruinnaghey yn menorah er y daa heu.
Ta ny banglaneyn olive shassoo er son shee.

Arabee Israelagh:
She seyraanee Israel lesh eiraght chultooragh as hengagh as enney Palasteenagh oc ad seyraanee Arabagh Israel ny Arabee Israelagh. She Arabish y çhengey chadjin oc, gyn bwooise da'n chraueeaght t'ec y loayreyder. She daa-hengeyderyn y chooid smoo jeh ny h-Arabee shoh as ad loayrt yn Ewnish myr y nah hengey oc. She Moslymee y chooid smoo jeu, agh ta ram jeu nyn Arabee Chreestee as nyn Nroosee chammah.
Rere Ard-Oik Staydraa Israel v'eh oolit dy row 1,617,000 Arabee 'sy çheer 'sy vlein 2010, ny 20.5% jeh pobble y çheer. Ta'n chooid smoo jeu cur ashoonaght Phalasteenagh as seyraanaght Israelagh orroosyn. Ta mooinjeryssyn ec ram jeu rish lughtyn-thie 'sy Vroogh Heear as ayns Straih Gaza, chammah as rish lughtyn-thie ayns campyn kemmyrkagh 'sy Jordaan, 'sy Teer, as 'sy Livaan.

Bun Cranncha:
She balley ayns twoaie Choontae Ghoon ny Ghoal, Nerin, eh Bun Cranncha (). T'eh ny lhie er Loch Súilí er Lieh-innys Inis Eoghain, 23 km çheu heear hwoaie veih Doirrey as 43 km çheu hwoaie veih Littyr Kennain. She Bun Cranncha y balley smoo ayns Inis Eoghain as y nah valley smoo 'sy choontae lurg Littyr Kennain.

Mira Awad:
She arraneyder, aghteyr, as screeudeyr arraneyn Arabagh Israelagh ee Mīrā ’Anwar ‘Awaḍ ( "Mīrā ’Anwar ʕawaḍ"; "Mira Anwar Awad"; ; ruggit 11 Mean Souree 1975). 'Sy vlein 2009 ren ee shassoo son Israel ayns Cohirrey Arraneyn yn Eurovision marish yn arraneyder Ewnagh Israelagh Achinoam Nini as ad goaill yn arrane "There Must Be Another Way". By ee y chied Arabagh ren goaill arrane er son Israel 'syn Eurovision as ee goaill y chied arrane lesh focklyn 'syn Arabish.

Cabbash phalm:
She glassrey ass cree gish ny ass buinney biljyn palm er lheh eh cabbash phalm. T'asdyn goaill stiagh "Cocos nucifera", "Euterpe edulis", "Euterpe oleracea", "Sabal" as "Bactris gasipaes". Dy cadjin, ta goaill magh cabbash phalm marroo biljyn palm feie un-ghassagh, agh ta dooieyn elley yl-ghassagh ny nyn .

Mark Cavendish:
She daawheeylleyder ratçhal keirdey Manninagh eh Mark Simon Cavendish MBE (r. 21 Boaldyn 1985). T'eh ratçhal marish y wirran UCI ProTeam Omega Pharma-Quick Step. Chossyn Cavenish y boyn airhey ayns Fenaghtys y Dowan ayns ny bleeantyn 2005 as 2008 tra v'eh ratçhal er son y Vretyn Vooar marish Rob Hayles as Bradley Wiggins 'sy screeb-ratçh ayns Gammanyn y Cho-unnaneys 'sy vlein 2006 tra ren eh ratçhal er son Mannin.

Christine Collister:
She arraneyder as screeudeyr arraneyn kiaull çheerey, kiaull ghroamid as snagchiaull ee Christine Collister (r. 28 Nollick 1961). V'ee ruggit as troggit er Mannin as haink enney urree 'sy vlein 1986 tra ren ee goaill yn arrane enmyssagh son y chochormys çhellveeish BBC jeh'n lioar "The Life and Loves of a She-Devil" liorish Fay Weldon.
Roish shen haink ee dy ve ny h-oltey jeh'n phossan kiaullee Richard Thompson Band. Car y chied kiare bleeaney ny lurg, ren ee goll er turryssyn dowanagh marish Thompson. Lurg eh shen, ren ee obbraghey as goll er sooree marish yn arraneyder, screeudeyr arraneyn as cloieder gitar, Clive Gregson. 'Sy lhing shen, ren y jees oc cur magh queig albym.
Shymmey albym t'er chur magh ec Collister lioree hene voish y vlein 1994, goaill stiagh yn albym "Live, Blue Aconite, Dark Gift of Time" as y JC co-chruinnagh "Songbird" marish Fledgling Records, as "An Equal Love" as "Into The Light" marish Topic Records. Myrane lesh shen, ren ee obbraghey marish y cholught Manninagh Stereo Scout Records, cooid jeh'n cholught Running Media Management Group. Ren ee cur magh yn albym bio "Home" (2004) as y JABE "XX" (2005) marish y cholught shen.

Randolph Quirk:
She çhengoayllee Manninagh eh Charles Randolph Quirk, y Barran Quirk, CBE, FBA (1920-2017). Va Quirk ruggit ayns Lammal, Skylley Maayl, Mannin 'sy vlein 1920. She mac lesh e phaarantyn Thomas as Amy Randolph Quirk t'ayn. Ren eh goll dys Colleish Ree Illiam, as lurg eh shen, hie eh dys Colleish Ollooscoill Lunnin son y Vaarle y lhaih fo currym Albert Hugh Smith. Hoshee e studeyryssyn 'sy vlein 1939, agh hie ad er nyn groghey car y Nah Chaggey Dowanagh, as ren eh creaghney ad eddyr ny bleeantyn 1945 as 1947. Hooar eh MA, PhD, as D. Lit as haink er dy ve ny olloo jeh'n Vaarle ayns Colleish Ollooscoill Lunnin veih 1947 derrey 1954. Haink er dy ve ny lhaihder ayns Ollooscoill Durham 'sy vlein 1954, as haink er dy ve ny olloo ayn 'sy vlein 1958. Hie eh er ash gys Colleish Ollooscoill Lunnin myr Olloo 'sy vlein 1960 as 'sy vlein 1968 ren eh goaill eiyrtys er Smith myr Olloo Quain derrey yn vlein 1981.
Ren eh lhaih leaghtyn as ynsaghey sheminaareyn ayns Colleish Ollooscoill Lunnin 'sy Çhenn Vaarle as ayns Shennaghys y Vaarle.

Bealach Féich:
She balley ayns Coontae Ghoon ny Ghoal, Nerin, eh Bealach Féich (). T'eh ny lhie er broogh yiass Abhainn na Finne. Myrane lesh y valley Srath an Urláir ta ny lhie er broogh hwoaie yn awin cheddin, ta'n daa valley currit ry-cheilley myr y Balley Lannoonagh.

Srath an Urláir:
