She balley ayns Coontae Ghoon ny Ghoal, Nerin, eh Srath an Urláir (; Yernish son "Strah yn Laare"). T'eh ny lhie er broogh hwoaie Abhainn na Finne. Myrane lesh y valley Bealach Féich ta ny lhie er broogh yiass yn awin cheddin, ta'n daa valley currit ry-cheilley myr y Balley Lannoonagh.

Carn Domhnach:
She balley er lieh-innys Inis Eoghain ayns twoaie Choontae Ghoon ny Ghoal, Nerin, eh Carn Domhnach (). T'eh ny lhie faggys da Cionn Mhálanna, y boayl smoo twoaieagh er yn ellan

Inis Eoghain:
She lieh-innys ayns Coontae Ghoon ny Ghoal, Nerin, ee Inis Eoghain (; Yernish son "Innys Eoin"). T'ee ny lieh-innys smoo er yn ellan as t'ee goaill stiagh y boayl smoo twoaieagh ayn, Cionn Mhálanna, as sheebaghyn geinnee an Lag, fir jeh ny sheebaghyn geinnee s'yrjey 'syn Oarpey. Ta Grianán an Aileach, doon reeoil va troggit ec lught Clan Uí Néill 'sy 6oo eash. Ta'n Grianán shassoo ec entreilys gys y lieh-innys.

Leffyr:
She preeu-valley Choontae Ghoon ny Ghoal, Nerin, eh Leffyr (; ). T'eh ny lhie ayns Glion Abhainn na Finne ayns shiar y choontae raad ta Abhainn na Finne çheet ry-cheilley rish an Mughdhorn. She boayl toshee Abhainn an Fheabhail t'ayn. Ta'n Strah Bane ny lhie harrish yn awin 'sy niar ayns Nerin Hwoaie as ta Leffyr kianglt rish liorish Droghad Leffyr.
Hie yn balley er ny hroggal mygeayrt cashtal va troggit ayn ec Manghus Ó Domhnaill, fer toshee Heer Chonnal (y chooid smoo jeh Coontae Ghoon ny Ghoal) 'sy 16oo eash. Haink er y valley dy ve ny valley garrastyn jeh Armee yn Vretyn Vooar derrey seyrsnys jeh'n chooid smoo jeh'n ellan 'sy vlein 1922.

Baile na nGallóglach:
She balley beg as balley eirinagh ayns twoaie Choontae Ghoon ny Ghoal, Nerin, eh Baile na nGallóglach (Yernish er son "Balley ny Goal-aeglee"; ). T'eh ny lhie çheu hwoaie veih Littyr Kennain er Cuan na Maoile Rua.

Bun an Phobail:
She balley beg as ynnyd seyrey slystagh ayns lieh-innys Inis Eoghain, twoaie Choontae Ghoon ny Ghoal, Nerin, eh Bun an Phobail (Yernish son "Bun y Phobble"; ).

Conmhaigh:
She balley beg ayns shiar Choontae Ghoon ny Ghoal, Nerin, eh Conmhaigh (). T'eh ny lhie ayns Ghlion Abhainn na Finne er awin an Daoil.
Rere coontey-pobble 'sy vlein 2011, va 1,438 deiney cummal ayn. Gollrish ram baljyn 'syn ard shoh, ta shennaghys y valley sheeyney heear gys Plandail Ulley. Ta boodeeys mestit 'sy valley as y mestey shen ry-akin ayns ny scoillyn as kialteenyn. Ta bunscoill Chatoleagh Raueagh ayn, myrane lesh bunscoill vestit. Chammah as shen, ta keeill Chatoleagh, cheeill Anglicaanagh, as keeill Heyr-Phresbyteyragh. Cha nel mean-scoillyn 'sy valley as ta ny paitçhyn goll er scoill ayns Ráth Bhoth ny Srath an Urláir.

Na Cealla Beaga:
She balley ayns sheear yiass Choontae Ghoon ny Ghoal, Nerin, ad na Cealla Beaga (Yernish son "ny Kialteenyn Beggey"; ). Ta'n balley ny phurt smoo er mooadys as ny phurt smoo scanshoil er yn ellan. T'eh ny lhie er coose yiass y choontae faggys da Doon ny Ghoal as y balley shen ny lhie çheu hiar veih na Cealla Beaga.

An Clochán Liath:
She balley Gaeltaght ayns Coontae Ghoon ny Ghoal, Nerin, eh an Clochán Liath (Yernish son "Y Claghan Lheeah"; ). T'eh ny valley smoo scanshoil ayns ard na Rosa as ny valley smoo ayns Gaeltaght Ghoon ny Ghoal.

Ráth Bhoth:
She balley ayns Coontae Ghoon ny Ghoal, Nerin, eh Ráth Bhoth (Yernish son "Rhaa Waane"; }).

Magh:
She balley beg ayns Coontae Ghoon ny Ghoal, Nerin, eh Magh (). T'eh ny hoie faggys da inver Abhainn an Fheabhail as er y joarey eddyr Pobblaght Nerin as Nerin Hwoaie. Ta Caayr Ghoirrey ny lhie beggan çheu yiass veih'n valley.

Ráth Mealtáin:
She balley ayns Coontae Ghoon ny Ghoal, Nerin, eh Ráth Mealtáin (Yernish er son "Rhaa Mealtán"; ). T'eh ny lhie 11 km çheu hwoaie veih Littyr Kennain as 4 km çheu hiar veih Baile na nGallóglach er coose heear Loch Súilí

An Baile Nua, Coontae Ghoon ny Ghoal:
She balley beg ayns Coontae Ghoon ny Ghoal, Nerin, eh an Baile Nua (Yernish son "y Balley Noa"; ). T'eh ny hoie er y raad N13 18 km çheu hiar veih Littyr Kennain as 16 km çheu heear veih Doirrey.

An Caisleán Nua, Coontae Ghoon ny Ghoal:
She balley beg as purt ayns twoaie y lieh-innys Inis Eoghain er coose hwoaie Choontae Ghoon ny Ghoal, Nerin, eh an Caisleán Nua (Yernish son "y Cashtal Noa"; ). T'eh ny hoie faggys da Bun an Phobail as mysh 32 km veih Caayr Ghoirrey.

An Fál Carrach:
She balley beg Gaeltacht as balley eirinagh er coose heear hwoaie Choontae Ghoon ny Ghoal, Nerin, eh an Fál Carrach (Yernish son "y Faal Carragh"; ). Ta'n balley ny lhie 'sy çhenn skeerey Cloch Cheann Fhaola. Ta 2,168 deiney cummal ayns ard reihyssagh an Fál Carrach as she Yernisheyryn 44% jeh pobble yn ard.

Na Gleannta:
She balley beg ayns Coontae Ghoon ny Ghoal, Nerin, ad na Gleannta (Yernish son "ny Glionteenyn"; ). Ta'n balley ny lhie raad ta daa ghlion çheet ry-cheilley, çheu heear hwoaie veih na Cruacha Gorma faggys çheet ry-cheilley daa awin.

Doirrey:
She Doirrey y nah chaayr smoo ayns Nerin Hwoaie as y kiarroo caayr smoo ayns Nerin. Ta'n fockle "Doirrey" çheet magh ass "Doire" ny "Daire" ("Darragh") yn Yernish. Va Kaart Reeoil bronnit er y chaayr ec y Ree Jamys I as va'n roie-veer "Lunnin" currit roish yn ennym 'sy Vaarle ("Londonderry"), agh she Doirrey yn ennym reiht.
Ta'n çhenn chaayr voallit ny lhie er broogh heear an Feabhal as daa ghroghad raaidey as droghad coshee goll tessen yn awin shen. Ta'n chaayr ny lhie er y daa vroogh jeh'n awin jiu (Taobh na Cathrach er y çheu heear as an tÉadan le hUisce er y çheu hiar). T'eh ny lhie faggys da'n joarey rish Coontae Ghoon ny Ghoal as she cree tarmaynagh sheear hwoaie yn ellan t'ayn eddyr Doirrey as Littyr Kennain.

Traa hashtee hollys y laa:
Ta traa hashtee hollys y laa çheet er yn aght dy vel y traa cluig currit er oaie fo oor. Ta'n aght shen lhiggey da oor bishee sollysh 'syn oie car y touree. Dy cliaghtagh, ta'n traa er ny cluig currit er oaie fo oor 'syn arragh as currit er ash 'syn 'ouyr.

Baie Ghoon ny Ghoal:
She giau ny baie er coose heear hwoaie Nerin eh Baie Ghoon ny Ghoal (; ). T'eh goll er çhemmal rish tree coondaeghyn - Coontae Ghoon ny Ghoal 'sy neear, 'sy twoaie as 'sy niar, rish Coontae Lheeahtrim 'sy niar, as rish Coontae Shliggee 'sy jiass. T'eh caglit liorish y Cheayn Sheear 'sy neear chammah. Ta'n Iascach as balley Ghoon ny Ghoal nyn lhie ec bun y vaie.
She Baie Ghoon ny Ghoal y baie smoo ayns Nerin as ta ny h-eayninyn marrey s'yrjey ayns Queiggey Ulley - Sliabh Liag - nyn lhie er coose y vaie as ad shassoo 601 m (1,972 tr) er yrjid.

Chumash:
She enmys Ewnish yn enmys Chumash ny Ḥumash (, ny ]; ny Ewdish: ) as eh çheet er y Torah 'sy chummey prentit (she Torah Sefer yn enmys ta currit er y scrolley). Ta'n fockle çheet magh ass "ḥamesh" (חמש, "queig") y Ewnish, agh she "Ḥamishah Ḥumshei Torah" ("queig queiggaghyn Torah") y lhieggan formoil. She enmys Ewnish eh er Queig Lioaryn Moses.

Cabbash vane:
She troarag "Brassica oleracea" 'sy phossan troaragagh Capitata ee cabbash vane. She "Brassica oleracea arr. capitata f. alba L." yn ennym formoil eck. Ta duillagyn glassey rea yn-ee eck, as ad ayns kione çhionn.

Cabbash veein:
She genus dy lossreeyn eh cabbash veein (oaylleeagh: Atriplex). She genus eigsoylagh t'ayn, mysh 100-200 dooie. Shimmey lus faasagh, lus slyst ny marrey as t'aynsyn. Ta dooieyn yn-ee nyn mast'oc.

Sléibhte Dhoire Bheatha:
She yn slieau-reayn smoo ayns Coontae Ghoon ny Ghoal, Nerin, Sléibhte Dhoire Bheatha (Yernish son "Sleityn Gharragh Vea"; ). Ta'n chooid smoo jeh eaghtyr y choontae jeant ass ny sleityn shoh. Ta ny sleityn scarrey ny h-ayrnyn slystagh, lheid as Gaoth Dobhair as na Gleannta, veih ny baljyn mooarey yn-çheerey, lheid as Littyr Kennain as Bealach Féich. She an Earagail y slieau s'yrjey 'sy clieau-reayn.

Ard-Sheshaght Ardjynagh Ellan Vannin:
She Ard-Sheshaght Vasoonagh ee Ard-Sheshaght Ardjynagh Ellan Vannin, as currym eck er son Masoonee Ellan Vannin. Ta'n Ard-Sheshaght fo coadey Ard-Sheshaght Unnaneyssit Hostyn.
Va'n Ard-Sheshaght currit er bun ayns 1886, dys unnaneaghey Sheshaghtyn va fo coadey aghtyn-reill ny h-Erin ny ny h-Albey. By Yn Reejerey John Senhouse Goldie-Taubman, Loayreyder y Chiare as Feed eh y chied Ard-Vainshtyr.
Ta 17 as 6 eck.

Gaoth Dobhair:
She skeerey er coose Atlantagh Choontae Ghoon ny Ghoal, Nerin, eh Gaoth Dobhair (Yernish son "Geay Doour"; ). T'eh sheeyney magh feie 28 km (16 mi) veih Mín an Chladaigh 'sy twoaie gys Croithlí 'sy jiass, as feie 14 km (9 mi) veih Dún Lúiche 'sy niar gys Machaire Chlochair 'sy neear. She fer jeh ny h-ardjyn çheerey smoo cummaltit 'syn Oarpey t'ayn as mysh 4,000 deiney cummal ayn. Ta seyrlannyn ardjynagh jeh'n çhirveish radio Yernish RTÉ Raidió na Gaeltachta soit ayn, myrane lesh campus mooie Ollooscoill Nerin, Galliu. Ta Gaoth Dobhair ny hoie fo scaa an Earagail.
Ta enney mooar er yn ard er-yn-oyr dy vel eh coontit myr crean y chultoor Yernagh, goaill stiagh shenn-chliaghtaghyn Yernagh, y chiaull hradishoonagh, y theater, ny cloiaghyn Gaelgagh as y Yernish. She ard Gaeltacht t'ayn as y chooid smoo jeh pobbyl yn ard nyn Yernisheyryn. Ta'n ennym "ny tree skeeraghyn" currit er Gaoth Dobhair as ny h-ardjyn Cloch Cheann Fhaola as na Rosa.

An Earagail:
She slieau faggys da Gaoth Dobhair, Coontae Ghoon ny Ghoal, Nerin, ee an Earagail (). T'ee shassoo 751 m (2,464 tr) er yrjid. She an Earagail y slieau s'yrjey ayns Sléibhte Dhoire Bheatha as ayns Coontae Ghoon ny Ghoal t'ayn. T'ee ny slieau smoo jiassagh, ughtagh as ard mastey reayn beg dy leityn ta goll er enney myr "na Seacht Deirfiúracha" ("ny Shiaght Shuyryn"). Ta'n reayn goaill stiagh an Mhucais, Cnoc na Leargacha, an Eachla Bheag, Ard Loch na mBreac Beadaí, an Eachla Mhór, Mac Uchta as an Earagail hene. She Mac Uchta yn slieau s'girrey da'n Earagail as ta'n ennym "an Earagail Bheag" currit er dy mennick.

Sliabh Liag:
She slieau er coose Atlantagh Choontae Ghoon ny Ghoal, Nerin, eh Sliabh Liag (Yernish son "Slieau Lhiack"; ). T'eh shassoo 601 m (1,972 tr) er yrjid as eh girree jeeragh magh veih'n 'aarkey. Rere shen, ta fir jeh ny h-eayninyn marrey s'yrjey 'syn Oarpey ayn.

Cionn Mhálanna:
Ta Cionn Mhálanna () ny hoie er Lieh-innys Inis Eoghain, Coontae Ghoon ny Ghoal, Nerin. T'eh ny voayl smoo twoaieagh er yn ellan. She "Coróin Bhanba" y kione smoo twoaieagh er y chione çheerey. Ta oik emshyraght soit er y chione as yn oik shen ymmydit ayns faaishnyssyn emshyraght lhuingys da RTÉ as da'n BBC. Ta "Coróin Bhanba" er Cionn Mhálanna soit mysh 16 km (10 mi) çheu hwoaie veih balley beg Málainn. Ta Inis Trá Tholl soit magh 'syn 'aarkey as eh soit ny s'odjey 'sy twoaie mysh 10 km çheu hiar hwoaie veih Cionn Mhálanna. Ny s'odjey 'sy twoaie, ta'n Tor Beag, y pheesh thallooin smoo twoaieagh fo reirey Nerin, ry gheddyn.

Loch Súilí:
She keyllys sailley, ny logh marrey, eh Loch Súilí (). T'eh ny lhie eddyr ny lieh-inshyn Inis Eoghain 'sy niar as Fánaid 'sy neear ayns Coontae Ghoon ny Ghoal, Nerin. Myrane lesh Loch Cairlinn as an Caoláire Rua, she fer jeh ny tree keyllyssyn sailley ayns Nerin t'ayn.
Ta Cionn Fánada as y thie sollysh ard-ghooagh echey as Cionn Dhún Damh nyn lhie ec twoaie yn logh. Ta baljyn ennagh soit er y logh, goaill stiagh Bun Cranncha er Inis Eoghain as Ráth Maoláin er y çheu heear. Ta Littyr Kennain ny lhie ec bun y logh.
Ta enney mooar er y logh er son arreydys y vea-feie (doraidyn, perkynyn, ushagyn marrey, guoiee arraghee as ollee) as y thummey sheese gys ny lhongyn brisht, goaill stiagh yn SS "Laurentic" va currit fo ushtey liorish meain ny torpaid Ghermaanagh hie fo ushtey liorish 3,211 caagyn airh. Va 3,191 caagyn jeh'n airh shen feddynit.
Va ram inshyn nyn lhie ec jiass y logh (an Bheart, an Inis, Oileán na gCoiníní as an tOileán Mór) agh car y 19oo eash va'n thalloo claddit as lhiassit er son yn eirinys. Va cleighee troggit ec colught Raad Yiarn Ghoirrey as Loch Súilí er y linney veih Doirrey gys Littyr Kennain. Ta ny thallooyn shen coontit nish myr fir jeh ny rooshyn Yernagh share er son freayltys bea-feie as arreydys ushagyn as ta ny smoo na 4,000 d'ollee chiaullee cummal ayn, myrane lesh guoiee ghlassey Ghreenlynnagh, guoiee vayrnag, guoiee ghlassey as guoiee vreckey.

Loch Feabhail:
She inver awin an Feabhal as logh marrey ayns Queiggey Ulley, Nerin, eh Loch Feabhail (). T'eh toshiaghey ec beeal an Feabhal faggys da Caayr Ghoirrey. T'eh scarrey Lieh-innys Inis Eoghain ayns Coontae Ghoon ny Ghoal as Coontae Ghoirrey ayns Nerin Hwoaie as she cooid jeh'n joarey t'ayn eddyr y Reeriaght Unnaneysit as Pobblaght Nerin. Ta'n chooid smoo jeh ny buill chummaltit soit er y çheu heear jeh'n logh, goaill stiagh Magh, Bun an Phobail as an Caisleán Nua, myrane lesh y valley beg Baile an Cheallaigh ta ny lhie er y çheu hiar ayns Coontae Ghoirrey. Ta tree awinyn mooarey roie stiagh 'sy logh: an Feabhal, Abhainn na Ró as an Fhochaine.

An Éirne:
She awin ayns sheear hwoaie Nerin ee an Éirne (). T'ee girree ayns Loch na Beithí faggys da Sraith an Domhain ayns Coontae yn Chavan as roie feie 103 km (64 mi) trooid Loch Gamhna, Loch Uachtair, Loch Éirne Eaghtyragh as Eeaghtyragh ayns Coontae 'er Managh gys y vooir faggys da Béal Átha Seanaidh ayns Coontae Ghoon ny Ghoal. Ta balley Inis Ceithleann soit, er y chooid smoo, er ellan 'syn awin eddyr y daa Loch Éirne. T'ee kianglt rish y Çhannon liorish Bollagh Ushtey yn Çhannon as an Éirne.

An Feabhal:
She awin ayns sheear hwoaie Nerin eh an Feabhal (). T'eh girree ec çheet ry-cheilley yn daa awin an Mughdhorn as Abhainn na Finne ayns Leffyr, Coontae Ghoon ny Ghoal as y Strah Bane, Coontae Heer Eoin. T'eh roie veih'n voayl shoh feie 35 km (22 mi) trooid Caayr Ghoirrey raad t'eh folmaghey stiagh ayns Loch Feabhail as, fy yerrey, y Keayn Sheear. Ta'n awin scarrey Coontae Ghoon ny Ghoal ayns Pobblaght Nerin veih coondaeghyn Ghoirrey as Heer Eoin ayns Nerin Hwoaie.

Caayl ny marrey:
She lus blaagh 'sy ghenus "Crambe" ayns Brassicaceae ee caayl ny marrey. T'ee ry-akin er slystyn marrey ny h-Oarpey eddyr yn Eearvooir as y Vooir Ghoo.
She yl-vleeantag t'ayn, as t'ee gaase wheesh as 75cm er yrdjid as 60cm er lheead. Ta duillagyn roauyr glass-ghorrym eck, as blaaghyn baney. Ta rass lomarcan gaase ayns fynneig chruinn.
Ta ny duillagyn eck yn-ee, as t'ad goll er giallaghey dy mennick do beagh ee ny s'meeney.

Stroo yn Eearvooir:
She stroo keayin Atlantagh niartal, çheh as tappee eh Stroo yn Eearvooir, myrane lesh y chrouw ta sheeyney gys yn Oarpey, y Stroo Atlantagh Hwoaie. T'eh roie rish slystyn hiar ny Steatyn Unnaneysit as Thalloo yn Eeast roish my t'eh goll tessen y Cheayn Sheear. Ta obbraid y niartee heear jannoo Stroo yn Eearvooir dy ve ny stroo siyree lesh y twoaie magh veih coose hiar America Hwoaie. Tra t'eh roshtyn , t'eh goll er rheynn magh ayns daa chrouw: ta'n chrouw hwoaie goll er oaie dys yn Oarpey Hwoaie as ta'n chrouw yiass goll er oaie gys yn Affrick Heear raad t'eh aacheayrtaghey. Ta'n Stroo cleayney emshyraght choose hiar America Hwoaie, veih Florida dys Thalloo yn Eeast, as coose heear yn Oarpey.

Pooar ushtey-lectragh:
Ta pooar ushtey-lectragh (ny niart ushtey-lectragh, bree ushtey-lectragh ny ushtey-lectraghys) çheet er y lectraghys ta goll er gientyn fo pooar yn ushtey; gientyn y lectraghys liorish forse ym-hayrnagh yn ushtey as eh tuittym ny roie. Cha nel farrane erbee elley jeh'n lectraghys yn-aanoaghey gientyn ny smoo lectraghys na'n phooar ushtey-lectragh as ee gientyn mysh 16% jeh giennaghtyn dowanagh y lectraghys - 3,427 TW·h 'sy vlein 2010, as s'liklee dy nee yn earroo shen mooadaghey fo 3.1% dagh blein car y nah 25 bleeaney elley.
Ta'n phooar ushtey-lectragh goll er gientyn ayns ny smoo na 150 çheeraghyn. Va 32% jeh ushtey-lectraghys y theihll gientit ayns ard yn Aishey as y Cheayn Sheealtagh 'sy vlein 2010. She yn Çheen y gienneyder smoo as 721 TW·h gientit ayn 'sy vlein cheddin (shen 17% jeh ymmyd lectraghys thieoil). Ta tree stashoonyn ushtey-lectragh ayn nish as ad ny smoo na 10 GW: Stangey ny Tree Braaidyn 'sy Çheen, Stangey Itaipu ta goll tessen y joarey eddyr y Vrasseel as y Pharaguay, as Stangey Guri 'sy Veneswaaley.

Báinigh:
She barranys ayns sheear yiass Choontae Ghoon ny Ghoal, Nerin, ee Báinigh (). T'ee çhemmal rish Baollaigh 'sy twoaie, rish Ráth Bhoth Theas 'sy niar hwoaie as rish Tír Aodha 'sy niar. Ta Baie Ghoon ny Ghoal ny lhie 'sy jiass as y Keayn Sheear 'sy neear. Ta ram baljyn as baljyn beggey ayn 'sy varranys, goaill stiagh Ard an Rátha, na Cealla Beaga, an Charraig, Cill Charthaigh, Doon ny Ghoal, Dún Cionnaola, na Frosa, Gleann Cholm Cille, Inbhear, Tamhnach an tSalainn as Teileann. She ard sleitagh t'ayn as y chooid smoo jeh fo scaa na Cruacha Gorma as sleityn as eayninyn ardjey, goaill stiagh Sliabh Liag, ry-gheddyn 'sy varranys. 'Sy vlein 2011 va mysh 16,000 deiney cummal 'sy varranys.

Cuan na Maoile Rua:
She baie as logh marrey er coose hwoaie Choontae Ghoon ny Ghoal, Nerin, eh Cuan na Maoile Rua (Yernish son "Cooan y Veayll Ruy"; ). She fer jeh ny gulladyn marrey s'lhoobagh ayns Nerin t'ayn. T'eh mysh 12 km er lhiurid as eh roie my hwoaie gys y jiass. She baie cadjin yn entreilys, agh t'eh foshley rish ammyr cheayl ta 10 km er lhiurid. Cha nee lheead cheddin ec yn ammyr shoh. Keayrtyn cha nel ee agh 100-150 m er lheead, raad ta ny strooyn roie cha tappee as 3-5 mooir-veeilaghyn 'syn oor. Keayrtyn elley t'ee cha lhean as 2.5 km. Ny baljyn as baljyn beggey er y logh, t'ad goaill stiagh Baile na nGallóglach, an Cheathrú Chaol as Creamhghort.

Novak Đoković:
Ta Novak Đoković (Новак Ђоковић; ) ny leddogeyr keirdey Serbagh. Rug eh ayns Belgraaid, yn Yugoslaavey (y Serb 'sy laa t'ain), er 22 Boaldyn 1987.

Roger Federer:
Ta Roger Federer ny leddogeyr keirdey Elveeishagh. Rug eh ayns Basel, yn Elveeish, er 8 Luanistyn 1981.

Baollaigh:
She barranys ayns sheear Choontae Ghoon ny Ghoal, Nerin, ee Baollaigh (). T'ee çhemmal rish Báinigh 'sy jiass, rish Ráth Bhoth Theas 'sy niar as rish Cill Mhic Réanáin 'sy twoaie. Ta'n Keayn Sheear 'sy neear. Ny baljyn as ny baljyn beggey smoo scanshoil t'ayn, t'ad goaill stiagh Anagaire, Aillt an Chorráin, an Dúchoraidh, an Clochán Liath, na Gleannta, Cill Riáin, Leitir Mhic an Bhaird, Port Nua as Rann na Feirste. Ta'n ellan mooar Aran Vooar soit 'sy varranys chammah.

Cill Mhic Réanáin (barranys):
She barranys ayns sheear hwoaie Choontae Ghoon ny Ghoal, Nerin, ee Cill Mhic Réanáin ny Cill Mhic Néanáin (). T'ee çhemmal rish Baollaigh 'sy neear as 'sy neear yiass, rish Ráth Bhoth Theas 'sy jiass as rish Ráth Bhoth Thuaidh 'sy niar yiass. T'ee caglit liorish Loch Súilí 'sy niar, as rish y Cheayn Sheear 'sy twoaie. T'ee goaill stiagh yn ellan Toraigh. Ny baljyn as ny baljyn beggey smoo scanshoil, t'ad goaill stiagh Baile na nGallóglach, an Bun Beag, Carraig Airt, an Cheathrú Chaol, Cill Mhic Réanáin, an Craoslach, Doirí Beaga, Dún Fionnachaidh, an Fál Carrach, Gort an Choirce, Littyr Kennain, Mín Lárach, Ráth Maoláin as Ráth Mealtain.

Ráth Bhoth Theas:
She barranys ayns shiar yiass Choontae Ghoon ny Ghoal, Nerin, eh Ráth Bhoth Theas (). T'eh çhemmal rish Baollaigh 'sy neear yiass, rish Baollaigh 'sy neear, rish Cill Mhic Réanáin 'sy twoaie, rish Ráth Bhoth Thuaidh 'sy niar hwoaie as rish y Strah Bane Eeaghtyragh as an Ómaigh Thiar ayns Coontae Heer Eoin 'sy niar as 'sy jiass er lheh. Ny baljyn as ny baljyn beggey smoo scanshoil, t'ad goaill stiagh Bealach Féich, Srath an Urláir, Caisleán na Finne, Conmhaigh as Cúil na gCuirridín.

Ráth Bhoth Thuaidh:
She barranys ayns shiar yiass Choontae Ghoon ny Ghoal, Nerin, eh Ráth Bhoth Thuaidh (). T'eh çhemmal rish Ráth Bhoth Theas 'sy jiass as 'sy neear yiass, rish Cill Mhic Réanáin 'sy neear, rish Inis Eoghain Thiar 'sy niar hwoaie as rish y Strah Bane Eeaghtyragh ayns Coontae Heer Eoin 'sy niar. Ta coose beg ec y varranys 'sy twoaie er Loch Súilí. Ny baljyn as ny baljyn beggey smoo scanshoil, t'ad goaill stiagh an Baile Nua, Baile Suingean, an Carraigín, Cúl Droma, Leffyr, Mainéar Uí Chuinneagáin as Ráth Bhoth.

Inis Eoghain Thiar:
She barranys er lieh-innys Inis Eoghain ayns twoaie Choontae Ghoon ny Ghoal, Nerin, ee Inis Eoghain Thiar (). T'ee çhemmal rish Ráth Bhoth Thuaidh 'sy neear yiass, rish Inis Eoghain Thoir 'sy twoaie as 'sy niar hwoaie, as rish Reamyssyn Heear Hwoaie Ghoirrey ayns Coontae Ghoirrey 'sy niar yiass. Myrane lesh ny joaraghyn thallooin shen, ta coose ec y varranys rish Loch Súilí 'sy neear as rish Loch Feabhail 'sy niar. Ny baljyn as ny baljyn beggey smoo scanshoil, t'ad goaill stiagh Bun Cranncha, Bun na hAbhann, Ceann an Droichid, Fathain, as Magh.

Inis Eoghain Thoir:
She barranys er lieh-innys Inis Eoghain ayns twoaie Choontae Ghoon ny Ghoal, Nerin, ee Inis Eoghain Thoir (). T'ee çhemmal rish Inis Eoghain Thiar 'sy jiass as 'sy neear yiass. Myrane lesh y joarey thallooin shen, ta coose ec y varranys rish Loch Súilí 'sy neear, rish y Cheayn Sheear 'sy twoaie as rish Loch Feabhail 'sy niar. Ny baljyn as ny baljyn beggey smoo scanshoil, t'ad goaill stiagh Baile Lifín, Bun an Phobail, an Caisleán Nua, Carn Domhnach, Cluain Maine, Cúil Dabhcha, Gleann Daoile as Málainn.

Tír Aodha:
She barranys ayns jiass Choontae Ghoon ny Ghoal, Nerin, ee Tír Aodha (). T'ee çhemmal rish Báinigh 'sy neear hwoaie, rish Ráth Bhoth Theas 'sy niar hwoaie, rish an Ómaigh Thiar ayns Coontae Heer Eoin 'sy niar, rish Lorg as an Machaire Buí ayns Coontae 'er Managh 'sy niar as 'sy niar yiass, as rish Ros Clochair ayns Coontae Lheeahtrim 'sy jiass. Myrane lesh ny joaraghyn thallooin shen, ta coose ec y varranys rish Baie Ghoon ny Ghoal, cooid jeh'n Cheayn Sheear, 'sy neear. Ny baljyn as ny baljyn beggey smoo scanshoil, t'ad goaill stiagh Baile an tSratha, Béal Átha Seanaidh, Bun Dobhráin, Doon ny Ghoal, an Lathaigh as Paiteagó.

Doon ny Ghoal Hiar Hwoaie (rheynn-reihys Dáil Éireann):
She rheynn-reihys er son Dáil Éireann, y çhamyr s'inshley ayns Parlamaid Nerin eh Doon ny Ghoal Hiar Hwoaie (; ). Ta 3 Teachtaí Dála ("Çhaghteryn y Whaiyl"; TD myr aagherrid) goll er reih ayn. T'ad Charlie McConalogue (FF), Joe McHugh (FG) as Pádraig Mac Lochlainn (SF) ny TDyn ec y traa t'ayn.

Gleann Cholm Cille:
She slyst er coose heear yiass Choontae Ghoon ny Ghoal, Nerin, eh Gleann Cholm Cille (Yernish er son "Glion Cholum Keeilley"; ). Ga dy nee boodeeys Yernisheyryn t'ayn, cha nel y çhengey goll er ymmyd myr çhengey phobble agh ec 34% jeh pobbyl y lyst, rere coontey-pobble 'sy vlein 2002. She an Caiseal y balley beg smoo 'sy clyst.

Cill Charthaigh:
She balley beg er coose heear yiass Choontae Ghoon ny Ghoal, Nerin, eh Cill Charthaigh (). Ta keeill Chatoleagh, daa hie grease feederaght, kuse veg dy happyn as kiare thieyn oast 'sy valley beg. She Yernisheyryn mysh 22% jeh pobbyl y valley beg.

An Charraig, Coontae Ghoon ny Ghoal:
She balley beg er coose heear yiass Choontae Ghoon ny Ghoal, Nerin, ee an Charraig (Yernish er son "y Charrick"; ).

Dún Cionnaola:
She balley beg ayns jiass Choontae Ghoon ny Ghoal, Nerin, eh Dún Cionnaola (). T'eh ny lhie 18 km (11 mi) çheu heear veih balley Ghoon ny Ghoal as 10 km (6 mi) çheu hiar veih na Cealla Beaga er yn N56. Cha nel agh un traid roie trooid y valley beg as mysh 300 deiney cummal ayn.

Na Frosa:
She balley beg ayns jiass Choontae Ghoon ny Ghoal, Nerin, ad na Frosa (). T'eh ny lhie mysh 11 km (7 mi) çheu heear veih balley Ghoon ny Ghoal er y raad R262.

Inbhear:
She balley beg ayns jiass Choontae Ghoon ny Ghoal, Nerin, eh Inbhear (Yernish son "Inver"; ). T'eh ny lhie er y raad N56 lieh-vollagh eddyr na Cealla Beaga 'sy neear as balley Ghoon ny Ghoal 'sy niar.

Teileann:
She balley beg Gaeltacht er coose yiass Choontae Ghoon ny Ghoal, Nerin, eh Teileann (). T'eh ny lhie ec bun Sliabh Liag faggys da'n Charraig. By phurt scanshoil y balley beg foddey er dy henney, agh cha nel ee cha scanshoil jiu as myr v'ee roish shoh.

Tamhnach an tSalainn:
She balley beg ayns jiass Choontae Ghoon ny Ghoal, Nerin, ee Tamhnach an tSalainn ny Moin Séarlas keayrtyn (Yernish son "Taauenagh y Tollan"; , ny dy shenndeeagh). T'eh ny lhie er y raad N56 mysh 6 km çheu heear veih balley Ghoon ny Ghoal.

Barranys:
She rheynn çheerey nagh vel cha scanshoil as coontae ayns Nalbin, Nerin as ayrnyn Hostyn eh barranys. She remlad veih ny mean-eashyn eh barranys as eh cur er cooinaghtyn dy row yn thalloo shen goll er reirey ec barran foddey er dy henney. Ansherbee, cosoylagh rish coondaeghyn, cha nel y kiangley shen foast er mayrn. Va'n corys reiree shen dollit magh ayns Sostyn 'sy vlein 1660, as, choud's ta'n corys ayn ny smoo cast, hie yn corys barranys er ny gholley magh 'sy 21h eash.

Pairk Bee Vannin:
She ynnyd obbree as aarlee bee ec Close Raad y Wyllin ayns Purt ny h-Inshey eh Pairk Bee Vannin. 
Ta shalee aavioghee tree-cheimagh ayn, fo stiurey y Rheynn Lhiasaghey Tarmaynagh as Rheynn Çhymmyltaght, Bee as Eirinys. Ren Flah Vretin as Bendiuic roostey leac ec toshiaght ny shalee ayns Averil 2012.
Ta costys mysh £3m rish 5 bleeantyn ec yn çhalee. 
'Sy chied cheim, ayns 2012, hrog ad cleigh-shickyrys as giatyn noa, as daachroo ad yn ynnyd-pumpal myr thie seyraadjagh. Hug Tinvaal £365,000 er son yn obbyr. Ta'n nah cheim bentyn rish shareaghey bun-troggalys as shirveishyn, as troggal thieyn-jantys noa, ry-chooilleeney roish jerrey 2013. Ta treoo cheim ry-heet croghey er troggal ny smoo thieyn-jantys ayns 2014. Er lhieu dy vees 150 staartaghyn ry-gheddyn ass yn obbyr. T'ad jerkal rish ny colughtyn-dellal hene argid y chur er son y cheim.
Va accanyn ayn, goaill stiagh barel Barrantagh Phurt ny h-Inshey, nagh row y chied cheim troggit dy kiart, as dy beagh ad jummal argid keesh bentyn rish reagheydys ny shalee.

Lus ny greg:
She oltey ynrican y ghenus "Crithmum" ee Lus ny greg (Crithmum maritimum). Ta ny h-enmyn cabbash varrey as cabbash hraie currit urree myrgeddin, agh ta keayllyn elley ocsyn neesht.
She lus yn-ee t'ayn, as ish ry-akin er slystyn marrey ny h-Oarpey heear, 'syn Affrick Hwoaie, ny h-Ellanyn Canaaragh as yn Vooir Ghoo.
Shennaghys.
Ren Shakespeare çheet er çhaglym lus ny greg, ny keird ghaueagh. 'Syn 19oo eash, hug ad lhieu mullagyn jee voish Ellan Eeaght dys Lunnin rish jerrey Mee Vayrnt. Hroar ad lus ny grey ayns garaghyn. Ta'n ghass, ny duillagyn as fynneigyn yn-ee, aarlit ny aw myr glassan.

Cabbash varrey:
Ta'n ennym cabbash hraie çheet er daa ghooie yn-ee:

Cabbash hraie:
Ta'n ennym cabbash hraie çheet er daa ghooie yn-ee:

Salicornia europaea:
She lus sheer-vio ee cabbash varrey (Salicornia europaea ). T'ee gaase ayns boglee varrey. Va ymmyd jeant jee dys jannoo glenney as sheeabin roish y 19oo eash, tra haink rish obbraghey LeBlanc. Ta gass as duillagyn yn-ee eck myrgeddin.
Aght aarlee.
Ta cabbash varrey goll er broie ny gaalaghey son y chooid smoo. Er coontey'n chooid ard sailjey eck, cha lhisagh oo cur stiagh sollan elley, as ta feme urree er ram ushtey. Ta cree ny gish creoi as reenagh, agh s'aashaghey eh yn 'eill y hayrn jee lurg broie. Ta'n 'eill gollrish famlagh ny lus ny sooghid. 

Queiggey:
She rheynn thallooin ta goll er ymmyd er y chooid smoo myr aarheynn reiragh çheerey ny steat eh queiggey. S'liklee dy daink y fockle magh ass "cóiced" y Çhenn Yernish ny "cúige" y Yernish (; "queiggoo" ny "queiggey"). Roish çheet ny Normanee 'sy 12oo eash va Nerin goll er rheynn magh ayns queig rheynnyn, ny reeriaghtyn, myr Connaghtey (), Lion (), Ullee (), y Vee () as y Vooan (). Jiu, ga nagh vel agh kiare queiggey goll er mayrn ayns Nerin (va'n Vee currit stiagh fo reirey Lion), ta'n enmys "cúige" foast goll er ymmyd myr cur sheese er ny h-aarheynnyn çheerey ayn.
Cha nel çhyndaa ayn ayns çhengaghyn elley jeh'n theihll, agh she yn fockle by niessey da'n 'ockle Gaelgagh t'ain na fockle haink magh ass y Ladjyn. Ta'n fockle shen foast goll er ymmyd ayns ram çheeraghyn ayns caghlaa dy hyndaaghyn: "province" y Vaarle as y Rangish, y Ghermaanish, y Spaainish, y Phortiugish, ("provintsia") y Rooshish, a.m.s. Ta'n fockle "queiggey" goll er ymmyd jiu myr cur sheese er rheynnyn thallooin ayns çheeraghyn elley nagh row cleayney Raueagh ny Celtiagh oc, myr ("wilaya") yn Arabish, ("oblast’") y Rooshish, as myr shen.

Gorzów Wielkopolski:
She caayr ayns Queiggey Lubusz ayns sheear y Pholynn eh Zielona Góra (; aaghirrit myr "Gorzów Wlkp."; ). 'Sy vlein 2012 va 124,470 deiney cummal 'sy chaayr. T'eh ny chaayr smoo ayns Queiggey Lubusz as t'eh goll er coontey myr fer jeh'n daa phreeu-valley 'sy wheiggey (she Zielona Góra yn fer elley). By phreeu-valley er Queiggey Gorzów eddyr ny bleeantyn 1975 as 1998 eh. T'eh ny lhie er yn awin Warta.

Opole:
She caayr ayns Queiggey Opole ayns jiass y Pholynn eh Opole (; , Germaanish Hileeshagh: "Uppeln", ). T'eh ny lhie er yn awin Odra.

Serbish:
She fer jeh abbyrtyn y Terbo-Chroitish ee yn Terbish ( ny ). T'ee goll er loayrt ec ny Serbee ayns Bosnia as Herzegovina (ayns Pobblaght Srpska er y chooid smoo), ayns Montenegro, 'sy Chroit as ayns Pobblaght ny Massadoan. She çhengey oikoil ee 'sy Terb as fer jeh ny çhengaghyn oikoil ayns Bosnia as Herzegovina.

Thalloo yn Eeast:
She ellan mooar magh veih coose hiar y Chanadey ee Thalloo yn Eeast. Ta'n ellan ny chooid smoo cummaltit jeh'n wheiggey Thalloo yn Eeast as Labrador. By eh "Thalloo yn Eeast" yn ennym va currit er y lane wheiggey roish y vlein 2001 tra v'eh ceaghlit. Ta'n ellan 108,860 km2 (42,031 mi ker) er eaghtyr as, rere shen, t'eh ny 16oo ellan smoo er y theihll. She Balley Eoin er coose hiar yiass yn ellan y balley smoo er yn ellan as preeu-valley yn wheiggey. Ta begnagh lieh-villioon dy leih cummal er yn ellan as un wheiggoo jeu cummal ayns Balley Eoin.
Va'n ellan feddynit magh ec ny h-Oarpee da'n chied cheayrt ec y Wiggynagh Eeslynnagh Leif Eriksson 'sy 11d eash. Ren eshyn as e lught troailtagh cur yn ennym "Vinland" er y çheer noa. By ad ny h-eeasteyryn Frangagh, Spaainagh, Bascagh as Portiugagh ny chied cheayrtee elley hie gys yn ellan. Ren yn Iddaalagh John Cabot (Giovanni Caboto), va gobbraghey er conaant fo Ree Inry VII Hostyn, çheet gys yn ellan 'sy vlein 1497. Ren ny ronseyderyn Portiugagh Gaspar Corte-Real as e vraar Miguel Corte-Real tayrn kaart jeh peesh jeh coose yn ellan 'sy vlein 1501. Agh by eh yn tarlheim ec Cabot yn aght smoo scanshoil ayns shennaghys noa-emshyragh yn ellan er-yn-oyr dy vel yn aght shen coontit myr bunneeaght yn Impiraght Ghoaldagh. Va'n nhee shen shickyrit 'sy vlein 1583 tra ren Humphrey Gilbert cur greim er yn ellan myr y chied choloin harrish mooir fo Kaart Reeoil y Venrein Ealisaid I Hostyn.
Ennym yn ellan.
Er coontey ny boodeeyssyn anchasley ren çheet gys yn ellan, t'eh goll er enney fo ram enmyn ayns ny çhengaghyn shen. Ta ny Yernee cur er as ta ny h-Albinee cur er. Ta'n cheeall cheddin ec y daa ennym shen myr t'ayn 'sy Ghaelg. Ta daa ennym elley ec ny h-Albinee er yn ellan: ("Ellan ny Boiddee") as ("y Thalloo Oor"). Ta'n lught Baarlagh cur ("y Thalloo Noa-feddynit") er, as ta ny Frangisheyryn cur ("y Thalloo Noa") er. Ta ny Bascee cur er as eh shen çheet magh ass "Terra Nova" y Ladjyn as ny çhengaghyn gollrhee. Ta'n lught Mi'kmaq cur "Taqamkuk" er yn ellan.

An Leadhb Gharbh:
She balley beg Gaeltacht er Aran Vooar magh veih coose heear Choontae Ghoon ny Ghoal, Nerin, ee an Leadhb Gharbh (). Ta shirveish baatey assaig kiangley yn balley beg rish Ailt an Chorráin er y çheer vooar. Ta oik postagh, mean-scoill, purt yn ellan ny lhie 'sy valley beg. Myrane lesh shen, ta thie bee, shamyr gammanyn, as ram thieyn lhionney ayn.

Ellanyn Vooir Eeaght:
She ellanragh magh veih coose hwoaie y Rank ayns Mooir yn Eeaght ad Ellanyn Vooir Eeaght (; ny ; Normanish: "Îles d'la Manche"). She Croghaneyn-crooin t'ayndaue. T'ad goll er rheynn magh ayns daa vayleeaght: Bayleeaght Ghuernsey as Bayleeaght Yersee. She remladyn Yiucaght ny Norman t'ayn as cha nee cooid jeh'n Reeriaght Unnaneysit ad. Ta mysh 168,000 deiney cummal ayn as ta 16,488 as 28,310 deiney cummal ayns ny preeu-valjyn er lheh oc, Saint Peter Port as Saint Helier. Ta ny h-ellanyn 194 km² er eaghtyr.
Çheer-oaylleeaght.
T'ad ny hoght ellanyn beayn-chummaltit na: 
Ta dagh fer jeu, goaill magh Jersey, fo reirey Vayleeaght Ghuernsey.
Ta shey ellanyn beggey neu-chummaltit ayn chammah.
Kiare jeu fo reirey Vayleeaght Yersee:
Daa jeu ny lhie magh veih coose Alderney:
Dy cadjin ta'n veer yerree "-ey" currit er ny h-ellanyn mooarey, as ta'n veer yerree "-hou" currit er ny h-ellanyn beggey; t'eh goll er credjal dy daink ad magh as "ey" as "holmr" y Çhenn Loghlynish.
Ny h-Ellanyn Chausey çheu yiass veih Jersee, cha nel ad coontit dy cadjin ayns cur sheese çheer-oaylleeagh Ellanyn Vooir Eeaght agh ta'n enmys "Ellanyn Vooir Eeaght y Rank" currit orroo dy mennick er yn oyr dy vel ad nyn lhie eddyr Ellanyn Vooir Eeaght as y vooar-heer Rangagh agh fo reirey yn Rank. By chooid jeh Diucaght ny Norman ad foddey er-dy-henney agh she thalloo Rangagh t'ayndaue jiu.
Ayns Frangish Yersee she "Îles de la Manche" yn ennym ta currit orroo, agh 'sy Rank hene she "Îles Anglo-normandes" ("ny h-Ellanyn Anglo-Normanagh") yn ennym ta currit orroo.

Rumex:
She genus dy lossreeyn eh Rumex. Ta mysh 200 'sy ghenus; ta kuse jeu cadjin 'sy lieh-chruinney hwoaie, as nyn sarkil ny keayrtyn. Ta'n ennym cadjin cabbag er dooieyn Goaldagh, agh t'eh çheet er lossreeyn elley ny keayrtyn gyn kiangley erbee rish "Rumex".
Coontey.
She lossreeyn jeeragh t'ayn, as bun-fraueyn liauyrey oc son y chooid smoo. Ta duillagyn ayns cummey roseag rish y 'raue, as dy mennick nagh vel ad casley rish ny duillagyn s'yrjey. Ta oirr rea ny tonnagh oc; ta stipule ec kuse jeu.
Ta blaaghyn neuvaghtal oc ayns dhossan liauyr ec kione gass. T'ad geayney dy cadjin, agh ta blaaghyn as gish vlaa jiarg ec shiartanse dy ghooieyn. T'ad daa-ghooghyssagh son y chooid smoo. She tree-eaghtyragh ee y rass, as moyl beg er dagh eaghtyr dy mennick.
Ymmyd.
Ta duillagyn yn-ee ec kuse jeu, as ta ymmodee praddagyn beaghey orroo. Ta sleih dyn ee myr glasserey as ayns puiddin, ny jannoo jough assdaue.
Ta tanneen as geayr oscalagh ayns ny duillagyn oc, as myr shen t'ad castagh. 
Ta ymmyd jeant jeu 'syn Oarpey Heear noi guinney undaagee.

Ooh:
Shymmey keeall t'ayn ec yn 'ockle ooh. 

Ooh (bee):
Ta oohyn goll er nyn mrey ec ram dooieyn eigsoylagh, goaill stiagh ushagyn, beishteigyn, daa-veaghee, as eeastyn. She sorçh bee t'ayn as ad er ny ve eeit ec deiney feie thousaneyn dy vleeantyn. Ta oohyn ushagyn as beishteigyn jeant ass bleayst coadee, fynnican, as bwinnican, as ad castit liorish strebbinyn keylley eigsoylagh. She oohyn kirkey, thunnag, quayl, oghyr as oghyr reeoil ny h-oohyn smoo eeit, agh she oohyn kirkey ny h-oohyn smoo cadjin.
She tashtey mooar jeh'n phroteen as jeh'n choleen ad oohyn as t'ad goll er ymmyd dy mennick 'sy choagyraght. Er coontey hasht y phroteen t'ayndaue, ta oohyn coontit dy mennick myr sorçh foalley ayns Pyramidyn Bee Stiuree. Ansherbee, gyn bwooise da'n leagh beaghee t'ayn ayns oohyn, shymmey keishtyn slaynt t'ayn bentyn rish qualleeaght, stoyral, as troarey oohyn as allerjeeyn er lheh.

Bainney:
She ushlagh bane as troar veih fairaigyn keeaghagh ny sheeintee eh bainney. She bun-arrane y veaghey da sheeintee aegey roish my t'ad jargal sorçhyn elley jeh'n vee y lheie. Ta'n leah-vluightys cummal bainney nooys as eh gymmyrkey noi-chorpeenyn ny mayrey gys y lhiannoo as t'eh cur streean er jargaght ram sorçhyn dy ghorlaghyn 'sy lhiannoo.
Myr troar eirinagh, ta bainney tayrnit magh ass sheeintee as ymmydit myr sorçh bee da deiney. 'Sy vlein 2011 ren gowaltyssyn bainney er feie yn dowan troarey mysh 730 millioon thunnaghyn dy vainney. She yn Injey y troareyr as y ceaueyder smoo jeh'n vainney, agh cha nel y bainney 'syn Injey goll er ymphurtal ny assphurtal. T'ad y Teelynn Noa, yn Unnaneys Oarpagh, yn Austrail as ny Steatyn Unnaneysit ny h-assphurteyderyn smoo as t'ad y Roosh as y Çheen ny h-ymphurteyderyn smoo.

Rolley scoillyn ayns Mannin:
Shoh rolley ny scoillyn ayns Mannin. Ta'n rolley goaill stiagh scoillyn fo currym ny ta feddyn argid veih'n Rheynn Ynsee as scoillyn neuchrogheydagh.

Bunscoill Anagh Coar:
She bunscoill ayns Doolish, Mannin, ee Bunscoill Anagh Coar (). Va'n scoill currit er bun 'sy vlein 1976 as jiu ta 117 scollag ayn.

Cabbag aalin:
She lus yn-ee slyst ny marrey ee cabbag aalin (Plantago maritima). T'ee ry-akin er feie ny cruinney ayns ardjyn tempreilagh as Arctagh, goaill stiagh yn Oarpey, yn Affrick heear-hwoaie, yn Aishey hwoaie as veanagh, America Hwoaie hwoaie as America Yiass yiass.
Jalloo-oaylleeaght.
She lus sheer-vio lussagh t'ayn, as ny duillagyn eck gyn gish as ayns cummey roseag. Ta ny duillagyn hene linnagh, mysh 2-22cm er lhiurid, 1cm er lheead as roauyr. Ta oirr rea ny faggys-rea oc, as tree dys queig cuishlinyn ry-akin. Ta blaaghyn geayney beggey eck, as ad soit gyn cass ayns crouw-vlaaghey wheesh as 10cm er lhiurid er gass 3-20 er yrjid.
Eggoaylleeaght.
T'ee gaase er slystyn marrey son y chooid smoo, agh ayns buill er lheh t'ee ry-akin rish strooanyn slieau. Ta'n soe eck caghlaa rere cochruinnaghey daa-ocseed carboan 'syn aer. 

Ardjyn Phobblaght Nerin:
Ta Nerin goll er rheynn magh ayns hoght ardjyn ec keim III fo'n skeim NUTS. Va'n skeim shen currit stiagh ayns bree 'sy vlein 1994.

Ooig:
Ta'n fockle ooig çheet er feaynid vooar fo-halloo as ee cha mooar as t'ee lhiggey da deiney goll stiagh. Ta ooigyn goll er kiaddey liorish emshyraghey y chlagh as s'mennick t'ad sheeyney foddey er diunid fo'n thalloo. Ta'n fockle shen ymmydit chammah da ooigyn marrey as fasteeyn creggey.
T'eh er ooley nagh vel ooigyn goll ny s'odjey na 3,000 meaderyn er diunid er-yn-oyr dy nee trimmid y chlagh erskyn yn ooigyn broojey sheese. Ta diunid ooigyn karst croghey er bun y "karstovaniya" (y joarey eddyr ny h-obbraidyn ta cowraghey yn karst rish y chlagh eayil vunneydagh).
She ooig-oaylleeaght yn fockle ta currit er ronsaghey magh, as studeyryssyn ta jeant er, ooigyn.

Cabbag lhean:
She lus sheer-vio ny h-Oarpey ee cabbag lhean (Rumex obtusifolius), as ish mie er enney myr noi-castey noi guinney undaagee. T'ee ny sarkyl ayns ardjyn. Dy cadjin, ta'n ennym cadjin cabbag çheet er y dooie mie er enney shoh.
Jalloo-oaylleeaght.
Ta cabbag lhean ry-enney er coontey ny duillagyn eck. T'ad wheesh as 12" er lhiurid as 6" er lheead, ga nagh roshys y lus hene erskyn 18" er yrjid, as t'ad gaase ayns cummey roseag. Ta'n oirr oc neurea dy pontreilagh, as myr shen ta jeeagh tonnagh echey. Ta er ny gish eck.
Ta'n blaa eck gaase myr crouw-vlaaghey geayney ta jiargaghey rish appaghey. Ta ny crouwyn-blaaghey gaase er gass lomarcan, eddyr Mean Souree as Mean Fouyir. Ta rassyn dhone-jiarg eck.
Ymmyd.
Ymmyd lheeys.
Ta ram ymmyd jeant jeh cabbag lhean noi gorley crackanagh myr jough ny glabbag, goaill stiagh askaidyn, brooan, jeirr, çhing aile, çhingys king as çhingys y ree. Chammah's lheeys hene, va sleih Anglia Hiar kiangley fraue cabbag lhean er y 'leeast noi çhingys craaee, as Yernee kiangley rassyn cabbag lhean er arm hoshtal mraane noi shastaght.
Ymmyd elley.
Chammah's y bree lheeys eck, ren Yernee ymmyd jeh cabbag myr aght fadeyragh: va caillin cuirrey ny rassyn leah 'sy voghrey, as lhisagh ee fakin y dooinney vees eck as eshyn buinn.
Va eirinee cliaghtey soailley eeym ayns duillagyn cabbag, ny dooieyn "Rumex" elley as duillagyn mooarey oc.
Sarkyl.
T'ad coontey cabbag lhean myr sarkyl 'syn RU rere Weeds Act 1959, as ayns Loghyn Mooarey America Hwoaie. T'ee beggan nieunagh, as foddee ee cur çhingys er sthock. S'doillee eh y lus y scryssey. Ta bun-fraue dowin eck, wheesh as 5 trieyn er diunid. Ta ny rassyn skianagh, as t'ad skeaylley rish foddey er y gheay ny 'syn ushtey, ny greimmey fynney beiyn. Foddee ad tannaghtyn bio rish bleeantyn roish my aasee ad.
T'ad lhiettal y lus liorish traaue as freayll y thalloo çhirrym dy liooar.

Quasar:
She çheshvean co-rollageyssagh bio feer breeoil as foddey j'in eh quasar (veih quasi-stellar radio source y Vaarle, ny "farrane radio lieh-rollageagh" 'sy Ghaelg). S'reddyn feer hoilsheanagh ad as ad currit er enney da'n chied cheayrt myr farraneyn jiarg-arree jeh'n vree lectro-vagnaidagh, goaill stiagh tonnyn radio as y sollys fakinagh. V'eh credjit dy nee poyntyn cosoylagh rish rollageyn, agh t'eh er credjal nish dy nee farraneyn sheeynt ad gollrish co-rollageyssyn.
Ga dy row arganyssyn ayn mychione troyn ny reddyn shoh cha jeianagh as ny 1980yn leah, ta co-choardailys oaylleeagh ayn nish dy nee ardjyn cumir ayns çheshvean cho-rollageys feer vooar ta cruinnaghey yn towl doo feer vooar echeysyn. Ta'n mooadys oc harrish er 10-10,000 keayrtyn ny smoo na craue raadeeoil Schwarschild yn towl doo. Ta'n quasar geddyn pooar veih'n jysk skeaylt ta cruinlaghey yn towl doo.

Weeds Act 1959:
She Slattys Parlamaid y Reeriaght Unnaneysit eh yn Weeds Act 1959 ("7 & 8 Eliz. II" c. 54) (Gaelg: "Slattys ny Sarkil 1959"), as eh bentyn rish smaghtaghey ymmodee sarkil 'sy Reeriaght Unnaneysit.
Ta'n slattys bentyn rish smaghtaghey cabbag lhean, cushag wuigh, onnane veg, cabbag chast as onnane 'irryn. T'eh lhiggey da'n Screeudeyr Steat son Çhymbyllaght, Bee as Cooishyn Çheerey, y Screeudeyr Steat ny ynnydagh echey curmal obbyr noi sarkil er thalloo preevaadjagh. Mannagh vel y shellooder cur biallys da'n oardagh, ta ooley wheesh as £1000 ry-chreck as kerraghey elley ry-hurranse.

Ewnyn:
She ashoon as possan kynneeagh-crauee ad ny h-Ewnyn (, "Yehudim"). She ny h-Israeliteyn ny ny Hebrewnyn y bun-phossan oc. Ta kiangley mooar eddyr y chynneeys, yn ashoonaght as y chraueeaght Ewagh er yn oyr dy nee yn Ewaghys craueeaght hradishoonagh ny h-Ewnyn. Ta mysh 13.7 millioon dy Ewnyn ayn 'sy theihll jiu, agh roish y Nah Chaggey Dowanagh v'eh er ooley dy row mysh 15 millioonyn dy Ewnyn ayn. Hooar shey millioon dy Ewnyn baase car y lhing shen ayns taghyrt ta goll er enney fo'n ennym "yn Deherree". Ta 42.5% jeh Ewnyn y theihll cummal ayns Israel, 39.3% ayns ny Steatyn Unnaneysit, 1.5 villioon 'syn Oarpey as mysh 400,000 'sy Chanadey.

John Phillips (aspick):
She Aspick Anglicaanagh Sodor as Mannin eddyr ny bleeantyn 1604/1605 as 1633 va John Phillips (m. 1555 - 7 Luanistyn 1633). Ta enney mooar er Phillips er-yn-oyr dy nee eshyn ren screeu sheese yn Ghaelg.
Seihll aeg.
Rug Phillips ayns Bretyn Hwoaie as hie eh er n'ynsaghey ayns St Mary Hall, Aah yn Ollee. Hooar eh B.A. 'sy vlein 1579 as M.A. 'sy vlein 1584.
Coorse-bea.
'Sy vlein 1579 haink er dy ve ny phesson er Sessay ayns Treen Hwoaie Yorkshire as 'sy vlein 1583 haink er dy ve ny phesson er Thorpe Bassett ayns Treen Hiar Yorkshire. V'eh currit ayns oardreilys myr Ard-Jaghin Vannin 'sy vlein 1587 as pointit myr pesson er Andreas. 'Sy vlein 1590 v'eh pointit myr çhaplyn da Inry Stanlagh, 4oo Eearley Derby. V'eh pointit myr pesson er Slingsby ayns Treen Hwoaie Yorkshire 'sy vlein 1591 as 'sy vlein 1601 v'eh pointit myr Ard-Jaghin Cleveland. 'Sy vlein 1605 haink er dy ve ny Aspick er Mannin.
Hooar eh baase ayns Cooyrt yn Aspick as v'eh oanluckit ayns Moir-agglish Phurt ny h-Inshey.
Screeu sheese y Ghaelg.
Car y lhing echey myr Aspick Sodor, ren Phillips reaghey "y Lioar Phadjer" as y Vible y hyndaa gys y Ghaelg. Ec y traa v'ayn, choud's ta fys ain, cha row corys screeuee ec y Ghaelg. Ren Phillips reih corys va bunnit er y Vretnish as y Vaarle (as eh feer cosoylagh rish y chorys ta ry-akin ayns "Lioar Jaghin Lis Mooar"). Ren eh creaghney yn obbyr er y Lioar Phadjer 'sy vlein 1610, agh cha daink rah er y chorys noa echey.

Lught-Reill Lectraghys Manninagh:
She Lught-Reill Lectraghys Manninagh () y colught ta freggyragh er son gientyn as livrey-ys yn lectraghys ayns Mannin. Va'n colught bunnit 'sy vlein 1984 as she bing lattyssagh jeh Reiltys Ellan Vannin t'ayn.
Gientyn y lectraghys.
Ta'n lectraghys er yn ellan goll er gientyn liorish:
Myrane lesh ny stashoonyn as gienneyderyn heose, ta'n eddyr-chochiangleyder Mannin gys Sostyn, caabyl lectraghys fo-honn AC, kiangley corys ym-skeayllee Lught-Reill Lectraghys Manninagh rish y chorys lectraghys Goaldagh.

Feailley Cho-streeuagh Kiaull, Loayrt as Daunsin Vannin:
She feailley cultooragh Manninagh ee Feailley Cho-streeuagh Kiaull, Loayrt as Daunsin Vannin ta kelloorey kiaull, daunse as drama Vannin.
Va roie-haghter ny feailley currit er bun 'sy vlein 1892, myr co-streeu sheshaght chiaullee ayns taishbynys bleinoil Guild Ellyn Jesh as Jeidjys Ellan Vannin. Haink eh dy ve ny smoo, as scughey dys Shamyr Ghaunse Plaase ayns 1902. Hug stiagh ad co-streeu daunse 'sy vlein 1929, as co-streeu drama giare ayns 1933. Ayns 1947, scugh yn 'eailley dys Plaase ny Marrey.

Taishbynys Troar Sulby:
She taishbynys troar Manninagh ee Taishbynys Troar Sulby.
Va roie-haghter y taishbynys currit er bun 'sy vlein 1946, fo'n ennym Sulby Flower Show. 

Unnaneys ny Moiraghyn:
She sheshaght yiastyllagh Chreestee eddyrashoonagh ish Unnaneys ny Moiraghyn, as yn obbyr eck bentyn rish kynneeyn as poosey. 

Plaase ny Marrey:
She ynnyd eunysseyrys er Shooylaghan Harris ayns çheshvean Ghoolish, Mannin, eh Plaase ny Marrey (). She thie mooar theayagh marish garaghyn t'ayn as ad ymmydit jiu son theater, daunse, as sorçhyn elley jeh'n eunysseyrys.
Shennaghys.
Hoshee Plaase ny Marrey myr steat preevaadjagh. Chionnee George Steuart yn thalloo son y troggalys, agh hooar eh baase 'sy vlein 1806 roish my daink er y thie dy ve troggit. Va cooid jeh'n thalloo currit er creck as va thie troggit ec mac Steuart da'n voir echey. Haink er y thie dy ve ny scoill as ny ynnyd-beaghee da'n chiannoort lurg baase Bnr Steuart.
'Sy vlein 1868 ren Henry Bloom Noble kionnaghey yn steat fo £7,000. Hooar eh baase 'sy vlein 1903 as va'n steat currit er arral da Co-chorp Ghoolish myr ynnyd turryssagh. Chionnee Co-chorp Ghoolish yn steat veih treishteilee hymney Noble 'sy vlein 1910 fo £60,000. Hie Halley Reeoil as Garaghyn Phlaase ny Marrey er foshley ayns sourey yn vlein 1913. Va sheeyntaghtyn troggit da'n thie 'sy vlein 1931, goaill stiagh y Cholonaid, y Verandey, Caayssyn Theayagh as yn Arcaid.
Va'n Çhamyr Lhaih çhyndaait myr Halley Cohaggloo 'sy vlein 1973 as 'sy vlein 1996 va ardane bann noa currit seose. Eddyr ny bleeantyn 2001 as 2004 va Plaase ny Maarey aahroggit as aayesheenit.
Ta Plaase ny Marrey kianglt jiu rish yn Gaiety Theatre as ad foast fo currym Cho-chorp Ghoolish. Ta ny garaghyn foshlit da'n phobble car y vlein as ta cuirraghyn kiaull goll er taghyrt car y touree.

Raad Lhean:
She straid ghiare ayns çheshvean Ghoolish, Mannin, eh Raad Lhean (). T'eh goaill toshiaghey er y ghoal rish Bayr Ghlion Shirragh, Raad Victoria as Ardane Stanlagh as t'eh roie shiar yiass gys y choose raad t'eh kiangley er goal rish Shooylaghan Harris as y Çhooylaghan Meanagh. Ta Plaase ny Marrey ny hoie ec jerrey yn raad as ta Garaghyn Cooinaghtyn T. E. Brown soit ec y toshiaght.

Kione Ghoolish:
She kione çheerey creggagh ayns Mannin eh Kione Ghoolish (). T'eh soit çheu yiass veih Doolish as eh jeeaghyn harrish Baie Ghoolish. Ta Sniaull as Laksaa ry-akin veih'n voayl er laa mie.
Fys cadjin.
Derrey yn vlein 1870 va'n kione çheerey fo shellooderys Steat Hie ny Cailleeyn Dooey tra ren y politickeyr John Senhouse Goldie-Taubman gialdyn cooid jeh da Coyrle Valjey Ghoolish. By ynnyd feer ennoil eh car lhing y turrysid Victorianagh as va'n kione çheerey so-roshtynagh liorish y Cheiy Yiass ny er fer jeh ny tree baataghyn gaal jeh Shirveish Baataghyn Purtey Ghoolish.
Lhiaghtyn cooinaghtyn.
Ta tree lhiaght cooinaghtyn ry-gheddyn er y Chione:

Poyll Faarkee Phurt Skillicon:
She poyll faarkee ec Kione Ghoolish, çheu yiass veih Doolish, Mannin, va Poyll Faarkee Phurt Skillicon (). Va ny puill faarkee troggit 'sy vlein 1874 liorish Robert Archer. S'liklee dy nee Purt Skillicon y chied phoyll faarkee fo'n aer va foshlit ayns ny h-Ellanyn Goaldagh. Tra v'eh troggit, cha row mraane lowit ayn, agh roish y vlein 1884 s'cosoylagh dy row yn lhiettrimys currit sheese.
Va ny puill faarkee troggit ayns gullad chreggagh choadit. Va boallaghyn jeant ass concraid troggit ayn er keimyn eigsoylagh as ad freayl ushtey yn 'aarkey ayns tobbyryn. V'eh eddyr £2,000 as £3,000 y costys troggee ec y traa. Deeck Archer er son ny puill faarkee.
Va jeeyl jeant da ny puill faarkee ayns sterrym 'sy vlein 1932.

Toor Warwick:
She toor jeant ass yiarn va shassoo 150 tr er yrjid va Toor Warwick ny Toor Çhyndaaee Warwick (). Soit er Kione Ghoolish, va ennym y jeshaghteyr Lunninagh, Thomas Warwick, currit er y toor. Lhig da'n toor mysh 200 deiney soie er yn ardan reayrtagh çhyndaaee as jeeaghyn magh er Doolish as harrish yn 'aarkey. Va yrjeyder ayn son deiney y ymmyrkey gys yn ardan, as ad gobbraghey fo bree yn ghaal. Hooar Warwick kiedoonys y toor y hroggal 'sy vlein 1898, as va'n toor creaghnit roish foshley yn imbagh turryssagh ayns 1899. Ansherbee, va jeeyl jeant da'n toor ayns aile 'sy vlein 1900, as reesht 'sy vlein 1906, as 'sy vlein 1907 va'n toor currit mow. Ta kione-cherroo Radio Vannin soit er ynnyd y toor nish.

Slattys Cloan as Sleih Aegey (Lhiasaghey) 2011:
She Slattys Tinvaal eh Slattys Cloan as Sleih Aegey (Lhiasaghey) 2011 (Baarle: ). Ren y slattys shoh kiarail son oardaghyn oaseiryn-clienney ta livrey harrish cairyn paarantagh da oaseir-clienney pointit.

Caayr:
She sorçh dy valley feer vooar ee caayr ny ard-valley. Ga nagh vel coardailys ayn er yn anchaslys eddyr baljyn as caayryn, ta staydys reiragh, leighoil ny shenndeeagh currit er caayryn dy mennick, as ad bunnit er y leigh ynnydagh. Ta'n fockle "caayr" çheet ass yn Yernish as y cheeall cheddin echey.

Foawr gas:
She planaid nagh vel jeant ass clagh ny stooaltane elley er y chooid smoo eh foawr gas. Ta kiare foawr gas ry-gheddyn ayns Corys ny Greiney: Iupiter, Sarn, Uraanus as Neptioon. Er y laue elley, ta rollageyderyn ennagh cur Uraanus as Neptioon ayns rang elley dy mennick - foawir rioee as ad laccal trimmid y chur er ny h-anchaslyssyn t'ayn eddyr oc as er un laue, as planaidyn lheid as Iupiter as Sarn er y laue elley. She foawir ghas y chooid smoo jeh ny planaidyn neughrianagh va feddynit magh derrey shoh.

Slattys Sornaigys (Lhiasaghey) 2011:
She Slattys Tinvaal eh Slattys Sornaigys (Lhiasaghey) 2011 (Baarle: ). Ren y slattys shoh jannoo baghtal pooaryn Lught-Reill Ushtey as Sornaigys Vannin bentyn rish troggal as cummal seose greienys sornaigys.

Jakob Jakobsen:
By hengoayllee as scoillar y lettyraght Faaroagh eh yn Olloo Jakob Jakobsen ny Jákup Jakobsen (22 Toshiaght Arree 1864 - 15 Luanistyn 1918). By eh yn chied Aaroagh ren feddyn keim ollooagh as y Nornish ayns Shetlynn bun-chooish y chione argane echey.
Rug Jakobsen ayns Tórshavn, Ellanyn ny Geyrragh, lesh Hans Nicolai Jacobsen ass Tórshavn as Johanne Marie Hansdatter ass Sandoy. By eh yn fer s'aegey ayns cloan troor paitçhey as daa huyr ny shinney echey. By chooreyder lioar as shellooder shapp lioar ayns Tórshavn yn ayr echey. Va'n çhenn happ soit 'sy çhenn valley agh ren y shenn Jacobsen astreeaghey soiaghey yn çhapp 'sy vlein 1918 gys ynnyd noa raad t'ee foast ny soie.
Hie Jakobsen dys y scoill "realskolen" ayns Tórshavn. Tra v'eh 13 blein d'eash hie eh er scoill 'sy Danvarg as ren eh creaghney yn cholleish echey ayns Herlufsholm 'sy vlein 1883. Hooar eh keim 'sy vlein 1891 marish y Danvargish myr y phreeu chooish echey as y Rangish as y Ladjyn myr cooishyn beggey. Hooar eh keim ollooagh 'sy vlein 1897 lesh yn obbyr "det norrøne sprog på Shetland" (y Nornish ayns Shetlynn).

Steat Ewagh as Deynlagh:
She cur sheese Israelagh er dooie as troyn Steat Israel eh "Steat Ewagh as Deynlagh" (). Va'n chied chur sheese er y dooie "Ewagh" screeuit ayns Fogrey Magh y Teyrsnys 'sy vlein 1948. Va'n tro "Deynlagh" currit rish dy h-oikoil ayns lhiassaghey yn Vun-Leigh va doltit 'sy vlein 1985 (lhiassaghey 9, olt 7A).

Lhoob Aqaba:
She lhoob mooar ec twoaie y Vooir Ruy, çheu hiar veih Lieh-innys Sinai as çheu heear veih Lieh-innys ny h-Arabaght, eh Lhoob Aqaba ny Lhoob Eilat (, "Khalyj al-'Aqabah"; , "Mifratz Eilat"). Ta'n coose echey goll er rheynn magh eddyr kiare çheer: yn Egypt, Israel, y Jordaan as yn Araab Saudi. Ta 6 baljyn mooarey ayn er y Lhoob: Taba, Sharm el-Sheikh as Dahab 'syn Egypt; Eilat ayns Israel; Aqaba 'sy Jordaan; as Haql 'syn Araab Saudi.

Straih Gaza:
She thalloo er coose hiar y Veanvooir ee Straih Gaza ( "Qiṭāʿ Ġazzah"). T'ee çhemmal rish yn Egypt 'sy neear yiass, as rish Israel 'sy jiass, 'sy niar as 'sy twoaie. Myrane lesh shen, ta'n thalloo caglit liorish y Veanvooir 'sy neear. T'ee 41 km (25 mi) er lhiurid as eddyr 6 as 12 km (3.7 - 7.5 mi) er lheead as ee 365 kilomeadar kerrinagh (141 mi ker) er eaghtyr. Ta mysh 1.7 millioon dy leih cummal 'syn ard. She Moslymee Sunni y chooid smoo jeh'n phobble. She cooid jeh thallooyn ny Palasteen t'ayn as t'ee goll er enney ec Steat ny Palasteen myr cooid jeh'n çheer shen.

Cabbag ny h-awin:
She lus 'sy chynney Asteraceae ee cabbag ny h-awin (Tussilago farfara). Va ymmyd lhee jeant jee rere tradishoon, agh ta oayllee er ngeddyn nieunagh assjee.
Jalloo-oaylleeaght.
She lus lussagh sheer-vio t'ayn, as t'ee skeaylley liorish raisoamyn as rassyn. T'ee ry-akin dy mennick myr coloin ass ymmodee lossreeyn. T'ee 10-30cm er yrjid.
T'ee çheet my vlaa 'syn arragh roish my ta duillagyn eck, eddyr Toshiaght Arree as Averil, er gass y pheesh. Ta'n blaa gollrish blaa lus ny minnagh beg yinnys dhossan resh clooieagh rish appeeaght. Ta'n pappus clooieagh skeaylley ny rassyn ec y gheay. Ta'n rass hene mysh 3mm er lhiurid, ny rollian buigh ny ruy, as asnaghyn coheeynt rish.
Ta ny duillagyn anmagh gaase tra t'ee skeaylley rassyn. T'ad gaase er gish elley, ass buinney elley, as wheesh as 30cm er yrjid. Ta duillag lomarcan ec dagh gass. T'eh 10-20cm er lhiurid, cree-chrooagh ny kiarkylagh, as ta feeacklyn mooarey ec yn oirr echey. Ta fynney meein bane as cuishlinyn bassagh er yn eaghtyr s'inshley echey' ta'n eaghtyr s'yrjey rea as glass.
Rheam.
Ta cabbag ny h-awin dooghyssagh ta'n Oarpey as yn Aishey, as t'ee jeant dooghyssahg ayns buill ayns America Hwoaie as America Yiass.
Ymmyd.
Va ymmyd lhee jeant jee. Ta gallane millish cabbag ny h-awin jeant jee ec Stockley's Sweets 'sy Reeriaght Unnaneyssit.
Nieu aaney.
Ta alkaloydyn pyrrolizidine 'sy lus, as niart gientynagh kanghyr oc. Ta feanish ayn jeh drogh-eiyrtyssyn, goaill stiagh çhingys aane ayns lhiannoo diu tey cabbag ny h-awin, as lhiannoo hooar baase erreish da'n voir echey iu y tey rish torraghys. Ren reiltys ny Germaan neulhiggey da sleih creck cabbag ny h-awin, as ren oayllee croo arraghys noa, "Tussilago farfara" Wein, gyn alkaloydyn pyrrolizidine. Ta'n arraghys shoh cooilleeney femeyn quallid slattyssagh.

Ramat Gan:
She caayr ayns Slyst Tel Aviv, Israel, eh Ramat Gan (). T'eh ny hoie çheu hiar veih Tel Aviv. V'eh bunnit 'sy vlein 1921 myr moshava, ny gowaltys theayagh. Ec jerrey yn vlein 2009 va mysh 145,000 dooinney cummal ayn. Ta fer jeh ny boorseyn daimanyn smoo soit ayn, myrane lesh ram çhynskylyn ard-haghnoaylleeagh as y thie s'yrjey ayns Israel, Toor Moshe Aviv.

Herzliya:
She caayr ayns Slyst Tel Aviv, Israel, eh Herzliya (). Ta mysh 87,000 dooinney cummal ayn. Ta ennym Theodor Herzl, ayr y Teionaght noa-emshyragh, currit er y chaayr. Ta'n chaayr 21.6 km2 er eaghtyr.

Eretz Israel:
She ennym çheer-oaylleeagh, shenndeeagh as crauee eh Eretz Israel ny Çheer Israel ( "ʼÉreṣ Yiśrāʼēl", "Eretz Yisrael") ta çheet er yn ard ta goaill stiagh y Levaant Yiass (ny Çheer Canaan, y Phalasteen, y Çheer Ghiallit ny y Çheer Vannee). Ta baght ny joaraghyn anchasley rish nyn geilley eddyr ny h-oltyn 'sy Vible, Genesis 15, Exodus 23, Earrooyn 34, as Ezekiel 47 er lheh. Ayns ardjyn elley 'sy Vible, ta'n cur sheese "veih Dan gys Beersheba" currit er y çheer.
Ta joaraghyn Eretz Israel anchasley rish joaraghyn reeriaghtyn shenndeeagh ny h-Israeliteyn. Ren ny steatyn Bar Kokhba, Reeriaght Herod, y Reeriaght Hasmoneagh as Reeriaght Unnaneysit Israel, as ta steat noa-emshyragh Israel, reirey er thallooyn as joaraghyn cosoylagh rish Eretz Israel, agh nagh row unnane as ny joaraghyn shen.
Ta ny h-Ewnyn credjal dy nee eiraght veih Jee dauesyn, bunnit er y Torah (ny lioaryn Genesis as Exodus, myrane lesh ny Faihderyn er lheh). Rere Genesis, ren Jee gialdyn y çheer da sluightee Abraham trooid y vac echey Ysaig as ny h-Israeliteyn, sluightee Yacob, oe Abraham. Ta'n teks cur sannish dy nee fer jeh ny conaantyn bibleagh eddyr Jee as ny h-Israeliteyn eh yn gialdynys bibleagh shen.

Cabbag ny jeeiginyn:
She lus lussagh sheer-vio 'sy ghenus "Rumex" ee cabbag ny jeeiginyn (Rumex hydrolapathum). T'ee ry-akin ayns curree as rish brooinyn awiney er feie ny h-Oarpey as yn Aishey heear. Ta cabbag ny jeeiginyn ny cooish goan myr dooie decaploidjagh, as 200 kroymasoom eck.
Jalloo-oaylleeaght.
She dooie s'yrdjey 'sy ghenus t'ayn, wheesh as 2m er yrjid. 
Ta duillagyn mooarey sleeanagh-oohchrooagh echey. Ta crouw-vlaaghey echey, as blaaghyn bane-jiarg dys glass urree rish y tourey.
Kianglaghyn çheumooie.
Caslys-çheerey rheamys as fys bea-oaylleeagh ec Naturespot.org

Crouw-vlaaghey:
She sorçh dy ghossan blaaghey lhiantagh ee crouw-vlaaghey, as ny blaaghyn eck soit er frauaigyn giare lhiattagh co-houd rish y ghass.
Ta enmyn oaylleeagh kuse dy lossreeyn cowraghey dy vel crouw-vlaaghey baghtal oc, 'syn ennym Ladjynagh "racemo-", myr sampleyr "Cimicifuga racemosa". 
Sorçhyn.
Ta ayn, as ymmodee crouwyn-blaaghey er y ghass cheddin.
Ta ny crouw-vlaaghey as blaaghyn gyn chass eck.
Ta ny speekag, as ny blaaghyn eck broojit rish y cheilley; ta speid mygeayrt eck son y chooid smoo.

Ellanragh Arctagh ny Canadey:
She ellanragh Canadagh soit çheu hwoaie jeh'n çheer vooar eh Ellanragh Arctagh ny Canadey. T'eh ny hoie ayns feer hwoaie America Hwoaie as t'eh coodaghey 1,424,500 km2 (550,000 mi ker) dy hallooyn. Ta'n ellanragh shoh jeant ass 36,563 ellan as t'eh goaill stiagh y chooid smoo jeh thalloo yn Chanadey Hwoaie - y chooid smoo jeh Nunavut as ayrnyn Hallooyn yn Eear Hwoaie. T'ad Ellan Baffin, Ellan Victoria as Ellan Ellesmere ny h-ellanyn smoo, as she Iqaluit (6,184 dooinney) y chaayr smoo. Cha nel agh 14,000 dooinney cummal 'syn ard er feie.

Nunarput utoqqarsuanngoravit:
She arrane ashoonagh Ghreenlynn, queiggey hene-reiltagh y Danvarg, eh Nunarput utoqqarsuanngoravit (Greenlynnish son "Uss, y Çhenn-Thalloo Ain"; ). Va'n arrane doltit 'sy vlein 1916 as va ny focklyn screeuit ec Henrik Lund as y chiaull ec Jonathan Petersen. Veih'n vlein 1979, va enney oikoil currit ec y reiltys er "Nuna asiilasooq" ("Thalloo yn Lhiurid Vooar"), arrane ta goll er ymmyd ec ny Kalaallit, bun-vooinjer Ghreenlynn.

Bro Gozh ma Zadoù:
She arrane ashoonagh ny Britaan eh Bro Gozh ma Zadoù (Britaanish son "Shenn-Çheer nyn Ayraghyn"). She carr arrane ashoonagh Vretin, "Hen Wlad Fy Nhadau", carr yn arrane shoh, cosoylagh rish arrane ashoonagh ny Corn, "Bro Goth agan Tasow".
Ren François Jaffrennou screeu sheese ny focklyn 'sy vlein 1897 as by eh yn chiaull va doltit na'n pheesh va cummit ec James James veih Pontypridd, Bretyn, son "Hen Wlad Fy Nhadau". Va'n arrane noa soilshit magh da'n chied cheayrt 'sy vlein 1898 as v'eh currit mygeayrt myr "Henvelidigez" ("Cochormys"). V'eh reiht myr arrane ashoonagh as myr arrane son y caarjys eddyr ny Bretnee as ny Britaanee y chelloorey 'sy vlein 1903 ec Cohaglym Kevredigezh Vroadel Breizh ayns Lesneven. Ren Maurice Duhamel jeshaghey yn pheesh da'n phianney as v'eh recortyssit ec Pathé 'sy vlein 1910.

Bro Goth agan Tasow:
She fer jeh arraneyn ashoonagh y Chorn, 'sy Chornish, eh Bro Goth agan Tasow (Cornish son "Shenn-Çheer nyn Ayraghyn"). She carr arrane ashoonagh Vretin, "Hen Wlad Fy Nhadau", carr yn arrane shoh, gollrish arrane ashoonagh y Vritaan, "Bro Gozh ma Zadoù".
Ta'n arrane "The Song of the Western Men", ta goll er enney ny s'menkey myr "Trelawny", goll er ny choontey myr arrane ashoonagh chammah.

Lofsöngur:
She arrane ashoonagh yn Eeslynn eh Lofsöngur (Eeslynnish son "Hymn") ny Ó Guð vors lands ("O Yee ny Çheerey Ain"). Ren Matthías Jochumsson screeu sheese ny focklyn as va'n chiaull cummit ec Sveinbjörn Sveinbjörnsson. Ta tree rane ayn 'syn arrane, agh cha nel sleih goaill agh y chied rane dy mennick.

Possan kynneeagh:
She ronney sheshoil ta bunnit er cultoor ny ashoonaght chadjin eh possan kynneeagh ny kynneeaght. Dy mennick, ta'n chynneeaght goaill stiagh shennayraght, cummey, coagyraght, eaddeeyn, eiraght, shennaghys, çhengey ny abbyrt, craueeaght, cowraghyn, tradishoonyn as troyn cultooragh elley, agh cha nel dagh fer jeu femoil. Ta'n enney kynneeagh goll er aaniartaghey trooid troyn cadjin as ad rheynn un phossan magh veih possanyn elley.

Rolley Loayreyderyn y Knesset:
She offishear gurneilagh y Knesset eh Loayreyder y Knesset (, "Yoshev Rosh HaKnesset", let. "Caairliagh y Knesset"). My vel yn Eaghtyrane anlheiltit ta'n Loayreyder shassoo ayns ynnyd yn Eaghtyrane. She Yuli-Yoel Edelstein y Loayreyder ec y traa t'ayn.
Derrey shoh, va dagh fer jeh ny Loayreyderyn, faagail magh Nahum Nir ass Ahdut HaAvoda, nyn olteynyn jeh'n phartee reiltagh. Daa cheayrt, ansherbee, chaill partee yn Loayreyder reiltys ny çheerey car nyn lhingyn oc (Avraham Burg as Reuven Rivlin ass Un Israel as Likud er lheh).

Arran:
She bee undinagh eh arran ta goll er aarlaghey lesh fuinney teayst ta jeant ass flooyr as ushtey. T'eh eeit dy mennick er feie yn Dowan as t'eh coontit myr fer jeh ny stooghyn beaghee shinney.
Shymmey cochiangle t'ayn jeh ny flooyryn eigsoylagh, as shymmey coreir ny mynayrnyn t'ayn chammah, as, rere shen, s'mooar y caghlaa dy horçhyn, chummaghyn, as cho-yannooyn ta ry-gheddyn er feie ny Cruinney. Foddee yn arran ve soorit, as laue 'syn obbraid shen ec farraneyn veih mynvioee najooragh dys yn aeraghey ellynagh, ny ve neuhoorit. Foddee bishaghtyn y chur stiagh 'syn obbraid, goaill stiagh croyn, messyn, sahll as bishaghtyn kemmigagh son blass, co-yannoo, daah as seihll yn arran y lhiassaghey.

Ai'ta!:
She gleashaght son coadey yn Vritaanish eh Ai'ta! ("Er oaie!" 'sy Vritaanish). Va'n ghleashaght currit er bun ayns Mee Vayrnt 2005 ec possan d'aeglee veih Bro-Dreger, y Vritaan. Ta'n ghleashaght nish jeant seose jeh Britaanisheyryn as deiney gyn y Vritaanish (as possanyn ayns Gerne Injil, Bro-Dreger, Bro-Leon, Roazhon, Naoned as Gwened) as ad shirrey aghtey dy concraidagh er son y Vritaanish. Cha nel kiangley politickagh ec y ghleashaght.

Cabbag Pherick:
She lus 'sy chynney Plantaginaceae ee cabbag Pherick (Plantago major). T'ee dooghyssagh da'n Oarpey as yn Aishey veanagh as twoaie. T'ee jeant dooghyssagh ayns çheeraghyn elley. Ta ymmyd jeant jee myr lus lhee noi lhottaghyn crackan, chammah's myr tey noi çhingyssyn gailley, as er son ymmodee çhingyssyn elley. Ta ny kemmigyn lhee aucubin, allantoin as gummalaght aynjee. Chammah's shen, ta duillagyn yn-ee eck.
Jalloo-oaylleeaght.
She lus lussagh sheer-vio t'ayn. Ta ny duillagyn eck ayns cummey roseag, mysh 15–30 cm er crantessen. She duillagyn ooh-chrooagh t'ayn, 5-20cm er lhiurid as 4-9cm er lheead dy cadjin; ta unnane er lheh wheesh as 30cm er lhiurid as 17cm er lheead. Ta kione geyre oc, as oirr rea; ta ny cuishlinyn feer vaghtal.
Ta blaaghyn beggey glassey-dhoney eck, ayns speek 5-15cm er lhiurid er gass mysh 15cm er lhiurid (wheesh as 70cm ny keayrtyn). Ta staimynyn jiarg-ghorrym eck.
Ta cabbag Pherick goll er pollnaghey ec y gheay. T'ee cur magh wheesh as 20,000 rassyn feer veg ayns cummey ooh, er speekyn ardey erskyn ny blaaghyn.
Eggoaylleeaght.
Ta cabbag Pherick gaase dy mie ayns thalloo er ny anveaghey, goaill stiagh faaieyn as çheughyn raaidey. Er coontey'n niart shen, t'ee scanshoil er son aalannaghey thalloo. Ta'n fraue brishey thalloo creoi, agh t'ad cochiangley'n ooir do nagh jed ee er crimmey.
Bee.
Ta ny duillagyn aegey yn-ee myr glassan, agh shegin dhyt broie ny shenn duillagyn. Ta kelkium as biomane A ayndaue. Ta ny rassyn feer veg, agh foddee oo jannoo far-'looyr jeu.
Ymmyd lhee.
Ta cabbag Pherick ry-akin er feie ny cruinney. Ta niart lhee eck, as shen goaill stiagh "slanaghey gortyn, lhiettal guinn-hiass, niart noi-ocsaidee, niart noi-vaagh, moanaghey y corys ym-yeenaght as lhiettal askaidaghey". 
Ta sleih er nyannoo glabbag ass duillagyn cabbag Pherick noi lhottyn, cremmyn as guinnaghyn. Ta ny kemmigyn breeoil aucubin, allantoin, flavonoidyn, toaraghyn geayr caffeenagh as alcoalyn aynjee, chammah's ram gummalaght blandeyragh. Rere tradishoon, ren ad ymmyd jeh'n 'raue noi lhottyn, çhiassaghey as çhingyssyn ennalagh.
Er y fa dy vel ee castagh, ta tey ass duillagyn cabbag Pherick slaanaghey çhingys y yiarrey ny giarrey folley. Ta cooid viomaneagh as meainagh ny lus aalhieeney adsyn ta caillt ec y çhingys. Ta rassyn ny king-vlaaghey ny lus ayns tey jannoo obbyr purgeid smarree as blandeyragh scoarnagh ghonnagh.
Ta'n aucubin 'sy duillag cur ort mooiney ny smoo geayr moonagh, as myr shen foddee dy vel eh boggaghey goot.
Ymmyd elley.
Ta fehghyn lhoobagh as lajer 'sy lus aasit, as foddee oo jannoo coyrd beg, rimlagh, ny whaaley jeu.

Shooylagh:
She greie ta lhiggey da deiney eamyn çhellvane y yannoo as y gheddyn harrish kiangley radio as ad gleashaghey harrish ard lhean eh yn shooylagh. Ta'n shooylagh abyl eh shen y yannoo trooid kiangley rish moggyl killagagh ta goll er kiarail ec obbreyder çhellvane shooylagh, as eh lhiggey da'n chiangley rish y voggyl çhellvane theayagh. Er y laue elley, cha nel y çhellvane gyn streng goll er ymmyd agh faggys da bun-stashoon preevaadjagh.
Myrane lesh y çhellvaneys, ta shooylee noa-emshyragh kiarail shirveishyn elley lheid as SMS (çhaghteraghtyn teks), MMS (çhaghteraghtyn jallooyn), post-L, so-roshtynys da'n eddyr-voggyl, shirveishyn çhellinsh giare-orraghey (fo-yiarg, Bluetooth), applacaidyn dellal, gammanyn as fotografeeaght.
Hie yn chied hooylagh magh er ny haishbyney ec John F. Mitchell as Martin Cooper ass Motorola 'sy vlein 1973 as y greie oc 2.2 punt (1 kg) er trimmid. By eh yn DynaTAC 8000x, 'sy vlein 1983, y chied hooylagh va ry-gheddyn dy mennick er y vargey. 'Sy vlein 1990 cha row agh 12.4 millioon d'eeckys-olteynyn ayn, agh 'sy vlein 2011 va ny smoo na 6 billioon.

Glioonag:
She co-earrooder persoonagh son ymmyd shooylagh ee yn ghlioonag. Ta'n chooid smoo jeh ny myn-oltyn t'ayn ayns co-earrooderyn ry-gheddyn ayns glioonagyn, goaill stiagh scaailan, mair-chlaare, greie leeideilagh lheid as kiap coventyn ny snaid, as loayrtee ayns un unnid. Ta glioonagyn feddyn nyn mree oc veih'n phreeulectraghys trooid cochormag AC as t'ad yn-ymmydit foddey veih beeal lectraghys lesh cooney yn chishtey pooar aalughtee.

Oghe veegrahonnagh:
She saase aarlee ta çhiow bee liorish bleaystanys y vee marish y ghoulraght lectrovagnaidagh 'sy spectrum meegrahonnagh ee yn oghe veegrahonnagh ny yn meegrahonnagh. Ta'n ghoulraght shen cur er co-vreneenyn poullrit 'sy vee y hyndaa as bree hermagh y gheddyn. She çhiow daa-lectragh yn enmys ta currit er yn obbraid shoh.

Greddaner:
She saase aarlee beg ry-hoi greddaney yn arran eh yn greddaner. Ta greddaneryn sampleyragh noa-emshyragh tayrn eddyr 600 as 1200 wattyn as dy mennick ta'n arran greddanit aarlit lurg eddyr minnid ny tree. Ta greddaneryn neu-lectragh ry-gheddyn chammah.

Feayreyder:
She saase thie cadjin eh yn feayreyder. T'eh jeant ass shamyr ta çhiassyeenit veih'n çhiass çheumooie jeh as pump çhiass (obbrinagh, lectraneagh, ny kemmigagh) ta gastreeaghey yn çhiass veih'n eayreyder gys y çhymmyltaght vooie. Ta'n obbraid shen freayll çhiassid yn eayreyder ny s'feayrey na çhiassid y çhamyr. She aght stoyral y vee ayns ny çheeraghyn lhiassit eh yn feayraghey. Ta ny çhiassidyn b'eayrey ginshley cormid vacsoyllee ny bacteyryn as eh lhiggey da seihll ny s'liurey yn vee.

Pronnag:
She sorçh dy vee jeant ass feill vleihit as crackan er ad pronnagyn. Dy mennick, ta pronnagyn jeant çheusthie jeh crackan ta jeant ass collane dy tradishoonagh, agh jiu ta crackanyn taahit ry-gheddyn chammah. Ayns ny h-Ellanyn Goaldagh, s'mennick dy vel pronnagyn jeant ass feill vuc ny feill vart aw as ad mestit marish lussyn blastal as grineyn. Dy mennick, ta rusk ny rusk-arran ry-gheddyn ayndaue. T'ad aarlit liorish greeghey, greddey ny fuinney.

Glenneyder jiole:
She greie ta goaill ymmyd jeh pump aer ta croo lieh-olmid son joan as ooir y yiole veih laareyn as eaghtyryn elley eh glenneyder jiole. Ta'n joan as yn ooir çhaglit ayns poagey trustyr ny ayns kicklone son ceau magh ec traa ennagh elley. Shymmey mooadys as mark dy ghlenneyderyn jiole ta ry-gheddyn, as t'ad goll er ymmyd 'sy valley as ayns thieyn grease.

Çhellvane:
She greie çhellinsh ta kiangley daa, ny ny smoo, ymmydeyr ry-cheilley er coloayrt tra nagh vel ad ry-cheilley eh yn çhellvane. Ta çhellvaneyn çhyndaa sheean ayns cowraghyn lectraneagh cooie da'n ym-skeaylley harrish caabylyn ny harrish mean ym-skeayllee elley, as t'ad aachloie cowraghyn veih'n çheu elley ayns cummey so-chlashtyn. Ta'n fockle "çhellvane", ny e lheid, goll er ymmyd ayns ymmodee çhengaghyn. Ta'n fockle çheet ass τῆλε, "tēle", ("foddey") as φωνή, "phōnē", ("goo") y Ghreagish, ny "goo foddey jeh (shoh)".
Va'n chied phaiteen recortyssit 'sy vlein 1876 ec Alexander Graham Bell as va'n greie lhiassit ec shiartanse dy gheiney elley.

Cumbrish:
She sorçh jeh'n çhenn Vritish va'n Chumbrish va loayrit car ny Mean Eashyn Leah ayns y "Hen Ogledd", ny "y Shenn Twoaie". Ta'n ard shen goaill stiagh thalloo ta soit jiu ayns Nalbin yiass as Sostyn Hwoaie, as yn ennym Cumbria currit er. Va'n çhengey feer chosoylagh rish y Çhenn Vretnish as ny çhengaghyn Brythonagh elley. Ta'n chooid smoo jeh çhengoaylleeyn credjal dy dooar ee baase 'sy 12oo eash lurg haink er y reeriaght lieh-heyr, Reeriaght Strah Chleayee, dy ve ny chooid jeh Reeriaght ny h-Albey.
Cha nel fys shickyr ayn dy nee çhengey er lheh ny abbyrt y Vretnish v'ayn. Hie yn kiangley thallooin eddyr thallooyn ny Bretnisheyryn 'sy twoaie as thallooyn ny Bretnisheyryn 'sy jiass er ny scryssey magh 'sy 7oo eash, agh va kianglaghyn marrey foast ayn, s'liklee. T'eh er credjal dy row y reeriaght Vretnagh, Strah Chleayee, ayns kioneys er Cumberland (gyn Copeland) as Glion Eden sheese gys Stainmore. T'eh er raa dy nee joaraghyn tradishoonagh Aspickys Carlisle cowraghey reamys ny reeaghyn ayns Strah Chleayee. Ta buill-enmyn bunnit er y Chumbrish feer chadjin ayns Lodainn, Siorrachd nam Pùballan, Siorrachd Dhùn Phris, Siorrachd Lannraig as Siorrachd Inbhir Àir. T'ad ry-gheddyn 'sy Ghallioo chammah agh ta cleayney mooar y Ghaelg orroosyn ayn.

Kiaull chlassicagh:
Tra ta shin gra kiaull chlassicagh, son y chooid smoo ta shin çheet er kiaull erbee ta er ny cloie liorish orcestrey as nagh vel coontit dy ve pop-chiaull ny craa-chiaull. Agh ta kiaull chlassicagh er ny rheynn ayns sorçhyn anchasley dy chiaull veih caghlaaghyn lhing, as cha nel agh nane jeu dy firrinagh enmyssit "kiaull chlassicagh".

Caslys-çheerey yn çhoob:
She Caslys-çheerey yn çhoob yn ennym t'er yn caslys-çheerey jeh'n TFH ayns Lunnin. V'eh crooit ec Harry Beck.

Harry Beck:
She Harry Beck (4 Mean Souree — 18 Mean Fouyir 1974) yn dooinney ren croo caslys-çheerey yn çhoob.

Cabbag Vanninagh:
She lus daa-vleinoil 'sy Brassicaceae ee cabbag Vanninagh ("Coincya monensis" fogh. "monensis"). T'ee ry-akin rish slyst ny marrey çheu heear ny Bretyn Mooar as Mannin.
Stayd.
She lus ny h-Inshyn Goaldagh t'ayn. Cha nel agh 22 oayll eck, as t'ee fo gaue baaish. She lus UK Priority Biodiversity Action Plan t'ayn. Ga dy row ee cadjin dy liooar ayns Mannin, ren y pobblaght leodaghey dy tappee ayns ny 2000yn. Ta Treisht Bea Feie Vannin troarey y dooie ayns thieyn glonney neayr's 2006.
Oayll.
T'ee ry-akin ayns dreeyminyn geinee arraghee, gyn monney glasseraght. Ta builley coshey coshee anveaghey glasseraght, as myr shen t'ee ry-akin rish cassanyn ayns dreeyminyn geinee dy mennick. Share lhee thalloo beggan tash; s'cummey lhee geayraght ny alkalaihaght ny thallooin, as cooid geinnee ny craaie.
Jalloo-oaylleeaght.
Ta'n chabbag Vanninagh gaase wheesh as 30cm er yrjid. Ta duillagyn liauyrey lobbagh eck, as skeaylley magh myr roseagh. Ta blaaghyn beggey buighey eck rish Averil.

Nicoteen:
She nicoteen yn drug ta çheu-sthie jeh'n chooid smoo dy hudjeenyn.

Alcoal:
Ta alcoal yn drug t'ayns joughyn gollrish vodka, lhune as feeyn.

Jeihagane:
She yl-lhiatteean lesh jeih çheughyn yn jeihagane.

Yl-lhiatteean:
She yl-lhiatteean cummey daa-howshanagh dooint erbee jeant ass linnaghyn jeeragh.

Surdey:
Ta surdey çheet er earroo erbee lesh fraue neuresoonagh. Myr sampleyr 2√7.

Kiarkyl:
She kiarkyl cummey runt lesh ym-linney jeant as poyntyn co-aggys voish mean shickyr.

Ishøj:
She balley ayns Hovedstaden, y Danvarg, eh Ishøj. 'Sy vlein 2013 va 19,247 dooinney cummal 'sy valley as 21,131 cummal 'sy valjaght.
Ta'n balley ny lhie er y choose ayns ard fo-valjagh København as she cooid jeh'n ard baljagh echey. Ta çheshvean København ny lhie 18 km çheu hiar hwoaie veih'n valley.
Mooinjerys eddyr-ashoonagh.
Baljyn as caayryn lannoonit.
Ta Ishøj goll er lannooney rish:

Daniel Quayle:
She kiaulleyder Manninagh Daniel Quayle.

Ardjyn y Danvarg:
Hie Ardjyn y Danvarg er nyn groo rere Lhiassaghey Baljagh y Danvarg 'sy vlein 2007. Va queig ard currit stiagh ayns ynnyd ny h-eear-choondaeghyn ("amter"). Ec y traa cheddin, va earroo ny baljaghtyn giarrit. Roish y Lhiassaghey va 270 baljaghtyn ("kommuner"). Hie yn lhiassaghey er bree er 1 Jerrey Geuree 2007.
Freggyrtyssyn.
She shirveishyn slaynt theayagh y vun-chooish smoo scanshoil ec ny h-ardjyn. T'ad freggyrtagh er son polaseeyn faillee as arraghey theayagh (barrooseyn as raaidyn yiarn ynnydagh er lheh). Ansherbee, 'sy Danvarg Hiar, ta'n arraghey theayagh goll fo currym un ving, Movia.
Reirey as politickaght.
Ta ny h-ardjyn stiurit ec coonseilyn jeeragh-reiht ("regionsråd"). Ta 41 oltey ec dagh fer jeu. T'ad goll er reih dagh kiare blein tra ta ny reihyssyn baljaghtagh taghyrt. By er 17 Sauin 2009 ny reihyssyn jerrinagh.
Cha nel ny h-ardjyn lowit keeshyn dauesyn hene y hroggal. Er-yn-oyr shen, t'ad croghey dy slane er gialdynyssyn steat (mysh 70%) as gialdynyssyn veih ny baljaghtyn (mysh 30%).
Ta 90% jeh bushaidyn ny h-ardjyn jeerit da'n çhirveish slaynt ashoonagh.

Ard Preeu-valjagh y Danvarg:
She fer jeh ny queig ardjyn 'sy Danvarg eh Ard Preeu-valjagh y Danvarg (). V'eh currit er bun er 1 Jerrey Geuree 2007 rere Lhiassaghey Baljagh y Danvarg 2007 ren cur ardjyn noa ayns ynnyd ny shenn choondaeghyn ().
Ta'n ard jeant ass ny baljaghtyn København as Frederiksberg, ny shenn choondaeghyn København as Frederiksborg as y valjaght ardjynagh Bornholm. 'Sy vlein 2012 va 1,729,952 dooinney cummal 'syn ard as eh 2,561 km2 er eaghtyr.

Baljaght Ishøj:
She baljaght ayns Ard Preeu-valjagh y Danvarg er ellan y Teelynn () 'sy Danvarg hiar ee Baljaght Ishøj (). Ta'n valjaght mysh 26 km2 er eaghtyr as beggan ny smoo na 21,000 dooinney cummal ayn. She Ishøj y preeu-valley as ynnyd y choonseil valjagh. Ta'n valjaght çhemmal rish Vallensbæk 'sy niar, rish Høje-Taastrup 'sy twoaie as 'sy neear, as rish Greve 'sy jiass. Ta coose beg ec y valjaght 'sy niar yiass chammah.

0 (earroo):
She earroo as cowrey earrooagh eh 0, ny neunhee 'sy ghlare chadjin.
Shennaghys.
Cha row ny Shenn Ghreagee ny ny Shenn Romanee jannoo ymmyd jeh neunhee. Cha row aght ayn dy ghra nagh row ooyl erbee ayns dty phoagey. Cha dug ad ennym er "veg". Va aghtyn ec no romanee son cur I, V, X, L, C, D as M ry-cheilley agh c'raad va 0? Cha ren ad coontey "veg".

Baljaghtyn y Danvarg:
Ta'n Danvarg goll er rheynn magh ayns queig ard as 98 baljaght (). Hie ny baljaghtyn shen er bun er 1 Jerrey Geuree 2007 rere conaantyn Lhiassaghey Baljagh 2007. Ren y lhiassaghey shen dolley magh ny coondaeghyn ("amter") as cur ny h-ardjyn stiagh ayns nyn ynnyd. Roish y lhiassaghey va 270 baljaght ayn, agh va'n chooid smoo jeu currit ry-cheilley ayns unnidyn ny smoo.

Muc hallooin:
Ta muc hallooin sorçh dy vaagh ta cummal 'syn Affrick.

Braun:
Ta Braun ny cholught Germaanagh voish Kronberg.

Kronberg im Taunus:
Ta Kronberg im Taunus ny valley 'sy clyst Hochtaunuskreis, Hessen, 'sy Ghermaan.

Hochtaunuskreis:
Ta Hochtaunuskreis ny lyst ("Kreis") 'sy vean jeh Hessen, 'sy Ghermaan, as t'eh ny phaart jeh'n ynnyd moirvaljagh Frankfurt/Rhein-Main.

Frankfurt/Rhein-Main:
Ta Ard Moirvaljagh Frankfurt/Rhein-Main, ny FRM dy mennick, yn nah ynnyd moirvaljagh 'sy Ghermaan, lesh ny shliee na 5.8 millioon dy leih aynjee.

Yn Teelynn, y Danvarg:
Ta'n Teelynn (; ) ny h-ellan smoo 'sy Danvarg as ny 96oo ellan smoo er y Dowan. Ta'n ellan 7,031 km2 er eaghtyr as ta 2,491,090 dy 'leih cummal er. T'eh kianglt rish Funen liorish Droghad y Chryss Vooar, rish Lolland, Falster (as y Ghermaan lurg y vlein 2021) liorish Droghad Storstrøm as rish y Toolynn harrish Amager as Droghad Øresund.
Ta København, preeu-valley yn Danvarg, ny hoie dy paartagh er coose hiar y Teelynn as dy paartagh er Amager. Ta caayryn elley er yn ellan goaill stiagh Roskilde, Næestved as Helsingør (ny Elsinore).

Rollage vuillagh:
She rollage naeearaneagh çhyndaaee ta feer vagnaidit ee rollage vuillagh. T'eh cur magh scellyn jeh'n goulraght lectrovagnaidagh. Cha nel ny skellyn shen ry-akin er y Dowan mannagh vel ad çheet jeeragh hooin, cosoylagh rish sollys thieyn sollysh. 'Syn aght shen, ta cummey yn rollage cosoylagh rish rollage ta builley. Ta rollageyn naeearaneagh feer ghloo as ta ammyn çhyndaaee cadjin as giarey oc. Ta'n aght shen gientyn eddyrcheimyn feer chiart eddyr ny buillaghyn as ad eddyr millihullee as thullee er lhiurid da rollage er lheh.
Er oyr ny h-ammyn oc, t'ad nyn ghreienyn ymmydoil. Ren tastaghyn er rollage vuillagh ayns rollage naeeearaneagh çhyndaaee lhiggey da feeraghey neuyeeragh yn ghoulraght ym-hayrnagh. Va ny chied planaidyn neu-ghrianagh feddynit magh as ad cruinnlaghey yn rollage vuillagh PSR B1257+12. Ta sorçhyn ennagh jeh rollageyn buillagh cha kiart er çheu y reiltaght hyndaaee oc dy vel ad cosoylagh rish cluig vreneenagh.
Croo.
Ta rollage vuillagh çheet er y theihll tra ta cree rollage vooar cohionnit car sar-nova as t'eh tuittym ersyn hene myr rollage naeearaneagh. Ta'n rollage naeearaneagh freayll y chooid smoo jeh'n vomentum uillinagh as, er yn oyr nagh vel agh corillagh beg jeh craue raadeeoil y çhenn rollage eck, t'ee crooit marish bieauid hyndaaee feer happee. Ta goull goulraght ceaut magh er lhiurid essyl vagnaidagh y rollage vuillagh as ta'n goull shen cassey lesh çhyndaa y rollage naeearaneagh. Ta essyl vagnaidagh y rollage vuillagh kiarail troa yn ghoull lectrovagnaidagh, agh cha lhisagh da'n essyl vagnaidagh ve unnane as yn essyl hyndaaee. Ta'n veeyeerid shen lhiggey da'n ghoull shen dy ve fakinit un cheayrt lesh dagh çhyndaa yn rollage naeearaneagh. She bun y ghoull bree hyndaaee y rollage naeearaneagh as t'ee gientyn magher lectragh veih gleashaght y vagher lectrovagnaidagh. T'eh cur rish bieauaghey protaneyn as lectraneyn er eaghtyr y rollage as crooaght goull lectrovagnaidagh ta ceaut magh veih poullyn y vagher lectrovagnaidagh. Ta'n çhyndaays shen neuhiyraghey lurg tammylt er oyr chur magh y vree lectrovagnaidagh. T'eh er credjal dy vel obbraghys y rollage vuillagh radio mooghit (y "linney baaish") tra ta amm çhyndaaee jeh'n vieauid voal chooie. Ta'n mooghey shen taghyrt lurg 10-100 millioon dy vleeantyn. Rere shen, t'eh er ooley nagh vel 99% jeh rollageyn naeearaneagh 'sy Tuinney builley ny smoo.

PSR B1257+12:
She rollage vuillagh ta soit 1000 dy hollys-vleeantyn veih'n Ghrian eh PSR B1257+12 (PSR 1257+12). 'Sy vlein 2007 v'eh shickyrit dy row 3 planaidyn neu-ghrianagh cruinnlaghey yn rollage.
Rollage vuillagh.
Ta PSR B1257+12 soit ayns co-hollys rollageagh y Voidyn. Ta'n enmys PSR B1257+12 çheet er ny co-ordnaidyn eck ayns amm B1950.0 as dy vel ee ny rollage vuillagh.
Va PSR B1257+12 feddynit ec y rollageyder Polynnagh Aleksander Wolszczan 'sy vlein 1990 as eh jannoo ymmyd jeh fodreayrtan Arecibo. She sorçh dy rollage naeearaneagh t'ayn. V'eh feddynit magh dy row anreiltyssyn 'syn amm vuillee eck. Er yn oyr shen haghyr ronseeyn son dy feddyn magh cre'n fa dy row ny anreiltyssyn shen ayn. 'Sy vlein 1992 ren Wolszczan as Dale Frail cur magh pabyr ard-ghooagh er y chied feddyn magh jeh planaidyn neughrianagh. Marish aghtyn sheelit ren ad feddyn magh planaid elley va cruinnlaghey yn rollage vuillagh 'sy vlein 1994. Ren y feddyn magh cur rish shirraghyn er son planaidyn elley va cruinnlaghey rollageyn buillagh elley. Dy meeaighar, s'liklee nagh vel mooarane dy choryssyn planaidagh ec rollageyn buillagh.

Coill an Chollaigh:
She balley 'sy valley eirinagh Tóin re Gaoith, Coontae yn Chavan, Nerin, eh Coill an Chollaigh (Yernish son "Keyll y Chollee"; ). Rere coontey-pobble 'sy vlein 2011 ta 2,530 dooinney cummal 'sy valley. Rere shen, t'eh ny nah valley smoo 'sy choontae lurg y Cavan hene.
