Er oyr yn oddeeaght veih'n vayr gleashtanagh M3 ta'n balley nish ny valley troailtagh.
Shennaghys.
Roish Plandail Ulley va'n ard enmyssit "Killechally", "Killycolly" as "Killycollie" 'sy Vaarle. Ansherbee, va thallooyn Tóin re Gaoith ayns Bréifne Thiar giootit veih Jamys I Hostyn dys William Bailie, glackeyder Albinagh. Roish jerrey yn vlein 1613 va thie niartit troggit echey as va'n reamys echey doont roish y vlein 1629.
Va jeeyll jeant da'n thie ayns aile 'sy vlein 1918 as va'n thie slane scryssit ayns ny 1930yn jeianagh.

Yn Cavan-Muinaghan (rheynn-reihys Dáil Éireann):
She rheynn-reihys er son Dáil Éireann, y çhamyr s'inshley ayns Parlamaid Nerin eh Yn Cavan-Muinaghan (; ). Ta 5 Teachtaí Dála ("Çhaghteryn y Whaiyl"; TD myr aagherrid) goll er reih ayn. T'ad joaraghyn ny coondaeghyn y Cavan as Muinaghan joaraghyn y rheynn-reihys. T'ad Caoimhghín Ó Caoláin (SF), Brendan Smith (FF), Joe O'Reilly (FG), Seán Conlan (FG) as Heather Humphreys (FG) ny TDyn ec y traa t'ayn.

Lag na Sionna:
She lhingey faggys da Binn Chuilceach ayns Coontae yn Chavan, Nerin, eh Lag na Sionna (Yernish son "Lagg ny Shannon"; ). She lhingey leaystagh t'ayn ta beaghit trooid ushteeagh, as she bun tradishoonagh y Çhannon t'ayn.
Ta'n lhingey hene mysh 16 m (52 tr) er lheead. Ren ny chied thummeyderyn ronsaghey magh y lhingey tra ren ad thummey cha dowin as 6 m sheese 'sy vlein 1971. Ny s'anmey ren Martyn Farr as thummeyderyn elley ronsaghey magh y lhingey cha foddey dowin as 9.5 m raad ta'n ushtey çheet magh as scoltey 2 m er lheead. 'Sy vlein 2009 ren Artur Kozłowski thummey cha dowin as 14.6 m as ren eh goll stiagh ayns shamyr neuhickyr.
Ta ny baljyn beggey an Damhshraith, an Blaic as Gleann Ghaibhle nyn soie faggys da Lag na Sionna.
Beeal-arrish.
Rere beeal-arrish, ta ennym y ven jee Sionna, oe 'neen lesh Manannan Beg Mac y Leir, currit er yn awin hene. Haink ee gys y voayl shoh dy ee mess neulhiggit Villey yn Oayllys va currit 'sy thalloo ec ny Druaightyn. Tra hoshee ee gee yn vess dirree ushtaghyn y lhingey dy doaltattym as ren ad stroie ee. V'ee tayrnt stiagh 'sy lhingey as hoshee ny h-ushtaghyn y lhingey thooillaghey magh harrish y çheer myr awin y Çhannon.
Ushtey-oaylleeaght.
Ta towshanyn gra dy vel awintragh 12.8 km2 er eaghtyr ec Lag na Sionna. Ta'n ard shen goaill stiagh Loch Gharbhachaidh, 2.2 km çheu hiar hwoaie veih'n Lag. Ta ushtaghyn y logh folmaghey stiagh ayns Poll na hAbhann roish my t'ad çheet magh reesht ayns Lag na Sionna.
She çhibbyr ec "Tiltinbane" ec kione heear ghreeym Binn Chuilceach y boayl syrjey 'syn awintragh. T'eh cur rish strooan gyn ennym ta roie dy jeeragh stiagh ayns Uaimh na Sionna ("Ooig ny Shannon"). Ta tuill elley goaill stiagh an Poll Buí, as, trooid Uaimh na Sionna, Poll an Chonnaidh ayns Coontae yn Chavan, as Poll na Tulaí Airde as Tulaigh na gCaorach ayns Coontae 'er Managh.
Ta ny towshanyn coyrlaghey dy row awintragh ny smoo ec Lag na Sionna tra. Tra ta stroo ard echey, t'eh er taishbyney dy vel eh kianglt dy -hushtey-oaylleeagh rish Lag an Bhroic as rish Lag an Cholúir faggys da Pairk Cheylley Mullach na Seangán, Fer Managh.

Cadee lheeanagh:
She lus 'sy ghenus "Eriophorum" ee Cadee lheeanagh (Eriophorum angustifolium). T'ee dooghyssagh da'n Oarpey Hwoaie, yn Aishey Hwoaie as America Hwoaie. Share lhee thalloo moaney ny geayragh, curree as reeastane. 
Jalloo-oaylleeaght.
She shiast raisoamagh sheer-vio t'ayn, as ymmodee fraueyn jiarg-bane trooid-hoilshagh gyn banglane eck. Ta gish ard ny shassoo jeeragh eck, gollrish faiyr reen, as ymmodee gaase ass y bun cheddin. Ta cummey prismey trooraneagh ny rollian ec y ghass ghlass rea. T'ee mysh 2-6mm rish y 'raue, as coonaghey dys birr ruy.
Cha nel feanish fondagh er yn yrjid eck: ta coontaghyn jeh 60cm, 15-75cm, ny wheesh as 100cm.
Ta wheesh as shiaght blaachassyn as coaughyn mysh 4-10mm er liurid gaase ass umbyl ec kione ny gish. Ta'n umbel jannoo achene rish torraghey, as un phappus eck. T'adsyn covestey myr ym-blaa bane mysh 5cm er liurid..
Ta'n ymmodee blaaghyn as raisoamaghys scarrey cadee lheeanagh voish "E. vaginatum", as un vlaa echey. T'ee ry-scarrey voish "E. gracile" ta currit da curree nagh vel sharroo, as er y fa dy vel blaachassyn "E. gracile" garroo.

Awin ny Jordaan:
She awin 251 km (156 mi) er lhiurid 'syn Aishey Heear ee Awin ny Jordaan (, "Nehar haYarden"; , "Nahr al-Urdun"). Ta'n awin roie stiagh 'sy Vooir Varroo. Ta'n awin ny joarey eddyr Steat Israel as y Broogh Heear er y çheu heear as y Jordaan er y çheu hiar. Rere y Chreestiaght va Yeesey bashtit 'syn awin liorish Juan y Bashteyder.

An Abhainn Dubh (Ceanannas):
She fo-awin jeh'n Bhóinn ee an Abhainn Dubh (Yernish son "yn Awin Doo"; ). T'ee girree faggys da Coill an Chollaigh ayns jiass Choontae yn Chavan, as t'ee roie trooid Loch Ramhar ec Achadh an Iúir gys yn Ooive ayns Coontae ny Mee raad t'ee çheet ry-cheilley rish an Bhóinn.

An Chláidigh, Coontae ny Mee:
She fo-awin jeh'n Bhóinn ayns Coontae ny Mee, Nerin, ee an Chláidigh (Yernish son "y Chladdagh"; ). T'ee girree ayns Baile an Tulcháin, boayl raad ta moanee vooar ayn, as t'ee roie shiar yiass trooid Dún Doire as stiagh 'sy Bhóinn ayns Beigthigh, balley eirinagh lieh-vollagh eddyr yn Ooive as Baile Átha Troim.

Binn Chuilceach:
She slieau er y joarey eddyr Coontae 'er Managh (Nerin Hwoaie) as Coontae yn Chavan (Pobblaght Nerin) ee Binn Chuilceach (Yernish son "Beinn Chelkagh"; ). Ta'n slieau shassoo 665 m (2,182 tr) er yrjid as she ish y boayl s'yrjey 'sy daa choontae as y 165oo boayl s'yrjey er yn ellan. Ta ushtey veih ny lhiargeeyn jiassey stroo fo'n thalloo derrey t'eh çheet magh kuse veg dy veeilaghyn ersooyl ayns Lag na Sionna, moir hradishoonagh y Çhannon.

Coigee:
She coigee () yn greih ta fidderyn jannoo ymmyd jeh.

Hal Holbrook:
Va Harold Rowe "Hal" Holbrook ny chloieder fillym Americaanagh. Rug eh ayns Cleveland, Ohio, ny Steatyn Unnaneysit er 17 Toshiaght Arree, 1925. Hooar eh baase er 23 Jerrey Geuree 2021

Joey King:
She ben-chloieder Americaanagh ee Joey Lynn King (r. 30 Jerrey Souree 1999). Ta enney mooar urree er son e paart myr Ramona Quimby ayns "Ramona and Beezus" marish Selena Gomez.

Conrad Bain:
She aghteyr Americaanagh va ruggit 'sy Chanadey va Conrad Stafford Bain (4 Toshiaght Arree 1923 — 14 Jerrey Geuree 2013). Ta enney mooar er Bain er son e phaartyn ayns ny claareeyn çhellveeish "Diff'rent Strokes" (myr Phillip Drummond) as "Maude" (myr Dr. Arthur Harmon).

Christopher Plummer:
Va Arthur Christopher Orme Plummer (13 Nollick 1929 – 5 Toshiaght Arree 2021) ny chloieder fillym Canadagh. Rug eh ayns Ontario, y Chanadey, er 13 Mee ny Nollick, 1929. 

Christopher Lee:
Va Christopher Frank Carandini Lee (27 Boaldyn, 1922 7 Mean Souree, 2015) ny chloieder fillym, ughtar as arraneyder Sostynagh.

Chicago:
She caayr vooar ayns Illinois, SUA, eh Chicago. T'ee ny trass caayr smoo 'sy çheer rere earroo yn phobble, lurg Caayr York Noa as Los Angeles.

Roger Ebert:
She cremeyder scannane, earisheyr, as screeudeyr scannane va Roger Joseph Ebert (18 Mean Souree 1942 — 4 Averil 2013).

Clive Dunn:
She aghteyr, fer aitt, ellyneyr, as ughtar Sostynagh va Clive Robert Benjamin Dunn (9 Jerrey Geuree 1920 — 6 Sauin 2012). Va enney mooar er er son e phaart myr Lhiass-Chorpral Jack Jones 'sy chlaare çhellveeish "Dad's Army".

Kevin Costner:
She aghteyr, leayreyder, stiureyder, arraneyder, kiaulleyder as delleyder Americaanagh eh Kevin Michael Costner (r. 18 Jerrey Geuree 1955).

Russell Crowe:
She aghteyr, leayreyder as kiaulleyder ass y Teelynn Noa, agh ta cummal 'syn Austrail er y chooid smoo, eh Russell Ira Crowe (r. 7 Averil 1964). Hooar eh ard-ghoo er son e phaart myr y Ghineraal Raueagh Maximus Decimus Meridius 'sy scannane "Gladiator".

Donald Pleasence:
She aghteyr scannane, çhellveeish as ardan Sostynagh va Donald Henry Pleasence (5 Jerrey Fouyir 1919 — 2 Toshiaght Arree 1995).

Richard Griffiths:
By aghteyr ardan, scannane as çhellveeish eh Richard Griffiths (31 Jerrey Souree 1947 — 28 Mayrnt 2013).

Nelson Mandela:
By irreyder magh as politickeyr noi-"apartheid" veih'n Affrick Yiass eh Nelson Rolihlahla Mandela (r. 18 J. Souree, 1918 – 5 Mee ny Nollick, 2013). V'eh ny Eaghtyrane er yn Affrick Yiass veih'n vlein 1994 derrey yn vlein 1999. V'eh ny chied dooinney gorrym va reiht myr Eaghtyrane, as eh reiht 'sy chied ard-reihys yl-chynneeagh 'sy çheer.

Jonathan Winters:
She fer aitt, aghteyr, ughtar as ellyneyr Americaanagh va Jonathan Harshman Winters III (11 Sauin 1925 — 11 Averil 2013).

Charles Bronson:
She aghteyr scannane as çhellveeish Americaanagh va Charles Bronson (r. Charles Dennis Buchinsky; 3 Sauin 1921 — 30 Luanistyn 2003).

Richard Schiff:
She aghteyr Americaanagh eh Richard Schiff (r. 27 Boaldyn 1955). Ta enney mooar er er son e phaart myr Emil Hamilton ayns "Man of Steel" marish Russell Crowe.

Calamintha:
She genus dy lossreeyn 'sy chynney Lamiaceae eh Calamintha. Ta mysh hoght dooieyn 'sy ghenus, as ram shenn cho-enmyn. T'adsyn dooghyssagh da ardjyn hwoaie tempreilagh ny h-Oarpey, ny h-Aishey as ny h-Affrick. T'ad goll er ee ec praddagyn "Lepidoptera", myr sampleyr "Coleophora albitarsella".
Ymmyd.
Ta dooieyn "Calamintha" goll er ee myr luss blasstal 'sy Niar Meanagh, myr za'atar.

Calamynthey:
She lus sheer-vio 'sy ghenus Calamintha ee calamynthey. T'ee ry-akin er feie yn Oarpey Heear, sheese dys yn Spaainey as yn Teer hwoaie. Share jee lhiargee faiyragh çhirrym er thalloo kelkagh, agh t'ee gaase er ayns keyljyn skeaylt, as er thalloo geinee ny mholmagh. Ta niart ack dy hassoo noi thalloo feer alkalaihagh.
Jalloo-oaylleeaght.
T'ee gaase wheesh as 0.6m er yrjid as 0.5m er lheead. Ta blaaghyn jiarg-ghorrym daa-ghooghyssagh oc ta goll er pollnaghey ec shey-chassee. She lus jeeragh crouwagh t'ayn; ta ny duillagyn eck piyral as cree-chrooagh, as ta oirr 'eeacklagh oc. Ta'n chuishlinaght oc moggylagh. Ta fynney er gish as duillagyn.
Ta blass jeih-hoaral eck, as shen ass ocsaid cis-piperitone son y chooid smoo.
Ymmyd.
T'ad jannoo tey ass ny duillagyn, as jannoo ymmyd jeh myr luss blasstal.

Callish Rangagh:
She lus yn-ee 'sy chynney Brassicaceae ee callish Rangagh. Ta'n ghass as blaa-chione eck goll er ee myr glassrey, broiet ny gaal-vroiet dy cadjin. Ta ny duillagyn yn-ee myrgeddin.

Pran (aghteyr):
She aghteyr Injinagh va Pran Krishan Sikand (12 Toshiaght Arree 1920 — 12 Jerrey Souree 2013). Va enney mooar er er son e phaart 'sy scannane "Duniya".

Máirtín Ó Cadhain:
She screeudeyr Yernagh va Máirtín Ó Cadhain (1906 — 18 Jerrey Fouyir 1970) ren cur magh ram lioar 'sy Yernish, "Cré na Cille" ny mast'oc.

Agan Tavas:
She sheshaght ta bunnit 'sy Chorn son moylley as ardjaghey staydys y Chornish eh Agan Tavas ("Y Çhengey Ain"). Ta soiag ec y çheshaght er Keskowethyans an Taves Kernewek. Va'n çheshaght currit er bun 'sy vlein 1987 son y Chornish y voylley as y ardjaghey myr çhengey loayrit. Ec traa yn vunneeaght, cha row agh deiney va loayrt dy flaaoil 'sy Chornish abyl dy ve nyn olteynyn. Agh, 'sy vlein 1990 v'eh shen ceaghlit as va'n çheshaght foshlit da chooilley ghooinney.

Tha Boord o Ulstèr-Scotch:
She reagheydys tessen-joarey ayns Nerin eh Tha Boord o Ulstèr-Scotch ("Jantys y Vaarle Albinagh Ultagh"). Va'n reagheydys currit er bun son cur er oaie studeyryssyn, freayltys as lhiassaghey y Vaarle Albinagh Ultagh myr çhengey vio. Ta'n reagheydys ny oltey jeh'n Ving Hengey Hwoaie/Yiass va currit er bun lurg Conaant Veeal Feirshtey 'sy vlein 1998. She Foras na Gaeilge y boayrd ta freggyrtagh er son cooishyn y Yernish. Ta'n reagheydys geddyn argid veih'n Rheynn Cultoor, Ellynyn as Corsoie ("Tha Männystrie o Fowkgates, Airts an Aisedom") ayns Nerin Hwoaie as veih'n Rheynn Cooishyn Co-phobbylagh, Co-chormid as Gaeltaght ayns Pobblaght Nerin.

Loch Ramhar:
She logh mooar najooragh 741 hectare er eaghtyr ee Loch Ramhar (). Ta'n logh ny lhie faggys da Achadh an Iúir ayns Coontae yn Chavan, Nerin.

Loch Saileán:
She logh mooar najooragh 162 hectare er eaghtyr ee Loch Saileán (). Ta'n logh ny lhie faggys da Searcóg ayns Coontae yn Chavan, Nerin.

Camomile:
Ta camomile çheet er ymmodee lussyn 'sy chynney Asteraceae. T'adsyn gollrish neayninyn. Ta sleih jannoo tey ass camomile son cooney cadlee ny goaill aash, ny myr jough blasstal.
Ta'n ennym ass Greagish , "ooyl thallooin", as shen rere soar ooyllagh ny blaaghyn. Haink eh trooid Ladjyn () as Frangish () stiagh 'sy Vaarle as y Ghaelg. 
Dooieyn.
Shoh heese dooieyn smoo cadjin son ymmyd lhee:
Potacaraght.
Ta kemmigyn scanshoil camomileagh goaill stiagh apigenin as alpha-bisabolol; sesquiterpeneyn, terpenoidyn, flavonoidyn, coumarinyn (herniarin as umbelliferone), phenylpropanoidyn, flavoneyn, flavanolyn as polyacetyleneyn.
Ta niart noi-changhyragh ec apigenin. Ta niart noi-yngyragh as ec alpha-bisabolol. Ta umbelliferone lhiettal fungyssyn. Ta feanish ennagh ayn dy nod covreneenyn elley thannaghey fuill, as bentyn rish kemmig y chorys nearag. Ta kemmygyn noi-loshtaght , coadee gien, ry-gheddyn assjee rere studeyrys "in vitro" as ayns beiyn. 
Ymmyd lhee.
Rere tradishoon, ta sleih jannoo ymmyd jee noi çhiassaghey, çhingyssyn gailley, gorley breinney, loshtaght, çhingys crackanagh, as gorley thoanney. Ta'n Çhirveish Laynt Ashoonagh goaill rish feanish Keim B dy vel bree eck noi imnea, preays as neuchadlaght. 
Boiraghyn.
Foddee camomile cur crapley breinney er mraane, as shen ny vun anappeeaght, ta National Institutes of Health ny SUA coyrlaghey mraane torragh n'oi. Ta feanish ennagh ayn dy vel kuse dy 'leih allerjagh noi, agh cha nel shen fondagh. 
Ymmyd jesheenagh.
T'ad jannoo ymmyd jeh camomile ny keayrtyn ayns cosmaidyn myr meeineyder, as er folt bane son giallaghey. 

DVD:
She cummey stoyral er jysk shilleydagh eh yn DVD ny yn JABE ("Jysk Aghtal Bun-Earrooagh"). V'eh ynlaghtit as lhiassit ec Philips, Sony, Toshiba as Panasonic 'sy vlein 1995. Ta DVDyn currit magh as ad cosoylagh rish CDyn er mooadys, agh t'ad abyl ny smoo fysseree y stoyral orroo.
Ta DVDyn roie-recortyssit mooar-yeant liorish jeshaghtyn mullee ta cur yn fysseree jeeragh as dy fishigoil er y jysk. She DVD-ROM yn ennym ta currit orroo er yn oyr nagh vel jargaght ayn y fysseree y scryssey magh ny yn jysk y screeu; cha nel agh lhaih y jysk lowit. Ta jyskyn DVD baney (DVD-R as DVD+R) ry-gheddyn chammah: foddee fysseree y screeu er ny jyskyn shen un cheayrt. Lurg shen t'ad cosoylagh rish y DVD-ROM. Ta DVDyn aascreeuee (DVD-RW, DVD+RW as DVD-RAM) ry-gheddyn chammah as eh lowit fysseree y screeu orroo as y scryssey vouesyn reesht as reesht.

Camphire:
She lus ynrican 'sy ghenus Lawsonia ee camphire (Lawsonia inermis), as bun y daah henna. Ta shennaghys liauyr ec y daah er son daahghey crackan, folt as eaddagh.
Jalloo-oaylleeaght.
She crouw vooar t'ayn, mysh 2-8m er yrjid. T'ee gyn clooie as yl-vanglaeagh. Ta jialgyn er king ny myn-vanglaneyn. Ta duillagyn piyral eck, er cass feer yiare, as adsyn eelipsagh ny sleeanagh rouyr. Ta birr birragh ny meayl oc, as oirr rea. T'ad mysh 2-3cm er lhiurid as 1-2cm er lheead. Ta blaaghyn beggey baney ny bane-jiarg eck, as ad soaral. Ta kiare seepalyn oc as piobanagh. Ta petylyn jeiragh oc, as staimynyn baney ny jiargey piyral rish oirr ny . Ta oohrey kiare-hamyragh oc. Ta'n mess ny kishtag dhone beg, mysh 4-8mm er crantessen; ta mysh 30-50 'sy vess.
Troarey.
Ta'n lus dooghyssagh da ynnydyn çhirrym as grianchryssagh 'syn Affrick hwoaie, yn Aishey yiass as heear, as yn Australasia hwoaie. T'ee cur magh smoo daah my t'ee gaase eddyr 35-45°C. Rish fliaghey, t'ee gaase dy tappee; ta ny duillagyn buighaghey as tuittym rish emshiyr çhirrym as feayr.
Ymmyd.
Ymmyd lhee.
Ta feanish jeh camphire myr lus lhee ayns screeuyr Hiar neayr's y 14oo eash, goaill stiagh obbraghyn Ibn Qayyim al-Jawziyya (14oo eash) as Pabyr Ebers (16oo eash).
Ta niart noi-fungyssagh eck. T'ee coadey liare as eaddagh myrgeddin, as lhiettal shey-chassee as millchay.
Ymmyd jesheenagh.
Va ymmyd jeant jeh myr daah neayr's yn Eash Ooha, er son daaghey crackan, folt, ingynyn as eaddagh. Va fys urree ec ny Shenn Romaanee, 'syn Injey rish y 4oo eash, as 'syn Spaainey rish Convivencia ny 8oo-15oo eashyn.
Ta sleih ayns yn Impiraght Romaanagh, yn Ibeir, yn Çhenn Egypt, yn Affrick Hwoaie, yn Lieh-innys Arabagh, y Niar Faggys as yn Aishey Yiass er nyannoo ymmyd jee myr cosmaid, chammah's mraane aegey 'syn Oarpey rish y 19oo eash. 
Cha nel shickyrys ayn er c'raad ghow ad toshiaght jannoo ymmyd jee; eddyr 'syn Injey ny 'syn Affrick.
Ta'n tradishoon shen aaviogheydagh kyndagh rish troarey share, obbraghey share, as arraghey sleih magh ass ardjyn ren ymmyd tradishoonagh jee.

David Letterman:
She oastagh çhellveeish, fer aitt, screeudeyr as gienteyder Americaanagh eh David Michael Letterman (r. 12 Averil, 1947). 

Cowrag:
Ayns coryssyn fysseree, she ta currit er cooid ennagh ee cowrag. T'ad gyn tosheeaght son y chooid smoo. Ta'n lipaid shoh ny metafysseree ta soilshaghey dooghys as scansh ny cooid, as cooney lhiat eh y 'eddyn reesht. T'ad scanshoil ayns çhaglymyn mooarey ta goll er ronsaghey ec ymmodee sleih. Ta cowragyn currit ec crootee ny ec ymmydeyryn. Ta cowragyn scanshoil ayns ymmodee shirveishyn Web 2.0.
Shennaghys.
Ta cowragyn cooney lesh obbraghyn lheid as rang-oardraghey, cowraghey shellooderaght, ny cowraghey enney eddyrlhieen. Ta focklyn, jallooyn, as cowraghyn elley ry-akin myr cowragyn. Va'n eie shen ayn roish co-earrooderyn, agh ta ronsaghey co-earrooagh lhiggey dhyt ymmyd aasagh as tappee jeu y yannoo.
Hoshiaght, ren soilsheyderyn ymmyd jeu dys cooney ymmydeyryn dy gheddyn cooid vennagh daue er shirveishyn eddyrlhieen. Myr sampleyr, ta'n "keywords" lhiggey da soilsheyderyn ynnydyn-eggey soilshaghey cooid dy tappee dys cooney lesh ronsaghey. Ayns 2003, ren ynnyd-eggey lioarvark sheshoil Delicious lhiggey da ymmydeyryn cur cowrag er ny "lioarvarkyn" oc dyn veddyn reesht. Chammah's shen, chroo ad shirveishyn çhaglym cooidjagh dys soilshaghey co-lioarvarkyn ymmydeyryn. Rere yn aght shen, ren Flickr lhiggey da ymmydeyryn cowragyn er ny caslyssyn oc y chur. Ren shen eh ny sassey caslyssyn y ronsaghey. Haink yn eie y ve cadjin, as ta claareyn co-earrooder elley goaill stiagh cowragyn er post-l ny coadanyn kiaull. Ta cowragyn lhiggey da ymmydeyryn rang-oardraghey cooid rere aght cooie daue hene, as rheynn ny rang-oardraghyn shen rish y cheilley. 
Dy cadjin, foddee oo scrutaghey cowrag er lheh as fakin cooid ymmodee ymmydeyryn ta kianglt rish; myr shen ta ymmyd oc da ymmydeyryn elley. Ta ymmodee ynnydyn-eggey soilshaghey neeal cowragagh ta soilshaghey cowragyn rere menkid.
She rang-oardraghey "neese" t'ayn, as shen noi keimoilaght "neose". Rere rang-oardraghey keimoil, ta'n crootagh meenaghey rangyn rang-oardraghey as yn aght cooie ymmyd jeu y yannoo. Ayns corys cowragagh, foddee dagh ymmydeyr jannoo e ymmyd hene jeh ny cowragyn t'ayn, gyn smooinaghtyn er ymmyd ymmydeyryn elley, as dy mennick ta niart echey cowragyn noa y chroo. Cha nel cooid goll er cur fo rang er lheh; foddee oo cur ymmodee cowragyn urree.
Sampleyryn.
Blog.
Shimmey blog ta lhiggey da'n ughtar cowragyn y chroo as cur er ny postyn jeant oc. Ny keayrtyn, ta corys ronnaghyn cooilleenagh ayn myrgeddin. Ta'n cowrag ny jeean-chiangley stiurys rish duillag ayndagh, as ish soilshaghey dagh post as y cowrag shen urree. Ta niart ec yn ughtar post erbee y aarang-oardraghey liorish caghlaa ny cowragyn t'eck; cha nel feme echey ish y scughey. Ta'n cooid vog vlog freayll arrey er ny kianglaghyn t'ayn.
Taghyrt.
Ny keayrtyn, ta taghyrt ennagh reih ogher myr cowrag oikoil. T'ad greinnaghey commee ymmyd jeh y yannoo ayns cooid bentyn rish y taghyrt, myr sampleyr artyn, caslyssyn-soilshey ny postyn-blog. Ta'n chowrag shoh cooney lesh greieyn-ronsee lheid ny cooid y gheddyn dy aashagh, liorish ayndagh cohassooagh. She t'ayn.
Cowragyn er lheh.
Cowrag yeshaght.
Ta soilshaghey magh fys semantagh ta ry-hoiggal ec co-earrooderyn. T'adsyn goaill stiagh reamys, parameter as fys. Myr sampleyr, ta "geo:long=50.123456" ny cowrag çheeroaylleeagh da cooid bentyn rish dowan-liurid 50.123456. Haink rish y cummey shoh er geolicious ayns 2004 son dy chowraghey cooid Delicious rere ynnyd. Ren ymmydeyr Dan Catt ymmyd jeh son dy chowraghey ynnyd er caslyssyn-soilshey Flickr; liorish cur cowrag "geotagged" er caslyssyn, hooar eh stroo RSS jeh dagh caslys as ny cowragyn shen er, as eisht dobbree eh orroo dys cur ad er caslys-çheerey. Haink yn eie dy ve cadjin dy liooar; ren ymmydeyryn greieyn dys jannoo aashagh yn obbyr shen, as fy-yerrey hug Flickr staartey da Catt. Chammah's cowragyn jeshaght ynnyd, t'ad ayn son taghyrtyn, rollageydys as claareyn BBC. Ta greieyn lheid as Husk jannoo aashagh eh cowragyn jeshaght y ronsaghey.
Cowrag chleeah.
Ta ny fockle as cowrey cleeah (codice_1) roish. Ta'n chowrag shoh soilshaghey magh cooid scanshoil teks, as lhiggey dhyt feddyn çhaghteraghtyn bentyn rish peiagh, taghyrt, bun-chooish, boayl ny cooish elley er lheh. Ta'n corys shen ry-akin er corys moggyley sheshoil dy cadjin, goaill stiagh Twitter, identi.ca, Tumblr, Instagram, Flickr, Google+ as Facebook.
Dynamickyn corys cramp.
Rish traa, ta co-hasht fockle çheet rish ayns coryssyn lioarvark sheshoil. Ta troyn dynamickyn corys cramp ry-akin ayns co-chur cowragyn.. My ta stiurey erbee ayn er ymmydeyryn, ta scaalhean cowragyn bentyn rish cooish er lheh co-chleayney rish scaalheean fo . Foddee oo scrutaghey co-cheintys ny cowragyn t'ayn dys feddyn tasht-fockle neuchramp.
Spammal.
Ta coryssyn cowrag surranse , as sleih cur rouyr cowragyn er red ennagh, ny cowragyn nagh vel bentyn rish dy firrinagh, dys cleayney eaishtaght. Dy lhiettal shen, ta sleih ny algorithmyn scrutaghey cowragyn ny keayrtyn dys feddyn lheid ny cooishyn. Ta lhiettal towse cowragyn er cooid er lheh cooney lesh shen, agh t'eh lhiettal ymmydeyryn myrgeddin.

Queen (bann):
She phossan craa-chiaullee Sostynagh ad Queen. Haink y possan ry-cheilley ayns Lunnin 'sy vlein 1970. Va'n possan jeant seose jeh Freddie Mercury (arraneyder), John Deacon (dord-ghitar), Brian Harold May (gitar stiuree, arraneyder) as Roger Meddows Taylor (drummyn, arraneyder).

Reejerey:
She dooinney as enmys "reejerys" currit er ec ree ny fer toshee elley er son e hirveishyn da'n reeriaght ny da'n çheer eh reejerey ny cright. 'Syn Oarpey er lheh, va'n reejerys currit er fir chaggee varkiaght. Car ny h-Ardvean Eashyn, va'n reejerys coontit myr rhenk jeh'n ooashlid injil. Ec toshiaght ny Mean Eashyn Jeianagh, haink er y rhenk dy ve kianglt rish eieyn y reejeroilid, coad stiuree yn 'er caggee Creestee cooyrtoil fondagh. Veih'n Eash Noa-emshyragh Leah, haink er yn enmys dy ve coontit myr enmys onnoroil son shirveishyn caggee ny neu-chaggee, gollrish corys ny h-onnoryn Goaldagh.

Davy I ny h-Albey:
She fer reiree 'sy 12oo eash va Davy I (Gaelg Vean-eashagh: "Dabíd mac Maíl Choluim"; ; 1084 – 24 Boaldyn 1153). V'eh ny Lah er ny Cumbriee (1113-1124), ny Eearley er Northampton as Huntingdon as, ny s'anmey, ny Ree er ny h-Albinee (1124-1153). V'eh ny vac saa jeh Mylecholumb III ny h-Albey as Margaid Wessex. Cheau eh e vleeantyn beggey ayns Nalbin agh, lurg baase e phaarantyn ayns 1093, v'eh ceaut magh er eebyrtys fo laueyn e naim as y Ree noa, Donal III ny h-Albey.

Marjorie Estiano:
She aghteyr, arraneyder, as screeudeyr arrane Brasseelagh ee Marjorie Dias de Oliveira. Rug ee er 8 Mart, 1982 'syn ard-valley Curitiba.

Çhengaghyn Slavagh:
She fo-chrouw yn chynney çhengey Ind-Oarpagh (IO) ad ny çhengaghyn Slavagh, ny Slavoanagh ny keayrtyn. She Proto-Lavish yn ennym ta currit er shenn-voir y chrouw as ee goll er loayrt eddyr y 5oo as y 8oo eash Oarpey Hiar. Jiu, ta ny çhengaghyn Slavagh goll er loayrt feie'n Oarpey Hiar, myrane lesh ayrnyn jeh'n Oarpey Veanagh, cooid vooar jeh ny çheeraghyn Balkanagh, as y paart hwoaie jeh'n Aishey. T'ad y Rooshish, yn Ookraanish as y Pholynnish ny çhengaghyn Slavagh smoo rere earroo ny loayreyderyn as ny tree çhengey shen coontey 225 millioon dy leih mastey earroo ny loayreyderyn.

Çhengaghyn Tocharagh:
She fo-chrouw varroo jeh ny çhengaghyn Ind-Oarpagh v'ayn ayns ny çhengaghyn Tocharagh. Va ny çhengaghyn Tocharagh loayrit ec boodeeyssyn beggey va cummal ec taauenee er y çheu hwoaie jeh Awintragh Tarim (cooid jeh'n ard noa-emshyragh Xinjiang 'sy Çheen). Ta ny çhengaghyn shen goll er rheynn magh ayns tree sorçh — y Tocharish A ("Agnish" ny "Turfanish"), y Tocharish B ("Kuchish") as y Tocharish C ("Krorainish").
Ta docamadyn veih'n 6oo gys y 8oo eash BNJ gra dy nee çhengey ny smoo shenn-emshiragh v'ayn 'sy Tocharish A as dy row ee ymmydit myr çhengey liturgagh y Vuddaghys, tra va'n Tocharish B loayrit ny smoo lheeadagh veih Turfan 'sy niar gys Tumshuq 'sy neear. Neuchosoylagh rish y Takish Chotanagh, çhengey Eeraanagh Heear veih'n çheu yiass jeh Awintragh Tarim, haink jerrey lesh ny çhengaghyn Tocharagh lurg haink ny h-eggyssyn Uyghuragh Turkagh stiagh 'syn awintragh 'sy 9oo eash BNJ.

Johnny Cash:
Va Johnny Cash (J.R. Cash; 26 Toshiaght Arree, 1932 - 12 Mean Fouyir, 2003) ny screeudeyr arraneyn, ny arraneyder, ny aghteyr as ny ughtar Americaanagh. Hoshee yn coorse echey ny lomarcan 'sy vlein 1955. V'ad "I Walk the Line", "Folsom Prison Blues", "Ring of Fire", "God's Gonna Cut You Down", "Hurt", "Mister Garfield", and "Man in Black" ny preeu-arraneyn echey. Hooar Cash baase er 12 Mean Fouyir, 2003.

Çhengaghyn Iddaalagh:
She fo-chrouw jeh'n chynney çhengey Ind-Oarpagh ny çhengaghyn Iddaalagh. T'ad goaill stiagh ny çhengaghyn Romanagh ren çheet magh ass y Ladjyn (y Ghaleeshish, yn Iddaalish, y Spaainish, y Chataloanish, y Phortiugish, y Rangish, y Romaanish, yn Ocsitaanish, a.m.s.), as shiartanse dy hengaghyn marroo ass Lieh-innys ny h-Iddaal, goaill stiagh yn Umbrish, yn Oscish, y Faliscish, y Phicenish Yiass, as y Ladjyn hene. Jiu, cha nel agh ny çhengaghyn sluightagh jeh'n Ladjyn foast goll er loayrt mastey çhengaghyn y chynney shoh.

Çhengaghyn Greagagh:
She fo-chrouw jeh'n chynney çhengey Ind-Oarpagh ta goaill stiagh y Ghreagish ad ny çhengaghyn Greagagh.

Cleeah (cowrey):
She cowrey ee cleeah ny cowrey earrooagh. Cha nel bun baghtal ec y chowrey.
Ymmyd.
Shimmey ymmydyn ta jeant jeh'n chleeah. Dy cadjin, t'ee cowraghey earrooyn reajyssagh; ta "#1" cowraghey "y chied" ny "sorçh 1", myr sampleyr, "pensyl #1". Ta sheiltynys ayn dy daink yn ymmyd shen ass cliaghtey Teletype Corporation mysh y vlein 1900. Ny keayrtyn, ta ymmyd jeant jeh er çhellvane dys cowraghey straih dy earrooyn myr reih; myr sampleyr, dys cur stiagh earroo enney, ny jannoo reih ass kaart.
Ayns cowrag, t'ee cowraghey fockle ny raa ta bentyn rish scansh, bun ny dooghys cooid ennagh.
Ayns ny SUA, t'ee cowraghey punt er trimmid dy cadjin.
Ta lhaihderyn prowal jannoo ymmyd jeh'n chleeah ayns prowallyn liauyrey, dys cowraghey dy lhisagh ad cur stiagh tooilley reamys eddyr linnaghyn, focklyn ny lettyryn:
Coadyn co-earrooder.
Ayns Unicode, ta cleeah ec U+0023.
Ayns ASCII, ta cleeah ec 35. Ayns earrooyn jeesoil, shen 010 0011.
Ayns EBCDIC, ta cleeah ec 0123. 
Ayns HTML as XML, ta cleeah ec "#;".

Çhengaghyn Anatoalagh:
She fo-chrouw jeh'n chynney çhengey Ind-Oarpagh va goll er loayrt 'syn Aishey Veg (yn Anatoal) ad ny çhengaghyn Anatoalagh. By ee yn Hittish y çhengey smoo ard-ghooagh ny mast'oc.

Çhengaghyn Ind-Eeraanagh:
She fo-chrouw jeh'n chynney çhengey Ind-Oarpagh ad ny çhengaghyn Ind-Eeraanagh, ny ny çhengaghyn Ayreeanagh. Ta'n fo-chrouw shoh ny fo-chrouw smoo as ny smoo na billoon dy loayreyderyn, goaill stiagh y Ghiffagish 'syn Oarpey as yn Ossetish 'sy Choagaash shiar gys Xinjiang as Assam (raad ta'n Tarikolish as yn Assamish er lheh goll er loayrt), as çheu yiass gys Sri Lanka raad ta'n Teeloinish goll er loayrt.
Çhengaghyn.
Ta tree possan 'sy fo-chynney:
Rere earroo ny loayreyderyn, t'ad yn Hindustanish (y Hindish as yn Oordooish ry-cheilley, m. 240 millioon), y Vengaalish (205 millioon), y Phunjabish (100 millioon), y Varathish (75 millioon), y Phershish (60 millioon), y Phashtoish (m. 50 millioon), y Ghujaratish (50 millioon), y Churdish (20 millioon), y Vojpurish (40 millioon), yn Awadhish (40 millioon), a.r.e. ny çhengaghyn smoo.
Ta daa hengey neu-rangoardit jeh'n fo-chrouw shoh ry-gheddyn ayns "Ethnologue": y Luwatish as y Vadeshish.

Albaanish:
Ta'n Albaanish ( ny ) ny çhengey Ind-Oarpagh ta goll er loayrt ec mysh 7.4 millioon dy leih. T'ee goll er loayrt 'syn Albaan as ayns Kosovo ayns ny çheeraghyn Balkanagh er y chooid smoo.

Bosnish:
She recortys cadjinit jeh'n Terbo-Chroitish, fer jeh ny çhengaghyn Slavagh Yiass, ta goll er ymmyd ayns Bosnia as Herzegovina ee yn Vosnish ( ). She Bosnish fer jeh ny tree çhengaghyn oikoil 'sy çheer, myrane lesh y Chroitish as y Terbish.

Spirited Away:
She scannane fansee bioghit Shapaanagh voish y vlein 2001 eh Spirited Away ( Hepburn: "Sen to Chihiro no Kamikakushi", "Goaill Ersooyl Sen as Chihiro"). Va'n scannane screeuit as stiurit ec Hayao Miyazaki as v'en leayrit ec Studio Ghibli. Ta paartyn ec ny h-aghteyryn Rumi Hiiragi, Miyu Irino, Mari Natsuki, Takeshi Naito, Yasuko Sawaguchi, Tsunehiko Kamijō, Takehiko Ono as Bunta Sugawara. She coontys er skeeal Chihiro Ogino (Hiiragi), caillin groamagh jeih bleeaney d'eash, as ish gastreeaghey gys nabooys noa. Car yn astreeaghey, t'ee goll stiagh ayns cor-rieughid as spyrrydyn as beishtyn cummal ayn. Lurg caghlaa e paarantyn myr muckyn, va jeant ec y witçh Yubaba (Natsuki), ta Chihiro goaill obbyr ayns thie tobbyr oonlee Yubaba son aght y gheddyn ish as e paarantyn y heyrey as goll er ash gys seihll ny deiney.

Vepsish:
She çhengey Ooralagh jeh'n chynney Finnagh ta goll er loayrt ec ny Vepsee ee yn Vepsish (, ny ). Gollrish ny shuyr-hengaghyn elley, yn Innlynnish as y Charelish, t'ee screeuit sheese 'syn abbyrlhit Ladjynagh.
Rere ny staydraa Soveidjagh 'sy vlein 1989, ren 12,500 dooinney cur sheese orroosyn hene myr Vepsee, agh 'sy vlein 2013, cha row yn çhengey goll er loayrt agh ec beggan ny smoo na 1,000 dooinney.
Rere soiaghey ny deiney, ta'n çhengey rheynnit magh ayns tree abbyrt: y Vepsish Hwoaie (ec Logh Onega çheu yiass veih Petrozavodsk, as çheu hwoaie veih'n awin Svir, goaill stiagh eear-Volost Ashoonagh ny Vepsee), y Vepsish Veanagh (ayns ard Chaayr Pheddyr as ayns Queiggey Vologda), as y Vepsish Yiass (ayns ard Chaayr Pheddyr). Ta ny Vepsisheyryn hwoaie cur "lüdikad" ny "lüdilaižed" orroosyn hene.
Ta ny smoo na 350 paitçhey gynsaghey yn çhengey ayns queig scoill ashoonagh.
Grammeydys.
She çhengey ghleiynagh ee yn Vepsish.
Ennym-ocklyn.
Ta 23 case grammeydagh ayns 'sy Vepsish:
Far-enmyn persoonagh.
Ta bun Finn-Oogragh ec ny far-enmyn persoonagh:
Corys screeuee.
Ta'n abbyrlhit noa-emshyragh bunnit er yn abbyrlhit Ladjynagh. Ta 29 lettyr ayn: 22 jeu veih'n vun-abbyrlhit Ladjynagh, shey as ad çheet magh ass ny bun-lettyryn Ladjynagh marish scarreydee, as she yn apostrophee y letter jerrinagh as eh shassoo er son y chleaoilys.
Sampleyr.
Art 1 jeh Fogrey Co-Chadjin ny Kiartyn Deiney:

Çhengaghyn Finnagh:
She fo-chrouw jeh'n chynney çhengey Ooralagh ta goll er loayrt ec mysh 7 millioon dy 'leih mygeayrt y Vooir Valtagh ad ny çhengaghyn Finnagh.
Ta'n Innlynnish as yn Estoinish ny breeu-hengaghyn 'syn 'o-chrouw as ad nyn jengaghyn oikoil ayns ny steatyn oc. Ta çhengaghyn elley ayn 'syn 'o-chrouw goaill stiagh yn Ingrish, y Charelish as y Vepsish (ta goll er loayrt mygeayrt Lhoob Finnlynn as Loghyn Onega as Ladoga). Ta Võro as Seto (sluightee noa-emshyragh jeh'n Estoinish Yiass) goll er loayrt ayns jiass yn Estaan.
Ta ny çhengaghyn geddyn baase, ansherbee. Haink jerrey lesh y Livoinish 'sy vlein 2013.

Frank Lloyd Wright:
She ard-obbree, kiaddeyder sthie, screeudeyr as ynseyder ren kiaddey ny smoo na 1,000 strughtoor as ren creaghney 532 pheesh d'obbyr va Frank Lloyd Wright (ruggit myr Frank Lincoln Wright; 8 Mean Souree 1867 – 9 Averil 1959). 

Longyearbyen:
She Longyearbyen y balley smoo as balley reiragh jeh'n ard Norlynnagh Svalbard. 'Sy vlein 2008 va 2,040 dooinney cummal 'sy valley. Ta'n balley ny hoie 'sy ghlion Longyeardalen er coose Adventfjorden, baie jeh Isfjorden er coose heear Spitsbergen. Ta Longyearbyen ny valley smoo twoaieagh er y Dowan.

Scoill Ard Noo Ninian:
Ta Scoill Ard Noo Ninian () ny scoill ta soit ayns Doolish as Kione Droghad. Va'n scoill aachrooit ayns 1985 rere aareaghey scoillyn ardjey ayns Doolish. 
Scoillyn.
Ta daa ayrn ec y scoill, Scoill S'inshley as Scoill S'yrdjey, er daa ynnyd. Ta'n Scoill S'inshley ayns Scoill Bemahague ayns Kione Droghad, son ynseydee 11-14 d'eash, as ta'n Scoill S'yrdjey ayns Doolish son ynseydee 15-18 d'eash.
Shennaghys.
Hoshiaght, va'n Scoill S'yrdjey ayns Scoill Raad ny Pairk ayns Doolish. Doshil y scoill shen er 7 Toshiaght Arree, 1894, as hoght shamyryn eck. Va 180 ynseydee eck, agh daase shen dys 480 rish dooney ny scoill ayns 2012. Hrog ad thie scoill ("Scoill Noo Ninian") ayns 1924. She ynnyd ny Scoill S'yrdjey t'ayn jiu. Ayns Mean Fouyir 2012, scugh ny h-ynseydee s'inshley dys thie noa, "Scoill Bemahague" as rheamys da 700 ynseydagh eck.

Ollay hundrey:
She ollay veg Holarctagh ee ollay hundrey ("Cygnus columbianus"). Ny keayrtyn, t'ee goll er rheynn ayns daa ghooie, Cygnus bewickii Palaearctagh as "C. columbianus" hene Nearctagh; ny keayrtyn elley ta oayllee goaill roo myr y dooie cheddin. Dy goan, ta oayllee goaill rish fo-ghooie elley, "C. c. jankowskii", ass yn Roosh hiar. Ny keayrtyn, ta'n ollay hundrey goll er rang-oardraghey 'sy ghenys "Olor" marish ollee Arctagh elley.
Ta ennym "C. c. bewickii" currit ec William Yarrell ayns 1830 rere Thomas Bewick, ny sur-ghrainneyder caslyssyn jeh ushagyn as beiyn. 

Anne Brontë:
Va Anne Brontë (behrt er 17 Jerrey Geuree, 1820 ayns Thornton, Yorkshire, Sostyn - 28 Boaldyn, 1849 ayns Scarborough, Yorkshire, Sostyn) ny screeudeyr as bard Sostynagh. 

Etlan:
She saagh aer breeaghit lesh skianyn soit eh etlan. T'ad goll er etlagh liorish seiy veih jeshaght skiootagh ny seiyeyder. Shymmey mooadys, cummey as oardagh jeh ny skianyn t'ayn ayns etlanyn. T'ad ymmydit ry hoi cooishyn soccar, arraghey as ymmyrkey cooid as deiney, cahnagh as ronsee.
Ta'n chooid smoo jeu getlagh fo laue stiureyder, agh ta fir jeu stiurit liorish reiltane ny co-earrooder.

Shirragh ny giark:
Ta shirragh ny giark ("Circus cyaneus") ny ushag jeh'n chynney Accipitridae. T'eh cummal ayns reeastane, magheryn as dreeymyn geinnee 'syn Oarpey, yn Aishey as America Hwoaie. T'eh gee caigneyderyn as ushagyn.
T'eh 44-52 cm er lhiurid as 300-600 g er trimmid. Ta'n kellagh lheeah lesh bolg bane, thoyn vane as king skian doo. Ta'n giark dhone lesh thoyn vane.

Radio Studio 54 Network:
She stashoon stashoon radio preevaadjagh ta bunnit 'syn Iddaal eh Radio Studio 54 Network ny Studio 54 Network. Hoshee yn stashoon gaachreeley er 6 Mean Souree 1985.

Locri:
Ta Locri ny çheu heear Iddaal.

Cane millish:
Ta cane millish çheet er ymmodee faiyryn sheer-vio 'sy ghenus "Saccharum", as ad dooghyssagh da ynnydyn grianchryssagh ny h-Haishey Yiass. Ta earroo ny dooieyn croghey er y corys rang-oardree t'ou jannoo ymmyd jeh.
Ta cane millish mysh 2-6m er yrdjid. Ta gish glioonagh frauaigagh oc, lane dy hugyr. T'ad crosh-heelraghey dy aashagh, as ta deiney troarey crosh-sheelree ass ymmodee dooieyn.

Yn Antarctagh:
She yn Antarctagh y vooar-rheynn smoo jiassagh 'sy Dowan. Ta'n Poull Yiass ry-gheddyn ayns mean y vooar-rheynn. Ta'n chooid smoo jeh'n vooar-rheynn soit çheu yiass veih Cryss yn Antarctagh, as t'ee cruinnit dy lane liorish y Cheayn Yiass. T'ee ny queiggoo mooar-rheynn smoo lurg yn Aishey, yn Affrick, America Hwoaie as America Yiass as ee mysh 14,000,000 km2 (5.4 millioon mi ker) er eaghtyr. Ta 98% jeh eaghtyr y vooar-rheynn coodit lesh rio as eh mysh 1.6 km (1 mi) er diunid.

Mwyllin geayee:
She jeshaght ta çhyndaa bree yn gheay myr bree hyndaaee lesh cooney bluit chassee eh mwyllin geayee. Hoshiaght, hie mwyljyn geayee er nyn lhiassaghey son mwyllarys grine son cur magh bee. Harrish ny bleeantyn, va ny jeshaghtyn doltit ec ram çhynskyllyn elley as er son cooishyn elley, goaill magh mwyllarys grine. Myr sampleyr, ta mwyljyn geayee ymmydit ry hoi çhirmaghey thallooin as son tayrn magh ushtey thallooin.

Troorane:
She croo as tree çheu as tree uillin echey eh troorane. Ta troorane lesh ny mullee "A", "B", as "C" soilshit magh myr formula_1.

600:

1600:

1750:

1820:

Roonysvaie:
She boayl ayns Skeerey Malew, Mannin, eh Roonysvaie (). T'eh ny hoie ayns jiass yn ellan eddyr Balley Sallagh as Balley Chashtal. Ta enney er y voayl er yn oyr dy nee ayn ta Purt Aer Vannin ny soie. Ayns ny shenn laaghyn va RNAS Ronaldsway soit ayn chammah.
She soiaghey Cah Roonysvaie t'ayn, tra ren forseyn Albinagh cur jerrey rish irree magh Manninagh 'sy vlein 1275.

Droghad Bailey:
She sorçh dy ghroghad thruss roie-yeant va toiggit ec Donald Bailey (1901 — 1985) eh droghad Bailey. V'eh lhiassit ec ny Goaldee car y Nah Chaggey Dowanagh son cooishyn cahnagh as va ymmyd mooar jeant jeh ec ny forseyn Goaldagh as Americaanagh car y chaggey shen.

Roltageagh:
She mynphlanaidyn ad roltagee, as ta'n enmys shen currit er mynphlanaidyn Chorys ny Greiney sthie. Ta'n enmys planaideen currit er ny fir smoo. She reddyn creggagh beggey t'ayndaue ta cruinnaghey yn Ghrian. Ren Giuseppe Piazzi feddyn magh y chied roltageagh, Keres, 'sy vlein 1801. Ec y traa shen, v'eh er smooinaghtyn dy nee planaid noa v'ayn. Ec y traa t'ayn, t'eh er credjal dy vel ny smoo na 600,000 dy roltagee ayns Corys ny Greiney, as y chooid smoo jeu 'syn ard eddyr cruinlee Vart as Iupiter. She yn Chryss Roltageagh yn ennym ta currit er yn ard shoh. She Keres y roltageagh smoo as eh 933 km (580 mi) er lheead. Rere shen, as rere troyn elley, t'eh coontit myr mynphlannad ny planaid crivassanagh. She 1991 BA y roltageagh sloo as eh eddyr 5 m as 10 m (eddyr 15 tr as 30 tr) er lheead.

Ben shee:
She spyrryd ny cretoor ayns feayn-skeealleydaght ny Gaeil ee yn ven shee (, ; veih , , y Çhenn Yernish). T'ee coontit myr faih baaish as myr çhaghter veih'n teihll elley.
Ayns ny skeeallyn she ben ta keayney roish baase dooinney. Ayns feayn-skealleydaght ny h-Albey ta ny h-enmyn bean sìth, bean-shìdh as bean-nighe. Ayns ny skeeallyn Albinagh ta'n ven niaghan y fuill magh ass eaddeeyn as eillaghyn caggee jeusyn as y baase fuirraghtyn orroo. By 'sy vlein 1948 ren y dooinney jerrinagh fakin ben shee, rere ny coontyssyn. Ta cretooryn cosoylagh ry-gheddyn ayns feayn-skeealleydaght Vretyn, Loghlynagh as ny Steatyn Unnaneysit.

Eeane:
She breneen ny co-vreneen eh eeane raad nagh vel earroo ny lectraneyn corrym rish earroo ny protaneyn. Rere shen ta lught jiooldagh ny lught jarrooagh echey.

Baie Haifa:
She baie er coose Meanvooiragh Israel hwoaie eh Baie Haifa (, "Mifratz Haifa"). She Baie Haifa yn un chooan najooragh er coose Meanvooiragh y çheer.
Ta Awin Kishon roie stiagh 'syn 'aarkey ayns shoh, as ta ny caayryn Haifa as Acre soit er joaraghyn yiass as hwoaie jeh'n vaie er lheh. Ta mean y vaie jeant seose jeh sheebaghyn geinnee as naboonyssyn fo-valjagh Krayot. Ta Slieau Carmel girree veih jiass y vaie as ta sleityn Ghalilee Heear roie gys y choose ec twoaie yn vaie. Ta Purt Haifa ny lhie er cooid jeh'n choose hiar yiass echey.
Ta'n ennym "Baie Haifa" currit er fer jeh'n nuy balley corpagh ayns Haifa as eh coodaghey yn ard çhynskylagh çheu hiar hwoaie veih çheshvean y chaayr as çheu yiass veih Kiryat Haim.

Krayot:
She doss jeh queig caayr va bunnit ayns ny 1930yn ad ny Krayot ( "haKrayot", "ny baljyssyn"). T'ad soit ayns ard Vaie Haifa, brooinyn y chaayr Haifa, Israel.
Ta ny Krayot (lhieggan yl-rey jeh'n 'ockle "kirya", "baljys") jeant seose jeh ny caayryn Kiryat Yam (36,900), Kiryat Motzkin (38,346), Kiryat Bialik (48,700), Kiryat Ata (78,422), Kiryat Haim (26,960), as Kiryat Shmuel (5,360).

Cannian:
She lus 'sy ghenus "Allium" eh cannian. Shimmey ennym oaylleeagh v'echey, agh nish t'ad gra dy nee troarag jeh'n dooie "Allium ampeloprasum" t'ayn. Ta Allium ampeloprasum arr. ampeloprasum as kurrat nyn go-hroaragyn echey.
Ta dhossan dy 'ineyn gollrish gass jannoo magh corp meanagh y lus, as eshyn yn-ee.
Jalloo-oaylleeaght.
She bleintag t'ayn. Cha nel cannian troggal cramman rouyr rere unnish, agh rollian ard dy 'ineyn duillag. Ta ny duillagyn hene rea as sleeanagh as glass dys buigh-ghlass, as wheesh as 90cm er lhiurid. Ta ny duillagyn lhie harrish y cheilley gollrish lheeanyn feayraghan, as t'ad crommey sheese 'sy vean er coontey y trimmed oc. Rish y nah hourey, ta cannian cur magh blaaghyn bane ny bane-jiarg my crouwyn-blaaghey er gish wheesh as 120cm er yrjid.
Troarey.
S'aashagh eh cannian y hroarey ass y rass, as er yn oyr dy vel ad tannaghtyn bio rish tammylt, cha nel feme er cur stiagh tappee. Cha nel money çhingys ny paittyn boirey orroo. Foddee oo gaase cannian dy gloo myr lossreeyn beggey, ny tannaghey ad dys gaase lossreeyn smoo.
Dy cadjin, t'ad giallaghey cannian liorish troggal thalloo mygeayrt oc (gooirraghey). T'ad tramylt dy liooar, as t'ad surranse y geurey dy mie son y chooid smoo, myr shen ta ram troaragyn faagit 'sy thalloo car ny geuree.
Shimmey troarag t'ayn, agh son y chooid smoo t'ad goll er rang-oardraghey myr troaragyn souree as geuree.
Ymmyd.
Shennaghys.
Ta shenn sampleyryn ry-gheddyn ayns ynnydyn shenndaaleeagh 'syn Çhenn Egypt, chammah's caslyssyn jeu. Er yn oyr shen, chreid Zohary and Hopf dy dee ny h-Egpytee cannian ayns y nah villennium RJC er y chooid s'anmey. Er lhieu myrgeddin dy vel shenn screeuyn nyn veanish dy jagh ad er ee ayns Mesopotamia chammah mysh y traa cheddin. She reih lus yn impir Romanagh Nero t'ayn; creid eh dy ren eh foays da'n choraa echey.
Cultoor.
She cowrey ashoonagh Vretin t'ayn, chammah's lus ny guiy: 'sy Vretnish, ta'n ennym cheddin, , bentyn rish y daa lus, as t'ad cur er lus ny guiy son reddaghey. Rere beeal-arrish, she cowrey Vretin t'ayn er y fa dy ren fir chaggee Bretnagh ymmyd jeu dys scarrey ad veih ny noidyn, liorish coyrle Noo Davy. Ayns Henry V, ta'n Ree Henry ginsh da Fluellen dy vel eh ceau cannian "son she Bretnagh mish, fys ayd, y cho-heeragh veen."
Ta cannian ayns crooinag ry-akin er cooinaghyn punt 1985 as 1990, myr cowrey son Bretin.
Ren gooyn crooinee Ealisaid II goaill stiagh cannian mastey cowraghyn blaaoil elley y Cho-unnaneys: Rose Tiudaragh Hostyn, onnane ny h-Albey, shamraig ny h-Erin, duillag valpys ny Canadey, as lotus ny h-Injey. By vie lesh y chrootagh, Norman Hartnell, cur lus ny guiy 'syn ynnyd echey er y fa dy row eh ny s'aaley, agh cha lhig ad da.
Ta'n ry-akin myr cowrey ny Gwarchodlu Cymreig, cagnaght ayns Fo-Rheynn Thie ny h-Armee Ghoaldagh.
'Sy Romaan, she cowrey Oltenia (ard shennaghyssagh heear-yiass) eh cannian.

Çhengey ashoonagh:
Ta çhengey ashoonagh çheet er çhengey (ny arraghys) as kiangley—"de facto" ny "de jure"—eck lesh sleih ny pobble thallooin ny çheerey as ad cummal ayn. Foddee çhengey ashoonagh shassoo son enney ashoonagh ashoon ny çheer. Er y laue elley, foddee dy vel yn enmys shen currit er un çhengey ny er çhengaghyn ennagh er lheh ta goll er loayrt ayns cooid jeh çheer er lheh. Myr sampleyr, ayns Nerin, ta daa staydys oikoil currit er daa hengey ayn: ta staydys ashoonagh as staydys oikoil currit er y Yernish agh cha nel agh staydys oikoil currit er y Vaarle.

Famman Kitterland:
She ellan feer veg 'sy Cheyllys eddyr Ellan Vannin as y Cholloo eh Famman Kitterland.
Ta'n ellan fo currym Hreisht Ashoonagh Vannin as shymmey ushag as bioag varrey ta ry-gheddyn ayn. Cha nel dooinney erbee cummal er yn ellan, agh son cooishyn reiragh, t'eh coontit myr cooid jeh Skeerey Rosien. Ta'n ellan ny sloo na 4 hectare (9.9 acyr) er eaghtyr.

William Heath Robinson:
By harneyder caslyssyn as linneyder cartoon Sostynagh eh William Heath Robinson (31 Boaldyn 1872 – 13 Mean Fouyir 1944). Va enney mooar er er son e chaslyssyn jeh jeshaghtyn quaagh.

Toor Moshe Aviv:
She thie speyrey ayns Ramat Gan hwoaie, Israel, eh Toor Moshe Aviv (). T'eh shassoo er 7 Bayr Jabotinsky ayns Boorse Daiman Israel. T'eh 235 m (771 tr), ny 68 laare, er yrjid. T'eh ny hie sy'rjey 'sy çheer.

Pobblaght y Pholynn (1918-1939):
Ta Nah Phobblaght y Pholynn ny yn Pholynn eddyrchahnagh çheet er y Pholynn eddyr y Chied Chaggey Dowanagh as y Nah Chaggey Dowanagh. V'ee er enney dy h-oikoil myr Pobblaght y Pholynn ny Co-unnaneys y Pholynn (). Va'n steat currit er bun 'sy vlein 1918 lurg y Chied Chaggey Dowanagh as, lurg caggaghyn ardjynagh, va joaraghyn y steat shickyrit 'sy vlein 1922. Va'n steat caglit liorish y Çheckoslovack, y Ghermaan, Caayr Heyr Danzig, y Litaan, y Latvey, y Romaan as yn Unnaneys Soveidjagh. Va coose giare ec y steat er y Vooir Valtagh eddyr Danzig as y Ghermaan er daa heu y chaayr Gdynia. Eddyr Mayrnt as Luanistyn 'sy vlein 1939 va joarey ec y Pholynn liorish y Rutheen Charpathagh. Haink jerrey lesh y steat lurg ny ruegyssyn er y çheer ec y Ghermaan Natseeagh, yn Unnaneys Soveidjagh as Pobblaght y Clovack ayns Mean Fouyir 1939, as ad cur rish toshiaght y Nah Chaggey Dowanagh 'syn Oarpey.

Pobblaght y Rank (1870-1940):
She Treeoo Pobblaght y Rank (, screeuit dy mennick myr ) y reiltys pobblaghtagh er y Rank eddyr ny bleeantyn 1870 as 1940. Va pobblaght fogrit magh 'sy vlein 1870 tra huitt Impiraght y Frank ass e ceilley. Haink jerrey ree 'sy vlein 1940 tra ren y Ghermaan Natseeagh ruegey yn çheer. Va reiltys noa, va bunnit ayns Vichy, currit er bun fo'n ennym Steat y Rank () tammylt giare ny yei toshiaght y Nah Chaggey Dowanagh.

Pobblaght Chonastagh Hoshiallagh ny Yugoslaavey:
By ee Pobblaght Chonastagh Hoshiallagh ny Yugoslaavey y steat Yugoslaavagh v'ayn veih'n vunneeaght eck car y Nah Chaggey Dowanagh derrey huitt ee ass e ceilley 'sy vlein 1992 car Caggaghyn ny Yugoslaavey. By steat soshiallagh v'ayn myrane lesh conastey va jeant seose jeh shey pobblaghtyn soshiallagh: Bosnia as Herzegovina, y Chroit, y Clovean, Montenegro, y Serb as y Vassadoan. Va'n Serb rheynnit magh eddyr y Terb hene as Vojvodina as Kosovo.

Pobblaght ny Sheckoslovack (1918-1938):
By eh Pobblaght ny Sheckoslovack (Sheckish / Slovackish: "Československá republika") yn enmys va currit er y Çheckoslovack eddyr ny bleeantyn 1918 as 1938. Va'n phobblaght jeant seose jeh Bohemia, Moravia, y Tileesh Heckagh, y Clovack, as y Rutheen Focharpathagh.
Lurg y vlein 1933 cha row deynlaghys erbee 'syn Oarpey Hiar as Veanagh agh y Çheckoslovack. Er 1 Jerrey Fouyir 1938, ren y Çheckoslovack lhiggey voish Sudetenland fo bree ec Germaanee Sudetenland as liorish pohlldey veih'n Ghermaan Natseeagh. By chooid jeh Conaant München va'n lhiggey voish shen. Va ayrnyn jeh jiass y Clovack as y Rutheen Focharpathagh lhiggit voish ayns foayr yn Ungaar as va ard Zaolzie lhiggit voish ayns foayr y Pholynn. Rere shen, haink jerrey lesh y chied phobbaght Heckoslovackagh shen as va'n nah phobblaght Heckoslovackagh currit er bun. Ny sloo na lieh-vlein ny yei shen, ren y Ghermaan ruegey y chooid elley jeh'n Çheckoslovack as va steat babbanagh currit er bun 'sy Clovack.

Benito Mussolini:
By pholitickeyr, earisheyr, as fer toshee yn Phartee Fashistagh Ashoonagh 'syn Iddaal eh Benito Amilcare Andrea Mussolini (29 Jerrey Souree 1883 – 28 Averil 1945). V'eh ny Ard-vinishter veih'n vlein 1922 derrey dy row eh currit magh ass yn oik 'sy vlein 1943. Ren eh reirey rere y vunraght derrey 1925 tra ren eh cur sheese dagh far-leshtal y deynlaghys as chur eh jaghteyraght leighoil er bun. V'eh er enney myr Il Duce ("y toshiagh") as by eshyn fer jeh ny deiney ogheragh ayns crooaght yn ashistaghys.
Va Mussolini ny oltey jeh Partee Soshiallagh ny h-Iddaal (PSI) hoshiaght, agh v'eh ceaut magh er oyr yn oiys echey rish neuchommeeaght y phartee 'sy Chied Chaggey Dowanagh. Ren eh cassid er y PSI as, ny s'anmey, vunnee eh yn ghleashaght ashistagh. Lurg y Varçhal er y Raue ayns Jerrey Fouyir 1922 haink er dy ve ny Ard-vinishter saa ayns shennaghys yn Iddaal. Ren Mussolini scryssey magh dagh asscharrey politickagh liorish e pholeenyn folliaghtagh as ren eh mooidjeen jeh stholkyn obbree. Liorish straih leighyn, ren Mussolini as e lught eiyrtyssagh echey niartaghey yn cheim echey, reddyn ren ceaghley yn steat gys jaghteyraght. Dreill eh ayns pooar harrish y çheer derrey ren Ree Victor Emmanuel III ceau eh magh 'sy vlein 1943. Kuse veg dy meeghyn ny yei, haink er dy ve ny hoshiagh er Pobblaght Hoshiallagh ny h-Iddaal, fo-steat Germaanagh Natseeagh ayns twoaie yn Iddaal. V'eh ny hoshiagh derrey v'eh currit gy baase 'sy vlein 1945.
V'eh er yn inçhyn ec Mussolini toshiaght y chur er y chaggey 'syn Oarpey lurg 1942, agh er 1 Mean Fouyir 1939 ren y Ghermaan ruegey er y Pholynn. By hoshiaght y Nah Chaggey Dowanagh v'ayn. Er 10 Mean Souree, ren Mussolini çheuaghey rish y Ghermaan, ga dy row fys echey nagh row yn Iddaal aarloo da caggey liauyr noi'n Reeriaght Unnaneysit ny noi'n Rank. Lurg livrey seose ny Frank, smooinnee eh, lurg faghtys giare 'syn Affrick Hwoaie noi ny forseyn Goaldagh, nagh beagh ayn agh caggey giare. Agh yiooldee yn RU ny treealtyssyn Germaanagh son shee as darr yn caggey er oaie.
Er 24 Jerrey Souree 1943, tammylt giare lurg ruegey Cochaarjagh er yn Iddaal, va Mussolini currit fo haart ec Ard-Choonseil y Fashistaghys as v'eh goit ec y Ree y laa ny lurg. Er 12 Mean Fouyir jeh'n vlein cheddin, v'eh livreyit ayns soiagh Gran Sasso liorish forseyn Germaanagh er lheh. Ayns Averil 1945, as yn jerrey çheet, ren eh geabbey scapail gys y twoaie. Agh v'eh goit ec ny paarteenee Iddaalagh as currit gy baase faggys da Logh Como. Va'n corp echey croghit seose, bun ry skyn, ec stashoon shirveish ayns Milaan.

Reeriaght ny h-Iddaal:
By steat va bunnit 'sy vlein 1861 ee Reeriaght ny h-Iddaal (). V'ee currit er bun tra dy row Ree Victor Emmanuel II ny Sardeen fogrit magh myr Ree ny h-Iddaal. Va'n steat bunnit myr eiyrtys er co-unnaneyssey yn Iddaal fo cleayney Reeriaght ny Sardeen. Haink jerrey lesh y reeriaght 'sy vlein 1946 lurg y Nah Chaggey Dowanagh tra ren ny h-Iddaalee reih corys pobblaghtagh ayns refrane.

Impiraght ny Shapaan:
By impiraght as ard-phooar ee Impiraght ny Shapaan ( "Dai Nippon Teikoku", "Impiraght Vooar ny Shapaan"). Va'n impiraght bunnit er 3 Jerrey Geuree 1868 liorish Aachroo Meiji 'sy Çhapaan as haink jerrey r'ee liorish y vunraght noa lurg y Nah Chaggey Dowanagh er 3 Boaldyn 1947.
Ren çhynskylaghey as caggoilaghey bieau yn Çhapaan Impiroil fo'n sleih-gherrym "Fukoku Kyōhei" (富国強兵, "Jean y Çheer Berçhagh, Niartee yn Armee") cur rish irree seose y Çhapaan myr ard-phooar. Lurg tammylt, haink urree dy ve ny oltey 'sy Chochaarjys Essylagh as ren ee ruegey, cummal as greimmey cooid vooar jeh'n Aishey as y Cheayn Sheealtagh. Ec mullagh e pooar 'sy vlein 1942, va'n Çhapaan stiurey eaghtyr thallooin fo 7,400,000 kilomeaderyn kerrinagh (2,857,000 mi ker). Rere ny h-earrooyn shen, t'ee coontit mastey ny h-impiraghtyn marrey smoo v'ayn rieau.

Reeriaght yn Ungaar (1920-1946):
She reeriaght er thalloo yn Ungaar va Reeriaght yn Ungaar (). V'ee goll er enney fo'n lhiass-ennym "y Lhiass-Reeaght" chammah. V'ee bunnit 'sy vlein 1920 as haink jerrey r'ee lurg y Nah Chaggey Dowanagh 'sy vlein 1946. By eh Miklós Horthy y Lhiass-Ree. Ren Horthy shassoo dy h-oikoil ayns ynnyd y ree Çhalse IV, Ree Ostyllagh ny h-Ungaar. Cha row Çhalse jargal çheet er ash dy valley fo baggyrtyssyn caggey veih ny çheeraghyn gerroil da'n Ungaar as er coontey yn laccal v'ec Horthy hene.
She Pooar yn Essyl va'n Ungaar car y chooid smoo jeh'n Nah Chaggey Dowanagh fo currym Horthy. 'Sy vlein 1944, ren y Ghermaan Natseeagh ruegey yn Ungaar as va Horthy ceaut magh ass oik. Ren toshiagh y phartee Crosh Sidey, Ferenc Szálasi cur reiltys fo pohlldey ny Natseeyn er bun as eh ceaghley yn Ungaar gys steat babbanagh fo'n Ghermaan.
Lurg y Nah Chaggey Dowanagh, huitt yn Ungaar fo cleaney yn Unnaneys Soveidjagh. 'Sy vlein 1946 va Nah Phobblaght yn Ungaar currit er bun fo stiurey Soveidjagh.

Unnaneys yn Affrick Yiass:
She roie-immeeaght jeh'n Affrick Yiass noa-emshyragh eh Unnaneys yn Affrick Yiass. V'eh currit er bun er 31 Boaldyn 1910 tra ren ny kiare coloinaghtyn Goaldagh—Coloinaght ny Rheynn, Coloinaght Natal, Coloinaght Transvaal as Coloinaght Awin Oranje—co-unnaneyssey rish nyn geilley. Lurg y Chied Chaggey Dowanagh va reiltys er yn Affrick Heear Yiass Germaanagh bronnit er yn Affrick Yiass myr anney jeh Commeeys ny h-Ashoonyn as haink er dy ve coontit, er y chooid smoo, myr queiggey elley jeh'n Unnaneys.
Va'n Unnaneys bunnit myr çhiarnaght jeh'n Impiraght Ghoaldagh. V'eh reirit fo sorçh jeh reeriaght vunraghtoil as ard-chiannoort shassoo ayns ynnyd y reeriaght Ghoaldagh. Haink jerrey lesh yn Unnaneys 'sy vlein 1961 tra va bunraght noa currit magh ayns bree. Er 31 Boaldyn 1961 haink er y çheer dy ve ny pobblaght fo'n ennym "Pobblaght ny h-Affrick Yiass".

Deynphobblaght ny Mongoil:
By eh Deynphobblaght ny Mongoil ( "Bügd Nairamdakh Mongol Ard Uls") yn enmys va currit er y Vongoil eddyr ny bleeantyn 1924 as 1992 tra va reiltys cummynagh stiurey yn çheer. Va kianglaghyn mooarey eddyr y çheer as yn Unnaneys Soveidjagh feie shennaghys y çheer.

Yn Cochaarjys Essylagh:
By eh yn Cochaarjys Essylagh (, "Sūjikukoku", ), ny ny Forseyn Essylagh ny yn Essyl, yn ennym va currit er ny çheeraghyn ren troiddey car y Nah Chaggey Dowanagh noi ny Forseyn Cochaarjagh. Ren yn Essyl cur y cochaarjys er oaie myr cooid jeh obbraghey bun-chaghlaaee as y dean oc na kioneys ny pooaryn plutacraatagh capitlagh jeh'n Theihll Heear y vrishey as shassoo noi'n chummynys.
Dirree yn Essyl magh ass Conaant Noi-Comintern, conaant noi'n chummynys va fo-screeuit ec y Ghermaan as y Çhapaan 'sy vlein 1936. Ren yn Iddaal fo-screeu yn Conaant 'sy vlein 1937. Haink er "Essyl y Raue–Verleen" dy ve ny cochaarjys caggee 'sy vlein 1939 fo'n Chonaant Staillin. Ren y Conaant Tree-pharteeagh (1940) cur lesh ym-lanaghey deanyn caggee yn Ghermaan rish e cochaarjyn.
Ec e vullagh car y Chaggey, va'n Essyl reilley thallooyn lheeadagh 'syn Oarpey, 'syn Affrick as 'syn Aishey. Haink jerrey lesh y chaggey 'sy vlein 1945 as va'n cochaarjys stroiet. Gollrish ny Forseyn Cochaarjagh, cha row olteynys 'syn Essyl shickyr, as çheeraghyn ennagh troiddey nish as reesht.

Cappan y druight:
She lus 'sy chynney Rosaceae eh cappan y druight (Alchemilla mollis). T'eh dooghyssagh da'n Oarpey yiass, as t'eh ry-akin er feie ny cruinney myr lus jesheenagh. 
She lus lussagh t'ayn, wheesh as 45cm er yrjid. Ta duillagyn duillageenagh echey, as oirr saue-eeacklagh oc. T'ad foltagh. Ta blaaghyn buighey-glassey echey ayns dhossan blaaghey. Ta ny duillagyn foltagh çhaglym druight ny fliaghey dy mie, ta cur eiyrtys taitnyssagh gloasagh orroo, as shen bun yn ennym cadjin oc.

Feeyn:
She jough alcoalagh ta jeant ass berrishyn feeyney ny messyn elley braghee eh feeyn. Ta cormid chemmigagh najooragh ny berrishyn lhiggey da'n vraghey gyn ymmyd shugyryn, stooghyn gortey, ensymeyn, ushtey ny mynayrnyn elley. Ta'n jiastyn lheie ny shugyryn ayns ny berrishyn as çhyndaa ad myr alcoal as daa-ocseed charboan. Ta sorçhyn eigsoylagh jeh berrishyn as crouwyn jeh jiastynyn jannoo sorçhyn eigsoylagh jeh feeynyn. Ta ny caghlaaghyn ard-ghooagh çheet magh ass ny h-obbraidyn cast eddyr lhiassaghey bea-chemmigagh y vess, ny h-ymobbraghyn 'sy vraghey, "terroir" as yn ennymaghey, myrane lesh cur stiagh deiney 'syn obbraid.
Ta shennaghys yn 'eeyn goll cha foddey sheear as thousaneyn dy vleeantyn as y jeeillaght shinney t'er ve feddynit ry-gheddyn 'sy Çhorshey veih'n vlein 6000 RC. Haink eh gys ny çheeraghyn Balkanagh roish y vlein 4500 RC. Va paart mooar ec yn 'eeyn 'sy Çhenn Ghreag as 'sy Çhenn Raue.

Cleaysh chiyt:
She lus 'sy chynney Asteraceae ish cleaysh chiyt (Hypochaeris radicata ny "Hypochoeris radicata"), as ish gollrish lus ny minnag. 
She lus sheer-vio t'ayn, as ee dooghyssagh da'n Oarpey. T'ee ry-akin ayns faaieyn dy mennick. Çheumooie jeh'n Oarpey, t'ee er ny jannoo dooghyssagh ayns America, yn Çhapaan, yn Austrail as yn Teelan Noa, as ny sarkyl ny keayrtyn.
Jalloo-oaylleeaght.
Ta'n duillag wheesh as 20cm er lhiurid. T'ad babbanagh as fynnagh, as reaghit myr roseag mygeayrt bun-fraue. Ta blaa buigh gial eck, as t'adsyn cur magh rassyn fedjagagh ta snaue er y gheay. Ta sapp bainnagh aynjee, as t'eh drigey sheeley magh rish giarrey.
T'ee ry-scarrey voish lus ny minnagh 'sy ghass as y duillag. Ta gass chleaysh chiyt gollagagh as fondagh, agh ta gass lus ny minnag jeeragh as follym. Chammah's shen, ta duillag lus ny minnag feeacklagh, as duillag chleaysh chiyt babbanagh.
Ymmyd.
Ta dagh ooilley olt cleaysh chiyt yn-ee. She duillag as fraue y bee s'cadjiney. Ta'n duillag yn-ee aw ny coagyrit, agh ta shenn duillagyn reen as snaueaneagh. Cha nel ad sharroo son y chooid smoo, as shen scansh elley eddyr ish as lus ny minnag.
Ta far-chaffee jeant ass fraue rostit cleaysh chiyt.
Nieu.
T'ad credjal dy vel rouyr cleaysh chiyt cur çhingys er cabbil.

Spittag:
Ta'n spittag ("Erithacus rubecula"), enmyssit spittag yiarg, cleeau yiarg ny ushag veg ruy neesht, ny h-ushag jeh'n chynney Muscicapidae. T'ee 14 cm er lhiurid as 14-21 g er trimmid. Ta cleeau as eddin yiarg as dreeym dhone eck. T'ee cummal ayns keylljyn, pairkyn as garaghyn 'syn Oarpey, yn Affrick Hwoaie as yn Aishey Heear. T'ee gee cretooryn gyn craue drommey.

2014:

Jamys Jeheiney:
She Jamys Jeheiney yn ennym jeh claare radio t'er ngholl er creeley er Radio Vannin AM dagh Jeheiney eddyr 17:00 as 18:00 neayr's 7 Mee Houney 2011. She "Jamys Jeheiney" yn ynrican claare radio 'sy theihll ta dy bollagh ayns Gaelg (er lhimmey jeh'n chiaull).
Stiureyder.
She Jamys O'Meara ren stiurey y chlaare veih 2011-2013, lesh paart dy chooney veih 2013 veih Daniel Quayle. Ayns 2013, she Jamys Kinree ren goaill harrish stiureydys y chlaare. T'eh er ny smooinaghtyn dy ren Jamys Kinree cur seose y chlaare ayns 2022, agh cha nel fys oikoil erbee ry gheddyn mychione. She Daniel Quayle ta stiurey y chlaare ec y traa t'ayn (er yn 18 Mayrnt 2022).
Cummey.
Ta paart dy ghammanyn goll er cloie harrish Twitter (neayr's 2012 - er çhaghteraghtyn SMS roish shen).
"Feer ny Foalsey".
'Sy ghamman "Feer ny Foalsey" ta Jamys ginsh tree skeealyn. Ta jees jeu feer - ren ad taghyrt - agh va nane jeu crooit echeysyn. Ta ny h-eaishtee tweetal nyn ansooryn ayns y chummey "Feer Foalsey Feer".

Kanghyr:
Ta'n fockle kanghyr, ny aase noa kanghyragh, currit er possan mooar dy ghorlaghyn ta goaill stiagh aase killagagh neu-reillt. 'Sy changhyr, ta ny killagyn rheynn as gaase gyn stiurey, as ad croo aaseyn kanghyragh as cur stiagh er ayrnyn ry laue jeh'n chorp. Foddee yn kanghyr skeaylley magh gys ayrnyn jeh'n chorp foddey magh lesh cooney yn chorys limfagh ny lesh cooney yn chorys folley. Cha nel dagh aase ny h-aase kanghyragh, ansherbee; cha nel aaseyn meiygh cur stiagh er kelleenyssyn gerroil as cha nel ad skeaylley gys ayrnyn elley jeh'n chorp. Ta ny smoo na 200 sorçh dy changhyryn t'er enney ain ta cur stiagh er kirp deinney.

Freddie Mercury:
By chiaulleyder, arraneyder, vard arrane as yl-chloieder greienyn Goaldagh eh Freddie Mercury (Farrokh Bulsara; Gujaratish: ફરોખ બલ્સારા‌, "Pharōkh Balsārā‌"; 5 Mean Fouyir 1946–24 Mee Houney 1991). Marish Brian May, John Deacon, as Roger Taylor, hooar eh ard-ghoo myr oltey jeh'n phossan kiaullee Queen.

Rolley caayryn ayns Israel:
Ta'n duillag shoh soilshghey caayryn Israelagh ta soit ayns Israel myrane lesh ny buill chummaltagh ta fo stiurey Israel çhesthie jeh'n Vroogh Heear. Ta'n rolley bunnit er yn ayndagh roie ta currit magh ec Ard-Oik Staydraa Israel (AOS). Rere corys gurneilys ynnydagh Israel foddee coonseil chaayragh ve bronnit er baljaght valjagh tra ta ny smoo na 20,000 dooinney cummal ayn.
Rolley.
Ta 14 caayr ayns Israel as ny smoo na 100,000 dooinney cummal ayndaue, goaill stiagh Jerusalem (ny smoo na 500,000 as goaill stiagh Jerusalem Hiar) as Tel Aviv. 'Syn ym-lane, ta staydys "caayragh" bronnit er 75 baljaght Israelagh ec Rheynn y Çheusthie. Va staydys caayragh bronnit er Kafr Qasim 'sy vlein 2008.
Ta'n rolley shoh goaill stiagh kiare boayl 'sy Vroogh Heear, ard nagh vel soit çheusthie jeh Israel hene. Ta Coonseil Shickyrys ny h-Ashoonyn Unnaneysit, Ard-Hionnal ny h-Ashoonyn Unnaneysit, Quaiyl Eddyr-Ashoonagh y Vriwnys, as Bing Eddyr-Ashoonagh y Chrosh Yiarg cur yn enmys Thalloo ny Palasteen fo Cummaltys. Ta eaghtyr as earroo pobble Jerusalem goaill stiagh Jerusalem Hiar va goit stiagh ayns Israel hene "de facto" fo conaantyn Leigh Jerusalem. Ansherbee, cha nel eh shen er enney ec y phobble eddyr-ashoonagh.
Ta'n taabyl shoh heese rang-oardraghey dagh caayr Israelagh rere ennym, slyst, eaghtyr, as earroo yn phobble, rere coontey-pobble 2009 jeh Ard-Oik Staydraa Israel:

Cardoon:
She lus 'sy chynney Asteraceae eh cardoon ("Cynara cardunculus"). She mooinjer dooghyssagh onnane vlasstal t'ayn, as shimmey troarag t'echey. T'eh dooghyssagh da'n Oarpey heear as Meanvooiragh.
Jalloo-oaylleeaght.
She lus sheer-vio lussagh t'ayn. T'eh gaase wheesh as 1.5m er yrjid. Ta duillagyn babbanagh glassey ny leeah-ghlassey echey, wheesh as 50cm er lhiurid, as jialgyn mooarey orroo. Ta ny blaaghyn gorrym-jiarg reaghit myr pseudanthium as ta jialgyn foawragh nyn mast'oc. Ta'n pseudanthium wheesh as 6cm er crantessen.
Share lesh ardjyn çhirrym, sheear dys yn Varoc as yn Phortiugal, shiar dys Yn Libya as yn Ghreag, as twoaie dys yn Chroit as y Rank yiass. T'eh ry-akin 'syn Cheeprey, ny h-Ellanyn Canaaragh as yn Vadeirey myrgeddin, as dooghyssagh daue, foddee. She sarkyl t'ayn ayns pampas ny h-Arjenteen, yn Austrail as California.
Myr troarey 'sy Reeriaght Unnaneysit, chossyn y lus Award of Garden Merit liorish y Royal Horticultural Society.
Troarey.
Ta daa phossan troarag ayn. Ta cardoon hene ("Cynara cardunculus", cocheayllagh rish "C. cardunculus" arr. "altilis" DC) er ny reih son gish duillag yn-ee. Ta onnane vlasstal ("Cynara cardunculus" possan Scolymus, cocheayllagh rish "Cynara scolymus" ny "C. cardunculus" arr. "scolymus" (L.) Fiori) er ny reih son buinnaghyn blaaghey yn-ee. Ta'n daa hroarag ny smoo na'n lus feie; cha nel monney jialgyn oc, as ta ny gish as blaaghyn ny smoo, myr shen ta troar smoo ry-gheddyn assdaue as t'eh ny sassey ad y chur stiagh. Cha nel monney scansh eddyr y jees oc as cardoon feie, as ta niart crosh-heelree eddyr oc. S'doillee daue crosh-heelraghey marish dooieyn "Cynara" elley.
Share da amm aase feayr as liauyr, mysh queig meeghyn, agh cha nod eh shassoo noi rio. Ta feme echey er rheamys mooar, as myr shen cha nel eh goll er troarey monney agh raad ta aggyrtys ynnydagh er. 
Ta jialgyn beggey do-akin, bunnys, er gish chardoon, as t'ad guinnagh dy liooar. Ta troaragyn gyn jialgyn er nyn droarey noi shen, agh bare dhyt kiarail y ghoaill gyn scansh da'n troarag t'ayn.
Ymmyd bee.
Dee ad cardoon 'sy Çhenn Ghreag, 'sy Çhenn Raue as 'sy Çhenn Phershagh. Ta feanish ayn jeh'n cherroo eash RJC liorish Theophrastus, myr (), agh cha nel enney y lus shen cruinn. V'eh ry-akin 'syn Oarpey mean-eashagh as jeianagh leah, as ayns America rish amm ny coloinyn. Hie eh ass fashan anmagh 'sy 19oo eash, agh t'eh goll er troarey foast 'sy Rank, y Spaainey as yn Iddaal. Ayns ard Geneva, ta troarag ynnydagh 'Argenté de Genève' ('Cardy') ny sur-vee ynnydagh. T'eh cadjin dy liooar 'syn Affrick hwoaie, ayns couscous Algeeragh as Tooneeshagh.
Ta ny buinnaghyn yn-ee, as t'ad goll er ee 'syn Iddaal yiass as 'sy Çhissyl. Ayns buill elley, t'ad gee ny gish son y chooid smoo.
Ta ny gish goll er çhaglym 'sy yeurey as yn arrey, kiart roish blaaghey. Ta'n blass orroo gollrish blass onnane vlasstal. 
"Roish my çhaglym cardoonyn son y voayrd, ta shin giallaghey ad liorish co-chiangley ad as filley coonlagh mygeayrt oc, as kiangley eshyn mygreddin, as faagail ad rish tree shiaghteeyn."
Ymmyd elley.
T'ad geddyn ensymeyn ass cardoon dys jannoo caashey feill-haghnagh. Ta caashey tradishoonagh ny Portiugal jeant jeh'n vinjey shoh ynrican, myr sampleyr, Queijo de Nisa.
T'eh goll er troarey myr lus jesheenagh, as ta blaaghyn mooarey as glasseraght yial ec troaragyn jesheenagh.
'Sy 21oo eash, t'ad cur geill da myr bun bea-gheesyl. Ta ooill ry-gheddyn ass ny rassyn echey, as t'eh gollrish ooill lus ny greiney. Hooar ronsaghey dy vel eh ny share na ooill reap bentyn rish cormid bree as jeeyl çhymbyllagh.

Ramla:
She caayr 'sy Clyst Veanagh ayns Israel eh Ramla ( "Ramlāh", "ar-Ramlah"; screeuit sheese myr Ramlah, Ramle, Remle as Rama chammah). She Ewnyn tromlagh y phobble (80% 'sy vlein 2001) agh ta ram Arabee cummal ayn chammah (16% Arabee Voslymagh as 4% Arabee Chreestee). Va'n chaayr bunnit m. 705–715 BNJ ec y Chaliph Umayyadagh Suleiman ibn Abed al-Malik lurg ren ny h-Arabee goaill yn ard. T'eh ny lhie er bollagh y "Via Maris" ta kiangley Cairo rish Damascus ec crossag marish y raad ta kiangley Jerusalem rish y phurt ayns Yafo.
Mooinjerys eddyr-ashoonagh.
Baljyn as caayryn lannoonit.
Ta Ramla goll er lannooney rish:

Kliszów, Queiggey Święty Krzyż:
She balley beg 'sy clyst reiragh Kije ayns Coontae Pińczów 'sy wheiggey Święty Krzyż ayns jiass meanagh y Pholynn eh Kliszów (). T'eh ny lhie mysh 4 km çheu heear veih Kije, 10 km çheu hwoaie veih Pińczów, as 31 km çheu yiass veih'n phreeu-valley ardjynagh, Kielce.
Haghyr Cah Kliszów ayns ard y valley beg er 19 Jerrey Souree 1702 car Caggey Mooar y Twoaie eddyr Reihderaght Sachsen as Co-lahys ny Polynn as ny Litaan er un çheu as Impiraght ny Soolynn er y çheu elley.

Kliszów:
Foddee dy vel Kliszów çheet er ny buill shoh heese 'sy Pholynn:

Kliszów, Queiggey yn Tileesh Eeaghtyragh:
She balley beg 'sy clyst reiragh Rudna ayns Coontae Lubin ayns Queiggey yn Tileesh Eeaghtyragh ayns sheear yiass y Pholynn eh Klisów (; ). T'eh ny lhie mysh 16 km çheu hiar hwoaie veih Lubin as 63 km çheu heear hwoaie veih'n phreeu-valley ardjynagh, Wrocław.
Roish y vlein 1945 va'n chaayr soit 'sy Ghermaan

Kliszów, Queiggey Podkarpacie:
She balley beg 'sy clyst reiragh Gawłuszowice ayns Coontae Mielec ayns Queiggey Podkarpacie ayns shiar yiass y Pholynn eh Klisów (). T'eh ny lhie mysh 4 km çheu yiass veih Gawłuszowice, 13 km çheu hwoaie veih Mielec, as 59 km çheu heear hwoaie veih'n phreeu-valley ardjynagh, Rzeszów.

Lieh-innys Sinai:
She lieh-innys ayns cummey troorane 'syn Egypt eh Lieh-innys Sinai (; Arabish Egyptagh: ). Ta'n lieh-innys 60,000 km2 (23,000 mi ker) er eaghtyr as t'eh soit eddyr y Veanvooir 'sy twoaie as y Vooir Ruy 'sy jiass. Dy çheer-oaylleeagh, ta'n lieh-innys ny hoie 'syn Aishey, ga dy vel y chooid elley jeh'n Egypt ny soie 'syn Affrick. Rere shen, t'eh gaghtey myr droghad eddyr yn daa vooar-rheynn. Ta mysh 500,000 dooinney cummal ayn.

Brattagh y Pholynn:
Ta brattagh y Pholynn jeant ass daa rimmeig chochruinnagh chorrym er lheead. Ta'n fer er baare bane er daah, as y fer er bun jiarg er daah. Ta cur sheese ayns bunraght y Pholynn er y daa ghaah myr daaghyn oikoil y çheer. Ta lhieggan elley jeh'n vrattagh marish armys yn çheer freillt dy leighoil son ymmyd oikoil ass y çheer as er ny faarkaghyn. Ta brattagh cosoylagh gollageagh ymmydit myr mergey faarkee yn Pholynn.
Va ny daaghyn bane as jiarg doltit myr daaghyn oikoil 'sy vlein 1831. Ta bun heraldagh ec ny daaghyn as t'ad çheet magh ass ny tinshuryn er armyssyn y daa çheer v'ayn ayns Co-unnaneys ny Polynn as ny Litaan — Urley Bane ny Polynn as Eiyreyder Ard-Diucaght ny Litaan, reejerey bane ta markiagh cabbyl bane er scape jiarg. Va'n brattagh doltit er 1 Luanistyn 1919.

Armys y Pholynn:
She armys ashoonagh y Pholynn eh armys y Pholynn () dy h-oikoil. She sorçh d'urley bane marish gob as ingnyn airhey echey ta ceau crooin vane, as ry-haishbyney er scape jiarg.

Coontae Pińczów:
She unnid reirey thallooinagh as gurneilys ynnydagh (powiat) ayns Queiggey Święty Krzyż, jiass meanagh y Pholynn, eh Coontae Pińczów (). Va'n coontae currit er bun er 1 Jerrey Geuree 1999 rere lhiassaghey gurneilys ynnydagh ny Polynn 'sy vlein 1998. She Pińczów y toiag reirey as y balley smoo ayn as eh ny lhie 40 km çheu yiass veih'n phreeu-valley queiggagh Kielce. Cha nel agh un valley elley 'sy choontae — Działoszyce, as eh ny lhie 23 km çheu heear yiass veih Pińczów.
Ta'n coontae 612.85 kilomeaderyn kerrinagh er eaghtyr as 'sy vlein 2006 va 42,127 dooinney cummal ayn. Va 11,886 dooinney cummal ayns Pińczów, 1,068 ayns Działoszyce as 29,173 dooinney cummal mooie çheu çheerey.
Ta Coontae Starogard çhemmal rish Coontae Kielce 'sy twoaie, rish Coontae Busko 'sy niar, rish Coontae Kazimierza 'sy jiass, rish Coontae Miechów 'sy neear, as rish Coontae Jędrzejów 'sy neear.
Aarheynnyn reiragh.
Ta'n coontae goll er rheynn magh ayns 5 slyst (gmina) (daa lyst valjagh-heerey as tree slyst çheerey). T'ad ry-akin 'sy taabyl shoh heese, rere earroo yn phobble.

Taganrog:
She caayr phurtagh ayns Queiggey Rostov, y Roosh, eh Taganrog (). T'eh ny hoie er coose hwoaie Vaie Taganrog (cooid jeh Mooir Azov) çheu heear veih inver yn awin Don. T'eh soit mysh 70 km veih Rostov-na-Donu.
Va Taganrog bunnit 'sy vlein 1698 ec y Tsar Peddyr I. Va'n chaayr ny chied chaayr va bunnit myr laare lhuingyssagh caggee, ny chied chaayr dy ve troggit er mooir 'oshlit (gyn rio 'sy gheurey) as ny chied chaayr 'sy Roosh va troggit rere aght plannit.
'Sy vlein 2013, va 254,783 dooinney cummal 'sy chaayr as ny smoo na 325,000 'syn ard mygeayrt y chaayr. Ta ny smoo na keead ashoonaght cummal 'sy chaayr chammah, goaill stiagh Greagee, Ewnyn as Armeainee.

Rostov-na-Donu:
She caayr phurtagh ayns Queiggey Rostov, y Roosh, eh Rostof-na-Donu (, "Rostov er yn (awin) Don"). She caayr reiragh Wheiggey Rostov as Lyst Chonastagh Yiass jeh'n Roosh t'ayn. T'eh ny lhie er yn awin Don, mysh 32 km veih Mooir Azov. Ta fo-valjyn y chaayr sheeyney cha foddey magh ass y chaayr as dy vel ad çheet ry-cheilley rish deltey yn awin Don.
'Sy vlein 2014 va 1 109 800 dooinney cummal 'sy chaayr. Rere yn earroo shen, she Rostov-na-Donu y 10oo caayr smoo 'sy Roosh. Ta ny smoo na 2.16 millioon dooinney cummal 'sy voir-valley çheu mooie jeh'n chaayr hene.

Yn Chaladoan:
She yn Chaladoan, ta çheet magh ass "Caledonia" y Ladjyn, yn ennym v'ec ny Rauee er y thalloo va ny lhie çheu hwoaie jeh'n wheiggey oc "Britannia", ny s'odjey na joarey yn impiraght oc. Ta Gaeil noa-emshyragh ny h-Albey cur "Tír nan Cailleannach" er yn enmys shoh. Jiu, ta'n enmys ymmydit myr ennym druiaghtagh ny bardagh son Nalbin, gollrish yn enmys "Hibernia" (ta ymmydit ayns cooish Nerin) as "Britannia" (ta ymmydit ayns cooish y Vretyn Vooar).

Robert Bunsen:
She kemmigagh Germaanagh va Robert Wilhelm Eberhard Bunsen (30 Mayrnt 1811 – 16 Luanistyn 1899). Ren eh ronsaghey spectrumyn brooightaghyn jeh stoo çhiowit. Myrane lesh Gustav Kirchhoff, ren eh feddyn magh ny bunstooghyn kaishum (1860) as rubiddjum (1861). Ren Bunsen lhiassaghey shiartanse d'aghtyn bun-ronsee bunnit er gas as by chioneraadagh eh 'syn 'otochemmig. Ren eh gobbraghey ayns reamys y chemmig orgaano-arsnagh. ren eh lhiassaghey losteyder Bunsen marish e chooneyder seyrlann Peter Desaga. Ta losteyderyn Bunsen foast goll er ymmyd ayns seyrlannyn er feie yn Dowan jiu.

Pinczyn:
She balley beg ayns Baljaght Zblewo, çheusthie jeh Coontae Starogard ayns Queiggey Pomorze, twoaie yn Pholynn eh Pinczyn (). T'eh ny lhie mysh 4 km çheu hwoaie veih Zblewo, 13 km çheu heear veih Starogard Gdański, as 49 km çheu heear yiass veih'n preeu-valley queiggagh Gdańsk. Ta 2,325 dooinney cummal 'sy valley beg.

Eilat:
She Eilat (; ) y chaayr smoo yiassagh ayns Israel. She purt harroogh as ynnyd seyrey foayroil eh Eilat. T'eh ny hoie er baare y Vooir Ruy er Lhoob Aqaba.
Ta ny smoo na 47,700 dooinney cummal ayn. She cooid jeh Faasagh Yiass Negev ec bun jiass Arava eddyr y valley Egyptagh Taba ec y jiass as y phurt Yordaanagh Aqaba 'sy niar. Ta'n Araab Saudi ry-akin harrish y lhoob shiar yiass veih'n valley.
Mooinjerys eddyr-ashoonagh.
Baljyn as caayryn lannoonit.
Ta parteeas ayn eddyr Tel Aviv as Los Angeles ayns ny Steatyn Unnaneysit as, myrane lesh shen, t'eh goll er lannooney rish:

Negev:
She ard faasagh as lieh-aasagh ayns jiass Israel eh Negev ( "haNéḡeḇ"; "al-Naqab"). She Beersheba (196,000 dooinney) ayns twoaie Negev y chaayr smoo as y balley reiragh ayn. Ayns jiass Negev, ta Lhoob Aqaba as ynnyd seyrey Eilat ry-gheddyn. Ta shiartanse dy valjyn lhiassee ry-gheddyn ayn chammah, goaill stiagh Dimona, Arad as Mitzpe Ramon, myrane lesh shiartanse dy chaayryn Bedjoonagh, lheid as Rahat as Tel as-Sabi. Ta kibbutzim eigsoylagh ayn chammah, goaill stiagh Revivim as Sde Boker. By eh yn fer s'jerree balley jerrinagh scuirr y chied Ard-vinishter Israelagh, David Ben-Gurion.
Bun-ocklaght.
Ta bun yn 'ockle "negev" çheet magh as fraue Ewnish ta keeallaghey "çhirrym". 'Sy Vible, ta'n fockle "Negev" shassoo son "jiass"; ta'n fockle "Negeb" goll er ymmyd chammah. 'Syn Arabish, ta Negev goll er enney myr "al-Naqab", ga nagh row yn ard coontit myr ard er lheh derrey soilshaghey magh yn joarey eddyr yn Egypt as yn Impiraght Ottomanagh 'sy 19oo eash as cha nel ennym Arabish tradishoonagh echey. Car yn Anney Goaldagh v'eh er enney myr fo-lyst Beersheba.
Çheer-oaylleeaght.
Ta Negev coodaghey ny smoo na lieh ayrn jeh Israel, ny smoo na 13,000 km² (4,700 sq mi) ny 55% jeh eaghtyr yn çheer er y chooid sloo. T'eh ayns cummey troorane ta shassoo bun ry-skyn. Ta'n çheu heear çheuaghey rish faasagh Lieh-innys Sinai as she glion Arabah y çheu hiar. Ta shiartanse dy hroyn cultooragh as creg-oaylleeagh symoil ayns Negev. Mastey ny troyn creg-oaylleeagh, ta tree "makhteshim" (foaryn bocs) ayns cummey towl ayn nagh vel ry-gheddyn ayns ard elley; Makhtesh Ramon, Makhtesh Gadol, as Makhtesh Katan.
She faasagh creggagh eh Negev. She mestey jeh sleityn creggagh dhone marish "wadi"yn (lhiabbeeyn awin çhirmey ta çheet my vlaa lurg fliaghey) as tuill ghowin currit ny hrooid. Foddee yn faasagh y rheynn ayns queig ard egg-oaylleeagh: twoaie, sheear, as mean Negev, yn ard-chlaare as Glion Arabah. Ta mysh 300 mm dy liaghey tuittym er twoaie Negev, ny yn chryss Veanvooiragh, as ta'n ooir 'syn ard shoh troaragh. Ta mysh 250 mm dy liaghey tuittym er sheear Negev, as ta'n ooir 'syn ard shoh eddrym as lieh-gheinnee. Foddee ny dreeyminyn geinnee roshtyn 30 meaderyn 'syn ard shoh. Ta mysh 200 mm dy liaghey tuittym er mean Negev, raad ta Beersheba ny hoie. She loess yn sorçh d'ooir ta ry-gheddyn 'syn ard shoh. She yn ard-hro jeh'n sorçh ooirrey shoh na dy vel eh jeen noi'n ushtey. Rere shen, cha nel yn ooir lhiggey da'n ushtey goll stiagh 'syn ooir as ta ny smoo crimmey ooirrey as skeayley ushtey ry-gheddyn ayns shoh. Ta'n ard-chlaare mygeayrt Ramat HaNegev (, "Ardjyn Negev") shassoo eddyr 370 as 520 meader ny s'yrjey na yrjid ny marrey. Ta ny souraghyn feer heh as ta ny geuraghyn feer feayr. Ta mysh 100 mm dy liaghey tuittym er yn ard shoh as ta'n ooir beggan sollanagh. Ta Glion Arabah sheeyney rish y joarey Jordaanagh feie 180 km veih Eilat 'sy jiass gys bun y Vooir Varroo. T'eh feer hirrym as s'goan dy vel 50 mm dy liaghey tuittym er yn ard shoh. S'boght yn ooir as cha nel mooarane gaase ayns shoh gyn cooney yn ushtaghey as bisheeyn ooirrey.
Blaanid as beiyn.
S'goan y vlaanid ayns Negev, agh ta biljyn as lussyn er lheh gaase ayn dy rahoil, goaill stiagh yn acaashey, "Pistacia", "Retama", "Urginea maritima" as "Thymelaea". Ta earroo beg dy lepardyn Arabagh, cretoor t'ayns gaue er lieh-innys ny h-Arabaght, cummal ayns Jiass Negev. She dooie ayns feer ghaue Shligganagh Negev ("Testudo werneri") nagh vel cummal agh ayns ny geinnee ayns sheear as mean faasagh Negev. She dooie sheeintagh jeh'n chynney "Soricidae" nagh vel ry-gheddyn boayl elley erbee faagail magh Israel eh Joushag Negev ("Crocidura ramona").
Deyn-oaylleeaght.
Jiu, ta ram laareyn jeh cooid Forseyn Coadee Israel soit ayns Negev. 'Sy vlein 2010, va ny smoo na 630,000 dooinney cummal 'syn ard (8.2% jeh pobble y çheer), ga dy vel eh coodaghyn 55% jeh eaghtyr y çheer. She Ewnyn 470,000 dooinney, ny 75% jeh pobble yn ard, as she Bedjoonyn 160,000, ny 25% jeh pobble yn ard. Mastey yn phobble Bedjoonagh, ta lieh-chooid jeu cummal ayns baljyn beggey gyn enney as ta lieh-chooid jeu cummal ayns baljyn as baljyn beggey va troggit dauesyn eddyr ny 1960yn as ny 1980yn. She Rahat y fer smoo jeu.
T'eh er ooley dy bee ny smoo na 1.25 millioon dooinney cummal ayns Negev roish y vlein 2025. T'eh er ooley dy bee mysh 1 millioon dooinney cummal ayns ard moirvaljagh Beersheva roish y vlein 2020, as bee ny baljyn Arad, Yeruham, as Dimona tree keayrt ny smoo roish y vlein 2025.

Chaim Herzog:
She politickeyr, sidoor, leighder as ughtar va Chaim Herzog (). V'eh ny 6oo Eaghtyrane er Israel.
Va Herzog ruggit ayns Beeal Feirshtey myr mac ec y rabbi ard-ghooagh Yitzhak HaLevi Herzog va ny Ard-Rabbi er Nerin veih'n vlein 1919 derrey 1937 (as, ny s'anmey, er y Phalasteen as Israel). Ren e lught thie cummal ayns Portobello, Divlyn, veih'n vlein 1919.
Ren eh astreeaghey gys y Phalasteen 'sy vlein 1935 raad ren eh goaill shirveish 'sy Haganah car Irree Magh ny h-Arabee, 1936-1939. Lurg shen, hooar eh keim ayns Colaashtey Ollooscoil Lunnin. Hie eh stiagh ayns ny forseyn Goaldagh car y Nah Chaggey Dowanagh. Ghow eh paart ayns seyrey shiartanse dy leih-champyn. Daag eh yn armee ayns 1947.

Modi'in Illit:
She balley cummaltit as caayr Israelagh Haredagh 'sy Vroogh Heear eh Modi'in Illit (; ; "Modi'in Eaghtyragh" dy lettyragh). T'eh ny hoie lieh-vollagh eddyr Tel Aviv as Jerusalem. Va staydys caayragh bronnit er y chaayr ec reiltys Israel 'sy vlein 2008. T'eh ny hoie mysh 6 km (3.7 mi) çheu hiar hwoaie veih Modi'in-Maccabim-Re'ut as ta'n ennym Kiryat Sefer ("Balley ny Lioaryn") currit er dy mennick, ennym y chied chiarroo va troggit 'sy vlein 1994. V'eh troggit ayns ynnyd queig balley beg Palasteenagh: Ni'lin, Kharbata, Saffa, Bil'in as Dir Qadis. Ec jerrey yn vlein 2009, va 46,200 dooinney cummal 'sy valley, as 'sy vlein 2013 va 59,332 dooinney cummal ayn. Rere ny h-earrooyn shen t'eh ny valley Ewagh smoo 'syn ard.

Ny Çheeraghyn Balkanagh:
She ard çheer-oaylleeagh as cultooragh 'syn Oarpey Hiar Yiass ad ny Çheeraghyn Balkanagh. Ta ennym ny Sleityn Balkanagh, ta roie veih'n Vulgeyr Hiar gys y Terb Hiar, currit er yn ard.
Ta'n ard cummaltit ec Slavee (Bosniee, Bulgeyree, Bunjevci, Croitee, Gorani, Massadoanee, Montenegree, Serbee, Sloveanee), Ladjynee (Romaanee, Aromaanee), Greagee, Albaanee, Turkee as possanyn kynneeagh elley, lheid as Romanee, Ashkali, as possanyn elley. She yn Chreestiaght Chair-chredjuagh yn credjue smoo, roish y Chreestiaght Chatoleagh as yn Islam.
Ta'n ard 666,700 km2 (257,400 mi ker) er eaghtyr as 'sy vlein 2002 va 59,297,000 dooinney cummal ayn. Ta'n ard çhemmit liorish y Vooir Aidreeatagh 'sy neear hwoaie, liorish y Vooir Ionagh 'sy neear yiass, liorish y Veanvooir as y Vooir Aejeeanagh 'sy jiass as 'sy niar yiass, as liorish y Vooir Ghoo 'sy niar as 'sy niar hwoaie. Ta'n joarey hwoaie, er y chooid smoo, jeant seose jeh ny h-awinyn Danube (veih'n vooir gys Belgraaid) as Sava (veih Belgraaid gys boayl 'sy Clovean, beggan sheear veih Zagreb).
Çheeraghyn ta nyn lhie 'syn ard shoh, t'ad goaill stiagh:

Cleaysh lughagh:
She lus sheer-vio ee cleaysh lughagh (Cerastium fontanum). Ny keayrtyn t'ad cur cleaysh lheeah ny lus y çhengey veg urree, agh ta ny h-enmyn shen ec lossreeyn elley myrgeddin. T'ee dooghyssagh da'n Oarpey.
T'ee gaase myr brat, wheesh as 4-8" er yrjid. Ta'n ghass gientyn fraueyn raad t'ee bentyn rish y thalloo, as myr shen t'ee skeeaylley magh. Ta duillagyn s'inshley spaddylagh as duillagyn dronuillagagh eck; t'ad geayshteenagh as ta oirr rea oc. T'ad gaase dy #piyral|piyral er y ghass. Ta blaaghyn beggey baney eck.

Pobblaght Hene-reiltagh y Chrimeea:
She pobblaght hene-reiltagh jeh'n Ookraan ee Pobblaght Hene-reiltagh y Chrimeea ( "Avtonomna Respublika Krym", "Avtonomnaya Respublika Krym", ). Ta'n phobblaght hene-reiltagh goaill stiagh y chooid smoo jeh lieh-innys y Chrimeea. T'ee çhemmit 'sy jiass as 'sy neear liorish y Vooir Ghoo, 'sy niar liorish Mooir Azov as Keyllys Kerch, as 'sy twoaie liorish yn Ookraan. Cha nel agh taagher keyl kiangley yn lieh-innys rish y çheer vooar. Ta Caayr Sevastopol çhemmal rish y phobblaght hene-reiltagh 'sy neear yiass. She Simferopol preeu-valley yn phobblaght hene-reiltagh.
'Sy vlein 2007, va 1,973,185 dooinney cummal 'sy phobblaght hene-reiltagh. Lesh shen, va 2,352,385 dooinney cummal ayn 'sy vlein shen. She Rooshee 58.32% jeh pobble yn ard, Ookraanee 24.32% as Tataree Chrimeeagh 12.1%.

Brest, y Velaroosh:
She caayr 'sy Velaroosh er y joarey rish y Pholynn eh Brest ( "Brest" ny "Bierascie" dy tradishoonagh; "Brest"; ; ; "Brisk"). 'Sy vlein 2010 va 310,800 dooinney cummal ayn.

Cleaysh voddee:
