She lus cadjin keylley 'sy chynney Araceae ee cleaysh voddee (Arum maculatum). T'ee ry-akin er feie ny h-Oarpey.
Jalloo-oayleeaght.
Ta duillagyn breck glass as gorrym-jiarg çheet magh 'syn arragh. Ta ny blaaghyn nyn soie er spaaidjag gorrym jiarg ny buigh, as speid bane-ghlass mygeayrt echey. Ta ny blaaghyn ass shilley rish bun y speid; ta fainney dy vlaaghyn bwoirrin heese as fainney firryn heose.
Ta fainney dy renaigyn erskyn ny blaaghyn croo ribbey beishteig. Ta soar as çhiassid y speid (wheesh as 15C ny s'çhoe na'n çhiassid çhemmalagh) cleayney beishteigyn, as "Psychoda phalaenoides" erskyn ooilley. T'ad goit ec y ribbey renaigagh as ta pollyn ny blaaghyn firryn ceaut orroo roish my nod as scapail. T'ad dy ymmyrkey da spaaidjagyn lossreeyn elley as pollnaghey ny blaaghyn bwoirrin lesh. T'ee cleayney caigneyderyn myrgeddin.
'Syn 'ouyr t'ee jannoo berrishyn jiarg feer nieunagh ass ny blaaghyn bwoirrin. Ta ocsalaaytyn saponin ayndaue ta brasnaghey crackan, aahjioogh, çhengey as gailley. Foddee eh gientyn doilleeid ennal, loshtaght as çhingys gailley, agh ta'n blass geyre oc as gleayshaght yialgagh 'sy veeal lhiettal sleih veih ee monney son y chooid smoo. Foddee aart erbee jee gientyn aawoalley allerjagh, myr shen, gow kiarail rish bentyn ree.
Ta fraue mooar eck, wheesh as 40cm fo hallooin.
Ymmyd.
Bee.
Ta fraue rostit cleaysh voddee yn-ee. V'ad cliaghtey creck eh myr "Portland sago", ayns ynnyd stark Injynagh, flooyr ny salep. Foddee eh ve nieunagh mannagh vel eh jeant dy kiart.
Jesheenaghey.
T'ee goll er troarey myr lus jesheenagh.

Simferopol:
She caayr er lieh-innys y Chrimeea eh Simferopol (; ; "y mosk bane"). Myr preeu-valley yn lieh-innys, she cree politickagh, tarmaynagh as arraghey Simferopol. 'Sy vlein 2013 va 362,366 dooinney cummal ayn. She unnid reiragh Phobblaght Hene-reiltagh ny Crimeea (yn Ookraan) ny Phobblaght ny Crimeea (y Roosh) t'ayn.

William Lawrence Bragg:
S'ard-ghooagh William Lawrence Bragg (31 Mayrnt 1890 – 1 Jerrey Souree 1971), y fishigagh Goaldagh va ruggit 'syn Austrail, as e ayr William Henry Bragg (1890-1971) er yn oyr dy ren ad gymmydey scellyn-X y strughtoor jeh crystalyn y gheddyn magh. Dod ad taishbyney dy row crystalyn dy stoo goll rish cloreed sodjum jeant ass millioonyn dy h-eeaneyn cloreed as eeaneyn sodjum reaghit dy reajagh. Sy vlein 1915, chossyn ad Aundyr Nobel ayns Fishig ayns paart son yn obbyr oc ayns crystallografeeaght scell-X. She ny Braggyn yn un ayr as vac chossyn yn onnor shoh. Haink Bragg dy ve ny Olloo jeh Fishig ec Ollooscoill Cambridge. Tra dirree eh ass yn obbyr shen, va anaase mooar echey er ynsaghey sheanse da sleih aegey.

Kaodan:
She commyoon 'sy rheynn Mor-Bihan 'sy Vritaan ayns sheear hwoaie jeh'n Rank eh Kaodan (). T'eh soit faggys da as çheu hwoaie jeh'n valley mooar an Oriant as ta'n balley mooar elley Henbont soit da'n shiar.
Ennym y valley.
She Kaodan yn ennym oikoil ta currit er y valley 'sy Vritaanish, agh ta pobbyl ynnydagh y valley fockley magh yn ennym myr myr . Veagh eh screeuit sheese myr as eh cur yn breear ("keyllaghey, jannoo keyll") gys cooinaghtyn as eh focklit magh myr 'sy Ghwenedish, yn abbyrt jeh'n Vritaanish ta goll er loayrt ayns Kaodan.
Çheer-oaylleeaght.
Ta'n commyoon çhemmit dy najooragh 'sy neear as 'sy niar liorish ny h-awinyn Skorf as Blavezh. T'eh jannoo seose paart jeh Boodeeys Baljyn an Oriant ayns sheear yiass Mor-Bihan.
Deyn-oaylleeaght.
Ta'n ennym Frangish as yn ennym Britaanish currit er cummaltee yn valley.
'Sy vlein 2011 va 6,865 dooinney cummal 'sy chommyoon, beggan ny smoo na'n 6,839 dooinney va recortyssit 'sy choontey-pobble 'sy vlein 2008. Shoh heese recortyssey jeh earroo yn phobble veih'n vlein 1911:
Y Vritaanish.
Ren y meoir ayns draght conaantyn lhing oikagh echey (2008-2014) kyndaghey y chaart "Ya d'ar Brezhoneg" y fo-screeu as ayns coyrlaghey marish "Tarzh an Deiz" cowraghyn 'sy Vritaanish y lhiassaghey. Va olteynys ayns kaart "Ya d'ar Brezhoneg" keim 1 doltit ec y Choonseil Valjagh er 30 Mean Fouyir 2010 as fo-screeuit er 2 Jerrey Souree 2012.
Ayns Mee Vayrnt dagh blein, veih'n vlein 2006, ta'n çheshaght "Tarzh an Deiz" stiurey y cuirrey kiaull "Kan ar Bobl" (Bro-Gwened) ayns Kaodan.
Va brastyl daa-hengagh foshlit ayns Scoill Chatoleagh Noo Joseph ayns Mean Fouyir 2013. Ta 21 phaitçhey er y rolley (3.5% jeh paitçhyn y vunscoill phobbylagh).
Shuyr-valjyn.
Baljyn as caayryn lannoonit.
Ta Kaodan goll er lannooney rish:

Thing:
By horçh jeh corpane as quaiyl reiree ayns sheshaghtyn Germaanagh va doltit ayns sheshaghtyn Celtiagh er lheh eh thing ny ting (Shenn Loghlynish, Shenn Vaarle as Eeslynnish: ; Germaanish, Ollanish: ; çhengaghyn Loghlynagh noa-emshyragh: ). Va ny thingyn jeant seose jeh pobble seyr y voodeeys as stiurit ec loayreyderyn leigh. Haink ad ry-cheilley ec boayl thing fo'n ennym , ny "tinvaal" 'sy Ghaelg 'sy laa t'ain.
Quaiyllyn slattyssagh as undinyssyn roie.
Ta quaiyllyn slattyssagh ashoonagh 'syn Eeslynn, ayns Noylnn as 'sy Danvarg goaill stiagh y fockle "thing":
Ta enmyn ny quaillyn slattyssagh ayns ny h-ardjyn hene-reilltagh ayns Åland, Ellanyn ny Geyrragh, Greenlynn as Mannin goaill stiagh y fockle "thing":

Cleaysh vuc:
She lus lussagh 'sy chynney Aristolochiaceae ee cleaysh vuc (Aristolochia clematitis). T'ee dooghyssagh da'n Oarpey. Ta'n lus nieunagh.
Jalloo-oaylleeaght.
Ta duillagyn cree-chrooagh eck, as blaaghyn feddanoil buigh-ghlass. T'ee snaie cast gish lossreeyn elley dys drappal cour yn ghrian.
Ymmyd lheeys as nieu.
Va ymmyd jeant jee myr lus lheeys, as myr shen t'ee ry-akin ny keayrtys çheymooie jeh'n rheamys dooghyssagh eck, raad erbee v'ee goll er troarey. T'ad credjal dy nee cleaysh vuc va bun thousaneyn dy chooishyn jeh gorley aaragh Balkanagh 'syn Romaain, y Vulgeyr, yn Serb, Bosnia as Herzegovina as yn Chroit, kyndagh rish flooyr sollit gyn yss lesh cleaysh vuc. Ta feanish ayn jeh kanghyr ammyr mooiney erreish da ee y lus. Ta kiangley ayn eddyr gorley aaragh as geayrag aristolochagh, t'ayns y lus. Hooar magh ad y kiangley erreish da lheelann reurid 'sy Velg jannoo ymmyd jeh lus elley 'sy chynney myr brasneyder moon. Haink brishey aaragh er kuse dy hurransee.

Britaanee:
She possan kynneeagh ny Britaanee ( ny ; ). T'ad cummal 'sy Vritaan, lieh-innys er coose heear hwoaie jeh'n Oarpey vooarheeragh. Ta'n chooid smoo jeu nyn lught sluightagh jeh possanyn jeh Brythonisheyryn ren astreeaghey as jurnaaghey gys y Vritaan veih sheear yiass y Vretyn Vooar, goaill stiagh y Chorn, cha leah as y 3oo eash BNJ as cha jeianagh as y 9oo eash BNJ (eddyr ny bleeantyn 450 as 600 er y chooid smoo).
She yn Vritaanish () y phreeu-hengey hradishoonagh oc as t'ee foast goll er loayrt ayns Breizh-Izel ("y Vritaan Eeaghtyragh"). Jiu, ta'n Vritaanish goll er loayrt ec mysh 365,000 dooinney, agh cha nel agh mysh 240,000 jeu nyn Mritaanisheyryn flaaoil. She Gallo y vyn-çhengey ghooghyssagh elley. She çhengey Cheltiagh y Vritaanish as she çhengey Romanagh y Gallo. Ta'n chooid smoo jeh ny Britaanee noa-emshyragh loayrt 'sy Rangish.

Boalley yn Accan:
Ta Boalley yn Accan, y Boalley Heear, ny Kotel ( ; ) ny hoie ayns Jerusalem, Israel, ec bun y çheu heear jeh Cronk y Çhiamble. She remlad jeh'n çhenn-voalley va cruinnaghey close y Çhiamble Ewagh, as, rere tradishoon, t'eh coontit myr y boayl smoo scanshoil 'syn Ewaghys magh veih Cronk y Çhiamble hene. Ta beggan ny smoo na lieh chooid jeh'n voalley, goaill stiagh ny 17 straih fo corrym y traid, cha shenndeeagh as jerrey eash y Nah Hiamble as eh er credjal dy row eh troggit mysh 19 RC ec Herod Mooar. Ansherbee, rere toghailtyn s'noa, ta'n 'eanish taishbyney nagh row yn boalley creaghnit roish baase Herod. Va ny straihyn jerrinagh currit rish y voalley veih'n 7oo eash as ny s'anmey. Ta Boalley yn Accan cur sheese er y veer vooie ta jeeaghyn magh er plaase mooar 'sy Cherroo Ewagh, myrane lesh ny meeryn ta follit çheu chooylloo jeh strughtooryn feie lhiurid slane Chronk y Çhiamble, lheid as y Boalley Beg Heear — meer 25 tr (8 m) er lhiurid 'sy Cherroo Moslymagh.

Yn Kerroo Ewagh:
She fer jeh ny kerrooyn tradishoonagh ayns Shenn Valley Jerusalem eh yn Kerroo Ewagh ( ny ; ). Ta'n ard, ta 116,000 meader kerrinagh er eaghtyr, soit ayns rheynnag hiar yiass jeh'n chaayr voallit, as t'eh sheeyney magh veih Giat Heion 'sy jiass, rish y Cherroo Armeanagh 'sy neear, gys Straid y Driaght 'sy twoaie as t'eh sheeyney gys Boalley yn Accan as Cronk y Çhiamble 'sy niar. Ayns bleeantyn beggey yn 20oo eash va mysh 19,000 Ew cummal ayn.
Jiu, ta 2,000 cummaltagh ayn as ta ram "yeshiva" as synagog soit ayn, goaill stiagh Synagog Hurva va stroiet shiartanse dy cheayrtyn as va aachasherickit 'sy vlein 2010.

Celtibeirish:
Y Cheltibeirish, she çhengey Cheltiagh va goll er loayrt ec ny Celtibeiree er Lieh-innys ny h-Ibeir eddyr ushtaghyn eaghtyragh ny h-awinyn Duero, Tajo, Júcar as Turia as Ebro. Ta feanish ayn jeh'n çhengey ayns begnagh 200 screeunyn veih'n chied as y nah eash RC. Ta'n chooid smoo jeu screeuit sheese 'syn abbyrlhit Celtibeiragh, agh ta fir ayn 'syn abbyrlhit Romanagh chammah. Ta ny screeunyn by lhiurey ry-gheddyn er tabladyn Botorrita, tabladyn ooha veih Botorrita faggys da Zaragoza veih'n chied eash RC. T'ad enmyssit Botorrita I, III as IV (ta Botorrita II 'sy Ladjyn).

Yn Chrimeea:
She lieh-innys er coose hwoaie jeh'n Vooir Ghoo ta begnagh cruinnit slane lesh ushtey eh Lieh-innys ny Crimeea ( "Krymskiy poluostrov"; "Krymskyy pivostriv"; ), ny yn Chrimeea (Rooshish: Крым "Krym"; Ookraanish: Крим "Krym"; Tatarish Chrimeeagh: "Qırım") dy h-aashagh. Ta'n lieh-innys soit çheu yiass veih çheer vooar yn Ookraan as çheu heear veih'n ard Rooshagh Kuban. T'ee çhemmit liorish daa vooir: y Vooir Ghoo as Mooir Azov 'sy niar. T'ee kianglt rish çheer vooar yn Ookraan liorish Quing Hallooin Perekop as t'ee scarrit veih Kuban liorish Keyllys Kerch.
Ta reiltys yn ellan "de jure" fo reiltys yn Ookraan, agh "de facto" fo reiltys y Roosh. She Pobblaght Hene-reiltagh ny Crimeea yn unnid Ookraanagh as she Pobblaght ny Crimeea yn unnid Rooshagh. Ta Caayr Sevastopol, unnid gurneilys ynnydagh elley 'sy neear yiass, fo stiurey yn Roosh chammah, gollrish Pobblaght ny Crimeea.

Pobblaght y Chrimeea:
She aarheynn chonastagh jeh'n Roosh ee Pobblaght y Chrimeea (, "Respublika Krym"; Tatarish Chrimeeagh: Къырым Джумхуриети, "Qırım Cumhuriyeti"; , "Respublika Krym"). T'ee soit er lieh-innys y Chrimeea. Dy h-eddyrashoonagh, t'ee coontit myr cooid "de jure" jeh'n Ookraan, agh, er 18 Mayrnt 2014, haink er yn ard, myrane lesh Caayr Sevastopol, dy ve ny chooid jeh'n Roosh "de facto".

Yn Chrimeea (reddaghey):
Shimmey keeall lesh yn enmys yn Chrimeea:

Queiggey Donetsk:
She queiggey 'syn Ookraan hiar eh Queiggey Donetsk ( "Donets'ka Oblast'"; "Donetskaya oblast") ny Donechchyna (Ookraanish: Донеччина) myr t'eh enmyssit dy mennick. She Donetsk y balley reiragh. Dy shenndeeagh, ta'n ard coontit myr ayrn jeh'n ard scanshoil Donbas. Roish y vlein 1961 va'n ennym "Stalino Oblast" ("Queiggey Stalin") currit er y wheiggey.

Queiggey Cherkasy:
She queiggey 'syn Ookraan veanagh eh Queiggey Cherkasy ( "Cherkas’ka oblast'") ny Cherkashchyna (Ookraanish: ) myr t'eh enmyssit dy mennick. She Cherkasy y balley reiragh. T'eh ny lhie er yn awin Dnieper.

Queiggey Chernihiv:
She queiggey 'syn Ookraan hwoaie eh Queiggey Chernihiv ( "Chernihiv’ka oblast’") ny Chernihivshchyna (Ookraanish: ) myr t'eh enmyssit dy mennick. She Chernihiv y balley reiragh.

Queiggey Odesa:
She queiggey 'syn Ookraan heear yiass eh Queiggey Odesa ( "Odes’ka oblast’") ny Odeshchyna (Ookraanish: ) myr t'eh enmyssit dy mennick. She Odesa y balley reiragh. T'eh ny lhie er coose hwoaie y Vooir Ghoo er y joarey rish Moldova as y Romaan.

Queiggey Kyiv:
She queiggey 'syn Ookraan veanagh eh Queiggey Kyiv ( "Kyivs’ka oblast’") ny Kyivshchyna (Ookraanish: ) myr t'eh enmyssit dy mennick. She Kyiv, preeu-valley yn çheer, y balley reiragh, ga nagh vel Kyiv hene ny chooid jeh'n wheiggey. Ta'n queiggey ny lhie er y joarey rish y Velaroosh. Ta Cryss Lhehlysh Chornobyl goaill stiagh yn ayrn hwoaie jeh'n wheiggey, ga dy vel eh stiurit er lheh, magh veih stiurey cadjin y wheiggey.

Queiggey Dnipropetrovsk:
She queiggey 'syn Ookraan veanagh eh Queiggey Dnipropetrovsk ( "Dnipropetrovs’ka oblast’"; "Dnepropetrovskaya oblast’") ny Dnipropetrovshchyna (Ookraanish: ) myr t'eh enmyssit dy mennick. She Dnipropetrovsk y balley reiragh. T'eh ny wheiggey smoo scanshoil 'syn Ookraan er çheu yn çhynskyl.

Queiggey Ivano-Frankivsk:
She queiggey 'syn Ookraan heear eh Queiggey Ivano-Frankivsk ( "Ivano-Frankivs’ka oblast’") ny Prykarpattia (Ookraanish: ) myr t'eh enmyssit dy mennick. She Ivano-Frankivsk y balley reiragh. Roish y vlein 1962, by eh Queiggey Stanislav (Ookraanish: ) ny ny lhiass-enmyn Stanislavshchyna ny Stanislavivshchyna (Ookraanish: ny ) ny h-enmyn va currit er y wheiggey. Va ennym y screeudeyr as y toshiallagh Ivan Franko currit er y wheiggey er 9 Sauin 1962 ec ny Soveidjee. Roish y vlein 1939, v'eh ny chooid jeh'n Pholynn.

Kije, Queiggey Święty Krzyż:
She balley beg 'sy clyst reiragh Kije ayns Coontae Pińczów 'sy wheiggey Święty Krzyż ayns jiass meanagh y Pholynn eh Kije (). She balley reiragh y valjaght fo'n ennym cheddin t'ayn. T'eh ny lhie mysh 9 km çheu hwoaie veih Pińczów as 31 km çheu yiass veih'n phreeu-valley ardjynagh, Kielce.

Pińczów:
She balley 'sy clyst reiragh Pińczów ayns Coontae Pińczów 'sy wheiggey Święty Krzyż ayns jiass meanagh y Pholynn eh Pińczów (). She balley reiragh y valjaght fo'n ennym cheddin t'ayn. T'eh ny lhie ayns glion yn awin Nida ayns queiggey shenndeeagh y Pholynn Veg.

Baljaght Kije:
She slyst reiragh çheerey, ny gmina, ayns Coontae Pińczów, Queiggey Święty Krzyż, ayns jiass meanagh y Pholynn eh Baljaght Kije (). T'eh ny lhie mysh 9 km çheu hwoaie veih Pińczów as mysh 31 km çheu yiass veih'n phreeu-valley queiggagh Kielce. She Kije y balley reiragh.
Ta'n valjaght 99.26 km2 er eaghtyr, as 'sy vlein 2006 va 4,624 dooinney cummal ayn.
Ta ayrnyn jeh ny h-ardjyn coadit Pairk Feieys Nida as Pairk Feieys Szaniec soit 'sy valjaght.
Baljyn beggey.
Ta'n valjaght goaill stiagh ny baljyn beggey Borczyn, Czechów, Gartatowice, Gołuchów, Górki, Hajdaszek, Janów, Kije, Kliszów, Kokot, Lipnik, Rębów, Samostrzałów, Stawiany, Umianowice, Wierzbica, Włoszczowice, Wola Żydowska, Wymysłów as Żydówek.

Baljaghtyn y Pholynn:
Ta baljaghtyn y Pholynn nyn mun-unnidyn son gurneilys ynnydagh 'sy Pholynn. She gmina (, yl-rey: "gminy") y fockle Polynnish ta currit orroo. Keayrtyn, ta'n fockle "gmina" çhyndaait myr boodeeys. Haink y fockle veih ("boodeeys") yn Ghermaanish. 'Sy vlein 2010 va 2,459 baljaght ayn.
Ta tree sorçh dy valjaght ayn:

Burgoonish (Germaanagh):
She fer jeh ny çhengaghyn Germaanagh v'ayn 'sy Vurgoonish. By hengey Ghermaanagh Hiar v'ayn. S'liklee dy dooar ee baase car y 6-oo eash BNJ. V'ee goll er loayrt ayns shiar yiass jeh'n Rank (Goal y traa shen).
Cha nel fys shickyr er y çhengey. Cha nel myr feanish ayn agh feer-enmyn ennagh dy Vurgoonee as focklyn ennagh elley to foast goll er ymmyd 'syn ard jiu as eh er credjal dy daink ad ass y çhengey shen. Ansherbee, er-yn-oyr dy vel yn ard ny lhie faggys da ardjyn Germaanagh elley, lheid as y Ghermaan hene, s'cast ad y scarrey magh veih focklyn Germaanagh as fraue elley oc. Chammah as shen, ren ny focklyn shen ceaghley dy mooar as nish cha nel eh jargal bun jeh'n chooid smoo jeh ny focklyn shen y hoilshaghey.

Rheynnyn y Rank:
She fer jeh tree keim dy ghurneilys ynnydagh ta goll er ymmyd 'sy Rank ad rheynnyn y Rank (, yl-rey "départements"). Ta 96 rheynn 'sy Rank Oarpagh as queig harrish mooir. Ta ny rheynnyn goll er rheynn magh ayns 342 slyst ().
Rolley ny rheynnyn.
Ta armys ec dagh rheynn agh cha nel staydys oikoil ec dagh fer as cha nel dagh fer ymmydit ec reiltys dagh rheynn. Ayns fir jeh ny rheynnyn, t'ad goaill ymmyd jeh logo ny cowrey ennagh elley.

Queiggey Kharkiv:
She queiggey 'syn Ookraan hiar eh Queiggey Kharkiv ( "Kharkivs’ka oblast’") ny Kharkivshchyna (Ookraanish: ) myr t'eh enmyssit dy mennick. She Kharkiv y balley reiragh. Ta'n queiggey ny lhie er y joarey rish y Roosh, ta ny lhie da'n shiar. Myrane lesh shen, ta joarey echey rish Queiggey Luhansk 'sy niar, rish Queiggey Donetsk 'sy niar yiass, rish Queiggey Dnipropetrovsk 'sy neear yiass, rish Queiggey Poltava 'sy neear as rish Queiggey Sumy 'sy twoaie.

Queiggey Kherson:
She queiggey 'syn Ookraan yiass eh Queiggey Kherson ( "Khersons’ka oblast’") ny Khersonshchyna (Ookraanish: ) myr t'eh enmyssit dy mennick. She Kherson y balley reiragh. T'eh ny lhie çheu hwoaie jeh lieh-innys y Chrimeea er cooseyn y Vooir Ghoo as Vooir Azov.

Queiggey Khmelnytskyi:
She queiggey 'syn Ookraan heear eh Queiggey Khmelnytskyi ( "Khmel’nyts’ka oblast’") ny Khmelnychchyna (Ookraanish: ) myr t'eh enmyssit dy mennick. She Khmelnytskyi y balley reiragh.

Queiggey Kirovohrad:
She queiggey 'syn Ookraan veanagh eh Queiggey Kirovohrad ( "Kirovohrads’ka oblast’") ny Kirovohradschyna (Ookraanish: ) myr t'eh enmyssit dy mennick. She Kirovohrad y balley reiragh.

Cleeshag:
She lus 'sy chynney Iridaceae ee cleeshag ny cliogagh (Iris pseudacorus). T'ee dooghyssagh da'n Oarpey, yn Aishey heear as yn Affrick heear-hwoaie. She "far-acorus" eh bun yn ennym oaylleeagh eck, er y fa dy vel ny duillagyn eck gollrish duillagyn "Acorus calamus".
Jalloo-oaylleeaght.
She lus lussagh sheer-vio t'ayn. T'ee gaase wheesh as 150cm er yrjid. Ta duillagyn cliweagh wheesh as 90cm er lhiurid eck. Ta blaaghyn buigh gial eck, 7-10 cm er lheead. T'ad goll er pollnaghey liorish shellanyn breck as shey-chassee elley. She kishtag eh y mess eck, as ymmodee rassyn dhoneyn aynjee. 
Share jee thalloo tash, as t'ee cadjin ayns curree. T'ee shassoo noi ushey wheesh as 25cm er diunid, pH injil (3.6-7.7) as thalloo gyn ocsygien. T'ee skeeaylley liorish raisoamyn chammah's rassyn; ta ny rassyn snaue er yn ushtey dys thalloo noa. Ga dy nee lus ushtee t'ayn, ta ny raisoamyn surranse çhirmid beayn. T'ee gaase wheesh ard as 300m erskyn yrjid ny marrey. Ta feme eck er ram nitrageen. 
Ayns Albin heear, ta thammagyn cleeshag nyn oayllyn scanshoil da eean raip.
Troarey.
She lus jesheenagh cadjin t'ayn ayns ardjyn tempreilagh. Ta caghlaaghyn troarag ayn ta cooie da garey curree. Chossyn daa hroarag Award of Garden Merit liorish y Royal Horticultural Society:-
Ruegyssaght.
Ayns ardjyn, ta cleeshag er jeet dy ve ny lus ruegyssagh ta cur lossreeyn dooghyssagh fo smaght. S'doillee eh geddyn rey ree, eer liorish traaue raisoamyn. 
Ta lhiettrimys er y lus ayns kuse dy vuill: 
Ymmyd.
Ren ad ymmyd jeh'n raisoam myr stoo lheeys. She jough hilgee v'ayn dy cadjin. Ta'n soo eck geyre as farbagh da'n chrackan as scowanyn. Foddee eh gientyn çhingys gailley rish ee.
Ren ad ymmyd jee dys glenney ushtey, er coontey'n ablid eck dy soo stiagh meainyn trome. Ta ny fraueyn eck cochiangley drundin as lhiettal crimmey.

Queiggey Luhansk:
She queiggey 'syn Ookraan hiar eh Queiggey Luhansk ( "Luhans’ka oblast’"; "Luganskaya oblast’") ny Luhanshchyna (Ookraanish: ) myr t'eh enmyssit dy mennick. She Luhansk y balley reiragh. Va'n queiggey bunnit 'sy vlein 1938 tra va ennym y chahnagh as y pholitickeyr Soveidjagh Kliment Voroshilov currit er myr Queiggey Voroshilovgrad (derrey 1958 as reesht eddyr 1970 as 1990).

Queiggey Lviv:
She queiggey 'syn Ookraan heear eh Queiggey Lviv ( "L’vivs’ka oblast’") ny L’vivshchyna (Ookraanish: ) myr t'eh enmyssit dy mennick. She Lviv y balley reiragh.

Queiggey Mykolaiv:
She queiggey 'syn Ookraan yiass eh Queiggey Mykolaiv ( "Mykolayivs’ka oblast’") ny Mykolayivschyna (Ookraanish: ) myr t'eh enmyssit dy mennick. She Mykolayiv y balley reiragh.

Queiggey Poltava:
She queiggey 'syn Ookraan veanagh eh Queiggey Poltava ( "Poltavs’ka oblast’") ny Poltavshchyna (Ookraanish: ) myr t'eh enmyssit dy mennick. She Poltava y balley reiragh.

Queiggey Rivne:
She queiggey 'syn Ookraan heear eh Queiggey Rivne ( "Rivnens’ka oblast’") ny Rivnenshchyna (Ookraanish: ) myr t'eh enmyssit dy mennick. She Rivne y balley reiragh.

Queiggey Sumy:
She queiggey 'syn Ookraan hiar hwoaie eh Queiggey Sumy ( "Sums’ka oblast’") ny Sumshchyna (Ookraanish: ) myr t'eh enmyssit dy mennick. She Sumy y balley reiragh.

The Doors:
By phossan craa-chiaullee Americaanagh ad The Doors. Haink y possan ry-cheilley ayns Los Angeles 'sy vlein 1965. Va'n possan jeant seose jeh Jim Morrison (arraneyder), Ray Manzarek (dord-ghitar), Robby Krieger (gitar stiuree, arraneyder) as John Densmore (drummyn).

Queiggey Ternopil:
She queiggey 'syn Ookraan hiar hwoaie eh Queiggey Ternopil ( "Ternopil’s’ka oblast’") ny Ternopilshchyna (Ookraanish: ) myr t'eh enmyssit dy mennick. She Ternopil y balley reiragh.

Queiggey Vinnytsia:
She queiggey 'syn Ookraan veanagh eh Queiggey Vinnytsia ( "Vinnyts’ka oblast’") ny Vinnychchyna (Ookraanish: ) myr t'eh enmyssit dy mennick. She Vinnytsia y balley reiragh.

Queiggey Volyn:
She queiggey 'syn Ookraan heear hwoaie eh Queiggey Volyn ( "Volyns’ka oblast’"). She Lutsk y balley reiragh. Ta'n balley Kovel ny valley smoo eearagh 'sy wheiggey as she eshyn y stashoon jerringagh er y raad yiarn eddyr Kyiv as Warszawa 'sy Pholynn.

Queiggey Zakarpattia:
She queiggey 'syn Ookraan heear yass eh Queiggey Zakarpattia ( "Zakarpats’ka oblast’"). She Uzhhorod y balley reiragh.

Queiggey Zaporizhzhia:
She queiggey 'syn Ookraan yiass eh Queiggey Zaporizhzhia ( "Zaporiz’ka oblast’") ny Zaporizhzhya (Ookraanish: ) myr t'eh enmyssit dy mennick. She Zaporizhzhia y balley reiragh.

Queiggey Zhytomyr:
She queiggey 'syn Ookraan hwoaie eh Queiggey Zhytomyr ( "Zhytomyrs’ka oblast’") ny Zhytomyrshchyna (Ookraanish: ) myr t'eh enmyssit dy mennick. She Zhytomyr y balley reiragh.

Brattagh y Vritaan:
She "Gwenn ha du" ("y Bane as y Doo") yn ennym 'sy Vritaanish ta currit er brattagh y Vritaan. Ta'n brattagh ymmydit feie shenn-çheer jeh'n Vritaan, ard ta goaill stiagh yn ard noa-emshyragh ta coodaghey 80% jeh'n çhenn-çheer ("Bretagne" 'sy Rangish) as Liger-Atlantel, fer jeh ny rheynnyn ta jannoo seose yn ard Broioù al Liger.
Va cummey yn vrattagh crooit ec Morvan Marchal 'sy vlein 1923. Hooar eh yn eie da'n vrattagh veih bratteeyn ny Steatyn Unnaneysit as y Ghreag er yn oyr dy row yn daa heer shen coontit myr cowraghyn y teyrsnys as y deynlaghys ec y traa shen.
Ta ny nuy rimmeig shassoo son ny nuy ard-aspick 'sy çheer. Ta ny queig rimmeig doo shassoo son ny h-ard-aspickyssyn Gallo (Bro-Zol, Bro-Naoned, Bro-Roazhon, Bro-Sant-Maloù as Bro-Sant-Brieg) as ta ny kiare rimmeig bane shassoo son ny h-ard-aspickyssyn Britaanish (Bro-Dreger, Bro-Leon, Bro-Gerne as Bro-Gwened). Ta'n cantoon lesh ny h-ermynyn cur cooinaghtyn da armys diucagh y Vritaan

Bro-Gwened:
She nane jeh queiggaghyn tradishoonagh y Vritaan eh Bro-Gwened (ayns Gwenedish) ny Bro-Wened (). Er y chooid smoo, she unnane y queiggey as y rheynn Mor-Bihan. Ta'n queiggey 5,649 km² er eaghtyr.
She Gwened y preeu-valley tradishoonagh.
Commyoonyn.
Ta 222 chommyoon ayns Bro-Gwened.

Bro-Leon:
She fer jeh queiggaghyn tradishoonagh y Vritaan eh Leon ny Bro-Leon (). Ta'n queiggey ny hoie ayns sheear hwoaie y Vritaan 'sy rheynn Penn-ar-Bed. T'eh 2,019 km2 er eaghtyr. Ga dy nee eh Kastell-Paol y preeu-valley shenndeeagh, she Brest y chaayr smoo. 'Sy vlein 2007 va 418,577 dooinney cummal 'sy wheiggey.
Commyoonyn.
Ta 112 chommyoon ayns Bro-Leon.

Bro-Naoned:
She fer jeh queiggaghyn tradishoonagh y Vritaan eh Bro-Naoned (; Gallo: "Paeï de Nàntt"). Ta'n queiggey ny hoie ayns shiar yiass y Vritaan 'sy rheynn Liger-Atlantel er y chooid smoo as t'eh coodaghey cooid beg jeh ny rheynnyn Il-ha-Gwilen as Vendée. T'eh 7,323 km2 er eaghtyr. She Naoned y preeu-valley shenndeeagh as y chaayr smoo ayn. 'Sy vlein 2007 va 1,286,869 dooinney cummal 'sy wheiggey.
Commyoonyn.
Ta 236 commyoon ayns Bro-Naoned.

Bro-Roazhon:
She fer jeh queiggaghyn tradishoonagh y Vritaan eh Bro-Roazhon (; Gallo: "Paeï de Resnn"). Ta'n queiggey ny hoie ayns shiar y Vritaan 'sy rheynn Il-ha-Gwilen. T'eh 3,946 km2 er eaghtyr. She Roazhon y preeu-valley shenndeeagh as y chaayr smoo. 'Sy vlein 2007 va 678,114 dooinney cummal 'sy wheiggey.
Commyoonyn.
Ta 214 commyoon ayns Bro-Roazhon.

Yn Ghaleesh:
Shimmey keeall t'ayn lesh yn enmys yn Ghaleesh. Foddee dy vel shiu shirrey fer jeh ny h-artyn shoh heese:

Yn Chaisht:
She feailley as laa seyr ee yn Chaisht (veih y Çhenn Yernish) ta kelloorey aa-irree Yeesey Chreest. Rere y Chonaant Noa, daa-irree eh tree laa lurg e chrossey ec Calvary as she mullagh Phaish Chreest t'ayn. T'eh taghyrt jeeragh lurg y Chargys, imbagh daaeed laa er lhiurid jeh trostey, padjeryn as pennys.
She Shiaghtin ny Caisht yn ennym ta currit er y çhiaghtin jerrinagh jeh'n Chargys as t'eh goaill stiagh Tree Laaghyn ny Caisht, goaill stiagh Jerdein Caisht ta kelloorey yn Shibber Jerrinagh as niaghan ny cassyn, as Jeheiney Caisht ta kelloorey Crossey as baase Yeesey.
She feailley yn-astreeaghey ee yn Chaisht. Rere shen, cha nel ee tuittym er y laa cheddin dagh blein. T'ee tuittym er y chied Doonaght lurg y lane-eayst lurg laa lieh yn Arree. Rere earrooaghey ny h-agglishyn, ta laa lieh yn Arree tuittym er 21 Mayrnt (ga dy nee 20 Mayrnt yn laa rollageydagh 'sy chooid smoo jeh ny bleeantyn) as keayrtyn cha nel y lane-eayst tuittym er y laa chiart rere y rollageydys. Rere shen, foddee yn Chaisht tuittym er laa ennagh eddyr 22 Mayrnt as 25 Averil.
Ennym.
Ta'n Chaisht goll er enney myr 'sy Yernish as ayns Gaelg ny h-Albey. Ta'n tree fockle Gaelgagh çheet magh ass y Çhenn Yernish. Haink y fockle shen gys ny çhengaghyn Gaelgagh veih "Pascha" yn Ladjyn. Hooar ny Rauee yn fockle ass πάσχα "paskha" yn Çhenn Ghreagish. By hyndaa ad ny focklyn shen er yn 'eailley Ewagh, Feailley ny h-Eaynchaisht, ny "pəsḥa" yn Aramaaish as "pasḥa" yn Ewnish. Jiu, she "pesakh" yn ennym Ewnish noa-emshyragh ta currit er yn 'eailley Ewagh.

Clerkagh:
She lus blaagh 'sy chynney Onagraceae eh clerkagh (Clarkia pulchella). T'eh dooghyssagh da'n Eearvooir Heear-hwoaie. She dooie sorçh "Clarkia" t'ayn. V'eh feddynit ec Meriweather Lewis ayns ynnyd Kamiah, Idaho rish turrys Lewis as Clark. Ny yei shen, cha jagh eh er rang-oardraghey neayr's 1814. Ta'n ennym echey çheet er Clark ga dy nee Lewis hooar eh.
Shennaghys oaylleagh.
Ren Robert Brown ymmyd jeh tra hooar magh eh arraghey Brownagh. V'eh scrutaghey pollyn clerkagh ayns ushtey liorish mynreayrtan son studeyrys er torraghey. 
Ren Newman as Pilson ymmyd jeh myr sampleyr jeh kiangley oyragh eddyr anchaslys genetagh ayns pobble as mayrnaght y phobble. 

Massadoanish:
She fer jeh ny çhengaghyn Slavagh Yiass ee yn Vassadoanish ny yn Vasseydoanish (, focklit magh myr ). T'ee goll er loayrt ec mysh daa villioon dy loayreyderyn ayns Pobblaght ny Massadoan er y chooid smoo, as ayns çheeraghyn Balkanagh elley. She çhengey oikoil y Vassadoan t'ayn as ta staydys oikoil eck ayns ayrnyn jeh'n Terb, yn Albaan as y Romaan.

Cliogagh frangagh:
She lus eh cliogagh frangagh (Gladiolus italicus).
T'eh dooghyssagh da'n Oaraishey, agh t'eh mie er enney ayns buill elley myr .
She lus sheer-vio t'ayn. T'eh gaase er gass yeeragh wheesh as meader er yrjid, as beggan duillagyn liauyr heese. Cha nel y ghass banglaneagh son y chooid smoo. Ta speekag rish y chione as 15-16 blaaghyn bane-yiarg urree. Ta staimyn as gynoecium y vlaa gobbey magh ass y vlaa. She kishtag eh y mess, mysh kentimeader er lhiurid, as ymmodee rassyn aynsyn.

Bro-Zol:
She fer jeh queiggaghyn tradishoonagh y Vritaan eh Bro-Zol (; Gallo: "Paeï de Dóu"). Ta'n queiggey ny hoie ayns shiar y Vritaan 'sy rheynn Il-ha-Gwilen. T'eh 637 km2 er eaghtyr. She Dol y preeu-valley shenndeeagh as y chaayr smoo. 'Sy vlein 2007 va 51,752 dooinney cummal 'sy wheiggey.
Commyoonyn.
Ta 39 commyoon ayns Bro-Zol.

Bro-Sant-Maloù:
She fer jeh queiggaghyn tradishoonagh y Vritaan eh Bro-Sant-Maloù (; Gallo: "Paeï de Saent-Maló"). Ta'n queiggey ny hoie ayns shiar y Vritaan as er ny rheynn magh eddyr tree jeh ny rheynnyn Il-ha-Gwilen, Mor-Bihan as Aodoù-an-Arvor. T'eh 3,931 km2 er eaghtyr. She Sant-Maloù y preeu-valley shenndeeagh as y chaayr smoo. 'Sy vlein 2007 va 355,052 dooinney cummal 'sy wheiggey.
Commyoonyn.
Ta 72 chommyoon ayns Bro-Sant-Maloù.

Bro-Sant-Brieg:
She fer jeh queiggaghyn tradishoonagh y Vritaan eh Bro-Sant-Brieg ny Pentevr-ha-Goueloù ( ny ; Gallo: ny ). Ta'n queiggey ny hoie ayns twoaie yn Vritaan 'sy rheynn Aodoù-an-Arvor er y chooid smoo as paart beg jeh'n rheynn Mor-Bihan. T'eh 2,558 km2 er eaghtyr. She Sant-Brieg y preeu-valley shenndeeagh as y chaayr smoo. 'Sy vlein 2007 va 293,674 dooinney cummal 'sy wheiggey.
Commyoonyn.
Ta 131 chommyoon ayns Bro-Sant-Brieg.

Skorf:
Ta'n Skorf (; ) ny h-awin ta roie veih mean y Vritaan gys an Oriant raad t'ee lhiggey stiagh 'sy y Cheayn Sheear marish y Blavezh. T'ee girree çheu hwoaie veih Lanwelan ayns rheynn Mor-Bihan as t'ee roie trooid ny baljyn ar Gemene, Kleger as Pont-Skorf. T'ee 78.7 km (48.9 mi) er lhiurid.
Ennym.
Va'n ennym "Scorvi" currit sheese da'n chied cheayrt 'sy vlein 1280 'syn ennym "Pons Scorvi". She fockle Britaanish t'ayn ta çheet er "lhiggey magh dubbyr".

Ree Adha:
She toshiagh Brythonagh veih'n 5oo as y 6oo eash eh Ree Adha ny Ree Artur (; ; ; ). Rere ny shennaghyssyn as ny far-skeealeraghtyn, ren eh stiurey cosney yn Vretyn noi ny ruegeyderyn Sacsonagh car y 6oo eash. Ta sonreeaghtyn skeeal Adha, er y chooid smoo, jeant ass beeal-arrish as ynlaghtyn lettyragh, as cha nel feanish hickyr ayn dy nee persoon shenndeeagh v'ayn. Ta cooylrey goan shenndeeagh mychione Adha çheet magh ass imraaghyn eigsoylagh, goaill stiagh "Annales Cambriae", "Historia Brittonum" as screeunyn Gildas. Ta ennym Adha ry-akin chammah ayns imraaghyn feeleeagh lheid as "Y Gododdin".
She persoonid feer scanshoil ayns ny far-skeealyn ta goll er enney myr Cooish ny Bretyn. Va Adha feayn-skeealeydagh lhiassit myr persoonid as sym vooar eddyr-ashoonagh echey lesh cooney ennoilid ny screeunyn "Historia Regum Britanniae" (""Shennaghys Reeaghyn ny Bretyn"") veih'n 12oo eash liorish Geoffrey Mynwy. Ayns skeealyn as daanyn Bretnagh as Britaanagh ny shinney na obbyr Geoffrey Mynwy, ta Adha ry-akin myr fer caggee mooar ta cosney yn Vretyn noi noidyn dooinoil as neughooghyssagh, ny myr persoonid druaiaghtagh y veeal-arrish, kianglt keayrtyn rish y theihll elley Bretnagh, Annwn. Cha nel fys ayn quoid jeh obbyr Geoffrey va doltit veih imraaghyn elley, ny va crooit ec Geoffrey hene.
Ga dy vel cooishyn, taghyrtyn as persoonidyn ta ry-akin 'syn 'eayn-skeealleydaght Adhagh anchasley veih teks gys teks, as nagh vel un lhieggan canoanagh ayn, by eh lhieggan Geoffrey Mynwy bun ny skeeallyn haink magh ny s'anmee. Ren Geoffrey soilshaghey Adha magh myr ree yn Vretyn Vooar chur ny Sacsonee fo haart as chur impiraght er bun er y Vretyn, Nerin, yn Eeslynn, Norlynn as Goal. Shimmey tro as taghyrt ta coontit myr ayrnyn co-hymagh jeh skeeal Adha as bun oc ayns "Historia" liorish Geoffrey, goaill stiagh ayr Adha Uthr Bendragon, y druiaghtagh Myrddin (ny "Merlin"), ben heshee Adha Gwenhwyfar (ny "Guinevere"), y cliwe Caledfwlch (ny "Excalibur"), gientyn Adha ayns Tre war Venydh (ny "Tintagel" ny "Dintagell"), e chah jerrinagh noi Medrawd (ny "Mordred") ec Camlan as e ynnyd fea jerrinagh ayns Innys Afallon (ny "Avalon"). Chur y screeudeyr Frangagh Chrétien de Troyes veih'n 12oo eash, chur Lawnslot (ny "Lancelot") as y Grail Casherick stiagh 'sy skeeal, bun lesh shaanrey yn 'ar-skeealeraght Adhagh. Haink er y çhaanrey shen dy ve coontit myr straih vooar jeh'n lettyraght vean-eashagh. Ayns ny skeeallyn Frangagh shen, ta moir y skeeal ceaghley veih Ree Adha hene dys persoonidyn elley, lheid as Reejereeyn y Voayrd Cruinn. Hie yn lettyraght Adhagh er ny vishaghey car ny Mean-Eashyn. Hie ee ass, ansherbee, car ny h-eashyn ny lurg agh va aa-vioghey ayns eck 'sy 19oo eash. Ta'n skeeal beaghey 'sy 21oo eash 'sy lettyraght as ayns cochormyssyn son y theater, y scannaneeaght, y çhellveeish, caslys-skeeallyn, as yn ym-ysseraght elley.

Rolley baljyn as caayryn lannoonit 'sy Vritaan:
Shoh rolley baljyn as caayryn 'sy Vritaan ta lannoonit rish buill as boodeeyssyn elley as y chooid smoo jeu soit çheumooie jeh'n Vritaan. Er y chooid smoo, ta'n çheshaght shen, dy mooar tra ta'n co-obbraghey jeant dy h-oikoil ec lught-reill yn unnid ynnydagh, goll er enney myr "lannooney baljyn", agh ta enmyssyn elley ayn lheid as "baljyn commagh" ny "shuyr-chaayryn".

Tewynblustri:
She balley, skeerey heayagh, ynnyd seyrey marrey as purt eeasteyraght 'sy Chorn eh Tewynblustri ().

Ankiniz:
She commyoon 'sy rheynn Liger-Atlantel ayns shiar hwoaie yn Rank eh Ankiniz (). She fo-veoiraght y rheynn t'ayn.
Va paart mooar shendeeagh echey myr ynnyd ogheragh er y raad gys preeu-valley shendeeagh y Vritaan, Naoned, ta ny lhie mysh 35 km çheu heear.
Mooinjerys eddyr-ashoonagh.
Baljyn as caayryn lannoonit.
Ta Ankiniz goll er lannooney rish:

Henbont:
She commyoon 'sy rheynn Mor-Bihan, y Vritaan, eh Henbont (). 'Sy vlein 2011 va 15,456 dooinney cummal 'sy chommyoon.

Baljyn as caayryn lannoonit.
Ta Henbont goll er lannooney rish:

Boodeeys Baljyn an Oriant:
She çhaglym dy chommyoonyn ayns Mor-Bihan, y Vritaan, eh Boodeeys Baljyn an Oriant (; ). V'eh currit er bun 'sy vlein 2000. 'Sy vlein 2011 va 198,810 dooinney cummal 'sy voodeeys.
Commyoonyn 'sy voodeeys.
Ta'n boodeeys jeant seose jeh 25 commyoon:

Colught:
She sorçh dy reagheydys ny heshaght eh colught ta jeant seose jeh çhaglym dy phersoonidyn er lheh as ad nyn bersoonidyn najooragh, leighoil ny mestey jeh'n daa horçh shen. Ta dean cadjin ec olteynyn colught as t'ad gobbraghey ry-cheilley son jeeraghey nyn schleiyn as stiurey nyn gouyryn as saaseyn son ny deanyn shen y chooilleeiney. Shimmey cummey t'ayn ayns colughtyn, goaill stiagh:

Algaghyn glassey:
She possan dy algaghyn ad algaghyn glassey, as ad shennayraghyn ny h-embryophyta. She possan paraphyletagh t'ayn son t'eh cowrit rere ny t'eh faagail magh, shen ny lossreeyn ooashley. Ta clade ayn ta goaill stiagh y jees oc, as shen Viridiplantae ny Plantae.
Cellular structure.
Green algae have chloroplasts that contain chlorophyll a and chlorophyll b, giving them a bright green color, as well as the accessory pigments beta carotene and xanthophylls, in stacked thylakoids. The cell walls of green algae usually contain cellulose and they store carbohydrate in the form of starch.
All green algae have mitochondria with flat cristae. When present, paired flagella are used to move the cell. They are anchored by a cross-shaped system of microtubules and fibrous strands. Flagella are only present in the motile male gametes of charophytes and are absent from the gametes of Pinophyta and flowering plants. 
Members of the Chlorophyceae class undergo closed mitosis in the most common form of cell division among the green algae, which occurs via a phycoplast.>
Like land plants, Charophyte green algae undergo open mitosis without centrioles. Instead, a 'raft' of microtubules, the phragmoplast, is formed from the mitotic spindle and cell division involves the use of this phragmoplast in the production of a cell plate.
Origins.
Photosynthetic eukaryotes originated following a primary endosymbiotic event, where a heterotrophic eukaryotic cell engulfed a photosynthetic cyanobacterium-like prokaryote that became stably integrated and eventually evolved into a membrane-bound organelle, the plastid. This primary endosymbiosis event gave rise to three autotrophic clades with primary plastids: the green plants, the red algae and the glaucophytes.
Evolution and classification.
Green algae are often classified with their embryophyte descendants in the green plant clade Viridiplantae (or Chlorobionta). Viridiplantae, together with red algae and glaucophyte algae, form the supergroup Primoplantae, also known as Archaeplastida or Plantae "sensu lato".
The Viridiplantae diverged into two clades. The Chlorophyta includes the early diverging prasinophyte lineages and the core Chlorophyta, which contain the majority of described species of green algae. The Streptophyta includes the charophytes, a paraphyletic assemblage of freshwater algae from which the land plants have evolved. Below is a consensus reconstruction of green algal relationships, mainly based on molecular data.
The algae of this paraphyletic group "Charophyta" were included before in Chlorophyta, so green algae and Chlorophyta in this definition were synonyms.
Reproduction.
Green algae are eukaryotic organisms that follow a reproduction cycle called alternation of generations.
Reproduction varies from fusion of identical cells (isogamy) to fertilization of a large non-motile cell by a smaller motile one (oogamy). However, these traits show some variation, most notably among the basal green algae called prasinophytes.
Haploid algal cells (containing only one copy of their DNA) can fuse with other haploid cells to form diploid zygotes. When filamentous algae do this, they form bridges between cells, and leave empty cell walls behind that can be easily distinguished under the light microscope. This process is called "conjugation" and occurs for example in "Spirogyra".
The species of "Ulva" are reproductively isomorphic, the diploid vegetative phase is the site of meiosis and releases haploid zoospores, which germinate and grow producing a haploid phase alternating with the vegetative phase.
Chemistry.
The green algae span a wide range of δ13C values, with different groups having different typical ranges.
Green algae contain sulfated polysaccharides like rhamnan sulfate in the amorphous sections of their cell walls. Some species also contain gallotannins.
Physiology.
The green algae, including the characean algae, have served as model experimental organisms to understand the mechanisms of the ionic and water permeability of membranes, osmoregulation, turgor regulation, salt tolerance, cytoplasmic streaming, and the generation of action potentials.

Sung Jae-gi:
Va Sung Jae-ki (Koreeish: ; 11 Mean Fouyir 1967 – 26 Jerrey Souree 2013) ny immeeaghtagh kiartyn deiney as ny 'allsoonagh libraalagh veih'n Chorea Yiass as ny 'er toshee jeh Fer ny Korea ().

Lossreeyn feddanagh:
She possan dy lossreeyn as cuishlinyn ligninagh ny lossreeyn feddanagh (lossreeyn cuishlagh, lossreeyn ooashley, tracheophyta ny tracheobionta). Ta ny cuishlinyn shoh (sylem as phloem) gymmyrkey ushtey, stoo meainagh as troar co-haaghey sollysh fud y lus.

Roc'h Trevezel:
She Roc'h Trevezel y nah vullagh s'yrjey jeh glout-sleitagh Armorica ayns Menez Are 'sy Vritaan. Gollrish Menez Kador, t'eh shassoo 384 m er yrjid. T'eh soit 'sy chommyoon Plouneour-Menez, faggys da Roc'h Ruz, y mullagh s'yrjey 'sy clieau-reayn.

Trojany, Queiggey Mazowsze:
She balley beg ayns y Pholynn eddyr Wołomin as Warszawa eh Trojany. Ta mygeayrt 490 dy chummaltee ayn.

Sant-Maloù:
She commyoon as caayr cheayin voallit 'sy rheynn Il-ha-Gwilen 'sy Vritaan ayns sheear hwoaie jeh'n Rank eh Sant-Maloù (; Galloish: "Saent-Malô"). 'Sy vlein 2011 va 45,201 dooinney cummal ayn.
Deiney kianglt lesh y chaayr.
Va ny deiney shoh heese ruggit ayns Sant-Maloù:
Shuyr-valjyn.
Baljyn as caayryn lannoonit.
Ta Sant-Maloù goll er lannooney rish:

Beaynushag:
'Syn eayn-skeealleydaght Ghreagagh, she ushag foddey seihllagh ee yn veaynushag ta gaavioghey ny gaaruggey dy çhymshallagh lioree hene. T'ee kianglt lesh y ghrian as t'ee geddyn seihll noa tra t'ee girree magh ass leoie yn roie-immeeaghtagh eck. Lurg tammylt, va'n veaynushag doltit ec y Chreestiaght Leah myr cowrey. Ga dy vel ee geddyn baase ayns aile 'sy chooid smoo jeh ny skeeallyn, ta lhiegganyn ayn nagh velm cho foayroil raad t'ee geddyn baase as loaughey roish my vel ee gaairree. Mastey ny screeudeyryn ren screeu mychione yn ushag, ta Herodotus, Lucan, Pliny Mooar, Paab Clement I, Lactantius, Ovid as Isidore veih Sevilla.

Yeesey Chreest:
By vunneyder yn Creestiaght eh Yeesey Chreest ( ny ny () (ny Yeesey ass Nasair (m. 6/2 RC - 30/33) ny sushtallyn agglishagh 'sy Chonaant Noa. Ta Creesteenyn credjal dy row Yeesey ny Haualtagh as, myr eiyrtys er shen, ta'n ennym "Y Chreest" (veih Χριστός, "Christós" "Y Fer Ooillit" y Çhenn Ghreagish) currit er.
Er yn oyr shen, ta Creesteenyn cur sheese er Yeesey myr Creest ny Messias. Ta Creesteenyn cur sheese er sushtallys, baase ourallagh as aavioghey Yeesey myr y Sushtal, as eh çheet er "naigh vie" (veih εὐαγγέλιον, "euangélion" y Ghreagish). Ayns beggan focklyn, she naigh barriaght veayn Yee er yn olk, as gialdynys y taualtys as y theihll beayn da dagh dooinney, liorish grayse jeeoil eh yn Sushtal.
Rere shen, ta Moslymee coontey Jeesey myr aachoureyder yn chraueeaght vunneydagh unjeeagh jeh Adaue, Noah, Abraham, Moses as fayderyn elley.

Yn Ghrianchryss:
She ard mygeayrt Cryss ny Cruinney ee yn Ghrianchryss ny yn Chryss Heh. T'ee roshtyn Çhyndaa yn Phartan 'sy twoaie ec 23° 26′ 16″N (ny 23.4378°) N as Çhyndaa yn Ghoayr 'sy jiass ec 23° 26′ 16″ (ny 23.4378°) S. Ta'n Ghrianchryss goaill stiagh dagh ooillay ynnyd 'sy teihll raad ta'n Ghrian dy jeeragh er-dty-skyn keayrt ennagh 'sy vlein (poynt fo-ghreiney).
T'ad scarrey yn Ghrianchryss veih daa chryss elley ny cruinney: dowan-lheeadyn meanagh as .
Emshyraght as imbaghyn.
Dy mennick ayns ymmyd cadjin, ta "grianchryssagh" cowraghey emshyraght ghrianchryssagh, dy ghra myr shen, çheh as tash er fud ny bleeaney, as ram glassyraght ayn.
Ta imbaghyn çhirrmey as fliughey ec ymmodee ynnydyn grianchryssagh. Ayns lheid yn ynnyd, ta cooid smoo jeh fliaghey ny bleeaney goll er ceau 'syn imbagh fliaghee. 
Cha nel feer imbagh fliaghee ec keyllyn fliaghee grianchryssagh, son ta fliaghey kinjagh oc er fud ny bleeaney. Ayns kuse d'ardjyn as imbagh fliaghee oc, ta brishey 'sy 'liaghey tra ta scughey çheu-ard oc (eddyr oc as ard ny twoaie ny ard y jiass, rere y lieh-chruinney).
My ta'n imbagh fliaghee taghyrt 'syn imbagh çheh, ny 'sy tourey, ta fliaghey tuittym 'syn 'astyr son y chooid smoo. 'Syn imbagh shoh ta quallid aer çheet as quallid ushtey millish çheet dy ve ny share, as ta glassyraght gaase dy tappee, myr shen ta baair anmagh 'syn imbagh. Er y laue elley, ta thooillaghyn ayns awinyn as ta kuse dy veiyn shirrey thalloo ard. Ta quallid thallooin leodaghey er y fa dy vel stoo beaghee goll er laistey ass y thalloo, as ta crimmey ayn. Ayns ardyn as malaarey ayndaue, ta mennickaght ny smoo 'syn imbagh shoh. Dy cadjin, ta dolley bee leah 'syn imbagh shoh kyndagh rish yn imbagh çhirrym roish, son nagh vel y maair aarloo foast. 
Cha nel emshyraght ghrianchryssagh ec dagh ard 'sy Ghrianchryss. Ta tundrey alpagh as sleityn sniaghtagh ayn, goaill stiagh Mauna Kea, Slieau Kilimanjaro, as ny h-Andeeyn eddyr y Veneswaaley as ardjyn hwoaie ny Shillee ny ny h-Argenteen. Rere rang-oardraghey emshyraght Köppen, shimmey ard 'sy Ghrianchryss t'ad cur "çhirrym" ny "breck-hirrym" er, goaill stiagh yn Sahara, faasagh Atacama as eear-chooyl ny h-Austrail.
Eggochoryssyn ny Grianchryss.
Ta lossreeyn grianchryssagh dooghyssagh da'n Ghrianchryss. Ta eggochoryssyn grianchryssagh goaill stiagh keyll 'liaghee, keyll yn-lhoamey hirrym, keyll yialgagh, faasagh as ynnydyn elley. Dy cadjin, ta bea-neuchaslys vooar ayn, chammah's dooieyn dooghyssagh, ayns keyljyn son y chooid smoo. Cha nel monney stoo beaghee ayns thalloo keyljyn grianchryssagh, as myr shen t'ad surranse jee-cheyllaghey , ny keayrtyn fo chorys .

Yn Kaart Oarpagh son Çhengaghyn Ardjynagh ny Mynçhengaghyn:
She conaant Oarpagh (CETS 148) va doltit ayns 1992 fo currym Choonseil yn Oarpey son çhengaghyn ardjynagh as mynçhengaghyn 'syn Oarpey y choadey as y chur er oaie eh yn Kaart Oarpagh son Çhengaghyn Ardjynagh as Mynçhengaghyn.
Çhengaghyn fo coadey yn Chaart.
Çheeraghyn ren shickyraghey yn Kaart as ny çhengaghyn va shickyrit fo conaantyn y Chaart:

Cappan:
She saagh beg foshlit son joughyn y ymmyrkey as y iu eh cappan. Foddee lesh dy ve jeant ass aamaid, plastagh, glenney, cray, meain, clagh, cray Heenagh ny stoo elley. Dy mennick, ta jesheenyn lheid as cassyn as sthilk ry-gheddyn orroo. Ta cappanyn goll er ymmyd son iu ayns ram cultooryn as rangyn sheshoil as ta sorçhyn eigsoylagh jeu ymmydit son ushlee as oyryn eigsoylagh.
Ta cappanyn er ve ymmydit feie thousaneyn dy vleeantyn son bee as joughyn y ymmyrkey myrane lesh jesheenys. Keayrtyn, t'ad ymmydit ayns oardee chultooragh ennagh as dy ymmyrkey reddyn nagh vel yn-iu, lheid as bee as boynyn.

Skaal:
She sorçh dy yyst beg ee skaal. Car ny Mean Eashyn, v'ad ymmydit son aunlyn as soolagh y hebbal. Jiu, ansherbee, t'ad ymmydit son cappan y ymmyrkey, lheid as adsyn ta ymmydit son tey-chappanyn. Dy mennick, ta mean y skaal goaill stiagh lhaggan da'n chappan. T'ad ymmydagh son eaghtyryn y choadey veih çhiass y chappan as son thooillaghey veih'n chappan y ghoaill myrane lesh ynnyd ymmydagh son speinyn tey.

Yn Chataloan Hwoaie:
She enmys ta goll er ymmyd keayrtyn, as ayns screeunyn Cataloanagh er lheh, da'n thalloo va lhiggit voish y Spaainey dys y Rank lurg Conaant ny Sleityn Pyreanagh 'sy vlein 1659 ee yn Chataloan Hwoaie (; ). Ta'n ard shen co-reggyrtagh, fo ny harrish, rish y rheynn Rangagh Pyrénées-Orientales.

Thie lhionney:
She ynnyd iu ta scanshoil da cultoor Vannin, y Vretyn Vooar, Nerin, yn Austrail, y Chanadey, Hostyn Noa, yn Affrick Yiass as y Teelynn Noa eh yn thie lhionney ny yn thie oast. Ayns ram buill, ayns baljyn beggey er lheh, foddee da'n thie lhionney ve ny ynnyd focasagh da pobble yn ynnyd. Ta screeunyn Samuel Pepys gra dy nee yn thie lhionney "cree Hostyn". Ta lhune, liggar, feeyn, joughinyn çheh as joughinyn glassey goll er creck ayn as, keayrtyn, ta bee goll er creck chammah.

Volcaan:
She brishey ayns scroig phlanaid, lheid as y Dowin, ta lhiggey da leavey, leoie volcaanagh, gassyn as stoo elley roshtyn dys eaghtyr y phlanaid shen veih cree yn phlanaid ny shamyr er lheh (m.s. shamyr vagmey) eh volcaan.
Ta'n scroig y Dowin goll er rheynn magh ayns 17 plait tectonagh ta snaue er jastan bog çheh t'er enney myr brat. Myr shen, ta'n chooid smoo jeh volcaanyn y Dowin ry-gheddyn raad ta ny plaityn shen scarrey veih ny çheet ry-cheilley. Myr sampleyr, ta volcaanyn ry-gheddyn ec dreeyminyn mean-cheayin, lheid as y Dreeym Vean-Atlantagh, raad ta ny plaityn scarrey veih my cheilley. Ta volcaanyn elley ry-gheddyn ayns buill raad ta ny plaityn çheet ry-cheilley, lheid as Fainney Ailey yn Cheayn Sheealtagh.

Bochotnica:
She balley beg 'sy clyst reiragh Kazimierz Dolny ayns Coontae Puławy 'sy wheiggey Lublin ayns shiar y Pholynn eh Bochotnica (). T'eh ny lhie mysh 3 km çheu hiar hwoaie jeh Kazimierz Dolny, 10 km çheu yiass veih Puławy, as 42 km çheu heear veih'n phreeu-valley ardjynagh Lublin. T'eh soit er broogh yesh yn awin Wisła er y raad eddyr Puławy as Kazimerz Dolny. 'Sy vlein 2010 va 1,500 dooinney cummal 'sy valley.

Kathleen Faragher:
She ard-ughtar Baarle Vanninagh y 20oo eash veanagh va Kathleen Faragher (1904 – 1974). T'ee mie er enney son bardaght hie er cur magh 'sy "Ramsey Courier", as screeu ee ymmodee skeealyn giarey as dramaghyn. Ta'n obbyr eck currit da bea as pobble Vannin.
Bea.
Rug Kathleen Faragher ayns Rhumsaa ayns 1904. She Joseph as Catherine Anne Faragher yn ayr as moir eck, nyn shellooderyn sheshaght-dellal groseyragh er Approach Road. Va tree braaraghyn as shuyr shinney eck. V'ee troggit ayns Rhumsaa, as darraghee ish dys Lunnin mysh 1924 son keird ghellal. 
Dobbyr ee ayns Lunnin rish 25 bleeaney, derrey hug anlheiltys ort goll magh dy leah. Hie ee erash dys Mannin ayns Jerrey Souree 1949. Chumm ee ayns Rhumsaa hoshiaght, as scugh ee dys Skyll Maghal. She Glion Shuin y balley s'jerree eck.
Bardaght.
Hie kied daan Faragher er cur magh 'sy Ramsey Courier er 14 Jerrey Souree 1949. She 'Blue Point' v'ayn, er ny screeu tra v'ee ayns Kent. Ghow ee yindys dy ghow rish y phabyr eh, ga nagh jagh eh er cur magh derrey haink ee erash da'n Ellan. Nee yn aght screeuee eck caghlaa rish traa as cliaghtey, as myr shen cha ren Faragher cur eh mastey y chied ny'n nah heihys daanyn eck. Hie eh er cur magh reesht 'sy treeoo heihys daanyn, "Where Curlews Call", ayns 1959, er ny aascreeu trooid as trooid.
Hug magh ad y nah ghaan ec, 'Maughold Head', ayns Toshiaght Arree 1950, as v'ad cur magh yn obbyr eck dy mennick ny yei shen. 
Ayns Mean Fouyir 1950, ren ad cur magh 'A Lament' ayns Baarle Vanninagh. Dennee sleih dy row blass er lheh Vannin er y vardaght eck, as b'oallagh da Sheshaghtyn Manninagh aaloayrt ad cho leah as 1951, marish daanyn Bard Ashoonagh Vannin, T. E. Brown. Ren C. Sydney Marshall screeu kiaull son 'Maughold Head' as 'In Exile', as v'ad ry-gheddyn myr recortys gramafone rish Toshiaght Arree 1960.
Ren The Ramsey Courier Ltd. cur magh teihys daanyn, "Green Hills by the Sea", ayns Toshiaght Arree 1955. Ta'n ennym çheet er yn daan as arrane ard-ghooagh 'Ellan Vannin' liorish Eliza Craven Green. Dooyrt George Bellairs dy ren ny daanyn soilshaghey magh "deep insight into Manx feelings and a nostalgic love of the old folk and ways" v'ec Faragher.
Hug magh ee lioar elley, "This Purple-Misted Isle", ayns Mee Houney was published in October 1957. Ta'n ennym çheet er obbyr T. E. Brown, as ren ee cummal seose y kiangley shoh ayns daan 'The Immortal "Kitty"' ta bentyn rish 'Kitty o' the Sherragh Vane' ass "Fo'c's'le Yarns" Vrown. Screeu Lhiass-chiannoort Ambrose Flux Dundas y goan foslee. Chreck ee dy mie, ad v'eh orroo y lioar y aachur magh daa cheayrt ayns daa vlein. Ta'n teihys shoh goaill stiagh 'The Homecomer', as blass cowreydagh Baarle Vanninagh Faragher echey:

Marlon Brando:
She aghteyr scannane as çhellveeish Americaanagh va Marlon Brando (3 Averil 1924 — 1 Jerrey Souree 2004).

Liv and Maddie:
She straih hellveeish aittys Americaanagh eh Liv and Maddie, ny t'er enney myr Liv and Maddie: Cali Style. Va'n straih crooit ec John D. Beck as Ron Hart as hie eh magh er ny scaalheaney er Disney Channel voish 19 Jerrey Souree 2013 derrey 24 Mayrnt 2017. Ta Dove Cameron, Joey Bragg, Tenzing Norgay Trainor, Kali Rocha, Benjamin King, as Lauren Lindsey Donzis cloie 'sy straih.
She tro er lheh jeh'n straih ny paartyn dooblit ta cloieit ec Cameron: Liv, ben-aghteyr t'er çheet dy valley lurg shayll cloie ayns straih hellveeish ennoil ayns Hollywood feie kiare bleeaney, as Maddie, lannoon ennee Liv hannee 'sy valley. She tro er lheh elley na'n bollagh raad dy vel ny karacteyryn loayrt rish ny shamraigyn ayns aght cho-akinagh son nyn marelyn bentyn rish taghyrtyn eigsoylagh y chur sheese as y hoylley magh.

Arthur Leonard Schawlow:
She fishigagh va ruggit ayns Mount Vernon, York Noa, va Arthur Leonard Schawlow (5 Boaldyn 1921 – 28 Averil 1999). Ren eh obbraghey er y reayrt-oaylleeaght er lheh as er laseryn as yn ymmyd oc 'sy spectroscoipaght er y chooid smoo. Chossyn as rheynn eh Aundyr Nobel 'syn 'ishig marish Nicolaas Bloembergen as Kaw Siegbahn 'sy vlein 1981.

Languedoc-Roussillon:
She nane jeh ardjyn y Rank ee Languedoc-Roussillon (; )

Lady and the Tramp:
She scannane romansagh kiaullee bioghit Americaanagh voish y vlein 1955 eh Lady and the Tramp. V'eh gientit ec Walt Disney as skeaylt magh ec Buena Vista Film Distribution. Y 15oo ard-scannane bioghit Disney, v'eh stiurit ec Clyde Geronimi, Wilfred Jackson, as Hamilton Luske, as t'eh goaill stiagh gooyn Barbara Luddy, Larry Roberts, Bill Thompson, Bill Baucom, Verna Felton, as Peggy Lee. Hie yn scannane er ny skeayley magh er 22 Mean Souree 1955. Ta'n scannane bunnit er y skeeal earishlioar "Happy Dan, The Whistling Dog" liorish Ward Greene. Hie scannane eiyrtyssagh, "", er ny skeaylley magh jeeragh er feeshan er 27 Toshiaght Arree 2001.

Chris Pratt:
Ta Chris Pine ny chloieder fillym Americaanagh. Rug eh ayns Virginia, Minnesota, ny Steatyn Unnaneysit er 21 Mean Souree, 1979.

Abstand:
She foddid-çhengagh Abstand (Germaanish son "baarney"). Myr sampleyr, cha nel agh Abstand beg eddyr Rooshish as Belarooshish (ta mooinjerys faagys eddyr oc as ta'd co-so-hoiggal son y chooid smoo. Ta Abstand smoo eddyr Rooshish as Sheckish (t'ad mooinjerys sloo eddyr oc, as cha nel ad co-so-hoiggal). Ta keim ard d'Abstand eddyr Rooshish as Germaanish (mooinjerys eer ny sloo), ny Finnlynnish (cha nel mooinjerys erbee eddyr oc).

Blass (sheshengoaylleeaght):
She blass aght dy 'ockley magh çhengey. T'eh neu-yantagh dy loayrt çhengey fegooish blass.

Çhengey Chowree Americaanagh:
She Çhengey Chowree Americaanagh (ASL) yn çhengey chowree smoo ayns ny SUA. Cha nel mooinjerys ayn eddyr ASL as Çhengey Chowree Ghoaldagh ny Baarle.

Aphasia anomagh:
She yn neu-ablid dy gheddyn fockleyn aphasia anomagh. Sleih as aphasia anomagh oc, cha nod ad feddyn ny fockleyn t'ad laccal tra t'ad loayrt. She callin patoayleeagh kianglt rish sorçhyn d'aphasia t'ayn.

Noi-cheayllys:
She yn mooinjerys eddyr daa 'ockle jeh bun condaigagh noi-cheayllys. Ta daa horçh dy noi-cheayllys ayn: "noi-cheayllys so-cheim", shen dy ghra king er continuum (gollrish "çheh "as "feayr)"; as "noi-cheayllys jeesoil" ny "noi-cheayllys ardoil", shen dy ghra reddyn nagh voddagh ve ec y traa cheddin (gollrish "marroo" as "bio").

Aphasia:
She moalaght çhengagh aphasia, ta çheet kyndagh rish jeeil rish ny h-ynnydyn çhengagh 'syn inçhyn. Ta ymmodee sorçhyn anchasley ayn, ta çheet woish jeeil dys buill anchasley.

Çhengey Chowree Austrailagh:
She yn çhengey chowree smoo 'syn Austrail Çhengey Chowree Austrailagh (Auslan). Ta mooinjerys faggys eddyr Çhengey Chowree Austrailagh as Çhengey Chowree Goaldagh.

Babblal:
She ayrn leah jeh cosney çhengey as aase paitçhey babblal, raad ta'n paitçhey jannoo ny sheeanyn cheddin reesht as reesht (m.s. "mama "as "jijijiji"). T'eh jeeaghyn dy vel ad cliaghtey jannoo ny sheeanyn anchasley, agh cha nel ad gra fockleyn kiart foast. Ta babblal goaill toshiaght tammylt beg lurg ta'n oikan ruggit as ta ymmoddee ayrnyn ayn choud's ta'n paitçhey gynsaghey ny smoo sheeanyn as t'eh sheeanal ny smoo gollrish loayrt. She ec mysh 12 mee ta babbanyn cliaghtey jannoo fockleyn kiart, agh foddee babblal goll er ny lurg shen.

Aphasia Vroca:
She sorçh d'aphasia Aphasia Vroca ta taghyrt kyndagh rish jeeil rish ynnyd Vroca 'syn inçhyn. Ta ny troaryn goaill stiagh loayrt feer voal, drogh-vingys, drogh-stiurey muskylagh jeh ny organeyn loayrtagh as doilleeïd er-lheh lesh grammeydys.

Ynnyd Vroca:
She ynnyd 'syn inçhyn ynnyd Vroca ta bentyn rish loayrt. Dy cliaghtagh, t'eh er y çheu hoshtal jeh'n vrat mooie harrish yn çhiamble.

Jastrzębie-Zdrój:
She caayr 'sy Tileesh ayns jiass y Pholynn eh Katowice (; ). Ta mysh 92,000 dooinney cummal 'sy chaayr. She balley beg farrane v'ayn derrey yn 20oo eash. Hooar eh kiartyn caayragh ayns 1963.

Sophie Rundle:
Ta Sophie Rundle ny ben-chloieder fillym Hostynagh va ruggit ayns 1988. Ta enney share urree er son e paart 'sy chlaare çhellveeish "Peaky Blinders" myr Ada Shelby as myr Emily Kostich 'sy chlaare çhellveeish "The Bletchley Circle".

Łobez:
She caayr ayns yn Pholynn eh Łobez ͡), Wheiggey Pomorze Heear. 'Sy vlein 2015 va 10,409 deiney cummal 'sy chaayr. Ta Łobez ny hoie er yn awin Rega. 

Sigourney Weaver:
Ta Susan Alexandra "Sigourney" Weaver ny ben-chloieder fillym Americaanagh. Rug ee ayns Caayr York Noa er 8 Jerrey Fouyir 1949.

Qui-Gon Jinn:
She karacteyr far-skeealagh 'sy tuinney "Star Wars" eh Qui-Gon Jinn. She Liam Neeson yn dooinney ren cloie yn karacteyr ayns ny scannaneyn. She karacteyr mooar eh 'sy treeskeealag scannane roie-immeeaghtagh, as eh ny chaggeyder ayns ' (1999). T'eh ry-akin rish tammylt veg myr scaan forsey 'sy straih vioghit voish y vlein 2008 ', yn episode jerrinagh jeh'n straih "Obi-Wan Kenobi", chammah's "" as myr goo jee-chorpit as Neeson gaavioghey yn paart echey ayns dagh fer jeu adsyn heose.

Bradley Cooper:
Ta Bradley Cooper ny chloieder fillym Americaanagh. Rug eh ayns Abington, Montgomery County, Pennsylvania, ny Steatyn Unnaneysit er 5 Jerrey Geuree, 1975.

Oliver &amp; Company:
She scannane contoyrtys kiaullee bioghit Americaanagh voish y vlein 1988 eh Oliver & Company. Hie yn scannane er ny ghientyn ec Walt Disney Feature Animation as er ny skeaylley er 18 Sauin 1988 liorish Walt Disney Pictures. Y 27oo ard-scannane bioghit Disney, t'eh bunnit dy anhickyr er y noaskeeal "Oliver Twist" liorish Charles Dickens.

The Little Mermaid (scannane 1989):
She scannane fansee kiaullee bioghit Americaanagh voish y vlein 1989 eh The Little Mermaid. Va'n scannane gientit liorish Walt Disney Feature Animation as skeayllit magh liorish Walt Disney Pictures. Y 28oo ard-scannane bioghit Disney, t'eh bunnit dy anhickyr er y çhee-skeeal Danvargagh voish y vlein 1837 lesh yn ennym cheddin echey liorish Hans Christian Andersen. Ta skeeal y scannane geiyrt er ben-phrinse moidjyn varrey ta enmyssit Ariel, ta geearree ve ny ben deiney as t'ee tuittym ayns graih rish prinse deiney ta enmyssit Eric. Nee yn ghraih shen cur r'ee conaant y yannoo marish y challiagh marrey, Ursula, son ve ny ben deiney as ve marish y phrinse. Va "The Little Mermaid" screeuit as stiurit ec John Musker as Ron Clements as v'eh gientit ec Musker as Howard Ashman, ren screeu arraneyn y scannane marish Alan Menken. Ren Menken cummey reaghys kiaullee yn scannane chammah. Ta'n scannane goaill stiagh gooyn Jodi Benson, Christopher Daniel Barnes, Pat Carroll, Samuel E. Wright, Jason Marin, Kenneth Mars, as Buddy Hackett.

Charlotte Rampling:
Ta Charlotte Rampling ny ben-chloieder fillym Ghoaldagh. Rug ee ayns Sturmer, Essex er 5 Mee ny Nollick 1946.

Sean Connery:
She aghteyr Albinagh va Sean Connery (ruggit myr Thomas Connery; 25 Luanistyn 1930-31 Jerrey Fouyir 2020). She Connery va'n chied dooinney ren cloie y karacteyr far-skeealagh "James Bond" er y scaailan.

Steiermark:
She steat ny "Bundesland" ayns shiar yiass yn Austeyr eh Steiermark (; Sloveanish/, , ). T'eh ny nah steat smoo 'syn Austeyr rere eaghtyr, as eh coodaghey 16,401 km2 (6,332 mi ker). T'eh çhemmal rish y Clovean 'sy jiass, as rish ny steatyn Austeyragh yn Austeyr Eaghtyragh, yn Austeyr Eeaghtyragh, Salzburg, Burgenland as Kärnten. 'Sy vlein 2019, va 1,243,700 dooinney cummal ayn. She Graz preeu-valley yn steat.

Elisha Cuthbert:
Ta Elisha Cuthbert ny ben-chloieder fillym Chanadagh. Rug ee ayns Calgary, Alberta, y Chanadey, er 30 Sauin, 1982.

Jason Bateman:
Ta Jason Bateman ny chloieder fillym Americaanagh. Rug eh ayns Rye, York Noa, ny Steatyn Unnaneysit er 14 Jerrey Geuree, 1969.

Rio de Janeiro:
She caayr 'sy Vrasseel eh Rio de Janeiro ("Awin Yerrey Geuree") ny Rio dy cadjin. She preeu-valley jeh'n steat fo'n ennym cheddin t'ayn.

Rolley Bretnee:

Goran Višnjić:
Ta Goran Višnjić ny chloieder fillym Croitagh. 

David A. R. White:
Ta David Andrew Roy White (behrt 12 Boaldyn, 1970) ny chloieder fillym, stiureyder as ghienteyder Americaanagh. 

Auvergne-Rhône-Alpes:
She nane jeh ardjyn y Rank ee Auvergne-Rhône-Alpes (Arpitaanish: "Ôvèrgne-Rôno-Arpes"; )

Wigan Athletic F.C.:
Ta Wigan Athletic Football Club Fwirran Bluckan Coshey Wigan Roortagh chlub sockyr Sostynagh ta soit ayns DW Stadium, Wigan, Lancashire. Va'n club bunnit 'sy vlein 1932.
Ec y traa t'ayn, she Graham Barrow y reireyder. Ta'n club cloie ayns Football League Championship.
F.A. Cappan cosneyder ayns Boaldyn 2013.

Will Grigg:
Ta Will Grigg (ruggit ayns Solihull) ny vluckaneyr sockyr Sostynagh. T'eh cloie lesh Wigan Athletic F.C..

Rug eh ayns Wigan, Sostyn, 'sy vlein 1995.

Wigan:
She Sostyn, as y balley smoo ayn, ee Wigan. Rere coontey pobble 2011 va 97,000 cummaltee 'sy valley.

Owen Evans (bluckaneyr Bretnagh):

Adam Le Fondre:
Ta Glenville Adam James le Fondre ny vluckaneyr sockyr Sostynagh. T'eh cloie lesh Wigan Athletic F.C..

Jake Buxton:

Yanic Wildschut:

Gary Caldwell:
She aa-vluckaneyr soccer keirdagh as reireyder Albinagh eh Gary Caldwell (ruggit er 12 Averil 1982). Chloie Caldwell lesh Newcastle United, Darlington, Coventry City, Derby County, Hibernian, Celtic, as Wigan Athletic as chossyn eh 55 eddyn eddyr-ashoonagh son ny h-Albey.
Coontit son y chooid smoo myr fendeilagh meanagh, she cloieder caghlaaee va Caldwell; v'eh currit magh er y faaie soccer myr cooyllagh yesh as meanagh fendeilagh keayrtyn harrish y choorse echey. Va'n braar shinney, Steven, ny vluckaneyr myrgeddin as chloie ad ry-cheilley ec Wigan ec y traa cheddin. Myr bluckaneyr eddyr-ashoonagh, chossyn eh ynnyd ayns Rolley Onnor Eddyr-ashoonagh Heshaght Vluckan Coshey ny h-Albey erreish da ny smoo na 50 eddyn y chosney.
Erreish da irree magh ass y chloie, hie eh stiagh 'sy ghreinnaghey, as t'eh er ny ghreinnaghey Wigan Athletic, Chesterfield, as Partick Thistle. Lurg shayll lesh Manchester City freayll rick er bluckaneyryn er eeasaght, hie eh reesht dys Hibernian myr cooneyder lesh Shaun Maloney.

Donervon Daniels:
Ta Donervon Daniels ny vluckaneyr sockyr Montserratagh. T'eh cloie lesh Wigan Athletic F.C. veih 2015.

Craig Davies (bluckaneyr):
Ta Craig Davies ny vluckaneyr sockyr Bretnagh. T'eh cloie lesh Mansfield Town F.C..

Craig Morgan (bluckaneyr):
Ta Craig Morgan ny vluckaneyr sockyr Bretnagh. T'eh cloie lesh Wigan Athletic F.C. veih 2015.

Nathan Byrne:
Ta Nathan Byrne ny vluckaneyr sockyr Sostynagh. T'eh cloie lesh Wigan Athletic F.C. veih 2016.

Ryan Colclough:
Ta Ryan Colclough ny vluckaneyr sockyr Sostynagh. T'eh cloie lesh Wigan Athletic F.C. veih 2016.

Danny Whitehead:
Ta Daniel Whitehead (r. 23 Jerrey Fouyir 1993) ny vluckaneyr sockyr Sostynagh. T'eh cloie lesh Wigan Athletic F.C. veih 2016.

Westmorland:
She coontae neuvoirvaljagh ayns Sostyn Heear Hwoaie va Westmorland.

Sam Morsy:
Ta Sam Morsy ny vluckaneyr sockyr Sostynagh. T'eh cloie lesh Wigan Athletic F.C..

Sanmi Odelusi:
