Rochdale F.C.:
Ta Rochdale Football Club ny chlub sockyr Sostynagh ta soit ayns Spotland, Rochdale, Lancashire.

Paul Jewell:
Ta Paul Jewell ny reireyder sockyr Sostynagh as ny henn-vluckaneyr.

Chris Hutchings:
Ta Chris Hutchings ny reireyder sockyr Sostynagh as ny henn-vluckaneyr.

John Deehan:
Ta John Deehan (r. 6 Luanistyn 1957) ny reireyder sockyr Sostynagh as ny henn-vluckaneyr.

Ray Mathias:
Ta Ray Mathias ny reireyder sockyr Sostynagh as ny henn-vluckaneyr.

Charlie Spencer:
Va Charlie Spencer (4 Nollick 1899 - 9 Toshiaght Arree 1953) ny vluckaneyr as ny reireyder sockyr Sostynagh.

John Benson (bluckaneyr ruggit 1942):
Va John Benson (23 Nollick 1942 - 30 Jerrey Fouyir 2010) ny vluckaneyr as ny reireyder sockyr Albinagh.

Bruce Rioch:
Ta Bruce David Rioch ny reireyder sockyr Albinagh as ny henn-vluckaneyr. Rug eh ayns Sostyn ayns 1947.

Roberto Martínez:
She reireyder as aa-vluckaneyr keirdagh Spaainagh eh Roberto Martínez Montoliu (ruggit er 13 Jerrey Souree 1973). She Martínez reireyder wirran ashoonagh y Velg.
Chloie Martínez myr meanagh fendeilagh as hoshee yn coorse echey ec Real Zaragoza, raad chossyn eh yn Copa del Rey. Cheau eh blein ec y chlub CF Balaguer, roish my ren eh fo-screeu son Wigan Athletic. Haink er dy ve coontit mastey possan beg dy Spaainee ec y chlub va enmyssit "ny tree amigos" as eh cloie marish Jesús Seba as Isidro Díaz, as ren eh cloie dy cadjin feie shey bleeaney, y lhing s'odjey echey ec un chlub. Car y lhing echey ayn, chossyn eh yn Football League Third Division as y Football League Trophy. Darree eh dys y wirran Albinagh Motherwell, eisht dys Walsall, roish my ren eh fo-screeu marish Swansea City ayns 2003. Haink er dy ve ny chaptan er y chlub as choonee eh da'n wirran ardjaghey dys League One y chosney ayns 2005. Darree eh dys Chester City ayns 2006, raad v'eh reiht myr captan reesht.
Ayns 2007, dirree eh as y vluckan coshey myr cloieder as haink er dy ve ny reireyder er Swansea City. Stiuree eh yn fwirran shen dys ardjaghey voish League One myr feniee. Lurg she, ren eh fo-screeu marish Wigan Athletic ayns 2009, raad choonee eh lesh y chlub injillaghey y haghney feie tree imbagh ass y cheilley. 'Sy chiarroo imbagh echey va Wigan injillit agh chossyn ad yn FA Cup ayns 2013 da'n chied cheayrt rieau ayns shennaghys y chlub. Ec jerrey yn imbee shen, haink er dy ve ny reireyder er Everton. Ayns Boaldyn 2016, va'n bayr myr reireyder currit da as haink er dy ve ny ard-reireyder er y Velg er 3 Luanistyn 2016. Stiuree Martínez ad dys y trass ynnyd ec Cappan FIFA y Theihill, 2018, yn ynnyd share oc 'sy chohirrey shen.

Kenny Swain:
Ta Kenneth "Kenny" Swain ny reireyder sockyr Sostynagh as ny henn-vluckaneyr.

John Ball (bluckaneyr ruggit 1925):
She bluckaneyr soccer Sostynagh va John Ball (13 Mayrnt 1925 – 16 Jerrey Souree 1998). Chloie eh myr fendeilagh marish Manchester United as Bolton Wanderers car ny 1940yn jeianagh as ny 1950yn.
Va Ball ruggit ayns Ince-in-Makerfield, Lancashire, as hoshee yn coorse soccer echey lesh Wigan Athletic car y Nah Chaggey Dowanagh. Car y chaggey, ga dy row ram cloiederyn ayns ny forsaghyn armit, adsyn va foast cloie lesh nyn glubyn, ren ad cloie myr yeiyn lesh clubyn elley chammah. Chammah's ve cloie lesh Wigan, ren Ball cloie myr yei lesh Gravesend.
Ayns Toshiaght Arree 1948, va Ball fo-screeuit liorish Manchester United er feeu er £2,000. Chloie eh da'n chied cheayrt lhieu daa vee ny s'anmey tra chaill ad y gamman 2–0 noi Everton er 10 Averil 1948. Harrish beggan ny smoo na daa vlein lesh United, cha row Ball ny hosheyder dy mennick 'sy chied wirran, as eh cloie myr cloieder ynnyd son Johnny Carey myr fendeilagh yesh, as cha chloie eh agh 23 keayrt lesh y chlub roish my row eh eeckit da Bolton Wanderers ayns Mean Fouyir 1950.
Hie Ball er ny vlaaghey ec Bolton, raad chloie eh ayns 200 gammanyn leeg son ny "Trotters". Hie yn coorse echey lesh Bolton tessen hoght imbee, voish 1950 derrey dirree eh magh as y chloie ayns 1958. Chloie eh 'sy 'Matthews Final' ayns 1953. Ayns 1960, va Ball pointit myr reireyder er e chied chlub, Wigan Athletic. Hannee eh 'syn ynnyd shen feie tree bleeaney roish my dirree eh ass y vluckan coshey. Eisht, chur eh ventyr jesheenee er bun. Ny s'anmey, darree eh magh dys yn Austrail dy veaghey, raad hooar eh baase ayns Jerrey Souree 1998 as eh 73 bleeaney d'eash.

Dave Philpotts:
Ta David Philpotts ny reireyder sockyr Sostynagh as ny henn-vluckaneyr.

Leighton Baines:
Ta Leighton Baines ny vluckaneyr sockyr Sostynagh. T'eh cloie lesh Everton F.C..

Jason Roberts (bluckaneyr):
Ta Jason Roberts ny vluckaneyr sockyr.

Accrington Stanley F.C.:
Ta Accrington Stanley F.C. ny chlub sockyr Sostynagh ta soit ayns Accrington, Lancashire. Va'n club bunnit 'sy vlein 1968.

Macclesfield Town F.C.:
Ta Macclesfield Town F.C. chlub sockyr Sostynagh ta soit ayns Macclesfield. Va'n club bunnit 'sy vlein 1874.

Nantwich Town F.C.:
Ta Nantwich Town Football Club chlub sockyr Sostynagh ta soit ayns Nantwich, Cheshire. Va'n club bunnit 'sy vlein 1884.

Bolton Wanderers F.C.:
Ta Bolton Wanderers F.C. chlub sockyr Sostynagh ta soit ayns Bolton, Lancashire. Va'n club bunnit 'sy vlein 1874.

Gary Teale:
Ta Gary Stewart Teale ny vluckaneyr sockyr Albinagh. T'eh cloie lesh Wigan Athletic F.C. as Derby County F.C.

Marlon King:
Ta Marlon King (ruggit er 26 Averil 1980) ny aa-vluckaneyr sockyr Sostynagh.

Kevin Kilbane:
Ta Kevin Kilbane ny vluckaneyr sockyr. T'eh cloie lesh Wigan Athletic F.C. as Everton F.C.
Rug eh ayns Lancashire, Sostyn, 'sy vlein 1977.

Antonio Valencia:
Ta Antonio Valencia ny vluckaneyr sockyr. T'eh cloie lesh Manchester United F.C..

Kevin Langley:
Ta Kevin Langley ny henn vluckaneyr Sostynagh (r. 24 Boaldyn 1964).

Eric Black:
Ta Eric Black (r. 1 Jerrey Fouyir 1963) ny reireyder sockyr Albinagh as ny henn-vluckaneyr.

Nathan Ellington:
Ta Nathan Levi Fontaine Ellington ny vluckaneyr sockyr.

Colin Greenall:
She shenn vluckaneyr Sostynagh eh Colin Greenall (r. 30 Nollick 1963).

Mike Pollitt:
Ta Michael Francis "Mike" Pollitt ny reireyder sockyr Sostynagh.

Neill Rimmer:
She shenn vluckaneyr soccer eh Neill Rimmer (r. 13 Sauin 1967).

Altrincham F.C.:
Ta Altrincham F.C. chlub sockyr Sostynagh ta soit ayns Altrincham, Cheshire. Va'n club bunnit 'sy vlein 1891.

Morecambe F.C.:
Ta Morecambe Football Club chlub sockyr Sostynagh ta soit ayns Morecambe, Lancashire. Va'n club bunnit 'sy vlein 1920.

Emmerson Boyce:
Ta Emmerson Boyce ny vluckaneyr sockyr Sostynagh.

Jimmy Bullard:
Ta James Richard "Jimmy" Bullard ny vluckaneyr sockyr Sostynagh.

Lee Nicholls:
Ta Lee Anthony Nicholls ny vluckaneyr sockyr Sostynagh. T'eh cloie lesh Milton Keynes Dons F.C..

Jordan Mustoe:
Ta Jordan David Mustoe ny vluckaneyr sockyr Sostynagh.

Geoff Davies:
Ta Geoff Davies ny shenn vluckaneyr sockyr.

Beauty and the Beast (scannane 1991):
She scannane fansee romansagh kiaullee bioghit Americaanagh voish y vlein 1991 eh Beauty and the Beast. Va'n scannane gientit liorish Walt Disney Feature Animation as skeayllit magh liorish Walt Disney Pictures. Y 30oo ard-scannane bioghit Disney as y trass va skeayllit magh car eash Disney Renaissance, t'eh bunnit er y çhee-skeeal voish y vlein 1756 fo'n ennym cheddin liorish Jeanne-Marie Leprince de Beaumont marish smooinaghtyn voish y scannane Frangagh voish y vlein 1946 fo'n ennym cheddin hie er ny stiurey liorish Jean Cocteau. Va'n scannane stiurit ec Gary Trousdale as Kirk Wise as gientit ec Don Hahn, voish scaa-chloie liorish Linda Woolverton.

Warren Joyce:
Ta Warren Joyce ny reireyder sockyr Sostynagh as ny henn-vluckaneyr.

One Hundred and One Dalmatians:
She scannane aittys contoyrtys bioghit Americaanagh voish y vlein 1961 eh One Hundred and One Dalmatians. V'eh gientit liorish Walt Disney Productions as t'eh bunnit er y noaskeeal voish y vlein 1956, "The Hundred and One Dalmatians" liorish Dodie Smith. Y 17oo ard-scannane bioghit Disney, v'eh stiurit ec Hamilton Luske, Clyde Geronimi as Wolfgang Reitherman as screeuit ec Bill Peet, as t'eh goaill stiagh gooyn Rod Taylor, Cate Bauer, Betty Lou Gerson, Ben Wright, Lisa Davis, as Martha Wentworth. Ta skeeal y scannane eiyrt er seiy quallianyn Dalmaashagh va goit ec Cruella de Vil ("deVille") vooidjeenagh ta geearree cooatyn y yannoo ass nyn sheh. Ta nyn baarantyn, Pongo as Perdita, goll magh nyn guallianyn y hauail voish Cruella as, er y vollagh, t'ad sauail 84 quallianyn elley va kionnit ayns shappyn bigginyn. Cur rish nyn quallianyn hene, ta shen goaill stiagh 101 voddey Dalmaashagh.

The Sword in the Stone (scannane 1963):
She scannane aittys fansee kiaullee bioghit Americaanagh voish y vlein 1963 eh The Sword in the Stone. Va'n scannane gientit ec Walt Disney as skeayllit magh ec Buena Vista Distribution. Y 18oo ard-scannane bioghit Disney, t'eh bunnit er y noaskeeal fo'n ennym cheddin liorish T. H. White, hie magh er ny hoilshaghey da'n chied cheayrt ayns 1938 as er ny aa-reaghey as aa-hoialshaghey reesht ayns 1958 myr y chied lioar jeh'n chiareskeealag Arthooragh lesh White, "The Once and Future King". Er ny stiurey ec Wolfgang Reitherman as Hamilton Luske, ta'n scannane goaill stiagh gooyn Rickie Sorensen, Karl Swenson, Junius Matthews, Sebastian Cabot, Norman Alden, as Martha Wentworth. She eshyn va'n scannane bioghit jerrinagh lesh Walt Disney Productions va skeayllit magh car bea Walt Disney.

Sleeping Beauty (scannane 1959):
She scannane fansee kiaullee bioghit Americaanagh voish y vlein 1959 eh Sleeping Beauty. Va'n scannane gientit ec Walt Disney as t'eh bunnit er y çhee-skeeal "Sleeping Beauty" (1697) liorish Charles Perrault. T'eh ny 16oo ard-scannane bioghit Disney. Hie eh magh er ny skeaylley er 29 Jerrey Geuree 1959 liorish Buena Vista Distribution. T'eh goaill stiagh gooyn Mary Costa, Eleanor Audley, Verna Felton, Barbara Luddy, Barbara Jo Allen, Bill Shirley, Taylor Holmes, as Bill Thompson.
Va'n scannane stiurit ec Les Clark, Eric Larson, as Wolfgang Reitherman, fo stiurey Clyde Geronimi, marish obbyr skeeal elley liorish Joe Rinaldi, Winston Hibler, Bill Peet, Ted Sears, Ralph Wright, as Milt Banta. Ta kiaull y scannane, ta goaill stiagh obbyr Chiaullane Sheeansey Graunke fo stiurey George Bruns, nyn reaghyssyn ny aachummaghyn jeh peeshyn voish ballay "Sleeping Beauty" 'sy vlein 1890 liorish Pyotr Ilyich Tchaikovsky.

Peter Pan (scannane 1953):
She scannane fansee contoyrtys bioghit Americaanagh voish y vlein 1953 eh Peter Pan. V'eh gientit liorish Walt Disney Productions as t'eh bunnit er y chloie voish y vlein 1904, "Peter Pan, or The Boy Who Wouldn't Grow Up" liorish J. M. Barrie. Er ny stiurey liorish Clyde Geronimi, Hamilton Luske as Wilfred Jackson, t'eh ny 14oo ard-scannane Disney. T'eh goaill stiagh gooyn Bobby Driscoll, Kathryn Beaumont, Hans Conried, Paul Collins, Heather Angel, as Bill Thompson. Ta'n scannane eiyrt er possan paitçhyn ta çheet quail Peter Pan as goll er jurnaa dys yn ellan Never Land son tannaghtyn aeg, raad ta Peter geearree shaghney Captain Hook.

Fun and Fancy Free:
She scannane skeealyn çhaglit fansee kiaullee bioghit Americaanagh voish y vlein 1947 eh Fun and Fancy Free. V'eh gientit ec Walt Disney as skeayllit magh er 27 Mean Fouyir 1947 liorish RKO Radio Pictures. She eshyn y nuyoo ard-scannane bioghit Disney as y kiarroo scannane bundeilit ren y teyrlann car ny 1940yn son argid y hauail car y Nah Chaggey Dowanagh.

Pinocchio (scannane 1940):
She scannane fansee kiaullee bioghit Americaanagh voish y vlein 1940 eh Pinocchio. V'eh gientit ec Walt Disney Productions as bunnit er y noaskeeal paitçhyn Iddaalagh "The Adventures of Pinocchio" (1883) liorish Carlo Collodi. She eshyn va'n nah ard-scannane bioghit lesh Disney, as eh jeant lurg rah y chied scannane bioghit, "Snow White and the Seven Dwarfs" (1937).

Snow White and the Seven Dwarfs (scannane 1937):
She scannane fansee kiaullee bioghit Americaanagh voish y vlein 1937 eh Snow White and the Seven Dwarfs. Va'n scannane gientit ec Walt Disney Productions as skeayllit magh liorish RKO Radio Pictures. Bunnit er y çhee-skeeal Germaanagh voish y vlein 1812 liorish ny Braaraghyn Grimm, she eshyn y chied ard-scannane lane liauyr bioghit dy tradishoonagh as y chied ard-scannane bioghit Disney. Va'n skeeal aachummit liorish ny h-ellyneyryn boayrd skeeal Dorothy Ann Blank, Richard Creedon, Merrill De Maris, Otto Englander, Earl Hurd, Dick Rickard, Ted Sears as Webb Smith. She David Hand va'n stiureyder oaseiragh, raad ren William Cottrell, Wilfred Jackson, Larry Morey, Perce Pearce, as Ben Sharpsteen stiurey straihyn er lheh y scannane.

The Jungle Book (scannane 1967):
She scannane aittys kiaullee bioghit Americaanagh voish y vlein 1967 eh The Jungle Book. V'eh gientit liorish Walt Disney Productions. Bunnit er y lioar fo'n ennynm cheddin voish y vlein 1894 liorish Rudyard Kipling, she eshyn y 19oo ard-scannane bioghit Disney. Er ny stiurey ec Wolfgang Reitherman, v'eh ny scannane jerrinagh v'er ny ghientyn ec Walt Disney hooar baase car e ghientyn.
Ta skeeal y scannane eiyrt er Mowgli, paitçhey feie va troggit ayns jungyl yn Injey liorish moddee oaldey tra ta e chaarjyn, y panther Bagheera as y maghouin Baloo geearree cur er y jungyl y aagail roish çheet y drogh heegyr Shere Khan.
Hie scannane eiyrtyssagh, "The Jungle Book 2", er ny skeaylley magh ayns 2003.

Robin Hood (scannane 1973):
She scannane aittys kiaullee contoyrtys bioghit Americaanagh voish y vlein 1973 eh Robin Hood. Va'n scannane gientit liorish Walt Disney Productions as skeayllit magh liorish Buena Vista Distribution, as t'eh bunnit er y skeeal çheerey Sostynagh jeh'n ennym cheddin raad ta ny karacteyryn er nyn soilshaghey myr beiyn antrapoamorfagh. Er ny ghientyn as ny stiurey ec Wolfgang Reitherman, she eshyn y 21d ard-scannane bioghit Disney as y chied obbyr va jeant dy lane lurg baase Walt Disney. Ta'n skeeal eiyrt er contoyrtyssyn Robin Hood, Little John, as cummaltee Nottingham as ad troddan noi ny keeshyn ass towse jeh Flah Yuan, as ta Robin cosney laue poosee Maid Marian. Ta'n scannane goaill stiagh gooyn Brian Bedford, Phil Harris, Peter Ustinov, Pat Buttram, Monica Evans, as Carole Shelley.

Cinderella (scannane 1950):
She scannane fansee kiaullee bioghit Americaanagh voish y vlein 1950 eh Cinderella. Va'n scannane gientit ec Walt Disney. Bunnit er y çhee-skeeal fo'n ennym cheddin liorish Charles Perrault, she eshyn y 12oo ard-scannane bioghit Disney. Va'n scannane stiurit ec Wilfred Jackson, Hamilton Luske, as Clyde Geronimi. Ren Mack David, Jerry Livingston, as Al Hoffman screeu ny h-arraneyn, ta goaill stiagh "Cinderella", "A Dream Is a Wish Your Heart Makes", "Oh, Sing Sweet Nightingale", "The Work Song", "Bibbidi-Bobbidi-Boo", as "So This is Love". T'eh goaill stiagh gooyn Ilene Woods, Eleanor Audley, Verna Felton, Rhoda Williams, James MacDonald, Luis van Rooten, Don Barclay, Mike Douglas, William Phipps, as Lucille Bliss.

Alice in Wonderland (scannane 1951):
She scannane aittys fansee kiaullee bioghit Americaanagh voish y vlein 1951 eh Alice in Wonderland. Hie yn scannane er ny ghientyn liorish Walt Disney Productions as v'eh bunnit er lioaryn "Alice" liorish Lewis Carroll. Y trass skeaylley jeig jeh ard-scannaneyn bioghit Disney, va'n chied taishbynys jeh'n scannane ayns Lunnin er 26 Jerrey Souree 1951 as ayns Caayr York Noa er 28 Jerrey Souree 1951. Ta'n scannane goaill stiagh gooyn Kathryn Beaumont myr Alice, Sterling Holloway myr y Cheshire Cat, Verna Felton myr y Queen of Hearts, as Ed Wynn myr y Mad Hatter. Ren Walt Disney eab "Alice" y aachummey myr ard-scannane bioghit ayns ny 1930yn as ren eh aavioghey yn smooinaght reesht ayns ny 1940yn. Hoshiaght, v'eh er smooinaght dy nee scannane jantys bio bioghit veagh yn scannane, agh ren Disney reih ard-scannane bioghit y yannoo fy yerrey.

The Three Caballeros:
She scannane skeealyn çhaglit kiaullee jantys bio/bioghit Americaanagh voish y vlein 1945 eh The Three Caballeros. Hie yn scannane er ny ghientyn liorish Walt Disney as er ny skeaylley magh liorish RKO Radio Pictures. Haghyr y chied taishbynys jeh'n scannane ayns Caayr Veksico er 21 Nollick 1944. V'eh skeayllit magh ayns ny Steatyn Unnaneysit er 3 Toshiaght Arree 1945 as 'sy Reeriaght Unnaneysit ayns Mayrnt 1945. V'eh ny 7oo ard-scannane bioghit Walt Disney, as ren eh kelloorey yn jeihoo feailley bleeaney jeh Donald Duck. Ta skeeal y scannane geiyrt er contoyrtyssyn trooid ayrnyn jeh America Jadjynagh, mestey bioghys tradishoonagh rish jantys bio. T'eh ny nah scannane mastey shey scannaneyn çhaglit hie magh liorish Walt Disney Productions car ny 1940yn, lurg "Saludos Amigos" (1942). Ta enney mie er chammah er-yn-oyr dy nee eshyn fer jeh ny chied ard-scannaneyn ren mestey bioghys tradishoonagh rish aghteyryn jantys bio.

Melody Time:
She scannane kiaullee jantys bio/bioghit Americaanagh voish y vlein 1948 eh Melody Time. Va'n scannane gientit ec Walt Disney as skeayllit magh liorish RKO Radio Pictures er 27 Boaldyn 1948. T'eh jeant seose ass shiaght meeryn ta currit rish kiaull ennoil as kiaull çheerey as t'eh coontit myr y lhieggan kiaull ennoil jeh'n scannane hie roish, "Fantasia". T'eh ny wheiggoo scannane bundeilit Disney lurg "Saludos Amigos", "The Three Caballeros", "Make Mine Music", as "Fun and Fancy Free".

Make Mine Music:
She scannane skeealyn çhaglit kiaullee bioghit Americaanagh voish y vlein 1946 eh Make Mine Music. V'eh gientit ec Walt Disney as skeayllit magh liorish RKO Radio Pictures. She eshyn y 8oo ard-scannane bioghit Disney as v'eh skeayllit magh er 20 Averil 1946. 

Saludos Amigos:
She scannane skeealyn çhaglit jantys-bio bioghit Americaanagh voish y vlein 1943 eh Saludos Amigos (Spaainish son "Bannaghtyn, Chaarjyn"). Va'n scannane gientit ec Walt Disney as skeayllit magh liorish RKO Radio Pictures. She eshyn y 6oo ard-scannane bioghit Disney as y chied ass shey scannaneyn bundeilit va gientit liorish Walt Disney Productions ayns ny 1940yn. Bunnit ayns America Ladjynagh, t'eh jeant seose jeh kiare meeryn; ta Donald Duck ayns daa jeu as Goofy ayns fer jeu. T'eh goaill stiagh y chied huarystal jeh José Carioca, y parrad sigar Brasseelagh. Hie "Saludos Amigos" magh da'n chied cheayrt ayns Rio de Janeiro er 24 Luanistyn 1942. V'eh skeayllit magh ayns ny Steatyn Unnaneysit er 19 Toshiaght Arree 1943. Va "Saludos Amigos" cha ennoil dy ren Walt Disney reih scannane elley mychione America Ladjynagh, "The Three Caballeros", y chroo, as hie eh er ghientyn daa vlein ny s'anmey. She "Saludos Amigos" yn ard-scannane bioghit s'girrey lesh Disney as eh 42 vinnid er liurid.

The Many Adventures of Winnie the Pooh:
She scannane skeealyn çhaglit kiaullee bioghit Americaanagh voish y vlein 1977 eh The Many Adventures of Winnie the Pooh. Hie yn scannane er ny ghientyn liorish Walt Disney Productions as er ny rheynn magh liorish Buena Vista Distribution. She eshyn ta'n 22h ard-scannane bioghit Disney as v'eh skeayllit magh da'n chied cheayrt er taishbynys dooblit marish "The Littlest Horse Thieves" er 11 Mayrnt 1977.
Ren ny karacteyryn ayn croo kiartys dellal jeant seose jeh ram skeealyn as claareeyn çhellveeish eiyrtagh, eaddeeyn, lioaryn, gaihyn, as tayrnys fo'n ennym cheddin ec Disneyland, Walt Disney World, as Hong Kong Disneyland ayns bishaghey rish Pooh's Hunny Hunt ayns Tokyo Disneyland.

The Great Mouse Detective:
She scannane contoyrtys folliaght bioghit Americaanagh voish y vlein 1986 eh The Great Mouse Detective (t'er enney chammah myr The Adventures of the Great Mouse Detective son e aa-skeaylley ayns 1992 as Basil the Great Mouse Detective ayns çheeraghyn ennagh). Va'n scannane gientit liorish Walt Disney Feature Animation as skeayllit magh liorish Walt Disney Pictures. Y 26oo ard-scannane bioghit Disney, hie yn scannane er ny stiurey liorish John Musker, Ron Clements, Dave Michener, as Burny Mattinson. She lughyn as roddanyn ta cummal ayns Lunnin y 19oo eash ny preeu-characteyryn.

The Black Cauldron (scannane):
She scannane contoyrtys fansee doo bioghit Americaanagh voish y vlein 1985 eh The Black Cauldron. Va'n scannane gientit liorish Walt Disney Productions lesh co-obbraghey marish Silver Screen Partners II as v'eh skeayllit magh liorish Walt Disney Pictures.Y 25oo ard-scannane bioghit Disney, t'eh bunnit dy anhickyr er y chied daa lioar ayns "The Chronicles of Prydain" liorish Lloyd Alexander, straih queig noakseealyn ta bunnit ad hene er feayn-skeealleydaght Vretnagh.

The Rescuers Down Under:
She scannane contoyrtys bioghit Americaanagh voish y vlein 1990 eh The Rescuers Down Under. Va'n scannane gientit liorish Walt Disney Feature Animation as skeayllit magh liorish Walt Disney Pictures. Y 29oo ard-scannane bioghit Disney, t'eh goll er eiyrt er y scannane voish y vlein 1977, "The Rescuers", va bunnit er ny noaskeealyn liorish Margery Sharp. Ayns "The Rescuers Down Under", ta Bernard as Bianca jurnaaghey dys Fadaneys yn Austrail son guilley ta enmyssit Cody y hauail voish poatçher mooidjeenagh ta shirrey shirragh ayns gaue. Hie yn scannane er ny stiurey liorish Hendel Butoy as Mike Gabriel voish screeu-chloie liorish Jim Cox, Karey Kirkpatrick, Byron Simpson, as Joe Ranft, as t'eh goaill stiagh gooyn Bob Newhart, Eva Gabor ('sy phaart scannane jerrinagh eck), John Candy, as George C. Scott.

Aladdin (scannane Disney 1992):
She scannane aittys fansee kiaullee bioghit Americaanagh voish y vlein 1992 eh Aladdin. Hie yn scannane er ny ghientyn liorish Walt Disney Feature Animation as er ny skeaylley magh liorish Walt Disney Pictures. Ta'n scannane ny 31d ard-scannane bioghit Disney as ny chiarroo scannane va jeant car eash Disney Renaissance. V'eh gientit as stiurit ec Ron Clements as John Musker, as t'eh bunnit er y skeeal çheerey Arabagh fo'n ennym cheddin voish "Un Oie as Thousane". Ta'n fwirran goo goaill stiagh gooyn Scott Weinger, Robin Williams, Linda Larkin, Jonathan Freeman, Frank Welker, Gilbert Gottfried, as Douglas Seale.

Pocahontas (scannane 1995):
She scannane drama shendeeagh kiaullee bioghit Americaanagh voish y vlein 1995 eh Pocahontas. Ta'n scannane bunnit er bea y ven Powhatan Pocahontas as çheet ny coloinee Hostynagh voish Colught y Virjeeney. Ta'n scannane romansaghey y quaaltys eddyr ish as John Smith as yn aght ren ee sauail e vea. Hie yn scannane er ny ghientyn liorish Walt Disney Feature Animation as er ny skeaylley magh liorish Walt Disney Pictures. She eshyn y 33oo ard-scannane bioghit Disney as y sheyoo scannane va gientit as skeayllit magh car yn eash ta enmyssit Disney Renaissance.

Hercules (scannane 1997):
She scannane far-feniagh aittys fansee kiaullee bioghit Americaanagh voish y vlein 1997 eh Hercules. Hie yn scannane er ny ghientyn liorish Walt Disney Feature Animation er son Walt Disney Pictures. Y 35oo ard-scannane bioghit Disney as y hoghtoo scannane bioghit car eash y Disney Renaissance, va'n scannane stiurit ec Ron Clements as John Musker. Ta'n scannane bunnit dy anhickyr er yn eniagh shenn-skeealagh Heracles (t'er enney 'sy scannane fo'n ennym Raueagh echey, Hercules), mac Zeus, 'sy feayn-skeealleydaght Ghreagagh.

Mulan (scannane 1998):
She scannane contoyrtys kiaullee bioghit Americaanagh voish y vlein 1998 eh Mulan. Hie yn scannane er ny ghientyn liorish Walt Disney Feature Animation er son Walt Disney Pictures. T'eh bunnit er shenn-skeeal Sheenagh Hua Mulan, as t'eh ny 36oo ard-scannane bioghit Disney as ny nuyoo scannane bioghit va gientit as skeayllit magh car eash y Disney Renaissance. V'eh stiurit ec Barry Cook as Tony Bancroft, lesh skeeal liorish Robert D. San Souci as scaa-chloie liorish Rita Hsiao, Chris Sanders, Philip LaZebnik, Raymond Singer, as Eugenia Bostwick-Singer. Ta'n lhieggan Baarle goaill stiagh Ming-Na Wen, Eddie Murphy, Miguel Ferrer as BD Wong myr cloiederyn tra ren Jackie Chan cur e ghoo rish goo Captan Li Shang son ny dooblaghyn Sheenagh. Hie scannane eiyrtyssagh, "Mulan II", er ny skeaylley magh jeeragh er feeshan ayns 2004.

Tarzan (scannane 1999):
She scannane contoyrtys bioghit Americaanagh voish y vlein 1999 eh Tarzan. Va'n scannane gientit liorish Walt Disney Feature Animation er son Walt Disney Pictures. Y 37oo ard-scannane bioghit Disney as y jeihoo scannane as y scannane jerrinagh va skeayllit magh car eash y Disney Renaissance, t'eh bunnit er y skeeal voish 1912 "Tarzan of the Apes" liorish Edgar Rice Burroughs. Hie yn scannane er ny stiurey liorish Kevin Lima as Chris Buck voish scaa-chloie liorish Tab Murphy, Bob Tzudiker, as Noni White, as t'eh goaill stiagh gooyn Tony Goldwyn, Minnie Driver, Glenn Close, Rosie O'Donnell, Brian Blessed, Lance Henriksen, Wayne Knight, as Nigel Hawthorne.

Dinosaur (scannane):
She scannane contoyrtys Americaanagh voish y vlein 2000 marish jantys bio as ta bioghit lesh co-earrooder eh Dinosaur. Hie yn scannane er ny ghientyn liorish Walt Disney Feature Animation ayns co-obbraghey lesh The Secret Lab. Y 39oo ard-scannane bioghit Disney, ta skeeal y scannane geiyrt er "Iguanodon" aeg va doltit as troggit liorish lught thie scaanjoonyn keylley er ellan grianchryssagh. Lurg ceau dreiggey stroialtagh, ta'n lught thie garraghey shirrey thie noa as t'ad jannoo caarjys rish griaght jeeneysoaryn er y vollagh as ad goll er jurnaa dys ny "Nesting Grounds". Dy meeaighar, ta cragheyderyn lheid as y "Carnotaurus" er nyn shirrey.

Fantasia (scannane 1940):
She scannane skeealyn çhaglit kiaullee bioghit Americaanagh voish y vlein 1940 eh Fantasia. Va'n scannane gientit as skeayllit magh ec Walt Disney Productions, lesh stiurey skeeal liorish Joe Grant as Dick Huemer as stiurey gientyn liorish Walt Disney as Ben Sharpsteen. Y trass ard-scannane bioghit Disney, t'eh jeant seose jeh hoght meeryn bioghit ta currit rish peeshyn dy chiaull chlassicagh v'er stiurey ec Leopold Stokowski, shiaght jeu hie er chloie liorish Kiaullane Philadelphia. Ta'n cremmeyder kiaull as y cummeyder, Deems Taylor, ny Ard-yesheyder as t'eh cur failt roish dagh meer ayns jantys bio. Hie scannane eiyrtyssagh, "Fantasia 2000", er ny skeaylley magh ayns 1999.

Fantasia 2000:
She scannane consert prowaltagh Americaanagh voish y vlein 1999 eh Fantasia 2000. Hie yn scannane er ny ghientyn liorish Walt Disney Feature Animation as er ny skeaylley liorish Walt Disney Pictures. Va'n scannane gientit ec Roy E. Disney as Donald W. Ernst, as t'eh ny 38oo ard-scannane bioghit Disney as eiyrtyssagh er y scannane voish ny 1940yn "Fantasia". Gollrish y roie-immeeaghtagh echey, ta "Fantasia 2000" jeant seose jeh meeryn ta currit rish peeshyn dy chiaull chlassicagh. Ta ny deiney ard-ghooagh Steve Martin, Itzhak Perlman, Quincy Jones, Bette Midler, James Earl Jones, Penn & Teller, James Levine, as Angela Lansbury foshley dagh meer ayns reayrtyssyn jantys bio t'er stiurey liorish Don Hahn.

The Emperor's New Groove:
She scannane aittys scannane bioghit Americaanagh voish y vlein 2000 eh "The Emperor's New Groove". Hie yn scannane er ny ghientyn liorish Walt Disney Feature Animation as er ny skeaylley magh liorish Walt Disney Pictures trooid Buena Vista Pictures Distribution. Y 40oo scannane bioghit lesh y teyrlann, v'eh stiurit ec Mark Dindal voish scaa-chloie liorish David Reynolds as skeeal liorish Chris Williams as Dindal. Ta'n fwirran goo goaill stiagh David Spade, John Goodman, Eartha Kitt, Patrick Warburton, as Wendie Malick. Hie scannane eiyrtyssagh, "Kronk's New Groove", er ny skeaylley magh jeeragh er feeshan ayns 2005.

Lilo &amp; Stitch:
She scannane drama aittys far-skeealaght heanse bioghit Americaanagh voish y vlein 2002 eh Lilo & Stitch. Va'n scannane gientit ec Walt Disney Feature Animation as skeayllit magh ec Walt Disney Pictures. Y 42h ard-scannane bioghit Disney, v'eh screeuit as stiurit ec Chris Sanders as Dean DeBlois. T'eh goaill stiagh Daveigh Chase as Sanders myr gooyn ny karacteyryn enmyssagh, as t'eh goaill stiagh gooyn Tia Carrere, David Ogden Stiers, Kevin McDonald, Ving Rhames, Jason Scott Lee, as Kevin Michael Richardson chammah. She eshyn va'n nah scannane bioghit ass tree (she "Mulan" va'n chied, as haink "Brother Bear" ny yei) hie er ny ghientyn son y chooid smoo ayns seyrlann vioghys Walt Disney World faggys da Orlando, Florida.

Treasure Planet:
She scannane contoyrtys jantys far-skeealaght heanse bioghit Americaanagh voish y vlein 2002 eh Treasure Planet. Hie yn scannane er ny ghientyn liorish Walt Disney Feature Animation as er ny skeaylley liorish Walt Disney Pictures er 27 Sauin 2002. Y 43oo ard-scannane bioghit Disney, she aachummey far-skeeal sheanse jeh'n noaskeeal contoyrtys "Treasure Island" (1883) liorish Robert Louis Stevenson t'eh.

Brother Bear:
She scannane drama aittys fansee kiaullee bioghit Americaanagh voish y vlein 2003 eh Brother Bear. Hie yn scannane er ny ghientyn liorish Walt Disney Feature Animation as er ny skeaylley liorish Walt Disney Pictures. She eshyn y 44oo ard-scannane bioghit Disney.
'Sy scannane, ta Kenai, guilley dooghyssagh Alaska, shelgey maghouin as t'eh marroo eh. Agh, ta ny Spyrrydyn brasnit jannoo maghouin ass Kenai hene myr pennys er-yn-or dy vel farg orroo. Son ve ny ghuilley reesht, lhisagh da Kenai jurnaaghey dys slieau raad ta Lossan y Twoaie bentyn rish y dowan. 
Hie scannane eiyrtyssagh, "Brother Bear 2", er ny skeaylley magh jeeragh er feeshan er 29 Luanistyn 2006.

Home on the Range (scannane 2004):
She scannane aittys kiaullee Heear bioghit Americaanagh voish y vlein 2004 eh Home on the Range. Va'n scannane gientit liorish Walt Disney Feature Animation as skeayllit magh liorish Walt Disney Pictures. Y 45oo ard-scannane bioghit Disney, she eshyn va'n scannane jerrinagh lesh Disney va bioghit lesh aghtyn tradishoonagh derrey "The Princess and the Frog" ayns 2009 as "Winnie the Pooh" ayns 2011.

Chicken Little (scannane 2005):
She scannane aittys far-skeealaght heanse Americaanagh voish y vlein 2005 ta bioghit lesh co-earrooder eh Chicken Little. Va'n scannane gientit liorish Walt Disney Feature Animation. T'eh bunnit dy anhickyr er y çhee-skeeal Anglo-Hostynagh "Henny Penny". Y 46oo ard-scannane bioghit Disney, v'eh stiurit ec Mark Dindal voish scaa-chloie liorish Steve Bencich, Ron J. Friedman, as Ron Anderson, bunnit er skeeal liorish Mark Kennedy as Dindal.

Meet the Robinsons:
She scannane aittys far-skeealaght heanse Americaanagh voish y vlein 2007 ta bioghit lesh co-earrooder eh Meet the Robinsons. V'eh gientit liorish Walt Disney Animation Studios as skeayllit magh liorish Walt Disney Pictures. Y 47oo ard-scannane bioghit Disney, t'eh bunnit dy anhickyr er y lioar paitçhyn "A Day with Wilbur Robinson" (1990) liorish William Joyce.

Bolt (scannane 2008):
She scannane contoyrtys aittys Americaanagh voish y vlein 2008 ta bioghit lesh co-earrooder eh Bolt. Va'n scannane gientit liorish Walt Disney Animation Studios as skeayllit magh liorish Walt Disney Pictures. T'eh ny 48oo ard-scannane bioghit Disney. Er ny stiurey liorish Chris Williams as Byron Howard, ta'n scannane goaill stiagh gooyn John Travolta, Susie Essman, Mark Walton, Miley Cyrus, Malcolm McDowell, Diedrich Bader, Nick Swardson, as Greg Germann.

Tangled:
She scannane aittys fansee contoyrtys kiaullee 3D Americaanagh voish y vlein 2010 ta bioghit lesh co-earrooder eh Tangled. Va'n scannane gientit liorish Walt Disney Animation Studios as skeayllit magh liorish Walt Disney Pictures. Ta'n scannane bunnit dy anhickyr er y çhee-skeeal Germaanagh "Rapunzel" 'sy çhaglym skeealyn çheerey va soilshit magh ec ny Braaraghyn Grimm, as t'eh ny 50oo ard-scannane bioghit Disney. Va'n scannane stiurit ec Nathan Greno as Byron Howard, as gientit ec Roy Conli, marish scaa-chloie va screeuit ec Dan Fogelman. Ta'n scannane goaill stiagh gooyn Mandy Moore, Zachary Levi, as Donna Murphy. Ta "Tangled" geiyrt er skeeal Rapunzel, ben-phrinse aeg, caillt marish folt fynn liauyr druiaghtagh ta geearree e toor follit y aagail. Noi yeeareeyn e moir gholtee, t'ee goaill rish cooney imlee ee y ghoaill magh 'sy dowan nagh row fakinit eck rieau er dy henney.

Winnie the Pooh (scannane 2011):
She scannane aittys contoyrtys kiaullee bioghit Americaanagh voish y vlein 2011 eh Winnie the Pooh. Va'n scannane gientit liorish Walt Disney Animation Studios as skeayllit magh liorish Walt Disney Pictures. Y 51d ard-scannane bioghit Disney, t'eh bunnit er y straih noaskeeal fo'n ennym cheddin liorish A. A. Milne as daahit liorish E. H. Shepard. V'eh stiurit ec Stephen J. Anderson as Don Hall, gientit ec Peter Del Vecho as Clark Spencer, as inshit ec John Cleese. Ren Anderson as Hall screeu y skeeal marish Brian Kesinger, Clio Chiang, Don Dougherty, Kendelle Hoyer, Nicole Mitchell, as Jeremy Spears.

Wreck-It Ralph:
She scannane aittys Americaanagh voish y vlein 2012 ta bioghit lesh co-earrooder eh Wreck-It Ralph. Va'n scannane gientit liorish Walt Disney Animation Studios as skeayllit magh liorish Walt Disney Pictures. Y 52h ard-scannane bioghit Disney, hie eh er ny stiurey liorish Rich Moore as er ny ghientyn liorish Clark Spencer voish scaa-chloie va screeuit ec Phil Johnston as Jennifer Lee as skeeal liorish Moore, Johnston, as Jim Reardon. Ta'n scannane goaill stiagh gooyn John C. Reilly, Sarah Silverman, Jack McBrayer as Jane Lynch. Hie scannane eiyrtyssagh, "Ralph Breaks the Internet", er ny skeaylley magh er 21 Sauin 2018.

Frozen (scannane 2013):
She scannane fansee kiaullee Americaanagh voish y vlein 2013 ta bioghit lesh co-earrooder eh Frozen. Va'n scannane gientit liorish Walt Disney Animation Studios as skeayllit magh liorish Walt Disney Pictures. Y 53oo ard-scannane bioghit Disney, ta'n scannane geddyn yn ardsmooinaght echey voishy çhee-skeeal "The Snow Queen" liorish Hans Christian Andersen. Ta'n scannane cur sheese er ben-phrinse ta goll er jurnaa marish fer rio, ny feeaihee Loghlinagh echey, as fer sniaghtee son e shuyr t'er ny tuittym magh y gheddyn as t'er nyn reeriaght y chur fo geurey beayn liorish e pooaryn.
Hie scannane eiyrtyssagh, "Frozen II", er ny skeaylley magh er 22 Sauin 2019.

Big Hero 6 (scannane):
She scannane far-feniagh Americaanagh voish y vlein 2014 ta bioghit lesh co-earrooder eh Big Hero 6. Va'n scannane gientit liorish Walt Disney Animation Studios as skeayllit magh liorish Walt Disney Pictures. Bunnit dy anhickyr er ny scheimyn aitt fo'n ennym cheddin liorish Marvel as va crooit liorish Man of Action, t'eh ny 54oo ard-scannane bioghit Disney. Va'n scannane stiurit ec Don Hall as Chris Williams as gientit ec Roy Conli, marish scaa-chloie liorish Jordan Roberts, Dan Gerson, as Robert L. Baird. Ta'n scannane goaill stiagh gooyn Ryan Potter, Scott Adsit, Daniel Henney, T.J. Miller, Jamie Chung, Damon Wayans Jr., Genesis Rodriguez, James Cromwell, Maya Rudolph, as Alan Tudyk.

Zootropolis:
She scannane aittys jantys caarjys poleenee Americaanagh voish y vlein 2016 ta bioghit lesh co-earrooder eh Zootropolis (enmyssit Zootopia as Zoomania ayns ardjyn eigsoylagh). Va'n scannane gientit liorish Walt Disney Animation Studios as skeayllit magh liorish Walt Disney Pictures. Y 55oo ard-scannane Disney, v'eh stiurit ec Byron Howard as Rich Moore, co-stiurit ec Jared Bush, as gientit ec Clark Spencer, marish scaa-chloie liorish Bush as Phil Johnston, as skeeal liorish Howard, Moore, Bush, Johnston, Jim Reardon, Josie Trinidad, as Jennifer Lee.
Ta'n scannane goaill stiagh gooyn Ginnifer Goodwin, Jason Bateman, Idris Elba, Jenny Slate, Nate Torrence, Bonnie Hunt, Don Lake, Tommy Chong, J. K. Simmons, Octavia Spencer, Alan Tudyk, as Shakira. Ta'n scannane geiyrt er caayr enmyssagh raad ta sheeintee antrapoamorfagh co-veaghey as t'eh ginsh skeeal paarteeas neulicklee eddyr meoir shee conning as molteyr shynnee as ad lhomey cochialg kimmeeagh bentyn rish skellal cragheyderyn.

SpongeBob SquarePants:
She straih hellveeish aittys vioghit Americaanagh eh SpongeBob SquarePants (ny SpongeBob). Va'n straih crooit ec yn ynseyder sheanse marrey as y daahder Stephen Hillenburg er son Nickelodeon. Ta'n straih geiyrt er contoyrtyssyn y characteyr enmyssagh as e chaarjyn ushtagh 'sy chaayr far-skeealagh fo-honn Bikini Bottom.

Dove Cameron:
Dove Olivia Cameron (ruggit myr Chloe Celeste Hosterman er 15 Jerrey Geuree 1996), she arraneyder as aghteyr Americaanagh t'ee. Ren ee cloie paart dooblit myr ny karacteyryn enmyssagh 'sy straih aittys "Liv and Maddie" liorish y Disney Channel, raad ren ee cosney Aundyr Daytime Emmy son Cloieder Ard-yindyssagh ayns Claareeyn Paitçhyn. Chammah's shen, t'ee er chloie Mal 'sy straih scannane "Descendants". 
Ayns 2016, ren Cameron cloie 'syn obbyr chiaullee hellveeish vio "Hairspray Live!" liorish NBC, raad ren ee cosney enmyssaght elley son Best Musical Moment ec ny MTV Movie & TV Awards ayns 2017, son e cloie jeh'n arrane "You Can't Stop the Beat". Er yn ardan, voish 2018 derrey 2019, ren ee cloie paart Cher Horowitz er aachummey theateragh jeh'n scannane "Clueless", as ayns 2019, hie ee magh er yn ardan ayns Lunnin tra ren ee cloie Clara Johnson 'sy chloie kiaullee "The Light in the Piazza".
Myr arraneyder, ren Cameron e chied goll magh lesh (2015). 'Sy vlein cheddin, ren ee cur magh e chied hingyl, "If Only", son "Descendants". Va'n chied skeaylley magh kiaullee, "Bloodshot / Waste", shiaullit ayns 2019. Ayns 2022, ren ee skeaylley magh y singyl "Boyfriend", haink er dy ve ny chied arrane lhee çheet stiagh er y chaart "Billboard" Hot 100, tra ren eh çheet stiagh mastey ny chied 20 arraneyn.

Kali Rocha:
She aghteyr Americaanagh ee Kali Michele Rocha (ruggit er 5 Nollick 1971). T'ee mie er enney cloie Karen Rooney, moir kiare paitçhey Rooney as lhiass-ard-ynseyder scoill 'sy straih hellveeish aittys "Liv and Maddie" liorish y Disney Channel. T'ee er co-screeu kiare episode jeh'n chlaare.
Bea aeg.
Va Rocha ruggit ayns Memphis, Tennessee as troggit ayns Ellan Rhode, ass dirree ee magh ass Carnegie Mellon School of Drama ayns 1993.
Coorse bea.
Hoshee coorse bea Rocha er yn ardan ayns aavioghey yn chloie "In the Summer House" liorish Jane Bowles ayns Luanistyn 1993 ec y Vivian Beaumont Theater. Voish shen, t'ee er ny chloie ayns ram gientynyn Broadway ass magh ass Broadway, goaill stiagh "Noises Off" as yn aittys "The Altruists" liorish Nicky Silver raad chroo ee paart Cybil.
Haghyr e chied çheet magh er y scaailan ayns aachummey scannaneagh "The Crucible" liorish Arthur Miller myr Mercy Lewish ayns 1996. Hass ee magh tra ren ee cloie tendeilagh etlagh Atlantic American ren arganey lesh karacteyr Ben Stiller ec y phurt aer 'syn aittys "Meet the Parents" ayns 2000, as y paart shen er ny aavioghey 'sy scannane eiyrtyssagh "Meet the Fockers". Va paart aafilleydagh eck chammah er "Buffy the Vampire Slayer" myr carrey jouyl drogh-chooilleenagh Anya, Halfrek, as carrey graih William the Bloody, Cecily. Ren Rocha cloie ben heshee Stonewall Jackson, Anna, ayns "Gods and Generals" liorish Ron Maxwell, drama ard-skeealagh bentyn rish y chied daa vlein jeh Caggey Theayagh America. Ta scannaneyn elley goaill stiagh "The Object of My Affection", "Autumn in New York", "White Oleander", "When Billie Beat Bobby", as "Ready? OK!".
T'ee er ny ghoaill ayrn 'syn episode "Strangers with Candice" jeh'n sitcom "Will and Grace" myr ben yeeragh ta flideragh marish Will. 'Syn arragh jeh'n vlein 2006, hoshee Rocha cloie 'sy sitcom giare-heiltagh "Teachers" liorish NBC. Ren ee cloie dy cuirreydagh ayns episode jeh'n straih "" myr Cindy Marino, naighteyr çhellveeish baggyrtagh. Chammah's shen, ren ee cloie ayns episode jeh'n straih "Bones" myr moir dreih. Chloie Rocha karacteyr laue-lhee baghee jeh'n chiarroo vlein, Dr. Sydney Heron, ec Seattle Grace Hospital 'sy straih hellveeish ABC, "Grey's Anatomy".
Ayns 2009, chloie Rocha marish e shenn aghteyr co-pharteeagh voish "Buffy the Vampire Slayer", Emma Caulfield, 'sy scannane "TiMER". Chloie Rocha 'sy straih un-straihagh "Sherri" myr Summer, reiltagh Sherri as carrey eck fy yerrey.
Ayns 2016, va Rocha reiht myr Marcy Burns, karacteyr aafilleydagh er y sitcom "Man with a Plan" liorish CBS. Ayns 2018, hie ee er n'yrjaghey myr karacteyr cadjin son y trass straih.

Gordy:
She scannane drama aittys lught thie Americaanagh voish y vlein 1994 eh Gordy. Ta'n scannane stiurit ec Mark Lewis, as geiyrt er skeeal bannoo ta enmyssit Gordy ta shirrey e lught thie (va currit gys thie buitçhoorys ayns Omaha). Va'n scannane rheynnit magh liorish Miramax Films fo'n ynnyd cowrey oc Miramax Family Films.

The Adventures of Ichabod and Mr. Toad:
She scannane skeealyn çhaglit bioghit Americaanagh voish y vlein 1949 eh The Adventures of Ichabod and Mr. Toad. Va'n scannane gientit liorish Walt Disney Productions, skeayllit liorish RKO Radio Pictures as stiurit ec Clyde Geronimi, Jack Kinney as James Algar lesh Ben Sharpsteen myr y stiureyder gientyn. Y 11oo scannane bioghit ayns canoin Disney Animation, t'eh jeant seose ass daa veer: y chied ta bunnit er y noaskeeal paitçhyn "The Wind in the Willows" (1908) liorish yn ughtar Goaldagh Kenneth Grahame, as y nah er y ghiare-skeeal "The Legend of Sleepy Hollow" (1820) liorish yn ughtar Americaanagh Washington Irving.

Bhumibol Adulyadej:
She Bhumibol Adulyadej ( ]; 5 Mee ny Nollick 1927 — 13 Jerrey Fouyir 2016) y nuyoo ree ren reilley er y Çheer Thai voish 1946 derrey 2016. She Rama IX yn enmys va echey.

Jackie Chan:
She aghteyr, jantagh scannane, ellyneyr caggoil, kiaulleyder as politickeyr Sheenagh voish Hong Kong eh Fang Shilong (ruggit myr Chan Kong-sang er 7 Averil 1954). T'eh goll er enney ny share fo'n ennym keirdagh echey, Jackie Chan.

Steven Seagal:
Ta Steven Frederic Seagal ny Steven Seagal ny chloieder fillym as ny ghienteyder fillym Americaanagh.

Callum Connolly:
Ta Callum Connolly ny vluckaneyr sockyr Sostynagh. T'eh cloie lesh Wigan Athletic F.C..

Josh Laurent:
Ta Josh Laurent ny vluckaneyr sockyr Sostynagh. T'eh cloie lesh Wigan Athletic F.C..

Matt Gilks:
Ta Matt Gilks ny vluckaneyr sockyr Sostynagh. T'eh cloie lesh Wigan Athletic F.C..

James Weir:
Ta James Weir ny vluckaneyr sockyr Sostynagh. T'eh cloie lesh Wigan Athletic F.C..

Valparaiso:
She caayr 'sy Çhillee eh Valparaíso.

Omar Bogle:
Ta Omar Bogle ny vluckaneyr sockyr Sostynagh. T'eh cloie lesh Wigan Athletic F.C..

Carlos Alazraqui:
Ta Carlos Jaime Alazraqui ny chloieder fillym Americaanagh.

Garry Marshall:
Va Garry Marshall ny chloieder fillym Americaanagh.
[[Ronney:Screeudeyryn ass York Noa (steat)

Bill Irwin:
Ta William Mills "Bill" Irwin ny chloieder fillym, vonkan as 'er aitt Americaanagh.

Šiprage:
She balley ayns Bosnia as Herzegovina eh Šiprage ()

Aishwarya Rai:
She ben chloieder as craishteyder Injinagh ee Aishwarya Rai Bachchan (ruggit er 1 Sauin 1973 myr Aishwarya Rai). T'ee mie er enney son yn obbyr ta jeant eck ayns scannaneyn Hindish as Tamilish, as ren ee cur ish hene myr fer jeh ny deiney ar-ghooagh 'syn Injey trooid e coorse aghteyrys. Ren Rai feddyn shiartanse d'aundyryn, goaill stiagh daa aundyr Filmfare Awards, as va'n "Padma Shri" bronnit urree liorish Reiltys ny h-Injey ayns 2009 as yn "Ordre des Arts et des Lettres" liorish Reiltys ny Frank ayns 2012. Dy mennick, va'n enmys "y ven s'aaley er y theihll" currit urree liorish yn ym-ysseraght.

Coonseil Slattyssagh Vannin:
She thie eaghtyragh jeh'n Tinvaal eh yn Choonceil Slattyssagh ( ny ).

Bioagyn:
Bioagyn phrotistyn y ymmyd çhaghnoaylleeaght lheead y echey. She ceaghley crooit ymmydoil son lheh jannoo myr sampleyr.

Piotrowice, Coontae Otwock:
She balley beg ayns y Pholynn eddyr Puławy as Warszawa eh Piotrowice. Ta mygeayrt 352 dy chummaltee ayn.

Edirne:
She balley 'sy Turkee eh Edirne (, , ).

Hans Christian Andersen:
Hans Christian Andersen (2 Averil 1805 – 4 Luanistyn 1875), she ughtar Danvargagh v'eh. Ga dy ren eh screeu ymmodee cloiaghyn, coontyssyn troailtys, noaskeealyn, as daanyn, ta enney share er son e shee-skeealyn lettyragh.
Ta shee-skeealyn Andersen, ta jeant seose jeh 156 skeealyn harrish nuy ym-lioaryn as er nyn jyndaa stiagh ayns ny smoo na 125 çhengaghyn, er ve goit stiagh ayns co-yssaght cho-chadjin y Neear, as ad roshtynagh da paitçhyn as kiarail lessoonyn y ghrayse as yn aalhiemmaght noi seaghyn. Ta ny shee-skeealyn smoo ard-ghooagh echey goaill stiagh "Eaddeeyn Noa yn Impir", "y Voidjyn Varrey Veg", "y Kiaulleyder Oie", "y Sidoor Stainney Shickyr", "ny Braagyn Ruy", "y Ven-Phrinse as y Phishyr", "y Venrein Niaghtee", "yn Eean Thunnag Graney", as "Thumbelina". Ta e skeealyn er chur bree rish ballayaghyn, cloiaghyn, as scannaneyn.

Andrew Corlett:
She Andrew Corlett yn chied vriw er Ellan Vannin.

Ghil'ad Zuckermann:
Ta Ghil'ad Zuckermann (; ruggit er 1 Mean Souree, 1971, Tel Aviv, Israel) (D.Phil., Aah yn Ollee; Ph.D., Cambridge) ny scoillar er y çhengoaylleeaght.

Garfield:
She caslys-skeeal Americaanagh va crooit ec Jim Davis eh Garfield.

Basshunter:
She arraneyder as markiagh jysk Soolynnagh eh Jonas Erik Altberg ta cloie fo'n ennym ardan Basshunter (r. 22 Mee ny Nollick, 1984, Halmstad, y Toolynn).

2015:

2016:

2017:

Laa Tinvaal:
Ta Laa Tinvaal, ny Laa'l Eoin, yn Laa Ashoonagh Vannin.

Raad-Yiarn Lectragh Vannin:
She raad-yiarn eddyr Doolish as Rhumsaa eh Raad-Yiarn Lectragh Vannin.

Nunap Isua:
She poynt s'odjey jiass Heer y Sniaghtey eh Nunap Isua ny Uummannarsuaq (Danvargish: "Kap Farvel").

The Lion King (scannane 2019):
She scannane drama kiaullee Americaanagh voish y vlein 2019 eh The Lion King. Va'n scannane stiurit as gientit liorish Jon Favreau, screeuit liorish Jeff Nathanson, as gientit liorish Walt Disney Pictures as Fairview Entertainment. She aa-yannoo bioghit lesh co-earrooder jeh'n scannane fo'n ennym cheddin echey voish y vlein 1994. Ta'n scannane goaill stiagh gooyn Donald Glover, Seth Rogen, Chiwetel Ejiofor, Alfre Woodard, Billy Eichner, John Kani, John Oliver, Florence Kasumba, Eric André, Keegan-Michael Key, JD McCrary, Shahadi Wright Joseph, as Beyoncé Knowles-Carter, chammah's James Earl Jones as eh aavioghey yn paart v'echey 'sy chied scannane. Ta skeeal y scannane geiyrt er Simba, leion aeg lhisagh goll rish e churrym myr ree kiart e heer ghooghys lurg dunverys e ayr, Mufasa, ec laueyn e naim, Scar.

Aladdin (scannane 2019):
She scannane aittys fansee kiaullee Americaanagh voish y vlein 2019 eh Aladdin. Hie yn scannane er ny ghientyn liorish Walt Disney Pictures, as v'eh stiurit ec Guy Ritchie voish script va co-screeuit echey marish John August. She aachummey jantys bio jeh'n scannane voish y vlein 1992 lesh yn ennym cheddin echey, as eh hene bunnit er y skeeal ennymagh voish "Un Oie as Thousane". Ta'n scannane goaill stiagh ny cloiederyn Will Smith, Mena Massoud, Naomi Scott, Marwan Kenzari, Navid Negahban, Nasim Pedrad, Billy Magnussen, as Numan Acar, chammah as gooyn Alan Tudyk as Frank Welker. Ta skeeal y scannane geiyrt er Aladdin, guilley straiddey, as eh tuittym ayns graih rish Princess Jasmine, y caarjys t'eh er n'yannoo marish Genie, as y troddan t'echey noi'n drogh phishagagh Jafar.

Naruhito:
She Impir y Çhapaan eh Naruhito (; ruggit er 23 Toshiaght Arree, 1960). Dirree eh gys Troyn y Chrysant er 1 Boaldyn 2019 lurg irree ass yn ayr echey, Impir Akihito, er 30 Averil 2019, rud ren goaill toshiaghey y rey Reiwa.

Bogotá:
She preeu-valley yn Cholombey eh Bogotá, ny Bogotá, Distrito Capital (Spaainish son "Bogotá, Rheynn Phreeu-valjagh") dy h-oikoil. Ta'n ennym shen giarrit dy mennick myr Bogotá, DC. V'eh Santafé/Santa Fe de Bogotá yn ennym echey eddyr 1991 as 2000. T'eh ny chaayr smoo 'sy çheer as t'eh reirit gollrish rheynnyn elley yn çheer.

Bad Cat:
She scannane jantys Turkagh voish y vlein 2016 ta bioghit lesh co-earrooder as jeerit er deiney aasit eh Bad Cat (). Va'n scannane stiurit ec Mehmet Kurtuluş as Ayşe Ünal. Ta'n scannane bunnit er y scheimm aitt "Kötu Kedi Şerafettin" liorish Bülent Üstün. She scannane seyr t'eh as hooar ayrnyn jeh'n obbyr argid voish soiaghey jannooyn. Hie eh er ny haishbyney ayns 2016 ec Feailley Scannane Bioghit Eddyrashoonagh Annecy, y chied scannane bioghit Turkagh v'ayn rieau.

Alex Ferguson:
Va Reejerey Alex Chapman Ferguson ny chloieder as reireyder bluckan-coshey ren reirey Manchester United voish 1986 dys 2013. T'eh coontit myr nane jeh ny reireyderyn share as s'rahoil va rieau ayn.
Chloie Ferguson myr bwoalleyder son kuse mooar dy chlubyn bluckan-coshey Albinagh, goaill stiagh Dunfermline Athletic as Rangers. Tra v'eh cloie da Dunfermline, she eshyn va'n ard-scoareyder 'sy leeg Albinagh ayns 1965 dys 1966. Ec jerrey e vea-chloie, v'eh gobbraghey myr ynseyder bluckan-coshey as eisht ghow eh toshiaghyt er e choorse-bea myr reireyder lesh East Stirlingshire as St Mirren. Ghow Ferguson soylley jeh traa feer rahoil tra she reireyder Aberdeen v’eh as ren eh cosney yn Leeg Albinagh tree keayrtyn, quieg cappanyn Albinagh, as Cappan ny Chosneyderyn ayns 1983. Reir eh possan bluckan-coshey eddyr-ashoonagh Albinagh rish tammalt giare lurg hooar Jock Stein baase, as hug eh lesh ad dys Cappan y Theihll ayns 1986.
Va Ferguson pointit dy ve ny leeideilagh er Manchester United ayns Mee Houney 1986. Tra v'eh gobbraghey da Manchester United, chossyn eh hoght aundyryn jeig as feed, myr shen tree ard-ennym jeig Ard-Leeg, quieg cappanyn FA, as daa aundyr Leeg Fenee. She Ferguson yn reireyder sodjey ren leeideil Manchester United, ren eh berraghtyn er recortys y Reejerey Matt Busby er nuyoo-jeig Mee y Nollick 2010.

Monte Águila, y Çhillee:
She caayr ny Shillee ee Monte Águila. Ta begnagh 6090 cummaltee eck. 

Droghad Vraddan:
She droghad eh Droghad Vraddan ta goll harrish yn Awin Doo er y raad eddyr Doolish as Purt ny h-Inshey. Hooar stadd er y chied linney gys Purt ny h-Inshey ec Raad Yiarn Vannin yn ennym voish y droghad.
She cowrey thallooin eh er Coorse y Clieau TT Mannin as eh soit çheu çheerey faggys da fo-valley Ghoolish raad ta ny roaryn-bree goll ny s'melley son dellal lesh y lhoob dooblit harrish yn awin. She ard reayrtey tradishoonagh eh marish soiagyn as eh soit faggys da'n Ynnyd-lhong Assaig raad ta ny lhongyn voish Sostyn, Nalbin as Nerin lhiggey magh.
Droghad as ny Ratçhyn TT.
Ta'n droghad soit er y joarey eddyr Braddan as Connaghyn. T'eh soit eddyr y 1-d as y 2-h Clagh veeilley er Coorse y Clieau ayns TT Mannin as Grand Prix Vannin er goal y raad A1 (Doolish gys Purt ny h-Inshey) as yn A23. Ta ayrn jeh'n çhenn raad-yiarn eddyr stadd Vraddan as Droghad y Cherroo jannoo ayrn jeh raad stiagh ta lhiggey da traght goll harrish tra ta ny ratçhyn taghyrtyn as ta ny raaidyn doont da ny ratçhyn.

Sadaf Taherian:
Ta Sadaf Taherian (Pershish: صدف طاهریان) ny ben-chloieder fillym Eeraanagh. Rug ee ayns Tehran, yn Eeraan er 21 Sauin, 1988. 

Hop-tu-Naa:
She feailley Celtiagh ta goll er kelloorey ayns Mannin er 31 Jerrey Fouyir eh Hop-tu-Naa. T'eh kelloorey yn feailley Celtiagh tradishoonagh Samhain, toshiaght y gheuree. T'eh er credjal dy nee eshyn y tradishoon gyn brishey shinney ayns Mannin.
Bun-ocklaght.
Ta'n enmys "Hop-tu-naa" çheet ass arrane Gaelgagh Manninagh t'er ny ghoaill car yn eailley as eh goaill stiagh ny focklyn shen myr aaraa; shimmey lheid jeh sheeanyn shen ta ry-gheddyn mastey ny Gaeil.
Tradishoonyn.
Ayns Mannin jiu, shimmey possan sleih ta goaill arraneyn Hop-tu-Naa "mastey ny thieyn" (as eh çheet dy tradishoonagh er farkaghtyn goll voish thie dys thie jannoo aghinyn er giootyn; ta lheid dy chaayneyderyn shen ta goll "mastey ny thieyn" ry-akin marish londeyryn napinagh 'sy noaskeeal "The Deemster" liorish Hall Caine. Chammah's shen, shimmey taghyrtyn as cooishyn Hop-tu-Naa ayn harrish Mannin dagh blein, goaill stiagh yl-chloiaghyn as co-hirraghyn son grainnaghey napinyn as goaill arraneyn tradishoonagh. Chammah as ny taghyrtyn ayns boodeeyssyn ynnydagh, ta Thie Tashtee Çheerey Ashoonagh ayns Creneash cuirrey cruinnaght son yn arrane tradishoonagh y ynsaghey as cooney y chur da sleih napinyn y ghrainnaghey.
Londeyryn napin.
Ayns Hop-tu-Naa noa-emshiragh, ta paitçhyn coamrey as goll voish thie dys thie geiyrt er miljanyn ny argid myr giootyn. Ta ny paitçhyn ceau londeyryn "napin" as goaill arraneyn Hop-tu-Naa. Shimmey sorçh eigsoylagh dy ghrainney napinyn ry-gheddyn as ad jeerit er troa shassoo yn napin as aght ny jesheenyssyn. T'eh er credjal nagh vel londeyryn napin ny shinney na toshiaght y 19oo eash, myr cha row yn losserey ry-gheddyn er yn ellan agh voish yn eash hie roish. Ayns ny shen laaghyn, hug ny paitçhyn bunyn ny napinyn lioroosyn as woaill ad dorryssyn ny deiney dob argid y chur dauesyn ayns cummey shendeeagh "Click ny Cair". S'liklee nagh vel y cliaghtey shen cooilleeinit foast.
Daunse.
Hie daunse Hop-tu-Naa er ny haglym ec Mona Douglas as Leighton Stowell. V'eh er credjal dy ren cubbylyn daunsey trooid ny straidyn er oie Hop-tu-Naa as ad ceau londeyryn napin. She daunse cosheeaght neuchramp da piyryn daunseyryn ta goaill ymmyd jeh'n cheim reel Manninagh as covestey d'arcyn nyn lomarcyn. Ta'n daunse shoh goll er ynsaghey ayns ram scoillyn ayns Mannin car mee Yerrey Fouyir dagh blein, as t'eh goll er cliaghtey ec ram jeh ny cooishyn Hop-tu-Naa harrish yn ellan.
Faaishnagh.
Ta fir jeh ny custymyn shonney cosoylagh rish adsyn ta kianglt nish rish Blein Noa Yerrey Gheuree. She traa da fadeyrys, faaishnys emshir, as faaishlaght v'ayn. Ec jerrey yn oie, va leoie yn aile jeant rea er y çhiollagh son cowrey coshey y gheddyn. Y moghrey ny yei, my row yn cowrey coshey pointeil ayns troa yn dorrys, beagh fer ny ben 'sy thie er raad y vaaish, agh my row yn cowrey coshey pointeil stiagh, she cowrey ruggyree v'ayn.
Va berreen enmyssit Soddag Valloo jeant; ren ad cur "balloo" er y verreeyn er-yn-oyr dy row eh jeant as eeit 'sy tostid. Ren mraane aegey as caillinyn ny berreenyn shen er smarageyn y çhiollagh, hoshiaght mestey ny mynayrnyn (flooyr, oohyn, bleaystyn ooh, sooie, as sollan) as teastney yn teayst. Va'n verreen rheynnit magh as eeit 'sy tostid, gyn fockle, as hie dagh peiagh dys y lhiabbagh goll gour nyn drommey as ad jerkal dy bee soylley jeh nyn sheshee ry-akin ayns ny h-ashlishyn oc. My row yn fer sheshee ayn, darragh eh jough ushtey dauesyn.
Va aghtyn faaishnagh elley ry-gheddyn, goaill stiagh skeddan saillit y gheid voish naboo as eh y rostey harrish aile, y ee 'sy tostid, as goll dys y lhiabbagh; ny ushtey y reill 'sy veeal as grineen sollan ayns dagh laue as t'ou geaishtagh rish cohaggloo naboo; beagh y chied ennym loayrit ec y naboo ennym dty heshey ry-heet.
Bee tradishoonagh.
Ta bee Hop-tu-Naa goaill stiagh mrastyr: praaseyn, pesmadyn as eeast mestit as lahnit ry-cheilley lesh eem. Veagh fooillee faagit çheumooie marish crockanyn d'ushtey da ny deiney shee. Va taffee jeant chammah ass shugyr as ushtey myr roortys co-chadjin er fastyr Hop-tu-Naa.

Siligo:
She commyoon 'sy Tardeen, yn Iddaal, eh Siligo.

Sage Kinvig:
Va Sage Kinvig (c. 1870-1962) nane jeh ny Gaelgeyryn dooyssagh s'jerrinagh tra hooar ee baase.
Va Sage Kinvig ruggit myr Sage J. Clarke ayns Garey Hollin ayns Ronague ayns Skylley Chairbre ayns jiass yn ellan mysh y vlein 1860. Ren ee poosey John Kinvig (c. 1860-1953) va gobbragh myr eeasteyr as masoonagh. Ren ee traenal ayns Balley Chashtal myr ben eaddeyder agh lurg tammylt hug ee seose shoh d'obbragh as cummal er yn thalloo ec y chroit eck. Va jeih paitçhyn eck.

Tommy Leece:
Va Tommy Leece (1859-12 Averil 1956) ny Ghaelgeyr doogyssagh voish jiass Vannin. Ghow eh toshiaght gobbragh ayns ny meainyn ayns Forsdal shooyl voish yn thie echey ayns Kerrookeeill dy roshtyn ny meainyn ec shey er y chlag sy voghrey. 
She laa liuayr as doillee v'ec yn sleih va gobbragh ayns ny meainyn as t'eh grait dy row Tommy poosit ayns y traa kirbyl echey. 
Bleeantyn ny lurg daag Tommy Mannin as hie eh d'obbragh 'syn Affrick Jiass. Fy-yerrey haink eh er ash dys Mannin as v'eh ny eeasteyr rish tammylt troailt dys Kione Sailley as Shetlynn.
Va Walter y Chleree ginsh skeeal dinsh Tommy da mychione yn traa v'eh cummal 'syn Affrick Yiass. Yn sleih va stiurey ny meainyn briaght jeh sleih dy gholl magh shelg as dooyrt Tommy dy jagh eh magh shelg conneeyn tra v'eh ayns Mannin. Va gunn cuirrit da as begin da goll magh shelg ushaghyn as cretooryn dy voddagh yn sleih ayns ny meainyn gee feill. 
Tra v'eh loayrt rish "Coimisiún Béaloideasa Éireann" v’eh gra dy row eh feer doillee keayrtyn greinnaghey Gaelgeyryn dy loayrt ass y Ghaelg.

Walter y Chleree:
Va Walter y Chleree ny Walter Clarke (8 Averil 1928 - 23 Jerrey Geuree 2007) ny ghooinney va gobbraghey da'n Ghaelg sy 20oo eash. 
Foddee dy row eh yn Gaelgeyr s'jerree dynsee yn Ghaelg veih loayrtee ghooghyssagh gyn cooney erbee veih lioaryn. Chur eh shilley er ny Gaelgeyryn as myr shoh haink eh dy ve ny Ghaelgeyr yindyssagh lesh coraa aalin. 
Va Walter y Chleree jannoo obbyr feer scanshoil ayns ny bleeantyn 1940 as 1950 as eshyn goll magh meeteil rish as recortey shenn sleih va ruggit as troggit sy Ghaelg gollrish Sage Kinvig, Tommy Leece as Eleanor Karran. Va'n obbyr shoh currit er bun hoshiaght ec yn Irish Folklore Commission agh v'eh goit ayns laue liorish sleih gollrish as Doolish y Karagher, Illiam y Radlagh as Çhalse y Craayne. 
Va'n Aundyr Reih Bleeaney Vannanan currit da ayns 2001. 

John Kinvig:
Va John Kinvig (c. 1870 - 1962) poosit rish Sage Kinvig as v'ad cummal ayns croit beg ayns Ronague ayns jiass yn Ellan. She Gaelgeyryn v'ad va ruggit as truggit ayns Gaelg. V'ad cooinaghtyn ny laaghyn tra va dagh ooilley pheiagh loayrt ass y Ghaelg ayns y valley veg oc agh eer dy row sleih loayrt ass y Ghaelg cha dod monney lhaih ny screeu. 
Va'n jees jeu toiggal dy row yn Ghaelg goll sheese y lhergagh agh v'ad maynrey dy row ymmoddee studeyryn y çhengey çheet dys yn thie oc d'ynsagh yn Ghaelg. Dooyrt Lola, inneen saa Sage as John, dy row yn thie oc lane dy 'leih goaill stiagh studeyryn.
Va ram naight ry-gheddyn voish John er y fa dy row eh goll mygeayrt y jiass gobbragh da'n Common Lands Board.
Kianglaghyn mooie.
Shoh John Kinvig loayrt rish Sage Kinvig, Ned Maddrell as Tommy Leece er ny recortyssyn jeant ec yn Irish Folklore Commission [https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=wTfzJc53-H8&t=6s]

Dorothy Pantin:
Va Dorothy Pantin (1896 - 1985) ruggit ayns Doolish 'sy vlein 1896 as hie ee dys scoill lheeys ayns Lunnin er y fa dy nee yn scoill shen va'n ynrican scoill va cur kied da mraane dy yannoo studeyrys er lheeys ec y traa shen. 
Haink ee erash dys Mannin ayns 1923 as ren ee cur ayns laue ram reddyn veagh cooney lesh marrane ayns y thie-lheeys. 
Va Dorothy yn chied ven laue-lhee ayns Mannin as ec y traa shen cha row monney geill currit da slaynt ny mraane ayns y thie-lhieys as s'liklee nagh row monney fys ec sleih noadyr er yn aght share dy chooney lesh mraane va torragh. 
V'eh cadjin dy liooar ec y traa shen son mraane dy gheddyn baase er y fa dy row ad torragh.
Er coontey jeh ooilley ny eieyn eck v'ee abyl dy yannoo shickyr dy row foddey sloo mraane geddyn baase lurg va ny paitchyn oc çheet er y theihll.  
Mastey reddyn elley ren ee, v'ee jannoo shickyr myr sampler, dy row sleih ayns y thie-lhieys gee dy mie as booise da reddyn gollrish shoh v'ee abyl dy chur stap er çhingysyn gollrish Rickets. 
Haink ee dy ve ard-ghooagh son yn aght v'ee stiurey yn Jane Crookall Maternity Home, yn thie-lheeys er-lheh son mraane as ny paitçhyn oc.
Hooar ee baase ayns 1985 as v'ee oanluckit ayns Doolish agh shimmey peiagh t'ayn ta foast cooinaghtyn ee as ooilley yn obbyr niartal ren ee son sleih va çhing er yn Ellan.

Robert Cain:
Va Robert Henry Cain (1909 - 1974) ruggit ayns y Çheen da paarantyn voish Mannin.  Tra ren yn Nah Chaggey Dowanagh goaill toshiaght ayns 1939 ren eh listal stiagh ayns yn armee as haink eh dy ve ard-ghooagh son reddyn ren eh ec jerrey y Nah Chaggey. V'eh ny ard-chaptan ayns yn armee ren parashuital cooyl armee ny Natseeyn ayns 1944. 
Va'n skimmee echey prowal geddyn droghad va goll harrish yn awin Rhine as begin daue prowal freayll rick er yn droghad dy voddagh armee ny Cumraagyn geddyn tessyn roish my row ny Natseeyn roshtyn yn droghad ad hene. Atreih, gyn yss da armee ny Cumraagyn va possan mooar jeh sidooryn Natseeagh ayn hannah lesh ram tankyn (va ny sidooryn shoh mie er enney da sleih myr "Panzer Division"). 
Begin da skimmee Robert Cain caggey ny lomarcan son shey laa gyn cooney. Eshyn va'n ynrican offishear ren scapail bio. Reesht as reesht va Robert Cain caggey noi tankyn eer tra v'eh gortagh dy agglagh as eer tra nagh row eh abyl dy akin dy kiart.
Ren Robert Cain cur mow shey tankyn ny lomarcan as ram gunnyn mooarey. T'ad gra dy daink ny Natseeyn dy ve lag-chreeagh er coontey jeh dunnalys Cain. Er yn çheyoo laa as feed Mean Fouyir ren yn skimmee echey scapail as er coontey jeh ooilley ny reddyn ren eh va'n VC currit da. She yn VC yn aundyr smoo ard-ghooagh as scanshoil currit da sleih son caggey. T'eh currit dauseyn ta dunnal erskyn towse. 
Haink eh erash dys Mannin as v'eh cummal ayns Balley Chashtal. Ta'n droghad ta goll harrish yn awin ayns Balley Chashtal mie er enn da sleih nish myr Droghad Cain. Hooar eh baase ayns Crowborough, Sussex er 2 Boaldyn 1974.

Juan Clague:
Va Juan Clague (1842 -1908) ruggit ayns Colby ayns 1842. Tra  v'eh aeg v'eh gobbragh er gowaltys yn lught-thie echey tra honnick eh fer er y ghowaltys karraghey lurgey jeh dooinney v'eh brisht. Ren eh coontey ram jeh shoh as myr shen v'eh currit ersooyl dy hraenal myr fer-lhee. 
Tra haink eh er ash dys Mannin v'eh gobbragh myr fer-lhee ayns jiass yn Ellan as v'eh mie er enn da sleih myr dooinney va kenjal as jesh as va cooney lesh sleih va boght. 
Ghow John soylley jeh cur shilley er sleih va cummal er y çheer as er coontey jeh shen v'eh loayrt ram Gaelg as dynsee eh ram kiaull Manninagh as ram shenn skeealyn mychione yn ellan ain.
Hooar eh ram skeealyn, kiaull as Gaelg voish dooinney enmyssit Bwoie Doal ny Tom Kermode. Va Tom ny eeasteyr va doal agh v'eh abyl dy insh skeealyn as goaill arrane dy mie as hooar John Clague ram fysseree mychione cooishyn Gaelgagh voish. 
Booise da Dr John Clague ta shin toiggal foddey smoo mychione glare, kiaull as skeeal yn Ellan ain. Tra hooar eh baase ayns 1908 v’eh oanluckit ayns keeill sy jiass as va ny focklyn shoh screeuit mychione echey: ‘Hie eh mygeayrt jannoo mie.’

Tommy Cain:
She shiaulteyr voish Purt le Moirrey va Thomas Cain, (1896 - 1950) ren ram ayns y Chied as Nah Chaggey Downagh. Ayns 1916 v'eh ny chaptan jeh baatey-caggee ayns y Cheayn Sheear as ayns 1917 v'eh ny chaptan jeh baatey er-lheh, enmyssit HMS Glen, va prowal sinkal baatyn-U.  
Hooar eh yn boyn DSC son yn dunnalys echey ayns sinkal kuse dy vaateyn-U lesh HMS Glen. 
Eddyr ny caggaghyn v'eh gobbraghey er ny baatyn echey magh ass Purt le Moirrey as voish 1929 lesh The IOM Steam Packet (Paggad Bree) va shiaulley eddyr Mannin as Sostyn.
Ayns 1940 va sidooryn voish ooilley ny h-Ellanyn shoh as y Rank prowal scapail voish ny Natseeyn as she Dunkirk yn boayl v'ad ooilley çhymsagh ry-cheilley as fuirraghtyn rish baatyn dy ghoaill ad thie.
Va ram baatyn voish yn Phaggad Bree goll noon as noal eddyr y Rank as Sostyn lesh sidooryn ayndoo. Va tree baatyn caillt ec y Phaggad Bree ayns un laa – The Fenella, King Orry as Mona’s Queen - ooilley sinkit er yn nuyoo laa as feed, Mee Boaldyn. 
Va Tommy goll noon as noal reesht as v’eh arryltagh stiurey yn Ben my Chree erash dys Dunkirk eer nagh row monney sleih elley geearree jannoo eh. V’ad abyl dy chooney lesh ram sidooryn elley booise da’n skimmee shoh as obbyr ren Tommy.
Tra va Tommy er yn traie ayns Dunkirk hooar eh moddey va ayns drogh stayd as jeeaghyn trimshagh agglagh, hug eh lesh yn moddey thie dys Purt le Moirrey as hug eh yn ennym Belgie er!
Ren yn Ben my Chree sauail 4,095 sidooryn voish ny traieyn ec Dunkirk as va 8,953 goit ersooyl booise da’n baatey,Tynwald.
She feniagh jeh daa chaggey va Tommy Cain as eshyn sinkal baateyn-U sy chied chaggey as sauail ram sidooryn ayns nah chaggey y theihll. 

Neil Armstrong:
Va Neil Alden Armstrong (5 Luanistyn 1930-25 Luanistyn 2012) ruggit ayns Wapakoneta Ohio ayns ny Steatyn Unnaneysit. 
Tra v'eh feer aeg v'eh geearree getlagh etlanyn as hooar eh kied-etlee tra nagh row eh agh queig bleeaney jeig d'eash. Tra v'eh ayns y lhuingys-caggee v'eh goaill toshiaght getlagh etlanyn-caggee. V'eh ayns caggey enmyssit Caggey Chorea as un cheayrt begin da tilgey magh ass yn etlan echey er y fa dy row eh bwoailt liorish gunnyn.
Ayns 1962 v'eh goll dy obbyr ec NASA as v'eh goaill toshiaght traenal myr shiaulteyr rollageagh. Ren eh traenal rish ymmoddee bleeantyn.
Er yn trass laa as feed, Mee ny Nollick, ren NASA reih Armstrong dy ve yn mainshter ayns Apollo 11, veagh shoh yn chied fynneig spoar dy gholl dys yn Eayst. Er yn çheyoo laa jeig, Jerrey Souree ayns 1969 daag Apollo 11 yn seihll lesh Neil Armstrong, Buzz Aldrin as Michael Collins ayn. Haink ad er yn Eayst dy sauçhey er yn chied laa as feed.
She Armstrong yn chied dooinney ren shooyl er yn Eayst as myr v'eh faagail Apollo 11 as cur yn cass echey er yn thalloo dooyrt eh:
Va Buzz Aldrin shooyl er yn Eayst neesht as v'ad tannaghtyn bunnys laa choud's va Michael Collins goll mygeayrt yn Eayst fuirraghtyn roo. Haink ad erash tree laa ny lurg shen as ren ad çheet dys y theihll ayns y Cheayn Sheealtagh. 
Hooar eh baase ayns 2012.

2020:

FK Žalgiris:
Ta Futbolo klubas Žalgiris ny Žalgiris ny chlub sockyr Litaan ta cloie ayns A lyga. Va'n club bunnit 'sy vlein 1947. Ec y traa t'ayn, she LFF stadionas y reireyder. Ec y traa t'ayn, she :lt:Vladimiras Čeburinas y reireyder. 

FK Riteriai:
Ta Futbolo klubas Riteriai ny Riteriai ny chlub soccer Litaanagh ta cloie ayns A lyga. Va'n club bunnit 'sy vlein 2005. Ec y traa t'ayn, she Pablo Villar y reireyder.

FK Kauno Žalgiris:
Ta Futbolo klubas Kauno Žalgiris ny Kauno Žalgiris ny chlub soccer Litaanagh ta cloie ayns A lyga. Va'n club bunnit 'sy vlein 2004 (Futbolo klubas Spyris). Ec y traa t'ayn, she Rokas Garastas y reireyder.

FK Panevėžys:
She club soccer Litaanagh eh Futbolo klubas Panevėžys, ny Panevėžys dy cadjin, voish y chaayr Panevėžys. Va'n fwirran yrjit gys A Lyga y Litaan roish yn imbagh 2018-19. Ec y traa t'ayn, she ... y reireyder.
Shennaghys.
Ta shennaghys liauyr 'sy toccer ec y chaayr Panevėžys. Roish y vlein 2014, ren FK Ekranas (ren cosney yn crouw 7 keayrtyn) shassoo er son y chaayr. Ansherbee, cha row yn club jargal cloie lurg y vlein 2015 er cooishyn argidys. Va'n club fogrit magh myr club brisht. Va "FK Panevėžys" currit er bun ec toshiaght y vlein 2015, jeeragh roish toshiaght yn imbee noa. Hoshee yn club cloie 'sy nah rheynn, as ren ad creaghney yn imbagh 'sy hoghtoo ynnyd. 'Sy vlein 2016, ren y club lhiasaghey as ren ad creaghney yn imbagh 'sy wheiggoo ynnyd. 'Sy vlein 2017, ren y club creaghney yn imbagh 'sy jeihoo ynnyd, agh 'sy vlein 2018 va'n club ny smoo raahoil as, marish y reireyder noa Alexandru Curteian, ren "FK Panevėžys" cosney yn I Lyga as v'ad yrjit gys yn A Lyga. Ec jerrey yn vlein 2019, ren ad creaghney yn imbagh 'sy wheiggoo ynnyd 'syn A Lyga.
Jeantagh y chullee.
Ta daah ruy ec y chullee son shassoo er son daaghyn y chlub.
Imbee Oarpagh.
"Rere cloiaghyn er 29 Jerrey Souree 2022"

FK Banga:
Ta Futbolo klubas Banga ny Banga ny chlub soccer Litaanagh ta cloie ayns A lyga. Va'n club bunnit 'sy vlein 1966. Ec y traa t'ayn, she David Afonso y reireyder.

FK Sūduva:
Ta Futbolo klubas Sūduva ny Sūduva ny chlub soccer Litaanagh ta cloie ayns A lyga. Va'n club bunnit 'sy vlein 1968. Ec y traa t'ayn, she Miguel Moreira y reireyder.

Veliko Tarnovo:
She caayr 'sy Vulgeyr eh Veliko Tarnovo (Bulgeyrish: Велико Търново, "Veliko Tarnovo").

Alec Baldwin:
Alexander Rae "Alec" Baldwin III (American: Alexander Rae "Alec" Baldwin III; born April 3, 1958) is an American film, theater and television actress, winner of three Golden Globe Awards, two Emmy Awards and seven Screen Actors Guild role in the "Rock 30" series. He was nominated for an Academy Award for Best Supporting Actor in 2003 for his role in the film "Cooler - Feel Vegas".

Siegfried &amp; Roy:
Va Siegfried & Roy ny eunyseyr, arraneyder, chiaulleyder, as ghelleyder Americaanagh. Hooar Roy baase ayns 2020.

Daniel O'Donnell:
Ta Daniel O'Donnell (ruggit 12 Mee ny nollick, 1961) ny kiaulleyder, as cummeyder Yernagh.

Enya:
Ta Enya Patricia Brennan (; ruggit 17 Boaldyn, 1961) ny kiaulleyder, arraneyder as cummeyder Yernagh. 

Star Wars:
She kiartys dellal yl-veanagh as kiaulldramey spoar ard-skeealagh Americaanagh eh Star Wars. V'eh crooit ec George Lucas marish y chied scannane fo'n ennym cheddin ayns 1977. Haink er y straih dy ve ny ard-yindys dowanagh 'sy phop-chultoor.

The Simpsons:
She straih hellveeish bioghit Americaanagh va crooit ec Matt Groening er son Fox Broadcasting Company eh The Simpsons. Hie yn straih magh er ny creeley da'n chied cheayrt er 17 Mee ny Nollick 1989.

Juan y Geill:
Va Juan y Geill (1899-1983) ny ghooinney va gobbraghey da'n Ghaelg sy 20oo eash. 
V'eh ruggit ayns Lerphoyll agh va e phaarantyn ruggit as troggit ayns yn Ellan Vannin. Ga dy row Gaelg voish y clean ec y moir as ayr echey, cha row agh Baarle loayrit ec y thie.
Hie eh mygeart yn Ellan cur shilley er ny shenn Vanninee va foast bio ec y traa shen. Dynsee Geill çhengey ny mayrey Ellan Vannin tra haink eh back gys yn Ellan lurg yn Nah Chaggey Mooar. 
Hooar eh staartey ayns Scoill Ard Cashtal Rushen as ren eh toghiaght gynsaghey brastyllyn Gaelgagh syn oie. Screeu eh "Conversational Manx, A Series of Graded Lessons in Manx and English, with Phonetic Pronunciation" cour ynseydee y ghlare ayns 1954 as ny s'anmey screeu eh "Cooinaghtyn my Aegid" as "Cooinaghtyn Elley."

Sahar Biniaz:
Ta Sahar Biniaz (Pershish: سحر بینیاز) ny ben-chloieder fillym Canadagh-Eeraanagh.

Splash and Bubbles:
She straih hellveeish phaitçhyn Americaanagh ta bioghit lesh co-earrooder eh Splash and Bubbles (ny "Jim Henson's Splash and Bubbles"). Va'n straih crooit ec John Tartaglia as hie eh magh er ny scaalheaney da'n chied cheayrt er PBS Kids er 23 Sauin 2016, lurg "Wild Kratts: Creatures of the Deep Sea". 

James Sie:
Ta James Sie ny chloieder fillym Americaanagh.

Pershish:
Pershish (پارسی) ny çhengey Ind-Oarpagh ta goll er loayrt ec mysh 110 millioon dy leih. T'ee goll er loayrt 'syn Eeraan, ayns Afghanistaan as ayns Tajikistaan er y chooid smoo.

Edmund Goodwin:
Va Edmund Goodwin (1844 -1925) ny 'er-ynsee as screeudeyr ny Gaelgey. Chur magh eh "Lessoonyn ayns Çhengey ny Mayrey Ellan Vannin" cour ynseydee y ghlare ayns 1901.
V'eh ruggit ayns Purt ny h-Inshey ayns 1844. Tra va Goodwin aeg, v'eh trome-çhing as cha row eh abyl dy hooyl dy mie son y chooid elley jeh e vea. Dobbyr Goodwin myr ynseyder-kiaull. Dynsee eh pianney as kiaulleeaght da Sophia Morrison. 
Va Goodwin aghtal ec glaraghyn. Va Germaanish, Frangish, Iddaalish, Eeslynnish, Yernish, Ladjyn, as Gaelg echey, as v'eh abyl dy lhaih ymmodee elley. Dynsee eh brastyllyn Gaelg ayns Purt ny h-Inshey son mooarane bleeantyn. 
Ren Goodwin cur er bun yn Çheshaght Ghailckagh marish John Joseph Kneen, Juan Clague, as A. W. Moore ayns 1899. 
Hooar eh baase ayns 1925. V'eh oanluckit ayns Purt ny h-Inshey. 

Archibald Cregeen:
Va Archibald Cregeen (20 Sauin 1774 - 9 Averil 1841) ny fockleyder Gaelg. Chur eh ry-cheilley "A Dictionary of the Manks Language" (1838). V'eh yn chied fockleyr son Gaelg.
Va Cregeen ruggit ayns Cairbre ayns Ellan Vannin lesh William Cregeen as e ven Mary Fairclough. Tra v'eh aeg, v'eh ny vasoonagh marmyr, grainnaghey lettyryn er lic oaie. Ren eh poosey Jane Crellin ayns 1798 as va hoght paitçhyn oc ry-cheilley. Ren eh troggal y thie echey ayns Colby. V'eh pointit dy ve toshiaght jioarey jeh Skeerey Roisen ayns 1813. 
Chur Cregeen yn fockleyr echey ry-cheilley harrish feead blein. Hie eh er fud yn ellan as ren eh çhymsaghey ny focklyn as raaghyn creeney.
Hooar eh baase er Jeheiney Caisht 1841. V'eh oanluckit 'sy ruillick ayns Skeerey Cairbre ayns Balley Beg.

Doolish y Karagher:
Va Doolish y Karagher (1926 - 1987) ny fockleyder Gaelg as ny 'er-ynsee as screeudeyr ny Gaelgey. Chur ry-cheilley eh "English-Manx Dictionary" (1979). Va Karagher fer jeh ny fir toshee jeh'n Aavioghey yn Ghaelg sy 20oo eash.
Va Karagher ruggit ayns Doolish ayns Ellan Vannin da William Fargher as e ven Catherine. Ren eh poosey Joyce Barry ayns 1954. 
Va'n shirveish agglish ooilley ayns Gaelg. 
V'eh nane jeh ny Gaelgeyryn va jannoo nyn gooid share dy chur bree as niart da'n Ghaelg as screeu eh fockleyr noa da'n ghlare. 
Hooar eh baase ayns 1987. 

Mark Hiddesley:
Va Mark Hiddesley ny Hildesley (9 Mee ny Nollick 1698 - 7 Mee ny Nollick 1772) ny haggyrt Anglicaanagh. She viggar Hitchin ayns Hertfordshire v'eh, as ny yei Aspick Sodor as Mannin (1755-1772). Ren eh greinnaghey yn Vible dy ve çhyndaait dys Gaelg. Ta’n skeeal shoh mysh:

Pete's Dragon (scannane 2016):
She scannane contoyrtys fansee Americaanagh voish y vlein 2016 eh "Pete's Dragon". Va'n scannane stiurit ec David Lowery, screeuit ec Lowery as Toby Halbrooks, as gientit ec James Whitaker. She aa-yannoo jeh'n scannane kiaullee Disney lesh yn ennym cheddin echey hie magh ayns 1977, agh cha nee scannane kiaullee yn scannane voish 2016. Ta'n scannane goaill stiagh ny cloiederyn Bryce Dallas Howard, Oakes Fegley, Wes Bentley, Karl Urban, Oona Laurence, as Robert Redford.

2021:

Reeriaght ny Danvarg:
Ta Reeriaght ny Danvarg (Danvargish: "Kongeriget Danmark", Greenlynnish: "Danmarkip Naalagaaffia", Faaroish: "Kongsríki Danmarkar") ny ockle Danvargagh son mooinjerys t'eddyr y Danvarg, Greenlynn as Ellanyn ny Geyrragh.

The Carpenters:
By phossan craa-chiaullee Americaanagh ad The Carpenters. Haink y possan ry-cheilley ayns Downey 'sy vlein 1968. Va'n possan jeant seose jeh Richard Carpenter as Karen Carpenter.

Breinnag:
Ta'n vreinnag ny heeintee jeh'n cloan Mephitidae.

Monsters, Inc.:
She scannane aittys scannane beisht Americaanagh voish y vlein 2001 ta bioghit lesh co-earrooder eh Monsters, Inc. (Monsters, Incorporated). Va'n scannane gientit ec Pixar Animation Studios er son Walt Disney Pictures. T'eh goaill stiagh gooyn John Goodman, Billy Crystal, Steve Buscemi, James Coburn, Mary Gibbs as Jennifer Tilly, as v'eh stiurit ec Pete Docter. Ta'n scannane geiyrt er daa veisht, James P. "Sulley" Sullivan foltagh as e charrey lieh-hooillagh Mike Wazowski, ta faillt ec y thie-grease bree "Monsters, Inc.", ta gientyn bree lurg aggle y chur er paitçhyn deiney. Ansherbee, ta seihll ny beishtyn credjal dy vel paitçhyn nieunagh as, erreish da caillin beg deiney skeetal stiagh 'sy thie-grease, lhisagh ee ve fillit dy valley roish my vel eh ro yeianagh.

Ratatouille (scannane):
She scannane aittys Americaanagh voish y vlein 2007 ta bioghit lesh co-earrooder eh Ratatouille. Va'n scannane gientit liorish Pixar Animation Studios as skeaylit magh liorish Walt Disney Pictures. Y hoghtoo scannane liorish Pixar, v'eh screeuit as stiurit ec Brad Bird, hie stiagh ayns ynnyd Jan Pinkava ayns 2005, as gientit ec Brad Lewis, voish smooinaght vunneydagh voish Bird, Pinkava as Jim Capobianco. Ta enmys y scannane çheet er y lhongey Frangagh ratatouille, ta goll er ny chiarail ec jerrey yn scannane chammah as er dooie yn ard-characteyr - roddan ("rat" 'sy Vaarle). Ta skeeal y scannane bunnit ayns Paarys as t'eh geiyrt er roddan enmyssit Remy, as brann echey ve ny ard-choagyrey. T'eh geearree eh y yannoo liorish crooaght cochaarjys marish guilley trustyr thie bee.
Ta'n scannane goaill stiagh gooyn Patton Oswalt myr Remy, roddan antrapoamorfagh as anaase echey 'sy choagyraght; Lou Romano myr Alfredo Linguini, guilley aeg trustyr ta jannoo caarjys rish Remy; Ian Holm myr Skinner, ard-choagyrey thie bee Auguste Gusteau; Janeane Garofalo myr Colette Tatou, "rôtisseur" ec thie bee Gusteau as yn ynrican ben-choagyrey; Peter O'Toole myr Anton Ego, cremmeyder thie bee; Brian Dennehy myr Django, ayr Remy; Peter Sohn myr Émile, braar shinney Remy; as Brad Garrett myr Auguste Gusteau, coagyrey hooar baase er gherrid.

Over the Hedge (scannane):
She scannane aittys Americaanagh voish y vlein 2006 ta bioghit lesh co-earrooder eh Over the Hedge. Va'n scannane gientit liorish DreamWorks Animation as bunnit er y scheim aitt fo'n ennym cheddin liorish Michael Fry as T. Lewis. Va'n scannane stiurit ec Tim Johnson as Karey Kirkpatrick voish scaa-chloie liorish Len Blum, Lorne Cameron, David Hoselton, as Kirkpatrick, as t'eh goaill stiagh gooyn Bruce Willis, Garry Shandling, Steve Carell, William Shatner, Wanda Sykes, Avril Lavigne as Nick Nolte.

Madagascar (scannane):
She scannane aittys Americaanagh voish y vlein 2005 ta bioghit lesh co-earrooder eh Madagascar. Va'n scannane gientit liorish DreamWorks Animation as rheynnit ec DreamWorks Pictures. Va'n scannane stiurit ec Eric Darnell as Tom McGrath as screeuit ec Mark Burton, Billy Frolick, Darnell, as McGrath. Ta'n scannane goaill stiagh gooyn Ben Stiller, Chris Rock, David Schwimmer, Jada Pinkett Smith, Sacha Baron Cohen, Cedric the Entertainer, as Andy Richter. Ta'n scannane geiyrt er possan beiyn voish Garey Baagh Central Park ren feddyn adsyn hene er ellyn Madagascar.

Chicken Run:
She scannane aittys bioghys stad-roie voish y vlein 2000 eh Chicken Run. Hie yn scannane er ny ghientyn liorish Pathé as Aardman Animations marish paarteeas voish DreamWorks Animation. Y chied ard-scannane liauyr liorish Aardman as y kiaroo scannane liorish DreamWorks, v'eh stiurit ec Peter Lord as Nick Park voish scaa-chloie liorish Karey Kirkpatrick as skeeal liorish Lord as Park. Ta'n scannane goaill stiagh gooyn Julia Sawalha, Mel Gibson, Tony Haygarth, Miranda Richardson, Phil Daniels, Lynn Ferguson, Timothy Spall, Imelda Staunton, as Benjamin Whitrow.

Flushed Away:
She scannane aittys contoyrtys voish y vlein 2006 ta bioghit lesh co-earrooder eh Flushed Away. V'eh stiurit ec David Bowers as Sam Fell, gientit ec Cecil Kramer, David Sproxton, as Peter Lord, as screeuit ecy Dick Clement, Ian La Frenais, Chris Lloyd, Joe Keenan as Will Davies. V'eh ny scannane jerrinagh DreamWorks Animation va co-ghientit marish Aardman Animations lurg "Chicken Run" (2000) as "" (2005), as ny chied scannane Aardman va jeant lesh bioghys CGI. Ta'n scannane goaill stiagh gooyn Hugh Jackman, Kate Winslet, Shane Richie, Bill Nighy, Andy Serkis, Ian McKellen as Jean Reno.

Ice Age:
She scannane aittys contoyrtys Americaanagh voish y vlein 2002 ta bioghit lesh co-earrooder eh Ice Age. Hie yn scannane er ny ghientyn liorish Blue Sky Studios as er ny skeaylley magh liorish 20th Century Fox. V'eh stiurit ec Chris Wedge as co-stiurit ec Carlos Saldanha voish scaa-chloie liorish Michael Berg, Michael J. Wilson as Peter Ackerman as voish skeeal liorish Wilson. Ta'n scannane goaill stiagh gooyn Ray Romano, John Leguizamo, Denis Leary, Goran Višnjić, as Jack Black. Bunnit car laaghyn yn eash rioee Phleistoseenagh, ta skeeal y scannane geiyrt er tree karacteyryn - Manny (Romano), mammoth ollanagh; Sid (Leguizamo), raiseyder thallooin mooar-veeallagh; as Diego (Leary), smilodon sharroo — t'er heet er lhiannoo deiney as t'ad gobbraghey ry-cheilley eh y chur er ash dys yn eggys echey. Myrane lesh shen, ta'n scannane geiyrt er Scrat, "fiorag harroo-eeacklagh", ta shirrey dy beayn boayl 'sy thalloo raad dy vel eh jargal eh chro darree y cheiltyn.

Finding Nemo:
She scannane contoyrtys Americaanagh voish y vlein 2003 ta bioghit lesh co-earrooder eh Finding Nemo. Va'n scannane gientit liorish Pixar Animation Studios as skeayllit magh liorish Walt Disney Pictures. Er ny stiurey liorish Andrew Stanton as er ny cho-stiurey liorish Lee Unkrich, va'n scaa-chloie screeuit ec Stanton, Bob Peterson, as David Reynolds voish skeeal liorish Stanton. Ta'n scannane goaill stiagh gooyn Albert Brooks, Ellen DeGeneres, Alexander Gould, Willem Dafoe, as Geoffrey Rush.
Hie scannane eiyrtyssagh, "Finding Dory", er ny skeaylley magh ayns Mean Souree 2016.

The Incredibles:
She scannane far-feniagh Americaanagh voish y vlein 2004 ta bioghit lesh co-earrooder eh The Incredibles. V'eh gientit liorish Pixar Animation Studios as skeayllit magh ec Walt Disney Pictures. Er ny screeu as ny stiurey ec Brad Bird, t'eh goaill stiagh gooyn Craig T. Nelson, Holly Hunter, Sarah Vowell, Spencer Fox, Jason Lee, Samuel L. Jackson, as Elizabeth Peña. Bunnit ayns lhieggan far-skeealagh jeh ny 1960yn, ta'n scannane geiyrt er Bob as Helen Parr, piyr far-feniee ta goll er enney myr Mr. Incredible as Elastigirl, ta follaghtyn nyn booaryn rere reillyn y reiltys as t'ad geearree beaghey ayns ny fo-valjyn marish nyn baitçhyn.
Hie scannane eiyrtyssagh, "Incredibles 2", er ny skeaylley magh ayns Mean Souree 2018.

Cars:
