She scannane aittys spoyrt Americaanagh voish y vlein 2006 ta bioghit lesh co-earrooder eh Cars. V'eh gientit liorish Pixar Animation Studios as skeayllit magh liorish Walt Disney Pictures. Va'n scannane stiurit ec John Lasseter voish scaa-chloie liorish Dan Fogelman, Lasseter, Joe Ranft, Kiel Murray, Phil Lorin, as Jorgen Klubien as skeeal liorish Lasseter, Ranft, as Klubien, as v'eh ny scannane seyr jerrinagh va jeant ec Pixar lurg hie eh er ny chionnaghey liorish Disney ayns Jerrey Geuree 2006.

The Reluctant Dragon (scannane):
She scannane Americaanagh voish y vlein 1941 eh The Reluctant Dragon. Va'n scannane gientit ec Walt Disney, stiurit ec Alfred Werker, as skeayllit magh liorish RKO Radio Pictures er 27 Mean Souree 1941. Dy bunneydagh, she stiurag hurrysagh seyraad Walt Disney Studios ayns Burbank, California v'eh. 'Sy scannane, ta'n fer aitt radio Robert Benchley as ram sleih ass fwirran Disney lheid as Ward Kimball, Fred Moore, Norman Ferguson, Clarence Nash, as Walt Disney, as ad cloie adsyn hene.

Song of the South:
She scannane drama kiaullee jantys bio/bioghit Americaanagh voish y vlein 1946 eh Song of the South. Va'n scannane gientit ec Walt Disney as skeayllit magh liorish RKO Radio Pictures. T'eh bunnit er çhaglym skeealyn Uncle Remus as aachummit liorish Joel Chandler Harris. She James Baskett ren cloie Uncle Remus. Ta'n scannane taghyrt ayns Jiass ny Steatyn Unnaneysit cur eash yn Aahroggalys, earish jeh shennaghys America lurg jerrey Caggey Theayagh America as scryssey yn cleabaght. Ta'n scannane eiyrt er Johnny ta shiaght bleeaney d'eash (Bobby Driscoll) ta jannoo keayrt er plandail e vummig son tannaghtyn liauyr. Ta Johnny jannoo carrey jeh Uncle Remus, fer jeh ny labreeyn er y phlandail, as t'eh goaill soylley clashtyn rish e skeealyn as contoyrtyssyn Br'er Rabbit, Br'er Fox, as Br'er Bear. Ta Johnny gynsaghey voish ny skeealyn kys streeu rish ny doolaneyn t'ayn er y phlandail.

So Dear to My Heart:
She ard-scannane jantys bio bioghit Americaanagh voish y vlein 1948 eh So Dear to My Heart. V'eh gientit ec Walt Disney as skeayllit magh liorish RKO Radio Pictures. Va'n foshley dowanagh ayns Chicago er 29 Sauin 1948. Gollrish "Song of the South" voish y vlein 1946, ta'n scannane mestey bioghys rish jantys bio. T'eh bunnit er y lioar "Midnight and Jeremiah" (1943) liorish Sterling North.

Ben and Me:
She peesh ghiare ghaa-chlowan bioghit Americaanagh voish y vlein 1953 eh Ben and Me. Hie eh magh er ny ghientyn liorish Walt Disney Productions as er ny skeaylley magh er 10 Sauin 1953. V'eh aachummit voish y lioar phaitçhyn va screeuit liorish yn ughtar as y daahder Robert Lawson hie magh er ny hoilshaghey da'n chied cheayrt ayns 1939.

Davy Crockett, King of the Wild Frontier:
She scannane Heear Americaanagh voish y vlein 1955 eh Davy Crockett: King of the Wild Frontier. Er ny ghientyn liorish Walt Disney Productions, she çhaglym reaghit as aaghiarrit jeh ny chied tree episodeyn jeh'n vyn-straih hellveeish "Davy Crockett". Ta Fess Parker cloie 'sy scannane myr Davy Crockett.

Mary Poppins (scannane):
She scannane fansee kiaullee Americaanagh voish y vlein 1964 eh Mary Poppins. Va'n scannane stiurit ec Robert Stevenson as gientit ec Walt Disney, as va ny h-arraneyn screeuit as cummit ec ny Braaraghyn Sherman. She lesh Bill Walsh as Don DaGradi y scaa-chloie, bunnit er y straih lioar liorish P. L. Travers, "Mary Poppins". Ta'n scannane goaill stiagh Julie Andrews 'sy chied ard-scannane eck myr Mary Poppins, ta jannoo keayrt er lught thie jee-obbragh ayns Lunnin as t'ee goaill ymmyd jeh'n aght bea er lheh eck son bree y lught thie y foaysoo. Ta paartyn co-hassooagh chammah ec Dick Van Dyke, David Tomlinson, as Glynis Johns. Va'n scannane goit ec y teyrlann Walt Disney Studios ayns Burbank, California, marish reayrtyssyn cooylrey peintit jeh Lunnin.

Winnie the Pooh and the Honey Tree:
She giare-scannane bioghit Americaanagh voish y vlein 1966 eh Winnie the Pooh and the Honey Tree. Va'n scannane bunnit er y chied daa chabdil jeh'n lioar "Winnie-the-Pooh" liorish A. A. Milne. Hie yn scannane er ny stiurey liorish Wolfgang Reitherman, er ny ghientyn liorish Walt Disney Productions, as er ny rheynn magh liorish Buena Vista Distribution er 4 Toshiaght Arree 1966 myr taishbynys dooblit marish "The Ugly Dachshund". V'eh ny ghiare-scannane jerrinagh ren Walt Disney gientyn. Hooar eh baase jeh'n changhyr scowanagh er 15 Nollick 1966, jeih meeghyn lurg skeaylley magh y scannane. Va ny h-arraneyn ayn screeuit ec ny Braaraghyn Sherman (Richard M. Sherman as Robert B. Sherman) as va'n reaghys kiaullee cummit as stiurit ec Buddy Baker.

Pete's Dragon (scannane 1977):
She scannane fansee kiaullee jantys bio/bioghit Americaanagh voish y vlein 1977 eh "Pete's Dragon". Va'n scannane stiurit ec Don Chaffey, gientit ec Jerome Courtland as Ron Miller, as screeuit ec Malcolm Marmorstein. Bunnit er y ghiare-skeeal neuhoilshit "Pete's Dragon and the USA (Forever After)" liorish Seton I. Miller as S. S. Field, ta'n scannane goaill stiagh ny roltagyn Sean Marshall, Helen Reddy, Jim Dale, Mickey Rooney, Red Buttons, Jeff Conaway, Shelley Winters, as goo Charlie Callas myr Elliott.

The Brave Little Toaster:
She scannane kiaullee bioghit Americaanagh voish y vlein 1987 eh The Brave Little Toaster. Er ny stiurey ec Jerry Rees, t'eh bunnit er y ghiare-skeeal voish y vlein 1980 fo'n ennym cheddin liorish Thomas M. Disch. Ta'n scannane goaill stiagh ny roltagyn Deanna Oliver, Timothy E. Day, Jon Lovitz, Tim Stack, as Thurl Ravenscroft, marish Wayne Kaatz, Colette Savage, Phil Hartman, Joe Ranft, as Jim Jackman ayns paartyn co-hassooagh.

The Brave Little Toaster to the Rescue:
She scannane kiaullee bioghit Americaanagh voish y vlein 1997 eh The Brave Little Toaster to the Rescue. Ta'n scannane eiyrtyssagh er "The Brave Little Toaster" voish y vlein 1987. Va'n scannane skeayllit magh jeeragh er feeshan er 20 Boaldyn 1997 'sy Reeriaght Unnaneysit as er 25 Boaldyn 1999 ayns ny Steatyn Unnaneysit liorish Walt Disney Home Video.
Va scannane eiyrtyssagh, "The Brave Little Toaster Goes to Mars", skeayllit magh ayns 1998.

The Brave Little Toaster Goes to Mars:
She scannane kiaullee bioghit Americaanagh voish y vlein 1998 eh The Brave Little Toaster Goes to Mars. T'eh bunnit er y ghiare-skeeal voish y vlein 1988 fo'n ennym cheddin liorish Thomas M. Disch. T'eh eiyrtyssagh er "The Brave Little Toaster to the Rescue" (1997). Va'n scannane skeayllit jeeragh er feeshan er 18 Boaldyn 1998 ayns ny Steatyn Unnaneysit liorish Walt Disney Home Video.

Torsten Haß:
Ta Torsten Haß (alias Kim Godal, behrt 21 Mee Houney 1970) ny screeudeyr Germaanagh.

ABBA:
She possan craa-chiaullee Soolynnagh ad ABBA. Haink y possan ry-cheilley ayns Stockholm 'sy vlein 1972. Ta'n possan jeant seose jeh Agnetha Fältskog, Anni-Frid Lyngstad, Benny Andersson as Björn Ulvaeus.

Jim Morrison:
Va Jim Morrison ("James Douglas Morrison"; 8 Mee ny Nollick 1943 - 3 Jerrey Souree 1971) ny arraneyder Americaanagh.

Casablanca (scannane):
She scannane drama romansagh Americaanagh voish y vlein 1942 eh Casablanca. Va'n scannane stiurit ec Michael Curtiz, as t'ad Humphrey Bogart, Ingrid Bergman, as Paul Henreid ny h-ard-aghteyryn. V'eh jeant as bunnit car y Nah Chaggey Dowanagh as t'eh jeeraghey er eebyrtagh Americaanagh (Bogart) lhisagh reih eddyr e ghraih er ben (Bergman) ny cooney rish e fer sheshee (Henreid), fer toshee y çhassoo Sheckagh noi ny Natseeyn, scapail voish caayr Casablanca va fo stiurey ec y Rank Veeshagh son e chaggey y reayll noi ny Germaanee. Ta'n cloie-screeu bunnit er "Everybody Comes to Rick's", cloie ardan lesh Murray Burnett as Joan Alison nagh row gientit. Ta'n fwirran co-hassooagh goaill stiagh Claude Rains, Conrad Veidt, Sydney Greenstreet, Peter Lorre, as Dooley Wilson.

The Office (straih hellveeish Americaanagh):
She straih hellveeish sitcom far-eanishagh Americaanagh eh The Office. Ta'n straih cur sheese er bea obbree laaoil failleyderyn oik ayns crouw y cholught far-skeealagh Dunder Mifflin Paper Company ayns Scranton, Pennsylvania. Hie eh magh er ny scaalheaney er NBC eddyr 24 Mayrnt 2005 as 16 Boaldyn 2013, feie nuy straihyn. Bunnit er y straih Ghoaldagh fo'n ennym cheddin (2001-2003) liorish y BBC as er ny chroo ec Ricky Gervais as Stephen Merchant, v'eh aachummit son y çhellveeish Americaanagh liorish Greg Daniels, shenn screeudeyr son "Saturday Night Live", "King of the Hill", as "The Simpsons". V'eh co-ghientit liorish Deedle-Dee Productions as Reveille Productions (Shine America ayns ny laaghyn ny s'anmey), ayns bishaghey rish Universal Television. V'ad Daniels, Gervais, Merchant, Howard Klein, and Ben Silverman, ny h-ard-ghienteyderyn bunneydagh agh haink fir elley stiagh ayns ny straihyn anmagh.

Madonna:
She arraneyder Americaanagh ee Madonna Louise Ciccone (r. 16 Luanistyn, 1958).

The Rolling Stones:
By phossan craa-chiaullee Sostynagh ad The Rolling Stones. Haink y possan ry-cheilley ayns London, Sostyn, 'sy vlein 1962. Va'n possan jeant seose jeh Mick Jagger, Keith Richards, Ronnie Wood as Charlie Watts.

Angelique Rockas:
Ta Angelique Rockas ny ben chloie, gienteyder as immeeaghtagh Affrickagh Yiass.

Charlotte, Carolina Hwoaie:
She Charlotte y chaayr smoo rere earroo yn phobble 'sy steat Americaanagh Carolina Hwoaie.T'eh soit ayns ard Piedmont as she eshyn balley coontae Mecklenburg County. Rere coontey-pobble y vlein 2020, va deiney cummal ayn, as rere shen she Charlotte y y 16oo caayr smoo rere earroo yn phobble ayns ny Steatyn Unnaneysit, y shiaghtoo caayr smoo 'sy Jiass, as y nah chaayr smoo 'sy Niar Yiass lurg Jacksonville, Florida. She Charlotte y laare cultooragh, tarmaynagh as arraghey jeh ard moirvaljagh Charlotte, raad va 2,660,329 deiney cummal ayn ayns 2014. Ta ard moirvaljagh Charlotte goit stiagh ayns ard staydraa cochianglt ta jeant seose jeh shey coontae jeig as raad ta 2,846,550 deiney cummal ayn ayns 2020.
Eddyr ny bleeantyn 2004 as 2014, she Charlotte va'n chaayr va gaase s'tappee, lesh 880,000 dy leih noa ayn. Rere staydraa voish coontey-pobble ny Steatyn Unnaneysit eddyr 2005 as 2015, va Charlotte ec baare rhenkyn milley-eashagh rere aase earroo yn phobble.
Ta kione-cherrooyn cochorpagh Bank of America, Truist Financial, as kione-cherroo hiar Wells Fargo soit ayns Charlotte. Rere shen, mastey undinyssyn argidoil elley t'ayn, she Charlotte y nah chaayr vancagh smoo ayns ny Steatyn Unnaneysit.
Mastey ny buill hurryssagh ayns Charlotte, ta ny fir vooarey goaill stiagh ny Carolina Panthers (fwirran bluckan coshey Americaanagh 'syn NFL), ny Charlotte Hornets (NBA), Charlotte FC (MLS), yn Coca-Cola 600, yn Wells Fargo Championship, Halley Foaynoo NASCAR, Charlotte Ballet, Children's Theatre of Charlotte ("Theater Paitçhyn Charlotte"), pairk chloie Carowinds, as y U.S. National Whitewater Center.
Ta emshyraght fo-hropickagh hash ayns Charlotte. T'eh soit shiartanse dy veeillaghyn çheu hiar jeh'n awin Catawba as çheu hiar yiass voish Logh Norman, y logh laue-jeant smoo ayns Carolina Hwoaie. Ta Logh Wylie as Logh Mountain Island, daa logh laue-jeant, soit faggys da'n chaayr chammah.

Loayreyder y Chiare as Feed:
She ard-oikagh y Chiare as Feed, y thie s'inshley dy whaiyl Vannin, eh Loayreyder y Chiare as Feed (). Ta'n Loayreyder reiht voish olteynyn y Thie ec y chied chruinnaght lurg reihys. T'eh freggyrtagh er son stiurey immeeaght y Thie as er son soilshaghey magh dy ynseydagh ny reillyn beayney t'ec y Thie. T'eh cur sheese dellal y Thie as t'eh cur kied da oardagh dellal y Thie ayns dagh cruinnaght.
Cha nel cairys ec y Loayreyder loayrt ayns resoonaghtyn, agh ta kiart echey votal. My vel troar vote corrym, ta'n choardail janoo conaant da leshyn y reihys goll er oi marish y resoonaght ny yn "status quo" y reayll ayns oardagh. Ansherbee, ta cairys ec y Loayreyder loayrt ayns resoonaghtyn ayns Tinvaal.
Va dagh Loayreyder voish 1750 dys 1898 nyn olteynyn jeh ny lughtyn-thie Moore ny Taubman ny v'ad poosit roosyn. Derrey yn vlein 1866, cha row olteynyn y Chiare as Feed reiht.
Erreish da'n chied reihys dys y Thie ayns 1867, v'eh currit er hene dy nee paart beayn eh paart y Loayreyder. Myr shen, tra ren Edward Moore Gawne irree ass y phaart ayns 1867, she eshyn va'n chied Loayreyder nagh dooar baase as eh ayns shelloo yn oik. Voish shen, ga dy vel eh jargal irree ass yn oik, ny ve neu-reiht, hooar dagh Loayreyder baase 'syn oik derrey Charles Kerruish ayns 1990, er lhimmey jeh John Robert Kerruish va reiht dys y Choonseil Slattysagh ayns 1919. Voish shen, cha dooar fer erbee jeh ny Loayreyderyn baase ayns oik.
Ta ny Loayreyderyn coamrit lesh yn eaddagh cheddin myr ta Loayreyder Whaiyl Hostyn coamrit: gooyn laatçhey airhey sheeidey Damaskagh doo marish bun-washag lane son caaghyn steat as gooyn sheeidey doo son dellal y laa. Va'n gooyn roie giootit voish Loayreyder Whaiyl Hostyn ayns 1966 son cooinaghtyn keead blein voish toshiaght reihyssyn theayagh gys y Chiare as Feed.
Er 27 Mean Fouyir 2016, va Juan Watterson reiht myr y Loayreyder, y dooinney s'aegey ren shelloo yn oik voish John Senhouse Goldie-Taubman. 

Eaghtyrane ny Coonseil Slattyssagh (Mannin):
She ard-oikagh Choonseil Slattyssagh Vannin eh Eaghtyrane ny Cooseil Slattyssagh ny Eaghtyrane y Choonseil Slattyssagh (). Derrey 1980, she Lhiass-chiannoort Vannin ren soie "ex officio" harrish y Choonseil Slattyssagh. Voish 1980 derrey 1990, ren ny h-olteynyn reih eaghtyrane magh vouesyn. Voish 1990, ta Eaghtyrane Tinvaal goll er reih liorish olteynyn Tinvaal magh vouesyn as t'eh soie "ex officio" myr Eaghtyrane y Choonseil Slattyssagh.
Ta eaghtyrane y choonseil, myr yn oikagh gurneilagh, tannaghtyn neuchleaynit, agh ta teiy reaghee echey; she shen, ayns cooishyn reihys corrym, ta'n eaghtyrane brishey yn stad.
T'eh freggyrtagh er son stiurey immeeaghtagh yn choonseil as er son soilshaghey magh dy ynseydagh ny reillyn beayney ayn, as t'eh freggyrtagh er son enmyssey oltey jeh'n choonseil dy chur billaghyn er oaie as ad çheet stiagh roish y choonseil.

Jeeg Beaufort:
She clash vooiragh najooragh çheusthie jeh Ammyr ny h-Albey eddyr shiar hwoaie Ulley as sheear yiass ny h-Albey ee Jeeg Beaufort. Ta'n jeeg 30 meeillaghyn (50 km) er lhiurid, 2 veeilley (3.5 km) er lheead as eddyr 700-1,000 trieyn (200 as 300 meader) er diunid.
V'ee recortyssit ayns 1856 myr red ren Captan Beechey feddyn magh "ymmoddee bleeantyn er dy henney".
Jalloo-oaylleeaght çheerey.
She glion thiollane baiht ee Jeeg Beaufort, va crooit liorish crimmey glonnoil car yn eash ghlonnoil s'jerree. Va lhiettalys currit er e lhieeney stiagh rere strooanyn loghtal as lajer tidee.
Tashtey-caggee dumpit.
Ga dy nee soiaghey feer ghowin as faggyssagh da'n phurt chahnagh ayns Càrn Rìoghain, ren y lught-reill 'sy Reeriaght Unnaneyssit y soiaghey dumpit smoo 'sy çheer son tashtaghyn-caggee kemmigagh as cadjincliaghtit lurg y Nah Chaggey Dowanagh: v'eh ymmydit son y chooish shen voish toshiaght y 20oo eash. T'eh er credjal ec Shirveishaght Choadee yn Reeriaght Unnaneysit dy vel ny smoo na millioon thunnaghyn dy hashtaghyn-caggee dumpit ayn.

2022:

DFK Dainava:
Ta Futbolo klubas Dainava ny Dainava ny chlub soccer Litaanagh ta cloie ayns A lyga. Va'n club bunnit 'sy vlein 2016. Ec y traa t'ayn, she Serhij Kuznetsov y reireyder.

FC Džiugas:
Ta Futbolo klubas Džiugas ny Džiugas ny chlub soccer Litaanagh ta cloie ayns A lyga. Va'n club bunnit 'sy vlein 2014. Ec y traa t'ayn, she João Prates y reireyder.

FC Hegelmann:
Ta Futbolo klubas Hegelmann ny Hegelmanns ny chlub soccer Litaanagh ta cloie ayns A lyga. Va'n club bunnit 'sy vlein 2009. Ec y traa t'ayn, she Andrius Skerla y reireyder.

FK Nevėžis:
Ta Futbolo klubas Nevėžis ny Džiugas ny chlub soccer Litaanagh ta cloie ayns A lyga. Va'n club bunnit 'sy vlein 2014. Ec y traa t'ayn, she Darius Gvildys y reireyder.

FK Jonava:
Ta Futbolo klubas Jonava ny Jonava ny chlub soccer Litaanagh ta cloie ayns A lyga. Va'n club bunnit 'sy vlein 1991. Ec y traa t'ayn, she Petro Kušlyk y reireyder.

FA Šiauliai:
Ta Šiaulių Futbolo Akademija ny Šiauliai ny chlub soccer Litaanagh ta cloie ayns A lyga. Va'n club bunnit 'sy vlein 2007. Ec y traa t'ayn, she Mindaugas Čepas y reireyder.

Clou Gaelgagh:
She kynney jeh coryssyn screeuee Ellanagh va cummit son prental y Ghaelg Chlassicagh eh clou Gaelgagh. V'eh ymmydit dy mennick voish yn 16oo eash derrey yn 18oo eash veanagh (Nalbin) ny yn 20oo eash veanagh (Nerin) agh cha nel eh ymmydit dy mennick nisht. Keayrtyn, ta dagh clou Gaelgagh enmyssit "Celtiagh" ny "unshagh" ga nagh unshee y chooid smoo jeh clouyn Gaelgagh.

Eliza S. Craven Green:
She feelee, screeudeyr as ben chloie Sostynagh va Eliza S. Craven Green (10 Nollick 1803 – 11 Mayrnt 1866).
Beashnys.
Va Eliza Craven ruggit ayns Kirkgate, Leeds, er 10 Nollick 1803. 'Syn aegid eck, ren ee ceau tammylt ayns Doolish ec y Theater Noa er Straid Atholl myr ben chloie. Lurg shen, ren ee cummal ayns Manchuin, agh ren ee goll er ash dys Leeds raad ren ee cummal feie shiartanse dy vleeantyn. Phoose ee rish James Green 'sy vlein 1828, tra hoshee ee soilshaghey magh e feeleeaght. Va'n eeleeaght eck soilshit magh fo'n ennym "Eliza Craven Green" as cha fo'n ennym "Eliza Craven".
V'eh yn chied lioar eck na "A Legend of Mona, a Tale, in two Cantos," Doolish 1825, 8vo, as v'eh yn nah lioar, as y fer jerrinagh eck, na "Sea Weeds and Heath Flowers, or Memories of Mona," Doolish, 1858, 8vo. Ren ee cur magh shiartanse d'eeleeaght as skeealyn dys y vean earishagh. Ren ee screeu son y "Phœnix", 1828, as y "Falcon", 1831, earishlioaryn ass Manchuin; son yn earishlioar "Oddfellows" , 1841 as ny s'anmey; son y "Leeds Intelligencer", "Le Follet", "Hogg's Instructor", as "Chambers's Journal", as ren ee cur lesh yn ym-lioar daanyn "The Festive Wreath", va soilshit magh ayns Manchuin 'sy vlein 1842.
Jiu, t'ee mie er enney myr screeudeyr y daan, "Ellan Vannin", 'sy vlein 1854, as eh goll er enney myr "arrane ashoonagh caghlaaee" Ellan Vannin.
Hooar ee baase ayns Leeds er 11 Mayrnt 1866 as t'ee oanluckit ayns Ruilick Noo Varkysh, Woodhouse, Leeds.

Thomas Shimmin:
She fer fritlag as feelee Manninagh va Thomas Shimmin (1800 – c. 1876–1879). She "Tom the Dipper" () y lhiass-ennym v'echey.
Ren eh screeu as goaill arraneyn 'sy Ghaelg as 'sy Vaarle. Va ny daanyn " Yn Coayl jeh'n Lillee" ("The Loss of the Lily"), "Happy Marriage of the Prince of Wales", as "The Royal Manx Railway, or £5 of wit for a penny" coontit mastey ny daanyn echey
V'eh deyrit daa cheayrt er son roosteyrys, 'sy vlein 1843 da'n chied cheayrt as reesht 'sy vlein 1851. 'Sy vlein 1843, hug ad deyrey arree dys yn Austrail, agh v'eh pardoonit as lhiggit seyr ayns Jerrey Souree 1847. Ren eh sharmanaghey chammah. Hooar eh baase, foddee 'sy vlein 1876 ny 1879.

Lillian Beckwith:
She screeudeyr Sostynagh va Lillian Beckwith (25 Averil 1916 – 3 Jerrey Geuree 2004), ny Lillian Comber myr v'ee goll er enney dy h-oikoil. T'ee mie er enney er son e straih lioaryn lhiass-veashynssagh bunnit er Ellan Skianagh.
V'ee ruggit myr Lilian Lloyd ayns Ellesmere Port, Cheshire, as phoose ee rish Edward Comber 'sy vlein 1937, as ayns 1942 ren ee arraghey dys Ealaghol, Ellan Skianagh, fo oardee lheihys son aash. Ren ee arraghey dys Sòdhaigh raad chionnee as stiuree ee e croit hene. Ren y bea eck kiarail bun shiaght lioar eck va soilshit magh eddyr 1959 as 1978. Ansherbee, smooinee fir jeh ny nabooyn eck dy row charaghteyryn aitt er lheh er ellan far-skeealagh Bruach ayns ny lioaryn feer chosoylagh rish feer phersoonidyn. Haink urree dy ve coontit myr "persona non grata" ayns yn eear-valley eck. Ren ee arraghey dys Mannin ayns 1962 as hooar ee baase er 3 Jerrey Geuree 2004.
Rolley lioaryn.
Straih Skianagh.
Ta dagh fer ry-gheddyn myr lioaryn clashtynagh er nyn insh liorish by Hannah Gordon.
Screeu Beckwith yn lioar "About my Father's Business" (1971) chammah, as ee coontey sheese er yn aegid eck ayns shapp e ayr.
Noaskeealyn.
Çhaglym giare-skeealyn:
As lioar choagyraght:

Eilean Cheap Bhreatainn:
She ellan er coose Atlantagh America Hwoaie eh Eilean Cheap Bhreatainn (Gaelg ny h-Albey er son "Ellan Rheynn Vretin"; , roie-ennym ""; ) She ayrn jeh'n wheiggey Nalbin Noa eh.
Ta'n ellan coontey stiagh 18.7% jeh eaghtyr ny h-Albey noa. Ga dy vel yn ellan scarrit magh ass lieh-innys ny h-Albey Noa liorish Keyllys Canso, ta Taagher Canso kiangley yn ellan rish y çheer vooar. Ta'n ellan soit shiar shiar hwoaie jeh'n çheer vooar as e chooseyn hwoaie as heear jeeaghyn magh er Lhoob Laurys Noo as y coose heear echey croo joarey hiar jeh Keyllys Northumberland. Ta ny cooseyn shiar as jiass jeeaghyn magh er y Cheayn Sheear as ta'n coose hiar croo joaraghyn sheear Cheyllys Cabot. Ta'n ellan cleayney seose voish yn jiass dys y twoaie raad ta'n thalloo jannoo çheer ard y rheynn hwoaie. Ta'n logh sailjey ("Laue yn Airhey" 'sy Rangish) jannoo kioneys er mean-çheerey yn ellan as eh coontit mastey ny loghyn sailjey smoo er y theihll.
'Sy vlein 2016 va 132,010 deiney, ny 15% jeh pobble y wheiggey, cummal er yn ellan. Ta earroo yn phobble goll sheese fo 2.9% voish yn vlein 2011. Ta 75% jeh pobble yn ellan cummal ayns Baljaght Ardjynagh Cheap Bhreatainn.
Çhengey.
Ta Coontey-pobble 2016 y Chanadey taishbyney nagh vel agh 40 loayreyderyn dooghyssagh ny Gaelgey ayns Ceap Bhreatainn. Er y laue elley, ta lughtyn-thie as persoonyn er lheh t'er nyn doshiaghey ym-skeallee yn çhengey dys sheelogheyn noa. T'ad goaill stiagh loayreyderyn flaaoil voish ardjyn Gaelgagh ny h-Albey as loayreyderyn ren ynsaghey yn çhengey ayns Nalbin Noa as, ayns cooishyn er lheh, ren studeyryssyn er y çhengey ayns Nalbin. Ta immeeaghtyn aavioghee elley goaill stiagh ynsagh da deiney aasit, cruinnaghtyn cultooragh theayagh as soilsheeyn magh.

Rolley ellanyn Vretin:
Shoh rolley ellanyn Vretin:

Agglish Hostyn:
She agglish Chreestiagh ee Agglish Hostyn (). Ta Agglish Hostyn coontit myr agglish vunneeaghtagh Hostyn. Ta ard-aspick Canterbury ny chleragh smoo shinsheragh, ga dy nee ree ny benrein y Reeriaght Unnaneysit yn ard-chiannoort. She Agglish Hostyn moir-agglish y Chommeeys Anglicaanagh. Ta e shennaghys goll sheear dys yn agglish Chreestiagh va recortyssit ayns Bretyn Raueagh ec y 3-oo eash as dys sushtallys Gregoiragh dys Kent fo laue Augustine Canterbury.
Ren yn agglish Hostynagh shaghney yn reirey paabagh tra ren Inry VIII failleil jannoo e phoosey rish Catreeney Aragon y yannoo gyn bree ayns 1534. Ren yn Aachummey Sostynagh greesaghey fo reirey lhiass-reeaghyn Edard VI roish scarrey giare jeh aachummey yn reirey paabagh fo Voirrey I as Philib. Ren Aght y Chiondeeaght 1558 aanoaghey yn scarrey as ren yn Coardailys Ealisaidagh goaill coorse ren lhiggey da'n agglish Hostynagh cur sheese urree hene myr agglish Aachummit as Chatoleagh:

Kirree varrey:
She ushagyn varrey kirree varrey ("Hydrobates pelagicus"). Ta'n ushag veg doo faagail magh kease lhean vane as rimmeig vane fo ny skianyn eck as ta etlagh craa gollrish etlagh craitnag. Ta'n vooar-chooid jeu sheelraghey er ellanyn magh ass cooseyn yn Oarpey lesh ny h-earrooyn smoo ayns Ellanyn ny Geyrragh, y Reeriaght Unnaneysit, Nerin as yn Eeslynn. Ta earroo mooar ry-gheddyn er y Cholloo chammah. She fo-ghooie er lheh ad ny h-ushagyn meanvooiragh.

Foillan:
She ushagyn marrey jeh'n chynney Laridae 'sy fo-oardagh Lari ad foillanyn. Mastey ny h-ushagyn, she yn mooinjerys s'faggys daue na ny gantyn (kynney Sternidae). Ta'n mooinjerys eddyr oc as ny h-awkyn ny s'odjey. Derrey yn 21oo eash, va'n chooid smoo jeh foillanyn currit stiagh 'sy ghenus "Larus", agh ta'n rang-oardraghey coontit nish myr rang-oardraghey neuchiart.
Er y chooid smoo, ta foillanyn nyn ushagyn meanagh dys mooarey, lheeah ny bane ayns daah, marish markyn dooey er nyn ging ny skianyn. Ta graagyn garroo oc as t'ad çhiu marish gobyn liauyrey as cassyn craitnagh. Ta'n chooid smoo jeu jannoo nyn idd er y thalloo as t'ad gee feill as ad feddyn nyn mee bio ny dy emshiroilagh. Ta'n bee bio dy mennick goaill stiagh crustee, eeastyn shliggagh, eeastyn as ushagyn beggey. Ta cabyn jee-yeushanagh oc as t'eh shen lhiggey daue spooilley mooar y ee. Er y chooid smoo, ta foillanyn cummal er y choose ny faggys da'n choose as cha nel ad goll magh foddey er y vooir, goaill magh ny pirree.

Foillan saggyrt:
She foillan mooar ta sheelraghey er cooseyn Atlantagh yn Oarpey eh yn foillan saggyrt ("Larus fuscus"). She ushag arraghee eh, ta tannaghtyn feie'n gheurey voish ny h-Ellanyn Goaldagh dys yn Affrick Heear. T'ad ry-akin ayns America Hwoaie chammah. Rish ny bleeantyn shoh chaie, haghyr bishaghey mooar ayns earrooyn ny foillanyn saggyrt.

Stronnag ghoo:
She awk mooar ee yn stronnag ghoo ("Uria aalge"). Ta rheynn ymphouyllagh eck as ee ry-akin ayns ushtaghyn Arctagh as twoaieagh y Cheayn Sheear as y Cheayn Sheealtagh. T'ee tannaghtyn mooie er y vooir da'n chooid smoo as çheet stiagh er y çheer son sheelraghey er eayninyn ny ellanyn creggagh.
Ta etlagh jeeragh tappee ec stronnagyn dooey agh cha nel ad gastey. She fo'n ushtey t'ad ny smoo gastey as ad thunney 30-60 m (100-195 tr) er diunid. Ta diunidyn thunnee seose dys 180 m (590 tr) recortyssit.

Erik Pontoppidan:
She ughtar, aspick Lutheragh jeh Agglish Norlynn, screeudeyr shennaghys, as shenndaghteyr Danvargagh va Erik Ludvigsen Pontoppidan (24 Luanistyn 1698 – 20 Nollick 1764). Ren e Chatechaght jeh Agglish y Danvarg cleayney dy mooar er smooinaghtyn crauee as cliaghtee 'sy Danvarg as ayns Norlynn rish 200 bleeaney lurg e hoilshaghey magh ayns 1737.

Mackenzie Ziegler:
She daunseyr, arraneyder, persoonid eddyr-voggyl as ben chloie Americaanagh ee Mackenzie Frances Ziegler (ruggit 4 Mean Souree, 2004). Hooar ee enney mie tra v'ee ny paitçhey as ee ry-akin feie shey bleeaney er y straih daunse "Dance Moms" er Lifetime marish e shuyr, y daunseyr as y ven chloie Maddie Ziegler.

Tuone Udaina:
She Tuone Udaina (1823 – 10 Mean Souree, 1898; Antonio Udina 'syn Iddaalish) y dooinney jerrinagh va fys erbee echey 'sy Dalmaatish, çhengey Romanagh dirree magh ass y Ladjyn er coose hiar y Vooir Aidreeatagh. She eshyn va preeu-vun abbyrt e phaarantyn, yn abbyrt va loayrit er ellan Veglia (Krk 'sy Chroitish). She Matteo Bartoli yn çhengoayllee ren y recortyssey ayns 1897.
Va'n lhiass-ennym "Burbu" currit er, agh cha nel fys ain mychione bun-ocklaght yn 'ockle shen. Ren Bartoli kiangley eh dy neuhickyr rish , fockle Iddaalish son dooinney groamagh granganagh. Ta çhyndaayssyn elley goaill stiagh "barbaragh" as "baareyder". Dobbree eh myr fer postagh mooiragh as myr ruillickeyr.
Cha row Dalmaatish Veglia y çhengey ghooghyssagh echey, er-yn-oyr dy ren eh ynsaghey eh as eh geashtagh rish coloayrtyssyn preevaadjagh e phaarantyn. Cha loayr eh yn Dalmaatish rish 20 bleeaney roish dy hoshee eh gobbraghey myr faishnyseyr çhengoaylleeagh. Cha ren ad recortyssyn sheean rieau.
Tra hooar Udaina baase as eh 74 bleeaney d'eash ayns bleaystey car obbyr bayr er 10 Mean Souree 1898, t'eh currit er hene dy hooar yn Dalmaatish baase er-yn-oyr nagh row Dalmaateyr elley feddynit as cha row eh er fys dy row Dalmaateyr elley foast bio.

Haylie Duff:
She ben chloie as arraneyder Americaanagh ee Haylie Katherine Duff (r. 19 Toshiaght Arree, 1985). T'ee mie er enney son e paartyn myr Sandy Jameson 'sy straih hellveeish "7th Heaven", myr Amy Sanders ayns "Lizzie McGuire", myr Summer Wheatley ayns "Napoleon Dynamite", as myr Annie Nelson 'sy scannane çhellveeish "Love Takes Wing" chammah as e scannane-eiyrtagh "Love Finds a Home". She ish y shuyr shinney jeh'n arraneyder as ben chloie Hilary Duff.

Cashtal Phurt ny h-Inshey:
She cashtal ayns Purt ny h-Inshey, Mannin, eh Cashtal Phurt ny h-Inshey (). Va'n cashtal troggit ec ny Wiggynnee er Ellan Noo Perick ta kianglt rish y valley liorish taagher. Ta'n cashtal ayns shelloo Eiraght Ashoonagh Vannin as t'eh foshlit da keayrtee as turrysee car y touree.
Va'n cashtal troggit ec ny Wiggynnee 'sy 11d eash fo reirey Ree Magnus Coshey-rooisht. Ga dy row thieyn cloaie maynaghoil Celtiagh ny shinney er yn ellan hannah, va ny chied niartagheeyn jeant ass aamaid. Va'n Cleiyagh ny chooid jeh'n vannishter Cheltiagh dy bunneydagh agh va ny boallaghyn caggee troggit ny s'anmey. 'Sy 14oo eash leah, va'n chooid smoo jeh ny boallaghyn as ny tooryn troggit ass claghyn geinnee ruy ynnydagh. Shimmey claghyn geinnee ruy ta ry-gheddyn mygeayrt y voayl. Lurg reirey ny Wiggynnee, hannee yn cashtal er ymmyd liorish yn Agglish er-yn-oyr dy row yn ard-cheeill troggit ayn – aspickys Sodor as Mannin – agh v'eh treiggit 'sy 18oo eash.
Hannee yn cashtal dy ve niartit as va soiagheeyn noa currit rish cho yeianagh as 1860. Ta ny thieyn çheusthie jeh'n chashtal nyn dholtanyn nish, agh ta ny boallaghyn mooie foast slane. Ren toghailtyn eddyr 1982 as 1987 soilshaghey magh ruillick vooar chammah as tholtanyn dhoon aamaid Vagnus Cosheyrooisht. She yn feddyn-magh share na oaie y "Ven Phaganagh" voish y 10oo eash as jesheen wannalagh Loghlynnagh as tashtey cooinaghyn argid ayn voish y vlein 1030 ny dy faggyssagh. She yn cummaltagh smoo ard-ghooagh ayn nish na y "Moddey Dhoo".
Ta Cashtal Phurt ny h-Inshey ry-akin er billaghyn £10 ta currit magh ec Reiltys Vannin.
T'eh currit roish dy nee Cashtal Phurt ny h-Inshey soiaghey Avalon ny skeealyn Arthooragh.
Ard-cheeill Charmane (tholtanyn).
She shenn "Ard-cheeill Charmane" tholtanyn yn ard-cheeill çheusthie jeh Cashtal Phurt ny h-Inshey. Gollrish ny strughtooryn elley er thallooyn y chashtal, ta'n mullagh thie slane caillt. Ren Robert Anderson scrutaghey ny tholtanyn son feddyn magh cre ny karragheeyn v'er laccal son yn ard-cheeill y aachummey as ren eh screeu tuarastyl dys y Lhiass-chiannoort ayns 1877. Ansherbee, cha row ny karragheeyn jeant.
Ta cabbal sellar cruin pointit fo'n charrick 34 trieyn er lhiurid, 16 trieyn er lheead as 9 trieyn er yrjid ta cleayney dys yn entreilys 'sy niar.
Ayns çheshvean y chroshlane ta'n tomman raad va Samuel Ritter, Aspick Vannin oanluckit ayns 1661.
Ta ruillick ry-gheddyn ayns corp ny killagh.
Ayns 1980 va skeerey Charmane, chooid jeh Aspick Vannin, livreit dys Ard-cheeil Phurt ny h-Inshey er Raad Nalbin ayns Purt ny h-Inshey.

Raad ny h-Albey, Purt ny h-Inshey:
She straid ghiare ayns Purt ny h-Inshey, Mannin, eh Raad ny h-Albey (), ny Raad Nalbin keayrtyn. T'eh goaill toshiaght er y ghoal eddyr yn A1 as Raad Tinvaal as t'eh roie my hwoaie shiar hwoaie gys Raad Derby. 

Lucien Quélet:
She najooragh as fliughane-oayllee Frangagh va Lucien Quelét (14 Jerrey Souree 1832 - 25 Luanistyn 1899). Ren Quelét feddyn magh shiartanse dy ghooieyn fungyssagh as she eshyn chur Société mycologique de France er bun - sheshaght ta jeeraghey er studeyryssyn bentyn rish fliughane-oaylleeaght.
Ren Quelét cur sheese er shiartanse dy ghooieyn fungyssagh, goaill stiagh:

P. D. Orton:
She fliughane-oayllee Sostynagh va Peter Darbishire Orton (28 Jerrey Geuree 1916 - 7 Averil 2005).

Carrick ny Kylliu:
She sker ayns Mooir Vannin magh ass coose yiass Vannin ee Carrick ny Kylliu (). Ta'n sker shoh ny peeshey thallooin smoo jiassagh t'er ny reirey ec Reiltys Vannin. Rere gurneilys ynnydagh, ta'n sker coontit myr ayrn jeh Skeerey Rosien. T'ee ny lhie çheu heear yiass voish y Cholloo, 4.5 km (2.8 mi) magh ass Kione Speeiney er y çheer vooar. She Thie Sollysh Charrick ny Kylliu voish yn 19oo eash yn cummey smoo fakinagh ayn. Ta'n thie sollysh 44 m (144 tr) er yrjid as va'n sollys ayn foaddit da'n chied cheayrt ayns 1875. Ta'n thie sollysh goll fo currym as obbyr ec yn Northern Lighthouse Board.

Jamyssaght:
She gleashaght pholitickagh as heshoil 'sy 17oo as 'sy 18oo eashyn va'n Jamyssaght (; , ; ). Ren y ghleashaght shen pohlldey aachummey yn linney shinsharagh jeh Reeraghtys Stuart gys y Troyn Goaldagh.

Bluckan coshey:
Shimmey sorçh dy spoyrt fwirranagh t'er enney myr bluckan coshey as she yn dean oc dean y vrebbal liorish bluckan. T'ad cur yn enmys "bluckan coshey", gyn sonreeaght, er y torçh dy vluckan coshey smoo cadjin raad t'eh ymmydit. Ta spoyrtyn enmyssit bluckan coshey goaill stiagh: sockyr; bluckan coshey croe (bluckan coshey Americaanagh ny bluckan coshey Canadagh er lheh); bluckan coshey Austrailagh; ruggyr (ruggyr unnaneys as ruggyr straih); as bluckan coshey Gaelgagh. Ta bun caghlaaee cadjin ec ny sorçhyn shoh as dy mennick t'ad cur reillyn bluckan coshey orroo.

Bluckan coshey Gaelgagh:
She spoyrt fwirranagh Yernagh eh bluckan coshey Gaeglagh ( ny ; ). T'eh goll er cloie eddyr daa wirran lesh 15 bluckaneyryn er dagh çheu er faaie faiyragh kiare-chuilleigagh. She dean y ghamman na'n bluckan y vrebbal jeeragh stiagh ayns dean y chondaigys (3 phoynt) ny harrish tesmad y dean (1 phoynt) ta 2.5 m harrish y thalloo.
Ta ny bluckaneyryn gymmyrkey yn bluckan liorish ymmyrkey, lhiemmey, brebbal, laue-phaartail as cass-dys-laue. 'Sy ghamman, t'ad lhiggey da horçh dy skenshyn: poyntyn as deanyn. T'ad bronney poyntyn tra ta'n bluckaneyr brebbal ny laue-phaartail yn bluckan tessen y tesmad, as eh soilshit liorish yrjaghey brattagh bane liorish fer reaghee. T'ad bronney dean tra ta'n bluckaneyr brebbal y bluckan fo'n tesmad stiagh 'sy voggyl, as eh soilshit liorish yrjaghey brattagh eayney. Ta dagh fwirran jeant seose jeh freilleyder dean, shey fendeilee, daa 'er meanagh, as shey soiagheryn.
She fer jeh kiare spoyrt ta stiurit ec "Cumann Lúthchleas Gael" ("Sheshaght Roortaghys Gaelgagh"), y çheshaght spoyrt smoo ayns Nerin. Myrane lesh yn immanaght as y chammag, ta bluckan coshey Gaelgagh coontit mastey ny spoyrtyn amateyragh. Ta'n bluckan coshey Gaelgagh cloiet ayns Nerin son y chooid smoo, agh ta unnidyn jeh'n Çheshaght ry-gheddyn 'sy Vretyn Vooar, 'syn Oarpey, ayns America Hwoaie, 'syn Affrick, 'syn Aishey as 'syn Austrail.
Ta kione-chloie Feniaghtys Bluckan Coshey Gaelgagh Ooilley-Nerin goll er cloie dagh blein ec Páirc an Chrócaigh, Divlyn as t'eh tayrn ny smoo na 80,000 deiney gys y chloie.

Melody Klaver:
She aghteyr Ollanagh ee Melody Klaver (r. 9 Mean Fouyir 1990).
Rolley scannaneyn as claareyn.
Scannaneyn:
Claareyn:

Bailey Jay:
She aghteyr pornograafagh, craishteyder an-ghraagh, cuirreyder as pod-scaalheaneyder tessen-cheintyssagh Americaanagh ee Bailey Jay (r. 5 Sauin 1988).

Kalena Rios:
She aa-aghteyr pornograafagh as aa-chraishteyder an-ghraagh tessen-cheintyssagh Brasseelagh ee Kalena Rios (r. 12 Jerrey Geuree, 1983). Hoshee ee gobbraghey 'sy çhynskyl pornograafagh ayns 2004. Harrish e coorse 'sy phornograafaght, ren ee goaill commee ayns ny smoo na 140 obbraghyn. Dirree ee ass y phornograafaght 'sy vlein 2015.

Bruna Butterfly:
She aa-aghteyr pornograafagh as aa-chraishteyder an-ghraagh tessen-cheintyssagh Brasseelagh ee Bruna Butterfly (r. 30 Mayrnt, 1990). Hoshee ee gobbraghey 'sy çhynskyl pornograafagh ayns 2010. 

Charlotte Cross:
She aghteyr pornograafagh as craishteyder an-ghraagh Americaanagh ee Charlotte Cross (r. 1 Mean Fouyir, 1994). Hoshee ee gobbraghey 'sy çhynskyl pornograafagh ayns 2015. 

Volodymyr Zelenskyy:
She politickeyr, aghteyr as fer aitt Ookraanagh eh Volodymyr Zelenskyy (; r. 25 Jerrey Geuree 1978). She eaghtyrane yn Ookraan t'eh ec y traa t'ayn. Hoshee eh 'syn oik shen ayns Boaldyn 2019.

Tessen-cheintyssagh:
She deiney ta gennaghtyn enney keintys nagh vel cohassooagh rish y cheintys va livreit dauesyn as dy vel geearree ceaghley dy beayn dys y cheintys t'ad cur enney orroosyn hene ad tessen-cheintyssee. Dy mennick, t'ad goaill ymmyd jeh couyr lhee son dy yannoo yn ceaghley shen, goaill stiagh therapaghyn aaenmyssagh keintys, lheid as therapey cur-er-ash broddagyn as laue-lheeys aa-enmyssagh keintys son dy chooney ad aa-heughey nyn girp rish nyn geintyssyn ennit.

Go, Dog. Go! (straih hellveeish):
She straih hellveeish strooanagh phaitçhyn ynsee ta bioghit lesh co-earrooder eh Go, Dog. Go!. Ta'n straih bunnit er y lioar phaitçhyn fo'n ennym cheddin (1961) liorish P. D. Eastman, as v'eh lhiassit er son Netflix liorish Adam Peltzman.

Bluckan (spoyrt):
She bluckan ta bolgit liorish aer as ta ymmydit son dy chloie fer jeh ny spoyrtyn enmyssit bluckan coshey eh bluckan. Ayns ny spoyrtyn shen, goaill magh lhimmaghyn ennagh, ta deanyn ny poyntyn schimmeigit tra ta'n bluckan lhiggit stiagh ayns fer jeh'n daa ard enmyssit da deanyn; ta gammanyn bluckan coshey jeant seose jeh daa wirran as ad geearree yn bluckan y ghleashaghey ayns troaghyn condaigagh er faaie.
Va ny chied vluckanyn jeant ass stoo najooragh, lheid as bolgan muickey bolgit, çheusthie jeh coodagh liare. Ta bluckanyn noa-emshyragh cummit ec jeshaghteyryn ass bolganyn rubbyr ny plastagh as, dy mennick, marish coodee phlastagh. Ta straihyn as gammanyn eigsoylagh gymmydey bluckanyn ceaghlagh, agh ta ny cummaghyn bunneydagh shoh oc:

Tilly McReese:
She aghteyr pornograafagh as craishteyder an-ghraagh Yernagh ee Tilly McReese (r. 27 Mayrnt, 1987). Hoshee ee gobbraghey 'sy çhynskyl pornograafagh ayns 2012 as dirree ee magh ass ayns 2022.

Donetsk:
She caayr hynskylagh 'syn Ookraan hiar eh Donetsk (, ), v'er enney myr Aleksandrovka, Yuzivka (ny Hughesovka), Stalin as Stalino keayrt. Ta'n chaayr soit er yn awin Kalmius ayns ard arganeit Wheiggey Donetsk. Ga dy vel y chaar coontit myr caayr Ookraanagh, t'ee fo stiurey "de facto" ec Pobblaght Heayagh Donetsk ta genmyssey yn chaayr myr e preeu-valley. V'eh oolit ayns 2021 dy row 905,364 deiney cummal 'sy chaayr as ny smoo na 2 villioon 'syn ard moirvaljagh (2011). Rere Coontey-pobble yn Ookraan 'sy vlein 2002, va Donetsk coontit myr y 5oo caayr smoo 'syn Ookraan.

Luhansk:
She caayr 'syn Ookraan hiar eh Luhansk () ny Lugansk (), v'er enney myr Voroshilovgrad (Ookraanish as Rooshish: Ворошиловград; 1935–1958 as 1970–1990). T'eh soit faggys da'n joarey rish y Roosh 'syn ard arganeit Donbas. Ec y traa t'ayn, she preeu-valley as balley stiuree Phobblaght Heayagh Luhansk (PHL), steat scarreydagh va bunnit ayns 2014 liorish atçhimeyryn currit rish y Roosh. She ish y chaayr as ny h-ardjyn goll mygeayrt fer jeh ny çheshveanyn caggee ayns Caggey Donbas. Roish e cappeeys liorish y PHL, va Luhansk ny phreeu-valley er Queiggey Luhansk. Ta deiney cummal 'sy chaayr.

Atçhimys:
She yn ymmyd jeh raghlid as elgys son deanyn politickagh eh yn atçhimys, ny tranlaase-aglee ny ym-agglaghey keayrtyn. Ta'n enmys shen ymmydit dy chur sheese da raghid car lhingyn shee ny, car caggaghyn, raghid noi shivoilee. She atçhimeyr y fockle ta currit orroosyn ta goaill ymmyd jeh'n atçhimys.
Ren yn Global Terrorism Database, ta stiurit ec Ollooscoill Maryland, College Park, recortyssey ny smoo na 61,000 taghyrtyn as 140,000 baaseyn eddyr y vlein 2000 as 2014.

Chornobyl:
She caayr ta begnagh treigit çheusthie jeh Cryss Eebyrtagh Chornobyl 'syn Ookraan eh Chornobyl (), ny Chernobyl (). T'eh soit ayns Baljaght Vyshhorod ayns y twoaie jeh Queiggey Kyiv. Ta Chornobyl mysh 90 km çheu hwoaie jeh Kyiv as 160 km çheu yiass voish Gomel 'sy Velaroosh. Roish y folmaghey echey, va mysh 14,000 dy chummaltee ayn, agh jiu cha nel agh mysh 1,000 cummaltee ayn.

Chanel Santini:
She aghteyr pornograafagh as craishteyder an-ghraagh tessen-cheintyssagh Americaanagh ee Chanel Santini (r. 7 Jerrey Geuree, 1998). Hoshee ee gobbraghey 'sy çhynskyl pornograafagh ayns 2016 agh dirree ee ass ayns 2020. 

Peyton Roi List:
She aghteyr as craishteyder Americaanagh ee Peyton Roi List (ruggit er 6 Averil 1998), ny Peyton List myr t'ee ennit ny smenkey.

Jade Laroche:
She aghteyr pornograafagh, craishteyder an-ghraagh as markiagh jysk ee Jade Laroche (r. 8 Mean Fouyir, 1989).

Vitali Klitschko:
She politickeyr as eear-ghoarneyr keirdagh Ookraanagh eh Vitali Volodymyrovych Klitschko (; r. 19 Jerrey Souree 1971). She meoir Kyiv as toshiagh Lught-Reill Steat Chaayr Kyiv eh voish y vlein 2014. She shenn toshiagh y phartee politickagh Bloc Petro Poroshenko "Gloo-pharteeaght" as shenn Oltey jeh Parlamaid yn Ookraan. Haink eh dy ve cassit ayns politickaght yn Ookraan ayns 2005 as ren eh mestey e heill politickagh marish e choorse myr doarneyr keirdagh derrey dirree eh magh ass y spoyrt ayns 2013.

Kharkiv:
She Kharkiv (), ny Kharkov (), y nah chaayr smoo 'syn Ookraan. Ta'n chaayr soit ayns hiar hwoaie yn çheer as she Kharkiv y chaayr smoo ayns ard shenndeeagh Slobozhanshchyna. She preeu-valley Wheiggey Kharkiv as Valjaght Kharkiv yn chaayr. Ayns 2021, v'eh oolit ry row deiney cummal ayn.

Ruegys Rooshagh er yn Ookraan, 2022:
[[Coadan:2022_Russian_invasion_of_Ukraine.svg|right|thumb|350px|
(Jeeagh er neesht: Caslys-çheerey cruinn y Chaggey Rooshagh-Ookraanagh)]]
Ta Ruegys Rooshagh er yn Ookraan çheet er taghyrtyn 24 Toshiaght Arree, 2022, as ny yei tra ren y Roosh soiaghey as ruegys lheeadagh er yn Ookraan, e nabooys sheear yiass voish y Roosh. She mooadaghey mooar 'sy Chaggey Rooshagh-Ookraanagh ghow toshiaght ayns 2014.
Roish y ruegys, haghyr bolgey cahnagh mastey ny forseyn Rooshagh ayns 2021 lheah. Car y volgee shen, ren eaghtyrane y Roosh, Vladimir Putin, cremey mooadaghey Reagheydys Chonaant yn Atlantagh Hwoaie voish y vlein 1997 myr baggyrt da sauçhys e heer as ren eh aggyrtagh leighyn y chur ayn son lhiettrimys y chur er çheet stiagh yn Ookraan 'sy chochaarjys cahnagh. Chammah as shen, ren eh cur magh reayrtyn as barelyn mychione mooadaghey yn Roosh. Er 21 Toshiaght Arree 2022, ren y Roosh cur enney oikoil da Pobblaght Heayagh Donetsk as Pobblaght Heayagh Luhansk, daa steat hene-ogrit scarree ayns ard Donbas 'syn Ookraan Hiar, as hiaull eh sidooryn dys ny thallooyn shen. Laa ny lurg, ren y Choonseil Chonastagh Rooshagh lesh un aigney cur kied da Putin ny forseyn cahnagh y ymmyd çheumooie jeh joaraghyn y Roosh.
Mysh 05:00 EET (UTC+2) er 24 Toshiaght Arree, ren Putin fograghey magh "obbraid chahnagh er lheh" 'syn Ookraan hiar; minnidyn ny lurg, hoshee tilganeyn bwoalley buill harrish yn Ookraan, goaill stiagh y preeu-valley, Kyiv. Dooyrt Shirveish Arrey Joarrey Steat ny h-Ookraan dy row nyn staagyn joarree rish y Roosh as y Velaroosh soit er. Daa oor ny s'anmey, ren forseyn thalloo Rooshagh goll tessen ny joaraghyn stiagh 'sy çheer. Ren yn eaghtyrane Ookraanagh, Volodymyr Zelenskyy, freggyrt liorish slattyssaghey leigh chaggoil, brishey kianglaghyn diploamagh, as ren eh oardaghey cogherrym cadjin. Ren y ruegys feddyn deyrey eddyr-ashoonagh lheeadagh, goaill stiagh lhiettrimyssyn va currit er y Roosh, as va ymmodee deiney goit fo ghlass ayns çhionnraaghyn 'sy Roosh hene.
Va soiaghyn yl-ghahagh shiaullit voish y Roosh, y Velaroosh as y daa halloo cummaltit 'syn Ookraan (y Chrimeea as Donbas). Dirree kiare areenaghyn mooarey magh: areeney Kyiv, yn areeney hiar hwoaie, yn areeney hiar as yn areeney yiass. Ta ny forsaghyn Rooshagh er n'ymmyrkey magh bwoallaghyn aer as tilgane foddey stiagh 'syn Ookraan heear. Ta forsaghyn Rooshagh er roshtyn ny er çhionney stiagh er baljyn mooarey ogheragh, goaill stiagh Chernihiv, Kharkiv, Kherson, Kyiv, Mariupol, as Sumy, agh t'ad er roshtyn shassoo lajer Ookraanagh nyn oi as er gennaghtyn doilleeidyn losteeagh as obbraidagh ta jannoo lhiettrimys er y ghleashaght oc. Tree shiaghtyn lurg tosheeaght y ruegys, va ny smoo rah ec ny forsaghyn Rooshagh 'sy jiass ga nagh row rah oc ayns buill elley. Rere y dolley rah oc ayns buill elley, ta ny forsaghyn Rooshagh er doltey strateysh scryssey magh, as mooarane dy ghuintee hivoilagh myr eiyrtys. V'eh currit sheese er y ruegys myr y ruegys cahnagh cadjinchliaghtit smoo 'syn Oarpey voish y Nah Chaggey Dowanagh.

Petro Poroshenko:
She fer dellal as politickeyr Ookraanagh eh Petro Oleksiyovych Poroshenko (; ruggit 26 Mean Fouyir 1965). She Eaghtyrane yn Ookraan v'eh eddyr 2014 as 2019. V'eh ny Hirveishagh Cooishyn Joarree eddyr 2009 as 2010 as ny Hirveishagh Traghtee as Lhiasaghey Tarmaynagh ayns 2012. Eddyr 2007 as 2012, v'eh ny 'er toshee er Coonseil Vanc Ashoonagh yn Ookraan. V'eh reiht myr eaghtyrane er 25 Boaldyn 2014 as ren eh feddyn 54.7% jeh ny teiyn 'sy chied cheayrt. Er yn oyr shen, v'eh reiht gyn roie ersooyl. Car yn eaghtyraneys echey, ren eh stiurey as reilley yn Ookraan car y Chaggey Rooshagh-Ookraanagh, as ren eh broojey ny forseyn atçhimagh ny s'diuney ayns ard Donbas. Ghow eh toshiaght jeh obbraghey co-hymey rish yn Unnaneys Oarpagh tra ren eh fo-screeu Conaant Copharteeys yn Ookraan rish yn Unnaneys Oarpagh.

Lviv:
She Lviv (; ; ; ; jeeagh er enmyn elley) y chaayr smoo 'syn Ookraan heear as y sheyoo caayr smoo 'sy çheer. Ta deiney cummal ayn. She Lviv fer jeh ny h-ynnydyn cultooragh smoo scanshoil 'syn Ookraan.
Enmyn.
Faagail magh e ennym Ookraanish, as e ennym shenndeeagh Roothenish "Lwihorod"/"Lvihorod", ta'n chaayr goll er enney fo ymmodee enmyn elley ayns çhengaghyn elley: Polynnish ; Germaanish ; Ewdish ny ; Rooshish ; Ungaarish ; Serbo-Crotish ; Romaanish ; Ladjyn ("caayr y leion", voish y Greagish Henndeeagh ); Tatarish Chrimeeagh ; Armeainish Veanagh "Ilov"; Armeaino-Kipchakish Իլօվ "Ilôv"; mastey enmyn elley.

Tatarish Chrimeeagh:
She glare Hurkagh Kipchak ee yn Tatarish Chrimeeagh () ny yn Chrimeeish (). T'ee goll er loayrt 'sy Chrimeea as mastey ny Tataree Chrimeeagh 'syn Oosbeckistaan, 'sy Turkee, Romaan, 'sy Vulgeyr as ayns boodeeyssyn beggey ayns ny Steatyn Unnaneysit as 'sy Yn Chanadey. Ny jean jarrood eddyr ish as y Tatarish, ta goll er loayrt 'sy Tatarstaan; ta mooinjerys ayn eddyr y daa ghlare agh cha nel ad so-hoiggalagh.

Odesa:
She Odesa (), ny Odessa () y treeoo caayr smoo 'syn Ookraan. She ynnyd turryssagh, purt varrey as cree arraghey scanshoil eh. T'eh soit ayns sheear yiass y çheer er coose heear hwoaie y Vooir Ghoo. She preeu-valley Wheiggey Odesa eh chammah as ynnyd yl-chynneeagh as cultooragh. Ta ny h-enmyn "Pearl y Vooir Ghoo", "Preeu-valley y Jiass" (fo Impiraght ny Roosh as yn Unnaneys Soveidjagh), "Preeu-valley yn Aittys" as "Palmyra Jiass" currit er dy mennick.

Hryvnia:
Ta'n hryvnia, hryvna, ny, keayrtyn, yn gryvnya (; "hrn"; cowrey: ₴; coad: UAH), ny argid cadjin 'syn Ookraan voish 2 Mean Fouyir 1996. Ta'n hryvnia goll er rheynn magh ayns 100 kopiyok. 

Brattagh yn Ookraan:
Ta brattagh ashoonagh yn Ookraan jeant ass daa voandey co-chruinnagh gorrym as buigh (Bunraght yn Ookraan, Art 20). Ta'n cochiangle jeh gorrym as buigh myr cowrey ny thallooyn Ookraanagh çheet as brattagh Reeriaght y Ghaleesh-Volhynia va ymmydit 'sy 12oo eash. Myr brattagh ashoonagh, ta'n daaghaagh gorrym as buigh er ny ymmyd dy h-oikoil voish Caghlaaghyn Mooarey 1848 tra v'eh croghit harrish Rathaus Lviv. V'eh doltit myr brattagh steat ayns 1918 liorish Pobblaght Heayagh yn Ookraan Heear as ny lurg liorish Pobblaght Heayagh yn Ookraan. Tra va'n Ookraan 'syn Unnaneys Soveidjagh myr Pobblaght Hoveidjagh Hoshiallagh yn Ookraan cha row eh leighoil yn brattagh shen y chroghey. Va'n brattagh doltit dy shallidagh son sharmanyssyn oikoil reesht ayns Mean Fouyir 1991 lurg seyrsnys yn Ookraan. Hooar y brattagh staydys oikoil reesht er 28 Jerrey Geuree 1992 liorish parlamaid yn Ookraan.
Ta'n Ookraan kelloorey Laa yn Vrattagh dagh blein er 23 Luanistyn voish 2004.Ceremony of hoisting Ukraine's national flag held at presidential administration, "Kyiv Post" (23 Luanistyn, 2011)Україна відзначає День Державного прапора "On Tuesday, August 23, all of Ukraine celebrates National Flag Day. Measures to raise the national flag are planned throughout the country.", 1+1 (23 Luanistyn, 2011)</ref>

Bluckan coshey Americaanagh:
Ta bluckan coshey Americaanagh, ny bluckan coshey gyn quaalleeaght ayns ny Steatyn Unnaneysit as 'sy Chanadey, çheet er spoyrt fwirranagh ta cloiet liorish daa wirran as un chloieder jeig er dagh fwirran er faaie kiare-chuilleigagh. Er yn 'aaie shen, ta maidjaghyn dean ry-gheddyn ec dagh kione. Ta'n soiagh, y fwirran ayns shelloo y vluckan ooh-chrooagh, geearree gleashaghey sheese y faaie liorish roie lesh y vluckan ny eh y haghey, tra ta'n coadey, yn fwirran nagh vel ayns shelloo y vluckan, geearree lhiettrimys y chur er gleashaght y toiagh as stiurey yn vluckan y gheddyn. Lhisagh ta'n toiagh gleashaghey ny smoo na jeih stundayrt harrish kiare gleashaght; my aillagh ad, lhisagh ad y bluckan y filley er ash dys y choadey. Agh, my veagh rah oc, t'ad cur straih noa jeh kiare gleashaght son y bluckan y ghleashaghey sheese y faaie. Ta poyntyn scoarit liorish gleashaghey yn vluckan harrish y kione-linney jeeragh stiagh ayns cryss king y choadee son thallooaghey ny liorish y bluckan y vrebbal trooid maidjaghyn dean y choadee son dean faaie. Ta'n fwirran lesh ny poyntyn smoo ec jerrey yn ghamman cosney yn gamman.

Vladimir Putin:
Vladimir Vladimirovich Putin (; r. 7 Jerrey Fouyir 1952), she politickeyr as eear-offishear fys Rooshagh t'eh. She eaghtyrane ny Roosh eh Putin as eh ny eaghtyrane voish 2012 as, roish shen, reesht eddyr 1999 as 2008.Eddyr y daa lhing myr eaghtyrane, va Putin ny ard-vinishter eddyr 2008 as 2012. V'eh ayns shelloo oik yn ard-vinishter chammah eddyr 1999 as 2000. She Putin y nah eaghtyrane roie shinney 'syn Oarpey lurg Alyaksandr Lukashenka ass y Velaroosh.

Kryvyi Rih:
She Kryvyi Rih ( "Cayrn Cam") ny Krivoy Rog () y chaayr smoo 'syn Ookraan veanagh, y 7oo caayr smoo 'sy çheer rere earroo yn phobble as y nah chaayr smoo 'sy çheer rere eaghtyr (goaill magh Sevastopol ta fo cummaltys ec y Roosh).

Armys yn Ookraan:
She scape gorrym marrish trooreen airhey eh armys yn Ookraan. Dy h-oikoil, t'eh enmyssit Cowrey Steat Flahoil Volodymyr Mooar, ny dy coloayrtyssagh, yn "tryzub" (). Ta ny cullee çheet magh ass seal-trooreen Volodymyr, y chied Flah Mooar Kyiv.
Va'n armys beg doltit dy h-oikoil ec yn Ookraan er 19 Toshiaght Arree 1992. Ta kied bunraghtoil ayn son cur er bun yn armys mooar, agh cha nel eh doltit foast. Va'n armys beg cummit liorish Andriy Grechylo, Oleksii Kokhan, as Ivan Turetskyi. T'eh ry-akin er Brattagh Eaghtyrane yn Ookraan.
Cha row y trooreen coontit myr cowrey ashoonagh derrey 1917 tra ren fer jeh ny screeudeyryn shennaghys Ookraanagh, Mykhailo Hrushevskyi, cur yn trooreen roish myr cowrey ashoonagh. Er 25 Toshiaght Arree 1918, ren y Rada Meanagh (parlamaid) doltey yn trooreen myr armys Phobblaght Heayagh yn Ookrane giare-heiltagh.

Brattagh ashoonagh:
Ta brattagh ashoonagh çheet er brattagh ta cowraghey as shassoo son ashoon ennagh. T'eh er ny chroghey ec reiltys yn ashoon shen agh, dy mennick, t'eh goll er chroghey ec ardvaljee yn ashoon chammah. Ta brattagh ashoonagh cummit lesh keeallyn er lheh da ny daaghyn as cowraghyn t'er as foddee ad ve ymmydit lheusyn hene myr cowrey yn ashoon. Ta cummey yn vrattagh ceaghlit dy mennick lurg taghyrtyn scanshoil shenndeeagh. Ta lostey ny trullaghey brattagh ashoonagh coontit myr jannoo cowreydagh.

Melitopol:
She caayr as baljaght ayns Queiggey Zaporizhzhia, shiar yiass yn Ookraan, eh Melitopol (, ). T'eh soit er yn awin Molochna ta roie trooid y çheu heear jeh'n chaayr as stiagh ayns Inver Molochnyi ta kianglt rish Mooir Azov. Ta deiney cummal ayn.
She Melitopol y nah chaayr smoo 'sy wheiggey lurg Zaporizhzhia. She preeu-valley Valjaght Melitopol t'ayn.

Zaporizhzhia:
She caayr ayns shiar yiass yn Ookraan eh Zaporizhzhia (). T'eh ny lhie er brooinyn yn awin Dnieper. She preeu-valley Wheiggey Zaporizhzhia t'eh. Ta deiney cummal ayn.
Ta enney mie er Zaporizhzhia son yn ellan shenndeeagh Khortytsia, son yn ymmodee stashoonyn lectragh t'ayn, goaill stiagh Stashoon Lectraghys Çheshveanagh Zaporizhzhia (y stashoon lectraghys çheshveanagh smoo 'syn Oarpey), stashoon lectraghys çhermagh Zaporizhzhia as Stashoon Ushtey-lectragh Dnieper, as myr ynnyd çhynskyllagh scanshoil. Ta staillin, ollymin, jeshaghtyn etlan, gleashtanyn, caghlaaderyn fo-stashoon, as cooid hynskyllagh elley jeant ayn.

Carter Cruise:
She markiagh jysk, arraneyder, kiaulleyder, craishteyder as aa-aghteyr pornograafagh Americaanagh ee Carter Cruise (r. 24 Averil, 1991). 

Denys Shmyhal:
Denys Anatoliyovych Shmyhal (; r. 15 Jerrey Fouyir 1975) she politickeyr as greeseyder dellalys Ookraanagh t'eh. V'eh pointit myr Ard-vinishter yn Ookraan ayns 2020. Roish e phointeil myr yn ard-vinishter, she Shmyhal va Kiannoort Wheiggey Ivano-Frankivsk.

Ookraanee:
Ookraanee (), she possan kynneeagh jeh'n sluight Slavagh Hiar dooghyssagh da'n Ookraan t'ad. She ny h-Ookraanee y shiaghtoo ashoon smoo 'syn Oarpey as y nah ashoon smoo mastey ny Slavee Hiar lurg ny Rooshee. Rere Bunraght yn Ookraan, ta'n enmys Ookraanagh çheet er dagh seyraanagh 'sy çheer. She Cair-chredjuee Hiar y chooid smoo jeh ny h-Ookraanee.
Va ny h-Ookraanee enmyssit Ruthenee derrey yn 20oo eash leah, as eh çheet er y thalloo vean-eashagh Ruthenia. She yn enmys Ladjyn va currit er Rus' Kyivagh, steat Slavagh mean-eashagh va bunnit ayns Kyiv. Lurg e tuittym, dirree Reeriaght Ruthenia magh, agh v'eh rheynnit magh beggan ny yei. Voish y 15oo eash, va lught yn Ookraan enmyssit Cossackee as ren ad cur er bun steat Sheshaght Zaporizhzhia. Ta trimmid currit er y chiangley rish ny Cossackee Zaporizhzhia er lheh ayns arrane ashoonagh yn Ookraan, "Ta shin, vraaraghyn, jeh sluight Cossackagh".

Olga Kurylenko:
Olga Konstantinovna Kurylenko (; r. 14 Sauin 1979), she aghteyr as craishteyder Ookraanagh t'ee. V'ee ruggit as troggit ayns Berdiansk, yn Ookraan, jeh sluight Ookraanagh, Rooshagh as Belarooshagh. V'ee feddynit magh myr craishteyder tra v'ee 13 bleeaney d'eash as ren ee arraghey dys Paarys son e coorse y lhiassaghey tree vleeaney ny s'anmey. Hoshee ee cloie myr aghteyr ayns 2005. V'ee rahoil da'n chied cheayrt myr aghteyr son e paart myr Nika Boronina 'sy scannane "Hitman" ayns 2007. Ta enney share urree myr y caillin Bond Camille Montes 'sy nah scannane James Bond as feed, "Quantum of Solace" (2008) as myr y far-vooidjeen Taskmaster 'sy scannane Marvel Studios, "Black Widow" (2021). 

Ard moirvaljagh:
Ta ard moirvaljagh çheet er ard ta jeant ass bun-chaayr çhionn-chummaltit myrane lesh ny thallooyn mygeayrt ta co-ymmyd çhynskyllyn, ardjyn traghtee, bun-troggalys arraghey, bun-troggalyssyn as cummallyn. Ta ardjyn moirvaljagh dy mennick goaill stiagh ram reiltyssyn as baljaghtyn: naboonyssyn, baljyssyn, baljyn corpagh, caayryn, baljyn, fo-valjyn, coondaeghyn, slystyn, as, feeu, steatyn as ashoonyn gollrish ny h-oaraslystyn. Ga dy vel undinyssyn sheshoil, tarmaynagh as politickagh er ceaghley, ta ardjyn moirvaljagh çheet dy ve nyn ardjyn tarmaynagh as politickagh ogheragh.

Kherson:
Kherson (), she caayr ayns jiass yn Ookraan. She preeu-valley Wheiggey Kherson t'eh. She purt scanshoil er y Vooir Ghoo as er Awin Dnieper eh as ta çhynskyl mooar troggalys lhong ayn. Va'n chaayr goit ec ny Rooshee er 3 Mayrnt 2022 tra ren ad soiaghey as ruegys er yn Ookraan. Ayns 2021, va 283,649 deiney cummal ayn.

Yasmin Lee:
She aghteyr pornograafagh, craishteyder an-ghraagh as aghteyr scannane tessen-cheintyssagh Americaanagh ee Yasmin Lee (r. 3 Mean Souree 1983). Ta enney mie urree son e paart myr Kimmy 'sy scannane "The Hangover Part II".

Jessy Dubai:
She aghteyr pornograafagh tessen-cheintyssagh Meksicagh ee Jessy Dubai (r. 12 Sauin, 1989). V'ee ruggit ayns Meksico ayns lught thie jeh sluight Meksicagh as Colombagh.

Eaghtyrane yn Ookraan:
She Eaghtyrane yn Ookraan () kione steat yn Ookraan. Ta'n eaghtyrane shassoo son y steat ayns cooishyn joarree, stiurey immeeaghtyn politickagh joarree yn steat, jannoo barganaghyn as cur kione er conaantyn eddyr-ashoonagh. Ta'n eaghtyrane reiht dy jeeragh ec seyraanee yn Ookraan feie queig bleeaney as ta jeoraght daa hiarrym echey.
She Plaase Mariinskyi thie oikoil yn eaghtyrane, ta soit ayns Slyst Pecherskyi, Kyiv. Ta thieyn oikoil elley goaill stiagh Thie marish ny Chimaeraghyn as Thie y Ven Hreoghe Cheaynee ta ymmydit son keayrtyn oikoil liorish ynnydee yoarree. Ta Oik Eaghtyrane yn Ookraan, ta enmyssit "Bankova" er oyr y straid raad t'eh, goaill ymmyd myr yn oik eaghtyraneagh
She Volodymyr Zelenskyy yn eaghtyrane roie voish 20 Boaldyn 2019.

Pavlo Lee:
She aghteyr scannane as ardan as persoonid çhellveeish Ookraanagh va Pavlo "Pasha" Romanovych Lee (; 10 Jerrey Souree 1988 - 6 Mayrnt 2022).
Seihll aeg.
Va Lee ruggit ayns Yevpatoria 'sy Chrimeea ec ayr Koryo-saram as moir Ookraanagh. V'ad Pasha Li as Pavlo Li e enmyn elley va echey.
Coorse.
She çhebbeyder-claare da'n bollagh çhellveeish Dom v'eh. Ren eh obbraghey 'sy theater as ymmoddee soilsheenyn as va enney mie er er son e phaart ayns ny scannaneyn "Tini nezabutykh predkiv. Tayemnytsi molfara" (2013), "Shtolnya" (2006), "Pravilo boya" (2017), "Zustrich odnoklasnykiv" (2019), as e phaart myr aghteyr goo er ny scannaneyn Baarle "The Lion King" as "The Hobbit" as eh er çhyndaa oc dys yn Ookraanish,
Ren eh listal ayns Forsaghyn Coadee Hallooin yn Ookraan er y chied laa jeh ruegys Rooshagh er yn Ookraan, 2022 agh v'eh marrooit ayns shligganaghey liorish ny forsaghyn Rooshagh ayns Irpin, faggys da Kyiv, er 6 Mayrnt 2022. V'eh oanluckit 'sy ruillick ayns Vorokhta er 18 Mayrnt 2022, boayl beaghee e vaarey.

Kyla Cole:
She aa-aghteyr pornograafagh, çhebbeyder çhellveeish, as craishteyder an-ghraagh Slovackagh ee Kyla Cole (r. 10 Sauin 1978). V'ee ruggit as troggit ayns Prešov, y Çheckoslovack (y Clovack jiu).

Mariupol:
She caayr ayns sheear yiass yn Ookraan eh Mariupol (, ny "Mariiupil" keayrtyn; ; "Marioúpoli"). Ta'n chaayr soit er coose hwoaie Vooir Azov ec inver yn awin Kalmius ayns ard Pryazovia. She yn Ookraan y jeihoo caayr smoo 'syn Ookraan as deiney cummal ayn.
Ta enney mie er y chaayr jiu er feie ny cruinney er son y çhennid varbaragh ren forsaghyn Rooshagh er y chaayr car y ruegys Rooshagh er yn Ookraan ayns 2022. Ren y çhennid Rooshagh scryssey y chooid smoo jeh'n chaayr as varr thousaneyn dy gheiney neuloghtagh.

Mia Maffia:
She aghteyr pornograafagh as craishteyder an-ghraagh tessen-cheintyssagh Sostynagh ee Mia Maffia (r. 29 Mayrnt, 1991).

Sumy:
She caayr ayns shiar hwoaie yn Ookraan eh Sumy (). She preeu-valley Wheiggey Sumy yn chaayr. Ta deiney cummal ayn.
Va'n chaayr bunnit ec ny Cossackee ayns ny 1650yn er brooinyn yn awin Psel.

Ana Nomie:
She aghteyr pornograafagh as craishteyder an-ghraagh tessen-cheintyssagh amateyragh Americaanagh ee Ana Nomie (r. 15 Boaldyn 1992 ayns Portland, Oregon, ny Steatyn Unnaneysit). Hoshee ee gobbraghey 'sy çhynskyl colleeaght ayns 2019 as t'ee jannoo yn chooid smoo jeh'n obbyr eck lhee hene gyn colughtyn mooarey. T'ee gobbraghey myr caillin feeshan as myr craishteyder an-ghraagh.

Donbas:
Ta Donbas ny Donbass (, ) çheet er ard shenndeeagh, cultooragh as tarmaynagh ayns shiar yiass yn Ookraan. Ta ayrnyn jeh Donbas stiurit ec possanyn scarreydagh atçhimagh myr eiyrtys er y Chaggey Rooshagh-Ookraanagh: Pobblaght Heayagh Donetsk as Pobblaght Heayagh Luhansk. Ta'n fockle "Donbas" ny phortmantey ta jeant ass focklyn Slavagh ta keeallaghey "Awin-tragh Donets", aagherrid jeh'n enmys "Awin-tragh Geayil Donets" ( "Donetskyi vuhilnyi basein"; , "Donetskii ugolnyi bassein"). Ta enmys yn awin-tragh geayil çheet ass Dreeym Donets; t'eh shen kianglt rish yn awin Donets.

Pobblaght Heayagh yn Ookraan:
Pobblaght Heayagh yn Ookraan (PHO), ny Pobblaght Ashoonagh yn Ookraan (PAO), she çheer 'syn Oarpey Hiar va er mayrn eddyr 1917 as 1920. Va'n steat fogrit magh lurg Irree Magh Hoshiaght Arree 'sy Roosh liorish y Chied Cho-chadjin. Ayns Mayrnt 1917, ren y Cohionnal Ashoonagh ayns Kyiv reih Ard-Choonseil va jeant seose jeh parteeyn soshiallagh er bunyn cheddin v'ayn 'sy chooid elley jeh Pobblaght ny Roosh. Va hene-reiltys y phobblaght currit er enney ec Reiltys Shallidagh ny Roosh. Lurg Irree Magh Yerrey Fouyir va seyrsnys y steat voish y Roosh fogrit magh er 22 Jerrey Geuree 1918 liorish y Chiarroo Co-chadjin jeh Ard-Choonseil ny h-Ookraan.

Yn Rhine:
Ta'n Rhine (, , , Walloonish: "Rén", , Sursilvanish: "Rein", Sutsilvanish as Surmiranish: "Ragn", Rumantsch Grischun, Valladerish, as Puterish: "Rain", , goaill stiagh Alsaasish/Germaanish Alemaanagh Injil, Ripuarish, Çhengaghyn Franconagh Injil: "Rhing", ) coontit myr fer jeh ny h-awinyn smoo 'syn Oarpey. Ta moir yn awin soit ayns cantoon Graubünden 'syn Elveeish ayns shiar yiass ny Sleityn Alpagh Elveeishagh as ta'n awin jannoo seose ny joaraghyn eddyr yn Elveeish as Liechtenstein, eddyr yn Elveeish as yn Austeyr, eddyr yn Elveeish as y Ghermaan as eddyr y Rank as y Ghermaan, as, eisht, t'ee roie my hwoaie trooid Çheer ny Rhiney 'sy Ghermaan as 'sy Çheer Injil roish my vel eh lhiggey stiagh ayns Mooir Hostyn.

Allie Haze:
She aghteyr pornograafagh as craishteyder an-ghraagh Americaanagh ee Allie Haze (r. 10 Boaldyn 1987). Va Haze ruggit myr Brittany Sturtevant ayns San Bernardino, California, ny Steatyn Unnaneysit, as v'ee troggit ayns Redlands, California. Hoshee ee cloie er yn ardan, craishtey as cohirrey ayns tostylyn aalid tra v'ee aeg. Hoshee ee gobbyr 'sy çhynskyl pornograafagh ayns 2009 as daa vlein ny yei ren ee fo-screeu conaant liehlagh marish Vivid Entertainment. Blein ny yei, ren ee fo-screeu conaant marish LA Direct Models derrey Mean Souree 2015.

Donets:
Seversky Donets () ny Siverskyi Donets (), ny ny s'menkey Donets, she awin ayns jiass Vagher yn Oarpey Hiar t'eh. Ta'n voir eck soit çheu hwoaie jeh Belgorod, y Roosh, as t'ee roie shiar yiass trooid yn Ookraan (Queiggaghyn Kharkiv, Donetsk as Queiggey Luhansk) as reesht trooid y Roosh (Queiggey Rostov) raad t'ee çheet ry-cheilley rish yn awin Don, mysh 100 km voish Mooir Azov. She Donets y kiarroo awin s'liurey 'syn Ookraan as y fer smoo 'syn Ookraan Hiar. She bun scanshoil jeh ushtey oor ayns shiar y çheer. T'ee cur yn ennym eck da Awin-tragh Donets t'er enney chammah myr Donbas, ard meaineraght gheayil scanshoil 'syn Ookraan.

Lena Kelly:
She aghteyr pornograafagh, craishteyder an-ghraagh as caillin feeshan tessen-cheintyssagh Americaanagh ee Lena Kelly (r. 4 Mayrnt, 1989). V'ee ruggit ayns Caayr York Noa ec lught thie jeh sluight Yernagh. 

Irpin:
Irpin (), she Balley Feniaghtagh ny h-Ookraan ta soit er Awin Irpin ayns Queiggey Kyiv faggys da Kyiv ayns twoaie yn Ookraan. Ta ayrn jeh Irpin, y balley beg Kotsiubynske, ny chroa çheusthie jeh Kyiv.

Balley Feniaghtagh yn Ookraan:
Balley Feniaghtagh yn Ookraan ( "Misto-heroi Ukrainy"), she enmys onnor t'er bronney son feniaghtys ard-yindyssagh car ruegys Rooshagh er yn Ookraan ayns 2022. V'eh bronnit er shey baljyn cur liorish ny kiare baljyn hooar yn enmys cheddin voish yn Unnaneys Soveidjagh. Va'n enmys bronnit er kiare baljyn elley ny s'anmey.

Taylor Hawkins:
Oliver Taylor Hawkins (17 Toshiaght Arree, 1972 – 25 Mayrnt, 2022), she kiaulleyder Americaanagh v'eh va mie er enney myr yn drummeyder 'sy vann craa-chiaullee Foo Fighters. Ren eh recortyssey hoght albym seyrlann marish y vann. Roish my daink eh stiagh 'sy vann ayns 1997, she Taylor va'n drummeyder turryssagh lesh Sass Jordan as lesh Alanis Morissette, myrane lesh y drummeyder 'sy vann prowaltagh eiyrtagh Sylvia. 
Ayns 2004, ren Hawkins cur er bun e heu-halee hene, Taylor Hawkins and the Coattail Riders, raad ren eh bwoalley er ny drummaghyn as goaill arraneyn. Ren eh skeaylley magh tree albym seyrlann eddyr 2006 as 2019 marish y vann shen. Ayns 2021, ren eh kiaddey yn yl-vann NHC marish olteynyn Jane's Addiction, Dave Navarro as Chris Chaney, raad v'eh reesht goaill arraneyn as bwoalley er ny drummaghyn. Hig yn ynrican albym magh ayns 2022. V'eh reiht myr "y Drummeyder Craa-chiaullee Share" ayns 2005 liorish yn earishlioar drummey Ghoaldagh "Rhythm".
Er 25 Mayrnt, 2022, v'eh fogrit magh er coontyssyn ym-ysseraght heshoil Foo Fighters dy row eh er ngheddyn baase.

Khloe Kay:
She aghteyr pornograafagh as craishteyder an-ghraagh tessen-cheintyssagh Americaanagh ee Khloe Kay (r. 4 Jerrey Fouyir, 1994). V'ee ruggit ayns Las Vegas, Nevada, ny Steatyn Unnaneysit.

Las Vegas:
Las Vegas (Spaainish son "Ny Lheeantyn"), ny Vegas dy mennick, she yn chaayr smoo ayns Nevada t'eh myrane lesh preeu-valley Clark County. Ta enney mie er y chaayr er son y charrooagh, y çhappal, y vee meein, yn eunysseyrys as y theihill oie t'ayn. 

Amy Adams:
She aghteyr Americaanagh ee Amy Lou Adams (ruggit er 20 Luanistyn, 1974). Ta enney mie urree son e paartyn drameydagh as aitt as t'ee er ve recortyssit tree keayrt mastey ny ben-aghteyryn keirdey smoo eeckit. T'ee er cosney ymmodee d'aundyryn as enmyssaghtyn, goaill stiagh daa aundyr Golden Globe ayns bishaghey rish enmyssaghtyn son shey aundyryn Academy as shiaght aundyryn BAFTA.
Mastey ny scannaneyn mooarey eck, t'ad goaill stiagh "Drop Dead Gorgeous" (1999), "Catch Me If You Can" (2002), "Junebug" (2005), "The Master", as "Arrival" (2016).

Nikki Benz:
She aghteyr pornograafagh as craishteyder an-ghraagh Canadagh as Ookraanagh va ruggit ayns Mariupol, yn Ookraan, ee Nikki Benz (ruggit myr Alla Monchak er 11 Nollick 1981). She ass y Chanadey lught thie e ayr agh v'ee troggit ayns Mariupol derrey 1988 tra ren ee arraghey stiagh gys y Chanadey marish e paarantyn. Lurg shen, v'ee troggit ayns Toronto.

Arrival (scannane):
She scannane drama far-skeealaght heanse Americaanagh eh Arrival. Skeaylt magh 'sy vlein 2016, va'n scannane stiurit ec Denis Villeneuve as aachummit ec Eric Heisserer. Va'n skeeal bunnit er y ghiare-skeeal "Story of Your Life" va scruit ec Ted Chiang ayns 1998. Ta'n scannane goaill stiagh Amy Adams myr Louise Banks, çhengoayllee va listit ec Armee ny Steatyn Unnaneysit son feddyn magh kys eddyr-insh y yannoo rish ny quaane neuhallooinagh t'er çheet dys y Chruinney, roish brishey magh caggey er cooish çhennidyn. Ta paartyn cohassooagh ec Jeremy Renner, Forest Whitaker, Michael Stuhlbarg, as Tzi Ma.
Va gioot toshee yn scannane ec Feailley Scannane y Veneesh er 1 Mean Fouyir 2016, as v'eh skeaylt magh ayns thieyn jalloo ayns ny Steatyn Unnaneysit liorish Paramount Pictures er 11 Sauin 2016. Chossyn y scannane $203 millioon er feie ny cruinney as hooar eh foaynoo mooar as ard-ghoo er son y scannaneaght, y stiureydaght, as, er lheh, er son cloie Adams ayn. Va'n scannane coontit mastey ny scannaneyn share 'sy vlein 2016.

Forest Whitaker:
She aghteyr, gienteyder, stiureyder, as immeeaghtagh Americaanagh eh Forest Steven Whitaker (r. 15 Jerrey Souree, 1961). T'eh mie er enney son e phaartyn ayns ny scannaneyn "Platoon" (1986), "Good Morning, Vietnam" (1987), "The Crying Game" (1992), "The Butler" (2013), "Arrival", as "Respect". Chossyn eh Aundyr Academy son yn Aghteyr Share kyndagh rish e phaart myr y jaghteyr Oogandagh Idi Amin 'sy scannane drama shenndeeagh Goaldagh "The Last King of Scotland".

Aghteyr pornograafagh:
She deiney ta goaill ayrn ayns aghtyn keintyssagh neu-lhiggit ayns scannaneyn pornograafagh ad aghteyryn pornograafagh ny cloiederyn as ben-chloiederyn pornograafagh.
Ta slattyssyn çheeraghyn ennagh coontey ad myr obbreeyn colleeaght er-yn-oyr dy vel ad gymmydey nyn girp myr chooid hraghtee. Ta aghteyryn pornograafagh ennagh jeeraghey er cooillyn er-lheh: homocheintyssagh, bondiaght, keintys thoanney, towlley dooblit, pornograafaght eddyr-chynneeagh, MILF, sheel-vleaystey, pornograafaght hessen-cheintyssagh, as cooillyn elley.

Jesse Jane:
She aa-aghteyr pornograafagh as craishteyder ee Cindy Taylor (ruggit 16 Jerrey Souree, 1980) ta ny share er enney lesh yn ennym ardan eck Jesse Jane.

Angell Summers:
She aa-aghteyr pornograafagh as craishteyder Frangagh ee Angell Summers (ruggit 29 Boaldyn, 1987). Hoshee ee gobbyr 'sy çhynskyl pornograafagh ayns 2007 as dirree ee ass ayns 2017. Car e coorse pornograafagh, ren ee obbraghey 'sy Rank as ayns ny Steatyn Unnaneysit.

Sophie Dee:
She aa-aghteyr pornograafagh as craishteyder an-ghraagh Bretnagh ee Sophie Dee (ruggit myr Kirsty Hill er 29 Boaldyn, 1984). Hoshee ee gobbyr 'sy çhynskyl pornograafagh ayns 2005 as dirree ee ass ayns 2020.

Lexi Lowe:
She aa-aghteyr pornograafagh as craishteyder an-ghraagh Bretnagh ee Lexi Lowe (ruggit er 17 Jerrey Souree, 1988). Hoshee ee gobbyr 'sy çhynskyl pornograafagh ayns 2010 as dirree ee ass ayns 2018.

Laurence Fishburne:
She aghteyr as gienteyder Americaanagh eh Laurence John Fishburne III (r. 30 Jerrey Souree, 1961). T'eh mie er enney son e phaartyn breeoil, niartallagh, eaghtyryssagh as cahnagh ayns ny scannaneyn echey. T'eh mie er enney son e phaart myr Morpheus ayns ny kied tree scannane jeh'n straih "The Matrix" (1999-2003), myr Jason "Furious" Styles 'sy scannane drama liorish John Singleton "Boyz n the Hood" (1991), myr Tyrone "Mr. Clean" Miller 'sy scannane caggee liorish Francis Ford Coppola "Apocalypse Now" (1979), as myr "The Bowery King" ayns straih scannaneyn "John Wick" (2017–jiu).
T'eh mie er enney son e phaartyn ayns scannaneyn elley, goaill stiagh "The Color Purple" (1985), "School Daze" (1988), "King of New York" (1990), "Deep Cover" (1992), "Searching for Bobby Fischer" (1993), "Event Horizon" (1997), "Mystic River" (2003), "Akeelah and the Bee" (2006), "Contagion" (2011), "Man of Steel" (2013), ' (2016), as "Ant-Man and the Wasp" (2018). Er çhellveeish, ren eh cloie Dr. Raymond Langston er drama kimmeeys CBS ' (2008–2011), Sur-Veoir Jack Crawford 'sy straih chreauagh NBC "Hannibal" (2013–2015), as Earl "Pops" Johnson 'sy sitcom ABC "Black-ish" (2014–jiu).

Ariana Marie:
She aghteyr pornograafagh, craishteyder an-ghraagh as daunseyr Americaanagh ee Ariana Marie (ruggit myr Hali Marie Waumans er 15 Mayrnt, 1993). Hoshee ee gobbyr 'sy çhynskyl pornograafagh ayns 2013.

Beth Bennett:
She aghteyr pornograafagh, craishteyder an-ghraagh as caillin feeshan Seelynnagh Noa ee Beth Bennett (ruggit er 15 Mayrnt, 1986). Hoshee ee gobbyr 'sy çhynskyl pornograafagh ayns 2014.

Natasha Nice:
She aghteyr pornograafagh as craishteyder an-ghraagh Frangagh-Americaanagh ee Natasha Nice (ruggit er 28 Jerrey Souree, 1988). Hoshee ee gobbyr 'sy çhynskyl pornograafagh ayns 2006. Ga dy row ee ruggit ayns Fontenay-sous-Bois, y Rank, ren ee arraghey dys ny Steatyn Unnaneysit marish e paarantyn tra v'ee 2 vleeaney d'eash.

Anissa Kate:
She aghteyr pornograafagh, stiureyder scannane pornograafagh as craishteyder an-ghraagh Frangagh ee Anissa Kate (ruggit er 7 Boaldyn, 1987). V'ee ruggit ayns Lyon, y Rank ec paarantyn Kabylagh as Iddaalagh. Hoshee ee gobbraghey 'sy çhynskyl pornograafagh ayns 2011 as t'ee jannoo y chooid smoo jeh ny scannaneyn eck ayns ny Steatyn Unnaneysit. Shymmey scannane ta jeant eck ta goaill stiagh reayrtyssyn keintys thoanney.

Aubrey Kate:
She aghteyr pornograafagh as craishteyder an-ghraagh tessen-cheintyssagh Americaanagh ee Aubrey Kate (r. 7 Sauin, 1990). Hoshee ee gobbraghey 'sy çhynskyl pornograafagh ayns 2013. 

Chernihiv:
Chernihiv (), ny goll er enney myr Chernigov () dy shenndeeagh, she caayr ayns twoaie yn Ookraan. She preeu-valley Wheiggey Chernihiv t'eh. Ayns 2021, va deiney cummal ayn.

Bucha, Queiggey Kyiv:
Bucha (), she Balley Feniaghtagh as caayr eh ayns Queiggey Kyiv faggys da Kyiv ayns twoaie yn Ookraan.
Shennaghys.
Traartys Bucha.
Er 2 Averil 2022, hoshee coontyssyn naight as feeshanyn çheet magh as ad taishbyney straidyn Bucha as ad coodit liorish kirp gheiney ayns eaddeeyn shivoilagh. Va laueyn kianglt ec fir jeu. Rere ny chied ooillaghyn, va ny smoo na 280 corp feddynit 'sy chaayr.
Baljyn lannoonit.
Ta Bucha lannoonit rish:

Foxy Di:
She aa-aghteyr pornograafagh as craishteyder an-ghraagh Rooshagh ee Foxy Di (ruggit ayns Caayr Pheddyr, y Roosh er 14 Mean Fouyir, 1994). Hoshee ee gobbyr 'sy çhynskyl pornograafagh ayns 2013 as dirree ee ass ayns 2019.

Crystal Greenvelle:
She aghteyr pornograafagh as craishteyder an-ghraagh Rooshagh ee Crystal Greenvelle (ruggit er 24 Boaldyn, 1997). Hoshee ee gobbyr 'sy çhynskyl pornograafagh ayns 2014 as dirree ee ass ayns 2021.

Gina Gerson:
She aghteyr pornograafagh, craishteyder an-ghraagh as caillin feeshan Rooshagh ee Gina Gerson (ruggit myr Valentina Alekseyevna Lashkeyeva ayns Prokopyevsk, Queiggey Kemerovo, y Roosh er 17 Boaldyn, 1991). Hoshee ee gobbyr 'sy çhynskyl pornograafagh ayns 2012 as dirree ee ass ayns 2021.

Andrea Zhay:
She aghteyr pornograafagh as craishteyder an-ghraagh tessen-cheintyssagh ee Andrea Zhay (r. 21 Mayrnt, 1987).

Korra Del Rio:
She aghteyr pornograafagh as craishteyder an-ghraagh tessen-cheintyssagh Americaanagh ee Korra Del Rio (r. 27 Averil, 1988). Hoshee ee gobbraghey 'sy çhynskyl pornograafagh ayns 2014. V'ee ruggit ayns Milwaukee, Wisconsin, ayns lught thie jeh sluight Germaanagh as Meksicagh.

Yn Amason:
Yn Amason (, ) ayns America Yiass, she yn awin smoo 'sy theihll rere lhiggey magh ushtey as t'ee 'sy chied ynnyd marish y Neel myr yn awin s'liurey 'sy theihll.

Linda Bhreathnach:
Linda Bhreathnach (r. 1983), she screeudeyr, stiureyder scannane, aghteyr as aa-chraishteyder Yernagh t'ee.
Ass Ros Muc, Conamara ayns sheear Nerin, ren Bhreathnach screeu as stiurey yn giare-scannane "Adulting"
Mastey ny h-aundyryn ren y scannane "Adulting" cosney, chossyn ee yn aundyr son y ghiare-scannane share ec Feailley Scannane Yernagh Lunnin as chossyn ee Aundyr y Rollage Yrjee marish Irish Screen America (York Noa as Los Angeles) son yn obbyr va jeant eck er y scannane cheddin.
Ren ee cloie "Róise de Burca" 'sy chlaare çhellveeish "Ros na Rún". As ish cloie yn karaghteyr eck, ren ee goaill ayrn 'sy chied phaag lesbeeagh er y çhellveeish ayns Nerin. Va ard-phaart ec Bhreathnach chammah 'sy drama politickagh "The Running Mate" as 'sy drama BBC/TG4, "Seacht / Seven".

Seána Kerslake:
Seána Kerslake (r. 21 Jerrey Fouyir, 1992), she aghteyr Yernagh t'ee. Ta enney mie urree son cloie Aisling O'Dowd 'sy chlaare drama-aitt RTÉ2 "Can't Cope, Won't Cope" (2016–2018). Ayns 2017, v'ee enmyssit myr fer jeh shey aghteyr jeig aegey liorish Screen International myr "Rollage Vairagh". Ayns 2020, v'ee rhenkit 'sy 50oo ynnyd ayns rolley ny h-aghteyryn Yernagh share liorish The Irish Times.

Bianca Freire:
Bianca Freire (r. 29 Nollick, 1986 ayns Campinas, y Vrasseel), she aa-aghteyr pornograafagh tessen-cheintyssagh Brasseelagh t'ee. Hoshee ee gobbyr 'sy çhynskyl pornograafagh ayns 2006, gobbyr er ny duillagyn eddyr-voggyl "Shemale club", "Tgirladventures", as duillagyn elley. Ayns 2008, ren ee cossyn aundyr eddyr-ashoonagh Tranny Awards 'sy ronney "y Craishteyder Americaanagh Yiass Share". Car e coorse 'sy çhynskyl pornograafagh, ren ee goaill ayrn ayns ny smoo na 50 scannane pornograafagh.

Father Ted:
Father Ted, she claare aitt t'eh va crooit ec ny screeudeyryn Yernagh Graham Linehan as Arthur Mathews as er ny ghientyn liorish y cholught gientyn Hat Trick Productions cour Channel 4. V'eh er ny scaalheaney harrish tree straih eddyr 21 Averil 1995 derrey 1 Boaldyn 1998, goaill stiagh un chur magh Nollick er lheh. 'Sy clane, ren ad 25 episodeyn. V'eh scaalheanit er RTÉ Two ayns Nerin, er Nine Network (straih 1) as ABC Television (straihyn 2 as 3) 'syn Australia, as er TV3 'sy Teelynn Noa.
Bunnit er Craggy Island far-skeealagh, ynnyd fadaneagh çheumooie ass coose heear Nerin, ta "Father Ted" cloiet lesh Dermot Morgan myr Father Ted Crilly (yn Ayr Ted Crilly), myrane lesh ny saggyrtyn elley Father Dougal McGuire (Ardal O'Hanlon) as Father Jack Hackett (Frank Kelly). Ceaut 'syn eebyrtys gyn onnoir liorish yn aspick Bishop Leonard Brennan (Jim Norton) son coooishyn eigsoylagh, ta ny saggyrtyn cummal as beaghey lesh y cheilley 'sy thie skeeragh marish nyn men thie Mrs Doyle (Pauline McLynn). Ta'n claare cur shaghrynys er arrishyn aittys cadjin as eh soilshaghey cowraghyn lomarcanys, meechraueeaght, mayrnaghys as pulgeydory y charaghteyr enmyssagh; ta'n cheeal ghowin shoh er ny ve yllit.

Domino Presley:
She aghteyr pornograafagh as craishteyder an-ghraagh tessen-cheintyssagh ee Domino Presley (r. ayns Atlanta, y Çhorshey, SUA er 8 Jerrey Geuree, 1987).

Jean Hollywood:
She aghteyr pornograafagh as craishteyder an-ghraagh queer ee Jean Hollywood (r. ayns Los Angeles, California, SUA er 19 Mean Fouyir, 1999).

Estelle Harris:
Estelle Harris (ruggit myr Estelle Nussbaum; 4 Averil, 1928 – 2 Averil, 2022), she aghteyr Americaanagh v'ee. Va enney mie urree son e goo jeesternagh, geayr mooadit. Va enney share urree son e paart myr Estelle Costanza er "Seinfeld". Mastey ny paartyn elley eck, t'ad goaill stiagh goo Mrs Potato Head ayns "Toy Story", Muriel ayns "The Suite Life of Zack & Cody", as Mama Gunda ayns "Tarzan II".

Emma Rose:
She aghteyr pornograafagh as craishteyder an-ghraagh tessen-cheintyssagh ee Emma Rose (r. ayns Tampa, Florida, ny Steatyn Unnaneysit er 20 Toshiaght Arree, 1996).

Tiara Tiramisu:
She aghteyr pornograafagh as craishteyder an-ghraagh tessen-cheintyssagh ee Tiara Tiramisu (r. ayns Caayr Veksico, Meksico er 9 Jerrey Fouyir, 2001).

Daisy Taylor:
She aghteyr pornograafagh as craishteyder an-ghraagh tessen-cheintyssagh Americaanagh ee Daisy Taylor (r. ayns Los Angeles, California, SUA er 28 Boaldyn, 1998).

Jenny Flowers:
She aa-aghteyr pornograafagh as aa-chraishteyder an-ghraagh tessen-cheintyssagh ee Jenny Flowers (ruggit er 10 Boaldyn, 1997).

Luna Love:
She aa-aghteyr pornograafagh as aa-chraishteyder an-ghraagh tessen-cheintyssagh ee Luna Love (r. ayns Phoenix, Arizona, SUA er 27 Mean Souree, 1998).

Kira Kazanzeva:
She aa-chraishteyder an-ghraagh tessen-cheintyssagh ee Kira Kazanzeva (; r. ayns Kazan, y Tatarstaan, y Roosh er 12 Toshiaght Arree, 1998).

Rousse Matus:
She aa-aghteyr pornograafagh as aa-chraishteyder an-ghraagh tessen-cheintyssagh Meksicagh ee Rousse Matus (r. ayns Caayr Veksico, Meksico er 18 Mean Fouyir, 1998).

Lana Rhoades:
She aa-aghteyr pornograafagh as craishteyder an-ghraagh Americaanagh ee Lana Rhoades (r. 6 Mean Fouyir 1996). Va Rhoades ruggit myr Amara Maple ayns Chicago, Illinois. Hoshee ee gobbyr 'sy çhynskyl pornograafagh ayns 2016. Ren ee obbraghey marish ny seyrlannyn Evil Angel, Elegant Angel, Girlfriends Films, Pure Taboo, Zero Tolerance, Jules Jordan Video, Blacked, Tushy, Vixen, Mofos, New Sensations, Bangbros, Digital Sin, Penthouse, Naughty America, Hard X as Sweet Sinner. Dirree ee ass y phornograafaght ayns 2021.

Aspen Brooks:
She aghteyr pornograafagh as craishteyder an-ghraagh tessen-cheintyssagh Americaanagh as Elveeishagh ee Aspen Brooks. Ruggit myr Bradley Briggs ayns Canton, Ohio, SUA er 19 Luanistyn, 1997, ren e lught thie arraghey dys yn Elveeish raad ren ee jannoo e studeyryssyn scoill. Ren ee arraghey reesht dys ny Steatyn Unnaneysit son dy yannoo e studeyryssyn ollooscoill. Hoshee ee gobbraghey 'sy çhynskyl pornograafagh ayns 2016 tra v'ee 19 bleeaney d'eash. Ren ee obbraghey marish ny seyrlannyn CX WOW, Mile High, Evil Angel, Transsensual, Kink.com, Pure TS, Gender X, Trans Angels, Grooby Productions, Rodnievision as Devil's Film, mastey seyrlannyn elley.

Liam Neeson:
She aghteyr ass Nerin Hwoaie eh William John Neeson (r. 7 Mean Souree, 1952).

Keira Verga:
She aa-aghteyr pornograafagh as aa-chraishteyder an-ghraagh tessen-cheintyssagh Meksicagh ee Keira Verga (ruggit ayns Caayr Veksico, Meksico er 1 Averil, 1994).

Barroose:
Ta barroose ny bus çheet er sorçh dy charbyd raaidey son arraghey theayagh. T'ad cummit son ny smoo troailtee y ymmyrkey na'n gleashtan ny yn van. Foddee barrooseyn ymmyrkey seose gys 300 troailtee, agh ta'n barroose er lheh gymmyrkey eddyr 30 as 100 troailtee.

Lorree:
Lorree, she sorçh dy charbyd t'eh ta cummit son laadyn ny lught y ymmyrkey ny son obbyr ymmydoil y yannoo. T'ad cur carr laadee orroo chammah.

Carbyd:
Ta'n fockle carbyd çheet er jeshaght ta garraghey deiney ny lught. Ta carbid goaill stiagh waggonyn, daawheeylyn, gleash-charbid (gleash-wheeylyn, gleashtanyn, lorreeyn, barrooseyn), carbid railley (traenyn, tramyn), carbid ushtey (lhongyn, baatyn, carbid fo-honn), carbid aer (etlanyn, etlanyn cassee) as carbid spoar.

Tiger Woods:
She golfeyr keirdagh Americaanagh eh Eldrick Tont "Tiger" Woods (ruggit er 30 Nollick 1975). T'eh 'sy chied ynnyd ayns cosnaghyn y PGA Tour, 'sy nah ynnyd ayns feniaghtyssyn mooarey firryn, as ta ymmodee recortyssyn er gheddyn echey. Ta Woods coontit myr fer jeh ny golfeyryn share rieau, as fer jeh ny roortee share 'sy çhennaghys noa-emshyragh.

Paige Spiranac:
Paige Renee Spiranac (ruggit er 26 Mayrnt, 1993), she ynseyder golf Americaanagh er YouTube lesh ny smoo na 260,000 fo-screeuderyn t'ee. Chammah's shen, she persoonid ym-ysseraght heshoil as aa-gholfeyr keirdagh t'ee.

Belle Delphine:
Mary-Belle Kirschner (ruggit er 23 Jerrey Fouyir 1999), ny Belle Delphine dy keirdagh, she dooinney ardghooagh yn ynnyd-eggey, aghteyr pornograafagh, craishteyder as persoonid YouTube Goaldagh t'ee. Ga dy row ee ruggit ayns Balley ny Rheynn 'syn Affrick Yiass, ren ee arraghey dys Lymington, Sostyn lurg ren e paarantyn scarrey voish y cheilley.

Morgan Freeman:
