Morgan Freeman (ruggit 1 Mean Souree 1937) she aghteyr, stiureyder as insheyder Americaanagh t'eh. Ta enney mooar er son e ghoo dowin er lheh, as t'eh er chloie paartyn eigsoylagh ayns ram scannaneyn dy chooilley sorçh. Harrish y choorse echey, t'eh er gheddyn ram ard-voyllaghyn, goaill stiagh Aundyr Academy, Aundyr y Screen Actors Guild, as Aundyr Golden Globe.

Bianka Nascimento:
She aa-aghteyr pornograafagh as craishteyder an-ghraagh tessen-cheintyssagh Brasseelagh ee Bianka Nascimento (r. ayns Natal, Rio Grande do Norte, y Vrasseel er 19 Toshiaght Arree, 1986).

Stacey Summers:
She aa-aghteyr pornograafagh as craishteyder an-ghraagh tessen-cheintyssagh ee Stacey Summers (r. ayns Divlyn, Nerin er 6 Luanistyn).

Taras Shevchenko:
She feelee, screeudeyr, ellyneyr, dooinney theayagh as politickagh, beeal-arrisheyr as kynney-graafee Ookraanagh va Taras Hryhorovych Shevchenko (; 9 Mayrnt [S.A. 25 Toshiaght Arree] 1882 – 10 Mayrnt [S.A. 25 Toshiaght Arree] 1861). T'eh goll er enney chammah myr Kobzar Taras, ny Kobzar (she bard 'sy chultoor Ookraanagh eh kobzar) T'eh er smooinaghtyn dy nee yn eiraght lettyragh echey bun y lettyraght Ookraanagh noa-emshyragh as, dy lheeadagh, yn Ookraanish ga dy vel ee anchasley rish glare e ghaanyn. Ta enney mie er Shevchenko chammah er son ny h-ard-obbraghyn va jeant echey myr peinteyr as daahder.

Tiffany Doll:
She aghteyr pornograafagh as craishteyder an-ghraagh Frangagh ee Tiffany Doll (ruggit 20 Boaldyn, 1986). Hoshee ee gobbyr 'sy çhynskyl pornograafagh ayns 2010 as t'ee jannoo reayrtyssyn jeh keintys thoanney ayns y chooid smoo jeh ny scannanyn eck. T'ee er ghra dy nee ben vaynragh ish as dy nee yn soyllarys eck e preeu-niartaght.
Beashnys.
Va Tiffany Doll ruggit er 20 Boaldyn 1986 ayns Cherbourg. Ta sluight Frangagh, Vietnamagh as Tooneeshagh eck. T'ee poost rish yn aghteyr pornograafagh Bruno Sx as ta un phaitçhey oc.

Charlie Chaplin:
Y Reejerey Charles Spencer Chaplin Jr. (16 Averil 1889 – 25 Nollick 1977), she aghteyr aitt, jeantagh scannane, as cummeyder kiaull Sostynagh dirree ard-ghooagh car lhing ny scannaneyn tostagh. Haink er dy ve ny yalloo er feie ny cruinney trooid e phersoonid scaa, the Tramp ("y Riblas"), as t'eh coontit myr fer jeh ny figyryn smoo scanshoil 'sy scannaneaght. Ren y coorse echey goaill harrish ny smoo na 75 bleeaney, voish yn aegid echey 'sy lhing Victorianagh dys blein roish e vaaish ayns 1977 as ren eh goaill stiagh ard-voylley as arganys.

Marlene Dietrich:
Marie Magdalene "Marlene" Dietrich (27 Nollick 1901 – 6 Boaldyn 1992) she aghteyr as arraneyder Americaanagh va ruggit 'sy Ghermaan v'ee. Ren y coorse eck goaill harrish ny 1910yn derrey ny 1980yn.
Ayns Berleen ayns ny 1920yn, ren Dietrich cloie er yn ardan as ayns scannaneyn tostagh. Ren e cloie myr Lola-Lola ayns scannane Josef von Sternberg, "The Blue Angel" (1930), geddyn ard-voylley eddyr-ashoonagh as conaant marish Paramount Pictures. Ren Dietrich goaill ayrn ayns ram scannaneyn Hollywood goaill stiagh shey paart jallooagh v'er stiurey liorish Sternberg — "Morocco" (1930) (yn un enmyssaght Aundyr Academy), "Dishonored" (1931), "Shanghai Express" as "Blonde Venus" (y daa jeu ayns 1932), "The Scarlet Empress" (1934) as "The Devil Is a Woman" (1935) — myrane lesh "Desire" (1936) as "Destry Rides Again" (1939). Ren ee traghtey er bun e persoonid drualtagh as e shilley "andooghyssagh" as haink urree dy ve fer jeh ny ben-aghteyryn s'berçhee 'sy lhing shen. Car y Nah Chaggey Dowanagh she eunysseyr ard-ghooagh ayns ny Steatyn Unnaneysit v'ee. Ga dy ren ee cloie paartyn ard-ghooagh ayns scannaneyn lurg y chaggey, goaill stiagh scannaneyn Alfred Hitchcock "Stage Fright" (1950), Billy Wilder "Witness for the Prosecution" (1957), Orson Welles "Touch of Evil" (1958) as Stanley Kramer "Judgment at Nuremberg" (1961), ren Dietrich ceau yn chooid smoo jeh'n traa eck ayns ny 1950yn derrey ny 1970yn turryssaghey yn dowan myr cloieder paalan buillvollee.

Marilyn Monroe:
Marilyn Monroe (ruggit myr Norma Jeane Mortenson; 1 Mean Souree, 1926 4 Luanistyn, 1962) she aghteyr, craishteyder as arraneyder Americaanagh v'ee. V'ee mie er enney son cloie karaghteyryn bwoyagh fynney as haink urree dy ve fer jeh ny cowraghyn keintyssagh smoo ennoil car ny 1950yn as ny 1960yn leah as v'ee coontit myr cowrey jeh caghlaa mooar keintyssagh y lhing shen. Ren ny scannaneyn eck tayrn stiagh $200 millioon (corrym rish $2,000 millioon ayns 2020) roish my dooar ee baase ayns 1962. Foddey lurg e baaish, ta Monroe foast coontit myr jalloo mooar y phop-chultoor. Ayns 1999, ren Undinys ny Scannaneyn Americaanagh oardaghey Monroe 'sy çheyoo ynnyd er rolley ny shen-skeealee woirrin share voish Lhing Airhey Hollywood.

Brigitte Bardot:
Brigitte Anne-Marie Bardot (r. 28 Mean Fouyir 1934), enmyssit dy mennick marish e aagherridyn B.B., she immeeaghtagh er son cairyn beiyn as aa-aghteyr, aa-araneyder as aa-chraishteyder Frangagh t'ee. Ta enney mooar urree son cloie karaghteyryn keintys-heyrit marish aghtyn beaghey hedonagh as she ish va fer jeh ny cowraghyn keintyssagh share ennymoil car ny 1950yn as ny 1960yn. Ga dy ren ee faagail yn çhynskyl eunysseyrys ayns 1973, t'ee foast coontit myr jalloo cultooragh mooar.

Sarah Bernhardt:
Sarah Bernhardt (ruggit myr Henriette-Rosine Bernard; 22 ny 23 Jerrey Fouyir 1844 – 26 Mayrnt 1923), she aghteyr ardan Frangagh v'ee ren cloie ayns kuse vie jeh ny cloiaghyn Frangagh smoo ennoil car y 19oo eash yeianagh as y 20oo eash leah, goaill stiagh "La Dame Aux Camelias" liorish Alexandre Dumas "fils"; "Ruy Blas" liorish Victor Hugo, "Fédora" as "La Tosca" liorish Victorien Sardou, as "L'Aiglon" liorish Edmond Rostand. Ren ee cloie paartyn firryn, goaill stiagh Hamlet liorish Shakespeare. Ren Rostand eamaghey ee myr "ben-rein y çhassoo as ben-phrinse y chowrey", as ren Hugo Hugo moylley yn "goo airhey" v'eck. Ren ee jannoo shiartanse dy hurryssyn theateragh er feie ny cruinney as v'ee fer jeh ny kied aghteyryn ren recortyssyn sheean as cloie ayns jallooyn roie.
Chammah's shen, t'ee kianglt rish speeideilys yn ellyneyr Alphonse Mucha er-yn-oyr dy ren ee cooney lesh soilsheydys yn obbyr echey. Dirree er Mucha ve ny ellyneyr feer ennymoil 'sy lhing shoh rere yn aght Art Nouveau v'echey.

Samantha Barks:
Samantha Jane Barks (ruggit er 2 Jerrey Fouyir 1990), she aghteyr as arraneyder Manninagh as Goaldagh t'er chloie er yn ardan as er y scaa scaailan chammah's er y çhellveeish. Dirree enney mie urree erreish jee goaill y trass ynnyd 'sy straih hellveeish schleie "I'd Do Anything" liorish yn BBC ayns 2008. Ayns 2012, ren ee cloie marish Jonathan Bailey 'sy straih "Groove High" liorish y Disney Channel, as ren ee goaill toshiaght myr aghteyr scannane myr Éponine 'sy lhieggan scannane jeh'n chloie kiaullee "Les Misérables".

Amy Jackson:
Amy Louise Jackson (ruggit er 31 Jerrey Geuree 1992), she aghteyr as craishteyder Manninagh as Goaldagh ta mie er enney son yn obbyr eck ayns scannaneyn Injinagh. Ta'n chooid smoo jeh ny scannaneyn shen 'sy Tamilish, 'sy Hindish, as 'sy Teloogooish. She aa-chraishteyder jeh Miss Teen World t'ee as t'ee er ghoaill paartyn ayns ny smoo na queig scannane jeig. Ren ee e chied obbyr ayns ny Steatyn Unnaneysit ayns 2017 myr Imra Ardeen/ Saturn Girl ayns "Supergirl", liorish DC Comics er ny ghientyn ec Warner Brothers. Ta ny paartyn mooarey eck goaill stiagh Amy Wilkinson ayns "Madrasapattinam" (2010), Sarah 'sy scannane jantys "Singh Is Bliing" (2015), as Nila 'sy scannane Injinagh smoo deyr, "2.0" (2018).

Charli D'Amelio:
She persoonid ym-ysseraght heshoil as daunseyr Americaanagh ee Charli D'Amelio (ruggit er 1 Boaldyn 2004). She daunseyr cohirreydagh v'ee feie 10 bleeaney roish my doshee ee 'sy choorse ym-ysseraght heshoil eck ayns 2019, tra hoshee ee postal stoo er y chlaare co-rheynn feeshanyn TikTok. Er TikTok, v'ee postal feeshanyn daunse dys arraneyn beoynagh. T'ee er gheddyn lught eiyrtyssagh feer vooar as haink urree dy ve ny crootagh smoo eiyrtyssagh er y chlaare shen.

Luna Rival:
She aghteyr pornograafagh, aghteyr scannane as craishteyder an-ghraagh Frangagh ee Luna Rival (ruggit 24 Jerrey Geuree 1997).

Anna Polina:
She aghteyr pornograafagh, craishteyder an-ghraagh as persoonid radio Rooshagh ee Anna Polina (; ruggit myr Anna Saganova () er 11 Mean Fouyir 1989 ayns Caayr Pheddyr, y Roosh (Leningrad, PHCH y Roosh ec y traa shen). Tra v'ee 10 bleeaney d'eash, ren ish as e lught thie arraghey dys y Rank raad t'ee foast beaghey.

Nadine Sage:
She aa-aghteyr pornograafagh as aa-chraishteyder an-ghraagh Americaanagh ee Nadine Sage (ruggit ayns Oakland, California er 16 Mayrnt 1993). Hoshee Sage 'sy çhynskyl pornograafagh marish pornograafaght amateyragh fo'n ennym Naidyne 'sy valley ayns 2011. Ayns 2012, hoshee ee craishtey marish y cholught FTVGirls.com. T'ee er n'yannoo obbyr lomarcan ny caillin/caillin, agh er-lhimmey my vel yn fer er enney dy mie eck as my vel treisht ayn. Ren ee daa reayrtys keintys; fer keintys thoanney marish Mofos.com ayns Mayrnt 2012. T'ee er ve obbraghey marish "KinkLive" liorish Kink.com as ayns Boaldyn 2012 ren ee reayrtys son "Whipped Ass" marish Aiden Starr.

Danny Glover:
Danny Lebern Glover (ruggit er 22 Jerrey Souree, 1946), she aghteyr, stiureyder scannane as immeeaghtagh politickagh Americaanagh t'eh. Ta enney mooar er son e phaart myr Roger Murtaugh 'sy straih scannane "Lethal Weapon". Va paartyn toshee echey ayns shiartanse dy scannaneyn elley, goaill stiagh "The Color Purple", "To Sleep with Anger", "Predator 2", "Angels in the Outfield", as "Operation Dumbo Drop". Va lhiass-phaartyn ec Glover chammah ayns "Silverado", "Witness", "A Rage in Harlem", "Dreamgirls", "Shooter", "Death at a Funeral", "Beyond the Lights", "Sorry to Bother You", "The Last Black Man in San Francisco", "The Dead Don't Die", "Lonesome Dove" as "". She cooidjeyder bio er son ram cooishyn politickagh eigsoylagh eh.

Fo-eaddagh ben:
Ta fo-eaddagh ben çheet er ronney eaddeeyn ben ta goaill stiagh fo-gharmadyn (coodee cheeagh son y chooid smoo), eaddeeyn oie, as gooynyn eddrymey. Ta fo-eaddagh ben jeant ass eaddagh eddrym, sheeyney, meein, glen, ny jesheenagh, lheid as sheeidey, stroll, Lycra, charmeuse, shiffon, lieen, ny laatçhey. Foddee ny h-eaddeeyn ve jeant ass frauaigyn najooragh lheid as sheeidey ny cadee; ny ass frauaigyn taahit lheid as polyester ny neelane.

Kendall Jenner:
She craishteyder as persoonid ym-ysseraght Americaanagh ee Kendall Nicole Jenner (ruggit er 3 Sauin 1995). She 'neen Kris Jenner as Caitlyn Jenner t'ee. Haink urree dy ve ard-ghooagh 'sy chlaare çhellveeish rieughid "Keeping Up with the Kardashians". Hoshee Jenner craishtey tra v'ee 14 bleeaney d'eash. Erreish jee ve gobbraghey ayns troddanyn soilsheydys prental hraghtee as seshoonyn fotograafagh, dirree ee ve ny smoo rahoil ayns 2014 as 2015 as ee shooyl ny roievollee car ny shiaghtinyn fassan ayns York Noa, Milaan as Paarys. T'ee er ve fakinit ayns troddanyn, artyn reagheydagh, as seshoonyn coodagh da "LOVE" as lhiegganyn eigsoylagh eddyr-ashoonagh jeh'n earishlioar "Vogue".

Jim Carrey:
James Eugene Carrey (ruggit er 17 Jerrey Geuree 1962) she aghteyr as fer aitt Canadagh as Americaanagh t'eh. T'eh mie er enney son e chloiaghyn ommidagh breeoil. Hooar Carrey e chied enney ayns 1990 erreish da paart aafilltagh y gheddyn 'sy straih hellveeish aittys sketçh Americaanagh "In Living Color" (1990–1994). Vrish eh magh myr rollage ayns ny jallooyn roie marish ', "The Mask" as "Dumb and Dumber" (dagh fer jeu ayns 1994). Beggan ny yei, hie ', "Batman Forever" (y daa 'er jeu ayns 1995) as "Liar Liar" (1997) magh er nyn skeaylley.
Ayns ny 2000yn, hooar eh enney s'odjey myr yn Grinch ayns "How the Grinch Stole Christmas" as ayns y scannane aitt "Me, Myself & Irene" (y daa 'er jeu ayns 2000), myrane lesh "Bruce Almighty" (2003), "Lemony Snicket's A Series of Unfortunate Events" (2004), "Fun with Dick and Jane" (2005), "Yes Man", "Horton Hears a Who!" (y daa 'er jeu ayns 2008), as "A Christmas Carol" (2009). Ayns ny 2010yn, va paartyn ec Carrey ayns ny scannaneyn "Mr. Popper's Penguins" (2011), "The Incredible Burt Wonderstone", "Kick-Ass 2" (y daa 'er jey ayns 2013), as "Dumb and Dumber To" (2014). Ayns 2020, ren eh cloie Dr. Robotnik ayns "Sonic the Hedgehog" as e scannane eiyrtyssagh ayns 2022 as Joe Biden ayns shey episode jeh "Saturday Night Live" ayns beeal reihys eaghtyraneagh ny Steatyn Unnaneysit, 2020.

Zoe Saldaña:
Zoe Yadira Saldaña Perego (ruggit myr Saldaña Nazario er 19 Mean Souree 1978), she aghteyr Americaanagh t'ee. Erreish jee cloie marish y possan theater Faces, ren ee cloie ayns daa episode jeh'n chlaare çhellveeish "Law & Order" ayns 1999. Hoshee e coorse scannaneagh blein ny yei marish y scannane "Center Stage" (2000) as ee cloie daunseyr ballay.
Ren Saldaña obbraghey ayns scannaneyn far-skeealagh sheanse, goaill toshiaght ayns 2009 lesh e chied huarystal ayns straih tuarystalyn myr Nyota Uhura 'sy straih scannane "Star Trek" as e chied huarystal myr Neytiri 'sy straih scannane "Avatar". T'ee cloie Gamora 'sy Dowan Scannaneagh Marvel, goaill toshiaght lesh "Guardians of the Galaxy" (2014). Ta Saldaña er ve cloie ayns tree ass y wheig scannane smoo berçhagh er çheu çheet-stiagh oc ("Avatar", ', as '), red nagh ren aghteyr elley erbee. Ny scannaneyn v'ee paartagh ayndaue, ren ad tayrn stiagh ny smoo US$11,000,000,000 er feie ny cruinney.

Chris O'Dowd:
She aghteyr as fer aitt Yernagh eh Christopher O'Dowd (ruggit er 9 Jerrey Fouyir 1979). Hooar eh enney lheeadagh myr Roy Trenneman, fer jeh ny h-ard-characteyryn 'sy chlaare aitt "The IT Crowd" lesh Channel 4 v'er ny skeaylley magh feie kiare straih eddyr 2006 as 2010. T'eh er n'yannoo coorse rahoil 'sy scannaneaght chammah trooid e huarystalyn ayns "Gulliver's Travels" (2010), "Bridesmaids", "" (2013), "Cuban Fury" (2014), "Miss Peregrine's Home for Peculiar Children" (2016), "The Cloverfield Paradox" (2018), as "The Starling". Chroo eh, as va paart mooar echey, 'sy straih hellveeish "Moon Boy" lesh Sky 1, v'er ny skeaylley magh eddyr 2012 as 2015. Er bun y straih shen, gooar eh enmyssaghtyn 'sy chloie, 'sy screeudeyrys as 'sy stiureydys ec Aundyryn Scannane as Çhellveeish Yernagh.
Voish y vlein 2017, t'eh er chloie Miles Daly 'sy straih aitt "Get Shorty" lesh Epix. Va paart aafilltagh 'sy straih drama aitt "Girls". Ren e chloie 'sy straih hellveeish aitt Ghoaldagh "State of the Union" cosney Aundyr Primetime Emmy dasyn. Ren y chied chloie Broadway echey ayns aachummey jeh "Of Mice and Men" (2014) cur enmyssaght Aundyr Tony da. Ayns 2020, v'eh scruit sheese 'sy 39oo ynnyd er rolley ny h-aghteyryn scannane Yernagh share liorish "The Irish Times".

Tori Black:
She Tori Black yn ennym ardan t'ec Michelle Chapman (ruggit ayns Seattle, Washington, SUA er 26 Luanistyn 1988). She aghteyr pornograafagh as craishteyder an-ghraagh t'ee. Shimmey Aundyr AVN ta cosnit eck. Hoshee ee gobbyr 'sy çhynskyl pornograafagh ayns 2007 tra v'ee 19 bleeaney d'eash erreish j'ee arraghey dys Florida. 

Ivana Montana:
She aghteyr pornograafagh, craishteyder an-ghraagh as persoonid ym-ysseraght heshoil Iddaalagh as Colombagh ee Ivana Montana (ruggit er 12 Averil 1996 ayns Desenzano del Garda, yn Iddaal). T'ee jannoo yn chooid smoo jeh ny scannaneyn eck er XVideos as Pornhub. 

Lisa Ann:
She aghteyr pornograafagh as persoonid radio Americaanagh ee Lisa Ann Corpora (ruggit er 9 Boaldyn 1972 ayns Easton, Pennsylvania). 'Sy choorse keirdagh eck, t'ee goll er enney myr Lisa Ann. Myrane lesh yn obbyr eck 'sy çhynskyl pornograafagh, t'ee er obbraghey myr stiureyder as myr jantagh schleie. Ren ee arrishyn jeh aa-Chiannoort Alaska, Sarah Palin, ayns shey scannane pornograafagh as un 'eeshan kiaullee. She oltey jeh ny Hallaghyn Foaynoo ec AVN, XRCO, as Urban X.

Rolley ny h-olteynyn ayns Halley Foaynoo AVN:
Ta Halley Foaynoo "AVN" ("Adult Video News") cur ammys dauesyn er son yn obbyr oc 'sy çhynskyl pornograafagh voish y vlein 1995. Ta ny h-olteynyn t'er lhiggey stiagh 'sy halley foaynoo er n'yanoo "cohoyrtyssyn mooarey 'sy çhynskyl pornograafagh" as dy vel "10 bleeaney er y chooid sloo oc 'sy çhynskyl" roish my vel ad smooinit son yndughtaghey.
Ta shiartanse dy vanglaneyn ayn ayns Halley Foaynoo "AVN"
Olteynyn.
Enmyn as bleeantyn lhiggey stiagh ny h-olteynyn.

Stephanie Hirst:
She çhebbeyder radio as çhellveeish Sostynagh ee Stephanie Hirst. T'ee er çhebbey "Hit40UK" as y claare anjeealagh laaoil "Hirsty's Daily Dose" er Capital Yorkshire.

Keintys thoanney:
Ta keintys thoanney ny bwoideeaght hoanney çheet er cur stiagh ny puttey yn woid çhionn stiagh ayns thoyn deinney son taitnyssid cheintyssagh. Ta sorçhyn elley jeh keintys thoanney goaill stiagh mairaghey, ymmyd gaihyn keintyssagh son towlley thoanney, keintys beill ta jeant er y thoyn (anilingus), as staikey. Ga dy vel "keintys thoanney" çheet er towlley bwoiddaghthoanney son y chooid smoo, ta feanishyn gymmydey "bwoiddeeaght hoaney" keayrtyn dy chur sheese dy liehlagh er towlley bwoiddaghthoanney, as "keintys thoanney" dy chur sheese er sorçh erbee jeh roortys keintyssagh thoanney eddyr deiney, goaill magh laue-chooilleeney thoaney.
Ga dy vel keintys thoanney kianglt rish y homocheintyssaght irryn, ta ronsaghyn magh taishbyney nagh vel dagh fer aeragh cliaghtey keintys thoanney as dy vel eh cadjin ayns cleuinyssyn hetracheintyssagh chammah. Ta sorçhyn jeh'n cheintys thoanney cliaghtit chammah ec lesbee. Foddee deiney taitnyssid y ennaghtyn voish keintys thoanney liorish greinney ny king nearragagh hoanney, as foddee attys y gheddyn liorish towlley thoanney – liorish greinney neuyeeragh y trellag phrostaitagh ayns fir, liorish greinney neuyeeragh y vrillane ny ard yn ine (ta goll er enney myr y "spot-G") ayns mraane, as nearrooyn keeallagh elley (goaill stiagh y nearroo pudendagh). Ansherbee, foddee deiney smooinaghtyn dy vel y keintys thoanney guinnagh. Foddee dy vel y smooinnaght shen bunnit er cooishyn shicklaagagh ayns cooishyn ennagh.

Staikey (roortys keintyssagh):
Ta staikey () çheet er cliaghtey keintyssagh raad dy vel ben cliaghtey keintys thoanney er fer liorish towlley yn thoyn echey marish dildo yeeallt.
Taitnyssid.
Foddee fir ennagh smooinnaghtyn dy vel greinney yn thoyn, as y trellag phrostaitagh, taitnyssagh. Foddee greiney yn trellag phrostaitagh lhiggey da attys ayns fir ennagh as ta fir elley geddyn taitnyssid ass y vainshtyraght cheintyssagh ta goll rish y chliaghtey shen. Ta mraane ennagh smooinaghtyn dy vel y cliaghtey shen cur pooar daue dy keintyssagh.

Keintys beill:
Ta keintys beill çheet er roortys keintyssagh ta jeant seose jeh greinney comyssyn deiney er dooinney elley liorish y veeal (goaill stiagh ny meillyn, y çhengey, ny ny feeacklyn) as y scoarnagh. She cunnilingus y keintys beill ta jeant er y phihtt ny er yn 'ine, as she fellatio y keintys beill ta jeant er y woid deiney. She sorçh elley jeh keintys beill eh anilingus, ny greinney beill jeh'n thoyn. Cha nel greinney beill jeh ayrnyn elley jeh'n chorp, lheid as paagey ny shliee, coontit myr keintys beill.
Foddee keintys beill ve cliaghtit myr roie-chloie dy vrasnaghey doostey keintyssagh roish roortyssyn keintyssagh elley (goaill stiagh bwoideeaght ineagh ny hoanney), ny myr roortys an-ghraagh ny ainjyssagh corpagh. Gollrish y chooid smoo jeh roortyssyn keintyssagh, s'bun jeh goaill doghanyn keintys-skeayllit eh. Ansherbee, s'inshley y gaue skeayllee lesh keintys beill na lesh bwoideeaght ineagh ny hoanney.

Eaghtyrane:
She enmys cadjin son y chione steat ayns y chooid smoo jeh pobblaghtyn eh eaghtyrane. Dy mennick, she kione y reiltys as fer toshee yn çheer eh.
Ta currymyn yn eaghtyrane anchasley er bun sorçh reiltys t'ayn. Ayns pobblaghtyn parlamaidagh, s'formoil ny currymyn t'ec yn eaghtyrane as cha nel currymyn slattysagh ny kiannoortyssagh echey. Ansherbee, ayns pobblaghtyn eaghtyraneagh as lieh-pharlamaidagh ta paart yn eaghtyrane ny smoo ard-cheimagh, goaill stiagh currymyn y chione reiltys. Ayns reamyn smaghtagh, foddee jaghteyr ny toshiaght steat un-pharteeagh ve enmyssit myr eaghtyrane.

Sheel-vleaystey:
She tuarystal sheayney deiney, er dooinney elley er lheh, eh sheel-vleaystey. Ta'n ennym currit dy cadjin da tuarystallyn ta taghyrtyn ayns scannaneyn, jallooyn, as earishlioaryn pornograafagh. Ta sheel-vleaystaghyn er çheet dy ve cooishyn da shaanraghyn feddish gollrish bukkake. Ta sheel-vleaystaghyn eddinagh (ny "eddinee") taishbynit dy mennick ayns scannaneyn as feeshanyn pornograafagh dy chur jerrey rish reayrtyssyn. Foddee sheel-vleaystaghyn taishbyney sheayney er commagh elley, lheid as er comyssee, er thoynyn, er cleeauyn, er eddinyn, ny, feeu, er çhengaghyn.

Sidney Poitier:
Sidney L. Poitier KBE (20 Toshiaght Arree 1927 – 6 Jerrey Geuree 2022), she aghteyr, stiureyder scannane, as diploamagh Bahamagh as Americaanagh v'eh., Ayns 1964, she eshyn va'n chied aghteyr Americaanagh-Affrickagh as y chied Vahamagh ren cosney aundyr Academy son yn Aghteyr Share. Ren eh cosney daa aundyryn Golden Globe cohirreydagh, aundyr BAFTA cohirreydagh, as aundyr Grammy son yn Albym Caaynt Share. She Poitier va fer jeh ny rollageyn mooarey jerrinagh voish Eash Airhey Hollywood.

Guanahaní:
Guanahaní, she ellan ayns ny Bahamaghyn va'n chied pheesh jeh'n Theihll Noa ren Christopher Columbus shilley as cur keayrt er er 12 Jerrey Fouyir 1492. She ellan ayns cummey poanrey t'eh ren Columbus arraghey yn ennym echey voish yn ennym Taíno dooghyssagh dys San Salvador. Dy tradishoonagh, t'ad cur enney Guanahaní er Ellan Watlings, va aa-enmyssit dy h-oikoil ayns 1925 myr Ellan San Salvador, agh ta schoillaryn noa-emshyragh arganey mychione kiartys yn enney shen as ta shiartanse dy hirreyderyn elley er nyn gur roish chammah.

Bukkake:
, she roortys keintyssagh raad ta ymmodee deiney sheayney er dooinney elley. Dy mennick, ta'n roortys shoh goll er taishbyney ayns scannaneyn pornograafagh.
She cooill chadjinagh 'sy phornograafaght cho-emshyragh ta'n bukkake. She 'sy Çhapaan hoal ayns ny 1980yn bun y roortys, agh ta'n shaanrey er n'arraghey er feie ny cruinney, as dys America Hwoaie as yn Oarpey er lheh, voish y traa shen, as t'eh er n'arraghey stiagh 'sy phornograafaght aeragh.

Dennis Hopper:
Dennis Lee Hopper (17 Boaldyn 1936 – 29 Boaldyn 2010), she aghteyr as crootagh scannane Americaanagh v'eh. Ren eh goll faare er Actors Studio, cloie er y çhellveeish ayns 1954, as, beggan ny yei, cloie ayns "Giant" (1956). 'Sy jeih bleeaney ny yei, ren eh cur e ennym roish 'sy çhellveeish as ec jerrey ny 1960yn va paartyn jeant echey ayns shiartanse dy scannaneyn, goaill stiagh "Cool Hand Luke" (1967) as "Hang 'Em High" (1968). Ren Hopper toshiaghey coorse mooar ard-voyllagh 'sy fotografeeaght ayns ny 1960yn.

BDSM:
Ta BDSM çheet er caghlaa sorçhyn dy chliaghtaghyn an-ghraagh ny paart-chloie ta goaill ymmyd jeh bondiaght, smaghtey, mainshtyraght as biallys, sadvasaghys, as dynamickyn eddyr-phersoonagh elley. Er coontey yn reayn lheeadagh dy chliaghtaghyn, ta goaill stiagh 'sy voodeeys ny 'sy fo-chultoor BDSM bunnit er hene-enney as taghyrtyn co-rheynnagh.
Hie yn enmys "BDSM" er ny recortyssey da'n chied cheayrt ayns postal Usenet 'sy vlein 1991, as t'ad çhyndaa yn enmys myr aagherrid Vaarle jeh ny aagherridyn elley B/D (Bondiaght as Smaghtey, ), D/s (Mainshtyraght as biallys, ), as S/M (Sadaghys as Masaghys, ). Ta "BDSM" ymmydit jiu myr abbyrt chummalagh dy choodaghey reayn mooar dy roortyssyn, cummaghyn cleuinyssyn eddyr-phersoonagh, as fo-chultooryn er lheh. Ta boodeeyssyn BDSM cur failt dy cadjin roish peiagh erbee as tro anreiltagh oc; foddee eh goaill stiagh caghlaaderyn eaddee, ard-jeeaneyderyn ceaghley kirpey, paart-chloiederyn beiyn, feddisheyryn rubbyr, as deiney elley.

Fassan:
Fassan (voish , , “cummey, kiaddey, tuarystal” y Çhenn-Rangish, voish “jannoo, cummey” y Ladjyn), she cummey jeh hene-dreagh as hene-reill ec earish as boayl er lheh as ayns co-hecks er lheh, goaill stiagh coamrey, cullee choshey, aght beaghey, gliggyryn, jeshaghey, oash fuilt, as shassoo kirpey. Ta'n enmys cowraghey tuarystal ta "beoynagh" myr ta meenit ec y çhynskyl fassan. Ta dagh red to coontit myr "fassan" ry-gheddyn as tayrnit ennoil mastey'n phobble liorish y chorys fassan (çhynskyl as yn ym-ysseraght).
Er coontey mooar-yantys yrjid ny h-earraghtyn as ny h-eaddeeyn ec leaghyn injil as roshtynys dowanagh, ta'n yn-chummal seose er ve coontit myr bun-chooish phreaysagh mastey politickeyryn, cowraghyn dellal, as ceaueyderyn.

Ellan Vannin (daan):
She daan as arrane eh Ellan Vannin va screeuit ec Eliza S. Craven Green ayns 1854. Dy mennick, t'eh er ve enmyssit "arrane ashoonagh caghlaaee Vannin". Ayns ny bleeantyn lurg e chur magh, va focklyn y daan currit rish kiaull liorish dooinney fo'n ennym J. Townsend ny F. H. Townend (s'ceaghlagh ny feanishyn).
Daan.
Lhieggan Gaelg.
Bun:
Lhieggan Bee Gees.
Ren ny Bee Gees recortyssey lhieggan y daan cour sheshaghtyn giastyllagh Manninagh. Ren ad goaill stiagh yn arrane 'sy turrys downagh oc myr taishbynys moyrn 'syn ynnyd dooghys oc. V'eh recortyssit ayns 1997 as skeaylt magh, as aa-skeaylt magh, myr singyl, 1998-1999.

Carlos Enríquez (aghteyr):
Carlos Enríquez (1898–1971), she aghteyr ass yn Ooraguay va gobbraghey 'syn Argenteen da'n chooid smoo. Va paart mooar echey 'sy scannane "Arroz con leche" (1950) fo'n stiureyder Carlos Schlieper.

Corsaideen:
Ayns eaddagh ben, ta corsaideen çheet er sorçh dy vun-gharmad marish meeryn jeh choodee cheeagh as cryssyn. T'eh sheeyney voish yeeallyn harrish ny geaylinyn sheese y challin as t'eh goaill jerrey ec baare ny lurgaghyn. Foddee eh goaill stiagh laatçhey ec yn oaie ny ec y chooyl. Myr fo-gharmad, foddee corsaideenyn ve foshlit (marish croghagyn) ny marish mod fo-hroosyn.

Eddie Murphy:
Edward Regan Murphy (ruggit er 3 Averil 1961), she aghteyr, fer aitt, screeudeyr, gienteyder, as arraneyder Americaanagh t'eh. Dirree foaynoo mooar er er y chlaare aittys sketçh "Saturday Night Live", as eh ny oltey fwirran voish 1980 dys 1984. Ta Murphy er obbraghey myr fer aitt shassagh as ren Comedy Central cur eh 'sy 10oo ynnyd mastey ny 100 Deiney Aitt Shassagh Share er y Theihll.
Ayns ny scannaneyn, ta Murphy er gheddyn enmyssaghtyn Aundyr Golden Globe son e chloie ayns "48 Hrs." (1982), y straih scannane "Beverly Hills Cop" (1984–jiu), "Trading Places" (1983), "The Nutty Professor" (1996), as "Dolemite Is My Name" (2019). Ta ram aundyryn cosnit echey chammah son y scannane aittys yindyssagh "Dr. Dolittle" (1998) as y scannane eiyrtyssagh echey Dr. Dolittle 2 (2001). Ayns 2007, ren Murphy cosney Aundyr Golden Globe son yn Aghteyr Cohassooagh Share as ren eh feddyn enmyssaght da Aundyr Academy son yn Aghteyr Cohassooagh Share son e huarystal jeh'n arraneyder annymagh James "Thunder" Early 'sy scannane kiaullee "Dreamgirls".

Commeeys cour Shee:
Ta Commeeys cour Shee (CcS) çheet er claare jeh Reagheydys Chonaant yn Atlantagh Hwoaie (RCAH-NATO) ta jeeraghey er troogal treisht eddyr Olteynyn yn RCAH as çheeraghyn elley 'syn Oarpey, goaill stiagh ny steatyn Lurg-Hoveidjagh; ta 20 steat nyn olteynyn. Ta'n claare goaill stiagh shey ard jeh'n cho-obbraid as t'ad geearree caarjyssyn marish commee trooid co-obbraghey cahnaght-dys-cahnaght ayns ny reanyn traenal, cliaghtaghyn, plannal as freggyrt cragh, bun-chooishyn sheanse as çhymmyltaght, keirdaghey, plannal polaseeyn, as cooishyn reiltyssagh shivoil.
Olteynys.
Ta 14 aa-olteynyn y CcS nyn olteynyn beayn 'syn RCAH nish: yn Albaan, y Vulgeyr, y Chroit, y Phobblaght Çheck, yn Estaan, yn Ungaar, y Latvey, y Litaan, Montenegro, Yn Vassadoan Hwoaie, y Pholynn, y Romaan, y Clovack, as y Clovean. Er 26 Averil 1995 haink er y Valta dy ve ny oltey jeh'n CcS; agh daag ee er 27 Jerrey Fouyir son e neaghtyraght y reayll. Er 20 Mayrnt 2008 ren y Valta aavioraghey e olteynys CcS; v'eh lhiggit ec yn RCAH ec yn ard-chruinnaght ayns Bucharest er 3 Averil 2008. Car ard-chruinnaght yn RCAH ayns Riga er 29 Sauin 2006, va cuirrey sheeynit dys Bosnia as Herzegovina, Montenegro, as y Serb co-chiangley rish y CcS, red ren ad er 14 Nollick 2006.

Cosmaid:
Cosmaid, she covestaghyn co-vunstooghyn ta tayrnit magh ass stoo najooragh ny stoo taahit. Shimmey cooish t'ec cosmaidyn. Adsyn ta kiaddit da kiarail phersoonagh as kiarail chrackan, foddee ad ve ymmydit dys y corp ny yn crackan y niee, y ghlenney, ny y choadey. Adsyn ta kiaddit son tuarystal y dooinney y yrjaghey ny y cheaghley (jeshaghey), foddee ad y ymmyd dys lheamyssyn y cheiltyn, cummaghyn najooragh y yrjaghey (lheid as mollee as ferrooghyn), daah y chur rish eddin dooinney, ny tuarystal yn eddin y cheaghley son dooinney, cretoor ny nhee elley y hoylaghey. Foddee yn chosmaid cur cooraght rish y chorp chammah.

Anna Muzychuk:
She feealee Ookraanagh ee Anna Olehivna Muzychuk (, "Anna Olehivna Muzychuk"; ; ruggit er 28 Toshiaght Arree 1990). Ayns 2012 va'n enmys "Ard-vainshtyr bronnit urree. She Muzychuk y kiarroo ben rieau ren feddyn raatys FIDE fo 2600 er y chooid sloo. V'ee raatit cha ard as 197 'sy theihll, as 2 mastey mraane.

Dominica Phoenix:
She aghteyr pornograafagh as craishteyder an-ghraagh Rooshagh ee Dominica Phoenix (ruggit er 14 Nollick 1989).

Ardal O'Hanlon:
She aghteyr as fer aitt Yernagh eh Ardal O'Hanlon (ruggit er 8 Jerrey Fouyir 1965). Ren eh cloie yn Ayr Dougal McGuire 'sy chlaare çhellveeish "Father Ted" (1995–1998), George Sunday/Thermoman ayns "My Hero" (2000–2006), as DI Jack Mooney ayns "Death in Paradise" (2017–2020).

Aiden Gillen:
She aghteyr Yernagh eh Aidan Murphy (ruggit er 24 Averil 1968) ta ny share er enney fo'n ennym ardan echey Aidan Gillen (). Ta enney mie er son e phaartyn scannane as çhellveeish, goaill stiagh Stuart Alan Jones ayns straih Channel 4 "Queer as Folk" (1999–2000), Tommy Carcetti ayns straih HBO "The Wire" (2004–2008), John Boy ayns straih RTÉ "Love/Hate" (2010–2011), Petyr "Littlefinger" Baelish ayns straih HBO "Game of Thrones" (2011–2017), obbragh CIA Bill Wilson ayns "The Dark Knight Rises" (2012), Janson ayns ' (2015) as ' (2018), Aberama Gold ayns straih BBC One "Peaky Blinders" (2017–2019), reireyder y vann Queen, John Reid ayns "Bohemian Rhapsody" (2018), as Dr. J. Allen Hynek ayns straih The History Channel "Project Blue Book" (2019–2020). Ren eh kiarail y goo as y taartyn roie da Paul Serene 'sy ghamman-feeshan "Quantum Break" (2016). Ayns 2021, va paartyn echey ayns ny straihyn kimmeeys dramadagh "Kin" as "Mayor of Kingstown".

Ciarán Hinds:
She aghteyr Yernagh eh Ciarán Hinds (ruggit er 9 Toshiaght Arree 1953). Ruggit as troggit ayns Beeal Feirshtey, Nerin Hwoaie, ta enney mie ec Hinds son e phaartyn er y scaailan as er yn ardan, voish karacteyryn feniaghtagh dys karacteyryn mooidjeenagh. Va paartyn mooarey echey ayns ram scannaneyn, goaill stiagh "The Cook, the Thief, His Wife & Her Lover" (1989), "Persuasion" (1995), "Oscar and Lucinda" (1997), "Road to Perdition" (2002), "The Sum of All Fears" (2002), "Munich" (2005), "Amazing Grace" (2007), "There Will Be Blood" (2007), "In Bruges" (2008), "Miss Pettigrew Lives for a Day" (2008), "Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows – Ayrn 2" (2011), "Tinker Tailor Soldier Spy" (2011), "Silence" (2016), "First Man" (2018), as "Belfast" (2021).

Maisie Williams:
Margaret Constance "Maisie" Williams (ruggit er 15 Averil 1997), she aghteyr Sostynagh ren toshiaghey e coorse cloie ayns 2011 myr Arya Stark, karacteyr toshee 'sy straih ghrama yindyssagh HBO, "Game of Thrones" (2011–2019). Hooar Williams ard-voylley as accolaidyn son yn obbyr va jeant eck, as hooar ee daa enmyssaght son Aundyr Primetime Emmy son yn Aghteyr Bwoirrin Co-hassooaagh Ard-yindyssagh ayns Straih Ghrama as enney dowanagh. Ta tuarystalyn elley Williams goaill stiagh y scannane çhellveeish "Cyberbully" (2015), scannane creauagh jeigeyragh far-skeeal sheanse Goaldagh "iBoy" (2017) as y straih ghrama yantys aitt "Two Weeks to Live" (2020). Ren Williams cur e goo rish Cammie MacCloud 'sy straih eddyrvoggyl vioghit Americaanagh "" (2019–jiu).
Ayns 2014, ren ee cloie 'sy chied ard-scannane eck, y drama folliaght "The Falling". Va co-phaartyn mooarey eck chammah ayns scannaneyn elley, goaill stiagh y scannane drama shendeeagh "Mary Shelley" (2017), y scannane aitt spoyrt roie-hendeeagh "Early Man" (2018), as y scannane drama aitt graihagh "Then Came You" (2018). Ayns 2020, ren ee cloie 'sy scannane atçhim far-feniagh "The New Mutants" as y scannane creauagh shicklaagagh "The Owners". Haink e toshiaght er yn ardan ayns 2018 'sy chloie liorish Lauren Gunderson, "I and You" ec y Hampstead Theatre ayns Lunni raad hooar ee aavriwnyssyn ard-ennymagh as ard-voyllagh,

Tory Lane:
Lisa Nicole Piasecki, ta ny share ennit myr Tory Lane, she craishteyder feddish, daunseyr andooghyssagh, aghteyr pornograafagh, as stiureyder scannane pornograafagh t'ee. V'ee enmyssit mastey ny 20 ben-aghteyryn share ec Adultcon 2007 as ren ee cosney daa Aundyr AVN. Chammah's shen, v'ee ynshellooit ayns Halley Foaynoo AVN ayns 2017.
Bea aeg as e coorse.
Va Lane ruggit ayns Schenectady, York Noa. Ren ee obbraghey myr ben lhionney ec y chlub The Elbo Room er Traie Fort Lauderdale. Ren ee obbraghey chammah ec shapp keintys as myr ben rooishteyder ayns clubbyn roostey ynnydagh ayns Florida.
Hoshee Lane 'sy çhynskyl pornograafagh erreish da ren Peter North scrial ee ayns Florida. Dettyl as darree ee dys California raad ren ee fo-screeu marish y jantys noa LA Direct Models. Erreish j'ee conaant y fo-screeu marish LA Direct Models, ren Lane e chied reayrtys ayns scannane pornograafagh marish Ben English as Marco Ayns Boaldyn 2007, ren Lane fo-screeu conaant daa-vlein marish Sin City son cloie as stiurey. Ayns 2006, va Lane ny kione-chloieder er y nah straih jeh'n chlaare rieughid "Jenna's American Sex Star" liorish Playboy TV, agh chaill ee yn aundyr 'sy vout jerrinagh. V'ee ynshelloodit ayns Halley Foaynoo AVN ayns 2017.
Bea phersoonagh.
She carrey persoonagh Jennifer Ketcham ee as t'ee ry-gheddyn 'sy lioar chooinaght eck, "I Am Jennie". Dooyrt Ketcham dy ren Lane ymmydey yn argid ren ee 'sy çhynskyl pornograafagh dy chiarail e shuyr, e mooinjer, as ee hene, as ren ee soilshaghey Lane myr "fer jeh ny callinyn goaney smoo freggyrtagh 'sy çhynskyl".

Arrane ashoonagh yn Ookraan:
"Shche ne vmerla Ukrainy i slava, i volia" (; dy lettyragh: "Cha nel gloyr ny seyrsnys yn Ookraan caillt foast"), ny t'er enney lesh yn enmys oikoil echey, "Arrane Steat yn Ookraan" (, ') ny lesh yn enmys giarrit echey, "" (, "Cha nel yn Ookraan caillt foast"), she arrane ashoonagh yn Ookraan t'eh. T'eh coontit mastey ny cowraghyn ashoonagh jeh'n çheer.

Kim Petras:
She arraneyder as screeudeyr arrane Germaanagh ee Kim Petras (ruggit er 27 Luanistyn 1992). Ga dy row ee ruggit ayns Koloin, y Ghermaan, t'ee cummal nish ayns Los Angeles ayns ny Steatyn Unnaneysit. Eddyr 2016 as 2020, ren ee skeaylley magh kiaull myr ellyneyr neuchroghagh fo'n lipaid eck, BunHead Records, roish ren ee fo-screeu conaant marish Amigo as Republic Records ayns 2021.

Jennifer Lawrence:
She aghteyr Americaanagh ee Jennifer Shrader Lawrence (ruggit er 15 Luanistyn 1990). She Lawrence va'n aghteyr bwoirrin va eeckit smoo ayns 2015 as 2016 as ta e scannane er gheddyn stiagh ny smoo na $6 billioon er feie ny cruinney gys y laa t'ain. 
Car y lambaanid eck, ren Lawrence cloie ayns cloiagheyn killagh as cloiaghyn kiaullee scoill. Tra v'ee 14 bleeaney d'eash, v'ee fakinit ec scrialtagh schlei tra v'ee er laaghyn seyrey ayns Caayr York Noa marish e lught thie. Ren ee arraghey dys Los Angeles as hoshee ee e coorse cloie ayns paartyn ei er y çhellveeish. She yn chied phaart smoo v'eck karacteyr er y sitcom "The Bill Engvall Show" (2007–2009). Hoshee e coorse scannaneaght tra ren ee cloie paart co-hassooagh 'sy drama "Garden Party" (2008), as ren ee brishey stiagh er y scaailan tra ren ee cloie jeigeyr boght 'sy scannane folliaght "Winter's Bone" (2010). Chammah's shen, ta Lawrence er chloie paartyn 'sy straih scannane "X-Men" (2011–2019) as myr Katniss Everdeen 'sy straih scannane "The Hunger Games" (2012–2015).

69 (shassoo keintyssagh):
Ta nuy as sheyad, nuy as tree feed, ny 69, ny t'er enney fo'n ennym Frangish soixante-neuf (69), çheet er possan dy hassooyn keintyssagh raad ta daa pheiagh çheughey ayns aght raad dy vel nyn meealyn faggys da comyssee nyn gommagh, as y daa jeu cloie keintys beill er y dooinney elley. Ta ny commee ayns shassoo byn ry-skyn gollrish ny h-earrooyn 6 as 9 'syn earroo 69. Foddee mestey erbee jeh ny keintyssyn cloie yn shassoo shoh.

Jamie Clayton:
Jamie Clayton (ruggit er 15 Jerrey Geuree 1978), she aghteyr as craishteyder Americaanagh t'ee. Ta enney share er Clayton son cloie Nomi Marks 'sy straih "Sense8" liorish Netflix, Sasha Booker 'sy trass straih jeh'n straih hellveeish "Designated Survivor", as Tess Van De Berg ayns "" liorish Showtime.
Bea lheah.
Va Clayton ruggit as troggit ayns San Diego, California. She turneyr coadey kimmee va'n ayr eck, Howard Clayton, as she planneyder cruinnaghtyn e moir, Shelley. Tra v'ee 19 bleeaney d'eash, ren Clayton arraghey dys Caayr York Noa son coorse y lorgey myr ellyneyr jeshaghey.
Coorse keirdagh.
Ayns 2010, she Clayton va'n ellyneyr jeshaghey as co-hebbeyder er y chied chlaare caghlaaee liorish VH1, "TRANSform Me". Y vlein ny yei ren ee cloie Kyla 'sy trass straih jeh'n straih hellveeish "Hung" liorish HBO. Ayns 2012, ren Clayton cloie Michelle Darnell er y straih eddyr-voggyl eddyr-obbragh "Dirty Work" as Carla Favers er y straih hellveeish "Are We There Yet?" Ren ee insh y lioar-sheean son y noa-skeeal da'n lught aasit aeg "George" mychione caillin tessen-cheintyssagh.
Ren Clayton cloie fer jeh ny hoght karacteyryn mooarey 'sy straih hellveeish "Sense8" liorish Netflix hie magh da'n chied cheayrt er 5 Mean Souree 2015. Ayns "Sense8" ren ee cloie Nomi Marks, ben hessen-cheintyssagh, screeudeyr bloggyn politickagh, as speiyder ta cummal ayns San Francisco. Dooyrt Clayton dy row anaase eck ayns "Sense8" er-yn-oyr dy veagh caa eck karacteyr tessen-cheintyssagh y chloie va screeuit eck ny jantee scannane hessen-cheintyssagh Lilly as Lana Wachowski as ve er y sett maroo. She baanreydagh y far-skeealaght sheanse as J. Michael Straczynski, as ren eh shen cleaney ee rish y çhalee shoh.
Ren Clayton cloie 'sy scannane "The Neon Demon" (2016), as 'sy scannane creauagh "The Snowman" (2017).
Ayns 2019, ren Clayton cloie Sasha Booker 'sy trass straih jeh'n straih hellveeish "Designated Survivor" liorish Netflix.
Ayns 2019, ren Clayton cloie ayns "", obbyr eiyrtyssagh jeh "The L Word" liorish Showtime.
Ayns 2021, v'eh fogrit dy nee Clayton cloie Pinhead ayns "Hellraiser".
Bea phersoonagh.
She ben hessen-cheintyssagh ee Clayton. Ayns 2011, ren "Out" moylley ee myr paart jeh ny h-aundyryn bleinoil oc "Out 100".

Jessie Andrews:
She aa-aghteyr pornograafagh, kiaddeyder, gienteyder, craishteyder, as markiagh jysk Americaanagh ee Jessie Andrews (ruggit er 22 Mayrnt 1992). Ruggit ayns Miami, Florida, she Americaanagh jeh sluight Yernagh as Latvagh er çheu e moir as jeh sluight Sheenagh er çheu e ayr.
Coorse keirdagh.
Ren Andrews obbraghey 'sy çhynskyl pornograafagh eddyr 2010 as 2015, raad hooar ee ard-voylley as aundyryn son e cloie ayns "Portrait of a Call Girl".
Ayns 2012, ren Andrews goaill ayrn 'sy feeshan kiaullee da'n arrane "Decisions" liorish Borgore marish Miley Cyrus. Ayns Jerrey Geuree 2014, ren Andrews, Dana DeArmond, Asa Akira, as Chanel Preston goaill ayrn 'syn art "4 Porn Stars on How They Stay Fit" liorish "Cosmopolitan".
Kiaddeyder fassan.
Ayns 2012, ren Andrews shiaulley e linney cliejeenys hene "Bagatiba" (she "bagātība" y fockle Latvish son "berçhid"). T'ee er craishtey son ny colughtyn eaddee, American Apparel, RVCA, as The Hundreds. T'ee screeu colloo coyrle keintyssagh son Galore Magazine. Ayns 2016, ren Andrews shiaulley y linney cullee faarkee Basic Swim as ayns 2017 ren ee shiaulley e linney eaddee Jeu Illimite.
Kiaull.
Ayns Sauin 2012, ren Andrews shiaulley aavestey jeh'n arrane "I Met You" liorish Anna Lunoe & Flume as v'eh skeaylt magh seyr son jeelaadey. Ayns Nollick, ren ee skeaylley magh aavestey jeh'n arrane "Latch" liorish Disclosure as Sam Smith.
Ayns Jerrey Fouyir as Sauin 2013, hie Andrews er turrys 'sy Chanadey myr markiagh jysk. Ren ee cloie ayns Montréal, Thunder Bay, Victoria, Edmonton, Vancouver as Calgary. Hie Andrews er turrys 'syn Aishey raad ren ee cloie ayns FLY ayns Singapore, We the Fest ayns Jakarta as y feailley Sunny Side Up Festival ayns Potato Head, Bali. Ayns 2015 hie ee er turrys ayns America Hwoaie raad ren ee cloie 'sy Marquee New York City, Exchange L.A, LIV Miami as Ultra Music Festival ayns Miami. Ayns Sauin 2015 hie Andrews er turrys 'syn Austrail 'syn eailley smoo 'sy çheer, Stereosonic, as ee cloie ayns Sydney, Melbourne, Perth, Adelaide as Brisbane chammah as ayns fo-chonsert ayns Sydney marish Diplo. Ayns 2016, ren Andrews skeaylley y singyl "Slowly" trooid OneLove Recordings.

Bethany Benz:
She aa-aghteyr pornograafagh as craishteyder Ookraanagh as Americaanagh ee Bethany Benz (ruggit ayns Kyiv, yn Ookraan er 12 Jerrey Geuree 1987). Ga dy row ee ruggit ayns Kyiv, ren e lught thie arraghey dys ny Steatyn Unnaneysit tra v'ee 12 vleeaney d'eash. Ta'n voir eck çheet ass sluight Senegaalagh, Ookraanagh, as Rooshagh.

Portrait of a Call Girl:
She scannane pornograafagh Americaanagh voish y vlein 2011 eh Portrait of a Call Girl. She Jessie Andrews y preeu-aghteyr as she Graham Travis y stiureyder as y screeudeyr. Ayns 2012, hooar y scannane 19 enmyssaght son aundyryn crootagh as çhaghnoil, ren eh cosney kiare aundyr AVN son yn aghteyr bwoirrin share, y stiureyder share, y tro share, as Scannane y Vlein; un aundyr XRCO son yn ard-skeeal share; as shey aundyr XBIZ son cloie yn vlein - bwoirrin, y scannaneaght share, y cloie neu-cheintyssagh share 'sy vlein, stiureyder y vlein - shallee neurheynnagh, as ard-scannane y vlein.
Skeaylley.
Hie yn scannane magh er ny skeaylley myr possan JABE-dooblit er 26 Luanistyn 2011. Hie y chied JABE magh marish troyn eigsoylagh er lheh, goaill stiagh peesh çheu-chooyl ny reayrtyssyn, taishbynys jallooyn, as quaaltyssyn. Hie y nah JABE magh marrish y scannane ny lomarcan, gyn un reayrtys pornograafagh.

Laura Burt:
She ben-chloieder ardan Manninagh as Americaanagh va Laura Burt (16 Mean Fouyir 1872 - 16 Jerrey Fouyir 1952). Va enney mooar urree son yn obbyr eck myr ben-chloieder ayns cloiaghyn Sostynagh as Americaanagh. Ren ish as e lught thie arraghey dys ny Steatyn Unnaneysit. She immeeaghtagh 'sy ghleashaght hobreeaght va'n voir eck.
Hayrn Burt enney mooar da'n chied cheayrt son e paart 'sy chloie "Blue Jeans" voish y vlein 1890. Another of her most famous performances was as Madge in "In Old Kentucky".
Phoose ee rish y chloieder Goaldagh Henry Stanford er 2 Mayrnt 1902, as ren ad cloie ry-cheilley ayns cooishyn er lheh derrey baase Stanford ayns.

Hilary Pritchard:
She ben-chloieder scannane as çhellveeish va Hilary Pritchard (16 Averil 1942–29 Jerrey Souree 1996).
Coorse.
Ta ny paartyn v'eck goaill stiagh yn episode "Take-Over" ayns "The Avengers" as tree episodes jeh'n sitcom "Are You Being Served?" liorish y BBC. Ren Pritchard cloie ayns sketçhyn aittys bio 'sy chlaare ceaueyder "That's Life!", as ren ee cloie Tanya ayns episode jeh'n chlaare "Doctor At Large" (1971).

Aoife Ní Thuairisg:
She çhebbeyder 'sy Yernish er TG4, bollagh Yernish Nerin, ee Aoife Ní Thuairisg. V'ee ruggit as troggit ayns Indreabhán, Conamara, er coose heear Nerin. Hoshee ee gobbraghey ayns TG4 ayns 1997. Roish my doshee ee gobbraghey marish y vollagh çhellveeish shen, va dellal hene eck, shapp ghleashagh miljeydys. Haink enney mie urree myr çhebbeyder y chlaare fassan rahoil, "Paisean Faisean". Agh, haink crampyssyn eck tra v'eh feddynit magh 'syn ym-ysseraght dy ren ee jiooldey lhieggan aeragh jeh'n chlaare y hebbey er-yn-oyr dy nee Feanishagh Yahvey ee. Myrane lesh "Paisean Faisean", t'ee er hebbey "Turas Teanga" as "Glór Tíre" chammah. T'ee poost voish y vlein 2006 as t'ee cummal foast ayns Galliu, Nerin.

Dáithí Ó Sé:
She çhebbeyder çhellveeish Yernagh eh Dáithí Ó Sé (ruggit er 2 Mean Souree 1976). Ec y traa t'ayn, t'eh çhebbey yn claare "Today" liorish RTÉ One marish Maura Derrane. Chammah's shen, she cuirreyder roie yn eailley Rose of Tralee as t'eh cuirrey yn claare cowag "Seal le Dáithí" ("Shallid marish Dáithí") dagh Jerdein er TG4.
Harrish y choorse echey, t'eh er obbraghey myr ynseyder, buitçhoor, fer ceau magh, fer assaig mygeayrt ny Blascaaidee, as mainshtyr y phreaban marish Duffy's Circus. Ayns 2010 hie eh er mooin Ray D'Arcy myr cuirreyder y Rose of Tralee. Phoose eh rish ben jeh ny "rosagyn" ayns 2012. Haink enney ashoonagh er myr insheyder eddyr claareeyn as myr çhebbeyder emshir er TG4.

Ooill:
Ta ooill çheet er un stoo kemmigagh neuphoulleragh ta jeant seose jeh hiddracharboanyn son y chooid smoo as ta ushtey-agglagh (t'eh shen, cha nel eh mestey rish ushtey) as lipaido-ghraihagh. Ta ooillyn loshtagh as jantagh eaghtyragh. Ta'n chooid smoo jeh ooillyn nyn lipaidyn neu-haieit as ta cummey ushlagh oc ec çhiassid hamyr.
Ta "ooill" goaill stiagh ymmodee rangyn jeh co-vunstooghyn, foddee ad ve neu-vooinjeragh rere strughtoor, troyn, ny ymmydyn. Ta ooillyn goaill stiagh ooillyn beiyn, blaa-ooillyn, as ooillyn pedrochemmigagh, as foddee ad ve so-ghaalagh ny neu-ghaalagh. T'ad ymmydit myr bee (m.s. ooill olive), myr conney (m.s. ooill hiassee), myr cooishyn lheeys (m.s. ooill veain), myr smarrey (m.s. ooill ghleashtan), as ayns jantys ram sorçhyn dy pheintyn, plastee, as stoo elley. Ta ooillyn elley goll er aarlaghey son sharmanyssyn as jesh-chliaghtaghyn crauee myr obbreeyn glennee.

Mícheál Ó Muircheartaigh:
She traghteyr gammanyn Gaelgagh Yernagh eh Mícheál Ó Muircheartaigh (ruggit 'sy Dein, Nerin, er 20 Luanistyn 1930). T'eh traghtey gammanyn Gaelgagh marish y scaalheaneyder ashoonagh radio as çhellveeish, Raidió Teilifís Éireann (RTÉ). Ayns coorse bea t'er gholl harrish 60 bleeaney, t'eh coontit myr "goo ny gammanyn Gaelgagh". Dy mennick, t'eh coontit myr "tashtey ashoonagh" ec ram sleih. Ta'n coorse bea echey er ny chosney da ynnyd ayns "Lioar Recortyssyn Guinness".

Frank Kermode:
She cremeyder lettyraght Manninagh as Goaldagh va'n Reejerey John Frank Kermode (29 Sauin 1919-17 Luanistyn 2010). Ta enney share er son yn obbyr echey "" as son yn obbyr ren eh er baghteyrys as reagheydys lioaryn.
She Olloo Lord Northcliffe y Lettyraght Vaarle Noa-emshiragh ayns Colleish-Ollooscoill Lunnin as Olloo Ree Edard VII y Lettyraght Vaarle ayns Ollooscoill Cambridge v'eh. 
Va Kermode ruggit er Mannin as ynsit ayns Scoill Ard Noo Ninian as Ollooscoill Lerphoyll.

Peyton Kennedy:
She ben-chloieder Chanadagh ee Peyton Kennedy (ruggit er 4 Jerrey Geuree 2004). Ta enney share urree son e paart myr Betty Nelson 'sy straih drama hellveeish "Grey’s Anatomy" (2018–2019) liorish ABC. Ta enney urree chammah son e paartyn scannaneaght ayns "The Captive" (2014), "American Fable" (2016), as "Lavender" (2016). Ren ee cloie Kate Messner 'sy straih Netflix, "Everything Sucks!" (2018), raad t'ee cloie caillin 15 bleeaney d'eash ta geearree e keintyssaght y hoiggal. Chammah's shen, ren ee cloie Dr. O ayns "Odd Squad".

Wesley Snipes:
Wesley Trent Snipes (ruggit er 31 Jerrey Souree 1962), she aghteyr, gienteyder scannane, as ellyneyr caggoil Americaanagh t'eh. Ta ny paartyn scannane smoo jeant echey goaill stiagh "New Jack City" (1991), "White Men Can't Jump" (1992), "Passenger 57" (1992), "Rising Sun" (1993), "Demolition Man" (1993), "To Wong Foo, Thanks for Everything! Julie Newmar" (1995), "U.S. Marshals" (1998), "The Expendables 3" (2014), "Coming 2 America" (2021), as y treeskeealag scannane "Blade" (1998–2004), raad t'eh cloie y karacteyr Blade. Er y çhellveeish, ta enney mie er son e phaart ayns "The Player" (2015).
Ren eh croo colught gientyn, Amen-Ra Films, ayns 1991, as fo-cholught, Black Dot Media, dy lhiassaghey shaleeyn scannane as çhellveeish. Ec 12 vleeaney d'eash, hoshee eh traenal ayns ny h-ellynyn caggoil.

Samuel L. Jackson:
Samuel Leroy Jackson (ruggit er 21 Nollick 1948), she aghteyr Americaanagh t'eh. She fer jeh ny h-aghteyryn smoo ennoil 'sy çheeloghe echey, ta ny scannaneyn ren eh goaill ayrnyn ayndaue tayrn stiagh ny smoo na $27 billioon er feie ny cruinney. Rere shen, she Jackson yn aghteyr smoo vondeishagh v'ayn rieau (goaill magh tuarystalyn cameo as paartyn goo).
Haink enney mooar er son e phaartyn ayns scannaneyn goaill stiagh "Coming to America" (1988), "Goodfellas" (1990), "Patriot Games" (1992), "Juice" (1992), "Menace II Society" (1993), "True Romance" (1993), "Jurassic Park" (1993), as "Fresh" (1994). Jackson continued gaining greater prominence for his collaborations with director Spike Lee in the films "School Daze" (1988), "Do the Right Thing" (1989), "Mo' Better Blues" (1990), "Jungle Fever" (1991), "Oldboy" (2013) as "Chi-Raq" (2015) as ayns ny scannane liorish Quentin Tarantino, "Pulp Fiction" (1994), "Jackie Brown" (1997), "Django Unchained" (2012), as "The Hateful Eight" (2015). Son e phaart ayns "Pulp Fiction", v'eh enmyssit son Aundyr Academy Award son yn Aghteyr Co-hassooagh Share.
She aghteyr feer heelaghtagh eh Jackson, as t'eh er ve cloie ayns ny smoo na 150 scannane. Ta ny paartyn elley echey goaill stiagh "Die Hard with a Vengeance" (1995), "A Time to Kill" (1996), "Hard Eight" (1996), "Eve's Bayou" (1997), "The Red Violin" (1998), "The Negotiator" (1998), "Unbreakable" (2000), "Shaft" (2000) as e scannane eiyrtyssagh/aavrebbyl voish y vlein 2019, "Coach Carter" (2005), "Snakes on a Plane" (2006), "The Other Guys" (2010), ' (2014), ' (2017), as "Glass" (2019). Hooar Jackson enney mooar chammah myr y Jedi Mace Windu 'sy treeskeealag roie-haghteragh "Star Wars" (1999–2005). Ny s'anmey, chur eh e ghoo rish y scannane bioghit "" (2008) as ayns y ghamman-feeshan . Ren eh cloie Nick Fury in 11 scannane ayns Dowan Scannaneaght Marvel, goaill toshiaght marish tuarystal cameo ayns "Iron Man" (2008), myrane as paart cuirreydagh 'sy straih hellveeish "Agents of S.H.I.E.L.D.". Nee eh cur y paart shen er aachroo ayns straih Disney+ "Secret Invasion" ta goaill toshiaghet ayns 2022.
Ta Jackson er chiarail e ghoo son shiartanse dy scannaneyn bioghit, scannaneyn feer-skeealagh, straihyn çhellveeish, as gammanyn-feeshan, goaill stiagh Lucius Best/Frozone ayns ny scannane "The Incredibles" (2004) as "Incredibles 2" (2018) liorish Pixar, Whiplash ayns "Turbo" (2013), y karacteyr enmyssagh 'sy straih hellveeish anime "Afro Samurai" (2007), as Frank Tenpenny 'sy ghamman-feeshan "" (2004). Ayns 2016, ren Jackson gobbraghey myr insheyder y scannane feer-skeealagh ard-voyllagh "I Am Not Your Negro" ta bunnit er screeuynyn James Baldwin.

Riley Steele:
She aghteyr pornograafagh, aghteyr çhellveeish, as craishteyder an-ghraagh Americaanagh ee Riley Steele (ruggit myr Britney Anne Palmer ayns San Diego, California, er 26 Luanistyn 1987).
Seihll aeg.
Va Steele troggit ayns Escondido, California. Roish jee goll gobbraghey 'sy çhynskyl pornograafagh, ren ee obbraghey marish Starbucks as ec barrey bee ec foain golf.
Coorse pornograafagh.
Ayns 2005, hie Steele dys Hollywood son fo-screeu "Pirates". Tra v'ee ayn, haink ee ny quail Jesse Jane, ren coyrlaghey jee goll stiagh 'sy çhynskyl pornograafagh.
Cha ren Steele cur fys er Digital Playground agh shiartanse dy vleeantyn ny yei. Ren Joone, bunneyder Digital Playground, fo-screeu conaant liehlagh eddyr e cholught as Steele y laa cheddin.
Ayns 2009, ren Steele cloie ayns scannane pornograafagh marish yn aa-hroddanagh UFC War Machine. Ayns Jerrey Geuree 2011, ren Steele co-chuirrey ny h-Aundyryn AVN. Er 30 Mean Fouyir 2013, ren Steele fo-screeu conaant daa-vleeaney marish y stiureyder Axel Braun.

Andy Allo:
She arraneyder, screeudeyr arrane, cloieder gitar, as aghteyr Cameroonagh as Americaanagh ee Andy Allo (ruggit 13 Jerrey Geuree 1989). Ren ee skeaylley magh y chied ass tree albym ayns 2009, as hie ee stiagh ayns bann Prince, The New Power Generation, ayns 2011. Va paart aafilltagh eck ayns tree episode jeh'n straih drama aittys "The Game" ayns 2011, myrane lesh paartyn elley, goaill stiagh paart cohassooagh 'sy scannane "Pitch Perfect 3" (2017) as yn ard-phaart 'sy straih "Upload" (2020) liorish Amazon Prime.

Jennifer Love Hewitt:
She aghteyr, gienteyder, as arraneyder Americaanagh ee Jennifer Love Hewitt (ruggit er 21 Toshiaght Arree 1979). Hoshee yn coorse eck myr aghteyr as arraneyder paitçhey, as va tuarystalyn eck ayns soilsheenyn çhellveeish ashoonagh roish my daink ee ry-cheilley lesh fwirran y straih "Kids Incorporated" (1989-1991) liorish y Disney Channel. Haink e brishey magh tra ren ee cloie Sarah Reeves Merrin er y drama jeigeyr "Party of Five" (1995-1999) liorish Fox as dirree urree ve ard-ghooagh myr rollage tra ren ee cloie Julie James ayns ny scannaneyn atçhim "I Know What You Did Last Summer" (1997) as y scannane eiyrtyssagh echey voish y vlein 1998, myrane lesh e paart myr Amanda Beckett 'sy scannane aittys jeigeyr "Can't Hardly Wait" (1998).
Ta ny scannaneyn elley ard-ghooagh eck goaill stiagh "Heartbreakers" (2001), "The Tuxedo" (2002) as y daa (2004–2006). Ren ee cloie Melinda Gordon er y drama neughooghyssagh "Ghost Whisperer" (2005-2010) liorish CBS, Riley Parks er "The Client List" (2012–2013) liorish Lifetime, Meoir er Lheh Kate Callahan er "Criminal Minds" (2014-2015) liorish CBS, as voish 2018, Maddie Buckley er y straih liorish Fox. Hooar ee enmyssaght da'n Aundyr Golden Globe son yn Aghteyr Bwoirrin Share - Mynstraih ny Scannane Çhellveeish son y scannane leeideilagh "The Client List" (2010).
'Sy chiaull, ta Hewitt er chur magh kiare albym seyrlann derrey shoh. Lurg e chied albym, "Love Songs" (1992) va skeayllt magh 'sy Çhapaan tra v'ee 12 vleeaney d'eash, ren ee recortyssey "Let's Go Bang" (1995), "Jennifer Love Hewitt" (1996) as "BareNaked" (2002). She yn albym BareNaked va'n chied albym eck hie stiagh ayns kaart chiaullee ny Steatyn Unnaneysit as ren eh roshtyn earroo 37 er y chaart "Billboard" 200. She yn singyl smoo rahoil v'eck er y chaart "Billboard" Hot 100 na cur magh 1999 y tingyl "How Do I Deal", haink stiagh ec earroo 59. Chammah's y chiaull as y cloie eck, ta Hewitt er obbraghey myr gienteyder kuse vie jeh ny shalleeyn scannane as çhellveeish eck.

Gitar:
She greie kiaullee cleeah strengit eh yn gitar ny yn gytayrn. Dy cadjin, ta shey streng er y ghitar. T'eh goll er reayll ec callin y chloieder as t'eh goll er chloie liorish mairaghey ny pluckey ny strengyn lesh y laue s'troshey tra ta mairyn y laue elley broojey er strengyn er lheh noi ny cleeahyn. Foddee figgeen ny pluggaghyn mair y ymmyd dy woalley ny strengyn. Ta sheean y ghitar tilgit dy sheeanoil, liorish shamyr aavuilltagh er y ghreie, ny ve mooadit liorish glackeyder lectraneagh as mooadagher.
Ta'n gitar coontit myr coyrdvane - t'eh shen, ta'n sheean goll er ghientyn liorish streng craaynagh ta sheeynit magh eddyr daa vaare shickyr. Dy shendeeagh, ta'n gitar er ny ve jeant ass aamaid as ta ny strengyn er ny ve jeant ass collane. Va strengyn gitar jeant ass staillin currit stiagh ec jerrey y nuyoo eash jeig ayns ny Steatyn Unnaneysit; haink strengyn neelane magh ayns ny 1940yn. Ta roie-immeeaghtyn y ghitar goaill stiagh y gittern, y vihuela, gitar kiare-choorse yn Aaruggyr, as y gitar baroque queig-choorse. Ta ny gitaryn shen er chur rish lhiassaghey yn greie shey-strengit noa-emshyragh.

Bodhrán:
She drum creatlagh jeh bun Yernagh eh yn bodhrán (ymmodagh: ' ny '). T'ad eddyr 25 as 65 cm (10-26 oarlagh) er crantessen, agh ta'n chooid smoo jeu eddyr 35 as 45 cm (14 - 18 oarlagh). Ta çheughyn y drum eddyr 9 as 20 cm (3.5–8 oarlagh) er diunid. Ta kione sheh ghoair taggit er un çheu (ta king haahit ny shehyn beiyn elley ymmydit keayrtyn chammah). Ta'n çheu elley foshlit dy lhiggey da un laue ve broojit noi'n çheu sthie jeh'n chione drummey dy stiurey yn tilgey as y toan-daah.
Foddee un ny daa hesmad, foddee ad ve yn-arraghey, ve çheusthie jeh'n chreatlagh, agh s'goan shen jiu er greieyn noa-emshyragh. Ta bodhrányn noa-emshyragh er lheh goaill stiagh coryssyn çhioonee obbrinagh gollrish adsyn ta ry-gheddyn er drummaghyn elley ayns trellooyn drummey. Dy cadjin, ta crackanyn ny bodhrányn goll er çhionney ny er lhaggaghey liorish ogher shey-lhiatteeagh, croghey er y staydys aeraghtagh.

Mapuçhish:
Mapuçhish ny Mapudungunish, (voish ' 'thalloo' as ' 'glare, loayr'), she çhengey Araucanagh, gollrish y Huilliçhish, ta goll er loayrt 'sy Çhillee yiass veanagh as 'syn Argenteen heear veanagh liorish ny Mapuçhee (voish "mapu" 'thalloo' as "che" 'sleih, kynney'). V'ee enmyssit rieau myr Araucanish, yn ennym chur ny Spaainee orroo; ta ny Mapuçhee shaghney yn ennym shen er yn oyr dy nee remlad ee jeh'n choloinaghys Spaainagh.

Mickey Mouse:
She karacteyr cartoon va crooit ayns 1928 liorish Walt Disney eh Mickey Mouse. She rhusag y cholught The Walt Disney Company t'eh. Lugh antrapoamorfagh ta ceau breeçhyn cuttagh ruy, braagyn mooarey buighey, as laueanyn baney, ta Mickey Mouse coontit myr fer jeh ny karacteyryn far-skeealagh smoo ard-ghooagh 'sy theihll.
Va Mickey crroit myr ynnydagh da'n aa-characteyr Disney, Oswald the Lucky Rabbit. She yn chied tuarystal v'ec Mickey na ayns "Plane Crazy", as va'n chied tuarystal theayagh echey 'sy ghiare-scannane "Steamboat Willie" (1928), fer jeh ny chied cartoonyn sheean. Hie eh er oaie dy ve ry-akin ayns ny smoo na 130 scannane, goaill stiagh "The Band Concert" (1935), "Brave Little Tailor" (1938), as "Fantasia" (1940). Son y chooid smoo, va Mickey ry-akin ayns giare-scannaneyn, agh keayrtyn v'eh soilshit ayns scannane foddey. Hooar jeih jeh cartoonyn Mickey enmyssaghtyn son Aundyr Academy son y Ghiare-Scannane Bioghit Share, as ren fer jeu, "Lend a Paw", cosney yn aundyr ayns 1941. Ayns 1978, she Mickey va'n chied characteyr cartoon dy gheddyn rollage er y Hollywood Walk of Fame.

A lyga:
She yn A lyga y rheynn s'yrjey jeh'n vluckan coshey keirdey 'sy Litaan. She aagherrid eh A Lyga ta giarraghey "Aukščiausia lyga" "Y Leeg S'yrjey". T'eh goll er stiurey ec Conastey Bluckan Coshey y Litaan, ny yn LFF (). Va'n "Aukščiausia lyga" rieau ayns laaghyn Soveidjagh y Litaan agh cha nee leeg cheirdey v'ayn agh lurg lheie yn Unnaneys Soveidjagh.
Clubyn.
Ta jeih club cohirrey ayns imbagh 2021. Bee yn fwirran s'inshley injillit as nee yn nuyoo club chirrey noi'n nah chlub voish yn "I lyga" dy gheddyn magh quoi vees cloie 'syn "A lyga" 'syn imbagh ry-heet.
a Bun-oltey yn "A lyga"
b Cha row rieau er injillaghey voish yn "A lyga"
c Ta daa aa-wirran fo'n ennym FK Dainava er chohirrey 'syn "A lyga" ayns 2001, 2011, 2012, 2013, 2014

Bill Murray:
She fer aitt as aghteyr Americaanagh eh William James Murray (ruggit er 21 Mean Fouyir 1950). Haink eh dy ve ard-ghooagh er "The National Lampoon Radio Hour" (1973–1974) roish my daink eh dy ve ny pheiagh ashoonagh er "Saturday Night Live" voish 1977 derrey 1980. Ren eh cloie ayns scannaneyn aittys lheid as "Meatballs" (1979), "Caddyshack" (1980), "Stripes" (1981), "Tootsie" (1982), "Ghostbusters" (1984), "Scrooged" (1988), "Ghostbusters II" (1989), "What About Bob?" (1991), "Groundhog Day" (1993), "Kingpin" (1996), "The Man Who Knew Too Little" (1997), as "Osmosis Jones" (2001). She "Quick Change" yn ynrican scannane raad t'eh enmyssit myr y stiureyder marish Howard Franklin.
Hooar Murray Aundyr Golden Globe, BAFTA as enmyssaght Oscar kyndagh rish e chloie 'sy scannane "Lost in Translatio" (2003) liorish Sofia Coppola. T'eh er cho-obbraghey dy mennick marish ny stiureyderyn Ivan Reitman, Harold Ramis, Wes Anderson, Sofia Coppola, Jim Jarmusch, John McNaughton as ny Braaraghyn Farrelly. Hooar eh enmyssaghtyn Golden Globe son e phaartyn ayns "Ghostbusters", "Rushmore" (1998), "Hyde Park on Hudson" (2012), "St. Vincent" (2014) as y vyn-straih HBO "Olive Kitteridge" (2014). Hooar Murray Aundyr Mark Twain son Aittys Americaanagh ayns 2016. Ta enney mooar er Murray chammah myr goo Garfield ayns ny scannaneyn aittys kynnee ' (2004) as y scannane eiyrtyssagh echey, ' (2006), myr Clive Badger ayns "Fantastic Mr. Fox" (2009), Baloo 'syn aachummey jantys bio "The Jungle Book" (2016) liorish Disney as myr Boss ayns "Isle of Dogs" (2018).

Gigi Hadid:
She craishteyder Americaanagh ee Jelena Noura "Gigi" Hadid (ruggit er 23 Averil 1995). Ayns Mee ny Houney 2014, ren ee e chied huarystal 'sy Top 50 Models ec Models.com. Ayns 2016, v'ee enmyssit myr Craishteyder Eddyrashoonagh y Vlein liorish y Choonseil Fassan Ghoaldagh. Harrish kiare bleeaney, ta Hadid er nyannoo queig jeig tuarystal as feed er coodee eddyrashoonagh yn earishlioar "Vogue".

Pianney:
She greie mair-chlaare strengit eh yn pianney raad dy vel ny strengyn bwoaillit liorish oardyn aamaid ta coodit liorish stoo ny s'buiggey (ta ny h-oardyn noa-emshyragh coodit liorish pelt olley çhiu; va ymmyd jeant as liare ayns fir jeh ny piannaghyn leah). T'eh goll er chloie liorish mair-chlaare, roa ogheryn (dellyn beggey) ta broojit ny bwoaillit liorish y meir y chloieder. Ta'n broojey ny yn bwoalley shen cur er ny h-oardyn ny strengyn y woalley. She yn Iddaalagh Bartolomeo Cristofori ren ynlaghey yn pianney mygeayrt y vlein 1700.

Sacsafone:
Ta sacsafone çheet er sorçh dy gheay-ghreieyn maidjey un-chuirtlagh marish corpane cughlinagh ta jeant dy cadjin ass prash. Gollrish dagh greie un-chuirtlagh, ta sheeanyn goll er ghientyn tra ta cuirtlagh er beealag craa dy chroo sheean-honn çheusthie jeh corpane y ghreie. Ta'n tilgey goll er stiurey liorish foshley as dooney ny tuill 'sy chorpane dy cheaghley lhiurid vreeoil yn 'eddan. Ta ny tuill goll er ghooney liorish kip liare ta kianglt rish ny h-ogheryn t'er ny gloie liorish y chloieder. Shimmey mooadys jeh sacsafone ta ry-gheddyn as t'ad dellit myr greie maylartee.

Huda Kattan:
Huda Kattan (ruggit er 2 Jerrey Fouyir 1983), she ellyneyr jeshee, screeudeyr blog aalid, as greeseyder dellalys Americaanagh t'ee. She bunneyder y linney cosmaidagh Huda Beauty t'ee.

Jameela Jamil:
She aghteyr, çhebbeyder, as immeeaghtagh Sostynagh ee Jameela Alia Jamil (ruggit er 25 Toshiaght Arree 1986). Hoshee yn coorse bea eck er Channel 4, raad v'ee cuirrey straih phop-chultoor 'sy lhieggan T4 voish 2009 derrey 2012. Lurg shen, haink urree dy ve ny cuirreyder radio jeh "The Official Chart", as v'ee ny co-chuirreyder jeh "The Official Chart Update" marish Scott Mills er BBC Radio 1. She ish va'n chied çhebbeyder lomarcan er y chlaare kaart BBC Radio 1.
Ayns 2016, ren Jamil arraghey dys ny Steatyn Unnaneysit. T'ee mie er enney son e paart myr Tahani Al-Jamil 'sy straih aittys yindyssagh "The Good Place" liorish NBC. T'ee mie er enney chammah myr cuirreyder y chlaare gamman oie anmagh "The Misery Index" liorish TBS as myr nane jeh ny briwnyn er y chlaare cohirree rieughid "Legendary".

Elon Musk:
Elon Reeve Musk (ruggit er 28 Mean Souree 1971), she greeseyder dellalys, baiheyder argid as dooiney mooar dellalys t'eh. She bunneyder, AOS, as ard-yeshaghteyr SpaceX t'eh, myrane lesh baiheyder argid, AOS, as Seyrnagh Gientyn Tesla, Inc., bunneyder The Boring Company, as co-vunneyder Neuralink as OpenAI t'eh. She Musk yn dooinney s'berçhee er y theihll lesh feeuid ghlen ny smoo na US$250 billoon ec Averil 2022 rere y "Bloomberg Billionaires Index" as rolley feer-hraa ny billooneyryn liorish "Forbes".
Va Musk ruggit lesh moir Chanadagh as ayr Affrickagh Yiass as v'eh troggit ayns Pretoria, South Africa. Ren eh frastyl er Ollooscoill Pretoria rish tammylt beg roish my ren eh arraghey dys y Chanadey tra v'eh 17 bleeaney d'eash. Ghow eh yn maireanagh ec Ollooscoill y Venrein as ren eh astreeaghey dys Ollooscoill Pennsylvania daa vleeaney ny yei raad hooar eh keim 'sy tarmaynys as 'syn 'ishig. Ren eh arraghey dys California ayns 1995 dy rastyl er Ollooscoill Stanford agh agh reih eh coorse dellalys y ronsaghey. Ren eh co-vunney y colught cooid vog Zip2 marish e vraar Kimbal. Va'n colught kionnit ec Compaq er $307 millioon ayns 1999. Y vlein cheddin, ren Musk co-vunney y banc er-linney X.com hie er mestey marish Confinity ayns 2000 dy chroo PayPal. Va'n colught kionnit ec eBay ayns 2002 er $1.5 billoon.
Ayns 2002, ren Musk bunney SpaceX, jeantagh eaghtyr speyrey as colught shirveishyn arraghey spoar. She AOS as Ard-Yeshaghteyr y cholught shen t'eh. Ayns 2004, hie eh stiagh marish y jeantagh carbyd lectraneagh Tesla Motors, Inc. (Tesla, Inc. jiu) myr caairliagh as seyrnagh gientyn. Haink er dy ve ny AOS ayns 2008. Ayns 2006, chooinee eh croo SolarCity, colught shirveishyn bree greiney va kionnit ny s'anmagh liorish Tesla. Haink er dy ve enmyssit Tesla Energy. Ayns 2015, ren eh co-vunney OpenAI, colught ronsee neu-vondeishagh ta cur far-inçhynaght chaarjyssagh er oaie. Ayns 2016, ren eh co-vunney Neuralink, colught neayr-haghnoaylleeaght ta jeeraghey er lhiassaghey co-eddinyn inçhyn-co-earrooder, as bunney The Boring Company, colught troggalys thiollane. Ta Musk er chur roish y Hyperloop, corys arraghey traen folmid ard-vieauid. Ayns 2022 ren eh coardail y çhirveish ym-ysseraght heshoil Americaanagh Twitter y chionnaghey er $44 billoon.

Harmoan:
Ta harmoan ny organe beill çheet er greie kiaullee geayee seyr-chuirtlagh ta ymmydit er feie ny cruinney ayns ram shaanraghey kiaull, goaill stiagh kiaull ghroamid, kiaull çheerey Americaanagh, kiaull chlassicagh, snagchiaull, as craa-chiaull er lheh. Shymmey sorçh harmoan ta ry-gheddyn, goaill stiagh yn harmoan daa-hoanagh, cromaidagh, tremolo, shiaull, kiaullaneagh, as bass. Ta'n harmoan goll er chloie liorish jeeraghey aer stiagh ny magh ass fer (ny ny smoo) jeh ny tuill harrish beealag liorish y veeal (ny meillyn as y çhengey). Çheu chooylloo jeh dagh towl ta shamyr ta cummal un chuirtlagh er y chooid sloo. She yn harmoan smoo cadjin ayn na'n lhieggan ta Richter-hiaullit marish jeih bollagh aer as feed cuirtlagh. She yn chlaasagh ghroamid yn ennym ta currit er y torçh shen dy mennick. She ribbey liauyr rea eh yn cuirtlagh harmoan as t'eh jeant ass prash, staillin dovergit, ny ooha ta kianglt ec un chione harrish scoltan ta ymmydit myr bollagh aer. Tra ta'n kione seyr craa liorish aer y chloieder, t'eh cur as seyrey lhiettrimys y vollagh aer dy ghientyn sheean.

Emily Willis:
She Emily Willis yn ennym ardan ta ymmydit ec Litzy Lara Banulos (ruggit 'syn Argenteen er 29 Nollick 1998), aghteyr pornograafagh as craishteyder an-ghraagh Americaanagh. Hoshee ee gobbraghey 'sy çhynskyl pornograafagh ayns 2017 tra v'ee 18 bleeaney d'eash. She ass yn Argenteen ee, agh ren ee arraghey dys ny Steatyn Unnaneysit tra v'ee 7 bleeaney d'eash.

JoAnna Garcia Swisher:
She aghteyr Americaanagh ee JoAnna García Swisher ("née" García; ruggit er 10 Luanistyn 1979). T'ee mie er enney son e paartyn myr Sam ayns "Are You Afraid of the Dark?" (1994–96), Vicki Appleby ayns "Freaks and Geeks" (1999–2000), as Cheyenne Hart-Montgomery er y sitcom liorish The WB/CW, "Reba" (2001–07). Hooar ee ard-ghoo chammah son e paartyn ayns "Privileged" (2008–09), "Better with You" (2010–11), "Animal Practice" (2012), "Once Upon a Time" (2013–18), "The Astronaut Wives Club" (2015), as "Sweet Magnolias" (2020). Ta García cloie Lindsey Johnson ayns "As Luck Would Have It" (2021) liorish y Hallmark Channel.

Tom Hardy:
She aghteyr, gienteyder, screeudeyr scannane, as aa-chraishteyder Sostynagh eh Edward Thomas Hardy (ruggit er 15 Mean Fouyir 1977). Erreish da studeyrys y yannoo er y chloie ec Laare Drama Lunnin, ren eh cloie e chied scannane ayns "Black Hawk Down" (2001) liorish Ridley Scott. Voish shen, t'eh er ve enmyssit son Aundyr Academy son yn Aghteyr Co-hassooagh Share, daa aundyr ec y Critics' Choice Movie Awards as daa aundyr BAFTA.
Ta Hardy er chloie chammah ayns ram scannaneyn, goaill stiagh ' (2002), "RocknRolla" (2008), "Bronson" (2008), "Warrior" (2011), "Tinker Tailor Soldier Spy" (2011), "Lawless" (2012), "This Means War" (2012), "Locke" (2013), "The Drop" (2014), as "The Revenant" (2015) raad hooar eh enmyssaght son Aundyr Academy. Ayns 2015, ren eh cloie "Mad" Max Rockatansky ayns ' as y daa lannoon Kray ayns "Legend". T'eh er chloie ayns tree scannane liorish Christopher Nolan: "Inception" (2010) myr Eames, "The Dark Knight Rises" (2012) myr Bane, as "Dunkirk" (2017) myr etleyder caggee RAF. Ren eh cloie Eddie Brock as Venom 'sy scannane 2018 "Venom" as y scannane eiyrtyssagh "" (2021).
Ta paarty hellveeish Hardy goaill stiagh y vyn-straih "Band of Brothers" (2001) liorish HBO, y vyn-straih drama shendeeagh "The Virgin Queen" (2005) liorish y BBC, Bill Sikes ayns 'sy vyn-straih BBC "Oliver Twist" (2007), Heathcliff ayns Wuthering Heights" (2009) liorish ITV, y straih drama "The Take" (2009) liorish Sky 1, as Alfie Solomons 'sy straih drama kimmeeys "Peaky Blinders" (2014–2022) liorish y BBC. Myrane lesh shen, ren eh croo, co-ghientyn, as cloie yn ard-phaart 'sy straih shendeeagh far-skeealagh "Taboo" (2017) er BBC One as FX.

Colm Meaney:
Colm J. Meaney (; ruggit er 30 Boaldyn 1953), she aghteyr Yernagh t'eh ta mie er enney son cloie Miles O'Brien ayns ' (1987–1994) as ' (1993–1999). T'eh er chloie paartyn cuirreydagh ayns ram claareeyn çhellveeish chammah, goaill stiagh "Law & Order" as "The Simpsons", as ren eh cloie Thomas Durant er "Hell on Wheels" (2011–2016).
Ta coorse mie 'sy scannaneaght echey chammah, goaill stiagh tuarystalyn ayns " Layer Cake", "The Damned United", y tree scannane aa-chummit jeh'n "Treeskeealag Barrytown" liorish Roddy Doyle, as ayns "Get Him to the Greek". She Meaney va'n ard-characteyr 'sy scannane "The Englishman who Went up a Hill but Came down a Mountain". Ayns 2017, ren Meaney cosney IFTA son yn Aghteyr Share kyndagh rish e huarystal jeh'n pholitickeyr Yernagh Martin McGuinness 'sy scannane "The Journey". Ayns 2020, v'eh rhenkit ec earoo 24 er rolley ny scannane share liorish "The Irish Times".

Síle Seoige:
She çhebbeyder çhellveeish as radio Yernagh ee Síle Seoige (ruggit er 13 Averil 1979). Va Seoige ruggit 'sy Spidéal, Coontae ny Galliu, y screeblagh ass kiare cloan lesh Mairtín as Philomena Joyce. Ren ee frastyl er Scoil Mhuire as Coláiste Chroí Mhuire. Erreish j'ee yn Ard-Teisht y yannoo, v'ee faillit ec TnaG son claare scannane fo'n ennym "Hollywood Anocht" y hebbey. Va Síle currit rish y phobble lurg ren e shuyr, Gráinne, arraghey dys TV3. Tra v'ee ayn, ren ee jannoo quaaltyssyn marish rollageyn Hollywood goaill stiagh Bruce Willis as Meryl Streep. Tra haink jerrey lesh "Hollywood Anocht" haink er Síle dy ve ny caillin emshir er TG4 as daa vlein ny yei haink urree dy ve ny cuirreyder jeh'n chlaare paitçhey "Cúla4".

Craishteyder:
Ta craishteyder çheet er dooinney ta ardjaghey, moylley, taishbyney, ny soilshey magh gientynyn traghtee (eaddeeyn fassan ayns taishbynyssyn fassan son y chooid smoo), ny gobbraghey myr coodaghyn sooilley da deiney ta croo obbraghyn ellyn, ny ta cur adsyn hene ny hassoo son fotografeeaght. Ga dy nee mraane y chooid smoo jeh craishteyderyn, ta craishteyderyn firryn ayn chammah, son craishtey eaddeeyn er lheh. Foddee craishteyderyn gobbraghey dy keirdagh dy taghyrtagh.
Ta'n craishtey coontit myr sorçh er lheh jeh'n chloie theayagh, neughollrish cloie ny daunse. Ga nagh vel yn anchaslys leayr eddyr y chraishtey as y cloie, cha nel tuarystalyn ayns scannaneyn ny ayns cloiaghyn coontit myr "craishtey". Gollrish shen, cha nel tuarystalyn ayns soilsheeyn çhellveeish coontit myr craishtey. Dy cadjin, cha nel y craishteyder loayrt. Cha nel barelyn persoonagh currit roish son y chooid smoo as ta ard-ghoo as caslys y chraishteyder coontit feer scanshoil.
Ta sorçhyn jeh'n chraishtey goaill stiagh: craishteyderyn fassan, drualtagh, follanid, bikini, ellyn ooasle, moyllagh, an-ghraagh as traghtee. Shimmey cummey ym-ysseraght ta taishbyney craishteyderyn: lioaryn, earishlioaryn, pabyryn-naight, yn eddyr-voggyl, as y çhellveeish. Ta'n craishtey fassan myr keird ry-akin ayns scannaneyn ("Prêt-à-Porter" as "Looker"), claareeyn çhellveeish rieughid ("Britain's Next Top Model" as "The Janice Dickinson Modeling Agency") as feeshanyn kiaull ("Freedom! '90", "Wicked Game", "Daughters" as "Blurred Lines").
Sorçhyn.
Craishtey fassan.
Craishtey roievollagh.
Ta craishteyderyn roievollagh taishbyney eaddeeyn voish kiaddeyderyn fassan, yn ym-ysseraght fassan, as kionneyderyn. T'ad enmyssit "craishteyderyn bio" dy mennick foast as t'ad hene-failt. Er yrjid, ta fir ny s'yrjey na 5'11" (180 cm) as ta mraane ny s'yrjey na 5'7" (170 cm). Ta craishteyderyn roievollagh gobbraghey ayns ram buill eigsoylagh, garraghey eddyr caaryn raad ta'n fassan mie er enney—Caayr York Noa, Lunnin, Paarys, as Milano. Ta caayryn fassan jeh'n nah straih goaill stiagh y Raue, Firenze, y Veneesh, Brescia, Barcelona, Los Angeles, Tokyo, as Moscow.
Ta slatyn towshan son craishteyderyn roievollagh goaill stiagh shirreydyssyn yrjid as trimmid er lheh. Car taishbynyssyn roievollagh, lhisagh ny craishteyderyn ceaghley ny h-eaddeeyn as y jeshaghey oc. Ta ny craishteyderyn shooyll, cassey, as shassoo dy haishbyney troyn garmad. Lhisagh ad goll dys quaaltyssyn son nyn gurrymyn y chur roish. Myr smoo vees y cliaghtey ec y chraishteyder, ny s'liklee t'eh da'n chraishteyder ve failt da taishbynys fassan. Foddee craishteyder roievollagh gobbraghey ayns rheamyssyn elley, lheid as taishbynyssyn fassan shappyn yl-rheynnagh, as ta ny craishteyderyn smoo rahoil croo nyn linnaghyn gientyn hene ny goll stiagh 'sy chloie dy mennick.
Ta'n "British Association of Model Agents" (AMA) ("Sheshaght Ghoaldagh ny Jantee Chraishtee") gra dy lhisagh craishteyderyn bwoirrin ve mysh 34"-24"-34" er towshan as eddyr 5' 8" as 5' "11 er yrjid (1.73 m - 1.80 m). S'feer hanney yn craishteyder sampleyragh. Foddee ad nagh vel roshtyn ny shirreydyssyn towshan ve nyn graishteyderyn ard-vooadys. Rere ynnyd-eggey yn New York Better Business Career Services website, t'ad ny towshanyn reih da craishteyder firryn na ve eddyr 5' 11" (180 cm) as 6' 2" (188 cm) er yrjid, marish bouin eddyr 26" as 32" (66.04–81.28 cm) as cleeau eddyr 39" as 40" (99.06–101.60 cm). Ta craishteyderyn roievollagh firryn feer hanney as mie hionnit.
Lhisagh craishteyderyn firryn as bwoirrin ve leayr 'sy chrackan, marish folt slayntoil, as troyn eddin tayrnyssagh. Ta linnaghyn stiuree geyrey da trimmid as coreiryn y chorp jannoo ny slatyn towshan reihyssagh. Ta ny craishteyderyn briwnyssit er bun ny linnaghyn stiuree shen er bun roie. Foddee ceaghlaghyn ardjynagh as rere y vargey ve ayn, croghey er beoynyn roie y lhing, ny jantee ny ny custameyryn.
Roish shoh, va'd ny towshanyn shirree da craishteyderyn na 35"-23.5"-35" (90-60-90 cm), towshanyn lhiassit Marilyn Monroe. Ta towshanyn ny craishteyderyn fassan y laa jiu ny s'niessey da cummey reiht yn AMA, agh ta fir jeu – goaill stiagh y craishteyder Afghaanagh Zohre Esmaeli – foast 35"-23.5"-35" er towshan. Ansherbee, ayns unnidyn fassan ennagh, smoo miandagh y mooadys 00 na'n mooadys 0.
Ta cummey thanney ny craishteyderyn er ve cremmit son jelliu ny cassey caslys kirpey caillinyn as cur çhingyssyn ee roish. Ren reagheyderyn taishbynys fassan ayns Madrid ayns Mean Fouyir 2006 jiooldey craishteyderyn va coontit myr fo-hrimmidagh liorish fwirran lheeys va ry-laue. Ayns Toshiaght Arree 2007 hooar y craishteyder Ooraguayagh Luisel Ramos baase voish crampyssyn cree voish mee-veeaghey. Va'n çhuyr eck, Eliana Ramos, ny craishteyder foast, as hooar ee baase jeeragh lurg taishbynys roievollagh shiartanse dy veeghyn roish shen. Car lhing shey mee, v'ad mastey tree craishteyder hooar baase rere y vee-veeaghey. She Ana Carolina Reston va'n dreih elley . Ayns 2015, va leigh currit ayns bree 'sy Rank chur y shirreydys ayn fogrey magh slaynt ny craishteyderyn liorish lhee roish taishbynyssyn fassan. Ta'n leigh shen gra dy lhisagh jallooyn reaghit ayns earishlioaryn ve soilshit.
Craishtey earishlioar.
Ta'n craishtey fassan goaill stiagh craishtey eaddeeyn ayns earishlioaryn chammah. 'Sy Çhapaan, shimmey sorçh dy chraishteyder earishlioar fassan t'ayn. She craishteyderyn ta ry-gheddyn dy mennick ayns earishlioaryn fassan as ta craishtey da ny h-earishlioaryn shen ny lomarcan ny . Er y laue elley, ta craishteyderyn straiddey, ny , nyn graishteyderyn amateyragh ta craishtey dy paart-emshiragh son earishlioaryn fassan ayns bishaghey rish nyn obbyr scoill ny rish nyn giartagyn. Neugollrish craishteyderyn keirdey, t'eh er smooinaghtyn dy vel craishteyderyn straiddey gollrish y dooinney cadjin rere caslys as cha nel ad ry-akin er ny roievollee. Chammah's shen, cha nel conaantyn liehlagh rish earishlioaryn fassan ec craishteyderyn straiddey. My vel craishteyder straiddey feer ennymoil, foddee ad çheet dy ve nyn graishteyderyn liehlagh. Ta ram jallooagyn fassan as kiaulleyderyn 'sy Çhapaan toshiaghey nyn goorse bea myr craishteyderyn straiddey, goaill stiagh Kaela Kimura as Kyary Pamyu Pamyu.
Craishtey follanid.
Ta'n craishtey follanid jeeraghey er taishbyney kirp layntoil, hionney. Dy mennick ta possanyn muskylyn shickyr ec craishteyderyn follanid. Ta trimmid y chraishteyder ny smoo er yn oyr dy vel trimmid ny muskylyn ny smoo na trimmid y vlennick; ansherbee, ta blennick kirpey ny sloo er yn oyr dy vel ny muskylyn feer hionnit as grainnit. Ta craishteyderyn follanid ymmydit ayns soilsheenys earishlioar; ayns cooishyn er lheh, she ynseyderyn follanid persoonagh t'ad. She roortee as spoyrteyryn ta craishteyderyn follanid elley as t'ad cohirrey myr deiney keirdey ayns cohirraghyn follanid as figoor. Ta shiartanse dy yantee gobbraghey ayns margaghyn mooarey lheid as ayns York Noa, Lunnin as 'sy Ghermaan as jantee chraishtee follanid oc. Ga dy vel margey mooar son ny craishteyderyn shoh, ta'n chooid smoo jeh ny jantee shoh gobbraghey myr fo-yantagh ta cur craishteyderyn er oaie ta geddyn nyn jeet stiagh myr craishteyderyn traghtee. Ta earishlioaryn ayn ta jeeraghey ayns troa y chraishtee follanid ny ayns troa yn ollanid as y claynt.
Craishtey drualtagh.
Ta'n craishtey drualtagh jeeraghey er y cheintyssaght as, rere shen, cha nel ny shirreydyssyn leayr; dy cadjin, t'ad bunnit er chooilley chraishteyder er lheh. Foddee craishteyderyn drualtagh ve jeh moaadys ny cummey erbee. Ren studeyrys voish 2014 ren scrutaghey skeealyn craishteyderyn drualtagh prioseil dy vel y craishteyder drualtagh meanagh 1.68 m (5' 6") er yrjid, 54kg (119 lb( er trimmid as 0.73 (corrillagh bouin-lhesh).
Cha nel stundayrt çhynskylagh ayn son craishtey drualtagh as t'eh anchasley voish çheer gys çheer. Son y chooid smoo, ta craishteyderyn drualtagh craishtey ayns feaillereyn, earishlioaryn fer, lheid as "Playboy", craishtey bikini, craishtey fo-eaddagh ben, craishtey feddish, feeshanyn kiaull, as obbyr vrash ayns scannaneyn. Ansherbee, ta craishteyderyn ard-ghooagh garraghey stiagh 'sy chraishtey prentit traghtee as t'ad ry-akin ayns faghtyssyn eaddagh-snaue, bikini as fo-eaddagh ben.
T'eh er smooinaghtyn dy nee ayns Sostyn ta bun y vargey son y chraishtey drualtagh tra ren "The Sun" cur Page 3 er bun ayns 1969, meer 'sy phabyr-naight oc va taishbyney jallooyn glieemianagh craishteyderyn "Penthouse" as "Playboy". Voish 1970, va ny craishteyderyn taishbynit gyn baare-eaddeeyn. Ayns ny 1980yn, cohirreyderyn "The Sun" goll ny yei as ren ad croo nyn meeryn Page 3 hene. Haink craishteyderyn drualtagh gys y chione toshee marish craishteyderyn lheid as Samantha Fox. Myr eiyrtys er shen, ta margey mooar 'sy vargey drualtagh 'sy Reeriaght Unnaneysit as shimmey jantys craishtee drualtagh t'ayn jiu.
Cha row yn craishtey drualtagh noa-emshyragh currit er bun agh ayns ny 1990yn. Car y lhing shen, va'n çhynskyl fassan cur craishteyderyn thanney marish shillaghyn begnagh firryn er oaie. Ren shen faagail baarney 'sy çhynskyl. Ren craishteyderyn fassan eigsoylagh va coontit dy ve ro-hraghtee ny ro-chruillagh tarmestey rish stundayrtyn y çhynskyl as ren ad geddyn bollagh elley. Ten craishteyderyn lheid as Victoria Silvstedt faagail y çhynskyl fassan as hoshee ad craishtey da earishlioaryn fer. Ayns ny jeihaghtyn roish shen, va shassoo son "Playboy" ny cooish son coayl jantyssyn as screeuyn-drommey. She claghyn va "Playboy" ren shiaulley coorseyn bea Victoria Silvstedt, Pamela Anderson, as Anna Nicole Smith. Haink er Pamela Anderson ve cha ennymoil voish "Playboy" as v'ee jargal paartyn y gheddyn er "Home Improvement" as "Baywatch" myr eiyrtys.
