Ayns ny 1990yn meanagh, va straih earishlioar fer lheid as "Maxim", "FHM", as "Stuff" currit er bun. Ec y traa cheddin, ren earishlioaryn elley goaill stiagh "Slitz" ass y Toolynn (roish shoh, she earishlioar chiaull v'eh) aa-chowraghey ad hene myr earishlioaryn fer. Roish yn eddyr-voggyl, va ny h-earishlioaryn shen feer chadjin mastey fir ayns nyn jeigeyryn as nyn feedyn leah er yn oyr dy vel ad coontit ny smoo blastallagh na ny haink rieau. Lesh aase y vargey drualtagh, hie yn fassan magh ass faagailee as haink ny kyrloghederyn Brasseelagh stiagh. Haink er y vargey drualtagh, va jeant seose son y chooid smoo jeh craishteyderyn fassan traghtee as craishteyderyn prentit traghtee, dy ve ny haanrey lesh hene er oyr ennoilid v'echey. Ansherbee, feeu ayns margaghyn mooarey lheid as y Reeriaght Unnanneysit, cha nel craishteyderyn drualtagh lhiettalit rish un jantys ny lomarcan er yn oyr nagh vel ad jargal shassoo dy argidoil er nyn ging hene marish un jantys. V'eh, as ta foast, cadjin dy liooar dy vel craishteyderyn drualtagh goaill ayrn ayns quaaltyssyn "paag-as-insh" fo nyn sooreeyn marish fir ard-ghooagh. Ta imraaghys y skibbagh lhiabbee currit roish liorish nyn leggadyn roie ny nyn aa-leggadyn. Haink er craishteyderyn drualtagh, lheid as Jordan t'er enney jiu myr Katie Price, dy ve nyn enmyn çhaghlagh er yn oyr dy row craishteyderyn Page 3 cha cadjin ayns ny pabyryn-naight baghtagh. Rere 2004, ren craishteyderyn Page 3 jinjagh cosney eddyr £30,000 as £40,000, raad va craishteyderyn nagh row er Page 3, rere 2011, cosney eddyr £10,000 as £20,000. Ayns ny 2000yn leah, hie craishteyderyn drualtagh, as craishteyderyn drualtagh yeearree, magh er claareeyn çhellveeish rieughid lheid as "Big Brother" son ard-ghoo y gheddyn. Ren shiartanse jeh aa-chommee "Big Brother" coorseyn craishtee drualtagh rahoil magh ass nyn 15 minnid jeh'n ard-ghoo oc. Agh, haink er y vargey drualtagh dy ve ro-haieit as hie ram earishlioaryn fer fo, goaill stiagh "Arena", "Stuff" a s"FHM" ayns ny Steatyn Unnaneysit. Car y lhing shen, haink er ram craishteyderyn drualtagh dy ve nyn markee jysk, goaill stiagh Kellie Acreman as Lauren Pope son cur rish nyn jeet stiagh. Ayns quaaltys 2012, dooyrt Keeley Hazell nagh nee y rooishtid y bollagh share son rah y gheddyn as dy row "yn aigh eck ve mastey yn 1% jeh deiney ren geddyn rah."
Craishtey an-ghraagh.
Neughollrish ny craishtaghyn elley, ta'n craishtey an-ghraagh çheet er sorçh jeh'n chraishtey raad ta jeeraghey yn chraishteyder nyn eaddeeyn y ghoaill jeh son greinney keintyssagh y jeeagheyder y hayrn magh. Dy mennick, ta'n craishteyder jannoo jallooyn ayns straih raad ta ny chied jallooyn taishbyney yn craishteyder marish eaddeeyn as, ayns oardagh, ta'n craishteyder roostey dys y jalloo jerrinagh raad ta'n craishteyder gyn eaddagh erbee. Dy mennick, ta'n straih shen goll rish straih phornograafagh raad ta'n craishteyder jannoo laue chooilleeney ny commyssey marish dooinney ny deiney elley. Chammah's shen, ta ny jallooyn shen goll rish scannaneyn pornograafagh raad ta'n skeeal cloiet er y scaailan. S'goan y craishteyder an-ghraagh nagh vel gobbraghey 'sy çhynskyl pornograafagh chammah, goaill magh adsyn ta jannoo yn craishtey shen dy amateyragh er-linney.
Craishtey feddish.
Ta craishteyderyn feddish craishtey eaddeeyn feddish ny greieyn ta ceaghley nyn girp ayns aght feddishagh ny ayns soiaghyn feddishagh. Ta ram craishteyderyn feddish taishbyney ny ta enmyssit fassan feddish, modyn eaddeeyn ta coontit barbagh as brasnagh as ta kiaddit son freggyrt, kynn, ny mian lajer toghtagh y hayrn magh. Ta ny h-eaddeeyn shen goaill stiagh cullee farkee fassanit dys coamree lheid as eilley kirpey as cullee fansee far-skeeal sheanse.
Foddee craishteyderyn feddish goaill stiagh bondiaght, ceaghley kirpey, fotografeeaght feddish as fotografeeagh ghrualtagh andooghyssagh chammah as coamree fansee keintyssagh (.i. cullee voidjyn, cullee voandyr, a.r.e.). Foddee craishteyderyn feddish craishtey son fotografeeaght as frastyl er cooishyn as gienseyn BDSM.
Shimmey aghteyr pornograafagh as craishteyder drualtagh ta gobbraghey chammah myr craishteyderyn feddish.
Craishtey caghlaaee.
Ta'n craishtey caghlaaee çheet er banglane jeh'n çhynskyl craishtee ta goaill stiagh craishteyderyn nagh vel covial rish ard-smooinaghtyn yn aalid. Dy mennick, ta craishteyderyn caghlaaee gobbraghey ayns cooillyn er lheh marish mod persoonagh ta shassoo son fo-chultooryn er lheh, lheid as y fo-chultoor gothagh, steampunk, as feddishaght. Foddee craishteyder caghlaaee ve crackan-jallooit, broddit, ny ceaghlit, ny ve marish folt fo-chultooragh lheid as ve baarit, daahit marish daa neu-najooragh, ny jeant myr mohawk. Foddee craishtey caghlaaee ve marish eaddeeyn ny dyn.
Hooar y craishtey caghlaaee coodaghey cadjin 'syn ym-ysseraght ayns ny 2000yn as ny 2010yn, trooid crooaght as cadjinaghey ynnydyn-eggey craishtee chaghlaaee, gollrish GodsGirls as SuicideGirls. Ta ynnydyn-eggey craishtee chaghlaaee cur nyn graishteyderyn er oaie marish nyn bersoonidyn chammah as marish nyn shillaghyn as nyn gurrymyn.
Craishtey moyllagh.
Ta craishteyderyn moyllagh failt son aggyrtys ceaueyder ry hoi gientyn, shirveish, cowrey, ny sheiltynys y chur er oaie liorish eddyr-obbraghey marish ceaueyderyn cummyssagh. Ta'n chooid smoo jeh craishteyderyn moyllagh tayrnagh as aalin er tuarystal fishigoil. T'ad kiarail fysseree mychione y ghientyn ny yn çhirveish as jannoo ad tayrnagh da ny ceaueyderyn. Ga dy vel foddeeaght yn eddyr-obbraghey giare, ta'n craishteyder moyllagh livrey taghyrtyn ta aahoilshaghey yn gientyn ny yn çhirveish t'ad shassoo son. Ta'n cummey shen jeh'n vargeeaght roshtyn ny sloo ceaueyderyn rere costys ny ta'n soilsheenys tradishoonagh (lheid as stoo prentit, radio, ny çhellveeish); ansherbee, ta tastid y cheaueyder er y chowrey, gientyn, shirveish, ny colught gleashit ny smoo liorish yn taghyrt bio shen.
Foddee faghtyssyn margeeys ta goaill ymmyd jeh craishteyderyn moyllagh taghyrtyn ayns shappyn, ynnydyn shappal, taishbynyssyn traghtee, taghyrtyn moyllagh er lheh, clubyn, ny ayns buill magh fo'n aer. Foddee craishteyderyn moyllagh ve ymmydit myr cuirreyderyn çhellveeish son quaaltyssyn y yannoo marish deiney ard-ghooagh ec aundyryn scannane, taghyrtyn spoyrt, as reddyn elley.
Craishtey ellyn.
Ta craishteyderyn ellyn shassoo son ellyneyr reayrtagh erbee myr ayrn jeh'n obbraghey crootagh. DY mennick, she deiney keirdey ad craishteyderyn ellyn ta kiarail imraa ny ardsmooinaght da obbyr ellyn ta goaill stiagh caslys deiney. Ny sorçhyn ellyn ta goll er chroo liorish craishteyderyn ellyn, t'ad goaill stiagh tayrn figgyr, peintal figgyr, jallooderys, as fotografeeaght, agh foddee mean erbee ve ymmydit. Ta craishteyderyn failt son y chooid smoo da brastyllyn ellyn ny liorish possanyn neuformoil jeh ellyneyryn oayllagh ta çheet ry-cheilley dy rheynn magh costys y chraishteyder.
Craishtey Instagram.
Haink er craishteyderyn Instagram dy ve feer ennoil liorish ymmyd lheeadagh yn ym-ysseraght heshoil. Ta ny craishteyderyn shen feddyn rah myr eiyrtys er earroo ny h-eiyrtyssee ta oc er Instagram as ardanyn ym-ysseraght elley. Cha nel ad unnane as ny craishteyderyn bunnit, lheid as Cara Delevingne as Gigi Hadid, ta goaill ymmyd jeh Instagram son nyn goorseyn craishtee tradishoonagh y chur er oaie, ga dy vel craishteyderyn ennagh, lheid as y craishteyder Playboy Lindsey Pelas, goaill toshiaght nyn goorseyn craishtee dy tradishoonagh as garraghey dys Instagram ny yei. Ta craishteyderyn elley goaill ymmyd jeh Instagram son nyn goorseyn y lhiassaghey, lheid as Rosie Roff ren obbraghey myr craishteyder fassan roish my row ee feddynit magh trooid Instagram as ren feddyn obbyr myr caillin croa 'sy doarneyraght Americaanagh. Ayns cooishyn ennagh, ta Instagram kiarail ardan da craishteyderyn neu-screeuit tayrn arrey ass jantyssyn as scrialtee schlei. Hie yn craishteyder Americaanagh Matthew Noszka stiagh 'sy cheird erreish da ve feddynit er Instagram liorish Wilhelmina Models.

Rooishteyder:
Ta rooishteyder ny daunseyr andooghyssagh çheet er dooinney ta jannoo roostey ayns aght boiree ayns laaragh da deiney aasit lheid as clubyn rooishtee. Keayrtyn, foddee rooishteyder ve failt son cloie ec giense fir nyr cooish caillagh ny ec taghyrt preevaadjagh elley.
Ta cummaghyn noa-emshyragh jeh'n roostey leodaghey yn eddyr-obbraghey eddyr ny rooishteyderyn as ny kionneyderyn as t'eh injillaghey scansh y woirey 'sy chloie. Cha nel dagh rooishteyder goaill jerrey lesh y cloie eck ny echey marish rooishtid slane, agh ta'n slane rooishtid ry-akin dy mennick raad t'eh lowit. Ta mestey stiagh y phoull craidoil er arraghey bree yn chloie roish dreagh ny smoo skibbylt as jarroo neugollrish yn aght moal craidoil. Ta'n chooid smoo jeh rooishteyderyn gobbraghey ayns clubyn rooishtee. Ta "daunseyr thie" gobbraghey son club ny kiartys dellal er lheh raad ta "ard-ghaunseyr" cloie marish e ard-ennym hene as jannoo turryssyn harrish ny clubyn jannoo tuarystalyn. Dy mennick, cha nee failleyderyn y chlub ny h-eunysseyryn (daunseyryn) shen agh coonreyderyn seyrey.

Donald Trump:
She politickeyr, persoonid ym-ysseraght, as delleyder eh Donald John Trump (ruggit er 14 Mean Souree 1946). She Trump va'n 45oo Eaghtyrane er ny Steatyn Unnaneysit eddyr 2017 as 2021.

Joe Biden:
She politickeyr Americaanagh eh Joseph Robinette Biden Jr. (ruggit er 20 Sauin 1942). She Biden y 46oo Eaghtyrane er ny Steatyn Unnaneysit as eh reiht da'n oik ayns 2021. She oltey jeh'n Phartee Deynlagh as she eshyn va'n 47oo Lhiass-eaghtyrane fo Barack Obama voish 2009 derrey 2017. Hass eh chammah son Delaware ayns Shannad ny Steatyn Unnaneysit eddyr 1973 as 2009.

Woody Harrelson:
She aghteyr as screeudeyr cloie Americaanagh eh Woodrow Tracy Harrelson (ruggit er 23 Jerrey Souree 1961). T'eh er gheddyn ram accolaidyn harrish y choorse echey, goaill stiagh Aundyr Primetime Emmy as daa Aundyr y Screen Actors Guild, chammah as enmyssaghtyn son tree Aundyr Academy as kiare Aundyr Golden Globe.
Haink ard-ghoo er Harrelson da'n chied cheayrt myr y fer lhionney Woody Boyd er sitcom NBC "Cheers" (1985–1993), raad ren eh cosney Aundyr Primetime Emmy son yn Aghteyr Co-hassooagh Share ayns Straih Aittys mastey queig enmyssaghtyn. Hie eh er gheddyn tree enmyssaght Aundyr Academy: yn Aghteyr Share son "The People vs. Larry Flynt" (1996), as yn Aghteyr Co-hassooagh Share son "The Messenger" (2009) as "Three Billboards Outside Ebbing, Missouri" (2017). Hooar Harrelson enmyssaght son yn Aghteyr Toshee Share ayns Straih Drama son e phaart myr Marty Hart 'sy straih sheeal chaglit kimmeeys "True Detective" (2014).

Will Smith:
She aghteyr, arraneyder crank-chiaull, as gienteyder Americaanagh eh Willard Carroll Smith II (ruggit er 25 Mean Fouyir 1968). 
Hooar Smith enney da'n chied cheayrt tra v'eh cloie 'sy phossan kiaullee DJ Jazzy Jeff & The Fresh Prince marish DJ Jazzy Jeff. Ren ad skeaylley magh queig albym seyrlann as ny singylyn "Parents Just Don't Understand", "A Nightmare on My Street", "Summertime", "Ring My Bell", as "Boom! Shake the Room" voish 1984 derrey 1994. Ren eh skeaylley magh lesh hene ny h-albymyn "Big Willie Style" (1997), "Willennium" (1999), "Born to Reign" (2002), as "Lost and Found" (2005), raad va singylyn "Gettin' Jiggy wit It" as "Wild Wild West" goit stiagh.
Hooar Smith ny smoo enney tra ren eh cloie eh hene-chaslys far-skeealagh 'sy sitcom "The Fresh Prince of Bel-Air" (1990–1996). Lurg shen, ren eh cloie 'sy scannane jantys "Bad Boys" (1995), as ny scannaneyn eiyrtyssagh echey "Bad Boys II" (2003) as "Bad Boys for Life" (2020), as ny scannaneyn aittys far-skeeal sheanse "Men in Black" (1997), "Men in Black II" (2002), as "Men in Black 3" (2012). Lurg ren eh cloie ayns ny scannaneyn creau "Independence Day" (1996) as "Enemy of the State" (1998), ren eh cloie Muhammad Ali ayns "Ali" (2001). Lurg shen, ren eh cloie ayns ram scannaneyn rahoil, goaill stiagh "I, Robot" (2004), "Shark Tale" (2004), "Hitch" (2005), "Hancock" (2008), as "Seven Pounds" (2008). Hooar eh enmyssaght Aundyr Academy son "The Pursuit of Happyness" (2006), as hooar eh rah traghtee son "I Am Legend" (2007).
Hooar Smith aawoalley theayagh lurg ren eh bwoalley as yllaghey ec y hebbeyder Chris Rock car sharmanys Aundyryn Academy 2022 lurg ren Rock spotçh va çheet er ben heshee Smith, Jada Pinkett Smith. Lurg shen, ren Smith irree magh as yn Academy as v'eh meelowit frastyl er cruinnaghtyn yn Academy, goaill stiagh ny Oscars, feie jeih bleeaney.

Elliot Page:
She aghteyr as gienteyder Canadagh eh Elliot Page (roish nish Ellen Page; ruggit er 21 Toshiaght Arree 1987).. T'eh er chosney shiartanse d'accolaidyn eigsoylagh, goaill stiagh enmyssaght Oscar, daa enmyssaghtyn son Aundyryn BAFTA as Emmy, as Aundyr Satellite.
Hooar Page enney da'n chied cheayrt son e phaart 'sy chiartys dellal çhellveeish "Pit Pony" (1997–2000) as e phaartyn aafilleydagh ayns "Trailer Park Boys" (2002) as "ReGenesis" (2004). Hooar eh ard-voylley son e phaart myr Juno MacGuff 'sy scannane Juno liorish Jason Reitman. Ta Page er chloie ayns ram scannaneyn elley, goaill stiagh "The Tracey Fragments" (2007), "Whip It" (2009), "Super" (2010), "Inception" (2010), as "Tallulah" (2016). T'eh er chloie Kitty Pryde 'sy straih scannane "X-Men" ' (2006) as ' (2014). Chammah as shen, ren eh gientyn as cloie ayns y scannane "Freeheld" (2015) as ren eh e hoshiaght stiuree marish y scannane "There's Something in the Water" (2019). 
Haink Page magh ayns Nollick 2020 myr fer tessen-cheintyssagh as ayns Mayrnt 2021 she eshyn va'n chied fer tessen-cheintyssagh foshlit va taishbynit er coodagh yn earishlioar "Time".

Bella Hadid:
She craishteyder Americaanagh ee Isabella Khair Hadid (ruggit er 9 Jerre Fouyir 1996). T'ee ny share er enney fo'n ennym Bella Hadid. Ayns 2016, v'ee reiht myr "Craishteyder y Vlein" liorish lught keirdey son Models.com. Harrish kiare bleeaney, va Hadid ry-akin shiaght keayrt as feed er coodee eddyrashoonagh yn earishlioar "Vogue".
Va Hadid ruggit ayns Washington, D.C. as v'ee troggit ayns Santa Barbara, California, as hoshee yn coorse craishtee eck tra v'ee shey jeg bleeaney d'eash. Haink urree dy ve fo-screeuit marish IMG Models ayns Luanistyn 2014 as ren ee e chied huarystal ayns Shiaghtin Fassan York Noa y vee ny yei. Ayns 2017, ren Hadid brishey yn recortys son yn earroo smoo jeh tuarystalyn er coodee "Vogue" ayns un vlein tra v'ee currit er coodee eddyrashoonagh yn earishlioar 'sy Çheen, 'sy Spaainey, 'sy Vrasseel, 'syn Austrail as 'syn Araab.

Keke Palmer:
She aghteyr, arraneyder, as persoonid çhellveeish Americaanagh ee Lauren Keyana "Keke" Palmer (ruggit er 26 Luanistyn 1993). T'ee mie er enney son cloie paartyn ayns gientynyn drama aittys as t'ee er chosney Aundyr Primetime Emmy, queig Aundyryn NAACP Image, as enmyssaghtyn son aundyr Daytime Emmy as aundyr y Screen Actors Guild. V'ee goit stiagh er rolley ny deiney smoo cummaghtagh liorish yn earishlioar "Time" ayns 2019.
Ren ee y chied chloie ayns "" (2004). Ny s'snmey, ren ee tuarystal 'sy scannane çhellveeish "The Wool Cap" (2004) as lurg shen ren ee cloie 'sy scannane drama "Akeelah and the Bee" (2006). Hie ee er oaie myr aghteyr paithçey lesh paartyn ayns "Madea's Family Reunion" (2006), "Jump In!" (2007), "The Longshots" (2008) as "Shrink" (2009). Ren ee cur magh e chied albym seyrlann, "So Uncool", ayns 2007.
Kianglaghyn magh.
]

Rose McGowan:
She aghteyr as immeeaghtagh Americaanagh ee Rósa Arianna "Rose" McGowan (ruggit er 5 Mean Fouyir 1973). Lurg e chied chloie ayns paart beg 'sy scannane aittys "Encino Man" (1992), hooar McGowan enney ny s'lhea son e cloie 'sy scannane aittys doo "The Doom Generation" (1995). Va'n chied phaart mooar eck 'sy scannane atçhim "Scream" (1996) as ny yei shen va'n ard-phaart cloiet eck ayns ny scannaneyn "Going All the Way" (1997), "Devil in the Flesh" (1998) as "Jawbreaker" (1999).
Car ny 2000yn, haink enney er McGowan son e paart myr Paige Matthews 'sy straih drama neughooghyssagh "Charmed" (2001–2006) liorish the WB. Hie ee er oaie cloie 'sy scannane "Grindhouse" (2007) liorish Robert Rodriguez as Quentin Tarantino. Ren ee cloie 'sy straih chreau jantys "Chosen" (2014), as chur ee magh e chied albym seyrlann, "Planet 9", ayns 2018.
Ayns 2017, ren yn earishlioar "Time" cur McGowan er enney myr nane jeh ny "Silence Breakers" ("Brisheyderyn y Tostid"), "Dooinney y Vlein" yn earishlioar, son loayrt er ard mychione solley keintyssagh as tranlaase keintyssagh, kyndagh rish cooishyn oltooan keintyssagh Harvey Weinstein as y ghleashaght Me Too. Ta'n lioar chooinaghtyn "Brave" skeaylt magh eck as t'ee er chloie ayns straih scannane feanishagh kiare-phaartagh "Citizen Rose", y daa jeu ayns 2018.

Jennifer Zamparelli:
She ben aitt as çhebbeyder çhellveeish Yernagh ee Jennifer Zamparelli (née Maguire) (ruggit er 9 Averil 1980). T'ee mie er enney son y currym er y chlaare çhellveeish "Republic of Telly", raad v'ee nane jeh ny h-ard-screeudeyryn, as myr co-hebbeyder y chlaare moghree "Breakfast Republic" marish Bernard O'Shea as Keith Walsh er RTÉ 2fm. Chammah's shen, t'ee cloie 'sy sitcom "Bridget & Eamon".

Nicola Coughlan:
She aghteyr Yernagh ee Nicola Mary Coughlan (ruggit ayns Galliu er 9 Jerrey Geuree 1987). T'ee mie er enney son e paartyn myr Clare Devlin 'sy sitcom "Derry Girls" liorish Channel 4 (2018–2022) as myr Penelope Featherington 'sy drama shennearish "Bridgerton" (2020–) liorish Netflix.

Mindy Kaling:
She aghteyr, ben aitt, screeudeyr, gienteyder, as stiureyder Americaanagh ee Vera Mindy Chokalingam (ruggit er 24 Mean Souree 1979), ta goll er enney 'sy cheird myr Mindy Kaling. Hooar ee enney da'n chied cheayrt myr Kelly Kapoor 'sy sitcom "The Office" (2005–2013) liorish NBC, raad v'ee ny screeudeyr, ard-ghienteyder, as stiureyder chammah. V'ee enmyssit son Aundyr Primetime Emmy son Screeudeys Ard-yindyssagh ayns Straih Aittys as queig keayrt son Straih Aittys Ard-yindyssagh.
Hooar Kaling arrey ny s'lhea son crooaaght, gientyn as cloie 'sy straih aittys "The Mindy Project" (2012-2017) liorish Fox. Ren ee croo y sitcom NBC "Champions" (2018), as ren ee cloie ayns queig episode jeh'n vynstraih "Four Weddings and a Funeral" (2019) liorish Hulu, y straih drama aittys "Never Have I Ever" (2020–jiu) liorish Netflix, as y straih drama aittys "The Sex Lives of College Girls" (2021–jiu) liorish HBO Max.
Ta coorse scannaneaght Kaling goaill stiagh obbyr goo ayns "Despicable Me" (2010), "Wreck-It Ralph" (2012), as "Inside Out" (2015). Va paartyn eck chammah ayns scannaneyn lheid as "The 40-Year-Old Virgin" (2005), "No Strings Attached" (2011), "The Five-Year Engagement" (2012), "The Night Before" (2015), "A Wrinkle in Time" as "Ocean's 8" (y daa jeu ayns 2018), as "Late Night" (2019), y fer jerrinagh v'er ny screeu as ny ghientyn eck. Ren e lioaryn cooinaghtyn, "Is Everyone Hanging Out Without Me? (And Other Concerns)" (2011) as "Why Not Me?" (2015), roshtyn rolley "The New York Times" Best Seller.

Sydney Sweeney:
She aghteyr Americaanagh ee Sydney Bernice Sweeney (ruggit er 12 Mean Fouyir 1997). Haink enney mooar urree 'sy straih "Everything Sucks!" (2018) son e paart myr Emaline as ren ee cloie Eden 'sy straih "The Handmaid's Tale" (2018) liorish Hulu as Alice 'sy vyn-straih HBO "Sharp Objects" (2018). T'ee er chloie Cassie Howard 'sy straih drama jeigeyr "Euphoria" liorish HBO voish 2019 as Olivia Mossbacher ayns "The White Lotus" voish 2021. Ayns scannaneyn, va paart eck 'sy drama aittys "Once Upon a Time in Hollywood" (2019) liorish Quentin Tarantino raad ren ee cloie Dianne "Snake" Lake, oltey jeh Lught-thie Manson.

Olivia Rodrigo:
She screeudeyr arrane, arraneyder, as aghteyr Americaanagh ee Olivia Isabel Rodrigo (ruggit er 20 Toshiaght Arree 2003). Hooar ee enney ayns ny 2010yn jeianagh marish e paartyn ayns ny claareyn "Bizaardvark" as "" liorish Disney. Lurg fo-screeu marish Geffen as Interscope Records ayns 2020, ren Rodrigo skeaylley magh e chied hingyl "Drivers License", ren brishey shiartanse dy recortyssyn as haink er dy ve fer jeh ny h-arraneyn creck erskyn insh jeh'n vlein 2021. Lurg y tingyl shen, ren ee skeaylley magh ny singylyn "Deja Vu" as "Good 4 U".
Ren e chied albym seyrlann, "Sour" (2021), roshtyn baare ny kaartyn er feie ny cruinney as hooar eh ard-voyllaghyn lheeadagh. Er yn oyr shen, ren ee cosney Aundyr Brit as tree aundyr Grammy, goaill stiagh yn Ellyneyr Noa Share. Ren "Time" enmyssey Rodrigo myr Eunysseyr yn Vlein ayns 2021 as ren "Billboard" enmyssey ish myr Ben y Vlein ayns 2022.

The Handmaid's Tale (straih hellveeish):
She straih hellveeish yee-launyssagh Americaanagh eh "The Handmaid's Tale" va crooit ec Bruce Miller as bunnit er y lioar fo'n ennym cheddin voish 1985 liorish yn ughtar Canadagh Margaret Atwood. Va'n straih currit ayns oardagh liorish y çhirveish stroo Hulu myr oardagh jeeragh-gys-straih va jeant ass 10 episode. Hoshee gientyn y straih ayns 2016 jeianagh. Ta'n skeeal goaill stiagh jee-launys lurg aa-chaggey theayagh ayns ny Steatyn Unnaneysit raad ta sheshaght ooilley smaghtagh smaghtaghey mraane troaragh, ta enmyssit "inneenyn meyl" ny "Handmaiden", as cur ad ayns slaueaght torraghys.
Hie yn chied tree episode jeh'n straih magh er skeaylley er 26 Averil 2017; hie ny shiaght episode elley magh er skeaylley dagh Jecrean ny yei. Ayns Jerrey Souree 2019, hie yn straih er ny aanoaghey son y chiarroo straih, as hie yn chied episode jeh magh er 27 Averil 2021. Ayns Mean Fouyir 2019, v'eh fogrit magh dy row Hulu as MGM lhiassaghey straih eiyrtyssagh vees bunnit er noaskeeal Atwood voish 2019, "The Testaments". Va'n straih aanoit ayns Mee ny Nollick 2020 roish y chied episode jeh'n chiarroo straih.
Chossyn y chied straih jeh "The Handmaid's Tale" hoght aundyr Emmy ass 13 enmyssaght, goaill stiagh aundyr son y Straih Drama Ard-yindyssagh. T'eh ny chied chlaare liorish Hulu ren cosney aundyr mooar chammah's y chied straih er shirveish stroo ren cosney Emmy son Straihyn Ard-yindyssagh. Chammah's shen, ren eh cosney Aundyr Golden Globe son y Straih Hellveeish Share - Drama. Ren Elisabeth Moss cosney aundyr Primetime Emmy son yn Aghteyr Bwoirrin Toshee Share ayns Straih Drama as aundyr Golden Globe son yn Aghteyr Bwoirrin Share ayns Straih Drama Hellveeish.

Gene Hackman:
She aa-aghteyr as noaskeealagh Americaanagh eh Eugene Allen Hackman (ruggit er 30 Jerrey Geuree 1930). Harrish e choorse ren goll feie ny smoo na shey jeihaght, ta Hackman er chosney daa Aundyr Academy, kiare aundyr Golden Globe, un aundyr y Screen Actors Guild, daa BAFTA, as un Silver Bear.
V'eh enmyssit son queig Aundyr Academy as ren eh cosney yn Aghteyr Share son e phaart myr Jimmy "Popeye" Doyle 'sy scannane creau ard-voyllit "The French Connection" (1971) as yn Aghteyr Co-hassooagh Share myr "Little" Bill Daggett 'sy scannane Heear "Unforgiven" (1992) liorish Clint Eastwood. Haink ny h-enmyssaghtyn elley son yn Aghteyr Co-hassooagh Share marish ny scannaneyn "Bonnie and Clyde" (1967) as "I Never Sang for My Father" (1970), marish y nah enmyssaght son yn Aghteyr Share son "Mississippi Burning" (1988).
Ta scannaneyn Hackman elley goaill stiagh "The Poseidon Adventure" (1972), "The Conversation" (1974), "French Connection II" (1975), "A Bridge Too Far" (1977), "Superman" (1978) as ny scannaneyn eiyrtyssagh echey "Superman II" (1980) as "" (1987), "Hoosiers" (1986), "No Way Out" (1987), "Bat*21" (1988), "The Firm" (1993), "The Quick and the Dead" (1995), " Get Shorty" (1995), "Crimson Tide" (1995), "Enemy of the State" (1998), "Antz" (1998), "The Replacements" (2000), "Behind Enemy Lines" (2001), "The Royal Tenenbaums" (2001), "Runaway Jury" (2003) as "Welcome to Mooseport" (2004) — e scannane jerrinagh roish my dirree eh magh ass y scannaneaght.

Sinnamon Love:
She aa-aghteyr pornograafagh, stiureyder pornograafagh, as craishteyder an-ghraagh Americaanagh ee Sinnamon Love (ruggit myr Kamilah Rouse er 31 Nollick 1973).
Ren ee stiurey yn scannane "My Black Ass 4", ghow enmyssaghtyn ec Aundyryn AVN ayns 2001 son y Feeshan Kynneeagh Share as y Reayrtys (Feeshan) Keintys Thoanney Share. Va Love lhiggit stiagh ayns Halley Foaynoo Urban X ayns 2009, as ayns Halley Foaynoo AVN ayns 2011.

Vittoria Risi:
She aghteyr pornograafagh, persoonid çhellveeish, as craishteyder an-ghraagh Iddaalagh ee Tiziana Zennaro (ruggit 'sy Veneesh er 3 Sauin 1978). T'ee ny share er enney fo'n ennym ardan eck, Vittoria Risi.
Bea as coorse.
Va Risi ruggit 'sy Veneesh 'syn Iddaal as hooar ee keim ass Colleish Ellynyn Ooasle y Veneesh. Hoshee ee gobbraghey myr jantagh cooid hallooin as myr peinteyr 'sy valley dooghyssagh eck. Hoshee ee gobbraghey 'sy çhynskyl pornograafagh ayns 2008 tra ren ee cloie 'sy scannane "Barcelona in Love".
Ayns Mean Soureee 2008, ghow Risi ayrn 'sy chlaare "Ciak, si giri!" liorish Sky Italia. Ayns 2010 ren ee cloie Moana Pozzi ayns "I Segreti di Moana" va stiurit ec Riccardo Schicchi. 'Sy vlein cheddin, ren ee cochaslys deiney y pheintal "La Nuda" liorish Giorgione ayns taishbynys mychione yn ellyneyr ec Palazzo Grimani 'sy Veneesh. Ayns 2011, ghow Risi ayrn 'sy 54oo lhieggan jeh Biennale y Veneesh jeh'n Ellyn Co-emshyragh raad ren ee shassoo rooisht ayns taishbynys Gaetano Pesce, ayrn jeh'n "Waag Iddaalagh" v'er churmey liorish Vittorio Sgarbi.
Ta Risi er ve jannoo tuarystalyn ayns ram claareeyn çhellveeish goaill stiagh "Matrix", "Stracult", "Ciao Darwin", "Artù" as "Niente di personale".

Sally Rooney:
She ughtar as screeudeyr scannane Yernagh ee Sally Rooney (ruggit er 20 Toshiaght Arree 1991). T'ee er screeu tree noaskeeal: "Conversations with Friends" (2017), "Normal People" (2018), as "Beautiful World, Where Are You" (2021). Va "Normal People" aachummit myr straih hellveeish ayns 2020 liorish Hulu, RTÉ, Screen Ireland as y BBC. Te obbyr Rooney er gheddyn ard-voyllaghyn cremmeydagh as rah hraghtee as t'ee coontit mastey ny screeudeyryn milley-vleeanagh toshee.

Iliza Shlesinger:
She ben aitt, aghteyr, as cuirreyder çhellveeish Americaanagh ee Iliza Vie Shlesinger (ruggit er ). Ren ee cosney "Last Comic Standing" liorish NBC ayns 2008 as hie ee er oaie cuirrey yn claare sooree "Excused" as yn claare gamman "Separation Anxiety" liorish TBS.
Ayns 2017, ren Shlesinger cuirrey e claare cowag oie hene, "Truth & Iliza", er Freeform. Derrey 2020, t'ee er skeaylley magh queig claare aittys er lheh er Netflix. Hie e claare aittys sketçh "The Iliza Shlesinger Sketch Show" magh er ny chied skeaylley er Netflix ayns Averil 2020.

Perrie Edwards:
She arraneyder Goaldagh as oltey jeh'n ven-phossan Little Mix ee Perrie Louise Edwards (ruggit er 10 Jerrey Souree 1993). Rere 2021, ta'n possan er chreck ny smoo na 65 millioon recortyssyn er feie ny cruinney.

T.S. I Love You:
She scannane pornograafagh Americaanagh voish y vlein 2017 eh T.S. I Love You. Va'n scannane gientit ec y cholught Gender X as rheynnit ec Zero Tolerance Entertainment. She Jim Powers ren stiurey yn scannane as she Chanel Santini, Casey Kisses, Alexa Scout, Isabella Sorrenti, Chad Diamond, Kai Bailey, Gabriel Dalessandro, as Jonah Marx ny h-aghteyryn ayn.

Feddan stainnagh:
She geay-ghreie maidjey kiaullee shey-howllit eh yn feddan stainnagh, ny yn feddan millish keayrtyn. She sorçh dy feddan millish t'eh, ta 'sy rang cheddin as y feddan Americaanagh Dooghyssagh as geay-ghreieyn maidjey elley ta roshtyn ny slatyn towshe shen. Ta kiangley mooar eddyr y feddan stainnagh as kiaull hradishoonagh Yernagh, kiaull hradishoonagh Vanninagh as kiaull Cheltiagh.

Cronk ny Merriu:
She tholtanyn doon gob coose marish jeeg choadee as carnaneyn caggee eh Cronk ny Merriu. Soit ayns Purt Grainney ayns Skeerey Stondane, ta'n boayl ard kiarail reayrtyssyn mie er y choose mygeayrt. Va'n laaragh crooit begnagh 2,000 bleeaney er dy henney. Ny s'anmey, ren ny Loghlynee troggal thie kiare-uillinagh as she fer jeh buill arree va troggit oc.
Foddee keayrtyn y chur er shiartanse jeh ny buill arree, ayns Stondane er lheh, liorish y chassan slystagh. Ta carnaneyn caggee ec dagh fer er y çheu thallooin oc as ta toghailtyn er haishbyney dy ren deiney goll stiagh trooid giatyn lajer.
Ta'n sampleyr jeh ny doonyn shen ayns Cronk ny Merriu er ymmyd myr bun jeh'n aahroggalys ta ry-akin ayns Thie Vanannan.

Brooke Scullion:
She arraneyder Yernagh ee Brooke Scullion (ruggit er 31 Mayrnt 1999) ta cloie keayrtyn fo'n ennym ardan Brooke. She co-hirreyder er straih 9 jeh "The Voice UK" v'ee raad haink ee gys y jerrey 'sy trass ynnyd. Ren ee cloie er son Nerin ayns Co-hirrey Arrane Eurovision ayns 2022 marish yn arrane "That's Rich".
Bea aeg.
Va Scullion ruggit er 31 Mayrnt 1999 ayns Baile Eachaidh, Coontae Ghoirrey, Nerin Hwoaie. T'ee er goaill ayrn ayns ny h-ellynyn cloie as 'sy spoyrt voish yn aegid eck. 'Sy vean-scoill, ren ee cloie ayns shiartanse dy ghientynyn kiaullee, goaill stiagh "Fame", "Mamma Mia!", as "Sister Act". Ren ee cloie chammah er fwirran camógaíocht Bhulf Tón CLG.
She studeyr drama ec Ollooscoill Ulley, Magee v'ee.

Clint Eastwood:
She aghteyr, stiureyder scannane as gienteyder Americaanagh eh Clinton Eastwood Jr. (ruggit er 31 Boaldyn 1930). Lurg rah 'sy straih hellveeish Heear "Rawhide", haink rah eddyrashoonagh er son e phaart myr y "Man with No Name" ("Y Fer gyn Ennym") 'sy ""Treeskeealag Dollars"" jeh scannaneyn Heear Spaghetti liorish Sergio Leone car ny 1960yn meanagh as myr y meoir shee noi-eniagh Harry Callahan 'sy queig scannane "Dirty Harry" car ny 1970yn as ny 1980yn. Ren ny paartyn shen, mastey paartyn elley, jannoo Eastwood myr jalloo cultooragh yn irrynaght. Chammah as e choorse 'sy scannaneaght, va Eastwood reiht ayns 1986 feie daa vlein myr meoir Carmel-by-the-Sea, California.
She enmyssagh son Aundyr Academy son yn Aghteyr Share t'eh, as ta Eastwood er chosney aundyryn Academy son y Stiureyder Share as y Scannane Share son e scannane Heear "Unforgiven" (1992) as e scannane drama spoyrt "Million Dollar Baby" (2004). Haink e rah hraghtee smoo marish y scannane aittys contoyrtys "Every Which Way but Loose" (1978) as y scannane jantys aittys eiyrtyssagh echey "Any Which Way You Can" (1980). Ta scannaneyn mooarey Eastwood elley goaill stiagh ny scannaneyn Heear "Hang 'Em High" (1968) as "Pale Rider" (1985), y scannane jantys caggee "Where Eagles Dare" (1968), y scannane pryssoon "Escape from Alcatraz" (1979), y scannane caggee "Heartbreak Ridge" (1986), y scannane jantys "In the Line of Fire" (1993), as y scannane drama romansagh "The Bridges of Madison County" (1995). Ta obbraghyn elley ny s'noa goaill stiagh "Gran Torino" (2008), "The Mule" (2018), as "Cry Macho" (2021). Voish 1967, ta colught Eastwood Malpaso Productions er ghientyn dagh fer, goaill magh kiare, jeh ny scannaneyn Americaanagh echey.
Chammah as ny scannaneyn ren eh stiurey as cloie, ta Eastwood er stiurey scannaneyn nagh row eh cloie ayndaue, goaill stiagh y scannane drama folliaght "Mystic River" (2003), y scannane caggee "Letters from Iwo Jima" (2006), y scannane drama "Changeling" (2008), as y scannane drama spoyrt beashnyssagh "Invictus" (2009).

Anya Ivy:
She aa-aghteyr pornograafagh as craishteyder an-ghraagh Americaanagh ee Anya Ivy (ruggit er ). V'ee ruggit ayns Atlanta, y Çhorshey. Hoshee ee gobbraghey 'sy çhynskyl pornograafagh ayns 2014 as dirree ee ass ayns 2020.

Jesse Eisenberg:
She aghteyr, stiureyder, gienteyder, as screeudeyr Americaanagh eh Jesse Adam Eisenberg (ruggit er 5 Jerrey Fouyir 1983). Ren eh e chied chloie er y çhellveeish lesh y straih drama aittys giare-heillagh "Get Real" (1999–2000). Lurg e chied ard-phaart 'sy scannane drama aittys "Roger Dodger" (2002), ren eh cloie 'sy scannane drama "The Emperor's Club" (2002), y scannane creauagh shicklaagagh "The Village" (2004), y scannane drama aittys "The Squid and the Whale" (2005), as y scannane drama "The Education of Charlie Banks" (2007). Ta enney mie er chammah son cloie bunneyder Facebook Mark Zuckerberg 'sy scannane "The Social Network" (2010) liorish David Fincher raad ren eh cosney enmyssaghtyn son yn Aghteyr Share voish ny h-aundyryn BAFTA Golden Globe, as Oscar.
Ayns 2009, va paartyn mooarey ec Eisenberg 'sy scannane drama aittys "Adventureland" as 'sy scannane atçhim aittys "Zombieland". Ta e scannaneyn elley goaill stiagh "To Rome with Love" (2012) as "Café Society" (2016), as ny scannaneyn roosteyrys "Now You See Me" (2013) as "Now You See Me 2" (2016) hie er eiyrtyssagh er. Ren eh kiarail goo Blu ayns ny scannaneyn bioghit "Rio" (2011) as "Rio 2" (2014). Ayns 2016, ren eh cloie Lex Luthor 'sy scannane far-feniagh "".

Jeff Bezos:
She greeseyder dellalys, shellooder ym-ysseraght, baiheyder argid, jeshaghteyr co-earrooder, as shiaulteyr rollageagh traghtee Americaanagh eh Jeffrey Preston Bezos ("né" Jorgensen; ruggit er 12 Jerrey Geuree 1964). She bunneyder, ard-chaairliagh as aa-eaghtyrane as AOS er Amazon t'eh. Lesh feeuid ghlen er mysh US$140 billoon ayns Boaldyn 2022, she Bezos y nah dooinney s'berçhee er y theihll as she eshyn va'n dooinney s'berçhee eddyr 2017 as 2021 rere Bloomberg as "Forbes".

Emily Ratajkowski:
She craishteyder, aghteyr, as ughtar Americaanagh ee Emily O'Hara Ratajkowski (ruggit er 7 Mean Souree 1991). V'ee ruggit lesh paarantyn Americaanagh ayns Lunnin as v'ee troggit ayns San Diego. Hoshee ee cloie myr paitçhey ayns San Diego roish my dooar ee paart aa-filleydagh er y straih "iCarly" (2009-2010) liorish Nickelodeon. Va'n chied huarystal eck myr craishteyder er coodagh Mayrnt 2012 jeh'n earishlioar an-ghraagh "treats!". Ren y tuarystal shen lhiggey rish e tuarystalyn ayns daa eeshan kiaullee: "Blurred Lines" liorish Robin Thicke as "Love Somebody" liorish Maroon 5.
She yn chied ard-phaart 'sy scannaneaght v'eck ny myr co-lhiabbagh karacteyr Ben Affleck 'sy scannane "Gone Girl" (2014). Ta'n obbyr scannaneaght eck goaill stiagh ny scannaneyn "Entourage" (2015), "We Are Your Friends" (2015), "I Feel Pretty" (2018) as "Welcome Home" (2018), chammah as y vyn-sraih "The Spoils Before Dying" (2015) as y straih skeealyn çhaglit "Easy" (2016). Ren ee tuarystalyn ayns Sports Illustrated Swimsuit Issue ayns 2014 as 2015 as ren ee e chied hooyl roievollagh keirdey myr craishteyder son Marc Jacobs ec Shiaghtin Fassan York Noa ayns 2015. T'ee er hooyl er ny roievollee ayns Shiaghtyn Fassan Phaarys son Miu Miu as Shiaghtyn Fassan Milano son Bottega Veneta, Dolce & Gabbana, as Versace. 

Bea neuhallooinagh:
Ta bea neuhallooinagh ny bea quaagh çheet er bea sheinyssagh foddee vel ayn magh ass y Dowan as nagh vel bun thallooinagh echey. Foddee dy vees cummey prokaryoteagh oc er y chooid sloo, dys cummaghyn inçhynagh ny, foddee, tastagh, as ad jargal ard-veenidyn y hroggal, goaill stiagh ard-veenidyn foddey ny smoo lhiassit na'n dooieaght. Ta cormid Drake smooinaghtyn mychione beays y vea tastagh 'sy tuinney. Ta sheanse y vea neuhallooinagh ayns dagh cummey goll er enney myr bea-oaylleeaght rollageagh, magher yl-cheirdagh ta ronsaghey ny coryn oyragh as ny taghyrtyn tuittymagh ta lhiggey da irree magh, rheynn magh, as gientyn bea 'sy tuinney.

Interstellar (scannane):
She scannane far-skeealaght heanse ard-skeealagh eh Interstellar t'er ny screeu, stiurey as gientyn liorish Christopher Nolan. T'ad Matthew McConaughey, Anne Hathaway, Jessica Chastain, Bill Irwin, Ellen Burstyn, Matt Damon, as Michael Caine ny h-ard-chloiederyn 'sy scannane. Ta'n scannane bunnit ayns traa jee-launyssagh ry-heet raad ta'n dooieaght streppey as geearree tannaghtyn bio. Ta'n scannane lhiantyn possan shiaulteyryn rollageagh ta jurnaaghey trooid towl beishteig faggys da Sarn as shirrey balley noa da'n dooieaght.
Ren ny braaraghyn Christopher as Jonathan Nolan screeu y cloie-screeu as eh bunnit er script ren Jonathan lhiassaghey sheear ayns 2007. Ren Christopher gientyn "Interstellar" marish e ven heshee, Emma Thomas, liorish nyn golught gientyn Syncopy, as marish Lynda Obst liorish Lynda Obst Productions. Va Kip Thorne, fishigagh sheiltynagh ass Caltech as lauryssagh Nobel ayns Fishig ayns 2017, ny ard-ghienteyder. Ren Thorne cloie myr coyrlagh sheansagh as ren eh screeu lioar kianglagh, "The Science of Interstellar". Ren Paramount Pictures, Warner Bros. Pictures, as Legendary Pictures cur argid rish y scannane. Hoshee yn fotograafaght ayns 2013 jeianagh ayns Alberta, yn Eeslynn as Los Angeles.
Hie "Interstellar" magh er skeaylley da'n chied cheayrt er 26 Jerrey Fouyir 2014 ayns Los Angeles, California. Hooar y scannane baghteyryssyn jarrooagh son y chloie-screeu, y stiurey, ny cooishyn, ny cluicyn reayrtagh, y chiaull, y cloie, as gloyr-vian. Chammah's shen, t'eh er gheddyn ard-voylley ass y phobble sheansagh son y chiartys sheansagh as soilshaghey magh yn ishig rollageagh sheiltynagh. Va "Interstellar" enmyssit son queig aundyr ec Aundyryn Academy, as ren eh cosney yn Aundyr son ny Cluicyn Reayrtagh Share, mastey ram accolaidyn elley.

Dua Lipa:
She arraneyder as screeudeyr arrane Sostynagh ee Dua Lipa (ruggit er ). Ta reamys eddyr-ghooagh eck as t
ee mie er enney son e sheean disco-pop-chiaull. Ta Lipa er gheddyn ram accolaidyn, goaill stiagh shey Aundyr Brit, tree Aundyr Grammy, tree Aundyr Kiaullee iHeartRadio, shey Aundyr Global, 11 Aundyr MTV, Aundyr Kiaull Americaanagh, tree Aundyr Crootagh YouTube, as daa recortys "Guinness World Records".
Erreish j'ee gobbraghey myr craishteyder, ren ee fo-screeu marish Warner Bros. Records ayns 2014 as ren ee skeaylley magh e chied albym fo'n ennym eck ayns 2017. Hie yn albym er roshtyn gys y trass ynnyd er Kaart Albymyn y RU as she bun hoght singylyn v'eh, goaill stiagh "Be the One", "IDGAF", as y singyl hie stiagh 'sy chied ynnyd 'syn RU "New Rules". 
Haink e singyl "One Kiss" (marish Calvin Harris) voish 2018 stiagh 'sy chied ynnyd 'sy Reeriaght Unnaneysit. Ayns 2019, ren ee cosney Aundyr Grammy son yn Ellyneyr Noa Share chammah's Aundyr Grammy son y Recortyssey Daunse Share son e co-obbraghey Silk City "Electricity". Ny s'anmey 'sy vlein cheddin, ren Lipa skeaylley magh "Don't Start Now" myr yn ard-hingyl voish e nah albym seyrlann, "Future Nostalgia" (2020). Haink eh stiagh 'sy nah ynnyd 'sy Reeriaght Unnaneysit as ayns ny Steatyn Unnaneysit. 

Sam Neill:
She aghteyr, stiureyder, gienteyder, as screeudeyr scannane Seelynnagh Noa as Yernagh Hwoaie eh Nigel John Dermot "Sam" Neill (ruggit er 14 Mean Fouyir 1947).
Va Neill ruggit 'syn Omee, Nerin Hwoaie, agh ren eshyn as e lught thie arraghey dys Christchurch, y Teelynn Noa, ayns 1954. Haink enney mooar er marish e huarystal 'sy scannane 1977 "Sleeping Dogs", as hie eh er oaie cloie ard-phaartyn ayns ny scannaneyn "My Brilliant Career" (1979), "", "Possession" (y daa jeu ayns 1981), "A Cry in the Dark" (1988), "Dead Calm" (1989), "The Hunt For Red October" (1990), as "The Piano" (1993). Haink ard-enney eddyr-ashoonagh er myr Dr. Alan Grant ayns "Jurassic Park" (1993), paart aafilleydagh echey reesht ayns "Jurassic Park III" (2001) as "Jurassic World Dominion" (2022).
Çheumooie jeh ny scannaneyn, ta Neill er chloie ayns ram straihyn çhellveeish, goaill stiagh "Reilly, Ace of Spies" (1983), "The Simpsons" (1994), "Merlin" (1998), "The Tudors" (2007), "Crusoe" (2008–2010), "Happy Town" (2010), "Alcatraz" (2012), "Peaky Blinders" (2013–2014), as "Rick and Morty" (2019). Chammah's shen, t'eh er hebbey as insh ram scannaneyn feanishagh.

Americaanee:
She seyraanee as ashoonee ny Steatyn Unnaneysit ad Americaanee (). 

Keeill Choobragh:
Ta Keeill Choobragh (, ) ny valley ayns Dùn Phris as y Ghallioo, Nalbin.

Ashley Park (aghteyr):
She aghteyr, daunseyr, as arraneyder Americaanagh ee Ashley Jini Park (ruggit er 6 Mean Souree 1991). Ta enney share urree son cloie Mindy Chen ayns "Emily in Paris" liorish Netflix as cloie Gretchen Wieners 'sy chloie kiaullee 2018l "Mean Girls". Ta e paartyn theateragh goaill stiagh Tuptim ayns aavioghey 2015 "The King and I" er Broadway, as MwE ayns "KPOP" ayns Ars Nova.

Tank:
She carbyd caggee eillit eh yn tank. T'eh kiaddit myr bun-wappin commyssagh ayns caggey thallooin 'sy linney toshee. Ta tankyn kiaddit as geill currit da niart gunn lajer, eilley lajer, as so-ghleashaght vagher caggee vie ta kiarit liorish queeyllyn oltit as jeshaght chummaghtagh; son y choois smoo, ta'n ard-arm soit ayns tooran. T'ad ry-akin dy mennick ayns forseyn thallooin 'sy 20oo as 21d eashyn as t'ad coontit myr ayrn ogheragh jeh'n chaggey co-armit.

Rita Ora:
She arraneyder, screeudeyr arrane, as aghteyr Goaldagh ee Rita Sahatçiu Ora (ruggit myr Rita Sahatçiu; 26 Sauin 1990). Haink enney mooar urree ayns Toshiaght Arree 2012 tra ren ee cloie er "Hot Right Now", singyl liorish DJ Fresh ren roshtyn y chied ynnyd ayns ny kaartyn 'sy Reeriaght Unnaneysit. Hie e chied albym seyrlann, "Ora", va skeaylt magh ayns Luanistyn 2012, er roshtyn y chied ynnyd 'sy Reeraighat Unnaneysit. Ghow yn albym stiagh ny singylyn "R.I.P." as "How We Do (Party)". She Ora yn ellyneyr lesh y chooid smoo jeh singylyn ren roshtyn y chied ynnyd 'syn RU ayns 2012 lesh tree singyl 'syn ynnyd shen.
Hie y nah albym seyrlann eck, "Phoenix", magh er skeaylley ayns Sauin 2018. Va'n singyl toshee jeh'n albym, "Your Song", coontit mastey ny jeih baare-hingylyn 'syn RU, as hie ny singylyn eiyrtyssagh, "Anywhere" as "Let You Love Me", stiagh mastey ny queig baare-hingylyn.

Carolina Abril:
She aa-aghteyr pornograafagh, craishteyder an-ghraagh as stroodeyr Spaainagh ee Carolina Abril (ruggit ayns Santa Cruz de Tenerife, y Spaainey er 19 Jerrey Souree 1992).
Beashnys.
Hoshee Abril gobbraghey 'sy çhynskyl pornograafagh ayns 2012 tra v'ee 18 bleeaney d'eash tra hie ee dys e chied reihys cloie. Ren ee gobbraghey marish y jeantagh scannane pornograafagh Spaainagh Torbe er e ghuillag ynnyd-eggey, Putalocura.
Ayns 2013, ren ee cosney yn taishbynys an-ghraagh er-linney "La Mansión de Nacho", va stiurit ec yn aghteyr as stiureyder Nacho Vidal.
Voish y toshiaght eck 'sy phornograafaght, t'ee er obbraghey marish ny seyrlannyn Evil Angel, Girlfriends Films, Brazzers, Lust Films as Private, mastey seyrlannyn elley.
Ayns 2014 as 2016, hooar ee daa enmyssaght ec Aundyryn XBIZ son Ellyneyr Bwoirrin Joarree yn Vlein.
Ayns Mee ny Nollick 2015, va Abril soilshit er coodagh yn earishlioar "Interviú".
Bentyn rish e keintyssaght, ayns ram quaaltyssyn ta Abril cur sheese urree hene myr dooinney ooilley-cheintyssagh.
Ayns Mee Houney 2020, ren ee fogrey magh trooid yn ardan Twitch, as trooid e moggylyn sheshoil ny s'anmey, dy row ee girree ass y çhynskyl ny scannaneyn pornograafagh. Derrey yn fogrey shen, va Abril er chloie ayns ny smoo na 150 scannane myr aghteyr.
Ta e scannaneyn goaill stiagh "5 Young Lawyers Take Cock", "Big Dick Brother", "Hard Academy", "Nacho's Fucking Warehouse", "Party House", "Rocco Siffredi Hard Academy 2" as "Stepmom Lessons 5".

John Aylward:
She aghteyr Americaanagh va John Aylward (7 Sauin 1946 – 16 Boaldyn 2022). Va enney share er son cloie aa-chaairliagh y Ving Ashoonagh Gheynlagh, Barry Goodwin, er y straih hellveeish "The West Wing" liorish NBC as er son cloie Dr. Donald Anspaugh er y straih hellveeish "ER" liorish NBC. Ren eh chiarail y goo son Dr. Arne Magnusson ayns "Half-Life 2: Episode Two".

Brian Cox (aghteyr):
She aghteyr Albinagh eh Brian Denis Cox (ruggit er 1 Mean Souree 1946). T'eh er obbraghey marish y Royal Shakespeare Company as y Royal National Theatre dy lheeadagh raad hooar eh enney son e huarystal myr Ree Lear. Ren eh cloie paartyn co-hassooagh ayns "Rob Roy" (1995) as "Braveheart" (1995) liorish Mel Gibson. She Cox va'n chied aghteyr ren cloie Hannibal Lecter er y scaailan ayns "Manhunter" (1986). She cosneyder daa Aundyr Olivier Award, un Aundyr Primetime Emmy as un Aundyr Golden Globe, as t'eh er ve enmyssit son BAFTA as tree aundyr y Screen Actors Guild. Ayns 2003, v'eh pointit dys Oardagh yn Impiraght Ghoaldagh myr Anneyder.
Mastey ny scannaneyn echey, t'ad goaill stiagh "The Long Kiss Goodnight" (1996), "The Boxer" (1997), "Rushmore" (1998), "Super Troopers" (2001), "The Bourne Identity" (2002), "The Ring" (2002), "25th Hour" (2002), "Troy" (2004), "The Bourne Supremacy" (2004), "Red Eye" (2005), "Zodiac" (2007), "The Escapist" (2008), "Fantastic Mr. Fox" (2009), "RED" (2010), "Rise of the Planet of the Apes" (2011), "Coriolanus" (2011), "RED 2" (2013), "Churchill" (2017), as "Remember Me" (2019). Ta Cox er chloie er yn ardan ayns Lunnin chammah as t'eh er chosney daa Aundyr Olivier son yn Aghteyr Share son e chloiaghyn ayns "Titus Andronicus" lesh y Royal Shakespeare Company as "Rat in the Skull" lesh y Royal Court Theatre, as hooar eh daa enmyssaght son Aundyryn Olivier ayns "Misalliance" as "Fashion".

Brian Cox:
Foddee dy vel Brian Cox çheet er:

Ashley Graham (craishteyder):
She craishteyder as çhebbeyder çhellveeish Americaanagh ee Ashley Graham (ruggit er 30 Jerrey Fouyir 1987). Lurg bleeantyn craishtey, hooar Graham e toshiaght er coodagh Chur Magh Eaddagh-snaue "Sports Illustrated" ayns 2016. Blein ny yei, ren Graham soilshaghey e chied lioar, "A New Model: What Confidence, Beauty, and Power Really Look Like", ta toyrt rish e sheealtaght 'sy ghleashaght yarrooid chirpey as ghoaill stiagh.

Skynn:
Ta skynn çheet er greie ny wappin as blod ny çheu giarree echey ta kianglt dy mennick rish laue ny cass. She fer jeh ny greieyn shinney t'er ymmyd ec y dooieaght. Va ny chied skynnaghyn ymmydit cha foddey sheear as 2.5 villioon bleeantyn er dy henney, myr ta ry-akin lesh greieyn Oldowan. Hoshiaght, v'ad jeant ass aamaid, craue, as clagh (lheid as clagh aile as creg glessagh), agh harrish ny h-eashyn, gollrish lhiassaghyn 'sy veaineraght as 'sy jantyssaght, ta skynnaghyn er ve jeant ass cobbyr, ooha, yiarn, staillin, pashagh, as çhitaanium. Ta'n chooid smoo jeh skynnaghyn noa-emshiragh goaill stiagh bluid anchorragh ny fillit; ta jesheenaghtyn as modyn bluid anchasley rish y cheilley rere y jeantee as y çheer vunneydagh.

Gollage:
Ayns skynneydys as cooid aarlee, ta gollage çheet er greie, ta jeant ass meain jiu son y chooid smoo, raad tan'n laue eck goaill jerrey ayns kione ta banglaneaghey ayns shiartanse d'eeacklyn as ad cam keayrtyn. Foddee yn ymmydeyr bee y leeaney son eh y yiarrey marish skynn ny eh y chummal seose as y chur rish y veeall.

Spein:
Ta spein (keayrtyn spain) çheet er greie ta goaill stiagh meilley aaghowin veg, ooh-chrooagh ny runtit, ec kione laue. She sorçh dy skynneydys t'ee myr ayrn jeh soiaghey buird er lheh. T'ad goll er ymmyd son bee y arraghey dys y veeal. Chammah's shen, t'ad goll er ymmyd son bee y aarlaghey liorish towshan, mestey, as tilgey mynayrnyn as son bee y hendeil. Ta speinyn noa-emshiragh jeant ass meain, aamaid, porslyn ny plastagh. Shimmey sorçh dy spein t'ayn as ad jeant ass stoo eigsoylagh son ram ymmydyn as bee.

Cathal Coughlan (kiaulleyder):
She arraneyder as screeudeyr arrane Yernagh va Cathal Coughlan (1960/1961 – 18 Boaldyn 2022). Va enney share er myr toshiagh y vann Microdisney, va crooit marish Sean O'Hagan ayns 1980. Ren nyn nah albym, "The Clock Comes Down the Stairs", roshtyn y chied ynnyd ayns Kaart Heyr y RU. Ren ad lhiassaghey lught eirtyssagh cultagh mastey graihderyn y chiaull heyr ayns Nerin as 'sy Reeriaght Unnaneysit roish my ren ad scarrey voish y cheilley ayns 1988.
Hie Coughlan er oaie myr toshiagh y vann ny s'creoi, The Fatima Mansions, ren feddyn rah ard-voyllagh lesh nyn guirraghyn kiaull as queig albym, agh ren ad scarrey voish y cheilley ayns 1995.
Ayns ny bleeantyn ny yei, ren Coughlan skeaylley magh stoo lesh hene as marish kiaulleyderyn gollrish O'Hagan, Jonathan Fell as Nick Allum. Hie e choorse lomarcan dys y vullagh echey ayns 2021 lesh yn albym "Song of Co-Aklan" hie magh tree vlein jeig lurg yn albym echey hie magh roish shen va enmyssit "Foburg" (2006).

Jodie Comer:
She aghteyr Sostynagh ee Jodie Marie Comer (ruggit er 11 Mayrnt 1993). T'ee er gheddyn ram accolaidyn goaill stiagh daa aundyr BAFTA as un Aundyr Primetime Emmy, chammah as enmyssaghtyn son daa Aundyr Golden Globe, daa Aundyr Critics Choice, as un Aundyr y Screen Actors Guild.
Va Comer ruggit as troggit ayns Lerphoyll, as hoshee yn coorse eck ayns episode jeh "The Royal Today" ayns 2008. Lurg tuarystalyn ayns shiartanse dy straihyn çhellveeish, hooar ee paart Chloe Gemell 'sy straih drama aittys "My Mad Fat Diary" (2013–2015) liorish E4, as Kate Parks 'sy straih drama "Doctor Foster" (2015–2017) liorish BBC One. Eddyr y daa straih, hooar Comer ard-voylley son e tuarystal myr Ivy Moxam 'sy vyn-straih drama "Thirteen" liorish BBC Three. Chammah as shen, ta e paartyyn goaill stiagh Ealisaid York 'sy vyn-straih hendeeagh "The White Princess" (2017) liorish Starz, as Sarah 'sy scannane çhellveeish "Help" (2021) liorish Channel 4.
Haink enney eddyr-ashoonagh j'ee son e paart myr Oksana Astankova / Villanelle 'sy straih chreauagh speeikearys "Killing Eve" liorish BBC America. Mastey ny h-obbragheyn scannaneaght ren ee, t'ad goaill stiagh Millie Rusk / Molotov Girl ayns "Free Guy" (2021), as Marguerite de Carrouges ayns "The Last Duel" (2021).

Elektra Rose:
She aa-aghteyr pornograafagh, craishteyder an-ghraagh as stroodeyr Americaanagh ee Elektra Rose (ruggit ayns New Hampshire, ny Steatyn Unnaneysit er 11 Averil 1995).
Beashnys.
Va Rose ruggit as troggit ayns New Hampshire, ny Steatyn Unnaneysit. She daunseyr v'ee tra v'ee troggal seose. Dirree ee ass yn ard-scoill ayns 2013 as ren ee feie tammylt ghiare frastyl er colleish phobbyl. Hoshee Rose gobbraghey 'sy çhynskyl pornograafagh myr caillin web-cam as hoshee ee jannoo scannaneyn pornograafagh jarroo tra v'ee 19 bleeaney d'eash ayns 2014. Ta Rose er n'yannoo obbraghyn marish 3rd Degree, Mile High, Devil's Film, Combat Zone, Lethal Hardcore, Kick Ass Pictures, Zero Tolerance, New Sensations, as Juicy Entertainment. Chammah's shen, t'ee er obbraghey marish ny h-ynnydyn-eggey pornograafagh Mofos, Team Skeet, ATK Girlfriends, Naughty America, as Foot Fetish Daily.

Talulah Riley:
Talulah Jane Riley-Milburn (ruggit er 26 Mean Fouyir 1985), she aghteyr Sostynagh t'ee. T'ee er chloie ayns scannaneyn, goaill stiagh "Pride & Prejudice" (2005), "St Trinian's" (2007) as y scannane eiyrtyssagh echey "" (2009), "The Boat That Rocked" (2009), as "Inception" (2010). Ren Riley cloie Angela er y straih hellveeish far-skeealagh sheanse Heear "Westworld" (2016–2018) liorish HBO.

Matthew McConaughey:
She aghteyr Americaanagh eh Matthew David McConaughey (ruggit er 4 Sauin 1969). Va'n chied phaart mooar echey lesh cloie co-hassooagh 'sy scannane aittys "Dazed and Confused" (1993). Lurg shiartanse dy phaartyn co-hassooagh, va'n chied phaart echey myr yn aghteyr toshee 'sy drama leighoil "A Time to Kill" (1996). Hie e choorse er oaie lesh paartyn toshee 'sy scannane far-skeealaght sheanse "Contact" (1997), 'sy drama shendeeagh "Amistad" (1997), as 'sy scannane caggee "U-571" (2000).
Ayns ny 2000yn, haink enney er McConaughey myr eiyrtys er e phaartyn ayns scannaneyn aittys romansagh, lheid as "The Wedding Planner" (2001), "How to Lose a Guy in 10 Days" (2003), "Failure to Launch" (2006), "Fool's Gold" (2008), as "Ghosts of Girlfriends Past" (2009), raad v'eh bunnit myr cowrey keintyssagh. Erreish da barney daa vlein voish yn aghteyrys, hoshee McConaughey cloie ayns paartyn ny smoo dramadagh, goaill toshiaght lesh y drama leighoil "The Lincoln Lawyer" (2011). Hooar eh enney ny s'lheeadagh son e chloiaghyn myr rooishteyder ayns "Magic Mike" as myr scaipailtagh ayns "Mud".
Ren tuarystal McConaughey jeh Ron Woodroof, guilley baa lesh faaishnys-enn SGJF, 'sy scannane beashnyssagh "Dallas Buyers Club" (2013) cosney da ard-voylley lheeadagh as ram accolaidyn, goaill stiagh Aundyr Academy son yn Aghteyr Share]]. Hie eh er oaie lesh paart co-hassooagh ayns "The Wolf of Wall Street" (2013), as paart roltageagh myr Rust Cohle 'sy straih chimmeeys "True Detective" (2014) liorish HBO. Ren ny scannaneyn hie er eiyrtyssagh er geddyn da rah hraghtee as chremeydagh, goaill stiagh "Interstellar" (2014) as "The Gentlemen" (2019), chammah as obbyr ghoo ayns "Kubo and the Two Strings" (2016), as y straih scannane "Sing" (2016-2021).

Anne Hathaway:
She aghteyr Americaanagh ee Anne Jacqueline Hathaway (ruggit er 12 Sauin 1982). Ta enney mie urree as t'ee er chosney ram aundyryn as accolaidyn, goaill stiagh un Aundyr Academy, un Aundyr Golden Globe, as un Aundyr Primetime Emmy, as v'ee coontit mastey ny h-aghteyryn bwoirrin smoo eeckit ayns 2015.
Dirree Hathaway magh ass Ard-scoill Millburn ayns New Jersey raad ren ee cloie ayns shiartanse dy chloiaghyn. Myr jeigeyr, v'ee reiht son cloie 'sy straih hellveeish "Get Real" (1999–2000) as haink e chied ard-phaart 'sy scannane aittys "The Princess Diaries" (2001) liorish Disney. Erreish j'ee paartyn y chloie ayns straih scannaneyn lught thie neu-rahoil, ren Hathaway arraghey dys paartyn aasit lesh ny dramaghyn "Havoc" as "Brokeback Mountain" ayns 2005. She yn drama aittys "The Devil Wears Prada" (2006) va'n rah hraghtee smoo v'eck ec y traa shen. Ren ee cloie cleaynagh aa-slaanit lesh çhingys aignagh 'sy drama "Rachel Getting Married" (2008) raad hooar ee enmyssaght son Aundyr Academy son yn Aghteyr Bwoirrin Share.
Hie Hathaway er oaie cloie 'sy scannaneyn romansagh "Bride Wars" (2009), "Valentine's Day" (2010), as "Love & Other Drugs" (2010), as y scannane fansee "Alice in Wonderland" (2010). Ayns 2012, ren ee cloie Selina Kyle / Catwoman 'sy scannane "The Dark Knight Rises". 'Sy vlein cheddin, ren ee cloie Fantine, streebagh er raad y vaaish liorish çhingys y cleeau, 'sy drama romansagh kiaullee "Les Misérables", raad ren ee cosney Aundyr Academy son yn Aghteyr Bwoirrin Co-hassooagh Share. Lurg shen, ren ee cloie sheanseyr 'sy scannane far-skeealaght sheanse "Interstellar" (2014), shellooder colught fassan er-linney 'sy scannane aittys "The Intern" (2015), ben-chloieder voyrnagh 'sy scannane roosteyrys "Ocean's 8" (2018), kialgeyr 'sy scannane aittys "The Hustle" (2019), as Rebekah Neumann 'sy vyn-straih "WeCrashed" (2022).
Chammah as e paartyn 'sy scannaneaght, ta Hathaway er chosney Aundyr Primetime Emmy son e paart goo 'sy sitcom "The Simpsons", er ghoaill arraneyn son kiaull scannane, er chloie er yn ardan, as er chuirrey cruinnaghtyn.

Jessica Chastain:
She aghteyr as gienteyder scannane Americaanagh ee Jessica Michelle Chastain (ruggit er 24 Mayrnt 1977). Ta enney share urree son cloie ayns scannaneyn as cooishyn feminagh oc. T'ee er chosney ram accolaidyn, goaill stiagh Aundyr Academy as Aundyr Golden Globe. Ren yn earishlioar "Time" coontey ish mastey ny keead deiney smoo cummaghtagh 'sy theihll ayns 2012.
Va anaase vooar ec Chastain 'sy chloie tra v'ee foast aeg as ren ee e chied obbyr cheirdey er yn ardan ayns 1998 myr Juliet liorish William Shakespeare. Erreish j'ee jannoo studeyrys er y chloie ayns Scoill Juilliard, ren ee fo-screeu conaant marish y ghienteyder çhellveeish John Wells. Va paart cuirreydagh aa-filleydagh eck ayns shiartanse dy straihyn çhellveeish, goaill stiagh "". Chammah's shen, va paartyn theateragh ec ayns cloie Anton Chekhov "The Cherry Orchard" ayns 2004 as cloie doo-skeeal Oscar Wilde "Salome" ayns 2006.
Erreish j'ee e chied scannane y yannoo 'sy drama "Jolene" (2008), va rah vooar eck ayns 2011 lesh skeaylley magh shey scannane, goaill stiagh ny dramaghyn "Take Shelter" (2011) as "The Tree of Life" (2011). Hooar ee enmyssaghtyn son Aundyryn Academy son e paart 'sy drama shennearishagh "The Help" (2011) as myr bun-ronseyder CIA 'sy scannane creauagh "Zero Dark Thirty" (2012). V'ad ny scannaneyn smoo rahoil eck ny scannaneyn far-skeealaght sheanse "Interstellar" (2014) as "The Martian" (2015), as y scannane atçhim "It Chapter Two" (2019). Hie ee er oaie geddyn ard-voyllaghyn son e paartyn ayns ny dramaghyn "A Most Violent Year" (2014), "Miss Sloane" (2016), as "Molly's Game" (2017), as 'sy vyn-straih hellveeish "Scenes from a Marriage" (2021). Ren ee cosney Aundyr Academy son yn Aghteyr Bwoirrin Share tra ren ee cloie Tammy Faye 'sy scannane beashnyssagh "The Eyes of Tammy Faye" (2021) v'er ny ghientyn lioreeish.
She bunneyder y cholught gientyn Freckle Films t'ee. Va'n colught shen currit er bun son caghlaays 'sy scannaneaght y chur roish. She baiheyder argid 'sy chlub sockyr Angel City FC t'ee.

Michael Caine:
She aghteyr Sostynagh eh yn Reejerey Michael Caine CBE (ruggit myr Maurice Joseph Micklewhite er 14 Mayrnt 1933). T'eh goll er enney son e vlass voish Lunnin Yiass, as t'eh er chloie ayns ny smoo na 160 scannane harrish shiaght jeihaght. T'eh coontit mastey jallooagyn mooarey y scannaneaght Ghoaldagh. T'eh er chosney ram aundyryn eigsoylagh, goaill stiagh daa Aundyr Academy, Aundyr BAFTA, tree Aundyr Golden Globe, as Aundyr y Screen Actors Guild.
Dy mennick, t'eh cloie Lunninagh. Ren eh brishey trooid ayns ny 1960yn lesh paartyn roltagagh ayns scannaneyn Goaldagh lheid as "Zulu" (1964), "The Ipcress File" (1965), "Alfie" (1966), "The Italian Job" (1969), as "Battle of Britain" (1969). V'eh enmyssit son Aundyr Academy son "Alfie". Ren e phaartyn car ny 1970yn goaill stiagh "Get Carter" (1971), "The Last Valley" (1971), "Sleuth" (1972), "The Man Who Would Be King" (1975), "The Eagle Has Landed" (1976), "A Bridge Too Far" (1977), as "California Suite" (1978). Car ny 1980yn, hooar eh rah chremeydagh feer vooar lesh "Dressed to Kill" (1980), "Educating Rita" (1983), as "Hannah and Her Sisters" (1986) liorish Woody Allen raad hooar eh e chied Aundyr Academy son yn Aghteyr Co-hassooagh Share.
Ta enney mie er Caine foast son e chloiaghyn myr Ebenezer Scrooge ayns "The Muppet Christmas Carol" (1992), as son e phaartyn aitt ayns "Dirty Rotten Scoundrels" (1988), "Miss Congeniality" (2000), "Austin Powers in Goldmember" (2002), as "Secondhand Lions" (2003). Hooar eh e nah Aundyr Golden Globe son "Little Voice" (1998). Ayns 1999, chossyn eh e nah Aundyr Academy son yn Aghteyr Co-hassooagh Share son "The Cider House Rules". Ren eh goll er oaie cloie ayns dramaghyn ard-voyllagh lheid as "Quills" (2000), "The Quiet American" (2002), as y scannane drama jee-launyssagh "Children of Men" (2006) liorish Alfonso Cuaron. Ren Caine cloie Alfred Pennyworth 'sy Treeskeealag "The Dark Knight" (2005–2012) liorish Christopher Nolan. Ta scannaneyn Caine elley liorish Nolan goaill stiagh "The Prestige" (2006), "Inception" (2010), "Interstellar" (2014) as "Tenet" (2020). Chammah's shen, ren eh cloie 'sy scannane creauagh roosteyrys "Now You See Me" (2013), 'sy scannane aittys jantys "" (2014), 'sy drama Iddaalagh "Youth" (2015) as 'sy scannane kimmeeys "King of Thieves" (2018).

Ray Liotta:
She aghteyr as gienteyder Americaanagh va Raymond Allen Liotta (18 Nollick 1954 - 26 Boaldyn 2022). Va enney share er son cloie Shoeless Joe Jackson ayns "Field of Dreams" (1989), Henry Hill ayns "Goodfellas" (1990) as Tommy Vercetti 'sy ghamman-feeshan "" (2002).
Ren e phaartyn elley goaill stiagh Ray Sinclair ayns "Something Wild" (1986), raad ren eh geddyn Aundyr Golden Globe, chammah as cloie ayns "Unlawful Entry" (1992), "Cop Land" (1997), "Hannibal" (2001), "Blow" (2001), "John Q" (2002), "Identity" (2003), "Observe and Report" (2009), "Killing Them Softly" (2012), "The Place Beyond the Pines" (2012), as "Marriage Story" (2019), chammah as y straih drama "Shades of Blue" (2016–2018).

Giat (entreilys):
Ta giat çheet er poynt goll stiagh ny magh ass boayl ta cruinnit liorish boallaghyn, cleighee, ny faalyn. Ta'n fockle çheet as "ġeat" y Çhenn-Vaarle. Ren smooinaght yn ockle çheet er y vaarney 'sy voalley ny 'sy chleigh dy bunneydagh, ny er y vagher ny er y raad va goll dys ny trooid y vaarney as chan er y chreagh fendeilagh. Foddee giatyn stiurey çheet stiagh ny magh deiney ny beiyn, ny foddee ad ve jesheenagh ny lomarcan.
Foddee giat goaill stiagh pinn chlickee ta yrjit ny injillit, ny broojit ny tayrnit son foshley ny dooney yn yiat. Dy mennick, ta glish ymmydit orroo son shickyrys smoo. Foddee giatyn mooarey ve ymmydit ayns thie mooar, lheid as cashtal ny balley niartit.

Urvashi Rautela:
She aghteyr as craishteyder Injinagh ee Urvashi Rautela (ruggit er 25 Toshiaght Arree 1994). T'ee er chloie ayns scannaneyn Bollywood. Ren ee cosney Miss Diva Universe 2015 as ren ee shassoo son yn Injey ec y tostyl aalid Miss Universe 2015.
Ren ee cloie da'n chied cheayrt 'sy scannane "Singh Saab the Great" (2013) as ren ee e chied scannane Kannada lesh "Mr. Airavata" (2015). T'ee er chloie ayns ram scannaneyn elley, goaill stiagh "Sanam Re" (2016), "Great Grand Masti" (2016), "Hate Story 4" (2018) as "Pagalpanti" (2019).

Britt Robertson:
She aghteyr Americaanagh ee Brittany Leanna Robertson (ruggit er 18 Averil 1990). Ta enney mie urree son e paart ayns "The First Time" (2012), as t;ee er cloie ayns ny scannaneyn "Tomorrowland" (2015), "The Space Between Us" (2017), "A Dog's Purpose" (2017), as "I Still Believe" (2020).
Ren ee cloie Marnie Cooper 'sy reayrtys foshlee jeh'n scannane "Scream 4" (2011) liorish Wes Craven. Ta enney er Robertson chammah son cloie paartyn ayns straihyn çhellveeish lheid as "Life Unexpected" (2010–2011), "The Secret Circle" (2011–2012), "Under the Dome" (2013–2014), "Girlboss" (2017) as "For the People" (2018–2019).

Chelsea Cooley:
She aghteyr, arraneyder, craishteyder, as cosneyder tostyl aalid Americaanagh ee Chelsea Scott Cooley Altman (ruggit er 30 Jerrey Fouyir 1983). T'ee er co-streeu ayns ny tostylyn aalid Miss Teen USA, Miss USA as Miss Universe as ren ee cosney Miss USA ayns 2005.
Myr Miss USA, ren Cooley shassoo er son y Miss Universe Organization. V'ad Natalie Glebova (Miss Universe, ass y Chanadey) as Allie LaForce (Miss Teen USA, ass Ohio) ny shellooderyn enmys "shuyragh" ayns. Ren ee troggal $22.8 million son ronsaghey magh kanghyr keeagh as oohragh car e lhing myr Miss USA.

Çhellooishan:
Ta çhellooishan çheet er saase ta cochiangley çhiooneyder, taishbynys, as kiaulleyryn son jeeaghyn er, as clashtyn rish, scaalheanaghyn çhellveeish son y chooid smoo. Dy mennick, t'ad ymmydit myr taishbyner co-earrooder chammah. V'ad skeaylt magh ayns ny 1920yn ayns cummey obbrinagh, haink orroo dy ve feer chadjin myr gientyn kionnee lurg y Nah Chaggey Dowanagh ayns cummey lectraneagh marish çhaghnoaylleeaght çhoobyn scell caddoyd (CRT). Va daaghyn currit rish scaalheanaghyn çhellveeish lurg 1953 as ren eh cur rish foayr cadjin y çhellooishan as haink er aeragyn mooie dy ve feer chadjin ayns thieyn fo-valjagh. Haink er y çhellooishan dy ve ny haase taishbynee son mean recortyssit ayns ny 1970yn, lheid as Betamax, VHS as, ny s'anmey, JABEyn. V'eh goll er ymmyd myr taishbyner voish y chied ghlioon jeh co-earrooderyn thie as consoleyn gammanyn-feeshan lheid as yn Atari ayns ny 1980yn. Rish ny 2010yn, ren çhellooishanyn pannylyn rea ta goaill stiagh taishbyner crystal ushlagh (LCD) goaill yn ynnyd jeh ny shenn-çhellooishanyn CRT.

COVID-19:
Ta COVID-19, ny doghan veerys crooinagh 2019, çheet er gorley gowaltagh ta çheet magh ass y veerys SARS-CoV-2 (syndrome ennalagh feer-gheyre y veerys crooinagh 2). Va'n chied hampleyr recortyssit ayns Wuhan, y Çheen, ayns Mee ny Nollick 2019. Ren y doghan skeaylley harrish y theihll, cur rish pandemagh COVID-19.

Rolley baljaghtyn ayns Carolina Hwoaie:
She steat ayns ny Steatyn Unnaneysit Yiass eh Carolina Hwoaie. Rere y choontey-pobble ayns 2010, she Carolina Hwoaie y nuyoo steat smoo rere earroo yn phobble as 10,453,948 cummaltee. Ta Carolina Hwoaie goll er rheynn magh ayns 100 coontae as t'eh goaill stiagh 532 valjaght cochorpagh ta jeant seose ass caayryn, baljyn, ny baljyn beggey. Cha nel y tree enmys anchasley rish y cheilley 'sy leigh.
Baljaghtyn smoo.
Shoh heese rolley ny 20 baljaghtyn smoo ayns Carolina Hwoaie rere y choontey-pobble ayns 2020.

Chrishell Stause:
She aghteyr Americaanagh ee Terrina Chrishell Stause (ruggit er 21 Jerrey Souree 1981). Ta enney urree son e paart er y chlaare rieughid "Selling Sunset" er Netflix, chammah as aa-phaartyn çhellveeish myr Amanda Dillon er "All My Children" as Jordan Ridgeway er "Days of Our Lives".

Simon Pegg:
Simon John Pegg (né Beckingham; ruggit er 14 Toshiaght Arree 1970) she aghteyr, screeudeyr scanne, as fer aitt Sostynagh t'eh. Haink enney mie er 'sy Reeriaght Unnaneysit myr co-chrootagh y sitcom "Spaced" liorish Channel 4 hie er stiurey ec Edgar Wright. Hie eh er oaie co-screeu as cloie 'sy "treeskeealag Three Flavours Cornetto": "Shaun of the Dead" (2004), "Hot Fuzz" (2007), as "The World's End" (2013). Ren eshyn as Nick Frost co-screeu as cloie 'sy scannane far-skeealaght heanse "Paul" (2011).
Ta Pegg er chloie karacteyryn ayns "Doctor Who" (2005), "Star Trek" myr Montgomery "Scotty" Scott (2009–2016), as ' (2015). Ec y traa t'ayn, t'eh cloie Benji Dunn 'sy straih scannane (2006–jiu), as t'eh er chur e ghoo rish y scannane ' (2019). Ta enney mie er chammah son cloie ayn 'sy straih scannane "Ice Age" myr goo Buck ayns tree scannane, ' (2009), ' (2016) as "The Ice Age Adventures of Buck Wild" (2022).

Alexa Scout:
She aghteyr pornograafagh, craishteyder an-ghraagh, as caillin shamraig tessen-cheintyssagh Americaanagh ee Alexa Scout (ruggit ayns Los Angeles, California, er 3 Mean Souree 1997). Hoshee ee gobbraghey 'sy çhynskyl pornograafagh ayns 2015 tra v'ee hoght bleeaney jeig d'eash marish ny seyrlannyn Grooby Girls, Trans Angels, as Transsexual Angel. Voish shen, t'ee er obbraghey marish Evil Angel, Devil’s Film, Trans Angels as Trans Erotica. 

Al Pacino:
Alfredo James Pacino (ruggit er 25 Averil 1940), she aghteyr as jantagh scannane Americaanagh t'eh. Coontit myr fer jeh ny h-aghteyryn smoo cummaghtagh 'sy 20oo eash, t'eh er chosney ram accolaidyn, goaill stiagh Aundyr Academy, daa Aundyr Tony, as daa Aundyr Primetime Emmy.
She aghteyr aghtallagh as aa-schoillar yn HB Studio as yn Actors Studio t'eh, raad v'eh ynsit liorish Charlie Laughton as Lee Strasberg. Ren eh e chied scannane tra v'eh 29 bleeaney d'eash marish myn-phaart 'sy scannane "Me, Natalie" (1969). Hooar eh enney son e chied phaart toshee myr deyrsnagh heroin ayns "The Panic in Needle Park" (1971). Haink moylley as enney lheeadagh tra ren eh cloie Michael Corleone ayns "The Godfather" (1972) liorish Francis Ford Coppola. Ren eh aa-chloie yn paart shen ayns "The Godfather Part II" (1974) as "The Godfather Part III" (1990). Hooar Pacino enmyssaght son Aundyr Academy son yn Aghteyr Co-hassooagh Shaare son e chied scannane 'sy straih shen. Chammah's shen, hooar eh enmyssaghtyn son Aundyr Academy son yn Aghteyr Share son "Serpico" (1973), "The Godfather Part II", "Dog Day Afternoon" (1975), as "...And Justice for All" (1979). Ren eh cosney yn aundyr son e chloie ayns "Scent of a Woman" (1992). Son e chloiaghyn ayns "Dick Tracy" (1990), "Glengarry Glen Ross" (1992), as "The Irishman" (2019), hooar eh ny smoo enmyssaghtyn son Aundyr Academy son yn Aghteyr Co-hassooagh Share. Ta tuarystalyn elley lesh goaill stiagh cloiaghyn ayns ny scannaneyn "Scarface" (1983), "Carlito's Way" (1993), "Donnie Brasco" (1997), as "The Insider" (1999). Chammah as shen, t'eh er chloie ayns ny scannaneyn creauagh "Heat" (1995), "The Devil's Advocate" (1997), "Insomnia" (2002), as ren eh cloie ayns "Once Upon a Time in Hollywood" (2019) as "House of Gucci" (2021).
Er y çhellveeish, ren Pacino cloie ayns ram obbraghyn liorish HBO, goaill stiagh "Angels in America" (2003) as y scannane beashnyssagh liorish Jack Kevorkian, "You Don't Know Jack" (2010), raad ren eh cosney Aundyr Primetime Emmy son y daa scannane. Ta Pacino cloie 'sy straih "Hunters" (2020-jiu) liorish Amazon Video. T'eh er chloie er yn ardan chammah as aundyryn Tony cosnit echey ayns 1969 as 1977 son e chloiaghyn ayns "Does a Tiger Wear a Necktie?" as "The Basic Training of Pavlo Hummel".
Ren Pacino e chied scannane myr jantagh lesh "Looking for Richard" (1996), raad t'eh stiurey as cloie 'sy scannane feanishagh mychione "Richard III"; ren Pacino cloie yn paart toshee er yn ardan ayns 1977. Ren eh cloie Shylock ayns scannane aa-chummit (2004) as gientyn ardan (2010) jeh'n chloie "The Merchant of Venice". Ren Pacino stiurey as cloie ayns "Chinese Coffee" (2000), "Wilde Salomé" (2011), as "Salomé" (2013). Voish 1994, she Pacino yn co-eaghtyrane er yn Actors Studio.

Camila Alves:
She craishteyder as kiaddeyder Brasseelagh ee Camila Alves McConaughey (ruggit er 28 Jerrey Geuree 1982). T'ee poosit rish yn aghteyr Americaanagh Matthew McConaughey.

Alicia Witt:
She aghteyr, arraneyder, as pianneyder Americaanagh ee Alicia Roanne Witt (ruggit er 21 Luanistyn 1975). Va paart yllit eck myr jeigeyr boirit 'sy scannane "Fun" (1994), myr schoillar kiaullee ayns "Mr. Holland's Opus" (1995) as myr schoillar ollooscoil as aggle urree 'sy scannane atçhim "Urban Legend" (1998). Ren ee cloie ayns ny scannaneyn "Vanilla Sky" (2001), "Two Weeks Notice" (2002), "Last Holiday" (2006) as y scannane creauagh "88 Minutes" (2007). Ta Witt er ve er y çhellveeish ayns "The Walking Dead", "The Sopranos", "Nashville", "Two and a Half Men", "The Librarians", "Friday Night Lights", ', "The Mentalist", "Cybill", "Justified", "Twin Peaks: The Return", ' as "Orange is the New Black".
Chammah's yn aghteyrys eck, t'eh raait dy nee yindys kiaullee t'ee myr pianneyder rahoil, arraneyder, as screeudeyr arrane. Ta Witt er chloie ayns hoght scannane Nollick liorish y vollagh çhellveeish Hallmark. Er y scannane jeianagh eck, "Christmas Tree Lane" (2020), ren ee obbraghey myr ard-ghienteyder as screeudeyr skeeal y scannane as ren ee cur daa arrane bunneydagh rish y scannane ta'n karacteyr eck goaill.

Eliza Jane:
She aghteyr pornograafagh, craishteyder an-ghraagh, as caillin shamraig Americaanagh ee Eliza Jane (ruggit er 7 Mean Fouyir 1993).
Beashnys.
Hoshee ee gobbraghey 'sy çhynskyl pornograafagh ayns 2016 tra v'ee 23 bleeaney d'eash myr aghteyr da'n jantys East Coast Talents. Voish shen, t'ee er obbraghey marish Digital Sin, Tushy, Evil Angel, Girlfriends Films, Metart, Wicked Pictures, Sweet Sinner, Digital Playground, Diabolic Video, Jules Jordan Video, Kink.com as Elegant Angel, mastey seyrlannyn elley.
Ayns 2018 hooar ee daa enmyssaght ayns Aundyryn AVN son y Roltag Noa Share as y Cloie Ynrican / Boirey Share. Hooar ee enmyssaght ayns Aundyryn XBIZ son y Reayrtys Keintys Share ayns Scannane Gonzo son "Dirty Dolls".
Ayns 2019 ren ee cosney Aundyr AVN son y Ven-aghteyr Share son "Anne: A Taboo Parody" as son y Reayrtys Keintys Lesbeeagh Share ayns Possan son "A Flapper Girl Story".
Derrey yn laa t'ayn, t'ee er chloie ayns ny smoo na 140 scannane.
Mastey scannaneyn elley, t'ee er chloie ayns "A Soft Touch 3", "Cum Deep In Me", "Lesbian Schoolgirls", "More Than Friends", "Mother Lovers Society 17", "Next Big Step", "Pure 9", "Student Bodies 6" as "Young and Curious 3".

Samantha Mumba:
She arraneyder, screeudeyr arrane, aghteyr, daunseyr, craishteyder fassan, as çhebbeyder çhellveeish Yernagh ee Samantha Tamania Anne Cecilia Mumba (ruggit er 18 Jerrey Geuree 1983). Ayns 2000, tra v'ee 17 bleeaney d'eash, hooar ee ardghoo lurg skeaylley magh e chied hingyl "Gotta Tell You", hie er roshtyn stiagh mastey ny queig arraneyn smoo eeckit ayns Nerin, 'sy Reeriaght Unnaneysit as ayns ny Steatyn Unnaneysit. Voish shen, ta'n arrane er ve currit stiagh 'sy rolley 100 Greatest Choruses of the 21st Century liorish "Billboard". Ren ee skeaylley magh e chied albym fo'n ennym cheddin ny s'anmey 'sy vlein shen as ren eh roshtyn y chiarroo ynnyd ayns Nerin as y nuyoo ynnyd 'sy Reeriaght Unnaneysit.
Ta Mumba er ve cloie myr aghteyr chammah, as ren ee cloie ayns scannane da'n chied cheayrt 'sy scannane "The Time Machine" (2002), as t'ee er chloie ayns ram scannaneyn seyrey Yernagh chammah. Hie ee er-ash dys y chiaull ayns 2013 as ren ee fogrey magh dy row planyn eck albym elley y skeaylley magh ayns 2019, agh cha ren ee skeaylley eh magh. Ren Mumba cur magh ny singylyn "Cool" as "Process" ayns 2020.

Jeremy Irons:
She aghteyr as immeeaghtagh Sostynagh eh Jeremy Irons (ruggit er 19 Mean Fouyir 1948). Erreish da traenal classicagh y yannoo ec y Bristol Old Vic Theatre School, hoshee Irons cloie er yn ardan ayns 1969 as t'eh er ghoaill ayrn ayns ram obbragheyn theateragh y West End, goaill stiagh cloiaghyn Shakespeare "The Winter's Tale", "Macbeth", "Much Ado About Nothing", "The Taming of the Shrew", as "Richard II". Ayns 1984, ren eh cloie da'n chied cheayrt er Broadway ayns "The Real Thing" liorish Tom Stoppard raad hooar eh Aundyr Tony son yn Aghteyr Share ayns Cloie.
Va'n chied phaart mooar echey er y scaailan 'sy straih "Brideshead Revisited" (1981) liorish ITV. Hooar eh enmyssaght Golden Globe er son y straih shen. Va'n chied ard-phaart 'sy scannaneaght 'sy drama romansagh "The French Lieutenant's Woman" (1981), raad hooar eh enmyssaght BAFTA son yn Aghteyr Share. Lurg ram dramaghyn, goaill stiagh "Moonlighting" (1982), "Betrayal" (1983), as "The Mission" (1986), hooar eh ard-voylley son e huarystal myr ny fir lhee mraane lannoonit 'sy scannane creauagh shicklaagagh "Dead Ringers" (1988) liorish David Cronenberg. Ta Irons er chosney ram aundyryn, goaill stiagh Aundyr Academy son yn Aghteyr Share, son e huarystal 'sy scannane "Reversal of Fortune" (1990).
Va paartyn ec Irons 'sy scannane creauagh folliaght "Kafka" (1991) liorish Steven Soderbergh, 'sy drama shennearish "The House of the Spirits" (1993), 'sy drama romansagh "M. Butterfly" (1993), as chur eh e ghoo rish "The Lion King" (1994) liorish Disney myr Scar, as ren eh cloie Simon Gruber 'sy scannane jantys "Die Hard with a Vengeance" (1995), Humbert Humbert ayns "Lolita" (1997) as Aramis ayns "The Man in the Iron Mask" (1998). Chammah as shen, ren eh cloie ayns ny scannaneyn "Dungeons & Dragons" (2000), "The Merchant of Venice" (2004), "Being Julia" (2004), "Kingdom of Heaven" (2005), "Eragon" (2006), "Appaloosa" (2008), "Margin Call" (2011), "Assassin's Creed" (2016), "" (2016), "Justice League" (2017), as "Zack Snyder's Justice League" (2021).
Er y çhellveeish, ren Irons cloie 'sy vun-straih hendeeagh "Elizabeth I", raad ren eh cosney Golden Globe as Aundyr Emmy son yn Aghteyr Co-hassooagh Share. Eddyr ny bleeantyn 2011 as 2013, ren eh cloie Paab Alistair VI 'sy straih hendeeaghe "The Borgias" liorish Showtime. Ayns 2019, ren eh cloie Adrian Veidt / Ozymandias 'sy straih "Watchmen" liorish HBO.
Ayns Jerrey Fouyir 2011, v'eh enmyssit myr Ambasseydeyr Jeih-aigney son Sheshaght Vee as Eirinys jeh ny h-Ashoonyn Unnaneysit.

Alan Rickman:
She aghteyr as stiureyder Sostynagh va Alan Sidney Patrick Rickman (21 Toshiaght Arree 1946 – 14 Jerrey Geuree 2016). Va enney mie er son e ghoo lhiastagh, dowin. Ren eh traenal ec Colleish Reeoil ny h-Ellynyn Dramadagh ayns Lunnin as haink er dy ve ny oltey jeh'n Royal Shakespeare Company (RSC), raad ren eh cloie ayns obbraghyn theateragh noa-emshiragh as classicagh. Ren eh cloie Vicomte de Valmont 'sy ghientyn ardan yn RSC jeh'n chloie "Les Liaisons Dangereuses" (1985), as erreish da arraghey yn ghientyn dys y West End ayns 1986 as Broadway ayns 1987, v'eh enmyssit son Aundyr Tony.
Haink y chied phaart 'sy scannaneaght echey myr y fer toshee atçhimagh Germaanagh Hans Gruber ayns "Die Hard" (1988). Chammah's shen, ren eh cloie Shirrym Nottingham ayns ' (1991), raad chossyn eh Aundyr BAFTA son yn Aghteyr Share ayns Paart Co-hassooagh; Elliott Marston ayns "Quigley Down Under" (1990); Jamie ayns "Truly, Madly, Deeply" (1991); P.L. O'Hara ayns "An Awfully Big Adventure" (1995); Colonel Brandon ayns "Sense and Sensibility" (1995); Éamon de Valera ayns " Michael Collins" (1996); Alexander Dane ayns "Galaxy Quest" (1999); Metatron ayns "Dogma" (1999); Severus Snape ayns straih "Harry Potter" (2001–2011); Harry ayns "Love Actually" (2003); Marvin the Paranoid Android ayns "The Hitchhiker's Guide to the Galaxy" (2005); as Judge Turpin ayns ' (2007).
Hoshee Rickman cloie er y çhellveeish tra ren eh cloie Tybalt ayns "Romeo and Juliet" (1978) myr ayrn jeh straih Shakespeare liorish y BBC. She yn chied phaart mooar v'echey na myr Obadiah Slope 'syn aa-chummey çhellveeish jeh "The Barchester Chronicles" (1982) liorish y BBC. Ny s'anmey, ren eh cloie ayns scannaneyn çhellveeish, goaill stiagh y paart myr y karacteyr enmyssagh ayns "" (1996), raad chossyn eh Aundyr Golden Globe, Aundyr Emmy as Aundyr y Screen Actors Guild, as Alfred Blalock ayns "Something the Lord Made" (2004). 
Hooar Rickman baase kyndagh rish kanghyr y fairaig villish er 14 Jerrey Geuree 2016 tra v'eh 69 bleeaney d'eash. V'ad ny paartyn jerrinagh echey myr Aaghineraal Frank Benson 'sy scannane creauagh "Eye in the Sky" (2015), as gooy phraddag ayns "Alice Through the Looking Glass" (2016).

Romee Strijd:
She craishteyder Ollanagh ee Romee Strijd (ruggit er 19 Jerrey Souree 1995). She aa-chraishteyder Victoria's Secret Angels t'ee, as t'ee er ve ayns e haishbynys fassan bleinoil voish 2014 derrey 2018. Ren ee obbraghey marish ny cowraghyn Alexander McQueen, Michael Kors, as Carolina Herrera. V'ee ry-akin ayns earishlioaryn chammah, lheid as Vogue, Elle, as Harper's Bazaar.

Hunter Schafer:
She craishteyder fassan, aghteyr, as immeeaghtagh Americaanagh er son cairyn LADT ee Hunter Schafer (ruggit er 31 Nollick 1998). Son yn immeeaghtys eck noi Slattys Preevaadjys & Shickyrys ny Seyraadyn Pobbylagh ayns Carolina Hwoaie, ren "Teen Vogue" cur Schafer er e rolley "21 Under 21" ayns 2017. Ayns 2019 hoshee ee cloie tra ren ee cloie yn schoillar ard-scoill tessen-cheintyssagh Jules Vaughn 'sy straih "Euphoria" liorish HBO.

Putin khuylo!:
She sleih-gherrym ta craidey Eaghtyrane y Roosh Vladimir Putin eh "Putin – khuylo!" (; ; ; er ny hyndaa dy mennick myr " bwoid Putin"). Ta'n bun echey 'syn Ookraan ayns 2014 as eh er n'aase ass caayney bluckan coshey va cloiet da'n chied cheayrt liorish ultras FC Metalist Kharkiv as Shaktar Donetsk ayns Mayrnt 2014 ec toshiaght y Chaggey Rooshagh-Ookraanagh. Haink er yn abbyrt dy ve ny arrane çhionnraa as s'lheeadagh eh er feie yn Ookraan mastey pohllderyn seyrsnys as unnaneys yn Ookraan as mastey adsyn ta shassoo noi Vladimir Putin 'sy Roosh as 'syn Ookraan.
Bun-ocklaght.
Ta'n awanid ("mat") er ny harlettyraghey myr "huilo", "huylo", "khuilo", "khuylo", ny "xujlo". She ("khuy"), "bwoid" dy lettyragh 'sy Rooshish as 'syn Ookraanish, bun yn 'ockle. She unnane ny focklyn shen 'sy Rooshish, 'syn Ookraanish as 'sy Velarooshish.
Ayns Boaldyn 2014, ren beealyn ym-ysseraght cur magh coontaghyn dy row "khuilo" currit rish yn Urban Dictionary myr co-cheayllagh son Vladimir Putin.
Ta aagherrid elley ayn ta goaill stiagh y cheayll cheddin — "" ("PTN PNKh"). T'eh shassoo son "" ("Putin, poshol na khuy", ta gollrish "Putin, immee "fuck"al uss hene", foddee ve aachummit 'sy Ghaelg myr "PTN IFUH").

Veerys:
Ta veerys çheet er jantagh gowaltagh fo-vynreayrtagh ta jannoo coipyn jehsyn hene çheusthie jeh killag vio bioag ennagh. Ta veeryssyn doghaney dagh sorçh jeh'n vea, voish beiyn as lossreeyn dys mynorgaanee, goaill stiagh bacteyryn as archaea.
Voish yn art ayns 1892 liorish Dmitri Ivanovsky ta cur sheese er pataghien va doghaney lossreeyn tombagey as feddyn magh y veerys mosaic tombagey liorish Martinus Beijerinck ayns 1898, ta coontyssyn cruinn er ve jeant er ny smoo na 9,000 dooieyn veeryssagh mastey ny millioonyn sorçhyn dy veerys t'er mayrn 'sy theihll. Ta veeryssyn ry-gheddyn ayns begnagh dagh eggo-chorys er y Dowan as she adsyn y nhee bea-oaylleeagh smoo lheeadagh t'ayn. She veerys-oaylleeaght, fo-vagher y vyn-vioagh-oaylleeaght, yn ennym ta currit er studeyryssyn bentyn rish veeryssyn.

Gary Sinise:
She aghteyr, deincharrey, as kiaulleyder Americaanagh eh Gary Alan Sinise (ruggit er 17 Mayrnt 1955). Mastey aundyryn elley, t'eh er chosney Aundyr Primetime Emmy, Aundyr Golden Globe, Aundyr Tony, as kiare Aundyr y Screen Actors Guild. Chammah's shen, t'eh er gheddyn roltage er y Hollywood Walk of Fame, as v'eh enmyssit son Aundyr Academy. Ta Sinise er gheddyn ram aundyryn as onnoryn son yn obbyr deinchaarjoil lheeadagh as obbyr marish sheshaghtyn giastyllagh. She pohllder sheshaghtyn shenn sidooryn eigsoylagh t'eh as ren eh cur er bun y bann Lt. Dan Band (enmyssit ayns onnor e characteyr ayns "Forrest Gump"), ta cloie ec garrastanyn cahnagh er feie ny cruinney.
Hoshee coorse cloie Sinise er yn ardan marish y Steppenwolf Theatre Company ayns 1983 tra ren eh stiurey as cloie ayns gientyn y chloie "True West" liorish Sam Shepard raad ren eh cosney Aundyr Obie.
