Hie eh er oaie cosney kiare enmyssaght son Aundyryn Tony goaill stiagh son e chloiaghyn ayns "The Grapes of Wrath" sa "One Flew Over the Cuckoo's Nest". Chossyn eh Aundyr Tony y Theater Ardjynagh marish y Steppenwolf Theatre Company. 
Ren eh cloie da'n chied cheart 'sy scannanaght ayns aachummey scannane y lioar liorish John Steinbeck, 'Of Mice and Men' va stiurit as gientit lesh neesht. Ren Sinise cloie George Milton marish John Malkovich ren cloie Lennie. Mastey ny paartyn elley echey, t'ad goaill stiagh Lieutenant Dan Taylor ayns "Forrest Gump" (1994) raad v'eh enmyssit son Aundyr Academy son yn Aghteyr Co-hassooagh Share. Ghow eh ayrn chammah ayns scannaneyn elley lheid as "Apollo 13" (1995), "Ransom" (1996), "The Green Mile" (1999) as "Impostor" (2002). 
Ta enney mie er chammah son e chloiaghyn er y çhellveeish, goaill stiagh e phaart myr Harry S. Truman ayns "Truman" (1995), raad ren eh cosney Golden Globe, as y paart enmyssagh 'sy scannane çhellveeish "George Wallace", raad ren eh cosney Aundyr Primetime Emmy. Va paartyn toshee echey chammah myr y Cronneyder Mac Taylor 'sy straih "" (2004–13) liorish CBS. Voish 2016 derrey 2017, ren Sinise cloie Meoir Er-lheh Jack Garrett ayns "." 

Bank of America:
Ta'n Bank of America Corporation (ny Bank of America dy mennick; aagherrit myr BofA ny BoA) ny vanc baighey argid yl-ashoonagh as ny cholught shellooagh son shirveishyn argidoil. Ta'n kione-cherroo echey bunnit ayns Charlotte, Carolina Hwoaie. Va'n banc bunnit ayns San Francisco as ghow eh yn cummey noa-emshiragh echey tra ren NationsBank ass Charlotte kionnaghey eh ayns 1998. She Bank of America y nah undinys banceyraght smoo ayns ny Steatyn Unnaneysit, lurg JPMorgan Chase, as y hoghtoo banc smoo 'sy theihll. T'eh tendeil mysh 10.73% jeh dagh yeearlys ayns bancyn Americaanagh, ayns co-hirrey rish JPMorgan Chase, Citigroup, as Wells Fargo.

Roberta Gemma:
She aghteyr scannane as pornograafagh Iddaalagh ee Floriana Panella (ruggit er 15 Nollick 1980), ta ny share ennit fo ny h-enmyn ardan eck, Roberta Gemma ny Roberta Missoni.

Bruce Willis:
She aa-aghteyr Americaanagh eh Walter Bruce Willis (ruggit er 19 Mayrnt 1955). Hoshee yn coorse bea echey er yn ardan ayns ny 1970yn. Hooar eh enney mooar lesh y phaart toshee er y straih drama aittys "Moonlighting" (1985–1989) as t'eh er chloie ayns ny smoo na keead scannane. Hooar eh enney mie myr feniagh jantys lurg e huarystal myr John McClane 'sy straih scannane "Die Hard" (1988–2013) mastey paartyn elley.
Ta scannaneyn elley marish Willis goaill stiagh "The Last Boy Scout" (1991), "Pulp Fiction" (1994), "12 Monkeys" (1995), "The Fifth Element" (1997), "Armageddon" (1998), "The Sixth Sense" (1999), "Hart's War" (2002), "Tears of the Sun" (2003), "Hostage" (2005), "Moonrise Kingdom" (2012), as "Motherless Brooklyn" (2019). Ayns ny bleeantyn jeianagh jeh'n choorse echey, ren Willis cloie ayns ram scannaneyn lesh bushaidyn injilley nagh row feddynit dy mie ec cremeyderyn as y lught fakin. Ayns Mayrnt 2022, ren lught thie Willis fogrey dy row eh girree ass lurg faaishnys-enn yn aphasia, foaynoo ta bentyn rish baght glare.
Myr arraneyder, ren Willis skeaylley mag e chied albym "The Return of Bruno" ayns 1987, as hie daa albym elley magh echey ayns 1989 as 2001. Ren eh cloie da'n chied cheayrt er Broadway ayns aa-chummey ardan jeh'n lioar "Misery" ayns 2015. Ta Willis er gheddyn ram accolaidyn eigsoylagh harrish y choorse echey, goaill stiagh Aundyr Golden Globe, daa Aundyr Primetime Emmy, as daa Aundyr People's Choice. Hooar eh roltage er y Hollywood Walk of Fame ayns 2006.

Milla Jovovich:
She aghteyr, ard-chraishteyder, as arraneyder Americaanagh ee Milica Bogdanovna Jovovich (; ; ; ruggit er 17 Nollick 1975), ta goll er enney dy keirdagh myr Milla Jovovich.
Va Jovovich ruggit ayns Kyiv, PHH yn Ookraan, yn Unnaneys Soveidjagh, agh ren ish as e lught thie arraghey dys Lunnin tra v'ee queig bleeaney d'eash as, lurg shen, ren ad arraghey dys Sacramento, California; fy yerrey, ren ad arraghey dys Los Angeles shiaght mee ny s'anmey. Ayns 1987, tra v'ee 12 vleeaney d'eash, hoshee ee craishtey tra ren Herb Ritts jannoo fotograafyn jee son coodagh yn earishlioar Iddaalagh "Lei". Ren Richard Avedon cur ish ayns ny soilsheenyn "Most Unforgettable Women in the World" liorish Revlon. Ayns 1988, ren Jovovich cloie da'n chied cheayrt er y scaailan 'sy scannane çhellveeish "The Night Train to Kathmandu" as ren ee cloie 'sy chied mooar-scannane eck, "Two Moon Junction".
Hooar Jovovich enney mooar son e paart 'sy scannane romansagh "Return to the Blue Lagoon" (1991) er yn oyr nagh row ee agh 15 bleeaney d'eash. T'eh er smooinaghtyn dy nee yn paart v'eck 'sy scannane jantys far-skeealagh sheanse Frangagh "The Fifth Element" (1997) liorish Luc Besson yn paart foshlee eck. Ren ee as Besson poosey ny s'anmey 'sy vlein shen, agh scarr ad voish y cheilley tammylt veg ny yei. Ren ee cloie y ben-eniagh as y martyr ayns "" (1999) liorish Besson. Eddyr ny bleeantyn 2002 as 2016, ren Jovovich cloie Alice 'sy straih scannane atçhim jantys "Resident Evil", hie er ve yn straih scannane smoo berçhagh va bunnit er gammanyn-feeshan.
Ren Jovovich skeaylley magh e chied albym, "The Divine Comedy", ayns 1994, as e nah albym, "The People Tree Sessions", ayns 1998. T'ee foast skeaylley magh prowallyn er yn ynnyd-eggey oikoil eck as dy mennick t'ee cur rish cassanyn-sheean scannane. Ayns 2003, ren ee as y craishteyder Carmen Hawk croo yn linney eaddeeyn Jovovich–Hawk, hie magh derrey 2008. She Creature Entertainment e colught gientyn hene eck.

Rosanna Davison:
She aghteyr, arraneyder, craishteyder as ben-rein aalid Yernagh ee Rosanna Davison (ruggit er 17 Averil 1984). V'ee crooinit myr Miss World 2003. She 'neen y chiaulleyder Chris de Burgh t'ee, as va'n arrane echey - "For Rosanna" - screeuit liorish e ayr j'ee son e albym "Into the Light" (1986).
Bea aeg.
Va Davison ruggit ayns Coontae Ghivlyn, Nerin, as ren ee frastyl y vunscoill ayns Scoill Aravon, Coontae Cheeill Mantan. Lurg shen, hie ee dys Scoill Ráth an Dúin ayns Gleann na gCaorach, Coontae Ghivlyn. She meoir brastyl v'ee roish my ren ee goaill jerrey lesh yn Ard-Teisht Yernagh ayns 2002.
Miss World.
Ayns Luanistyn 2003, hie ee stiagh ayns kione-chloiaghyn Miss Ireland ayns Divlyn. Ren ee cosney yn co-hirrey as hie ee stiagh ayns Miss World as ee co-streeu er son Nerin. Haghyr yn co-hirrey Miss World ayns Mee ny Nollick 2003 ayns Sanya, y Çheen marish 106 co-streeuder elley. Ren Davison cosney yn chrooin. She ish y chied Yernagh ren cosney yn enmys voish tosheeaght yn enmys ayns 1951. Car e lhing, ren Davison keayrtyn er y Reeriaght Unnaneysit, ny Steatyn Unnaneysit, y Chanadey, y Çheen, as Sri Lanka.

Danny DeVito:
She aghteyr, stiureyder, gienteyder, as screeudeyr scannane Americaanagh eh Daniel Michael DeVito Jr. (ruggit er 17 Sauin 1944). Hooar eh enney mooar son e huarystal myr y çhaghter taksee Louie De Palma 'sy straih hellveeish "Taxi" (1978–1983), raad ren eh Aundyr Golden Globe as Aundyr Primetime Emmy. T'eh cloie Frank Reynolds er y sitcom "It's Always Sunny in Philadelphia" (2006–jiu) liorish FX as FXX.
Ta enney mie er son e phaartyn ayns ny scannaneyn "One Flew Over the Cuckoo's Nest" (1975), "Terms of Endearment" (1983), "Romancing the Stone" (1984), "Throw Momma from the Train" (1987), "Twins" (1988), "The War of the Roses" (1989), "Batman Returns" (1992), "Jack the Bear" (1993), "Junior" (1994), "Get Shorty" (1995), "Matilda" (1996), "L.A. Confidential" (1997), "The Big Kahuna" (1999), "Big Fish" (2003), "Deck the Halls" (2006), "When in Rome" (2010), "Wiener-Dog" (2016) as "" (2019).Ta enney mie er chammah son e phaartyn goo ayns scannane lheid as "Hercules" (1997), "The Lorax" (2012) as "Smallfoot" (2018).
Ayns 2017, chossyn eh enmyssaght son Aundyr Tony son e chloie ayns aavioghey Broadway yn chloie "The Price" liorish Arthur Miller. Ren DeVito as Michael Shamberg cur Jersey Films er bun. Tammylt veg ny yei, haink er Stacey Sher dy ve ny co-phartee. Ta'n colught gientyn shen mie er enney son scannaneyn lheid as "Pulp Fiction", "Garden State", as "Freedom Writers". Ren DeVito goaill shelloo er Jersey Television traa, colught ren gientyn y straih hellveeish "Reno 911!" liorish Comedy Central. Ren DeVito as e ven heshee Rhea Perlman cloie ry cheilley 'sy scannane "Matilda" (1996), bunnit er y noaskeeal paitçhey fo'n ennym cheddin liorish Roald Dahl. Va DeVito fer jeh ny gienteyderyn va enmyssit son Aundyr Academy son y Jalloo Share son "Erin Brockovich" (2000).

Val Kilmer:
She aghteyr Americaanagh eh Val Edward Kilmer (ruggit er 31 Nollick 1959). Hoshiaght, v'eh ny aghteyr ardan, agh hooar eh ardghoo lurg cloiaghyn ayns scannaneyn aitt, goaill toshiaght lesh "Top Secret!" (1984) as "Real Genius" (1985), chammah as y scannane jantys cahnagh "Top Gun" (1986) as y scannane fansee "Willow" (1988).
Ta Kilmer er chloie ram sleih firrinagh ayns scannaneyn, goaill stiagh Jim Morrison ayns "The Doors" (1991), scanjoon Elvis Presley ayns "True Romance" (1993), Doc Holliday ayns "Tombstone" (1993), John H. Patterson ayns "The Ghost and the Darkness" (1996), John Holmes ayns "Wonderland" (2003), as Pilib II y Vassadoan ayns "Alexander" (2004) mastey sleih elley. Ta enney mie er chammah son e huarystalyn myr Bruce Wayne/Batman ayns "Batman Forever" (1995), as Simon Templar ayns "The Saint" (1997). Ta Kilmer er n'yannoo cloiaghyn goo er shalleeyn eigsoylagh myrgeddin, goaill stiagh Moses 'sy scannane bioghit "The Prince of Egypt" (1998) as Walker Sloan 'sy ghamman-feeshan "" (2011).
Ren e chloiaghyn myr Chris ayns "Heat" (1995) as "Gay Perry" ayns "Kiss Kiss Bang Bang" (2005) cosney da enmyssaghtyn son Aundyr Saturn son yn Aghteyr Co-hassooagh Share.
Chammah's shen, she ughtar yn lioar "I'm Your Huckleberry: A Memoir" eh Kilmer, hie er ny hoilshaghey magh ayns 2020. Ayns 2021, "Val", hie scannane feanishagh magh fo seihll Kilmer.

Aisling Franciosi:
She aghteyr Yernagh ee Aisling Franciosi (ruggit 6 Mean Souree 1993). Ren ee cosney Aundyr AACTA son e cloie 'sy scannane "The Nightingale" (2018). Er y çhellveeish, ta enney mie urree son y drama kimmeeys "The Fall" (2013-2016) liorish RTÉ-BBC Two, straih 2 jeh'n straih "Legends" (2015) liorish TNT, as y vyn-straih lesh BBC One, "Black Narcissus" (2020).

Zendaya:
She aghteyr as arraneyder Americaanagh ee Zendaya Maree Stoermer Coleman (ruggit er 1 Mean Fouyir 1996). T'ee er gheddyn ram accolaidyn, goaill stiagh Aundyr Primetime Emmy. Ren yn earishlioar "Time" cur ee stiagh mastey ny 100 dooinney smoo cummaghtagh 'sy theihll 'sy rolley bleinoil oc ayns 2022.
V'ee ruggit as troggit ayns Oakland, California, as hoshee yn coorse bea eck myr craishteyder paitçhey as daunseyr jeenane. Hoshee yn coorse cloie er y çhellveeish eck myr Rocky Blue er y sitcom "Shake It Up" (2010–2013) liorish Disney Channel as ren ee cloie myr y roltag enmyssagh 'sy sitcom "K.C. Undercover" (2015–2018) son y vollagh cheddin. Haink e chied chloie 'sy scannaneaght ayns 2017 lesh y scannane far-eniaghtagh "" as ny scannaneyn hie er eiyrtyssagh er. Ren e paart myr Rue Bennett, jeigeyr deyrsnagh-druggey 'sy straih drama jeigeyr lesh HBO, "Euphoria" (2019–jiu), jannoo jee y cosneyder s'aa jeh Aundyr Primetime Emmy son y Ven-aghteyr Toshee Share ayns Straih Drama. Ta e paartyn scannane goaill stiagh y drama kiaullee "The Greatest Showman" (2017), y drama romansagh "Malcolm & Marie" (2021), as yn ard-skeeal far-skeealaght sheanse "Dune" (2021).
Myrane lesh e coorse cloie eck, ta Zendaya gobbraghey 'sy çhynskyl kiaull. Ayns 2011, ren ee cur magh ny singylyn "Swag It Out" as "Watch Me", y singyl jerrinagh marish Bella Thorne. Ren ee fo-screeu rish Hollywood Records ayns 2012 as beggan ny yei ren ee cur magh e chied hingyl, "Replay", haink stiagh mastey ny 40 arraneyn s'yrjey er kaart "Billboard" Hot 100 ny Steatyn Unnaneysit. Ren ee cur magh e albym seyrlann hene-enmyssit ayns 2013. Haink e rah hraghtee smoo myr kiaulleyder lesh y cho-obbraghey marish Zac Efron, "Rewrite the Stars", voish "The Greatest Showman" ayns 2018.

Steve Buscemi:
She aghteyr Americaanagh eh Steven Vincent Buscemi (ruggit er 13 Nollick 1957). Ta enney mie er son e phaartyn ayns ny scannaneyn "Reservoir Dogs" (1992), "Desperado" (1995), "Con Air" (1997), "Armageddon" (1998), "Ghost World" (2001), "Big Fish" (2003), as "The Death of Stalin" (2017). Ta enney mie er chammah son e cho-obbraghyn marish ny braaraghyn Coen as eh er ve cloie ayns shey scannane lioroosyn: "Miller's Crossing" (1990), "Barton Fink" (1991), "The Hudsucker Proxy" (1994), "Fargo" (1996), "The Big Lebowski" (1998), as "Paris, je t'aime" (2006).
Ta coorse rahoil ec Buscemi chammah er y çhellveeish. Eddyr ny bleeantyn 2010 as 2014, ren Buscemi cloie y paart toshee myr Enoch "Nucky" Thompson 'sy straih hellveeish "Boardwalk Empire" liorish HBO as er ny chroo ec Terence Winter. Ren e chloie cosney da daa Aundyr y Screen Actors Guild, Golden Globe as daa enmyssaght son Aundyr Emmy. Mastey yn obbyr çhellveeish ta jeant echey, ta e phaartyn goaill stiagh "The Sopranos" (2004, 2006), "30 Rock" (2007–2013), "Portlandia" (2014–2017) as "Miracle Workers" (2019–jiu). Ren eh e chied scannane myr stiureyder lesh y scannane "Trees Lounge" (1996), va screeuit echey as v'eh ny rollage ayn chammah. Lurg shen, ren eh stiurey "Animal Factory" (2000), "Lonesome Jim" (2004), as "Interview" (2007).
Ta Buscemi er obbraghey dy mooar 'sy vioghys, goaill stiagh obbyr ghoo myr Randall Boggs 'sy straih scannane "Monsters, Inc." (2001–2021), Wesley ayns "Home on the Range" (2004), Horace Nebbercracker ayns "Monster House" (2006), Templeton the Rat ayns "Charlotte's Web" (2006), Scamper ayns "Igor" (2008), Bucky the Hamster ayns "G-Force" (2009), Wayne the Werewolf 'sy straih scannane "Hotel Transylvania" (2012–2022) as Francis E. Francis ayns "The Boss Baby" (2017).

John Travolta:
She aghteyr as arraneyder Americaanagh eh John Joseph Travolta (ruggit er 18 Toshiaght Arree 1954). Haink enney mie er car ny 1970yn tra ren eh cloie er y sitcom çhellveeish "Welcome Back, Kotter" (1975–1979) as ayns ny scannaneyn rahoil "Carrie" (1976), "Saturday Night Fever" (1977), "Grease" (1978), as "Urban Cowboy" (1980). Huitt e choorse bea car ny 1980yn, agh haghyr aavioghey echey car ny 1990yn lesh e phaart ayns "Pulp Fiction" (1994), as hie eh er oaie cloie ayns scannaneyn goaill stiagh "Get Shorty" (1995), "Broken Arrow" (1996), "Phenomenon" (1996), "Face/Off" (1997), "A Civil Action" (1998), "Primary Colors" (1998), "Hairspray" (2007), as "Bolt" (2008).
Va Travolta enmyssit son Aundyr Academy son yn Aghteyr Share son e chloiaghyn ayns "Saturday Night Fever" as "Pulp Fiction". Chossyn eh Aundyr Golden Globe son yn Aghteyr Share ayns Jalloo Roie Kiaullee ny Aittys son e chloie ayns "Get Shorty" as t'eh er gheddyn shey enmyssaghtyn, y fer jerrinagh ayns 2011. Ayns 2014, chossyn eh Aundyr IIFA son Ard-obbyr Ard-yindyssagh 'sy Scannaneaght Eddyrashoonagh. Ayns 2016, ren Travolta geddyn e chied Aundyr Primetime Emmy, myr gienteyder y chied straih jeh'n straih skeealyn çhaglit "American Crime Story", er ny fo-enmyssey myr "". Hooar eh enmyssaght elley son Emmy as son Golden Globe son e chloie myr y leighder Robert Shapiro 'sy straih. She etleyder preevaadjagh eh Travolta chammah.

Eddinagh (roortys keintyssagh):
Ta eddinagh çheet er roortys keintyssagh raad ta fer sheayney er eddin chommee cheintyssagh. She sorçh dy cheintys neu-howllagh t'eh, ga dy vel eh goll er chloie son y chooid smoo lurg aght elley jeh greinney keintyssagh, lheid as bwoideeaght 'ineagh, bwoideeaght hoanney, keintys beill, ny laue-chooilleeney. Ta eddinee ry-akin dy mennick ayns scannaneyn as feeshanyn pornograafagh myr aght jerrinagh y reayrtys son y chooid smoo.

Sievierodonetsk:
Sievierodonetsk (), Sieverodonetsk () ny Severodonetsk (), she caayr ayns Queiggey Luhansk 'syn Ookraan hiar t'eh. T'eh soit er broogh clee yn awin Siverskyi Donets as mysh 110 km (68 mi) sheear hwoaie voish y pree-valley yn wheiggey, Luhansk. T'eh jeeaghyn magh er Lysychansk tessen yn awin. Ta deiney cummal 'sy chaayr as, rere shen, she eshyn y nah chaayr 'sy wheiggey. Ec y traa t'ayn, ta'n chooid smoo jeh'n chaayr goit ec y Roosh as Pobblaght Heayagh Luhansk bwooise da'n chaggey 'sy çheer lurg ren y Roosh ruegey yn çheer ayns 2022.

Lizzie Holden:
She daawheeylleyder ratçhal keirdey Manninagh ee Elizabeth Rose Rebecca "Lizzie" Holden (ruggit er 12 Mean Fouyir 1997).

The Hunchback of Notre Dame II:
She scannane kiaullee bioghit Americaanagh voish y vlein 2002 eh The Hunchback of Notre Dame II. Hie eh er stiurey liorish Bradley Raymond as er ny skeaylley jeeragh er feeshan. T'eh eiyrtyssagh er y scannane Disney 1996 "The Hunchback of Notre Dame". Va'n scannane gientit ec Walt Disney Animation (Japan), Inc., Walt Disney Television International (y Çhapaan) as Walt Disney Television Animation.

Star Wars (scannane):
She kiaulldramey spoar ard-skeealagh Americaanagh voish y vlein 1977 eh Star Wars (aa-enmyssit Star Wars: Episode IV – A New Hope). Va'n scannane screeuit as stiurit ec George Lucas, gientit liorish Lucasfilm as rheynnit magh liorish 20th Century Fox. She eshyn y chied scannane 'sy straih scannane "Star Wars" as y kiarroo cabdil rere chron-oaylleeaght 'sy "Skywalker Saga". Bunnit "foddey er-dy-henney" ayns tuinney far-skeealagh raad ta'n co-rollageys fo smaght yn Galactic Empire ("Yn Impiraght Cho-rollageagh") tranlaasagh, ta'n skeeal eiyrt er possan dy chaggeyderyn seyrsnys ta goll er enney myr y Rebel Alliance ("Cochaarjys ny h-Irreyderyn Magh") ta geearree y wappin s'noa lesh yn Impiraght, y Death Star ("Rollage y Vaaish"), y scryssey. Ta Luke Skywalker er ve tramman 'sy streeu as eh gynsaghey aghtyn y chummaght metafissigoil t'er enney myr "the Force" ("y Forse") voish y Vainshtyr Jedi Obi-Wan Kenobi. Ta'n fwirran cloie goaill stiagh Mark Hamill, Harrison Ford, Carrie Fisher, Peter Cushing, Alec Guinness, David Prowse, James Earl Jones, Anthony Daniels, Kenny Baker, as Peter Mayhew.

Babe (scannane):
She scannane drama aittys voish y vlein 1995 eh Babe (ta goll er enney chammah myr Babe the Sheep-Pig 'syn enmys obbree). Va'n scannane stiurit ec Chris Noonan, gientit ec George Miller as screeuit ec y jees jeu. She aa-chummey yn noaskeeal "The Sheep-Pig" (1983) liorish Dick King-Smith, ta ginsh skeeal muc eirinagh ta geearree obbyr moddey keyrragh y yannoo. She Roscoe Lee Browne yn insheyder as ta ny karacteyryn beiyn cloiet ec feer veiyn as babbanyn annymatraneagh.
Hie scannane eiyrtyssagh, "", er ny skeaylley magh er 25 Sauin 1998.

Encanto:
She scannane aittys fansee kiaullee Americaanagh voish y vlein 2021 ta bioghit lesh co-earrooder eh Encanto. Va'n scannane gientit ec Walt Disney Animation Studios as rheynnit magh liorish Walt Disney Studios Motion Pictures. Y 60oo scannane va gientit ecy teyrlann, v'eh stiurit ec Jared Bush as Byron Howard, co-stiurit ec Charise Castro Smith, ren c-screeu y scaa-chloie marish Bush, as v'eh gientit ec Yvett Merino as Clark Spencer, marish arraneyn bunneydagh liorish Lin-Manuel Miranda. Ta'n scannane goaill stiagh gooyn Stephanie Beatriz, María Cecilia Botero, John Leguizamo, Mauro Castillo, Jessica Darrow, Angie Cepeda, Carolina Gaitán, Diane Guerrero, as Wilmer Valderrama. Ta "Encanto" geiyrt er lught thie yl-heelogheagh, mooinjer Madrigal. Ta'n lught thie stiurit liorish y voir-reilleyder (Botero) as ta e paitçhyn as cloan ny cleinney eck-goaill magh Mirabel Madrigal—geddyn giootyn druiaghtagh voish mirril ta cur cooney daue shirveish er sleih y voodeeys ynnydagh oc ta enmyssit Encanto. Tra t'eh er fys ec Mirabel dy vel y lught thie coayl y druiaght oc, t'ee goll magh son feddyn magh cre ta taghyrt as son e lught thie as nyn dhie druiaghtagh y hauail.
Hie "Encanto" magh da'n chied cheayrt 'syn El Capitan Theatre ayns Los Angeles er 3 Sauin 2021 as v'eh skeaylt magh ayns ny Steatyn Unnaneysit er 24 Sauin harrish roie theateragh feie 30 laaghyn myr freggyrt rish pandemagh COVID-19. Chammah's shen, v'eh skeaylt magh ayns cummaghyn 3D, 2D as D-BOX. Hooar eh ny smoo na $256 millioonyn er feie ny Cruinney noi bushaid er $120–150 millioonyn, as hooar eh ny smoo rah hraghtee tra v'eh skeaylt magh er Disney+ er 24 Nollick 2021. Va'n cassan-sheean feer ennoil as hie eh er roshtyn y chied ynnyd er y "Billboard" 200 ayns ny Steatyn Unnaneysit as ny kaartyn Compilation Albums 'sy Reeriaght Unnaneysit; v'ad "We Don't Talk About Bruno" as "Surface Pressure" yn daa arrane smoo ennoil as ad er roshtyn baare ny kaartyn "Billboard" Hot 100 ayns ny Steatyn Unnaneysit as y UK Singles Chart 'sy Reeriaght Unnaneysit feie shiartanse dy hiaghtinyn.

Sydney to the Max:
She straih hellveeish aittys Americaanagh eh Sydney to the Max. Va'n straih crooit ec Mark Reisman as hie eh magh er ny scaalheaney er Disney Channel eddyr 25 Jerrey Geuree 2019 as 26 Sauin 2021. Ta Ruth Righi, Ava Kolker, Jackson Dollinger, Christian J. Simon, Ian Reed Kesler, as Caroline Rhea cloie 'sy straih.

Bizaardvark:
She straih hellveeish aittys Americaanagh eh Bizaardvark. Va'n straih crooit ec Kyle Stegina as Josh Lehrman as hie eh magh er ny scaalheaney da'n chied cheayrt er Disney Channel er 24 Mean Souree 2016. Hie yn straih er ny scaalheaney feie tree straih goaill stiagh 63 episodeyn as haink jerrey lhee er 13 Averil 2019. Ta'n straih goaill stiagh ny cloiederyn Madison Hu, Olivia Rodrigo, Jake Paul, DeVore Ledridge, Ethan Wacker, Maxwell Simkins, as Elie Samouhi.

K.C. Undercover:
She straih hellveeish aittys Americaanagh eh K.C. Undercover. Va'n straih crooit ec Corinne Marshall as hie eh magh er ny scaalheaney er Disney Channel eddyr 18 Jerrey Geuree 2015 as 2 Toshiaght Arree 2018. Mastey ny h-ard-chloiederyn t'ayn, t'ad goaill stiagh Zendaya, Veronica Dunne, Kamil McFadden, Trinitee Stokes, Tammy Townsend, as Kadeem Hardison.

Best Friends Whenever:
She straih hellveeish aittys Americaanagh eh Best Friends Whenever, Va'n straih crooit ec Jed Elinoff as Scott Thomas as hie eh magh er ny scaalheaney er Disney Channel voish 26 Mean Souree 2015 derrey 11 Nollick 2016. Ta'n straih goaill stiagh ny cloiederyn Landry Bender, Lauren Taylor, Gus Kamp, Ricky Garcia, Benjamin Cole Royer, as Matthew Lewis Royer.

Shake It Up (straih hellveeish Americaanagh):
She sitcom Americaanagh eh Shake It Up (ny Shake It Up! myr t'eh ry-akin keayrtyn). Hie yn straih er ny scaalheaney da'n chied cheayrt er Disney Channel voish 7 Sauin 2010 derrey 10 Sauin 2013. Va'n straih crooit ec Chris Thompson as t'ad Bella Thorne as Zendaya ny h-ard-chloiederyn ayn. Ta skeeal y straih geiyrt er contoyrtyssyn CeCe Jones (Bella Thorne) as Rocky Blue (Zendaya) as ad cloie daunseyryn cooylrey er claare ynnydagh, "Shake It Up Chicago". Ta'n skeeal geiyrt er nyn lhag-haghyrtyn er as çheumooie jeh'n sett as nyn drubbylyn as nyn staydys sheshoil 'sy scoill. Ta Davis Cleveland, Roshon Fegan, Adam Irigoyen, Kenton Duty, as Caroline Sunshine cloie karacteyryn elley 'sy straih.

Gabby Duran &amp; the Unsittables:
She straih hellveeish aittys far-skeealaght heanse Americaanagh eh Gabby Duran & the Unsittables. Va'n straih crooit ec Mike Alber as Gabe Snyder as hie ee er ny skeaylley magh er Disney Channel voish 11 Jerrey Fouyir 2019 derrey 26 Sauin 2021. Ta'n straih bunnit er y noaskeeal "Gabby Duran and the Unsittables" liorish Elise Allen as Daryle Conners, as t'ee goaill stiagh ny cloiederyn Kylie Cantrall, Maxwell Acee Donovan, Callan Farris, Coco Christo, Valery Ortiz, as Nathan Lovejoy.

Rock Dog:
She scannane aittys voish y vlein 2016 ta bioghit lesh co-earrooder eh Rock Dog (Sheenish aashit: 摇滚藏獒; Sheenish hradishoonagh: 搖滾藏獒; pinyin: Yáogǔn Zàng'áo dy lettyragh "Masteen Tibetagh Rock and Roll"). Va'n scannane gientit liorish Mandoo Pictures as Huayi Brothers as v'eh stiurit ec Ash Brannon 'sy chied obbyr stiuree echey voish script liorish Brannon as Kurt Voelker. Ta'n scannane goaill stiagh gooyn J. K. Simmons, Luke Wilson, Eddie Izzard, Lewis Black, Kenan Thompson, Mae Whitman, Jorge Garcia, Matt Dillon, as Sam Elliott. 

Yn Impiraght Ghoaldagh:
Va'n Impiraght Ghoaldagh () jeant seose jeh çhiarnyssyn, coloinyn crooinagh, çheeraghyn coadit, annaghyn, as thallooyn croghagh elley fo goll er reirey ny stiurey liorish y Reeriaght Unnaneysit as ny steatyn hie roish. Hoshee ee lesh shellooyn harrish-mooir as stashoonyn traghtee va currit er bun liorish Reeriaght Hostyn eddyr y 16oo eash yeianagh as y 18oo eash lheah.
Ec mullagh e cummaght, she ish va'n impiraght smoo er y theihll v'ayn rieau as, harrish ny smoo na keead bleeaney, she ish va ard-phooar y theihill. 'Sy vlein 1913 ren yn Impiraght Ghoaldagh goaill reirey harrish ny smoo na 412 villioon sleih, ny 23% jeh pobble ny cruinney ec y traa, as 'sy vlein 1920 ren eh coodaghey 35,500,000 km2 (13,700,000 mi ker), ny 24& jeh eaghtyr thallooin ny cruinney. Myr eiyrtys er shen, ta sheckteraght chultooragh, hengoaylleeagh, leighoil, as vunraghtoil yn Impiraght Ghoaldagh ry-gheddyn dy lheeadagh. Ec mullagh e pooar, v'eh currit sheese er myr "yn impiraght raad nagh vel y ghrian lhie", er-yn-oyr dy row y ghrian soilsheeney er feeu nane jeh ny thallooyn eck.

Hari Nef:
She aghteyr, craishteyder, as screeudeyr Americaanagh ee Hari Nef (ruggit er 21 Jerrey Fouyir 1992). Va'n chied phaart mooar cloie eck myr 'sy straih vunneydagh "Transparent" liorish Amazon, raad v'ee enmyssit son aundyr SAG ayns 2016. Ren ee shooyl er y roievollagh da'n chied cheayrt ec Shiaghtin Fassan York Noa ayns Arragh 2015, raad ren ee shooyl er son Hood By Air as Eckhaus Latta, as lurg shen haink urree dy ve ny ben hessen-cheintyssagh oshlit ren screeu conaant marish IMG Models. Haink urree dy ve ny chied ben hessen-cheintyssagh hie magh er coodagh earishlioar vooar Ghoaldagh. Ta Nef er screeu mychione ram bun-chooishyn voish yn ellyn veein as y scannaneaght dys y cheintys, y cheintyssaght, as yn enney tessen-cheintyssagh.

Jazz Jennings:
She persoonid YouTube, craishteyder loayrtagh, persoonid çhellveeish, as immeaghtagh Americaanagh er son cairyn LADT ee Jazz Jennings (ruggit er 6 Jerrey Fouyir 2000). She Jennings fer jeh ny deiney s'aa va recortyssit as enney tessen-cheintyssagh eck.
Ta Jennings cuirrey straih feeshan er YouTube bentyn rish e seihll enmyssit "I Am Jazz". Ta Jennings cloie 'sy straih hellveeish rieughid "I Am Jazz" liorish TLC, ta jeeraghey er e seihll marish e lught thie myr jeigeyr as myr aeglagh tessen-cheintyssagh. Hie yn straih magh er ny scaalheaney er 15 Jerrey Souree 2015.

Janet Mock:
Janet Mock (ruggit er 10 Mayrnt 1983), she screeudeyr, cuirreyder çhellveeish, stiureyder, gienteyder, as immeeaghtagh er son cairyn tessen-cheintyssagh Americaanagh t'ee. Haink er e chied lioar, y lioar chooinaghtyn "Redefining Realness", dy ve coonit myr lioar creck erskyn insh lesh y "New York Times". She reagheyder cohoyrtagh lesh "Marie Claire" t'ee as eear-reagheyder fwirran lesh ynnyd-eggey yn earishlioar "People".

John Leguizamo:
John Alberto Leguizamo Peláez (ruggit er 22 Jerrey Souree 1960), she aghteyr, fer aitt, gienteyder, as screeudeyr Americaanagh t'eh. Haink foaynoo mooar er tra ren eh cloie 'sy scannane "Super Mario Bros." (1993) myr Luigi, as tra ren eh cloie paart co-hassooagh 'sy drama kimmeeys "Carlito's Way" (1993). Ny s'anmey 'sy theihll echey, ren eh cloie 'sy scannane "To Wong Foo, Thanks for Everything! Julie Newmar" (1995), raad hooar eh enmyssaght son Aundyr Golden Globe son yn Aghteyr Co-hassooagh Share. Lurg shen, ren eh cloie ayns "Romeo + Juliet" (1996), "A Brother's Kiss" (1997), "Body Count" (1998), "Summer of Sam" (1999), "Moulin Rouge!" (2001), "Collateral Damage" (2002), "The Alibi" (2006), "Righteous Kill" (2008), "Repo Men" (2010), "The Counselor" (2013), as "John Wick" (2014). T'eh er chiarail obbyr ghoo myr Sid the Sloth 'sy straih scannane bioghit "Ice Age" (2002–2016), myr insheyder y sitcom "The Brothers García" (2000–2004), as myr Bruno ayns "Encanto" (2021). Va paart aa-filley ec Leguizamo er "ER" as er "The Kill Point". Ta enney mie er chammah son e phaart myr Ozzy Delvecchio er "Bloodline".

Amiyah Scott:
She aghteyr, craishteyder, ughtar, as daunseyr Americaanagh ee Amiyah Scott (ruggit er 11 Jerrey Geuree 1988). Ta enney mie urree son e faare er appyn ym-ysseraght heshoil lheid as Instagram, myr dooinney ennoil ayns boodeys shamyr ghaunse LADT, as er son e paart myr Cotton 'sy straih hellveeish "Star" (2016–2019) liorish Fox. Va paart eck chammah 'sy hoghtoo straih jeh "The Real Housewives of Atlanta."

Alexis Lewis:
She ynlaghteyr, cosneyder margaghyn sheanse, as loayrtagh pobbylagh Americaanagh ee Alexis Lewis. Ta enney share urree son e sheealtaght er son ynsagh ynlaght as e ynlaghtyn deinchaarjoil. T'eh er fys dy ren ee kiarail loayrtyn ec y Thie Bane, y Smithsonian, SXSW, y National Maker Faire, y Social Innovation Summit ayns 2018, as taghyrtyn TEDx.

Lena Raine:
She cummeyder, gienteyder, as lhiasseyder gamman-feeshan Americaanagh ee Lena "Kuraine" Raine (ruggit er 29 Toshiaght Arree 1984), ny Lena Chappelle, ennym elley t'ec. T'ee mie er enney son yn obbyr ec er cassanyn-sheean ny gammanyn-feeshan "Celeste" as "Guild Wars 2". T'ee er chummey kiaull son gammanyn-feeshan elley, goaill stiagh "Minecraft, Deltarune," as "".

Nikita Dragun:
Nikita Nguyen (ruggit er 31 Jerrey Geuree 1996) ta goll er enney dy keirdagh myr Nikita Dragun, she persoonid YouTube, ellyneyr cosmaidagh, as craishteyder Americaanagh t'ee.
Bea leah.
Va Nguyen ruggit 'sy Velg as hie ee er yn ard-scoill 'sy Virjeeney ayns ny Steatyn Unnaneysit. She jeh sluight Vietnamagh as Meksicagh t'ee, as haink ee magh myr ben hessen-cheintyssagh tra v'ee foast ny jeigeyr. Ayns shiartanse jeh ny feeshanyn YouTube eck, t'ee er loayrt mychione e caghlaays.

Hans Zimmer:
She cummeyder as gienteyder kiaull cassan-sheean fillym Germaanagh eh Hans Florian Zimmer (ruggit er 12 Mean Fouyir 1957). Ta daa Oscar as kiare Grammy er nyn gosney echey, as t'eh er ve enmyssit son daa Emmy as Aundyr Tony. Chammah's shen, va Zimmer currit er y rolley Top 100 Living Geniuses, hie magh er ny hoilshaghey liorish "The Daily Telegraph".
Ta enney mooar er ny h-obbraghyn echey er oyr mestey kiaull lectraneagh marish sheeaneyn reaghyssyn kiaullaneagh tradishoonagh. Voish ny 1980yn, ta Zimmer er chummey kiaull son ny smoo na 150 fillym. Ta ny h-obbraghyn echey goaill stiagh "The Lion King", "Gladiator", "The Last Samurai", straih filmyn "Pirates of the Caribbean", treeskeealag "The Dark Knight", "Inception", "Interstellar" as "Dunkirk". Ren eh cosney Aundyr Academy son "Dune" ayns 2022.

Nicole Maines:
She aghteyr as immeeaghtagh Americaanagh er son cairyn tessen-cheintyssagh ee Nicole Amber Maines (ruggit er 7 Jerrey Fouyir 1997). Roish e coorse aghteyrys, she ish va'n aghinagh neuennymagh 'sy chooish leighoil "Doe v. Regional School Unit 26" ayns Ard-chooyrt Vriwnyssagh Maine, raad ren ee arganey nagh row e slyst scoill lowit kied stiagh dys y çhamyr oonlee ven y yiooldey er-yn-oyr dy nee ben hessencheintyssagh ee. Ren y chooyrt briwnyssey ayns 2014 dy row jiooldey scollagyn tessen-cheintyssagh voish shamyryn oonlee ta co-reggyrt rish nyn enney keintyssagh neuleighoil, y chied vriwnys jeh'n torçh shen liorish cooyrt steat.
Myr aghteyr, ta Maines cloie Nia Nal er y straih far-feniagh "Supergirl" (2018–2021) liorish The CW eddyr y chiarroo as y hoghtoo straih. She ish ta'n chied dooinney ren cloie far-feniagh tessen-cheintyssagh er y çhellveeish.

Trace Lysette:
She aghteyr as ellyneyr recortyssey Americaanagh ee Trace Lysette (ruggit er 2 Jerrey Fouyir 1987). Ta ny paartyn smoo ennoil eck goaill stiagh Shea 'sy straih hellveeish "Transparent" (2014–2019) as Tracey 'sy scannane "Hustlers" (2019). T'ee er ny ghoaill ayrn myr ish hene 'sy scannane feanishagh "" liorish Netflix.

Teddy Quinlivan:
She craishteyder Americaanagh ee Theodora "Teddy" Quinlivan. V'ee feddynit magh ayns 2015 liorish Nicolas Ghesquière, stiureyder crootagh Louis Vuitton.
Coorse bea.
Ayns Mean Fouyir 2017, haink Quinlivan magh myr ben hessen-cheintyssagh. Ren Ghesquière, y kiaddeyder Marc Jacobs, yn ellyneyr cosmaidagh Pat McGrath, as sleih elley 'sy çhynskyl fassan cur moylley er e fogrey magh.
T'ee er hooyl son kiaddeyderyn lheid as Carolina Herrera, Jeremy Scott, Jason Wu, Dior, Louis Vuitton, as Saint Laurent.
Ayns 2019, haink er Quinlivan dy ve ny chied chraishteyder tessen-cheintyssagh dy foshlit ve faillt liorish Chanel.
V'ee rhenkit mastey ny craishteyderyn "Top 50" liorish models.com.
Ren Quinlivan gialdyn dy nee ee cur jerrey rish yn obbyr eck lesh kiaddeyder ny cowrey erbee ta gobbraghey lesh sleih as cassid drogh-ymmyrkey keintyssagh jeant orroo er-yn-oyr dy row ee oayllagh rish.
Bea phersoonagh.
Va Quinlivan troggit ayns Shrewsbury, Massachusetts. Ren ee studeyrys er yn ellyn ayns Scoill Ellynyn Walnut Hill. T'ee beaghey ayns Caayr York Noa.

Andrea James:
She gienteyder fillym, screeudeyr blog, as immeeaghtagh Americaanagh er son cairyn tessen-cheintyssagh ee Andrea Jean James (ruggit er 16 Jerrey Geuree 1967).
Bea leah.
Va James troggit ayns Franklin, Indiana, as hie ee dys Colleish Wabash, raad ren ee e mooar-studeyryssyn er y Vaarle, y Ladjyn, as y Ghreagish. Erreish j'ee keim y gheddyn ayns 1989, hooar ee M.A. 'sy Vaarle as 'sy lettyraght voish Ollooscoill Chicago.
Coorse bea.
Lurg e studeyryssyn, hie James gobbraghey 'sy toilsheenys, da'n chied cheayrt feie shiartanse dy vleeantyn ec y "Chicago Tribune", as lurg shen feie jeihaght ec DDB Chicago. Hoshee ee e caghlaays tra v'ee gobbraghey ayn. Haink urree dy ve ayndagh 'syn immeeaghtys kionnee, as anaase eck 'sy volteyrys lheeys as acadoil. Ayns 1996 ren ee croo Transsexual Road Map, ynnyd-eggey ceaueyder son y voodeeys tessen-cheintyssagh, as ny s'anmey ren ee cur er bun HairFacts as HairTell, ynnyd-eggey as forym resoonaght bentyn rish scughey fuilt.
Ren James arraghey dys Los Angeles ayns 2003 raad ren ee co-vunnaghey Deep Stealth Productions marish e cumraag shamyr, yn ughtar as y eunysseyr Calpernia Addams, son stoo y chroo t'er yeeraghey dys y voodeeys tessen-cheintyssagh. Ren ad feeshan ynsee, "Finding Your Female Voice", son ynsagh goo y hoyrt da mraane tessen-cheintyssagh, as ayns 2004 ren ee cloie mastey yn chied wirran ooilley-hessencheintyssagh jeh "The Vagina Monologues", as ad cur er mayrn peesh va crooit ec Eve Ensler. Va James ny co-ghienteyder as ny aghteyr ayns "Beautiful Daughters", scannane feanishagh bentyn rish y haghyrt.
Ayns 2004, ren James cur er bun y colught neuvondeishagh GenderMedia Foundation. Blein ny yei, v'ee ny coyrlagh script son "Transamerica" (2005), cur cooney da'n aghteyr Felicity Huffman aarlaghey da'n phaart eck myr ben hessen-cheintyssagh. Va paart eck 'sy scannane feanishagh "" (2005) liorish HBO, as ayns 2007 ren ee stiurey scannane shiaght minnidyn, "Casting Pearls". She gienteyder coyrlagh as commagh v'ee 'sy straih hellveeish hooree rieughid "Transamerican Love Story" er y vollagh çhellveeish bun-earrooagh Logo ayns 2008. Ayns 2009, ren ee stiurey giare-scannane elley, "Transproofed".
Ayns 2007, va James pointit mastey Boayrd ny Stiureyderyn er TransYouth Family Allies, reagheydys neuvondeishagh ta pohlldey yn aegid hessen-cheintyssagh as nyn lughtyn thie, as ayns 2008 v'ee pointit mastey Boayrd ny Stiureyderyn er Outfest, raad v'ee ayndagh ayns aa-vioghey yn scannane feanishagh "Queens at Heart". Ayns 2012 ren ee co-vunnaghey Thought Moment Media. Ren ee stiurey yn scannane consert "" (2015) liorish Showtime.

Florencia de la V:
Florencia Trinidad (ruggit er 2 Mayrnt 1976), ta ny share er enney fo'n ennym ardan eck Flor de la V, she aghteyr, persoonid çhellveeish, ben aitt, as vedette Argenteenagh t'ee. V'ee feddynit magh ayns 1998 liorish Gerardo Sofovich ayns Buenos Aires as hooar ee anchoodaghey ym-ysseraght as paartyn çhellveeish beggey myr eiyrtys. Er oyr e paart ayns "Los Roldán", hooar ee enney mooar eddyrashoonagh. Harrish ny bleeantyn, haink urree dy ve feer ennoil ayns thieyn er feie yn Argenteen.

Stephen Root:
She aghteyr Americaanagh eh Stephen Root (ruggit er 17 Sauin 1951). T'eh er chloie Jimmy James er y sitcom çhellveeish "NewsRadio", Milton Waddams 'sy scannane "Office Space" (1999), as t'eh er chiarail gooyn Bill Dauterive as Buck Strickland er y straih vioghit "King of the Hill" (1997–2010). Ta e phaartyn elley goaill stiagh Capt. K'Vada 'syn episode daa-ayrnagh "" (1991) jeh'n straih ', shiartanse dy phaartyn ayns scannaneyn lesh ny Braaraghyn Coen goaill stiagh Mr. Lund ayns "O Brother, Where Art Thou?" (2000), Gordon Pibb ayns ' (2004), Hawthorne Abendsen ayns straihyn 2–4 jeh'n straih "The Man in the High Castle", Jim Hudson ayns "Get Out" (2017), as paartyn co-hassooagh ayns ram straihyn HBO, goaill stiagh "Boardwalk Empire", "True Blood", "Perry Mason", as "Succession". Ec y traa t'ayn, t'eh cloie Monroe Fuches / The Raven er y straih ghoo-aittys "Barry" (2018–jiu) liorish HBO.

Lara Sajén:
She arraneyder, daunseyr, as commagh straih rieughagh Argenteenagh as Spaainagh ee Lara Sajén Fleitas (ruggit er 22 Mean Fouyir 1977 ayns Campana, Buenos Aires 'syn Argenteen).

Estelle Asmodelle:
She yl-oayllee Austrailagh ee Estelle Asmodelle, hie er enney myr Estelle Maria Croot rieau. She craishteyder, aghteyr, daunseyr builg, kiaulleyder, immeeaghtagh, ellyneyr as fishigagh t'ee. Haink urree dy ve ny chied dooinney tessen-cheintyssagh va ennit dy h-oikoil as recortyssit lesh Rheynn Ruggyryn, Baaseyn as Poosaghyn Vretyn Yiass Noa er 13oo Jerrey Fouyir 1987. Ayns 1986, va'n enmys "Australia’s First Sex-Change Pin-up Girl" bronnit urree. V'eh raait dy nee ish y dooinney tessen-cheintyssagh as y mooad fotografyn smoo jeant jee 'syn Austrail. She peiagh arganeagh v'ee car ny 1980yn as, rere shen, ta e skeeal er ve ry-gheddyn ayns lioaryn chammah.

Georgie Stone:
She aghteyr, screeudeyr, as immeeaghtagh Austrailagh er son cairyn tessen-cheintyssagh ee Georgie Robertson Stone. Tra v'ee At the age of 10, Stone was the youngest bleeaney d'eash, haink urree dy ve ny dooinney s'aa lhiettalyssyn broddagh y gheddyn 'syn Austrail.

Angelica Ross:
She aghteyr, delleyder, as immeeaghtagh Americaanagh er son cairyn tessen-cheintyssagh ee Angelica Ross (ruggit er 28 Sauin 1980). She claareyder co-earrooder hene-ynsit t'ee, as she bunneyder as AOS y cholught TransTech Social Enterprises t'ee, colught ta cur cooney da failley deiney tessen-cheintyssagh 'sy çhynskyl çhaghnoaylleeaght.
Hoshee e coorse aghteyrys eck 'sy straih voggyl "Her Story" (2016), as ny s'anmey hooar ee tooilley enney as moylley mooar son e paartyn ayns 'sy straih drama "Pose" (2018–2021) as y straih atçhim haglit "American Horror Story" (2019–jiu), y daa jeu er nyn gur magh liorish FX.

Andréa Furet:
She aghteyr Frangagh ee Andréa Furet (ruggit er 11 Mean Souree 2002). Ta enney urree son e paart 'sy scannane çhellveeish "Il est elle" liorish Clément Michel ayns 2020, scannane ta bunnit er cooishyn yn enney tessen-cheintyssagh.

Isis King:
She craishteyder, aghteyr, as kiaddeyder fassan Americaanagh ee Isis King (ruggit er 1 Jerrey Fouyir 1985). T'ee mie er enney son y chooid smoo son e paart er y chlaare çhellveeish rieughid "America's Next Top Model", raad v'ee ny chied ven hessen-cheintyssagh cohirrey er y chlaare as haink urree dy ve fer jeh ny deiney tessen-cheintyssagh share ennit er y çhellveeish.

Venus Lux:
She aghteyr pornograafagh, stiureyder, gienteyder, as ynseyder Americaanagh ee Venus Lux (ruggit er 10 Jerrey Fouyir 1990).
Bea aeg.
Va Lux ruggit as troggit ayns San Francisco, California, as t'ee jeh sluight Sheenagh as Mongoilagh. She paitçhey ynrican t'ee. Ren ee obbraghey myr cumraag, myr rooishteyder, as myr ben lhionney roish hie ee stiagh 'sy çhynskyl pornograafagh.

Anetta Keys:
She aa-aghteyr pornograafagh as craishteyder an-ghraagh Sheckagh ee Anetta Keys (ruggit myr Aneta Šmrhová ayns Křivoklát, y Phobblaght Çheck er 18 Sauin 1983).

Divinity Love:
She aa-aghteyr pornograafagh as craishteyder an-ghraagh Sheckagh ee Divinity Love (ruggit 'sy Phobblaght Çheck er 11 Toshiaght Arree 1986).

Maria Mia:
She aa-aghteyr pornograafagh as craishteyder an-ghraagh Germaanagh ee Maria Mia (ayns Berleen, y Ghermaan er 25 Mean Fouyir 1980).

Lucie Theodorová:
She aa-aghteyr pornograafagh as craishteyder an-ghraagh Sheckagh ee Lucie Theodorová (ruggit ayns Studénka, y Phobblaght Çheck er 18 Nollick 1982).

Angels Sydney:
She aa-aghteyr pornograafagh as craishteyder an-ghraagh Frangagh ee Angels Sydney (ruggit ayns Saint-Amarin, y Rank er 7 Sauin 1982).

Christie Lee:
She aa-aghteyr pornograafagh as craishteyder an-ghraagh Canadagh ee Christie Lee (ruggit myr Pamela Lee ayns Greater Sudbury, Ontario er 16 Mean Fouyir 1984).

Roxy Panther:
She aa-aghteyr pornograafagh as craishteyder an-ghraagh Ungaaragh ee Roxy Panther (ruggit myr Szandra Óhidi ayns Budapest, yn Ungaar er 20 Jerrey Fouyir 1987).

Terri Summers:
She aa-aghteyr pornograafagh as craishteyder an-ghraagh Ollanagh ee Terri Summers (ruggit myr Judith Teresa Jasper ayns Amsterdam, y Çheer Injil er 13 Jerrey Geuree 1976).

Eve Angel:
She aa-aghteyr pornograafagh as craishteyder an-ghraagh Ungaaragh ee Eve Angel (ruggit myr Éva Dobos ayns Budapest, yn Ungaar er 19 Boaldyn 1983).

Foscadh:
She scannane drama Yernagh voish y vlein 2021 eh Foscadh ("Fastee"; ta goll er screeu myr Foscaḋ chammah, y lettyraghey shendeeagh rere y çhenn-chlou) ta bunnit er ny karacteyryn voish y noaskeeal "The Thing about December" liorish Donal Ryan. Hie yn scannane er ny skeaylley magh ec y Galway Film Fleadh er 23 Jerrey Souree 2021. V'eh reiht myr y reihys Yernagh son Best International Feature Film ec ny h-Aundyryn Academy.

Sofia Wylie:
She aghteyr as daunseyr Americaanagh ee Sofia Christine Wylie (ruggit er 7 Jerrey Geuree 2004). Hoshee yn coorse eck 'sy daunse roish my dooar ee enney mooar cloie paart y characteyr Buffy Driscoll er y straih drama aittys "Andi Mack" (2017-2019) er y Disney Channel.
Ta Wylie er ve gobbraghey marish Disney, as ta e paartyn goaill stiagh Cory Bailey 'sy scannane "Back of the Net" (2019), Riri Williams 'sy chiartys dellal bioghit "Marvel Rising", Mia Brooks 'sy straih voggyl "Shook" (2019), as Gina Porter 'sy straih far-eanishagh liorish Disney+, "" (2019–).

Joshua Bassett:
She aghteyr as arraneyder Americaanagh eh Joshua T. Bassett (ruggit er 22 Nollick 2000). Ta enney mie er son e phaart myr Ricky Bowen ayns "".

Matt Cornett:
She arraneyder as aghteyr Americaanagh eh Matt Cornett (ruggit er 6 Jerrey Fouyir 1998). T'eh cloie Emorgle Jock Caswell (nicknamed E.J.) er y straih far-feanishagh Disney+, "."

Larry Saperstein:
She aghteyr Americaanagh eh Laurence Benjamin Saperstein (ruggit er 12 Averil 1998). Ta enney mie er son e phaart myr Big Red 'sy straih far-eanishagh Disney+, "".

Julia Lester:
She aghteyr as arraneyder Americaanagh ee Julia Rose Lester (ruggit er 28 Jerrey Geuree 2000). Ta enney share urree son e paart myr Ashlyn Caswell 'sy straih Disney+, "".

Dara Reneé:
She aghteyr Americaanagh ee Dara Reneé (ruggit er 7 Sauin 2000). Ta enney mie urree son e paart myr Kourtney Greene 'sy straih far-eanishagh Disney+, "".

Frankie A. Rodriguez:
She aghteyr Americaanagh eh Frankie A. Rodriguez. Ta enney mie er son e phaart myr Carlos Rodriguez er y straih Disney+, "".

Kate Reinders:
She aghteyr as arraneyder Americaanagh ee Kate Reinders (ruggit er 10 Nollick 1980). Ren ee cloie yn cloieder toshee as y cloieder ynnyd ayns ram cloiaghyn Broadway. Va Reinders ruggit ayns Seattle, Washington, agh troggit ayns Spring Lake, Michigan. Ren ee goll dys Western Michigan Christian High School, as dirree magh lesh keim ayns 1998.

Joe Serafini:
She aghteyr Americaanagh eh Joseph Ronald Serafini (ruggit er 22 Jerrey Geuree 1998). Ta enney mie er son e phaart myr Seb Matthew-Smith 'sy straih Disney+, "".

The Goonies:
She scannane aittys contoyrtys Americaanagh voish y vlein 1985 eh The Goonies. Va'n scannane co-ghientit as stiurit ec Richard Donner voish scaa-chloie liorish Chris Columbus, bunnit er skeeal liorish Steven Spielberg. 'Sy scannane, ta paitçhyn ta beaghey ayns naboonys "Goon Docks" jeh'n valley Astoria, Oregon, geearree nyn dhieyn y hauail voish goaill stiagh gioldeeaght as, er y vollagh, t'ad ronsaghey magh caslys-çheerey tashtee ta stiurey ad er contoyrtys son berçhys caillt One-Eyed Willy, mooirchragheyder shenn-skeealagh voish y 17oo eash. Car y chontoyrtys, ta lught thie kimmee shirrey ad son y tashtey y ghoaill roosyn hene.

Jayde Nicole:
She craishteyder as delleyder Canadagh ee Jayde Nicole (ruggit myr Jayde Nicole Gelette-Ivany er 19 Toshiaght Arree 1986). V'ee reiht myr Playmate of the Month liorish "Playboy" son Jerrey Geuree 2007 as v'ee enmyssit myr Playmate of the Year 2008 ayns cur magh Mean Souree yn earishlioar fer.

Marley Brinx:
She aghteyr pornograafagh as craishteyder an-ghraagh Canadagh ee Marley Brinx (ruggit ayns Toronto, Ontario er 4 Luanistyn 1994).

Sunny Leone:
She aghteyr as craishteyder ayns çhynskylyn scannaneaght ny Steatyn Unnaneysit as yn Injey ee Karenjit Kaur Vohra (ruggit er 13 Boaldyn 1981), ta goll er enney fo'n ennym ardan Sunny Leone. She aa-aghteyr pornograafagh t'ee. V'ee ruggit 'sy Chanadey lesh lught thie Sikhagh Injinagh. Ta seyraanagh Canadagh as Americaanagh eck. She Karen yn ennym bigginagh eck. V'ee enmyssit Pet of the Year ec "Penthouse" ayns 2003, ren ee obbraghey myr cloieder conaantit lesh Vivid Entertainment, as v'ee enmyssit myr nane jeh'n 12 roltag phornograadagh share ayns 2010 liorish "Maxim".
T'ee er chloie paartyn ayns cruinnaghtyn, scannaneyn, as straihyn çhellveeish seyrey. Va'n chied phaart cadjin ayns 2005 tra ren ee obbraghey myr naighteyr son MTV Video Music Awards er MTV India. Ayns 2011, ren ee goaill ayrn 'sy straih hellveeish rieughid Injinagh "Bigg Boss". Chammah's shen, t'ee er chuirrey yn claare rieughid Injinagh "Splitsvilla".
Ayns 2012, chloie ee da'n chied cheayrt ayns Bollywood 'sy scannane creauagh an-ghraagh "Jism 2" (2012) liorish Pooja Bhatt as ren ee arraghey dys y chloie cadjin raad chloie ee ayns "Jackpot" (2013), "Ragini MMS 2" (2014), "Ek Paheli Leela" (2015), "Tera Intezaar" (2017), as y scannane Malayalamagh "Madhura Raja" ayns 2019.

Yazmene Milan:
She aa-aghteyr pornograafagh Injinagh ee Yazmene Milan (ruggit er 6 Averil 1981). Hoshee ee gobbraghey 'sy çhynskyl pornograafagh ayns 2004 as dirree ee magh ass ayns 2007.

Paige Ashley:
She aa-aghteyr pornograafagh as craishteyder an-ghraagh Albinagh ee Paige Ashley (ruggit ayns Glaschu er 12 Averil 1987). Hoshee ee gobbraghey 'sy çhynskyl pornograafagh ayns 2006 as dirree ee ass ayns 2018.

Georgie Lyall:
She aa-aghteyr pornograafagh as craishteyder an-ghraagh Albinagh ee Georgie Lyall (ruggit ayns Glaschu, Nalbin, er 30 Sauin 1984). Hoshee ee gobbraghey 'sy çhynskyl pornograafagh ayns 2013 as dirree ee ass ayns 2021.

Gemma Massey:
She aa-aghteyr pornograafagh as craishteyder an-ghraagh Sostynagh ee Gemma Massey (ruggit ayns Tamworth, Sostyn, er 30 Mean Fouyir 1984). Hoshee ee gobbraghey 'sy çhynskyl pornograafagh ayns 2009 as dirree ee ass ayns 2021.

Hannah Harper:
She aa-aghteyr pornograafagh, stiureyder scannane pornograafagh, as craishteyder an-ghraagh Sostynagh ee Hannah Harper (ruggit myr Samantha Hudson ayns Brixton, Sostyn, er 4 Jerrey Souree 1982). Hoshee ee gobbraghey 'sy çhynskyl pornograafagh myr cloieder ayns 2001 as dirree ee ass ayns 2015. Ren ee stiurey queig scannaneyn pornograafagh chammah eddyr ny bleeantyn 2004 as 2006.

Alexa Tomas:
She aa-aghteyr pornograafagh as craishteyder an-ghraagh Spaainagh ee Alexa Tomas (ruggit ayns Valencia, y Spaainey, er 19 Mayrnt 1985). Hoshee ee gobbraghey 'sy çhynskyl pornograafagh ayns 2013 as dirree ee ass ayns 2021.

Avy Lee Roth:
She aa-aghteyr pornograafagh as craishteyder an-ghraagh Spaainagh ee Avy Lee Roth (ruggit ayns Valencia, y Spaainey, er 1 Nollick 1979). Hoshee ee gobbraghey 'sy çhynskyl pornograafagh ayns 2003 as dirree ee ass ayns 2014.

Amarna Miller:
She persoonid YouTube as aa-aghteyr, gienteyder, stiureyder, as screeudeyr scannane pornograafagh Spaainagh ee Amarna Miller (ruggit ayns Madrid, y Spaainey, er 29 Jerrey Fouyir 1990). Hoshee ee gobbraghey 'sy çhynskyl pornograafagh ayns 2010 tra v'ee 19 bleeaney d'eash as dirree ee ass ayns 2017.

Stella Cox:
She aghteyr pornograafagh as craishteyder an-ghraagh Iddaalagh ee Stella Cox (ruggit 'sy Raue, yn Iddaal, er 7 Sauin 1990). Hoshee ee gobbraghey 'sy çhynskyl pornograafagh ayns 2013 tra v'ee 23 bleeaney d'eash.

Willem Dafoe:
She aghteyr Americaanagh eh William James Dafoe (ruggit er 22 Jerrey Souree 1955). She fowder ram accolaidyn t'eh, goaill stiagh Cappan Volpi son yn Aghteyr Share, goll rish enmyssaghtyn son kiare Aundyryn Academy, kiare Aundyryn y Screen Actors Guild, tree Aundyryn Golden Globes, as un Aundyr Scannane y British Academy. T'eh gobbraghey dy mennick marish ny jeantee scannane Paul Schrader, Abel Ferrara, Lars von Trier, Julian Schnabel, as Wes Anderson.
Ren eh cloie 'sy chied scannane echey ayns "Heaven's Gate" (1980), agh va'n raad lhiggit da car y ghientyn. Va'n chied phaart toshee echey 'sy scannane gleash-wheeyleyder jeebyrtagh "The Loveless" (1982) as ren eh cloie yn ard-noid ayns "Streets of Fire" (1984) as "To Live and Die in L.A." (1985). Hooar eh e chied enmyssaght son Aundyr Academy son e phaart myr Sarjant Elias Grodin 'sy scannane caggee "Platoon" (1986) liorish Oliver Stone. Ayns 1988, ren Dafoe cloie Yeesey ayns "The Last Temptation of Christ" liorish Martin Scorsese as ren eh co-chloie 'sy scannane "Mississippi Burning", as arganeyssyn mooarey bentyn roosyn ec y traa.

Joseph Gordon-Levitt:
She aghteyr as jeantagh scannane Americaanagh eh Joseph Leonard Gordon-Levitt (ruggit er 17 Toshiaght Arree 1981). T'eh er ny gheddyn ram accolaidyn, goaill stiagh enmyssaghtyn son Aundyryn Golden Globe son e chloiaghyn ayns "500 Days of Summer" (2009) as "50/50" (2011). 
Va Gordon-Levitt ruggit ayns Los Angeles lesh lught thie Ewagh, as hoshee eh cloie tra v'eh ny phaitçhey raad ren eh cloie ayns scannaneyn lheid as "A River Runs Through It" (1992), "Holy Matrimony" (1994), as "Angels in the Outfield" (1994). Ren eh cloie Tommy Solomon 'sy straih hellveeish "3rd Rock from the Sun" (1996–2001) raad ren eh geddyn tree enmyssaghtyn ec Aundyryn y Screen Actors Guild. Va paart co-hassooagh echey ayns "10 Things I Hate About You" (1999) as chur eh e ghoo rish Jim Hawkins 'sy scannane bioghit "Treasure Planet" (2002) liorish Disney roish my ghow eh brishey voish yn aghteyrys son studeyryssyn y yannoo ec Ollooscoill Columbia. Dirree eh ass yn ollooscoill gyn keim ayns 2004 son e choorse-bea y aavioghey.
Erreish da çheet er ash cloie, ren Gordon-Levitt cloie ayns "Manic" (2001), "Mysterious Skin" (2004), "Brick" (2005), "The Lookout" (2007), "The Brothers Bloom" (2008), "Miracle at St. Anna" (2008), "" (2009), "Inception" (2010), "Hesher" (2010), "Premium Rush" (2012), "The Dark Knight Rises" (2012), "Looper" (2012), as "Lincoln" (2012). Chloie eh Philippe Petit 'sy scannane "The Walk" (2015) as Edward Snowden 'sy scannane "Snowden" (2016). Ayns 2020, chloie eh 'sy drama leighoil "The Trial of the Chicago 7".

Valentina Nappi:
She aghteyr pornograafagh as craishteyder an-ghraagh Iddaalagh ee Valentina Nappi (ruggit ayns Scafati, yn Iddaal, er 6 Sauin 1990). Hoshee ee gobbraghey 'sy çhynskyl pornograafagh ayns 2012.

Sara Tommasi:
She aghteyr, persoonid çhellveeish, craishteyder, as aa-aghteyr pornograafagh Iddaalagh ee Sara Tommasi (ruggit ayns Narni, Umbria, yn Iddaal, er 9 Mean Souree 1981). Ren ee cloie da'n chied cheayrt 'sy scannane aitt "Ultimi della classe" (2008) raad chloie ee ynseyder v'er glackey fotografeeyn feaillere "çheh". Ayns 2010, ren ee cloie rooisht ayns episode jeh'n straih hellveeish "Crimini". Ayns ny bleeantyn 2012 as 2013, ren ee obbraghey myr aghteyr pornograafagh raad ren ee queig scannaneyn.

Sophie Moone:
She aa-aghteyr pornograafagh as craishteyder an-ghraagh Ungaaragh ee Sophie Moone (ruggit myr Renáta Somossy ayns Budapest, yn Ungaar, er 24 Nollick 1981). Hoshee ee gobbraghey 'sy çhynskyl pornograafagh ayns 2001 as dirree ee ass ayns 2013.

Aletta Ocean:
She aghteyr pornograafagh as craishteyder an-ghraagh Ungaaragh ee Aletta Ocean (ruggit myr Dóra Varga ayns Budapest, yn Ungaar, er 14 Nollick 1987). Hoshee ee gobbraghey 'sy çhynskyl pornograafagh ayns 2007.

Harrison Ford:
She aghteyr Americaanagh eh Harrison Ford (ruggit er 13 Jerrey Souree 1942). She fowder ram accolaidyn eh, goaill stiagh yn AFI Life Achievement Award as y Cecil B. DeMille Award, goll rish enmyssaghtyn son Aundyr Academy as kiare Aundyryn Golden Globe. T'eh er ve ny 'er toshee ayns scannaneyn jeh chooilley haanrey.
Lurg y chied cheim jeh'n choorse bea echey as eh cloie paartyn beggey as co-hassooagh, hooar Ford enney mooar tra ren eh cloie Han Solo 'sy scannane kiaulldramey spoar ard-skeealagh "Star Wars" (1977), as hie eh er oaie gaa-chloie yn paart shen ayns kiare scannaneyn eirtyssagh harrish y nah 42 vleeaney. Ta enney mooar er chammah son e huarystal myr Indiana Jones 'sy chiartys dellal ennymagh, goaill toshiaght lesh y scannane contoyrtys jantys "Raiders of the Lost Ark" (1981), as er son cloie karacteyryn elley ayns kiartyssyn dellal eigsoylagh, goaill stiagh Rick Deckard ayns ny scannaneyn far-skeealaght heanse jee-launyssagh "Blade Runner" (1982) as "Blade Runner 2049" (2017), as y karacteyr Jack Ryan liorish Tom Clancy ayns ny scannaneyn creauagh speeikearagh "Patriot Games" (1992) as "Clear and Present Danger" (1994). Ta e choorse bea goaill cha foddey sheear as shey jeihaghtyn as t'eh goaill stiagh co-obbraghyn marish fir jeh ny jeantee scannane s'ennoil 'sy traa shen, lheid as George Lucas, Francis Ford Coppola, Steven Spielberg, Ridley Scott, Peter Weir, Roman Polanski as Mike Nichols.
Ta Ford er chloie karacteyryn feniagh ayns scannaneyn elley lheid as ny scannaneyn creauagh "Witness" (1985), "The Fugitive" (1993), as "Air Force One" (1997), chammah's y drama spoyrt shendeeagh "42" (2013). Chammah's ny paartyn feniagh echey, t'eh er chloie paartyn ny s'dooey ayns scannaneyn lheid as y drama aittys appee "American Graffiti" (1973), y scannane creauagh co-chialgagh "The Conversation" (1974), y drama mayrnagh "The Mosquito Coast" (1986), y drama leighoil "Presumed Innocent" (1990), as y scannane creauagh anhickyrys erskyn-dooghyssagh "What Lies Beneath" (2000). Ta Ford er ghoaill ayrnyn ayns aittyssyn as dramaghyn romansagh car y choorse bea echey, goaill stiagh "Heroes" (1977), "Working Girl" (1988), "Sabrina" (1995), "Six Days, Seven Nights" (1998), "Random Hearts" (1999), "Morning Glory" (2010), as "The Age of Adaline" (2015).
Çheumooie jeh'n aghteyrys echey, ta kiedoonys etlagh ec Ford as dy mennick t'eh cur cooney da ny shirveishyn gear-cheim ayns mishoonyn sauail faggys da'n thie echey ayns Wyoming. She immeeaghtagh er son y çhymmyltaght t'eh, as t'eh er ghoaill shirveish myr y chied Lhiass-chaairliagh er Conservation International voish y vlein 1991.

Rip Torn:
She aghteyr Americaanagh va Elmore Rual "Rip" Torn Jr. (6 Toshiaght Arree 1931 – 9 Jerrey Souree 2019). Ren e choorse bea goll harrish 60 bleeantyn.
V'eh enmyssit son Aundyr Academy son yn Aghteyr Co-hassooagh Share son e phaart myr Marsh Turner ayns "Cross Creek" (1983). Ren eh cloie Artie yn gienteyder er "The Larry Sanders Show", raad v'eh enmyssit son shey Aundyryn Emmy, goaill stiagh fer va cosnit echey ayns 1996. Chammah's shen, ren eh cosney un American Comedy Award son y Fer Co-hassooagh S'aitt, as daa CableACE Award son yn obbyr echey er y chlaare, chammah as e phaartyn myr Zed 'sy chiartys dellal scannane "Men in Black" (1997–2002) as Patches O'Houlihan ayns "" (2004).

James Woods:
She aghteyr Americaanagh eh James Howard Woods (ruggit er 18 Averil 1947). Ta enney mie er son yn obbyr echey ayns gientynyn scannane, ardan, as çhellveeish eigsoylagh. Hoshee yn coorse bea echey lesh paartyn beggey er, as magh voish, Broadway. Ayns 1972, chloie eh er "The Trial of the Catonsville Nine" marish Sam Waterston as Michael Moriarty er Broadway. Ayns 1972 chossyn eh Theatre World Award son e chloie ayns "Moonchildren". Ayns 1978, ren Woods brishey stiagh er y çhellveeish marish Meryl Streep, cloie e fer sheshee 'sy vyn-straih ard-voyllagh "Holocaust". Hie yn straih er oaie geddyn Primetime Emmy Award for Outstanding Limited Series. Lurg e chied chloie scannane ayns "The Visitors" (1972) liorish Elia Kazan, ren eh cloie paartyn co-hassooagh ayns scannane, goaill stiagh "The Way We Were" liorish Sydney Pollack as "Night Moves" (1975) liorish Arthur Penn. 
Ayns 1979, hooar Woods ard-voylley son e phaart toshee myr Gregory Powell 'sy scannane creauagh kimmeeys "The Onion Field". Ren y cremeyder Roger Ebert cur moylley er Woods son y scannane shen, as dooyrt eh dy nee " schleioil er lheh" eh. Hooar Woods enmyssaght son Aundyr Golden Globe son e chloie. Car ny 1980yn, ren Woods cloie ayns scannaneyn lheid as "Videodrome" (1983) liorish David Cronenberg, "Once Upon a Time in America" (1984) liorish Sergio Leone, as "Salvador" (1986) liorish Oliver Stone, raad hooar eh e chied enmyssaght son Aundyr Academy. Car ny 1990yn, ren eh cloie paartyn karacteyr ayns "Chaplin" (1992) liorish Richard Attenborough, "Casino" (1995) liorish Martin Scorsese, "Nixon" (1995) liorish Oliver Stone, as "Vampires" (1998) liorish John Carpenter. Ayns 1997, hooar Woods e nah enmyssaght son Aundyr Academy son e chloie myr Byron De La Beckwith, y dunver as kiondeeaghteyr bane jeh'n 'er toshee 'sy ghleashaght cairyn theayagh, Medgar Evers, ayns "Ghosts of Mississippi" (1996) liorish Rob Reiner. Ren Woods goll er oaie cloie paartyn co-hassooagh ayns "Any Given Sunday" (1999) liorish Oliver Stone, "Contact" (1997) liorish Robert Zemeckis, "True Crime" liorish Clint Eastwood, as "The Virgin Suicides" (1999) liorish Sofia Coppola.
Ta enney mie er chammah son e phaartyn ayns scannaneyn çhellveeish lheid as Bill W. ayns "My Name is Bill W." (1989), Roy Cohn ayns "Citizen Cohn" (1992), as Rudy Giuliani ayns '. Er 20 Boaldyn 1995, ren Woods chloie y Turneyr Coadee Danny Davis ayns ', scannane va jeant da'n çhellveeish as hie magh er ny scaalheaney er HBO. Ayns 2011, ren eh cloie Dick Fuld ayns "Too Big to Fail" er HBO. Ren e chloie cossyn Aundyr Primetime Emmy, as Aundyr y Screen Actors Guild. Ta enney mie er chammah son e phaart toshee 'sy drama CBS "Shark" (2006–2008), as e phaartyn cuirreydagh aynss "Ray Donovan" (2013) liorish Showtime, chammah's e phaartyn goo ayns ny scannaneyn bioghit "Hercules" (1997), "" (2001), "Stuart Little 2" (2002), as "Surf's Up" (2007) as er son cloie eh hene er episodeyn eigsoylagh jeh ny straihyn çhellveeish "Family Guy" as "The Simpsons".

Tommy Lee Jones:
She aghteyr as stiureyder scannane Americaanagh eh Tommy Lee Jones (ruggit er 15 Mean Fouyir 1946). T'eh er gheddyn kiare enmyssaghtyn son Aundyryn Academy as ren eh cossyn Aundyr Academy son yn Aghteyr Co-hassooagh Share son e chloie myr Marshyl Samuel Gerard 'sy scannane creauagh "The Fugitive" (1993).
Ta e phaartyn ard-ghooagh elley goaill stiagh Rouailtagh Texas Woodrow F. Call 'sy vyn-straih hellveeish "Lonesome Dove", Agent K 'sy straih scannane "Men in Black", Shirrym Ed Tom Bell ayns "No Country for Old Men", Hank Deerfield ayns "In the Valley of Elah", y noid Two-Face ayns "Batman Forever", Mike Roark 'sy scannane cragh "Volcano", yn atçhimeyr William "Bill" Strannix ayns "Under Siege", Rouailtagh Texas Roland Sharp ayns "Man of the House", y ransher Pete Perkins ayns "The Three Burials of Melquiades Estrada" (va stiurit echey chammah), Curnal Chester Phillips ayns "", Stiureyder y CIA Robert Dewey ayns "Jason Bourne", as Warden Dwight McClusky ayns "Natural Born Killers". Er y gherrid, ren eh cloie 'sy scannane far-skeealaght heanse "Ad Astra" ayns 2019 as 'syn aittys "The Comeback Trail" ayns 2020.

Karl Urban:
She aghteyr ass y Teelynn Noa eh Karl-Heinz Urban (ruggit er 7 Mean Souree 1972). Hoshee e choorse bea lesh tuarystalyn ayns scannaneyn as straihyn çhellveeish Seelynnagh Noa lheid as '. Va'n chied phaart echey ayns Hollywood 'sy scannane atçhim "Ghost Ship" (2002). Voish shen, t'eh er chloie ayns ram scannaneyn ennoil, goaill stiagh y nah as y trass scannane 'sy treeskeealag "The Lord of the Rings" tra ren eh cloie Éomer. T'eh er chloie Leonard McCoy 'sy straih scannane aavioghit "Star Trek", Vaako 'sy straih scannane "Riddick", Judge Dredd ayns "Dredd", as Skurge ayns ' liorish Marvel Studios. Ayns 2013, ren eh cloie 'sy straih far-skeealagh heanse "Almost Human". Voish y vlein 2019, t'eh er chloie y caggeyder Billy Butcher 'sy straih strooanagh far-feniagh "The Boys" liorish Amazon.

Tomer Capone:
She aghteyr Israelagh eh Tomer Capone (Kapon ny Kappon ny Capon chammah, ; ruggit er 15 Jerrey Geuree 1985). T'eh er chloie ayns claareyn çhellveeish Israelagh ennoil lheid as "Hostages" as y straih hellveeish chreauagh pholitickagh "Fauda". Ayns 2016 va Aundyr Ophir bronnit er son yn Aghteyr Share ayns "One Week and a Day". T'eh cloie ayns "When Heroes Fly" as 'sy straih liorish Amazon, "The Boys".

Nollaig Ní Laoire:
She arraneyder as kiaulleyder Yernagh ee Nollaig Ní Laoire ta mie er enney ayns kiarkylyn arraneys y sean-nós.
Beashnys.
Va Nollaig ruggit ayns Dún Doire, faggys da Ráth Chairn ayns Coontae ny Mee ayns 1989. Ta'n chiaull eck voish yn aegid eck as ee beaghey faggys da Gaeltacht na Mí]] as dy mennick t'ee ry-chlashtyn as ry-akin ayns feaillaghyn as cruinnaghtyn. 
Ec y traa t'ayn, ta Nollaig gynsaghey ayns Gaelscoil ayns Cill Dhéagláin.
Arraneys.
She cosneyder Chorn Uí Riada ayns 2010 t'ee.
She Nollaig va'n dooinney s'aa rieau ren cosney Corn Uí Riada, as y chied dooinney rieau ass Coontae ny Mee ren cosney yn aundyr shen.

Erin Moriarty (aghteyr):
She aghteyr Americaanagh ee Erin Elair Moriarty (born June 24, 1994). T'ee mie er enney son e paart myr Annie January / Starlight 'sy straih "The Boys" (2019–jiu) liorish Amazon Prime Video, ta bunnit er y straih lioar scheimyn aitt fo'n ennym cheddin. Roish "The Boys", va paartyn ladoosagh eck ayns "Jessica Jones" (2015) liorish Netflix, "True Detective" (2014) liorish HBO, "Red Widow" (2013) liorish ABC. Çheumooie jeh'n çhellveeish, t'ee er chloie ayns shiartanse dy scannaneyn seyrey, goaill stiagh "The Kings of Summer" as cannane"Captain Fantastic", mastey scannaneyn elley.

Dominique McElligott:
She aghteyr Yernagh ee Dominique McElligott (ruggit er 5 Mayrnt 1986). Ta enney mie urree son e paartyn ayns ny straihyn "Raw" (2008), "Hell on Wheels" (2011–2012), "The Astronaut Wives Club" (2015), "House of Cards" (2016–2017), "The Last Tycoon" (2016), as "The Boys" (2019–2022).

Jack Quaid:
She aghteyr Americaanagh eh Jack Henry Quaid (ruggit er 24 Averil 1992). Ren eh e chied obbyr cloie tra ren eh cloie paart beg 'sy scannane jee-launyssagh "The Hunger Games" (2012) roish e phaart rahoil myr y kerreyder straiddey Hughie Campbell 'sy straih far-feniagh "The Boys" (2019–jiu) liorish Amazon Prime Video. Mastey paartyn elley, v'eh coontit myr ayrn jeh'n ard-wirran ayns "Vinyl" (2016) liorish HBO as va shiartanse dy phaartyn goo echey lheid as Brad Boimler ayns "" (2020–jiu). Ren eh cloie Richie Kirsch 'sy scannane fanntagh "Scream" (2022).

The Boys (straih hellveeish):
She straih hellveeish far-feniagh Americaanagh eh The Boys. Va'n straih lhiassit ec Eric Kripke son Amazon Prime Video as t'eh bunnit er y lioar scheimyn aitt fo'n ennym cheddin liorish Garth Ennis as Darick Robertson. Ta skeeal y straih geiyrt er possan kerreyderyn straiddey ta troddan noi sleih far-feniaghtagh ta jannoo drogh-ymmyd jeh ny pooaryn oc. Ta'n straih goaill stiagh possan d'aghteyryn ta goaill stiagh Karl Urban, Jack Quaid, Antony Starr, Erin Moriarty, Dominique McElligott, Jessie T. Usher, Chace Crawford, Laz Alonso, Tomer Capone, Karen Fukuhara, as Nathan Mitchell.

Antony Starr:
She aghteyr Seelynnagh Noa eh Antony Starr (ruggit er 25 Jerrey Fouyir 1975) ta mie er enney son e phaartyn çhellveeish. T'eh er chloie ny paartyn Jethro as Van West er "Outrageous Fortune" (2005-10), Lucas Hood er "Banshee" (2013-16), as Homelander er "The Boys" (2019-jiu).
Son e phaart 'sy scannane Austrailagh "Wish You Were Here" (2012), chossyn Starr Aundyr AACTA Award son yn Aghteyr Share ayns Paart Co-hassooagh, mastey accolaidyn elley. V'eh enmyssit son Aundyr Scannane y Teelynn Noa son yn Aghteyr Share son e chloie ayns "After the Waterfall" (2010).

Jessie T. Usher:
She aghteyr Americaanagh eh Jessie T. Usher Jr. (ruggit er 29 Toshiaght Arree 1992). Ren eh cloie Cam Calloway 'sy straih hellveeish "Survivor's Remorse" liorish Starz. Roish shen, ren eh cloie Lyle ayns "Level Up". Ayns 2014, ren eh goaill ayrn ayns "When the Game Stands Tall" as chur eh e ghoo rish American Boy ayns "Teenage". Ayns 2016, ren Usher co-chloie ayns "". Ec y traa t'ayn, t'eh cloie Reggie Franklin / A-Train 'sy straih "The Boys" liorish Amazon Prime Video.

Chace Crawford:
She aghteyr Americaanagh eh Christopher Chace Crawford (ruggit er 18 Jerrey Souree 1985). T'eh mie er enney son e huarystal myr Nate Archibald er y straih drama jeigeyr "Gossip Girl" liorish The CW. Chammah as shen, t'eh mie er enney son cloie ayns ny scannaneyn "The Covenant" (2006), "The Haunting of Molly Hartley" (2008), "Twelve" (2010), as "What to Expect When You're Expecting" (2012). Ayns 2015, ren eh cloie Billy LeFever 'sy straih drama ghiare-heiltagh "Blood & Oil" liorish ABC. Ayns 2019, hoshee eh cloie Kevin Moskowitz / The Deep 'sy straih "The Boys" liorish Amazon Prime Video.

Laz Alonso:
She aghteyr Americaanagh eh Lazaro "Laz" Alonso (ruggit er 25 Mayrnt 1974). Ta enney mie er son e huarystal myr Tsu'tey 'sy scannane far-skeealaght heanse "Avatar" liorish James Cameron as Fenix Calderon 'sy scannane "Fast & Furious". Va paartyn ayns scannane elley ec Alonso chammah, goaill stiagh "Jarhead", "This Christmas", "Miracle at St. Anna" as "Detroit". Ayns 2019, hoshee eh cloie myr nane jeh'n ard-wirran 'sy straih vunneydagh liorish Amazon Prime Video, "The Boys" raad t'eh cloie Marvin T. "MM (Mother's Milk)" Milk.

Karen Fukuhara:
She aghteyr Americaanagh ee . Ta enney share urree son e paartyn myr Tatsu Yamashiro / Katana 'sy scannane far-feniagh "Suicide Squad" (2016) as myr Kimiko Miyashiro 'sy straih vunneydagh liorish Amazon Prime, "The Boys" (2019–jiu). Ta enney mie urree chammah er-yn-oyr dy ren ee cur e goo rish y characteyr Glimmer voish y straih Netflix, "She-Ra and the Princesses of Power" as Kipo voish "Kipo and the Age of Wonderbeasts."

Jennifer Åkerman:
She craishteyder, screeudeyr blog, screeudeyr arrane, as arraneyder Soolynnagh ee Jennifer Johanna Åkerman (ruggit er 10 Jerrey Souree 1989). T'ee ny shuyr s'aa lesh y ven-chloieder Malin Åkerman.
Tra v'ee hoght bleeaney jeig d'eash, ren Åkerman arraghey dys Los Angeles raad ren ee studeyryssyn 'sy cholleish. Ren ee prowal cloie, agh ren jantys craishtee feddyn magh ee as voish shen t'ee er n'yannoo craishtey son shiartanse dy chowraghyn as soilsheenyn. Hug y craishtey ee dys Caayr York Noa as ny smoo obbyr chraishtee. Ec y traa cheddin, hoshee ee goaill arraneyn lesh y vann Bella Tech, as lurg shen, t'ee er ve goaill toshiaght lesh e bann hene, Bloke & Bird.
Ren Åkerman goaill ayrn myr daunseyr ennymoilagh 'sy chlaare daunse ennymoilagh "Let's Dance 2013" hie magh er ny scaalheaney er TV4. T'ee er ny screeu bloggyn son Veckorevyn, Chic as Metro Mode.

Emilia Schüle:
She aghteyr Germaanagh va ruggit 'sy Roosh ee Emilia Schüle (ruggit er 28 Sauin 1992 ayns Blagoveshchensk).
Coorse bea.
Va Emilia Schüle ruggit ayns 1992 'sy Roosh lesh lught thie Germaanagh. Tra v'ee un vlein d'eash, ren ee as e lught thie arraghey dys Berleen. Ghow ee ayrn ayns brastylyn daunse keirdey 'sy daunse noa-emshiragh, 'sy daunse straiddey, as 'sy vallay tra v'ee hoght bleeaney d'eash.
Erreish j'ee ayrn y ghoaill 'sy cheirdlann "Talents Getting Started" ayns 2005, ghow ee ayrn ayns shiartanse dy hoilsheenyn son Arcor, IKEA, Clearasil as Deutsche Telekom. Chloie ee ayns ny scannaneyn çhellveeish "Guten Morgen, Herr Grothe" as "Manatu – Nur die Wahrheit rettet dich" raad hooar ee e chied phaartyn toshee, as haink y chied ard-phaart ayns 2008 tra ren ee cloie marish Anke Engelke, Armin Rohde as Piet Klocke 'sy scannane "Freche Mädchen".
Haink y chied ard-phaart elley ayns 2009 'sy scannane "Gangs" myr Sophie, marish ny h-aghteyryn as braaraghyn aegey, Wilson Gonzalez as Jimi Blue Ochsenknecht. Ayns 2010 ren ee cloie ayns "Rock It!" as "Freche Mädchen 2".

Maya Diab:
She arraneyder pop-chiaull, eunysseyr, aghteyr, as persoonid çhellveeish Livaanagh ee Maya Diab (; ruggit er 12 Sauin 1980). She aa-oltey jeh'n phossan caillin Livaanagh The 4 Cats t'ee.

Alice Zeniter:
She noaskeealagh, çhyndaader, screeudeyr cloie, dramadeyr, as stiureyder Frangagh ee Alice Zeniter (ruggit ayns 1986).
T'ee er cosney yn undyr Prix Renaudot son deiney aegey son e trass noaskeeal, "Juste avant l'Oubli", as yn aundyr Prix Goncourt son deiney aasit aegey son e kiarroo noaskeeal, "L'Art de Perdre".
Ren Zeniter soilshey magh e chied noaskeeal, "Deux moins un égal zéro", tra v'ee 16 bleeaney d'eash. Va'n nah noaskeeal eck, "Jusque dans nos bras", soilshit magh ayns 2010 as çhyndaait dys y Vaarle myr "Take This Man".
Ren e noaskeeal s'noa, "L'Art de Perdre", cosney shiartanse d'aundyryn. V'eh soilshit magh 'sy Vaarle ayns 2021 myr "The Art of Losing", noaskeeal ren cosney j'ee Aundyr Lettyragh Eddyrashoonagh Ghivlyn marish e çhyndaader Frank Wynne.

Lisa Snowdon:
She çhebbeyder çhellveeish as radio as craishteyder fassan Sostynagh ee Lisa Snowdon (ruggit myr Lisa Snawdon er 23 Jerrey Geuree 1972). She cuirreyder y chlaare çhellveeish rieughagh "Britain's Next Top Model" liorish Living TV voish y vlein 2006 derrey 2009. Chammah's shen, ren ee co-hebbey "Capital Breakfast" er Capital London voish Luanistyn 2008 derrey 18 Nollick 2015.

Mandy Moore:
She arraneyder, screeudeyr arrane, as aghteyr Americaanagh ee Amanda Leigh Moore (ruggit er 10 Averil 1984). Haink enney mooar urree lesh e chied hingyl, "Candy", haink stiagh ec earroo 41 er y "Billboard" Hot 100. Ren e chied albym seyrlann, "So Real" (1999), feddyn teishtys platin voish yn RIAA. Haink er y tingyl ennymagh voish yn aa-chur magh jeh "So Real", "I Wanna Be With You" (2000), dy ve ny chied arrane mastey ny 40 arraneyn share ayns ny Steatyn Unnaneysit, as haink eh stiagh ec earroo 24 er y Hot 100. Lurg shen, ren Moore skeaylley magh ny h-albymyn seyrlann "Mandy Moore" (2001), "Coverage" (2003), "Wild Hope" (2007), "Amanda Leigh" (2009), "Silver Landings" (2020), as "In Real Life" (2022). Ta Moore er chreck ny smoo na 2.7 villioon albymyn er fud ayns ny Steatyn Unnaneysit rere yn earishlioar "Billboard".
Ren Moore e chied scannane myr cloieder ayns 2001 lesh paart beg goo 'sy scannane aittys "Dr. Dolittle 2", roish my ren ee cloie Lana Thomas 'sy scannane aittys "The Princess Diaries". Hooar ee enney mooar son e paart toshee myr Jamie Sullivan 'sy scannane drama romansagh "A Walk to Remember" (2002), as chloie ee ayns ny scannaneyn "Chasing Liberty" (2004), "Saved!" (2004), "Racing Stripes" (2005), "Because I Said So" (2007), "License to Wed" (2007), "Love, Wedding, Marriage" (2011), "47 Meters Down" (2017), "The Darkest Minds" (2018), as "Midway" (2019). Chur Moore e goo rish Princess Rapunzel 'sy scannane aittys kiaullee fansee bioghit "Tangled" liorish Walt Disney Animation Studios ayns 2010 as ny s'anmey ayns ym-ysseraght Disney elley.
Eddyr ny bleeantyn 2016 as 2022, ren Moore cloie Rebecca Pearson 'sy straih drama lught thie "This Is Us" liorish NBC. Chossyn ee daa Aundyr y Screen Actors Guild son Cloie Ard-yindyssagh liorish Fwirran ayns Straih Drama. Ayns 2019, va roltag er y Hollwood Walk of Fame bronnit urree.

Cemre Baysel:
She aghteyr Turkagh ee Cemre Baysel (ruggit er 5 Toshiaght Arree 1999). Ren ee cloie da'n cheayrt er y çhellveeish ayns 2014 lesh paart co-hassooagh ayns "Yeşil Deniz". Lurg shen, va paart eck ayns "İsimsizler" ayns 2017 roish my dooar ee paart 'sy straih drama hendeeagh "" myr Firuze. Hooar ee enney ny share lesh e paart co-hassooagh ayns "Elimi Bırakma" eddyr ny bleeantyn 2018 as 2019. Lurg shen, va paart eck 'sy straih drama chimmeeys "Ramo". Ayns 2020, hooar ee e chied phaart toshee 'sy straih "Sol Yanım", ghow jerrey rish y vlein ny yei. Ayns 2021, hooar ee paart y ven hoshee 'sy straih aittys romansagh "Baht Oyunu" marish Aytaç Şaşmaz.

Maddie Ziegler:
Madison Nicole Ziegler (ruggit er 30 Mean Fouyir 2002), she aghteyr as daunseyr Americaanagh t'ee. Hoshiaght, v'ee goll er enney son goaill ayrn 'sy chlaare rieughagh "Dance Moms" liorish Lifetime voish 2011 (tra v'ee hoght bleeaney d'eash) derrey 2016. Voish y vlein 2014, hooar ee enney ny shlea tra ren ee cloie ayns shiartanse jeh feeshanyn kiaullee liorish Sia, goaill toshiaght lesh "Chandelier" as "Elastic Heart", ren feddyn ny smoo na 5 billoonyn shillaghyn er YouTube. Ta Ziegler er ny ghoaill ayrn ayns scannaneyn, claareeyn çhellveeish, taishbynyssyn, consertyn, soilsheenyn, as er coodee earishlioaryn. V'ee coontit ec "Time" er e rolley jeh ny "30 jeigeyryn smoo cummaghtagh" dagh blein eddyr 2015 as 2017.
She briw va Ziegler er straih 2016 jeh'n chlaare "", ren ee jurnaaghey marish Sia ayns America Hwoaie as 'syn Austrail ayns 2016 as 2017 as t'ee er chur turryssyn daunse marish e shuyr, Mackenzie. Ta e paartyn scannane goaill stiagh Camille Le Haut 'sy scannane bioghit "Ballerina" (2016), Christina Sickleman ayns "The Book of Henry" (2017), y paart enmyssagh ayns "Music" (2021), Mia 'sy drama ard-scoill "The Fallout" (2021) as Velma ayns "West Side Story" (2021) liorish Steven Spielberg.

Isabella Santiago:
She aghteyr as craishteyder Veneswaalagh ee Isabella Santiago (ruggit er 18 Toshiaght Arree 1991). She Isabella y chied aghteyr as craishteyder Veneswaalagh ren cosney yn tostyl aalid Thai Miss International Queen. Ayns 2021 hooar ee e chied phaart 'sy "telenovela" Colombagh, "Lala's Spa", er y voggyl çhellveeish Colombagh, RCN Televisión. Ta Isabella beaghey ayns Bogotá, yn Cholombey.

Franziska Facella:
She aa-aghteyr pornograafagh as craishteyder an-ghraagh Germaanagh ee Franziska Facella ('sy Vaveyr, y Ghermaan er 28 Luanistyn 1989).

Tera Bond:
She aghteyr pornograafagh as craishteyder an-ghraagh Ungaaragh va Tera Bond (20 Jerrey Fouyir 1978 - 11 Jerrey Fouyir 2017). Hoshee ee gobbraghey 'sy çhynskyl pornograafagh ayns 2002 as dirree ee ass ayns 2011. Er 11 Jerrey Fouyir 2017, hooar ee baase rere asslaynt gheyre. Rere e braar, va kanghyr eck agh, ga dy row yn lheeys rahoil er çheu yn changhyr, ren ny çheu-eiyrtyssyn cur stiagh dy mooar er e slaynt.

Eleanor Tomlinson:
She aghteyr as arraneyder Sostynagh ee Eleanor May Tomlinson (ruggit er 19 Boaldyn 1992). T'ee er chloie ayns ram scannaneyn goaill stiagh "Angus, Thongs and Perfect Snogging" (2008), "Jack the Giant Slayer" (2013), "Colette" (2018) as "Love Wedding Repeat" (2020). Chammah's shen, ren Tomlinson cloie 'sy straih "Poldark" (2015–2019) liorish BBC One.

Viggo Mortensen:
She aghteyr, screeudeyr, stiureyder, gienteyder, kiaulleyder, as ellyneyr Americaanagh eh Viggo Peter Mortensen Jr. R (ruggit er 20 Jerrey Fouyir 1958). V'eh ruggit as troggit ayns Steat York Noa lesh ayr Danvargagh as moir Americaanagh, as ren eh beaghey 'syn Argenteen car yn aegid echey. She fowder accolaidyn eigsoylagh t'eh, goaill stiagh Aundyr y Screen Actors Guild as t'eh er ve enmyssit son tree Aundyryn Academy, tree Aundyryn BAFTA, as kiare Aundyryn Golden Globe.
Ren Mortensen e chied chloie 'sy scannaneaght 'sy scannane creauagh "Witness" (1985) liorish Peter Weir, marish Harrison Ford. Lurg shen, ren eh cloie ayns shiartanse dy scannaneyn mooarey elley, goaill stiagh "The Indian Runner" (1991), "Carlito's Way" (1993), "Crimson Tide" (1995), "Daylight" (1996), "The Portrait of a Lady" (1996), "G.I. Jane" (1997), "Psycho", "A Perfect Murder" (1998), "A Walk on the Moon" (1999), as "28 Days" (2000).
Hooar Mortensen enney ard-ghooagh eddyrashoonagh ayns ny 2000yn leah tra ren eh cloie Aragorn 'sy treeskeealag yantys chontoyrtys ard-skeealagh "The Lord of the Rings" liorish Peter Jackson. Ayns 2005, ren Mortensen geddyn moylley cremeydagh son e chloie a'sy scannane creauagh kimmeeys "A History of Violence" liorish David Cronenberg. Daa vlein ny s'anmey, ren Mortensen geddyn tooilley moyllee ayns scannane elley liorish Cronenberg - "Eastern Promises" (2007).

Jeff Goldblum:
She aghteyr as kiaulleyder Americaanagh eh Jeffrey Lynn Goldblum (ruggit er 22 Jerrey Fouyir 1952). T'eh er chloie ayns fir jeh ny scannaneyn smoo ard-ghooagh rieau, goaill stiagh "Jurassic Park" (1993) as "Independence Day" (1996), myrane lesh ny scannaneyn eirtyssyagh oc.
Erreish da paartyn co-hassooagh y chloie car ny 1970yn jeianagh as ny 1980yn leah, haink enney er Goldblum tra ren eh cloie Seth Brundle ayns "The Fly" (1986) liorish David Cronenberg, ren cosney da Aundyr Saturn son yn Aghteyr Share. T'eh er chloie ayns ram straihyn çhellveeish chammah, goaill stiagh "Will & Grace", ren cosney da Aundyr Primetime Emmy. Ren eh stiurey yn giare-scannane "Little Surprises", va enmyssit son Aundyr Academy son y Ghiare-scannane Jantys Bio Share. Ren e vann snag-chiaull, Jeff Goldblum and the Mildred Snitzer Orchestra, skeaylley magh y chied albym oc, "The Capitol Studios Sessions", ayns 2018.

Kadeem Hardison:
She aghteyr Americaanagh eh Kadeem Hardison (ruggit er 24 Jerrey Souree 1965). Ta enney share er son e phaart myr Dwayne Wayne er "A Different World", çheu-straih jeh'n sitcom "The Cosby Show" liorish NBC. Ren eh cloie Craig Cooper, ayr y characteyr enmyssagh, ayns "K.C. Undercover" liorish y Disney Channel, as Norman ayns "Love Is_" liorish OWN. Va paart echey chammah 'sy chied straih jeh'n aittys Showtime, "Black Monday", as ren eh cloie 'sy straih Teenage Bounty Hunters er Netflix.

Brian Baumgartner:
She aghteyr Americaanagh eh Brian Baumgartner (ruggit er 29 Sauin 1972). Ta enney share er son cloie Kevin Malone, karacteyr 'sy sitcom "The Office" (2005–2013) liorish NBC.

Idris Elba:
She aghteyr, gienteyder, as kiaulleyder Sostynagh eh Idrissa Akuna "Idris" Elba (ruggit er 6 Mean Fouyir 1972). Ta enney mie er son paartyn ta goaill stiagh Stringer Bell 'sy straih "The Wire" liorish HBO, DCI John Luther 'sy straih "Luther" liorish BBC One, as Nelson Mandela 'sy scannane beashnyssagh "" (2013). T'eh er ny ve enmyssit kiare keayrtyn son Aundyr Golden Globe son yn Aghteyr Share – Mynstraih ny Scannane Çhellveeish, as un cosnit echey, as t'eh er ny ve enmyssit queig keayrtyn son Aundyr Primetime Emmy.
Ren Elba cloie ayns "American Gangster" (2007) as "Prometheus" (2012) liorish Ridley Scott. Chammah as shen, ren eh cloie Heimdall 'sy scannane "Thor" (2011) as e scannaneyn eiyrtyssagh ' (2013), ' (2017), as ' (2022), chammah as ' (2015) as "" (2018). Ren eh cloie chammah ayns "Pacific Rim" (2013), "Beasts of No Nation" (2015), as "Molly's Game" (2017). Ayns 2016, chur eh e ghoo rish Chief Bogo ayns "Zootropolis", Shere Khan 'sy scannane jantys bio aachummit "The Jungle Book", Fluke ayns "Finding Dory," as Krall ayns "Star Trek Beyond". Hie yn chied scannane er ny stiurey echey ayns 2018 lesh y scannane "Yardie" ta bunnit er y noaskeeal voish y vlein 1992 "fo'n ennym cheddin" liorish Victor Headley. Ayns 2021, chloie eh Bloodsport ayns "The Suicide Squad", as ayns 2022, ren eh cur goo da'n characteyr Knuckles the Echidna 'sy scannane "Sonic the Hedgehog 2" (2022).
Çheumooie jeh'n aghteyrys, ta Elba cloie myr DJ fo'n enmys DJ Big Driis ny Idris as myr kiaulleyder R&B cho-emshiragh. Ayns 2016, v'eh enmyssit ayns rolley ny Deiney Smoo Cummaghtagh 'sy Theihll liorish "Time" 100.

Lauren Lindsey Donzis:
Lauren Lindsey Donzis (ruggit er 28 Jerrey Souree 2004), she aghteyr Americaanagh t'ee ta goll er enney son cloie Molly 'sy straih "No Good Nick" liorish Netflix as Ruby 'sy chiarroo straih jeh'n straih vunneydagh "Liv and Maddie" liorish y Disney Channel.
Ta Donzis cloie ayns aavioghey jeh'n straih "Punky Brewster" voish ny 1980yn.

Benjamin King (aghteyr):
She aghteyr Americaanagh eh Benjamin King (ruggit er 8 Sauin 1971).
