Ren eh cloie er "Scrubs" myr Milos as t'eh er ny chloie er claareeyn elley lheid as "Grey's Anatomy", "Las Vegas", as "Mike and Molly". Chloie eh er y straih hellveeish "Liv and Maddie" liorish y Disney Channel myr Pete Rooney, ayr ny h-ard-characteyryn, car y chied tree straihyn. Cha ren eh cloie 'sy straih yerrinagh.

Chanel Preston:
She aa-aghteyr pornograafagh as craishteyder an-ghraagh Americaanagh ee Chanel Preston (ruggit myr Rachel Ann Taylor ayns Fairbanks, Alaska, SUA er 9 Toshiaght Arree 1986). Hoshee ee gobbraghey 'sy çhynskyl pornograafagh ayns 2010. Ayns Mayrnt 2012, v'ee reiht myr Penthouse Pet son yn earishlioar "Penthouse".
Bea aeg.
Va Preston ruggit as troggit ayns Alaska, ny Steatyn Unnaneysit. T'ee jeh sluight Sostynagh, Germaanagh, as Frangagh. Tra v'ee 19 bleeaney d'eash, ren ee arraghey dys Hawaii raad ren ee cummal feie shey bleeaney. Ren ee obbraghey myr rooishteyder feie ny smoo na blein roish my ren ee çheet stiagh 'sy phornograafaght. She aesthetaghteyr kiedoonit t'ee chammah.

Lysychansk:
Lysychansk (), ny Lisichansk (), she caayr ayns Queiggey Luhansk 'syn Ookraan hiar t'eh. T'eh soit er broogh yesh yn awin Siverskyi Donets as mysh 115 km sheear hwoaie voish y pree-valley yn wheiggey, Luhansk. T'eh jeeaghyn magh er Sievierodonetsk tessen yn awin. Ta deiney cummal 'sy chaayr. Ec y traa t'ayn, ta'n chaayr goit ec y Roosh as Pobblaght Heayagh Luhansk bwooise da'n chaggey 'sy çheer lurg ren y Roosh ruegey yn çheer ayns 2022.

Anikka Albrite:
She aa-aghteyr pornograafagh as craishteyder an-ghraagh Americaanagh ee Anikka Albrite (ruggit myr Thrace Ardith Allen ayns Denver, Colorado, SUA er 7 Luanistyn 1988). Hoshee ee gobbraghey 'sy çhynskyl pornograafagh ayns 2011 as dirree ee ass ayns 2018.

Dixie D'Amelio:
She persoonid ym-ysseraght heshoil Americaanagh ee Dixie Jane D'Amelio (ruggit er 12 Luanistyn 2001). T'ee mie er enney son e feeshanyn er yn ardan ym-ysseraght heshoil TikTok. She Dixie y çhuyr by hinney lesh Charli. V'ee ruggit as troggit ayns Norwalk, Connecticut. Ayns 2020, ren ee goaill ayrn 'sy straih voggyl "Attaway General" er YouTube. Ta ny smoo na 55 millioonyn sleih eiyrtyssagh eck er TikTok as t'ee cuirrey claare er YouTube fo'n ennym "The Early Late Night Show". Ayns 2020, ren ee foscreeu conaant recortys marish HitCo Entertainment as hoshee ee cur magh singylyn.

Noah Schnapp:
She aghteyr Americaanagh eh Noah Cameron Schnapp (ruggit er 3 Jerrey Fouyir 2004). Hooar eh ard-ghoo kyndagh rish y straih hellveeish strooanagh atçhim far-skeealaght heanse "Stranger Things" er Neftlix raad t'eh cloie yn karacteyr Will Byers. Ta e phaartyn scannane goaill stiagh Roger Donovan 'sy drama shendeeagh "Bridge of Spies" (2015) liorish Steven Spielberg as goo Charlie Brown 'sy scannane bioghit "The Peanuts Movie" (2015).

Joe Locke (aghteyr):
She aghteyr Manninagh eh Joseph William Locke (ruggit er 24 Mean Fouyir 2003). Ta enney er son e phaart myr Charlie Spring er y straih "Heartstopper" liorish Netflix, t'eh er chloie voish y vlein 2022.
Bea aeg as ynsagh.
Va Joseph William Locke ruggit er 24 Mean Fouyir 2003 ayns Doolish, Mannin. Ren eh goll er scoill ayns Scoill Ard Valley Kermeen.
Tra v'eh foast 'syn ard scoill, ren Locke as tree scollagyn elley cur aghin rish y reiltys yn-jantaght failt y chur er kemmyrkee Heeragh gys Mannin .

John Doman:
She aghteyr Americaanagh eh John Doman (ruggit er 9 Jerrey Geuree 1945) ta mie er enney son cloie Ard-oaseir Poleen Steat Maryland, Lhiass-varrantagh Poleen, as Meoir William Rawls er y straih "The Wire" (2002–2008) liorish HBO, Curnal Edward Galson er "Oz" (2001), Dr. Deraad er "ER" (1999–2003), Rodrigo Borgia er y straih hellveeish eddyrashoonagh "Borgia" (2011–2014), Don Carmine Falcone 'sy chlaare "Gotham" (2014–2017) liorish Fox, as Bruce Buttler ayns "The Affair" (2014–2019).

Internet Adult Film Database:
Yn Internet Adult Film Database (IAFD), she stoyr fysseree er-linney t'eh, bentyn rish y çhynskyl pornograafagh, goaill stiagh cloiederyn, ben-chloiederyn, stiureyderyn, seyrlannyn, rheynneyderyn as scannaneyn pornograafagh.

James Cromwell:
She aghteyr Americaanagh eh James Oliver Cromwell (ruggit er 27 Jerrey Geuree 1940). Mastey ny scannaneyn share echey, t'ad goaill stiagh "Babe" (1995), ' (1996), "L.A. Confidential" (1997), "The Green Mile" (1999), "The Queen" (2006), "Secretariat" (2010), "The Artist" (2011), as ' (2018). 
Ta Cromwell mie er enney son e chloiaghyn er y çhellveeish, goaill stiagh "Angels in America" (2003), "Six Feet Under" (2003–2005), "" (2012–2013), "Succession" (2018–jiu), as "Counterpart" (2018–2019).

Reeriaght Westphalen:
Va Reeriaght Westphalen ny reeriaght 'sy Ghermaan v'er mayrn eddyr 1807 as 1813. Ren ee goaill stiagh thalloo ayns Hesse as ayrnyn elley yn Ghermaan. Ga dy row ee neuchroghagh dy h-oikoil, she steat jiulean jeh'n Chied Impiraght Rangagh v'ee va goll fo stiurey braar Napoléon, Jérôme Bonaparte. Va ennym yn ard Westfalen currit urree, ga dy nee ennym meechiart v'ayn er yn oyr nagh row monney thallooyn yn ard shen fo reill y reeriaght. Ren y reeriaght coodaghey thalloo va enmyssit Ostfalen.
Ren Napoléon cur sheese er Westphalen y chied vunraght screeuee noa-emshiragh 'sy Ghermaan, gurneilys 'syn aght Frangagh, as aachummaghyn eirinagh. Ren y reeriaght seyrey ny serfee, cur cairyn corrym da chooilley pheiagh, as cairyn bing noi ny quaiyllyn. Ayns 1808 ren y reeriaght cur ny chied leighyn ayns bree hug cairyn corrym da ny h-Ewnyn, red chiarail clowan son aachummaghyn da ny steatyn Germaanagh elley.
Va'n çheer boght son y chooid smoo, agh ren Napoléon aggyrt keeshyn as eeckyn tromey as sidooryn co-screeuit. Cha daink agh kuse veg jeh ny sidooryn er ash lurg ren Napoléon ruegey yn Roosh ayns 1812. Va'n çheer banc-vrisht ayns 1812 as tra va Napoléon cooyllaghey noi ny Co-chaarjyn ayns 1813, va'n çheer barriaghtit as haink er y chooid smoo jeh ny thallooyn eck dy ve goit stiagh 'sy Phroosh. Ansherbee, hannee y chooid smoo jeh ny h-aachummaghyn ayns ynnyd.

Charles Dance:
She aghteyr Sostynagh eh Walter Charles Dance (ruggit er 10 Jerrey Fouyir 1946). Ta e phaartyn scannane smoo ennoil goaill stiagh Sardo Numspa ayns "The Golden Child" (1986), Dr. Jonathan Clemens ayns "Alien 3" (1992), Benedict ayns "Last Action Hero" (1993), Lord Havelock Vetinari ayns "Terry Pratchett's Going Postal" (2010), y Master Vampire ayns "Dracula Untold" (2014), Alastair Denniston ayns "The Imitation Game" (2014), Alan Jonah ayns "" (2019), as William Randolph Hearst ayns "Mank" (2020).
Er y çhellveeish, ren Dance cloie Guy Perron ayns "The Jewel in the Crown" (1984), Tywin Lannister ayns "Game of Thrones" (2011–2015), as y Çhiarn Mountbatten 'sy trass as 'sy chiarroo straih jeh "The Crown" (2019–2020).

Vogue Williams:
She craishteyder as persoonid ym-ysseraght Yernagh ee Vogue Williams (ruggit er 2 Jerrey Fouyir 1985) ta mie er enney son goaill ayrn ayns "Dancing with the Stars" as "Stepping Out" as son cosney "" ayns 2015.

Layla Flaherty:
She craishteyder as persoonid çhellveeish Yernagh ee Layla Flaherty ghow ayrn 'sy chlaare çhellveeish "Desperate Scousewives", hie magh er ny scaalheaney er E4 ayns 2011. Er y gherrid, ghow ee ayrn ayns episode jeh'n straih "Real Housewives of Cheshire".
Bea aeg.
Va Flaherty ruggit ayns Galliu ayns 1983 lesh ayr Jamaicagh as moir Yernagh. Ren ee arraghey dys Lerphoyll ayns 2005.

Amerigo Vespucci:
She marçhant, ronseyder, as lhuingysseyr Iddaalagh voish Pobblaght Firenze va Amerigo Vespucci (9 Mayrnt 1451 – 22 Toshiaght Arree 1512). She ass yn ennym echey ta shin geddyn y boayl-ennym "America".
Eddyr ny bleeantyn 1497 as 1504, ren Vespucci goaill ayrn ayns daa hurrys er y chooid sloo car Eash y Ronsee. Ren eh e chied hurrys er lieh yn Spaainey (1499-1500) as lurg shen er lieh yn Phortiugal (1501-1502). Ayns 1503 as 1505, va daa lioaran soilshit fo'n ennym echey, as ad goaill stiagh cur sheese daahoil ny ronsaghyn shen as turryssyn lhiassit elley. Va'n daa lioaran feer ennoil as hie ad er nyn lhaih er feie'n Oarpey. Ga dy vel screeudeyryn shennaghys arganey mychione ughtarys as ynrickys ny coontyssyn shen, ec y traa shen va'd feer cummaghtagh as cooneydagh ayns bishaghey dooishtid ny ronsaghyn noa as ren ad cur rish ennym as ard-ghoo Vespucci myr ronseyder as lhuingysseyr.
Dooyr Vespucci dy row eh toiggal, sheear ayns 1501 car e hurrys Portiugagh, dy nee ayrn jeh mooar-rheynn noa da ny h-Oarpee va'n Vrasseel as chur eh "Yn Seihll Noa" urree. Ren yn aggyrtys shen cur cleaney mooar er y chaartgraafee Martin Waldseemüller enney y chur er dedgeyn Vespucci ayns 1507. Ren Waldseemüller cur y lhieggan Ladjynaghit jeh ennym Vespucci - "America" - er y Theihll Noa. Haink kaartgraafeeyn ny yei cur "America" er y vooar-rheynn as ayns 1532 va'n ennym currit dy beayn er y vooar-rheynn noa-ronsit.
Ayns 1505, va Vespucci jeant ny heyraanagh jeh'n Chashteel rere oardagh reeoil as ayns 1508 v'eh pointit da'n oik noa "piloto mayor" (ard-lhuingysseyr) son "Casa de Contratación" (Thie yn Traght) ayns Sevilla, v'ayns shelloo echey derrey'n vaaish echey ayns 1512.

David Fabricius:
She jed Germaanagh va David Fabricius (9 Mayrnt 1564 – 7 Boaldyn 1617). Ren eh jannoo daa feddyn-magh car laaghyn leah yn rollageydys fodreayrtanagh marish e vac shinney, Johannes Fabricius (1587–1615).
Va David Fabricius (lhieggan Ladjynit yn ennym kiart echey "David Faber", ny "David Goldschmidt") ruggit ayns Esens, as ren eh studeyryssyn ec Ollooscoill Helmstedt goaill toshiaght ayns 1583 as ren eh shirveishey myr jed son y valley beg faggys da'n valley dooghyssagh echey 'sy Reeshlann (sheear hwoaie yn Ghermaan as shiar hwoaie yn Çheer Injil noa-emshiragh), ec Resterhafe faggys da Dornum ayns 1584 as ec Osteel ayns 1603. Myr va cadjin ec y laa shen son sminishteryn Protestoonagh, ren eh crie er y çheanse: she yn rollageydys va feer anaasagh da. Ren Fabricius co-reggyrt marish y rollageyder Johannes Kepler.

Tirna Slevin:
She craishteyder Yernagh ee Tirna Slevin (ruggit ayns 1994). V'ee ruggit ayns Divlyn agh hie ee as e lught thie son beaghey ayns Galliu tra v'ee foast aeg. V'ee reiht myr y yeearreyder Yernagh 'sy tostyl aalid Miss Grand International ayns 2020.

Lynn Kelly:
She craishteyder Yernagh ee Lynn Kelly (ruggit er 16 Mayrnt 1987). V'ee ruggit ayns Divlyn, Nerin. Ren ee cosney yn tostyl aalid Miss Universe Ireland ayns 2008 tra ren ee shassoo son Divlyn 'sy cho-hirrey.

Grainne Gallanagh:
She craishteyder Yernagh ee Grainne Gallanagh (ruggit er 22 Mean Souree 1994) va crooinit myr Miss Universe Ireland 2018 er 2 Luanistyn 2018. Hass ee son Nerin ec Miss Universe 2018, as haink ee stiagh mastey yn Chied 20.
Bea aeg.
Va Gallanagh troggit ayns Bun Cranncha, Coontae Ghoon ny Ghoal. Ren ee goll er scoill ayns Scoil Mhuire, Bun Cranncha. Dirree ee ass Undinys Çhaghnoaylleeaght, Littyr Kennain as hie ee stiagh 'sy voandyrys jeeraghey er Slaynt ny Mraane.

Wiktoria Ryczko:
She craishteyder follanid as persoonid ym-ysseraght heshoil Yernagh as Polynnagh ee Wiktoria Ryczko (ruggit er 16 Mayrnt 1998). V'ee ruggit 'sy Pholynn agh t'ee beaghey ayns Nerin feie ram bleeantyn nish.

Hannah Rose May:
She aghteyr as screeudeyr Yernagh ee Hannah Rose May (ruggit er 17 Boaldyn 1995). V'ee ruggit ayns Divlyn, Nerin, agh t'ee nish beaghey ayns ny Steatyn Unnaneysit raad t'ee gobbyr myr aghteyr çhellveeish as scannane. Hoshee ee cloie 'syn aghteyrys ayns 2016. T'ee er ny chloie paartyn ayns ny straihyn çhellveeish "Ballers" (2017-2018), "Shooter" (2018) as "Altered Carbon" (2018) as er ny chloie Charlie 'sy ghiare-scannane "The Way the Future Was" (2019).

Claire Tully:
She aa-chraishteyder an-ghraagh as persoonid çhellveeish Yernagh ee Claire Tully (ruggit er 28 Toshiaght Arree 1984). V'ee ruggit ayns Divlyn, Nerin.

Jessie Vard:
She craishteyder an-ghraagh Yernagh ee Jessie Vard (ruggit er 31 Nollick 1998). V'ee ruggit ayns Coontae Ghoon ny Ghoal, Nerin.

Lucy Belle:
She aa-aghteyr pornograafagh as craishteyder an-ghraagh Romaanagh ee Lucy Belle (ruggit ayns Urziceni, yn Romaan, er 8 Jerrey Fouyir 1986). Hoshee ee gobbraghey 'sy çhynskyl pornograafagh ayns 2007 as dirree ee ass ayns 2016.

Alyssia Kent:
She aghteyr pornograafagh, craishteyder an-ghraagh, as caillin shamraig Romaanagh ee Alyssia Kent (ruggit ayns Bucharest, yn Romaan, er 7 Mean Souree 1991). Hoshee ee gobbraghey 'sy çhynskyl pornograafagh ayns 2017.

Maya Gates:
She aa-aghteyr pornograafagh as craishteyder an-ghraagh Romaanagh ee Maya Gates (ruggit ayns Bucharest, yn Romaan, er 6 Jerrey Geuree 1986). Hoshee ee gobbraghey 'sy çhynskyl pornograafagh ayns 2005 as dirree ee ass ayns 2013.

Lea Lexis:
She aa-aghteyr pornograafagh as craishteyder an-ghraagh Romaanagh ee Lea Lexis (ruggit ayns Constanța, yn Romaan, er 18 Toshiaght Arree 1988). Hoshee ee gobbraghey 'sy çhynskyl pornograafagh ayns 2015 as dirree ee ass ayns 2021.

Alina Plugaru:
She delleyder, aa-aghteyr pornograafagh, as craishteyder an-ghraagh Romaanagh ee Alina Plugaru (ruggit ayns Vaslui, yn Romaan, er 18 Nollick 1987). Hoshee ee gobbraghey 'sy çhynskyl pornograafagh ayns 2006 as dirree ee ass ayns 2009. Ayns 2011, ren ee cur er bun fwirran daunse an-ghraagh Erotic Dreams Show by Alina Plugaru raad t'ee cloie dy mennick ec feaillaghyn, flurtyn preevaadjagh, as cruinnaghtyn pobbylagh.

Sandra Romain:
She aa-aghteyr pornograafagh as craishteyder an-ghraagh Romaanagh ee Sandra Romain (ruggit myr Mărioara Cornelia Popescu ayns Timișoara, yn Romaan, er 26 Mayrnt 1978). Hoshee ee gobbraghey 'sy çhynskyl pornograafagh ayns 2000 as dirree ee ass ayns 2017.

Alice Romain:
She aa-aghteyr pornograafagh as craishteyder an-ghraagh Romaanagh ee Alice Romain (ruggit ayns Reșița, yn Romaan, er 11 Jerrey Geuree 1991). Hoshee ee gobbraghey 'sy çhynskyl pornograafagh ayns 2011 as dirree ee ass ayns 2017.

Katie McGrath:
She aghteyr Yernagh ee Katie McGrath (ruggit er 3 Jerrey Geuree 1983). Hooar ee enney er y çhellveeish tra ren ee cloie Morgana Pendragon 'sy straih "Merlin" (2008–2012) liorish BBC One, Lucy Westenra 'sy straih Ghoaldagh-Americaanagh "Dracula" (2013–2014), as Sarah Bennett'sy straih skeealyn atçhim çhaglit "Slasher" (2016), as Lena Luthor 'sy straih far-feniagh "Supergirl" (2016–2021). Ta e paartyn scannane goaill stiagh Ben Thelma Furness 'sy scannane drama "W.E.", Jules Daly 'sy scannane Nollick "A Princess for Christmas" (2011), Zara Young 'sy scannane contoyrtys far-skeealaght heanse "Jurassic World" (2015), as Elsa 'sy scannane fansee ard-skeealagh "" (2017).

Christopher Ecclestone:
She aghteyr Sostynagh eh Christopher Eccleston (ruggit er 16 Toshiaght Arree 1964). Ta enney share er son yn obbyr hellveeish as scannaneaght ta jeant echey, goaill stiagh e phaart myr y nuyoo corpoilys foalley jeh Doctor 'sy straih far-skeealaght heanse "Doctor Who" (2005) liorish y BBC, e phaart myr Matt Jamison ayns "The Leftovers" (2014-2017), as e cho-obbraghyn marish ny jeantee scannane Danny Boyle as Michael Winterbottom.
Ren Eccleston ynsaghey ec Scoill Veanagh Reeoil y Loayrtys as y Drama ayns Lunnin as ren eh cloie da'n chied cheayrt er yn ardan er gientyn "A Streetcar Named Desire" liorish y Bristol Old Vic. Hooar eh enney mooar son e phaartyn scannane lheid as Derek Bentley ayns "Let Him Have It" (1991) as David Stevens ayns "Shallow Grave" (1994), as e chloiaghyn çhellveeish ayns "Cracker" (1993–1994) as "Hillsborough" (1996). Chossyn eh BAFTA son e chloie myr Nicky Hutchinson 'sy vyn-straih "Our Friends in the North" (1996) liorish y BBC, red chur e ennym er ard mastey lughtyn thie er feie'n Reeriaght Unnaneysit. Lurg y scannane shen, ren eh cloie ayns ny scannaneyn "Jude" (1996), "A Price Above Rubies" (1998), "Elizabeth" (1998), "eXistenZ" (1999), "Gone in 60 Seconds" (2000), "The Invisible Circus" (2001), "The Others" (2001), "24 Hour Party People" (2002), as "28 Days Later" (2002), chammah as ayns paartyn çhellveeish ayns "Clocking Off" (2000) as "The Second Coming" (2003).
Hooar eh enney as moylley lheeadagh son e phaart ayns aavioghey "Doctor Who" ayns 2005 tra v'eh ny chied dooinney chloie yn paart voish y vlein 1996. Daag eh yn paart shen lurg un straih. Voish shen, t'eh er chloie ayns ny straihyn çhellveeish "Heroes" (2007), "The Shadow Line" (2011), "Blackout" (2012), "Lucan" (2013), "The Leftovers" (2014–2017), "Safe House" (2015), "Fortitude" (2015), as "The A Word" (2016–2020) as ayns ny scannaneyn ' (2009), "Amelia" (2009), "Song for Marion" (2012), ' (2013) as "Legend" (2015). Chossyn eh Aundyr Emmy Eddyrashoonagh son e chloie ayns un epsiode jeh'n straih skeealyn çhaglit "Accused". Er yn ardan, t'eh er cloie ny paartyn enmyssagh ayns gientynyn "Hamlet" as "Macbeth" as t'eh er ny chloie ayns gientynyn "Miss Julie", "A Doll's House", as "Antigone".

Freema Agyeman:
She ben-chloieder Goaldagh ee Freema Agyeman (ruggit myr Frema Agyeman er 20 Mayrnt 1979) ta mie er enney son cloie Martha Jones 'sy straih far-skeealaght heanse "Doctor Who" (2007–2010) liorish y BBC, Alesha Phillips 'sy drama aghtyn kimmeeys "" (2009–2011), Amanita Caplan 'sy drama far-skeealaght heanse "Sense8" (2015–2018) liorish Netflix, Shelly Periwinkle 'sy chlaare "Old Jack's Boat" liorish CBeebies, as Dr. Helen Sharpe 'sy straih aghtyn lheeyssagh "New Amsterdam" (2018–2022) liorish NBC.
Lurg yn irree magh eck voish "Doctor Who", ren Agyeman cur e paart myr Martha Jones er ny aavioghey 'sy çheu-straih "Torchwood" as va paart eck 'sy straih "Little Dorrit" liorish y BBC.

Jenna Coleman:
She aghteyr Sostynagh ee Jenna-Louise Coleman (ruggit er 27 Averil 1986), ny Jenna Coleman myr ta e ennym screeuit er y scaailan voish 2013. Ta enney mie urree son cloie Jasmine Thomas 'sy çheabin "Emmerdale", Clara Oswald 'sy straih far-skeealagh heanse "Doctor Who", Benrein Victoria 'sy drama shennearish "Victoria", Joanna Lindsay 'sy vyn-straih chimmeeys "The Cry", as Marie-Andrée Leclerc 'sy vyn-straih chimmeeys "The Serpent".

John Hurt:
She aghteyr Sostynagh va'n Reejerey John Vincent Hurt CBE (22 Jerrey Geuree 1940 – 25 Jerrey Geuree 2017). Ren y coorse bea echey goll harrish queig jeihaghtyn. Haink enney mie er tra ren eh cloie Richard Rich 'sy scannane "A Man for All Seasons" (1966) as hooar eh enmyssaghtyn BAFTA son e chloiaghyn myr Timothy Evans ayns "10 Rillington Place" (1971) as Quentin Crisp 'sy scannane çhellveeish "The Naked Civil Servant" (1975). Chloie eh Caligula 'sy straih hellveeish "I, Claudius" (1976) liorish y BBC. Rere y chloie echey 'sy drama pryssoonys "Midnight Express" (1978) hooar eh enney as moylley eddyrashoonagh as chossyn eh aundyryn Golden Globe as BAFTA goll rish enmyssaght son Aundyr Academy. Ren e chloie myr y rollageyder Kane, 'sy scannane atçhim far-skeealaght heanse "Alien" (1979), goaill stiagh reayrtys raad ren cretoor neuhallooinagh bleaystey magh ass e chleeau. Ta'n reayrtys shen coontit mastey ny reayrtyssyn smoo imrragh ayns shennaghys y scannaneaght.
Chossyn Hurt e hrass BAFTA, myrane lesh e nah enmyssaght Oscar as Golden Globe, myr Joseph Merrick 'sy scannane beashnyssagh "The Elephant Man" (1980) liorish David Lynch. Ren paartyn mooarey ennoil car ny 1980yn goaill stiagh Bob Champion 'sy scannane beashnyssagh "Champions" (1984), Mr. Braddock 'sy drama "The Hit" (1984) liorish Stephen Frears, Winston Smith ayns "Nineteen Eighty-Four" (1984) as Stephen Ward 'sy drama "Scandal" (1989). Va Hurt enmyssit reesht son BAFTA son yn obbyr echey 'sy drama Yernagh "The Field" (1990) as ren eh cloie yn ard-noid, James Graham, 'sy scannane contoyrtys ard-skeealagh "Rob Roy" (1995). Ren e scannaneyn jeianagh goaill stiagh y straih scannane "Harry Potter" (2001–11), ny scannaneyn "Hellboy" (2004 as 2008), y scannane creauagh erskyn-dooghyssagh "The Skeleton Key" (2005), y skeeal-sheear "The Proposition" (2005), y scannane creauagh politickagh "V for Vendetta" (2005), y scannane contoyrtys jantys "Indiana Jones and the Kingdom of the Crystal Skull" (2008), y scannane jantys far-skeealaght heanse "Outlander" (2008) as y scannane peeikearys "Tinker Tailor Soldier Spy" (2011). Ren Hurt aavioghey e phaart myr Quentin Crisp ayns "An Englishman in New York" (2009), chossyn da e hiaghtoo enmyssaght BAFTA. Chloie eh yn War Doctor 'sy straih hellveeish "Doctor Who" liorish y BBC ayns 2013.
Hooar eh baase 'sy valley echey ayns Cromer, Norfolk, er 25 Jerrey Geuree 2017 lurg troddan noi kanghyr y fairaig villish.

Matt Smith:
She aghteyr Sostynagh eh Matthew Robert Smith (ruggit er 28 Jerrey Fouyir 1982). Ta enney mie er son e phaartyn myr y chied chorpoilys foalley jeig jeh'n Doctor 'sy straih "Doctor Who" liorish y BBC as myr Flah Philip 'sy straih "The Crown" liorish Netflix raad hooar eh enmyssaght son Aundyr Primetime Emmy.
Hoshiaght, va Smith geearree ve ny vluckaneyr keirdagh, agh ren y spondylolysis cur eh magh ass y spoyrt. Hie eh stiagh 'sy National Youth Theatre jannoo studeyrys er yn aghteyrys as y screeudeyrys crootagh ec Ollooscoill Anglia Hiar, as haink er dy ve ny aghteyr ayns 2003, cloie ayns cloiaghyn goaill stiagh "Murder in the Cathedral", "Fresh Kills", "The History Boys" as "On the Shore of the Wide World" ayns theateryn Lunnin. Sheeyney yn obbyr as ny schleieyn echey stiagh ayns theater West End, t'eh er ny chloie ayns gientynyn ardan "Swimming with Sharks" marish Christian Slater as myr Henry ayns "That Face".
Haink e chied phaart er y çhellveeish ayns 2006 tra ren eh cloie Jim Taylor ayns "The Ruby in the Smoke" as "The Shadow in the North". Haink e chied ard-phaart er y çhellveeish ayns 2007 'sy straih "Party Animals" liorish y BBC. Chloie Smith y chied chorpoilys foalley jeig jeh'n Doctor voish 2010 derrey 2013. V'eh ny ghooinney s'aa chloie yn karacteyr. 'Sy scannaneaght, ren eh cloie paart dooblagh ayns "Womb" (2010), as cummaghyn corpagh Skynet ayns "Terminator Genisys" (2015), y steet Jack ayns "Last Night in Soho" (2019), as Milo ayns "Morbius" (2022).

Ard-ghuillag:
<templatestyles src="Main Page/minerva.css" />

Alessia Macari:
She craishteyder as aghteyr Yernagh as Iddaalagh ee Alessia Macari (ruggit ayns Divlyn, Nerin, er 16 Jerrey Fouyir 1993). Ta enney mie urree myr persoonid çhellveeish, ayns straihyn çhellveeish rieughagh son y chooid smoo. Ren ee cosney yn chied straih jeh'n chlaare rieughagh Iddaalagh "Grande Fratello VIP" ayns 2016.

Tess O'Reilly:
She craishteyder drualtagh as markiagh jysk Yernagh ee Tess O'Reilly (ruggit er 28 Sauin 1985).

Niamh Colgan:
She craishteyder an-ghraagh Yernagh ee Niamh Colgan (ruggit er 5 Sauin 1995). 

Laura McGuinness:
She aa-aghteyr pornograafagh as craishteyder an-ghraagh Yernagh ee Laura McGuinness (ruggit er 6 Mean Souree 1981).

Patrick Stewart:
She aghteyr Sostynagh eh yn Reejerey Patrick Stewart OBE (ruggit er 13 Jerrey Souree 1940). Ta'n coorse bea echey goll harrish shiaght jeihaghtyn ayns gientyn ardan, çhellveeish, scannane, as gamman-feeshan eigsoylagh. T'eh er ve enmyssit son aundyryn Olivier, Tony, Golden Globe, Emmy, as y Screen Actors Guild. Hooar eh rollage er y Hollywood Walk of Fame er 16 Nollick 1996. Ayns 2010, v'eh jeant ny reejerey liorish y Ven-rein Ealisaid II son e hirveishyn 'sy drama.
Ayns 1966, haink er Stewart dy ve ny oltey jeh'n Royal Shakespeare Company. Ren Stewart cloie da'n chied cheayrt er Broadway ayns 1971 ayns gientyn "A Midsummer Night's Dream". Ayns 1979, hooar eh Aundyr Laurence Olivier son yn Aghteyr Share ayns Paart Co-hassooagh son e chloie ayns "Antony and Cleopatra" 'sy West End. Haink e chied phaart çhellveeish 'sy straih "Coronation Street" liorish ITV ayns 1967. Haink e chied ard-phaartyn ayns gientynyn çhellveeish "Fall of Eagles" (1974), "I, Claudius" (1976), as "Tinker Tailor Soldier Spy" (1979) liorish y BBC. Ayns 2008 ren eh cloie Ree Claudius ayns "Hamlet" as hooar eh e nah Aundyr Olivier as e chied enmyssaght son Aundyr Tony son gientynyn theateragh West End as Broadway er lheh.
Hooar Stewart enney mooar son e phaart myr Captan Jean-Luc Picard ayns ' (1987-1994), e scannaneyn eiyrtyssagh, as ' (2020-jiu). Chloie eh Captain Ahab 'sy straih "Moby Dick" (1998) liorish USA Network, Ebenezer Scrooge ayns "A Christmas Carol" (1999) liorish TNT, as Ree Inry II ayns "The Lion in Winter" (2003) liorish Showtime. Chammah's shen, haink er dy ve ennoil son e chloiaghyn aitt 'sy sitcom "Frasier" liorish NBC as y straih "Extras" liorish y BBC raad hooar eh enmyssaght son Emmy. Er y gherrid, t'eh er chloie yn paart toshee 'sy straih "Blunt Talk" (2015-2016) liorish Starz. T'eh cur e ghoo rish Lhiass Stiureyder y CIA Avery Bullock er "American Dad!". 
Haink e chied phaart 'sy scannaneaght lesh y scannane "Hedda" (1975) marish cloiaghyn elley ayns "Excalibur" (1981), as "Dune" (1984). Hooar eh tooilley enney tra ren eh cloie yn Olloo Charles Xavier 'sy straih scannane "X-Men" (2000-2009), ayns "Logan" (2017), as tra ren eh cloie lhieggan caghlaaee yn characteyr 'sy scannane "Doctor Strange in the Multiverse of Madness" (2022). T'eh er chloie ayns scannaneyn elley, lheid as "L.A. Story" (1991), ' (1993), "Jeffrey" (1995), as "The Kid Who Would Be King" (2019). T'eh mie er enney son yn obbyr ghoo ayns "The Pagemaster" (1994), "The Prince of Egypt" (1998), ' (2001), "Chicken Little" (2005), "Gnomeo & Juliet" (2011), as "Ted" (2012). 

Aoife Walsh:
She craishteyder fassan Yernagh as aa-hellooder yn enmys Miss Ireland ee Aoife Walsh (ruggit ayns Cluain Meala er 2 Luanistyn 1989).

Cailín Ní Toibín:
She craishteyder as shellooder tostyl aalid Yernagh ee Cailín Aíne Ní Toibín (ruggit er 25 Toshiaght Arree 1994). V'ee crooinit myr Miss Universe Ireland er 31 Luanistyn 2017. Hass ee son Nerin ec Miss Universe 2017.

Yr Hen Ogledd:
She ard shendeeagh ayns Twoaie Hostyn as jiass Ghoaltaght ny h-Albey eh yr Hen Ogledd, ny y Shenn Twoaie, raad va Goaldee Cheltiagh y Yn Vretyn Vooar fo-Raueagh cummal car ny Mean Eashyn Leah. Loayr y sleih sorçh jeh'n Vrythonish t'er enney ain myr Cumbrish as ee feer chosoylagh rish y Çhenn Vretnish. Ren sleih Vretyn as y Hen Ogledd coontey adsyn hene myr un phobble as ad cur "Cymry" ("cumraagyn"), voish "combrogi" y Vrythonish, orroo hene. She ard er lheh va'n Hen Ogledd neu-ghollrish ayrnyn y Vretyn Vooar Hwoaie raad va ny Pictee, Anglo-Hostnee, as Scoti cummal.
V'ad ny reeriaghtyn mooarey ayn na Elmet, Gododdin, Rheged, as Reeriaght Strah Chleayee. Va reeriaghtyn as slystyn beggey elley ayn chammah, goaill stiagh Aeron, Calchfynydd, Eidyn, Lleuddiniawn, as Manaw Gododdin. Va enmyn Brythonagh ec ny reeriaghtyn Anglagh Deira as Bernicia as, rere shen, s'liklee dy row bun Brythonagh oc. Va dagh reeriaght y Hen Ogledd goit ec ny h-Anglo-Hostnee as ny Pictee roish y vlein 800 faagail magh Strah Chleayee; va Strah Chleayee goit stiagh ayns Reeriaght ny h-Albey 'sy 11d eash.
Ta cooinaghtyn y Hen Ogledd foast lajer ayns Bretyn. Ta'n tradishoon Bretnagh goaill stiagh caardyssyn "Gwŷr y Gogledd", ny "Fir y Twoaie", as ren shiartanse dy reeraghtyssyn Bretnagh tayrn nyn eiraghtyn assdaue. Haink ram teksyn Bretnagh ass Fir y Twoaie, lheid as Taliesin, Aneirin, Myrddin Wyllt, as bardyn Cynfeirdd. Ta feniee y twoaie lheid as Urien, Owain mab Urien, as Coel Hen as e sluight ry-gheddyn 'sy vardaght Vretnagh as ayns ny Trooryn Bretnagh.

Aghteyr:
Ta aghteyr ny cloieder (as ben-aghteyr as ben-chloieder son mraane keayrtyn) çheet er peiagh ta jannoo tuarystal jeh karacteyr ayns cloie. Ta'n aghteyr cloie bio ayns mean tradishoonagh y theater ny ayns meanyn noa-emshiragh lheid as scannaneyn, er y radio, as er y çhellveeish. She ("hupokritḗs") yn enmys Greagish, ta çheet er "ny ta freggyrt". Ta soilshaghey yn aghteyr er paart - ellyn yn aghteyrys - bentyn rish as croghey er y phaart ta cloiet, gyn scansh dy vel eh bunnit er peiagh jarroo ny er karacteyr far-skeealagh. Ta'n soilshaghey taghyrtyn eer tra ta'n aghteyr "cloie adsyn hene".
Sorçhyn.
'Sy theater.
Son cloie er yn ardan, lhisagh aghteyryn stiuraghyn ardan ta ry-gheddyn 'sy script y ynsaghey, lheid as "Ardan Clee" as "Ardan Yesh". Ta ny stiuraghyn shen bunnit er geill yn aghteyr as eh ny ee shassoo er yn ardan jeeaghyn magh er y lught fakinagh. Lhisagh aghteyryn ynsaghey ny stiuraghyn "Heose yn Ardan" (voish y lught fakinagh) as "Heese yn Ardan" (jeeaghyn hug y lught fakinagh). Lhisagh aghteyryn theater ynsaghey yn glackey - aght gleashaght yn aghteyr as eh er yn ardan car cloie. Ta'n chooid smoo jeh scriptyn cur sheese er y ghlackey ta eignit. Ta'n stiureyder cur saraghyn bentyn rish y ghlackey, lheid as goll tessen yn ardan.
'Sy scannaneaght.
Lhisagh aghteyryn scannane ynsaghey ve ainjyssagh rish shamraigyn kiart nyn meealloo. Lhisagh ad ynsaghey kys nyn gowraghyn y gheddyn as tannaght ayn. She soiaghey er y laare ta cowrit liorish rybban er y chooid smoo. She yn ynnyd raad ta ny soilshaghyn as focys y çhamraig ny s'fondagh. Lhisagh aghteyryn scannane aarlaghey adsyn hene as cloie dy mie er scaa-heishtyn.
Er y çhellveeish.
Lhisagh aghteyryn çhellveeish ynsaghey kys meegrafoynyn lav (meegrafoynyn Lavaliere) y ymmydey. Lhisagh ad toiggal smooinaght y "chlowan". "Ta'n enmys clowan çheet er yn ard ta sooillag y çhamraig recortyssey." Çheusthie jeh'n çhynskyl cloie, ta kiare sorçhyn dy phaartyn çhellveeish. She "kinjagh y straih" y chied horçh - ny preeu-aghteyryn 'sy chlaare myr ayrnyn jeh'n wirran beayn. Ta aghteyryn "aafilleydagh" gobbraghey fo conaant as ad cloie ayns ymmodee episodeyn. She paart beg nagh vel ry-akin agh ayns un episode eh yn "co-roltag". Ta paart ny smoo ec y "roltag chuirreydagh" na myr t'ec y "cho-roltag" as, dy mennick, ta focys yn episode jeerit er ny urree.
Er y radio.
She cloie accoustagh dramadagh eh drama radio t'er ny scaalheaney er y radio ny er ny hoilshaghey er meanyn eaishtagh, lheid as rybbanyn ny JC. Kindagh rish dolley rinkyn reayrtagh, ta'n drama radio croghey er y chohaggloo, er y chiaull, as er clugeyn sheean son dy chur cooney da'n eaishteyder ny karacteyryn as y skeeal y yannoo bio.

Instagram:
She shirveish voggyley sheshoil as rheynn fotografeeyn as feeshanyn eh Instagram. V'eh bunnit ayns 2010 liorish Kevin Systrom as Mike Krieger, as v'eh kionnit ny s'anmey liorish y cholught Americaanagh Facebook Inc., ta goll er enney myr Meta Platforms jiu. Ta'n app lhiggey da ny h-ymmydeyryn ym-ysseraght y laadey seose foddee ve reaghit liorish sheelaghyn fotografagh as ta currit ayns oardagh liorish lipaidyn brock as lipaidyn çheer-oaylleeagh. Foddee postalyn ve rheynnit dy pobbylagh ny dy preevaadjagh lesh eiyrtyssee roie-lowit. Foddee ymmydeyryn femblal stoo ymmydeyryn liorish lipaidyn ny soiaghey, jeeagh er stoo beoynagh, cowraghey magh coontey-mie jeh fotografeeyn, as eiyrt er ymmydeyryn elley son y stoo oc y chur rish nyn rollian.

Aideen Halligan:
She aa-chraishteyder an-ghraagh Yernagh ee Aideen Halligan (ruggit ayns Purt Largey, Nerin, er 29 Jerrey Fouyir 1986). Ren ee craishtey eddyr 2008 as 2009 son ATKingdom, BustyBrits, as FEMJOY, mastey colughtyn elley.

Robin Williams:
She aghteyr as fer aitt Americaanagh va Robin McLaurin Williams (21 Jerrey Souree 1951-11 Luanistyn 2014). Va enney mooar er son e schleiyn cummeydeyragh as ny karacteyryn eigsoylagh ren eh croo er y chooyl as cloie ayns scannaneyn, ayns dramaghyn as ayns aittyssyn. T'eh coontit mastey ny fir aitt share v'er mayrn rieau.
Hoshee Williams cloie aittys shassooagh ayns San Francisco as Los Angeles car ny 1970yn meanagh, as hooar eh enney mooar tra ren eh cloie yn fer neuhallooinagh Mork 'sy sitcom "Mork & Mindy" (1978–1982) liorish ABC. Lurg e chied phaart toshee scannaneagh ayns "Popeye" (1980), ren eh cloie ayns ymmydee scannaneyn rahoil, goaill stiagh "The World According to Garp" (1982), "Moscow on the Hudson" (1984), "Good Morning, Vietnam" (1987), "Dead Poets Society" (1989), "Awakenings" (1990), "The Fisher King" (1991), "Patch Adams" (1998), "One Hour Photo" (2002), as "World's Greatest Dad" (2009). Chammah's shen, ren eh cloie ayns scannaneyn rahoil elley lheid as "Hook" (1991), "Aladdin" (1992), "Mrs. Doubtfire" (1993), "Jumanji" (1995), "The Birdcage" (1996), "Good Will Hunting" (1997), as 'sy tree-skeealag "Night at the Museum" (2006–2014). V'eh enmyssit son kiare Aundyryn Academy as ren eh cosney Aundyr Academy son yn Aghteyr Co-hassooagh Share son "Good Will Hunting". Hooar eh daa Aundyr Primetime Emmy, shey Aundyryn Golden Globe Award, daa Aundyr y Screen Actors Guild, as queig Aundyryn Grammy myrgeddin.
Er 11 Luanistyn 2014, tra v'eh 63 bleeaney d'eash, hooar Williams baase liorish hene-varroo ec y thie echey ayns Paradise Cay, California.

Linda Larkin:
She aghteyr Americaanagh ee Linda Elizabeth Larkin (ruggit er 20 Mayrnt 1970). Ta enney share urree son e phaart myr goo Princess Jasmine 'sy scannane bioghit "Aladdin" (1992) liorish Disney.
Coorse bea.
Hoshee Larkin e coorse bea ayns 1990 lesh y scannane "Zapped Again!" raad ren ee cloie Joanne.
Haink urree dy ve goo Princess Jasmine ayns 1992 'sy scannane "Aladdin". Son cloie yn paart, v'eh urree e goo y injillaghey myr va Disney coontey ry row yn goo eck ro ard.
Ren Larkin aavioghey yn paart shen ayns ny h-obbraghyn eiyrtyssagh harrish meanyn eigsoylagh, goaill stiagh "The Return of Jafar" as "Aladdin and the King of Thieves", chammah as 'sy straih hellveeish, ayns "House of Mouse", ayns "Sofia the First", as ayns ny gammanyn-feeshan "Kingdom Hearts" as "Disney Infinity".
Son yn obbyr eck son Disney, va'n enmys Disney Legend bronnit urree er 19 Luanistyn 2011.
Bea phersoonagh.
Ta Larkin er ve poosit rish yn aghteyr as y chiaulleyder Yul Vazquez voish 2002.

Denzel Washington:
She aghteyr, stiureyder, as gienteyder scannane Americaanagh eh Denzel Hayes Washington Jr. (ruggit er 28 Nollick 1954). Ta enney mie er son y chloiaghyn er yn ardan as er y scaailan as t'eh er chur sheese er aghteyr ren aachummey "smooinaght y rolteenys scannaneagh classicagh". T'eh mie er enney chammah son e co-obbraghyn marish ny stiureyderyn Spike Lee, Antoine Fuqua, as Tony Scott. Harrish e choorse bea t'er gholl harrish kiare jeihaghtyn, ta Washington er ny gheddyn ram accolaidyn, goaill stiagh Aundyr Tony, daa Aundyr Academy, tree Aundyryn Golden Globe as daa Silver Bears. Ayns 2016, hooar eh Aundyr Golden Globe Cecil B. DeMille, as ayns 2020, ren "The New York Times" enmyssey eh myr yn aghteyr share jeh'n 21d eash. Ayns 2022, hooar Washington Boyn Eaghtyraneagh y Teyrsnys as eh er ny vronney er liorish yn Eaghtyrane Joe Biden.
Hoshee Washington e choorse aghteyrys 'sy theater raad chloie eh ayns cloiaghyn goaill stiagh "Coriolanus" liorish William Shakespeare ayns 1979. Haink enney er da'n chied cheayrt 'sy drama lheeyssagh "St. Elsewhere" (1982–1988). Hie "A Soldier's Story" (1984) liorish Norman Jewison as "Cry Freedom" (1987) liorish Richard Attenborough mastey ny paartyn scannaneagh leah echey. Chossyn eh e chied Aundyr Academy son e phaart myr Sidoor Shingoil Silas Trip 'sy drama caggee "Glory" va bunnit er Caggey Theayagh America. Car ny 1990yn, chroo eh hene myr y fer toshee ayns scannaneyn eigsoylagh lheid as y scannane beashnyssagh ard-skeealagh "Malcolm X" (1992) liorish Spike Lee, aachummey jeh cloie Shakespeare "Much Ado About Nothing" (1993) liorish Kenneth Branagh, y scannane creauagh leighoil "The Pelican Brief" (1993) liorish Alan J. Pakula, y drama "Philadelphia" (1993) liorish Jonathan Demme, as y drama leighoil "The Hurricane" (1999) liorish Norman Jewison. Chossyn Washington Aundyr Academy son yn Aghteyr Share son e phaart myr y chronneyder trullit Alonzo Harris 'sy scannane creauagh kimmeeys "Training Day" (2001). Ta Washington er ny chloie paartyn eigsoylagh caghlaaee, goaill stiagh y greinneyder bluckan-coshey Herman Boone ayns "Remember the Titans" (2000), y feelee as ynseyder Melvin B. Tolson ayns "The Great Debaters" (2007), y bock mooar druggaghyn Frank Lucas ayns "American Gangster" (2007) as etleyder lhuingys aer lesh deyrsnys ayns "Flight" (2012).
Ayns 2010, chossyn Washington Aundyr Tony son yn Aghteyr Share ayns Cloie son e phaart 'sy chloie "Fences" liorish August Wilson. Ny s'anmey, ren Washington stiurey, gientyn, as cloie 'syn aachummey scannaneagh jeh'n chloie shen ayns 2016, as eh er n'enmyssey son kiare Aundyryn Academy, goaill stiagh y Jalloo Share as yn Aghteyr Share son eh hene. Chammah's shen, ren eh gientyn aachummey scannaneagh "Ma Rainey's Black Bottom" (2020) liorish Wilson. Myrane lesh shen, t'eh er chloie er yn ardan ayns "A Raisin in the Sun" (2014) liorish Lorraine Hansberry as "The Iceman Cometh" (2018) liorish Eugene O'Neill.

Adèle Exarchopoulos:
She aghteyr Frangagh ee Adèle Exarchopoulos (ruggit er 22 Sauin 1993 ayns Paarys). Ta enney share urree son e paart toshee myr Adèle ayns "Blue Is the Warmest Colour" (2013), raad hooar ee enney eddyrashoonagh as moylley cremeydagh. Ec Feailley Scannane Cannes ayns 2013, haink urree dy ve ny dooinney s'aa yn aundyr Palme d'Or y gheddyn. Chossyn ee Aundyr y Los Angeles Film Critics Association son y Ven-aghteyr Share as y Trophée Chopard mastey accolaidyn elley son e cloie ayns "Blue Is the Warmest Colour".

Mahjong solitaire:
Mahjong solitaire (ny er enney chammah myr Shanghai solitaire, mahjong lectraneagh ny co-earroodagh, solitaire mahjong ny mahjong), she gamman piyral un-chloieder ta goaill ymmyd jeh possan leacanyn mahjong ayns ymmyd caartyn. S'menkey ta'n gamman goll er chloie er co-earrooder na myr gamman buird.
Ta'n ennym çheet magh ass y ghamman kiare-chloieder mahjong, agh shimmey anchaslys t'ayn eddyr y daa ghamman.

William Rowan Hamilton:
Y Reejerey William Rowan Hamilton LL.D, DCL, MRIA, FRAS (3/4 Luanistyn 1805 – 2 Mean Fouyir 1865) she maddaghteyr, rollageyder, as fishigagh Yernagh v'eh. She Olloo Andrews y Rollageydys ec Colaashtey ny Trinaid, Divlyn v'eh, chammah as stiureyder ec Thie Rollageydys Dún Sinche. Ren eh cur dy mooar rish reayrt-oaylleeaght, obbrinaght chlassicagh, as algeerey foayssagh. Va'n obbyr echey feer scanshoil 'syn ishig heiltynagh; she yn aa-ormlaghey er obbrinaght Newton, ta goll er enney jiu myr obbrinaght Hamiltonagh, va feer scanshoil ayn. T'eh conntit jiu myr bun y vagnaidys lectragh as yn obbrinaght whantum. 'Sy vaddaght ghlen, t'eh share er enney myr ynlaghteyr y chiarneen.
Ren coorse bea sheansagh Hamilton goaill stiagh studeyrys er y reayrt-oaylleeaght howse-oaylleeagh, aachummey saaseyn breeoil ayns coryssyn reayrtoil, lhiassaghey sheiltynyssyn curmeyderyn cubblit algeeragh co-whingagh (raad ta earrooyn cramp goll er nyn groo myr piyryn jeh feer earrooyn oardit), feaysleydys cormidyn yl-ennymagh, obbraidee linnagh er kiarneenyn, as fondaghey troar son obbraidee linnagh er reamys kiarneenyn (cooish er lheh y çhoarym cadjin ta goll er enney jiu myr çhoarym Cayley-Hamilton). Ren Hamilton ynlaghey "calcalys icosagh", ren eh ymmyd jeh son ronsaghey magh bollee heu-ghoont er daa-heedran-jeig nagh vel çheet rish dagh mullagh agh un cheayrt.

1805:

Maitreyi Ramakrishnan:
She aghteyr Canadagh ee Maitreyi Ramakrishnan (ruggit er 28 Nollick 2001). Ta enney mie urree son y paart toshee myr Devi Vishwakumar 'sy straih yeigeyr Netflix "Never Have I Ever" (2020–jiu).

Kaley Cuoco:
Kaley Christine Cuoco (ruggit er 30 Sauin 1985), she ben-chloieder as gienteyder Americaanagh t'ee. Lurg straih paartyn co-hassooagh ayns scannaneyn as er y çhellveeish, vleayst ee magh er y scaailan lesh y phaart myr Bridget Hennessy er y sitcom "8 Simple Rules" (2002–2005) liorish ABC. Lurg shen, ren Cuoco cur e goo rish Brandy Harrington er "Brandy & Mr. Whiskers" (2004–2006) as ren ee cloie Billie Jenkins er y straih yerrinagh jeh'n straih hellveeish "Charmed" (2005–2006). Ny s'anmey, chloie ee Penny er y sitcom "The Big Bang Theory" (2007–2019) liorish CBS. Voish y vlein 2020, ta Cuoco er chloie as er obbraghey myr yn ard-ghienteyder son y straih chreauagh aitt "The Flight Attendant" liorish HBO Max.
Ren Cuoco chloie 'sy scannaneaght da'n chied cheayrt 'sy scannane çhellveeish creauagh "" (1992). Ta'n obbyr eck 'sy scannaneaght goaill stiagh "Virtuosity" (1995), "Toothless" (1997), "Can't Be Heaven" (1999), "Alley Cats Strike" (2000), "Growing Up Brady" (2000), "Crimes of Fashion" (2004), "The Hollow" (2004), "Lucky 13" (2005), "To Be Fat like Me" (2007), "Cougar Club" (2007), "Killer Movie" (2008), "The Penthouse" (2010), "Hop" (2011), "Authors Anonymous" (2014), as "The Wedding Ringer" (2015). Hooar ee rollage er y Hollywood Walk of Fame ayns 2014 as ayns Jerrey Fouyir 2017 chur ee Yes, Norman Productions er bun.

Lili Reinhart:
She ben-chloieder Americaanagh ee Lili Pauline Reinhart (ruggit er 13 Mean Fouyir 1996). Ta enney mie urree son cloie Betty Cooper 'sy straih drama yeigeyr "Riverdale" (2017–jiu) liorish The CW as Annabelle 'sy scannane drama kimmeeys doo-aittys "Hustlers" (2019) liorish Lorene Scafaria. Ayns 2020, chloie ee Grace Town ayns "Chemical Hearts", aachummey scannane jeh'n noaskeeal "Our Chemical Hearts" liorish Krystal Sutherland.

Sharni Vinson:
She aghteyr as daunseyr Austrailagh ee Sharni Vinson (ruggit er 22 Jerrey Souree 1983). Ta enney mie urree son e paartyn 'sy çheabin çhellveeish "Home and Away", as ayns ny scannaneyn "Bait 3D", "Step Up 3D" as "You're Next".

Wendy Glenn:
She aghteyr as craishteyder Sostynagh ee Wendy Glenn (ruggit er 4 Luanistyn 1985).

Phoebe Tonkin:
She aghteyr Austrailagh ee Phoebe Jane Elizabeth Tonkin (ruggit er 12 Jerrey Souree 1989). Ta enney urree son e paart myr Cleo Sertori ayns "", Fiona Maxwell ayns "Tomorrow, When the War Began", Faye Chamberlain ayns "The Secret Circle", as Hayley Marshall i'sy straih "The Vampire Diaries" liorish The CW as y çheu-straih "The Originals".

Cariba Heine:
She aghteyr as daunseyr Austrailagh va ruggit 'syn Affrick Yiass ee Cariba Heine (ruggit er 6 Jerrey Fouyir 1988). Ta enney urree son e paartyn myr Rikki Chadwick 'sy chlaare ' liorish Network Ten, myr Bridget Sanchez 'sy trass straih jeh "Blue Water High", as myr Caroline Byrne ayns '.

Raven Alexis:
She aghteyr as stiureyder scannane pornograafagh as craishteyder an-ghraagh Americaanagh va Raven Alexis (26 Jerrey Geuree 1987 - 23 Mayrnt 2022). Hoshee ee gobbraghey 'sy çhynskyl pornograafagh ayns 2008 as dirree ee ass ayns 2013. Hooar ee baase voish doghan voish molkey rere gorley Crohn.

Randi Love:
She screeudeyr blog as craishteyder an-ghraagh Americaanagh ee Randi Love (ruggit ayns Spokane Valley, Washington).

Finding Dory:
She scannane jantys drama aittys Americaanagh voish y vlein 2016 ta bioghit liorish co-earrooder eh Finding Dory. Hie yn scannane er ny ghientyn liorish Pixar Animation Studios as v'eh skeaylt magh liorish Walt Disney Pictures. V'eh stiurit ec Andrew Stanton as screeuit ec Stanton as Victoria Strouse. T'eh eiyrtyssagh dy jeeragh er "Finding Nemo" (2003) as t'eh cur failt er-ash er gooyn Ellen DeGeneres as Albert Brooks, marish Hayden Rolence (ta goll stiagh ayns ynnyd Alexander Gould), Ed O'Neill, Kaitlin Olson, Ty Burrell, Diane Keaton, as Eugene Levy çheet stiagh 'sy wirran. Ta'n scannane geiyrt er yn yeeast neuchooinaghtagh (DeGeneres) ta goll er jurnaa son dy ve aachianglt rish e paarantyn (Keaton as Levy).
Hie "Finding Dory" magh er ny skeaylley da'n chied cheayrt ec yn El Capitan Theatre ayns Los Angeles er 8 Mean Souree 2016, as v'eh skeaylt magh dy cadjin ayns theateryn ayns ny Steatyn Unnaneysit er 17 Mean Souree. V'eh feddynit dy mie ec cremeyderyn as hooar eh ard-voylley son e vioghys, e hrimmid ennaghtagh, e chloie goo, as yn aittys v'ayn. Chossyn eh $1.029 villoon er feie ny cruinney as haink er dy ve ny hrass scannane smoo ayns 2016 rere çheet-stiagh. Ec traa yn skeaylley magh echey, v'eh ny 22h scannane smoo rere çheet-stiagh rieau as ny chiarroo scannane bioghit smoo rere çheet-stiagh rieau car e choorse theateragh.

Frozen II:
She scannane fansee kiaullee Americaanagh voish y vlein 2019 ta bioghit liorish co-earrooder eh Frozen II. Hie yn scannane er ny ghientyn liorish Walt Disney Animation Studios as v'eh skeaylt magh liorish Walt Disney Pictures. Y 58oo ard-scannane bioghit Disney, t'eh eiyrtyssagh dy jeeragh er "Frozen" (2013). Va'n scannane stiurit ec Chris Buck as Jennifer Lee, as screeuit ec Lee, Buck, Marc Smith, Kristen Anderson-Lopez, as Robert Lopez. V'eh gientit ec Peter Del Vecho as t'eh goaill stiagh gooyn Kristen Bell, Idina Menzel, Josh Gad, as Jonathan Groff. Haink Anderson-Lopez as Lopez er-ash myr screeudeyryn arrane, as ren Christophe Beck cummey yn chiaull. Ta'n scannane bunnit tree bleeaney lurg taghyrtyn y chied scannane as t'eh gieyrt er ny shuyraghyn Anna as Elsa, Kristoff, y feeaih Loghlinagh Sven, as y fer sniaghtee Olaf as ad jurnaaghey dys keyll ghruiaghtagh son feddyn magh bun pooar druiaghtagh Elsa.
Hie "Frozen II" magh da'n chied cheayrt ayns Los Angeles er 7 Sauin 2019 as hie eh magh er ny skeaylley ayns ny Steatyn Unnaneysit er 22 Sauin. Hooar y scannane baghteyryssyn jarrooagh son y chooid smoo son y cheiraght, y loayrtys, as ny cooishyn echey; hayrn y skeeal as y focus cremey obballagh ennagh, ansherbee, as va freggyrt vestit ayn roish y chiaull. Chossyn "Frozen II" $1.450 villoon er feie ny cruinney. Va "Frozen II" enmyssit son yn Arrane Bunneydagh Share ec y 92h Aundyryn Academy, as hooar eh ram accolaidyn elley.

Descendants (scannane 2015):
She scannane çhellveeish aittys contoyrtys fansee kiaullee Americaanagh voish y vlein 2015 eh Descendants. She Kenny Ortega va'n stiureyder as y choreografee. Ta Dove Cameron, Sofia Carson, Booboo Stewart, as Cameron Boyce cloie ny paitçhyn jeigeyragh lesh Maleficent, y Drogh Venrein, Jafar, as Cruella de Vil, er lheh. Ta'n scannane geiyrt er ny jeigeyryn as ad geearree cochiartaghey nyn mea çheumooie jeh'n ellan pryssoonagh oc as ad er mishoon son slatt-obbee yn Fairy Godmother ("Mimmey Shee") y gheid as nynbaarantyn y heyrey voish bondiaght. Hie eh magh er ny skeaylley da'n chied cheayrt er 31 Jerrey Geuree 2015 lesh y Disney Channel.
Ta Mitchell Hope, Melanie Paxson, Brenna D'Amico, Sarah Jeffery, Zachary Gibson, Jedidiah Goodacre, Dianne Doan, Dan Payne, Keegan Connor Tracy, Wendy Raquel Robinson, Maz Jobrani, Kathy Najimy, as Kristin Chenoweth cloie 'sy scannane chammah.
She yn chied chur magh 'sy chiartys dellal "Descendants" t'eh, as ren ad straih ghiare-chummit bioghit lesh CGI er y çheu as yn ennym "" currit urree. Hie scannane eiyrtyssagh magh ny yei fo'n ennym "Descendants 2" hie magh er 21 Jerrey Souree 2017, as scannane elley - y trass scannane 'sy chiartys - "Descendants 3" hie magh er 2 Luanistyn 2019.

ICarly:
She straih hellveeish aittys Americaanagh eh iCarly. Va'n straih crooit ec Dan Schneider as hie eh magh er ny scaalheaney er Nickelodeon voish 8 Mean Fouyir 2007 derrey 23 Sauin 2012.

Kirsten Price (aghteyr):
She aghteyr pornograafagh as craishteyder an-ghraagh Americaanagh ee Kirsten Price (ruggit ayns Providence, Ellan Rhode er 13 Sauin 1981). Hoshee ee gobbraghey 'sy çhynskyl pornograafagh ayns 2004.

Traartys Bucha:
Ta Traartys Bucha () çheet er dunveryssyn as caartrey seyraanee Ookraanagh liorish Forsaghyn Armit y Roosh car y chah son, as y chummaltys jeh Bucha car y Ruegys Rooshagh er yn Ookraan. Hie feanish fotografagh as feeshan er ny hoilshaghey magh er 1 Averil 2022 lurg cooyllaghey ny forsaghyn Rooshagh voish y chaayr.
Er lesh y veoir as lughtyn reill ynnydagh elley, ta mysh 1,300 kirp er ve feddynit voish y chaayr as ny h-ardjyn mygeayrt-y-mooee, goaill stiagh 31 phaitçhey. Haishbyn fotografyn kirp heyraanee, ayns linnaghyn as nyn laueyn kianglt çheu chooylloo oc, as ad er ve lhiggit orroo jeeragh 'sy chione; ren eh cur feanish dy nee cur-gy-baaish giare v'ayn. Ren brialtys liorish Radio Free Europe cur feanish dy row ymmyd jeant jeh laare fo halloo çheu heese voish ynnyd campal myr shamyr horçhee. Shimmey corp va feddynit as ad lhottit as loshtit, as ren caillinyn cha aeg as kiare bleeaney jeig d'eash cur coontyssyn dy row ad eginit ec sidooryn Rooshagh. Yeearree yn Ookraan er y Chooyrt Chimmeeys Eddyrashoonagh ronsaghey magh cre haghyr ayns Bucha myr ayrn jeh'n ronsaghey rea bentyn rish y ruegys son feddyn magh haghyr kimmeeyssyn caggee Rooshagh ny kimmeeyssyn noi'n çheelnaue ny dyn.
Ta ny lughtyn reill Rooshagh gra nagh lhieu yn freggyrtys as dy ren yn Ookraan foalsaghey feeshanyn y taghyrt ny cloie ny dunveryssyn myr obbraghey brattagh foalsey, as t'ad gra dy nee "naight foalsey" ad feeshanyn as fotografyn ny kirp varroo. Cheau possanyn as sheshaghtyn ym-ysseraght eigsoylagh er feie ny cruinney anghoo er ny jeean-loayrtyssyn Rooshagh. Ren feanishyn sooilley voish cummaltee Bucha gra dy nee Forsaghyn Armit y Roosh jantee ny dunveryssyn.

Emilia Jones:
She aghteyr, arraneyder, as screeudeyr arrane Sostynagh ee Emilia Annis I. Jones (ruggit er 23 Toshiaght Arree 2002). Ren ee cloie yn paart toshee Ruby Rossi 'sy scannane "CODA" (2021), raad chossyn ee shiartanse d'accolaidyn, goaill stiagh enmyssaght BAFTA son y Ven-aghteyr Share ayns Paart Toshee.
Ta enney urree chammah son e paart myr Kinsey Locke 'sy straih Netflix "Locke & Key" (2020–jiu), as t'ee er ny chloie ayns "Doctor Who" (2013) as "Utopia" (2013–2014). Ta paartyn toshee elley eck goaill stiagh "Brimstone" (2016), "Ghostland" as "Two for Joy" (y daa jeu ayns 2018), as "" (2019). T'ee er ny chloie er yn ardan chammah 'sy West End, Lunnin.

Ananda Lewis:
She çhebbeyder çhellveeish, seyr, aa-chraishteyder, as immeeaghtagh sheshoil Americaanagh ee Ananda Lewis (ruggit er 21 Mayrnt 1973). She markiagh feeshan er MTV v'ee voish ny 1990yn jeianagh derrey 2001 tra ren ee faagail y moggyl son e scaalheaney hene, "The Ananda Lewis Show", y hebbey. She co-reggyrtagh v'ee son "The Insider" voish 2004 derrey 2005. Eisht, haink urree dy ve ny seyr. Ren ee çhebbey aavioghey 2019 jeh "While You Were Out" er "TLC".
Er 1 Jerrey Fouyir 2020, dooyrt Lewis er Instagram dy row ee streeu noi kanghyr ny keeaghyn jeh'n trass keim feie yn daa vlein roish shen.

Ashlynn Brooke:
She aa-aghteyr pornograafagh, craishteyder an-ghraagh, as rooishteyder Americaanagh ee Ashlynn Brooke (ruggit myr Ashley Brooks ayns Oklahoma City, Oklahoma er 14 Luanistyn 1985). Hoshee ee gobbraghey 'sy çhynskyl pornograafagh ayns 2006 as dirree ee ass ayns 2012.

Kurt Gerstein:
She offishear SS Germaanagh va Kurt Gerstein (11 Luanistyn 1905 – 25 Jerrey Souree 1945). She toshiagh shirveishyn jee-ghorlaghey çhaghnoil yn "Hygiene-Institut der Waffen-SS" (Undinys Glennid y Waffen-SS). Erreish da ard-ghunveryssyn y akin ayns sleih-champyn ard-ghunverys Natseeagh Belzec as Treblinka, hug Gerstein coontys cruinn da'n diploamagh Soolynnagh Göran von Otter, chammah as da diploamee Elveeishagh, olteynyn yn Agglish Chatoleagh Raueagh as kianglaghyn oc rish Paab Pius XII, as da Reiltys Eebyrtagh y Çheer Injil son cur fysseree da'n voodeeys eddyr-ashoonagh bentyn rish y Deherree myr v'eh taghyrt. Ayns 1945, lurg ren eh lhiggey eh hene seose, screeu eh "Coontys Gerstein" as eh coodaghey ny taghyrtyn echey 'sy Deherree. Hooar eh baase rere hene-varroo lhiassit tra v'eh ayns laueyn ny Frangee.

Oie ny Feeleeyn Marrooit:
Ta Oie ny Feeleeyn Marrooit ( "Dela Yevreyskovo antifashistskovo komiteta" ny "Cooish y Ving Noi-ashistagh Ewagh"; "Harugey malkus funem Ratnfarband" ny "Martyryn yn Unnaneys Soveidjagh") çheet er cur-gy-baase tree Ewnyn Soveidjagh jeig ayns Pryssoon Lubyanka ayns Moscow er 12 Luanistyn 1952. Va ny chied deiney goit seose ayns Mean Fouyir 1948 as Mean Souree 1949. Ren ny lughtyn reill cassid er dagh fendeilagh dy breagagh mychione y pheeikearys as y traitoorys chammah as kimmeeyssyn elley. Erreish daue ve goit seose, v'ad torçhit, bwoailt, as currit lioroosyn hene feie tree bleeaney roish my row ad kerrit dy h-oikoil. Va queig screeudeyryn Ewdish mastey ny fendeilee as dagh fer jeu nyn olteynyn jeh Bing Noi-ashistagh ny h-Ewnyn.
Fendeilee.
Va fir ennagh va kianglt dy jeeragh ny neu-yeeragh rish y JAC goit seose ayns ny bleeantyn mygeayrt y chooish leigh. Ga nagh row Solomon Mikhoels goit seose, ren Stalin sarey e vaase ayns 1948. Va Der Nister, screeudeyr Ewdish elley, goit seose ayns 1949, as hooar eh baase ayns sleih-champ obbyr ayns 1950. Hooar y cremeyder lettyragh Yitzhak Nusinov baase 'sy phryssoon, as va ny h-earisheyryn Shmuel Persov as Miriam Zheleznova lhiggit – dagh fer jeu ayns 1950.

Anne Heche:
She aghteyr Americaanagh va Anne Celeste Heche (25 Boaldyn 1969 – 12 Luanistyn 2022). Haink enney mie urree tra ren ee cloie yn lannoon Vicky Hudson as Marley Love er y çheabin çhellveeish "Another World" (1987–1991), raad ren ee cossyn e chied Aundyr Daytime Emmy as daa Aundyr y Soap Opera Digest. Haink enney ny share urree ayns ny 1990yn s'anmey marish paartyn 'sy scannane drama kimmeeys "Donnie Brasco" (1997), 'sy scannane cragh "Volcano" (1997), y scannane giarrey "I Know What You Did Last Summer" (1997), 'sy scannane aittys jantys "Six Days, Seven Nights" (1998), as 'sy scannane creauagh drama "Return to Paradise" (1998).
Lurg e paart myr Marion Crane 'sy scannane aa-yeant "Psycho" (1998) liorish Gus Van Sant, hie Heche er oaie cloie paartyn ayns scannaneyn seyrey lheid as y scannane drama "Birth" (2004), y scannane aittys keintys "Spread" (2009), "Cedar Rapids" (2011), y scannane drama "Rampart" (2011), as y scannane doo-aittys "Catfight" (2016). Hooar ee ard-voylley son e paart 'sy scannane çhellveeish "Gracie's Choice", chossyn j'ee enmyssaght son Aundyr Primetime Emmy, as son yn obbyr eck er Broadway, goaill stiagh "Twentieth Century" er lheh.
Gollrish e paartyn scannaneaght as ardan, ren Heche cloie ;sy straih hellveeish drama aittys "Men in Trees" (2006–08), "Hung" (2009–11), "Save Me" (2013), "Aftermath" (2016), as y straih hellveeish drama chaggee "The Brave" (2017). Chur ee e goo rish y straih hellveeish vioghit "The Legend of Korra" (2014), raad ren ee cloie Suyin Beifong, as hie ee magh myr co-streeuder er y 29oo straih jeh "Dancing with the Stars" (2020).

Mila Kunis:
She aghteyr Americaanagh ee Milena Markovna "Mila" Kunis (; ; ruggit er 14 Luanistyn 1983). Hoshee ee cloie Jackie Burkhart er y straih hellveeish "That '70s Show" (1998–2006) liorish Fox tra v'ee 14 bleeaney d'eash. Voish y vlein 1999, t'ee er ny chur e goo rish Meg Griffin er y straih vioghit "Family Guy" liorish Fox.
Haink e chied phaart mooar ayns 2008, tra ren ee cloie Rachel 'syn aittys romansagh "Forgetting Sarah Marshall". Hooar ee moylley cremeydagh as accolaidyn son e cloie 'sy scannane creauagh shicklaagagh "Black Swan" (2010), raad hooar ee Aundyr Marcello Mastroianni son yn Aghteyr ny Ben-aghteyr Aeg Share, as enmyssaghtyn son Aundyr y Screen Actors Guild as Aundyr Golden Globe son y Ven-aghteyr Ch-hassooagh Share. Ta e scannaneyn mooarey elley goaill stiagh ny scannaneyn jantys "Max Payne" (2008) as "The Book of Eli" (2010), yn aittys romansagh "Friends with Benefits" (2011), y scannane fansee "Oz the Great and Powerful" (2013), as ny h-aittyssyn "Ted" (2012), "Bad Moms" (2016) as e scannane eiyrtyssagh, "A Bad Moms Christmas" (2017).

Bertold Brecht:
She cliaghteyder theater, screeudeyr cloie, as feelee Germaanagh va Eugen Berthold Friedrich Brecht (10 Toshiaght Arree 1898 – 14 Luanistyn 1956), v'er enney dy keirdagh myr Bertolt Brecht. Dappee eh car Pobblaght Weimar as va ny chied rahyn echey myr screeudeyr cloie ayns München roish my darree eh dys Berleen ayns 1924, raad screeu eh "The Threepenny Opera" marish Kurt Weill as raad hoshee co-obbraghey seihltagh echey lesh y chummeyder Hanns Eisler. V'eh goit lesh smooinaghtyn Marksagh car y lhing shen as screeu eh "Lehrstücke" ynseydagh as haink er dy ve coontit myr sheiltynagh toshee yn theater ard-skeealagh (va enmyssit echey "theater ynseydagh") as y .
Car lhing y Ghermaan Natseeagh, ren Brecht scapail e heer ghooghys, dys Loghlin da'n chied cheayrt, as dys ny Steatyn Unnaneysit car y Nah Chaggey Dowanagh raad ren yn FBI cur arrey er. Lurg y caggey, v'eh goit jeeragh roish y ving House Un-American Activities Committee ("Bing Thie Jantyssyn Neu-Americaanagh"). Darree eh er-ash dys Berleen Hiar lurg y caggey raad chur eh y colught theater Berliner Ensemble er bun marish e ven heshee, y ven-chloieder Helene Weigel.
Hooar Brecht baase ayns Berleen Hiar ayns 1956 rere teaym chree.

Olga Smirnova (daunseyr):
She caillin ballay Rooshagh ee Olga Vyacheslavovna Smirnova (; ruggit er 6 Sauin 1991). Ec y traa t'ayn she callin ballay prima ish marish Ballay Ashoonagh y Çheer Injil ayns Amsterdam, y Çheer Injil. T'ee er ve daunsey ec buill er feie'n Oarpey chammah as ayns Beijing as 'sy Çhapaan.

The Lion King 1½:
She scannane aittys kiaullee bioghit Americaanagh voish y vlein 2004 eh The Lion King 1½ (ta goll er enney chammah myr The Lion King 3: Hakuna Matata, ny The Lion King III: Hakuna Matata ayns ardjyn ennagh). Va'n scannane skeaylt magh jeeragh er feeshan er 10 Toshiaght Arree 2004 as gientit liorish y chrouw Austrailagh jeh Disneytoon Studios. She eshyn y trass cur magh as y cur magh jerrinagh 'sy treeskeealag "Lion King". T'eh bunnit er "Timon & Pumbaa" as gobbraghey myr skeeal bunneydagh y phiyr meerkat/muc fahnaghtagh Timon and Pumbaa as ta skeeal y scannane taghyrt çheusthie jeh taghyrtyn "The Lion King". Ta tromlagh yn wirran goo voish y chied scannane filley er-ash son nyn baartyn y aavioghey, goaill stiagh Nathan Lane as Ernie Sabella myr gooyn Timon as Pumbaa er lheh. Ta skeeal y scannane bunnit, dy baghtal, er skeeal "Rosencrantz and Guildenstern Are Dead" liorish Tom Stoppard, doo-aittys ta ginsh skeeal "Hamlet" voish tuarym y daa vyn-characteyr.

Ariel Winter:
She ben-chloieder Americaanagh ee Ariel Winter Workman (ruggit er 28 Jerrey Geuree 1998). Ta enney urree son e paart myr Alex Dunphy 'sy straih aittys "Modern Family" liorish ABC, raad ren ish as e co-roltagyn cosney kiare Aundyryn lhiantagh y Screen Actors Guild son Fwirran Ard-yindyssagh ayns Straih Aittys. Chammah's shen, chur ee e goo rish y characteyr enmyssagh 'sy straih "Sofia the First" liorish Disney Junior as rish y characteyr Penny Peterson 'sy scannane bioghit "Mr. Peabody and Sherman" voish y vlein 2014.
Bea aeg.
Va Winter ruggit er 28 Jerrey Geuree 1998 lesh Chrisoula ("née" Batistas) as Glenn Workman. Trooid e moir, she jeh sluight Greagagh ee as trooid e ayr she jeh sluight Germaanagh ee. She yn 'neen s'aa jeh ny cloiederyn elley Shanelle Workman as Jimmy Workman t'ee.

Sarah Hyland:
She ben-chloieder as arraneyder Americaanagh ee Sarah Jane Hyland (ruggit er 24 Sauin 1990). V'ee ruggit ayns Manhattan as hie ee dys Scoill ny h-Ellynyn Cloie Keirdey roish my ren ee geddyn paartyn beggey ayns ny scannaneyn "Private Parts" (1997), "Annie" (1999) as "Blind Date" (2007). Ta enney share urree son e paart myr Haley Dunphy 'sy straih aittys "Modern Family" liorish ABC (2009–2020), raad hooar ee moylley mooar, goaill stiagh kiare Aundyryn lhiantagh y Screen Actors Guild son Fwirran Ard-yindyssagh ayns Straih Aittys as enmyssaght son Aundyr Çhellveeish Critics' Choice son y Ven-aghteyr Co-hassooagh Share ayns Straih Aittys.
Ta enney er Hyland myrgeddin son e paartyn ayns ny scannaneyn "Geek Charming" (2011), "Struck by Lightning" (2012), "Scary Movie 5" (2013), "Vampire Academy" (2014), "See You in Valhalla" (2015), "XOXO" (2016), "Dirty Dancing" (2017) as "The Wedding Year" (2019).

Ed O'Neill:
She cloieder as fer aitt Americaanagh eh Edward Leonard "Ed" O'Neill (ruggit er 12 Averil 1946). Ta e phaartyn goaill stiagh Al Bundy 'sy sitcom "Married... with Children" liorish Fox Network, raad v'eh enmyssit son daa Aundyr Golden Globe, as Jay Pritchett 'sy straih aittys "Modern Family" liorish ABC raad v'eh enmyssit son tree Aundyryn Primetime Emmy as ren eh cosney kiare Aundyryn lhiantagh y Screen Actors Guild son Fwirran Ard-yindyssagh ayns Straih Aittys. Chammah's shen, t'eh er ny chloie 'sy straih scannane "Wayne's World", ayns "Little Giants", ayns "Prefontaine", ayns"The Bone Collector", as ayns "Sun Dogs", chammah as obbyr ghoo son y chiartys dellal "Wreck It Ralph" as "Finding Dory".

Ty Burrell:
She cloieder as fer aitt Americaanagh eh Tyler Gerald Burrell (ruggit er 22 Luanistyn 1967). Ta enney share er Burrell son e phaart myr Phil Dunphy 'sy straih aittys "Modern Family" liorish ABC, raad ren eh cosney Aundyr Primetime Emmy son yn Aghteyr Co-hassooagh Share ayns Straih Aittys ayns 2011 as 2014 (ass hoght enmyssaghtyn lhiantagh) as queig Aundyryn y Screen Actors Guild: fer son Cloie Ard-yindyssagh liorish Aghteyr Firryn ayns Straih Aittys ayns 2013 as kiare aundyryn lhiantagh son Cloie Ard-yindyssagh liorish Fwirran ayns Straih Aittys va rheynnit magh liorish y wirran voish 2011 derrey 2014.
Ta Burrell er ny chloie shiartanse dy phaartyn ayns cloiaghyn Broadway lheid as "Macbeth" as ayns cloiaghyn elley nagh row er Broadway lheid as "Burn This". T'eh er ny chloie paartyn mooarey ayns ny straihyn çhellveeish "Out of Practice" as "Back to You". T'eh er ny chloie ayns scannaneyn lheid as "Evolution", "Black Hawk Down", "Dawn of the Dead", "Muppets Most Wanted", as myr Doc Samson ayns "The Incredible Hulk". T'eh er ny chur e ghoo rish karacteyryn ayns ny scannaneyn bioghit "Mr. Peabody & Sherman", "Finding Dory", as "Storks".

Shrima Malati:
She aghteyr pornograafagh as craishteyder an-ghraagh Ookraanagh ee Shrima Malati (ruggit er 21 Mean Souree 1988). Hoshee ee gobbraghey 'sy çhynskyl pornograafagh ayns 2013.

Kira Kovalenko:
She stiureyder scannane as scaa-screeudeyryn Rooshagh ee Kira Takhirovna Kovalenko (; ruggit er 12 Nollick 1989 ayns Nalchik, PHHH Kabardino-Balkaria, PHCH y Roosh, yn Unnaneys Soveidjagh).

Lilia Gildeeva:
She earisheyr Rooshagh ee Lilia Faridovna Gildeeva (; ruggit er 14 Mean Souree 1976) ren obbraghey son y chlaare naight Segodnya lesh NTV voish 2006 derrey 2022. Ta enney mie urree son e spotçheraght er aer marish e co-obbree Alexey Pivovarov.
Va Gildeeva ruggit ayns Zǝy, Pobblaght y Tatarstaan. Ren ee studeyryssyn ayns Ollooscoill Steat Kazan as hoshee yn coorse bea eck myr earisheyr çhellveeish ayns Yar Çallı. Ayns Toshiaght Arree 2022 dirree ee ass NTV erreish j'ee yn Roosh y aagail son çheer elley kyndagh rish y ruegys Rooshagh er yn Ookraan.

Mark Ruffalo:
She aghteyr as immeeaghtagh çhymmyltaghtoil Americaanagh eh Mark Alan Ruffalo (ruggit er 22 Sauin 1967). Hoshee eh cloie ayns ny 1990yn leah as haink enney er da'n chied cheayrt lesh yn obbyr ren eh 'sy chloie "This Is Our Youth" (1998) liorish Kenneth Lonergan as 'sy scannane drama "You Can Count on Me" (2000). Hie eh er oaie cloie ayns ny h-aittyssyn romansagh "13 Going on 30" (2004) as "Just like Heaven" (2005) as ayns ny scannaneyn creauagh "In the Cut" (2003), "Zodiac" (2007) as "Shutter Island" (2010). Hooar Ruffalo enney eddyr-ashoonagh tra ren eh cloie Bruce Banner/Hulk ayns ny scannaneyn far-feniagh Marvel "The Avengers" (2012), "Iron Man 3" (2013), ' (2015), ' (2017), ' (2018), "Captain Marvel" (2019), ' (2019), as "Shang-Chi and the Legend of the Ten Rings" (2021), chammah as 'sy straih scannane lesh Disney+ "" (2022). Ayns 2019, ren Ruffalo co-ghientyn as cloie ayns "Dark Waters".
Hooar Ruffalo enmyssaghtyn son Aundyr Academy son yn Aghteyr Co-hassooagh Share tra ren eh cloie toyrtyssagh sheel 'sy drama aittys "The Kids Are All Right" (2010), Dave Schultz 'sy scannane beashnyssagh "Foxcatcher" (2014), as Michael Rezendes 'sy drama "Spotlight" (2015). Chossyn eh Aundyr y Screen Actors Guild son yn Aghteyr Share ayns Scannane Çhellveeish tra ren eh cloie screeudeyr aeragh as immeeaghtagh 'sy scannane drama çhellveeish "The Normal Heart" (2015), as Aundyr Primetime Emmy son yn Aghteyr Toshee Ard-yindyssagh ayns Straih Chaglit ny Scannane son e phaart dooblit 'sy vyn-straih "I Know This Much Is True" (2020). Car y choorse bea echey, ta Ruffalo er ny ve enmyssit son un Emmy, un Grammy, un Oscar, as un Tony.

Stranger Things:
She straih hellveeish drama far-skeealaght heanse Americaanagh eh Stranger Things. T'eh er ny chroo ec ny braaraghyn Duffer, ta gobbraghey myr stiureyderyn as ard-ghienteyderyn myrane lesh Shawn levy as Dan Cohen. Haink y chied straih magh er ny skeaylley er Netflix er 15 Jerrey Souree 2016 as va'n straih yerrinagh aanoait ayns Toshiaght Arree 2022. Ta'n straih bunnit ayns ny 1980yn 'sy valley far-skeealagh Hawkins, Indiana, as t'ee geiyrt er shiartanse dy chooishyn folliaghtagh, dorraghey, as erskyn-dooghyssagh ta taghyrt mygeayrt y valley. 
Ren ny braaraghyn Duffer lhiassaghey "Stranger Things" myr mestey jeh'n drama ronsee marish meeryn erskyn-dooghyssagh goll rish atçhim as ennaghtyn lambaanagh, marish sampleyryn ogheragh rish pop-chultoor ny 1980yn. Va elmintyn stiureydagh as bun-chooishagh tayrnit magh ass obbraghyn liorish Steven Spielberg, John Carpenter, David Lynch, Stephen King, Wes Craven as H. P. Lovecraft. Hayrn ad breeaghys voish prowaltyssyn va jeant car y Chaggey Feayr as sheiltynyssyn co-chialg va goaill stiagh prowaltyssyn reiltyssagh folliaghtagh.

David Harbour:
She aghteyr Americaanagh eh David Kenneth Harbour (ruggit er 10 Averil 1975). T'eh er ny chloie paartyn co-hassooagh ayns scannaneyn lheid as "Brokeback Mountain" (2005), "Quantum of Solace" (2008), "State of Play" (2009), "The Green Hornet" (2011), "End of Watch" (2012), "Snitch" (2013), "The Equalizer" (2014), "Black Mass" (2015), "Suicide Squad" (2016), "Sleepless" (2017) as "Extraction" (2020). Haink enney eddyr-ashoonagh er son e huarystal myr Jim Hopper 'sy straih drama far-skeealaght heanse "Stranger Things" (2016–jiu) liorish Netflix, raad chossyn eh Aundyr Çhellveeish Critics' Choice ayns 2018, daa enmyssaght son Aundyr Emmy, as enmyssaght son Aundyr Golden Globe. Ren Harbour cloie yn karacteyr enmyssagh ayns "Hellboy" (2019) as Red Guardian ayns "Black Widow" (2021).

Danica Dillon:
She aa-aghteyr pornograafagh as craishteyder an-ghraagh Americaanagh ee Danica Dillon (ruggit myr Ashley Lewis ayns Ashtabula, Ohio, er 4 Jerrey Geuree 1987). Roish my doshee ee gobbraghey 'sy çhynskyl pornograafagh ayns 2009, v'ee gobbraghey myr rooishteyder ayns club rooishtee ayns San Diego, California tra ren ee çheet quail Jenna Haze. Ren Haze cur coyrle j'ee obbyr y gheddyn 'sy phornograafaght. Daa hiaghtin ny yei, va'n chied reayrtys jeant ec Dillan. Dirree ee magh ass y çhynskyl pornograafagh ayns 2019, as jiu t'ee gobbraghey myr aghteyr ayns straihyn as scannaneyn çhellveeish.

Stoya:
She aghteyr pornograafagh, aghteyr scannane, craishteyder an-ghraagh, as screeudeyr Americaanagh ee Stoya (ruggit ayns Wilmington, Carolina Hwoaie, er 15 Mean Souree 1986). Hoshee ee gobbraghey 'sy çhynskyl pornograafagh ayns 2007. Chammah's yn obbyr eck 'sy phornograafaght, ta Stoya er ny chloie 'sy straih hellveeish fansee lesbagh "Dagger Kiss" (2016) chammah as 'sy scannane far-skeealaght heanse Serbagh "A.I. Rising" (2018).
Ta Stoya screeu colloonyn dy mennick son "Slate", "Vice" as "The Verge", myrane lesh colloon coyrlee keintys son "Refinery29". T'ee er ny hoilshaghey peeshyn ayns "The New York Times", "New Statesman", "Esquire", "The Guardian", "Nylon", "Playboy", as "XCritic", chammah as art ayns "Porn Studies," jurnyl acadoil scrutee. Hoilshee ee magh e chied lioar ayns 2018, fo'n enmys "Philosophy, Pussycats, and Porn," çhaglym d'eabyn persoonagh as cremeydagh.
Goaill toshiaght lesh e colloon ass 29 Mean Souree 2021 ayns "Slate" - "How to Do It" — hoshee ee goaill ymmyd jeh'n far-ennym "Jessica Stoya" ayn.

Rayveness:
She aghteyr pornograafagh, aghteyr scannane as çhellveeish, as craishteyder an-ghraagh Americaanagh ee Rayveness (ruggit myr Gina-Raye Carter ayns Jamestown, Carolina Hwoaie, er 19 Mean Souree 1972). Hoshee ee gobbraghey 'sy çhynskyl pornograafagh ayns 1992. Dirree ee ass ayns 2012 agh ren ee çheet er-ash ayns 2021. She indughteyr ayns Halley Foaynoo AVN as Halley Foaynoo XRCO t'ee.

Joanna Angel:
She aghteyr pornograafagh, craishteyder an-ghraagh, as stiureyder scannane pornograafagh Americaanagh ee Joanna Angel (ruggit myr Joanna Mostov ayns Brooklyn, Caayr York Noa, er 25 Nollick 1980). Hoshee ee gobbraghey 'sy çhynskyl pornograafagh ayns 2005. She bunneyder yn ynnyd-eggey "BurningAngel.com" t'ee.

Jenna Presley:
She shirveishagh Protestoonagh Americaanagh ec Keeill Cornerstone, San Diego, as aa-aghteyr pornograafagh as craishteyder an-ghraagh ee Brittni De La Mora Rae ta ny share ennit fo'n ennym ardan eck Jenna Presley (ruggit myr Brittni Ruiz ayns San Diego, California, er 1 Averil 1987). Hoshee ee gobbraghey 'sy çhynskyl pornograafagh ayns 2005 as dirree ee ass ayns 2012 roish my ren ee doltey yn Chreestiaght. 

Tera Patrick:
She stiureyder as aghteyr pornograafagh, craishteyder an-ghraagh, as screeudeyr blog Americaanagh ee Tera Patrick (ruggit myr Linda Ann Hopkins ayns Great Falls, Montana, er 25 Jerreu Souree 1976). Hoshee ee gobbraghey 'sy çhynskyl pornograafagh ayns 1999.

Hollie Stevens:
She aghteyr pornograafagh, kesteyder, craishteyder as screeudeyr Americaanagh va Hollie Stevens (ruggit myr Tia Kidwell; 4 Jerrey Geuree 1982 – 3 Jerrey Souree 2012).
Hoshee ee gobbraghey myr rooishteyder ayns 2000 fo'n ennym Holly Wood as hie ee stiagh 'sy çhynskyl pornograafagh ayns 2003, raad ren ee cloie ayns ny smoo na 180 enmyssyn. Ren ee e chied reayrtys marish Bridgette Kerkove as Joel Lawrence ayns "Mirror Image" son Sin City. She screeudeyr as craishteyder son yn earishlioar "Girls & Corpses" v'ee. Chloie ee 'sy scannane atçhim seyr "Noirland", hie magh er ny stiurey liorish Ramzi Abed. She markiagh jysk, ellyneyr reayrtagh, roortagh breb-ghoarney, as peinteyr v'ee.
Ayns 2011 hooar ee magh dy row kanghyr ny keeaghyn ec as ayns Luanistyn 2011 hie ee fo'n skynn son ny keeaghey y ghiarrey voee. Ayns Mean Souree 2012 phoose ee rish e leggad, y fer aitt as yn aghteyr Eric Cash; y vee cheddin, hooar ee magh dy ren y kanghyr er ny cheaghley as ny scughey dys yn inçhyn eck. Hooar ee baase rere y changhyr er 3 Jerrey Souree 2012 ayns San Francisco, California.

John Savage (aghteyr):
She aghteyr Americaanagh eh John Savage (ruggit myr John Smeallie Youngs er 25 Luanistyn 1949) ta share ennit son e phaartyn ayns ny scannaneyn "The Deer Hunter" (1978), "The Onion Field" (1979), "Hair" (1979) as "Salvador" (1986). Ta enney chammah er son e phaart myr Donald Lydecker 'sy straih hellveeish "Dark Angel".

Greg Davies:
She fer aitt, aghteyr, çhebbeyder, as screeudeyr Bretnagh eh Gregory Daniel Davies (ruggit er 14 Boaldyn 1968). Ta enney share er son e phaartyn myr Greg ayns "We Are Klang", Mr Gilbert ayns "The Inbetweeners", Ken Thompson ayns "Cuckoo", y "Taskmaster" ("Mainshtyr") ayns "Taskmaster", Dan Davies ayns "Man Down", as Paul Wickstead ayns "The Cleaner". T'eh er ny ghoaill ayrn myr eshyn hene chammah ayns "Mock the Week", "Fast and Loose", "Live at the Apollo", as "Would I Lie to You?"
V'eh enmyssit son BAFTA son e chloie ayns "Cuckoo" ayns 2013.

Simon Bird:
She aghteyr, fer aitt, as stiureyder Sostynagh eh Simon Antony Bird (ruggit er 19 Luanistyn 1984). Ta enney share er son e phaart myr Will McKenzie 'sy straih aittys "The Inbetweeners" (2008–2010) liorish E4, chammah as as [[The Inbetweeners Movie|y daa scannane hie er eiyrtyssagh er (2011 as 2014), as myr Adam Goodman 'sy straih aittys "Friday Night Dinner" (2011–2020) liorish Channel 4.

Hannah Tointon:
She aghteyr Sostynagh ee Hannah Tointon (ruggit er 28 Nollick 1987). Ta enney share urree son e paart myr 'sy chiaulldramey sheabin "Hollyoaks" liorish Channel 4 as myr Tara Brown 'sy straih aittys "The Inbetweeners".

Kara Tointon:
She aghteyr Sostynagh Kara Louise Tointon (ruggit er 5 Luanistyn 1983). Ta enney share urree son e paart myr Dawn Swann 'sy chiaulldramey sheabin "EastEnders" liorish y BBC. Ayns 2010, chossyn ee yn straih chohirree "Strictly Come Dancing" liorish y BBC, as ayns 2015, ren ee cloie Maria 'sy ghientyn bio jeh "The Sound of Music Live" liorish ITV.

Joe Thomas (aghteyr):
She aghteyr as fer aitt Sostynagh eh Joseph Owen Thomas (ruggit er 28 Jerrey Fouyir 1983). Ta enney share er son e phaart myr Simon Cooper 'sy straih aittys "The Inbetweeners" (2008–2010) E4 as y daa scannane hie er eiyrtyssagh er, "The Inbetweeners Movie" (2011) as "The Inbetweeners 2" (2014).
Lurg "The Inbetweeners", hannee Thomas ve kianglt rish Channel 4, raad hie eh stiagh ayns fwirran y straih drama aittys "Fresh Meat" ayns 2011, raad ren eh cloie Kingsley Owen derrey 2016. Ren eh obbraghey reesht lesh e cho-obbree voish "The Inbetweeners" James Buckley tra hie ad stiagh ayns fwirran y straih BBC Two "White Gold", raad ren Thomas cloie Martin Lavender. Ayns 2018, ren eh cloie 'sy scannane aittys "The Festival".

Awin Ghlion Ruy:
Ta Awin Ghlion Ruy () ny strooan ghiare ta girree faggys da ny Skoryn as ta çheet ry-cheilley lesh Awin Laksaa ayns Laksaa. Ta'n strooan 4.3 km (2.7 mi) er lhiurid. Foddee brick y hayrn voish y strooan.

Awin Laksaa:
She awin ghiare ayns Mannin ee Awin Laksaa (). Ta'n awin girree er lhargeeyn Sniaull as t'ee roie sheese dys y choose raad t'ee çheet ry-cheilley lesh y cheayn ayns Baie Laksaa ec Laksaa. Ga dy vel ee ny s'liurey na Awin Laksaa, she fo-awin ee Awin Ghlion Ruy. Dagh imbagh car meeghyn yn ouyir, ta braddanyn goll seose yn awin raad t'ad cassey er hostal dys Awin Ghlion Ruy son y chooid smoo. Ta fo-strooan jeh Awin Laksaa cur bree rish y wheeyl ushtey obbree smoo er y theihll, Queeyl Laksaa.

James Buckley (aghteyr):
She aghteyr, kiaulleyder, persoonid YouTube, as stroodeyr moggyl Sostynagh eh James Patrick Buckley (ruggit er 14 Luanistyn 1987). Ta enney share er son e phaart myr Jay Cartwright 'sy straih aittys "The Inbetweeners" liorish E4

Long Mint:
She aghteyr pornograafagh as craishteyder an-ghraagh tessen-cheintyssagh Thai ee Long Mint (ruggit ayns Bangkok, y Çheer Thai, er 4 Toshiaght Arree 1986). Hoshee ee gobbraghey 'sy çhynskyl pornograafagh ayns 2009.

Blake Harrison:
She aghteyr, fer aitt, as daunseyr Sostynagh eh Blake Harrison (ruggit er 23 Jerrey Souree 1985). Ta enney share er son e phaart myr Neil Sutherland 'sy straih aittys "The Inbetweeners" liorish E4 as, er y gherrid, 'Medium' Dan 'sy sitcom "Kate & Koji" liorish ITV voish y vlein 2020.

Hayden Panettiere:
She aghteyr, craishteyder, as arraneyder Americaanagh ee Hayden Lesley Panettiere (ruggit er 21 Luanistyn 1989). Ta enney share urree son e paart myr Claire Bennet 'sy straih far-feniagh "Heroes" liorish NBC (2006–2010) as myr Juliette Barnes 'sy straih drama chiaullee "Nashville" (2012–2018) liorish ABC/CMT, raad chossyn ee daa enmyssaght son Aundyr Golden Globe son y Ven-aghteyr Share - Straih, Myn-straih ny Scannane Çhellveeish. Chammah's shen, t'ee cloie Kirby Reed 'sy straih scannane fanntagh "Scream" liorish Wes Craven.
Hie ee magh er y scaailan ayns 1990 tra nagh row ee agh 11 vee d'eash. Cha jagh ee magh er y scaailan reesht derrey 1994 tra chloie ee Sarah Roberts er y straih heabin "One Life to Live" liorish ABC voish y vlein shen derrey 1997. Hie ee er oaie cloie Lizzie Spaulding 'sy straih heabin "Guiding Light" liorish CBS voish 1996 derrey 2000. Ta Panettiere er ny chloie 'sy scannane drama bluckan coshey "Remember the Titans" (2000) liorish Disney, 'sy straih yerrinagh jeh'n straih drama aittys leighoil "Ally McBeal" (2002) liorish Fox, 'sy scannane drama aittys "Raising Helen" (2004), 'sy scannane çheer-ghraihagh "Tiger Cruise" (2004) liorish y Disney Channel, 'sy scannane aittys ratçhal cabbil "Racing Stripes" (2005), 'sy scannane drama skyrraghtyn figgyr "Ice Princess" (2005), 'sy scannane aittys romansagh "I Love You, Beth Cooper" (2009), 'sy scannane drama kimmeeys firrinagh "" (2011), as 'sy scannane drama "Custody" (2016). Chur ee e goo rish ny karacteyryn Kairi as Xion 'sy straih ghamman "Kingdom Hearts" (2002–2017) as Samantha "Sam" Giddings 'sy ghamman-feeshan "Until Dawn" (2015).

Eileen Daly:
She aghteyr, stiureyder, gienteyder scannane, screeudeyr, arraneyder, çhebbeyder, screeudeyr arrane, as aa-aghteyr pornograafagh Sostynagh ee Eileen Mary Theresa Daly (ruggit er 1 Mean Souree 1963). She benrein screeaghee cho-emshiragh ee chammah, as ee er ny chloie ayns shiartanse dy scannaneyn atçhim. T'ee cloie chammah 'sy vann eck, Eileen and Ben.

Jodie Gasson:
She aa-craishteyder an-ghraagh Sostynagh ee Jodie Gasson (ruggit ayns Brighton, Sostyn, er 25 Jerrey Fouyir 1988). Hoshee ee gobbyr myr craishteyder ayns 2008 as dirree ee ass ayns 2014. She yn çhuyr s'aa ee lesh y chraishteyder Kelly Gasson.

Kelly Gasson:
She aa-craishteyder an-ghraagh Sostynagh ee Kelly Samantha Gasson (ruggit ayns Brighton, Sostyn, er 31 Jerrey Geuree 1987). She yn çhuyr shinney ee lesh y chraishteyder Jodie Gasson.

Melissa Debling:
She craishteyder an-ghraagh Sostynagh ee Melissa Debling (ruggit ayns Ramsgate, Kent, Sostyn, er 21 Toshiaght Arree 1989). T'ee er ve ry-akin ayns earishlioaryn lheid as Nuts, Zoo, Front and FHM. Ren ee obbraghey marish y linney keintys Elite TV chammah. Hoshee ee soilshaghey magh feailleraghyn ayns 2011 as chur ee magh e ynnyd-eggey hene ayns 2013.

Yn Strang:
Ta'n Strang () ny valley beg ayns Skylley Vraddan ayns Mannin. Ta'n balley beg soit cur liorish Doolish, y balley smoo er yn ellan, as Mwyllin Doo Aah. Ta Thie-lheihys Noble soit faggys da'n valley beg er soiaghey va kionnit son thie baanrit ayns 1862 as va jeant ayns 1868 myr Thie-lheihys Valley Moaney.

Erica Ellyson:
She aa-aghteyr pornograafagh as craishteyder an-ghraagh Americaanagh ee Erica Ellyson (ruggit ayns Hurley, Mississippi, er 1 Jerrey Fouyir 1984). Hoshee ee gobbraghey 'sy çhynskyl pornograafagh ayns 2006 as dirree ee ass ayns 2008. Ayns Mee ny Nollick 2008 as Jerrey Geuree 2009 ghow ee ayrn 'sy chlaare rieughagh "Momma's Boys".

Emily Cheree:
She immeeaghtagh er son mayrnee ghellal cheintys, aa-aghteyr pornograafagh, as aa-chraishteyder an-ghraagh Americaanagh ee Emily Cheree va goll er enney myr Tinslee Reagan myr yn ennym ardan eck (ruggit ayns Minnesota ayns 24 Mayrnt 1993). Hoshee ee gobbraghey 'sy çhynskyl pornograafagh ayns 2012 as dirree ee ass ayns 2018. T'ee er chloie paartyn ayns scannaneyn seyrey lheid as "Nowhereland" (2016) as "Girl Lost: A Hollywood Story" (2020).

Dita Von Teese:
She vedette, daunseyr craidoil, craishteyder, as delleyder Americaanagh ee Heather Renée Sweet (ruggit er 28 Mean Fouyir 1972), ta goll er enney fo'n ennym keirdey Dita Von Teese. Ta aa-chadjinaghey yn chloie craidoil currit j'ee as rere shen ta'n ennym "Queen of Burlesque" ("Benrein y Chraidaght") bronnit urree.
Ta Von Teese er ny chloie ayns "", "RuPaul's Drag Race," "The Masked Dancer", "The Curious Creations of Christine McConnell", mastey gientynyn çhellveeish elley. Ta enney urree myrgeddin son e poosey giare rish yn arraneyder Marilyn Manson chammah as cloiaghyn ayns feeshanyn kiaullee echey. Ta daa lioar soilshit magh ec Von Teese bentyn rosh shennaghys y chraidaght, feddishaght, as aalid. Chammah as shen, t'ee er ny recortyssey arraneyn marish y chiaulleyder Frangagh Sébastien Tellier. T'ee er n'yannoo turryssyn er feie ny cruinney marish e taishbynyssyn craidoil ayns caayryn lheid as Lunnin, Berleen, York Noa, as Paarys. Ren Dirty Martini, Perle Noire, Ginger Valentine, Jett Adore as y craishteyder Playboy Gia Genevieve goaill ayrnyn ayns e tiahsbynyssyn mastey yeiyn er lheh elley. She yei er lheh va Von Teese ec yn ynnyd Paaryssagh Crazy Horse dy mennick. Rere y taishbynys ayns 2016 va DVD skeaylt magh. Voish 2006 derrey 2008, she loayreyder Viva Glam son MAC Cosmetics va Von Teese son argid y haglym son ronsaghey VGYS. She ambasseyder dowanagh son Cointreau v'ee eddyr 2007 as 2013 as ayns 2010–2011 she eddin Perrier v'ee. T'ee er n'yannoo kiare sooraneyn fo'n chworey Dita Von Teese Perfumes. Ta cowrey fo-eaddagh ben eck, chammah as oashyryn fo'n ennym Secrets in Lace, as ganseeyn foshlit soyleyssagh son y çhapp Austrailagh er-linney Wheels & Dollbaby.

Amber Rayne:
She aghteyr pornograafagh as craishteyder an-ghraagh Americaanagh va Amber Rayne (ruggit myr Meghan Elizabeth Wren ayns Detroit, Michigan; 19 Mean Fouyir 1984 - 2 Averil 2016). Hoshee ee gobbraghey 'sy çhynskyl pornograafagh ayns 2005 as dirree ee ass ayns 2015. Hooar ee baase ec y thie eck ayns Sun Valley, Los Angeles, rere anlught druggey er 2 Averil 2016.

Carrie LaChance:
She craishteyder an-ghraagh, aghteyr, cleayneyder, as greeseyder dellalys Americaanagh ee Carrie Marie LaChance (ruggit ayns Dover-Foxcroft, Maine, er 30 Averil 1985).

Memphis Monroe:
