She aa-aghteyr pornograafagh as craishteyder an-ghraagh Americaanagh ee Memphis Monroe (ruggit myr Heather Dorsey ayns New Orleans, Louisiana, er 23 Mayrnt 1985). Hoshee ee gobbraghey 'sy çhynskyl pornograafagh ayns 2005 as dirree ee ass ayns 2016. Son dy chroo yn ennym ardan eck ghow ee "Memphis" voish ennym yn ard-characteyr 'sy scannane "Gone in 60 Seconds" as "Monroe" voish Marilyn Monroe. T'ee beaghey ayns Louisville, Kentucky.

Stormy Daniels:
She stiureyder as aghteyr scannane pornograafagh, as aa-rooishteyder Americaanagh ee Stephanie Gregory Clifford (ruggit ayns Baton Rouge, Louisiana, er 17 Mayrnt 1979), ta goll er enney dy keirdagh myr Stormy Daniels. She cosneyder ram aundyryn çhynskylagh t'ee, as she oltey ee ayns ny haljyn foaynoo NightMoves, AVN as XRCO. Ayns 2009, ren gleashaght listal tayrn ee dy smooinaghtyn er ourys y cheau er David Vitter, y shannadeyr roie ec y traa, ayns ard-reihys 2010 son y Çhannad Americaanagh ayns Louisiana.
Ayns 2018, haink er Daniels dy ve kianglt ayns arganeys leighoil marish yn eaghtyrane Americaanagh Donald Trump as e hurneyr Michael Cohen. Ren Trump as e cho-obbreeyn eeck $130,000 argid tostagh dys Daniels son ee y hannaghtyn tostal mychione adulterys v'eck, er lhee, marish Trump ayns 2006. Ta loayrtee Trump gobbal yn adultrinys as jannoo cassid er breagyn Daniels.

Lexi Belle:
She aghteyr pornograafagh as craishteyder an-ghraagh Americaanagh ee Lexi Belle (ruggit myr Jessica McComber ayns Independence, Louisiana, er 5 Luanistyn 1987). Hoshee ee gobbraghey 'sy çhynskyl pornograafagh ayns 2005.

Tera Wray:
She aghteyr pornograafagh as craishteyder an-ghraagh Americaanagh va Tera Wray (ruggit myr Tera Elizabeth Lents ayns Owensboro, Kentucky; 14 Averil 1982 - 13 Jerrey Geuree 2016). Hoshee ee gobbraghey 'sy çhynskyl pornograafagh ayns 2007 as dirree ee ass ayns 2008. Hooar ee baase rere hene-varroo ec y thie eck ayns Joshua Tree, California, er 13 Jerrey Geuree 2016.

Fluke (scannane):
She scannane drama fansee Americaanagh voish y vlein 1995 eh Fluke. Va'n scannane stiurit ec Carlo Carlei as ren Matthew Modine cloie goo yn characteyr enmyssagh marish paartyn co-hassooagh liorish Eric Stoltz, Nancy Travis, Max Pomeranc, Bill Cobbs, Ron Perlman, Jon Polito, as Samuel L. Jackson myr goo Rumbo. Va'n scannane bunnit er y noaskeeal lesh yn ennym cheddin voish y vlein 1977 liorish James Herbert.

Edward James Olmos:
She aghteyr, stiureyder, gienteyder, as immeeaghtagh Americaanagh eh Edward James Olmos (ruggit er 24 Toshiaght Arree 1947). Ta enney share er son e phaartyn myr Lieutenant Martin "Marty" Castillo ayns "Miami Vice" (1984–1989), myr aghteyr as stiureyder ayns "American Me" (1992), myr William Adama ayns "Battlestar Galactica" (2004–2009), myr yn ynseyder Jaime Escalante ayns "Stand and Deliver" (1988), raad hooar eh enmyssagh son Aundyr Academy, as myr y Chronneyder Gaff ayns "Blade Runner" (1982) as e scannane eiyrtyssagh "Blade Runner 2049" (2017). Voish 2018 derrey 2022, t'eh er ny chloie ayr daa oltey jeh club roar-bree jeebyrtagh 'sy straih "Mayans MC" liorish FX
Chossyn Olmos Aundyr Primetime Emmy son yn Aghteyr Co-hassooagh Ard-yindyssagh ayns Straih Drama ayns 1985 son e chloie ayns "Miami Vice", myrane lesh Aundyr Golden Globe son yn Aghteyr Co-hassooagh Share - Straih, Myn-straih ny Scannane Çhellveeish. V'eh enmyssit son Aundyr Golden Globe as Aundyr Academy son yn Aghteyr Share ayns Paart Toshee son e chloei ayns "Stand and Deliver".
Ta enney mie er chammah son e phaartyn myr Abraham Quintanilla 'sy scannane "Selena", myr yn insheyder El Pachuco ayns ny lhiegganyn ardan as scannane jeh "Zoot Suit", as myr goo Chicharrón ayns "Coco".
Harrish e choorse bea, ta Olmos er ny ghreesey er son paartyn anchasley as soyllaghyn Spaainagh 'syn ym-ysseraght Americaanagh. Ta e stiurey, e ghientyn, as e chloie ayns scannaneyn as er y çhellveeish goaill stiagh "Wolfen", "Triumph of the Spirit", "Talent for the Game", "American Me", "The Burning Season", "My Family/Mi Familia", "Caught", "12 Angry Men", "The Disappearance of Garcia Lorca", "Walkout", "The Wonderful Ice Cream Suit", "American Family", as "Dexter".

Elisabeth Moss:
She aghteyr Americaanagh ee Elisabeth Singleton Moss (ruggit er 24 Jerrey Souree 1982). T'ee er ny gheddyn ram accolaidyn, goaill stiagh daa Aundyr Primetime Emmy, daa Aundyr Golden Globe, as daa Aundyr y Screen Actors Guild.
Hoshee Moss cloie ayns ny 1990yn leah as haink enney urree da'n chied cheayrt tra ren ee cloie Zoey Bartlet, y neen s'aa jeh Eaghtyrane Josiah Bartlet, 'sy straih drama pholitickagh "The West Wing" (1999–2006) liorish NBC. Chossyn ee enney ny smoo tra ren ee cloie Peggy Olson, scrudeyr hie dy ve ny choipscreeudeyr, 'sy straih drama hennearish "Mad Men" (2007-2015) liorish AMC, as, ny yei shen, chossyn ee Aundyr Çhellveeish y Critics' Choice son y Ven-aghteyr Share ayns Scannane/Myn-straih as Aundyr Golden Globe son y Ven-aghteyr Share - Myn-straih ny Scannane Çhellveeish son e tuarystal myr y Chronneyder Robin Griffin 'sy vyn-straih "Top of the Lake" (2013) liorish y BBC. Son gientyn as cloie June Osborne 'sy straih drama jee-launyssagh "The Handmaid's Tale" (2017-jiu) liorish Hulu, chossyn Moss Aundyr Primetime Emmy son y Ven-aghteyr Toshee Ard-yindyssagh ayns Straih Drama as Aundyr Primetime Emmy son y Straih Drama Ard-yindyssagh, mastey accolaidyn elley.
Ta Moss er ny gheddyn moylley lheeadagh son e cloiaghyn scannane, goaill stiagh paartyn co-hassooagh ayns "Girl, Interrupted" (1999), "Get Him to the Greek" (2010), as "Us" (2019) as paartyn toshee ayns "The One I Love" (2014), "The Square" (2017), "The Invisible Man" (2020) as "Shirley" (2020). T'ee er ny chloie ayns tree scannaneyn liorish Alex Ross Perry, goaill stiagh "Her Smell" (2018). Er yn ardan, t'ee er ny chloie er Broadway ayns gientynyn David Mamet jeh "Speed the Plow" as gientynyn Wendy Wasserstein jeh "The Heidi Chronicles". Son y chione jerrinagh, chossyn ee enmyssaght son Aundyr Tony son y Ven-aghteyr Share ayns Cloie. Chammah's shen, t'ee er ny chloie ayns gientyn West End y chloie liorish Lillian Hellman, "The Children's Hour".

Joseph Fiennes:
She cloieder scannane, ardan, as çhellveeish Sostynagh eh Joseph Alberic Twisleton-Wykeham-Fiennes (ruggit er 27 Boaldyn 1970), ta share ennit myr Joseph Fiennes. Ta enney mie er Fiennes son yn ym-schleioilid as peeshyn hennearishagh echey. Ta na h-accolaidyn echey goaill stiagh un Aundyr y Screen Actors Guild as enmyssaght son aundyr BAFTA.
T'eh mie er enney son e huarystalyn myr William Shakespeare ayns "Shakespeare in Love" (1998), raad v'eh enmyssit son Aundyr BAFTA son yn Aghteyr Share ayns Paart Toshee as Aundyr y Screen Actors Guild son Cloie Ard-yindyssagh liorish Aghteyr Firryn ayns Paart Toshee, myr y Reejerey Robert Dudley ayns "Elizabeth" (1998), myr Commisar Danilov ayns "Enemy at the Gates" (2001), myr Martin Luther ayns "Luther" (2003), as myr Monsignor Timothy Howard 'sy nah straih jeh'n straih hellveeish "American Horror Story" (2012–2013). Va'n cloie echey 'sy straih hellveeish "The Handmaid's Tale" (2017–2021) enmyssit son Aundyr Primetime Emmy son yn Aghteyr Co-hassooagh Ard-yindyssagh ayns Straih Drama ayns 2018.

Yvonne Strahovski:
She aghteyr Austrailagh ee Yvonne Jaqueline Strzechowski (ruggit er 30 Jerrey Souree 1982), ta goll er enney dy keirdagh myr Yvonne Strahovski. Ta enney mie urree er y chooid smoo son e paartyn ayns çhellveeish ghramadagh as t'ee er ny gheddyn ram awundyryn as enmyssaghtyn, goaill stiagh daa enmyssaght son Aundyryn Primetime Emmy as tree enmyssaghtyn son Aundyryn y Screen Actors Guild.
T'ee ny share ennit son e paartyn myr y veoir CIA Sarah Walker 'sy straih drama pheeikearys "Chuck" (2007–2012) liorish NBC, myr Hannah McKay 'sy straih drama "Dexter" (2012–2013) liorish Showtime, as myr y veoir CIA Kate Morgan 'sy straih haghyrtyn "" (2014) liorish Fox. T;ee er ny chloie Serena Joy Waterford 'sy straih drama yee-launyssagh "The Handmaid's Tale" (2017–present) liorish Hulu, raad hooar ee enmyssaghtyn son daa Aundyr Primetime Emmy, tree Aundyryn y Screen Actors Guild, as Aundyr Golden Globe.
Ta obbraghyn elley lesh Strahovski goaill stiagh ' (2010), "Killer Elite" (2011), "I, Frankenstein" (2014), "The Astronaut Wives Club" (2015), "Manhattan Night" (2016), "All I See Is You" (2016), "He's Out There" (2018), "The Predator" (2018) as "The Tomorrow War" (2021). Chur ee e goo rish Miranda Lawson 'sy straih ghamman-feeshan "Mass Effect" as rish Batwoman 'sy scannane far-feniagh bioghit ' (2016).

Alexis Bledel:
She aghteyr as craishteyder Americaanagh ee Kimberly Alexis Bledel (ruggit er 16 Mean Fouyir 1981). Ta enney mie urree son e paart myr Rory Gilmore 'sy straih hellveeish "Gilmore Girls" (2000–2007), as myr Emily Malek ayns "The Handmaid's Tale" (2017–2021). Va paart aafilleydagh ec Bledel ayns "Mad Men" ayns 2012 as ren ee aavioghey yn paart eck myr Rory Gilmore 'sy vyn-straigh aa-chruinnaght "" (2016) liorish Netflix.
Ren Bledel y chied chloie ard-scannane myr Winnie Foster 'syn aachummey jantys bio jeh "Tuck Everlasting" (2002) liorish Disney, as hie ee er oaie cloie ayns "Sin City" (2005), "Post Grad" (2009), as 'sy straih scannane "The Sisterhood of the Traveling Pants".
Ta Bledel er ny gheddyn ram aundyryn as enmyssaghtyn son yn obbyr eck. Hooar ee enmyssaghtyn son aundyryn Satellite, Teen Choice, as Young Artist son e paart ayns "Gilmore Girls". T'ee er ny gheddin kiare enmyssaghtyn son Aundyryn Primetime Emmy son "The Handmaid's Tale" as Aundyr Primetime Emmy son y Ven-aghteyr Cuirreydagh Ard-yindyssagh ayns Straih Drama cosnit eck. Ta tree enmyssaghtyn son Aundyryn y Screen Actors Guild feddynit eck son Fwirran Ard-yindyssagh ayns Straih Drama.

Madeline Brewer:
She aghteyr Americaanagh ee Madeline Kathryn Brewer (ruggit er 1 Boaldyn 1992). T'ee mie er enney son e paart myr Tricia Miller 'sy straih hellveeish "Orange Is the New Black" (2013), e paart ayns "Hemlock Grove" (2014–2015), as e paart myr Alice/Lola 'sy scannane atçhim "Cam" liorish Netflix. T'ee cloie Janine Lindo 'sy straih yee-launyssagh "The Handmaid's Tale" (2017–jiu) liorish Hulu, raad hooar ee enmyssaght son Emmy son y Ven0aghteyr Co-hassooagh Ard-yindyssagh ayns Straih Drama.

Ann Dowd:
She aghteyr Americaanagh ee Ann Dowd (ruggit er 30 Jerrey Geuree 1956). T'ee er ny chloie paartyn co-hassooagh ayns ram scannaneyn, goaill stiagh "Green Card" (1990), "Lorenzo's Oil" (1992), "Philadelphia" (1993), "Garden State" (2004), "The Manchurian Candidate" (2004), "Marley & Me" (2008), "Side Effects" (2013), "St. Vincent" (2014), "Captain Fantastic" (2016), as "Hereditary" (2018). Chloie Dowd y karacteyr Sandra 'sy scannane creauagh "Compliance" (2012), raad hooar ee Aundyr y National Board of Review son y Ven-aghteyr Co-hassooagh Share.
Va paart reiltagh ec Dowd 'sy straih "The Leftovers" (2014–2017) liorish HBO, raad hooar ee enmyssaght son Aundyr Primetime Emmy son y Ven-aghteyr Cuirreydagh Ard-yindyssagh ayns Straih Drama. Ayns 2017, hoshee ee cloie Aunt Lydia 'sy straih yee-launyssagh "The Handmaid's Tale" liorish Hulu, raad chossyn ee Aundyr Primetime Emmy son y Ven-aghteyr Co-hassooagh Ard-yindyssagh ayns Straih Drama.
Ayns 2021, chloie Dowd 'sy scannane drama fwirran "Mass", raad hooar ee enney cremeydagh as aundyryn, goaill stiagh enmyssaghtyn voish Aundyryn y Critics' Choice as BAFTA.

O-T Fagbenle:
She aghteyr, screeudeyr, as stiureyder Goaldagh eh Olatunde Olateju Olaolorun "O-T" Fagbenle (Yorubish: "Ọlátúndé Ọlátẹ́jú Ọláọlọ́run Fágbénlé"; ruggit er 22 Jerrey Geuree 1981). T'eh er ny chloie ayns shiartanse dy scannaneyn as gientynyn ardan as çhellveeish. Ta enney share er Fagbenle son e phaart myr Luke ayns "The Handmaid’s Tale" (2017–2021) liorish Hulu as son e huarystal jeh Barack Obama ayns "The First Lady" (2022).

Max Minghella:
She aghteyr, gienteyder scannane, stiureyder, as scaa-screeudeyr Sostynagh eh Max Giorgio Choa Minghella (ruggit er 16 Mean Fouyir 1985). Ta enney mie er son e phaartyn ayns ny scannaneyn "Syriana" (2005), "Art School Confidential" (2006), "Elvis and Anabelle" (2007), "The Social Network" (2010), "The Ides of March" (2011), "The Internship" (2013), "Horns" (2013), as "Spiral" (2021), as son e phaart myr Nick Blaine 'sy straih hellveeish "The Handmaid's Tale" (2017–jiu), raad hooar eh enmyssaght son Aundyr Primetime Emmy ayns 2021.

Doo-skeeal:
Ta doo-skeeal çheet er shaanrey drama ta bunnit er fuillaghtyn deiney as, er y chooid smoo, ny taghyrtyn agglagh ny trimshagh ta çheet er yn ard-characteyr. Dy tradishoonagh, she aghin purgaid ny scooirey cooidjagh, ny "pian ta dooshtey yn taitnys", son y lught fakin dean y doo-skeeal. 
Ta bun y doo-skeeal ry-gheddyn ayns theater y Çhenn-Ghreag 2,500 bleeaney er dy henney. Trooid meeryn jeh'n obbyr lesh Aeschylus, Sophocles as Euripides foast er mayrn, chammah as meeryn elley voish bardyn as feeleeyn elley as ny doo-skeealyn Raueagh jeianagh lheid as adsyn voish laue Seneca; trooid obbraghyn Shakespeare, Lope de Vega, Jean Racine, as Friedrich Schiller dys ny doo-skeealyn jeianagh voish Henrik Ibsen as August Strindberg; smooinaghtyn Samuel Beckett er y vaase, er y choayl as er y fuillaghtyn; hannee yn doo-skeeal myr fer jeh ny buill chultooragh jeh'n phrowaltys cultooragh, jeh'n varganey, jeh'n streeu, as jeh'n chaghlaa.

Far-skeealaght launyssagh as yee-launyssagh:
Ta far-skeealaght launyssagh as yee-launyssagh çheet er shaanraghyn jeh'n far-skeealaght heiltynagh ta ronsaghey strughtooryn sheshoil as politickagh. Ta'n far-skeealaght launyssagh soilshaghey magh soiaghey ta coardail rish ethos yn ughtar as t'ee goaill stiagh cowraghyn jeh rieughid elley as ad jeerit er yeearreeaghtyn y lhaihder. Ta'n far-skeealaght yee-launyssagh kiarail y red n'oi: soilshaghey soiaghey nagh vel coardail rish ethos yn ughtar. Ta noaskeealyn ennagh mestey yn daa haanrey, dy mennick myr macsoyley er ny bollee eigsoylagh foddee yn sheelnaue goaill rish as ny bollee shen croghit er reihyssyn y çheelnaue. Ta flaunyssyn as jee-launyssyn ry-gheddyn dy mennick 'sy far-skeealaght heanse as ayns sorçhyn elley jeh'n far-skeealaght heiltynagh.
Va ny smoo na 400 obbraghyn flaunyssagh soilshit magh 'sy Vaarle roish y vlein 1900 as ny smoo na thousane elley er nyn jeet magh car y feedoo eash. Ta'n bishaghey shen bunnit dy cooidjagh er aase yn anaase 'sy far-skeealaght haanrey, 'sy far-skeealaght heanse, as 'sy far-skeealaght aeglagh dy mennick, agh, chammah's shen, er y chaghlaa sheshoil ny s'lhea hug twoaieaght cooishyn sheshaghtagh ny dowanagh, lheid as adsyn bentyn rish y çhaghnoaylleeaght, caghlaa emshyraght, as aase eaarroo yn phobble. Ta fir jeh ny beoynyn shen er nyn groo fo-haanraghyn er lheh lheid as y far-skeealaght egg-launyssagh, y far-skeealaght emsyraght, noaskeealyn jee-launyssagh aeglagh, as noaskeealyn jee-launyssagh feminagh.

Bruce Miller (gienteyder):
She screeudeyr as gienteyder çhellveeish Americaanagh eh Bruce Miller. Ta enney share er son "Eureka" (2006), "The 100" (2014) as "The Handmaid's Tale" (2017). Chossyn Miller Aundyryn Primetime Emmy son Straih Drama Ard-yindyssagh as son Screeudeyrys Ard-yindyssagh son Straih Drama ayns 2017 er son yn obbyr ren eh er "The Handmaid's Tale", chammah as Aundyr Golden Globe son y Straih Hellveeish Share - Drama. She eshyn va'n chied chlaare er ardan strooanagh ren cosney Emmy son Straih Ard-yindyssagh. Er y gherrid, ren Miller fo-screeu bargane lhiassee marish ABC Signature as Hulu.
Bea phersoonagh as ynsagh.
Va Miller troggit ayns Stamford, Connecticut, as dirree eh ass Ollooscoill Brown ayns 1987.

Samira Wiley:
She aghteyr Americaanagh ee Samira Denise Wiley (ruggit er 15 Averil 1987). Ta enney share urree son e paartyn myr Poussey Washington 'sy straih drama aittys "Orange Is the New Black" (2013–2019) liorish Netflix as myr Moira 'sy straih drama yee-launyssagh "The Handmaid's Tale" (2017–jiu) liorish Hulu, raad chossyn ee Aundy Primetime Emmy son Ben-aghteyr Cuirreydagh Ard-yindyssagh ayns Straih Drama.
Va paartyn elley ec Wiley ayns scannaneyn lheid as "The Sitter" (2011), "Nerve" (2016), "Detroit" (2017), as "Social Animals" (2018). Ren ee insh y scannane feanish "Night on Earth" (2020) liorish Netflix.

Aria Alexander:
She aa-aghteyr pornograafagh as craishteyder an-ghraagh Americaanagh ee Aria Alexander (ruggit ayns Houston, Texas, er 25 Mayrnt 1995). Hoshee ee gobbraghey 'sy çhynskyl pornograafagh ayns 2014 as dirree ee ass ayns 2017.

Veronica Avluv:
She aghteyr pornograafagh as craishteyder an-ghraagh Americaanagh ee Veronica Avluv (ruggit ayns Rowlett, Texas, er 23 Sauin 1972). Hoshee ee gobbraghey 'sy çhynskyl pornograafagh ayns 2010.

Zoe Britton:
She aghteyr pornograafagh as craishteyder an-ghraagh Americaanagh ee Zoe Britton (ruggit myr Michelle Ara Murphy er 25 Jerrey Geuree 1979). V'ee ruggit ayns Riverside, California, as troggit ayns Lubbock, Texas. Hoshee ee gobbraghey 'sy çhynskyl pornograafagh ayns 2002 as dirree ee ass ayns 2015.

Iain Glen:
She aghteyr Albinagh eh Iain Alan Sutherland Glen (ruggit er 24 Mean Souree 1961). Ta enney share er Glen son e phaartyn myr Dr. Alexander Isaacs/Tyrant ayns tree scannaneyn jeh'n straih scannane "Resident Evil" (2004–2016) as myr Ser Jorah Mormont'sy straih hellveeish fansee "Game of Thrones" (2011–2019) liorish HBO. Ta paartyn mooarey elley goaill stiagh John Hanning Speke ayns "Mountains of the Moon" (1990), Larry Winters ayns "Silent Scream" (1990) raad chossyn eh Aundyr y Silver Bear son yn Aghteyr Share voish Feailley Scannane Eddyrashoonagh Verleen, Manfred Powell ayns "" (2001), Brother John ayns "Song for a Raggy Boy" (2003), y paart enmyssagh ayns "Jack Taylor" (2010–2016), Sir Richard Carlisle ayns "Downton Abbey" (2011), James Willett ayns "Eye in the Sky" (2015), as Bruce Wayne ayns "Titans" (2019–jiu).

Donita Dunes:
She aa-aghteyr pornograafagh, craishteyder an-ghraagh, as daunseyr Americaanagh ee Donita Dunes (ruggit myr Donita Whitefield ayns Seagoville, Texas, er 11 Jerrey Fouyir 1966). Ta enney urree son e keeaghyn mooarey bishit (44GG), e tattooyn as e geyridyn.
Ayns ny 1990yn meanagh, ren ee arraghey dys Los Angeles raad hoshee ee gobbraghey 'sy çhynskyl pornograafagh ayns 1997. Ta enney urree son keintys thoanney, bukkake as towlley dooblit.
Dirree Donita ass y phornograafaght chreoi ayns 2000 as ass y phornograafaght lane ayns 2006 as hoshee ee jeeraghey er y daunse. T'ee ceau yn chooid smoo jeh'n vlein jurnaaghey trooid ny Steatyn Unnaneysit jannoo taishbynyssyn.

Netflix:
She shirveish strooanagh fo-screeuit as colught gientyn Americaanagh eh Netflix, Inc. Ta'n colught bunnit ayns Los Gatos, California. V'eh bunnit er 29 Luanistyn 1997 liorish Reed Hastings as Marc Randolph ayns Scotts Valley, California, as t'eh kiarail lioarlann jeh scannaneyn as straihyn çhellveeish trooid barganeyn rheynnagh chammah as e ghientynyn hene ta goll er enney myr Netflix Originals.

Feish:
Ta feish ( ny ) çheet er feailley ellynyn as culoor Gaelgagh tradishoonagh. Ga dy vel keeal ny s'lhea ec ny Manninee, ayns Nerin ta çheet dy mennick er cohirreydssyn daunse Yernagh as, ayns Nalbin, t'eh çheet er coorseyn ynsee thummee ta jeeraghey er y chiaull hradishoonagh as er y chultoor. S'trome-chooishagh ayns Gaelg ny h-Albey yn scarreydagh er-yn-oyr dy vel anchaslys ayn 'sy cheeal as ayns fockley magh eddyr as  — ta çheet er y woiddeeaght.

Anne Frank:
She jeelaneyder Germaanagh-Ollanagh jeh sluight Ewagh va Annelies Marie "Anne" Frank (12 Mean Souree 1929 – Toshiaght Arree ny Mayrnt 1945}}). Nane jeh ny guintee Ewagh s'ard-ghooagh 'sy Deherree, hooar ee enney lurg e baase marish soilshaghey magh ayns 1947 jeh "The Diary of a Young Girl" ( dy bunneydagh 'syn Ollanish, "y cooyl thie"; Baarle: "The Secret Annex"), raad chur ee sheese ayns focklyn e bea 'syn ollaght eddyr 1942 as 1944 car cummaltys Germaanagh y Çheer Injil car y Nah Chaggey Dowanagh. She fer jeh ny lioaryn smoo ennoil t'eh as she bun shiartanse dy chloiaghyn as scannaneyn t'eh chammah.
Va Anne ruggit ayns Frankfurt, y Ghermaan. Ayns 1934, tra v'ee kiare bleeaney dy lieh d'eash, darree e lught thie dys Amsterdam, y Çheer Injil,lurg ghow Adolf Hitler as y Partee Natseeagh stiurey as reirey harrish y Ghermaan. Cheau ee yn chooid smoo jeh'n vea eck ayns ny mygeayrt Amsterdam. Rish Boaldyn 1940, va ny Frankyn goit ayns Amsterdam ayns ribbey yn chummaltys Germaanagh er y Çheer Injil. Chaill Anne e seyraanaght Ghermaanagh ayns 1941 as haink urree dy ve coontit myr peiagh gyn steat. As tranlaaseyn noi ny h-Ewnyn mooadaghey ayns Jerrey Souree 1942, hie ad ayns follaght ayns shamyryn follit çheu cooylloo lioaraghan 'sy thie raad va ayr Anne, Otto Frank, gobbraghey. Derrey goaill seose y lught thie liorish y Gestapo er 4 Luanistyn 1944, ren Anne screeu dy mennick ayns jeelane hooar ee myr toyrtys ruggyree.
Lurg y ghoaill seose oc, va ny Frankyn ymmyrkit dys sleih-champyn. Er 1 Sauin 1944, va Anne as e shuyr, Margot, ymmyrkit voish Auschwitz dys sleih-champ Bergen-Belsen, raad hooar ad baase (voish taiphus s'liklee) reggyryn dy veeghyn ny s'anmey. Hoshiaght, v'eh oolit ec y Chrosh Yiarg dy dooar ad baase ayns Mayrnt, as ren lughtyn-reill Ollanagh cur 31 Mayrnt sheese myr laa oikoil nyn maaseyn. Ta ronsaghey noa gra dy dooar ad baase ayns Toshiaght Arree ny Mayrnt leah.
Ren Otto, yn un vayrnagh ass lught thie ny Frankyn, filley er-ash dys Amsterdam lurg y chaggey as hooar eh magh dy row jeelane Anne sauailt liorish e scrudeyr, Miep Gies. Reih eh cooilleeney y mian smoo ec Anne ve ny screeudeyr as hoilshee eh magh e jeelane ayns 1947. V'eh çhyndaait voish yn Ollanish vunneydagh dys y Vaarle ayns 1952 myr "The Diary of a Young Girl", as voish shen, t'eh er ny ve çhyndaait ayns ny smoo na 70 çhengaghyn.

Ard-vinishter y Reeriaght Unnaneysit:
She toshiagh reiltys y Reeriaght Unnaneysit eh ard-vinishter y Reeriaght Unnaneysit. Ta'n ard-vinishter cur coyrle da'n vonark er obbraghey chooid vie jeh'n chiart reeoil, stiurey Coonseil ny Shirveishee as reih ny shirveishee. She toshiagh y phartee smoo ayns Quaiyl Hostyn ta'n ard-vinishter chammah, as eh ny ee goaill shelloo er yn oik rere barrantys y thie s'inshley y oardail as t'eh ny ee soie myr oltey yn Pharlamaid.
Cha nel oik yn ard-vinishter bunnit er slattys ny docamad bunraghtoil, agh er bun cadjinchliaghtey raad ta'n monark roie poinsheil myr ard-vinishter yn peiagh s'liklee barrantys y thie s'inshley y oardail; dy cadjin, she toshiagh y phartee politickagh ny cochiangley parteeyn politickagh t'ayns shelloo yn earroo smoo jeh soiagyn 'sy çhamyr. V'eh fogrit ec yn Ard-vinishter Boris Johnson er 31 Jerrey Geuree 2022 dy beagh Oik yn Ard-vinishter currit er bun dy formoil. 
Ta'n ard-vinishter gobbraghey "ex officio" myr Ard-hiarn y Tashtee, Shirveishagh y Çhirveish Heayagh as y vinishter ta freggyrtagh son y çhickyrys ashoonagh. Ta cairyn ennagh bronnit er ard-vinishteryn, cha myr ard-vinishter agh myr yn ynnyd oc myr Ard-hiarn y Tashtee, goaill stiagh yn aarys oc ec 10 Downing Street. Ayns 2019, va oik Shirveishagh son yn Unnaneys currit er bun; she Boris Johnson va'n chied ard-vinishter yn enmys shen y ghoaill.
Haink er Liz Truss dy ve ny Ard-vinishter er 6 Mean Fouyir 2022, lurg hie ee ayns ynnyd Boris Johnson myr Toshiagh y Phartee Cumaadagh agh dirree ee magh ass oik yn Ard-vinishter as toshiagh y phartee lurg 50 laa ayns shelloo ny h-oikyn. Va Rishi Sunak reiht myr toshiagh y phartee ayns e ynnyd as haink er dy ve ny Ard-vinishter er 25 Jerrey Fouyir 2022.

Eaghtyrane ny Steatyn Unnaneysit:
She kione steat as toshiagh reiltys Steatyn Unnaneysit America eh eaghtyrane ny Steatyn Unnaneysit ( ny "POTUS" myr aa-gherrid). Ta'n eaghtyrane stiurey banglane kiannoortagh y reiltys conastagh as she ard-anneyder Forsaghyn Armit ny Steatyn Unnaneysit t'eh ny ee.
Ta pooar yn eaghtyraneys er ny vishaghey dy lheeadagh voish bunneeaght yn oik ayns 1789. Ga dy vel pooar yn eaghtyrane er ny vishaghey as lhaggaghey harrish traa, ta'n eaghtyrane er ny chloie paart niartal ayns seihll politickagh America voish toshiaght y 20oo eash, goaill stiagh bishaghey mooar car eaghtyraneys Franklin D. Roosevelt. 'Sy traa t'ain, ta sleih jeeaghyn er yn eaghtyrane myr nane jeh ny figooryn politickagh smoo cummaghtagh 'sy theihll myr toshiagh yn un far-phooar 'sy theihll ta foast er mayrn. Myr toshiagh yn ashoon as y tarmaynys smoo echey rere LTS ennymagh, ta'n eaghtyrane goaill shelloo er pooar creoi as bog.

Shamyr Ghorraghey yn Unnaneys Mooar:
She troggalys quaagh ee Shamyr Ghorraghey yn Unnaneys Mooar ta aahoilshaghey jallooyn yn ard mygeayrt, liorish cooney voish soilshey as scaaneyn, er scaailanyn baney çheusthie jeh doonaghyn stiagh y troggalys. She shamyr ghorraghey yn ennym ta currit er y ghreie. She fer jeh ny buill hurryssagh va troggit er Kione Ghoolish car y 19oo eash yeianagh as y 20oo eash leah.
Shennaghys.
She shelloo preevaadjagh v'eh hannah agh haink jerrey lesh yn obbraghey ayns ny 1990yn. Haink er y çhamyr ghorraghey dy ve ny helloo jeh Eiraght Ashoonagh Vannin. Chur ad coodaghey coadee mygeayrt e strughtoor Victorianagh. Hie yn çhamyr ghorraghey er ny aalhiassaghey as ny aacherraghey as t'ee foshlit reesht car ny meeghyn souree as er n'obbraghey dy arryltagh. She cowrey thallooin er lheh ta shassoo magh tra ta'n jeeagheyder çheet er ny baatyn gys Doolish.

Çhalse III y Reeriaght Unnaneysit:
She Ree yn Reeriaght Unnaneysit as 14 reamyssyn elley eh Çhalse III (Charles Philip Arthur George; ruggit er 14 Sauin 1948). Hie eh er roshtyn dys y chrooin er 8 Mean Fouyir 2022 lurg baase e voir, Benrein Ealisaid II. Myr Diuc y Chorn as Diuc Valley Voaid voish 1952 dys y roshtyn echey, she eshyn va'n eirey baghtal shinney as s'odjey er shirveish ayns shennaghys y Reeriaght Unnaneysit, as Prinse Vretin shinney as s'odjey er shirveish, as yn enmys freillt echey voish 26 Jerrey Souree 1958 derrey yn roshtyn echey. Ec 73 bleeaney d'eash, she Çhalse yn dooinney shinney roshtyn dys y chrooin Ghoaldagh, recortys va freillt hannah henne ec Illiam IV as eh 64 bleeaney d'eash

Lorena Abicht:
She shiaulteyr Austeyragh ee Lorena Abicht (ruggit er 12 Jerrey Souree 1994). Ren ee cohirrey ec cloie 49er FX ec Cloiaghyn Olympagh y Touree, 2020, raad haink ee stiagh 'sy 17oo ynnyd.

Theresa May:
She politickeyr Goaldagh va Ard-vinishter y Reeriaght Unnaneysit as Toshiagh y Phartee Cumaadagh voish 2016 derrey 2019 ee Theresa Mary May (ny Theresa Mary, y Ven May; née Brasier; ruggit er 1 Jerrey Fouyir 1956). Ren ee obbraghey myr Screeudeyr Cooishyn Thie voish 2010 derrey 2016 ayns reiltys Cameron as she oltey yn pharlamaid (MP) ee son Maidenhead ayns Berkshire voish y vlein 1997. Rere eie-oaylleeaght, ta May cur sheese urree hene myr cumaadagh un-ashoonagh.

Boris Johnson:
She politickeyr Goaldagh va ny Ard-vinishter er y Reeriaght Unnaneysit as ny Hoshiagh er y Phartee Cumaadagh voish 2019 derrey 2022 eh Alexander Boris de Pfeffel Johnson (ruggit er 19 Mean Souree 1964). Roish shen, ren eh obbraghey myr Screeudeyr y Steat son Cooishyn Joarree as y Cho-unnaneys voish 2016 derrey 2018 as myr Meoir Lunnin voish 2008 derrey 2016. She Oltey yn Pharlamaid (OP) son Uxbridge and South Ruislip voish 2015, as roish shen she OP son Henley voish 2001 derrey 2008.

Leryn Franco:
She craishteyder, aghteyr, as aa-roortagh Paraguayagh ee Leryn Dahiana Franco Steneri (ruggit ayns Asunción er 1 Mayrnt 1982). Ec y traa t'ayn t'ee gobbraghey son y rheynn roortagh ec Club Sol de América. Chloie Franco ec ny Cloiaghyn Olympagh ayns 2004, 2008 as 2012 raad ren ee co-hirrey myr ceaueyder shleiy.
Er 8 Mean Souree 2012, ren Franco y ceau share eck er 57.77 m ayns Barquisimeto, y Veneswaaley ec Feniaghtys Ibeiro-Americaanagh 'sy Roortaghys, 2012. Haink er e cooilleeney dy ve ny recortys ashoonagh, as eh er ny gholl shaghey yn aa-recortys er 55.66 m, va ceaut ec Franco ec Feniaghtys Americaanagh Yiass 'sy Roortaghys, 2011.
Ayns 2013, v'ee reiht son cloie 'sy scannane Yernagh "Eliza Lynch: Queen of Paraguay", as ee cloie Eliza Lynch aeg.
Bea phersoonagh.
Va paarantyn Franco ruggit 'syn Ooraguay as she moylleyder Olimpia 'sy Pharaguay Peñarol 'syn Ooraguay t'ee. Ren Franco cloie bluckan coshey roish my ren ee ceau shleiyn. She keimagh ayns reagheydys dellal t'ee.

Liz Truss:
She politickeyr Goaldagh, aa-Ard-vinishter y Reeriaght Unnaneysit as aa-Hoshiagh y Phartee Cumaadagh ee Mary Elizabeth Truss (ruggit er 26 Jerrey Souree 1975). Haink urree dy ve reiht myr Toshiagh y Phartee Cumaadagh er 5 Mean Fouyir 2022 as myr yn Ard-vinishter er 6 Mean Fouyir 2022. She ish va'n Ard-vinishter smoo giare-heiltagh er yn RU v'ayn rieau er dy henney lurg dirree ee magh ass yn oik lurg 50 laa as Rishi Sunak reiht ayns e ynnyd. She Oltey yn Pharlamaid (OP) t'ee son South West Norfolk voish y vlein 2010. Va Truss ayns shelloo ram oikyn fo ard-vinishteryn David Cameron, Theresa May, as Boris Johnson, as she Screeudyer Joarree v'ee er y gherrid voish y vlein 2021 derrey 2022.

Izium:
She caayr er Awin Donets ayns Queiggey Kharkiv 'syn Ookraan hiar eh Izium (, "raisin"; er ny romanaghey myr Izum as Izyum chammah; ). Ta Izium soit mygeayrt 120 km (75 mi) çheu hiar yiass voish Kharkiv, preeu-valley yn wheiggey. Ta deiney cummal ayns Izium.
Hie yn chaayr fo cummaltys Rooshagh voish 3 Boaldyn 2022 lurg ren y Roosh ruegys er yn Ookraan derrey Mean Fouyir leah 'sy vlein cheddin. 'Sy vee shen, haghyr troddan çhiu 'syn ard mygeayrt faggys da'n chaayr veg Balakliia. Er 10 Mean Fouyir, ren ny forsaghyn Ookraanagh aaghoaill yn chaayr myr ayrn jeh noi-hoiagh Kharkiv.

Thie yn Reiltys, Mannin:
She aarys oikoil Lhiass-chiannoort Vannin eh Thie yn Reiltys. T'eh soit er Raad y Chiannooirt ayns Kione Droghad, Mannin. Ta Thie yn Reiltys ymmydit chammah son aaght y chiarail da cuirreydee oikoil dys yn ellan as t'eh ymmydit dy lheeadagh son cruinnaghtyn oikoil lheid as failtyn as jinnairyn. Ta'n troggalys er ny ve ymmydit myr aarys oikoil y Lhiass-chiannoort voish y vlein 1863 as t'eh ayns shelloo Tinvaal voish y vlein 1903.

Peter Wasserscheid:
She kemmigagh as olloo Germaanagh ayns jeshaghtys aawoalley kemmigagh ec Ollooscoill Erlangen-Nuremberg eh Peter Wasserscheid (ruggit er 23 Jerrey Fouyir 1970 ayns Würzburg). Myrane lesh Matthias Beller, she cosneyder Aundyr Gottfried Wilhelm Leibniz (2006) t'eh.
Cooylrey persoonagh.
Ren Wasserscheid studeyrys er y chemmig ec RWTH Aachen voish 1991 derrey 1995 roish my ren eh yn ollooaght echey 'sy phossan obbree lesh yn Olloo Wilhelm Keim. Lurg ronsaghey eear-ollooagh ec BP 'sy Vretyn Vooar, ren eh obbraghey ec RWTH Aachen. Voish Jerrey Fouyir 2003, she caairliagh y jeshaghtys kemmigagh t'eh ec Ollooscoill Erlangen-Nuremberg.
Chammah's shen, she oltey bunneydagh y cholught Solvent Innovation GmbH t'eh raad t'eh myr Stiureyder Oaylleeagh voish y vlein 2001.
Ta Wasserscheid poost as tree paitçhyn echey.
Obbyr.
She fliughaneyn eeaneagh focus obbyr Wasserscheid raad t'eh ny chione-raadagh, dy mooar ayns ard lhiassaghey ny fliughaneyn eeaneagh seyr voish hallageenyn.

Nakisanze Segawa:
She feelee as skeealleyder Oogandagh ee Nakisanze Segawa She ughtar t'ee jeh'n lioar "The Triangle" voish y vlein 2016. Haink ee stiagh 'sy trass ynnyd ayns Aundyr Feeleeaght Beverley Nambozo ayns 2010 son e daan "The hustler". She commeeagh ayns Ebedi International Residency v'ee, ayns Iseyin, y Naigeer, ayns Jerrey Gueree 2015.
Screeunyn.
She feelee cloie ee Segawa as t'ee ginsh e daanyn 'sy Lugandish as 'sy Vaarle. Ta'n obbyr eck er ny ve soilshit magh ayns shiartanse sy skeealyn çhaglit. Va'n noaskeeal eck, "The Triangle", soilshit magh ayns 2016.

Modern Family:
She straih hellveeish sitcom Americaanagh eh Modern Family t'er ny chroo ec Christopher Lloyd as Steven Levitan son yn American Broadcasting Company. Hie eh er ny skeaylley magh feie 11 straih, voish 23 Mean Fouyir 2009 derrey 8 Averil 2020. Ta'n straih geiyrt er bea tree lughtyn thie ayns Los Angeles fo-valjagh, as ad kianglt ry-cheilley liorish yn ard-ayr Jay Pritchett.
Ren Christopher Lloyd as Steven Levitan smooinaghtyn er y straih tra v'ad rheynn skeeallyn eddyr oc bentyn rish nyn lughtyn thie noa-emshiragh hene. Ta possan fwirranagh ec "Modern Family" as t'eh kiarit ayns aght straih far-eanishagh as ny karacteyryn ginsh dy jeeragh rish y çhamraig ayns meeryn co-akinagh.
Va'n straih aa-noait son y 11d straih er 5 Toshiaght Arree 2019 as hie eh magh er 25 Mean Fouyir 2019. She ish va'n straih yerrinagh jeh'n straih. Hie yn episode jerrinagh magh er ny skealley er 8 Averil 2020.

Kit Harington:
She aghteyr Sostynagh eh Christopher Catesby Harington (ruggit er 26 Nollick 1986). Ren eh studeyrys ec Scoill Veanagh Reeoil y Loayrtys as y Drama as ren eh e chied chloie keirdey lesh y phaart toshee myr Albert Narracott 'sy chloie West End "War Horse" ayns 2009. Ayns 2011, ghow e phaart brishey magh myr Jon Snow 'sy straih hellveeish fansee "Game of Thrones" (2011–2019) liorish HBO enney eddyrashoonagh as shiartanse d'aundyryn, goaill stiagh enmyssaght son Aundyr Golden Globe Award son Straih Drama Çhellveeish as daa enmyssaght son Aundyr Emmy son Aghteyr Co-hassooagh Ard-yindyssagh ayns Straih Drama as Aghteyr Toshee Ard-yindyssagh ayns Straih Drama.

America Ladjynagh:
She ayrn vooar-rheynn America eh America Ladjynagh raad ta ny çhengaghyn Romanagh - t'eh shen, çhengaghyn t'er jeet ass y Ladjyn - goll er loayrt ec y chooid smoo jeh'n phobble, myr Spaainish, Portiugish, as Frangish. Va'n enmys currit er bun 'sy nuyoo eash jeig son çheet er ardjyn ayns America va reirit ec ny h-Impiraghtyn Spaainagh, Portiugagh, as Frangagh. Cha nel cur sheese shickyr er yn enmys, agh t'eh ymmydit dy mennick son cur sheese er America Yiass, America Veanagh, Meksico, as ny h-ellanyn 'sy Charib. She cur sheese giare eh America Spaainagh as y Vrasseel, ny America Phortiugagh.
Ta'n enmys "America Ladjynagh" ny s'lhea na ronnaghyn elley lheid as "America Spaainagh" as "America Ibeiragh".

Ny h-Ellanyn Canaaragh:
She boodeeys hene-reiltagh jeh'n Spaainey ad ny h-Ellanyn Canaaragh (). T'ad Tenerife, Fuerteventura, Gran Canaria, Lanzarote, La Palma, La Gomera, El Hierro as La Graciosa ny preeu-ellanyn. She Las Palmas de Gran Canaria yn preeu-valley.

Diucaght y Vritaan:
She steat feudagh mean-eashagh va Diucaght y Vritaan (; ) v'er mayrn eddyr 939 (date Chah Treant-Felger) as 1547 (blein vestey ny h-enmyssyn Ree yn Rank as Diuc y Vritaan 'sy toshiagh lomarcan, Inry II y Rank). Ren y thalloo echey coodaghey lieh-innys heear-hwoaie yn Oarpey, caglit liorish y Cheayn Sheear 'sy neear as Mooir yn Eeaght 'sy twoaie. Va joarey neuhickyr echey lesh yn awin Liger 'sy jiass, as lesh y Norman as queiggaghyn Frangagh elley 'sy niar. Va'n diucaght currit er bun lurg ceau magh ny h-armeeyn Wiggynagh voish yn ard mysh y vlein 939. Va'n diucaght neuhickyr dy politickagh car y 10oo as y 11d eash as pooar caglit ec ny diucyn magh voish nyn dhallooyn persoonagh. Va mooinjerys mestit ec y diucaght lesh e nabooys Diucaght y Norman as ad ayns co-chaarjys marish y cheilley keayrtyn as troddan lesh y cheilley, gollrish y Chaggey Britaanagh-Normanagh.
Ren Inry II Hostyn ruegey yn Vritaan 'sy 12h eash veanagh as haink er dy ve ny Choontey er Naoned ayns 1158 fo conaantyn lesh Diuc Konan IV. Haink er mac Inry, Jeff, dy ve ny Ghiuc trooid e phoosey rish Cooney, y Ven-diuc eiraghtagh. Hannee reeaghyn Anjou ayns pooar derrey tuittym nyn impiraght ayns twoaie yn Rank ayns 1204. Dreill y Chrooin Rangagh cleayney as cummaght harrish y diucaght car y chooid elley jeh'n 13oo eash. Hie oardyryn maynaghoil marish pohlldey voish y lught ooasle Britaanagh er nyn mun harrish y diucaght 'sy 11d as 12h eash, as 'sy 13oo eash va'n chied fer jeh ny h-oardyryn jeirkagh bunnit ayns baljyn mooarey yn Vritaan. Vrish caggey theayagh magh 'sy 14oo eash tra ren aggyrtee choghrialtagh streeu ny mast'oc car Caggey yn Eiraght Vritaanagh, as cologidyn eigsoylagh pohlldit liorish Sostyn as y Rank.
Haink jerrey lesh y staydys neuchrogheydagh 'sy diucaght lurg baase Rank II ayns 1488. Rere eiraght, hooar e 'neen Onnee yn diucaght, agh va'n poosey roie eck scrysst liorish Ree Çhalse VIII y Rank as poose eh hene r'ee. Myr eiyrtys, hooar Ree yn Rank yn enmys Diuc y Vritaan – . Haink er y chrooin diucagh dy ve unnaneysit rish y Chrooin Rangagh ayns 1532 rere reihys ayns Steatyn y Vritaan lurg baase y Venrein Claude y Rank, y ven-diuc heyr yerrinagh.
Lurg Irree magh y Rank, as myr eiyrtys er cummaghyn pobblaghtagh eigsoylagh y reiltys Frangagh voish y vlein 1792, va'n diucaght scryssit magh as corys Frangagh ny (ny rheynnyn) currit stiagh ayns e ynnyd.

Bob Dylan:
She arraneyder Americaanagh ee Bob Dylan (r. 24 Boaldyn, 1941).

The Beach Boys:
By phossan craa-chiaullee Americaanagh ad The Beach Boys. Haink y possan ry-cheilley ayns Los Angeles 'sy vlein 1961. Va'n possan jeant seose jeh Mike Love (arraneyder), Brian Wilson (dord-ghitar, arraneyder), Carl Wilson (gitar stiuree, arraneyder), Alan Jardine (gitar ryddim, arraneyder), Dennis Wilson (drummyn) as Bruce Johnston (dord-ghitar).

Caghlaa emshyraght:
Ta’n ennym caghlaa emshyraght çheet er çhiow ny cruinney, ardjaghey çhiassid meanagh yn Dowan, as er caghlaayn elley emshyraght kyndagh rish ardjaghey daa-ocseed charboan (CO₂) 'syn aeraght. Hoshee eh lesh loshtee geayil 'sy chaghlaa mooar çhynskylagh voish y vlein 1850 magh, as t'eh goll dy mooar ny smessey dagh blein nish.

Kabylee:
She possan kynneeagh Berberagh ad ny Kabylee ( ny "Leqbayel" ny "Iqbayliyen"). She Kabylia ayns twoaie yn Algear, harrish ny Sleityn Atlasagh as shiar voish Algiers, y thalloo dooghyssagh oc. T'ad nyn bossan Berberisheyryn smoo 'syn Algear as nyn nah phossan Berberisheyryn smoo 'syn Affrick Hwoaie.
Ta ram Kabylee er nyn arraghey voish yn Algear, rere cooishyn lheid as Caggey Theayagh yn Algear, smaghtey cultooragh liorish reiltys meanagh yn Algear, as laggaghey çhynskylagh. Ta eebyrtys ny Kabylee ry-gheddyn ayns ram çheeraghyn elley jiu, goaill stiagh y Rank as ayns Québec 'sy Chanadey.
Ta ny Kabylee loayrt Kabylish, çhengey Verberagh, er y chooid smoo. Voish Arragh ny Berberee ayns 1980, t'ad er ny ve ec toshiaght y ghleashaght son enney oikoil ny çhengaghyn Berberagh 'syn Algear.

Frangee:
She possan kynneeagh as ashoon 'syn Oarpey Heear son y chooid smoo ad ny Frangee (). Ta cultoor, shennaghys, as glare Rangagh er nyn rheynn ny mast'oc, as adsyn kianglt rish çheer y Rank.
Ta ny Frangee, goaill stiagh loayreyderyn dooghyssagh ny çhengaghyn Oïl voish twoaie as mean y Rank er lheh, jeh sluight ny Goail (goaill stiagh ny Belgae) as ny Rauee (ny Goal-Rauee), chammah as jeh sluight Germaanagh lheid as ny Frankee, ny Visigothee, ny Suebi, as ny Burgoonee hie dys Goal voish y çheu hiar jeh'n Rhine lurg tuittym yn Impiraght Raueagh, chammah as adsyn voish tonnyn elley yn arraghey stiagh ta foast ayn jiu. Ren ny Loghlynee çheet dys, as cummal ayns, y Norman 'sy 10oo eash as chur ad dy mooar rish shennayraght ny Normanee. Harrish shen, ta mynlee ardjynee ayns çheusthie jeh'n Rank as linnaghyn, çhengaghyn, as cultooryn er lheh oc, goaill stiagh ny Britaanee 'sy Vritaan, ny h-Ocsitaanee 'syn Ocsitaan, ny Bascee ayns Çheer Vascagh y Rank, ny Cataloanee 'sy Yn Chataloan Hwoaie, Germaanee 'syn Alsaash, as Flandrynee ayns Flandyryn y Rank.
Ta shennaghys liauyr jeh cliaghtaghyn ynnydagh as anchaslyssyn ardjynagh ec y Rank, as ga dy vel y chooid smoo jeh'n phobbyl loayrt y Rangish, ta çhengaghyn lheid as Picardish, Poitevin-Saintongeais, Franco-Provençal, Ocsitaanish, Cataloanish, Auvergnat, Corsickish, Bascish, Flandrynish Rangagh, Francoanish Lorraine, Alsaashish, Normanish, as Britaanish goll er loayrt ayns nyn ardjynyn er lheh. Ta Arabish goll er loart dy lheeadagh chammah, y çhengey vynlagh smoo 'sy Rank, ynnyd va freilt ec y Vritaanish as yn Ocsitaanish hannah hene.
She pash lheie ee sheshaght noa-emshyragh y Rank. Voish mean y 19oo eash, hie ram sleih dys y Rank, goaill stiagh Spaainee, Portiugee, Iddaalee, Arabee as Berberee, Ewnyn, Affrickee Fo-Haharagh, Sheenee, as sleih elley voish yn Affrick, yn Niar Meanagh, as yn Aishey Hiar, as ren y reiltys, as eh cur sheese y Rank myr ashoon ooilley-ghoaillagh marish feeuidyn cadjin, moylley lheie as arreyderyn stiagh jerkit glackey rish feeuidyn as cliaghtaghyn cadjin Frangagh. Son y chooid smoo, ta seyraanee Frangagh smooinaghtyn dy nee yn ashoonaght unnane as y teyraanaght, gollrish y leigh Rangagh.
Gollrish y Rank vooar-heeragh, ta Frangee as sleigh jeh sluight Frangagh ry-gheddyn er feie ny Cruinney, goaill stiagh ayns rheynnyn as thallooyn harrish mooir y Rank lheid as ny h-Injyn Sheear Frangagh ("y Charib Rangagh"), as ayns çheeraghyn joarree as possanyn Frangisheyryn ny dyn ayndaue, lheid as yn Elveeish ("Elveeishee Rangagh"), ny Steatyn Unnaneysit ("Americaanee Rangagh"), y Chanadey ("Canadee Rangagh"), yn Argenteen ("Argenteenee Rangagh"), y Vrasseel ("Brasseelee Rangagh"), Meksico ("Meksicee Rangagh"), y Çhillee ("Shilee Rangagh") as yn Ooraguay ("Ooraguayee Rangagh").

Jaghteyrys:
Ta jaghteyrys ny ard-reillaght çheet er cummey reiltys raad dy vel pooar y reiltys freilt ec toshiagh ny possan dy hoshee neu-reiht gyn caglee ny marish kuse veg dy chaglee. She jaghteyr yn ennym ta currit er toshiagh jaghteyrys, ga dy vel enmyssyn elley currit orroo dy mennick dy h-oikoil, goaill stiagh "toshiagh", "eaghtyrane", as enmyssyn elley. Ta'n pholitickaght çheusthie jeh jaghteyrys taghyrt eddyr y jaghteyr, y kiarkyl sthie, as y chondaigys, foddee eh ve sheeoil ny elgyssagh. Foddee jaghteyryn ve currit er bun liorish "coup" caggee ta ceau yn reiltys roish magh er egin ny liorish hene-choup raad dy vel toshee reiht jannoo yn reill oc beayn. Ta jaghteyryssyn er nyn rang-oardraghey myr jaghteyryssyn caggee, jaghteyryssyn un-phartee, jaghteyryssyn persoonaghys, ny monarkaghtyn ard-chummaghtagh.
Ta'n enmys jaghteyrys çheet ass yn ymmyd echey ayns Pobblaght y Raue. Lhiassee jaghteyryssyn caggee leah 'syn eash eear-chlassicagh, ayns eash ny Shogunyn 'sy Çhapaan er lheh. Lhiassee jaghteyryssyn noa-emshiragh 'sy 19oo eash tra ren "caudillos" goaill greim er y phooar ayns America Ladjynagh. Dirree steatyn fashistagh as steatyn cummynagh magh 'syn Oarpey car ny 1920yn as ny 1930yn. Va'n Fashistaghys scryssit magh lurg y Nah Chaggey Dowanagh tra hie yn Cummynys er ny skeaylley magh dys mooar-rheynnyn elley. Haink er jaghteyryssyn persoonaghys 'syn Affrick as jaghteyryssyn caggee ayns America Ladjynagh dy ve feer chadjin car ny 1960yn as ny 1970yn. Huitt ram jaghteyryssyn ec jerrey yn Chaggey Feayrr as car y treeoo tonn jeh'n deynlaghey. Ta ram jaghteyryssyn foast ayn, as king elley girree, 'syn Affrick as 'syn Aishey er lheh, agh 'syn Oarpey Hiar myrgeddin.
Ta jaghteyryssyn stiurey reihyssyn dy mennick son leighoilid y chur er bun ny son greesaghyn y chiarail da olteynyn y phartee reilley, agh cha nee reihyssyn cohirreydagh ny corrym t'ayndaue da'n chondaigys. Ta'n shickyrys ayns jaghteyryssyn freilt er co-eignaghey ta jeant seose jeh fysseree chaglit ny vreagagh, lorgey as cur fo cosh y chondaigys politickagh, as obbraghyn elgyssyn. Foddee jaghteyryssyn tuittym liorish "coup" ny irree magh liorish possanyn condaigys niartal.

Niamh Ní Chróinín:
She çhebbeyder çhellveeish as radio ee Niamh Ní Chróinín. She çhebbeyder as ard-hebbeyder t'ee ec y çhirveish da deiney aegey t'er Cúla4, sraith chlaareeyn as bollagh noa çhellveeish yn Yernish. Ta kiangley mooar eck ayns taghyrtyn Yernish da deiney aegey as t'ee ny h-ambassadeyr ec Cúla4 foast ec taghyrtyn da deiney aegey er fei'n çheer.
Coorse bea.
Va Niamh ruggit ayns Divlyn, as v'ee gobbraghey roish shoh myr markiagh jysk lesh TodayFM, 98FM, Raidió RíRá as Raidió na Gaeltachta. She briw v'ee er y straih "Junior Eurovision" er TG4. She "Bean an Tí" t'ee dy mennick ec BEO – co-hirrey kiaullee Oireachtas na Gaeilge as ec y cho-hirrey Scléip Ghael-Linn. 

Sheeidey:
She frauaig phroteen najooragh eh sheeidey as foddee cummaghyn jeh ve feeit myr eggaghyn feeit. Ta frauaig phroteen y çheeidey jeant ass fibroin son y chood smoo, as eh er n'ghientyn liorish laarvaghyn beishteigyn ennagh as ad jannoo cocoonyn. Ta'n sheeidey share ennit goit ass cocoonyn laarvaghyn crooag heeidey yn chrouw smeyr "Bombyx mori" ta troggit 'sy vondiaght (troggal dhianeyn sheeidey). Ta caslys skelley yn çheeidey çheet ass strughtoor prismagh ny frauaigyn sheidey ta lhiggey da eaddagh sheeidey aaskellaghey sollys ta çheet da ec uillinyn eigsoyllagh, as daaghyn caghlaaee gientit myr eiyrtys.
Ta'n sheeidey goll er ghientyn liorish shiartanse dy veishteigyn; agh, dy cadjin, cha nel agh sheeidey y phraddag lhemyn goll er ymmyd ayns jantys eggaghyn feeit. Ta'n sheeidey goll er ghientyn liorish laarvaghyn beishteigyn ta goll trooid ooilley-hoe, agh ta beishteigyn ennagh, lheid ass sneeuderyn moggyl as griaranyn caignagh, gientyn sheeidey er feie nyn mea oc. Chammah's shen, ta gientyn sheeidey ry-akin ayns hymenoptera (shellanyn, connspeaghyn, as snienganyn), yeeastyn argid, quaillagyn Voaldyn, caraigyn, jarganyn, quaillagyn, as midjeyn. Ta arthropodyn elley, lheid as doo oalleeyn, gientyn sheeidey chammah.

Victoria Justice:
She ben-aghteyr as arraneyder Americaanagh ee Victoria Dawn Justice (ruggit er 19 Toshiaght Arree 1993). T'ee er ny gheddyn shairtanse d'accolaidyn, goaill stiagh daa Aundyr Young Artist as enmyssaghtyn son tree Aundyr Imagen, Aundyr NAACP Image, as tree aundyr Kids' Choice.
Ren Justice cloie da'n chied cheayrt marish tuarystal cuirreydagh er y straih drama aittys "Gilmore Girls" (2003), as haink enney urree er Nickelodeon, cloie Lola Martinez er y straih drama aittys "Zoey 101" (2005–2008), Tori Vega er y sitcom jeigeyr "Victorious" (2010–2013), as Jordan Sands 'sy scannane atçhim aittys "The Boy Who Cried Werewolf" (2010). Lurg shen, ren ee cloie 'sy scannane aittys romansagh "The First Time" (2012), y scannane jeigeyr "Fun Size" (2012), y scannane drama aittys "Naomi and Ely's No Kiss List" (2015), y scannane aittys jeigeyr "The Outcasts" (2017), y scannane romansagh "Trust" (2021), y scannane aittys "Afterlife of the Party" (2021), as y scannane aittys romansagh "A Perfect Pairing" (2022). Chammah's shen, ren ee cloie yn paart toshee myr Lindy Sampson 'sy straih hellveeish creaueagh "Eye Candy" (2015) liorish MTV. 
'Sy chiaull, ta Justice er ny recortyssey shiartanse d'arraneyn son cassanyn-sheean da ny shalleeyn aghteyrys eck, goaill stiagh "Victorious" as yn obbyr chiaullee lesh Nickelodeon "Spectacular!" (2009). Va'n chied hingyl eck, "Gold", skeaylt magh ayns 2013. Hie ee er hiatys feie shiaght bleeaney voish y chiaull, agh haink ee er-ash lesh yn arrane "Treat Myself" va skeaylt magh ayns Nollick 2020.

Zión Moreno:
She aghteyr as craishteyder Americaanagh ee Zión Moreno (ruggit er 23 Toshiaght Arree 1995). T'ee mie er enney son e paartyn çhellveeish 'sy straih "Control Z" liorish Netflix as ayns aachummey HBO Max jeh'n straih "Gossip Girl" (2021) chammah as son e paart 'sy scannane "K-12" va screeuit as stiurit ec Melanie Martinez.
Seihll aeg.
Va Moreno ruggit ayns El Paso, Texas, lesh paarantyn Meksicagh; ta e moir çheet ass Chihuahua as ta e ayr çheet ass Monterrey. V'ee troggit ayns Albuquerque, New Mexico as loayr ee yn Spaainish 'sy thie.
She ben tessen-cheintyssagh ee Moreno as hoshee ee caghlaa tra v'ee foast 'sy scoill; car y lhing shen ren e cooidjaghtee braggartaghey ish.
Coorse bea.
Darree Moreno dys Caayr York Noa tra v'ee 19 bleeaney d'eash son coorse bea y gheddyn 'sy chraishtey. V'ee scrialtit ec jantyssyn Wilhelmina, Elite, as Slay. Hoshiaght, ren ee smooinaghtyn dy nee red doolaneagh va'n craishtey agh t'ee nish smooinaghtyn dy vel eh lane soiaghey mooar.
Ren ee çhebbal Aundyryn TV Awards ec MIPCOM 2017 ayns Cannes.
Ren ee cloie da'n chied cheayrt er y scaailan tra chloie ee Fleur 'sy scannane kiaullee far-rieughagh "K-12" ayns 2019. Ayns 2020, hoshee ee cloie Isabela de la Fuente 'sy drama jeigeyr Meksicagh "Control Z" er Netflix. Ayns Mayrnt 2020, v'eh fogrit dy row ee reiht son Luna La y chloie 'sy straih "Gossip Girl" liorish HBO Max, aachummey bog jeh'n straih vunneydagh hie magh er 8 Jerrey Souree 2021.

Daniela Vega:
She aghteyr as arraneyder eddyr-ghooagh Shilleeagh ee Daniela Vega Hernández (ruggit er 3 Mean Souree 1989). Ta enney share urree son e cloie ard-voyllagh 'sy scannane "A Fantastic Woman" (2017). Ec 90oo Aundyryn Academy ayns 2018, haink er Vega dy ve ny chied dooinney tessen-cheintyssagh rieau çhebbal ec ny h-Aundyryn. Ayns 2018, ren yn earishlioar "Time" enmyssey Vega myr nane jeh ny 100 deiney smoo cummaghtagh 'sy Dowan.

Daniela Santiago:
She craishteyder as aghteyr Spaainagh ee Daniela Santiago Villena (ruggit ayns Málaga, y Spaainey, er 1 Averil 1982). Ta enney mie urree son e paart myr Cristina "La Veneno" 'sy straih veashnyssagh "Veneno" (2020). Son e paart 'sy straih shen, chossyn ee Aundyr Ondas.

Navya Singh:
She aghteyr, craishteyder, as daunseyr Injinagh ee Navya Singh (ruggit er 23 Nollick 1989).
Seihll leah.
Va Navya Singh ruggit lesh lught thie Sikhagh cumaadagh ayns Lakshmipur, balley beg ayns Slyst Katihar, Bihar. Hoshee ee goll trooid jymmoose olk tra v'ee aeg as hoshee ee cur ee hene myr jeigeyr bwoirrin. Darree ee dys Mumbai ayns 2011, as cheaghil ee e ennym dys Navya. Lurg lhing ghiare cummal marish dooinney mooinjeragh nagh row cohassooagh rish e enney keintyssagh, darree ee çheusthie jeh Mumbai as hoshee ee gobbraghey myr daunseyr. Tra reih ee goll trooid laue-lheeys aa-livreys keintys, haink e moir dys Mumbai son ish y chohassooaghey trooid yn obbraid.
Coorse bea.
Cloie as daunse.
Roish my daink urree dy ve ny craishteyder, ren ee obbraghey myr daunseyr ayns scannaneyn as straihyn çhellveeish. Ayns 2017, ren ee cloie er y çhellveeish 'sy straih chimmeeys "Savdhaan India" er y vollagh Life OK, as 'sy feeshan kiaullee "Shiver" liorish Monica Dogra.
Ren ee daunsey 'sy scannane "Pledge To Protect" ayns 2021. 
T'ee er ny chremmey çhynskyl scannaneaght yn Injey er yn oyr dy vel aghteyryn kis-cheintyssagh reiht son paartyn tessen-cheintyssagh, nagh vel deiney tessen-cheintyssagh reiht son paartyn bwoirrin ny firryn, as dy vel tessen-cheintyssee er nyn daishbyney ayns scannaneyn Bollywood myr "...nheeghyn faghid, ny mian gyn graih."
Craishtey.
Va'n chied tuarystal eck myr craishteyder ec Shiaghtin Fassan Lakme ayns 2016, raad she ish va'n ynrican ben tessen-cheintyssagh v'ayn. T'ee er ny chraishtey eaddeeyn va kiaddit ec Wendell Rodricks as Archana Kochhar.
Ayns 2018, ambasseyder cowree v'ee son Miss Transqueen India, tostyl aalid son mraane tessen-cheintyssagh.

Vincent van Gogh:
She peinteyr Eear-Impressionagh Ollanagh va Vincent Willem van Gogh (30 Mayrnt 1853 – 29 Jerrey Souree 1890). Lurg e vaaish, haink er dy ve coontit myr fer jeh ny figgyryn smoo ennoil as smoo cummaghtagh ayns shennaghys ellyn y Theihill Heear. Harrish jeihaght, chroo eh mysh 2,100 obbraghyn, goaill stiagh mysh 860 caslyssyn ooill, y chooid smoo jeu jeant 'sy daa vlein jerrinagh jeh'n vea echey. T'ad goaill stiagh reayrtyn çheerey, jallooyn neu-vio, co-chaslyssyn, as hene-chochaslyssyn marish daaghyn creeoil as skeabeydys dramadagh, breeoil, as trome-cheayllagh lhig da bunneeaght yn ellyn noa-emshyragh. Cha row rah hraghtee echey as, er cooishyn y verginaght as y voghtinys, hooar eh baase rere dunverys hene tra v'eh 37 bleeaney d'eash. 
Va van Gogh ruggit lesh lught thie meanvrastyllagh ooasle. She paitçhey trome, kiune, as smooinaghtagh v'eh. Hoshee eh tayrn tra v'eh foast aeg as tra v'eh ny ghooinney aeg ren eh obbraghey myr delleyder ellyn, jurnaaghey dy mennick, agh haink merginaght er tra v'eh scughit dys Lunnin. Chass eh dys y chraueeaght as cheau eh lhing ghiare myr çhaghter Phrotestoonagh y tushtal ayns jiass y Velg. Feie tammylt v'eh beaghey eddyr drogh-laynt as y lomarcanys roish my doshee eh peintal ayns 1881 lurg haink eh er-ash dys y valley echey marish e phaarantyn. Ren e vraar aeg Theo meansal eh; ren y jees jeu freill co-reggyrtys liauyr lesh lettyryn chur da'n enney echey myr ellyneyr lurg e vaaish.
Cha nel daaghyn soilsheanagh sampleyragh yn obbyr yeianagh echey ry-akin ayns ny h-obbraghyn leah echey, va jeant seose jeh caslyssyn neu-vio as tuarystallyn labbreeyn y theay. Ayns 1886, darree eh dys Paarys raad haink eh quail olteynyn y ghleashaght "avant-garde", goaill stiagh Émile Bernard as Paul Gauguin, va aa-reggyrt noi yn ennaghtyn Impressionagh. As yn obbyr echey lhiassaghey, chroo eh troa noa dys y jallooderys neu-vio as y reayrt çheerey. Haink er e chaslyssyn dy ve ny s'gilley car y lhing echey ayns Arles ayns jiass y Rank ayns 1888. Car y lhing shen, ren eh mooadaghey cooishyn yn obbyr echey son straihyn biljyn olive, magheryn curnee, as lussyn ny greinney y ghoaill stiagh.
Hurr van Gogh voish y çhingys aignagh, episodeyn shickoysagh, shaghraneyn as, ga dy row eh boirey er y çhickyrys inçhynagh echey, ren eh meerioose er e slaynt fishigoil, cha ren eh ee dy kiart as diu eh dy trome. Haink jerrey lesh e chaarjys marish Gauguin lurg arganeys eddyr y jees oc tra ren van Gogh giarrey peesh jeh'n chleaysh chlee echey liorish skynn-vaaree. Eisht, cheau eh lhingyn ayns thieyn lheihys shickeeatragh, goaill stiagh lhing ayns Saint-Rémy. Lurg ren eh seyrrey eh hene voish ny thieyn lheihys as erreish da arraghey dys yn Auberge Ravoux ayns Auvers-sur-Oise faggys da Paarys, haink eh fo currym y fer lhee homeopathagh Paul Gachet. Hannee y verginaght ayn as er 27 July 1890, t'eh er credjal dy ren van Gogh lhiggey eh hene 'sy chleeau liorish gunnane as hooar eh baase daa laa ny yei marish e vraar Theo ry-laue.
Cha ren van Gogh creck ny caslyssyn echey tra v'eh foast er mayrn as s'mennick dy row eh coontit myr fer keoie as rey, ga dy ren çhaghleyderyn ennagh cur enney er feeuid yn obbyr echey. Cha daink enney mooar er agh lurg e vaaish. Ta schoillaryn jiu cur enney da paart y çhuyr 'sy leigh echey - Jo Bonger-Van Gogh - ayns cummey as ardjaghey yn ard-ghoo echey myr ellyneyr. Daase eh ayns smooinaghtyn y theay myr ard-cheeayllagh nagh row toiggit car e heihll. Daase yn enney echey car y 20oo eash leah tra va peeshyn y vod echey goit stiagh liorish ny Fauvee as ny h-Expressionee Ghermaanagh. Harrish ny jeihaghtyn eiyrtyssagh, hooar eh rah chremeydagh as hraghtee as t'eh coontit jiu myr peinteyr scanshoil as doo-skeealagh ta cur rish smooinaght romansagh yn ellyneyr angaaishagh.
Jiu, ta obbraghyn van Gogh coonit mastey ny caslyssyn smoo deyr 'sy Dowan as ta onnor currit da'n leggad echey liorish Thie Tashtee van Gogh va currit er bun liorish reiltys y Çheer Injil ayns Amsterdam.

Caitríona Balfe:
She aghteyr, gienteyder, as aa-chraishteyder fassan Yernagh ee Caitríona Mary Balfe (ruggit er 4 Jerrey Fouyir 1979). Ta enney share urree son e paart toshee myr Claire Fraser 'sy straih drama henndeeagh "Outlander" (2014–jiu) liorish Starz raad chossyn ee Aundyr British Academy Scotland, Aundyr Irish Film and Television, daa Aundyr People's Choice as tree Aundyryn Saturn. Chammah's shen, chossyn ee enmyssaghtyn son daa Aundyr Critics' Choice Television as kiare Aundyryn Golden Globe son y Ven-aghteyr Share ayns Straih Hellveeish - Drama.
Tra v'ee hoght bleeaney jeig d'eash as ee jannoo studeyryssyn er y drama ec Undinys Çhaghnoaylleeaght, Divlyn, hooar Balfe obbyr myr craishteyder fassan ayns Paarys. Feie jeih bleeaney, v'ee ry-akin ayns faghtyssyn soilsheenys as er roie-vollee son cowraghyn lheid as Chanel, Dolce & Gabbana, Alexander McQueen, Balenciaga, Givenchy, Bottega Veneta as Oscar de la Renta roish my ren ee jeeraghey er y chloie. Va paartyn toshee eck ayns ny straihyn moggylagh "The Beauty Inside" (2012) as "" (2012–2013), as chloie ee ayns ny scannaneyn "Super 8" (2011), "Now You See Me" (2013), "Escape Plan" (2013), "Money Monster" (2016), "Ford v Ferrari" (2019) as "Belfast" (2021).

Brendan Gleeson:
She aghteyr as stiureyder scannane Yernagh eh Brendan Gleeson (ruggit er 29 Mayrnt 1955). She fowder tree Aundyryn IFTA, daa Aundyr British Independent Film, as Aundyr Primetime Emmy t'eh as t'eh er ny ve enmyssit daa cheayrt son Aundyr BAFTA as kiare keayrtyn son Aundyr Golden Globe. Ayns 2020, va currit sheese 'sy 18oo ynnyd er rolley ny h-aghteyryn Yernagh share liorish "The Irish Times". She ayr eh lesh ny h-aghteyryn Domhnall Gleeson as Brian Gleeson.
Ta enney share er son e chloie myr Alastor "Mad-Eye" Moody ayns straih scannane "Harry Potter" (2005–2010). Ta enney mie er chammah son e phaartyn cohassooagh ayns scannanyn lheid as "Braveheart" (1995), "Michael Collins" (1996), "The General" (1998), "28 Days Later" (2002), "Gangs of New York" (2002), "Cold Mountain" (2003), "Troy" (2004), "Suffragette" (2015), "Paddington 2" (2017), "The Ballad of Buster Scruggs" (2018), as "The Tragedy of Macbeth" (2021) myrane lesh e phaartyn toshee ayns "In Bruges" (2008), "The Guard" (2011), "Calvary" (2014), "Frankie" (2014), as "The Banshees of Inisherin" (2022).
Chossyn eh Aundyr Primetime Emmy ayns 2009 son e phaart myr Winston Churchill 'sy scannane çhellveeish "Into the Storm". Hooar eh enmyssaght son Aundyr Golden Globe son e chloie myr Donald Trump 'sy straih "The Comey Rule" (2020) liorish Showtime. Voish 2017 derrey 2019 chloie eh 'sy straih chimmeeys "Mr. Mercedes". Hooar eh enmyssaght son Aundyr Emmy son e phaart 'sy straih aittys "State of the Union" (2022) liorish Stephen Frears.

Diego Velázquez:
She peinteyr Spaainagh va Diego Rodríguez de Silva y Velázquez (bashtit er 6 Mean Souree 1599 – 6 Luanistyn 1660). She ard-ellyneyr ayns quaiyl Ree Pilib IV y Spaainey as y Phortiugal as Eash Airhey yn Spaainey. She ellyneyr liehlagh yn eash Varockagh (m.1600–1750) v'eh. Hoshee eh peintal ayns aght tenebragh, as ny s'anmey lhiassee eh aght ny seyrey ghow stiagh skeabeydys trome. Goll rish cummaghyn reayrtyn jesh scansh hendeeagh as chultooragh, pheintal eh ram cochaslyssyn vooinjer reeoil y Spaainey as fir heay, çheet dys y vullagh 'syn ard-obbyr echey, "Las Meninas" (1656).
Haink er caslyssyn Velázquez dy ve ny chiaddey da peinteyryn rieughagh as impressionagh. 'Sy 20oo eash, ren ellyneyryn lheid as Pablo Picasso, Salvador Dalí, as Francis Bacon moylley Velázquez trooid aa-obbraghey fir jeh ny caslyssyn jallooagh echey.
Va'n chooid smoo jeh'n obbyr echey goit stiagh ayns çhaglym reeoil y Spaainey, as ta'n çhaglym share ry-gheddyn ayns Museo del Prado ayns Madrid, ga dy row caslyssyn ennagh giootit myr giootyn diploamagh lesh fer jeu giootit dys ny Habsburgyn Austeyragh. 

Myo Ko Ko San:
She craishteyder tessen-cheintyssagh, immeeaghtagh er son cairyn LADT, as cosneyder tostyl aalid Burmagh ee Myo Ko Ko San (; ruggit er 1 Mean Fouyir 1994). Er 19 Mean Souree 2018, chossyn ee Aundyryn ASEAN - LGBT Community Pride.
Bea leah as ynsagh.
Va Myo Ko Ko San ruggit er 1 Mean Fouyir 1994 ayns Mandalay, Myanmar, myr guilley. She ish y nah phaitçhey ass tree chloan, marish shenn vraar as braar aeg. Hoshee ee goll trooid jymmoose olk keintyssagh 'sy lambaanid eck, as hoshee ee caghlaa e keintys tra v'ee 15 bleeaney d'eash tra v'ee foast 'sy scoill. Ghow ee jerrey lesh e lhaue-lheeys aa-livreys keintys 'sy Çheer Thai tra v'ee 23 bleeaney d'eash. Ren ee studeyrys er y jeshaghteyrys shivoil ec Ollooscoill Haghnoaylleeagh, Mandalay.
Tostylys.
Miss Rainbow Ribbon 2013.
Ayns 2013, ren ee cohirrey ayns Miss Rainbow Ribbon 2013, tostyl son mraane tessen-cheintyssagh hie er taghyrt er 23 Jerrey Fouyir 2013 ec Hotel Mandalay liorish Rainbow Ribbon Network Myanmar. Erreish j'ee yn tostyl y chossyn, v'ee reiht son shassoo er son Myanmar son Miss International Queen 2014, y tostyl aalid da mraane tessen-cheintyssagh smoo 'sy Dowan.
Miss International Queen 2014.
Hass ee er son Myanmar ec y tostyl Miss International Queen 2014 hie er taghyrt er 7 Sauin 2014 ayns Pattaya, y Çheer Thai, marish cohirreyderyn voish 20 ashoonyn elley. Haink ee stiagh 'sy chied ynnyd son Schleiyn.
Miss Universe Myanmar 2022.
She Myo Ko Ko San y chied ven tessen-cheintyssagh cohirrey ayns Tostyl Miss Universe Myanmar. Haink ee stiagh mastey ny 10 cohirreyderyn syrjey ayns Miss Universe Myanmar 2022.
Coorse bea.
Erreish j'ee cohirrey 'sy tostyl Miss International Queen 2014, va enney currit urree myr Miss International Queen Myanmar, as haink urree dy ve ny far-chraishteyder as ny h-aghteyr. 

Tatumn Milazzo:
She bluckaneyr soccer keirdagh Americaanagh ee Tatumn Marie Milazzo (ruggit er 17 Averil 1998). T'ee cloie myr fendeilagh marish y chlub Chicago Red Stars ayns Leeg Ashoonagh Hoccer ny Mraane.
Coorse bea.
Va Milazzo ruggit ayns Orland Park, Illinois, as hoshee e coorse bea marish Chicago Eclipse Select roish my ren ee goll stiagh ayns Ollooscoill Carolina Yiass as cloie soccer colaashtagh son South Carolina Gamecocks. Car y lhing eck marish ny Gamecocks voish 2016 derrey 2019, chloie Milazzo 80 gammanyn as scoaral 3 deanyn. V'ee cloie mastey ny Gamecocks tra ren ad cosney tree enmys y Chohagloo Hiar Yiass ayns 2016, 2017, as 2019.

Andreja Pejić:
She craishteyder as aghteyr Austrailagh ee Andreja Pejić (ruggit myr Andrej Pejić er 28 Luanistyn 1991). Erreish j'ee çheet magh myr ben tessen-cheintyssagh ayns 2013, t'ee nish coontit myr nane jeh ny craishteyderyn tessen-cheintyssagh smoo ennit er y theihll.

Emma Ellingsen:
She craishteyder as persoonid YouTube Norlynnagh ee Emma Ellingsen (ruggit er 9 Mean Fouyir 2001). Ta e bollagh YouTube jeant seose jeh brastyllyn cosmaidagh, blogyn feeshan, as blogyn feeshan troailt. Ta Ellingsen fo-screeuit lesh y jantys craishtee Team Models.
Bea leah.
Va Ellingsen troggit ayns Nøtterøy, balley ta soit mysh oor er y traen voish Oslo. Haink Ellingsen magh dys e mooinjer as e caarjyn myr ben tessen-cheintyssagh tra v'ee nou bleeaney d'eash. Myr paitçhey, v'ee ry-akin 'sy scannane feanishagh Norlynnagh "Born in the Wrong Body" ren jeeraghey er ish as paitçhyn tessen-cheintyssagh elley ayns Norlynn.

Bertram Kelly:
She jeshaghteyr Manninagh va Bertram George Kelly (4 Jerrey Geuree 1884 – 1976). V'eh ruggit ayns Doolish, Mannin, as ta enney mie er son cur soilshey lectragh dys Mannin.
Bea leah.
Va Kelly ruggit lesh lught thie marrinagh Manninagh er 4 Jerrey Geuree 1884. She mac lesh Margaret Quirk as y Captan James Kelly v'eh. She captan lhuingey va'n ayr echey darree e choorse bea anmagh 'sy theihll echey dy ve ny reireyder er "Southend-on-Sea Pier, Pavilion and Electric Tramways" ayns 1887. Erreish da'n phointeil echey, darree y Captan Kelly as e lught thie dys Sostyn.
Va Kelly ynsit ec Ard-scoill Ghuillyn Southend as Colleish Walton roish my ren eh studeyrys er y jeshaghteyrys lectragh ec y Cholleish Haghnoil Reeoil ayns Glaschu.Lurg yn ynsaghey echey, ghow Kelly staartaghyn soilshey lectragh marish Midland Railway, Coonseil Choontae Lunnin as Coonseil Chorpagh Hornsey. Tra v'eh ayns Lunnin, she oltey gastey Heshaght Vanninagh Lunnin v'eh.
Cur soilshey lectragh dys Mannin.
Darree Kelly er-ash dys Mannin ayns 1920 raad v'eh pointit myr jeshaghteyr ard-choonee lesh Raad-Yiarn Lectragh Vannin. Daa vlein ny yei, ayns 1922, v'eh pointit myr y chied Yeshaghteyr Lectragh lesh Balley Corpagh Ghoolish - y vlein cheddin hie "Slattys Soilshey as Bree Valley Corpagh Ghoolish" trooid Tinvaal. Ren eh lowal da rick y reayll harrish troggal stashoon bree Heu Hwoaie ny Purt.
Coorse agglishagh.
Lurg dirree eh magh as y çhaghnoaylleeaght, ghow Kelly toshiaght lesh coorse bea noa 'syn agglish. Erreish da ve oardit ayns Agglish Hostyn, haink er dy ve ny viggar er Skeerey Vraddan ayns 1950. Dobbree eh lesh y skeerey feie 14 bleeaney derrey dirree eh magh ayns 1964. Ghow eh shirveishyn agglishagh magh fo'n speyr dagh Jedoonee car y tourey myr ayrn jeh ny currymyn echey.
Bea phersoonagh.
Phoose Kelly rish Daisy Christian ass Doolish ec Keeill y Dowin, faggys da Laksaa, ayns 1911. Va tree 'neen oc, ny lannoonyn Sybil Marjorie as Joan Christian, va ruggit ayns 1912, as Monica Joyce, va ruggit ayns 1917. Hooar eh baase ayns 1976 tra v'eh 92 vlein d'eash.

Sienna Grace:
She aa-aghteyr pornograafagh as aa-chraishteyder an-ghraagh tessen-cheintyssagh Americaaanagh ee Sienna Grace (ruggit ayns Los Angeles, California er 23 Boaldyn 1989).
Beashnys.
Va Grace ruggit ayns Los Angeles, California, er 23 Boaldyn 1989. V'ee troggit ayns Bakersfield, caayr ta soit 'sy steat cheddin. Ayns Boaldyn 2013, tra v'ee er roshtyn 24 bleeaney d'eash as erreish j'ee toshiaghey lesh yn obbraghey broddagagh, hoshee ee gobbraghey 'sy çhynskyl pornograafagh.
Ta'n ennym ardan eck çheet ass karacteyr 'sy straih phaitçhey "Hannah Montana".
Dirree ee ass y çhynskyl ayns 2015 erreish j'ee ny smoo na 40 scannane y recortyssey as shiartanse dy feeshanyn er ShemaleYum.com as TsPlayground.com.
Mastey ny scannaneyn jeant eck, t'ad goaill stiagh "Next She-Male Idol 7", "Tranny Handies 2", "TS Playground 6", "Rogue Adventures 41", "T-Girl Up and Cummers" as "The Trans X-Perience".

Robbie Coltrane:
She aghteyr as fer aitt Albinagh va Anthony Robert McMillan (30 Mayrnt 1950 –14 Jerrey Fouyir 2022), hie er enney dy keirdagh myr Robbie Coltrane. Hooar eh enney eddyr-ashoonagh myr Rubeus Hagrid 'sy straih scannane "Harry Potter" (2001–2011), as myr Valentin Dmitrovich Zukovsky ayns ny scannaneyn James Bond "GoldenEye" (1995) as "The World Is Not Enough" (1999). V'eh pointit lesh OBE ayns Onnoryn y Vlein Noa 2006 liorish y Venrein Ealisaid II son ny shirveishyn echey lesh y drama. 

Rafael Orozco Maestre:
She kiaulleyder, arraneyder as cloieder Colombagh va Rafael José Orozco Maestre (24 Mayrnt, 1954 - 11 Mean Souree, 1992).

Rishi Sunak:
Rishi Sunak (ruggit er 12 Boaldyn 1980), she politickeyr Goaldagh va reiht myr Ard-vinishter y Reeriaght Unnaneysit as Toshiagh y Phartee Cumaadagh ayns Jerrey Fouyir 2022. She Shirveishagh Tashtee yn Reeriaght Unnaneysit v'eh voish 2020 derrey 2022 as Ard-scrudeyr y Tashtee voish 2019 derrey 2020. She oltey yn Pharlamaid (MP) son Richmond (Yorks) t'eh voish 2015.
Va Sunak ruggit ayns Southampton lesh paarantyn jeh sluight Injinagh darree dys y Vretyn Vooar voish yn Affrick Hiar car ny 1960yn. V'eh ynsit ec Colleish Winchester, raad chossyn eh keim 'sy fallsoonys, politickaght as tarmaynys (PPE) ec Colleish Lincoln, Aah yn Ollee, as MBA voish Ollooscoill Stanford ayns California myr Schoillar Fulbright. Tra v'eh ec Stanford, hie eh quail e ven heshee ry-heet Akshata Murty, neen lesh N. R. Narayana Murthy, y billooneyr as delleyder Injinagh chroo Infosys. Lurg dirree eh magh as yn ynsagh, ren Sunak gobbraghey marish Goldman Sachs as ny s'anmey myr parteeas ec ny colughtyn sthock-argid cleiyee Children's Investment Fund Management as Theleme Partners.
Va Sunak reiht da Quaiyl y Reeriaght Unnaneysit son Richmond ayns Yorkshire Hwoaie ec ard-reihys y Reeriaght Unnaneysit 2015, geiyrt er William Hague. Hass Sunak er son Brexit car y refrane bentyn rish olteynys yn UO ayns 2016. V'eh pointit dys nah-reiltys Theresa May myr Fo-scrudeyr Parlamaidagh y Steat cour Gurneilys Ynnydagh ayns aa-vestey yn vlein 2018. Lurg dirree Theresa May magh, hass eh er son faghtys Boris Johnson dy ve reiht myr toshiagh y Phartee Cumaadagh. Tra va Johnson reiht as pointit myr Ard-vinishter, ren eh pointeil Sunak myr Ard-scrudeyr y Tashtee. Va Sunak eiyrtyssagh er Sajid Javid myr Shirveishagh y Tashtee lurg dirree eh magh car aa-vestey ard-choyrle Hoshiaght Arree 2020.
Myr Shirveishagh, s'ard-ghooagh va Sunak ayns freggyrtys argidoil y reiltys car pandemagh COVID-19 'sy Reeriaght Unnaneysit as y builley echey er tarmaynys y çheer, goaill stiagh ny skeimyn Coronavirus Job Retention as Eat Out to Help Out. Dirree eh magh myr Shirveishagh er 5 Jerrey Souree 2022 roish dirree Johnson magh car geyre-ghaue reiltys y Reeriaght Unnaneysit ayns Jerrey Souree 2022. Hass Sunak ayns reihys toshiaghys y Phartee Cumaadagh son eiyrt er Johnson, raad chaill eh reihys ny h-olteynyn ayns foayr Liz Truss. Lurg dirree Truss magh car geyre-ghaue reiltys elley, va Sunak reiht myr Toshiagh y Phartee Cumaadagh gyn reihys. V'eh pointit myr yn Ard-vinishter er 25 Jerrey Fouyir 2022, tra haink er dy ve ny chied Aishanagh Goaldagh as ny chied Hindugh va reiht as pointit da'n oik shen.

Ava Kolker:
She aghteyr paitçhey Americaanagh ee Ava Grace Kolker (ruggit er 5 Nollick 2006). Ta enney er Kolker son e paartyn myr Ava Morgenstern 'sy straih "Girl Meets World" (2014–2017) er y Disney Channel, as myr Olive Rozalski er "Sydney to the Max" (2019–2021). 'Sy scannaneaght, chloie ee Lily ayns "Scary Movie 5" (2013), Heather ayns "Miss Meadows" (2014), Boot ayns "Message from the King" (2016) as Elise Rainer aeg ayns "" (2018).
Bea leah.
Va Kolker ruggit ayns Los Angeles, California. Ta tree shuyr eck, Kayla Kolker, Jade Kolker as Lexy Kolker, ta ny h-aghteyr chammah as ta goll er enney son e paart myr Chloe 'sy scannane atçhim "Freaks" voish y vlein 2018.

Caroline Rhea:
She aghteyr Canadagh as ben aitt hassagh ee Caroline Gilchrist Rhea (ruggit er 13 Averil 1964) ta share er enney son e paart myr Hilda Spellman 'sy straih "Sabrina the Teenage Witch" liorish ABC.
T'ee er ny chloie shiartanse dy haishbynyssyn aittys er lheh, goaill stiagh taishbynyssyn shassagh son HBO, Showtime, as Bravo. Ta enney mie urree chammah myr goo Linda Flynn-Fletcher 'sy straih "Phineas and Ferb" liorish y Disney Channel as myr karacteyr reiltagh ayns "Hollywood Squares" marish e carrey Whoopi Goldberg. Va Rhea reiht ec Rosie O'Donnell myr ben oast e claare hellveeish va enmyssit "The Caroline Rhea Show") as ren ee çhebbey yn claare çhellveeish rieughagh "The Biggest Loser" er NBC ayns ny chied tree imbagh. V'ee ry-akin dy mennick er "Match Game" liorish ABC marish Alec Baldwin as t'ee aavioghey e paart myr Eugenia Scrimmage 'sy straih scannane "Bruno & Boots" as Noleta Nethercott ayns "A Very Sordid Wedding". Darree ee er ash ny s'anmey dys y Disney Channel er y straih "Sydney to the Max", cloie paart Grandma Judy.
